reviews:
["Great apartment with the perfect location if you  need something downtown! It's clean, cozy, peaceful and has anything you need!", "We had a fantastic stay in Sofia. Tony was super helpful with giving advice and communicating ahead of time. The apartment was very classy, clean, and super comfortable. I definitely recommend this place to anyone coming to explore Sofia!", "It was great! A super cute flat that is really close to city centre, but it's not noisy at all.", "I can only spend good words for this spot and this host, Tony was very kind and full of advise for us! The best in town", "Perfect location in the city centre, 5 min walking to Vitosha, free parking,clean apartment, good comunication, share toilet. I recommend it.", "The check-in here is very streamlined and easy, and you could not ask for a better location. Everything we wanted to do was a short walking distance away, making public transportation unnecessary. Nearby are several excellent restaurants. As well, most of the major sights are grouped in downtown Sofia, which is in very short walking distance.

The internet here worked great, there was a kitchen available to cook in, though we personally did not use it for more than making some coffee, as there are so many good and cheap places to eat nearby. Would recommend Furma for coffee and a pastry ( or no pastry ).

Overall an excellent location, value, and a kind host. I wouldn't hesitate to stay here.", "Everything was great during our stay in Tony's and Vera's house. The location is great and we got to experience a great hospitality.
Tony was very helpful with all our questions and her recommendations where to go and what to see were awesome too.
I would definetly recommend this home to everybody visiting Sofia.", "We can just recommed Tony&Vera place, It's really good location and flat is situated in silent yard. Room was pretty nice and adequate for the price. Thank you guys", "A great place you can rent from great people!", "Nice place and close to everything.", "Great place in the city center, host had no problem adapting to last minute reservation changes :)", "Very nice host and perfect position ", "
The private room is at centre, Serdika metro is walkable (just 500mts). Close to all main attractions in the city and Serdika has direct connection to Sofia airport. Also many restaurants, supermarkets near by.
Tony&Vera clearly mentioned the self check in guidelines. But there was confusion that the street address in listing was wrong, then while in chat Tony gives me the exact one

About private room. Its cosy has shared washroom and basic kitchen. Best suits for family with one kid. Clean and neat. Recommended for all. We had single day stop over at Sofia and enjoyed very well", "Perfect ", "A clean and very well located place in the heart of the city. Highly recommended", "Nice place to stay when visiting Sofia. Room was a great size, quiet area and good location.", "cool apartment in the heart of Sofia!", "Great location, really in the heart of the city, all sightseeings are in a walking distance. The best choice for travelers by car because of private parking place (in the center of Sofia it is difficult to park).
Thanks for warm welcome!", "We really enjoyed Tony & Vera’s place. It was very clean and comfortable and the location was great. Definitely recommend.", "Vera is a great host and very welcoming! Helping us out with lots of local tips. The apartment is very comfortable, clean and in the very center of Sofia.
Everything was great and we’re definitely gonna come back!
A plus is her super adorable dog , we miss her already !!!!", "Its a nice place and really centric you can walk everywhere from there", "The Tony&Vera's  room is very good place for short stay in the center of Sofia.
It is quite and clean.
It has everithing for 3 people to stay in very very central location.
It has car parking capability.
It is highly recommended.", "A great little place in a very central location :) ", "Tony and Vera are two lovely hosts who’ve helped us a lot with our stay in Sofia. Their place was beautiful and very well located, and they gave us some perfect tips. Also their dog Dolly is adorable! I would recommend this place. ", "Cozy place, good location, nice host. Recommended!", "Such a great price for a lovely place to stay. Super friendly, great location, what more could you want.", "Great location, a nice spacious apartment with really comfy beds. Very quick to respond and a cheery welcome on arrival. Free parking was really easy and handy given the central location.", "Central place with very nice welkom and hospitality. Private quite and comfortable. Shared kitchen and some steps from the entrence door.", "This was an amazing place to stay! It was close to everything, tucked away enough to be quiet from traffic, and a nicely designed space with everything you need to make your own meals. Tony was very hospitable and welcoming, gave us many tips of things to do in the area, and shared stories of her travels. It was also very clean. We would definitely stay here again!", "The location was fantastic, and Tony&Vera made everything very easy. Great value for money too.", "Perfect central location in Sofia. The room is cosy and just as seen on the photos. Tony was very responsive, she welcomed me and explained me all the details. Definitely a good option for some days in Sofia!", "Had a great stay at Tony and Vera's place. Super quick and efficient with communication. Only a short walk from the train station and easy to find. We were met for our check-in and given all the information we would need for our stay in Sofia. Place was lovely and clean and the wifi worked well. We will be sure to book again if we are in Sofia. Thank you Tony and Vera", "Amazing place and hosts.  Could not be better!", "Great host and nice aparement", "Very good location to stay. Cozy and nice room. Tony is very nice!", "Great Place and Great People! ", "Everything was great and Tony was a very nice host. She picked us up at the airport and told us some things about the city. The apartment couldn't be more central.", "Very pleased ", "I loved to stay in this beautiful apartment right in the center of Sofia! The location is amazing, walking distance to shops, really nice restaurants, bars and metro stations. The apartment is great! Tony is super easygoing person who will do everything for your comfort, I felt as I know her from years! I'll definitely stay in her apartment every time I visit Sofia!", "It was a lovely stay! Very clean and cozy apartment. We had everything we need to be comfortable. The location is perfect, very close to historical sites and the metro station. It is the center of the city, so we had everything close bay, bars and restourants. The owner Toni is very nice and frendly . I definitely would come back.", "Un accueil exceptionnel je veux vivre la", "Recomendo a todos, otima localizaçao.", "Le logement de Tony & Vera est idéal pour visiter Sofia, il se situe au cœur de la ville. Nous avons été bien accueilli par Vera qui nous a conseillé sur les lieux à visiter et nous a même fourni un plan ! La chambre est spacieuse, la cuisine et la salle de bain partagées sont propres. Le parking gratuit dans la cour intérieure de l'immeuble est un plus ! Bon rapport qualité prix", "Super ospitali e casa super confortevole :) la consiglio a tutti!", "Excelente!!! Super recomendable. Cerca de todo, limpio, amplio, cómodo, tiene todo lo necesario! Tony es muy amable y gentil!! Volveremos !!! Gracias", "Todo perfecto, muy céntrico y camas cómodas "]
topics: ['need clean anything', 'super communicating giving', 'great flat really', 'town best tony', 'toilet vitosha share', 'pastry distance short', 'great helpful go', 'pretty room nice', 'great people place', 'close everything nice', 'place problem last', 'host nice perfect', 'serdika sofia airport', 'perfect', 'recommended highly well', 'nice sofia place', 'apartment cool heart', 'thanks warm welcome', 'vera’s really place', 'sofia center clean', 'really nice centric', 'recommended highly clean', 'location little central', 'dog dolly adorable', 'recommended nice place', 'location super could', 'really location given', 'private quite comfortable', 'shared hospitable thing', 'everything made tonyvera', 'sofia good definitely', 'place tony lovely', 'better could amazing', 'aparement great host', 'location good stay', 'great people place', 'central apartment picked', 'pleased', 'apartment stay sofia', 'cozy clean apartment', 'un la veux', 'localizaçao otima recomendo', 'prix qualité bon', 'la e ospitali', 'tony muy e', 'perfecto cómodas camas']

reviews:
["This apartment is absolutely AMAZING! Everything was as described. The location is perfect as there are many choices in restaurants around the area. And being close to a bank is great when you need to exchange currency for Bulgarian Lev.  Staying here is like never leaving home. It is very romantic and you will never forget your stay. Great communication, extremely clean and furnished. We did not want to leave.", "Perfect experience!!!", "Amazing Location looking over the church. Very stylish and convenient space.", "Great", "Cozy apartment  with excellent location and nice view. Very helpful host.", "Thanks Luchesar for your hospitality. The appartment is great with excellent location", "Cozy apartment with a nice view of a beautiful church, very communicative location (restaurants, bars and clubs nearby), the pictures of the flat correspond perfectly. The host was very hospitable and helpful in our interaction. Good level of privacy. Looking forward to staying at Lucho's place again. ", "Аbsolutely lovely apartment with many extras, just as the pictures and description! Very stylish, clean and comfortable with a magnificent view of bed! ", "Beautiful stylish apartment right in the centre of Sofia. Full of lovely little details. Great view overlooking church. Wonderful spot for watching life go by as you drink your morning coffee. The neighbourhood is lively without being too noisy. Cafes, restaurants, market stalls, bars, shops, and many interesting places on your doorstep.", "Perfect location in the heart of the city with an amazing view. Apartment made with great attention to details. We had great time there! The hosts are super friendly and nice.", "This is a lovely, cosy apartment in a good, central location. There are lots of bars and restaurants around which offers variation. 
Luchesar was a great host and answered any questions we had quickly and thoroughly meeting our needs. 
We would definitely recommend staying here", "A great place to stay in Sofia! The Airbnb is located at a small square with a beautiful church which provides a nice view from the apartment. You wake up relaxed, can go downstairs to grab a coffee and pancakes for breakfast and start your day in the city without the need to grab a taxi or get a bus/metro. Everything is in walking distance. The apartment itself is located in a quiet building and provides everything that you might need!
Luchesar is an excellent host! Communication went flawless and he was really flexible with the check-out time. I would totally recommend this Airbnb to everybody visiting Sofia!", "Lovely flat in a great location. All amenities you could need. 
Bars and cafes close by. 
Great communication. 
Lovely views from flat.", "Really nice flat, super central! There is currently some construction works in the square which can be noisy in the morning but otherwise everything was perfect!", "Great location and very stylish apt. - the view to the top of the church every morning was a bonus!
Unfortunately they are in the midst of doing some road work on the street, if coming by taxi you will need to go around it and it could be confusing if you do not know the way. 
There are steps to go up to the apt. as per other reviews would not recommend for eldery  people.
We had a great stay , it is near many shops, cafes, bakeries and a short walk to the main center where you could catch a Free Sofia walking tour (among other interesting things to do) would recommend for sure!", "We had a great time at Lucho's place. The apartment looks exactly as in the photos. We stayed here with 3 people and it is big enough for 3. The location is perfect, in a great area. We called it the backyard, but really close to the apartment there is a patio with a few nice restaurants (The Little Things and Mamma Mia). We felt like the area could be the upcoming part of Sofia.

Keep in mind that the building does not have an elevator,  and the apartment is located on the 5th floor. 

Communication went smoothly, Lucho was very quick with replying and flexible with checking-out. 

5/5!", "Luchesar’s place is is very nice and the pictures do it justice. It’s about 5 floors up, and May be quite chilly for some, but overall good value.", "A wonderful place to stay and everything is in walking distance.", "Topadres!", "a bright and modern space in a great location", "Great little apartment very centralt located. Stylish and easy to adapt to.", "Luchesar's place is a very nice flat in the very centre of Sofia. It was sparkling clear and with all amenities. It's a great place with a good value for money.", "Lucho's place is stylish with a comfy bed and a great shower (best during our 3 week trip). The walk up to the fifth floor with heavy bags was definitely worth the view of the church out the apartment windows! Definitely recommend it as a base for exploring Sofia ", "Gorgeous apartment overlooking the church and square-exactly as in the pictures. Close to main sites (10 min walk) yet felt felt very homely and safe in the neighbourhood and apartment. Prompt communication with Luchesar both before and during our stay. Highly recommended!! ", "The location and view is unbeatable.  Everything for a comfy stay is at hand including basic kitchen supplies and extra blankets.  AC works great. On the fifth floor so great views but no elevator.", "The location is truly amazing. So many cool bars and restaurants in walking distance and all of the major sites can be easily reached by foot as well. The apartment is nice and modern as long as you are willing to walk up five flights of stairs.", "Lovely flat in a central location with lots of little shops and good places for food around.  The views from the apartment are stunning. Lucho had everything arranged when we arrived after a hiking trip, so check-in was super easy. Totally recommend!", "Nice studio. great location. Thank you.", "Great location. great place.", "Thank you for some wunderful days in Sofia. The Apartment is great located in an alive district in front of a church. Friendly and helpful contact with Luchesar.", "We really enjoyed our stay in this lovely apartment. It's in a great location, near lots of cool bars and restaurants. The view of the church out of the window is absolutely amazing - but do be aware that the church bells ring quite loudly at 8am each day! But that's a small price to pay for the lovely view. Lucho was a helpful host and check in was easy even though we arrived very late into Sofia due to flight delays. Overall a really great value for money base to explore the city!", "Great flat for solo traveller or couple! I stayed for 2 nights on a business trip & it worked perfectly . The street, Tsar Shishman, has lots of cool shops for eating, shopping & a few good bars to hang out in. It’s located within walking distance of central sights, was clean, tidy & has a nice window view of the Church. The host was v helpful-will definitely be staying here again when I return to this lovely little City.", "An amazing, comfortable pearl in the heart of Sofia, clean and organized, perfect for exploring Sofia and the surroundings", "Lucho was so friendly and helpful throughout our stay! The flat is in a perfect location - bars, shops and restaurants are all within walking distance. The home was really clean, the bed was very comfy and the shower was amazing! No complaints at all, I would definitely recommend staying here.", "Fantastic location with amazing view. Really nicely decorated flat with great facilities. Very helpful host - much recommended!", "it was SO great at Luchos place, the area was amazing and the view - so great! really recommending it :)", "Lucho’s place is nice and cozy, and is in the heat of the city center of Sofia so easy to get to many of the great attractions in the city center. Lucho is also very prompt with his responses and I can recommend his place without any reservations.", "Beautiful place nearby a nice park where you can enjoy a drink. Ideal when you want to discover Sofia by foot.

Luchesar answers all your questions and helps you where he can. We had a lovely city trip!", "Beautiful apartment, great location, great hospitality!", "Lovely space and in a good location to explore Sofia.  Super close to our to favourite restaurant finds (Made in Blue and Made in Home...same owners)", "Lucho’s place is highly recommendable! It’s a quiet cosy nest on top of a building overlooking the beautiful Sveti Sedmochislenitsi Church. It’s very centrally located and therefore a perfect starting point to discover Sofia. There are many excellent traditional restaurants in short walking distance (such as Manastirska Magernitsa); a must-do for passionate slow foodies like myself is the Sun Moon Small 5 Corners restaurant. Thank you, Lucho, for a great stay at yours!", "The location of the apartment is excellent, right in the city center of Sofia. There is no need to take the metro, tram or the bus to discover the city. Great restaurants and cafés are located in walking distance. The self-check in was no problem at all and was very pleased with the information I received from Lucho on how to do it. The kitchen is fully furnished with everything you need to cook a delicious dinner. 
The only minor rather negative aspect was that the floor was pretty cold and we could not find a way to warm it. 
To sum it up, it was an excellent choice to choose the apartment for our short trip to Sofia. I totally recommend choosing the apartment to ensure that your time in Sofia will be very pleasant. I would definitely chose this apartment again!", "Best place in town, great location, cozy and clean. Perfect communication, aways a pleasure to stay there:)", "Lovely flat in a fantastic part of Sofia. Lots of cool shops, restaurants and bars round about and very close to the main sights. Clean and bright flat with a well equipped kitchen.", "Really trendy and retro apartment in the center of Sofia. Truly amazing and perfect for me and my girlfriend!", "Very nice appartment at a great location in Sofia. All the highlights are at walking distance and the view from the appartment is beautiful!!! Luchesar respond fast and is a good host!! ", "Cute place, close to city center, close to eating facilities, walking distance from metro.
The place can get a bit cold but the place looks just as advertised.", "The apartment is very cozy and the location perfect! Luchesar was very helpful and flexible - i would go again!", "This is the second time we've stayed at this apartment and the experience was as great as the last. Lucho has always been a great host to us and we will certainly be back in this iconic flat next time we're in Sofia. You can't beat the location and the style of the apartment is very cozy and charming. You're guaranteed to have a great stay!", "I got the authentic Sofia experience. :) and the most awesome view in town to boot.", "Great studio space overlooking the square and church. Couldn’t ask for a better location as a base to explore lovely Sofia. 

Everything went smoothly with our host; check in and communication was all clear and easy. 

Overall a fantastic experience. 

Highly recommend.", "The apartment was perfect for us. Not too small for a couple and had all the amenities we needed. It is very central and within walking distance to all the attractions and Christmas Market. If we'd come back to Sofia, we'd definitely look to stay at the apartment again.", "Very cosy and nice apartment. It’s located in the city center close to very good restaurants, coffees and bars. Many places of interest are nearby and you can discover the city of Sofia from the apartment.", "Splendid.", "Stylish flat with lovely view.", "Lucho's flat is absolutely lovely. The flat, which is entrally located and just a short walk to everything, has an amazing view. Lucho was very quick to respond so communication was a breeze. Would definitely recommend this flat to anyone!", "Such a beautiful apartment!
Luchesar is a fantastic host, making accomodations for my arrival at 2am and even booking a taxi back to the airport for me :)
The apartment is huge and beautiful and close walk to lots of the main attractions in Sofia and plenty of bars and restaurants. The park on the street is lovely, full of cats and dogs and makes for a great view. The bed is super comfy and the shower hot and powerful. Everything you need is here (toiletries, hairdryer, ironing board) and they even left us a gift and some fruit as a welcome :)
Be prepared for a lot of steps to the apartment, over 100! A perfect workout at the end of the day
I hope to definitely stay here again!", "Great little flat in the best location. 

5 double flights of stairs, so make sure you are fit and healthy.", "Great apartment, looks just like the pictures. Lucho (the host) even helped us book a taxi to the airport. Very kind! Me and my boyfriend enjoyed our stay in beautiful Sofia very much in this cozy place.", "Great location with a fantastic view and easy to get around to all the attractive places in the city.
Luchesar responded very promptly to any queries and was very flexible to accommodate our early morning arrival. 
Very stylishly decorated, modern and clean. The place was a bit cold when first coming in from outside but this is easily rectified with a portable heater. 
Highly recommended and would stay there again!", "Perfect location! Clean and cosy place, good communication with the host, recommended!", "Luchesar is a very helpful host, he explained to us how to use public transport and what's good in the area. His communication was amazing and we would love to stay here again!!", "Lucho's place is a gem! It's beautiful, light and spacious. The view is spectacular. It's right in the heart of trendy Sofia.. Everything you want is on his street. Loved it!", "We had a great time! Apartment was located for walks very well. Great view from the rooms. A good place to start your journay through Bulgaria.", "Very centrally located! The appartment is on the fifth floor, so the view is amazing! All the city highlights are on walking distance. Enough restaurants and bar are located close the the appartment. A very cosy and nice restaurant is located next door (called Little things, if you leave the building on the right side). 
We can really recommend the free bike tour, this tour takes you to the green parts of the city, a lovely addition to our city trip!
The appartment itself is nice and clear. There is even the possibility to make your own cup of coffee. It suits four persons, but i would not recommend it, better place four two persons.", "Fantastic location, everything within walking distance. Large space in the flat, very clean. Would definitely stay again!", "A lovely apartment in very central and pleasant location with lovely views.   Home from home in this underrated city.  Luchesar wss extremely responsive and helpful host and I will definitely come back on my next visit to Sofia.  Soon I hope!", "The apartment was quiet charming. It has a great view on a beautiful church and a square. The neighbourhood is great!  It has many nice restaurants and coffee shops and is only a few minutes walking from the historical center.", "We loved our stay at Lucho's place. The apartment is just as it looks in the pictures and has everything you need for a great stay. The location is perfect, near to all the major sights but also close to some fantastic restaurants and bars (The Little Things and Skaptoburger were both excellent.) The view of the church is amazing and a drink at the local bar in the park opposite is a great way to start or end the evening. I would definitely recommend staying here.", "We had a nice stay at Lucho's. We felt good in this spacious and bright apartment very well located (near Vitosha boulevard) and with a great view. We didn't meet Lucho in person but the communication was easy. Plus he had left some fruits and cake for us in the kitchen which was a very sweet attention.", "We had a great stay at this lovely apartment in central Sofia. The location was great and view from the apartment was lovely. The apartment is very modern and kitted out with everything you need. Luchesar's was also very efficient at getting in touch and providing details of check in (etc). Thanks you! ", "Great place to stay, spacious, clean and perfect location, close to bars restaurants and shopping!", "The apartment was great. In a very nice position, 10 min by walk to center. Quite an impressive view. It was clean and easily reachable from the airport. Shisman Street is full of stores and people. The Sveti Sedmochislenitsi Church is stunning, although it's not very pleasant to hear the bells ringing in the early morning. 

You will hear people talking and playing all day long. To me is ok, but someone could find it annoying.

I highly recommend it!! :)", "Great location, quiet and yet easily accessible from airport and centre. Highly recommend waking up to that view!", "Perfect place in Sofia, wonderful host, stunning view!!!", "This top floor little gem has a view to die for, overlooking a church and public space. It's perfectly located, within 10-15 minute walk to all major sights and there are some lovely little cafes and restaurants just a few doors down. The space is bright, airy, spacious and beautifully decorated. Not expected as you climb up the stairs in an unrenovated old apartment building. Ina, a friend of the host, was very warm and welcoming and the host was super accommodating when it came to my checkin. ", "Great location, easy check in. Fabulous shower and comfortable bed. Lucho was responsive when I had questions. The front door to the block is covered in graffiti and the common area a bit shabby but the apartment is fantastic . Highly recommended.", "Lucho's apartment was tremendous value (comfortable and spacious) in a great location with an idyllic park view. We didn't get to meet Lucho, who managed the apartment remotely during our stay but he was very helpful and even ordered us a cab to get us to the airport. Unfortunately our stay was tarnished a bit by events outside of his control. First, the power was out nearly all of our only full day there which became problematic as our laundry was stuck in there though am sure that this is a rare occurrence. Slightly more discomforting were loud screaming arguments from neighbors both nights we were there. ", "Flat was very central, 10 min walk maximum from restaurants in town. Airport taxi (booked on arrival in the terminal, at 2am) cost us 13lev (7euro) and took about 15min.

Every night we started our evening by sitting in the local bar, which was in the park outside the house overlooking the church, and it was great for people watching! We stayed in the flat for two days and all the sightseeing was max 15min walk away so it was easy to pop home before the dinner and chill for a bit. Air con was much appreciated as it was very hot. 
We also appreciated the coffee left for us, and the small coffee creams in the fridge which allowed us to have coffee in bed. These things matter! 

In the bathroom host had a wide range of half used bottles of shampoos, shower gels, creams, etc. for guests use (who cares about the single serving bottles, they're so wasteful!!) which came in handy. I'd definitely stay again if I'd come to Sofia again!!!", "This apartment was wonderful for a stay in Sofia! It's a short walk from the city center and in a very fun neighborhood with lots of restaurants. The apartment was lovely, it gets a lot of natural light and was really comfortable. ", "This is a fantastic Airbnb in a wonderful location. It's an easy walk into town and there's also nice restaurants nearby to enjoy. The view of the church is very beautiful and definitely worth the climb up the stairs. I would hope to stay here again when visiting Sofia if it's free! ", "We had a very nice stay at Lucho's place. Lovely apartment and neighborhood!!", "Lucho's flat was the absolute perfect place to stay in Sofia! Seriously don't look elsewhere. The location is unbeatable. The road it is on is full of restaurants and bars that are genuinely cool and serve amazing food. We didn't eat elsewhere during our stay. The flat itself is beautiful and has lots of room for two people. If I am back in Sofia there is nowhere else I would stay! ", "Vert Nice place! I felt like home hère and love the sight. ", "Wonderful place ", "Lucho's place is great - really well located, clean & very stylish. Air con was also a saving grace in the Sofia summer! ", "The top floor flat is beautiful, romantic, airy and spacious. I loved the location and the view! Also, it was surprisingly quiet at night despite the central location. Very clean and comfy bed.

", "Lucho's place is fantastic!  Central to everything that Sofia has to offer, in a fun and safe area.

Lucho's friend Ina let us in to the apartment, so we didn't get to meet Lucho, but his communication was very good, highly responsive and quick with some helpful suggestions on everything from parking to offering to book taxis for us!

The space is large and bright, great kitchen and bathroom, with a comfy bed.

The hot water did stop working for a couple of days, however this was a building wide issue across all five floors, so not something Lucho could have controlled!  He was very responsive on text and arranged a plumber to investigate the day it happened, so we are grateful he did what he could to try and resolve something impacting the building's supply.

We loved staying at Lucho's place and will definitely stay there again on our next visit to Sofia!", "U", "Great pad that is conviniently located in the hip area. Clean and stylish with a. Reasonably well equiped kitchen, too. ", "Perfectly located within walking distance of the metro, the old town and plenty of bars and restaurants. Spacious and clean apartment. Only word of warning: the apartment is on the 5th floor and there's no lift. This was no problem for us but some people may struggle. 
Great stay, thanks Lucho ", "Very nice place, good host, very helpful. Beautiful view from the apartment and very central. Lots of nice food places. If you like coffee Dabov's specialty coffee not far away is definitely worth the short walk. ", "Really nice appartement with a very good location in the city centre of Sofia. The appartement is very light and cosy. The only thing that you need to know it is located on the fifth floor, a good workout :-)", "Lucho's apartment is a gem in the city of Sofia. It is a very bright and cosy flat and is convincing through its central location. 

Lucho himself is a very friendly and helpful host, who was always there when we had questions or problems.

Sofia is definitely worth a visit, especially if you stay at Lucho's flat.", "Very nice and cozy apartment. Bright spaces with a beautiful view to the church. The apartment is located right in the center and sorrounded by loads of restaurants and bars. ", "Great apartment in the centre of the city. Easy to walk to all the sights from this apartment. Highly recommended ", "Luchesar's place is in a great, central location. You can walk to all the major sites in central Sofia. There are some wonderful cafes nearby. The place is decorated very stylishly and has a nice view of the church. It was very quiet at night. We didn't meet him in person but he was very good with communicating how to enter the building. ", "The flat is really very nice except the problem with canalization in the bath.", "The flat is unbelievable: nice wooden floor, everything is new with same lovely old pieces and the view! The check-in is easy and so was the hole communication. I would came again.", "We never met Luchesar in person but the communication was smooth. Also the appartment was really nice and beautiful und well equipped. The view from the appartment was great and the location was perfect for our city trip, we could reach everything by walking. There are also a lot of nice and lovely restaurants, bars and shops nearby. We would definetely stay there again:)", "This is a real gem in the heart of Sofia that is the definition of value for money. 

Lucho is a great host, providing clear instructions and excellent communication.

The apartment is stunning. The pictures do it great justice, as it really is that nice. Beautifully decorated and very clean. The flat has everything you'd need, including some toiletries such as shower gel which is very helpful if you're hand luggage only. Couldn't get a better location in Sofia, so close to everything you might want to do and surrounded by some great restaurants (give The Little Things a go, it's right behind the apartment!).

The church opposite is beautiful and great to look out over, just know that they like to give their bells a good ring in the morning at 8am on Saturday and 9am Sunday whilst we were there. So if you'd like to sleep in, you should know to expect these to last for a couple of minutes - but why would you want to sleep in when in Sofia?

Also, the apartment is on the fifth floor and there is no elevator. It was no issue for us and it was well worth the climb up the stairs to get the lovely view over the church.

All in all I would highly recommend Lucho's beautiful apartment to anyone coming to Sofia!", "Great hosts, great place, amazing vacation. If you want tips about Sofia feel free to ask :) The place is amazing and in a very central place. ", "Luchos place is the perfect spot for a stay in Sofia. Located in between shops, bars and restaurants. Public transport right in front of the door. Very cozy, stylish and clean place. Breathtaking view out of window. As has been said, it was up 5 flights of stairs and so it's quite hard work each time you return to the flat. With suitcases it's also rather hard. Don't be put off by the outside front door, it has lots of graffiti on it, however we discovered that graffiti is very normal in Sofia, it's everywhere! 

The flat is clean, tidy, has everything you can need and is secure. There is an extra large bolt for security which was nice. The air conditioner is also a heater, which was needed on some days. 

We had some difficulties organising getting the keys as we arrived on a weekday and Ina who was due to get us the keys was working till 5:30pm. Thankfully the day before she let us know that she would be able to meet us at the flat when we arrived, which was much better. 

The location is perfect we were 10 mins from the centre of town, many good restaurants directly around us, including the amazing 'The Little Things' which is literally directly below the flat and a gorgeous crepe shop for dessert. Never met any of the neighbours so that was no problem, the church outside rings out it's bells every morning at 8am sharp, no need to set an alarm as it woke us gently each morning. 

Price is incredible for what you get, would highly recommend.", "although we arrived very late everything went perfectly. the flat is super comfy and has all you need. very good located.", "The apartment was great! We loved the apartment itself, the view from the apartment and the location. If you are lucky enough and have the option to stay here I would definitely recommend it! My sister and I spent 4 nights in the apartment and we loved it! The apartment is modern and has great light. It is located right above a beautiful square with a church and has the best view. It is important to note that the apartment is almost on the top floor and it is quite a climb to get up to the apartment so I would not recommend this for anyone who has an issue with stairs. My sister and I enjoyed the exercise and welcomed the climb after spending our days trying all the delicious bulgarian food. We loved the crepe place and The Little Things restaurant right under the apartment and we also enjoyed the pizza at Mama Mia. The location of the apartment could not have been better and we were able to walk everywhere in the city. Lucho and Ina were amazing hosts and were welcoming and super helpful. We fell in love with Sofia and this amazing apartment just made our stay even better. I highly recommend this apartment to anyone planning a trip to Sofia!", "Awesome apartment! We arrived in Sofia around 2pm, which was the stated check in time, with the knowledge that we wouldn't be able to get into the flat until 5pm. Throughout the day this time was gradually pushed back till 6pm, and once in the flat we had to wait around for another hour whilst the host's friend cleaned the flat after the previous guest had stayed. 

The flat itself was lovely, very comfortable and a great size for 2 people, would also accommodate 4 rather easily. The view, being on the 5th floor, is wonderful! The church square opposite the building is lovely and quite popular for obvious reasons. 

The washroom seemed to be slightly smelly, the drains seem to be connected and so the shower did not smell particularly clean. 

Otherwise, our trip was lovely. Can recommend for others to stay, just make sure to have your notifications switched on the day you're checking in.", "We had a lovely stay at Luchesar's apartment on Sishman Street. The apartment is as in the photos, with a great view, light feel and modern decor. The building and area was very quiet, despite being in the centre of town, which we loved, and we were able to sleep with the windows open with no noise. Sofia is a quiet city, right now, and there was never more than a gentle hubbub from the cafe in the square below, during the day. We ate at a few cafes nearby, many of which are brilliant,  and low cost compared to most European cities. A special mention to Skapto Burger just up the road, and the amazing ice cream shop not much further on.  We had coffee and crepes one morning for breakfast from the place at the Base of our building. We have only two words of Bulgarian, but most people either spoke perfect English or pointing worked fine. The kitchen in the apartment was well equipped and we put together a couple of great meals from Bulgarian fayre, bought from within 100m of the front door. We took a couple of the free tours, including 'Balkan Bites' which gave us a taster of the local food. Sofia may be a bit rough around the edges, but the food and people are world class. 
The apartment was a home from home, and despite the 5 flights of stairs, was the perfect place to be. Thanks Luchesar!", "Amazing place! I will definitely come back again. Nelle vicinanze possibilità di cenare e bere qualcosa.
Raccomandato assolutamente!", "L'appartement était comme décrit et correspondant aux photos. Joliment décoré, agréable et avec une vue magnifique sur une église et un petite place. Idéalement situé au centre de Sofia avec magasins, restaurants et bars tout près. Même si cela ne nous a pas dérangé, il faut noter que l'appartement est au 5ème étage sans ascenseur.", "El apartamento de Lucho está muy bien ubicado, se llega perfectamente desde tanto el aeropuerto como de la estación de trenes.  Tener en cuenta que es en un quinto piso sin ascensor,  pero nosotros por lo menos lo pudimos hacer sin problema!  Hay una iglesia hermosa en frente.  El lugar es muy limpio y ordenado,  me gustó mucho el estilo de decoración,  se pasa muy bien.  La comunicación con Lucho es fluida, y por mas de no habernos conocido,  estuvo atento a cualquier cuestión.  La pasamos muy bien y volveríamos!", "Un lugar agradable, bien decorado y en una buena localizacion. Luchesar siempre estuvo atento y nuestra estancia en la ciudad fue buena. Gracias.", "centraal gelegen apt, vlakbij goeie restaurants/bars.", "Netter Kontakt, Wohnung stylish und gemütlich. Lage perfekt für city-trip!", "Die Unterkunft ist perfekt gelegen um Sofia zu Fuß zu erkunden. Gerne wieder!!!!", "Schöne Unterkunft, sehr sauber und in zentraler Lage. Check-In und Kommunikation was unkompliziert. Bei meinem nächsten Trip nach Sofia würde ich wieder diese Unterkunft buchen!", "Tolle Wohnung in absolut zentraler Lage! Überaus netter Kontakt. Völlig unkomplizierter Check-in und Check-out.
Gerne wieder!", "Splendida location! Peccato per i 5 piani senza ascensore ma la vista compensava. Zona centrale comoda per i mezzi anche se non sono necessari per spostarsi per il centro. ", "La ubicación es espectacular , el apartamento muy bonito. Algo frío , pero muy bien todo", "Appartement design et spacieux, situé proche des principales rues de la ville.
L'appartement est bien équipé et dispose d'une vue sur une charmante église.", "Tolle Wohnung und top Lage. Direkt in der Innenstadt mit tollen Restaurants und Cafes in der unmittelbaren Umgebung. Alles sehr unkompliziert und einwandfrei. Wenn ich mal wieder in Sofia sein sollte, dann würde ich sofort wieder diese Unterkunft buchen. Vor allem ist die Aussicht fantastisch. ", "L'appartement est très paisible et agréable. Il est très bien équipé, propre et calme. Nous avons été très bien accueillis. Il se situe au cœur de Sofia et permet de tout faire à pied ! La vue de l'appartement est superbe. ", "Muy lindo departamento, con vista hermosa, pero por escalera! Tenerlo en cuenta si se tiene equipaje grande! La ubicación es muy conveniente!", "Superbe appartement, très bien situé pour explorer la ville (et faire de bons resto!). Propre, design avec une super vue. Ina qui a nous a accueilli nous a donné plein de bons conseils le tout en français et avec une gentillesse hors pair. Très bonne adresse", "Descrizione precisa, buona posizione, host gentile. Nessun problema.", "Wir (meine Schwägerin, mein 17-jähriger Neffe und ich auf Besuch bei meinem 19-Jährigen Sohn, der in Sofia für 12 Monate social work macht) haben gerade 4 wunderbare Tage in Sofia in Lucho´s Apartment verbracht: 

das Apartment war genau so, wie die Fotos versprochen haben - hell, geschmackvoll eingerichtet, bequem, Blick auf den belebten Platz mit Cafe, Kirche, Spielplatz mitten in der Innenstadt von Sofia, in einer Straße voller netter und cooler Lokale und Geschäfte. Für uns genau die richtige Umgebung.

Die Kirchenglocke in der Früh, das Lachen der Menschen auf dem Platz - wir wollten immer das Fenster offen haben, um die Geräusche von Sofia zu haben. Wenn jemand es ruhiger haben will, kann es vor allem im Sommer vielleicht zu laut sein: für uns war es perfekt.

Wissen sollte man, dass die Wohnung im 5.Stock ohne Lift liegt. Für uns war das kein Problem, wir haben die Höhe und den Blick aus den Fenstern oben geliebt. Mit schwerem Gepäck oder wenn Stiegen steigen ein Problem ist, sollte man es sich gut überlegen.

Im Apartment gab es alles, was wir brauchten: Kleiderschrank zum Koffer auspacken, Fön zum Haare trocknen, Bügeleisen (haben wir nicht verwendet), Spiegel (wir waren in der Oper und haben versucht, uns schöner anzuziehen), Kerzen für abends, Servietten, Tee/Kaffee, Betten waren angenehm!

Lucho hat alles gut organisiert und war immer für uns erreichbar. 
Am ersten Tag hatten wir ein Problem mit dem Abfluss im Badezimmer - Lucho hat sofort veranlasst, dass uns jemand hilft und alles wieder funktioniert hat.

Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt und es war gar nicht leicht, good-bye zum Apartment und der Car Shishman zu sagen, den Schlüssel einzuwerfen und mit dem Koffer wieder Richtung Flughafen zu fahren. 

Im Sommer sind wir wieder in Bulgarien - wer weiß, vielleicht gibt es noch ein paar freie Tage in Lucho´s Wohnung. Wir haben uns richtig zu Hause gefühlt.

Alles Gute an Lucho - Caroline

", "Piso moderno, confortable, perfecto para parejas; su único inconveniente, no tener ascensor, se compensa con el sitio y la vista, una iglesia, un parque y un mercado de hortalizas. Yo, con sesenta años, subía sin problema. Volvería de nuevo.", "Situé dans un quartier truffé de bonnes adresses, l'appartement de Lucho est un lieu de résidence idéal pour visiter Sofia. Lumineux, spacieux et impeccable, on s'y sent tout de suite chez soi ! Nous n'avons pas rencontré notre hôte mais Ina, une de ses amies (qui parle français), nous a très chaleureusement accueillies. Elle nous a trouvé des adresses sur Sofia (notamment le musée d'art contemporain, très difficile à trouver tant il est peu référencé) et même beaucoup aidé pour le reste de notre voyage (itinéraire, traduction...). Notre séjour à Sofia n'aurait pas été le même si nous n'avions pas logé chez Lucho et rencontré Ina !"]

reviews:
["The place is really stylish and cozy. Hosts were great. The location is pretty close to the city center. You can park everywhere. The neighborhood is quiet. I absolutely recommend the place to everybody who wants to have perfect stay in Sofia.", "We arrived arround 8 o'clock and because the owners were away their friend Boris came to meet us at the (Website hidden by Airbnb) was very helpful told us where to go to eat have a dring get a taxi and all of these things.The apartment was charming and clean with a nice balcony view!The only thing is that the appartment was about 25 minutes walk to the center and the shops there closed very early but all in all everything was very good!", "Our month-long stay at Martin and Maria's apartment was amazing.  There is lots of natural light all day long from the windows and skylights.  The balcony on the back is great for enjoying morning coffee or an evening glass of wine.  

Martin was extremely fast in communicating with us and responded to all of our questions.  Check-in was simple and convenient.  

The apartment is well appointed for both short or long stays.  The kitchen had everything we needed though we only cooked a few meals at home.  The bathroom is very nice and had lots of hot water.  The wireless internet was flawless and VERY fast.  

The apartment is located in a more residential area, but is only a 10 minute walk to TONS of great restaurants, bars, and shops.  It's quiet at night and very safe.

The cafe across the street (Ecstasy) is an amazing neighborhood hangout.  They have great coffee, drinks etc for VERY reasonable prices.

If you're looking to check out Sofia this is a great spot from which to explore.  We highly recommend it.", "The Apartment is perfekt to stay some days in the center of Sofia.", "nice apartment.", "A fantastic little apartment not far from the city centre - well connected, in a quiet and easy to get to area. Martin was super helpful and great with communication both prior and during our stay. Overall had a superb experience and would definitely use again in the future!", "The appartment was really clean and spacious. I have nothing bad to say about it. The host was very kind. I highly recommend!", "Llegamos tarde porque se nos retrasó el tren y nos dieron todas las facilidades. Calidad, precio increíblemente bien. Muy recomendable. Estuvimos tres personas bien, sin problemas.", "4 notti nel mese di agosto....appartamento molto (Website hidden by Airbnb) piccoli ma perfetti...cucina funzionale...piccolo living ma freschissimo...terrazzino con ombra tutto il giorno perfetto per pranzetti/cene in 4...camera da letto ....comoda spaziosa solo un po calda essendo sotto tetto....
per il centro 20 minuti a piedi piacevoli se piace camminare...comunque mezzi pubblici a 3 minuti...
per l'appartamento tornerei per la citta non so'.....", "Host molto cortese e sempre disponibile. La casa è perfetta. La particolarità è quella di sentirsi a casa di amici, in quanto c'è tutto  quello che occorre nella vita quotidiana, addirittura anche molti effetti personali della host. 
La casa è a un quarto d'ora di cammino dal centro della città. Di sera le strade per il ritorno sono buie, per cui conviene chiedere alla host di ottenere le coordinate dell'appartamento, per utilizzarle con un navigatore dello smartphone e non avere problemi. 
C'è anche un bel balconcino che non ho potuto però utilizzare nella mia permanenza, in quanto di mattina o di sera (quando ero in casa) faceva ancora un po' fresco.
Consiglio questo appartamento senza alcun dubbio."]

reviews:
["We stayed for two nights and everything was as expected. The flat is really clean and cosy and had everything we needed. We didnt meet the hosts,but communication was easy with quick responses and we had no troubles throughout the whole stay. Very recommended and good luck :)", "Yasen & Dani's place is perfectly located in the heart of Sofia. With lots of bars, restaurants and public transport links nearby, there really isn't anything more a person can ask for. The apartment itself is really beautiful and has everything one might need for a pleasant stay. Yasen & Dani have been very pleasant in terms of communication. I can recommend them and their place for anyone who plans to visit Sofia and want to have a smooth and enjoyable stay.", "Our friends stayed at Yasen and Dani apartment for a couple of days and they had a great stay there. Yasen and Dani were very friendly and nice. Our friends were traveling with their child and Yasen and Dani helped them with him as well. They also offered them a drive from the airport to the apartment which is in the city center.
Highly recommend this host!", "Absolutely the best place in the heart of Sofia where you can be! Super cozy, beautiful, spacious and clean! Yasen and Dani really made this place feel like home and you can see and feel their very exquisite sense of home decor and hospitality everywhere in their home. Packed with anything you will need - from kitchen amenities to great books and magazines. We were so pleasantly surprised to experience this place and fell completely in love with it. Dani and Yasen are the best hosts you will meet in Sofia - very positive and beautiful people! The place has great and spacious living room, pretty and very well equipped kitchen, cute and very comfortable bedroom and very, very clean bathroom and toilet. This place will make you feel like very precious and important guest. We recommend it wholeheartedly. Thank you, Dani and Yasen for making our stay so comfy and special <3", "Excellent!", "The flat is situated in an old building but don’t let this fool you. The flat is modern and vibrant with personal touch. It is in a perfect location to explore the city by food or by any method of transportation. There are plenty of amazing restaurants, cafes and/or bistros. 
The check-in and check-out is very easy. The hosts are very hospitable and will meet one’s needs. There were plenty of suggestions/ tips left in the flat.
Highly recommended property and hosts.", "Very cozy apartment , probably the best location I have ever been on in Sofia , very friendly and helpfull hosts. Would go back there again", "It's in a very nice block in sofia, really cute streets and shops around it! Very fast communication and easy to get in to the apartment! The apartment is clean and nice!", "Great spot in central Sofia! Check in couldn’t have been easier, and the space is large. Easy to walk to all the major sites like National Palace of Culture and Vitosha street.", "We had a very pleasant time in sofia thanks to yasen and dani ! Very near to the city centre and very quiet it is the perfect place to stay if you want to discover the lovely sofia !", "A great location in the heart of the City with good local restaurants. Easy check in and excellent communication from hosts. Thank you for letting us stay.", "good", "Yasen and Dany are absolutely the best hosts ever! 
Very easy check-in and out, 
Great location to metro, bus, restaurants, center, 
Quiet bedroom and helpful tourist info booklets, 
All you need for a great vacation or even just a few days in the heart of this ancient city of Sofia!", "The flat couldn't be more in the center so you can get to all the sights and Vitosha Blvd by walking. The flat is spacious, stylish and very comfy. There was everything we needed for cooking and all together it was definitely a 10/10 experience, we would definitely come back!", "The apartment was a wonderful place to relax in a relative quiet neighbourhood in the busy city centre of Sofia. You’re on ground level, but actually the apartment is a bit higher so people can’t just look inside from outdoors. The historical sites in Sofia are just ten to fifteen minutes by foot. It was very clean in each room and even in the small details. 

The kitchen is equipped for basic cooking, with a handy oven and a good coffee machine. We were surprised to explore the Billa Supermarket, which was nearby, had good prices and mostly showed English texts on the products.

The communication with the hosts went smoothly due to their quick response and handy tips. Because of our late flight, it was nice to have the possibility to enter the apartment using the lockbox. 

Sofia is an interesting city with so many things to see and visit. We loved the Free Sofia Tour, the Free Hiking Tour and the Free Food Tour, all based on a tip with very motivated guides to tell you the funny facts and to show you the highlights of the city. Even as students is was nice to have a lot of possibilities for food, culture and sightseeing with our small budget.", "check in was easy and quick", "Self check in was very effective and eazy!
the house is very central!! and close to "Vitosha" main street
there's a supermarket , bakery, bars, restaurants and street food in a 200m radius! and more.
The house is fully equipped with any thing you can think of, very clean and a great and cozy exterior design!!

Highly recommend!!!", "The appartement was super nice, clean and cozy - just like on the pictures. The location is great and Yasen and Dani were friendly and punctual. I highly recommend this appeasement. ", "Perfect location, next to the train station and the Main Street  (Vitosha) full of cheap places to eat and shops, but there were a lot of restaurants, super markets and bakeries in front of the apartment as well (we recommend a small bakery with tasty typical pastries like “banitza”, all kinds of puff pastry with Bulgarian cheese and Bulgarian yogurt). The apartment was quite clean except for the bathroom which, at night, would get invaded by mosquitoes. The living room was big, the kitchen small but big enough to satisfy all your needs. Would book again ", "Great location, nice cozy place & good coffee.", "This flat is in the perfect location to explore the city, enjoy local restaurants, and to walk in the parks.   We were not sure about it not having air-conditioning for the first week of August, but it was not a problem at all.  The mornings and evenings are cool and the apartment is on the first floor.  It was a great value experience and we would do it again.", "A great apartment, with great facilities and fast service. ", "The apartment is in the excellent location in the city center. If you go there by car you might have a problem because the parking is limited to 2 hours but there are some private parking space near the apartment for about 20 leva. The apartment is very nice and convenient. Everything was clean and neat and the host was very helpful. Sofie left a good impression on us and we hope to come back some time soon :) Thank you Dani, all the best!! :) ", "We had a great experience in Yasen and Dani’s apartment.  Their directions were perfect and we followed them from the airport to their door.  The space was comfortable, and the neighborhood was just what we were hoping for.  There were lots of small stores and restaurants, and it was close to the walking street and the metro.  I highly recommend this apartment.
", "Everything about our stay was amazing! Location is great and Yasen and Dani respond straight away", "Really complete flat and Yasen&Dani are very attentive. Highly recommendable stay", "If this place is available, book it!! It has everything and the hosts are wonderful. The place is very centrally located, a block away from the main pedestrian street Vitosha. It was a very spacious apartment and had great amenities. The hosts were incredibly responsive as well. Highly recommend!", "I can absolutely recommend a stay at Dani and Yasen's apartment! It is clean and has everything you need for a comfortable stay. The location is ideal as the historic sights are close and there are lots of nice restaurants and bars just a few steps away. Our host's hospitality was unsurpassed: they assisted us with tons of advices and we could always reach them in case we needed to.", "Great spot close to everything. Highly recommended if you’re visiting Sofia ", "Great hosts, very responsive, communication was easy, building is old and with character, but place is neat and comfortable, centrally located, plenty of places to eat and drink around, NDK and the metro stop are within a 5-7 min walk. Would recommend the apartment and would definitely stay there again.", "Dani & Yasen's place is amazing! Located in the very heart of the city, but still in a quiet street close to local amenities . 
Everything in the flat is up to a very good standard and spotless clean. The communication was great and the check-in/check-out really smooth. 
A+ hosts and property! ", "Our stay at Dani and Yasen’s place was amazing! The apartment’s location was perfect for anything and everything you would want to see or do in Sofia. Dani met us at the airport and made our check-in process a breeze! She gave us great tips on sightseeing, night life, cultural events and shopping in the city. She was always available to answer any questions and would reply instantly to messages. Their place was sparkling clean, beautifully decorated and really felt like home! They had maps of the city available for us. I especially enjoyed the espresso machine! I cannot recommend this place high enough! Dani and Yasen go above and beyond to ensure their guests are taking care of. When we make another trip to Sofia we will definitely look for their place and book it again!", "The apartment is really located in the heart of Sofia! Everything is really really close on foot! It is clean and very well equipped! Also the owners are very hospitable and willing to help in any way they can! 3 minutes from a metro station and the main pedestrian street. Mostly recommended!", "Perfect location so lose to the centre and parks. The hosts were brilliant, would definitely recommend. The apartment was a good size and ideal!", "Loved everything about the place. Well furnished, beds were comfy, shower was AMAZING and it was near great food and cocktails. Would recommend this this place to anyone and everyone.", "The apartment is centrally located, close to all of the sights, but in a quiet residential area with lots of shops and restaurants nearby. Hosts were extremely welcoming and made us feel right at home - the apartment was really comfortable and clean. Airport pickup option was also really convenient and definitely appreciated.", "The apt was nearby the center of Sofia, Dani and Yasen were perfect hosts and they for few euros they gave us a ride from and to the airport. The house is really clean and comfortable. We hope to come back soon.", "Nice and cosy place.
Top location.", "Excellent place and very central area. It has everything necessary for the stay. Very easy to find", "The fact we visited that place for a second time says enough: extremely cosy, clean and warm apartment. It is located in the very centre of the city so it is very easy to reach the most important sightseeings and the fancy bars and restaurants. The contact with the host was again quick and clear. We would definitely visit them again.", "My stay at Yasen and Dany was great! The apartment is super clean, it has everything you might need! Location is perfect! It is in the heart of the city. There are supermarkets 2 min away and metro-station 5 min away, shopping streets all around. Yasen and Dany were very helpful and kept fast communication.
I can recommend it and I would stay there again!", "This is a very good place to stay in the center of Sofia. Perfect sushi and nice restaurant just on the next corner. Yasen was a perfect host, we've got answers and suggestions in seconds. We were surprised how convenient we've got the keys. You must also try it! ;) Good location, nice apartment and prepared hosts. Anytime again!", "Highly recommended. Central, spacious, clean, close to restaurants. I recommend Yasen&Dani's place to everyone.", "Great location, everything smelled clean, comfortable bed, easy check-in, coupled with a great host who was there to promptly answer all our queries.", "Great apartment to spend some days. It has the full facilities and it's so close to the city centre!", "Nice place, close to metro, easy check-in, easy check-out, clean, quiet, good interior, sufficient quantity of towels, some showere toiletries, comfortabe bed.
Will come back.", "An amazing apartment in the best location! Check in was easy to follow, the apartment was roomy, clean and comfortable. Great kitchen to cook meals and bed was comfortable. Location was excellent! Yasen and Dani were great host ensuring we were comfortable at all times! Will definitely come back and stay again =)", "Great place in the heart of Sofia, would definitely recommend it and stay there again.", "It's well situated - central - and everything is easily accessible. A comfortable, clean environment to decompress and enjoy the city in whichever way you want.", "Yasen has been very communicative and easy going. The instructions to get to the apartment are very clear. The apartment is very well located and close to every place by walk.", "Yasen and Dani's place was amazing, not more than 200m from the city center and very cozy. If you travel by car and park just outside, make sure to pay for parking from Monday to Friday. They block your wheel otherwise and it costs 30 BGN to release. The hosts are very friendly and helpful.", "Real Pleasure to Stay in this Perfect Flat in The Heart of Sofia . Extremely professional and punctual host . 5 Stars service!!! Definitely will use it again. Highly recommended ! Thank You:)", "We enjoyed our stay in Sofia a lot and one of the reasons was this apartment. The location is perfect  - exactly in the city centre so we were able to easily reach the places we wanted. The apartment was very clean and cosy and the communication with the hosts was very fast and easy and we had no problems to check in and out.", "Great place right in the heart of Sofia centre. Good communication from the host and the apartment was more than we expected. Spacious, clean, stylish! Everything you could ask for whilst you are in Sofia. We will definitely be booking the place again!", "emplacement idéal à Sofia à 2 minutes à pied de Vitosha, des restaurants de qualité non loin, l'appartement est confortable, le salon permet vraiment de se poser et la chambre à coucher donnant sur une cour intérieure permet de dormir dans le calme. bref à recommander sans réserve, les hôtes sont réactifs. Merci à eux", "Gentilissimi e appartamento molto pulito. Trovarlo è stato un po' difficile, ma a causa dell'alfabeto complicato :)", "El alojamiento está genial, el mejor airbnb en el que nos alojado, el apartamento es amplio, con mucha luz y muy cómodo. Además, está cerca de la zona comercial de Sofia. 100% recomendable ", "Yansen y Dani son unos anfitriones espectaculares, son muy atentos y siempre dispuestos a ayudarte. El apartamento es muy céntrico. Sin duda lo recomiendo", "Casa al centro di Sofia, spaziosa e pulita. ", "Apartamento en una ubicación increíble y limpio! Anfitrión inmejorable. Nos facilitó toda la información que le pedimos. Una experiencia muy buena!", "Espaço limpo, bem localizado e pessoa mto atenciosas ", "挺完美的", "Yasen i Dani zijn absoluut de ultime gastheer/-vrouw! Hartelijk, altijd beschikbaar, persoonlijk en warm. Na een verblijf bij hen wil je geen andere locatie!
Het apartament is comfortabel, schoon en volledig ingericht voor een aangenaam verblijf. De locatie is ideaal, op loopafstand van alle bezienswaardigheden met in de directe omgeving volop restaurants, cafés en winkeltjes. Zeer aanbevelenswaardig!!!", "Todella siisti ja mukava asunto aivan Sofian keskustassa! Lyhyt matka kaikkialle, joten loman aikana pääsi hyvin tutustumaan Sofian tunnelmaan. Lähellä asuntoa useita ravintoloita, joista suurimmasta osasta erinomainen kokemus. Omistajat olivat ystävällisiä ja kaikki sujui kuten oli sovittu. Voin lämpimästi suositella tätä kohdetta!", "Van donderdag tm dinsdag in Sofia geweest. Prettig om wat tijd te hebben om de stad en cultuur goed te ervaren. De stad heeft een rijke historie. 
Enkele tips: begin met Sofia Free Tour, beklim Vitosha Mountain( naar waterfal) bezoek de prachtige gebouwen, muses en neem een cocktail in de rooftop bar!

Locatie van dit appartement is ideaal. Alles op loopafstand, echt in het centrum.", "Eğer aranızda Sofya’ya gelip merkezi bir yerde kalmak isteyen olursa öneririm. Ev sahiplerimiz de çok kibar ve yardımsever insanlardı.", "La casa è a 10 minuti dal centro in una zona veramente tranquillissima con bar e ristoranti a due minuti. Dani e Yasen sono fantastici. Ci hanno offerto la possibilità di venirci a ritirare all'aereoporto e ci hanno accompagnato a cambiare i soldi in un punto molto conveniente. Gentilissimi anche quando ci hanno illustrato la città e le attrazioni. La casa ha tutto. Gentilissimi", "La estancia en el apartamento de Yasen&Dani ha sido fantastica,el apartamento es muy céntrico y como aparece en las fotos.
Pero si algo destacariamos sería la amabilidad de los propietarios,gracias por ayudarnos en todo,nos vamos con un gran recuerdo de Sofia", "Casa ubicata in una traversa della via principale nel centro di Sofia (Via Vithoska). Casa ampia e molto pulita.  Camera da letto matrimoniale di dimensioni normali ma il salotto era molto spazioso (bellissimo). I proprietari disponibili e attenti ai propri ospiti. Unico neo, se proprio volessi essere pignola,  magari lascerei qualche prodotto in più per la cucina (alimenti di prima necessità). CONSIGLIATO per un soggiorno piacevole nella capitale bulgara.", "Muy buen alojamiento. Bien situado, muy limpio y con todo lo necesario para una buena estancia. El sistema de entrada "libre", facilita mucho la llegada, sin tener que estar pendiente de llegar o salir a una determinada hora. Los dueños han estado atentos y accesibles en todo momento, muy amables. 100% recomendable ", "Apartamento espacioso y acogedor, en pleno centro de Sofía. Plenamente equipado. Los dueños muy atentos."]
