reviews:
["One of the best locations in Sofia!", "Central location, great place. The hosts were really helpful, messaging all the instructions we needed.", "Very nice place with great location in the heart of Sofia. Recommended for a couple or single travelers", "Perfect location, umcomfortable bathroom otherwise good place to stay", "Everything was great, when I entered I felt the positive energy and I felt as I am home. The location is great, you will find everything you would need in the apartment. The only negative thing was the shower as there was no place for shower and it is actually in the wc, but I figured out a solution. Will come back, thank you.", "Great location, good host! Would go back again!", "Great and pleasant stay. Very nice person with active communication. The building is a little bit run down from outside, but the apartment is great, renovated, clean.", "It was a very pleasant stay over at Simo's place. Top location for an affordable price. I would recommend it to anyone willing to visit Sofia for sightseeing, clubbing or whatever. 
", "Lovely place to stay! The studio is as described and looks exact like on the photos - really stylish, clean and cosy. Provides silence and nice atmosphere, where you feel like home. There's also a lot of sun light during the day and something important for me - adjustable light in the night, which makes this place so comfortable! Perfect location - everything is near. Oh, and great internet connection.
Simeon was an excellent host. He was very helpful and so kind answering to all of my questions.
Definitely, I will return to this place in the future! :)", "Good location, price and facilities (washing machine, fridge, shower, TV with many channels). Owners
always replied quickly to any message. Only issue for maybe some people is that the room is on the top floor of an old and dark building. Otherwise it's perfect.", "Good position, in the city center of Sofia. Nice and colorfull studio at the top of the building. Clean, bright and peacefull. Perfect for couples.", "Excellent location and very easy check in, with good instructions. I stayed here alone for 3 nights and it was ideal as a base in the city, I would definitely recommend it.", "Indeed a cozy little place in the heart of Sofia. The location cannot be better, that's for sure.  
Perfect for single or a close couple for a few days. As others have said, the combination of the many stairs and lack of kitchen makes this place not too suitable for longer terms. But for a place to lay your head at night or chill in front of the great TV, it works beautifully. 
Apart from that - communication with Simeon & Siyana was excellent, the place was clean, and check-in was easy and straightforward. Thanks!!", "The location is very central to all tourist attractions and many delicious restaurants. When we arrived at night the toilet wasn't flushing but thankfully the next morning the hosts friend came and resolved the problem. Communication was efficient and quick. I enjoyed my stay at the apartment because it was an accurate description of what is posted on airbnb.", "Excellent location in the heart of Sofia. Lots of cool cafes, bars and restaurants nearby. The place was spacious and communication with the host was also really good. Recommended.", "The place is really nice and clean and close to the city center/University/metro station so that everything is convenient! More importantly, Simeon and Siyana were very caring hosts who are always thinking about your needs!", "We had a really nice stay in this cozy apartment. Excellent location with everything you need around. ", "Simeon's studio is great for tourists AND for work trips as it is located in the heart of Sofia and close to all main stations and attractions. The flat is also in the hippest Sofia neighbourhood and I can say as a Sofia local that one can find great bars and restaurants in a 2-5min walk radius around the studio.
Would definitely visit again!", "A compact studio apartment in a great location! Suitable for people who are inspired to spend time in the city instead of cozying indoors. No real kitchen, but there are great food on the streets.", "The space at the Simeon is cozy and with a good location. However it is important to reinforce that it is on the sixth floor and there is no elevator. Also, the bathroom is a bit odd because the shower is above the toilet. Simeon was always very solicitous and helpful. It's a good place to stay a few days in Sofia!", "The host were really reactive to our request which was really appreciable also we had a bad start in the flat since there was probably a forgotten cleaning. Also we would recommand a refreshment of the bathroom. But unless these small bad points we had a very good stay in the new flat.", "Great little bolt hole up and away from the bustling city below... Fantastic value and had everything I needed. It was just me but would be comfortable for two... Plenty of bars and restaurants right on the door step. Siyana was extremely helpful with any question I had and made me feel very welcome. Recommended!", "Great place, great location. My son really enjoyed his stay.", "The place e is really cosy. Suitable for one person or a couple. What I personally liked the most were the fast answers I got from the hosts. I recommend it. Just keep in mind there's no lift and it's on the top floor.", "Every thing ok   Next to the city and 5minite to bus station. I recommendation these house.", "Location of the place was great, close to everything. Host was very helpful replaying promptly considering I booked a place on the day of arrival.", "Yeah it's a perfectly fine place to stay, and as advertised.

The area looks dodgy until you realise there are 5 govt. ministries on the same street. 

Spot is beside 'Crystal Park' which is a bit of a hotspot for locals and travellers.

", "Upon first entering the building at 9pm (completely sober, just speaking at normal conversational voice with my wife), we started walking up the stairs to an apartment. We were greeted on the first floor by a man holding a knife, glaring at us. Confused, and thinking that he was working on something, I walked past him, and smiled. He looked at me angrily. Then he said something angrily, went into the first floor apartment and shut the door loudly. My wife and I were petrified. We walked upstairs and called the host, who said that the neighbors were upset that some previous guests had been loud and drunk. We were scared for our safety and immediately left the apartment, and had to get an expensive hotel room nearby.", "amazing place for staying alone or for couples. center of sofia, good prices, friendly host. i can only suggest this place", "Don't hesitate! Perfect localisation and it's a charming place.", "The apartment is small but very nice. It was very clean and in a great location in the heart of Sofia. The only drawback is that is on the 5th floor and there is no elevator, but apart from that is a great choice.", "Simeon's place has an amazing location! For all solo travellers, this place offers amazing proximity to lots of places to eat, drink and have fun! It is walking distance to almost everything, including a nightclub next door! But worry not, the place is very quiet if you are a light sleeper! Would recommend mainly for the location!", "++ Communication was excellent and check in went smoothly. Host is very responsive and polite when communicating over chat. The place is very central with shops and restaurants round the corner. Good value for money. 

 - - the bathroom had a stale smell, probably coming from the gutter. The shower is on top of the toilet and it is challenging to get a proper shower.", "Perfect location !", "Very comfortable place in the heart of the city! Excellent communication with the host.", "Small, cosy place. Really good location. Close to everything. Cafes, tram, supermarkets, parks. You can walk literally everywhere.
The apartment is small but got everything you need. A fridge, tv, kettle and heating.
We enjoyed your time in Sofia and in Simeon’s place.", "Simeon is very responsive and helpful host.  I have spent 10 days in his flat without any trobles. Perfect location!", "I didn't meet Simeon but he gave me all information that I need.
About the apartment, it's clean and situate in good position. I suggest for a couple or single traveller", "I returned to the studio and stayed 2 weeks . 
As usual the host was great and the location is  killer . Thanks .", "Simeon's place is located in heart of Sofia city with many options to eat and visit right downstairs.", "Simo was great to talk to. I didn't get to meet him, but his instructions for getting into the apartment and for check-out were clear and super easy, and he checked in routinely to make sure everything was alright. The apartment itself is cute and in a perfect spot to enjoy downtown Sofia. You will get a bit of a workout on the stairs, but it's worth it. Thanks Simo!", "10/10
Location is just perfect, very clean and communication fest, easy and helpful.
I even had some delay in my return fight and Simeon let me stay for a couple of hours more so I didn't have to wait on the street. 
When I return to Sofia I'll repeat at Simeon's appartment.", "Perfect place to explore Sofia, Just be prepared for a lot of steps up to the apartment and there is not much to cook on. The Resteraunt in Sofia are such good value and great that it didn't matter for us anyway :)", "Great location, it's an old building on a quiet street, and within a walking distance from the very heart of the city.
The communication with Simeon was good, although there were a few details about the studio that I did not know about, such as the lack of a stove (so it's not quite possible to cook) and the tiny toilet-shower-sink all in one. It would have been nice to know about these details in advance.
Overall it's a good place to stay for a few days, but I personally would not recommend it for a longer stay - unless you don't really cook nor you don't mind making the whole toilet wet because the shower is just in the middle of everything.", "The Studio is extremely well located. It does not get any better than this. It was well equipped. The only issue was the bathroom, because it was pretty small and a lil bit old. Checking in and communication was also without any problem. Simeon was answering right away.
I am recommending his apartment, if you want to be in the heart of the city.", "As they say location, location ! This one is as good as they come. Very easy to communicate with host. Good for one person, unless the people are in very loving relations !", "Center of Sofia, near Cathedral Alexander Nevsky. But 6th floor without elevator.

Appartement is not very big, ok for a solo or couple traveller and air conditionned (summers in Sofia are hot !). And who wants to stay in an appartement in a city like Sofia anyway ?
 
Shower might be surprising to westerner as it is on toilet bowl.", "The place is good for 1 or 2 people for a short stay. The bathroom is small, but everything I needed was in the flat. The location is excellent, and good value for the price.", "Simeon's place is conveniently located in a quiet residential area, yet so close to many wonderful places, like the Cathedral and the National Weather, and several bars, restaurants and a supermarket.", "He is very helpful, especially about check-in and check-out hours. You do not live any problems in communication with him as soon as you let him know about your requests.", "Perfect location...central yet quiet. Simon was very professional with his online communication...I didn't meet him personally, but he arranged a helpful man to meet me who helped carry my luggage up the many stairs. I ended up really appreciating the stairs as I needed the exercise. The way to live long and happy :)", "This studio apartment was very comfortable for a 4 night stay. It's in the centre of of city, close to restaurants, bars and the city's sites, and has everything you'd need for a short (or long) stay. The bed is large and comfortable and the air-conditioned works well. The check-in process was very good, and the studio is nicer than the photos demonstrate. It's much more than I expected for the price. I'd stay again...", "Great apartment, cosy but equipped with everything you need. The stairs are long, but it's good exercise. :)

Location is the best, very central to everything in the city. Close to nightlife but not noisy at all.", "The location is amazing and the place was very clean and tidy. It's also conveniently close to the meetup spot for two of the free Sofia tours - the Balkan bites and the pub crawl! Thanks again Simon!", "Perfect studio in the city center. Communication with Simeon was good. When we arrived we thought the keys were not working and a friend of Simeon came immediately back to help us (sorry again was our own mistake!) As already mentioned you have to take some stairs to the studio but this is  a perfect exercise after having dinner and some drinks ;-)", "excellent location, assistance with checking in slightly early and value.  the only thing i was a bit disappointed with was that only a single source of water exists for drinking, washing dishes and bathing and that is the bathroom sink (a hose connects the sink to the shower head).  this all works fine, it just is a bit challenging if you want to simply heat up food in the toaster oven and wash the dishes afterwards, etc.  otherwise everything was excellent!", "Great location! The apartment has everything you need to stay for a couple of days. ", "This studio is clean and bright, with everything you could need for a short stay. Most of Sofia is within walking distance,  Definitely recommended +++", "My experience at Simeon's place was great, the studio was very clean, in an amazing location, and it is very comfortable to stay in.

Simeon, was a great host, he always replied to my messages on time, and he was always very kind to help me at anytime. 

The building is a bit ruining out. The studio was in the 6th floor without lift, so it is not suitable if you keep going in and out from the accommodation. 

The weak point is that the stairs of the building were dark in the floors of the middle and a bit smelly as it looks no buddy is in charge of the hygiene of the building.

In General, I had a nice stay at Simeon's place, is an excellent option if you going in a budget plan and Sofia is a beautiful, and  charming city to discover. 
", "A lovely little loft. Perfectly situated in the center of town. Easy walking distance to everything you'll need. Thanks for a lovely stay. ", "It's a cozy studio in the centre of Sofia. You can find everything in walking distance. Great place to stay!", "Our experience was excellent. The location is fantastic, the studio is in the center of Sofia and from there you can walk everywhere. Actually, in the same street is Hamabara, a pretty unique bar which is an obligated to visit. The studio is exactly as it is shown in the pictures, with nice furniture, illuminated and comfy.  Perfect for young couples, because of the fact that there are many stairs. Great attention from the hosts and a great option to visit the beautiful city of Sofia.", "Excellent home in an excellent location. A lot of restaurants, parks, and shops within walking distance. The flat is cozy and well-equipped. The only downside at all is that it's up 6 flights of stairs. Overall, a great place that's a great value", "Amazingly well located studio, walking distance to anything of interest in Sofia. Simeon is a thoughtful host, whose communication is accurate and timely. It's a bit of a walk up the stairs (6 floors), but that is clearly laid out in the description, so no complaints. Overall, a good experience. ", "Nice and cozy studio. Very good accomodation also for 2 people.", "every thing was ok like in my first visit! 
", "The apartment itself is nice but the building it's in is a little bit rundown. Simeon was very nice.", "Although we didn't personally meet Simeon, we had the pleasure of staying at his place. It is really small but cozy and it had everything we needed for a short stay in Sofia. Highly recommended!", "Great location, very central. 
The only issue was that we had no access to a kitchen. Keep in mind that if you like to cook or heat up anything that will be complicated.  You will have access to a kettle, a coffee machine and a very small oven. ", "It's a great apartment for one or two people! Very centrally located, easy access to the metro to/from the airport and very close to many restaurants and bars. It's a small place but very clean and had everything we needed for a long weekend! Simeon was great with communication for check in/out. We recommend it  :) ", "Wow! What wonderful place to stay. Exactly as advertised. Not only is the flat clean and well equipped, Simeon was a wonderful and helpful host. Highly recommended! ", "Everything was Nice  and it was realy close to the center ;)", "It is a very cosy place, highly recommended. Simeon was very helpful and communicated everything.

", "Apartment in the heart of the city.The studio is as described and looks exact like on the photos.
Lovely place to stay especially, perfect for a couple.", "Cozy and unique apartment in the heart of the city. Simeon and Monica were very helpful and welcoming throughout our stay! :) a place perfect for a couple. ", "The host was welcoming and correct. The location is also very central.", "Everything was just as described. There was a minor issue with the shower water pressure on our last day, but not a big deal as it was still manageable. Simeon assured he would look into the issue for future quests. Never the less, we would still choose to stay here again in the future. ", "Simeon was so nice with us, he was a very nice host. the Apartment was super clean and very close to the turistic center of Sofia. He has the pick up service and it was perfect because he was at the airport when we arrive. 
Thanks a lot ! simeon! if we turn back some day we will try to go to your Loft again :)", "Très bon appartement, très bien équipé, très bonne localisation par rapport aux principaux lieux touristiques de la ville.", "L'appartement de Siméon est situé à 15 minutes de la rue piétonne et au 5eme étage sans ascenseur d'un très ancien immeuble qui demande des travaux d'entretien. Il faut bien avoir en tête qu'il n'y a pas de cuisine et que la salle de bain est minuscule. Le lit était confortable et le linge de lit propre. Siméon a répondu à tous nos messages et inquiétudes. ", "Posizione perfetta ma molto molto piccolo, soprattutto il bagno (impossibile farsi la doccia). Consigliato per una persona e brevi soggiorni.", "Petit logement mais parfaitement situé pour visiter Sofia. Climatisation plus qu'appréciée par 36 degrés ! Merci ", "Logement en plein centre pour une visite touristique sans avoir à utilisée de taxi, l'endroit est calme et juste à coté d'un des bar les plus vieux de Sofia (mais chut je ne vous ai rien dis )
L'accueil a été prévus et ponctuel !
Si j'ai à revenir je serai ravi de le reprendre .
", "Alloggio piccolino , semplice, pratico, in pieno centro. Nei dintorni locali , ristoranti supermercati e piccoli market oltre ovviamente chiese parchi e le principale cose da visitare di Sofia. Ovvio non devono spaventarti i 6 piani a piedi. Sono stato da solo ma secondo me perfetto anche per una coppia senza particolari pretese.
Null'altro da dire!", "Agréable studio dans un quartier vivant ! Tout se fait à pieds étant donné la localisation idéale. Nous y avons passé un bon moment entre copines. ", "Simeon war freundlich und unkompliziert! jederzeit gerne wieder!
", "Appartamento pulito comodo e centralissimo, sicuramente 5 stelle per rapporto qualit-prezzo. Condominio silenzioso, camera silenzioso, bagno piccolo ma funzionale. Materasso e cuscino nella media, un giorno magari si potrebbe rinnovare. 6-7 piani di scale da fare a piedi, ma fa molto bene alla salute salire le scale. Complessivamente un ottimo appartamento rispetto a prezzo location pulizia. Ho anche dimenticato gli occhiali nell'appartamento e il titolare me li ha rispediti subito al mio domicilio.", "Gemütliches Apartment, absolut ausreichend für einen Städtetrip.", "Nette kleine Wohnung sehr sehr zentral, sonnig und hell ! Danke*"]

reviews:
["We don't meet Mila personally, check in instruction was perfect and local tips was useful. The place is in the centre and quiet neighborhood.", "Great location, nice and cosy apartment, 10-15 walk from everything . Internet wasn’t working  at all the time , the connection was very poor. The parking is not free , there is a green zone in-front of the building if you stay more then 4 hours they will charge your car.", "Everything was perfect, responsive owner! Good location, apartment was clean and looks like on pictures, very sweet. 
Thank, will come again :) ", "Nice apartment, very cosy and clean,has everything needed. For checkin and checkout was very easy and smoothly.Perfect location, 3 mins walk to metro and 10 mins walk to the very center area. 
The host is very professional, gave us a lot of useful information in the city,thank you for hosting!", "Lovely, clean place! Everything within walking distance. At night, it can get a little bit warm at times, but luckely there is a ventilator :)", "Great place in sofia. Lots of space and located in a quick walk to all the tourist highlights", "We really enjoyed our stay at Mila's.
The apartment was very nice and even though she wasn't there she gave us clear instructions and useful advices about what to visit in Sofia. The house was pretty close to the city centre. Definitely a good choice. ", "What a wonderful moment in this apartment ! So cosy, very well situated and decorated. Mila is a perfect host...taking care so well of her guests, with sweet attentions. We recommend her a lot. And we’ll come back for sure in this beautiful house when we’ll travel again in Sofia. Thank you so much Mila :)", "Great location- close to everything and perfect ammenities for stay in Sofia. Would recommend", "Location was a bit dodgy but it was close to town (15-20 minute walk). Nice and clean, very comfortable mattress. Mila was a great host and very quick to respond ", "Unbelievably clean with good amenities. Perfectly quiet and one of the most comfortable beds we’ve ever slept in. We had better sleep here than we’ve had in a month of travel. 

Easy walking to main Sofia sights but very quiet spot. Taxi stand super close if you need.", "Easy & convenient,  would recommend.", "When you walk in to Mila’s Place you immediately feel relaxed and impressed with the space. She has made a lot of effort to cater for your needs during your stay, while adding touches that give the place a great feel and mood.

It caters for two but I felt her use of the space was effective and there is a lot of room.

She was a wonderful host, she provided all the information I needed  with great detail and left no stone unturned. Her tips and hints were very useful and impacted my stay in Sofia in a very positive way. She was communicative and went the extra mile for me. I felt so comfortable chatting to her and making requests. I always felt as though she was more than happy to make me feel more comfortable.

Her place is conveniently situated and I could walk to many significant places within 20 minutes at most.

You will not be disappointed by your stay here and Mila evidently works hard to ensure that.

I loved this place❤️", "Mila is a good host and the place is perfect for two travelers.", "Great place to stay as a couple, close to the city centre and not expensive :)", "Nice place close to the city center and Mall Sofia where you can find shops and restaurants. The apartment is small but nicely done. Consider bringing with you soap and shower gel as the place doesn’t offer any. No TV. Appropriate for a couple. The host is quite responsive. We are happy with our stay.", "Our stay was great. Mila was very very helpful and replied really quickly when we needed something. The apartmant was cozy, clean, the location was great and overall we had a great experience. Thank you!", "Great location and very pleasant spot.", "Bright apartment near of the main street, shops, bars,... Faithful of the description", "The place is quite new, extremely clean, calme neighborhood, but also not far from the city center (10 minutes by feet), the building itself is quite secure , nothing to complain about, plus Milla was double checkingon me if I arrived and everything was clear", "Very nice apartment, located max. 10 mins in the near of the central spot of Sofia. It was comfortable and clean. Very warmly recommended!", "Fantastic", "Great host!Super fast responses and very helpful!", "Apartment close to the center (10-15min walking) and close to a big shopping mall (5 min walking). More than enough for two people during three nights, we had a very pleasant stay, no noise and the kitchen was properly equipped. We didn't meet Mila but she was very responsive to e-mail.", "Great place. Highly recommended!", "Great and cozy place. Loooved the bed. Amazing. 10 points go toooo.. Mila", "Mila is a fantastic host, so helpfully and very fast to reply to any questions you have. Great warm and comfortable flat with an unbelievably comfortable bed l. Thanks so much", "For a couples weekend getaway,Mila’s place was perfect. It was warm, clean, with a huge comfortable bed. The location was perfect in a safe area with a five minute walk to the center and some really nice underground bars (the real stuff) along the walk - just check the side streets. 
Also the wifi was working perfectly during our stay and the check in was very easy with clear directions.", "My wife and I had a wonderful three night stay at Mila’s place. We didn’t get to meet Mila since she was out of town but she provided us with clear instructions to check in. Everything was great and the apartment and clean and stylish perfect for two people. 
It is also close to the downtown area. Would definitely recommend this place to travelers.", "WOW. If you are staying in the centre of Sofia and need a fantastic warm apartment with everything you need then book Mila’s place. Perfect.", "The accomodation in mila's house was very nice! The house is very cozy and well equiped! It is next to opalchenska metro station and 10-15 minutes by foot from the very center of the town, Serdika! Mila was very helpful with everything we asked her! In the house there are tourist guides for the city! The only serious problem is that the wi fi internet didnt work! Mila tried to solve this problem but it was not rendered possibile! We surely recommend it!", "It is  just like in the photos. It is sparkling clean. Very close to the center. There are towels and ameneties. The kitchen is equiped very well.  The heating is on all night and its very warm and cosy. The wifi was not ok, but I supose it was a one time coincidence. All in all it was a great stay and I highly recommend it", "Mila was good with keeping me informed when I needed information.", "Great place . Great host . Great location. Perfect", "Very Nice place :)", "Very nice appartment! Will come back again.", "The apartment is very central. Near to a lot of shops and the city centre. We did not even use public transport the three days we were in Sofia! 
Great apartment!", "The house is cozy, spacious and clean. The neighborhood is residential and quiet, 5 minute far from Vitosha blv. Unfortunately we did not meet our host Mila because she was out of town but she answered quickly and clearly to our requests.", "Mila is a great host, very helpful, communicative and responsive! The apartment is awesome! Close to public transport and to shops, restaurants and cafes. The Sofia mall is only a 5 min walk. The apartment was super clean and cozy. Building is clean and the area feels safe. Overall 5 stars! Would definitely stay at Mila's again :)", "Mila is a great host! The apartment was clean and everything was working well. She sends you all this great tips for things to do and see on beforehand, but also in the apartment you can find all these maps and little booklets with tips and restaurants etc. The communication went really well and the apartment is not hard to find at all. It is also just a 10 min walk max to the city center and 5 min walk to the first nice bars and restaurants. Only minor issue is that the wifi was not really working well, but that's the only negative thing I can say!", "Everything was nice! I enjoyed  this place. 
clean, cozy, quite, mostly interior designs. I liked it much. Even they have candles and dumbbells as well what i need.
kind host.
thank you so much for your hosting and kindness.
I wish you have a beautiful life ~☆", "We really enjoyed staying at Mila's place! The apartment was very clean, silent and in a well maintained residency building. Almost everything is reachable with a 10-15 min walk! The communication with Mila was a little troubled the day before our arrival, she wasn't replying to our last messages including questions about how to get there and who would be our emergency person because of her absence in the city during our stay. This made us feel a bit insecure and worried but in the end everything turned out well and we didn't regret to have chosen her place for our weekend trip :)
Thank you again!", "Very cute apartment with nice touches like tour guides, kitchen utensils, and bathroom supplies. Location is near some street food and close to a subway stop. We had a little trouble with the washing machine but eventually got it to work.", "Mila's place is a lovely Airbnb experience. It is easy to find, in the heart of Sofia, clean, quite, good value for money.
I wish all Airbnb hosts would do the effort to make their place neat as Mila does.", "Mila's place was very clean, comfortable and walking distance to the center of town. A big plus is that it's close to a metro station that has a direct train to the airport. Check-in and communication with mila was great.", "Very cozy and nice apartment within a walking distance from the center of Sofia. I recommend it", "Mila's place was very clean and organised, in a quiet area of the city but very close to the centre, I even found some good local restaurants (better food than in the centre)  and coffees less than 10min away. The only concern in the beginning was that the  area is quite dark at night, so I wasn't sure about how safe it is...but I had no problem and apparently the Sofia is quite safe city in general. Mila was very quick at responding the messages and very helpful with my requests. Recommend the place if you wanna spend a few days in Sofia. 
Xx", "Great Airbnb in Sofia. Mila was very attentive throughout the whole process and I was even able to do a late check-in without any issues. The apartment was clean, spacious, and in a convenient location. About a 10 to 15 minute walk from the center of Sofia but it wasn't an issue at all. Thank you again!", "Mila is very nice, very easy to communicate with and the place is cozy and very central which is great for discovering the city on foot. 
I would recommend the place highly.", "My little vacation in Sofia was great. Mila was very helpfull and the communication was perfect. The apartment was clean and looks very nice. When going to Sofia, I really would recommend to stay in this apartment:)", "The place was ten minutes away from the city centre, really close and we loved it. It was exactly what you could expect. Mila was so kind enough to let our luggage stay even though we had to check out early. But we wanted to see some museums and our flight was later that day. Great host! I will def come back if I ever visit Sofia again.", "Very neat and cosy apartment, quiet but almost everything reachable within minutes. Recommend ", "Mila's apartment was perfect for our stay. It was clean and spacious and very close to the city centre. Mila was very helpful and I would definitely like to stay here again if I return to Sofia! ", "Great location, only a 10 minute walk from the centre of the city and close to Serdika and Opalchenska metro stations.", "I was pretty happy but I really like the host to be there and she wasn't. This made finding the place, finding parking, and figuring out the key system a little difficult. I feel like Airbnb is a community of individuals helping each other out (a little extra cash for the one and a cheap, non commercial, place to stay for the other) and when the host isn't there I always suspect that some mafia boss is just renting out dozens of flats with made up profiles. Still good place for the money. Kind of a strange, if not very clean area, but the flat itself was very clean, not far from the main attractions, and had parking on site--although this isnt guaranteed, just depends on if there is a free spot, which bothered me a little. My overall rating for the place is positive but if I stayed in Sofia again I would probably look elsewhere. That being said, Mila (if that's your real name;)) was very communicative, friendly and helpful.", "The flat is nice and located at a walkable distance to the main attractions. The wifi could be a bit better, since it disconnected all the time from my phone when I was out of the bedroom.
The city is very hot during the summer and an air conditioning would make the stay more pleasant.", "Mila's apartment is very nice just like the pictures. It's very easy to get there by metro. And it's very safe area cause the police station is few steps far from the apartment :) There's a shopping mall near the apartment where you can find something to eat. Also there's a currency exchange in the mall, the exchange rate there is better than airport and city center.", "Very clean and nice appartment", "The bed is really awesome and the mattress is really comfy!
The apartment is in a quiet area but not far from the main road and just a five minute walk from the city centre (the area where the most hip places are) - we have enjoyed the walks back home in the night!
Mila had some water put away in the fridge - it was 35°C - we really appreciated it! (also the instant coffee in the cupboard ^^)
Overall we've had a great time, and loved the apartment - it set the warm tone for our mornings, evenings and sleep - so we could enjoy the lovely Sofia during the day. Thanks again! Veronika and Balazs", "We had a wonderful stay. We enjoyed having coffee on the quiet balcony in the morning. The full-sized fridge was a pleasant surprise, as we like to buy a few groceries for breakfast. Even with the windows open at night, the area was quiet enough to sleep. But the apartment was quite close to stores and restaurants. The furniture/decor was comfortable and inviting. We really felt like we were staying at our home away from home. ", "Very cosy apartment within walking distance of the centre of Sofia.", "This is a lovely and spacious apartment in Sofia. It is a short walk to the city centre and all the attractions and there is a metro stop close by. The hosts were unable to meet us but were very kind and easy to contact and had left lots of information for us. Would recommend this apartment when staying in Sofia! ", "Nice and quiet appartement. The flat is not in the city center but not far by walk (10-15min max) and there is subway and tramway station not far if needed. Recommended if you have to spend few night in Sofia", "The apartment looks exactly like the photos. It was a great location and Mila was a friendly host and very efficient. Would definitely recommend staying here  !", "It is a great apartment. Very cosy and comfortable. Located near all main spots in the center of Sofia. It's very calm and relaxing. Everything was like described. ", "That's a great, pretty apartment, with super comfortable bed and in a perfect location. Mila is very helpful. Totally recommend!", "Appartement très bien, proche du centre ville ! ", "Appartement propre et simple, avec balcon, situé à une dizaine de minutes à pied de l'hyper centre, avec métro juste à côté.
Pratique pour découvrir la ville à un prix raisonnable.", "Appartement très bien situé, 10 minutes à pied du centre de Sofia et mall a proximité. Entrée dans les lieux facile. ", "Superfijne Airbnb! Een aanrader als je een dag of 2 naar Sofia gaat!", "Appartement sympa et fonctionnel. Arrivée autonome très pratique. Avec mon amie, nous avons passé un super séjour. Je recommande ce logement. 10-15 min à pied du centre.", "Bel appartement, très bien localisé près du centre ville et près du métro. 
Mila est très serviable avec pleins de bons conseils.
J'y retournerais avec plaisir :)", "Een klein maar leuk en proper appartementje. Ongeveer 10 minuutjes wandelen tot de Vitosha blvd en 5 minuutjes tot de metrohalte. Er is ook een lidl supermarkt op 5 minuten wandelen, wat zeer handig is! Meer hadden we niet nodig om er een leuke citytrip van te maken. Aanrader!", "Una estancia agradable el piso esa bastante bien y la localizacion es centrica. Volveria sin dudar. Gracias por todo Mila", "Πολυ ομορφο διαμερισμα κοντα στο κεντρο της πολης δεκα λεπτα με τα ποια διπλα σε σταση του μετρο ! Καθαρο ομορφα διακοσμημενο και ζεστο! Η Μιλα πολυ καλη αν και δεν την ειδαμε απαντουσε αμεσως στα μνμτα μας! Το μονο μικρο αρνητικο ειναι στο wifi! 
Το συνηστω ανεπιφυλακτα!", "El sitio esta en una ubicación perfecta para ir andando a todas partes y facil de llegar desde el aeropuerto. La casa es pequeña pero cumple con todo lo necesario para pasar unos días geniales en Sofía. El trato siempre fue rapido y fluido con Mila ademas de estar muy atenta en todo momento. Como unico punto negativo la casa no esta equipada con horno pero tienes todo lo necesario para cocinar. Ha sido un placer!", "Ik heb Mila helaas niet ontmoet, maar ze was een tophost op afstand. Ze had goede tips voor ons verblijf in Sofia en reageerde erg snel! Het appartement ligt niet in de meest mooie omgeving, echter is het van binnen wel mooi! De locatie is echt top, alles is te lopen!", "Отличная квартирка. Очень чистая.есть все необходимое.", "Een klein, leuk appartementje dichtbij het stadscentrum. We hadden geen klachten en het is een goede prijs-kwaliteit verhouding. Mila is een behulpzame en vriendelijke verhuurster.", "Bel appartement, bien décoré et propre avec un petit balcon. Proche du centre ville. Je n'ai pas rencontré Mila car les clés étaient dans une boîte mais elle a répondu à mes questions par mail.", "駅からは徒歩10分くらいで､立地はまあまあ｡ﾎｽﾄはとても親切で､返信はとても早かったです｡清潔な部屋でした｡", "Appartement calme et agréable à 10-15 mn du centre de Sofia.
Bien équipé et agreable", "Appartamento molto carino in posizione non troppo lontana dal centro di Sofia, solo 15 min a piedi dal palazzo di Giustizia. Consiglio il free Sofia tour che parte proprio da quel palazzo.", "Prima locatie appartement. Goede verbinden overal naar toe. Centrum Serdika is zelfs lopend te doen. Appartement schoon, met alle noodzakelijke voorzieningen."]

reviews:
["Really nice and cosy place located in the city centre. Really good host. Everything was perfect.", "Very good apartment and Velislav is great host. I recommend his house", "Had a great stay at this appartement. It was beautiful, clean and has a good location near the city center. Velislav is a nice host and made me feel welcome. I had everything I needed in the appartement and if I didn't I had the feeling I could call him and he would help me out. I definitly recommend staying here, I think I will be doing the same next time I visit Sofia. By the way, awesome couch. ", "Velislav is sociable, friendly, and reliable host. The apartment has everything you need for a stay of two to three people. The location is great, 5 minutes from the administrative and historical center of the city. Everything was great! I recommend!", "My girlfriend and I stayed in Velislav's apartment, awaiting my permanent residence in an apartment during my 4-month internship in Sofia.

Even though we were a bit later than promised, Velislav welcomed us with a big smile. The apartment is a as promised, there was even some fruit on the table. It's a very nice (and clean!) space. That goes for the bathroom, the livingroom annex kitchen and especially for the bedroom.

Sofia is a city which you can fairly easy discover on foot. The location of the apartment adds to that experience. Most of the popular tourist attractions are easy to reach within a 5-10 minute walk.

On top of that, Velislav quickly reacts to my questions and is easy to reach!

In short: I would recommend this apartment to everyone, especially to friends and family who will visit me. My father booked already! I hope that says it all ;-)", "Excellent cozy apartment with warm and comfortable interior. Close to everything you need in the city centre and  yet very quiet area. My host was very kind and made sure I had everything I need. Unexpected pinch of Paris romance in the grey February Sofia.", "The apartment is great-so nice and clean.The location perfect.", "Thank you for everything! Everything was great, next time sure again!", "I spent about a week in Velislav his apartment and cannot say anything different than his apartment being the best one i spent my time in till now. Its compact yet so functional and loaded with small thoughts simply making this an insanely good apartment. The living room is compact but cozy (internet available of course) , the kitchen is loaded with useful equipment and additionals such as herbs when cooking, a wash machine with the needed powder to do laundry and so on....simply perfect!  The bedroom is beautifully designed and incredibly comfortable and lastly, the bathroom and shower are just amazing.  (here too you will find shampoo etc, enough toilet paper and so on) .   As mentioned in the beginning, this was by FAR the best apartment ive been in since i started using AirBnB.

Thanks once more!!!!", "The communication prior to and during the stay was prompt and clear. The place is in a pretty good location and most of the major attractions like Saint Sofia, Saint Alexander Nevsky, Archaeological Complex Serdica, etc. can be easily reached by walking. The place itself is spacious, clean and tidy. Thank you Velislav for kindly hosting us at your place!", "Fantastic place to stay in Sofia! The apartment was an ideal size and had all the amenities to make our stay perfect. Velislav was an incredible host and made us feel welcomed to both the apartment and the city of Sofia. Great location, within walking distance of all landmarks and was in a safe area. The apartment was also incredible value for money - I would definitely recommend for anyone looking for somewhere nice to stay in the city.", "Wonderful flat, spotless, spacious ans great value for money!", "This is my fourth or even five time at Velislav’s place!

It’s nice to have a place to call “home” in Sofia!", "Great place and good location", "We loved the apartment. It has everything we needed in the kitchen (also coffee&tea). 
There is also a washing machine (super useful during more than a week  stay, plus baby on borad). 
The apartment was very clean and had a super sofa table that could be adjusted and used for work ( my husband loved it). 
Velislav is really nice and managed great with our very late check in and late check out. 
Definitely a place I would book, once we visit Sofia again.", "perfect, comfortable and clean place at a great location", "The Apartment is at a perfect location at the center! Cute and cozy flat with my friend Velislav always ready to help us with anything we wanted ! I recommend this place and i will stay again soon for sure ", "Very good location, clean appartment with all the equipements needed. Velislav is nice and helped a lot for our confort. Thanks again!", "Velislav is a great host. He will answer any questions you may have and is very responsive to anything you may need. It’s a home away from home. ", "Terrific location. Modern, renovated flat. Very comfortable bed and all you need to cook a meal. This is a gem.", "Velislav’s place was just as the pictures, really clean and tidy and perfect for staying for a few days while visiting Sofia. Communication with Velislav was perfect from the beginning, he even offered to pick us up from the airport and was kind enough to wait even though our flight was delayed 2 times and we ended up arriving at 4am. Velislav explained everything that was close to the apartment and interesting places to visit. I would definitely stay again in this apartment if I came back to Sofia.", "The apartment is great , clean , kitchen well-equipped , and it's an easy walk to the main attractions of the city. Velislav was also quick to respond to all of my enquiries. 

The only thing you might want to note is that the road that the apartment is located on is split into half, and can be a bit tricky to find.", "We stayed at Velislav's place for four nights and we really enjoyed it.
The apartment is clean, modern and well-equipped.
 It is a short walk from the historic center of Sofia. Velislav was very helpful and responded quickly to any request.", "Velislav is a delightful host, we arrived in the middle of the night, he came to pick up us to the airport, so we did not have to solve the problem with transport and finding the apartment. Apartment is located in the heart of the Sofia, walking distance to all main attraction, pubs, restaurant. I would definitely recommend this host and apartment as well. In case of coming back to Sofia, we would stay again, without any hesitation :)", "Velislav's apartment in Sofia is ideal for single travellers and couples alike. The apartment is clean, quiet, safe, cosy and very central.
You are a 25 minute walk from the Central Railway and Bus Stations; you are a 5-10 minute walk away from the wonderful Serdika metro station (a site which shares the metro with the historic ruins and mosque) where you can catch a subway train to the airport in 20 minutes.
You are 5 minutes away from the transcendent St Alexander Nevsky cathedral - one of the most utterly wonderful places I have visited.
And to top it off, you are a 10-15 minute walk to both the university district and Sofia's very hip centre.

Staying at Velislav's was my second time in Sofia - I cannot recommend the city or this apartment highly enough.", "Very nice apartment. If you arrive in the cold seson, then the heating and hot water in apartment is working totally good. From central heating. It is easy to find this place from the airport, first with metro and then walk straight ahead. I can recomend.", "We had a lovely time at the apartment for our birthday celebrations. Its only 15 mins walk to the cathedral and most attractions. Velislav was very friendly and also picked us up from the airport he was so kind to arrange for his dad to take us back to the airport when we left as velislav had a wedding to attend. The apartment is very spacious and clean and has lots of facilities washing machine cooker etc and we were even allowed to help ourselves to fruit in the apartment what a lovely touch. Would highly recommend this place", "The place was as advertised. It was clean and comfortable. A 15-20 minute walk to all the tourist stuff/bars/restaurants. There are some nice bars and restaurants nearby as well. When some of the hostels are only a couple of dollars less per night, this is a great deal!", "The apartment was perfect for a weekend trip to Sofia. We had everything we needed and much more! The bathroom and the kitchen are fully equipped and the apartment itself is really cozy. The check-in and check-out went without any problems - evey we were arriving quite late! Velislav had a few recommendations for us and tried to help us with everything. There are a few good restaurants and cafes around the corner and the subway is near by. I would definitely recommend this place!", "Velislav picked me Up at the Airport and brought us to a car hiring place ... He gave us great Tipps and the Appartement is also really nice... It's located in the Center. You can reach everything in Walking distance ... We were really happy we would always recommend it! 
Thank you ", "It's my 4th time at Velislav's place... and every time is like coming back home!
I absolutely recommend this place for everybody needing a cosy spot in the city centre.", "Amazing place and amazing host. The apartment was perfect, everything clean and equipped with all the necessary.
Velislav has been very nice with us and also ready to give us advice about where to eat, the best way to reach some points of interest near Sofia and so on.

Really recommend.", "Of all the places I have stayed this was by far the nicest experience! Velislav is an amazing host that makes you feel at home immediately. The place itself has everything you need, from all kitchen utensils to a washing machine and fast internet. I can highly recommend when visiting Sofia!", "Velislav is a great host - as described by all other guests and colleagues. His hospitality and the solutions he found for us, because I mistook the booking dates, exceeded our expectations :) Thank you Velislav and we hope to see you soon when we are back in your super flat :)", "This my second stay at Velislav and it is alaways a quiet, comfortable well situated  and well equiped place. I highly recommand this flat. And you can count on Velislav for being responsive and communicative.
Jean-Sébastien", "Nice, cozy and very clean apartment in a good neighourhood. Highly recommended.", "Velislav was fast to respond, friendly and helpful. His place is brand new, clean and has all the amenities one could need. It is close to the city center..10min walk.", "Great apartment, really clean, close to all the major sightseeings. We had a wonderfull trip to Sofia staying at this apartment.", "The appartament is very comfortable, has everything you need to spend a few days in it. The bed was very comfortable after a very exhausted day. It is very central just 7 minutes walk from the Cathedral Alexander Nevsky. To thank Velislav for helping us with everything we needed was always available to answer our questions. We will be back.", "Velislav's apartment is awesome! Very cozy and warm, we didn't have to use the heating at all even if outside it was really cold for us! It gave us ideas for renovating our place!The bedroom was big and the bed very comfortable. Shower water hot anytime, kitchen and washing machine we didn't had to use but available. Big sofa and cable TV in the living room was appreciated!
The location was in a nice quiet neighborhood just a few minutes walk from the cathedral of St Alexander Nievsky and 5-10' from Independence square and Vitosha Blvd!! 
Velislav is an amazing host,cared for all our needs, answered all our questions in just few minutes and he even booked us a taxi for 4:30am and woke up to send us the confirmation sms!
Sofia was an amazing trip and surely Velislavs apartment had a role for it!! Warmly recommend it, and next time i hope to be able to book it again!", "This is my third time in Velislav’s place.
I always come for business reasons and I always feel at home!", "Fell like at home when you can cook, wash your laundry and do everything", "My wife and I stayed here for 5 days.
Velislav's apartment is perfect for a stay in Sofia.
 The apartment is exactly as shown on the listing. It is very clean. 
It was well stocked with sundries. 
It is a short walk from the historic centre of Sofia.
Velislav was very helpful and responded quickly to any request", "Really great place. First of all it was spotlessly clean, both the beds are comfortable and it has a nice kitchen and bathroom, overall a nice space.

But the best part is that everything is in walking distance from here, if you don't mind walking up to 20 minutes, you will never need a taxi or the metro.

The host is a really good guy and our check in and check out were completely punctual.", "What an amazing little gem. The flat is cozy but feels perfectly laid out and completely fit for purpose. Doesn't feel small at all. Velislav was a great host! I definitely recommend. Also it's slap bang in the middle of so many great spots and helped me discover all sides of Sofia.", "Excellent apartment, very modern and clean, hotel quality level! Great value. Velislav responds directly and is a friendly businessman, very flexible with check-in and check-out. Stayed with a friend and we both would stay at Velislav's apartment in the future. Highly recommended!", "Velislav"s apartment was excellent. There are many good cafes, shops and restaurants in the area and it is approx a 10min walk to Vitosha Boulevard (pedestrian street). The apartment is a good size and even better than it looked in the photos. It was nicely decorated and everything was quite new. The bedroom is very large with a comfortable bed and had lots of storage. The kitchen had everything needed to prepare a meal. We had a great stay and  would definitely recommend Velislav's apartment.", "Velislav's place is perfect! Central and very walkable to everything you could need and want. As a host, Velislav is extremely helpful and replies to any queries very very quickly. I will stay again in the future!", "Had a really nice stay at Velislav's place - nice location on a quiet street, apartment is clean and cozy, and communication was flawless. Thank you for everything! Will definitely stay here again the next time I am in Sofia :)", "The apartment is located in the centre of Sofia and very near to all town landmarks. Vey convenient and very clean. The owner, Velislav, was ready to answer all our questions immediately and he was kind enough to arrange our arrival and departure upon our extra request.", "We stayed at Velislav's place for two nights and we really enjoyed it! The apartment it's near Sofia's center, you can get everywhere walking. It was really clean, cozy, with a great taste and Velislav was so far, the best host I've ever had! He was kind, helpful and he even picked us up at the bus station :) Definitely I recommend this apartment if you're visiting Bulgary's capital, you won't regret it.  ", "Very nice appartement for spending a few days in Sofia ! We would recommend his appartment any day !", "Very clean and Velislav is very gentle.", "Very nice appartement - recommend.", "This is a great apartment for anyone looking to stay in Sofia, in a central location within walking distance of the main areas of the city. The apartment itself is clean, modern and well-equipped. Velislav was a great host and made sure we had everything we needed for the duration of the visit. Highly recommend!", "Velislav was a wonderful host, very accommodating and friendly. Velislav è un ottimo host; ci ha accolto all'arrivo e ci ha salutato alla partenza, aiutandoci anche nel chiamare un taxi che avesse il POS per pagare con la carta. Durante il soggiorno si è reso disponibile per consigli ed altre eventualità.
Senza ombra di dubbio lo consigliamo a chiunque voglia andare a visitare la bella Sofia.", "Juste Parfait!
accueil  très courtois par le propriétaire qui parle anglais. L'appartement neuf est très propre et très plaisant. Il est situé dans une rue calme près de l'opéra, quartier très agréable et central.
Je recommande sans hésitation"]

reviews:
["Great value , for a very nice apartment in the center of Sofia.", "The perfect stay continued for another two days!", "Galina was a great host.
Her place was tidy and clean.
The location and floor were perfect and met exaclty what I was looking for.
I could really find hard any disadvantages or anything I could improve.
Thanks for the experience!", "The place is very nice, newly furnished, clean with subtle and cozy design. It's on the first floor which is convenient.", "Great place in the city center.", "Highly recommended!", "Very good located", "Very good communication from the beginning with the host. The renovated apartment is as shown in the pics. Excellent location, privacy, hygiene, comfort and close to everything walking (supermarkets, clothing stores, exchange houses and a hospital very close to any emergency). I will definitely come back and recommend it to 100%.", "I would definitely recommend the apartment. You can visit the city by foot. It's just a 5 - 10 minute walk to the city centre. The railway and shops are close as well. I had a lot of contact with Nedko, he was very friendly and helped us out with a lot of things. 
Great place to stay if you are visiting Sofia for a couple of days.", "Beautiful apartment in the centre of Sofia, with all the utilities in a walking distance.
Super responsive and supportive host. If you're in Sofia this is the perfect solution!", "Amazing place to stay. Wonderful location and a beautiful homely environment.", "if you re not a smoker avoid this apartment. All the house terribly smelled like smoking and the smell would not go away. It was terrible to arrive home and be welcomed by that smell. Other than this the accommodation was great but I would never get back there and would not advise it to anyone as the smell seemed to be quite persistent and would not go away after cleaning. Apartment kitchen is very well equipped and apartment is on a top location. Also the bed was very comfortable.", "Very well equipped and comfortable apartment with every amenity. Perfect location for city centre, we loved the Sun Moon restaurant nearby.", "Galina’s place is lovely and very nearby several cultural features in Stara Zagora.  Parking was very helpful and easy to manage.  Very nice stay, thank you!", "Great, clean, beautiful, stylish and spacious apartment. The location is ideal, close to the city center. The kitchen is fully equipped. There is a washing machine, an oven, a coffee machine (dolce gusto) and even a dishwasher. There were more then enough glasses, cups, plates, pots and pans. There were also two small balconies (one of them had washing lines to dry your clothes). It's a perfect place to stay, even for longer periods! We would highly recommend this place!", "Great location and very attentive host, would stay again for sure.", "Had a great week staying at the apartment... perfect location for us... and the kitchen facilities also perfect... we had all that we needed to cook a nice meal. Clean and comfortable living and bedroom... Will be booking this apartment again!!!", "Simlpythe Best!", "Great apartment in a great location... only a few minutes walk to the nearest metro and the famous Vitosha Boulevard. Kitchen is great and has everything you need to cook a meal in the evening... living area is stylish and comfortable. ", "VERY pleasant place to stay, plenty of space, especially after small hotel rooms. Plenty of light, double glazed  windows and blackout blinds if required. 

Central to the sights and excellent restaurants within walking distance. 

Communication was excellent and we were met at the door on arrival to show us how to get in and out. WiFi and TV worked well (not that we watched it). 

Highly recommend if you are visiting Sofia!!", "The apartment is really nice and big, would recommend it specially for a group of over two people. The location is unbeatable, we wanted to be close to the main street and the park, and that's what we got. The hosts offer local tips and are helpful", "Beautiful and designed apartment.
Excellent location close to Vitosha Boulevard.
The kitchen is equipped with everything it takes.", "10/10 Would recommend", "Amazing apartment and superb location. Our host and co-host were all so helpful and made the whole experience run smoothly. The apartment itself was stunning with loads of room and homely modern feel. If I was to go Sofia again I would definitely stay here again and recommend this place to anyone going to Sofia.", "Galina’s place is as beautiful as the pictures. Ideal for 3 girls visiting Sofia for the first time. It’s spacious, clean and the best location!! Close to the main street of restaurants and roughly within 15mins walk to the main attractions. 

Nedko and Teo were very quick to respond to queries and check us in. Would definitely stay again! ", "Fantastic location, spacious and well equipped, we loved our stay here!", "This place is fantastic! The pictures don't do it justice. It is super spacious and comfortable. The locations is great, just a couple of minutes away from the metro. It is easy to walk to various sights in Sofia and it is close to tons of restaurants and cafes (we really liked Melnishka Skara Pri Marto basically across the street).

The atmosphere in the apartment was relaxing. The apartment was very clean and cozy. The bedroom faces the street but we did not have any problems with noise.

We loved this apartment and we'll definitley seek it out next time we visit Sofia!", "Lovely place, very clean and modern. The host were very helpful and accommodating as we arrived in the middle of the night. Waking distance to all the recommended places, bars and restaurants nearby. We rented a car for a day trip to the mountains and it was well worth it! Overall great place to stay!", "The location is very convenient and the appartement is exactly as it is on the pictures, extremely clean and cozy.", "Amazing apartment at the center ! 3 minutes walking from Vitosha street! Thanks Galina and Stilian for the hospitality! Everything was perfect", "Great modern interior and lovely refurbished and very tidy apartment. 
Central and close to everything needed or to be seen in town.", "Es un lugar muy bien ubicado cuenta con todo lo indispensable para pasar una buena estancia en esta ciudad, cerca de restaurantes y bares, a minutos caminando de los principales lugares históricos y turísticos", "Excelente ubicación, todo tal cual las fotos. 
Pasamos una muy linda estudia la ubicación es inmejorable al igual que el apartamento", "La casa é bella e accogliente, elegante e ampia. Vicina alle principali attrazioni e al centro storico. anche sotto casa ci sono ristorantini dove mangiare. unica pecca alcuni utensili da cucina sporchi. "]
