reviews:
["Best location in Sofia for best price!
Thanks Seta!", "Perfect location and easy communication! New and cosy! Great host! Thanks for having us! Highly recommended place. ", "This was our second time staying at Seta's studio. Seta is great and so is her studio. Highly recommended to anyone visiting Sofia. ", "We absolutely loved Seta's place! The location is just fabulous and so is the studio. Spotless clean, bright and modern. We only got to meet Seta upon arrival but she looked like a really nice lady. She'd even bought us breakfast and some local specialties. I'd definitely recommend her place to anyone visiting Sofia.", "The apartment was clean and had everything needed for short stay. Would recommend without hesitation!", "Seta’s place is very close to termini station  and has good accessibility but in Rome", "The appartement is located in the center of Sofia near the Alexander newski cathedral. It Was clean and the bed also comfortable. the curtains were very thin and the Sun woke us up. Furthermore Was it difficult to shower without getting the whole bathroom wet (but the shower itself Was good). ", "Ivo is a great host: extremely responsive and helpful. The flat is self-contained and well-located (a stone throw away from Cathedral Saint Alexandar Nevski and on the main road. Highly recommended!", "Great location :)", "Seta's place is a good value, overall, but you need to be aware that there is no AC, only a rotating fan and lots of street noise, it is a very busy street!", "Fantastic apartment in such a prime location! Everything is within walking distance. The apartment had everything you would possibly need. Ivo gave so many fantastic recommendations and was always available to help with anything we may need. Overall a great experience and would definitely recommend this place. I would definitely stay again! ", "Seta's apartment was very nice, lots of windows, natural light, no air conditioning, but there was a fan which we used, and was cooling. We had a problem when we first arrived, there was no hot water, the boiler was not working and we contacted Seta, she fixed it immediately, she's very responsive and helpful. Water pressure is amazing!    ", "We would not recommend this place as it is at the moment. There is a lot of noise from the road traffic, no window blinds, no shower curtain (bathtoom becomes a mess after a shower) and lack of basic thingsO:-):(+_+)(+_+)(+_+)(+_+)(+_+)(+(+_+)(+_+)(+_+)(+_+)()", "Great location and great value for money!
Perfect for short term stay, be it on business or for sight seeing.
Easy check-in, friendly and quickly responding host.
The location comes at a cost - being on Sofia’s main central street, the studio is a bit noisy.

 ", "The location is perfect! It's near all the landmarks, and just two blocks away from the Alexander Nevsky Cathedral. The apartment is very clean and modern. Check-in is wonderful, easy and practical. ", "Apartment clean and tidy and it was  within walking distance of the centre and all attractions. Great apartment and great hosts", "Great stay! Nice located in the city centre and close to many restaurants :)", "Nice, centrally located efficiency studio.  For self-caterers, the kitchen is stocked with all the basics.", "Very nice and practical apartment, completely central. Easy to get to from the airport and within walking distance from the main sightseeing points. Ivo answered the questions promptly and gave useful recommendations about where to leave my luggage on my departure day. Recommended for a good stay in Sofia!", "Excellent location, very central and close to both public transportation and bars/restaurants. Beautiful park nearby, Sofia's version of Central Park.", "Lovely apartment, perfectly located within centre and has everything you would need while staying in the city", "Wonderful location, great communication with the host. ", "I really enjoyed my stay in this place! The check-in was really easy, the place was exactly as described, really stylish and comfy! The location was perfect! Right downtown close to my favourite places: The Alexander Nevsky cathedral, the Vitosha street, and all the best bars and clubs! Everything was easily at walking distance! 
I would stay there again without hesitation!", "Great location, the apartment has everything you would need for a short stay in Sofia. Right in the middle of the city and near everything. 15 minutes from the airport and great transport links", "Great location.", "Great location!!", "“True” Sofianites are said to “have been born on the yellow cobblestones". Seta's bright and spacious apartment is just above the main bustling avenue, the yellow brick road - a symbol of the city. 
You will wake up every morning to the sight of the elegance and refinement of a belle epoque residence (1883). The golden domes of the Russian church and the cup of your morning coffee at the tranquil Tobacco garden bar will be waiting for you in the next corner. Ten minutes walk to the elite Oborishte Street, artistic Pette kiosheta, Largo monuments, city centre, a handful of exciting museums, lovely parks full of people, mouthwatering mekitsas for breakfast, coctails in Bar me ... enough to make you feel a "Sofianite", even for a few days. 
As for the hospitality, you can count on your hosts being there if something comes up (as it happened to all of us in our travels). When the central heating of the building turned off (spring time), the hosts responded immediately and provided us with a radiator which was more than adequate, and it was Good Friday night! 
Sum up: we left with lovely memories and will be more than happy to come back... enough said", "Couldn't have asked for any better. Seta's place is clean, comfortable and located brilliantly in Sofia. Easy to contact and very helpful. I would 100% stay here again :)", "The appartement is very centrally located and pretty cute. There also is enough storage space. The bed is a sofabed however. And curtains are very thin. It's on a busy street, you don't hear it when you close the windows. But we like to sleep with the windows open... An issue was that the appartement smelled a little bit and the floors were off. Next morgen we discovered why. After taking a short shower half of the appartement was flooded (and some of our luggage left on the floors was wet) . Clogged drains! They offered to help us, after calling. But they did ask us to mob up the water. Not the way you want to spend a sunday morning on a holiday, without the proper equipment. When you actually wanted to get breakfast. My husband did manage to mob up  most water. And when we got back, everything was solved and we did get fresh towels, since we used them as a mob.", "Had a great time in sofia! Seta was super nice and accomodating! Place is in a great location!", "Great staying in Seta’s place!", "Perfect location, everything near by. Clean and has everything you need. Seta is a good host and although we didn't meet in person, he checked with us if everything was like we'd expected it to be. Make sure you eat at the burger place next to the apartment (Boom), best meat and vegetarian burgers! ;)", "All went well. Thanks for having us. ", "The place was clean, the kitchen sufficiently equipped and the bed really comfortable! The location couldn’t have been better, it is possible to reach everything within the city centre by foot what we really appreciated :)", "Seta was very helpful and kind. The apartment was clean, cozy and in a great location. Super easy check-in. We enjoyed our stay.", "Seta is a great host, her place is a beautiful apartment, centrally located, and just what you need when visiting the city.", "Really nice place, very clean and centrally located. 
The host is very helpful and kind.", "Amazing location. Great value. Quick responses :)", "Great location, no more than ten mins walk to get to most places. Apartment was clean and comfortable", "great experience for me. will come back", "Setas apartment is exactly like she described. The Location is georgeous. We had a fantastic trip! Can absolutely recommend the apartment and Sofia! Thank you!", "The studio was perfectly located in the middle of the city centre. Besides this the studio was extremly clean, had everything you needed and as a bonus there was a map of Sofia+tips with the best restaurants in the city. Definitly recommend others to stay here!", "Seta’s place is a gem in Sofia’s Airbnb scene! It has everything you need and there is no better location in town! Seta was great in communicating with me and making sure I would have a nice and easy stay!", "We had such an great time in Seta her appartment. Super clean, cozy and in the heart of the city!", "Cozy place in city center. Got more than I expected. 13 out of 10 will try to book again, when I'm in Sofia", "Seriously the best location. Easy check-in and check-out!", "A studio really clean, well located, spacious and modern, perfect to cook some little meals ! The bed is big as the shower and all the appartment by the way ! Only little thing missing, the curtains if we need to sleep in a dark place.

Seta answer fast, and made everything to make our trip as good as possible. Her flexibility about check-in / out was absolutely enjoyable !

We have a lovely stay in Sofia thank to this airbnb !", "Everything was perfect in this flat : great location, very clean, welle furnished and equipped ; we had a great time in Sofia ! ", "We stayed at Seta's appartment for two nights. Everything was perfect, the appartment is in the main boulevard of the city, so it's really easy to arrive there from the airpoty and also to go from there to everywhere by walk. The appartment was really beautiful and confortable, exactly like it's shown in the pictures. We had everything what we need and it was really clean! I recommend it! Thank you Seta", "Great appartment in the center of Sofia.
Everything you need is available in the appartment. Including very good wifi!
We found some interesting guide booklets in the appartment with good tips for restaurants and bars.
We had a great stay!

", "Best location possible, easy and flexible check in/out, nice flat, good communication, definitely recommended", "Great location! In the heart of the city, close to public transport this apartment will offer an amazing stay for a couple that wants to enjoy the cultural and night life of Sofia. We really liked how it was furnished as well as the smart key system that allows you to take/leave your key at any time. You will love it!", "This apartment is well placed just in the middle of the city centre close to the Alexander Nevsky church. Apartment is extremely clean and the check-is is perfect. If I need to come to Sofia I'd be back to Seta's place. Thanks", "We haven´t met Seta in person, but have been communicating before our stay- always answered very quickly and helpful. Perfect location in the center of Sofia and very nice and clean apartment. We really enjoyed our stay :) Highly recommended!", "Just perfect.", "Seta was brilliant. I didn't actually book this for myself but on behalf of my father who is not as up to date technology wise!
But I was in close contact with Seta before the trip and she did everything she could to make sure everything went ok. 
My dad was delighted with the place.
The location is brilliant, right in the heart of the city right on the doorstep of the most culturally significant places (national museum and theatre, cathedral...)
It was clean and tidy and the place had everything my father needed.
Can't say much more, I would highly recommend.
", "Great apartment. In real it looks even better than on the pictures! 
Very convenient location - you can walk pretty much everywhere in the city.
Seta was very friendly and right on time. 
We'd come back :)", "My boyfriend and I stayed in Seta's place for two nights and had a really lovely time. The apartment is extremely comfortable and spotlessly clean  with really modern decor throughout.  Situated on the doorstep of the cathedral and lots of great bars/shops/restaurants/theatres, we could not have asked for a better or more central location. Seta was a great host and communicated with us throughout our stay, so checking in/out was really easy and flexible. We would highly recommend anyone visiting Sofia to stay here!", "Seta's apartment is beautiful, clean, and in a wonderful location. It's right next to a lovely park, with many restaurants and cafes in the neighborhood. Seta was very easy to communicate with, and flexible with our check in time. We were driving into Sofia from the east, and didn't know exactly when we'd arrive. He was extremely accommodating. He also found us a place to park our rental car over night in his neighborhood!! We'd highly recommend a stay at his apartment in Sofia. Thank you Seta!", "Seta is a wonderful host and very good at communicating promptly. My friend and I visited from London for a weekend break and this place was perfect for two people. Very close to the metro and walking distance to nightlife too!", "Seta's place was in a great location walkable to many restaurants. The place was nice and clean very homely, I'd definitely recommend! ", "Amazing location, and really beautiful and confortable apartament. Really cool!", "Wonderful stay here for 3 nights. Was in a great location close to everything and was a very spacious place. Would highly recommend this for anyone looking to stay in Sofia. ", "What a great place! Seta's apartment is located right in the centre of Sofia, so we could walk pretty much everything.

It was clean, tidy, and communication was great from the beginning. Thanks for letting us stay!", "Nice place!!", "Seta was very accommodating and the place was great for one person in a perfect location. ", "The place is central, nice and comfortable! Perfect place to stay in Sofia! Thank you Seta! ", "Great place to stay, central located and clean.
I highly recommend it.", "Hosting, house and location simply perfect. Thank you Seta!", "My partner and I stayed at Seta's place for two nights and it was absolutely perfect. Communication and check in were great. The apartment is right in the center of the cultural area with most of the main attractions no more than 5 mins walk away. Excellent bars and restaurants are close by and the units facilities are fantastic. I would happily stay again. Thank you Seta. ", "Great little flat in the heart of Sofia, very clean and convenient with all the amenities required. Hosts were great and communicated everything perfectly. ", "Cool little spot in a great location, close to everything Sofia has to offer. Communication with Seta was smooth and check in/out was seamless. Will come back again!", "We had a very good experience with Seta and "Ruski 12". We were welcomed by Seta, after she waited more than one hour due to the delay of our plane, and she gave my wife all necessary explanations about the apartment. The apartment whch is very functional and also nicely furnished in a modern style, makes you feel at home immediately. Also the available coffee, milk, cereals, fruit etc gives a welcome signal.  The location is very close (a couple of minutes walking) to the main historical and cultural buildings and a metrostop (University) which is a big advantage. ", "This place was amazing! Perfect location, walking distance from everything and Seta was a lovely host, she had muesli, yoghurt and milk all ready for me when I arrived which was great. She allowed us to stay later then the check out time as we had a late flight too. Overall, would definitely recommend to stay here. ", "Great apartment in perfect location! The apartment is super close to the city center and Sofia's main attractions. It's located in a safe neighbourhood, near several embassies. It was clean, looked exactly as shown on the pictures, and the wifi connection worked well. The only negative point was that it is located on a busy street and thus it was quite noisy with open windows- but that's the price you have to pay for such a central location, and it was not a big problem for us.
The communication with Seta was really great, she was very helpful and friendly and answered all our questions. I would definitely recommend this place!", "Staying at seta's place is ways nice.
Super clean, awesome location in the city center.
Highly recommended", "Great location in the heart of Sofia, nice studio and host. Would stay again !", "Perfect apartment. Located in a perfect position close to the center.
Clean, spacious, good for 1-2 people.

The host was super nice, amazing, she waited me until late and was super helpful.
Highly recommended", "Seta and her son Boris, made us feel very welcome. Communication with both of them was great, especially since we were late with out arrival due to traffic jam on the border. Everything was as described and shown on the pictures. Towels, soap and other amenities ware there as well. In addition, water, coffee, two types of sugar (white and brown) and fruit was waiting for us. Also there was oil, salt, vinegar, dishes - everything needed for cooking. We didn't cook during this trip, but still, having it available was well appreciated. Traffic outside the apartment is quite busy, but the windows provide solid isolation, so we didn't have trouble having a good night rest in this very central location. The place is located near the Sofia landmarks, such as Aleksandar Nevski curch, Holy Sunday church, National Gallery, Ivan Vazov theatre and a couple of other museums and landmarks. We would gladly stay here again and could recommend it to all travelers.", "The arartment is a rare find. The location is top notch: in the very heart of Sofia. The apartment is very cosy and furnished with a lot of taste (perfect size for 1-2 people). Communication with the host was flawless: even though our flight arrived a bit late (around 11pm), Seta was very flexible. Definitely recomended! ", "Great apartment, great location and a lovely host!", "Situation géographique idéale.  Bel appartement bien décoré et confortable.  Par contre, en tant que non-fumeurs,  nous avons été incommodés par l'odeur persistante de cigarette", "tres bon hote et super localisation ", "Idéalement situé dans Sofia, appartement très propre et agréable. Parfait pour visiter Sofia", "Appartement très bien situé et agréable.", "추천합니다.
그러나
빛에 예민하신 분들은 
밤에 창가의 빛때문에 잠들기가 힘드실수도 있습니다^^
위치는 좋습니다.", "Appartamento centralissimo e davvero comodo. A 5m a piedi dalla cattedrale di aleksandr nevskij e dalla fermata di Sofia University (15m a piedi da quella di Serdika). Casa pulita e comoda. Unico problema: avevo già letto nelle recensioni precedenti della poca coprenza delle tende ma non avevo realizzato di quanto. In realtà non sono assolutamente coprenti, considerata anche l'altezza della casa (primo piano rialzato) è proprio ad altezza lampioni e la notte entra moltissima luce, ci siamo dovute arrangiare apponendo gli asciugamani grandi sopra le tende. Di solito io non ho grandi problemi con la luce, ma questa volta era davvero troppa.
A parte questo, tutto ok.
Non abbiamo conosciuto l'host perché ci ha lasciato le chiavi in una cassetta di sicurezza.", "Situato in una zona centralissima, di fronte all'ambasciata italiana, il monolocale si presenta come un luogo accogliente e ben arredato. Vicina alle più importanti attrazioni turistiche e a pochi passi dalla metro. Anche se non abbiamo conosciuto di persona la proprietaria è stata sempre disponibile ad ogni tipo di dubbio o richiesta!", "L'appartamento di Seta si trova di fronte l'ambasciata italiana, a due passi dalla Cattedrale di Alexander Nevsky. Posizione ottima, in pochi minuti raggiungi ristoranti e attrazioni. Consiglio soprattutto per la zona molto pulita. Camera abbastanza spaziosa e confortevole. Unica nota, la doccia è un tutt'uno con il pavimento del bagno, a dividere c'è solo una tendina, si rischia di bagnare tutto a terra.", "Εύκολο τσεκ ιν και τσεκ αουτ. Απλα επαιρνες τα κλειδια απο μια θυριδα. Δεν γνωρισαμε ποτε τον Σετα, μονο ενα μηνυμα ανταλλαξαμε. Το σπιτι βρισκεται σε εξαιρετική τοποθεσία και ήταν αρκετά καθαρό. Γενικά, αξίζει για την τιμή του.", "El apartamento de Seta está en una situación inmejorable, limpio y con todo lo necesario para pasar unos días. Muy recomendable", "Setas kleine Wohnung ist im Herzen Sofias gelegen und eröffnet damit die Möglichkeit, alle Sehenswürdigkeiten der Hauptstadt schnell zu erreichen - sowohl zu Fuß, als auch mit vielen öffentlichen Verkehrmitteln. Sie ist geschmackvoll und modern eingerichtet und hat alle Bequemlichkeiten für einen angenehmen Aufenthalt - ich habe mich sehr wohl darin gefühlt. Die Sauberkeit in allen Räumen ist auf höchstem Niveau. Die Gastgeberin Seta und ihr Helfer Bobi antworteten schnell und sehr freundlich auf alle meine Fragen. Bei meinem nächsten Besuch in Sofia würde ich gern wieder in Setas Wohnung einziehen und empfehle sie herzlichst auch allen zukünftigen Gästen.", "El piso es excelente, igual que en las fotos. Genial el check in y la zona. Lo recominedo.", "L'appartement est très propre, bien équipé et idéalement placé. 
Nous n'avons pas eu la chance de rencontrer Seta mais nous avons parfaitement communiqué par message et sans soucis . 
Je recommande ce logement. Super rapport qualité/prix.", "La casa è in una comoda posizione centrale. Non abbiamo incontrato Seta, ma è stata comunque molto presente alle nostre richieste.", "Appartamento centrale, situato di fronte all'ambasciata italiana in uno dei posti più belli di Sofia, e molto tranquilli. L'host è stata molto disponibile, interessandosi sul come procedesse il nostro soggiorno. La casa è molto spaziosa e confortevole, dotata di tutto il necessario. Unica nota dolente sono le tende completamente trasparenti. Infatti tutte le mattine puntualmente alle 6:00 eravamo svegli. Consigliatissima.", "Appartamento perfetto per un soggiorno a Sofia. La posizione è in pieno centro, davanti all' ambasciata italiana e facile da comunicare cosí ai tassisti come punto di riferimento.
Qualsiasi luogo di interesse del centro è raggiugibile a piedi e Seta si è dimostrata estremamente puntuale, gentile e discreta.
Il locale è moderno e funzionale e dotato di ogni comfort, dal wi-fi, all asciugacapelli, passando dal tostapane al microonde.
Se capiterò nuovamente a Sofia sicuramente tornerò in questo appartamento!", "Semplicemente perfetto! Situato in una posizione comodissima per visitare la città a piedi (nella via principale di Sofia, a pochi passi dalla cattedrale e dalla chiesa russa), dispone nei dintorni di supermercati, ristoranti e metropolitana. Ideale per 2 persone è accessoriato di tutto: forno a microonde e piastre ad induzione, stoviglie ed anche dei beni di prima necessità, come olio, sale, the e caffè... Consigliatissimo.", "L'appartamento corrisponde alle foto e si trova in una posizione ottima: a poca distanza da una fermata centrale della metro e vicino al centro storico della città: praticamente a 2 passi dalla cattedrale e di fronte all'ambasciata italiana.  La casa è un monolocale molto pulito e ben organizzato negli spazi; inoltre c'è tutto il necessario per passare più di qualche giorno a Sofia. La comunicazione con Seta è stata facile e veloce e lei è stata molto gentile e disponibile. Ottimo rapporto qualità/prezzo. L'unica piccola pecca le tende poco oscuranti, ma per il resto davvero tutto buono! Consiglio Seta e il suo appartamento!", "L'appartamento di Seta è ubicato proprio di fronte l'ambasciata italiana, su una via centrale colma di locali! Ogni punto della città è raggiungibile a piedi e ad ogni modo c'è una fermata della metropolitana a 5 minuti a piedi. L'appartamento è pulitissimo e ben accessoriato, consigliatissimo per un soggiorno di coppia. 
Unica nota "negativa", se così la si può chiamare: entra troppa luce la mattina, a causa  delle tende chiare!", "L'appartement est moderne, très propre et vraiment idéalement placé dans la ville ! La communication avec Setta était parfaite et elle a eu la gentillesse de m'attendre à l'appartement alors que j'avais une heure de retard à l'arrivée. Elle m'a aussi laissé partir plus tard dans la journée car elle n'avait pas d'autres réservations. Seuls points négatifs: l'appartement et la literie sentaient très fort la cigarette, et les rideaux n'isolent pas de la lumière extérieure. Je recommande tout de même cet appartement ! ", "Abbiamo incontrato Seta solo qualche minuto ma è bastato per capire quanto fosse gentile. Sempre disponibile via sms, davvero cortese. La casa è piccola ma ha proprio tutto ciò che serve, perfetta per due persone", "Appartamento moderno , pulito , in posizione centralissima ! Vicinanza ad ottimi ristoranti ai locali ed ai principali luoghi turistici .Piacevole vista sul boulevard , doccia molto spaziosa. Ottima la comunicazione e il check in. ", "Circondata da Club e locali dove passare le serate ma anche molto centrale facile da raggiungere.. La raccomando! La casa è piccola ma sfruttata benissimo", "Consiglio pienamente l'alloggio di Seta: un carinissimo monolocale sfruttato nel migliore dei modi, molto funzionale, moderno (wifi), luminoso. Esso si trova nel cuore della città, con locali e ristoranti ovunque (uno proprio nel civico affianco). Seta ha aspettato il nostro arrivo dal portone e si è resa disponibile per ogni necessità. ", "Seta è stata davvero fantastica: gentile, accogliente, premurosa. La casa è davvero bella, nuova e soprattutto in pieno centro. A piedi ci si può muovere con grande facilità. Consigliatissimo!", "Appartement sympathique, propre et vraiment proche de tout.
Attention par contre il n'y a pas de volet comme beaucoup de logements en Bulgarie et l'ambassade d'Italie en face est éclairée de nuit. Mais après une grosse journée de visite on ne s'attarde pas sur ce détail ;-)"]

reviews:
["Very nice place.", "The hosts were very flexible with the check-in and we felt at home in the little loft studio. The neighborhood is quiet and has it all - a grocery store, bakeries, artisan meats and milk stores, a few coffee places, a park nearby and easy access to the city via the metro station.", "Great location, great space. It's exactly as the pictures show. Having the complimentary breakfast included in the service is really adds a real nice touch to the experience. I recommend this place for sure. ", "Great hospitality, clean and tidy place.", "Everything was great.", "Everything was perfect, would definitely use this apartment again!", "Perfect communication and very helpful person, but unfortunately our car broke and we had to cancel the reservation. Even if the policy was stricted we received a refund. Thank you so much !
Recommend !", "Wonderful place, situated 5 minutes from the metro. Quiet city district, wonderful housing! Would book again when I am in Sofia.", "It was great", "Very nice!!!", "Second stay was as pleasent as the first one.", "Ver nice and cosy apartment. Totally recommend. ", "Апартаментът е уютен и е в близост до метрото.", "Very good and quiet place. Very clean. The location is good - near to bus and subway station.", "It is very cosy. ", "Lovely apartment, good location.", "The place has really everything you need! It's clean and comfortable.  We enjoyed our stay and we will gladly return there.", "I booked Boris and Tsvety's flat for my parents and they were very satisfied with what they got. Based on their experience, I would definitely recommend the place!", "Very nice place, cozy, clean and warm. One step on a public transport and supermarkets! Good neighborhood!", "Nice, cozy place. Comfortable bed. Perfect location. Great hosts.

Thank you, Boris and Tsvety! I would stay in the studio again :)", "Nice place. Recommend.", "The studio was clean and weIl-equipped. It's very close to a metro station.Everything was great!", "Boris And Tsvety's flat is really lovely. The studio was clean and weIl-equipped. It's very close to a metro station and it takes about 10 mins to get to the center of Sofia. A great stay. Will be back!", "Everything was ok as discribed. Clear discription of the itinerary. Good location. Clean and nice place.

Thanks.", "Everything was OK. The apartment is clean and quiet.", "Very nice and clean studio, exactly as shown. It has a great location in a quiet neighbourhood with free parking area. The subway station is about 5 minutes away. Everything was perfect and all the positive reviews are totally worthy.
I would definitely recommend it! ", "Very nice and cozy place, all amenities needed were there.  Hosts are superb!", "Very nice apartment, clean and the hosts are really  helpful :) Thanks a lot! We`ll definitely come back!  ", "Nice cozy place. Boris was a great host. Very high value for money. Highly recommended!", "I loved the place because most of the things were brand new – the bed and linen, the armchairs, the cooker, all the plates, pots, cutlery, etc. The bed was really comfortable and everything was so clean! There was complimentary wine waiting for me and in the morning I had delicious breakfast in the small café, owned by the host family. They were great, too. Very helpful and at the same time respected my privacy. I recommend it! 
", "Boris and Tsvety were amazing hosts! They couldn't greet us personally but we met a family member who gave us the key and showed us the studio. We struggled to find the correct block, but it is literally the second block on the right.
Location is great; not far from the Metro and 3 stops to the city centre. The studio is great for couples and came with more than we thought. The complimentary wine is a nice touch - and for the price, you must stay here when visiting Sofia! Thank you to the hosts for being amazing.", "Totally recommended! Great place, absolutely clean and the hosts always available to help. Thank you both!", "Very nice place to stay. Close to public transport, Banks and Shops. I'd revommend it.", "I was in touch mainly with Boris, who was really responsive and helpful when needed. Their place is very close to a metro station (about 5-7min to station, 2-3 stops to central Sofia), a few cafes, supermarkets, a cake shop and a park for those who like to walk/exercise. The breakfast in the morning is quite delicious.", "This is a fantastic studio apartment within a very short distance of the metro, local supermarkets and local restaurants. The area is very quiet and peaceful. It is an excellent base to explore all that Sofia has to offer. I would highly recommend this listing.", "good for the price", "Nice,quiet,clean flat,perfect location,kind hosts.I recommend this place.", "Boris and Tavety's place is very comfortable space. It is very convenient for people with and without car.

The studio has everything you need - cooker, kettle etc all kitchen facilities you need.

TV with a lot of programmes. The bed was very comfortable. The studio had very lovely touches.

We would happily stay again, good value for money.", "i recommend this place to anybody who wants to stay in Sofia alone or as a couple.
Its a decent private studio located in a safe and clean neighbourhood. 
i'd def book it again.
Clean. silent. ac. and a bottle of white wine incl. if you have time for that.
thanx a lot:)", "Nice apartment in great area of the city, safe and well connected to Sofia Center and airport. The place is clean and cozy. Good communication with the host. I had a great and comfortable stay and I would defiantly stay here again! Highly recommend!", "Very cozy and beautiful flat. Boris and Tsvety are very friendly hosts.", "I had a great time at Boris and Tsvety’s place. Thanks for the wine! Lovely apartment.", "We had a really nice stay and lived comfortably. The area is not so central, but quite charming and really green. We checked in with Tsvety, she was lovely. We got a bottle of sparkling wine upon arrival. The breakfast at the cafe downstairs consists of ham and cheese baguette and coffee, proper portion.", "Boris and Tsvety made my stay in Sofia easy and hassle-free. They are very kind and welcoming, and breakfast in the morning at the cafe was a lovely gesture. This is an excellent affordable way to experience Sofia!", "Very clean apartment, complementary wine is great. Hosts very gracious and fast in communication. Great little café for breakfast.", "Was a nice relaxing stay. Nice area", "Comfy place to stay over a short trip. Nice touches to the apartment. Very thoughtful of hosts to ensure things are going alright. Very responsive and helpful. Thank you guys for a nice stay!", "The apartment was smaller than I had anticipated but I am from Australia and not sure what I can compare it too. The hosts were lovely friendly people who were very helpful. The studio was ok for 1 person but I think it would be small for two. ", "Very clean, well maintained, comfortable, good location. ", "Great place to spend a night if you need a place next to the (Website hidden by Airbnb) park right next to the apartment", "A wonderful little apartment on a very comfortable location.", "Spacious, clean, great location and great host. The breakfast included is a perfect touch.", "It is exactly as promised: a lovely studio run by a warm-welcoming Boris,in a quiet neighborhood. Easy access with Boris’ directions from nearby metro station. Elevator available so the stairs climbed are just a few — only one floor above the top floor.", "Good value for a basic space. Only one small window at floor height so it's not a place you want to hang out in for too long. The bathroom was very basic and was soaked after a shower but again - great value for a short stay. Boris was also lovely.", "Lovely studio apartment in a convenient and quiet location. Boris and Tsvety went above and beyond to make my trip as convenient as possible. The apartment is clean and has everything you could need (the complimentary bottle of wine was a lovely touch!). If I'm ever back in Sofia I will certainly be booking here again :)", "Great clean, well-equipped spacious studio in a quiet residential neighborhood just 1-3 metro stops to the city center.  Pictures are very accurate.  Had a few issues with WiFi, but Boris responded almost immediately to them.  Apartment is on the top floor (there’s an elevator to one floor below...you walk up the last flight.)  It has a skylight and a small window on the floor of the apartment, so it’s bright but no view.  Air conditioning worked well to cool down the studio.  I was there for 4 nights but was only able to take breakfast (toasted ham/cheese sandwich and a coffee) once since Boris’ cafe is closed on weekends and I departed the apartment at 7:45 and the cafe wasn’t opened yet.  Good place! Nice host!", "Great place! Close to public transportation that will take you to the airport/center of the city. The apartment was clean and it was very cozy!", "very helpful and friendly host
appartment:
you get what you pay for", "Boris was really friendly and gave us free bottle of wine and breakfast!", "Very nice apartment close to the centre of Sofia. Totally recommended!", "Great apartment and accommodating hosts!", "Great space for one person or a couple if you are looking for something quieter. About 15-20 min outside of the city via foot and public transportation.", "so far the worst airbnb experience. even in sofia you get way better places for the same amount of money.
bed is horrible, wifi is most of the time not working, there is no real shower.", "Very friendly hosts.  Helped me when I needed to purchase and print a bus ticket.  Nice shop with free breakfast in the same building.  Quiet area away from downtown.", "Boris was the best host I have ever met. He took care of everything and helped me a lot. Deffinitely recommended!!", "The studio is so cozy and After long day walking, I felt I could relax with some coffee and tea available! Moreover, Boris has a great knowledge about the city and shared some tips as well on what to do.
Would definitely be back to this Studio!", "Great!", "Boris and Tsvety are terrific hosts; very flexible with us having to extend our stay a couple of times. Their place is very cozy and comfortable. We would stay there again.", "Our collaborator enjoyed her stay in Sofia thanks to our guest.
We will book again in this flat in next occasion.
Thank you", "All you need is there including a breakfast surprise in the bar downstairs!", "Very good!", "Boris and Tsvety are truly lovely.  They took extra care to show us around and provide us with all the details we needed.  The apartment is well-equipped and even has a washing machine (tip: if it is rainy, allow 2 days for clothes to hang dry). The location is also great - within a few minute walk to a grocery store and a similar distance to the metro (to bring you downtown). This was a wonderful place to stay for my two days in Sofia.  Thank you!", "Perfect place, helpful guys!", "Great hosts and excellent location, all in all, a great value find and breakfast is thrown in ", "I only stayed a short while (one night) at Boris and Tvestsy's place - but wish it could have been longer!  Their studio apartment was clean, well equipped and well situated near to Joliot Curie metro station (for me it was a straightforward journey there from the central bus station).   Boris was friendly and helpful in my communications with him and when I met him at the apartment.  I'd recommend staying there to any single travellers or couples travelling through or seeking a short-term base in Sofia.", "Hospitality was amazing. Came late in the evening and was even helped and ordered a pizza.", "Nice studio in Sofia, good for one person or a couple or two very close friends. Not really centrally located but only 3 metro stops away from the very center. The line also links the flat to the airport. The flat is in a calm and safe residential area. Extra bonuses included in the rent: a bottle of wine and free breakfast on weekdays. Overall a good place for a budget traveler.", "Very clean studio, well connected and great attention by the host. Thank you Boris.", "The studio is well situated nearby F. Marie Juliot metro which means easy access to the city. The welcome was fantastic with a complimentary bottle of wine on the breakfast table, air con worked great and a very lovely stay. I loved visiting and hope you'd be happy to accomodate me again. :)", "Everything was very good", "The apartment was great for our stop-over in Sofia. Everything weny great and Boris and Tsvety were helpful along the way. Recommended!", "Nice attic apartment in residential area. Not central but easy to reach the centre by Metro. Hosts very helpful and quickly responded to any queries. Also organised taxi for us to the airport early in the morning.", "I enjoyed my stay a lot, nice people, they receive the guests as family members. 
Boris came to pick me from the airport, and their small cafe made me to feel at home, nice food, good cafe. The studio is small but comfortable, equipped with all necessary items. The lift works, but still some stairs to the top. 
Peaceful, well located, the metro is near. ", "Nothing beats this apartment for such a good price. It's close to public transportation, so you can make it to either the city center or the airport without any  hassle. The apartment is clean and quiet. Not extremely spacious but compact and packed with everything you need. The hosts are friendly and really helpful, and you can enjoy some nice food in their cafe.", "Everything was absolutely perfect. they picked us up at the airport even if it was 10:30pm and brought us to the Airbnb which was super sweet. All for the low price of 5 euros!! Then, we were checked in. Super nice couple. We were offered free breakfast the next morning at their cafe which was really great. They helped us get to the metro so we could get to the city centre. The walk from the Airbnb and the metro ride to the city center was a maximum of 20 Minutes (depending on how fast you walk). The location was perfect. Super residential and quiet and super relaxing at night. The AC was great, worked well. We had a 6am flight so they've arranged a cab for us at 4am and it was on time and great. Overall super smooth stay! Would STRONGLY recommend. ", "Very good value. Close to the metro to get easily to the city centre.", "Quiet neighborhood close to restaurants and shops. 5 minutes walking to metro. 

Several nice restaurants in the vicinity and all the pricing is unbelievable. The most expensive dish on most menus is €4...and these are decent restaurants.

Metro cost only €0.80 to go to the center which is only 3 stops away. Also the same price to the airport. 

Taxi to the center is approx €3 and €5 to the airport. 

", "This place is a full package! 
The host is super nice and helpful! The place is close to a metro station and a bus station! The apartment is clean and very organized ! Is a small appartment but you have absolutely everyting that you can think of( including a bottle of wine and a delicious breakfast)! 
I would come back again and again here! Better than any 5 star hotel! :)) ", "I had a wonderful time staying with Boris and Tsvety! Their apartment is really cozy and comfortable, within easy walking distance of a beautiful park and right next to a metro stop that can take you into the center of town in a matter of minutes. The hosts themselves were also great — they were very accommodating and helped me call a taxi for the following morning in addition to answering all my questions about the apartment and the city. I would definitely recommend staying here!", "Great city, neighborhood, Building and apartment. Honestly everything about the apartment is good.  The cafe downstairs is a great value and the food is delicious. Everything works the shower is powerful and the water is nice and hot. I would happily stay there again. Another nice Air BnB experience.  ", "Boris and Tsvety were a great host, helped us every possible way to make sure our stay was a comfortable one in their humble abode.", "It is a cute apartment conveniently located for both metro into town or stroll across a.  park. Boris was friendly and helpful. Breakfast was from 8am so unfortunately couldn't experience. ", "Lovely stay in this little flat, very good communication before hand, and breakfast was lovely. Close to BILLA supermarket and a metro station. Thank you for our stay!", "Boris was very helpful and flexible, he rescheduled our booking immediately and also helped us with currency exchange. 
The apartment was as described, with some nice welcoming touches (information, a complimentary bottle of muscat wine). The house is in close proximity to the metro station which makes transportation super easy. 
I would recommend it for a relaxed holiday in Sofia. 

Tip, if you are lucky you might hear/see baby owls from the attic window.", "Very quiet atelier, with great access to shops and transport. The hospitality is excellent whilst maintaining absolute privacy.", "Boris and Tsvety are really nice and we'll provide you all the information you need to spend a great time in Sofia. Thanks again for your warm welcome! François", "The room is very clean with everything necessary. I had trouble connecting to wifi so I had to use roaming, and the roof is very low which you cannot notice in the photo. I will recommend this apartment which is good located and nice ", "The appartment got absolutely everything you need!
The quarter is great easy with bus or metro. The breakfast in their own bistro is great...
The host and the family are really friendly.", "Lovely apartment in a quiet but central spot in town. The host also owns a small café where he serves a lovely breakfast.  I was pleasantly surprised by that. I would definitely recommend this place.", "very nice flat. Boris is very helpful. the flat is very clean and the bed is very good", "Thanks for everything", "Our stay in Bulgaria was one to remember. ", "Great studio, it had everything I needed. Comfortable place and nice neighborhood, lots of restaurants nearby, and the metro station is very close. Totally recommended.", "Really good value place to stay. Well equipped. tasty breakfast at the cafe downstairs! Top floor (with lift) so very peaceful.", "Boris and Tsvety's flat is perfect for the traveller to Sofia. Access to both the centre and the airport is straightforward, and around the studio itself there are all the amenities necessary to cater to an evening in. The studio itself is well kitted out and comfortable, just as portrayed on the photos and would make for as good a base for one night as for a month. Checking in and out was very straightforward, adding to the convenience of the place. The only hiccup was temperamental WiFi, but I would very much recommend this place to anyone visiting Sofia.", "Great place. Seek no more and choose it for your stay in Sofia. Everything was great.", "Very welcoming and great stay. ", "Very comfortable and care-free stay. Thanks to the hosts! ", "Convenient & clean. Everything went flawless. ", "I had such a wonderful stay in this apartment. Boris was so kind and came to get me after I was dropped off by a taxi at a wrong location. The bookshelf above the television set was fascinating and global, I was able to enjoy an A. R. Luria book during my stay. There's even a cafe on the premises which is convenient for a mid-day snack or lunch!", "Boris & Tsvety were very nice and accommodating. The apartment was a great value for money. I would highly recommend them to anyone visiting Sofia!", "Perfect. Great stay in Sofia.", "Wonderful hosts. I was horribly sick and in pain and they even went out of their way to bring me homeopathic remedies.", "Friendly people, good neighbourhood, nice wine. I would appreciate a better (real) bed. And a sign how to go in case of fire.", "location is perfect. there are so many restaurants anf cafes around. flat is better than i expected and also bigger than i expected. there is everything u need even an iron, scale, bookreading lamb. it is so practically designed. Boris is a really helpful good and sincere person. And the most important thing he helped me with checkin and check out timing  flexibilty. ps. only airbnb flat i rent who has a plug next to bed:) ", "Boris And Tsvety are very nice hosts - we had a great time at their place!", "great place, amazing people", "Boris and Tsvety were very accommodating, and they helped us feel welcomed even though we arrived at a very late time of the night. They were excellent hosts, and the room is very quiet and clean. ", "Very welcoming!", "Very nice studio not far away from the sights of Sophia. Nice host as well! I recommand", "Nice and tidy, lovely little apartment. Very friendly hosts.", "We had a great time at the apartment. It was very clean, fully equipped with everything which is needed and easy to find. The communication to the hosts was uncomplicated and good. I can fully recommend this place!", "Boris' and Tsvety's place is neat, comfortable and accessible. I'd recommend it to anyone that would like to visit Sofia. ", "We were 2 people and stayed 1 one night only. After a long journey we enjoyed the complimentary bottle of red wine :) Boris & Tsvety were great hosts and they did their best to make our stay as pleasant as possible.  The appartment is very close to public transportation and it is very quick to reach the center of Sofia or even one of the largest mall of eastern Europe!
We highly recommend this place, thank you again Boris & Tsvety !", "Really nice and friendly hosts. The studio was clean and tidy. I really enjoyed my stay there, I'll definately go back again and recommend to my friends and family who want to visit Sofia. Close to tube station and Arena Armeec", "They are super hosts, doing everything they can to make guests feel welcome. A plus is that the cafe that they own is filled with delicious Bulgarian foods. My Bulgarian friend joined me and Tvesty and Boris were accommodating with him, too. I will recommending this place to all of my friends.", "The flat is exactly as described.  It is in a very pleasant neighborhood with easy access to the metro and shopping near by.  The flat has many amenities so it makes the stay very pleasant, as many times these things are overlooked.  Boris and Tsvety are both very pleasant people and are willing to help if needed.  I would recommend this flat for a stay in Sofia very highly.   ", "Wonderful apartment! Had everything we needed and was in a great location, easy to access the city. The hosts were so kind and very friendly. I would definitely return here. Finding the apartment can be a bit difficult for people not familiar with the area, but local shop owners helped point me in the right direction. ", "Although the drive to the b&b was a little tricky, we were welcomed very warmly by Boris, who had kindly been waiting for us. The flat was wonderful, just as expected from the description. We hope to stay in Sofia again so as to spend a little more time with our lovely hosts. ", "The studio was lovely and quiet, just as advertised and had everything we needed. They were incredibly nice and welcoming  and we enjoyed eating breakfast at their cafe. 

I would highly recommend the studio and it was within walking distance to metro and in a great neighborhood.

We fell in love with Sofia and hope to return and stay with Boris and Tsvety again!", "We stayed at Boris and Tsvety's Studio for only one night, as we needed a place to crash on our way back home.

We made the booking in a rush, mostly looked at the positive reviews and the photos, and immediately forgot where we were going. But we were surprised to find a great studio apartment,  with anything you might need. Very clean, and modern feel to it. 
Now that I'm looking at the photos again, everything is exactly the same.

We were impressed by how fast Boris and Tsvety replied even though they were on holiday in Greece. We met with their daughter who showed us the place, and told us about the breakfast option, to be honest we did not read that far :)

We arrived late, and pretty much just slept till the next day, when we enjoyed a sandwich and a chocolate waffle at the nearby cafe. Included in the price.

We highly recommend staying here, we kind of wished we had more time to stay here and explore the city.
Maybe next time.

Thanks guys.
", "Welcome to Sofia and the very nice B&B Studio where I stayed for a week. The unit is comfortable, modern, well-equipped, excellent wi-fi, convenient location. Tsvety and Boris are especially great people, and I hope you can spend some time with them.  

If this is your first visit, a recommendation: Walk to the nearby Metro station “Joliot Curie”. Onboard the trains, stops are announced and you will listen for this name when returning. Buy a ticket for 1 Lev at the window and get onto the metro going toward Center, which is actually the third stop called Serdica or Serdika.

The first stop from Joliot Curie is Stadium. Continue on to the second stop, Sofia University. Step off the train there and go up the escalator to the right. Pass through the turnstiles and immediately begin looking for McDonald’s *before* you go out of the underground. Directly across from McD is the Tourist Information Center. They have a website with hours listed at (Website hidden by Airbnb) Inside the information center you will find maps, guides, and people who speak English and can answer all your questions as well as make good recommendations. Then from the info center it is a comfortable, scenic walk into the city center. Now, please enjoy your stay. I certainly did.   :-)", "Honestely - it was one of the best apartments I've ever stayed in through Airbnb. The very low price for the quality and all the facilities, the location etc. that you get in this apartment is unbeatable. The small details make the difference - there is a hairdryer, iron, books, washing machine, the kitchen is more than FULLY equipped (spices,pans,wineglasses etc..), perfectly working internet & airconditioning, warm water, coffee, very (!) clean and modern, TV and the location and the area is the best in Sofia. And is really true - there is a bottle of red wine waiting for you when you check-in, as well as a breakfast every morning in the Cafe downstairs. It is a perfect place for singles, couples, short stay, long stay, budget travellers, business people - literally for everyone. I will definitely plan my trips to Sofia more in advance, just so that I can stay in the apartment :)
And the hosts - what else can I add, great, helpful, friendly, communicative, having a great daughter that helped me with the check-in.
This is the PERFECT AIRBNB STAY, Thumbs up! You won't get better service & facilities in any of the 5 star hotels in Sofia. Thank you and see you definitely very soon!", "Super lovely people in a great part of Sofia. Very comfortable apartment with everything you need within walking distance. ", "Dear Boris and Tsvety,

Thanks for your wonderful hospitality in Sofia. The apartment was cozy and comfortable, and you really made things easy by helping me to/from the airport. In short, everything was PERFECT :)

It was great to walk into the apartment and find all I needed and much more. I don't know when I'll next be in Sofia, but I hope to meet you guys when it does happen!

Take care, all the best, and warmest regards always!

~Isaac", "Whoa. Boris and Tsvety are possibly the most gracious hosts we have had. Lovely, lovely people. 

The apartment was everything we expected. Clean, quiet, convenient. Fast internet, hot shower, comfy bed.

Highly recommended from us. 

Thanks for everything, Boris! Chau!", "Superb! Boris and Tsvety are fantastic hosts. They were able to pick me up at the bus station the morning of my arrival. The apartment is well decorated and comfortable. Upon entering you can tell a lot of effort was made in making sure you have a positive experience staying there. There's even a small café owned by Boris and Tsvety where you are provided with a complimentary breakfast. The apartment location is in a good area of the city and has some nice cafés, banks (ATMs), and a grocery store nearby. You can walk a couple blocks to either the bus lines or the metro underground line which take you to the centre. I highly recommend this place to anyone visiting Sofia. ", "Fantastic private studio, Boris & Tsvety are great host & where kind enough to pick me up from the airport & help me with where places where in the city. The studio is great place to stay & very comfortable. It was a home away from home for me. I would highly recommend staying here. Great value for money & very comfortable. there are shops near by where you can buy all essentials & a train station that takes only 3 short stops to the main attractions of Sofia.", "Πολύ καλοί οικοδεσπότες . Εξυπηρετικοί και φιλικοί . Το σπίτι Πολύ κοντά στο μετρό και η γειτονιά ήσυχη .  Θα το προτιμήσω ξανα. ", "Boris m'a proposé de venir me prendre à l'aeroport. Ce que j'ai trouvé très pratique de ne pas avir à me plonger dans une carte pour trouver l'itinéraire.

Arrivé dans le studio, tout était clairement expliqué sur une fiche en anglais. J'avais son téléphone, il habite dnas l'immeuble et tiens le café au bas de l'immeuble d'à côté; là où il accueille ses invités pour le petit déjeuner. Lesphotos sont conformes au studio  et le lit confortable.", "Sehr zuvorkommend und wir hatten sehr gute Kommunikation miteinander", "Semplice e comodo sia per visitare la città che per raggiungere l’aeroporto. ", "Petit mais avec tout le confort pour deux personnes.
J ai pu laisser ma valise dans le café le temps de faire une dernière visite de la ville. C'était bien pratique.
De plus, c'est à 5 min de la ligne de métro aéroport-centre ville. Donc très facile d accès.", "Le logement est conforme à la description, bien situé à 2 pas du métro pour le centre ville, le café offert le lendemain matin au pied de l'immeuble est un plus, vraiment tout était très bien.", "Ein sauberes und sehr nettes kleines Apartment. Die Kommunikation verlief sehr toll und die Gastgeber sind total freundlich!", "Отличная небольшая квартира-студио.Мансардный этаж, поэтому окно очень небольшое, почти нет вида на город. Хороший зеленый район, совсем недалеко от метро, вокруг много вкусной еды, например пицца на станции метро Жолио Кюри просто обалденная! Замечательные хозяева,с удовольствием приеду к ним еще раз!", "L'appartement est tel que décrit. Au dernier étage, en sous pente, c'est un petit studio bien équipé, confortable et propre. Pas à proximité du centre mais avec le métro à 2 minutes on y est très rapidement. Le quartier est calme, quelques commerces à proximité ainsi que des restaurants. Le matin, le petit déjeuner est à prendre au café en bas de l'immeuble, belle idée que de l'inclure dans le prix. Tout comme celle de laisser une bouteille de vin pour l'accueil.  Et si je n'ai hélas vu ni Boris, Tvesty, j'y retournerai les yeux fermés.", "Genial!", "最寄りのﾒﾄﾛ駅から近く､静かで落ち着いた環境ながら､食事や買い物にも困ることはなく､快適に過ごすことが出来ました｡朝食付き(平日のみ)もありがたかったです!ちなみにお部屋とは関係ないですが､ﾒﾄﾛの一回券は､購買後1時間以内に使わないと無効になってしまうようです｡ご注意を｡", "Ich bin mit meinem Aufenthalt bei Boris und Tsvety sehr zufrieden. Die Wohnung sieht genauso aus wie beschrieben. Die Umgebung ist sehr ruhig und die Ubahn ist zu Fuß gut erreichbar. Ich kann die Wohnung nur weiterempfehlen.", "Чистая студия,немного маловата,но на несколько дней проживания самое то)До метро пешком минут 10.В целом для непривередливых-отлично!", "Perecto para estar un par de nocjes por Sofia. Está a cinco minutos del metro y a un bonito paseo del centro atravesando parques (lo recomiendo si te gusta caminar). 
Espléndido almuerzo que nos preparó Boris to take away porque teníamos prisa para coger el avión.
Como pega diría que hay mosquitos por la noche y la cociba y baño estan viejos, pero la ducha sentó genial!", "Logement impeccable avec tous les services. À 5 minutes du métro et de nombreux bus. Très facile pour aller dans le centre. 
Vraiment une adresse incontournable sur Sofia", "Habe meinen Aufenthalt sehr genossen. Boris war sehr nett.  Die Umgebung hat mir sehr gut gefallen. Die U-bahn ist zu Fuße gut erreichbar. Aber für mich war der Clou zu  Fuß durch den Park ins Zentrum zu laufen.Hab mich als Alleinreisende rund um sicher gefühlt.", "Fantastisch verblijf. Alles wat je nodig hebt, is er aanwezig.
Zeer sympathieke en behulpzame eigenaars.", "Merci à Boris et Tsvety pour leur réponses toujours rapides et explications avant le séjour. Le petit déjeuner au pied de l'immeuble est très appréciable, et servi par sa maman. L'appartement est agréable, propre et avec la clim s'il fait trop chaud. L'accès aux centre se fait très facilement et rapidement en bus. Tout est fait pour que tout se passe bien. Bravo.", "Genel olarak memnun kaldık, ama internet çok yavaştı. Ve odanın duvarları çok ince yan odadaki bay ve bayanın tüm sesi içerdeydi. Ama tavsiye ediyorum.", "Alles war gut und ich bin mit der Reise und meinem Aufenthalt bei Boris sehr zufrieden", "Très chouette studio correspondant tout à fait à la description et aux photos!!", "La posizione del piccolo appartamento è ideale per visitare Sofia, vicino alla metro e ad una importante fermata autobus si trova in un quartiere vivo e ricco di piccole attività.
Non troppo adatto per persone alte, ma per molti può non essere un problema.
L'unico difetto è un lucernario che diffonde una bella luce durante il giorno, ma anche molto presto la mattina.
Per il resto un proprietario molto cordiale ed un appartamento dal buonissimo rapporto qualità/prezzo.", "Communications un peu difficile, sinon tout est bien.", "Si vous souhaitez découvrir Sofia pour le tourisme, voyage affaire ou autre comme moi, n'hésitez-pas.
Le logement est en parfaite adéquation avec la description faite sur l'annonce. 
Boris est est fort arrangeant que ce soit pour venir vous chercher à l'aéroport ou pour vous faire le change sans avoir besoin d'aller en banque qui est pourtant à 50m de l'appartement.
Il ne manque absolument rien et le logement est cosy.
Si je revenais à Sofia c'est sans hésitation que je logerai de nouveau chez Boris et Tsvety.
Les transports en commun métro, bus ou station taxi sont à 2 pas.
", "Alle angegebenen Eigenschaften des Studios waren wie bezeichnet und funktionierten. Die Klimaanlage ist im Sommer sehr hilfreich. Wer Sofia kennt, der weiß, was einen erwartet. Der verwöhnte Reisende ist dort fehl am Platz, im kleinen wie im großen. Zum Übernachten reicht es jederzeit. Die Kommunikation hat ohne Probleme geklappt.", "Superbe logement et hôtes! Très agréablement surprise, gens souriants et gentils! Propre, calme et cosy!", "Totale liberté et disponibilités de l'hôte à 2 pas du centre-ville ", "Turkish Review--

Öncelikle belirtmeliyim ki Sofya şehri, kısa süreliğine gidip kültür turizmi yapmak için oldukça ideal bir yer. İstanbul'a yakınlığı ve ucuzluğu bunu sağlıyor. Boris ve sevgili eşinin stüdyo dairesi kalmak için oldukça ideal. Aynı resimlerde görüldüğü gibi. Havadar ve temiz. İhtiyaç duyduğunuz her şey dairede mevcut. Konumu da çok iyi. Serdika denilen şehir merkezine oldukça yakın. Zaten Serdika metro durağından kırmızı hatta (M1) biniyorsunuz ve üç durak sonra Juliot Curie durağında iniyorsunuz. Duraktan ev beş dakika yürüme mesafesinde. Çok yakınında her şeyi bulabileceğiniz bir süpermarket var. Kafeler de var. Eve çok yakın mesafede yine 24 saat çalışan bir taksi durağı var. Boris ile hiç yüz yüze denk gelmedik. Buna gerek kalmadı çünkü. Her türlü yazışmaya kısa sürede cevap veriyor zaten. Sofya'ya sık sık gitmeyi düşünüyorum. Gidersem Boris'in evinde tereddütsüz kalabilirim. Hiç düşünmeyin. Gayet iyi iyi bir seçim olacaktır. Sofya ile ilgili merak ettiklerinizi özelden danışabilirisiniz. İyi yolculuklar ve iyi tatiller. ", "Très  bien situé,  à  5mn du métro...
Accueil très  agréable et chaleureux.
Tout était  parfait!", "Der Aufenthalt bei Boris und Tsvety war sehr angenehm. Da mein Flug verspätung hatte, wurde insgesamt alles recht spät, sodass ich leider die Gastgeber nicht persönlich kennenlernen konnte.Ich war froh, dass mein Freund früher in derStadt war und die Schlüssel fürs Zimmer geholt hat. Das Zimmer ist schön, wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Auch die Nachbarschaft wirkt sicher bei Nacht.
Leider war das Zimmer am nächsten Tag schon vergeben, sodass wir nicht noch spontan eine Nacht dranhängen konnten. Schnell sein lohnt sich also, wie gesagt, wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt :) 
Lieben Dank an Boris und Tsvety :-)", "Nous avons apprécié nos trois jours passés  à Sofia dans ce charmant petit studio situé au 6è et dernier étage (avec ascenseur) d'un vieil immeuble calme dans un quartier tranquille et très bien desservi. Un grand merci à la gentille Michaela, qui, en l'absence de Boris et Tsvety, a fait le maximum pour nous accueillir et répondre à nos attentes.
", "Tres bien placé ce petit studio tout conford sera idéal pour votre futur voyage en capital bulgare
je recommande volontier
De plus boris et tsvety sont tres sympas et tres discret
", "Værtsparret var meget venlig og beskrev nøje hvordan man kunne finde forskellige steder. 
Lejligheden var lille men hyggelig. 
Der manglede vand som skulle være inkluderet og sengen var lidt hård men ellers var alt godt :) 
", "ﾎﾞﾘｽ夫妻は､とても気持ち良く迎えてくれました｡夜中の空港到着でしたが､笑顔でであうことができ､安心しました｡部屋は､設備もよく､せいけつで､気持ち良く過ごすことができました｡観光についても､適切なｱﾄﾞﾊﾞｲｽをくれました｡また､訪れたいﾎｽﾄです｡さらに､今回はﾛｰﾏからの､私の大切な友達も受け入れてくれました｡感謝しています｡
", "Ottimo contatto, persone semplici e simpatiche.
Locale è grazioso e ben arredato, giusto per 2 persone. 
Zona è tranquilla e ben alberata, non manchera' occassione di incontrarci nuovamente.
Great contact, simple and nice people.
 Local is nice and well furnished, right for 2 people.
 Area is quiet and well treed, will not fail 'occassione to meet again.
 Ciao Giuseppe e Ramona
"]

reviews:
["Cozy place, great location, great host. Highly recommended!", "Maia's apartment is located strategically close to a metro station and to one of the nicest areas in Sofia, sprinkled with small restaurants, coffee shops, and other shops. 
The apartment is cozy and bright, equipped with everything needed for a comfortable stay. ", "This is my second time in Maia's place. The apartment is really nice and its location is just great. There's a lot to see if you want to take a walk around the center of the city and the metro station is just a couple of minutes away for everything else. 
Maia is also a great host and will offer you help should you need something. 

I highly recommend this place and will probably stay there again in future!", "A quiet apartment at the heart of a busy city.
", "The place is really nice and the location is perfect - right in the center of the city.  The metro station is just a couple minutes away and there's also a bus stop almost at the front door. 
Maia and her sister were also very nice and helpful.", "Great place. Small but well arranged, located close to everything. It faces a quiet (surprisingly quiet!) back yard. It's a great deal!", "Maia's apartment is really cosy and nice, for me looks as well artistic. The apartment has everything, from well equipped kitchen to a washing machine, WiFi-TV, comfortable bed and nice couch to rest during the day.  The apartment is looks like as it in the pictures, I could say even bigger. The only thing is that the Toilet is small, but for me was totally okay- no need of big toilets with a lot of space that is not used- This was perfect small to do the ordinary things...

The apartment is located in the top center, everything what you want is on a walking distance- around you have restaurants, cafes, 24 hour shops, parks and the main attractive places in the city are on a walking distance. 

Maya is really nice, she was sending me massages during my stay to ask if everything is okay and fine or if we need something... the host that you really want :))

I recommend this place for friends, couple or a family... it really worth it.
 
", "Perfect central location, tricky if you have a car and don't know the regulations for public parking. Thank you!", "very sweet host. a really girl-next-door character that received us with kindness and was always a few seconds away from a reply on a text msg. apt is cute. bathroom smaller than small but the good thing is that the whole place is warm, and everything u might need in a home is there. i would definitely recommend her. p.s. the apt is downtown in the best possible location.", "I rented the apartment for my son and he told me that Mia was very easy to contact and a really nice person.  He agreed with all the reviews written above however wanted to emphasize on the size of the bathroom , it is really small. ", "This is the second time we stayed at Maia's place. Just like the last time she was a great host - although we did not need to contact her very often, she was very quick to respond, flexible and very easy to communicate with. 

As for the place - it is exactly how it looks like in the pictures - it is even more cozy with the new couch :))

I would definitely recommend staying there if you are visiting Sofia and you are looking for a nice, comfortable and a convenient place to stay at which is at a perfect location as well. 

We wish you all the best, Maia - we hope to see you again. :) ", "My boyfriend and I stayed at Maia's apartment for 2 whole months. I am a local, so I pretty much know Sofia like the back of my hand, but it was my boyfriend's first time here. It has all the requirements needed for a short city break and as previously stated, have fun finding (and using) the shower! 

I'd definitely give Maia another shout if I was to ever return to Sofia. ", "We had a great time during our time in Sofia and the apartment was ideal. Great location and perfect space.
I recommend this flat to anyone in Sofia for short or longer stays!", "The studio was as in the picture clean,cosy and the  location was great. The only think that is negative is the restroom or toilet: very small and it had a smell. I had a very good time. 

Thanks Maia.", "Staying at Maia's was a very nice experience! 
My friend and I spent the weekend in Sofia.
The small but functional flat offers everything you possibly need for a comfortable stay. After visiting Sofia we used to relax and chat on the couch, enjoying the cosy atmosphere the smooth light gives to the livinig room. 
The flat is on the 6th floor and to get there you can use an old elevator that makes you go back in time :)
There's wifi, a furnished kitchen, towels, bed linen...the small bathroom even has a hidden shower! Have fun searching for it! ;) 
The location is perfect, just a few minutes walk from the center. The neighbourhood is suprisingly green, there's a huge park and a canal as well. 
Good restaurants and bars are all around the area.
Maia is a nice and helpful host.
We definitely recommend the flat!", "Thanks for the appartement.  It's clean convinient and well located. ", "We really enjoyed the stay at Maias nice and cosy flat in Sofia. Everything was there to relax and feel good. Maia provided us with a nice map of the city and some recommendations where to go and what to see, that was very helpful and welcoming. She came to pick us up at the bus stop when we arrived, which helped us a lot, too. The flat was perfectly located within the city in a nice neighbourhood. Thanks Maia for having us as your guests :-) Best, Yvonne & Markus", "The apartment is really well located and offers everything you need for a pleasant stay in beautiful Sofia! 
Furthermore, Maia is really nice and helpful. She told me how to go from the airport to the apartment by bus, and picked me up from the station. As it turned out that I didn't need her apartment for the whole period I was booking it for, she was really accommodating. I moved out two days earlier, and she agreed to give me a part of my money back, which I highly appreciate.
", "Maia was a wonderful host who responded almost immediately the whole time, was punctual once we got there and handled all our requests with consideration and care. Her place was everything it promised, if not even more. Located virtually in ground zero of the Sofia downtown, it has the key places of interest within walking distance and every means of transportation available just around the corner. On the other hand, the apartment overlooks a very dormant backyard ensuring you can enjoy the quiet and sleep in after a busy day exploring Sofia's buzzing life. Clean, minimalistic, and with all utilities functioning properly. Enough storing capacity in the bedroom and ample space in the living room. (Friendly advice: Don't rely on the sofa to serve as a third bed.) Bathroom certainly not suitable for human giants but just right in all other cases. The kitchen corner is a nice touch and although one would most likely never eat in, I imagine preparing a simple meal should not be a problem. There were even typical local spices in jars, as well as honey, tea, coffee and the like. All in all, this is a place for those who want to stay at the heart of the Bulgarian capital while experiencing the simple comfort of a place carrying the character of early 20-th century (?) architecture and living space. I wouldn't think twice before booking Maia's studio next time I'm in Sofia.", "Maia's apartment is very well located. Walking distance from pretty much any attraction and at a crossroads of buses, tram and subway; you could not ask for a better location.

The apartment itself is very good; good size and it has everything you need. 
Only 2 things to be weary about - while there is no noise from the street at all; the elevator and the fridge do get noisy. Also, the apartment is exactly as in the photos: the washroom is extremely small and there is no actual shower.

In spite of this 2 issues; my stay in the apartment was very, very good. Maia is super responsive and helpful. 

My stay in Sofia was great, and this apartment was a big part of why.", "Very nice and comfortable studio in central Sofia. Location is great: near are subway, tram and trolley buses. 5 min by walk to bus stop from/to Airport. There are many shops, restaurants and cafeterias near location.
Maia is great and friendly host. She helped us with advices and met us in suitable place.", "I really enjoyed my stay with Maia, she was helpful right from the beginning.  The apartment was small, but it had everything we needed.  I was really impressed with the kitchen which was fully equipped and even had a great selection of spices :)  Made cooking at home a treat.  The central location meant we never had to take transit to go out at night.  Would definitely recommend.", "Maia is a great host. She was very helpful during the stay and provided us with good information to get around Sofia. 
The apartment is centrally located and within walking distance to the city central and other major attractions.
There is a tram and a bus station near the apartment building so thats helpful.
The apartment is located on the 6th floor and there is an elevator available. The apartment is very clean and tidy. The living room and bedroom are adequate for two people. The bed is not big enough for two people. However, everything seems to come together and fitted well within the apartment.
The bathroom is a little tight for anyone over six feet. 
The apartment was stocked with the essentials and Maia was a gracious host.
I would recommend anyone going to Sofia to take up this apartment", "Maia was a wonderful hostess and able to accomodate an early check in; she answered my many questions. Her flat is compact but full of light with a nice kitchen. The location is perfect- right on the tram line and a short walk to the major sites. ", "Maia's house is great: very close to the center walking and public transport close by, as well as shops open 24hrs.

The house is very clean and bright, ideal for 2 people. As she says very cozy and nice. It makes you feel at home and cooking, reading ... as if you were at your own house.

The relationship with Maia could not have been better. We have a very good communication from the beginning until the last hours in Sofia. And the most important thing: we love how is.
We miss u, Maia!", "I had a great experience here in this apartment and with Maia. The apartment is in a fantastic location (really, it couldn't be better) and is clean. The bathroom is very small and a bit cramped, but is acceptable. There's no separate shower in the bathroom; to take a shower, you close the door and the whole bathroom becomes the shower area.

Maia is super nice and speaks English perfectly. 

Overall, I highly recommend the apartment. I'd stay here again without thinking twice about it. ", "Maia was very hospitable and gave us useful information about Sofia. The apartment has everything what you need. It's perfect for one person or a couple. It's very clean. The elevator is beautiful as vintage! :) The place of the accommodation is perfect. You can go to everywhere by walking. ", "I really enjoyed it in Maya's apartment, it has definitely a lot of...character. An authentic old building, with really interesting elevator ;), nice view, and of course ...the location, it is probably no better location than this,in the middle of the centre. The apartment is FULLY EQUIPPED, also the kitchen, there is a TV, even with German TV :). It is a perfect place for couples, singles, business people, backpackers - everyone will enjoy it there. Maya is really helpful with everything, thank you very much for your hospitality and help!", "Appartement avec tout le necessaire, bien placé, et plutôt spacieux. Maia et Elizabeth ont été extremement arrangeantes concernant les heures d’arrivée et de départ. En effet, j’ai pu rester jusqu’à 15h le jour de mon départ car mon avion était à 17h. 
Seul bémol notable, la salle de bain est incroyablement petite, prendre une douche n’est pas évident.", "La meilleure des hôtes qui a fait preuve de gentillesse et de patience.", "Mooi en netjes appartement. Aan alles was gedacht en super dicht bij een metrostation en het is ook prima te lopen naar het centrum. Het communiceren ging erg makkelijk en snel.", "Fomos eu e meu namorado. Nossa estadia foi muito boa!
O apartamento é bem aconchegante, funcional e a uma distância a pé do centro e de alguns pontos turísticos, além de ser perto de um metrô.
Maia respondeu todos os nossos recados rapidamente e nos deu muitas boas dicas principalmente em relação ao transporte local.
Apesar da ótima estadia, achamos o banheiro um pouco pequeno, e a cortina da janela do quarto deixa muita luz passar, o que é ruim para dormir até um pouco mais tarde.
Mesmo assim, foi uma estadia muito boa a um preço justo.
Ficaria lá novamente com certeza!", "Kann Maias Airbnb wärmstens empfehlen!", "Das zweite Bett passt nicht ganz gut für Leute über 1.90m. Es ist aber verkraftbar. :)", "Pasamos unos dias geniales en casa de Maia. El piso es pequeño pero muy servicial y acogedor y tiene de todo. Su cohost, Elie, fue un auténtico encanto recibiéndonos casi de madrugada con una sonrisa. La única pega del piso es el ascensor, muy pequeño (solo para una persona) y hace muchisimo ruido.(Es un sexto) Por lo demás... La ubicación es excelente, llegas andando al centro en unos 15min, y tienes todos los transportes cerca, asi como restaurantes, supermercado...
100% recomendable.", "Maïa et Elie étaient disponibles pour nos questions et le logement est bien situé.", "Es war ein sehr schöner Aufenthalt in Sofia, die Wohnung ist schön und ausreichend eingerichtet und ausgestattet! Das Bad ist zwar winzig klein, aber für uns hat es gereicht :) 
Maia war sehr hilfsbereit und hat sich mehrfach erkundigt, ob wir was brauchen! Vielen Dank für das tolle Wochenende ", "Charmant appartement au centre du Sofia, à proximité du métro.
Maya est très sympathique et disponible.
Je me suis senti comme à la maison et je reviendrai lors de mon prochain séjour, j'espère."]
