reviews:
["The room is really close to the city center, 5 mins walking. You have a big supermarket 2 mins walking distance and a street market just in front of the house.  The apartment has everything you could possible need. The room is comfy, it has a big coach and a very nice terrace to the street. Inne is very kind, fast answering messages and caring. I would totally recommend this place. I am coming back very soon!", "Even if we did reserve the room the day we arrived, Inne was very responsive and was available for us ! It was great to stay at his place and to follow his visiting advices !", "Highly recommended", "Really good location!", "Inne is a great host, very helpful and communicative, gave us useful info, answered all questions fast, and really made us feel like home. The place is as central as it can get. The private balcony is great to relax and watch the bazaar, also very silent later in the evening. The building is amazing; a true historical neoclassical villa from 1910. It is old but adventurous and mysterious, a thing I personally loved. The shower was very spacious & there is tons of hot water anytime (faucet was a bit tricky). The room was bright, warm, comfortable. I guess the carpet could be cleaner, but it was ok. There were other guests too, in the other rooms -the ones were very friendly and we had a nice chat; the others were "invisible", but left traces of dirt, which wasn't good. Anyway. It was a delight staying there for three days, and I'm definitely coming back :) Thank you Inne", "Great location and inne was super helpful and relaxed. Thank you!", "Authentic and cool place to stay in Sofia. Inne is cool host", "Great location! Very easy communication with Inne, clean and cozy room, just perfect for a weekend in the city.", "House is pretty old but great. Apartments are well placed. Inne is a nice host, he responds quickly and helps with everything.", "Inne was very friendly host, the communication was great, the room is worth for the money and the location is great ,close to the downtown and the meteo if you want to go to the airport i will recommend this place and Inne as a great host", "Great location, great value and great host. All good! Thank you :)", "Everything, as expected. Super near to the Center and a friendly host, who gave us a lot of tips. The balcony was also nice.", "Great location to visit Sofia. The apartment is a little old but clean. 
Inne was really nice. Thank you :)", "Great cozy room with a cute balcony overlooking the market. Inne is a very charming host, very helpful, communication was super easy. The location is central, close to Serdika station, with fast connection to the airport. I had a great and easy stay and can fully recommend this listing.", "Great location, clean and ideal as it's close to everything,nice market on street outside, no traffic and 15to20min walk from bus and train station while metro stop is 5mins walk. Good rates too.", "Inne was a super nice host! The room was centrally located and very easy to get around. However, you can hear the train from this room, so be aware of this if you need a quiet space to sleep!", "We were only there one night but Inne was a great host, he was very quick to respond and gave great recommendations for things to do in our 3 hours in the city. The room was cosy and clean and the location of the house was great.", "Inne is a very dynamic young guy, great host. His place couldn't be better located and the cleanliness as well as the unique decoration makes his place special. Totally recommended!", "it was a great time right there, good place near to city Centre, Anne is a very good host 
highly recommended", "Inne's house is located in the city center so it's perfect to see the main buldings of Sophia. Inne is a very nice host, he was really fast answering our questions and he managed to come anytime when he was need it. Also, we could let the luggage there until the afternoon because our plane took off at night. Even a bad aparment can be the best with people like Inne, 100% recomendated.", "Inne was a really kind host and that really helped me out with the things that were not so great in Sofia. Once you are actually in the apartment it is cozy, clean and spacious Inne helps with everything, he knows all the great places and how to welcome guests. Perfect location. Thank you Inne", "The room is spacious, quiet and bright. It is in an apartment with two other rooms, a bathroom and a kitchen. It very well located, around 5-7min by foot from Serdika metro station. Inne is reactive and gave us tips on where to eat in Sofia. Definitely a good deal for your stay in Sofia !", "Inne's place was amazing!!! Much better than we expected. We had such a great time! ", "Absolutely helpful host with amazing and thorough recommendations. We managed to see and skim through the best of Sofia when we only stayed for one night due to Inne’s suggestions before we arrived! Having a balcony was also lovely and the location is very convenient.", "Everything was perfect and the location is fantastic.", "It would be difficult to find a more convenient location, especially for those arriving and leaving Sofia by both train and plane.

Inner makes a great host, always at hand to answer questions and offer advice for sightseeing and eating out.

Like most places in Sofia, the flat has seen better days but it's clean, safe and friendly and the price is within nearly everyone's budget.", "Inne was very friendly and very good host. the room was as expected", "Inne left the keys for me to find outside the house. I stayed for just one night so I could not really experience the appartment fully, but it was fine by me.", "The place is okey. It is located in an area with street shops, where you can find lot of fruits.
Our bedroom was not ready when we arrived and no ready after the time we agreed with the host... The host was late and we had to wait extra time for him to clean. 
But finally Inne is a good host, maybe it was just a bad thay for him.
The place was okey for our purpose, we have just slept there one night.
", "We had a late arrival due to flight delay, so we arrived at 02:00 AM. It was confusing to find the place, but managed to do so at the end. We took the keys, and entered into a very very old house, which had lots of stuff thrown all over the hallway, knives, forks, mattresses, chains etc. There was no light so we had to use our phones to light the way up the stairs and get into the room. When we got up in the main hallway, everything was dark except 1 room which had a red light and scary noises coming out from the room. Several cockroaches passed our way, so we just went straight downstairs and left the place. Horrible experience, the closest real thing to Scary Movie. ", "We didn't have a chance to meet Inne, but we had an absolutely perfect stay in this room, which is very cosy and clean. We felt really comfortable in it, and Inne has done everything to made our arrival and departure as simple as possible !", "Inne is really kind to let us store our luggage before check in. He also provided some insider tips on where to go for good food and historical spots. The room itself is spacious and cozy, located right next to the local market, so you will get to feel the buzz from time to time.", "It was such a big room and it had the cutest little balcony. The place was clean and it’s close to the center. We didn’t have any trouble with the host, he actually replied to our texts so fast and he was really helpful like he let us check in 6 hours earlier. Totally recommended!", "Inne' place is at a great spot to do a citytrip through Sofia and travel from and to the airport. He really wants to help and gives nice tips for places to go. The room was great.", "Inne was very kind and friendly, superb location, really convenient, walking distance to the bus station and there's a local market downstairs. Clean apartment, ample kitchen and shower amenities. Willing to offer local tips and advice. Airbnb experience could not better! 5/5 highly recommended!", "Cute room with nice private balcony in the old parts of town. Good and quick communication and easy access. ", "We loved staying here. Inne gave us great tips on what to see and how to get around. The location was awesome and the apartment is very spacious and clean. ", "The flat is located in the centre of Sofia so it is accesible very easily. Everything was nice and clean. Very good stay.", "it‘s a very good place to stay for one night and very cozy", "Very nicely located in the center next to the market (you can buy there everything you need). Between the central train station and the metro station serdika. Easy to reach from the airport. I had a nice room with a balcony. ", "Nice Hostelroom right in the old town city center. Restaurants and bars are easy to reach. 
Inne is a pretty cool guy and answered all questions fast and uncomplicated! Thank you for everything ", "We stayed in the double room with balcony, so spent lovely times relaxing and people watching. Inne met us and gave us lots of tips. He checked everything was ok and was always busy cleaning and adding touches  like toiletries and bowls of sweets.

The place is old but clean and we used the kitchen to cook. 

Good location away from main drag, but only 10mins walk to sites. 

Recommend.", "Brilliant location - very central to and 5 minutes from the metro, every part of the city to walkable though. So lovely to have a balcony and the shower has great pressure! ", "Very good communication, nice spacious room, good advises, beautiful ancient apartment with character.", "Great location and very friendly host. Would definitely come again :)", "Nice balcony overlooking a pedestrian street.", "Very nice private room in a flat shared with other travellers. Inne was a great host, the communication before and during the stay was excellent and he really tried to make it a good visit for us, including the option of leaving the luggage a few hours longer. Very central flat, just a few minutes walk to wherever in town.
The bed was rather to the hard side, but not a problem for us.
Will remember Inne for our next visit to Sofia!", "Inne is the best host you can looking for. Super top in all", "Very clean and cozy room in a nice appartment on a beautiful location. Inne helped us very well and is very hospitable. I can recommend this to everyone!", "Inne is a great host, the place is perfectly located, very good quality-price ratio.
thank you
petr", "Very nice and clean room in a good location, just in the City centre.", "Very attentive owner. Our arrival was delayed, since the taxi brought us to the wrong address, and we arrived only at 1.30 at night, but the host still waited for us. Thank you so much. The room is clean, for two is quite spacious. A good bathroom, there is a kitchen with everything you need. I recommend this owner!", "Everything I had to say, and all the gratitude I made, I've made directly to inne in person. So making a long thing short: had a great stay and a had a blast sitting and talking to inne.", "A great place to stay in Sofia !", "Inne was extremely hospitable and helped us immediately with any problem.  He shared drinks with us and other guests, and even went as far as spending the last night in the apartment to help us getting a taxi the next morning! Very well located apartment of which the 3 rooms are for rent. I have only good memories of this stay and would definitely go back there", "It was great experience.
Host is very carring and friendly. 
Responsible. 
We like small privet balkony with the view on the street. Nargila.", "숙소 위치는 시장안에 있어서 나름 좋았던것 같아요! 하룻밤 묵기 좋은곳 같습니다~ 샴푸,린스,바디워시 용품들이 여러개씩 풍족하게 모두 구비되어있습니다! :)  끄뤈뒈 쥐진나면 금팡이롸도 무눠질궈가타여 엘베업씀니다 계돤에 불이 안들어와숴 훗렛쉬 켜숴 갓서염 ! 여좌뷴들이쓰기엔 무숴울고가타여~!!", "très bon séjour chez Inné. l'appartement est localisée au coeur d'un marché très authentique de Sofia (petit balcon ayant une vue sur celui ci) Tout le confort est là et très bon rapport qualité prix, je recommande.", "Nous sommes restées une nuit chez Inne, le temps d'une escale entre l'aéroport et Plovdiv. Mais nous avons, grâce à ce logement, eu un excellent aperçu de Sofia : l'appartement est a proximité du métro et du tram, il donne sur une petite place très mignonne, dans des rues commerçantes mais très calmes. Inne nous a indiqué un restaurant non loin que nous avons beaucoup apprécié, et pour celle et ceux qui se rendent à Plovdiv, il s'avèrent que le terminal de bus est à une quinzaine de minutes à pieds ! 
En bref : une très bonne expérience chez un hôte chaleureux et réactif.", "Qualità prezzo eccezionale per pochi giorni a sofia. L'host è stato molto gentile e premuroso spiegandoci come poter vedere la città nel miglior modo possibile", "Nur für anspruchlose junge Menschen geeignet.", "una buena casa para pasar unos dias en sofia", "Lze očekávat to co je v nabídce, více nemohu posoudit.  Byly jsme pouze jednu noc,  check in pozdě večer, brzy ráno odjezd. ", "Très bon séjour à Sofia dans l’appartement de Inne. Très réactif, il a toujours été à l’écoute de nos attentes et parle bien le français.
Je recommande vivement cet appartement qui est idéalement situé dans le centre ville de Sofia.", "Inne ist ein großartiger Gastgeber, er ist sehr hilfsbereit und hat uns viele Tipps für die Stadt gegeben. Das Gebäude ist leider schon sehr alt und nicht im besten Zustand. Die Matratze war für mich viel zu hart. Für den Preis ist es aber ganz in Ordnung. Die Lage direkt am Markt und nicht weit von Serdika ist toll!", "Лучший из всех у кого я оставался хозяин! Советую его! 10 из 10! Очень крутой! Лучший! ", "Muy bien! Céntrico, con estilo y todo lo necesario para estar en Sofía!", "Excellent accueil et excellent départ. Inne est à l'écoute des remarques et veille à ce que le séjour de chaque inviter passe un bon séjour.", "El anfitrión es súper antento amable y hospitalario té responde rápido y te ayuda en todo tipo de cosas la ubicación es muy bueno recomiendo el lugar", "El piso está muy céntrico. Tanto para la llegada como salida nos puso todas las facilidades. Además tuvo el detalle de guardarnos las maletas hasta la tarde. El apartamento esta muy limpio y tiene todo lo que puedes necesitar.", "Logement bien équipé et cosy avec un petit balcon privatif donnant sur le marché, un vrai plus. Hôte attentionné et excentrique :)", "Plus proche d'un hostel que d'un airbnb, c'est un appart très bien situé, calme et agréable. Bon rapport qualité-prix-emplacement. Il y a 3 chambres et nous avions la chambre avec lit double (lits simples dans les autres?) qui a un BALCON PRIVÉ! Hyper agréable!!
Par contre il faudra vider les lieux à 11h du mat sans quoi vous vous ferez sortir sans attendre, ce qui nous est arrivé... Donc ne prévoyez pas de grasse mat !
Expérience positive dans l'ensemble :)"]

reviews:

", "Firstly it was great that any questions we needed to ask before we travelled to sofia we could message Vladislav via (Hidden by Airbnb) and he always replied straight away.
Once arriving he organised our transfer to the apartment from the airport which was a great help. 
The apartment was as it shows on the photo, couldn't fault it. It was very nice and clean. There was only 2 of us but easily big enough for 6 people if one stayed on couch. Game room as it shows was good of you fancied staying in for a couple of hours.
Vladislav was only a message or phone call away if we needed him for anything. He was a great host, he even took us out one night. He is a nice guy. 
I would highly recommend staying here if your going to Sofia.  The main street with all the shops, bars etc is only 10 to 15 mins walk, not fair at all. But even closer there are lots of shops that is just at the top on the street of the apartment. 
Overall 10/10.
Hope to go back one day!", "Great place. Vladislav was a good host. Provided us with all the information we needed about how to get to certain attractions. Place was clean and spacious. Quiet neighbourhood and close to the metro too. Would stay here again! ", "Our flight to Sofia was delayed, but Vladislav waited for us to welcome us to the apartment. It is very nice and spacious (we were with 2, although the apartment is for suitable for 5 people). It is close to the city centre and public transport. At the end of the day it was nice to come back to a warm apartment, thanks to the AC, because it was -18 degrees Celsius outside. If you are looking for a comfortable apartment close to the city center, this is it!", "Vladislav wasn't in the city but took care of everything for us to receive the keys. The apartment is as described and looks like the pictures. The water evacuation didn't work too well in the bathroom, making showers a bit complicated for 4 people, as the door doesn't retain water, but I am sure this should be fixed as you're reading this comment.

Nothing went wrong, would recommend.
", "Vladislav was very profesional, helpful and informative. Was always able to be reached st anytime of the day and on time. Great guy!!", "Great place! Playroom - great idea! :)", "The apartment was really good, as well as we expected!! Vladislav was a good host too. I'll recommend it if you decide to spend some days in Sofia.", "From start to finish a fantastic stay.  Vladislav is just a cool guy.  Someone you would want to have a beer with.  The place has a modern feel.  Furniture very comfortable and good fixtures. Fine selection of essentials throughout apartment.  Newer tv and blazing fast internet.  Location offered a quieter stay, but was only five minute walk to everything. Public transport very close to take you right into central Sofia.  Stay in this place as a couple, family, or even single because it is great value.  All things considered the best Airbnb I have encountered.", "It's a great apartment, well equipped kitchen. Clean and with plenty of room for 3 people. Vladislav himself was so helpful, waiting for us past the agreed check in time when our train was very late, and provided alot of information about what to see in Sofia and surrounds, allowing us to have an easy stay. Great location and a very close walk to everything you have to see in sofia, would reccomend! The games room was also a big plus, very fun. Thankyou for having us! ", "Vladislav is a great host.  Checkin was smooth as he was already waiting for us at the apartment. He also provided all the required details.  And also,  he is always a call away... Apartment is the same as its shown in the apartment. Cosy n nice... Walking distance to city center n main attractions.... Even tram station is very near.  ", "The apartment was very well located (15-20min walking to downtow) close to Metro stations and convenience stores.

Apartment was spotlessly clean and well equipped.

Would go back to Vladislav apartment if I return to Sofia", "Vladislav is a great host! He was very friendly and helpful. He made sure that we had everything that we needed and he could also give us some helpful insider tip's about the city. The apartment was very clean and located in the city center. We really enjoyed our stay in Sofia! Thank you!", "

This apartment is fantastic. It's very spacious but still very cozy. Very newly done, beautifully furnished and decorated in modern style that appeals to me a lot. It's well equipped with many kitchen supplies and everything else you could possibly need during your stay. The beds and couch are very comfortable, rooms are spacious and bright, with big windows facing back yard.

I was staying here alone and felt very comfortable. I loved the main space, bright living room with kitchen corner, that has great, comfortable couch and big TV screen.
But I believe groups would especially enjoy the playroom, which adds very fun extra to apartment and the whole stay.

Location itself is great. The building is nice and located in small street, that is very peaceful during night and day time.
It's still very close to the main street, where you can find well stocked market and many other smaller shops, coffee shops and bar.
It's also only a short distance from the city center, so you can walk to all the main attractions, or that's at least what I did.
Otherwise, metro station is just around the corner, there are many bus lines at the main street, and also the main bus and railway stations are only about 10 min walk away.

I also discovered the cutest cake shop ''Tita Cakes'' on corner of ''Sveti Kiril i Metody'' and  ''Georgi S. Rakovski'' street (that's just one street away). It makes perfect breakfast place for all dreamers and romantic souls.


On the evening of my arrival I was very warmly welcomed by Vladislav's sister. She waited for me with no problem till my late arrival, show me around the place and explained how everything functions. They even prepared map, with all closed shops and main city attractions.

The communication with Vladislav was also great, we had smooth conversation. He was very responsive to all my questions and very flexible with my check-in and check-out time.

I really loved staying here and would definitely recommend this place to anyone. Thank you for wonderful stay, I really hope I'll have chance to visit again.", "The apartment was great, all new exactly like in the pictures. From the place you are near to all the important things on Sofia city center and there is a supermarket very near. 
The host was always available and nice!
I recommend it 100%

Roxana", "Beautiful appartment and very nice environment ! Everything was new and well preserved ! The hosts were excellent and helpful with everything that had to do with the house and not only.Its definitely a very good choice for someone who wants to have an excellent stay in Sofia.", "Habe das Apartment mit Bekannten über ein verlängertes Wochenende gebucht. Der Aufenthalt war dabei durchwegs positiv: das Apartment ist sauber, liegt zentru (Hidden by Airbnb) ah und für sämtliche Utensilien wie Shampoo, Kaffee oder WiFi ist gesorgt. Schlüsselabgabe und -übernahme verläuft reibungslos. Gerne wieder", "Goede locatie, ruim appartement met vele voorzieningen. Communicatie verliep heel snel en goed", "Ottimo appartamento, pulito, in posizione tranquilla ma molto comoda ai mezzi pubblici e al centro città che può tranquillamente essere raggiunto a piedi. Nelle vicinanze bar, ristoranti e negozi di ogni genere.
Appartamento perfettamente equipaggiato e dotato di tutto ciò che serve. Vladislav è un host preciso,  velocissimo nelle risposte e disponibile per fornire ogni informazione utile al soggiorno.
Tornerei sicuramente in questo appartamento.", "100 % recommendation!
Die Kommunikation mit Vladislav war perfekt. Anworten kamen innerhalb weniger Minuten und auch die Tatsache, dass wir erst spät abends in Sofia ankamen, war kein Problem. Wir wurden vor der Tür erwartet. Die Wohnung ist prima; sauber, ruhig und gut ausgestattet. Sie liegt in einer ruhigen Wohngegend, aber das Zentrum ist schnell zu Fuß erreichbar und  die U-Bahn-Station 'Löwenbrücke' ganz in der Nähe. Außerdem gibt es in unmittelbarer Nachbarschaft ein paar nette Lokale. Im Haus selbst eine kleine Bar und in der Parallelstraße  (Kiril I Metodiy) ein schönes, etwas versteckt liegendes Gartenrestaurant  (nur an der offenen Tür und einer Lampe erkennbar) und die Delta Blues Bar mit Live-Musik. Alles bestens!", "Airbnb parfait. Super propre, très bien équipé, très bien situé, excellent rapport qualité / prix. Bref, rien à redire.  De plus, Vladislav est très disponible et très réactif. Nous avons passé un super séjour. Merci beaucoup Vladislav.", "El apartamento está muy bien para pasar unos días en Sofía. Se encuentra entre el centro y la estación de tren y autobuses para hacer viajes de día. Vladislav es muy atento y contesta muy rápido a todas las preguntas.", "Vladislav kitűnő házigazda volt, minden elismerésem az övé. A szállás tiszta, központi helyen fekszik, Szófia legfontosabb látnivalói akár gyalogosan is könnyen megközelíthetőek onnan. Ajánlom!", "Bellissimo appartamento, pulito e ben attrezzato. Pozione ottima. Ideale anche per una famiglia. Rapporto qualità-prezzo: Eccellente! 
Ci ritornerei volentieri", "Perfecta comunicación Vladislav en todo momento, nos recibió su padre Alexander magnífico anfitrión, muy amable y simpático, nos explicó y ayudo en todo momento todo lo que necesitábamos saber. El apartamento es muy grande, muy limpio y la iluminación es genial, con todos los servicios cerca Restaurant, tiendas etc. Cerca del centro andando 20 minutos , tienes varios tranvías y un trolebús (el Nº 9 a la Catedral). A un minuto desde apartamento que te bajan al centro, dos paradas y en 5 minutos estas. Dormimos muy bien allí. Es Recomendable al 100% todo genial", "leuk appartement en goede gastheer!", "Entspricht den Angaben 100%", "Een zeer leuk appartement in hartje Sofia. De speelkamer is ideaal voor kinderen. Het appartement heeft alles wat je nodig hebt. Ook de keuken is volledig uitgerust met koffieapparaat etc. De bedden slapen heerlijk, het textiel is erg schoon en overal is airco. Probleempje was het parkeren. Er is geen prive parkeerplaats maar een betaalde (schijnt) verderop. Bij het naar boven brengen van de koffers was de politie al bezig een wielklem te plaatsen. Voor 30 Lev. haalden ze die gelukkig weer weg. Het appartement is wel erg mooi gelegen vlakbij alle bezienswaardigheden. De communicatie met Vladislav verloopt soepel. Hij reageert heel snel.", "Apartamento muy confortable, totalmente reformado y nuevo, bien amueblado y situación bastante céntrica. A 10 minutos a pié del centro histórico de Sofia, cerca de restaurantes, tiendas casas de cambio y supermercado. Zona tranquila sin ruidos ni trafico. Vladislav os puede hacer además el transfer al aeropuerto mas rápido y económico. Muy recomendable por situación calidad y precio.", "El apartamento está muy bien situado en el centro de la ciudad. Muy limpio. Con todas las comodidades. La cocina completa. Las instalaciones muy bien. La calle muy tranquila y silenciosa. Totalmente recomendable. Además hay futbolín y dardos. ", "Unser Aufenthalt in der Wohnung von Vladislav war ausgezeichnet! Die Kommunikation und Hilfsbereitschaft waren außerordentlich und wir würden jederzeit wieder gerne seine Gäste sein. Das Appartment war ausgesprochen sauber und wir haben uns dort sehr wohl gefühlt! Die sehr zentrale Lage hat es uns außerdem ermöglicht, die Stadt ausschließlich zu Fuß zu erkunden.", "Bel appartement 2 chambres bien agencé , bien équipé et très propre.
Situé à seulement 200 mètres du métro.L'hôte est fiable et sérieux. Très bon rapport qualité/prix ...", "Puntualissimo, come sono arrivato Alexander è venuto nell'immediato. Loro veramente cortesi e facile la comunicazione con loro. La casa è esattamente come si vede dalle foto, per noi italiani impegnativo il bagno in quando una doccia minuscola senza box, ad ogni doccia il bagno era completamente pieno di acqua! per il resto tutto perfetto, completa di tutte le comodità e tutto funzionante. ", "tutto positivo. l'unico inconveniente lo scolo della doccia che era intasato", "L'appartamento è spazioso e ben distribuito.
Posizione comoda.
Vladislav è  stato gentile e pronto per qualsiasi domanda.
Consigliatissimo soprattutto per gruppo di amici", "Der Aufenthalt in Sofia war sehr schön. Die Lage der Wohnung ist zentral gelegen, sodass alles zu Fuß erreicht werden konnte. Vladislav war freundlich und unterstützend. Die Wohnung selbst war super, sehr groß, sauber und gut ausgestattet.", "Appartement agréable, deux vraies chambres, salon agréable mais pas de table pour dîner (assez courant en Bulgarie), cuisine équipée, bonne clim, pas de bruit.
Généralement un très bon choix pour un séjour tranquille pas loin du centre.
Hôte sympa et pas compliqué. ", "Vladislav ist ein sehr kompetenter Gastgeber, Kommunikation 1A, sehr flexibel, bei Problemen immer verfügbar, Gut ausgestattete Wohnung, Lage relativ zentral, allerdings sollte man Nachts nicht alleine herumspazieren. 5 Minuten von der nächsten U-Bahnstation und Supermärkten."]

reviews:
["The apartment is very nice and comfortable! Location is very convenient.", "Great place and value.", "Great place. Great hosts.", "Nice place, perfect location in high end neighbourhood. Host responsive and punctual. ", "Perfect place. ", "The neighborhood is nice, with many restaurants near by. ", "Very clean, cosy and close to public transportation. Nice cafés and places to eat nearby.", "We are more than happy to have found this place. It was incredibly clean, well furnished and surprisingly spacious. The kitchen had everything that you would need for both long and short term. We would love to stay there again.", "I highly recommend the place :)", "The place is tiny but very cosy. A great use of the place with the available furniture. The apartment has access to many shops as well as places to dine. View from the flat is an amazing asset as you can see the snowy mountain tops. Nearby a metro station that is on 3 stops (10 minutes) from the city-center. Overall, a very good choice and value for money.", "I had a  great stay at Eran's property. Great location, access to subway, there were some restaurants and supermarkets nearby the flat. The apartment was great and renovated,  clean and we had everything that we needed.", ".", "Nice place, near to the centre of the city.", "Perfect!", "A really nice place to stay and the location is perfect. Despite the short time we spent there, we had a great time and everything needed. The hosts made us feel very welcome. I highly recommend it.", "Great comfi place , clean and nice . Very well equipped.", "Wonderful apartment, great host :)", "Perfect location ! Nice, clean and quiet place, great host ! ", "Awesome palace with great location and practical interior. Cannot wish for a better place really.", "Great apartment with great location, communication with the owner was excellent.", "Everything was great! The host was really kind to us and we enjoyed our stay. The location is perfect. 
I highly recommend this place! ", "Amazing place to stay in Sofia. Location is very good, 2 metro stations from city center and it's in very quiet area. We loved staying here.", "Very nice apartment. Everything was perfect!", "This was one big disappointment. The apartment was most basic and the kitchen was not clean. The beds were terrible: small single blanket and the mattress is old with depressions when you try to lay flat. I was advised to leave the keys inside at check-out, but got locked-in since the front door was  locked, just when I had to catch my flight in the early morning.", "Great Apartment in a top location", "Lovely place in the best neighbourhood of sofia! Great location near the tube station, only 3 stops away from the city center.", "Eran and his team here really helpful and friendly, the place is in a perfect location, 5 minutes walk from the metro station. The building is quiet yet on a trendy street. The interior is stylish and it has one of the most comfiest beds! Definitely recommend! ", "This is an amazing place to stay in Sofia. It is located just beside a metro station which takes you to downtown in just few minutes. The area around the apartment is also very well developed (shops, cafererias, etc).
I highly recommend this place. ", "Nice and fresh apartment in good neighbourhood! Nice kitchen if you want to cook, but there are also good cafes and restaurants nearby. There is also a grocery store, metro, atm, barbers etc in the area. We stayed there for a full week, and had no problems at all. Would go back!", "The great location, only 3 minutes to the underground. Many nice cafes around. Very friendly host. But the flat is smaller than it seems on the photos. ", "Eran’s place is ideally located close to the metro and shops in a nice neighborhood.
The flat is so light and agreable. The balcony is an amazing bonus.

It’s also a very spacious studio! More like an appartment!

Thanks for hosting us Eran!", "Very good place!", "Superb!", "Nice apartment. Nice location. Next to supermarket and metro. But I had hard time to get to location. Not good communication with the guy who received me.", "It’s very nice, peaceful place!", "Love that place!Been there twice and for sure if I need to go back to Sofia will choose the same place again and again !", "Eran place is quite modern and clean. It is far from the Center but well connected by metro 3 metro stops). The only downsides were the bathroom (with an unpleasant odeur and which could use refurbishing) and lack of certain amenities (I could use two tea bags and a shampoo). For the rest things were fine: Eran and his friend on spot were reactive and everything went well with the check in. Eran also responded very fast with the booking. But don’t count on any tips re where to eat -I tried with his friend who delivered the keys and I was unsuccessful.", "Nice, clean apartment, in a good location and very close to the metro.", "Great place to stay at regarding stylish space, security and at a prime location. All needed amenities were present.

There was even a travel adapter and a recommendation for a taxi app with a discount code.

Fully recommended and also this place is a great specimen of value for money", "Amazing place to stay!Clean and quiet!Close to metro station,with really good aces to the city centre.A lot of coffee shops,restaurants and bars,Lidl near by!Recommend it to anyone who wants to relax and enjoy the stay!Will go back there at the end of April and I can't wait,already miss that place !", "We enjoyed the cosy style of the apartment and the easy access to transportation facilities.", "Eran's place was nice, tidy and well furnished. It is only minutes away from the nearest metro station and the "Borisova Gradina" park. Rosen (his co-host) was very friendly and flexible with check-in times. Overall great experience.", "Very nice studio apartment in a great location and the bed was so comfortable.  Highly recommended.", "Very happy with that place.", "A great and cosy place to stay in Sofia with a very good location and connection to transport links to the city centre and the airport. Very polite and responsive hosts!", "It is ok.", "We were welcomed by Rosen, who was very kind. He answered to our messages immediately. The appartment was clean, warm, bright. Small and cozy. Free WiFi. 24h hot water. Comfortable bed and clean bedsheets. Close to metro station, supermarket,nice local restaurants. For me and my husband was perfect :) ", "Nice place right by a grocery store, pharmacy and a nice coffee shop for working. Apartment was small but clean and comfortable.", "Great apartment, with great view and all of the amenities you need for a perfect stay. The area is nice and very suitable if you own a car, but also easily accessible by public transport. Highly recommend.", "A very nice apartment with location about two blocks from the metro, cable tv, and high speed wifi. There is a nice supermarket (Lidl) only a few meters away. The Museum of Socialist Art is walkable from the apartment (but difficult to zigzag to).

Check-in was very easy and I did not have any problems with the apartment. I left very satisfied with the experience.

Note: the downstairs door is only supposed to be locked during the evening and early morning but I left the keys in the apartment to head to the airport a little before noon and the door was locked (so I could not leave until a visitor was buzzed in). Check out the door's status 2 minutes before leaving so you do not experience this kind of stress.", "Good place yo stay", "Excellent!", "Really nice place in a good area!", "Your apartment made our stay in Sofia a very pleasant one! It really was a beautiful apartment, with all comforts we needed. A nice place to come home after a day of seeing the city. We would definitely recommend it to other people.", "This studio apartment is 3 minutes walk from the metro so is perfect for exploring all of Sofia and getting to and from the airport.  Locally there is a supermarket within 50 metres and several places to eat at night, if you decide not to go to the town centre.  The TV had English channels and the Wi-Fi was spot on.   A great place with a super friendly host.", "Everything was perfect!", "Great, clean apartment. Less than a minute walk to a metro stop and 3 minutes to the city centre. Great location locally too with a 24 hour convenience store downstairs and a big supermarket open until late over the road. Hosts communicated well and the apartment was very well cleaned and equipped for our arrival. 10/10", "The apartment and the stay was great. It is as it is shown in the photos. Very clean and comfortable. It is located in a very quiet neighborhood, although there is some distance from the center, the apartment is two blocks from the metro station and close to a large park and various services such as supermarkets, restaurants and pharmacies.

The communication with Eran was very fluid, always responded quickly when I wrote. Really recommendable.", "Eran, Vencislava and Rosen are amazing co-hosts! Everything was amazing, area is very safe and close to airport but also close to center. Apartment was even better than in pictures and very clean. Highly recommended!", "Lovely modern apartment close to the metro in a nice quiet block. Great balcony to chill out on. Really nice place for our trip to Bulgaria. Thanks. Karl", "Great location stylish and modern.", "amazing", "Spacious, light and airy studio in immaculate condition. Two minutes from metro station from it takes about 10 minutes to the centre. Plenty of cafes, shops and restaurants in immediate area. Very nice, recommend highly.", "Location, location, location! This place was perfect for our needs, we were 10 minutes walking to family and just 5 minutes walking to metro, there are shops and cafes right below. The place was clean and host was quick to respond, best part..Water Heater, we landed in Sofia right in time for annual water shut off in that area so there was going to be no hot water, but there is a water heater which was absolutely great! Apartment has everything you need (even a converter for chargers in case you forgot to bring one).", "This is a beautiful flat just two short stops from the city center. The flat is also easily accessed via metro from the airport. Vencislava is an excellent host!", "Great host an a lovely appartement", "The apartment was great. We had a small problem with a lock on a front door but it was replaced next morning. What can you do - it could happen anytime. Thanks to our host the whole lock experience was just a minor thing and not something unbearable.", "We enjoyed our stay at Vencislava's place, it is clean, modern and minimalist. Close to the metro station, cafes and restaurants. Being on the 6th floor was great, because you have a nice view of the city from the balcony. We met Vencislava upon check-in and she was very friendly. Definitely recommend her place.", "Great place in a nice suburb of Sofia, just 2 metro station away from the centre. Apartment super clean & comfy. Only drawback, we stayed one night and pay as much for the night as for the cleaning fee. All else was perfect ", "This was such an amazing appartement for a couple. The large bed, the spacey living room, the great shower, and that perfect Nespresso machine! Great location in a rather modern area and being withing less than five minutes of a metro station. Coming here after every, rather busy and exhausting, day, felt like coming home.

The host was very nice and waited more than an hour just because our plane had delays. Wonderful welcome and the communication was always swift. Definitely recommend this Airbnb!", "I can only strongly recommend Vencislava's flat. Top notch both location and conditions. Would definitely stay there again!!!", "The apartment is bright and very close to the metro stop. It was comfortable for a short stay. ", "Met Vencislava's upon arrival she was lovely and filled us with information on where she would recommend, her place was lovely and clean. Close to restaurants and the metro was only a few minutes walk away so commuting was easy. Thank you again :) ", "Nice flat, a great size for two people. Very close to metro which is just a couple of stops into town. Alternatively can take the nice walk through the park!", "This is a lovely place with a great view from the balcony, clean , well equipped,  quiet and very close to the grocery store and metro station. It is located in one of the best areas in Sofia and is very close to the center of the city. We will stay there again. Vencislava is a great host.", "The place is nice and quiet with a small balcony.  Perfect for solo or couple.  Love the coffee maker that I can make my own cappuccino every morning.  Location is just outside the city center so commuting to all the tourist sights are very easy.  Love the park that is only few minutes away where I can go for a run.  Overall it is a great value.", "Beautiful apartment right next to the metro station equipped with everything needed for a visit. The balcony was a welcome bonus for early morning coffee. 

Vencislava was attentive and made sure I was comfortable and had everything I needed. Couldn't ask for a better host or apartment for a trip to this beautiful city. ", "Enjoyed our stay at Vencislava's apartment (and in Sofia in general) ! Great place with everything one's need, clean and cosy, convenient as well as the metro is two minutes walk away from it! Vencislava was really kind and was here to welcome us and explain everything we needed to know concerning the apartment, she also was accommodating (we wanted to stay one more night at her place and she made the arrangement right away) which made our trip even more pleasant !

Recommending it if you plan to stay in Sofia :)", "This apartment is very bright, clean and comfortable.  My wife and I spent two nights here and were very happy with the place.  The communication is very good.  Very accessible to great restaurants as well as the metro. We had to get to the airport first thing in the morning, and by car, it was very easy and direct.  ", "Nice and tidy studio with excellent location. There are plenty of shops and restaurants in the area. The Joliot Curie metro station, which can bring you to the Airport or the City Centre, is just few minutes walk from the studio.
The host is very friendly and approachable. I highly recommend the studio.", "Really nice studio apartment, clean and tidy and very convenient location. 
Really good for the price.", "Great host who was really helpful with the check-in and accommodating to my request for a late check-out. Really great location less than 5 minutes away from the metro with brilliant food from the cafe across the road. The apartment was super clean, modern and spacious. ", "Really nice apartment in an excellent location. Communication was great and very flexible. Thank you", "This is the first time I'm using Airbnb, and my experience was great. The apartment is located in a prestige neighborhood, two minute walk to the metro station. There are also coffee shops and restaurants nearby. The apartment itself is very comfortable fun and modern decorated and equipped. Thanks Vencislava for the lovely hospitality.", "I would come back to this place again in future! ", "Thank you it was perfect ", "Good location and nice area. Apartment is clean, comfortable and well-equipped. Perfectly suits for couples and solo travelers for leisure or for work. The hostess is very kind and helpful. I recommend this place.", "Comfortable, compact and cosy apartment with proximity to public transport and eateries. Very clean and upscale area.", "The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.", "Absolutely lovely apartment that I would be happy to live in, I don't think you can give greater praise than that! In a lovely quiet neighbourhood, with a metro station, Lidl and a few coffee shops all within 2 mins walking. The Mall is a pleasant walk away which has all the shops you would ever need or want to goto. Due to the close proximity of the metro station it is ideal for travellers, with the central Sofia University station just 2 stops away, and only costs £0.60 (1.60лв) for a single trip.

I will be back in Sofia again before long, and I hope that this apartment will be available as it will be my first choice!", "Чудесно място с всички нужни неща и прекрасно разположение!", "Appartement top, encore mieux qu’en photo
Juste à côté d’une station de métro donc parfait pour découvrir Sofia", "Die beste Gastgeber, beste Wohnung und beste Preis! ", "Het stijlvolle appartement van Eran is een echte aanrader voor iedereen die voor een verblijf in Sofia op zoek is naar een fijne plek om te logeren.", "줄리오큐리역에서 4분 거리로 위치는 좋아요. 센터는 지하철 3정거장이면 가고, 공항 가기도 좋아요.
숙소 도착 30분 전에 연락을 해야 하는데 이부분이 불편해요.
숙박기간이 4일인데 수건이 1인당 2개만 있어서 불편했어요", "Η τοποθεσία είναι πολύ βολική, υπάρχουν αρκετά καταστήματα κοντά και η περιοχή είναι όμορφη. Το διαμέρισμα είναι πολύ συμπαθητικό, όπως φαίνεται και στις φωτογραφίες. Η καθαριότητα ήταν εξαιρετική.", "Bon emplacement près de la station de métro, proche commerce et restaurant. Appartement calme et propre.", "Een perfecte plek om te logeren met openbaar vervoer en winkels onder handbereik.", "Όλα ήταν μια χαρά. Κ ο χώρος κ επειδή είπαμε στον Eran  να έρθει πιο νωρίς γιατί κρυωναμε κ ήρθε.  Όπως είπα όλα ήταν μια χαρά κ ευχαριστούμε", "Het stijlvolle appartement van Eran bied een fijne verblijfplaats voor een bezoek aan de stad, gedurende een aantal dagen.
Wij vonden het een plezierige ervaring om er te mogen logeren.", "Prima verblijf, goede ligging en een geweldige kamer! Een heel fijn weekend gehad !", "Nagyom szivesen ajanlom mindenkinek. Minosegi lakas, nagyon jo helyen van, es profi a vendeglato.", "L'appartamento è molto spazioso e confortevole; la location è perfetta: vicinissima alla stazione metro, e a negozi di prima necessità, il quartiere è molto tranquillo. L'host è disponibile per qualsiasi richiesta o informazione.", "Το διαμέρισμα της Vinceslava και του Eran βρίσκεται ίσως στην καλύτερη περιοχή της Σόφιας (Iztok), Η στάση του μετρό είναι μερικά βήματα μακριά, καθώς και το Lidl.  Η περιοχή είναι γεμάτη στυλάτα καφέ, ωραία εστιατόρια, καταστήματα και απέχει μόλις 2 στάσεις μετρό από το κέντρο της Σόφιας (Serdika station). Το διαμέρισμα είναι αεράτο, φωτεινό και πεντακάθαρο. Οι οικοδεσπότες πολύ φιλικοί , διαθέσιμοι και εξυπηρετικοί. Προτείνω τον χώρο αυτό ανεπιφύλακτα", "Schöne, modern eingerichtete Wohnung in bester Lage. Die Metro ist nur einige Minuten entfernt und es gibt viele gute Lokale in der Umgebung.", "Mooi hygiënisch ruim appartement, goed uitgeruste keuken, goede wifi en airco en een vriendelijke host. Zeker een aanrader!", "Dit is een uitstekend appartement een paar minuten lopen van een metrostation die je in vijf minuten naar het centrum brengt.  Comfortabel en schoon appartement.  wij bevelen het aan voor iedereen die naar Sofia gaat.  eigenaresse bijzonder vriendelijk. this is a perfect appartement only a couple of minutes from a metrostation which will bring you in 5 minutes to the center.  Comfortable and clean appartment.  we recommend to hire this appartment for anybody considering to visit Sofia. onwer very friendly", "Appartement très propre, très bien décoré, et très bien équipé avec lave linge et climatisation. Supermarché Lidl a 2 pas et station de métro également. Mon séjour a été parfait.", "Wij hebben een prima verblijf gehad bij Vencislava in Sofia. Ze was vriendelijk en heeft ons uitgelegd hoe alles werkte.
De locatie en het verblijf was prima. Het zit niet heel dicht bij het centrum, maar omdat wij op doorreis waren was dat geen probleem. 
Het appartement zelf is gewoon prima! Voor een dag (of een paar dagen) is het fijn verblijven.", "Super Unterkunft mit perfekter Verbindung. Sauber und angenehm modern, nur empfehlenswert!", "Excelente apartamento con muy buena ubicación!! A 2 minutos caminando de la parada del metro en una zona muy segura! Vencislava es una gran persona, nos recomendó lugares donde ir y cosas que hacer! Definitivamente volvería a quedarme aquí!", "Toll eingerichtet . Gastgeberin sehr freundlich und zuverlässig .
2 Metrostationen mitten in der Stadt .
Einkaufsmöglichkeiten direkt in der Nähe ", "Buona posizione. Tra il centro e l aeroporto. Costa solo 1euro raggiungere in metro. Casa pulita.
Silenzioso", "Wer in einem sehr grünen Viertel mit passender Infrastruktur inmitten der Einheimischen wohnen will sollte diese Wohnung wählen. Sowohl das Haus als auch die Nachbarschaft sind ruhig und angenehm. Großer Supermarket in Gehnähe, ebenso kleine authentische Lokale, gut sortierte Apotheke etc..
Wohnung ist geschmackvoll eingerichtet-hat alles Notwendige, ist sehr hell mit kleinem Balkon und schöner Aussicht aus dem 6. Stock.", "Casa comodissima... arredamento nuovo... zona molto tranquilla.... CONSIGLIATO"]

reviews:
["Beautiful place in the centre of Sofia. Very clean,  cosy, with great location walkable to everything you need( reastaurants, cafes, night life). Very useful self check in system and paid parking next to the building.", "Modern, stylish, sleek and clean, spacious... beautiful place that we will definitely go back to! Superb check in/check out arrangements, perfect communication with the host. Loved it!", "Excellently located and very stylish apartment in the TOP centre of Sofia. Astonishing view, modern furniture, kind and responsive host. If you're wondering whether to book or not, wonder no more!", "Wonderful host, great location, super clean and modern, clear communication. Wonderful experience", "great views and nicest place in sofia", "Venelin was answering quickly to my booking request (I was already in Sofia).
the apartment is in great location, lot's of bars and restaurants around and short walking distance to all of Sofia site seeing.
the place was very hip, with great view.
the kitchen is fully equipped with coffee maker as well, there is a smart t.v. with Netflix, a.c. and heating, iron, umbrellas (for rainy day), hair dryer and even washing machine.
the key is in a code box for an easy check in.
the elevator is quite old and you need to close the grill door before your press the floor button.
great stay!!!", "Very nice Apartment! In the heart of Sofia! Only two things are not so good! First the elavator which is very very old and a strange smell in bathroom which come from inside. Venelin is very communicative guy! Thanks", "Very good place, so cozy to stay in it, the best thing was Netflix. It’s so worth it for the price and everything else", "Clean, tidy, well appointed in a great location.", "Location was great, apartment was clean and modern. Venelin was always avail when you needed him", "Great apartment and brilliant location. Would highly recommend. Venelin made check in very easy and gave great suggestions for transport and the local area.", "The place is in the center of town, yet still very quiet. The apartment is spacious and stylish. Communication with Venelin was super smooth. I'd come again any time!", "Great place, great location, great host.", "The apartment location is in the real center of sofia... and that's make everything much better. The place is clean and practical.", "Very comfortable apartment in the center of Sofia", "Top location, quick responses, clean, nice and fine!", "Very comfortable, and clean apartment, with great location.", "Amazing location in the heart of Sofia. We were able to walk everywhere. Venelin was a wonderful host and responded to our questions within minutes. We would stay there again.", "The appartement was nice and clean. Walking distance from center. Building is old but the appartement is very modern and has a great view!", "A clean and well styled apartment with excellent views. Was in a great location - walking distance from tourist sites but also many excellent cafes and restaurants. Would definitely recommend!", "Everyring was Beautiful : wiew, cleanliness, center of city, comfortable ...", "This apartment is great! The location is perfect—just steps to some of the coolest restaurants and bars in Sofia! Highly recommended!! ", "The apartment was very nice, and really well decorated. Everything was very clean. The location is perfect, walking distance to all the main sights. Venelin gave us clear instructions on how to enter the house and was very communicative the whole time. I would certainly come back to his apartment!", "Despite the horrible parking situation (no street parking, it costs about ~$20 USD to park next door), I had a great stay here. The view is fantastic, the amenities nice, and it's very stylish and well decorated. Very spacious and comfortable too. Only drawback was the very strict checkout time, but apart from that it was great. Venelin was very responsive and hospitable as well. ", "Perfect I ", "Venelin is a really good host and the flat looked exactly as in the pictures! The communication with him was superb, he was always really quick in answering all our questions, his instructions for check in were easy to follow and whenever we had an issue he was always super quick to respond and solve it. The flat is super stylish and the view is also awesome, with the living room overseeing Sofia's main cathedral and one of the bedrooms being in the other direction, towards Vitosha mountain. I will definitely recommend this place to anyone visiting Sofia, it's excellent value for money, the views are wonderful and the host does a very good job. ", "nice space near the center. the communication with venelin is perfect. good experiences ", "Great place! Would recommend.", "Beautiful appartment in the heart of Sofia. Everything was as in the pictures and the view is gorgeous. 

We had some issues with the keys (we couldnt get them to work) but this was taken care of rapidly by our host, who responded fast, was available to help and solve the problem. 

Overall I recommend this appartement.", "Great location, view and interior. Easy communication. Definitely recommendable, would come back!", "Clean, 2 bed room apartment , thoughtful decorated. Venelin’s place is perfectly located on the edge of Sofia’s city center in a neighborhood full of small restaurants, bars & shops. For those coming by car, 24h surveilled parking lots are probably your best choice at reasonable prices (30 LV per day). All in all a perfect place for your stay in Bulgaria’s capital!", "What a great flat! The panoramic views of the city and indeed amazing. We had a wonderful 3 night stay and I would definitely recommend this place to stay. Perfectly located to explore by foot. 
Thank you!
Caroline and Erika", "Good location. Very clean and stylish appartment ", "We stayed in the apartment for 3 nights. The location is great, close to many sightseeing spots.", "Great location, central, close to everything you need - stores, restaurants, nightlife, history, important Sofia sights. Venelin is a great host, extremely responsive and polite. There was a small issue with the shower drain and Venelin dealt with it in the most timely and efficient manner. The apartment was clean, comfortably furnished. And of course - great views of the cathedral on one side and Vitosha mountain on the other. Great stay overall.", "Great experience, I would recommend it!", "Location was fantastic", "realy nice place", "The apartment is clean and the photos are just exactly same as the real one.

We rent a car in Bulgaria and there was a car park just 1 mins near the apartment which was super convenience.


The apartment lift is so classic haha , it's like 40/50's age movie lift (but it is small approximate for 2 persons with a small luggage =P ) 

we love the apartment and recommend for who going with friends or family .", "Venelin's flat is centrally situated, comfortable walking distance from all the main sites in Sofia, and near a huge park. The apartment was spotlessly clean and comfortable, and exactly as described. We never actually met Venelin but he answered all queries very promptly via messages, and check-in and check-out was very smooth. We had a very pleasant three night stay and I would thoroughly recommend his apartment.", "Great apartment! Nicely decorated. Top location and Venelin is an excellent host. He responds quickly and gave us some usefull tips!", "Spacious clean and sunny appartment with an amazing view! Very convenient location, and  Venelin is extremely helpful and cooperative!", "The space was exactly as described, with a few extra personal touches. Venelin was exceptional at communicating, checking in with us every day to make sure we had everything we needed and that we were happy with the apartment. The location perfectly located in central Sofia, with lots of nice restaurants and bars. The elevator is out of order, so not ‘currently ‘ suitable for disabled people, but this was not s problem for us. I would highly recommend both Venelin as a host and this apartment.", "The Venelin’s place is great, clean, practical, center of the city, quite area. We enjoyed! 
Also Venelin ( even we did not meet in person) is great owner, sending messages and asking all the time if there is something he could provide as a help during our stay!
We would go again", "Venelin’s apartment was very nice with two double beds and a sofa bed, making it very comfortable for three people. 

Good selection of bars near by and a busy crowd at the weekend. Flat is modern and has good appliances. Nice view out to the cathedral also. 

Venelin responds very quickly and offers good insight on Sofia to help you get the most out of your stay. Would recommend.", "Venelin’s place was perfect for us. The apartment is modern and clean with great views of the city. The apartment is central and check in was very easy. Would stay here again!", "Communication and check in was excellent. Venelin's apartment is in a prime location in the centre, with a fantastic view, just like in the pictures, which are true to life. You have bars, restaurants, parks, cultural and historical sights, metro all within close walking distance. Apartment was at a good temperature, the shower is really good. Living room is great for relaxing in the comfortable couch. Kitchen space is lovely. Really nice, cosy bedrooms. Very pleased all around!", "Venelin‘s place was really really nice. It was just like in the images. It is located close to the city centre. Communication with Venelin was really easy. Everything was just perfect. Would recommend his place to anyone.", "Great stay - easy, clean, comfortable. Recommended!", "Grat place in Belgrado, well located, nice view, confortable.", "5 stay stay! The apartment is chic, clean and close to everything. My friend and I enjoyed 4 wonderful nights at Venelin’s beautiful home and it could not have been better! Self-check-in was very clear and easy, the apartment was exactly as advertised, and Venelin was the perfect host; communicative, friendly, with local tips and lightening fast responses! We couldn’t have been happier with our stay, highly recommend it to all!", "Even though the building looks very old, we loved everything about the apartment!!! Super clean, right in the centre of Sofia and in a safe neighbourhood!  The apartment was also well-heated, elegantly decorated and the view was amazing. Numerous places to eat and drink within walking distance and supermarkets and sightseeing as well. Venelin was a very polite host and eager to help us answering fast in any upcoming questions. We definitely recommend this place!!!", "We had a fantastic time at Vanelin place.
The place is well kept, spacious, comfy.
The location is unbeatable and communication with Vanelin was quick.
Thank you for having us!", "This is a fantastic place, with city views one side, and Mt Vitosha (and more city) the other. It's very comfortable and spacious and generally well-appointed, with two separate bedrooms (rather than a sofa bed in another room masquerading as a bedroom). Venelin was very quick to respond to questions, and check-in and -out was very easy. The location is very central, ideal for local bars and restaurants and most central sights, and it's pretty quiet given that it's on a main road. Excellent value.", "Very nice apartment! Clean and stylish with a great view from both sides. Would stay again. It was a pleasure dealing with Venelin! ", "A great base to explore the city, coupled with a really nice view to wake up to everyday. Venelin was a great host and made us feel very welcome. There was an issue with the toilet which he dealt with immediately so as to not hamper our stay.", "Everything was very nice. Fast check in and ch class out, everything was thought before we had any question. Apartments are in a very good condition. Place is cozy and in the center.", "Great place to stay with good food/party/sightseeing locations around. Place is clean & the view is amazing!", "Very nice, cozy and sunny flat. With an amazing view in two sides of the city. In a very exeptional location at the center of the city.", "It couldn't be better. Top location, cosy, stylish, warm and clean apartment. Great communication with the host. Highly recommended!", "Perfect flat, great decoration, clear instruction, very close to night life and city center 
Perfect :)", "Great cozy apartment. The view is wonderful. Very well decorated apartment, good heating for winter. The elevator up is pretty old school but works fine! 

Alexander Nevsky cathedral is a short walk away, and there are good restaurants, bars and supermarkets all around the apartment (try Lavanda!). 

Venelin was very responsive and communicated well. 

Overall great experience!", "Beautiful flat in town center.

Loved it :)", "This apartment has a great view of the city and is in a perfect location. The instructions for how to access apartment were very clear and contained photos, however we had issues with check in because the lockbox had been tampered with. After calling the emergency number, someone came and let us in. Also, hot water was out for a period, but it was due to a problem with the central heating system for the city center. Venelin was quick to reply to this issue. He also offered information about Sofia and local restaurant recommendations.", "A really comfortable apartment and in a fantastic location. Communication and check in was seamless.", "Great place to stay, great view and easy walk to bars and restaurants.", "Excellent location, lovely apartment which looks just like the pictures. The only difficulty was we couldn’t open the lock box to get the keys but we called the emergency number on the instructions and help cane quickly.", "Absolutely fantastic location, absolutely everything within walking distance apart from the mountain which is understandable. Download the my taxi app for unbelievably cheap taxis. 

The Sofia guides in the apartment and sent online by Venelin really give you a good indication of what to do. Sleeping arrangements and great, comfortable and easy.

Can't recommend this enough!", "Great place and a fantastic location", "Great place, great location.", "Venelin's flat was perfect:  super location, perfectly appointed and very comfortable. Venelin made the communication and logistics simple. I would highly recommend.", "Everything perfect, friendly and responsive. The appt was well equipped and the view was breathtaking. Location directly in the center, perfect.", "The apartment is really cute, cosy, but big enough to leave space for privacy as there are two separate rooms. The master bedroom has an incredible comfy bed! Everything is spotless clean. It's well equipped so you have everything you'll need to make your stay as comfortable as possible. The apt is right in the city centre so everything's in walking distance. The communication was very smooth. In total I had a wonderful time and can highly recommend the apt. Thanks for making me have such a memorable time!", "The apartment is close to the city Centre and it is a really beautiful place.", "I'm so glad we picked the BEST apartment in Sofia. It is as beautiful as the pictures show. The view is fantastic, especially late at night with only the dome of the cathedral lit up. Couldn't find a better location for moving around the city.
We had all the comforts necessary to make our stay at the apartment enjoyable.
I would higly recommend Venelin's apartment, don't even consider staying anywhere else.", "Great located apartment in the center of everything. Super host, fresh and secure apartment, great guide for the apartment, outdoor box for easy key handling.", "The host and co-host are very nice and willing to help with anything at any time of the day. The place is very clean, modern and location is perfect. I strongly reccommend it!", "The apartment is in a great location and just as mentioned in the pictures. Clean and tidy. Compact yet spacious...bright and lively. The only problem was the old lift of the building which broke down a couple of times ...everything else was just perfect. 

Venelin is a great host and very very helpful. Will surely recommend this to everyone visiting Sofia.", "Beautiful home....perfect to visit Sofia....Venelin is Gret.", "The apartment was exactly as described, very central, well equipped kitchen and very clean . Lovely bedrooms and most mod cons (excluding a microwave). The apartment however is on the top floor and the elevator is very old and small so this might be an access issue for someone of a larger size/ disabled. One issue I had was that I was unable to close the metal shutters of the windows in the larger bedroom which hindered my ability to sleep in . I thoroughly enjoyed my stay and would recommend to a friend if they were visiting Sofia . ", "Венелин е от хората, предлагащи апартаменти под наем, за които всеки наемащ си мечтае. Лично нямаше нужда да се срещаме, защото кореспонденцията ни вървеше коректно, бързо, точно и детайно. Имах силното усещане, че всичко по престоя ми ще премине точно така както се очертаваше да премине - спокойно и без стрес. Апартаментът е уютен, чист, декориран с внимание към детайлите и с прекрасен изглед от хола. Усещането е за ДОМ и СИГУРНОСТ. По време на престоя си нямах нужда от съдействие от страна на Венелин, но имах неговото уверение, че при нужда той или негов приятел ще бъдат на мое разположение по най-бързия начин. Локацията е централна, удобна, в район с най-приятните заведения, кафенета, магазинчета и галерии в София.

Venelin is a host to dream for. There was no need to meet the host in person as the communication was great, with quick responses, very helpful and detailed. I had the feeling since arranging the booking that my stay would go as planned - relaxing and stress-free. The apartment itself is very cozy, clean, secure, decorated to the smallest detail and has an amazing view from the living room. You will feel at home and safe too! During my stay, I had no need to contact Venelin, but he ensured me that I could rely on him (or his friend) at any given time for whatever the reason. The location is in the heart of Sofia, convenient, in a district full of the nicest coffeeshops, restaurants, shops, galleries, etc. (and sightseeings for the tourists - Venelin had provided also a full set of guides.)
Definitely worth the money:)", "Amazing flat right in the center of Sofia.
Comfortable beds, big rooms (especially one), ac and nice shower. Highly recommended!", "Venelin is a fantastic host, his communication was excellent and when we arrived he was there to make sure we have everything we need. He left us his phone number in case we need anything. Checking out was easy, because there was a lock box downstairs where we left the keys.
Outstanding location and beautiful view!!!
The apartment is close to everything you need, great restaurants, bars and coffee shops. Top location, the best one if you want to explore Sofia!!!
The apartment was very clean, the beds very comfy, perfect size bathroom and fully stack kitchen. Fast Wifi and cable TV.
Definitely a place we want to come back when visit Sofia again.

 
", "Alloggio perfetto: pulito, del tutto funzionale e gradevole esteticamente per passare qualche giorno anche in 5 persone. Posizione ideale per conoscere la Capitale Sofia. Da consigliare senza riserve.
Maurizio ", "Un alojamiento muy bonito y muy céntrico , muy acogedor.
Lo recomiendo ", "Vi hade en fantastisk vistelse i Sofia, och tack vore Venelins lägenhet blev det ännu bättre. En ren, modern och fin lägenhet med bekväma sängar och soffa, mysigt kök och topp-läge. 
Venelin var mycket hjälpsam och svarade snabbt på meddelanden. 
Lägenheten är nära affärer, barer och parker mitt i stan, och det är massor att göra och se inom gå-avstånd. 
Lägenheten liknar bilderna och beskrivningen, och passade våra behov.", "El apartamento es muy lindo, limpio y muy bien ubicado. La zona es agradable, segura y con amigables vecinos incluidos. Adoré estar allí por unos días con mi familia.", "O apartamento encontra-se no setimo andar, acessivel atraves de um pequeno elevador muito velho e em  mau estado de conservaçao. Nao é piossivel acesso de cadeira de rodas.", "Appartement bien situé avec vue imprenable sur la capitale.", "Reizvolle Wohnung mit wunderschönem Ausblick in zwei Richtungen. Attraktive Lage in lebhaftem Quartier. Gastgeber reagiert sehr schnell bei Unklarheiten.", "Erg leuke plek met mooi uitzicht. Ziet er mooi en verzorgt uit. Alle bezichtingen waren binnen loopafstand.", "Un appartement très propre et mignon en plein centre ville. La vue sur les toits de la capitale est très appréciable. La communication avec Venelin est facile et de grand service. Je vous le recommande. Pour ma part je retournerai avec plaisir.", "A casa do Venelin é exactamente como descrita no anúncio. 
Tinha tudo o que precisei para uma estadia de 5 dias e está muito bem decorada. As camas são confortáveis. E tem mesmo a melhor vista de Sofia!!!
A localização é excelente, é possivel ir a pé para as principais atrações da cidade e tem vários restaurantes e cafés a poucos metros.
O contacto com o Venelin foi simples, assim como o check-in e o check-out. 
O Venelin deixou-nos alguns guias da cidade e excelentes sugestões. 
Um espaço onde certamente voltaria a ficar.", "Venelin était un super host ! Son petit guide nous a beaucoup servi et nous a permis de très bien manger. L'appartement est super bien placé, nous permettant de nous déplacer principalement à pied. Je recommande vivement !  ", "Die Wohnung ist einfach TOP!
Sie ist super neu (ich war bestimmt der erste Gast) und sauber. Sie liegt zentral und dank dessen, dass sie im 7. Stock liegt, sehr ruhig. Es gibt einen Aufzug (Adventure Aufzug ;-) ), so dass man mühelos hochkommt.
Einziges Manko wäre, dass die Wohnung keinen Schrank bietet, aber das war für mich OK.
Gerne wieder!"]
