reviews:
["You will find clean linen and bathroom well stocked. Check in is easy but make sure you print the location before you arrive in Sofia or use (Hidden by Airbnb) maps. After the first time it was easy to find it. Rooms are big and clean. We did not do any cooking but it has all the necessary kitchen appliances should you feel like dining at ‘home’.

Kaloyan and vasya were great hosts and Kaloyan making all the communications with us.

The outside areas is a bit run down but relatively safe.", "Perfect location to explore sofia by foot. We had an issue with the heating since it didn't work and we felt bit cold. However, Vasya told us that it is because of the central heating in the whole city and he brought us quickly a heater which helped a lot. Thanks for your quick responses we had a good time in Sofia!", "Very comfortable and spacious space. Great location. Close to metro, tram, grocery store, all the sights. Abundant hot water. Vasaya was very responsive. Would highly recommend.", "Vasya and Kaloya have been great hosts, very quick to help with anything we have asked. The place is just fab - bright, spacious and cosy, I wish I could take it to London. I also must say that it was sparkling clean. Superb location! We will definitely come back.", "Clean place in a decent location, I love the bedrooms since proper sleep is easy to get in there.

The wifi device is very cheap and didn't provide working internet half the time.", "Great location, spacious apartment, clean and new. Hosts are great and providing local tips and answering any questions during your stay, including where to leave luggage at check-in. Highly recommend.", "Checking in went quite easy. There is a box near the front door and with a code you can get the frontdoor key. The appartment is spacious, and has everything you need. I stayed here with a friend, we both had our own bathroom en bedroom. So it's great value for your money. The appartment is close to a main road and construction site, so there can be some noise at night,", "Brilliant apartment, fully renovated, convenient location, excellent service.", "Vasya’s place is a clean and large central place to stay. I would stay there again!", "Clean, quiet and A/C cooled off the place properly, building itself, especially entrance is not great looking but apartment itself is clean, nice and quiet", "The appartment is amazing! We enjoyed very much the location, the style... thank u!", "The place is amazing. Spacious, clean, fully equiped, quiet building ideal for 4-6 people. It's also really close to the city centre, just 10 minutes walking. ", "Vasya's apartment is centrally located, within a short 10 minute walk of Vitosha boulevard - the main drag of Sofia with lots of restaurants and sights nearby. The space is beautifully decorated and immaculately clean. Check-in was about as simple as it can be and Vasya's co-host Kaloyan sent out detailed check-in instructions in advance to make sure there is no confusion. Communication with the host was through Kaloyan and it was seamless. One very small issue was that only one of the two bathrooms had soap and even then it was one very small bar. However, given our short stay this wasn't a major problem and did not affect my enjoyment of the apartment and the city. I would definitely stay here again on my next visit in Sofia!", "The place worked well for are family of four, a lot of good restaurants within walking distance from apt. ", "Vasya’s place was amazing!!!!", "This is a bright, spacious, and well-located apartmnet in Sofia. Check-in was smooth and communication was good.  I would definitely stay here again.", "Our stay at Vasya apartment was perfect !
Thanks again !", "A spacious and clean apartment a 10 minute walk from the centre of town", "Comfortable, convenient apartment in Sofia. Great space for four guests with two bathrooms and big bedrooms. Well equipped kitchen which came in very handy.", "The apartment is in a very good location close to all the main tourist spots in Sofia. It’s a large space with lovely decoration and comfortable. The communication with the host is fast and the check in process is really easy and fast. I think this is perfect place to stay in Sofia.", "It is a nice apartment and near to the city Center, within 10 minutes walk and you will have everything. Thanks so much.", "Clean apartment with good amenities. Washing machine comes with detergent was a plus when traveling with kids. Only thing I was put off when i saw the street with burnt store on ground level next to the entrance door. ", "great location and very spacious apartment! easy check in/out", "Lovely, lovely apartment. Very spacious, newly decorated, spotlessly clean and great location. The street outside or the building might not say much but the place is really beautiful. Very good internet also (for me it's very important). Vasya and Kaloyan responded immediately and were very polite.
I would definitely recomment this place and would be very happy to visit again.", "Everything is perfect, will definitely stay there again.
Highly recommended!!", "Top appartment, situated only 5-10 walking minutes from the heard of Sofia. We could visit easily the center by foot. 
The apparment is very cosy, bright and clean and has all facilities you can wish for a city trip. 
You can find only couple of steps from the flat a very good Restaurant, "Balito", you should try the fish or local food there. There is as well next to the location a small food store with local specialities and 2 min walk from there a counter window where you can buy "banitchka" for breakfast...this is the bulgarian pastry stuffed with feta cheese :-)
Yes, Vasya's flat is definitively a perfect location in Sofia. We noted it well for our next trip. 
And last but not least: Vasya and Kaloian are very advertent hosts, very helpful and kind. Very communicative too.", "Very good location, big apartment. A renovated place with very good facilities. Highly recommended.", "Myself and two of my friends staying in this lovely apartment for 3 nights and it was absolutely brilliant.  It was a pleasure returning to the apartment after we'd been out sight-seeing every day, largely down to how stylish and clean it was. A great place to stay and I will definitely recommend it to anyone who is thinking of going to Sofia. The city is lovely too - a great capital to visit!", "Good position..nice (Website hidden by Airbnb) complains", "This flat was very well positioned, a few hundreds meter from the city centre. The flat is fantastic, well kept and decorated. The host were great too. Highly recommended.", "Lovely apartment, centrally located, large and clean. Perfect to visit Sofia, warmly recommended.", "Great place and great hosts!", "Great place to stay with lots of space and perfect furnishings.  The inside of the apartment is a great space to come back to after a long day out in the town; easy to relax in and very comfortable.  Host was in constant contact and very helpful.  Would highly recommend this place to travelers headed to Sofia.", "Good place", "great location and very responsive host. no micro wave, and not perfectly clean toilet in an other wise very clean place. we enjoyed very much", "Great house in a excellent location. All good", "You better bring your own towers and toilets papers.
Bad service", "It’s a great apartment and Vasya is a nice host. She helped us wherever she could...
And the location of the apartment is very good, close to the city centre", "Vasya’s place was exactly as pictured and the perfect place for our stay in Bulgaria. Spacious, cozy and clean. Plus Vasya is an excellent host that answered every question and doubt. Will definitely stay there again when we return to Bulgaria. Thanks Vasya!!!", "Great host! Responds quickly.
Apartment is modern and very clean. Best place for a city trip in lovely Sofia", "Good apparent with 2 bedrooms and a lot of space. Very good location.", "The apartment was exactly as described in the pictures. 
Very clean, brilliant and cute.
Rooms are large and confortable.
Location is 10 mins walking  from the city center and I had never had to take a taxy to go around. 
The self check in and self check out were perfect and allowed top flexibility.", "Nicely decorated, spacious and comfortable apartment, great value for money. Smooth check-in and check-out process. Excellent location - 5 min by foot from Vitosha bld. and Sveta Nedelya square. We really enjoyed staying at Vasya's place.", "Vasya's flat in Sofia is really great. There is a lot of space (we were 5 and everything was OK). Furniture is really new and everything has been arranged with a very nice taste.
Downtown is just 10 min walk away, metro station is close and finding the place is very easy.
Vasya was very kind and full of precious suggestions, though we did not have the chance to meet her.", "I was pleased to stay at Vasya's place. Huge space, very clean and warm with every detail though of. I'm a very demanding customer when I travel on business and this was beyond my expectations. Communication was also very smooth and Vasya responded immediately to all my requests.", "Good", "Assenza sapone e shampoo nei bagni", "Super appartement ! 
Très proche du centre-ville et de ces nombreux commerces. Un véritable régal.", "Mooi netjes in orde appartement.
Dichtbij het centrum.
Kijk goed de parkeerregels in Sofia na.", "Appartamento nuovo, centrale, ben arredato, pulito e confortevole. I nostri ospiti sono stati ineccepibili, sempre gentili e disponibili. Il nostro soggiorno a Sofia, città meravigliosa, è stato grandioso anche grazie alla nostra sistemazione.", "pasamos tres días estupendos en el departamento de Vasya. Todo de primera y en excelente estado. la ubicación es buena y permite recorrer toda la parte histórica de la ciudad sin que sea necesario transporte alguno. lo recomendaría sin dudarlo a cualquier huésped que desee visitar Sofía.", "Zentrale Lage und unkomplizierte Vermieter", "L' appartamento è perfetto ed è esattamente come appare nelle fotografie.
Il caseggiato e in particolare l'isolato non è bellissimo, il portone d'ingresso e le parti comuni andrebbero ripulite e rinfrestate un po'.
Quando si entra in casa, cambia tutto. Pulito e perfetto. Funziona tutto ed è davvero spaziosa e comoda per quattro persone.
La nostra vacanza è stata perfetta anche grazie all'alloggiamento ineccepibile.", "Das Appartement war sehr gut ausgestattet und entsprach komplett unseren Vorstellungen. Vasiya hatte alles gut organisiert.", "Appartement très bien situé et exactement comme sur les photos!
Vasya est très réactive et la communication facile!
Une adresse à retenir à Sofia.", "Väldigt fint och rent, nära till centrum."]

reviews:

Yory was a warm, kind and thoughtful host, she provided us with valuable information for our stay and was always available if we needed anything. 

The apartment is located very close to the metro line and only a stop away from the main area of Sofia,  as well as easy access from the bus/train/airport. It walking distance to shops, cafes and restaurants. It had everything we needed, we loved our stay!", "Very hospitable!", "Yory is an excellent host. She is very quick in responding and gives a lot of information. We arrived quite late and she was very flexible. Good value for the money.", "The place is very conveniently located, just on the edge of city center, yet in a more quiet residential part. It's a really good value, for one person the price is quite OK, for two persons a bargain, yet still comfortable.

Regarding cleanliness, I saw some negative comments which initially made me sceptical, but when I came the apt was thoroughly cleaned and smelled almost aseptic. Something that appeared as stains were in fact cosmetic blemishes due to the age of some furniture, nothing really special.

The place is more suited to younger folks because there's no elevator in the building, so you do have to climb several floors up.

Yory is a very kind and responsive host, it was a pleasure communicating with her. As long as the apt occupancy allowed her, she was very flexible with check-in and check-out time. 

In the end, given the value and correctness of the offer, as well as Yory's amazing hospitality, I would definitely recommend the place for those who want to save money and still have a solid level of service for the value.", "Yory is a really sweet charming lady who really helped us have an amazing time in Sofia. The appartment is really great we had everything we needed!", "Yory was very nice and helpful but the accommodation may be better", "Great host and amazing lady. Top notch hospitality.", "Wonderful place in a quiet area, not too far from the city center. Yory is a wonderful host who is always ready to help or give tips. Would really recommend this place.", "Yory was a fantastic host and the location is very central with plenty of shops and restaurants a stone’s throw from the studio flat. Yory’s communication was excellent and check in was very smooth. She is a kind and friendly host who genuinely loves looking after people.

The bathroom had a leaky toilet, mouldy shower curtain and a bad smell but the rest of the studio was clean and tidy. The kitchen was great and the coffee machine was ace.

On the second night we were playing music very quietly and received a message from Yory that her neighbours were complaining about the noise. We were playing music from an iPhone speaker, it wasn’t loud at all. Just something to be aware of if you stay, that she has very sensitive neighbours.

It is outstanding value for money and we would stay again definitely. Thank you Yory for a lovely stay.", "The host is so nice. Such a sweet lady and the place is also pretty nice but it's right next to a construction place and since the walls are also very thin it was very annoying. Also the bathroom is totally soaked 10 min after taking a shower. Floor is totally wet. Stuff in the kitchen and around is pretty old but usable. Me and my girl did could leave our luggage in their appartement when we checked out till late in the evening. That was very nice", "A pleasant surprise!  Yory's place is big savings and value place to stay...yet is very nice and especially close to shops, restaurants etc (within 2min walking distance). First, to get to Yory's studio, I can highly recommend the taxi app called "TaxiMe". There is no Uber in Bulgaria, but this taxi app works super and is available for android (think iPhone too). Just message Yory an eta from the airport or train station, so she can meet you and show the room. Just be prepared for I think is 6-floors walk-up the stairwell and bring smartphone  with flashlight for coming home at night (there is a hallway light now on top floor)...just you may need some kind of flashlight to climb up the stairs. I recommend and will stay again!", "The flat is in a fabulous location. It's safe and Yory is a lovely host. She plans to renovate the apartment which will be lovely. I've been to Sofia many times but this is the first time I've merely wandered to the best places so easily. We went together one afternoon and Yory introduced me to", "I thoroughly enjoyed my time in Yory’s place. What I liked especially was the great location with such easy access into town and very conveniently located a short walk away from a metro station. Also, a quick bus ride will take you to Studentski Grad which is a really vibrant student area full of bars and clubs. The studio flat is on the 4th floor and quite spacious so it doesn’t feel cramped or anything. Plenty of room for baggage and stuff. ", "I spent 2ish weeks in the studio which easily felt like my own little home. The space feels homey and is perfectly located about 10ish minutes from the center. Yory was extremely helpful with everything. I had a lovely stay!
", "Great place for great price. Yori was really responsive, helpful and friendly!", "I'm very satisfied about my being at Yory's place. Apartment is very cosy, clean and nice and there is all you need. Strongly recommend!

I leave the best for the last: Yory is an exceptional host. She is extremely helpful, and quickly responds any request and kindly offers her advice. She provided directions to places I needed to go (no (Hidden by Airbnb) maps in Bulgaria), recs for places to eat, and even helped me book accomodations at Rila monastery for the day after (called them in the morning). Go to the local restaurant she recommends to get an authentic Bulgarian meal without the cost of a tourist trap. Her studio is a good size and well furnished. The bed is comfy! There is also a washer, which is very convenient. 5 minutes from Metro and she lives next to a mall and Thai massage (10 min). I had an early morning flight, and I asked Yory whether she could order a taxi for me because I had no idea how to do it in Bulgaria.  She of course did not hesitate and then even messaged me right before the taxi arrived at 3am to give me information about the taxi itself.  Thank you, Yory!  ", "Clean, great location, kind host, and  with a restaurant and 24/7 corner store in front. Walkable distance to the city center and cheap cab ride from airport. ", "The studio is very near to European Union Metro station (two stops from the center), a lot of good restaurants, a big shopping center with a bank inside (useful to change your money), a supermarket all-nighter. We had a great time and would definitely go to her apartment again next time we are in Sofia. Thanks again Yori from both of us", "The studio is close to the center, you can reach it by foot in about 15 min or you can take the metro for 2 stops. It is in a strategic position, nearby there are pharmacy, restaurants, the mall with a supermarket, bar, park. The kitchen is equipped and you can also cook something. It was a little bit cold, the heater wasn't enought for the entire studio but it depends on the temperature particularly low in that days. Yory is very lovely and cozy, punctual and precise in Communications and she gave us information about the city and public transports. Even if we were welcomed by her husband when she came back to Sofia she write us to personally know each other, she is really friendly! I suggest her to everyone!", "Yory's apartment was ideal for me. Cozy with a nice view and easy access to public transit and nice restaurants and shops within a 1 minute walk. I especially loved the rain shower! I'd definitely stay again.", "We enjoyed ower  stay 
", "Yori was a very nice and appreciative host. She gave her best to make our stay as nice as possible. We really enjoyed the 24h supermarket on the other side of the street :D the location was perfect for us, very central and calm. We would recommend her studio definitly :)", "Yory is the best host you could possibly hope to have. She is warm, friendly, generous, accommodating, helpful, great communicator, friendly and very sociable. I could tell that she would be happy to give you privacy if you are not the sociable type. I took Yory to a concert while I was in Sofia and we had a great time. We have become friends and will meet in London.
The studio is excellent value for money and walking distance to the Metro, shopping mall, supermarket, cafes, coffee shop, 24hour convenience store, restaurants, the city centre and the National Palace of Culture. The taxi to the airport from Yory's was 11 Bulgarian Lev - astounding value! 
I fully recommend staying here as it has everything that you need. 
The Wi-Fi is excellent, also. Do it! 
", "Yory is a great host and we enjoyed our staying there a lot. very comfortable accommodation and hospitality in budget!! She is also a great person.", "The place is really clean, lovely and quite.  You can find anything you need and the host is amazing! ", "She gave me the information i needed for the city and helped me to move around. She was very friendly. The room was very warm and cozy! I will definitely visit again. ", "Yory was a great host, We loved to stay at her place - clean and tidy studio. We had everything that we need. 
Located very close to city center, nearby metro station and mall. Neighborhood is quite and safe.
Definitely recommended
Gints and Alina 
 ", "Yory is really kind and helpful. She was very welcoming! The apartment is really cosy and clean. I enjoyed staying there and I would really recommend this apartment to anybody looking for a place to sleep in Sofia. The bed is comfortable and big enough for two people. The bathroom is really clean as well. I felt overall really comfortable in this apartment. ", "I would highly recommend booking to stay at this airbnb, the studio apartment is well situated with amenities close by and is only a short distance from the metro station. Yory is a fantastic host, extremely hospitable and welcoming, so much so I didn't want to leave!", "Comfortable and cozy place.", "Staying at Yory's studio was so nice. We were so tired after a difficult 2 day journey from Romania and this stay was exactly what we needed. Everything was clean and tidy, and Yory was very pleasant and accommodating. Thanks Yory! ", "Yory's place is very well located in Sofia, very close to the subway station. The flat is small but cosy, perfect for a couple. Yory's informations about Sofia were very useful. Just one detail: the bed is a little bit small for 2... :) ", "Yory is a very nice and helpful host. She met us in the metro entrance to explain us the right way to the apartment, she booked our taxi when we have left the place for the airport. So, it makes the trip easier thanks to her. Then, Yory's studio has a perfect location : it takes 10 minutes walking to reach the downtown and the area is interesting as well (restaurants, shops, mall, etc.). 
The apartment is enough for 2. It is very quiet and confortable so we did sleep very well ! We didn't try to cook but you can manage preparing something simple with the equipment you'll find there. To conclude, it's a really good value for money ! Even if this place doesn't look as modern as what we could think from the photos. Thanks for everything :). :) ", "Nice little place, short walk to the metro and the whole of Sofia is just a few minutes away", "Nice apartment, big enough for two persons. Host was really amazing! You can ask anything, tips about Sofia or if you need anything in the studio, Yory helps right away! It made the trip unforgettable. I would recommend it to everyone. The studio is located conveniently, close to local stores and restaurants, a lot cheaper than in central Sofia. Still it's just two metro stops away! We had a lovely time, thanks Yory! You're wonderful :)", "Nice apartment close to the metro. Yori is a very sweet woman who is ready to help you no matter what!", "nice place to stay, cleen and a good nighbourhood", "Yory's studio is ten minutes from the city center by walking and is in a quiet neighborhood. The studio is on top of a 5 or 6 story building without an elevator, so if you have a lot of luggage, it will be tough getting everything up and down. If you're a backpacker in need of a place to stay, this is a great place. The wifi is fast, bathroom is clean, and it's got a workable kitchen for a few days. The pipes in this building seem to be old, so the water came out not perfectly transparent. I did buy bottled water for my entire stay, although the shower and the bathroom sink were better. The tap water in Sofia is nice, so this particular building was an exception.", "My stay was short, so honestly didnt have time to spend in the apartment, but it was very cozy. U have everything that u need to operate inside, especially kitchen was fully equipped 

Very close to the metro station what is convenient.
Also great communication with an owner 

", "Yory was a very fine host if there was anything I needed all I had to do was ask and the information was provided. The area of the apartment was very convenient you literally walk out the door turn left and there was a pharmacy, an off-license and a cafe. If you were going out for the day the metro was literally 2 minutes away right next t a shopping centre. The apartment was cosy and had everything needed, including a washing machine. A great place!", "My girlfriend and I stayed this summer at Yory's place for two nights. We were supposed to meet in the early evening, but our flight had 5 hours delay. Yory was very friendly and said that it was not a problem to meet us at night. When we arrived, Yory was waiting in front of the building for us to arrive with the taxi. She showed us the house and was really sweet. There was a bottle of water and she even brought us food. The studio is clean and everything that you need is there. We enjoyed our stay and recommend Yory since she is a friendly and good host.", "Yory was very helpful: offering suggestions of areas around Sofia, Bulgaria that we might enjoy. The space was clean, cozy, and had useful amenities provided. To our lovely host: thank you for our pleasant stay! ", "Yory was a very welcoming host and the studio apartment was great. We stayed one night after arriving on a late flight and it was perfect. ", "Amazing host, very friendly and accommodating,  flat is great and in a perfect location, well worth the money!", "Yori’s studio is on excellent location, near to NDK and Vitosha street.
The studio is clean bright and comfortable, and Yori is very pleasant person.
All the best!

", "I really enjoyed my stay at Yory's apartment. It's newly renovated and nice, and Yory provided absolutely everything I could've needed for my short stay. She's a very kind and gracious host. I'd only note that it's a bit of a climb to the top floor, which wasn't a problem for me but may be for others. I'd highly recommend for anyone looking for an affordable, comfortable, clean place to stay in Sofia.", "I stayed here for a month and it was perfect. Yory was a great host, friendly, responsive and helped me out with everything I needed. Place is quiet, close to grocery stores, and subway. Bed is comfy and everything worked without problems. Loved staying here!", "Yory was a great host, very friendly and accommodative. The studio was clean and had everything I needed. The bed was comfortable and the place was quiet to sleep. I would definitely enquire to stay again on my next visit to Sofia. Thank you Yory!", "yory is very sweet and she made me feel at home during my stay in sofia. the apartment is great. it is clean, comfortable and conveniently located. i highly recommend this property. thanks yory!   ", "I arrived quite late and Yory welcomed me which of course was really useful. The studio is as described and has everything you may need for a short stay. It is literally across the street from betahaus and you can also walk or take the subway into the city center very easily.
I enjoyed staying in the area and had a great time in Sofia.

Chris", "Felt like i was the first person to stay at this place, unfortunately some issues came with that.

There was no hot or warm water most of the days because the small boiler broke and they could not repair or replace it in time.
The ventilation over the cooking stove did not work, so your place would smell of the food you cooked.
There is only 1 small frying pan and 1 small pot. This is not enough to cook a proper meal.
The toilette is prone to get clogged.

It would be a really nice place if they would fix these things.", "The apartment is small and cozy, but had everything I needed: small kitchen, a desk, a comfy bed and even a washing machine. It's perfect for remote workers, since one of Sofias co-working spaces (betahaus). NDK, the city center and also some nice clubs and bars are in walking distance. And Yory is an amazing host! I'd love to stay at her place again. ", "Casa di Yory è in una zona residenziale della città, molto comoda per chi vuole vivere le attrazioni del centro ma anche un momento lontano dallo stress turistico; ben collegata con la metro, il centro è raggiungibile anche a piedi. Parchi nei dintorni meravigliosi, Yory è disponibile ad aiutare con suggerimenti su luoghi da visitare o ristoranti tipici. Parlando perfettamente inglese, la comunicazione è veloce e scorrevole. Consigliatissimo per un we!", "Habe mich sehr wohl gefühlt und würde gerne wieder mal vorbeikommen. Sehr netter Gastgeber Yory.", "Ce Airbnb est l'un des meilleurs que j'ai pu essayer. L'appartement est propre, Yory est très réactive et réellement à l'écoute. La cuisine permet de tous faire avec 2 plaques et un four traditionnel ! Mais l'appartement est suffisamment près du centre pour commander à manger (FoodPanda). Merci Yory, je reviendrai", "친절하고 빠른 응답. 
게스트를 위한다는 느낌을 많이 받은 편안하고 좋았던 숙소", "Были одну ночь. Самолёт задержали, прилетели поздно ночью. Спасибо большое Юрию, он нас ждал, не смотря на позднее время. Апартаменты расположены на верхнем этаже четырёхэтажного дома. Комната не большая, но очень уютная. В принципе, нам всё понравилось.", "Un peu rudimentaire mais très calme et Yori est très accueillante, parfait pour une ou deux nuits et/ou les petits budgets", "El estudio es mas acogedor de lo que parece, relacion calidad precio estupenda.", "Notre hôte était adorable, elle nous a même offert un petit cadeau en partant (elle confectionne des bijoux). Appartement pratique et près du centre.", "Yori nos esperó hasta las dos de la mañana. Además, con una sonrisa en la cara, lo que siempre se agradece!

Felices fiestas!", "Yory nos esperó hasta las 3 de la mañana que llegó nuestro avión y se preocupó por nosotros. El estudio es muy acogedor y luminoso. Muy bien localizado, cerca de un supermercado y del metro.", "Yory fue muy amable en todo momento. El ático está en un 5 piso por escalera por lo que tiene hermosa vista. Afuera nevaba y adentro nunca tuvimos frío. Bien calefaccionado. 
Está a unas cuadras del metro.", "Piccolo appartamento confortevole e attrezzato con tutto l'indispensabile, ideale er una breve vacanza come la nostra; casa situata al quarto piano di un edificio che purtroppo non ha l'ascensore ma poco male. La posizione è ottima e il rapporto qualità prezzo decisamente favorevole. L'host è gentile e disponibile e offre un posto privato,  accogliente e pulitissimo.", "Квартира была очень уютная и хорошенькая. От неё мы могли без проблем пойти пешком в Центр. Йори очень милая и всегда была готова нам помочь. Нам все понравилась и мы на все 100 процентов ещё раз приедем. Все было супер.)", "Situation parfaite, dans un quartier cosy de Sofia et à 200m de la station de métro. Yori est une hôte disponible et charmante, le studio - sous les toits - a un excellent rapport qualité/prix et le petit cadeau créatif est la cerise sur le gâteau :-) Merci beaucoup Yori ! Nous ne manquerons pas de revenir lors de notre prochain passage à Sofia", "Una muy buena anfitriona. Nos ayudó en todo y su casa es exactamente tal cual el anuncio.", "Petit studio très sympathique et bien situé ! Yory est une excellente hôte qui sait par exemple où manger si vous voulez un restaurant typiquement bulgare et loin des touristes ! En fonction de vos envies de visite, elle saura vous conseiller ! Toujours là pour aider, nous recommandons ce Airb&b ;) 
Camille et Margot", "Nuestro vuelo llegó a las 00.30 y entre que salimos del aeropuerto y llegamos al apartamento, eran casi las 2 de la mañana, sin embargo Yory nos esperó despierta. 
El apartamento en sí, es pequeño pero acogedor. La verdad es que tiene todo lo que se pueda necesitar para un fin de semana.
Además de eso, cuando le preguntamos por algún sitio para comer, típico búlgaro, no solo nos lo indicó sino que también nos imprimió el como llegar.
Para finalizar, como nos fuimos por la mañana temprano, Yory también se preocupó en llamarnos a un taxi que los recogió en la puerta del apartamento.", "un tres bel appartement situé proche du centre de sofia 2 stations de metro
accueuil tres chaleureux de YORI, pret à fournir tous les renseignements necessaire
superbe acceuil!", "très bien accueilli par youri , l'appartement est conforme au photos et très agréable, youri est très attentionnée et a même offert un cadeau à ma copine, on reviendra avec plaisir ", "Estudio perfecto para parejas que cuenta con todos los servicio necesarios. El estudio esta situado en un barrio muy tranquilo, un poco apartado del centro, con restaurantes, una farmacia, bares y un supermercado 24h. A un minuto, tiene una parada de metro que te situa en el centro en 2min. Durante mi estancia no me ha faltado de nada y recomiendo al 100% este estudio. Por ultimo, decir que Yory es una excelente casera.", "Hieno vastaanotto ja huone juuri sellainen, kuin saattoi odottaa. Lämmin, valoisa huone ja hiukan vuoristonäköalaa. Hieno kylpyhuone. Kaupat, ravintolat, ostoskeskus, metro ja muut palvelut parin minuutin kävelymatkan päässä.", "L'appartamento è come nelle foto. È di piccole dimensioni e per questo comodissimo per una vacanza di pochi giorni anche in inverno, visto le piccole dimensioni si scalda velocemente e resta sempre a una temperatura costante. La cucina è mediamente attrezzata ma non manca nulla di essenziale. 
È un'ottimo appartamento e anche la zona è comoda per qualsiasi spostamento, a 5 minuti a piedi è presente la stazione della metro e si può trovare anche un centro commerciale con tutte le più famosi marche e un parco per delle passeggiate rilassanti (temperatura permettendo).
Unica pecca il condominio. Stile sovietico, per niente curato e con odori nel giro scale. Ma già dopo 2 giorni ci si fa l'abitudine.", "J'ai vraiment apprécié ce court séjour à sofia. Yory est disponible pour toutes questions ou renseignements.  L'appartement correspond très bien au photo. Il est très bien situé.  On avait le métro à deux minutes de l'appartement ainsi que le centre commerciale."]

reviews:
["Elieta apa. was clean and welcoming, It has the best location in the center close to everything and we really enjoyed are stay here, Elieta is super kind and responsive, 
Highly recommended!", "Lovely apartment in an excellent location. The host could not have been more helpful and communication was excellent.", "All perfect!! Highly recommended!!", "We had a great stay at Elieta’s apartment. Very cleaning, spacious, well located and very comfortable...  We had everything we needed. 
Elieta gave us very quickly responses to all our questions. 

Thanks for being a great host! :)", "The apartment is fantastic-clean, stylish, with a lot of space and has so many facilities. And what is important it is great located in the heart of Sofia, close to everything. Elieta is very nice and helpfull. We had a pleasant stay and hope to come again soon!", "Elieta was prompt and helpful.  The building was safe and centrally located to everything we needed.  The apartment was clean and would have worked great for a family or two couples!  We would stay here again.", "Large two bedroom apartment in the city centre. Free parking. Full kitchen. Had everything we needed. Elieta met us to check us in and was very friendly. Would definitely stay again.", "Great apartment with an excellent location. Elieta was also happy to go the extra mile booking us a taxi for our return trip home.
We will definitely book this apartment again on our return  visit.", "Excelent host and apartment. Stone throw distance away from the city center. 24/7 shop next door.  All wanted attractions closeby", "The apartment was clean and stilish, very well located just in the city center. Parking also very useful. Elieta was very helpful, communication was fluent. I definetely recommend her place to stay in Sofia", "The photos accurately reflect the apartment. This is a stylish, light-filled city center apartment in a great location. Very clean. Elieta was a good host who greeted me at the apartment. WiFi connection was fast. One of Sofia’s best coffee shops (Rainbow Cafe) is less than a block away. Only negative would be that it overlooks a busy street and it is noisy if the windows are open. The windows are very good at blocking out the noise when they are closed.", "Vest nice and clean apartment in the heart of the city. Thanks!", "Very nice, clean convenient  downtown apartment close to everything with city transportation, subway and tram. The host was very pleasant and polite.", "Elieta is the best host I’ve ever seen. The place definitely worths more than the price. It’s so lucky that we have the chance to stay there during our trip in Sofia", "Die Lage der Wohnung ist perfekt. Man kann viel zu Fuß erkunden und Elieta hat uns immer super Tipps gegeben.
Die Wohnung ist wunderschön und das Preis-Leistungsverhältnis stimmt voll und ganz!
Elieta war sehr aufmerksam und immer erreichbar."]

reviews:
["Nenko is very funny and kind. He is a great host. I highly recommend this place.", "Nenko is a rock star super host. I spent almost ten days and I used the share room like an office space. The apartment is near to Metro station, Mall of Sofia, Serdika and NDK. View from apartment to Vitosha mountain is gorgeous ☀️. If you like running like me you could use the park near to apartment.", "If you are looking for a cozy temporary room, supplied with all the luxuries of a modern home as enormous TV,comfy bed, big sofa and a fascinating mountain view, this is definitely the right place for you to stay in...Among all my previous times spent in Sofia this is, for sure ,the best one so far. Nenko earned his "superhost" title with his beyond great approach to his guests,daily cleaning routine, high-level communication and of course his five-star morning breakfast.", "Great host. Great house. I highly recommend him and his flat. He was very thoughtful at every single detail. Having breakfast every day together was also a great way to meet him and exchange opinions and experiences. 

The area was also very nice and near center, with Mall of Sofia just behind it and 10min walking from the very center spot of the city.

We also had a nature trip on Saturday with his family to Vitosha mountain. 

Nenko is a very funny, open-minded and talkative person. Definitely I would go back again in case I need to feel like home.", "It was pleasant staying at Nenko's in Sofia.  The apartment and location are great, just as described and shown in his listing.  His breakfasts and conversations were a nice way to start the day.  We even did a fun winter hike on nearby Mt. Vitosha.", "Very well located! Very very clean room! And nice host!", "I stayed in his apartment for three days.
His apartment is actually better than described in pictures. Do not surprise when you arrived at apartment with its deterioration.
His room is completely renovated and cleaned enough as I could stayed comfortably.
He treated me breakfast everyday at his own preparation, and I could enjoy local meal everyday and get to know about Bulgaria. Plus, he was very interesting guy and always encouraging to enjoy my journey.
The price was very affordable, I absolutely recommend this apartment if you’re gonna stay in Sofia.", "I had a really great stay at Nenko's place. His flat is very well located and within walking distance of the city centre. My room was very spacious, neat and comfortable - very good value for the price. What's more, Nenko is a very interesting person - I really enjoyed our conversions :)", "Beautyful bathroom and balcony and a professional host with time to talk about society. Thank you for this good experience. :-)", "I suggest this place to all who want to spend short or long term stays in Sofia. It is clean, with wide room, very good and generous breakfast. Very closed to the city center, it only takes 15 minutes walking. 
Nenko is a very pleasant guy, available in any sort of conversation, very helpful in giving advice.
I really enjoyed the stay and I thank Nenko for this.", "Nenko is a very funny and friendly man who takes good care of his guests. He respected my privacy but was also very helpfull, had nice (Website hidden by Airbnb) to tell and made me a very delicious breakfast every morning (he's a great pancake maker). I can fully recommend anyone staying at his place.", "I spent 2 weeks in August at Nenko's place. The accommodation does correspond to the pictures - the room is spacious, the bed is comfi, the AC is very efficient, the kitchen is well-equipped, the bathroom works properly (though it is a Bulgarian style without any curtains), and the balcony has a lovely Vitosha view. It is all spotless. One should keep in mind that the district Zone B-5 has its harsh post-socialist vibe - just to be prepared for its unpleasant looks. As far as safety is considered, I did not have any issues even walking home at the night time (plus, for the peace of one's mind there are always cheap taxis available). The building itself is very old and the common facilities are malfunctioning, broken or completely missing. However, it does not reflect Nenko's apartment and the overall atmosphere at all! Bulgaria is slowly but surely getting there...
Nenko is a nice and honest host who walks those extra miles for his guest's convenience. It is very easy to talk to him and find a piece of advice or a compromise (or a story), respectively. He gives one their privacy, but is also reachable, if needed. Nenko's mother was staying with him at the time - very nice and quiet old lady (quite a pity that I cannot speak Bulgarian), one could hardly notice her.
The offered breakfast was tasty - again, if one cannot schedule the time or doesn't feel like having breakfast, it is without a problem to decline the offer.
Nenko left after 4 days into my stay and came back a day before my departure - all the details had been arranged on time, I had everything I need at my disposal and Nenko was indeed always available through the chat.
To be completely honest, first I was a bit overwhelmed by the district, but it all went away very fast and I ended up having a beautiful stay at Nenko's place (including 2 lovely evenings at the balcony). I can only recommend it!

Thank you for everything, Nenko!", "All I can say is Perfect! This is my most great experience of being hosted in Airbnb. From the local tips up until business and likes its all very good. Thank you Nenko for the stupendous stay I would definitely comeback and explore other parts of Bulgaria. ", "The view from his apartment is beautiful, you can see the Vitosha every day", "This place was great, everything I needed for a relaxing stay in Sofia. He made breakfast for us every morning (Really tasty big breakfast such as french toast & oatmeal with honey) . The home was extremely clean, and he was very responsive to any request or questions. Also really quick to respond within just a couple minutes max. Great breakfast conversation & plenty of amenities for cooking. 

The room is large & has a wonderful view of Sofia from the balcony. I didn't want to leave with how great this place was compared to past airbnb's I've stayed in. 

Would highly recommend, esp. for people looking for a long term stay somewhere in Sofia.", "My stay at Nenko's place was very comfortable and interesting. The location of the apartment is very optimal...the city center, restaurant, supermarket, tourist places and attraction is just a few minutes from the apartment. The apartment room itself is very spacious equipped with all the basic necessity i.e. TV, bed, air conditionare, wifi and moreover a private balcony opening with a wonderful view of mount Vitosha in front :)
Nenko is very wonderful hospitable host who help you with all your  doubts and questions. His communication is very swift and he cook wonderful breakfast :)
All in all i would highly recommend the Nenko's place stay for solo travelers! 
Thanks and regards to Nenko for making my stay very comfortable and enjoyable. 
Grüße
Pratiksh", "Perfect location. Amazing host. And a very nice room. This is without doubt a place I would go back with delight.", "Spent a month with Nenko and it felt like home.  Room had every thing I needed. Nenko was very helpful if I had questions or needed help with anything. View of the mountain and park was magnificent off my balcony. Breakfast and great coffee as well as having Nenko to share my adventures in Bulgaria and hear a bit about his life growing up here.  Nenko has lived in other areas of the world and is an interesting person. Great location near the Mall of Sofia which has lots of choices for restaurants upstairs as well as a movie theatre. Also there is a market nearby. The center is a 15 minute walk or quick metro ride away.  Great experience getting to know Sofia in a very comfortable setting.", "Very nice and helpfull, nenko is always ready to help for your stay in Sofia ... Tha appartment is more than confortable, it is really high level confort and has a beautiful view on the mountains. In summer you will appriciate the climatisation !!", "The apent is located in the city center, about 10min away from a metro station and almost 30min from the city center, so it's very central. The room is very big and has good amenities such as a couch and a TV. The appartment has beautiful view of the city. Nenko is very hospitable and likes to enjoy breakfast with you, so it's very convenient. An awesome host!", "The best place to stay in Sofia, close to the city center, the apartment is really new as the pictures or better, Nenko will give to you your space and he cook a really good breakfast, so kind and smart guy, see you soon.", "Absolutely top! Spacious room (even better than pics) with a nice mountain view, easy access to metro and various breakfasts offered, which is a great value for deal of course. More importantly, Nenko is a super host with rich experiences and special kindness, making you feel at home. We had deep exchanges and traveled together. This is exactly what I expect from Airbnb. I have fallen in love with this country thanks to its people'", "Nenko is a very enthusiastic host who likes to share his life stories. He lives in a apartment complex with multiple buildings which all look alike (bit like council housing). The area is called 5B (in true socialist style) and the building is #8. (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps is all shambles in Sofia and is likely to take you to the wrong building. Nenko offers to meet guests at the mall nearby. Please accept that option. It will save you time.

Nenko converts his living room to host the guest. It has a nice comfortable single bed. Great wifi and view of the mountains, if its not smoggy.

I got treated to french toast and tea for breakfast. The area/community slowly builds on you. Trams and metro are about a 10 min walk", "Nenko is truly a great host and made me feel very welcome from the start! He came to meet me over at the mall of Sofia. The room was spacious and had a stunning view of the Vitosha mountain from the balcony. Nenko made some great breakfasts in the morning which was definitely something to look forward to. He also drove me down to the Rila monastery - which is absolutely amazing! I highly recommend staying here :) ", "everything is great.
i had an earlier flight, Nenko help me to order the taxi the night before and he even woke up when i left ;)
anyway i like the view from the balcony", "Great place and a lovely host!", "This place is even better than the pictures. Very close to the metro station. Close to restaurants and shops. Everything was very clean. Nenko was really nice, his breakfasts are superb. The room was really big and cozy. I really encourage everybody to stay here. ", "Nenko is a wonderful host. From the moment I got there to when I left my stay was superb. Nenko is friendly, kind and extremally helpful,  communicating directions and places to visit really well. The room was very spacious, clean and comfortable with a stunning balcony view of Vitosha mountain. The variety of breakfast prepared by Nenko was top class and a real treat to each day. I would highly recommend Nenko's place and his excellent hospitality to any prospective guest. Thankyou Nenko for making my stay in Sofia a wonderful experience.", "One of the best airbnbs in existence! Nenko made my experience in Sofia all the more charming. I absolutely loved our breakfast chats and he is also a great cook. The room is more than perfect, bathroom impeccable in terms of design and cleanliness, and the kitchen is spotless. Nenko will always make you laugh and learn something new. I would have stayed indefinitely if I didn't have to return to work. Merci Nenko and see you again soon! ", "Nenko was a great host. Extremely attentive and caring, he offered delicacies breakfast every morning. The apartment is spotless clean and is ideally situated in the centre of Sofia next to a metro station, also convenient access to the airport ", "Nenko is very kind and friendly to me as he came to pick me in the mall and prepared  the very delicious breakfast !!! And he really helped me a lot during my stay.
Also, as it was New year, he treated me a great dinner, I was so grateful!!
You shouldn't miss the chance to stay in his house, it will be cozy and excellent experience, I promise!!", "I have given Nenko an all round five star. The communication was second to none and always prompt. Nenko came to meet me at the local Mall and booked a taxi for me to leave in the morning.

I skipped breakfast mot days but Nenko was always offering. Was a good place to work from, great wifi and big screen 200 channel TV. And to rest as well, very quiet, new and spottles bathroom. The Soifa mall (called like that) has a few restaurants and a Costa cafe, if that's your poison, 3/4 minutes away. You can walk to the centre in 10/15 minutes.

Very much recommended!", "A true Superhost.  During the month that I stayed with him, Nenko performed countless kindnesses, including making breakfast every day, taking me on trips to the countryside and dropping me off at the airport (twice).  Always available, friendly and a pleasure to spend time with, he was never intrusive.  The apartment was also a great place to work, with a super fast internet connection and  a spacious desk.   I slept well; the room was always comfortable and the shower was hot and the water flow, strong.   The nearby shopping center provided many dining options and I joined a small gym in a nearby building.   Moreover, the apartment was excellent value for the money.", "I stayed for a week this room and I spent a very good time.
Nenko is a great host. He is very friendly and helpful. He prepare the breakfast for me every day and it was delicious!
The room is clean and big too.
I will stay here if I have opportunity to go to Sofia again!!", "The room is very big, clean, and comes with a great TV, a work space if you need it, and a comfortable bed. The view from the balcony is wonder and there is only a very short walk to the city center. Nenko was very nice and went far above and beyond helping me with anything and everything. I would definitely recommend Nenko and would stay here again.", "As in the previous occasion friendly, helpful and flexible. Specially remarkable his help when leaving very early in the morning.
Thanks a lot and until next time.
", "Nenko is a great host, He made me feel right at home. Non intrusive but totally helpful when needed. he Took me Around to see the countryside and was an all around great guy. Definitely going back for another stay with him", "Nenko is a true airbnb soul! Happy to visit him in my short trip in Sofia. Thank you for all your support and superb breakfast!
Wish you all the best.", "I really enjoyed my stay at Nenko's place. The apartment is in a great location close to the center, and Nenko was very friendly and helpful with any questions I had. Highly recommended for future guests!", "I really enjoyed staying at Nenko's place, both for the room + facilities, and for the host. The room is spacious, has a big screen TV and stereo system (in case you are stuck inside for any reason). The room is quiet and warm even in the worst winter conditions, and it provides an amazing view of the Vitosha mountain. The bathroom is newly and stylishly renovated by Nenko himself, it has a modern look and feel. As a huge bonus, parking is free and usually easy near the building. The Mall of Sofia and the city center are both very easy to reach even on foot (Mall is within 2 minutes actually.)

The best part of my stay in this room was still Nenko, the host. He tirelessly prepared delicious breakfasts every morning, and was very helpful and understanding about anything that I came up with. He is also an endless source of information and topics to discuss, with a friendly attitude and a great sense of humor.

I very highly recommend staying in this room, especially if you are looking for more than just roof over your head. Staying at Nenko's is a great opportunity to start your day with great conversation and great food!", "Flexibility with arrival, showing me around", "The room is just as described: spacious, clean and calm, with an access to the balcony and a view on the Vitosha mountains The Mall of Sofia is just around the block, and it takes 15 minutes to walk to the city centre.
Nenko has been a great host, very kind and thoughtful. It was nice chatting in the morning around a coffee and a home made breakfast, thank you very much !", "Nenko was a perfect host on my visit to Sofia. He was very helpful and interested in my travel from the beginning to the very last minute. The apartment is perfectly located, just next to the city center and offers a great view over the neighbourhood. I can highly recommend everybody to stay with Nenko in Sofia!", "Nenko's place is behind the Mall of Sofia, making it an easy landmark to navigate.  From there, you can walk to the historic center in 15-20 minutes.  I walked back late at night about 10 pm but felt very safe.  Nenko was renovating the bathroom and the work was almost finished when I arrived.  It was a little inconvenient but it didn't bother me.  I'm a seasoned traveler and very adaptable.  I appreciated him prepare simple breakfasts for me everyday.  I also had the chance to do some of the local things like going to the local swimming pool or mineral baths.  Going hiking on the mountains was not possible that day because the cable car was closed (bad weather) which was a pity.  Overall I had a short but good stay in Sofia.  Thank you Nenko.", "Nenko is honestly one of the nicest hosts I have had the chance to stay with so far. He is warm, welcoming, and is also very knowledgeable about many things. I actually learned a lot just by talking with him. Yet, he is also the kind of person you can be quiet with and just chill. As for the place itself, it's very nice and spacious, and very close to the center! The mall is nearby, and so is the metro station. Overall, a great experience!

Also, did I mention Nenko's breakfasts?", "Nenko is the perfect host. I enjoyed talking to him at breakfast about bulgaria and business opportunitys, i learned a lot from him. He showed me the mountains. He even helped me to translate for the hairdresser :-). The apartment is well equipped and the location is very good, near the mall of sofia. I had a great time and will come back next time, i am in sofia! Thank you very much! ", "I was very happy to stay at Nenko's place in Sofia. Nenko is very kind and caring person who enjoys having a guest at his place. He usually shares lots of interesting stories and Bulgarian culture as well which I enjoyed so much. He showed me around the area near his place from the first day so I could find places easily later on by myself. Also he took me to the Mt. Vitosha on the weekend which was an amazing experience as well. 

I can easily describe that the place is in a heart of Sofia which is right next to the Mall of Sofia. It is very easy to go anywhere from this location on foot as well. Not only that, but also the apartment has an amazing view of Mt. Vitosha from the room through the big window and own balcony. I was so happy to wake up and see the beautiful mountain view every morning and also have very delicious breakfast offered by Nenko.  

The room is very spacious and it gets lots of light at day time as well. It's always warm enough for the cold weather. The bed is comfortable to sleep. I could use the desk for my computer and other stuff as well. A sofa is comfy to watch movies on a big screen TV. Kitchen is clean and it has everything we need for cooking. Bathroom has hot shower 24/7. Overall, I could tell the house is very well arranged for everything and very clean. Therefore, if I have an opportunity to come and visit Sofia in the future again, I will definitely stay at his place again. 
", "Clearly my best Airbnb experience to date. The apartment centrally and perfectly located, it's clean and comfy with a beautiful mountain view. But the best thing about it was  Nenko... Polite, friendly, and respectful... And if it's some stimulating conversation you want... There isn't anything Nenko can't converse upon. A very interesting man and a wonderful stay. Oh yeah ...the breakfasts were to die for and his fibre optic wifi is faster than Nasa's!))) 5 Stars... Highly recommended!", "Staying with Nenko was pleasant from top to bottom. He has shown me some very interesting things during my stay, one of which being the mountain nearby. We took a lovely hike up and then spent the Sunday relaxing for the most part. His diverse life made for great conversation and his breakfasts really are as infamous as other reviews would have you expect.
Top food,
Top place to stay,
Top guy. :)", "Nenko's room is just as pictured - spacious, comfortable and with a lovely balcony that affords a charming view of the Vitosha Mountains. The location is great, too, right near the Mall of Sofia; I really appreciated having that as a landmark to always guide me home. Nenko's breakfasts were great, too; there was something different every morning and by my last day he knew just how I liked my coffee! I'll admit, I was taken aback by the state of the bathroom, it's not quite what I was expecting, but the delicious breakfasts and the trip to the mountains helped to make up for that. ", "Delicious breakfasts, charming stories, excellent directions... it's like having a good friend who lives in Bulgaria. Room was comfortable with every amenity. Wi-Fi, laundry, tons of space. A beautiful balcony view. You must stay here.", "Nenko is a fantastic host. One word can describe him "home" :)

I feel sorry could´t spend more time talking to him, but I enjoyed very interesting talks with the morning breakfast that he made me everyday. Highly recommend every body to try those breakfast, oooh! the cheese, I bring some to Mallorca from the airport BTW ;)

The view of the Vitosha Mountain it´s amazing from the appartment.

Sofía is a city with a lot of carachter, I need time to get use to it but after the first day I feel very confortable, one important advice is don´t judge a place by the outside. Feel totally secure walking arround and is very easy to get to any point of the city by walk, tram, subway or bus. ", "I booked this place for my father who was in Sofia for a conference. He told me that everything went great! Nenko's Apartment is wonderful and comfortable and Nenko has been a very resposible host. Nenko went out of his way to help my father as my father missed his flight back to the US.. My father is very touched and really really thankful to have not only stayed in a good Apartment but also met a great Person in Sofia.", "Nenko is such a great person and has an lot of business knowledge. During the great breakfast you can get business consulting worth hundreds of Dollars for free  and Nenko is like a real friend who likes to show you around. The room is great, the view from the balcony on the 10th floor is wonderful. The location is great, one of Sofia's large malls is within 5 minutes walking distance, the subway is just 2 more minutes from the mall, thus it is very easy to get into the center within minutes.", "Nanko is the perfect host and the room is perfect also. One advice go to meet nenko ;)", "Perfect spot to explore Sofia. The apartment is well kept and Nenko gives you complete freedom to come in and out of it. Nenko's breakfast is great! it gives you energy to start exploring early in the morning and keeps going until lunchtime. A good experience overall and highly recommended.", "Nenko is fantastic. He was more than a host but is now a friend. His breakfasts had me going the entire day. I would recommend any expat in need of a place to rest to stay with Nenko. It was my pleasure.", "I enjoyed the stay at nenko very much and felt very welcomend. Really good conversations. The apartment is absolut clean modern and nice, his breakfast is unbeliveble good,

If you going to sofia I would highly recommended to stay there. iam happy that i took the right choice, thanks ", "Nenko is a an attentive and friendly host. The room is spacious. Top notch service.", "Stayed already second time! Great experience!
Nenko is very nice person. Apartment clean, comfortable room, very quiet but still in city centre.", "Nenko is a very nice person!
You will fully enjoy your stay with him!", "Nenko was a great host!  The apartment was spacious as the pictures show. He made sure I was well fed for breakfast and knew where I was going.  He also took me to the bus station when I left which made things much easier. The apt is located within a 10 minute walk of the centre.. Highly recommended!", "An excellent experience staying in Sofia.  Thanks for everything.  I will definitely be back.", "Nenko was a great host during my stay at his apartment! He was very helpful throughout my stay and I very much enjoyed eating breakfast with him and having conversations. The room itself is as described in airbnb, very big, clean, modern, and comfy. Being right next to the mall of Sofia and the metro was very nice as well.

Also, the Internet is outrageously fast! :)", "Nenko is an exceptional and very kind host. His apartment is very spacious and perfectly comfortable, and he probably has the fastest internet in Bulgaria too. It was a very enjoyable stay, and Nenko is a very interesting person who I will definitely be keeping in touch with.", "Ich wurde bei einem verabredeten Treffpunkt abgeholt und zur Wohnung gebracht.Freundlicher Empfang,viele gute
Gespräche, sehr hilfsbereit und auskunftsfreudig", "El apartamento está situado de manera muy céntrica, cerca de comerciales, transporte público y atracciones. El cuarto es muy amplio y cómodo, y Nenko es un anfitrión excepcional!", "C'est la deuxième fois que je loge chez Nenko. Nenko est un homme adorable avec lequel il est possible d'échanger toutes sortes de conversations et d'idées.
Il propose tous les matins un petit déjeuner  différent au cours desquels nous parlons de mes visites et de mes rencontres. Nenko a en plus le tact de ne pas s'immiscer dans la vie privée. La chambre est spacieuse et confortable. Le wifi fonctionne à merveille.
Sofia est de surcroît une ville magnifique et intéressante par la multitude de ses musées. Les prix sont tellement abordables près de 50 % moins chers qu'à Bruxelles.
Je conseille vivement de prendre une location chez lui. Son appartement est situé à proximité d'une station de métro qui vous emmène dans le centre ville de Serdika une station plus loin.  j'y retournerai que pour le plaisir de le revoir et de revoir Sofia où il a fait un  temps magnifique.   Je transmets mes amitiés sincères et chaleureuses à Nenko. Christiane", "Wie geschrieben, Gastgeber und sein Unterkunft war sehr gut. Sehr gute Lage", "La stanza è molto comoda e spaziosa. Il centro della città è distante solo 15 minuti a piedi, una fermata della metro a 5 minuti a piedi. La zona è molto tranquilla e piena di negozi(un centro commerciale e un supermercato vicino casa). L'host è sempre stato gentile e disponibile per consigli e aiuti(dal momento della colazione alla scelta di un taxi per andare in aeroporto ). 
Lo consiglio vivamente e spero di tornarci presto.", "Nenko é um excelente anfitrião e a comunicação com ele sempre foi muito fácil. Me deu dicas de lugares legais pra conhecer em Sofia. O quarto é grande, limpo e com vistas para a montanha. O apartamento é próximo ao centro. Totalmente recomendado!!", "Die Kommunikation mit Nenko vor und während des Aufenthalts war sehr gut. Er hat mich bei der Ankunft von der Mall of Sofia abgeholt. Alles war sauber und das Bett war auch gut. ", "El alojamiento es perfecto, limpio, al lado del centro y Nenko es un anfitrión perfecto. Muchas gracias por todo!", "Nenko est un hôte formidable. Toujours disponible pour aider. Petits déjeuners variés. ", "Meine 6 Wochen in Nenko's Zimmer mit Balkon waren sehr angenehm. Es war alles vorhanden, was ich zum leben und arbeiten brauchte und entsprach genau den Fotos.
Nenko hat mich zu zwei schönen Ausflügen in die Berge mitgenommen und war immer sehr zuvorkommend. Wenn es passend war, haben wir zusammen gefrühstückt. Dabei hat er sich immer viel Mühe gegeben und sich nach meinen Essgewohnheiten gerichet.
Die Wohnung selbst befindet sich im 10. Stock, den man mit einem Aufzug gelangt. Von dieser zentral gelegenen Unterkunft kann man wirklich schnell viele interessante Orte von Sofia zu Fuß oder mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln erreichen.
", "Ich hatte nur einen kurzen aufenthalt in sofia-in dieser zeit lernte ich nenko als kompetenten, seriösen und einfühlsamen gesprächspartner kennen. Und freue mich schon auf meinen nächsten sofia aufenthalt!"]

reviews:
["Overall. Nice place. Great communication with hosts. A slight smell upon entering the flat but the place makes up for it. Great for a short stay", "Sweet place! :)", "Perfect location and place! Really clean and tidy. The host was really nice and easy going. Highly recommend!", "Dear Vasil: Wow! Thank you for a great place to stay, a great service and your friendly approach to this Airbnb hosting thing! A truly amazing experience I will share with friends and relatives. Thank you. Thank you. Thank you!", "What a place to stay! Just perfect! When we arrived at the address Vasil was waiting at the front steps with the keys and a smile :) We arrived rather late. Nomatter, we felt well cared for preceded by clear, concise and puntual messaging. A truly memorable experience in one of the best apartments in Sofia!", "Great Place!!! 
10 out of 10 !!! it is better than suite in 5 star hotel and private , secure parking in the city center!", "The apartment is spacious, clean and very well located. The host was super responsive! We had some complications with our previous airbnb apartment and had to find a new place to stay urgently: we messaged Zori at 2AM and at 7AM she already responded, providing all the details and even being so kind to check-in us earlier! Thank you Zori, for the great help and saving our trip to Sofia!", "Awesome spacious apartment with everything you could need. Stylish artworks and a very comfortable bed. Very close to town centre with local restaurants and bars close by.", "Zorri's apartment is wonderful. It has a large living room, a spacious bedroom, a pleasant shower, a small covered balcony and a kitchen. The apartment is air conditioned, it is centrally located and has parking. It is easily reachable to the Presidential Palace and the pedestrian mall where there are many shops and cafés. On foot or on one metro stop you can also reach the junction where the Jerusalem Restaurant (Hachshara) and the Great Synagogue are located.", "Great place. Very clean and had everything we needed. Located in a central part of town. Would stay here again :)", "Great space in the middle of what seems to be a hipster neighbourhood in Sofia.", "The location of this apartment is fantastic! We appreciated the free gated parking, AC that worked very well, and the fast communication when checking in.", "Fantastic place, very clean and lovely hosts. I will be back!", "The apartment is perfectly clean and cozy, in a very central location. The hosts all are very nice and welcoming. Thank you!", "Wonderful, modern and comfortable apartment with a great location. Five minutes walk to Vitosha Boulevard and some great Restaurants all close by.
Having free, secure parking was great and getting around Sofia from here was perfect.
The WiFi is very good and even though the apartment is on a busy road very little noise can be heard. 
This place come very highly recommended by me.", "Flat is very nicely designed, kitchen has everything you need, private parking place is very rare for this location. I would definitely be Zori's guest again.", "Stayed there for a second time. It was as awesome as the first.", "The place is great, the location is excellent and the parking place was private garage behind the building so it was very easy reaching the parking.
I would recommend the place for sure.", "We enjoyed staying at this lovely apartment! The location is close to everything. The Interior design is classy. Our flight was late and Nadia was super nice to wait for us and greet us an hour after our expected arrival. Next time we hope to stay here again. Overall, a great experience!", "Fantastic location walking distance to all of the main sights, restaurants, and bars. Checking in and out was simple, and the apartment has everything you need for your stay. The perfect place to stay in Sofia.", "A perfect place, confortable, very well located, convenient parking and a very accomodating host! Thanks again!", "Great location & comfortable apartment", "Everything was as described and communication was very good. Would book again!", "Very clean and spacious modern apartment in heart of Sofia, just 3 minutes walk  from Bul.Vitosha, main street with lots shops and restaurants.All the amenities needed to live in a house are given. Even capsule for espresso coffee( But we got only two and we were in three,but it was at the last minute that I changed reservations from two to three people). The host Vassil were very helpful and flexible about check-in and check-out, he  answered quickly to my requests.The parking space is big plus, just behind the building,  fenced closed and guarded. When back to Sofia, I would definitely repeat in the same apartment.  I highly recommend it! Thank you.", "Vassil's place was absolutely incredible. A huge apartment centrally-located with all the stuff you need and really affordable... thank you Vassil and Nadia! Be back soon", "The apartment had all needed for our city break", "Comfortable central apartment with secure parking.  Fantastic air conditioning when it's hot", "TLDR : Family of 3. Excellent spacious apartment in the center. Parking on site. Great location. Excellent A/C and wifi. 

Such a great location from which to explore Sofia. We could walk anywhere easily from the apartment. The space itself is clean, large, with great wifi and amazing air conditioning. Arriving was easy, and communication with our hosts was great. I would return here in a heartbeat.", "The Vassil's apartment is extremely commodious and well-designed. It is located in the central part of Sofia very close to the best restaurants, night life and business facilities. 
The flat is in the vintage facility built in a social-realism architectural style (we were impressed with the elevator in the house - had never seen such constructions before). 
The hosts are very friendly. They provided us with the free water, tea and coffee. 
We appreciate their hospitality and recommend their apartment to another guests of Sofia.", "Very clean, renovated, exactly as described. Excellent communication with the hosts. AC's in both living room and bedroom were a life saver in the heat wave.", "Very nice place. Location is amazing and host communication is excellent. It's a really well equipped modern apartment and we were well taken care of.", "This apartment was perfect for us. Both in terms of comfort and location. Well equipped, comfortable bed, great shower and most importantly excellent air conditioning. Really close to all central places of interest, both cultural and  historical, plus the park was minutes away. The Metro is all accessible and provides a cheap route to and from the airport. Our hosts were helpful and attentive, fitting around our plans and meeting us near the station. Can't rate this place enough.", "Amazing apartment!! Perfect communication from Nadia!! Great price! And right in the centre of the city! Book book book!", "Very nice apartment great location. 
The kitchen could be more equip though, so keep that in mind if you're cooking a lot. 
Also safe and secure parking available which was nice. Hosts were friendly and accommodating. Thank you ", "I love this apartment! It's home away from home. What I found comfortable for me is the tall furniture and wardrobe, plenty of closet space, tall ceilings, comfortable bed and spacious rooms. Although it's in a central part of Sofia, it's quiet. Walking distance to lots of bistros, NDK and the pedestrian part of Vitosha street. I highly recommend it and I'd love to stay here again. ", "Great location. Clean and spacious modern apartment. Bed is very comfortable. It does look better in person than in photos. Nice to have a/c. Thank you management staff for accommodating my needs. Definitely recommend this place for good stay in Sofia.", "Excellent apartment! I recommend this apartment! :)", "Great and spacious apartment, with excellent location near to the center of Sofia and many options for food, shopping etc. The Metro is also nearby. Communication with the host was excellent, and we got many useful tips about the city. The Parking space is very useful, but not very near to the apartment (15+ minutes walking). ", "This place is lovely, the pictures don't do it justice. Great location, super comfy bed. We were able to check in early too - would really recommend as a base for exploring Sofia ! ", "Lovely and spacious apartment in a convenient central location. Very friendly hosts that were accommodating of a delay in arrival and an early morning checkout. Highly recommended.", "The apartment is really cool! Everything is new, clean and cozy. All the amenities needed to live in a house are given. It is located completely in the middle of the city center. Just 2 minutes walking from the Main Street, bars, cafés, restaurants and night clubs. They have been really nice and provided us with nice recommendations. I would definitely repeat in the same apartment. Completely recommendable. Thank you! ", "Clean, looks even better in real life than in the pictures, very good service, excellent location close to the main boulevard in the center with restaurants, bars and the main touristical sightseeings. Really nothing wrong I can say about my stay, I recommend it.", "Great apartment in the city centre. Wonderful host. Spacious and everything of a high quality. Would stay here again.", "The appartment have great location. It is just minut walk to NDK - big and beautiful park and couple of minutes walk to Sofia centar. There is lots of restaurants, markets and everything you need. It is bigger than you could see on photos and very comfortable. Absolutely clean. Highly recommended!", "We really enjoyed staying in Vassil’s apartment. We stayed 3 nights there and we had a great time! The apartment is very cosy and well equipped, there is everything you need. Location is absolutely perfect,  Lidl, Billa is just a few step from apartment.  Vassil and Paulownia were very helpful and flexible about check-in and check-out, they answered quickly to our requests. We highly recommend it! ", "Nice place, enough for 2 person.
modern and new place and perfect communication!", "The flat is close the main street of the city. We really enjoy our weekend. ", "Szuper az elhelyezkedés.
Őrzött parkoló ami ritka a belváros szívében.", "Appartamento molto accogliente e curato. Buona la posizione, consigliato", "Das Appartement ist leicht zu finden und per Metro oder Auto vom Flughafen gut erreichbar. Auch Taxis sind sehr günstig! Für einen Km zahlt man ca 80 leva also rund 40 cent. 

Die Unterkunft ist wie beschrieben. Ein privater Stellplatz ist dabei. Absolut wichtig sollte man sich ein Auto mieten wollen. 

Die Stadt Sofia glänzt mit unzähligen Cafés, welche nachts zu gut besuchten Bars werden und an Clubs mangelt es nicht. Wichtig ist dabei zu beachten, dass beim eintritt in eine Diskothek immer der Eintritt plus ein mindestverzehr gezahlt wird. Rechnet mit Tarifen zwischen 20 bis 30 Euro. Aufgrund der günstigen Preise im Club für uns Europäer reicht es dann aber auch.

Das Preisniveau ist für uns recht günstig. Hier anhand Beispielen: Cappuccino 1.80 Euro (barista stil), fast food unter 3 euro. Bier 2 Euro. Cocktails ca 4 Euro. Restaurant ca 8 Euro im schnitt für hauptspeisen.

Kulturell war Sofia enttäuschend. Außer die Alexander Kathedrale konnten wir leider nichts interessantes finden. 

Das Appartement befindet sich super zentral. Der vitoschka Boulevard ist ein katzensprung und die Bars gehen gleich los. 

Lifestyle: 8 von 10 punkten 
Kultur: 3 von 10 punkten 
Englisch: 9 von 10 punkten 

Die Kommunikation mir der Besitzerin war stets einwandfrei. Mit Englisch kommt man in der Stadt gut durch. 

Viel Spaß beim genießen :)", "Die Wohnung ist gemütlich eingerichtet, ruhig und hat eine angenehme Größe.
", "Super Lage, das Apartment war noch besser als auf den Fotos. Die Innenstadt ist nicht mal 5-10 min entfernt, genauso wie die größten Clubs von Sofia. "]
