reviews:
["The place is just great - very cozy studio, great location, great host. 
Location: the place is a 4 min walk to the metro and tram stations, 15 min walk to the center and in the  same time situated on two quiet streets, away from the traffic noise.
Host: Elena is very punctual and friendly - you couldn't ask for more from a host.
Furniture: everything is as shown in the pictures - the place is very sunny and well equipped - me and my wife had everything we needed.
I just couldn't recommend more this lovely studio.", "Elena is so friendly. Everything was great, the apartment was clean, warm and well-equipped. No complaints about the check-in.
Thank you Elena for your hospitality! ", "Elena is very helpfull and friendly! I had a great stay in this apartment. It is very clean and comfortable. And close to the city centre. Highly recommended!", "Elene's place is the perfect location for both, a short and long period of time. 
You can find all the possible amenities you might think of (coffee machine, vacuum cleaner, kettle, hair dryer, plenty of blankets,...). 
She is very nice and at your arrival she will give you many tips on what to visit, where to eat and where to go grocery shopping.
My boyfriend and I have had a very pleasant experience. Recommended!", "We had a perfect stay in Sofia at Elena's appartment. It is cosy, clean and very well situated. Just near the city centre, 15 mins walking from Serdika, the central metro station. Elelna was very available, and always ready to give advices and help.", "Top floor apartment, short walk from train station, bus station, and downtown. Comfortable bed, great facilities, including a spacious living area. And Elena, the host, was very prompt and helpful.", "Elena is a wonderful host: hospitable and always ready to help. The apartment is bright, clean and comfortable. Thank you for a wonderful autumn week in Sofia.", "Elenas place is very lovely. It is located close to metro stop, however you can easily walk to all the main sights as well. The WiFi works great, it had everything we needed. There are some great restaurants nearby which Elena happily told us about. She also was very communicative and went out of her way in printing a couple of documents for us as well. I would highly reccomend her place, we both thought that it was even better in person compared to the pics.", "We had a great stay at Elena's place. The apartment was clean, spacious and big. The kitchen was well equipped for everything we needed to cook. We arrived late via train and check in was no problem for Elena who communicated well leading up to and throughout our stay. The place was in a quiet neighbourhood and we felt very safe there. Just a short walk to city centre and supermarket. Recommend this apartment we would stay again!", "Good place to stay  for short trips!", "A clean and comfortable apartment very well set up with all you need for a stay in Sophia. It is a nice quiet area and very safe to walk around. Close to the excellent metro station for getting around the city.", "Apartment was exactly as expected according to pictures and previous reviews. Clean, cozy, equipped with everything you need for few days stay, close to metro station and around 15 min walk from center of Sofia.", "We stayed in this studio for 9 days. The value is good considering the central location of the apartment to attractions in Sofia, the VERY fast WiFi,  responsive host and quiet apartment. The biggest problem for us was that the bathroom floods with water whenever you take a shower. There is no separate shower lip, so when you take a shower the water goes on the bathroom floor to a small drain. This is not practical if you have to take a shower for more than 2-3 minutes. Also, there was visible dog or cat hair on the couch. Overall, if you stay here for a short time then this apartment is perfect, but longer than 3 days then it can get to be frustrating. ", "This is an excellent place. Exactly as on the pictures, very modern, clean and ideal for visiting Sofia as it’s just 10-15 minutes walk to the core center and close to all important sights. Elena is a very nice, welcoming host and she responds to all questions quickly. I highly recommend her place and I would visit again. ", "The apartment is great. Very new and super clean, all amenities I needed and a good powerful shower with plenty hot water. The location is quiet but with easy access (couple minutes) to metro station or a 20 minute walk to the centre. There are also supermarkets within easy reach (10 minutes in either direction). Elena is very good host who made sure my stay was grand. All in all a great place to stay and experience.", "Great place, great hospitality
Totally recommended", "We've stayed for four nights in this apartment. The location is great, only 5 minutes away from the subway. The apartment itself wat clean and big. Elena is very helpfull and friendly as well. Thanks!", "We had a lovely stay in Elena’s apartment. It was very clean and quiet and perfect for our trip! Thank you Elena!", "Elenagave us good tips about what to see and do in Sofia, and her emailed instructions for finding the apartment from the railway station made our arrival stress-free. The studio is spacious and had everything we needed for a very comfortable stay.", "I had a great stay in Elena’s studio in Sofia. The flat was in a good location, situated close to the centre of Sofia. The apartment was quiet so was ideal for studying or working from.", "An excellent option in Sofia! Elena's apartment was super nice, having all the requirements for a comfortable stay and located within easy walking distance to the center and Lavov Most metro station. The unit is on the top 6th flr (w. elevator), lots of windows, very quiet, bright space with most all amenities. Several restaurants and supermarkets close by. Elena was very helpful, communication was easy and, after a 14 hr flight, it was nice to be able to relax.", "This is super nice studio - very clean, nice amenities, much better than expected - truly an excellent value!  Especially liked the very comfortable bed.  Elena is a great hostess, very helpful and responsive.  I also appreciated the great location - very close to the metro and downtown Sofia area.  Would definitely stay here again!", "This apartment looks just like in the pictures, but in reality it is even more beautiful and cozier! The window view is probably one of the best in Sofia, I am not kidding! It is the last floor apartment, so it's practically covered in roof windows, which I absolutely loved!
The center of the city is literally five minutes walk. It was clean, the kitchen had everything you might need, and Elena was a great host giving us some pretty much useful tips.
If you are coming during winter, there is an air conditioning system, so you can warm up the place according to your needs.
I'd definitely come again!", "The apartment is in a very convenient location near Lavov Most. It takes only a few minutes (5 at the most) to get to the closest metro station and from there it's only one stop to the central station (Serdika). You can also walk to the center of town in 10-15 minutes. There's a small grocery store on the other side of Lavov Most (a Billa) and a larger one (a Lidl) about 10 minutes away near the public fountains.

The apartment itself is comfortable, spacious, and clean and has a full kitchen (with a washing machine), a comfortable couch and bed, and a nice little bathroom. The cable tv and internet are also reliable. The apartment can get a little chilly in colder weather (especially the floor), but the combination air-conditioner / heater helps quite a bit. All-in-all, this was a great home away from home.", "Elena is a great host. The apartment was exactly as described cleen, warm, lovely, walking distance from the center. Exactly what we were looking for. Highly recomended.", "Very nice flat, well located in Sofia. The flat corresponds totally to the pictures. We spend a really good journey, thank you Elena", "We had a nice 1-night stay at Elena's place. The apartment is close to the central railway station which was our goal. Elena met us personally and explained everything despite of the late hour. The apartment was very clean and matched the profile  description. Recommended!", "The studio was very convenient with everything I needed. Elena is a wonderful hostess who pays a lot of attention to details and is very willing and able to help.", "Perfect place for up to a few people in  a great location, the perfect distance from the rail station and the centre.", "The places is better and more spacious than you can grasp from the photos, with a view of the mountains and city. Elena ir a great host. It truly is The Place, if you are looking for a perfect stay in Sofia.", "It was one of the best stays ever! Elena is a great host. The place is just perfect. Everything is clean and brand-new.   The location is really good – close to the city center and the rail way station. I can thoroughly recommend the place.", "It is located at near train station. There was electric kitchen range problem at first night, finally worked out. The host is so friendly that comes right away if you have problems since she live next apartment. I recommend absolutely anyone who likes to visit Sofia.", "The host canceled this reservation 37 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.", "Elena is very nice and friendly. The flat is clean and beautiful. We are very satisfied. Enjoy!



", "The apartment is really nicely furnished, spacious, with a lot of light and it is equipped with everything you might need. Elena is extremely nice and reliable. I would definitely stay again!
", "Elena is a really nice host, when she heard that we want to go to mountain "vitosha" she immediately provided us useful information!
The apartment is in a pretty good location(near metro station), also, if u just want to go to the center by feet, it won't be more than 15mins.
Thank u so much, Elena!
", "Elena was so helpful and responsive as a host. The apartment was huge and convenient. You can reach the city centre only by walking around 20 - 30 minutes. Good value! ", "Elena is the perfect host -
very helpful and punctual! Next time I'm in town, I'll defenetly renting the apartment! ", "We had a great stay! the apartment is easy to find and not far from the metro so everything is accessible fairly easy. Elena was very nice and welcomed us very well.", "The apartment itself: Rating: A. Everything necessary was there for short and medium term stays. For long time stays, maybe especially for 2 persons, AND IF one wants to really cook for oneself, an extra pot and pan could be useful. Buy your preferred item. No problem. Not expensive.

Location: Rating: A. Subway (approx. 10 min intervals) and buses in 5 min. walking distance, tram (up to 20 min. intervals depending on time of day) in 3 min. walking distance, both taking you to the center. Or walk to Serdika (Sofia center) in 15 min. by normal brisk walking. Vitosha boulevard shopping street is another 10 min. away. I prefer to walk to the center.
There are many restaurants in Vitosha boulevard. For actual shopping you may prefer to go to Sofia's shopping malls, though not all "big" brands may be there.

Elena: Rating: AAA. Do I need to say more? Always pleasant, helpful, etc.", "We spent a good time at Elena’s Modern studio. We appreciate the appartement, comfortable  with a very good equipment, spacious and bright, good wifi and  very clean. it’s really close to down town.
Close to a very  typical bulgarian restaurant, in the same road.
Elena is very welcoming, she gave us a lot of suggestions. 
Thank you very much for everything, we appreciate your help for the luggage  ;-)
We recommend to everyone going to Sofia to stay in this modern appartement.
Ann and Gil
", "Everything was quite well with Elena's apartment. She was really kind and asked everyday if there is problem or not. It's in a central place and not noisy. 
Recommended", "Sofia was literally amazing! The apartment is very cute, near to the center of the city (just 10-15 minutes walking) and Elena is an incredible host. Fast answers, helpful (there was a little problem with the hot water and she gave us the key of her apartment for an entire day to have all the showers we needed). She also gave us a lot of suggestion (Maps, museums and bulgarian restaurants - one of these practically next to the apartment, in the same road). And the view from te house is speechless! Thank you for everything, Elena! ", "Elena was there to show us the apt. and the surrounding tourists attraction n supermarket and vegies market.The apt.was modern,clean and tidy as in the pictures on AirBnB. Good wifi and a kitchen for simple cooking. Within walking distance to train and bus stations.Would definitely recommend to everyone going to Sofia.", "The studio is a bit tough to (Website hidden by Airbnb) more like 15 mins walk from the train station.
We had a problem with all the keys...There are 3...in fact got locked IN the building upon checkout.
There was not nearly enough hot water...we did not have a lot of time to wait for warmup.
Bed was comfortable and it was in a pretty quiet area.
There is a traditional Bulgarian restaurant right down the (Website hidden by Airbnb) is beyond amazing!
Elena was a wonderful host...responsive to our concerns...the space is well appointed with great Wi-Fi signal.", "Good play, very clean!!", "Very good studio with lots of space, just like the photos. Clean, comfortable and being on the top floor has nice views!", "Elena was a wonderful host and well educated. The place was great and do recommend this place to whoever wants to stay in Sofia.", "I enjoyed my stay at this Studio apartment. The bed is a bit uncomfortable since there are hard and soft spots on the mattress, but there its still good. You cant have a shower for too long of a time, else the water will be flooding out of the bathroom. The couch also seems to easily fall apart, as soon as you intend to lean into a corner. Kitchen provided adequate utensils for cooking.  Good overall lightning.", "It was a very lovely place clean and spacious! Elena was very sweet. Very close to train!", "This was a lovely place.  It looked just like the picture, everything was clean and new-looking.  Good location, next to a metro station or could just walk a short distance to the city centre.  
Elena responded to messages when needed but the place was very private and very security conscious.  ", "A quiet, clean modern apartment.
Lovely views, good air cond, and wifi
Very good value.
Would recommend it.", "I stayed for two nights at Elena's place.
Everything was as described and the apartment was clean and tidy, bed sheets, bed covers and towels were provided as well.
New working A/C and fast internet.

The location is very convenient being close to both the city centre and the bus/train station.

Elena was helpful, kind, non-intrusive and generally available via text messages.
", "It was a fine stay. Elena is great person, very hospitable!", "Elena was the perfect host - always kind, welcoming, understanding and accommodating. The flat itself couldn't be better - ideal central location, quiet neighbourhood, excellent transportation links. I felt at home in Elena's flat. Will stay there again and would recommend to friends. 

Елена беше идеалният домакин - любезна, доброжелателна, готова да помогне и разбере нуждите на човека отсреща. Студиото е прекрасно, има всичко от което човек се нуждае, красива гледка, транспортни връзки, централна локация, тих квартал. Почувствах се вкъщи в студиото на Елена. Бих го препоръчала на приятели. ", "El apartamento es súper bonito. Perfecto para 2 o 3 personas, súper acogedor y limpio.
Esta a unos 10 o 15 minutos más o menos del centro, cerca de una estación de metro y todos los servicios necesarios alrededor como supermercados, droguerías, cafeterías...

Recomendadisimo!", "Petit appart’ conforme aux photos ! Très bien accueilli et joignable aussitôt le besoin, tout était correct et bien renseigné.", "Loin de chez vous mais comme chez vous. Merci Elena !", "La casa de Elena es mucho mejor que lo que parece en las fotos. Muy acogedora y a menos de 10min andando del centro. Elena fue muy amable al permitirnos dejar el equipaje en su casa ya que llegamos antes de la hora del check in. Nos dio muchas indicaciones y consejos. Repetiría seguro.", "Bell'appartamentino a circa 600 metri dal centro e ben collegato con aeroporto... Elena è stata molto precisa nel farci trovare l'abitazione in perfetta pulizia e nel fornire informazioni utili per vivere al meglio il soggiorno a Sofia.. grazie Elena", "Appartement impeccable, et super accueil. Proche du métro (5min à pied), du centre ville (10/15 min à pied). Il y a tout ce dont on a besoin dans l'appartement (machine à laver, fer à repasser, sèche-cheveux, tout pour cuisiner, etc...). Idéal pour un séjour d'une semaine ou plus !

 Il y a un restaurant qui fait de la cuisine typique bulgare juste en bas, ouvert jusqu'à 2h du matin, et délicieux! SItué aussi juste a côté d'une épicerie si vous voulez cuisiner vous même.

Super logement, très bon rapport qualité/prix.", "Очень комфортная и просторная квартира , красивый вид на город и горы, квартира полностью оборудована всем необходимым , идеальная чистота, Елена очень внимательная и доброжелательная хозяйка, приятная в общении, у нас остались прекрасные впечатления , с удовольствием остановимся у Елены в будущем.", "Отличный вид и расположение. Гостеприимные хозяева.", "La fille d'Elena nous a chaleureusement accueillis, malgré notre léger retard et nous a donné plusieurs recommandations de restaurants. Le logement est conforme aux photos, très spacieux et idéalement situé près de la gare. Nous recommandons sans hésiter ! :)", "Quel beau séjour! L’endroit est propre et fonctionnel, avec une belle luminosité et tout à proximité (épicerie, restaurants, transport en commun, etc). 
Elena communique de façon rapide, efficace et chaleureuse autant avant que pendant le séjour, et elle s’assure qu’on ait tout ce dont on a besoin. Si je retourne à Sofia, ce sera assurément dans ce même logis!", "Todo excelente! Tanto la atención de Elena como el apartamento.", "Merci Elena pour votre disponibilité, discrétion et respect.", "El apartaestudio de Elena es mejor que lo que muestran las fotos. Y ella es más de lo que dice que es en su presentación. Es agradable estar ahí, y sobretodo porque está bien equipado.", "Elena war sehr hilfsbereit, kommunikativ, freundlich.", "Ho trovato tutto perfettamente pulito ed un'ottima accoglienza.  Elena mi ha fornito tutte le informazioni che ho richiesto. La descrizione dell'appartamento è molto dettagliata. L'alloggio è luminoso, pulito, confortevole e dotato di tanti accessori (tostapane, lavatrice, ferro da stiro etc). Si trova a pochi minuti dalla fermata della metropolitana e quindi è ottimamente collegato sia con il centro della città, sia con l'aeroporto. Il soggiorno è stato piacevole."]

reviews:
["The place was cosy and it was really quiet during the night.", "An excellent place for short business trips and weekend getaways :)", "This is a great budget place for a young single traveler, or a young couple who want to explore the city and / or party in it. It's in an incredible region where there's everything within 2 blocks distance. Hosts are nice and helpful, you won't have problems with any additional requests you may have. 
Note, however, that the place is very small and won't do for more people, or for older couples which demand more comforts.", "This appartment is very clean and cosy, and Iva is a good host. You will have everything you need even if it's a bit little; it's well equipped and the location is great. We only missed a little table to have quick breakfast or lunch, but we managed fine. I totally recommend this place for a short stay :)", "Everything was perfect. Iva is very nice person. Strongly recommended.", "Iva was an amazing host. The place is great - small and cozy. It's perfect location in the small streets in the center of the city allowed me to easily commute to my bussines during the day and in the evening I was able to explore the city be walking around. Near by there are great restaurants and bars.  The place is also perfect if you want to explore Sofia night life and clubs.", "no comment,", "The location is perfect and the apartment is very cozy. I would definitely chose it again.", "This is clean, basic and ideal for a short stay on a budget. A welcoming host and well situated flat.", "Very nice location, easily find the stations, restaurants and bars. I think it is the best place if you want a place to live alone or with your partner with this price when you travel in the city.", "Really friendly and helpful! The location of the apartment is really fantastic, right in the middle of Sofia", "The location is excellent is Maria was very helpful and flexible with check in.  ", "Excellent location, in the heart of town with many cool restaurants, cafes, and parks in the area! Communication with Maria was very good. Kitchen is small but enough if you don’t plan to cook a lot. Definitely recommended!", "Appartement that offers all the basics (small kitchen included),  perfectly located (3 min walking from Vitosha Blvd & subway) with very smooth check-in.  
If you are looking for a (typical Bulgarian?) place to spend the night , Maria's app is your choice!", "Maria was a good host and the place is worth it especially location wise. ", "Amazing host. Good choice.", "High recommended cosy place in the city center The host respond fast for maseges or inquiries  and you could find many maps for city with recommende it places to visit", "Really cute apartment at an amazing location!
It has everything you need, and in a very central place in Sofia.
Maria waited for us and was very responsive, tnx!", "Maria is very kind and nice, but she can't speak english well, so the communication was a bit difficult. Furthermore she didn't answer me for the check-in until the evening before my arrival. The place is nice, but very small. We had some problems with the bathroom: it's small and uncomfortable.", "Wonderful trip in Sofia, very central location. Thank you for this good trip.", "Maria is super friendly and helped us out even though we arrived late and I communicated a little late.", "The place is greatly located, with all the basics to cook and enjoy a great stay in Sofia. We spent there 5 nights and it was quiet and in a nice neighbourhood.", "Everything was good, nice place :)", "Great location - very central. Clean and functional apartment, friendly host! Plenty of local information, maps and suggestions :-)", "Great location. A cozy place to explore the city from, right next to all the day and night life.", "Maria was a very kind and hospital host, who helped making my stay in Sofia as easy as possible. Not the least, because she was very flexible with both check-in and -out. I really enjoyed my stay in the heart of Sofia.", "The place is very nice and situated in the heart of the city. The furniture is mostly wooden which gives the space a special charme. The bed was a bit creaky but otherwise everything was great. The communication with Maria worked perfectly so I can fullheartedly recommend her place. ", "The accomodation is very nice, in the historical centre of the city of Sofia, easy to find - right in the centre but also quiet. We didn' t need to use any transpotation for everything we wanted to see in the center of Sofia. It' s also only three stops from the railway station using the metro. Maria was very helpful for every information we needed. Thanks!", "nice place to stay", "Had a great stay at Maria's place! Great location and cozy flat :)", "The apartment is well located next to everything you would like to visit. There is a supermarket really close to it. It was clean and cosy. I recommended it to everyone.", "We had a great time, I recommend to anyone. Very welcoming host! We arrived during the night, had no problem checking in.", "Great location. Comfortable bed. Cool little place.", "We had an Awsome stay in Maria flat, it was nice, close from everything and really calm. We will come back for sure !", "The apartment is big, clean, well equipped and the host friendly. We really appreciate the location (perfect area for restaurants and nightlife), tourist guides, English books and the fact that the bathroom is perfectly equipped  (shampoo, toothpastes etc). The only thing missing is a heater but in  general I highly recommend it", "I did not meet Maria, but her son Kris was so helpful. The flat is located in the Sofia Center in an area where all I wanted was available in walking distance; Shopping Malls, Restaurants. Only 2 minutes of walking, one can get to the wonderful Vitosha Blvd.. Overall, I did enjoy my stay and would recommend it.", "It was very nice!", "The place is in an excellent location in the center of the city. The communication with Maria was super easy, she always replied immediately. The only problem with the apartment were the ants in the kitchen and the bathroom.", "Very nice :)", "Comfy bed in a comfy apartment in a convenient spot in a great city", "Maria s house is great! The location is perfect, very centered, and also very clean. It has all you need. A bit hot in summer... a perfect spot for Sofia and maria answered all my question very fast and nicely :) ", "We didn't meet Maria herself but as soon as I called that we were in front of the front door, someone came outside to help us even tough we were too early. The apartment is very well situated, it's small but perfect for two persons.

The only downfall was that it was very hot in the apartment and that there was no fan or ac, which made it very hot during the day and night. ", "Maria is very caring and the room is perfect to stay in Sofia. It is very close to the city centre and metro station. Just something more about the cleaning of the room.", "Maria's place is excellently located near a number of nice restaurants and only 10 - 20 minutes walk from most of the main sights in Sofia. The apartment itself is cozy and comfortable. ", "The room was great and perfect for short stays. In the most central area of the city and close to metro and bus stations. Food literally steps away ", "Maria was very kind and her place was perfect to explore all that Sofia has available. Really close to everything and in the best part of town. Thank you, Maria!", "Lovely central apartment, great location for exploring the city.", "Great location. Easy to find. Nice place. ", "Iva's place is perfect for couples need accommodation in Sofia. Simple, clean, but there is everything you need. And Iva and her friends is very helpful. Absolutely recommended.", "Really nice place and friendly host. Totally satisfied.", "I had a wonderful staying there, Iva is a great host, helpful at all the time and the location off the apartment was right in the city center.

I will return again and can really recommend the host and place !

", "The location of the apartment is perfect for any traveler wishing to see the sites around the city centre, and the apartment itself is very clean and well kept. 
That being said, we had a big issue with checking in to the apartment. Since we had a late flight into Sofia, Iva had confirmed that checking in at 2 am local time would not be an issue. We arrived in front of the apartment at exactly 2 am and tried to the number Iva had given us to collect the keys, as discussed. However, we received no answer through calling, texting, or messaging on the airbnb application. After waiting over an hour in the street and calling over 10 times we had to find alternative accommodation for the night, which was further complicated by the lack of hotel rooms in the area. After checking into a hostel around 4 am we finally received a call from Iva's business partner, apologizing for an emergency which had apparently prevented our hosts from getting into contact with us. Upon realizing that we had been waiting and forced to search a foreign city for accommodation in the middle of the night, Iva's partner did try to rectify the situation by covering the cost of our hostel and picking us up in a cab. The next day Iva offered to remove the cost of the night we missed due to the incident, which was appropriate considering we did not get to check-in on that day. Although we spent the next day exhausted from the stress of wandering the streets until the morning hours, the rest of our stay passed without issues. I wish I could give a better review, as the apartment itself was lovely, but our experience did not leave us assured that Iva is a dependable host.", "The house is in the center of the center of Sofia in a very nice quartier; Iva and her staff are always available and friendly; comunication and chek-in were perfect
Thanks for all", "Nice warm place and easy check in ", "Very central and convenient.  Lovely little place close to fabulous reataurants.", "Cozy apartment wonderfully located (everything from best restaurants to touristic attractions at a walking distance) and very nice host, definitely recommended for anyone planning a trip to the beautiful Sofia!", "Good and pleasant communication,  clean and cozy apartment and awesome location!", "All perfect. The house is located in a quiet area from where you can easily reach the main attractions of the city. Iva and Kris were very kind and always available. Very nice home, complete with all accessories. I absolutely recommend it and would go back there again.", "We had a great time in Sofia!", "Iva was a great host and communicated very well. The apartment is clean and comfortable and is located about 5 minutes walk from the Main Street in Sofia. I recommend staying here. ", "This is a tiny, apartment that is best for shorter stays. It is a great locations, near many shops, cafes, eateries, and attractions. Within 10 minutes walk in any direction you will have some of the best sushi- Hamachi-ni, a Starbucks, some great local pizza-Franks, a grocery store-Lidl, quite a few bakeries-Jovan Dutch Bakery and Ma Bakery are fantastic, as well as Vitosha street which is a main shopping boulevard and leads to the very center of the city. This Airbnb is actually taken care of by two WONDERFUL hosts-Iva and her friend Kris. When you can't reach one, you usually get the other, for anything you need, within reason. They aren't far from the flat, so timing is not a bad wait either. They are a wonderful resource for local insight as well as good old fashioned Balkan welcoming. We only had a couple hiccups during our stay but they were taken care of and not any faults with the host. The flat was very clean and straightforward with common necessities available. Iva even had a washing machine installed for our longer stay, which was a month, and just not feasible without one, while traveling with a small child! This is a great base camp for traveling around the area or a business trip stop over. Just ask Iva or Kris for any tips, they will be ready with a smile! Absolutely wonderful experience with these hosts.", "Iva, despite not being aailable on the day of our arrival, was sure to make sure someone was there. She was great on giving advice and overall we had a lovely time in Sofia. Thanks!", "Everything super, nice apartment, central, flexible check in, thermal insulation and wifi could have been a bit better, but the heating worked really well.", "my best stay on an airbnb apt. by far.

Iva is a great host.
First couple of days we had our plans changed by getting a flu - Iva was there all the way. 
Always trying to help, without even asking she called doctors for us, tried to get us some medicine and alot more things that you wouldnt normaly think a host should do.

She is an amazing person - thats already 99% of the trip going good right there.

Ofc. Nothing bad to say about the apt. - very clean, cosy, extremely close to almost anything good in the city. 
What more can you guys ask for?", "The apartament is very cozy and quiet, near of the Center, we never need to took any public transportation. Everything was fine. Iva is a very atencious guest.", "Completely satisfied!
Host:
Everything was clear and easy from the beginning, I didn't meet Iva but she left me all the informations that i needed and her friend who waited for me and showed me the apartment was nice and professional too.
House:
A very small apartment that has everything you can ask for a vacation in this city: it was clean, warm and there is wifi. Absolutely suggested for 1-2 people. 
Position: 
7-8 minutes walking from the center of the city
If I will come back to Sofia this is the apartment that I will rent again for sure!!
", "Nice clean and centric place:)) totally recomendable!!", "Apartment is in great location It s just 2 minutes walking from vitosha boulevard, it s perfect for 1 or 2 people....Iva is fantastic eprson helped me for everything!Hoping next time i can find free again this apartment, then Sofia is wonderful town!", "The apartment was great.
Ideally located, very clean and pleasant to live in. 
Iva helped me a lot, giving me a lot of indications about restaurants, cafés etc..
Will definitely return. Great experience.", "nice place, a lot attentions to details and very clean. simple, cozy and convenient. Iva is a very good host , providing assistance  and help . good experience to be repeated and recommended.

posto carino, pulito e con grande attenzione ai dettagli ( saponi, cotton fioc , etc etc)
iva è una persona gradevole e gentile. esperienza da ripetere e raccomandabile

", "We had a fantastic time staying in Sofia at Iva's lovely flat!  It is cosy, quiet and in a convenient location, within easy walking distance of all the attractions of the city.

Iva was really friendly and gave very helpful tips and advice.

I will definitely stay again when next in Sofia, and would thoroughly recommend!", "The appartment and the localization is great. Iva is a perfect host. I would recommend it to everyone! :)", "The flat was nice, the right choice for staying in Sofia for a weekend: there is everything one might need for a comfortable stay and the location is great. The communication was easy and even when we had a little problem with a bathroom, it was solved very quickly. Thanks a lot!", "My friend and me had an awesome time in Sofia and the apartment was really great. Iva showed us the place and gave us some really great tips where we should go to. When we had questions, she was always there to give us answers. All in all, this is an absolutely perfect place to stay! :)", "We had a great time at Iva's place. The apartment was very clean and Iva was very nice. The shower is a little bit complicated, but this was no big deal. We had everything we needed and we would choose this apartment again!

The apartment is perfectly located! Very very close to everything that you might want to see in Sofia! Everything is in walking distance, 3 minutes to the main shopping boulevard, 2 minutes to the - very good - Made in Home restaurant and shops, cafés, supermarkets all around. If you visit Sofia you should definitely take the Free Sofia Tour - it was great!", "Iva was a very nice, caring and helpfull host, providing us with all the information we needed.  She even brought us extra blankets and a heater to make sure we didn't get cold during the night.

The appartment itself was clean and has everything needed to spend a few days there, although the kitchen is small and has very limited appliances in case you were planning on cooking yourself. This won't be necessary though, as it's right in the city center with plenty of restaurants just minutes away.", "Iva and her husband Alex are fantastic! We went out together the night we arrived and had a great time!
The apartment is very well located, clean and tidy. 100% recommendation.

", "Lovely place in the center of the city. Bars, clubs & restaurants under 5min walk. Iva is a very friendly host. :)", "Iva's place is a really cute apartment, very close to the heart of Sofia and to public transport. Many bars, restaurants and cafeterias are just 5 to 10 minutes walking from the apartment. Though the neighborhood is very calm and nice! Sofia is a beautiful city you will surely like! 
The apartment is small however it is very comfortable for two people.
Iva was very helpful and kind. I definitely recommend it!", "Great location! Had a fantastic time!", "Iva was very communicative and very flexible with the check-in and check-out times. Super relaxed, friendly and helpful :).

The apartment is located in the heart of Sofia and very well connected. It has all what you need to spend the night and go about your day.

This is a bargain considering the host, location and price.", "The location of the apartment is perfect and easy to get to. It was really comfortable and a good place to relax after our sightseeing. Iva was a nice host and responded fast to our questions. All in all, a great place to stay in Sofia.", "The place was very good, nice location just one street from Vitosha boulevard the main street in Sofia.  Iva was very nice and gave me good recommandation ! 
I recommend this place", "Great location, Iva is great host. She have made all our stay very simple and pleasant. We have everything that we needed and more of that, this place is nice for 2 day stay, but also for 2 weeks stay. Will be our choice for every other stay in Sofia for sure!", "Iva is a really nice host. She helped us a lot. Her place was clean and cozy. Location is perfect. We stayed there 2 weeks without any problems. I highly recommend this place:)", "Super host Iva! 
I had great time in Sofia, becouse of she took care to show me around city center area and tought me local infomation very well.
She speak in English and great communication skill.
Probably, this flat would be very popular soon, so if you have a chance to go to Sofia, then you should stay this place 100% possitive =)
", "absolut nice place to stay. Iva and her friend are very friendly and helpfull.", "The place is awesome, great for couples. The location is really good, close to many things to see and some nice restaurants/bars. The host was supernice and helpful :) I recommend it!", "appartamento piccolo ma funzionale, dotato di tutto il necessario.ottima la posizione, ideale per visitare la città anche a piedi.", "Maria ist eine großartige Gastgeberin.
Die Wohnung ist winzig, aber sie liegt super zentral, ist renoviert und man hat alles, was man für ein langes Wochenende in Sofia braucht. Empfehlenswert!", "La posizione è centralissima e permette di visitare la città comodamente senza uso di bus o tram.
La casa piccola la stanza da letto arredata con mobili datati, Ikea farebbe meglio in un piccolo spazio, mancanza di Tv, manca un ferro da stiro, manca un condizionatore rimpiazzato da un ventilatore , mancanza di bidè, frigo sporco lascato dai precedenti con la spazzatura fuori dalla porta e costretti a buttarla dopo richiami dei vicini.", "Maria est très  arrangeante (arrivés  plus tard que prévu  à  cause d'un  incident lors de notre vol, elle nous a très  gentiment  attendu). Le logement est pratique pour un cour séjour. Situation  du logement idéale.", "El apartamento fue tal y como esperábamos. Con nuestras preferencias encajó a la perfección. La localización es inmejorable, cerca de la calle principal y al lado de un supermercado. 
El apartamento cuenta con muchos folletos de información para orientarte sobre dónde ir o qué ver de la ciudad. Lo recomiendo! :)", "Appartement très bien situé, vraiment au centre de la ville, ce qui est très pratique. 
L’appartement correspond aux photos, petit mais suffisant avec tout le nécessaire.", "Nuestra estancia en el apartamento de María no pudo ser más satisfactoria, tanto por la comodidad del mismo, la cercanía a todo en la ciudad (sobre todo el centro, y por tanto un montón de sitios donde ir, cafeterías, restaurantes, supermercados, etc)

También está al lado de una estación de metro, por lo que si estás preocupado por la accesibilidad al transporte público has de saber que no tendrás ningún problema.

Finalmente hay que destacar la amabilidad de María, que entendió perfectamente que llegáramos bien tarde (más allá de media noche) y lo solucionó comunicándose en todo momento con nosotros con gran atención y rápidas respuestas. Además de ello no le importó que nos fuéramos del apartamento a las 17:30 debido a que nuestro vuelo salía a las 20:35. 

En definitiva, un apartamento 100% recomendable.", "Appartamento piccolo ma carino, come nelle foto. Il punto di forza è la posizione, ci siamo spostate unicamente a piedi", "Très bon emplacement, à quelques pas du boulevard Vitosha! Rapport qualité-prix impeccable !", "Πολύ ωραίο διαμέρισμα στο κεντρο της Σοφιας. Μικρο, καθαρο και δεν αντιμετωπισαμε κανενα προβλημα. Ιδανικη οικονομικη επιλογη για ζευγαρια.", "La verdad que nos gusto más de lo que esperábamos, no pasamos nada de frío pese a estar nevando allí, tienes la estación de metro a menos de 5 minutos andando, y a parte muchos sitios buenos en los que comer y cenar a menos de 10 minutos andando. Calidad/precio muy bueno.", "Appartamento pulito , centrale  e con molti ristoranti nelle vicinanze.", "Super zentral, perfekte Lage. 
", "L'alloggio è ubicato al centro di Sofia. Perfetto e ben servito. L'appartamento non è grande ma c'è tutto ciò che serve. Consigliato.", "Sehr zentral, direkt an der Fußgängerzone und vielen Sehenswürdigkeiten. Alles in der Wohnung was man braucht.", "Die Kommunikation war einwandfrei! Der Check-In und Check-Out lief super! Die Wohnung liegt zentral und man ist zu Fuß schnell im Zentrum und hat jede Menge gute Essmöglichkeiten in der Nähe. Die Wohnung war ordentlich, dass Bad war mir persönlich ein bisschen zu klein und es hat etwas aus dem Ausfluss gerochen. Über die Küche kann ich nichts sagen, die habe ich nicht benutzt. Insgesamt war es ein angenehmer Aufenthalt.", "Ottima posizione, appartamento basic ma non manca nulla, prezzo basso.  Consigliato", "Ottima posizione e ottima accoglienza. Casa tranquilla e comoda, ideale per due persone. Maria fornisce molte guide e informazioni a disposizione per i turisti.", "Appartement bien situé, propre et fonctionnel, parfait pour un bon séjour ! J'y retourne sans hésitation !", "Alloggiare nell'appartamento di Iva è stato molto molto positivo. La posizione è sicuramente il punto di forza dell'appartamento, in pieno centro e circondato da tutti i servizi e diversi ristoranti e bar tutti molto interessanti. La casa è comoda, vi è tutto il necessario e Iva è molto disponibile. In realtà non ho assoluatemnte nulla da obiettare tranne il fatto che, a quanto pare non per colpa loro, non abbiamo mai avuto acqua calda e stare 4 giorni senza acqua calda e soprattutto con l'acqua freddissima di sofia, è stato un disagio non indifferente. Ma per correttezza devo anche dire che Iva aveva reso disponibile la sua casa per una doccia. Perciò...consigliatissima come host e come appartamento. Alla prossima.", "Het appartement is schoon, voorzien van alles en ligt zeer gunstig.", "Appartement très bien situé, calme, propre et pratique. Cuisine bien équipée, parfait pour visiter Sofia à pied. On recommande !", "La casa è come appare nelle foto, piccola ma accogliente. La posizione è molto centrale, siamo riusciti a muoverci a piedi senza problemi. Nelle vicinanze ci sono tutti i servizi. L'ospitalità è stata eccellente, siamo rimasti in contatto tutto il periodo della permanenza. Consigliatissima per brevi permanenze. ", "Kommunikation und Check-in verliefen wunderbar, die Wohnung ist sehr zentral und ruhig. Ich habe mich sehr wohl gefühlt und kann die Wohnung absolut empfehlen.", "Io e mia sorella abbiamo passato 4 giorni (di neve) bellissimi a Sofia.
Iva è stata velocissima per ogni messaggio inviato e molto gentile: ci ha dato informazioni dettagliate per arrivare all'appartamento e molti consigli utili per la nostra permanenza.
L'appartamento è piccolino ma perfetto per due persone e totalmente consigliabile per un breve soggiorno nella capitale.
", "Posizione tranquilla e silenziosa ma vicinissima al centro, consigliato", "Iva est une hôtesse très accueillante. Aucune mauvaise surprise sur le logement et un emplacement idéal au cœur de la capitale bulgare"]

reviews:
["The space is neat, cozy, well located and has a nice view. Thanks to Lilly for being a nice and informative host.", "Perfect location , price and independent place in Sofia.Good communication.", "Central location, flawless stay, very small bathroom, the room is worth its price.", "Good location, perfect communication with the host. Very good place if you are looking for cheap, clean safe and friendly place in Sofia!!!", "This place is just as cosy and lovely as it looks like in the photos. Everything about it felt charming and I simply loved my stay there. The location itself is outstandingly accessible with the public transport and was easy to get to almost every point in Sofia. Highly recommended!", "Just what I needed, a warm, clean, comfortable, convenient and very affordable spot in a great area close to shops, metro, etc.", "Had a comfortable and peaceful stay.", "It’s small but enough to one person to stay one or two nights, and Lilly is so nice!", "the flat is really unique and the self checkin/checkout system is super interesting.  It is in a quiet neighborhood near sofia university.  everything is within walkable distance.  the bathroom is tiny but manageable.  Lily responds quickly for any inquiry.  sofia is a very nice city.  i enjoyed every moment of it.  will repeat for sure :)", "small and quiet place, all is well. thank!", "The loft is very tiny, but has everything necessary for one person.", "Well this place is great value for money. If you want a private tiny living space for backpacker price range, then this is the place for you. It's quite clean, good location and in a nice neighborhood.  
Check in and out made easy with the key lock mechanism.", "It is really easy to check in and out. Very small space, but it has almost all the basic things that you need. The shower place is really super tiny, and the bed is not made for very tall people, but with this price it is worth it! Lilly is very easy to reach, i had a problem with the warm water, it was fixed a few hours later! You get what you bought, i would recommend the place and i would come again.", "Lilly's place is very sweet and clean. It's small, but the location is really central, close to public transport and everything you could possibly need. I recommend it and would come back again. It's good value for the price offered.", "Lilly's place is stylish and in a very convenient location, near the European Union metro station. It's a small but well organised space with some very convenient amenities like a kettle and a mini fridge. It was a good base from which to visit Sofia.", "Very easy to check in and out. Small space has almost all the basic things  that you need. And very good location. Just the shower place is super tiny, but with this price is super worthy! Recommend!", "It's a great little space to get some good sleep in a very green and quiet part of central Sofia. Close to great grocery store and good coffee near European Union station at the mall. Definitely recommend for a no-frills, comfortable and clean sleep and shower! ", "Everything was ok", "The appartment was nice and cozy, walkable distance from the city centre, communication with Lilly was great, she responded very quick. Overall, would recommend for a short stay in Sofia :))", "Everything was allright,except renovation works noise from neighbours and problems with water in shower.Water very cold or very hot not", "Good apartment. A bit smaller bathroom but is precisely described. Excellent location.", "It was a really nice stay in a good location; I had some difficulties checking in at first, but Lilly was easily available so I could get in on time :) If you want to stay in the room, just be reminded the room and especially the bathroom is really small. All in all it was worth the price :)", "quiet, clean and easy to walk to the city center. Lilly was really helpful in both getting to and from the airport. would stay again!", "Very nice apartment for a short stay, excellent value for money and walking distance to everything.", "Despite that we had a little misunderstanding about how to enter the apartment, everything is as described in the profile. The apartment is more of a tiny studio but enough for a single traveler on a budget. The location is definitely great, considering the price! Very clean and cosy.", "a small place that you need for your holidays.
is located near the center of the city in a beautiful neighborhood.
there are many shops around as well as stopping the meter 10 minutes with feet!
the host discreet !! I get it", "If you are looking for a confortable and quite place where to sleep choose It. Very well located, internet exellent.", "I hope see you next time", "It is a nice bedroom, with a nice bed. Its comfortable and not cold. Its clean and you have tools to prepare tea or coffee. Its quiet and calm. The arrival system is automathised so its comfortable and quickly. The bathroom is very small. The price is very cheap, then I recommend the place.", "Great host. Responded quickly and everything was as advertised.", "Cozy and tiny accommodation close to the center.", "Good value in walking distance to the city center. Its small, but so is my budget. A great place to sleep.", "Чудесна локация и уютна стая!", "Мястото е удобно и точно както на снимките. Блокът е малко стар но за цемата е перфектно. Точно в Центъра на София до НДК близко до южният и борисова всичко е на 20 мин пеша или 5 с такси. Страхотна комуникация със собственичката. Има хавлий и интернет", "Keine Duschkabine. In der WC sollte ich duschen und ganze Wasser gat sich vor der Tür in der Flur gesammelte. 
Ganze Zeit war nass. 
Die Regale waren verstaubt."]

reviews:
["A real surprise of an appartment - very cozy and pleasant. Also, an amazing vynil collection, jesus :)", "This place is really cozy. Calm neighbourhood, while being just 10 minutes walk from the very heart of the city centre. Perfect location.", "very cosy place to stay, nice neighbourhood and near by the center", "The apartment is in a great, safe location only 20 minutes walk from the centre.
It was super comfortable, with everything I needed for an enjoyable stay.
Maxi was a great host, and was always on hand if needs be. Will definitely look forward to staying again.", "Great location, charming apartment. You can find everything what you need for your trip. I really liked art map of Sofia that was left on the table :)", "Stay was just ok at the place. The location is decent as it's within a ten-twelve minute walk from downtown/city center and sights, the layout of the place is great with it's open floor plan and artworks decor but unfortunately the place had cleanliness issues and a couple of the furniture pieces were broken (dining chair was not to be used and the office chair had  its wheels fall off). There were no hospitality touches such as fresh soap etc, and the kitchen cabinets were a bit of a mess. Lot's of potential but still work to do..", "Maxi was an outstanding host, helpful and way easy to get ahold of and his place was in a great location!Highly recommend!", "Beautiful apartment located top floor of building. Exceeded my expectations and we were always excited to come back at the end of the night. Very clean  and great location", "Grea place, great location, i would recommend the flat!", "Such a stylish flat - full of light and character. The perfect base from which to explore Sofia. Right next to a big park with woodland - perfect for running/ relaxing. Maxi left a book there full of really amazing recommendations - we were blown away by Sofia, what a great city and easy to get to the mountains too.", "A nice cosy and well appointed apartment.", "I can recommend this place to anyone who wants to visit Sofia, but also wants a quiet place to stay! It is perfectly located, there are supermarkets and restaurants in the neighboorhood, and it is only 5 minutes walking to the metrostation( from there I think 5 minutes and you are in the city centre).The place itself is beautifully decorated and gives you a nice and comfort feeling! It is also very clean! What more do you want?:) Also the contact with Maxi was good and quick! :)", "A quirky interesting light and airy studio with a cute balcony. Very comfortable space and a 20 minute walk from the centre of Sofia. Fantastic power shower and comfy bed. Could easily live there! 5 minutes walk to metro station and 4 stops to central railway station. A few cafes and food shops and beer shop about 5 minutes walk. The cafe at the back of the walkway of the shops next to the monument  a lovely young man working providing good coffee freshly baked bread and soup and moussaka.", "Thank you so much. It was a great experience to stay in Maxi’s flat. It was stylish, clean and nice. I really enjoyed being here.", "We really enjoyed our stay at this stylish and quirky studio, close to the centre of Sofia and the metro. Maxi’s communication was prompt and check in was smooth. Would recommend ", "beautiful sunny flat in a quiet and lovely part of sofia. maxi is really friendly and made everything easy. i would love to stay here next time i am in the city. ", "Stylish apartment, great location and lighting. Sound system was a nice touch. ", "Staying at Maxi's place was a great time! We loved the open space of the apartment and felt right at home. The view of the mountains from the balcony was a great touch as well! Maxi was very hospitable and even offered to swing by and do our laundry for us, which was very nice. The space offered a large combined living room/bedroom, medium-sized bathroom, and small kitchen with two stovetop burners. Only issue we had was the communication with our host, which was a little slow when we really needed it not to be.  Otherwise, my boyfriend and I greatly enjoyed our stay at Maxi's!", "Excellent apartment! Spacious and great location! ", "Lovely artistic decor, excellent location and always available host. Great stay.", "Maxi's place is in a great location - quiet and peaceful, yet within 10 minutes walk of bars, restaurants and sights, and 5 minutes walk from the metro. The apartment is very stylish and has a lovely energy. It was a great place to relax and chill out, but also to take in some of what the city has to offer. I'd definitely recommend it!", "Great location and beautiful space", "Very highly recommended.", "It has been a great stay, almost at the heart of Sofia. Walking distance to loads of prime locations in town. Very stylish open space with a balcony which is a big plus. Pristine clean. Maxi is really helpful. Many thanks!", "maxi's house is a cosy penthouse to stay over in Sofia, and most of the tourists spots are within walking distance. maxi is also very helpful to solve our parking problem. thanks!", "I have stayed in many Air BnB’s in different countries and this was my favourite place. We arrived late evening and maxi made every effort to make sure we got into the apartment okay. Maxi was very easy to get in touch with and also spoke perfect English. The apartment was beautiful and spacious, in a quiet location but near enough to the centre. I would recommend this apartment for anyone visiting Sofia!", "Maxi's apartment is really well located, with a great little balcony for air on a warm day. The open plan style of the living/sleeping area suited me really well, and I loved the big windows letting so much light in. I never used the kitchen, so can't comment on that, but found the bathroom adequate. The bedding was a little dated, but that is the only minor thing I can mention in a negative light. Definitely recommended as a base in Sofia!", "Maxi is a great host. He has a very nice stylish flat with a great sound system. The interior of the apartment is delicious, you enjoy just being inside. There was no iron and hair dryer in the apartment, but in the morning Max brought them. And I think he bought new ones, so there should not be problems in the future. Thank you. Recommend to everyone.", "Everything was perfect! Thank you Maxi!", "A light, spacious and clean apartment. Well located. Great stay!", "all great, highly recommend! very stylish place, quiet, great location. thank you!", "We had a nice stay at Maxi`s place. The Apartment is really well located and has everything you need to be comfortable.", "Great ***", "Maxi's place is perfect for travelers who want to enjoy the closeness of city center, but still have a very peaceful place. Great equipment, very pleasant place to sleep. We hope to come back some day!", "The place was great. Good location, spacious room for 2 and a beautiful city. Would definitely recommend.", "Great stay, great apartment and great location. Loads of shops with loads of options. Nice place.", "We liked our stay at Maxi's apartment a lot. He is very quick to communicate and the place is very well located. Highly recommended if you are looking to stay in Sofia. Would definitely stay there again.", "Nice apartment, near to the metro station and at 20 minutes from the city center by walk. Max was very kind and and excellent host.", "Maxi's open plan, stylish space offered us a very relaxing and inspiring stay. Very close to the best Bulgarian Architecture university, we imagine a talented designer used to live in this pad. 
Great location, close to the metro and trams, allowed us to happily explore the capital. We are looking forward to revisiting.", "Maxi was an excellent hosts with suggestions on places to go and very responsive. The appartment is flawless!", "Very nice studio decorated in artsy style, with great attention to detail and spotless. Maxi replied in a very efficient manner, helped me with my bag and gave me useful suggestions for restaurants and trips. He's very reliable and kind. I will reserve again when in Sofia.", "Thank you for a great time at the Atelier. The apartment is beautiful, very spacious, full of light, and well heated. The internet is very fast and the water pressure excellent. The host was very friendly, and gave us tips we wouldn't have found elsewhere. We will be back.", "I highly recommend staying in Maxis apartment. Although it is not directly in the city centre, it is easy to get there (by tram that goes every 5 minutes or just by taking a 20 minute walk). Nearby are nice grocery stores and restaurants. We appreciated especially a place named Izbata. If your staying in Sofia, you should give the free tours a try - really worth it. If you feel lazy, you can have a nice time in the apartement and for example enjoy the view on the mountains from the balcony.", "The flat is located in a nice , quiet neighbourhood close to the city center, with everything around for shopping.  
The Appartment itself is big , clean , and has got lots of daylight.
Maxi was very helpful and quick to answer messages.
Thanks again I would definetly stay again !", "perfect place for a getaway! Amazing space and great location!", "Great flat in the perfect location. Everything was easy and went smoothly. Can only recommend! Only negative is that in January when we stayed in the flat it was cold in the flat and the heating not sufficient.", "Fantastic location in a quite place and just 200 m to the famous Swing'n Hall Music Club in Sofia. Great host uncomplicated and friendly. Flat with character of a painters studio with hundreds of vinyl records which brought me back in the time I was sixteen. Thank you Maxi it was a great stay in Sofia.", "Here you find everything, a nice place, cosy, spacious and luminous, a really convenient location, in a nice neighborhood, really close to the center, and with all transportation nearby, a super host, kind and efficient. Highly recommended!", "A very stylish apartment about a 10 minute walk from the centre.", "We loved our stay here! Very spacious and clean apartment. Close to the metro and very easy to walk just about anywhere in the city center. Maxi recommended Pod Lipite restaurant which is just a couple of blocks away and it was outstanding. Best meal we had while in Sofia. I highly recommend this apartment!", "Maxis apartment was great. We were in Sofia in winter and heater was great. Location is perfect. Quiet yet close to city. Maxi is great in responding quickly. Sofia is a great city.", "The location of the apartment was close to central areas and nestled in a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle. Really loved the aesthetics of the whole apartment as it was the perfect space for my 4 days in Sofia. View was really good as well. Would definitely recommend.", "What a host. I think Maxi couldn't be more relax. The place is beautiful and very clean. We had to study for a few days aswel and the place is just perfect to hang around. Thanks Maxi!", "The place was perfect had every thing we needed from a wine opener to amplifier and loudspeakers so we could play music from the smartphone. Maxi waited for us in the apartment although the flight was late , took care of getting for us a cub when we had to return at 4:30AM . and was very responsive for all our needs. the location was easy walk everywhere and the building is clean and nice we loved every minute thank you Maxi", "Great place to stay in great area! Fair warning - Maxi’s place is on the top floor of a 6 or 7 floor apartment complex and there is no elevator. Get ready for LOTS OF STAIRS! This should not deter you from the home though, since it was an excellent place to stay.", "We had a lovely stay at Maxi's. The neighbourhood is peaceful and very close to the centre and the apartment has beautiful views and is very spacious. Great hosting from Maxi & Pavel as Maxi was away during our stay but still contactable.", "Great place, dont miss the small market nearby and the coffeeshop at its end.", "In a quiet part of Sofia yet within very close walking distance of the heart of the city. Spacious with quirky bits of furnishings. Recommend this apartment and Maxi was accomodating and helped organise a taxi to take me to the airport. Well worth te stay.", "maxi is a great host and the flat is just a beautiful place. a good spot to start exploring sofia and a great spot just to relax your feets after walking around.
the contact to maxi was easy and he responded very quick!", "Great spacious apartment with balcony. Clean space, equiped kitchen, good bed. Eating spots nearby and otherwise 20min walk into the city. Nearby is a great park to hang out.
The apartment building itself is very quiet, but sleepling with the windows open, the street traffic can get quite loud in the morning (we had earplugs and were fine!).", "The property is an amazing value.  Close to transport, the city center, shopping, inexpensive food vendors, farmers market, the main city park, at the same time reasonably quiet.  The owner was responsive to all our needs while remaining unobtrusive as can be.  The check in/out procedures were simple and prompt.  Be prepared to carry your luggage 4 floors up/down, but the owner offered help help.", "The apartment was big and walking distance from the centre. It can be a little hot during the summer but the apartment was endowed with a fan, which was very useful. Maxi was very kind and helped us with our luggage before our departure. Definitely to recommend.", "Great spot to visit Sofia from!", "The apartment is situated right behind thr architecture university and only 10 to 15 min to the center of sofia! Despite the balcony there is a nice loft feeling at maxis place and i really enjoid the trip! The apartment was clean, the checkin was very friendly and i had no problems at all with the accommodation. ", "Superbly decorated place in a great location, could not ask for anything better. Maxi is a great host and takes care of you very well. You can really see the effort he puts into it!", "Maxi's place was full of character; a stylish and comfortable base for exploring the beautiful city of Sofia and surrounding areas. We were greeted by a friend of Maxi's, a lovely guy who took the time to show us around the local area, and importantly, where to find a cold beer nearby! After spending the day exploring the city, we loved coming back to Maxi's place and putting a record on whilst relaxing in this fantastic apartment. Maxi's style permeates the whole apartment and has got to be the best choice of Airbnb in the city. A 5 to 10 minute walk will get you into the city, and there are trams almost directly outside the apartment. We have already recommended Maxi's place to friends and hope to return ourselves soon! Roisin and James. ", "Great place if you're staying in Sofia!", "This was the perfect nest for our short little stint in Sofia, it was clean and simple with everything you'd need to feel at home in the city. we found it a really great location and ended up exploring by foot mostly. Would suggest this gem to anybody. Maxi was super helpful and check in was real smooth after a long old journey! ", "The Atelier is well-located in the heart of a great area, close to restaurant and grocery. The studio is quiet, comfortable, and beautiful, and has everything you need for a pleasant stay. Maxi is very easy going and friendly, and will do everything to be sure you enjoy your time in Sofia. ", "A truly beautiful and comfortable studio. A design of the main room was outstanding. Had a vinyl player which was great for a nice evening atmosphere! Very recommend for a pleasant stay in Sofia!", "We had a fabulous weekend at Maxis place! The apartment was super charmant, clean and exactly what we wanted to feel homey. Great view from the balcony, nice and quite for a good nights sleep, but also very close to the city center - either by tram or walking. Maxi was very reliable and quick in answering any questions. My friends and I would book and recommend it again and again.", "My partner and I didn't want to leave! This home has the perfect combination of comfort, ambiance and charm and a view that is breathtaking. The location is nestled within a sweet community and beautiful landscape and is within walking distance to the center of the city. We would definitely rebook Maxi's place for our next trip to Sofia. ", "Maxi's place was great. A three-minute walk to the the Metro Station. The apartment was comfortable and quiet, and Maxi was a great host.", "Really nice localization and Maxi is very helpful!", "Maxi was a great host! I had a late flight and he was happy to meet me when I arrived. He was great at communication before and during my stay. 

The flat was lovely. Very comfy with everything I needed and in a good location. Great set of records as well which was an added bonus. 

Thanks Maxi! ", "The apartment was perfect for two on a long weekend city getaway. Quiet and relaxing, the studio is located on the outskirts of central Sophia and within walking distance of downtown. The apartment had everything we needed, and was just what we expected from the description. The amenities were clean and comfortable, check-in and -out were easy, and Maxi was a fantastic host.", "Just grab this place
Everything is perfect ", "We did not see Maxi very much but he did what he could to help us through text messages and phone calls. The house is perfect, looks exactly how you see in the picture. We could go walking  to the main places in Sofia. Very central and clean. I know, there was no elevator... only stairs but Maxi made it clear from the beginning. Definitely , I would go back. Great place and a great guy. ", "Schön eingerichtete Wohnung in bester Lage. Die Innenstadt ist zu Fuß erreichbar. Maxi ist ein netter Gastgeber, sehr zu empfehlen!", "Die Unterkunft hat uns sehr gut gefallen. Wir haben uns von Anfang an sehr willkommen und heimisch gefühlt. In der Wohnung gibt es viel zu entdecken und uns fehlte an nichts. Maxi ist ein toller Gastgeber! Wir kommen gern wieder!", "Het appartement was voor ons precies goed. Rustig in de nacht, gezellige drukte overdag (er is een universiteit tegenover het gebouw). ‘s Nachts is er een beetje levendigheid, met name rond de nachtwinkel op het plein om de hoek. Maar daar merk je dus niets van. 
Let er wel op, het appartement is op, ik denk, de 5e verdieping, zonder lift. 
Naast die nachtwinkel is er een metro station op 10 minuutjes lopen (met directe verbinding naar het vliegveld) en het centrum heb je met 20 minuten echt wel bereikt. Winkels en restaurants zitten al veel dichterbij ook.
Maxi is een host/gastheer zoals het hoort; hij was er bij aankomst, liet ons de stapel plattegronden zien van de omgeving die we mochten gebruiken en gaf ons wat tips om te doen en hoe er te komen.
Sofia is mooie stad, zeker een stedentripje waard en in vergelijking met Nederland zijn de prijzen er lager.", "Heel gezellig appartement.", "Eine wirklich schöne Unterkunft in Sofia. Nicht direkt im Zentrum, aber gut gelegen, um alles zu erreichen. Maxi ist unkompliziert und hilfsbereit. Wir hatten eine gute Zeit!", "Het appartement is erg mooi en ruim, en heeft alles wat je nodig hebt. Maxi was een behulpzame en aardige host, ik zou zijn plek zeker aanbevelen!", "Super appartement ! A 15 min du centre à pied, mais cela permet de se balader dans les rues du "vrai" Sofia ! 
Appartement idéal pour 2. 
Maxi est un super hôte.
Je conseille !"]
