reviews:
["Very nice place! It is very comfortable and cozy. Perfect for couple or family with kids.", "The appartement is very nice and well located", "Beautiful cozy and spacious home, with very convenient location, within walking distance from many places of interest - sightseeing, cafes, restaurants, shops. Would love to stay there again, and definitely highly recommend. 
Diliana And Slav, thank you.", "It's one of the best apartments in Sofia at the moment. Yes it's true. Completely renovated, center of the city, pedestrian zone, a lot of markets, bars etc. Just rent it and you will understand that the apartment is really cool. Hosts are very nice people. I wish them all the best!", "Slav and Diliana were great. Very helpful and welcoming hosts. They recommend great restaurants and things to do. The apartment was super clean and even better than the pictures, very modern and comfortably furnished.   Just a couple of minutes by foot from the most popular monuments in Sofia and close to the city life, his apartment let us explore the amazing Sofia in the best way possible. The beds were really comfy and there were also enough spare towels amongst the other essentials. Highly recommend and would definitely want to stay here again the next trip to Sofia!", "We had wonderful stay at the apartment! It is beautiful and large, and we had everything we needed. Nice views from the hammock makes daydreaming too easy. The Wifi was strong. The elevator is on the small side and only fits 2 people comfortably (or 3 if you get real close). Very central location and everything that we wanted to see was within walking distance. It was really nice to meet the hosts, Diliana and Slav, who made us feel very welcome.", "Nice apartment in good position", "The apartment is great! it is spacious, clean and well decorated. However the building could use some renovations as it is old. location is also great.", "The appartment was great. A great location with a great view. 
The elevator is an antique, which I liked, but was a bit scary haha...
We did have an issue with the hot water in the shower... aside from that everything was perfect. The hosts sent us many reccomendations and were very nice. The appartment was very stylish and plesent.", "Great central location and a lovely apartment in an old period building. The 1900’s Schindler lift was very atmospheric! The apartment was on the top floor and is tastefully decorated. Beds were comfortable and the shower was strong, however be careful as its a wet room and slippery when you come out. Front bedroom overlooks the rod and you can hear the trams below well into the night, although not too much of a problem. Definitely recommend staying here as a decent apartment in a central location with a supermarket close by.", "Outstanding! What a surprise! Sofia, rila mountains and the apartment!Amazing weekend ! wish that was my house!!", "The apartment was great! Exactly as photographed and described. Self check in was  simple and instructions were clear. We had an issue with the water heater and the host did a great job fixing it without much inconvenience. And thanks again for the gifts! The neighborhood is pretty central although a little rough around the edges. Glad the apartment was so nice because the building is very old. Be brave when taking the elevator. And check out the small indoor/outdoor bar across the street!", "The apartment was great, exactly like in the pictures. Check in was very easy and communication with the host was good", "The apartment is big, clean and modern with all the equipment you need. The position, just near Serdika metro station, is the best to visit the city center on foot and to go to the airport by metro. A very nice solution for a family weekend in Sofia!", "We had a wonderful time staying at Diliana and Slav's place. The apartment is located in the City Center, sparkling clean and had all amenities. The Hammock and the Chalk board defiantly gave the apartment a special touch.
Very much recommended.", "Awesome place. The apartment is beautiful, roomy, comfortable, and in walking distance from most local attractions. Lorein (who administrated for D & S) was attentive and thoughtful, and available to help when needed. I will definitely stay there if/when I visit Sofia again!", "Exceptional in everyway.  I've stayed in a lot of AirBnB's but this was the nicest.  Great design, clean, bright (with blackout shades to sleep late).  Sad I did not book it for longer.", "Nice apartment!", "Fantastic place, great host, good location. Would highly recommend.", "Very nice place, value for money!", "It is such a stylish space with unique touches. The main entrance of the building and the old elevator do not implicate you will have such a modernized apartment. Lorein and her colleagues did really a great job turning the apartment into such an artistic peace or work! ", "Lovely apartment, stylish decor. Good amenities (washing machine, dishwasher, air con). Next to tram line so be prepared for some noise. Good location. Nice local area and reasonable walk to sights - 15-20 minutes. Hosts were very good at responding to queries and provided some great restaurant recommendations. Check in was easy with keysafe and very clear directions from hosts. Would definitely recommend. ", "Super cool place, very clean and well equipped. Definitely recommend. ", "Absolutely beautiful apartment in the most amazing location!!!", "The apartment is exactly as pictured. It has been renovated with meticulous care. The internet and TV work well and the air conditioning in all three rooms is very effective. The directions for entering and leaving the apartment were very detailed and accurate. Be aware that the apartment is on the 6th floor but a small elevator services it well and the view is great. Communication is very important with Airbnb and our host, Lorie, did an excellent job in providing everything we needed for a successful visit to Sofia. We used several of her recommendations for dining and found the city very accessible. The close proximity  of Pirotska street,  the Metro, the Central Market, bakeries, and the Women's Market made the location perfect.", "Great location & Great apartment ", "lovely large bright modern apartment", "Beautiful flat and exactly as advertised. The shower is amazing and the views are great.
It’s very central to great sights, but a bit far from good eating places. The building itself isn’t quite in a great state (lift a bit scary, but totally reliable), but after all that the apartment is a lovely surprise.", "Great spacious and stylish apartment with two large bedrooms and a cool living space. Clear instructions for self check-in. ", "This apartment is centrally located, clean, spacious and comfortable. Check-in was a breeze. The hammock is great for an afternoon nap.
Overall, I would highly recommend this apartment.", "This is a cool, modern, large flat. It's got great light, is spotless and is nicely decorated. The host was super helpful. The one thing to note is that while it's one km from all the action, it's a bit of a scruffy area compared to the rest of the centre. I felt safe walking home at night even though it was really quiet there.", "Nice place!", "Stylish home with all required amenities. Elevator to the building was really old but seemed sturdy. Overall pretty satisfied.", "The apartment is stylish, comfortable and just a 5 minute walk from all the great sights in Sofia. A great place to hang out when the heat gets a bit too much! Simple self check-in process that made it easy for us to get in even though we didn’t arrive until 2am. A great Airbnb property.", "Amazing place, walking distance to the center of town, inside the flat every little detail is taken care of, feels like home.", "We did not meet Diliana and Slav in person, but their apartment is lovely. Great location and nicely decorated. Would recommend.", "Lovely flat. Everything you could want. Good location. Short walk to the main street. Lift looks a bit scary but works!", "Myself and three friends spent a Wonderful long weekend in Diliana and Slavs lovely apartment. The apartment was stunning and very comfortable. We loved how spacious it was and really enjoyed our time in Sofia! Communication with the hosts was great  and check in was easy and stress free. Thanks for having us!", "Great stay, hosts were very helpful with checkin and my early arrival. Lovely place and non touristy location!", "Great and lovely apartment in good location. Apartment is 100% like the pictures and description.
Uncomplicated check in and check out and very nice and helpful hosts.
Perfect for groups and a citytrip to Sofia.", "We were a group of friends. And we couldn't have hoped for a better place to stay. The apartment is well located but most important is that it is such beautiful and homey place. We truly enjoyed the exploration of Sofia, going to Rila, but coming home was a real gift as well. We could share our experiences around the fire/candle place, we prepared our own breakfast in the well equipped kitchen and we always did feel at home. Moreover the owner's did check in with us regularly to see whether all was going well. It all went so smooth! They also provided many tips. We had an excellent time. And we do hope to come back next year to also visit Plovdiv when it is the cultural capital of Europe.", "Amazing place as shown on the pictures. Check in was very convenient and the host very helpful, polite and available.
Good location not fat from the heart of sofia. I definitely recommend you to book this flat if you are around...", "Dilana and Slav made everything very easy. This apartment is super stylish and comfortable with a great bathroom, useful kitchen and comfortable beds. It is on the sixth floor so not good for the unfit! The views are brilliant and the location is fascinating- a very local neighbourhood next to the markets. Sofia is a fantastic and easy place to explore.", "We had an amazing 3 days in Sofia. The appartment is just awesome and is well localized. Everything is walking distance and the Metro is just 5 min from the appartment. Diliana and Slav did everything to make our stay unforgettable and provided useful information on the best places to visit in Sofia.", "The apartment is beautiful and we had a very interesting and fun stay. Slav was very helpful in the run up to our holiday and the apartment is very close to all of the points of interest within the city. I would highly recommend a stay here!", "We enjoyed Diliana and Slav's place. It was exactly as pictured and described. Clean, neat, artsy, and with an amazing view. I will definitely return.  Thank you to our hosts!", "Nice apartment.", "Diliana and Slav have been fantastic hosts - our check in was very late but they left clear instructions so that the process was as smooth as possible. The apartment itself was spacious, stylish and had a great view of Vitosha mountain and the rooftops of the city. The hammock is a great addition and adds some uniqueness to this lovely apartment. Would definitely stay again if in Sofia in the future!", "Very beautiful place with great decoration. The bedrooms were spacious and the beds very comfortable. We had a scruple about the sofa but in the end it was very comfortable for two persons to sleep. Me and my friends enjoyed our stay there and Diliana and Slav were very helpful when we needed them... The only disadvantage was the scary elevator. Very close to the center of the town and only 10-15 minutes by car from the airport... Generally about Sofia, for the future visitors if you going to visit the city by car, make sure that you going park your car to a private parking lot as the local policemen adviced us...", "We had a very nice time in this apartment. The location is very central, metro and tram are very close. The apartment is stylish and very clean, and there is a hammock! We only had one little issue with the shower, since the boiler was running out of water after 2 people showered. But of course, that is not a big of a deal. Overall, I really would recommend this apartment to others, it is a great place!!", "Very nice apartment:) Everything is perfect except limited of hot water.", "The apartment was brilliant - so well located and we loved the design. It was very bright and spacious, with amazing views of Vitosha mountain! We felt right at home with all the extra touches. Slav was extremely helpful and gave us lots of information which made all aspects of our trip much easier. We would definitely recommend and would love to come back again!", "Very stylish place, very clean and clear check in procedures. Will definitely stay at the place again if i come back to sofia!", "Lovely apartment, very chic! Easy to communicate with the hosts and enjoyed our stay. Possibly a 15 minute walk into town centre but local shops and cafes available.", "Best airbnb ever! Great place to stay, spacy, clean, nice details, good location, great shower, good beds, easy check in and out. Good access from the airport by metro, Serdika stop. Take the free shuttle to the other terminal if necessary. 
Highly recommended!!!", "Diliana and Slavs place is great.. thoughtfully and tastefully appointed with lovely artistic decor and practical white goods..fridge, freezer, oven, microwave, hob, washing machine...plus detergents...I rarely am this organised in my own house!! Short 15 min walk to vitosha and all the bars and restaurants... brilliant self check in that made arriving on a late plane easy as we didn't have to worry about putting anyone out.. brilliant place..loved it..thanks very much for letting us stay..", "Great place very stylish and close to everything", "Diliana and Slav's apartment is beautiful and charming. It's very stylish, fun, very clean, warm, equipped with everything that is needed and relatively quiet. We really enjoyed being in it. you should take in account that we have to wait between the showers if we want the water to be really hot, in our opinion it's worth it. In addition, you should be very careful with the elevator, because it is very old and can get stuck easily. The location of the apartment is excellent and close to everything, and although the building is a little old, we enjoyed the centrally location very well. Diliana and Slav are very nice and very responsive  through the site. They helped us planning our vacation and offer great ideas for for activities. We had a great time at this place.", "This apartment exceeded my expectations. The rooms were huge and comfortable and there was plenty of space for my family of 4. The hammock is a great touch and was very relaxing. Coffee and sugar along with some spices and other kitchen staples were provided. The location of the apartment was great. Diliana and Slav were very easy to communicate with and went above and beyond to provide us with a new baby cot after discovering the old one had been broken by a previous guest. We had a new one delivered to the apartment before the kids went to sleep our first night in Sofia. We would definitely stay at the apartment again if ever in Sofia again. Thanks!", "What a beautiful hidden gem in the centre of Sofia! The perfect apartment and the perfect hosts!!! Thank you for everything and I definitely will rent the apartment again when in Sofia. Absolutely loved it and recommend it.", "Sofia is a beautiful city and the AirBnB is in a great location, all the sites are easy to get to by foot. The walking tour that Diliana and Slav provided got us to all of the sights and they were quick in responding to any other questions we had. The apartment was great to relax in and on top of that the weather was lovely. Definitely a great trip!", "Really cool looking place with great views of the mountain. Check in was very easy. Beds were great and shower is amazing, but hot can run out so spread out the rota. Lovely touches and 5min walk to metro (serdika).", "Slav and Diliana’s flat is very clean and well furnished. It is more beauty than in the photos. It is comfortable and recently renovated. Slav was a great host even though we didn’t meet him in person. But he answered us very quickly so we hadn’t got any problems. 
I recommend a lot this flat, it is central and it seems to be at home. 
Thanks Slav and Diliana!", "We visited Sofia for a weekend with a group of friends and we can really recommend staying in this airbnb! It is really centrally located (we never used the metro) and the apartment itself is very light, cozy and it was super clean. Communication with Diliana and Slav was very easy and nice. 
If we come back to Sofia, we will definitely stay here again!", "Diliana and Slav’s place is spacious, central, clean and overall just very nice. Highly recommended.", "Diliana and Slav's apartment is exactly as shown. Its a beautiful space.  Diliana and Slav provided very clear check in instructions, and emailed us a couple of times during our trip to make sure we had everything we needed. In fact, Diliana even brought over a missing piece for the espresso machine. We looked forward to the view of Mt. Vitosha every day. Their recommendations for restaurants is spot on- Go to Furna Bakery and Mehana Mamin Kolyo - you won't be disappointed. There is an elevator. It is very small, quite old, but don't be alarmed! The machinery is clearly current and it ran very smoothly. The shower is wet-room style, with a partition separating from the toilet, rather than a completely enclosed shower stall. The water pressure was fantastic and the puddles drain pretty quickly.

This is a true neighborhood, within a block of the Women's Market, full of locals going about their business. We walked everywhere from their place, but if you like there is a tram across the street, the subway about 8 minutes walk. It took us maybe 30 minutes to walk to Aleksander Nevsky Cathedral. This was my first Airbnb stay and I was not disappointed at all.
Cheers,
Gina and Norah", "Lovely modern clean appartment! Perfect location! Close to everything you need! Easy self check in! Definitely recommend! Thank you again!", "This flat is amazing! Even better than the pictures! The neighbourhood is really nice and the position is convenient to many places because it is just in the centre of the city. 4 minute walking from the metro and many trams just downstairs. Diana and Slav sent me many suggestions and a wonderful (Hidden by Airbnb) map with all the direction (food and must see places) and two tours of the city. It was very easy communicating with them and they very very fast in replying. The apartment is fully equipped, also the kitchen but probably you'll take the advantage of the restaurants and markets. Having a nap on that hammock is just super relaxing and you can (Email hidden by Airbnb) e to Sofia. You'll be impressed! Can't wait to be back in Sofia and no doubt to stay in this flat.", "Absolute dream flat! Fully recommend!", "The apartment is exactly as advertised - the hosts add a personal touch too which makes your stay really that extra special. Thank you both again - we would definitely stay here again.", "Do not hesitate to book at Diliana and Slav's place! The apartment is in an excellent location in the heart of the city and the view from the hammock is fantastic. Check-in/out was smooth and hassle-free. The apartment was very comfortable and has everything you need. Diliana and Slav even recommended places to eat which were brilliant. Overall we had an amazing stay in Sofia - many thanks.", "The apartment is like the pictures, cosy and comfortable. I really recommended. The communication and info from the host was clear and they were very kind, and the sheets and towels were very fresh. Good location. The hammock was the best of the house. ", "Excellent spacious well furnished and decorated apartment which is in a walkable area of the city and there are local cafes for breakfast.

I would highly recommend staying here.", "Dilana and Slav's Airbnb is one of the best apartments I've visited. Looks exactly like on the photos and was fully equipped. I can highly recommend it because it's also perfectly connected to the airport with public transport. The hosts were really friendly and helped us with every question.", "Is exactly as on the pictures.
The hammock is usable and very cozy to fall a sleep.
In the surrounding there are nice shops and bars, the city center is within walking distance.
I would recommend that flat.", "Top place to stay in Sofia! Spacious,clean, central location, close to transport links, bars and restaurants. And of course great hosts! ", "The apartment itself is stunning - finished to a high standard yet still homely and comfortable. Perfect for a relaxing getaway. It's an ideal location for exploring the city, and you get a good view from the windows too (6th floor). We stayed for two nights. The kitchen has everything you need to self-cater should you wish (we cooked our own dinner and breakfast), and the apartment is spotlessly clean. Diliana and Slav were great at communicating all we needed to know, and we're on hand should we need any help. They also offered great suggestions, suited for our trip (places to eat, how to get around, etc). The enterance to the flat can be a little tricky to find, but if you follow the instructions, you shan't have a problem. You may need a torch as the communal hallway & stairwell (before you get into the flat) doesn't have lights. I would stay there again. Very nice flat, great hosts.", "The place is very cosy and clean. We especially liked the hammoc and the wall you can write on with chalk  Diliana and Slav were very helpful and caring hosts - they took care so that we have everything we need and even have left us a pack of nice cookies as welcome gift. The neibourghood is interesting and colorful, there's market for fresh products nearby. We could easily walk to all interesting places in the city. There's also a convenient metro station about 5 mins walk. Would definitely go back!", "My stay here was amazing and I loved the apartment and the location. The bedrooms were large, plenty of closet space, and most importantly very comfortable beds.", "Excellent!
Je recommande vivement cet appartement.
Il est moderne et très agréablement décoré (mention spécial pour la hamac :-)
L'appartement est très bien situé, proche du métro et de la mosquée.
Et je dois dire que l'organisation et le suivi par notre co-logeuse (Lorein) a été exceptionnel.
Toutes les explications pour trouver l'appartement et récupérer les clefs sont précises et accompagnées de fotos. On ne peut pas se tromper.
Lorein a même préparé des listes de restaurants et de circuits à pieds possibles pour visiter la ville. Ces recommandations étaient très pertinentes et utiles.
Lorein est très réactive lors de nos échanges d'email. Bravo!
Merci beaucoup et j'espère avoir l'occasion de revenir.
Yves", "Magnifique appartement parfaitement placé. L'ascenseur Schindler du début du siècle dernier est une expérience !! Des restaurants sympas et pas chers en toute proximité, la magnifique mosquée et non moins belle synagogue. Tout peut se faire à pied. Séjour très agréable dans l'ensemble. L'appartement est super bien équipé. Je recommanderais jsute de rajouter des lampes de chevet dans les chambres. La douche à l'italienne est très belle mais si on ne fait pas très attention, on inonde vite toute la pièce... Enfin, attention, l'heure du check-out est stricte et non négociable... J'ai été obligée de mettre mes bagages en consigne car pas de possibilité de les laisser dans l'appartement. Ceci dit, le lieu conseillé pour les consignes s'est avéré un lieu très sympa, Gifted Sofia, avec des idées de cadeaux très originaux et pas kitsch comme tout ce qu'on trouve dans les boutiques de "souvenirs" ! Lorein qui assure l'accueil est hyper réactive.", "", "Superschöne, geräumige Wohnung in zentraler Lage.", "Alloggio molto curato, posizione ottima e host molto gentile e disponibile.
Ci tornerò!
Grazie Diliana.
JUNO CONSULTING SRL", "Eine super saubere und sehr schöne Wohnung. Sie liegt sehr zentral und alles was man braucht ist nur ein paar Meter entfernt. 
Sehr freundliche und hilfsbereite Gastgeber, denen das Wohlergehen ihrer Gäste sehr am Herzen liegt.
Ich kann die Wohnung nur weiterempfehlen.", "L'appartamento di Slav e Diliana è a dir poco fantastico!
Si trova in una posizione molto comoda e in non più di un quarto d'ora a piedi è possibile visitare molte delle principali attrazioni di Sofia. La zona è molto tranquilla e piacevole.
Nell'appartamento abbiamo trovato tutto ciò che poteva servirci, anche per cucinare comodamente a casa. Il divano è molto comodo ed è stato davvero piacevole rilassarsi in soggiorno dopo aver camminato tutto il giorno in città.
La comunicazione con gli host è stata veloce ed impeccabile. Ci hanno anche inviato in anticipo una mappa molto utile con alcuni suggerimenti sulle principali cose da vedere e su alcuni ristoranti in zona.
Insomma, non si può chiedere di meglio! Grazie ancora
", "Alles war wie auf den Bildern. Eine super Lage und gute Tipps der Gastgeber. Absolut zu empfehlen!", "Apartamento de 10. Muy bien ubicado en poco menos de 15 minutos estarás en pleno centro de Sofia. El apartamento es tal cual las fotos, todo limpio e impecable, con todo detalle. Para repetir. Ademas Diliana y Slav te informan de todo y cualquier duda que tengas te ayudan.", "Das Appartement ist wunderbar, zwei wirklich große Zimmer, ein total gemütliches Wohnzimmer mit Hängematte! und Sofa natürlich:-)
Die voll eingerichtete Küche haben wir leider nicht genutzt, weil wir außerhalb gegessen haben. Das Badezimmer ist sehr modern, Alles total liebevoll eingerichtet, die Sicherheitstür gibt einem Nachts Ruhe!
Die Betten und die Bettwäsche waren ultragemütlich, selten so gut geschlafen. 
Man hört den Lift etwas und wenn die Fenster offen sind, die Straßenbahn, notfalls sollte man sich Ohrenstöpsel mitnehmen. 
Der Ausblick war ein Traum, hoch oben über den Dächern Sofias, einfach genial. 
Die Kommunikation mit den überaus netten Gastgebern war perfekt und der Self- Check-In und -out funktionieren reibungslos. 
Wir kommen wieder!", "Великолепная квартира, просторная, уютная, светлая, все есть для комфортного проживания. Фотографии квартиры полностью соответствуют действительности. Мы с мужем чувствовали себя как дома!!!"]

reviews:
["Monika and Jordan's place was stylish, clean, centrally located and overall extremely convenient. Our communication was easy and prompt, and we enjoyed our stay very much. Being located directly next to a park is a great perk. Highly recommended!", "Had a great time staying at Monika and Jordan's apartment. It's very clean and brand new and the television was perfect with Netflix on it :) would highly recommend. ", "My boyfriend and I spend a month and a half at Monika and Jordan's Airbnb. We had a wonderful time. The location was perfect. Right outside the front door, there is a large green park. Many sunny days were enjoyed strolling around. There is a nice grocery store about a 5 minute walk away, and many great restaurants in and around the area. You could easily walk to downtown Sofia (about 25-ish minutes), but we actually spent most of our time closer to home. The apartment itself was modern and clean. All the kitchen supplies you would need are provided. The bathroom was spacious and the rainfall shower was a nice feature. Monika and Jordan are very kind hosts. Monika even made us some homemade lemonade on our arrival, so nice :). If we are back in Sofia in the future, we would definitely stay here again!", "You can expect this property to look just like the pictures! Monica and Jordan arranged for Radi to pick me up from the airport and were quick to respond to any of my queries. Monica even came over the first night to ensure Netflix was logged in for me and show me around the kitchen (washing machine and dishwasher!). The bed linens smelled fresh and just washed and it lasted all week! The apartment was spotless, newly renovated and quite roomy. 

The location was a bit far from the city center for my solo trip. It was walkable for sure (20-30 min), but in rainy weather, it was not something I wanted to be doing twice or more a day. 

All in all, this place deserves all the positive remarks it has gotten. Thank you!", "I had a great experience staying in this flat. It is modern, clean and in a great location. The hosts are super responsive and ready to help out asap in case of questions/issues. Will definitely try to book it again for my next visit.", "Nice and clean. Will stay there again.", "The flat is as advertised. Very clean and bright. Perfect for a weekend trip to Sofia! Some very good restaurants nearby. In front of the flat, there is a nice park. All main attractions in Sofia are at a walkable distance from the flat. To sum up, we definitely recommend this place!", "Perfect place, front park (green area), at 15-20mn walk from city center.
if you want to feel like at home for sure this place is for you!", "The flat is brand renovated, modern and clean, great location in front of a park and 15 mins walk to city center, quite area, the bathroom is very comfortable with a strong shower, smart tv with Netflix, kitchen is very well equipped including coffee machine!
Monika and Jordan are very kind and reactive on any question, i can surely recommend it!", "All ok with no surprises", "Monika and Jordan are very nice hosts; they respond quick, where flexible with checking out a bit later and had various tips for eating outside. Their apartment is nicely located at a park and about 15min walking from the eagles bridge. The apartment is brand new, well equipped kitchen with an espresso machine including coffee :-), fast WiFi and Netflix! The apartment is also on the ground floor in case you don’t like walking a lot of stairs. We really enjoyed staying here!", "Very kind hosts with attention to detail and always responsive. We had a great stay and enjoyed some very local bars & restaurants.", "great place, super new .  location si fine   with   lots of nice  restaurants   nearby . perfect  size for a couple. nice to  tour  all days and unwind  here with netflix :)", "Nice and quiet, comfortable place, literally few meters to Zaimov park. 
The apartment is new, stylish and well-equipped and looks even better than in the photos. Monica is a friendly and responsive host.
Many thanks!", "Our stay at the oak house was very nice, the flat is spotless and well located, close to the center. I would definitely recommend it for a trip to sofia", "Monika and Jordan's place is clean, stylish, and centrally located. It is also well appointed with all the necessities you could need during your stay. Monika was a very gracious host and helped recommend restaurants and markets nearby.", "Perfect please, I recommend it", "This was a wonderful experience. Monika's apartment overlooks the Zaimov park in Sofia and is walking distance from all major sites in the city. Monika was super helpful and patient with me finding the place when I arrived. One of the best airbnb experiences in Sofia.", "Amazing stay at Monika and Jordan's place! They were extremely helpful beforehand responding to questions, and very flexible for when we arrived and checking-in and checking-out. 

The flat is in a great location, it is really clean and very well equipped with everything you could need for a very comfortable stay. Jordan was accommodating meeting us and helping us check-in, and helped us with recommendations for places to eat and drink when we arrived and throughout our time in Sofia.

I would thoroughly recommend a stay in this Airbnb and in Sofia, my girlfriend and I had an excellent time, and would not hesitate to return!", "This place was perfect for us, a family of three with a small child. The apartment was emaculate, with everything we needed for our five days. Two markets are within walking distance, including a couple restaurants, bakeries, and outdoor cafes. The highlight for us was the park at our doorstep. Our small child played on the playground everyday and it was full of families enjoying the evenings outdoors. There were trams as well, but we never used them as we were able to walk to many of the main sights, even with a baby stroller. The last two days we had a rental car, and Jordan showed us a nearby parking place which was very cheap (parking on the street is free at night, but only for residents during the day). And get this: our flight in was delayed 6 hours, so we arrived at 1:30 in the morning... upon hearing this, Jordan organized for someone to pick us up! What could have easily soured our holiday start was made much smoother thanks to the hosts, who were always available for tips and questions. It is experiences like this that keep us with Airbnb apartments.", "Wonderful location, immaculately clean, very comfortable brand-new apartment. Monika is warm and friendly and flexible (she allowed for late check-in and check-out) and gave us excellent advice. I would stay there again in a heartbeat. ", "Fantastic location in easy walk of some lovely bars and restaurants. Despite the great location, and being right by the park, it's still quiet and peaceful inside. 
Well-equipped, with fab internet, international TV, wonderful shower and comfy bed. 
Monika was easy to communicate with and responded quickly when we had queries. And what's not to love about arriving to find a bottle of cold wine in the fridge and a bowl of fresh raspberries! Thanks, Monika!
The only slight downside to staying during a heatwave is that the air con is in the living room - you can leave the bedroom door open and the cool air will circulate, but if there are more than two adults staying, it becomes a trade-off between privacy and cool air.", "Great place and great location, basicaly IN the park. If u walk out of the flat, u are in the park. Very cosy flat. We cooked twice and had all equipment there. Very modern. It was very hot when we were there and the airco worked perfectly. If we come back to Sofia we will stay there again.", "We really enjoyed our stay at Monika and Jordan's apartment. Communicating with the hosts was very easy. Our flight was delayed for 5 hours and Monika was able to accommodate us with a later check-in than what we had initially requested. Then, when the taxi dropped us at the wrong location, a couple of blocks away, Monika came to meet us and walk us to the apartment. The apartment itself is very clean, modern, and nicely furnished. The location is great as it is really close to the center and to many nice restaurants and shops. Monika is a great host and we'll definitely stay in this place again!", "The location is nice, central but not noisy. A well designed flat, very clean, tidy and comfortable, felt like home. Big plus for the dishwasher, coffee machine and the washing machine. Also you have really anything you need. The park was perfect for our daughter.  

The host Monika, was very kind, thoughtful and helpful. The communication was fast and easy. 

Wonderful place to stay, highly recommend, we would book anytime again. Thank you!", "The flat is gorgeous, Monica was a wonderful host and it was a perfect stay for a family with 2 kids- front of a beautiful park, short walk to downtown, everything you need nearby. Would stay again anytime! ", "The apartment looks like it was promoted on the web. Clean, comfortable, stylish and close to everything. Monika welcomed us very friendly when we came. She left coffee, tee, sugar - things, you can not every time find! And that was for me good detail! 
We felt like home. There was even tooth brush and tooth paste in case you forget them..
I highly recommend their flat to all who need lodging in Sofia .
Чудесен апартамент! Стилно и с вкус обзаведен, уютен, и с всичко необходимо. Препоръчвам на всичко, които търсят да отседнат в София. Благодарности!", "A big shoutout to Monika and Jordan for their apartment! It's exactly as described in airbnb! Very clean and tidy, everything renovated and very new! The hosts organized pickup from the airport! I would totally recommend staying there!!", "The hosts made great effort to adjust to my plans, and this was well beyond my expectations. The apartment is spotless clean, the design is cool, you have really everything you need. It is near a large park too, and in walking distance to Oborishte st. with a lot of places to eat.", "I highly recommand you this flat well located and wonderfull host Monika!!", "It has been great to stay at Monika's and Jason's place. They have been very nice and helpful. The apartment is amazing. Super clean, nicely decorated and has anything you would need. The neighbourhood is great. Close to centre and with very nice bars and restaurants. Don't hesitate to ask Monika some advices!", "We have experienced a great stay and hospitality at the Airbnb of Monika and ... . They helped us get to the apartment from and to the airportw even at night. 
The apartment itself is very clean, quiet and nice decorated.
Thank you for the great experience. ", "This is by far the best Airbnb experience I had. From the start Monika was easy to communicate, friendly and the apartment is really nice, clean and close to city centre. Can't recommend enough!", "Staying at Monika and Jordan's place was great. The house is very neat, cozy and clean. Everything is new with modern style. There is a beautiful park nearby - great for walking and jogging. Walking distance from the ideal center. Nice restaurants and bars nearby.", "We had a very pleasant stay at Monika's and Jordan's place. It was impeccably clean, you can find all items there that you need and all our questions were answered immediately (even at 11pm ;)). I can highly recommend this place and would like to thank our hosts again for all their help!  ", "Monika and Jordan are super host!!!! Nice, kind and thoughtful (they left toys for our small kids). The place is all that you want. Great location, close to the park, nice restaurants and theatres.  The appartment is fully renovated, clean and cozy. We loved our stay and hope to come back.  THANK YOU!", "Our stay at Monika and Jordan's apartment was wonderful. A clean, comfortable respite from the city. Great location--- near one of the best restaurants and bars, a supermarket nearby, lovely park and easy access to cabs. It made a great landing pad for our Sofia adventure. Monika had quick and accurate communication, always willing to help. Thanks for a wonderful stay! We hope to retune soon and would book the apartment again. ", "Great modern flat in central Sofia, close to the city center (easy walking distance). Flat was very modern and clean, felt like a real home for our stay in Sofia and was better than any hotel we saw online. Perfect communication with the hosts, they were always happy to help. They even helped to organize the transfer to the airport which was great. We also appreciated the complimentary bottle of wine as well as shampoo, and washing liquid for the washing machine. We had a lovely time in Sofia and would always stay at M&J's again, thanks a lot!", "Amazing!! The flat was more than great! Top decoration that made you feel comfortable! Close to public transportation and also by feet the center is not far away. The experience with Monika was great, she was really nice and helpful and all the time available for everything we needed. She even found a private parking spot some footseps away from the flat which was really helpful for me. It was just GREAT! Best experience so far with airbnb", "The apartment is in a great and quite neighborhood, just in front of a park. In Bulgaria people enjoy spending time outside and, in the period we stayed in Sofia, it was national holiday and the weather was warm so there were a lot of people and kids around. The location is not really in the center but you have Alexander Nevski Church at 5 minutes and supermarkets, restaurants and bars all around. We used to live in Sofia and it was nice to enjoy another neighborhood we've never lived in. The apartment is clean, comfortable, equipped with everything needed. They also offered us a bottle of wine but we don't drink, it was so kind from them. The coffee machine is new and makes a perfect espresso. Bathroom is specious and they have a galley for bidet. All the towels were new and clean. Thank you for all!", "The apartment is in a nice location not too far from the centre and kept super clean. Great stay! ", "Briefly the best of all worlds. If you are looking for a neat and upscale place to stay in downtown Sofia, whether for business or pleasure, then look no further. Located at walking distance from all top restaurants, clubs and business strip. Yet hidden behind a beautiful park, at a quiet street, isolated from the busy life style of Sofia. As soon as we entered the apartment, we immediately could tell the furnishing was second to none. This truly brand new renovated place, made us feel cozy and welcomed as it were our own home.
The owners made sure we had everything we needed during our stay. Over all we could not be any happier. I only wish if we could have stayed longer. Thank you, Monika and Jordan!
Sincerely, Pavlov’s Family
", "Es un apartamento precioso, todo está nuevo y con muy buen gusto. Es muy tranquilo porque está enfrente de un parque. La zona nos ha encantado porque llegas  al centro andando y tienes supermercados y restaurantes fantásticos. También hay una parada de taxis “buenos”.  Todo fue muy fácil con Monika que es muy agradable y detallista. Perfecto apartamento y anfitriona.", "Es un excelente departamento y muy bien ubicado. Mónika es super host", "Emplacement idéal, proche d'un parc pour la tranquillité, proche de commerces, de bons restaurants sont également accessibles à pied, proche des  lieux d'intérêt, proche des transports en commun. La décoration, le confort en font un lieu très agréable où l'on se sent bien, comme chez soi. La propreté irréprochable des lieux est un atout de plus. Les hôtes sont très discrets, confiants et très accueillants et vous mettent rapidement à l'aise.", "Perfecto alojamiento, coincide plenamente con la descripción.", "Appartement fonctionnel et au calme, très bien situé proche du centre ville et commerce ainsi que des transports taxis et trams.
À relouer sans hésitation.
Luc et chantal
", "Appartement charmant et moderne, bon accueil, à relouer sans la moindre hésitation.", "La casa era increíble, la ubicación bastante buena ya que no tardas ni 15 minutos en llegar a los mas importante de la ciudad, la cama comodisima, la ducha, ningun ruido fuera.... en definitiva, muy top!! Increíble en todos los aspectos!"]

reviews:
["The best Airbnb I ever been! Everything was better than I expected! The building is just finished, the furniture is new, hole apartment was extremely clean! There is a garage too! I can recommend this place to everyone!", "Second time here! Looking forward for the third one. Great place!", "Awesome place in a great location!", "Perfect location, easy check-in. Cozy place suitable even for our one-year-old daughter. Thanks Plamen!", "Great place!", "Very nice place! I recommend it. ", "Great appartment!", "The location of the flat couldn’t have been better. 
The small details of the interior were beyond amazing!!!
there is private parking which makes thing a lot easier if you’re using a rental. 
Check was extremely easy and quick.", "Great place. ", "Fantastic location, cosy, like home. I definitely recommend.", "Amazing Everything and clear communication! Felt at home right away!", "on of the best B+B in sofia", "One of the best in Sofia", "right next to CBD, with excellent lay out and great value! Now my regular stay when in Sofia", "Plamen's apartment is all one can imagine! Very modern, clean, excellently located! Plamen himself is extremely nice, communicative and eager to answer all sorts of questions. Check-in and check-out went smoothly due to a very easy to use lockbox!", "I loved the location, the interior, the availability of a parking spot. The host is very intelligent, the place is both private and spaceus, quiet and wonderful. I am very thankful to the host for making this great place a home for travelers.", "Lovely place with great location! I have nothing but good things to say about it.", "Plamen's apartment was excellent with everything needed for a short term stay. Good location, quiet.", "Great apartment!", "Perfect apartment in the city center; very comfortable, clean and tidy. I really enjoyed my stay! The apartment was closed to everything. Big advantage is the garage. 
I strongly recommend it to everyone and for sure will stay again there.", "This place is amazing... you literally exit the front door and are already in the top center of Sofia with all the historical sites, fancy little cafes, nice restaurants and busy night life, yet again, the apartment itself is very quiet and beautifully furnished and decorated. 

Everything was brand new, just as stated in the description of the property, and spotless clean. Also, this must have been one of the most comfortable beds I've ever tried and I've seen a few. Communicating with Radost was a breeze, always quick and clear, always ready to help.

Thanks for everything, Radost. 

Would definitely recommend to anyone coming to Sofia for either short or long term stay!!!", "Lovely place, well located, fully equiped appartment", "Amazing place in every single way. No doubt about recommending the place to every one. Don't hesitate to book (that comes from someone Who has spent more than ten years living in sofia in the past)", "We were very pleased with Plamen's place! It was newly renovated, "sparkling clean", quiet and very comfortable. Plamen couldn't meet us in person but left very clear and easy to follow instructions for check-in. We have already recommended to friends and would definitely stay here again. Thanks, Plamen!", "The apartment is very very beautiful and comfortable, with great planning and cozy feel. It is well kept warm when outside the tempratures are low. It is well equiped and has many thoughtful advantages.

The locations is fantastic - everything is up to 10 minutes walking distance - sites and restaurants.

Two things that bothered us and prevented giving it a full 5 star review:
1. The bed mattress is too soft. We found it uncomfortable and substantially derogating from the quality sleeping experience which we expected. I recommend Plamen to replace the mattress with a quality one.
2. The shower is open - which ends in water all over the floor. It is not serious but certainly getting the only towel which is supplied all soaked up.", "Plamen is a great host! His apartment is sunny,spaceous and in the city center:) I highly recommend his place. Oh,and his wifi is great (if you need this information)", "Quick feedback. Nice clean room. Very near to MUST visit touristic places in walking distance. I would say it was my best choice to stay here.", "GREAT STAY", "Nice place, great location", "The perfect place to stay in Sofia! 
Comfortable, beautiful  spacious and  great location
The private parking was a massive plus
I will definitely recommend it!", "All good as always!", "it is a nice unit in a wonderful location", "Plamen’s place was perfect for a short trip in Sofia. It’s in a perfect area and the house was so comfy that reminded me home.", "lovely light airy place. squeaky clean. good instructions. amazing location", "Excellent location, just a few blocks from the Serdika metro station.  The apartment is the most completely furnished of three we have used in this trip.  Very clean.", "Centrally located, close to the subway and main shopping area.  A fanatastic apartment.  Lovely inside and a great host.  Fast communication and very helpful.  Allowed us to check out half an hour later too.  Would thoroughly recommend staying here!", "He is very good host. I really enjoyed his apartment. And he helped me to get a taxi in early morning.", "We had a great stay at Plamen's place. Awesome location, right in the heart of Sofia and near a bunch of cool restaurants and coffee shops. 
And the place is amazing, sparkling clean and with the most comfortable bed and pillows. I would choose it as my home :)", "Great place to stay in Sofia, very clean and spacious! A must stay!", "Fantastic one bed apartment in Sofia. Great location and finished to a good standard. Thank you so much Plamen.", "this place is perfectly situated in Sofia making it a very short walk to the city centre. the place it's self was amazing. it had everything u would need and some extra as well. outstanding!", "Plamnen’s apartment is artfully done, is very comfortable and it’s well fitted with all equipment. The apartment is spacious and bright. We enjoyed our time in Sofia and were every comfortable in the apartment. ", "Plamen was extremely accommodating with our date changes. It is an extremely lovely and spacious apartment with a modern touch. It is right in the centre of the city and I would not hesitate to stay in the flat when I am back in Sofia.", "Great please Very good location Safe parking Recomended for stay in Sofia", "Plamen's place is AWESOME. It's hip, spacious and very comfortable. The apartment is in the heart of Sofia and an easy walk to all it's best attractions, with the Metro not far for bigger excursions. The inclusion of secure parking was a big plus. His check-in guide made everything super smooth. Already looking forward to staying again!", "Great apartment good wifi everything was fine.", "Very clean and modern place conveniently located within close walking distance of many sites! Great host who communicated well with accurate information, made checkin really easy. Would stay again for sure! ", "Plamen's apartment is very good. Big, modern, stylish, cozy, very clean, very central located (close to main sights and to Metro station as well) and has a very good price. Kitchen is well equipped,  bathroom is very good. Apartment has 2 air conditioners (in living room and in bedroom) that was very important as it was very hot outside during my stay. I definitely recommend this apartment for stay in Sofia. Thank you, Plamen. ", "Very nice, modern apartment with all the right touches - would move in in a second. Communication was all easy via PDF instructions & key box. Good location for all the Sofia activities. Plus has Staropramen (Czech beer on draft) 2 doors down, nice cafe & börek  plus Dada café around the corner, and easy walk to much of the city (didn't need the tram by our flat, and weren't there long enough to use the Metro).
Got to see the Swimming Pool location as well; more archaeology museum et al. 
Sadly, Fairouz Lebanese restaurant was closed the day we were leaving :-(  Next time...", "Great, bright clean, brand new space about 15 mins walk from the centre of town. ", "Very central and convenient location! My husband, daughter, and I had a wonderful stay at Plamen’s apartment. Walkable distance to major Sofia sights. Тhe check-in process was very straightforward and clear. ", "Great apartment, everything was on point! Will most definitely come again!", "I could not have imagined a better place to stay, or a nicer host to have.  The place was very clean, Plamen was very considerate and the location was unbeatable! 
As someone who grew up in Sofia, I can say that there are few to no locations that are better suited for exploring the city. 
I do not only want to come back, but I also recommend this place to anyone who wants a central but quiet base to explore one of the most beautiful cities in Eastern Europe.", "The apartment was super clean and stylish. It had everything we needed and situated close to cafes, restaurants and a beautiful church with a little playground for our toddler. We would definitely stay here again.", "The location was great the parking  is really important. Excellent choice for Sofia.
", "Plamen’s apartment is perfect for your Sofia visit. Close to the center with food and restaurants around. Clean and comfortable... very cozy! ", "The stay was lovely. The appartment was perfect, spacious, very modern and fresh and central. Walking distance to a lot of the main areas. 

Lovely place would highly recommend staying here for sure! ", "Great host! Beautiful apartment. Exactly how in pictures! Easy check-in. Walkable to almost all the places in the city. We were two girls staying here for two nights, had an excellent time.its on the first floor, a few steps up. Highly recommend this one for 2-4 people.
Worth the charge! Value for money.", "Plamen’s apartment is great. It’s in a good location just a few minutes walk away the centre and has lots of shops and restaurants nearby. The apartment is very new and with all the amenities of a 5 star hotel. Plamen is a is a wonderful host! He was very responsive, communicative and flexible.  He sent very clear instructions for check in and we had no problems despite arriving at night.", "perfect place in a great location
", "I really recommend this place for the central location, excellent cleaning and the owners are very nice person and very available", "Great as always, fast replies from host, great place and location! Super convenient if you are with a car and saves you the trouble of looking for parking!", "A great and very clean apartment, a fantastic location and a very helpful and responsive host. airbnb at its best. We will be coming back!", "A very spacious and well-equipped apartment in a good location. Very close to the heart of action in the city but in a quite neighbourhood with great restaurants and a fabulous yoga studio nearby (Santosha). Plamen was very easy to deal with, as was Monica (who assisted on site).", "I will give this an overall of 5/5 stars! It’s honestly so nice inside and there deign of the apartment is so cool! My partner and I visited Bulgaria as a surprise and this apartment is so close to the city Center and is also close to a supermarket if you needed. Honestly we did not have to spend money in transport while we stayed here. And the apartment looks exactly like in the pictures! If anything, I will stay here again! 

Thank you so much, Brenda! :)", "Plamen's flat is very trendy and modern, also very well located. I really enjoyed my stay!", "location was amazing 
but guest needs to check in without host.so it was little bit hard.", "Lovely apartment, close by to the centre and the host was very welcoming.", "Very good flat, good location, easy checkin/out :) early baggage drop off possible. Recommended place ;)", "Very nice apartment! Very close to city center.", "Great apartment, location and host. This is my second visit, so I guess that says it all...", "Plamen's apartment is excellent. The place is in top central location, spacious, clean and well-equipped. Plamen and his team were kind and always responded on time.  I recommend this apartment to guests in Sofia,
Kalin", "Plamen's appartement is a really nice place in Sofia. You have all the accomodations you may need for a short (and even longest) stay. Parking is also definitively a plus.
Plamen was very helpfull and brilliant in his communication. Great host !", "Great stay at Plamen's place! The apartment is exactly as pictured and is very well maintained. Centrally located but quiet. Would recommend!", "Second time at Plamen's apartment and I will be back. Great place, great host.", "Perfect! Would always recomend!!", "I liked everything about Plamen's place. Very clean, cosy, well located, perfect communication with our host. I will be back :)", "Located just near the centre in the city(perfect location),the appartment is clean and provides u great hospitality.The appartment owner Plamen is very helpful and will guide u throughout your stay.", "Plamens place is everything you see in the pictures, clean, modern and perfectly situated in the city. It has all the necessary items in the apartment and Plamen was always available if we needed something. Definitely enjoyed our stay and recommend it to others.", "Thank you for the cosy fkat you prepared for us - we loved all the attention to details and like the christmas decorations :-) Further the home was super clean and tidy. Everything is new. Very central location- you can’t get better value for money! We also liked the self check- in which was easy, thanks to the detailed info Plamen shared with us prior to our arrival. He was a wonderful host even if we had not met we felt taken care of. We are so happy to have rented this flat. Highly recommended to all! Good luck and best wishes, Plamen!!", "I recommend this appartment. Everything was excelent. Great location, the appartment is stylish, spacious and clean. I'll be back again :)", "Great apartment, quick and precise communication, good location near the main attractions: we'll be back soon:-)", "All was excellent!  I highly recommend this appartment. ", "I’ve stayed many Air B&B’s throughout Sofia, but Plamen’s apartment is my favorite! Stylish, spacious, clean, central- it is everything you can hope! Plus, Plamen is extremely responsive! Book it!!", "We had the best weekend in Sofia very partially thanks to Plamen’s place – its location is ideal and it was beyond comfortable and clean. The flat is very spacious and inviting, everything looked and felt immaculate. 

Plamen was also a wonderful host, very helpful and quick to respond before, during and after our stay. He even left a bunch of very helpful city guides in the living room and was able to give us a few tips too. 

Overall, his attention to detail both in the flat and as a host have really made the experience better and easier. Couldn’t recommend this place more!", "Great location - literally in the heart of Sofia. This place in my opinion is better than a hotel. It was a spacious, nicely decorated apartment with great access to the centre. The communication was great, the host was very friendly and always willing to help. It was easy to find the place and get in following the instructions given. I arrived late in the evening and I was well surprised to find a shampoo, shower gel and a soap prepared for me in the bathroom as I didn't have any. There were also towels on my bed. Best thing in the morning was that I didn't have to worry about going out for a coffee as there was a brilliant coffee machine and some fresh ground coffee in the cupboard. There was also a hairdryer, iron, washing machine, a fridge, cooking facilities and cutlery - you have everything you might need, even for a long stay. I strongly recommend it - this place is definitely worth the money!!", "Plamen’s place was amazing, central located, very clean and furnished in a modern way, if I go to Sofia I will stay there again, I felt it like home.
Thanks", "Plamen's appartement is very nice! Clean and really modern. Bars, restaurants and public transport are on walking distance. Would definitely recommend to stay at his place.", "Plamen‘s apartment is very well located in the heart of Sofia, so many things are in walking distance. Yet, the neighborhood is quite calm, so you can get some good sleep. 
 
The apartment is furnished in a hip an modern way, what we really liked. 

A little bummer: it seems like one of the previous guests didn’t care about the no-smoking rule...

Nevertheless, all in one we had a great stay and can strongly recommend that place to every Sofia tourist!", "We loved the stay in this flat! It is located in the City Center with nice Cafes, Restaurant fancy Store and everything what you need i (Website hidden by Airbnb) min walk away. You have the Metro in 2 min walk. 
But the best, make your own sightseeing tour in a 5 min walk to the biggest Kathedrale on Balkan.", "Clean spacious apartment close to the centre! Great place to stay for a long weekend in Sofia with everything you need.", "The appartment was very clean and convenient, everything is new. Plamen is very responsive and helpful. Highly recommended.", "Great apartment! Amazing location, style, comfort. Everything you need.", "Great apartment in perfect location!!", "This apartment is very comfortable and lovely in a great location.  There was water and snacks available to us when we first arrived which was a really nice touch.  Modern apartment and very clean.  Absolutely loved it!", "Beautiful place!  Great location!  Would definitely stay there again, thanks!!", "Great spot, good location", "Best place to stay in Sofia. Close to the centre but in a quiet area. Beautiful place and would happily stay there again. Very helpful.", "The appartment was great and exactly as described. The location was calm but super central. The communication in advance was nice and very quick. We were provided with some snacks and water. I would definitely recommend staying there and we will choose this appartment for our next trip to Sofia.", "The apartment is great! Really modern, clean and tastefully decorated. When we arrived there was cold water in the fridge and snacks on the table. The kitchen is well equipped for self catering, or it is located well to walk to many restaurants and cafes. The hosts gave great recommendations of places to eat nearby. The shower is great and bathroom has some toiletries. Bed is comfortable and the rooms are open, light and spacious with big doors opening out to a little balcony. Despite being very centrally located, the apartment is very quiet in the evenings. Check in was simple, and we were given very clear instructions to enter the apartment. We would absolutely recommend staying here, and would certainly love to stay again if we ever get to Sofia again.", "This place is a perfect diamond. Perfect for couple or girly weekend away! Communication and recommendations was great! Easy 
Access from airport, and walking distance to everything! 
I will be happy to recommend and stay there again! I wish there was more places like this! We love it! :)", "Really lovely apartment, very considerate helpful hosts. Would definitely stay here again.", "Great stay! Amazing apartment. Aleko was especially great, extremely helpful and made the stay even more easy.", "We had a wonderful stay in this apartment. I would highly recommend it!", "The apartment is very nice and comfortable. It's central and you don't need to have a car to visit the city!", "The apartment was wonderful and we really enjoyed our stay. The flat looks exactly like on the pictures and everything was very clean. Although it's located in the city center, its still in a quiet neighborhood. The communication with Radost and her daughter was perfect and they were both very friendly. We had everything we needed in the apartment. We felt like home and I would love to come back to this apartment! Can't imagine a better place to stay in Sofia!", "Beautiful apartment and hosts. I highly recommend this place for anyone visiting Sofia.", "Great place. Very comfortable and modern. Just as described! Close to most places that we wanted to see and go to in Sofia. Communication was quick and effortless. Would highly recommend the apartment and the hosts, and would definitely stay here again.", "We stayed for 2 nights and the apartment was top notch! The location is very central, within walking distance of the House of Parliament, Alexander Nevsky cathedral and other central major attractions. The apartment is new, really clean, looks *exactly* as shown in the photos and has everything you need. The hosts were very responsive, friendly and helpful. We definitely recommend the apartment and would for sure stay there again!", "-Great location, near the main metro station
-very clean and cozy like the photo
-check in n check out very smooth
-fast wifi connection
-its a amazing experience and very great house :)
Definitely will come back", "We enjoyed our stay in this apartment. Is new, clean, comfortable and have a great location. Radost and Plamen are great hosts.  Thanks for all the tips, maps and recommendations.", "Lovely peope, nice and helpful. The flat is brand new, very clean and nicely furnished. Perfect location. Would definitely go back.", "Place is great! Radost and Plamen are wonderful hosts", "Very beautiful place, great location, smooth communication. Couldn't be better.", "We are absolutely delighted we found this lovely apartment, Brand new building, very modern and central just minutes from the main Sophia's Cathedral. 
The hosts, Radost and Plamen really made our stay to be very special, told us about the things to do in the city and helped with anything we needed. Furthermore as we have children similar age, our boys spent time playing together and visiting museums, and it really felt like a home away from home.
As there are 2 flats one next to another, we realised this would be ideal for 2 families visiting together and we are now considering another trip to Sofia as there is lots to do and see.
Thank you dear hosts!!", "Radost was a great host and the apt in Sofia was very modern, clean, bright and right in the very center of all the action in Sofia.  For us ( a family of 4 ) it was more than I expected and super comfortable.  In July it is super warm in Sofia and sometimes when we're in Europe around this time we rent places where they guarantee air conditioning and upon arrival, the aircon is not really working or is just spewing a little air.  This apt definitely kept us all cool!  We even had free parking.  Thank you Radost.  We'll definitely be coming back.", "This was my favourite and most enjoyable air bnb experience for my whole 3 week holiday travelling around. The apartment is so fresh, light, comfortable and so tastefully decorated. A really lovely vibe.
Unbelievably close to everything which made the small amount of time I spent in Sofia very enjoyable. My hosts were wonderful, super accommodating and had amazing communication. They helped me out above the call of duty. 
Thank you so much for this experience!! Highly recommended :)", "The apartment was really nice, location was superb, and most importantly the hosts were absolutely great and very accommodating! I'd recommend it to anyone!! ", "Excellent apartment in an amazing location!
מקום שקט ומומלץ במרכז העיר,נקי ומסודר ,מאובזר ומצויד בכל מה שצריך", "Wir waren sehr begeistert von dem Appartement. Komplette Ausstattung und alles ganz neu. Die Unterkunft ist sehr sauber und es fehlt an nichts. Top Lage im Zentrum mit Parkplatz in der Tiefgarage. Wir waren mit unserer 1,5 Jahre alten Tochter dort und haben ein Babybett und einen Hochstuhl bekommen. Also auch für Familien mit kleinen Kindern sehr gut geeignet. Wir werden wiederkommen.", "소피아에 오시는 여행객분들께 적극 추천합니다.
집에서 생활하는거처럼
전혀 불편함이 없고 깨끗하고 편안했습니다.", "location eccellente, centralissima", "Bel appartement  bien situé, je recommande.", "Alles was gewoon top !!", "Das wichtigste in solchen Dingen wie Wohnungsüberlassungen ist vertrauen.

Meines hat Plamen!!!", "Très bon emplacement dans un appartement très agréable. Un bon plan à Sofia. Propriétaire plein de petites attentions très appréciables", "Logement très agréable et les hôtes sont géniaux.", "L'appartement de Plamen et Rhadost est bien pensé et bien conçu pour un hébergement de court séjour. Nous sommes restés 3 nuits à Sofia avec notre petite fille de 20 mois. Nos hôtes ont été très accueillant et ont eu plein de gentilles attentions envers notre fille. Malgré notre arrivée tardive (23h), l'accueil était parfait. L'appartement est très bien situé pour visiter la vieille ville à pied. Tout est parfaitement propre (Tout est neuf) et optimisé. Nous recommandons vivement !", "Superbe appartement, très bien situé. Je recommande fortement !", "Sehr empfehlenswerte moderne Wohnung, an zentraler Lage.Ideal für kurze sowie längere Aufenthalte.Die Wohnungsaustattung ist vollständig und es fehlt wirklich nix.Es ist sehr sauber und gepfegt.Die Gastgeber sind sehr zuvorkommend und freundlich.Ich kann diese Wohnung nur weiterempfehlen."]

reviews:
["Great place! ", "It is a great apartment in the heart of the city. Everything is in within walking distance and in the same time  Clean, full of light and with many thoughtful touches - it is an ideal base for exploration of Sofia. 

Maria and Pavel are great hosts  - prompt to respond, considerate and very helpful. Highly recommended.", "The apartment was clean. All the necessary stuff were there and stuff beyond that. The hosts were very helpful.", "Pavels flat is situated in a charming area and has a great view! I can recommend it conpletely, though in wintertime it can get chilly and you will need the provided additional heating and covers. Pavels team is very helpful with all questions you might have!
Thanks to all of them", "Great place, nice view 5/5", "This flat is charming and has a cute street view from the balcony and a view over the rooftops. It is definitely worth the climb to the 5th floor. There is a tv, iron, washing machine and kitchenware. The small details have been thought out. Coffee and breakfast cereals were available. The coffee was great. There is an espresso machine and French press. There were plenty of clean towels provided. The bed was comfortable and the place was clean. It was a very cute place. Tips for the local area were provided by the host and they also checked in to see if I was enjoying my stay and offered any further assistance. It is a very central location. You can walk to the main shopping area and cathedral etc within 15-20 minutes. This is a great place to stay. I highly recommend a stay here. ", "Diliana's place was lovely. The view from the balcony is gorgeous and the amenities were fantastic. It was tough getting up the stairs to the 5th floor, but it was worth it for the view. Aside from this she had to meet us as the previous tenant had taken her second set of keys. This was slightly unnerving and I had a little trouble sleeping due to this, but it was okay in the end. Despite that mishap, her place was very lovely and central.", "The apartment is cozy and comfy with a great balcony and perfect location.  Although it's a 5th floor walk-up, the stairs are a good way to work off all the wonderful food in Sofia.  Wish we could have stayed another week!", "The apartment is perfectly depicted in the images. It's very cozy, sparkling clean, and located in the ideal neighborhood. The 5th floor location allows you to see a gorgeous sunrise each morning. I traveled alone to Sofia and felt very safe on the street at night and going in and out of the building. I highly recommend this location to anyone visiting Sofia!", "And absolutely wonderful apartment! Really great location and fantastic patio/terrace. If you are young and don’t mind walking up five flights of stairs (common in many older buildings like this in Sofia) I highly recommend this place....the location is perfect and safe.", "Pavel's apartment is a great place to stay when visiting Sofia. It is beautifully located with the great Alexander Nevsky within walking distance and the town close by! Lots of homely touches which makes you feel at ease and brilliant & convenient cooking facilities for those nights in. Lots of restaurants and bars in town in which most speak some English! The only downside is that it is on the 5th floor.. which makes carrying a weekly shop home a tiring task! Hosts and Co-Hosts are amazingly accommodating. 

Would definitely stay here again should we return to Sofia!", "The location is excellent, everything is on the doorstep or a short walk away! The balcony is lovely with amazing views over the rooftops and street. Lovely flat with everything to make it feel like a home - coffee pods, candles on the balcony, many thoughtful touches. Self check in and out are really convenient and communication with the hosts was timely and prompt. ", "Great Location, The neighbourhood is very calm and the appartment is clean and perfect !

We had an amazing time in Sofia !", "Lovely flat, clean and with everything you need for a stay. Only to be aware that it’s on the fifth floor with no lift, a good exercise! Great location and very quiet. The host always super fast in replying and also thought to leave 2 umbrellas for the rainy days...we did use them a lot! 
The host was so kind to also assist us in dealing with an issue with the car park.
Very greatful and flat super recommended.

", "The house was clean. Right in the heart of the city and the communication was excellent.", "Very well located, but still quiet place. Small, but cozy and well equipped. Balcony is perfect for morning coffees! Excellent communication - answers came within a couple of minutes! ", "Really enjoyed staying at Pavel's place: it's centrally located and very comfy. Communication was awesome, thanks a lot to Diliana for instructions and area tips.", "It’s like to be in a luxury hotel!
Thanks a lot!!", "Check-in was easy and efficient! We especially liked the location and neighbourhood; very central and near every point of interest by walking distance. We enjoyed the flat’s blog and felt in good hands with Daliana! They unfortunately had a small trouble with hot water in the neighbourhood, but they were up-front and accommodating about it. We would definitely recommend! The terrace is a MUST!", "Great location and lovely views from the balcony. Perfect for a solo traveler, or a couple. Would happily stay here again!", "We had a lovely time in Sofia! This apartment is in the middle of everything and it felt like home! I always wanted to experience living in the center of Sofia city. I highly recommend the place and the host was super friendly.", "Excellent place to stay! Great location, clean place and working WIFI! 5 stars all the way. ", "The place is centrally located, and there is a good vegetarian restaurant in 50 meters away. I enjoyed staying there, everything in the apartment was like on the pictures. Maria and Deliana were fantastic hosts and provided all sorts of great information about the neighborhood. The flat is perfectly located in the city center and all the sights are easily walkable. It’s a great spot for couples and the solo traveller alike!", "the place has a great view and is located in one of the best parts of the center of Sofia.", "Thanks for the nice stay! The communication was perfect from the beginning, the response was always within a minute. The place is really nice, clean, well equipped and the location couldn't be better.
