Beautifully decorated apartment with plenty of personal touches (including a terrific espresso machine!), very spacious, great view from the balcony, super clean. Perfect location and host responded immediately to questions and messages. When I return to Sofia I certainly plan on staying there again!", "This was my second stay at this place. I personally like it very much, especially the location! It's in the center of the center :) Around there are shops, cafes, restaurants, and all sorts of public transport. The place is renovated and clean. Not very big, but I find it really nice and cosy. You gotta keep in mind though that it's on the 5th floor, so you have to climb some stairs, but you can look at it as a an exercise :) The hosts were really responsive, and to check in you just pick up the key from a safe box at the buildings entrance, which is great for late check ins. All in all, I recommend this place and would be glad if I have chance to stay there again!", "This was a lovely place to stay in Sofia and would really recommend. The check in was easy and efficient and the communication was great. The apartment was clean, spacious and warm and newly renovated. The location was handy to the main Vitosha avenue, and quite close to the local metro station. We really liked the recommendations that we were given while there. We tried many of the bars and restaurants that were in a blog sent along with out check-in instructions and everywhere on the list was amazing. 
Thanks for a great stay!!", "Great value. Perfect location for travellers who like a creative area with galleries, vegan restaurants and interesting bars. Friendly hosts. This place is just what you need.", "Great location, and an excellent, accommodating host. WiFi was great for work. Thanks again for having me!", "This place is great! It's in the center of the center :) You have everything around - shops, cafes, restaurants, and connections to all sorts of public transport. The metro station is some 300-400 meters away as well. The apartment is renovated and clean. The only downside is maybe the climb to the 5th floor, but it was a nice exercise for me :) The hosts were really responsive, and to check in you just pick up the key from a safe box at the buildings entrance, which is great for late check ins. All in all, I recommend his place and would be glad if I have chance to stay there again!", "First of all, we would like to thank Pavel for being such a great host and for making our stay so pleasant. Location was absolutely perfect, right in the city centre, within walking distance of restaurants, bars, shops and all. The apartment was really nice, cosy and very clean with a lovely terrace. It had everything we needed! Hope we can come again soon. :)", "Unfortunately the bed sheets were dirty and had some stains :-(", "Great Place. Probably I will come back in my next visit", "Flat is superbly located, with adorable cafes and bars all nearby. Pavel is an outstanding host, and communicating with him was a breeze - he even allowed us to do a late check out, which enabled us to take advantage of the city till the last minute, thanks Pavel!", "Nice flat with a great location, but unfortunatelly not very tidy and problems with the water drain in the bath", "Pavel apartment was great in a beautiful street", "The flat is really nice and comfortable with a cool terraze. Everything was clean and tidy. Bedroom is a bit small but we didn't care because we didn't spend much time at the apartment, anyway for a couple is perfect size. The greatest thing is the location, 5min walking to boulevard vitosha, and really close to all interesting points.

And Pavel was a great host, he answer us super fast, and he has been really helpfull. He told us really good recomendations, and the city guide he gave us was so useful too.

Dont hesitate to stay at his apartment!", "This is a fantastic place to stay. Right in the heart of Sofia with everything you might need at your door step. Very friendly people and neighbourhood. No complaints at all!! An excellent place to stay. Would recommend it to anyone, providing they can handle 5 flights of stairs. Thanks Pavel :)", "Pavel's place is a reasonable short walk from Vitoshi Blvd and many downtown spots.  For those worried about the 5th floor climb, since the stairs are wide and shallow it was an easy climb so I wouldn't let this stop you from booking a nice room with a great balcony.  It was nice to have morning sunshine and open the bedroom door to the balcony and then have a tea outside.  There is also a good traditional Bulgarian restaurant just around the corner.", "Great location. Fab balcony. Comfy bed. Only thing is that it can get quite hot as there's no aircon! Pavel provides an online guide which has some good recommendations in. We also found the restaurant over the road super good and cheap for food. Meats are really good there. And the vegetarian cafe on the corner is also really nice. Thanks Pavel for an awesome week.", "The flat is located in the centre of Sofia, in up-and-coming neighbourhood full of cute little cafés and designer shops. If you want to explore Sofia, this is a perfect choice! We didn't get the chance to meet Pavel, but he was a great host. He has a great self check-in system which we've used. He provided us with detailed information on how to get to the apartment, as well as a digital guide, which Pavel created himself! It helped us a lot, as he recommended a lot of restaurants, bars and other places which we visited and we've liked. The apartment itself is equipped with everything you might need from shampoo, olive oil and hand cream to scissors, TV with HDMI cable and moka pot. We enjoyed staying at Pavel's place and I can't but recommend it!", "Great location", "Nice place to stay. Nice location. No air-conditioning. But, overall ok. ", "
We enjoyed our stay in Pavel's apartment. There were no reviews when we booked so we're pleased that all went smoothly. He left clear directions and helpful recommendations for where to go and what to do. 

The apartment was clean and well appointed with all we might have wanted from a handy umbrella to three types of coffee maker. If we were to add one thing it would be that a mirror could be helpful. 

The peace and privacy on the fifth floor is worth climbing up the stairs. It is a nice neighbourhood with a good cafe on the corner. 

All in all would happily recommend staying here while in Sofia. 

", "Very nice apartment. Perfect location. ", "Много приятно местенце в пешеходния център на града! :)", "Ottima scelta!

reviews:
["The location is very near the Vitosha street but in the same time very calm and quite. The apartment was spotless clean and everything that I needed was already there. Geen grote luxe, maar prima om te slapen of ‘s avonds nog even te ontspannen.", "Recomendaría sin duda, inmejorable. El alojamiento es céntrico, espacioso, limpio y con todos los detalles. Y Zhivko es un gran anfitrión, nos ha ayudado en todo!", "Top Lage! Super Service!Dankeschön!", "Muy recomendable!! La casa está muy céntrica, impecable y con todos los detalles muy cuidados. Zhivko, el dueño, estuvo dispuesto en todo momento a ayudarnos: nos dejó recomendaciones de sitios, mapas..., vino a recogernos al aeropuerto a la 1 am por 15€ y después de que nos hubieran dicho que todos los taxis timan y lo que debería ser un trayecto de 10 son 30€ no dudamos en aceptar su oferta. 
El lugar perfecto para alojarse un fin de semana en Sofía y disfrutar de la ciudad, especialmente si vas en pareja!", "Voor een citytrip in Sofia is dit een mooi appartement om te verblijven. De locatie is echt top! Het appartement bevindt zich in een van de zijstraatjes van drukke winkelstraat Vitosha waardoor je met een paar min lopen bij alle bezichtingen bent. Een aanrader is een hip restaurant/cocktailbar tegen over het appartement, weliswaar duur voor Bulgaarse begrippen maar het is het waard. Zhivko was een geweldige host. Hij was altijd bereikbaar, beantwoorde al onze vragen snel en vertelde over de highlights van Sofia m.b.v. een kaart. Het appartement is erg knus en bevat alles wat je nodig hebt tijdens een citytrip zoals handdoeken, een fohn, waterkoker, koelkast, etc. De douche kan er gek uit zien, maar hij werkt prima! Ook is er wifi in het appartement. 

Tips voor een citytrip zijn de free Sofia tour, the new Sofia pub crawl (hidden bar tour) en de balkan food tour.", "这个房子还是不错的,适合旅游居住,一室一厅一卫,不能做饭,其他都很好,性价比高!", "Un alojamiento muy céntrico y confortable, muy acogedor, el anfitrión nos vino a buscar al aeropuerto a las 4 am por 15 euros, lo cual nos vino de lujo. Mapas y recomendaciones y muy buena comunicación. Recomendable", "Que dire! 5 étoiles ne suffisent pas
Cet appartement est absolument parfait, j'en ai un souvenir magique.
Il est parfaitement situé, vous ne pouvez pas trouver mieux! A deux pas du boulevard Vitosha où il y a tout. On en a fait des kilomètres à pied! Son emplacement rend les transports inutiles :)
La douche peut surprendre, mais bon, c'est à la bulgare!
La cuisine contient tout ce qu'il faut. Les trois pièces sont vraiment très bien, délimité, cela à son charme.
Le lit est parfait, très confortable, et il y a une tonne d'oreiller et de couette en rab.
Le chauffage marche très bien (2/5 est bien suffisant tant il est efficace!), et il y a une clim pour les journées chaudes, ce qui n'était pas notre cas.
Et enfin, la cerise, le plus important pour moi : le calme! Pas un bruit ne parvient dans la chambre. J'y ai passé des nuits fabuleuses, et cet endroit me manque déjà. C'est quand qu'on revient? :D", "Zhivko è un grande Host! 
La nostra vacanza a Sofia è stata un caos a causa di uno sciopero negli aereoporti che ci ha fatto perdere le prime 2 notti prenotate. 
Tuttavia, la notte passata a Sofia ci ha consentito di conoscere il proprietario di casa, un super host!
Ci é venuto a prendere gratuitamente in aereoporto salvandoci dalla neve e ci ha accompagnati nell'appartamento che è molto caldo, pulito e centrale. 
Ci ha indicato una taverna tipica dove mangiare e siamo rimasti in contatto quando non riuscivamo a trovare dei luoghi in Sofia! 
É stato molto preciso, professionale ed amichevole. 
Una pecca nell'appartamento. Il bagno è scomodo perchè la doccia non è protetta da un box quindi se ti lavi, tutto il bagno si lava con te !", "Estancia genial. La ubicacion es buenisima. Zhivko nos ha ayudado en todo lo posible y ha estado siempre disponible cuando hemos contactado con el. El piso tiene todo lo necesario, tranquilo pero a un paso de la calle comercial de Sofia. Y una gigantesca cama perfecta para recargar energia. Lo recomendamos", "Zoek niet langer. Super goede locatie, aardige man en goede hulp, super voor vakantie in Sofia!", "Ubicación genial, en pleno centro cerca de todo. El apartamento precioso, ideal para una pareja.
El anfitrión fantástico, atento a todo y un detalle que te ofrezca recogida en el aeropuerto!
100% recomendable", "Un apartamento genial para disfrutar de una ciudad preciosa. Muy limpio y bien equipado. En el alma de Sofía, a 2 pasos del Boulevar Vithosa. Desde el apartamento puedes recorrer la ciudad dando un paseo.
Zhivko es un anfitrión excelente, nos recogió en el aeropuerto a las 3:30 de la mañana por 15€ (llegamos con una hora de retraso). Estuvo en todo momento disponible para solventar cualquier duda y nos recomendó sitios muy ricos para comer y tomar algo por la noche.
100% recomendable.", "Живко хороший и гостеприимный человек. Приятно с ним общаться . Живко всегда поможет если что то надо. Прекрасный человек и отличная квартира.Мы всем очень довольны .", "El apartamento es genial y a solo 200 metro de la Avenida Vitosha.
Zhivko y su pareja son encantadores, nos recogieron en el aeropuerto y nos dieron consejo sobre restaurantes. Recomiendo totalmente!", "Carinissimo appartamento in posizione strategica, piccolo ma non manca nulla, lo consiglio.", "Zhivko es un apersona muy atenta. Nos dio la opción de recogernos en el aeropuerto de madrugada por 10€. Vale la pena cuando llegas tarde. El apartamento muy bien situado. En El Centro. Ideal para una pareja. El apartamento muy limpio y con todas las comodidades y utensilios.", "Nos encantó el apartamento. Fuimos 2 personas y aunque no es muy grande aprovecha muy bien el espacio y es muy completo. La cama es muy cómoda y muy grande. Además Zhivko es un anfitrión muy atento y simpático. Nos recogió en el aeropuerto por 10€ pese a ser la 1 de la madrugada, y además se ofreció a llevarnos gratis al aeropuerto el día que nos íbamos. En resumen, el apartamento es totalmente recomendable. :)", "La estancia en el apartamento de Zhivko ha sido genial. Todo súper limpio y nuevo. La cama es muy muy cómoda y enorme. La calefacción estupenda, hacía frío y la casa es muy caliente. El trato con él fenomenal también , muy atento y dispuesto a ayudar con todo. 
La ubicación es perfecta también, se puede ir a todos sitios andando.
Repetiríamos si volviésemos a Sofia. ", "Zhivko肯定是最棒的房东之一,在索菲亚的期间,他很热心并巨细靡遗地帮助我们｡房间也是非常干净舒服,充满设计感｡选择这里为这趟索菲亚之行增色不少｡", "Abbiamo alloggiato due notti nell'appartamento che si trova a pochi passi da vitosha, la via principale di Sofia, tutto perfetto, comunicazione eccellente, servizio di transfer che ci ha fornito è stato eccellente. Viene messo addirittura a disposizione dell'ospite tutto per la colazione al mattino. Casa profumatissima e pulita. Letto enorme e comodissimo. I superhost sono una garanzia. Grazie ancora e se passeremo di nuovo da Sofia sarai la mia certezza! Davide&Keta", "Boede her tre dage i oktober og Zhivko's hjælper Zlatin modtog os i lufthavn og vi blev kørt til lejlighed for en fair pris. Beskrivelse passer fint af lejlighed, denne er meget centralt beliggende få minutters gang til hovedgaden (Vitosha). I samme kvarter som lejlighed findes mange barer, cafeer og restauranter samt indkøbsmuligheder. Udenfor lejlighed findes natklub og da vi var her i weekend kan dette godt være lidt støjende dog uden at være et problem. Kommunikationen med ejer efter bestilling var meget professionel og vi fik den hjælp som vi ønskede. Mange tak for denne gang :-)", "je recommande se logement , bien décoré et très propre.", "Zhivko est un hôte parfait, il était disponible dés mon arrivée, il s'est adapté à mon horaire de vol, il s'est rendu disponible quand j'avais des questions. L'appartement correspondait parfaitement à la description, idéalement situé à côté de la plus grande avenue passante de Sofia, à côté de tous les restaurants et bars sympathiques. ", "El apartamento tiene una excelente ubicación a 5 minutos del centro.El ambiente es confortable y tiene todos los servicios.El hostelero es amable y accesible.Repetiría en este sitio sin lugar a dudas."]

reviews:
["Great place and nice location.  Easy check-in and very close to metro station sedika.", "Perfect, Thanks !", "The place is clean and it has a really good location. Radoslav is a very communicative and helpful host. I will recommend it to everyone! Thanks!", "Radoslav is a very reliable and responsible host. The place is clean, tidy and with a very good location. I recommend it to everyone. Thanks Rado.", "My stay here was great, even if it was just for one night. The place was very clean, quiet and comfortable. Radoslav was very helpful with everything, especially with giving me directions before check-in. I definitely recommend his place and would stay here again!", "The place was exactly as described and as seen in the pictures. Cute place with a nice galaxy touch. The host was very hospitable and helped me check in and carry my heavy luggage! The location is amazing, it’s super central and about 3-5 minutes walk to the metro. Very convenient and easy to find place! Would definitely recommend!", "The guest house is located in a very convenient central place just 2 min from the metro station. What I like about the place is that you could do self-check in and the key to your room is at the door. Also, I like the idea of the interior and the black sheets. It's a good place for stay for one or two nights.", "Special thanks to Radoslav! His service was great, he helped me to find the best place to stay at Sofia on the best price ever! Highly recommend!", "Radoslev hosted me on 11-12 December. He responded very quickly to my short notice. The location of the place could not be more convenient - in the top centre of Sofia. The room was clean and warm.", "Много добра комуникация и посрещане от домакина. Цената е много ниска за предлаганото разположение и удобства. Мястото е изключително тихо и спокойно, стаите са чисти и отоплени, в удобна близост до всякакъв вид транспорт, идеално пасващо за разходки или ангажименти в центъра или като цяло в столицата. С радост бих ползвал отново предлаганото настаняване при следващи посещения и пътувания до София.", "Good location in the center ,near metro.
A pleasant stay.", "The bathroom is very small", "Great host.", "The place is really awesome . I really enjoyed the stay . And receptionist(Gaby) is really great ,friendly and so positive. its highly recommended and value for money. i had good time there", "Cool place near the city center", "Great room in a great location in Sofia, very interesting guests and very helpful host who is always at hand ! Would definitely recommend!", "Decent hostel accommodation in central sofia, on a quiet street in an interesting area", "Very nice, convenient and clean place in the very center. The arrival and the stay was smooth, I appreciated the hospitality and the local advices. Just what I needed!", "Small bathroom with a shower on top of the toilet. just one small sink for everybody", "Great location, great price :)", "Simply amazing!!!!", "My stay was nice. Prompt response from host. Enjoyed my days here.", "Radoslav is really helpful, he always replied me quickly, and on the first day of my arrival there was even a small gathering for all the guests, which really helps a solo traveler to quickly blend into the vibe of the city. Location is also perfect, 3 min walking from the metro and you have everything around there, supermarket, restaurant, clothing stores... you name it. Would love to stay there again.", "Place is great, location couldn’t be better. Facilities are all well maintained.", "Nice", "Good place to be in Sofia ", "Cheap for a reason. The room is a LOT smaller than it looks on the pictures. It has a distinctive smell. Hardly enough for two people. The bathroom is also chaos, never seen something like this before. ", "Kudos to the staff members. Very helpful and lively. Everything was good. Had no issues. I liked the fact that small improvements were made for e.g. The faucet was replaced in one of the wash basin which was broken when I first saw. All the best!", "Perfect stay for a solo traveler, keyless entry was extra convenient. Seamless communication. Recommended!", "A great location, easy to access,  excellent WiFi, at a great price. Thanks.", "Communication is really easy and staff is very friendly but the place lacks of atmosphere and is extremely poorly soundproofed. ", "Great location short walking distance from Serdika station. Has a cafe right outside, right near the Mosque, Synagogue, Church and the main centre. Felt safe and secure no issues at all, would stay here again.", "Beautiful place, really attractive! A lot of people to meet and the situation is perfect! Good trip, thanks :)", "It was a pleasant room with the galaxy on the ceiling being a great touch.  The room was clean and was a nice place to rest after a day visiting the city. Ideally for us their was a vegan place to eat 1 minuet from the room and with the room being only a 20 minuet walk to the station was ideal.
However I would say that the combination of toilets cubicles that had showers in them would have caused a issue if the place had been busy and the provided mop for wiping up the water wasn't very effective.
Overall if your looking for a place to stay for a few days it can be recommended", "You should definitely stay here if you want to visit sofia! Radoslav is great host!", "The most comfortable and the best place in the center of Sofia!", "Great room in the heart of Sofia! Clean and comfortable. The walls are a bit thin but nothing to worry about. I’d definitely come back!", "Great place to stay! 5 min is walk to the central metro station, close to everything you need in Sofia!", "Really recommended good price good location ", "this is the best place u can find for such a price. It’s the same price as the cheapest hostels. The location is great 3 min walk from serdika metro which serves both lines. 
The host responds fast and check in is very flexible (just leave ur bag there at reception)", "Everything was as described. Very central. Very quiet. Airport pickup very convenient. Good choice.", "Stayed with my friend in Sofia for a night! Place really central, you have everything around, walkable to the main road with all the restaurants and bars! 
Radoslav and his quick responses are on point! And his receptionist Ani will definitely make you welcome!", "Nice place with very good center location! Ideal for one night stays.", "Very close to the metro star job serdica, in a beautiful  neighbourhood! The room was spacious  and clean and the people very welcoming!", "In perfect location in the center of Sofia , really close to metro station for airport, value for money.", "Milky way galaxy room's It's a very pleasant and quiet place located in the center of the city, and for Radoslav I have no words very pleasant and helpful that rarely is such a person", "Very good location, nice neighborhood, comfortable place to sleep...I really enjoyed it! I recommend.", "The location and room were great. Spacious and clean room.", "We loved Radoslav's place! Literally 2 minutes from the Synagogue and right next to the most important metro station where the Roman ruins are. Loved it!", "Central. Supermarket nearby. Cool vibe. Recommended", "Perfect place :) Central and with a good vibe!", "Brilliant stay. Very accommodating with local tips on places to eat, drink and visit. Recommended the free Sofia walking tour and it was well worth it. Nice social area upstairs that serves drinks. Great location in the middle of Sofia.", "The location of this hostel is incredible - just steps from the heart of the city and all the main attractions! Radoslav was very helpful in arranging a shuttle from the airport and provided very useful tips to help see the beautiful city of Sofia. The hostel was clean and quiet and it was great to meet other travelers from many different countries. Thanks Radoslav for helping to make my trip to Sofia a memorable one!!! :)", "Perfectly located in the centre of Sofia, this AirBnb is not only great to explore the city but also to connect to other people. The bar inside is a great get together place at night, enjoy a Bulgarian beer with Rado and Marco! 

Recommended for everyone! Best deal you can find for the price", "Close to everything! Nice place, clean, great communication. Good for travelers who want to see the highlights of Sofia.", "Me and my friend stayed at Radoslav’s place for one night. His room was very clean, warm and comfortable. Also, it was in walking distance from all the main attractions of the city. Radoslav was a friendly host and he tried his best to make our stay enjoyable. He gave us local tips and helped us arrange transfer to the airport. I would definitely recommend his place to anyone visiting Sofia.", "Radoslav is a very helpful person who will help you with whatever you want.", "Clean and tidy, very close to metro station, fast internet(50/20mb).", "A short drive from the airport. Great location for people arriving by public transport as close to the metro station. Within walking distance to shops and restaurants.

I was looking for something a little different than the chain hotels. The building is perhaps a converted office with the hallway used as sitting room and kitchen. It does have large comfortable chairs. The Kitchen is a microwave and fridge at the end of the corridoor but with so many places to eat on the door step it is not really needed.

Arrived late at night with deep snow outside but the building was warm enough for a comfortable sleep.

The price is very low compared with hostels in the area with a private room only a couple of euros more than staying in a bed in a dorm. 

Overall a great budget stop off.", "Thanks Radoslav. You keep the place really clean! And we love the location!
The room is clean and the bed is very comfortable. To my surprise, the shower works out really well: you can sit on the toilet seat cover to clean and dry your feet. When you put the cover up, the toilet seat is actually dry. Quite amazing. The water is nice and hot and stable. We'll definitely come back if we don't need a kitchen.", "It is in a corridor (which incidentally also is the ‘Living Room’l), & the front entrance is to that one. If the ‘Private Entrance’ is to the room itself, then that would be accurate. 

We never met in person, but over email he wrote ‘May you please leave a nice review and 5 stars :)? I will do the same for :)’. But I do not feel like being a part of the ‘Tricking of Future Guests’. Next time I will look for an other airbnb.", "Great that we could check in ourselves. The celling is amazing and the location is really good. Would come again.", "Truly genuine, hospitable, creative host. This spot is right in the middle of many shops close to public transportation. Radoslav makes you feel like you are among friends and provides wonderful information about Sofia as well as sharing his wisdom and ideas from his travels and life experiences. Highly recommend!", "Точност, гостоприемност и услужливост, както винаги при посещенията ми. Много добро и удобно разположение в центъра на София. При всяко идване в София бих отсядал при Радослав!", "Très bien situé", "L’auberge est située dans un quartier génial, animé par le meilleur marché couvert de Sofia. L’hôte s’est adaptée à mon rythme (arrivée tardive et départ tôt). On a eu un petit quiproquo le lendemain très sympa . Je vous recommande cet endroit!", "В комнате не хватает света и вентиляции. Было окно, но я боялась его открывать так как меня и так всю искусали комары. В реальности ремонт уже не такой как на фото.
Очень понравилась девушка на ресепшене. Очень активная и позитивная, рассказала про все главные места в городе. 
В общем если вам нужно хорошее место в центре и вам будете только ночевать там, то это отличный выбор.", "A 2 pas du métro Serdika dans une rue piétonne au calme et en plein centre ville. Accueil formidable ! ", "Bien situe, au moins une quinzaine de chambre. Belle maison ancienne dans un quartier sympathique.personnel adorable", "De locatie is erg goed, vlakbij een metrohalte in het centrum. De galaxy-kamer was proper. De badkamer is niet erg handig, de douchekop hangt boven de wc en het water maakt de helebadkamervloer nat.", "Alloggiare da Radoslav è stato un piacere. Radoslav è spiritoso, amichevole, i suoi consigli su Sofia mi sono stati utili. È una persona paziente visto le quasi 2ore di ritardo nel check in, mi ha aspettato nonostante i suoi impegni. Alloggio in pieno centro, confortevole e silenzioso. comodo per gli spostamenti con la metro a 2 passi.", "Отличная комната в самом центре Софии! Рядом супермаркет, метро, центральная улица, кафе и достопримечательности, в 20 минутах ходьбы авто- и ж/д вокзалы.
Радослав гостеприимный хозяин, быстро отвечает на сообщения, подробно объяснил, как добраться. 
Комната уютная, комфортная и удобная и чистая.
Рекомендую!", "Estuve una noche y repetí dos más. Radoslav es atento y te ayuda en cualquier cosa. El lugar está muy céntrico y bien situado. Gracia por todo.", "El alojamiento es lo esperado, está muy bien situado, en la misma calle hay una parada de metro y está cerca de las principales atracciones de la ciudad. En el barrio hay todo tipo de tiendas con todo lo que se pueda necesitar. El alojamiento es tranquilo y silencioso.  El anfitrión, Radoslav, es muy amable y cercano. Buena relación calidad /precio. Recomendable.", "Sólo estuve una noche y fue perfecto. De hecho voy a repetir.  Gracias", "", "Goede optie in Sofia. De locatie is prima, supercentraal, alles makkelijk op de voet te doen.", "值得推荐的地方!干净整洁的房间,舒适的床和枕头｡绝佳的位置,无论你想购物还是参观,一切都很便捷!友好热情的房主,总是保持良好的沟通!如果你是背包客,这里将是你在索菲亚最佳选择!", "Radoslav es un buen tipo y muy hospitalario , la ubicación no puede ser mejor y la habitación y el baño limpios y de buena calidad", "Un señor muy atento y simpatico, ademas la situacion es muy buena. Check-in / -out was a breeze, with Plamen making sure we were clear on how to access the property before we arrived to avoid any issues. Kitchen was stocked with the basics, including an espresso maker and coffee. Bathroom was clean, with small toiletries provided. There was even a washing machine! I really liked the 'bedroom', which is partitioned off with floor to ceiling windows. Such a great use of space and there are deep window sills, perfect for sitting and reading. 

The only issue we had was with the bed linens. The bed was made with a bottom sheet and lots of pillows, with additional linens piled on top. When opening the pile, we realised it was one double duvet cover and one single duvet cover. And no duvet! This was likely a mistake; whoever prepared the space likely thought the single duvet cover was a double top sheet. And it was so hot, a duvet wasn't actually needed. We didn't take issue with it, and instead slept very well under both covers!

We only stayed one night but wished we could have stayed longer. My boyfriend loved it so much I think he's on the search for a similar space in our hometown that we can call our own. I really can recommend this flat!", "This is the best place I have ever visited during vacations and I will explain you why:

LOCATION. This apartment is situated just in the heart of Sofia 10 min from the main street and 5 min from the Sofia cathedral. INTERIOR. For me, as a designer, this place is exciting! Furniture from the kitchen to bed is just beyond descriptions, colors are amazingly fit together, carpet pillows all together it created a cozy and relaxing atmosphere.

KITCHEN. This place equipped with all staff that you need: pots, cups, glasses, dishes, and of course fridge, toaster, dish washer. What is more, you will find good coffee, tea, and even cookies in this kitchen.

CLEAN. All place smells incredible good, you won't find any dirty places. They provide you with bed linen, towels, extra pillows.

OWNER. Radost and her daughter are extremely welcoming and supported us every time when we needed some help either call the taxi or allow to spend in the place extra hours before leaving.

P.S. We slept like babies in the air there is just glorious and the bed space makes you feel like you are in the heaven

HIGHLY RECOMMEND staying here. You won't find the better place.", "Top appartement!", "Εξαιρετικό διαμέρισμα, πολύ όμορφος χώρος και σε πολύ καλή τοποθεσία! Το προτείνω ανεπιφύλακτα", "소피아에 방문하실 한국분들에게 적극 추천 드립니다.

reviews:
["Awesome place.", "Great place, wonderfull!", "Great place - stylish, spacious and cosy, great location. Would definitely come back again:-)", "As always , I really enjoyed my stay in the yellow apartment - it is stylish , well situated ,close to the tube (leading to the airport) and the city center.

Nadia and Radi are very accommodating and hospitable - thank you very much for everything!", "Wonderful place , will  visit it again,", "A", "Everything was great, but the neighbours from above were a bit noisy. 
We will definitely recommend the place and stay again at Radi's appartment!", "Great place and perfect location", "Radi and Jeni are very hospitable and kind.They were helpful on my arrival and very accommodating and flexible.The apartment is clean and nice.It provides fast internet,which was important to me (as I was working during my stay).

The apartment is very close to the city center and to the metro (which is leading to the airport in 35 minutes). I recommend. Thank you Radi and Jeni.", "Nice and clean.", "The host, the place, the location - just great!", "A great place with great hosts. Everything was as we wanted :)", "Nice, modern place. We booked it and arrived pretty late in the evening but the hosts still responded very fast. Thanks!", "Excellent place!
Top location,very close to the city center.
Clean,cozy!!!
Thank you ;)", "Staying in the Yellow Apartment was one of the smoothest in my travel experience. It was urgent for me to find a place for one night and the response of the host was almost immediate so I was able to arrange everything very quickly. Radi’s place is with the perfect location in the center but at the same time on a quiet street. The apartment is very cozy, comfortable, absolutely nice and well equipped. Radi was perfect host – very attentive and helpful from the very beginning.", "Great place! Great host! Great location!", "I enjoyed my stay at yellow apartment. I was the first guest of this brand new place. I was surprised to see how welcoming and caring is the host. I was provided with portable 4g router. When I was out, I queried for local points of interest via viber and the host was always quick to reply and provide with relevant information. It took little time of host, but made my stay stress free. I would be happy to come back and spend more time at the lovely Yellow apartment. So much better than Hilton hotel nearby and at fraction of the cost.", "It is a well designed, lovely studio.", "Yellow apartment is a great place to stay. Apart from being well run it is in an area which has great organic and artisan shops close to center but with quiet leafy streets. 
We parked our car at the airport and took metro which has a stop just 5 minutes walk from apartment. 
We were greeted by Co-host who had parking vouchers for us but were glad not to have to drive Sofia streets.
We had a very comfortable few days and I would recommend this apartment and host.", "Radi is fast for answering, and he's english Very good", "The place is very nice with modern decoration and everything you will need is provided. It is very close to the metro station and city centre. Very kind host!", "Modern, clean, comfty apartment in a sweet neighborhood. The check-in was pleasent. All in all quite a good choice!", "This was the perfect apartment for my trip to Sofia. I was walking distance from everything and I felt super safe. The apartment is newly renovated and everything smells fresh and new. I was very comfortable there.", "Excellent appartment in modern stile. Walking distance to the center of Sofia. Only 100 meter from the appartment you find a fantastic italian restaurant!", "Perfect !", "It was just one night but an amazing night in this flat ! Perfect", "It is a lovely apartment. The amenities were comprehensive, including basic dishes you'd need for a kitchen. There were nice extra touches, like a message blackboard saying hi to me. It isn't in the middle of the touristy bits of Sofia but the walk was nice and there are buses and metro as well.", "Lovely apartment and very well furnished - would definitely recommend.", "Wonderful stylish apartment, spotless, everything brand new, very comfortable bed, nice bathroom and very good AC.", "We had a wonderful time in Sofia! The apartment was great! Alex, who did the check-in with us, even helped us with finding a place in a local restaurant, after our late arrival due to a delayed flight. And they also booked a taxi for our travel back to the airport! I would recommend the place to stay! ", "A really great, cozy place at a convenient location. The apartment had all the amenities you'd expect and even more! The stylish decoration really makes it feel super cozy !", "The hosts were very accommodating and responsive, and the apartment was spotless. The apartment is a fair walk from the Main Street but it’s very conveniently accessed from the airport using the metro route. The apartment is on the ground floor, but the neighborhood is quiet. ", "Modern and well equipped apartment with everything you need and easy to get around the city from there. They were always responsive to our questions, also kind enough to help us with everything.
Ви благодариме. Поздрав од Македонија :)", "We really liked our stay in this airbnb. It is very stylish and well equipped. We had everything to cook ourself. Good location to discover the city by foot! The  communication is smooth. It was really usefull that we could leave our luggage in the hallway awaiting our flight.", "Awesome place, great location. ", "Amazing place located in one of the most friendly neighborhoods of Sofia! We got exactly what we saw online and that made us super happy! Amenities were more than enough including thinks that are not permitted on air, like razor blades! Wifi & portable WiFi were great too! Hot water, washing machine and more...If you are looking for a cool place in Sofia, just try it!", "Nice modern place, with awesome interior design and nice area where all the cafes and restaurants are just 5 min walking.", "Highly recommend the apartment, great location and close to city centre / shops/ good market / restaurants/ cafes. Mostly I liked the additional extra bits for cleaning and toiletries - super useful if you are traveling with kids. ", "Such an amazing Airbnb! Quiet location but still within walking distance to every place you would want to visit. The space is just as clean and beautiful as the photos. Check-in and communication were super easy. Couldn’t recommend this place enough! ", "She was very kind, the apartment very cozy and very beautiful in a quiet area", "Fantastic accommodation in a cool part of Sofia. We walked pretty much everywhere, although taxis are also cheap (5-6 lev around town). Nadya acted as our personal concierge - arranging anything we needed, advising on activities etc. The apartment itself is modern and well equipped, even with portable WiFi for the guests! We highly recommend these guys and would happily return. Thanks for your great hospitality!", "Nice place. Good communication and helpful tips. Kind enough to help booking taxi for airport", "Amazing place and host. We needed to get to the hospital one day, and she recommended a good English speaking hospital, and booked a taxi for us. Very clean, and close to town. ", "Thank you Radi and Nadya for the amazing hospitality! They were always responsive to our overwhelmingly many questions, also kind enough to help us arrange taxis whenever we need them. The place is clean and spacious, worth the price. Would definitely recommend to stay. ", "Radi and Nadya were great hosts. The apartment is lovely, well decorated, well located and  very clean. They gave us very good tips about the city and around the flat. It is close to the city centre and we could walk everywhere. There is a great vegetarian restaurant called "Soul Kitchen" 5 minutes walking from there, that Nadya kindly recommended, it was a great start with Sofia for us. We also did the Free Sofia Walking tour, also Nadya's tip, and we loved. They kindly offer to book a taxi for us as our flight was very early in the morning. We wish we could stay more. We hope to go back soon.", "my choice at sofia", "Radi and Nadia (and their cousin) were absolutely amazing hosts! I have to say the apartment was our favorite part of our trip and of Sofia. They responded incredibly fast, the place was awesome, and they even left us a bottle of champaign to celebrate our birthdays. More than that, Nadia woke up at 4am just to call us a taxi! They even gave as a wifi device to carry around the city. Honestly, simply the best. We would totally stay longer, and highly recommend it!", "Great place and good value for money - simple as that.", "Modern clean apartment with everything you need and easy to get around the city from there. Nadya was super helpful and responses were always speedy! :) Would recommend.", "Very cosy flat, secluded within greenery and hosted by great owner.", "Thanks for being a nice host! It was lovely and comfy! ;)
The place was in a good location never felt like we need to go far to get anything.
Parking method is horrible haha but Nadia helped us with that ;) thanks again!", "The apartment was great and very nice. Good location near from the center - 10 to 15 minutes. I recommend. Thank you Radi !!", "Radi's place was ideal for the trip for me and my boyfriend. We were in touch with Nadya, who was extremely responsive and attentive to our requirements (we were arriving earlier than the check-in officially was and so they've facilitated for us to collect the keys earlier). The apartment was lovely - homey and personalised. We were welcomed by Alex right on time and the location was perfect for being in the city centre and it didn't require much transport (if any) for our sight-seeing! Thank you for the lovely welcoming, I'd certainly recommend Radi's place and would love to visit again.", "Nice and calm place, there is everything you need, close to the citycenter.
Great communication and I would def. recommend this place !
Thanks for everything", "Stayed one night, loved my stay here. Apartment was clean and quiet. It looks like it does on the photos. Nadya was very helpful with check-in, and quick to respond to any messages. Recommend staying here!", "The flat was a great size, very", "I would totally recommend Radi's Appartments. I had the opportunity to stay in the Yellow one and besides the fact that i slept like a baby (very good matress), everything is just perfect! He is an amazing host and person, provieds all the information you need, he repsonds very quicly and he helps you to have an amazing stay in Sofia. 100% Satisfied! Undoubtedly i will be back! Thank you!", "The Yellow Apartment is an excellent choice for staying in Sofia! Cozy, very well equipped, extremely clean and near the center, 15 minutes walk. Nadya was very helpful and we surely recommend this apartment. I am usually not a fan of ground floor apartments but in this case it was not relevant. Thank you!!", "My sister and I stayed for one night in The Yellow Apartment. Nadya was great and allowed us to check in a bit earlier as we arrived early in the morning. 

The apartment is open space, bright and clean. It has a full kitchen, small dining table, sofa, chairs, a double bed, TV and heater/ AC. The bathroom is very clean with a great shower. The only thing is, it does get quite wet in there after a shower so keep that in mind. 

There is also local information regarding tourist attractions although you don’t necessarily need it as it’s easy to explore the area. Thr location of the apartment is very central - only a 20 minute walk from the high street. 

Overall a pleasant experience. I would stay here again if in the city :-)", "Great place for a reasonable price in proximity to the city center!", "We were a bit wary of all the good reviews, but it turns out they are well-deserved. The apartment was beautiful, clean, and very thoughtfully prepared (there’s even a first aid kit in the bathroom). Nadya was super helpful in both talking about Sofia and booking our next place. In short, this place was above and beyond expectations, and we can highly recommend it.", "The place was perfect for a long weekend in Sofia; really good location on a quiet street but near to everything, clean, really good facilities, hosts were fantastic. Would absolutely recommend this apartment.", "A fantastic, stylish apartment in a quiet, residential area. The apartment felt like it was almost brand new, so everything was to a high standard. The metro station is just 5 mins away and there are a few shops and restaurants nearby. All in all, I would definitely recommend it.", "Radi and his Family are perfect hosts.
They always answer within a few minutes. The flat is very clean an looks exactly as on the pictures. The kitchen has all the tool you need to cook a great meal.
Thank you", "The apartment is very stylish and cosy. Everything needed is provided. The location is perfect: walking distance to the city center and very close to the subway station. The hosts are friendly and responsible.", "Excellent place. Recommended", "Nice apartment, nicely decorated. Warm atmosphere inside.
Not too far from city centre (10-15 min walk). I recommend this adress.", "This was our second stay at the Yellow apartment, when we knew we were returning to Sofia this was our first choice. The place is clean and really well equipped. Great hosts and great apartment.", "Comfortable, clean and cozy. Good location, great restaurants nearby. We really enjoyed our stay.", "Really nice place! The apartment is beautiful and has everything you need! It is near the city center!! I recommend it.", "We really enjoyed our stay at the yellow apartment, so much so we have already booked another stay. The space was exactly as shown, clean, very well equipped and felt secure & homely. Great hosts, great apartment!", "I recommend it 100% exactly as in the pictures, central location good host", "We had a wonderful stay. Appartment is desiged, super clean, well equiped. It even had a portable router..
The neighberhood is freindly and pretty close to the center.  I reccomend !", "A really perfect apartment in a quiet neighbourhood close to the city center.  It looks as presented, is very clean and quiet, and all amenities are available.  Recommended!", "My stay was outstanding! The place was clean, stylish and comfortable. It had everything I could possibly need. The location was perfect and the hiss were responsive and very accommodating. Book this place today! It is phenomenal.", "The place is even better than it seems on the photos. Really cozy and stylish, has everything you need for a comfortable stay. The location is great- close to all the fun parts of Sofia. Communication with the host was easy and efficient and all the arrangements were met with great punctuality.  Can't recommend the place enough!", "We stayed in the yellow apartment during a weekend trip to Sofia and had a really great time. The apartment was super clean and very nice.  Everything was exactly as described.  Communication with Radi was quick and easy.  The apartment is in walking distance to the city centre and we got some good recommendations for dinner nearby.  Public transport is also very close. 
I would totally recommend staying at Radi's place, it is really very nice and we felt at home instantly.", "Very Nice spacious And clean appartment. We enjoyed our stay a lot! Its Just like the pictures, perfectly shown. Amazing host, perfect communication! We would Love to go back once!", "Great place in a very cute neighborhood, would stay there again! The host is also super nice!", "Great apartment, and in a good location next to some great restaurants!", "Radi's place was really nice and stylish. He also let me check-in very early in the morning. Will definitely stay again if I am back.", "Had a great stay at this cozy apartment. Everything is simple but stylish and very comfortable. Really loved the kitchen. Great communication with the host with quick replies and helpful tips for restaurant bars (try 'made in blue'!! ) etc. Everything is within walking distance (1-2km).", "Really nice place! Great for two people. Excellent welcome and hospitality (Radi asked us if we needed anything and was really open to questions and even late check out).. It has everything you might need, it is clean and close to the center.  You can find parking seats outside the house or very close to it. Very comfortable and really beautiful stay!
Πολυ ομορφο σπιτι! Ιδανικο για δυο ατομα.. πολυ καλη υποδοχη και φιλοξενια(ο Ραντι μας εστελνε αν ειμαστε καλα και αν χρειαζομαστε τιποτα και ηταν ανοιχτος σε ερωτησεις αλλα και στο να κανουμε check out αργα).. ειχε οτιδηποτε μπορει να χρειαστειτε, ηταν πολυ καθαρο και κοντα στο κεντρο ακομα και με τα ποδια.. Αν εχετε αυτοκινητο μπορειτε να βρειτε θεσεις πολυ κοντα στο σπιτι η ακομα και απ εξω.. πραγματικα βολικο σπιτι και πολυ καλη η διαμονη μας!", "A great apartment for the two of us. Friendly , interesting neighbourhood , 15 min walk to centre or £2.50 taxi.  Excellent host.we really recommend this if you are looking for a city break.", "I love staying here during my business travel. It's walking distance to my favorite places in the city yet it's quiet and secluded. &The host is great.", "Perfect host. Very social, really helpful and super friendly. The apartment is top class. We felt at home the moment we walked in. Would recommend it to all my friends and family. Thnx so much Radi! We had an awesome time in Sofia!", "Quiet, comfortable place, centrally located and well equipped. Great communication with host.", "Impeccably clean, well-designed studio in a nice neighborhood within a reasonable walk to the metro. Radi was very responsive and proactively asked if I needed anything. Only issue was that Internet was via 4G hotspot, so it wasn't ideal for a large work file I needed to send, but worked eventually. I'd stay here again if I return to Sofia and will recommend to co-workers who visit our Sofia office.", "A restored and well decorated apartment in a great location. It's a Ikea style apartment with all amenities available. The location is a safe residential area with many nice bakeries, coffees and small supermarkets. It's a two minute walk to a main avenue with many transportation options including tram and just a 10 minute walk to the city center. Also two of the best restaurants in Sofia are in a short walking distance from the apartment (Ресторант Под липите and Soul Kitchen). Very recommended.", "The appartement is very charming and the bed comfortable. It's a little outside the center but you can easily walk there. We had to leave very early but it was easy to arrange everything with the keys.", "This place is in a very nice quiet area of central Sofia with trees lining the street and really friendly neighbors. Its only a 10 minute walk into the city centre where you have everything you could possibly want. Inside the apartment itself is very stylish, clean and all brand new with everything you need. Your host Radi couldn't be more helpful and he's a really great guy. Also its really amazing value for money as you'll pay more in a hotel and I found it much better than staying in a hotel. I really enjoyed my stay and anytime I'm back in Sofia I'll definitely be stopping here", "L’appartement était parfait. Tout d’abord la location est très centrale est permet de tout faire à pied depuis celui ci ce qui est très agréable. 

Ensuite l’appartement est parfait pour un couple seul ou avec petit enfant. Il est fonctionnel, moderne est très cosy. Je le recommande à 200% 

De plus un petit message de bienvenue avec votre prénom est écrit à votre arrivée. 

Je le réserverai à nouveau si je reviens sur Sofia !", "Très bonne adresse. appart très cosi, bien équipé, plaisant.", "Die Unterkunft war großartig.", "un super appartement décoré avec goût, proche du métro, quartier calme, très bien équipé ! ", "Superfijn appartement op een toplocatie! Het appartement is niet midden in het centrum gelegen maar in een rustig straatje op loopafstand van het centrum. Het is een superfijn buurtje met goede restaurants heel dichtbij . We hebben hele leuke tips gekregen van onze host en het appartement is ruim, licht en is heel netjes. Ook de communicatie is top, supersnel en heel behulpzaam!", "Leuke en gezellige studio op een rustige locatie. Alles is op loopafstand. Fijn dat er rolluiken aanwezig zijn tegen de warmte en voor de nachtrust. Er viel goed af te stemmen met Radi over aankomst en vertrek!", "Per un viaggio in coppia ci siamo recati a Sofia per qualche giorno a Pasqua. Radi è stato un ottimo padrone di casa. La sua ospitalità e la sua gentilezza ci hanno fatto sentire a casa nostra. L'appartamento è ancora più affascinante dal vivo che in foto e si percepisce il comfort da ogni minimo dettaglio. A soli 10 minuti dal centro, è una casa davvero deliziosa. Prenotate questo alloggio se vi trovate a Sofia, è INCANTEVOLE! Grazie Radi!", "De Yellow Apartment van Radi is een geweldige plaats om te verblijven als je in  Sofia bent. Het apartment is precies zoals op de foto's en alles is op loopafstand te vinden. We werden warm ontvangen door de host met tips over Sofia. Zeker een aanrader dus!", "Ad accoglierci con precisione e puntualità abbiamo trovato Nadya, che parla un inglese ineccepibile, ed è non solo gentile nei modi, ma anche molto accorta nel darci più consigli possibili. La casa non solo corrisponde alle caratteristiche dell'annuncio ma se possibile supera le aspettative in pulizia ed organizzazione. Ampia, calda, luminosa, piena di tutti i comfort necessari. Ti senti a casa tua dal primo momento che metti piede oltre la soglia. La distanza di cammino permette di raggiungere tutte le mete di interesse a piedi in pochi minuti, ma consente un riposo assicurato per via del silenzio che regna nella strada. Davvero super consigliato!!!", "Die Yellow Wohnung in Sofia ist ein Traum. Ideal für Menschen die eine ruhige Lage geniessen möchten und trotzdem nah an allem in Sofia sind. Metro öffentliches Verkehr sind auch zwei Schritte entfernt. Einkaufsmöglichkeiten, Bio Markt daneben, Massagen, Coiffeur  und noch dazu ganz nah am Zentrum. Alles stimmte perfekt. Ich danke den Radi nochmals und wünsche ihm viel Erfolg! Mit besten Grüssen Svetlana Ehinger", "Estupenda experiencia. Volvería a alojarme en el mismo apartamento si volviese a ir. Altamente recomendado. Los propietarios fueron muy serviciales y amigables. La limpieza perfecta y la localización difícil de mejorar."]

reviews:
["TOP apartment!! right in the center and super clean.", "Thank you again! best apartment in Sofia", "Miro &Ani provided an excellent location and hospitality so I would recommend  their apartment to anybody who is looking for pleasant and comfortable overnight staying in Sofia.", "Just perfect :-)", "Amazing location!
Very Very Very clean and tidy!
Communication was very easy and fast!
The bed was very big and comfortable!", "Miro and Ani’s place is outstanding! From their hospitality, the wonderful and super clean apartment, to the location. Everything was perfect! The communication between me and Miro was perfect and he made everything for me easy. The apartment is great - super clean and tidy, modern and comfortable. It was very kind from them to leave wine, beer, coke, coffee, tea etc. - everything one might need. The location is perfect- close to everything you need, along with super easy commute. I absolutely recommend this place, it’s fantastic, a place where I would definitely return. Miro and Ani thanks for everything!", "Great place,  very clean and will defiantly book again!", "Clean and cozy apartment and is located next to many great downtown restaurants and touristic locations. Check-in/check-out were very easy. The apartment is in a quiet and renovated building. I had a great time walking around and having my base so central. The space itself was nice and clean and the bathroom was really nice. I really liked staying there. Communication and everything was great. I can wholeheartedly recommend.", "I think that the fact that it was my second stay at Miro’s place says it all. But if it doesn’t: the place is in perfect spot for exploring the city, very central, spotless clean and it’s design is amazing. Plenty of amenities complimentary and Miro is the best host I’ve ever encountered, very polite and responsive, and always helpful. I am looking forward to returning in this beautiful apartment.", "This is the second time I’ve stayed at Miro and Ani’s, and it was every bit as good as the first time. I now look out for it every time I’m in Sofia!", "The place ia very good and well prepared! The location allowed us to visit all the cirt by foot! mira and Ani were very helpfull!", "Will book again", "Very convenient - just a block away from the main strip Vitoshka. The place is tastefully decorated, quiet and well maintained. The hosts are awesome - helpful and non-intrusive. 
Perfect place for a vacation or a business trip.", "the place is amazing , location is supper , very near to everything , the stay was excellent", "A great apartment in the centre of town, just a minutes walk from Vitosha Boulevard. The apartment is beautifully designed, and has everything you need. Check-in and check-out was super simple, and both Miro and Ani were very helpful and responsive in all my queries. When I come back to Sofia, I will be checking (and hoping) that this apartment is available.", "Great accommodation in top location", "Great location, sparkling clean apartment with tasteful touches. Ideal for a couple or solo traveller, efficient check-in and check-out process. Steps away from main pedestrian boulevard but still very calm and quiet. When they were refurbishing this apartment they were thinking about future guests and how to make their stay comfortable!", "Another Great Stay at Miro and Ani's Place.  Perfectly placed for Sofia and excellent hosts and they make staying there and leaving so smooth!!!", "We had a fantastic stay in Miro and Ani's luxury, modern apartment in the heart of Sofia. The location is very central, steps away from Vitosha Boulevard, and the apartment itself is state of the art and well decorated. The wine, chocolates and little shampoos were delightful extra touches! Highlights for us included the bedroom's patio and large, comfortable bed, the bathroom's square rain shower head, and the living room's L-shaped couch that doubles as an extra bed. Host was welcoming and attentive - would highly recommend this booking!", "Miro and Anni were excellent hosts. 
Communication was super quick. There were plenty of thoughtful touches like fresh fruit and chocolates in the kitchen, homemade jam in the fridge. 
Location was excellent, and the flat fantastic. Would highly recommend.", "Great apartment close to everything you could possibly want. 3 minutes from the main road but no noise at night. Apartment is well equipped and cupboards and fridge had useful things in them. Check in and out was super easy and host was very helpful and friendly. Would highly recommend this space to anyone staying in Sofia.", "Perfect location beautiful designed house 
Everything was perfect ", "Great place, well located, clean, and above all, amazing hospitality. Miro is one of the best hosts I have encountered so far, totally recommended ", "Absolutely brilliant apartment with amazing hosts. Really enjoyed my stay here and would recommend it to anyone who's coming to Sofia!", "The flat is really perfect: clean, fully equipped and beautifully designed. Miro and Ani have been very flexible and responsive. The location of the flat is perfect too, close to the hart of Sofia and still quiet. Sofia is a city where you feel good !", "Amazing apartment. Check in was smooth and easy. Communication was fast. The apartment is located in a lively area, but very peaceful inside. The amenities in the apartment are outstanding. Very clean.", "the flat is well located and the owner super friendly", "Super stylish apartment, clean and cool touches everywhere. Wonderful shower/wetroom too. Absolutely brilliant location, close to all the trendy  restaraunts and bars. Couldn't recommend this Miro and Ani's place enough... they even left a bottle of wine for our arrival!", "This Airbnb is 2 blocks off the main drag yet still quiet and very cute. Queen size bed w a little balcony. Full size rain shower. Separate toilet area. Washer. Coffee maker. A/C. Easy self check in. We were lucky this place was available! 

We booked very last minute (same day!) and Miro was very communicative about getting it ready and even left us a bottle of wine and let us check out late because of our late flight. Highly recommend. Great location. Lovely host.", "A great place really central just meters from Vitosha bul. but quiet at the same time. Very stylish and clean flat. Would be more than happy to stay there again.", "Super clean, comfortable, nice location like a luxurious hotel. I strongly recommend this flat!", "one of the best Airbnb experiences we have had. super central, super clean, super finished.  Would stay again and advise my friends to stay there if visiting Sofia", "Awesome place, very chic and cool. Close to all the main attractions in Sofia.", "Perfect place to stay while in Sofia. The apartment is very comfortable and clean. Miro and Ani were wonderful hosts. Check in was very easy. Miro was responsive to all communication, which was greatly appreciated. Nothing was too much trouble. Miro even bought our bus ticket to Ruse as we were unable to do so online.
The coffee machine (with pods), was a welcome sight after a 20+hour flight. Chocolates and wine was also appreciated. 
Would highly recommend this apartment - it will not disappoint.", "After traveling around the world and staying at AirBnB's, I can say that Miro and Ani's place is tops. It is conveniently located and very comfortable. It was very clean and they thought of their guest during my whole stay.  I could walk to just about everywhere and only hopped on the metro to get back and forth to the airport. One can easily walk to the free tour meeting location.", "Beautifully appointed apartment as pictured. Clean. Fantastic location. Miro and Ani were so responsive with every communication. The building lost hot water our first night and the next morning (not their fault!), and the water was rather frigid (mid-May). Our hosts offered to send us to a hotel, but we "toughed it out".  Loved Sofia, Plovdiv and the surrounding areas--wished we had had more time to explore more. Would definitely stay at their apartment again.", "A great apartment in central sofia.  Good public transport option from the airport.", "This was one of the best airbnb experiences I've ever had! The apartment was even better than in the pictures, amazingly designed, extremely clean, and perfectly located in the heart of Sofia. Miro was very responsive in the communication. And the little attentions were so nice, like sweets in the kitchen and having an espresso machine. I recommend Miro and Ani's apartment a million times!", "It's my third or fourth time staying at Miro and Ani's. Need I say more? Miro is a superhost. Incredibly responsive, punctual and helpful. The flat is clean, quiet and in a great location. It's my go-to place when I'm in Sofia!", "I spend a really good time in Miro and Ani's flat which is really good located close to the center!
The apartment is very well decorated and really convenient!", "Very lovely appartment! We really enjoyed staying there. Hosts are very kind :))", "This is my go to place when staying in Sofia. Miro is a fantastic host. Great flat and location. Won’t say too much more, because I want availability next time I’m in town :-)", "This place is exactly as it shows in pictures, they are excellent hosts and they take care up to the last detail. We were received as Home. The best thing is it’s location unbeatable everything in a walking distance.", "We had a great stay in Miro and Ani's appartment. Located right on the main street of Sofia. Apparment looked great. Would recommend!", "My wife and I have stayed in many Airbnb's in many countries and this was definitely our favorite.  The apartment is beautifully decorated, immaculately clean, very comfortable and in a perfect location.
We stayed over Christmas and the personal touches (Christmas decorations, baked cookies, drinks/tea/coffee, little gifts under the tree, ...) by Miro and Ani were amazing and made our holiday that much better.
The apartment is about 5 minutes walk from great restaurants, bars and cafes.  Check in was very easy and Miro answered all of our questions within minutes.
This was a perfect stay and we would highly recommend!", "This is my 2nd stay in this apartment.  That speaks to how great I think it is.  Once again, thanks Miro!", "Great apartment, in a great location! Check in was easy and let us explore the city with ease, there was a great little bakery right across the street that made for great breakfast and it was a gorgeous apartment! Highly recommend!", "I very much enjoyed my stay in Miro and Ani’s flat. They are fantastic hosts. Great communication and very helpful. The flat is in a great location, very central and close to shopping, restaurants, subway and the downtown business district. The flat was very clean, quiet, well lit, good wifi, comfortable bed and good table for eating/working. Would stay here again on my next trip to Sofia. Many thanks Miro and Ani for being such great hosts.", "Excellent location. Miro was communicative and very accommodating. The flat is big, modern and clean in a great, lively neighbourhood.", "Great home i loved it", "Great place to stay in the heart of Sofia with everything just around the corner. Really nice and clean flat - its all you need during your stay. Miro is more than helpful, we had some fruits and drinks left in the fridge, would definitely recommend to all my international friends and will book myself again as well.", "This is possibly the best Airbnb experience we have had to date (and there have been many!). 
If could transport this flat to London and make it our home, I’d do it in a flash. 
I hope to stay again soon!!", "Miro and Ani's place was just lovely. A gorgeous apartment very close to the city centre. Miro was incredibly welcoming and went above and beyond with local advice and flexible timings. Would highly recommend to any one wanting to visit Sofia.", "The place is immaculate. It’s obvious that it’s recently renovated with excellent touches and nice furniture. Miro is great! He provided fresh fruit along with flowers. Also, the apartment is one block away from Sofia’s Main Street with many outdoor restaurants. I will definitely stay here again on my next visit.", "Better then 5 star hotel!Super clean right in the center of Sofia.Modern apartment safe and quite place.I recomand this apartment!", "The place is perfect! It’s even better than in the photos, gives you the feeling that it’s brand new and you are the first to use everything inside. Spotless clean, very modern and Miro was so kind as to leave fresh fruit, coke, beer etc in the fridge as well as coffee, tea and everything one could need. The neighborhood is very quiet and it’s only one block from Vitosha blvd where all the restaurants and bars are. Also, 5 min from Metro. I have lived in Sofia one year and know my way around the city but even so the location is absolutely perfect for whatever u want to do: shopping, sightseeing or food and drinks, it’s walking distance from everywhere, very few times we took the metro or taxi. The mattress and the couch are both very comfortable and the shower is a masterpiece.
Miro as a super host, quick, polite, excellent English speaker, very helpful and even gave us a gift! I absolutely recommend the place and will definitely return. Miro, thanks for everything again!", ".", "It was our first time in Sofia and our hosts were the best. We had a flight arriving late and they bought us a pizza and had beer and a nice wine on the table. They even gave us some fresh fruit to have. It was an amazing way to start the trip. The place is very clean and new with lots of new modern amenities like touch screen lights. The location is fantastic as well. Will definitely use them again when we are back!", "Amazing place, amazing hosts. Book it.", "Miro's place is great! The pictures are accurate, it's walking distance from attractions, cafés, restaurants, bars, and shops. What makes this place even better is the impeccable service offered by Miro and friends. They were extremely helpful and responsive from the get-go, even providing us with a Hotspot (so useful when you're a tourist). We had no problems finding the place and they were flexible on letting us drop off our bags before check-in time. I highly recommend to anyone looking for a smooth and seamless stay in Sofia!", "As a business traveler staying for an extended period, this was a great place: clean, comfortable, and convenient.  Per the photos, it is also furnished quite stylishly.  But on top of that, the hosts made my stay even better as Miro was very generous with his time and care.  Highly recommended!", "Just a perfect, serene sanctuary of serenity and relaxation, right in the beating heart of the  busy Metropolitan area of beautiful Sofia! Unbelievably quit (considering the central location) brand new, pristinely clean, elegant and modern, loaded with all you need to feel at home! Not only that- the host is the best you can wish for-ready to assist you in few minutes to any of your needs of the moment, plus more! Fridge was filled with fresh fruits and vegetables from a local farm, and there was a  home made Grape Schnapps Liqueur (Rakia) to greet you you for a friendly welcome ! Highly Recommended place,  would come back to it in any further trips and occasions!", "Lovely place. Very clean and super close to the city centre. Everything, that you need to stay in Sofia.", "This apartment is perfectly located, really comfortable and clean. I recommend it without any doubt. The host Miro is very helpful. Thanks for everything!", "This is a perfect appartment. Central, clean, confortable and the hosts are amazing. The communication was exceptional, about recommendations for restaurants and the surrounding area. Would recommend 100% and wouldn't stay anywhere else if I ever come to Sofia again!!", "The accommodations were just as we had hoped and expected in every way; cleanliness, proximity, comfort, and we always felt safe.  The host was welcoming, courteous, kind, and very professional all at the same time.    The photos provided on the site were very representative of the apartment and was exactly what we were expecting when we walked in.  Would recommend the host and the apartment to anyone.  Very satisfied with our stay.", "Uber modern apartment, very well-equipped, luxurious linens, very easy to find.  Excellent communication with the hosts - they even left a welcome gift toy for my young daughter and left some beer in the fridge. Will definitely stay here again if we ever get back to Sofia. ", "Very nice plays to stay", "I stayed at this cozy apartment during my business trip to Sofia. Being originally from Sofia, I looked for something in the heart of the city that is close to institutions and business, yet I was pleasantly surprised how quiet the neighborhood is. The location of the place itself allowed me flexibility during the day – walking distance away from most governmental buildings, and in the evening - there are some good restaurants and cafes around, also a number of historical sites are nearby. The apartment is only couple of minutes’ walk form the metro station. That saved me a lot of money on rent-a-car. The place has good internet connectivity.

The young couple who runs this place is very nice and helpful. They have done really good job there – the apartment is clean and comfortable. 

Hope you enjoy your stay there as I did! I loved it.", "Very nice appartment, great decoration. Also an excellent location very close to the Vitosha bld.
Thanks again for this homemade wine! Very kindful.

Too bad regarding the hot water that was not working but thanks for the agreement.", "Great flat in a central location! Miro and Milen are very accommodating as well. ", "This place is a gem! Have used Airbnb in over 20+ countries, this was definitely one of the best experience I have had. Very nicely decorated and a unique place. Fast internet. Both hosts are very friendly and caring. I did self check-in and welcomed with farm made delicious red wine and strawberries. There was even a mobile hotspot device provided by the host in case I needed to stay connected in the city. Definitely will stay again next time I visit Sofia.", "Séjour à Sofia excellent dans cet appartement, allez y les yeux fermés pour ma part.
Réactivité pour les réponses, l’appartement est conforme à l’annonce, petites attentions à votre arrivée.
Bref 100% satisfait.
Encore merci à eux", "דירה מהממת, נקייה, חדשה, במיקום הכי טוב בסופיה. יש הכל מסביב. דקה הליכה מהמדרחוב הראשי, עשרות מסעדות ובתי קפה, גישה לתחבורה ציבורית ואתרים היסטוריים. ממליץ לפתוח את הבוקר בבית קפה Memento שנמצא 2 דקות הליכה. שווה מאוד!", "Это тотальное эстетическое наслаждение...! Чудесная и стильная квартира - дизайнерские решения, приятная цветовая гамма и продуманность в каждой детали! Очень радует глаз и наполняет прекрасным настроением:) долго не могла выйти на прогулку- так приятно там было находиться:) а вышла - и сразу в центре! Пешеходный бульвар, магазинчики и ресторанчики - чувствуешь себя местным жителем. Благодарю и радуюсь за всех будущих путешественников, кто здесь окажется:) непременно рекомендую !"]
