reviews:
["Very cool flat with an artistic touch. Monica and Jordan are wonderful people. Keeping in touch with them was always quick, convenient and easy going. Thanks guys!", "The apartment is clean and lovely and the location is just great! I hope I get the chance to stay there again!", "Great place! Recommend!", "The Apatment was really nice! Awesome design  Great location and communication with the hosts. I’ll be happy to be back again.", "Just Great! Thanks!", "Terrific place for parents to stay while they were visiting Sofia", "Very cosy place. Excellent communication with the host flawless check in and checkout.", "I love the place. It’s super art, clean, location is spot on. Hosts are amazing. Recommend.", "Monica & Jordan's place is clean if a little worn round the edges. It has charm and is well appointed with all you will need for a city stay. Situated fairly centrally in Sofia it is never the less reasonably quiet. We never met the hosts but they were responsive to emails and the check in procedure was relatively straight forward. There is a "non-stop" across the street and a lovely little cafe next door serving great sandwiches and ready meals. The apartment offers good value and we enjoyed our stay here...", "Monica & Jordan’s place is great! We reserved it at the last possible moment, as it was urgent and still got very fast response on their side! They were a life saver! 
The place looks exactly as shown in the pics, it's cozy, very warm and in a convenient location!

Thank you again Monica & Jordan!", "The apartment was very clean and tidy. Small,with vintage look. The atmosphere was stunning. We still don't know Monica and Jordan, but the communication with them was easy and we received tips for the apartment only in a few minutes. Neighborhood is quite with great location. Thanks again guys for the lovely holiday and for the great coffee with which we start every morning. 

Best regards! See you soon!", "Excellent experience! Perfect host!", "This is a lovely little apartment in a great neighborhood near the university. So nicely renovated and comfy, and Monica and Jordan were very gracious and kind. We wish we could have stayed longer. Highly recommended!", "That's the second time my boyfriend, Forrest, and I stayed at Monica and Jordan's loft. This time we stayed for 25 days. We didn't miss anything and felt completely at home. At some point due to repair work there was no water in the area for an hour or two and after they turned it on it turned out our toilet cistern didn't work. Monica and Jordan came the same they and fixed it. You can completely rely on the two of them for everything. They are amazing hosts and we would happily be their guests again. ", "Monica and Jordan are very nice and frendly and available for any questions. The apartment is  incredibly and cozy. Thank you for correct attitude! I would recommend We Loft for your stay in Sofia. ", "My girlfriend and I stayed at Monica and Jordan's appartment for a week around the Christmas holidays. They are amazing hosts and really nice peolpe. We were really feeling at home - the appertement is really cosy and has really positive energy. The interior of the appartement is amazing and we had everything useful that you can find in a home! There are no unnecessary rules and expectations - just to threat treid place like you would threat your own home. We are really grateful and for sure will stay there again next time. Thank you! :)", "Monica is charming and friendly and was really helpful the whole time. About the apartment I can say that the location is perfect and the place is very cozy and at the same time stylish. Thank you for everything, we are fascinated! ", "The best neighborhood in Sofia - just on the edge of downtown, but in a very quiet area full of eclectic shops and bars within walking distance (also next to two parks). The loft was great and the hosts were the best I've ever had on AirBnB.", "Monica was wonderful host! Lovely place! Perfect Location! Well done, guys! Good Luck! ", "Everything was perfect ! Great apartment, clean, very nicely decorated with perfect location ( 5 minutes from the downtown ) ! Great host ! I would definitely come again ! Thank you, Monica, for your hospitality ! ", "Very cozy, clean and convenient apartment, located 5-10 minutes to the top city center, metro and bus stations. The host Monica is nice and friendly person. She even provides a portable 4G wi-fi device, which you can bring together with you.
If you'd like to visit Sofia, I would highly recommend to stay there :))
Thanks again for the nice stay!", "Jordan was extremely friendly. The apartment itself is located in a central spot in a great neighbourhood. The interior design is very well thought out and easily makes you feel home. Overall, anything that to do with either the apartment or the host went through perfectly fine and had no problems, would totally recommend the it to anyone! ", "The place was the same as it is in the pictures. It was clean. It is nice location.", "Nice place, good location! We enjoyed our stay in Sofia", "perfect place 5 star service.", "Nice place and the location was also good.", "The apartment was exactly like described and very good located with nice bars near by. Even a later check-out was no problem.", "Amazing stay in Sofia! Beautiful old building, within quite close walking distance to most attractions!", "Great location, close to restaurants, parks and an easy 20 minute walk to the centre of Sofia. ‘Owllee Coffee’, on the way into the Centre, served the best coffee we had in Bulgaria. ‘Red Coral Kitchen’ was a great place for dinner, just 5 minutes walk away. 

Quiet neighbourhood, although due to the style and age of the building, we could hear footsteps from the people above us at night. The benefits of staying here clearly outweighed this minor issue (pack earplugs) so don’t let this discourage you from staying in this lovely apartment. 

Monica was really helpful and quick to respond, definitely recommend this place.", "This apartment is a nice located apartment in the old center of Sofia. Great style ! Nice Balcony.  Easy and Fast communication with the landlords from Distances.  Very good description of checking-in .", "Place was very nice, location was excellent. There was a 24hr shop nearby and the metro is close as well. Lot of brochures and tips available for what to do in the area. ", "The flat from monica&jordan is in a nice barrio in Sofía you can find all what you Need, and the place is very pretty. 
Good stay good Host erverthing Best. ", "Monica and Jordan’s place is in a perfect location, in the midst of great bars, restaurants and walking streets. It’s also very stylish. There is a leaking pipe in the bathroom, but otherwise the apartment is great.", "Monica & Jordan's place was very clean, looked just like the photos, maybe even a little bigger. It is walking distance from the center, in a nice neighbourhood with lots of nice bars and restaurants. I would definitely recommend it.", "Very cute place! Loved the design and the details of the apartment. Charming ", "Incredible home and the best value in Sofia. Would only hope to stay here again when I am back in Sofia! ", "the apartment is very nice, clean and situated in a good neighborhood in the city, just 10-15 minutes walking from the main monuments in the city. we would repeat for sure. ", "Nice flat with potential. Bathroom had leaking pipe and toilet, in the kitchen we had to wash some things before we used them. Communication was great with them. 
The park close to the flat is really nice. ", "The place is beautiful and clean. We really appreciated the air conditionner. The appartement is at a walking distance of a metro station and is also at a walking distance from central Sofia which is always fun to walk to.", "Lovely, chic apartment in a great part of the city. Monica & Jordan made the whole thing very easy. Monica and Jordan are very obviously experienced hosts and give a lot of care to their guests!", "Perfect place, really recommended, clean, central position", "We have had a perfect stay in Sofia! The appartement was beautifull and bigger then espected. The appartement was also really clean!", "Beautiful flat. 10 minute Walk from metro station, best streets, walking tour in city centre 15-20 mins.

Very comfortable stay, very stylish place, good place to base yourself for your time in Sofia!", "Lovely loft apartment right in the heart of the city,  just a short taxi ride from Sofia Airport.", "Very clean and pleasant space. The location is also great. ", "Cozy and cute space in a centrally located area!", "The apartment was perfect! It was very clean and tidy when I arrived and the instructions were very easy to follow. The apartment is in a great location. It it is a 5 min walk to the metro which is very useful I would suggest looking into taking it. Right below the apartment there are many little shops and cafes, some shops stay open all night. I would recommend staying here it is quite a nice little gem.", "One of the best places in Sofia... Highly recommended.", "Great location to walk into the city. The response was timely and the apartment was clean and extremely functional. It was a great stay!", "This is definitely a lovely,artsy,stylish and comfort apartment. It offers everything you need for your stay in Sofia despite the reason for travel.", "Everything was perfect! The house is really cosy and the location very nice. Great choise!", "Staying here for the second time and again had a lovely visit. The location of this place is just so perfect!", "Perfect place to spend a long weekend in my home town! I’ll repeat for sure!", "The house is beautiful exactly as shown in the photos, very clean and close to the city center ! We didnt't get to meet Monica and Jordan but we communicated through mail , they even helped us find a taxi cause we had an early flight and there was snow. I would totally recommend this place. :)", "It’s a very central and lively location near to many joints and visiting places. The space is really fancy. Definitely recommended.", "I recently stayed at Monica and Jordan’s place and really enjoyed their hospitality! The apartment has been designed very artistically and is situated very centrally.

It's less than 10 minute walk from Sofia University and the city centre and it's located in a nice and quiet neighbourhood. We had coffee and all other kitchen and bathroom necessities provided as all. 
Monica and Jordan were amazing hosts! They gave us very clear instructions prior our visits and have left a very informative pack with places and things to do in Sofia. What is more communication was amazing! The responded within minutes to all of our questions. 
Couldn't recommend more! It's perfect for everyone who wants a little escape in Sofia!", "Mónica and Jordan were great hosts. I never met them, but they were very responsive to my requests (all about figuring out parking!) and check in was easy. The place was super cute, clean, and exactly as pictured. And warm in the cold snow!", "A beautiful place in an authentic part of the city. The experience was flawless and the hosts were very responsive. Excellent experience!", "A stylish apartment in a residential suburb of Sofia. A nice location to enjoy the city. A few issues in the bathroom but hopefully they will be easily fixed, but it doesn't impact too greatly on the enjoyment of the stay. Would recommend.", "Monicas and jordans apartment is lovely, comfortable, clean in a very quiet neighborhood. It is about 5 minutes walk from the public transport(Metro, buses) . I highly recommend it, as my stay was perfect and they are the best examples of what Airbnb should be. Thank you so much for all your help.", "What a lovely place; ideal for two for a short (or long) weekend. Couldn't ask for better communication with Monica and Jordan, instructions were clear and concise, and the apartment well furnished. It had everything we could want, and is in an excellent location (halfway between the main city and the airport).

Che posto bellissimo; ideale per due persone per un fine settimana. The apartment is amazing! Even more beautiful than in the photos! 
You are going to love it! And Monica is a truly a super host!
She was in the house waiting for us , she gave us amazing tips about Sofia ( very helpful) 
We never had to take the metro cause the apartment was perfectly located! 
Book it now if you are thinking to go to sofia! ", "Monica & Jordan's place is a very cute apartment with the most beautiful decoration. The flat has every amenity needed for a pleasant stay. It is located near public transport in a residential neighborhood that has absolutely everything at hand. Down town is also walking distance. The apartment is just as shown in the pictures and although we didn't meet Monica and Jordan, they were always available to help us with everything. If we ever come back to Sofia we are sure to stay again with them.", "Monic & Jordan's loft apartment is exactly as displayed. It's a beautiful gem close to the heart of Sofia. It's evident that they've put a lot of thought into the interior of their place and it's kept very clean. The apartment is walking distance (<30 mins) to all the major sights, restaurants and bars in Sofia. It's pretty close to the airport, with easy access to the metro. Alternatively, a taxi to/from the airport costs 10-15 Lev.

Unfortunately I didn't get to meet Monica & Jordan in person as they were away for the weekend. However, they were extremely accommodating and arranged for Ivo to do check-in. The check-in process with Ivo was straightforward considering I landed late and had no mobile reception. I just gave him the heads up when I left the airport (free wifi) and he met me at the apartment at my suggested time. He gave me a tour of the apartment and even helped me find a place to get some food late at night.

Overall, a very pleasant stay and I'll be keen to stay again next time I go to Sofia.", "A lovely apartment a short walk from Orlov Bridge, just like in the pictures, a well stocked kitchen with a coffee machine, TV with plenty of channels. We had some problems with check in as the directions could have been even clearer as you simply cannot find 'Sofia University' on the metro system map - it is abbreviated as SU St Kliment Orhidski and that is the name of the station that Monica should have given us and not Sofia University. That led to us getting lost and delayed on our arrival. Also, we lost hot water for about 16 hours - granted that was not the fault of the host, but communication was sketchy at best during that period and I wasn't going to stay in the flat when I had no hot water. I had made it explicitly clear to Monica that I was going to go out sightseeing the next day (hot water or not) and she still sent me a message at like 10 am asking me if there was hot water and I was like, I can't tell, I am out on Mt Vitosha now, can you check for me? No reply.  Like seriously, common sense please: who gets an AirBNB apartment and then stays in all day? Otherwise, I understand that Monica & Jordan manage a number of AirBNB apartments/lodgings across Sofia and she must have been too busy to get back to me given that she is working full time too. Shame things went wrong, but I am deducting one star for that - I've had much better experiences. The location wasn't as central as I thought but I could cope - Orlov Bridge and the metro station are a good 10 - 15 mins walk away and that's fine if you're young and happy to walk but for people like my parents, they won't be happy walking that distance. Monica also didn't seem to know the local neighbourhood well as she wasn't able to answer my questions about arrival late at night when I asked her if anything was going to be open - in fact, plenty of things were (Subway, McDonald's Billa Supermarket etc) up till 11 pm and Subway was 24 hours but she could only direct me to a tiny 24 hours alcohol/tobacco shop which didn't really do food. Like I said, lovely apartment but I think they could have improved the communication. It wasn't even a language issue as Monica's English was perfect - it's just being able to see things from the guests' point of view and understanding our needs. ", "Very nice Apartment in a great area of sofia. The communication was easy and i will defenetly come back. ", "Verry good place to stay. My mate Charles was willing to take this place again next time he's going to Bulgaria.", "Great and stylish apartment in the heart of Sofia.

", "Monica's apartment in Sofia is a lovely place to stay. Fit for a cosy weekend with your partner, or a few days of solo travelling, I enjoyed my time and would definitely re-book.

The bedroom is large, with a fantastic double bed and a pull-out sofa bed. There is air conditioning in both the kitchen and bedroom. Towels, loo roll, shampoo and soap are provided.

We arrived on the last day of the month and by the following day, it was SUPER FAST!", "My Boyfriend and I stayed at this property for only 1 night but we wished we could have stayed longer! The interior design was spectacular and had such a homely feel. Leaflets were left out for places for us to see and explore. They were very helpful as we were  unsure of the area.", "Communication  before our arrival was excellent and Monica received us warmly even though we arrived late evening. The flat was great and the location was excellent too. Monica was always available for any questions we had. We would surely stay again at the flat.", "A beautiful, artist-decorated apartment on a lovely street in Sofia, with all the amenities you could want. Monica was a very welcoming host. I wish I could have stayed longer!", "An excellent place where to stay! Monica and Jordan are very good people and also very friendly. The place is even better as it looks in the pictures, very comfortable and super clean. You definitely feel like at home! Me and my girlfriend absolutely recommend to have this place as number one option when you go to Sofia.", "Monica was an excellent host. She is very friendly, welcoming and helpful. 
The apartment is exactly as advertised. I loved the fact that the WIFI was portable, which means you can take it with you as you stroll through Sofia. 
I highly recommend this apartment for your trip to Sofia. I would stay there again without hesitation. 
", "The experience at the place of Monica and Jordan was really good. Everything in the place works perfectly, the bed is comfortable, there is a nice lunch place on the opposite side of the street and the styling of the place is just awesome! Monica was really fast in communication. This place is highly recommend.", "I booked this place trusting on the description and the photographs. Picked the right one. It was all there! No disappointment, whatsoever. It's really a smart appartment and all for yourself. It's nice to return there after a long walk through the town and very well located. Breakfast? Right nextdoor. ", "The place and the district are fantastic, and we had a very pleasant stay. Only minor annoyance was loud TV of some of the neighbors late in the night.", "Monica and Jordan are wonderful hosts! The flat is gorgeous and it has anything you would need. The location is convenient. 
We really enjoyed our stay and we would book this flat again during our next visit to Sofia. ", "Everything was OK", "Nice clean apartment! The host responded super quick to my same day book and arrival. ", "Communication was perfect, the apartment is lovely, and even though we met her for some minutes Monica was a perfect host.", "I stayed at Monica’s and Jordan’s place for 11 days and I loved it. I felt as if I have found a new home. Monica was an exquisite host and the communication was excellent. The apartment is cosy, super clean, super functional, impressively designed and at the excellent location. One more advantage of this place was that I had all the comfort of working in the apartment. I highly recommend this place. Thank you guys. ", "Monica and Jordan are great hosts and were contactable during our stay when we had questions. The apartment has everything that you need! Very warm, very clean, highly recommended!", "Very friendly hosts. They made us feel at home. They helped us with our first steps in Sofia. I can totally recommend the apartment and the nice hosts.", "Super nice, cozy and clean apartment, perfect super central location with cute cafés,  restaurants etc, Monica was very friendly and charming host, perfect cost/quality ratio. Can highly recommend staying at this place. I will definitely book it again.", "It was my first time to use Airbnb service and I am more than satisfied! It was possible to check in as we arrived in Sofia in the morning. Apartment is cosy, clean, modern, bright, there is air conditioning so it was warm in the apartment and portable wifi device!  The apartment is located in nice neighbourhood  near the center and is very easy for orientation. Everywhere can be reached quickly by foot. Taxi is cheap in Sofia and taxi drivers know the address, so who does not like to walk can be reached anywhere for a couple of euros! Monica is a very friendly person and she was there for all our questions. I can highly recommend Loftapp to everyone! Great apartment, great host!", "The apartment is as beautiful as the photos show it. Clean, safe and stylish. The location is near the University of Sofia (15 minutes to walk). The booking was super fast and without complications. Monica was totally cooperative and very friendly, and constantly be reached by phone. We would love to live there again and again. ", "The apartment is modern, bright, cosy and the location is more than perfect. Monica was super friendly, helpful and positive host. They even give you wireless internet that you can take with you around the city so you will never be lost. 

I would highly recommend their place for your stay.  ", "We were so warmly welcomed by our host Monica! The apartment is just like the photos, modern,clean and convenient. The locotaion is central but quiet on one of the best streets in Sofia. Our host even provided us with a mobile wi-fi device which we could bring with us around town. We will definitely stay there again if in Sofia!", "Place is great. Location perfect. Monica and Jordan are wonderful and friendly hosts. If you are visiting sofia you should definitely stay at their place.", "It was my first time to use airbnb and we had the most pleasant stay in Monica & Jordan's loft!! 
It's a cozy place and there was everthing we needed.
On top of that Monica even rembered it was my birthday there was a delicious birthday cake for me in the fridge!! 
All the questions I had they answered within only minutes.
The loft is in 15mins walking distance from the city center and there are several small shops, bars and restaurants around! 
I can highly recommend Monica & Jordan's loft for a stay in Sofia! You couldn't think of more caring hosts!", "Monica was very friendly host. It was possible to check in earlier. 
The apartment is very charming and you can see the love to art in this place. The neighbourhood is also nice and close to city centr. Taxi drivers know the location. I enjoyed my stay ", "Very cozy, clean and warm apartment. Our host Monica and Yordan were very friendly, they answered every question that we asked. The apartment is 10-15 min walking from the center in a very quiet neighborhood. We didn't use the public transport even though the metro and bus station is very near. The taxi is cheap so if you are lazy to walk at home you'll pay 4-5 leva which is around 2 euros. 
Definitely going back to this apartment.", "Прекрасное расположение,близко к достопримечатеьностям города(пешком 15-20 минут)
Любезнъе хозяева,готовъе всегда помочь и посоветовать! Жилье в стиле лофт и весьмс удобно для 2х гостей!Могу рекомендовать безусловно!", "Appartement très charmant et spacieux pour nous deux! Proche du centre ville à pied, c'est un bon pied a terre pour visiter Sofia! Nous y reviendrons avec plaisir !", "Appartement super sympa et agréable avec localisation presque parfaite et en tout cas très pratique. 
Réactivité en cas de besoin et fluidité de communication très appréciable. Je reviendrai avec grand plaisir sachant que ce n'est pas mon premier appartement à Sofia. ", "Ho soggiornato nell'appartamento di Monica & Jordan per una settimana, ed è stato tutto perfetto. 
L'appartamento è in una buona posizione, vicino alla metro e a molte zone di interesse, ristoranti, bar e supermercati.
L'appartamento è molto accogliente e ben tenuto, il self check-in è molto semplice e pratico. 
Gli host sono stati molto cortesi e disponibili in tutto. ", "Le quartier, l'appartement, l'accueil, la situation de l'appartement, le confort", "C'est un appartement qui nous accueille régulièrement, l'emplacement est parfait pour nous.", "Die Küche etwas spartanisch aber sonst wunderbar!! Es war ein super aufenthalt ", "Très bon séjour dans l'appartement de Monica et Jordan. L'accueil a été très bien. Monica nous a accueilli et expliqué le fonctionnement de l'appartement et nous a donné quelques conseils sur la ville. 
L'appartement en lui-même est exactement similaire aux photos, très joli et très agréable. Il est parfaitement équipé pour vivre plusieurs jours. Il est aussi très calme et très bien isolé. L'appartement est situé à environ 10 minutes à pied du premier métro et à peine 15 minutes à pieds des premiers sites touristiques. C'est un quartier résidentielle mais animé (restaurants, petits magasins). La nuit le quartier est très calme et les voisins parfaitement silencieux. 
Monica nous a commandé un taxi pour le retour à l'aéroport (11 lev) et a toujours été disponible durant le séjour pour répondre à nos questions. 
Nous recommandons donc ce logement les yeux fermés et nous n'hésiterons pas à y retourner si l'occasion se représente! ", "Świetna lokalizacja, bardzo miłe mieszkanie. Idealne na krótki pobyt w Sofii. Właściciele są ludźmi bardzo życzliwymi i pomocnymi. Szczerze polecam każdemu to mieszkanie.", "Le studio est très bien situé dans un immeuble des années 1930 et dans un quartier agréable proche du centre historique de Sofia. L'aménagement et les équipements sont parfaits. Les hôtes ont été très cordiaux et accueillants. On y retournera!", "Quartier vraiment agréable et sympathique!!
Appartement sympathique et spacieux, bien décoré.", "Das Apartment ist wie auf den Bildern abgebildet. Es war sauber, aufgeräumt und liebevoll eingerichtet. Als Ausgangspunkt zum Erkunden der Stadt absolut empfehlenswert. Die Küche ist nicht umfangreich ausgestattet - aufgrund der günstigen Verpflegungskosten vor Ort aber absolut kein Problem. ", "Accoglienza gentile e premurosa. Tutto corrispondeva a quanto annunciato. Quartiere molto gradevole, comodo al centro. Lo consigliamo.", "Super nett und tolles Appartment wirklich super ", "Zuerst hat uns Monica, wie vorher vereinbart, empfangen und uns die ganze Wohnung gezeigt, insbesondere das Bedienen der Beleuchtung voller Effekte, des W-Lan-Geräts für unterwegs und der tollen Nespresso-Kaffeemaschine erklärt. Überall haben wir dann kleine und große Extras entdeckt - wir haben beinahe vergessen, dass wir in einer Ferienwohnung sind. Und übrigens, das kingsize Doppelbett mit seiner hochqualitativer Matratze ist absolut phantastisch. Die Wohnung lädt zur Erholung ein und befindet sich in unmittelbarer Nähe von diversen Einkaufsmöglichkeiten, Cafés und Restaurants. Auf jeden Fall verbringen wir den Urlaub in Sofia wieder in diesem Appartement!"]

reviews:
["Great place in the city center. Highly recommended.", "The balcony and view are spectacular and the location is great. Nice place for a stopover. Check in and out was very easy, very accommodating host. Thanks.", "It was a great experience and Svetoslav such a warm host. The place is very cosy and the view is amazing ❤", "Svetoslav is a wonderful host. He was not hesitant in guiding me (Aparna) to his place and that was exactly what gave me confidence as I was traveling alone to a new place. This space is centrally located and good enough for a comfortable, value for money accommodation. There are restaurants nearby to help yourself with your meals. This is a smart option to experience the urban landscape of Bulgaria.", "Excellent host, we enjoyed our stay very much.", "Its always a great pleasure to stay by Svetoslav. He's very friendly and helpful. I like the room and the amazing roof terrace. I come back for sure :)", "Perfect position (so many restaurants and bars across this street so close to vitosha boulevard that is the main commercial street in the centre of Sofia), nice apartment with a cool terrace. Svetoslav is so kind and welcoming.", "To be recommended. Location is superb", "it was really great to stay I will recommend this place to everyone ...awesome place and amazing host .....
kitchen is not in your apartment it's bit away .... just for information", "Svetoslav’s place is perfectly located for a stay in Sofia.  It is near all types of transport, but it is so well placed you can actually walk almost everywhere.  Svetoslav is a very helpful host and has lots of tips and suggestions to make your stay in Sofia special.  We were very lucky to have fantastic weather in mid October so we loved the balcony and sat out there every morning and evening.  It is a great location to watch the sun going down whilst relaxing with a drink.", "Your expectations will be exceeded by top notch location, a true gem in the heart of Sofia rooftop patio suite.  The host Svetoslav is indeed super host, his personable personality, accommodating to all your needs and questions , intelligent , engaging and hands on help. A home away from home that draws you like a magnet in its ambiance. As a world traveller on airbnb i give it two thumbs up and more. Looking forward to next stay.", "Very central yet quiet room on the fifth floor with a wonderful rooftop terrace; the view will take your breath away, whether at sunrise or in the evening. Svetoslavis a super friendly and helpful host, thanks for everything.", "The place was perfect. Svetoslav is a really nice and caring host, sharing stories with his guests and even let us try some of his cooking art. The apartment is well equipped with everything needed. Communication was easy and fast, he offered help several time, e.g. calling a taxi. I definitely recommend this place.", "Really nice place. Very good location, nice room with ensuite bathroom and private terrace. The wifi is really good. Easy check in and check out.The host Svetoslav is really friendly . Highly recommended .", "Great person, great hospitality, cosy and clean room in a  quiet and central area. Looking forward to visiting again.", "Perfect location for a holiday in Sofia. Beautiful view over Sofia", "The Location is great. The palace of justice can be reached on foot in a few minutes and everyday Svetoslav offered us breakfast everyday. He's a fantastic host. The balkony is just beautiful. We would recommend.", "We had a great stay at Svetoslav's appartment. Location is perfect and the host was nice and very helpful.", "Top value for money.  Nice host and an excellent central location. Highly recommanded.", "Great location right in the city centre. Easy access, great atmosphere and nice hosts. 
Thank you very much for a wonderful stay.", "We stayed only a weekend at Svetoslav's place, the location cannot be beaten, it is in the hart of Sofia. Svetoslav was very helpful providing tips and went out of his way to accommodate us. Next time we will definitely stay there again", "Svetoslav's place has everything you need... a great location with a wonderful balcony and view of Sofia. We had a great time and Svetoslav made us very welcome.", "Me and my friend really enjoyed our stay. Svetoslav's girlfriend welcomend us very nicely and invited us for a drink and snacks with her friends on the balcony. The bed was comfortable, the view on the balcony is stunning and we felt happy to find such a lovely place!  ", "Very comfortable with a  great view of Mount Vitosha. The location is in a great area, lots of amazing restaurants to choose from as well as some of Sofia's major historical sites. We were two blocks away from a major pedestrian thoroughfare. I would stay there again in a heart beat. ", "A very welcoming host in a pleasant and well located flat. You can discuss and enjoy a very beautifull sight over Sofia. I recommand !", "Svetislav is a friendly guy and always there if you need him. If not in person then he is available on his phone. The room and shower was good and the view from the terrace was awesome. Your room has an air conditioner thats really good for the summer months. All in all i do not regret staying 3 nights at Svetoslavs AirBnB. If i am in sofia again i will definitely stay there again.", "Svetoslav is a great host and is always trying to assist you for having a great time in Sofia. He responded fast and gave us tips about the area. Next to that, the view from the balcony is amazing!", "Great location, in city center, only a few steps away from the main walking street. The view on the balcony is fantastic. I stayed one night and came back to stay one more. Svetoslav is a wonderful host. He thinks almost everything for his guests. He even called a taxi for me going to the airport. Thanks Svetoslav!", "Svetoslav shower us around in the neighbourhood even our plane was late. A extremely warm welcome in Bulgaria because of this lovely host!", "Excellent location, friendly host, amazing view from you own private terrace balcony. less than 5 mins walk to the main street with restaurants, bars, shops and where the walking tours meet. The attic is like a private studio apartment - large bed, sitting area with two armchairs, large wet room and a large terrace/balcony with a a view to the mountains. Highly recommended!! Svetoslav was very welcoming and helpful and I had a very comfortable stay here. ", "It’s a nice cosy place at an amazing location. You are close to the old town of Sofia and still a very quiet place to stay. The view at the terrace is amazing!

Svetoslav is a nice host who has a good communication with his guests. ", "This place was great with a nice view of the mountain in the private balcony! close to lots of shops, restaurants and sights! Would recommend when you stay! Svetoslav also invited us to view the moon and stars with him and his telescope!! ", "Amazing place and host! The apartment is close to all attractions, very central. Communication was fluent, we got suggestions for a free city tour.  The place was clean and had all we needed. Also very private. Definitely recommended!", "Great stay. Useful local tips, speedy communication, ideal location. Svetoslav's great personality and friendliness made our stay in Sofia even better. Thank you.", "Perfect cozy place with a great roof terrace. Owners are very polite and helpful. Located so close to the city promenade that it is unbelievable how quite it actually is. I'll definitely  be back", "This is a really nice dedicated space with the roof terrace, sitting area inside and a wet room. It couldn’t be more centrally located near the local bars and restaurants but still very quiet. It’s a 10 minute walk from Serdika station on a direct line to the airport and all major sights are within walking distance. Svetoslav was very helpful on the day of my arrival.", "Outstanding apartment in the very heart of Sofia. You will have complete privacy with a terrace that has gerogeous views. The hosts are very nice and accommodating.", "Marvelous private room with great sight of Sofia. Very convenient location in the center of the city. Very happy with this, my first experience in Sofía. Planning to come back to Svetoslav’s house in the future.", "Thank you Svetsolav for a really warm welcome and the helpful advise about restaurants and places to go in Sofia.

It was our first and truly brilliant time in Sofia. The mountain view balcony was a top spot for us and all the facilities were better than we expected. We may visit back another time!", "Svetoslav was an amazing host, very kind and responsive.", "Svetoslav was an awesome host and his his place was the perfect airbnb. We arrived to a lovely clean cosy room with a comfortable bed, water cooler and towels. The roof terrace is absolutely gorgeous. We found ourselves spending a lot of time there as it was peaceful and cosy with the most amazing view. It feels like your own flat within the home. 
On our first night, Svetoslav walked us to the nearest shop and then sat and had a beer with us whilst giving us restaurant and bar tips. He also showed us a couple of videos he had created using traditional Bulgarian musicians. He is incredibly talented and this was such a great insight to have on our first day in Bulgaria.

The place is even better than it looks in the photos and is right in the centre of Sofia, plus Svetoslav is an awesome host - I would definitely recommend staying here!", "Nice (almost private) room with dedicated terrace and very central but calm. The host are also very nice.", "A lovely central place with a fantastic view.  Would definitely recommend it!", "Good value for the money! Location is perfect, the main street for restaurants and bars is around the corner! Spectacular view from the balcony:)", "I couldn't have picked a better place to stay my first night in Bulgaria. Svetoslav and his wife are friendly, welcoming and accommodating in every way. I loved the space, it was perfect. The area is great too, right in the centre surrounded by cafes, interesting shops and bars. I will definitely stay there again when in Sofia!", "Svetoslav is a friendly and helpful host and we really enjoyed our short stay at his place which is very quiet even though it is in a great and central location. We particularly loved sitting on the balcony and looking at the fantastic view of the rooftops and mountains.", "Great location, great comunication with the host, for a couple of days in Sofia it's perfect. Balcony view is fantastic. Apartment is central, close to everything you could possibly need. Recommend!", "We enjoyed our stay very much! The apartment was very central and we were at walking distance from everything. We also enjoyed our terrace. Svetoslav was a good host and gave us a map with recommendations of restaurants and bars.", "On the plus side:
* The location is perfect. Right in the heart of Sofia with lots of shops, restaurants, bars all within walking distance.
* It's also a good location if you need to visit other places in Sofia as there are two metro stations pretty close by.
* The room is basic, but absolutely fine and has a nice little seating area, both inside as well as outside on the terrace with an amazing view of Sofia.
* The bed has a pretty good mattress, so you'll wake up refreshed.
* The shower is good, warm & strong, though not suitable for long showers as the water doesn't drain quickly enough, so at some point the bathroom will overflow.
* The wifi worked absolutely fine.
* The room is equipped with a water cooler/heater, which makes for tastier water than the tap water. So if you have your own water bottle, you won't need to keep buying water, but can just fill it up.
* Svetoslav and his wife are very friendly and gave some good advise on things to do while I was there.

On the down side:
* There were some hick-ups, both when checking-in and checking-out.
* The toilet in the bathroom is leaky which meant that the bathroom floor was always wet.
* Also, there is no place or hangers to hang out your clothes, so you'll basically be in suitcase wrinkled clothes for the duration.
* The room isn't suitable for very tall people as I'd guess that the ceiling is at approx 2 meters. In the same vein, I got the impression that the bed is only 1.90 long.", "Perfect for couples exploring sofia together. Had a great time, especially enjoyed the sunny rooftop terrace. Room was very cosy and clean. In the morning you can open the balcony doors and wake up to a view of mt vitosha.
Svetlav and his wife are very friendly and helpful. When we arrived Svetlav immediately showed us around the area, even though it was already 10pm.", "Great hosts. Awesome location and views", "Great rooftop apartment in Sofia's downtown area close to lots of great places to eat and drink and just a short walk from the major attractions. Sletoslav and his family and extremely hospitable and welcoming. Would definitely recommend!", "Everything was good, Svetoslav was very helpful and took me around to find a few key things such as local mobile phone shop and a money exchange place with good rate and suggesting a traditional Bulgarian restaurant 5 mins from his house, must book in advance though.

Keep it up! 
Deep.", "Great and very central location, super friendly people who make sure that you feel good in here. We are fascinated and will definitely come back. Thank you very much!", "Great place with a perfect location. I felt like being home and they were very helpful. I would definitely recommend this place to everyone looking for a comfortable place close to the center.", "Svetoslav is a great host! Upon our arrival, he showed us around the city center and pinpointed the best restaurants and bars to go to. Both him and his wife were very kind and friendly. He was easy to contact and replied to our messages almost immediately. Overall, great host, I would definitely recommend staying at his place if you go to Sofia :)", "We had an amazing stay in this lovely appartement. The view was beautiful. The room was very cozy. Svetoslav is very friendly and welcoming. He gave us local tips and showed us around. I would definitely come back again.", "Svetoslav and his wife were  great hosts, they are right in the hart of things yet the flat is quiet, the room is very conferable. enjoyed my stay very much.", "Svetoslav is a great host! he welcomed my parents in a perfect way. The room is really clean, cozy, well furnished and with all the necessary amenities. The flat is in the old town really well located,  really near to restaurants, pubs, bars . The neighborhood is quiet and nice. If u are looking for a cozy room and for a perfect host,  book now :)", "The best place and the best host in Sofia. Highly recommended!", "Amazing view and great value! We really enjoyed staying here. The bed was not the most comfortable but okay for a night or two. Nice hot shower and (we stayed here in the winter) the heater worked great.", "Svetoslav's place has a really good location, form there, you'll be able to reach almost everything witihin 10 min walk. The room is reealy cosy we loved it :) and it has a reaaly nice terrace with an amazing view to the city and the Vitosha mountain.  Also he helped out us with a lot of information about the surroundings, places worth to see. So totally recommended! :) and thanks for everything!", "The room has a private bathroom and terras. It is really cosy and big enough for two persons. The location is really good. It is only 1 min walking from thz main street in the centre. The host was kind and flexible about our check in time. Thank you again for your hospitality! We've enjoyed our stay.", "The loft is just fantastic.  So private and warm and cozy. So well situated if you want the centre of Sofia with beautiful views of Vitosha mountain and yet so peaceful if you need to decompress after a busy day of shopping and eating amazing food and sightseeing. It’s the perfect place to hibernate of an evening with a glass of wine ", "Svetoslav and his wife are such amazing people! The plce itself very cozy and clean.
They even gave us Bulgarian cuisine in the evening!
Undoubtedly one of the best BnBs in Sofia :)", "Yet another great stay. Can't speak highly enough of the host, apartment and location. 10/10 from us!", "My friend and I enjoyed our stay in Sofia very much. 

Svetoslav and his wife are very welcoming and friendly hosts.
The accommodation is clean, tidy, practical and its cozy atmosphere is perfect.

reviews:
["Much better than expected. Very aesthetic place, would definitely book again!", "Great location, a perfect place for a solo traveler. Nearby there are many places to eat and get drinks. Metro station is a meter outside the front door. More than a pleasurable stay. Self Check-in was easy and fast.", "Great location in a well furnished room. Fridge, plates microwave, etc. If you get up early, you can watch the sun come up over the mountain from your window", "Very nice place. In the center
I recommend", "A great and cozy place to stay, with a perfect view and one of the best locations in Sofia.", "Place with good view. Clean and warm. Very good location! Highly recommend!", "Such a lovely place right in the heart of the center! ☺️", "I am grateful and lucky to have found what I need where I need it in the name of Pavel and this adorable room. Many thanks and hope to spend more time in my future trips to Sofia.", "Very nice and clean room, perfect choice for short staying in the capital. Pavel was very helpful! The location is more than perfect as the room is in the heart of the capital!", "Super central location, but really quiet during the night. Everything is as it looks on the pictures. Clean an new. Really good for a short stay.", "great location and easy communication.  will be back soon", "Great location!", "The best place to stay in Vitosha", "Great check in, and location!", "Perfect location right downtown. Just steps from metro and few blocks from main strip. Clean, easy to find with good directions.", "nice!", "thanks . great stay . clean and tidy", "excellent location", "nice studio. well location. easy to find. conform at the description", "The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.", "Pavels place is great for a short stay in Sofia. A very small studio apartment with the bathroom having glass walls only (not good for non couples I assume!). Good location", "The place is next to the metro station and really convenient to move around the centre of Sofia. The apartament is small but has everything you need for a short stay, more suitable for one,  but can be too for a couple. Easy check-in and good communication with the host. I recommend it!", "Perfect and charming apartment for short stay. Everything was perfect and easy. Awesome location, magnificent communication with Pavel. Highly recommended.", "Place is great ! Perfect location! Loved the quick responses!", "Pavel is a great host! Helpful and hospitable. The apartment was clean and cozy in a city center. I’d strongly recommend it to all.
The most convinient thing was the metro station right next to the house. ", "Probably the best location in town. The room is perfect for 2 guest, the bed it is a little bit small for 2 persons. Ideal for short term stay or solo travelers.", "cool, cute and convenient place near major subway station.", "Pavel is great!  Amazing place and he was very thoughtful to help and very responsive too, great host!", "Amazing location just in the center of Sofia and good price.", "I did a solo trip for my first visit to Sofia and I was only there for exactly 48 hours. I'm so glad I found this flat. Pavel was very understanding and accommodating about my early arrival. While we waited for the previous guest to check out, he gave me some recommendations on sights and restaurants.

The flat is literally on top of Sardika II metro and the Greek ruins, just steps from all of the main sites including museums and Vitosha Boulevard. I'm a gym rat so Pavel pointed out the gym behind the building which costs only 5 BGN per visit. 

The flat itself is very small but perfect for one person. I felt very safe as a female traveling alone. The room was very comfortable and had everything I needed plus more (fan, space heater, microwave, fridge, TV, etc.). I highly recommend it!", "Lovely space in heart of Sofia! Ideal for short term stay or solo travelers. The space is limited but provides all amenities you may need!", "Perfect for a solo traveler! Best possible location within walking distance of everything: sights, train station, all the main churches. Worked for me. ", "A really nice apartment. It’s small but for one/two nights is good. It was very clean and cozy. The owner helped me a lot and he was always ready to answer to every question. The location is amazing. Just 2 minutes by walk to vitosha boulevard.", "Pavel's studio was such a great stay! A compact space with a fridge and kettle and conveniently located to transport, city highlights and shops. A great view as well. Pavel himself was a thoughtful and efficient host who provided easy and supportive instructions! Highly recommend", "This place is perfectly located right by the metro and not far from the main strip about ten minutes walk to vitosha blvd. Easy to find with pavels clear instructions and self check-in is very convenient.", "The room was exactly as at the picture. It was a bit hot in the morning as the sun shines directly in the window. I wonder how to live there at summer without air conditioning...but it was not a case for me.
The lication is super central. Pavel is always online and ready to help.
May be come back)", "Great host, he even pick me up and he made sure everything was fine and I arrived in time", "My boyfriend and I stayed for only one night and we really enjoyed our stay. The location of the appartment is perfect in the heart of Sofia.
We could contact Pavel very easily.
I would definitly recommend this flat to anyone who wants to visit Sofia over the weekend", "Good location. Easy accessible apartment. Good and fast communication with the host.", "Pavel's place was excellent - perfect location, cleanliness, everything! One of the best Airbnbs I've stayed in. Exactly as pictured and very easy to check in and out. Best for couples or individuals though as the bathroom doesn't offer much privacy.", "Apartment is exactly as advertised.  Cozy place, but easy to get to from train station and very near the metro.  The entrance was a bit spooky at night, but only a bit.", "+", "The place is exactly as you see in the pictures, organized, clean, everything new, ideal for one person or a couple. 

It is located in the very center of Sofia, close to everything and the price is very reasonable for what it includes. 

Even if there is not a kitchen, there is cutlery, plates, microwave, were to get hot water and a small fridge with a freezer. Recommend!", "Hey great place", "Great place. Location is perfect. Very close to the main metro station Serdika and easy to find. Place is clean and cozy. Exactly like in the picture. We did not met Pavel in person but he was very helpful and he answeres very quickly. We just loved it. ", "This place is good for a single person or a couple but not good for friends or familly because of the see through bathroom! But it was very clear in the pictures so it's my fault. In exception of the bathroom the place was very cute, in the center and very clean.", "Incredible location, cozy place and perfect host combination for this place.", "We only stayed for one night but it was perfect!", "It was a cozy room, very clean, with great location in the city center. The host was cool and helpful with everything. I recommend this room, it really okey for that money.", "Very quiet and detached,still in the city center.", "A fantastic room, in the real center of Sofia (you can reach every POI in less than 5 minutes by walking). The place is really nice, cleaned and well furnished.

Suggested!", "In the center of the center , probably one of the best possible localisation in town ...", "The host was very quick and precise in the answers. The apartment is small but nice and comfortable and located in a very central area. I highly recommend it", "Self check-in was easy, the location is very central so I expected it to be really hectic outside, but 6th floor is high enough that it's really quiet!", "It was a really pleasure to stay in Pavel's apartment. He is really kind and absolutely available to help you. His apartment is really comfortable and in a strategic position just over the metro station Serdica.", "We had a great stay at Pavel's appartment. The location is perfect, right next to the Serdika Metro station, in the midst of shopping streets as well. The Serdika Metro Station is the most strategic station for all destinations in Sofia. Pavel was helpful with very clear instructions. The appartment is tidy with good WiFi connectivity.", "Pavel is having a lack of patience in explaining everything included in the explanations was wrong, 
I did not see any photos, 
The phone number in the booking confirmation message does not send that of an old employee.
 Pavel looks as a very positive person but worn out and relying on gim. 
Pavel is a totally inaccurate person. 
This event coming late from the air port and find the place but not the keys.
I was very disappointing after a long day on the road and wait an hour until he arrived. That key was not. This kind of service makes me reluctant to use rbnb service again and I intend to complain and ask them to remove your apartments from the site.", "Сlean cozy little apartment in the heart of the city with a view of the city and the mountains.", "The studio is good and in central Sofia", "Charming room with all you need. Maybe need a rack more for the towels. The elevator is a bit scary but works - you'll still have to climb a floor though. Bed too small for two people upon my opinion. Good location, Pavel gives detailed instructions for a check-in round the clock. Would book again.", "Unbelievably central location, just ten steps away from the primary metro station Serdika. Compact place, perfect for two, has everything you need. We decided we would definitely try to stay at Pavel's place on our next visit to Sofia. Great value for money, which is typical of the city itself.", "Pavel's cozy and clean haven is worth the money and more. It is located in an amazing spot. Metro stop and eateries are all close by. It is a bit tricky to find the main door but once you find it, everything else is smooth sailing. It is small but spacious. Overall it is a great unit. The pictures are very accurate to what you are getting.", "AirBNB announcement said Wi-Fi included and the password wasn't there working. Great amenities such as the plates, forks, spoons, microwave, fridge+freezer and the big shower. We both enjoy having a shower there in the morning. It was a bit cold in the morning, but because we didn't realise it was a little heater in the drawer. The located building is so old, but as the whole city is. Enjoy with Pavel for one day or two, it will be fine!!!", "A nice room in a perfect location for Sofia exploration. Finding the place is not easy, especially at night, so be well prepared. The self check-in mode made it slightly more difficult. The place itself was very nice and comfortable. We forgot about the transparent bathroom walls but after a couple of uses, we grew accostumed to them. I would only recommend this place to very close friends and couples, though. The value for money is okay but not unique in Sofia. Finally, if you need to leave bags with the host on your last day, do check with Pavel beforehand. We were lucky and he was very nice, though :)", "Clean, neat, cozy loft apartment for 1 or 2. EXCELLENT location...near restaurants, shops, and local transportation. Easy to arrive at the central train or bus station if one wants to travel to other cities in Bulgaria as we did. We loved being so close to Vitosha, the pedestrian "mall". We were sad to leave this beautiful city and our "home" there.", "I really recommend this place if you want to be in the center of everything and you want to use your room only for sleeping and showering. Room has everything you need except hairdryer.", "The place was really small but super located directly next to station serdika, which is perfect for the airport connection.
I liked the accommodation, clear self- check-in and Pavel was really kind.
You can't cook there, what's ok if you just want to sleep.
Thank you", "Very centeal appartment. Easy to check in And close to everything. Not so big but enough for 1 or max 2 people", "Really cute and cozy room located in the very center of Sofia. Walking distance from every sightseeing (around 5-10 mins depending where you want to go). Pavel was very helpful about everything we needed.", "Great place, very central in Sofia", "Nice clean place to stay and enjoy the city, very Central and close to metro", "The apartment is small but very well arranged and very clean. The location is perfect for sightseeing.", "Very convenient location in dead center of the city. No issues with my stay, would recommend.", "You can't get any more central. It's close to the metro, the sights and the main shopping street. A great place to stay!", "The studio is very central, super close to the Serdika metro station which is Sofias transportation hub. Know that there is very limited space, 12 m2 or so (with the bathroom inside) - but if that's not a problem for you I will definitely recommend you staying here! We received the room very clean and with everything we needed.
The self-checkin felt like a scavenger hunt and following Pavel's precise instructions we had no trouble finding the right place. All in all a very pleasant experience!", "Great efficiency unit with easy check-in and walkable to many lovely Sofia sights. Pavel and Rosen and their apartment manager were easily accessible and helpful hosts.", "Pavel's place in indeed in a great location. Besides, it's a cozy apartment that's perfect for 1-2 people.

The only small issue is heat. There is no AC which, to be fair, upon checking his listing, he didn't even claim to have. He did provide a fan but, being the top floor, it was still very hot. Nevertheless, I advice you all to visit his place as you'll get the best value for your money.", "it was one of my favorite  place i've been in airbnb", "I enjoyed this nicely designed little studio. It may be a little tight for two people, but it is great for one person for a short stay. The location is perfect and the basic amenities are there (a kettle and microwave, but no stove). The hosts were responsive and provided all the necessary information.", "We arrived at Pavel's flat in mid-summer. Finding the main entrance was a bit quizzy, just stick to the left side once you enter the yard through the main entrance, which is on the same road as the metro exit.
Room temperatures reached 35 degrees, what even the king-sized vent couldn't handle. But everything was exactly as written in Pavel's description of the flat.
Really tiny-house-feeling. 
Thanks for everything.", "Great, central location (although address bit difficult to find) and excellent value for a budget traveler.", "Newly renovated appartment just near the Serdika metro station. Unfortunately I wasn't able to meet Pavel in person, but communicating with him was easy. 

As I mentioned earlier, the apartment is quite recently renovated. It seems modern and the shower is great (even for tall people).  

I definitely recommend this place to anyone who is going to Sofia!", "Great cozy room in the center of Sofia. The approach is not great, but the room is very clean with a lot of light. It is a very small apartment but great for one man stay. Maybe a little tight for two", "Good budget place ", "Pavel's place was just what we were looking for. One room, good for a couple or close friends as the bathroom is part of the same room. It is small and there is everything you'll need for your stay.

Our host gave us the choice to meet him or just turn up and check in, providing us with a contact number ahead of time in case we needed to get in touch. He touched base with us during our stay and made us feel very welcome. Would highly recommend!", "Pavel is very nice and communicative. The room is in a great central location, right next to serdika metro and 3 min from vitosha boulevards. (And in the same building as the only kosher restaurant in city) and in a good value. The only thing less good was the lack of an AC when it was a hot weekend. It seems common to not have ac in sofia but for me it was a bit uncomfortable. ", "Pavel is an excellent host. We had a great stay at his place, it is very clean and tidy. It is perfectly located to get the metro to the airport. Thank you Pavel!", "Great value! The apartment is located right in the centre of the city, very close to the metro. You couldn't ask for a better location! Room includes double bed, ensuite, fast wifi, TV, microwave, fridge. Definitely recommended!", "Pavel's little apartment is in a perfect location, central and with direct connection with the airport. The little apartment-room has all the essential and it's well suited for a single traveller or a couple.", "Pavel's place is the ideal location. He was a great host. He greeted us by the metro station and showed us to the house. The location is right next to a metro station. It is also very close to some of the touristic locations. Overall, we highly recommend it for lone travelers or couples. The room is small but cozy. ", "Pavel's accommodation is perfect for visiting Sofia. In front of the metro, a few minutes walk to all major attractions. The room is clean, newly refurbished and is very quiet. Internet is very fast. Pavel was a very kind and timely host. My stay was really nice. Highly recommend Pavel.", "Pavel's studio is very precise and comfy. It is very well located and has great views. Would recommend it to anyone coming by to Sofia  ", "Pavel es un amfitrión muy atento. El apartamento es pequeño pero tiene una situación immejorable. Muy práctico el sistema de auto check-in. Muy recomendable!", "Petit appartement en plein centre ville, idéal pour visiter le vieux Sofia. L'equipement est sommaire mais suffisant. Le Wifi est très appréciable même si son accès est présent dans bon nombre de cafés et de restaurants. Tous les monuments se trouvent dans un rayon de marche à pied très raisonnable. La proximité du métro fait que l'on peut venir directement de l'aéroport sans avoir à marcher avec ses valises. Le point fort de cet appartement est vraiment son emplacement. Merci à Pavel pour sa disponibilité et sa réactivité.", "Pavel è un host molto carino e disponibile. Il suo appartamento è molto confortevole anche se piccolo. È tutto ben organizzato e a portata di mano, non manca nulla, è dotato di dettagli moderni. La posizione è centralissima!", "L’appartement est charmant et très bien placé. Proche du centre ville, c’est l’emplacement idéal pour traîner à pied à Sofia. Communication simple et précise avec Pavel, je recommande !", "Excelente ubicación. Tiene todo lo necesario y justo como en las fotos. El proceso de entrada / salida muy simple y práctico. Definitivamente muy recomendable. Muchas gracias!", "Studio très propre et idéalement situé pour visiter Sofia. Très bon rapport qualité/prix. Idéal pour un couple.", "Chambre très propre, localisation parfaite et hôte très aimable. Merci pour cet accueil.", "Posizione perfetta e Pavel davvero disponibile e simpatico. Il bagno dentro la stanza è poco intimo se si è in due persone. Consigliato", "Ένα όμορφο σπιτάκι στο κέντρο της πόλης δίπλα από το μετρό ήσυχο και καθαρό!Ευχαριστούμε τον Pavel για την όμορφη διαμονή!", "Je conseil ce logement qui es très bien situé, c'est parfait pour une personne seule ou un couple il y a l'équipements nécessaires, les explications sont claires pour pouvoir ce débrouiller tout seul afin d'accéder au logement quand on arrive assez tardivement comme moi (~00h30-01h00).

C'est propre, la résidence es calme, c'étais vraiment parfait au delà de ce que j'attendais.", "Excellent emplacement...parfait pour un voyageur seul 
Logement très très propre 
", "Posizione perfetta! Vicinissima alle strade principali dove trovare bar, ristoranti e negozi. Vicinissima alla stazione della metro, che noi non abbiamo usato perché la città si gira benissimo a piedi. Le indicazioni di Pavel sono state precise e non abbiamo avuto nessun tipo di problema. Appartamento accogliente e ben costruito ( porta blindata, mobili nuovi) . Super consigliato!", "El alojamiento de pavel esta bien. solo que habia un olor desagradable en la bacha que esta dentro del dormitorio.", "L' alloggio è perfettamente rappresentato dalle foto, la sua posizione è praticamente perfetta per visitare interamente la città. Esso si trova a 30m dalla metropolitana, fermata centro, ed a due passi dal corso principale ricco di negozi,ristoranti e bar. L' host è davvero molto preciso e disponibile per qualsiasi eventuale problema. Crediamo di ritornare per conoscere meglio Sofia godendo dei comfort dell'appartamento.

p.s manca una scopa e paletta", "Le studio de Pavel est idéalement placé pour visiter et sortir (le métro SERDIKA est au bas de l'immeuble).
Le logement est bien aménagé, neuf et très propre. Nous le recommandons, Merci Pavel et Rosen !", "Location eccezzionale per chi viaggia solo per vacanze e per lavoro.", "Alojamiento perfecto por ubicación, comodidad, limpieza..."]

reviews:
["I really enjoyed my stay at Denitsa's place! Very clean and comfortable apartment. A full plate of fruits was very pleasant surprise! I can recommend it to my friends and would gladly stay there again! Thank you :)", "It was amazing. ", "Very good place to stay, fast responses from owner.", "Denista's apartment was very nice. it was spacious, had a well equipped kitchens and comfortable separate bedroom.  It's about a 15-20 minute walk to the center of which was perfect for us in a quiet neighbourhood. Denista's boyfriend Jacobo let us in and gave us some really useful advice. for the city. I would highly recommend them as hosts.", "Beautiful apartment and great hosts! Perfect place to stay in Sofia :)", "A more helpful couple you could not wish to find, very very genuine", "I had a lovely stay at the appartment. The appartment was very clean and modern. All of the hotspots of Sofia are in a walking distance and the metro is also nearby. I would definitely recommend it to anyone!", "Fabulous apartment for a stay in Sofia. Very comfortable and clean space to relax in after busy days exploring. Easy to get into the city centre - 20 minute walk or a metro ride.
Denitsa and Jacopo were very welcoming and so helpful during our stay. Their recommendations were some of the highlights of our trip.", "Denitsa's appartement is very spacious an clean. It has a modern kitchen and comfortable bed for 2 persons. The communication was fast and helpful. They were waiting in front of the building to hand us the keys. We have nothing to complain about", "Denitsa and Jacopo are very friendly and they stayed late to check us in.  The apartment is spacious and well-appointed .  I wish we could stay longer!", "Apartment is stunning and much bigger than I expected. Really central location to the airport and the city. Denitsa and Jacopo were so friendly and helpful. A perfect spot to explore the city", "All very good and i keep coming back to this (Website hidden by Airbnb) was my 4th time!", "Denitsa and her boyfriend were excellent hosts. They made us feel welcome from the moment we arrived. The explained the flat's amenities to us on arrival, gave us some great tips on what to do and where to eat etc. during our stay. The check-in/out process was nice and organised and the flat itself was nice and clean, well equipped and in a location that's fairly easy to get to from the centre. All in all a very good stay.", "The location and neighbourhood is safe, very close to the mainstation and just a 15 min walk from the center. The apt offered everything we needed, it is spacious and well equipped. Denitsa was waiting for us upon our arrival, explained everything and is an excellent host! Thanks a lot!", "Great place to be in", "It was wonderful apartment! All was excellent. Owners are bright, interesting and communicative people. I glad to meet them! I recommend this apartment to all!", "Denitsa and her boyfriend are really helpful and warm-hearted. They told me a lot of useful information, including bus ticket, money exchange, traveling advice, etc.  I am really appreciate for their help.", "Denitsa is really kind and attentive. We had a great time in her house. Suggested!", "We really enjoyed our stay at Denitsa and Jacopo’s house. The flat is well furnished and modern and you can find everything you need. 
Moreover, the apartment is well situated (even if not in the first centre) in a very nice and peaceful neighbourhood (walkable distance from the very city centre). 
The hosts were great, they answered really fast. Denitsa provided us a lot of enjoyable advices on where to eat (you can find this also in the virtual guide they have prepared on Airbnb). Highly suggested. We wish to come back here one day!", "Denitsa's place was amazing, really clean, great location great hosts and super friendly and helpful especially when we check-in.  Fully recommended ", "Very good tips for Sofia, nice and clean place, friendly and helpful with the luggage, we really enjoyed it!", "I recently spent 9 nights at Jacopo and Denitsa’s apartment and had a thoroughly enjoyable stay. 
At check in, the host’s warm hospitality and willingness to spend time welcoming me to Sofia went beyond any other experience I’ve had at any other Airbnb. 
The apartment is modern, clean and spacious. It is also in easy walking distance from the main bus and train station. 
I will hopefully visit Sofia again sometime soon and would love to stay at the apartment again. ", "Great location, close to the railway and bus station. A modern, spacious and very clean appartment. The hosts are very friendly and helpful, checking in and out was no problem at all. I would definitely recommend this place, it was a great experience.", "very clean, well equiped, modern new hospitable.central , safe: perfect!will definetly book again", "Our two-day vacay in Sofia was better than expected. 
Denitsa's place was extremely clean and well-equiped. The hosts were very fast at responding on our messages and helpful at giving suggestions. The appartment is fully renovated and equiped with nice furniture (extra+ for super comfortable bed). It takes around 10-15 minutes on foot to get to the city center or to the Cathedral. 
We are very pleased with this trip and we definitely recommend the place to anyone who wants to explore Sofia :)", "Great stay, despite some delays in arriving, Denitsa waited for us to arrive late in the evening and helped us orient ourselves for the coming days. Highly recommend her place to others, who enjoy exploring the city, have a comfortable stay and don't mind being a longer walking distance from the city.", "very good host fast to answer", "Two of us stayed at Denitsa’s apartment for two nights and had a great experience. Located only just a few blocks away from the train/bus stations and Lions Bridge, the apartment was easy to find and is in a seemingly safe section of town.  Denitsa was accommodating to our request of checking in early (due to our train’s arrival time) and offered several suggestions for things to do in the city, along w/ providing maps and City Guides.  The apartment has everything anyone needs and more: great location, clean rooms, comfortable bed and sofa, iron and ironing board, hand weights for exercising, washing machine, balcony, full kitchen, and a large/open layout.  If returning to Sofia, we wouldn’t hesitate to book the apartment again!", "Denitsa’s place has everything you need for any time-length stay! We had a warm welcome, a great communication and flexibility in our checkin and checkout schedule. The apt is comfortable, the old Sofia neighborhood exactly what we expected from a quiet stay. Should i come back to Sofia I would surely book the place again!", "If you are visiting Sofia and you want a nice, cosy and clean place to stay this is the perfect one thd things I loved more was the big amount of light coming from the windows and the accuracy in the details. The apartment is very close to the center(20 minutes by foot and 5 minutes from the Metro Station of Lavov Most). The neighborhood is safe and without any kind of noise. The owners Denitsa and her boyfriend Jacopo gave us all the tips we needed.", "Lascio una recensione super positiva, appartamento identico alle immagini, situato in pieno centro, i proprietari disponibilissimi", "Appartement grand, propre et très fonctionnel. Convient à une personne seule ou à un couple. Situé dans un quartier un peu excentré mais qui reste très accessible. Denitsa et Jacopo sont très réactifs aux messages, questions et sont soucieux qu'on se sente bien chez eux. Je recommande !", "Appartamento ben arredato, posizione buona per visitare il centro ma comunque silenziosa. Gli host sono stati amichevoli e disponibili, molto gentili nel dare consigli su cosa fare in città.
Consigliato", "Die Wohnung liegt im vierten Stock eines Mehrfamilienhauses, aber es gibt einen Aufzug :D Die Nachbarschaft ist sehr ruhig uns nett. Die öffentlichen Verkehrsmittel sind gut und schnell zu Fuß zu erreichen (Pläne gibt es in den TouriInfo Zentren).  Die Wohnung ist super sauber und auch mit drei Personen sehr bequem zu bewohnen. Die Küche ist so ausgestattet sodass man auch mal  kochen kann.", "기차역과 버스터미널에서 가깝고 주변 환경이 너무 아련할 정도로 좋았다
현대적인 빌라와 오래된 전통 가옥이 어우러지고 그 사이는
나무들이 채워서 그림같은 동네였다
7월인데도 최고 27도 정도로 덥지도 않았고
여름 햇살에 반짝이며 흔들리는 5층 높이의
나무들을 바라보는 것도 신선했다(이 집은 5층) 

키친도 내가 바로 서서 요리와 설겆이를 할수 있는
최초의 집이었다 
요리 도구도 다양하고 깨끗해서 불편하지 않았다
욕실은 보기 드문 습식 욕실로 한국처럼 마음놓고 사용가능했다

close to the bus terminal and train station....
easy and clean cook system...
strong water power...
3step safe door system...
and there is elevater....
very good...
"]
