reviews:
["Highly recommended! Cozy and cute place. Although it looked small it was equipped with everything necessary for our stay, it was clean and well furnished. Brilliant location! Just 5 minutes walking from Alexander Nevski Cathedral and Sofia University and most of the attractions downtown. Momchil and Viki were kind and helpful hosts.", "Fantastic location, as others have said it is about 10-15 minutes walking distance from the centre of Sofia. The room has everything you need, including a kettle, dishes, and a washer/dryer, and is kept warm. Would stay again!", "It was a great experience to stay at VM studio; the apartment is just as described - cosy, very clean and offering everything you might need during your stay in Sofia. The area is quite safe and well connected to the city centre and the rest of the city. Momchil was really helpful with all my questions and I can definitely recommend staying at VM studio.", "Great host and the place is just enough with everything we need for both of us. Thank you for hosting us! Cheers!", "Momchil is a very good host, he gave us a lot of information, helped in everything and answered fast for the messages. The apartman is very nice and clean, the center is about 10 mins by walk so also good location", "The apartment was very clean and not far from the city center. Public transportation was also quite easy to find and there were supermarkets and restaurants nearby. Momchil was a great host and has a great eye for details.", "Great location, very easy check in, and clean. I would highly recommend.", "Nice small and cosy place! Perfect for 1-2 people who want to stay in a clean place 5' walking distance from the heart of Sofia. Momchil would answer straight away to all our messages and never bothered us for anything, even though he lives with his family right above the apartment. Recommend it!!", "Smooth communication from the beginning of the booking process to the end of our stay. Some welcoming and homey touches made the check-in and the whole of our stay even more enjoyable. The place itself is just as described both by the hosts and by other guests - a central, cosy and quite little studio with everything you might need for a short stay in Sofia.", "We had a great stay. Check in was simple. The room was clean and had everything that we needed. Good location.", "We had a really nice stay at theVM studio.  Momchil and Victoria are really nice hosts and the Appartement is super cute and comfy! We had everything we needed to enjoy our days in Sofia.", "Great value place to stay in the heart of the city. Very welcoming host. Really enjoyed.", "Really nice apartment!
Strongly recommend!", "Stayin at this place is cool, very close to the Cathedrale and the center. Make sure you check out the Events at Kino Cabana and have a drink at „one more“", "It was nice and quite. It is easy to reach the city center, and the supermarket. ", "The place is very good as it is described, central location, one has privacy while staying and very welcoming hosts. I followed previous guest advice to bring a sweater because it really gets chilly in the morning and it worked really well. Overall it’s a great place to stay in the heart of Sofia.", "Momchil was supposed to be at the studio when we originally would arrive. At last, our plane was delayed and he had left the key in a keybox near the entrace of the garden. If you go to Sofia I recommend you to stay at his place. The studio is a bit small but perfect with about everything you need for a visit to this gem of a city. There's Wi-Fi, a bed with fine pillows, towels and also a watercooker.
We didn't spend much time in the studio it isn't a place for that, instead it is your base, your small headquarters from where to explore Sofia a city with many beautiful faces!

Tl;dr:5/5 would stay again
Cheers!
Mark", "If you’re looking to stay in Sofia, this is the place! Quiet yet very close to the center, wonderful homey touches, and generous hosts!", "Momchil is an amazingly hospitable host! He really made me feel welcome and was very helpful whenever I needed something. Great place overall as well, especially considering the price and location! ", "No problems. Nice little room close to center", "I really recommend to stay at momchil's place. He answered every question immediately and he is very kind. 
The location is really fine. For this money you won't find anything better. ", "Our stay at Momchil's place was really memorable and it contributed a lot to our desire to return to Bulgaria in the not-too-distant future. Communication with Momchil was smooth from the very beginning, he was thorough and considerate in all of his answers. The instructions for both the check-in and check-out were clear and made the process easy. There was also a lovely greeting note. 
The studio itself is functional and has everything necessary for a pleasant stay (including some books and booklets, kitchen is equipped with pots and pans and dishes, there is a fridge). The bathroom is on the smaller side, but again, it is not missing anything. It is very private, as the studio has a separate entrance. The location was perfect for us, a mere 10-minute walk both from the nearest metro station and from the centre of the city. It takes only 30 minutes on foot to the bus station. ", "Lovely  place! Right in the heart of the city. Had an amazing time! ", "excellent hospitality and really clean. 100 % recommended", "Momchil is very kind and helpful! Nice and warm place!", "First of all ive been welcomed with a lot enthousiasm, a cold beer and a nice bite. The appartment was very clean and tidy. Momchil borrowed me some things i needed and the communication went very smoothly. They were there when i needed them, but i was completely on my own. Its a very quiet neighbourhood on walkingdistance from the center. Highly recommended, keep up the good work!", "VM studio is clean and close to the main tourist sites of Sofia. Momchil and Viktoria are very helpful and speak english fluently. Definitely recommend!", "A cozy place,  which is super clean and feels safe (the neighborhood was quiet and peaceful)! In the studio, you will find everything you need. It is close to the center and the metro station (15-20 mins walk) you can enjoy your walk since you will start seeing the attractions on your way.  Momchil is really nice and kind. He is helpful and responses quickly.  
In overall, our stay was great. Sure you will feel at home!", "The studio has been recently refurbished and is located in a calm, residential area of Sofia, within walking distance of the Nevski Cathedral (10mn) and the city center (Serdika metro - 15mn). There's also tram 20 and 22 that take you to the same metro station.

It's great for a single traveler that wants to discover Sofia and the best part for me is how helpful Momchil and his wife are, that's the biggest plus in my opinion. Two people could also stay as the bed is big enough, though it can be a bit small.", "We had a nice time in Momchil's apartment. It's very well located, only fifteen minutes walk from Sofia city center. The neighborhood is quiet and cute. Momchil and his brother were very available hosts and they gave us good advices about Sofia. We highly recommend them !", "It was a beautiful small and cozy apartment situated in an beautiful old house (renovated) located in a very peaceful neighborhood, only few minutes(10 -15 min) walk from the downtown of Sofia. The apartment is on the ground floor and it's in the shade so even in the hottest days inside it will be cool, so we had to wear warmer clots inside. Momchil was very friendly and helpful. Over all we had a great time visiting Sofia and staying in VM Studio. ", "소피아 여행 왔는데 공항에서 지하철로 정거장 두개에 15분-20분정도 걸어서 도착했습니다. 호스트 정말 친절하구요 아늑하고 정말 좋습니다..  추천해요~

I really enjoyed the experience in Sofia. The host was really kind and the room was very nice with a good price. If you’re planning to travel in Sofia, then Momchil’s room would be the best. I recommend this.
Thank you Momchil!", "Molto compatto, in una posizione abbastanza comoda (15 minuti dalla metro) e in ogni caso abbastanza vicino al centro. L'unico difetto dell'appartamento è il bagno- doccia, ma non penso che in uno spazio così piccolo ci fosse altra soluzione possibole", "Super séjour. Momchill est un hôte très accueillant et a été très disponible pour nous tout au long du séjour, pour nous apporter des informations. Je recommande !!", "El apartamento está muy bien situado, a unos 15 minutos andando del centro. A pocos metros tienes cafeterías, supermercado y tiendas. Todo lo necesario para pasar unos días en Sofía.", "Local perfeito para ficar. próximo ao metro que te larga direto ao aeroporto. Recomendo e certamente voltaria...", "Pequeña estancia en la planta baja, muy luminosa (sin persianas), ligeramente húmeda (pericón deshumidificador) acondicionada a la perfección y bonita. Perfecta para turistas muy activos que únicamente pasen la noche en el mismo. Perfecta ubicación, a unos 10-15minutos del centro. Lo mejor de todo los anfitriones, muy atentos, dispuestos y detallistas. Muy recomendable.", "Enanisimo y muy acogedor.
Para una persona de 10. Para dos seguro que no tanto pero en principio se podria muy amables y sinpaticos. Una familia adorable."]

reviews:
["Good", "Book it❤️", "Nikola was a great host, he was there on time to meet me and let me in(I was the one that was late :-) and he didn't Hover, something I appreciate a lot in a host! 
The location of the studio was great, a stone throw away from the hart of the city and all the night life and business locations. the studio was renovated with a nice modern feel to it. Perfect for couples or a single travelers. I will most definitely keep this place in mind for future travels to Sofia.", "place was as expected. good location", "Greatly located studio, exactly as described and shown on the pictures. Amazingly quiet, in spite that it is really in the very downtown. We got a nice sleep and perfect time. Big thanks to our wonderful host for the tips and insides! Highly recommended cute place!", "Amazing, cozy place!!! Very clean, conveniently located, and very kind host. Highly recommendable :-)", "Great place to stay. Easy self check in instructions, all major sites in walking distance, close to the metro from the airport and super clean. Highly recommend.", "Kamen’s studio is very romantic and highly recommended place for staying in Sofia! It is located in the centre of city, you can easily find small shops and coffee places around. The studio even has a balcony with amazing view on roofs, birds and flowers. Despite the studio is small, you will find everything is needed!", "easy and nice. I recommand!", "Nikola offers and adorable studio!

It was perfectly located to discover the Sofia city center (by foot). It was clean, well-furnished and beautiful.  However, the studio was too cold to enjoy it completely. 

At the time of the year when we rented the studio (end of October), the central heating was not yet activated but the weather already cold. Therefore, an additional electric heating would be required or the guests should be informed about a possibly cold studio.

However, in times, in which the heating is not required (summer) or is activated (winter) the studio probably deserves a higher rating.

Kind regards,

Robin", "Recommendable. We enjoyed staying at Nikolas/ Kamens place very much. Great location.", "We had a great weekend :) everything was fine", "The house is very clean and only 5-10 mins walking distance to city centre.
Everything was more than my expectation.
I highly recommend this place.", "Had a wonderful stay in this beautiful studio flat and the location was perfect! I highly recommend this place to anyone visiting Sofia. Thanks for everything Nikola & Karen.", "The location is perfect and Nikola was a very friendy and nice host, he responded very quickly and was always happy to help. The apartment was very clean and well equipped. I can highly recommend this place for a nice and comfortable stay in Sofia.", "If you are looking for a romantic, quiet, bright place, this could be your first option. It has everything you need for a city break, or even if you would like to stay more than a weekend. It is very clean, nice pubs and coffee shops in the neighbourhood,  very nice view from the balcony and a cozy and familiar atmosphere overall.", "Gorgeous apartment and very conveniently located!", "Great little studio apartment", "Lovely apartment situated in the centre of Sofia. It is so close to everything you want to see while also being very quiet. It has a lovely bathroom and little kitchen with a balcony- all very homely and well-decorated. Really enjoyed our stay and the excellent host!", "Great for a very central stay in Sophia. Suited our needs perfectly", "Easy checkin, clean and very calm!", "Nikola was fantastic - very quick to respond and accommodate when he could. An excellent host. 
Property was accurately described and perfect.", "Great spot and really cosy, I would happily return", "Great place- compact with everything you need (all very clean and new!). The balcony and courtyard is lovely.", "The apartment is small but cosy. There is a nice balcony where you can enjoy breakfast. The place was very clean and had all the necessary amenities. 
Location is very good, less then 5 min walking distance from the center and public transportation.
Overall as long as your ok with climbing the stairs the place is recommended.", "When I travel abroad I always try to stay with super hosts. Nikola was no exception confirming he is a great host. The communication was easy which is always a plus. The studio is cozu and right in the middle of the city with an excelent location. The host had great tips for us which makes easy to explore the city. Has a nice balcony with some flowers and the bathroom is clean and very nice. The overall experience was very good.", "Perfect apartment for your stay in Sofia. The apartment is clean, bright and lovely arranged. Very central so you may find many things within walking distance. Nikola is super friendly and helpful, perfect host! I would recommend this to everyone!", "Great cozy studio at a perfect location. Everything is within walking distance and close to the woman's market. Communication with Nikola was good and we felt welcome. Nice comfortable stay after travelling through mountain villages. Recommended!", "This a very well-located studio apartment in a charming neighbourhood, very conveniently close to most things you’d want to see in Sofia. Kamen is an excellent and highly professional host, who is very detailed and responsive - and I had an unusually high number of pesky requests I threw his way. The apartment has 92 steps up 5 flights, which didn’t bother me but it might bother some. The apartment itself is extremely cosy, and the owner has made some efforts to make it simple and pleasant. It has loads of light, great ‘old world’ atmosphere because of the interior courtyard it overlooks in a late 19th/early 20th century building, and it has been thoughtfully supplied with basic staples by the owner. The bed is a fold-down couch, which comfortably suited a lone traveller, but I do not have an opinion as to how it would fare with two. I have to go back to Sofia in a few months, and I will certainly contact Kamen for his high service ethic. ", "Me and my friend stayed there for two nights. Although I arrived late because of the bus, Nikola waited for me very patiently, showed me the place and sended me many local recomendations. The place is really clean, nice and cozy. There are all kinds of accessories to cook and everything. Summing up, we enjoyed it very much, we highly recommend it! Thank you again (: ", "It’s a really nice and cute apartment. It doesn’t feel small and has everything you need. ", "Everything here was perfect! The maid was waiting for me when I arrived making check in quick and easy. Small kitchen in room with coffee and some fruit left out for guests. I loved the cute little balcony! Location is perfect in a quiet place yet short walk to all the sights. I loved my time in Sofia and I resort appreciate a late check out as i was jet lagged. Thank you for everything!!", "The best Airbnb I have stayed at in any country. Kamen's studio is beautiful, with lots of natural light, and in a perfect location for exploring the city.  Everything you need is within walking distance. I wish I could bring the studio back home with me.  My only advice is that if you are light sensitive, bring an eye mask for sleeping because the automatic light in the hallway occasionally turns on and shines through a high window.", "good", "Such a lovely place, small but very cozy. Nikola picked us up from the airport and took us to the place while he showed us the city center. Very clean and comfortable, just like in the pictures! 
Totally recommendable! ", "Nice renovated place in an old style building close to the center of Sofia. Nikola was really kind and gave us some advices to find our way in the city. We enjoyed our stay in Nikola's flat. ", "Excellent place for our stay in Sofia—clean, central location, beautiful balcony and excellent communication. Highly recommend! ", "very good. recommended", "Très bon séjour passé dans ce très bel appartement, décoré avec goût et très bien équipé. Nous avons manqué de rien. Il est idéalement situé, proche du métro Serdika, nous étions à moins de 10 min de marche des endroits à visiter. L’hôte a su nous donner toutes les indications nécessaires, très à l’écoute et surtout très réactif. Je recommande vivement ce logement pour profiter pleinement du centre de Sofia", "Un alojamiento estupendo en una zona inmejorable de la ciudad de Sofía. Totalmente recomendable", "Idéalement situé dans le centre historique de Sofia, dans un immeuble un peu vétuste mais plein d'authenticité, l’appartement fraîchement rénové de Nikola est très confortable et bénéficie d'un charme indéniable. Nous n'avons pas rencontré Nikola mais il s'est montré très réactif lors de nos contacts par mail. Une adresse à recommander!"]

reviews:
["Hosts were so quick and clear on responses and all little details made whole stay a really great joy.", "Невероятна квартира", "Amazing", "Beautifully fitted out little apartment. The space is optimised perfectly and it's also super new and stylish. Bang in the centre of town and Luba and Joro were so helpful with their advice and little touches. Will definitely stay again on my next trip to Sofia.", "Staying in SoHOME... It is not just an accommodation. I found a home with an exceptional atmosphere. Warm, cozy and full of heartiness in every detail. The apartment has a wonderful location - in the heart of Sofia, but at the same time its exposure to the patio makes it calm and very quiet. Luba is nice and smiling host and she will surprise you with a  welcome letter. 
SoHOME is a place with soul. And you will love it, I'm sure.", "Great stylish design place in the centre of everything.", "Everything was just as described. Communication with the host was very good as well (fast response). Moreover the location is perfect, very central and right next to everything.
Highly recommend Lubas place for a city trip (2-3 days) to Sofia.", "Nice place in the center, the host is very helpful. Recommend.", "This is a wonderful base to explore beautiful Sofia. It’s in the very center and the space is fully optimised for the business traveller or explorers. Bed is super comfy, the floor heating  heavenly and the rain shower invigorating. Luba is a great host and  I’d def stay there again for my next stays.", "Brilliant space, fantastic availablity if needed help with anything", "Cosy space, nice decor, loved the bedroom and dining space, lounge a bit dark but could not be helped (a lamp would help rather than just the ceiling lights), bathroom quite cool but as a wet room remained very wet after showering (needs better drainage), like the under floor heating throughout though. Great location and lots of information left in the apartment to use to find my way around the city. Help offered in ordering a taxi to the airport if required. Very smooth and easy check out. Would stay again and would recommend to others. Thanks. I am looking forward to travelling back to Sofia next year and exploring further. I would recommend the free Sofia tour at 2 and 6pm every day.", "Lovely apartment, really clean and well designed. Luba was very helpful with any points I had to ask her. All round great stay. Thank you.", "We stayed in Luba's apartment for 5 days and it was perfect. The place is really clean and charming, well occupied with all you need, and we really loved it's decoration. The bed was comfortable and there was always hot water in the shower. The apartment is located in the best location in the city, it is close to everything (it's just one minute from the vitosha bul, and walking distance from all the historical places). 

Luba was very kind and helpful, and we think her place is the best choice you can take for your trip to Sofia.", "The apartment is in an excellent location and is well presented. There is some building work and road work in the area but you can't hear any of it once you're inside. 

We had a good night's sleep and there's air conditioning if needed. ", "Great location. Ground floor apartment in center of city near Vitosha Blvd. Near all the restaurants and bars, but in a quiet location. Would happily stay here again.", "If you wanna visit Sofia, THIS is the place to stay. I cannot recommend it enough. Seriously.", "Cute little minimalistic apartment that doesn't lack anything you actually need. Great location next to central (but horribly touristic) Vitosha Street. Listen to Luba's advice and you'll end up in some awesome restaurant and maybe hiking in Vitosha mountain (much better than the street). Sofia is definitely worth a visit, if you like a laid back authentic city with so many awesome restaurants (check out Aubergine and the Halloumi-Beetroot-Salad they have on the menu - best salad I ever had) and this is definitely an awesome place to start exploring.", "Cozy and beautiful place located right in the city center.  Very convenient for both business and pleasure. The  only thing missing in the apartment  is a TV while toilet and shower are shared in the same place which is very very small. Pity for such a nice place...  Luba is a great host and always responding fast...", "Just like the pictures! Nice, stylish and clean! Also for tourists the ideal location, right in the centre of beautiful Sofia. Better than expected! Thanks Luba for your hospitality and super valuable diner and sightseeing tips! All the best! Ciao", "The appartment is really nice, stylish and in the middle of the centre. I will defenitly reccomend this appartment! The communication with Luba is also really good!", "Great apartment and location!", "Luba was a perfect host, very communicative and the place is really in the middle of Sofia! I really suggest Luba's place for a nice and cozy weekend in the city.", "We were three friends at Lubas place, had a great time, the apartment is right in the center of the city and all the action, smaller but cozy for us :) Luba is very hospitable, she helped us even when we arrived late at night or the last day we needed help with the backpack, it was short trip, but we really enjoyed it! I will be surely back again :)", "Great place. Very stylish and in such a central location close to all the great attractions.", "The apartment is really nice (with heated floors!) and is perfectly located in the middle of Sofia. Luba and Joro were very welcoming and helpful with checkin, checkout and tips for what to see and do in the city.", "We had an awesome time at SoHome! The interior design is lovely and the location of the apartment is just perfect, all the sights are within walking distance, restaurants and pubs directly at the doorstep. We really liked Sofia and the Bulgarian culture and would definitely recommend to pay a visit!", "Perfect airbnb!Beautiful little designed apartment located right in the middle of everything!The apartment is clean,cozy and the underfloor heating was great!
Thanks Luba and Giorgi for an awesome stay!", "it is a very cosy appartment. feels great to be there . on a good location right in city center of sofia.", "Extremely nice and responsive host! The place is great, just 25 meters from the main street. It is cozy and welcoming and has everything that you might need. Luba and her husband are really charming and always willing to help. Thank you for everything!", "Great location and beautiful design. Unfortunately a couple of cockroaches that i had to chase away. A bit stressful.", "George and Liuba were so kind and nice, their home is stylish and in the most central and convenient location. Communication was superfine, well everything was superfine :D", "Fantastic little apartment conveniently located right in the middle of everything. No noise of traffic heard from the apartment. It has been renovated very nicely and the underfloor heating was great! Luba was quick to communicate with us at any time we needed her - there’s a reason why they’re superhosts, would highly recommend!", "AWESOME Airbnb! Luba a is a great and very friendly host and the apartment had the coolest maps with tips and restaurants to go to. Also the apartment is really stylish and in the best location! Would love to stay here again anytime.", "Our stay at Luba's place was great! The apartment looks exactly as in the pictures and its location is perfect for exploring the city. The WiFi is great, the connectivity with other parts is effortless as there are multiple public transport hubs around. Luba was very friendly, sweet and accommodating and we will most definitely return! Thank you for the easy going stay.", "If you are going to discover Sofia for a couple of days, this apartment will serve all your needs to its fullest. 

It is freshly renovated, located in the center of your interests and equiped with anything you'll need on your stay (including a very fast internet connection).

Luba and Georgi are always keen to help you with usefull recommendations :)

Thanks for having us, we will be back for sure!", "Never have we ever been welcomed to an AirBnB so nicely. Luba and Georgi are extremely kind, helpful and always willing to give some tips about the city. Besides all this; the apartment is perfect. Everything has been renovated and looks nice and clean. It’s a very cosy apartment that is located on probably the best spot ever. Right in the middle of the city center, just one street away from the main boulevard (Vitosha Blv.). Thanks Luba & Georgi for an awesome stay. It was great to meet you guys!", "Great apartment. Great location. Luba is a very friendly and helpful host. Everything was very clean n well equipped.", "I had the best time in SoHOME! The location is unbeatable! A little gem right in the heart of Sofia, yet quiet and safe! Tastefully decorated, the apartment is clean, cozy and welcoming. Although I traveled by myself, the flat is spacious enough for 3 guests. The bed is super comfy, the ceilings are high. There is floor heating throughout the apartment, which was a treat! Do not look any further, this place is the best! Luba and Joro, thank you for hosting me and I hope to stay at SoHOME again in the near future! ", "Merci beaucoup Luba,
Nous avons passé un excellent séjour qui ne s’était pas très bien commencé. Nous avions effectué une autre réservation airbnb sur Sofia qui a été annulé par notre hôte alors que nous étions devant la porte. Nous avons trouvé le logement de Luba d’urgence la veille et nous avons obtenu une réponse très rapidement ce qui nous a rassuré. De plus l’appartement était beaucoup mieux situé et mille fois plus agréable, cosy et fonctionnel que le airbnb que nous devions avoir de base 
Nous recommandons ce airbnb à tout couple voulant visiter Sofia", "Super localisation en plein centre à proximité des restaurants, super appart design propre et surtout super hôte :)", "Super bedankt voor alles Luba! Je bent acht een superhost! Je hebt ons super geholpen ook toen ik last had van mijn knie en naar het ziekenhuis moest. Je reageerde altijd super snel en alles was snel geregeld en opgelost. De locatie is echt geweldig, je kunt zo naar alle hoogtepunten in de stad wandelen en staat zo op de bruisende boulevard. Het is een heerlijk rustig, veilig en fijn als je binnen bent. Het appartement ziet er heel goed uit en is zeker een aanrader.", "Perfect AirBnb!! 
L’appartement est idéalement situé, en plein centre ville, à proximité du boulevard Vitosha (bars, commerces, restaurants...). À l’intérieur, un point ++ pour le chauffage au sol et le lit trop bien!! Mais tout est vraiment sympa ! Luba et Joro sont très réactifs, et donnent de très bons conseils. 
Je recommande +++++!", "Das Apartment von Luba und Georgi ist perfekt für einen Wochenendtrip nach Sofia!
Zentraler kann man nicht wohnen, wir haben alles zu Fuß gemacht.
Alles ist blitzbank sauber, die Kommunikation superschnell und Georgi hat uns tolle Tipps gegeben.
Wir würden auf jeden Fall wiederkommen und können die Unterkunft nur empfehlen!!", "L’accueil de Luba était vraiment génial malgré le retard que nous avons pu avoir pour notre arrivée... Un accueil chaleureux et avec pleins de bonnes adresses! L’appartement est très mignon et bien situé, c’est un sans faute pour passer un bon séjour à Sofia, je recommande vivement :).", "La estancia es genial, muy bien decorada y cama cómoda. Nos pusieron muchas facilidades a la hora de la llegada ya que llegamos bastante tarde. Estaba limpio pero nos encontramos algunas arañas por la casa. A parte de eso, sin ningún problema. Nos dejaron mapas y recomendaciones.", "Idéal pour un séjour à Sofia !
L'appartement est situé sur le plus grand boulevard du centre ville avec plein de boutiques, bars et restaurants à proximité! L'emplacement est idéal pour visiter la ville à pied ! Il est en même temps très calme car ne donne pas sur les rues exterieures.
C'est un appartement avec beaucoup de cachet parfaitement rénové avec beaucoup de charme mais aussi très fonctionnel et pratique, parfaitement équipé (cuisine, machine à laver, sèche linge).
Nous avons eu droit à une bouteille de vin et des biscuits de bienvenue !
Nous étions les premiers visiteurs et Luba et Joro ont été très attentionnés du début à la fin, nous avons reçu plein de conseils pour visiter la ville et ses alentours au mieux !
Incontournable si vous allez à Sofia, en tout cas nous y retournerons si nous sommes de passage à nouveau !

PS: petit plus, Luba parle très bien français !!!!"]

reviews:
["The place is good enough, the location is good, too.", "It is indeed a nice place to stay in. Everything went smootly with the check-in and out and we received the anonymity we needed back to then. The walls are really very thin and during one out of four nights we were woken up early in the morning by the neighbours. Nevertheless we might book it again for the conviniences which this appartment offered to us otherwise. Thank you very much for the comfort given to us, Mariela.", "It was a great please to stay. Nice and quiet location.", "Great communication. Mariela was not onsite to welcome us, but her friend was very welcoming.", "A very pleasant apartment in a convenient part of town. Everything described in the Airbnb profile is what I found at 14 Lyulin Planina. It’s a 1960s era building, I’m guessing, and the apartment shows that, but it’s been modestly modernised. Comfortable bed and everything working in the kitchen and bathroom.", "We had a really great time.  It was a comfortable apartment, quiet neighborhood, walking distance to main streets and the "Veda House" vegan restaurant which we loved. The hosts gave clear instructions and were always responsive and helpful.", "very convenient location. Great host and a really nice place to visit!", "Really good position, lovely and cozy interior design. Perfect for a couple. Extremely easy check-in. Mariela is the perfect host, always available if necessary. Highly recommended!", "Excellent location", "Nice stay, the apartment is exactly what was expected. Only 10 minutes from vitosha boulevard", "Mariela's place was amazing, and its location was perfect! It is very close to the main street and the city center, but also to metro and tram lines. It is also beautiful on the inside, with lots of space, a nice kitchen and everything you would need for a great stay!", "Nice place with well organized and new furniture, everything within the place was good just without air-condition.
Quiet, safe neighborhood. But a little bit far supermarkets.
I recommend the place and definitely I go again.", "well please I'd good", "This Airbnb is run as a business by people running multiple Airbnbs, rather than being somebody's home. We had booked for 10 nights but left after 4 nights.

The positive points of Mariela's place were her prompt and careful communication, the wifi which was reliable and fast, and the local recommendations for cafes and restaurants which were great. The self check-in process with lockbox was also efficient and smooth. The location is convenient, quiet but easy walk to the centre.

However we had several issues during our stay: there was a central hot water outage so we had no hot water for the first 3 nights (although obviously there was nothing Mariela could do about this). The apartment was not cleaned properly: the floors had not been cleaned, the bed was not fully made (pillows and pillowcases were left in the living room and we had to do these ourselves) and there was no soap in the bathroom. There was a shampoo bottle and handsoap bottlewhich had both been refilled with the same bright green liquid from under the kitchen sink (which seemed to be dishwashing liquid).

We also had some issues with noise from the upstairs neighbours (their TV is above the bedroom and was clearly audible)- although again this is not something that can be changed.

We did not expect luxury for the price however we were disappointed over these things and decided to leave early. Mariela and her co-hosts were understanding and overall receptive to our feedback, in particular, they use a cleaning company and have told us the cleaning issues will be addressed with them. So we hope these things will be improved.", "Mariela will provide you all information you need to feel at home quickly and discover the place (very well located)!", "Lovely apartment, within a short walk to city center parks, shopping and museums. There was a washing machine in the apartment which I don’t think is mentioned in description. I found this useful as I was traveling light. Hosts were also helpful when my flight was cancelled! Thank you. ", "The house is nice and on a good location. The house has everything you need. A luxerious coffee machine, washing machine and hair dryer! The bed was very comfortable and slept perfect here.", "This place is really nice when you want to go and explore the city! Definitely big enough and what we needed was there at our disposal.

 Small sidenotes though: the bathroom could be better (sink is in the middle of the room), the windows are best to be closed because of bugs and the bed was not that comfortable. 

But overall good price/quality and really effective and clear communication!", "Excellent location and great local tips from host.

Despite being a ground floor flat, the roads are quiet and so you could easily sleep with the windows open", "Central location. Communication with Mariela was easy even though we didn't meet her. The apartment was clean and accurate to the description. 
The only point is that the walls are thin so you can hear the neighbors. 
Sofia is a beautiful city. Good experience", "Great location, apartament was very clean, super cosy y modern. Recommending it!", "We had a lovely time at Mariela's place, everything you need near by and is very central to all the tourist attractions. Will definitely love to return to Sofia.
Thank you.
Marc & Silvia", "Great location for the centre.", "I strongly recommend Mariela`s place to everyone, it is clean, has a nice interior style and at last but not least, it is situated really close to the center (10 min walk), yet it is quiet at night.
Mariela was really responsive and provided me with lots of recommendations, too.", "Mariela was a wonderful host. Although we never met the hosts, it was not a problem as communication was great: instructions were clear and concise. The bedroom was a bit cold, as the heating system is placed in the living room, but there were several covers. The bed was not very comfortable. The place is also very clean and just 5-7 walk from Vitosha street, There is also a great bio-shop just around the corner. Special thanks go to Dessy who was promptly replying to our questions.", "Great location. Communication with Mariela and Dessy was easy even though we didn't see them. It's a 10 minutes walk to the shopping street and a 20 minutes walk to the historic center. I would recommend this place for sure :-)", "Mariela was sweet and gave all the answers I needed.

The prices of everything was very comfortable and sutisfying. We took Mariela's suggestion and used the Yellow taxi app which was very useful.
We enjoyed "sun moon" for breakfest, the caffe-pizza place around the corner from the apartment, and "rooftop bar" for amazing cocktails at night.
Thanks so much!", "Great place would go back.", "We had a fantastic stay at Mariela's apartment.

The apartment was very clean, comfortable and well-equipped. It was located in a quiet street close to the centre.

Mariela was a great host and gave us lots of tips and recommendations! ", "Good relation quality - price and really good location of the flat! ", "Loved it!
First of all the location is great, 5-10 minutes walking distance into the city centre. There's a shop right around the corner for basic stuff and there's also a large Lidl about a ten minute walk away.
The apartment was clean, spacious and had everything we needed. Check in/check out was straight forward; Mariela wasn't actually available so we met her friend for the keys; Pleasant guy who was also accommodating for the fact we were running late.
Not much more to say; cooking equipment was all there, it was warm and the shower was nice.
All in all we had a great time in Sofia- awesome city!", "Wonderfull and wormly welcome host. Clean amd confor space with evrything you need. Placed in the center of Sofia, evrything is walking distance. Clean ", "Mariela's apartment is located just a 7-10 minute walk from the principle street of downtown Sofia. Located in a quiet, local neighborhood the apartment provides a cozy getaway but within minutes you can be in the hustle and bustle of the city, day or night. The apartment is spacious and comfortable, especially for two, making this BNB great for a romantic getaway. Moreover, Mariela is a great host. She provided helpful information on where to go, what to see and what to eat. Also, she was very responsive during my stay for any questions I had. Highly recommend for a visit to Sofia! ", "Bien placé, entrée et sortie des lieux pratiques, spacieux et confortable, très bien équipé et avec des petites attentions appréciées, à recommander .", "Appartement très propre , très bien équipé et identique aux photos.
Récupération et Restitution des clés très faciles, et en toute autonomie, ce qui est très pratique, grâce  à la boîte à clés sécurisée.
L'emplacement est idéal car proche du centre à pieds et des principaux points à visiter.
Enfin les indications de Mariela sont très précises et complètes et elle répond de manière très réactive aux questions.
Bref, je recommande ce logement et son hôte.
", "Appartement situé dans une rue très calme très proche du centre à pied et de la rue principale piétonne. Jolie decoration, rez-de-chaussée peu lumineux et moyennement soigné; défaut majeur est une personne âgée insomniaque habitant au-dessus, donc personne sensible cherchant calme et sommeil, cela va être difficile...", "Mariela molto disponibile e casa confortevole e in buona posizione!", "Очень приятные хозяева, молодые и активные, любые вопросы решаются практически мгновенно. Хозяева всегда на связи и стараются обеспечить наилучшие условия и атмосферу для отдыха.", "Милая квартира,хорошее расположение в тихом районе,гостеприимная хозяйка,готовая ответить на все ваши вопросы ,даже то что не касается квартиры,о самом городе,например, где лучше позавтракать или выпить коктейль❤❄", "Die Unterkunft war ok. Etwas dunkel, weil sie sich im Erdgeschoss befindet. Das Bett (dünne, alte Matratze) ist ok für ein paar Tage, eignet sich aber nicht für längere Aufenthalte. Sonst ist die Wohnung in Ordnung.
Beim CheckIn war leider niemand persönlich anwesend, alle Instruktionen kamen recht kurzfristig per Mail. Zudem wurde ich zuerst an eine falsche Adresse in eine andere Wohnung geschickt, musste mich dann nochmal per Mail melden um die richtigen Angaben zu erhalten, zum zweiten Mal Wohnung suchen, Schlüssel suchen. Ich habe auch keine Tel. Nr erhalten, bzw. die Anweisung, nur per Mail zu kommunizieren. Man braucht also zwingend ein Smartphone, dass auch in Bulgarien ohne WLAN Internet hat, sonst ist man etwas aufgeschmissen! Ich schätze es aber eigentlich grundsätzlich, wenn der Host kurz persönlich anwesend ist und ein paar Tipps gibt.", "Mig og min mor havde en fantastisk rejse til Sofia. Lejligheden var flot og centreret og vi var meget glade for at bo her. Anbefales virkelig :)", "La estancia en este apartamento fue simplemente increíble. No fue difícil el check-in y las dueñas estaban atentas en todo momento a cualquier duda que tuvieses.

El apartamento está cerca de todo lo importante de Sofía, por lo que si a lo largo del día queréis descansar, es ideal para ello. No váis a necesitar transporte público.

El estado del apartamento también es genial, todo en su sitio y no faltaba de nada. Realmente daba gusto estar en él.

Sin duda, lo recomiendo al 100% a todos los visitantes que vengan a Sofía ;)", "L´appartement est très joli, était très propre, bien équipé, élégant et bien placé. Le seul problème était que le chauffage central ne marchait pas et il faisait froid et aussi beaucoup de bruit d´appartement dessus. Mariela était très soucieuse.", "Die Wohnung ist optimal für ein paar Tage Aufenthalt. Sehr ruhig nach hinten gelegen, großzügige Verstaumöglichkeiten und Akkus bestens zu erreichen. 
Leider war die Matratze etwas dünn und die Nachbarn oben drüber waren abends vor allem zu hören 

Trotzdem klare Empfehlung, der Kontakt war super nett und wir haben tolle Tipps bekommen!", "Het bed is helaas erg dun en hard (het matras is simpelweg versleten). We voelden de veren in onze rug en zij prikken en voelden de latten eronder. Dit vonden wij erg jammer aangezien een goede nachtrust voor ons erg belangrijk is. Tevens werden wij zaterdagochtend (onze tweede nacht) vroeg gewekt door werkzaamheden in een appartement boven ons ergens. Dat maakte op zich al lawaai maar dat was nog geeneens het ergste. Er werd met een hoop lawaai namelijk puin naast ons slaapkamerraam gedumpt, erg frustrerend.

Verder was de locatie uitstekend en was het appartement schoon genoeg en was Mariela behulpzaam met tips over Sofia.", "Het appartement was heel proper en goed gelegen. Op wandelafstand van het centrum en de voorzieningen waren in orde.", "깨끗하고 넓은 아파트.
필요한 모든 것들이 잘 갖추어져 있다.
위치도 중심가 근처라 걸어서 접근 가능하며 대중교통고 편리하게 이용할 수 있다.
Mariela는 친절하게 체크인,체크아웃 방법과 소피아의 많은 정보들을 알려주었다.
추천할 만한 곳이다.:)", "Marielas Unterkunft ist wirklich sehr schön. Für 2 Personen groß genug, man hat alles was man braucht und die Wohnung ist an sich sehr gemütlich eingerichtet. 

Außerdem ist die gute Lage hervorzuheben, man ist zu Fuß in ca. 10 Minuten auf der bekanntesten Einkaufstraße von Sofia, auch Bars, Restaurants, Cafés und Kneipen sind fußläufig in nicht allzulanger Entfernung zu erreichen. 

Die Wohnung war sauber, groß und gemütlich eingerichtet, wir haben uns während unseres Aufenthaltes sehr wohl gefühlt. 

Mariela hat uns tolle Tipps gegeben zu beliebten Cafés, Bars, Restaurants und Sehenswürdigkeiten. Auch findet man in der Wohnung einen Stadtplan sowie interessante Sehenswürdigkeiten, die man sich anschauen kann.

Alles top, Unterkunft empfehlenswert! :)", "Het appartement is netjes en ruim. Alles is oploopafstand. ", "El apartamento es exactamente como en las fotos, está muy cerca del centro y tiene todo lo necesario alrededor. Mariela nos dio buenos consejos sobre qué podíamos hacer en Sofía.

reviews:
["Very nice, comfortable and cozy apartment. Location in the heart of the city. Good value for money. We recommend strongly this apartment. ", "Charming, cosy, sunny  studio apartment. Great location.", "Neat and cosy studio with excellent location. ", "The location was very good and it is cozy. Furthermore the apartment was clean and we had enough space. The communication was sometimes difficult.", "Cozy apartment in a great location.", "Nice and central apartment. We didn t see Alex who deposited the keys in a lock at the house. He also arranged an extra bed for our baby. Communication was good but it s a shame we couldn t actually meet our host.", "Had a wonderful time, the bed was so comfortable and it is such an adorable little apartment. The kitchen is compact and has everything you need to cook a meal. Great location to go sightseeing. Excellent value!", "The check-in process was very easy with the key safe, which was fortunate as my flight was delayed. This apartment is very close to the city centre and only a 5 min walk from Serdika Metro. The space was very clean and homely, with a cute balcony. It's a relatively quiet location, however every so often I could hear the neighbours. The only issue was when having a shower. The water runs onto the floor and this is unavoidable, however it wasn't that bad that I wouldn't stay here again. Otherwise this is a perfect place to stay and explore Sofia from!", "Super appartment in pefect location in the center of Sofia. I totally recommend this appartment to  everyone who wants to visit Sofia!", "This is my 2nd time at this appartment,highly recomended.", "Great flat in a central location! Highly recommended if you'd like to be in the heart of Sofia and enjoy a private visit at a lovely studio flat.", "Great place to stay. Very clean and stylish, and very close to the center of the city.", "Pleasant stay and overall a satisfying service at a fair price.

It was not very easy to get in contact to clear doubts both before and during our stay; the host did not respond to messages and we had to ring to get an answer.

The apartment is cute, cosy and well-located, and the wifi and AC work perfectly. However, it could have been cleaner and the walls to the apartment next-door are thin. It's a fourth floor without lift. The shower works well but it's practically impossible not to flood the entire bathroom floor.

The host kindly arranged for us to leave our luggage in the building after check-out and collect it in the afternoon.", "It’s really cute apartment in center of Sofia .", "We had a wonderful stay in Sofia, and the location was perfect! If we will ever come back to Sofia we will definitly stay at Alex and Polina again", "It's really a pity because except for two major problems the apartment was really cozy and it had a really nice balcony. We could not enter the apartment the first night because the code we were given to open the box where the keys were was wrong. The host didn't answer because it was 2 am so we had to go and get a room in a hostel. However he quickly returned the money for that night so this was very professional of him. The other problem is that the bathroom needs to get fixed as soon as posible, you can't take a shower without the floor being flooded with water, we had to use towels to dry it but even then you get wet and it was an inconvenience to the point it made us not want to shower.
Everything else was fine, I guess we just had bad luck with this trip,  the host was nice and helpful, he did what he could in that situation.", "Small, cosy but a well maintained apartment. Very central and close to underground. Air-conditioner works well. It's situated on the top floor so you don't get noise from above, however just be prepared to walk the few flights of stairs up - but it's not a problem. Alex and Polina made the instructions really clear, I'd recommend their place for a short stay in Sofia ;-)", "The flat was exactly as beautiful as we though, great decoration, very clean, luminous. The area is perfect location for visiting, in the middle of everything. We loved it!", "Perfect location to visit Sofia.", "The apartment has a uniqu ambiance,the location is excelent,fully equipt,very easy self check in ,safe and quiet.overall very good stay!", "The location is just great. It is in heart of the city. The self check-in & out and flexible times are great. The apartment is cute & cozy. If I go to Sofia again, I definitely will stay there again.", "Very cozy, small apartment in the heart of the city. We had a great time. Thank you Alex and Polina!", "The main problem was the lack of cleanliness. The floor was dirty and curtain, blinds, furniture in general were dusty. The shower/tub seemed to be leaking and the bathroom floor was flooding from shower use. The location is indeed very central and close to the main metro station although the street of the property itself is very deserted at night so we had slight security concern.", "The flat was lovely and had a perfect location to everything! Would definetely recommend it!", "absolutely amazing! the best thing is the location", "The place is centrally located and very comfortable. It is easy to access regardless of checkin time because of their lockbox system which makes it great for anyone arriving at early or very late hours. One of the best beds I have ever slept in. Highly recommended.", "we had a good time in sofia, the location is perfect and the flat was cosy :) thanks for having us!", "This is a super nice and central apartment to stay in. I'd recommend it to anyone!", "It’s a great cosy very small apartment enough for two people.", "The place is nice, clean. The position is strategic, because it's near to the city center, and to the metro that goes to the airport.

The informations that Alex and Polina gives are really precise.

We recommend them for anyone who wants to go to Sofia", "Alex and Polina’s apartment was the perfect stay! Right next to the main metro station with both lines interesting and less than a block from great restaurants and coffee shops, I would highly recommend their cozy apartment in downtown Sofia! I’ll definitely be back!", "A very nice and romantic apartment. Clean and near everything (supermarkets, centre of the city...).
A perfect place for visiting Sofia.", "The place is nice, the bed was perfect, really confortable an the sheets smelled really good. It is also in a perfect position, near Bulevard Vitosha and the central metro station. The only thing is that the floors weren't perfectly clean and that when you have a shower is impossible not to wet the floor. Anyway the apartment is really nice and confortable and the host really kind and available!", "Great value. Close to town..view of rooftops..coffee when it was raining.. quiet.. private...  Very secure. I called it my private Crows nest... would rent again", "Alex and Polina's place is well located. You can walk to many of Sofia's attractions and it is close to a good supermarket and metro.
The apartment is nice;  the kitchen is a bit small.
Alex is responsive and his English (written, didn't meet him) is very good.
Good choice in Sofia.", "An ideal little hideaway in Sofia.

Well located and within easy distance of all the sights. Nice and quiet . Nice touch that tea and coffee were provided . Also felt secure.", "First of all location is great. Real Heart of the city. Clean, small and cozy flat. Only problem that i saw, bathroom floor is fulling with water when you are taking shower. Dont forget to take your slipper. :) Alex is a great host, internet fast. The building has 3 doors, looks secure. Kitchen enough to make a breakfast, small balcony for smoking. Really quite place to stay. I really recomend that place if you dont search for luxury.", "Excellent location, in the very centre of Sofia, well within walking distance of every major attraction. The hosts were very friendly, we booked the same day we were travelling, they accepted our booking and they were also very flexible regarding check-out times. Communication between them and us was excellent. Although it is very central, the flat is very quiet, ideal also for people with light sleep like myself. The pictures really correspond to the flat.", "This place is so sweet...small but perfectly formed! It's in the converted attic of a beautiful old building and has a lovely balcony where you can sit and enjoy breakfast. Amenities were fine and we felt well catered for.  We only met Natalia briefly (Alex and Polina's mum) but it was all we needed - she let us in, showed us around and that was that!

The location was perfect - a safe side street walking distance from the centre. 

The bath was a little small but other than that, we were very happy staying here and it suited our needs perfectly. We were here for a wedding and would definitely return if ever in Sofia again. 

Thank you!
Natalie and Graham", "Great apartment, very well located near yo the metro station and the centre. Very clean and 100% recommendable.", "Great apartment in a great location. Recommended!", "Perfect little apartment for your stay in Sofia, excellent  location, amazing friendly hosts, I hope we get a chance to go back sometime ! ", "Loved the location. Apartment is exactly same as in the pictures. I only had a bit of a problem entering the house upon check in as the cleaning lady didn't open the door for me till after an hour, although I have clearly communicated my arrival time with the host ", "Lovely apartment right in the centre of Sofia. Hosts communicated instructions very promptly and clearly and clearly after a late booking. Fully recommend, ace place and hosts. ", "The apartment for our needs despite how small it is it was just as we expected. Great location close to subway. The Airbnb map however took us to the wrong location but we eventually found it. Great wifi. We did not have any personal interaction with the hosts.  Lots of stairs so be aware of that is a problem for you. We would recommend it. ", "Thanks so much to Alex and Polina - very clear instructions on check-in and check-out. All very efficient. And a lovely apartment, very central, with a great little balcony. Thanks a lot! ", "The place is very nice, cozy & perfectly located in central Sofia. Alex is a great host, very responsive, communication with him was very easy. Highly recommended!", "Lovely stay, Central, nice balcony, good space.  The only issue is that quite thin walls, but I'm an incredibly light sleeper so would probably be fine for most people.", "Wonderful space which is as it's described in photos and text.  Close to nightlife, but nice and quiet at night.  Excellent internet speed for those working remotely.  Highly recommend. Host was communicative and a big help !!", "We loved this apartment. Everything was great. We can only recomend it. ", "Very nice apartment in strategic location, everything at walking distance. Quiet and clean, we had everything we needed. Alex is very kind and we had a great communication even if we didn't meet in person. 
Absolutely recommended!", "Nice, clean and cozy apartment in the Center of sofia.", "Perfect location, very close to the center. Very nice apartment, with everything you need. ", "The apartment is really nice with a lovely balcony. The position is perfect, very closed to Serdika metro and to popular monuments. Alex and Polina were so kind with us during all the journey. The last day, they allowed us to leave our bags in the apartment until late afternoon. 
I reccomend this charming place to everyone :)", "The apartment is really nice, complete and perfect located. Recommended!!!", "Alex was effective in the communication for check-in and check-out.
Apartment was very well located near by the centre and we enjoyed the weekend over there.
", "The apartment is warm and cozy. It has everything you need for stay) it's in 3 minutes from metro station, and in 5 minutes from president administration. in 10 minutes you can get to Sofia Mall", "The keys handover was a mess and took place via some unfriendly bulgarian guys that did not speak one single word english. 

The flat was dirty, shabby and very used. Some of the mobiliar is broke. Dust and Dirt and Hairs in the corners. The Bed Linen had the smell of the previous guest.
There is no central heating, only an noisy air conditioner that distributes hot air. Not good for this Period, generally very bad insulated building structure.
Warm water is provided only via an ugly, leaking boiler and is also very limited. Water floods the bathroom when you shower because of bad concept. 

A place to avoid", "It was great. I would stay here again!", "Fantastic place! Has everything that one might need! Warm cosy. Great location - very central, but because it is not on a main street - really quite. Fast Internet. Safe neighbourhood. Everything is really within a walking distance and it is also 2 min walk from a metro station, so if you are coming from the airport - it is very fast and close. Also have to admit that the hosts' tips about the area were very helpful. Despite the fact that I have mixed up the time of our arrival the host was very understanding and has checked us in right away!", "The host canceled this reservation 42 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.", "Lovely apartment in the heart of the city. Everything can be done walking.
The information to arrive where clear and Alex and Polina even send us a small pdf with instruction and great location (restaurants, etc...)

Thank you :)", "It we the second time we stayed there. The stay was perfect as always. Thank you Natalia! :)", "Very nice appartment, close to the center and all the main attractions. The little balcony is very charming! Easy communication with Alex and Paulina: we arrived late in the evening due to flight delays but they waited for we to reach the apartment and to make sure everything was ok.", "Really wanted to love this place as it had amazing reviews, but unfortunately our experience with communication, check-in, and having someone coming into the apartment unannounced during our stay left us with a bad taste. 

We were told that since the owner was on vacation that the keys would be left with a security guard for our arrival. We arrived at 6:45pm and the security guard had no keys and no knowledge of anyone who should leave keys. We tried calling the numbers left for us by the owners but all phones were off and we let messages as well as texted and sent air b&b messages. We had to leave and find somewhere to sit until we finally heard back about an hour later. We were again advised that the keys were at security. 

We went back and the keys were indeed there. No one greeted us or gave any brochure or information on the apartment. We had to wait until the next day until we were contacted after leaving messages to get the wifi information. 

The apartment itself is quite cute and bed is comfortable, however there were still food and beverage items leftover from the previous renters in the mini fridge and the sheets smelled if dust. We stayed 7 days and the biggest issue with the apartment itself is the way the shower is setup so you always get water all over the floor no matter what you do. We went through all the floor towels and were not contacted about any extra amenities over the next 7 days. 

The biggest problem of all was the second last day when at noon there was a knock at the door and 4 men decided there was an issue with the wifi and they needed to set up something new due to a conflict with the apartment owners in the bottom of the building (original owners of wifi).

We had just finished a nap, so I had to lock myself in the bathroom sans pants as there was no time to even change. There was no phone call or attempt to contact us at all. This was very upsetting as we should have had complete privacy when renting an entire apartment for 7 days unless contacted first. We mentioned this and got excuses and a half hearted apology.

All in all, it's a cozy little place, but due to our bad experiences with the communication, lack of privacy, etc. We would definitely not stay here again.", "We were made very welcome although we arrived early but we're able to leave bags whilst the flat was being cleaned   Very central location but quiet and peaceful.  Lovely well equipped appartment   Several flights of steps with luggage so maybe not for elderly or those with health problems but suites us really well ", "I really liked staying here. the room is characterful, quiet and larger than it looks in the pictures, and the balcony is perfect for sitting out on. 
It was easy to find too, and near to he centre of the city while also being a short distance away from the noise and 'buzz'.  
It was easy to pick up the keys and drop them off at the end of my stay, and Polina was helpful and speaks excellent English.
If I'd had more time I would have liked to stay longer.", "We had a very pleasant stay in this appartment. The bed is very comfy and the balcony is great for breakfast in the sun. Location is A+. Thanks Alex and Polina! ", "The apartment was truly wonderful and perfectly prepared. Everything we needed was there. The location was also perfect and the service of Polina is outstanding. I forgot something and she made sure I got it back. Lovely stay. Highly recommended!", "It was a nice flat, with a cool balcony witch was so cozy in the evenings! 
It was in the center of the city. 
The host was helpful with everything ", "Clean, charming and comfortable studio in a wonderful central location. Alex and Polina's very kind mother met me at the flat and showed me around. This was my first AirBnB experience, and Polina was very quick to respond to all of my questions. She also provided a great list of nearby restaurants and coffee shops, some of which I would never have discovered if I'd stayed in a hotel. ", "Nicely laid out loft studio, with some very clever touches to make the space feel bigger. Hosts are polite and professional. There isn't an elevator which might be a pain to some, but otherwise the apartment is fine. Would recommend.", "The flat was clean and spacious. The location was spot on and we loved our stay in the centre of Sofia. The free car park right across the road was convenient and the host was friendly and helpful. The hosts provided us with a Brochure before our arrival which was very informative and useful. Thank you for the wonderful stay.", "It's a great little place in a great location, close to everything. It has a lot of natural light and the little balcony is very charming. It's a little tight for two people but doable for a few days. It's on the top floor with no elevator so don't bring heavy bags. ", "Absolutely lovely flat in a great part of Sofia to get around. Cute little balcony was really appreciated in the sunshine. Had a bit of an issue with the front door key as it needs a bit of a wiggle, but once we got the knack there was no problem! Would definitely stay here again if return to Sofia. ", "Well located little gem in Sofia! Easy to find thanks to excellent directions provided. Major sights are easy to reach by foot. Thanks for having us!", "The neighbourhood is great - within minutes of a walk can get to practically every part of Sofia down-town. The studio is really bright & cosy and for our 3 days stay we had all we needed. The hosts were very friendly, gave us some good tips for the direct neighbourhood and the communication was really smooth. All-in-all a lovely stay!", "Very good central location, bright and nice studio where you'll find anything you'd possibly need. Secured, well maintained building. Easygoing host- kind and helpful. Overall- a nice place to stay :)", "Very nice studio in great location in the city centre, with a small balcony perfect for a coffee in the morning and drinks in the evening. The hosts also provided us with free parking which is very hard to come by in central Sofia!", "Very good experience, Polina was very responsive. The flat was well located minutes of amazing places.", "The apartment is just as beautiful as it is in the photos. Alex and Polina were of great help and always answered the questions I had in a short timespan. The location of the apartment is perfect. There are lots of restaurants, bars, and monuments nearby. I'd recommend it to anyone who wants to spend a few days in Sofia, you can't go wrong with this one!", "We stayed 2 night in Alex and polina appartement. 
It was perfect for our weekend :-). 
Near the center, cosy quiet confortable everything was great.", "Great location, the place is exactly the same as in the pictures. Hosts flexible with arrangements. Definitely recommend it.", "Very nice and clean place! Perfect location close to everything.", "Generally everything was good. The location is great and everything was as shown/listed on the AirBnB page.", "Wonderful apartment, like the pictures, and well situated. Polina and her mother welkomed us very well. It's with pleasure that we will come back again! ", "Small, cosy apartment located close to the major sights of Sofia centre. Thank you!", "Beautiful apartment, just on the heart of the city with all you need.
Polina, is a very nice host, always there if you need her.
Thank you so much.", "They were great. Quiet. Gave recommendations on where to eat, transportation etc. ", "It´s a great location and wonderful apartment perfect for two people. It is really nice of Polina and Alex that they have even made these brochures that they send out when you book the apartment with all necessary information about location, how to get from station or airport and what to see in Sofia. Apartment was small, but had all necessities.", "We thoroughly enjoyed staying in the apartment, which was exactly as described and we would recommend it as perfect for a couple who want a centrally situated place to stay in Sofia.", "This apartment was perfect. ", "Perfect location, and nice hospitality!", "Always perfect! I m a frequent user of Polina s apartment. Everything is in walking distance! When comming back to Sofia, I definitely would stay at this cute apt. again!!! ", "I had such a great time. The apartment is so cute and well located. 
Polina was so helpful and sweet and even gave me tickets to a concert and introduced me to people.  It was exactly the experience I was looking for.  I felt like a local. ", "I spent five days in Alex and Polina's charming little apartment.  It was comfortable and cozy and remarkably well-equipped (there even was a clothes-drying rack, much to my satisfaction).  Also, Polina was easy to reach, just a phone call away.  Sofia is a wonderful city to visit, and this centrally located apartment, with its feeling of home away from home, made my stay even more pleasant.", "I loved this place!  Great location and great apartment, very well decorated with comfortable furniture and walking distance from Vitosha, the main commercial street with restaurants, pubs, and shopping.  Alex and Polina did everything to make sure the check in process was smooth, and they provided a great pdf file to my email which helped me familiarize with the surroundings and the building.  I definitely recommend this apartment and look forward to returning next time.  Thank you!", "Great apartment! Met Polinas mom for the checkin - went very smoothly. Nice place off the main street, very quiet and cozy! Highly recommend this place.", "Alex and Polina have a very nice cosy apartment which is perfect for a couple. All was clean and very professionally prepared for our arrival: plenty of towels, information material about Sofia etc. We arrived very late on Friday night but our hosts very accommodating and didn't make us feel like it was a problem at all. Check out time on Sunday was whenever suited us, which was very useful. And the location is excellent. ", "I had a wonderful week in Sofia thanks in large part to Polina and Alex. Polina was always promptly available to answer questions and give advice. The apartment suited my needs perfectly and was very centrally located. Polina and Alex also have a nice guesthouse in the small village of Golets - ask them about it if you're interested in visiting, I spent a night there and had a great time. Highly recommend!", "Polina was an excellent host.  She was very accommodating.  The apartment was cozy and in a great location.  Although small, it was comfortable and nice.  I would use the apartment again in the future without hesitation.  However, it says that it will sleep 3 but it would be very tight if you had to sleep three people.", "Thoroughly enjoyed Hogmanay holiday at the central studio-apartment in Sofia which was as stylish and cosy as it looks in the photos. It was warm to come back into from the sub-zero temperatures outside, and Polina was equally welcoming when we first arrived. Great space with good shower, coffee maker and balcony overlooking quiet but well positioned central city street.  ", "Great studio in the heart of the old part of Sofia. The location is as good as it gets - walking distance to pretty much anything downtown including historic sights, and it's also a block away from the metro. The space has a lot of character, and so does the building too. It's small, but quite ok for one person or a couple, and the interior is done with style and vision.

Polina was a perfect host - she communicated clearly and instantly and was always responsive if needed.

I would certainly recommend this studio apartment for Sofia trips.", "I had a great stay at Alex and Polina's studio. They were helpful and made my stay comfortable. I would definately stay here again if I ever return to Sofia.", "Best place to stay in Sofia!", "The apartment is best located in the very city center of Sofia and is very cozy. Paulina took good care of me :-)
Best wishes", "Nice apartment close to the city center. Flat is equiped with everything you need. Would stay there again =)", "Very quick response to my quest .Within a day locally .Warm welcome and professional caring.Sweet apartment and charming.", "We spent 4 nights at Natalie studio apartment and we were positively surprised how homie and cozy the flat is. We found the place quite, very tidy. It is exactly as shown on their webpage.
I personally met only Natalie, but Polina was always reachable in matter of minutes by msg, Viber, hence helpful from remote.
Before we got there, they send us a useful brochure with all practical infos to reach the place from airport, bus station, suggested local restaurants and such.
The location is very good, we never had to use public transportation and main spots are just around the corner.

", "This is the perfect place to stay in Sofia: cozy, central located apartment with a nice and caring owner Polina - couldn´t be better.", "Alex and Polina are awesome. They speak great english and are happy to accommodate you, show you around (if you ask) etc. I accidentally booked one night less than I thought and they helped me out anyway and made me feel very welcome. The apartment is as the photos. The area is really convenient. I felt the bed was comfortable. It felt safe enough, locked up well etc. I recommend, when in Sofia. Also I recommend the walking tour just around the corner to orient yourself. ", "Communication in Sofia could have been better, but then again if no reply means I do as I please, there it's really no reason to complain. ;-)

The flat is very nice and the location is fantastic, so I would book here any time. Five stars. 

Note that at the time of this writing, the pin on the map was wrong. If you arrive in your own, do verify to avoid a detour. ", "A great place in a top location.  I always enjoyed coming home to this apartment.  Hosts are really easy to deal with.", "Alex and Polina's place was great. A unique experience in a great central location.", "We had some lovely days in Sofia. The apartment is really cosy and well located in the centre of Sofia. Polina is a great host, she was always accessible via phone and helped us whenever we needed help. ", "Fantastic flat in a great area of Sofia. Clean and homely and Pollina was great to deal with.", "We loved our stay at this apartment, as it was so handy to everywhere we wanted to go in Sofia - which itself was a wonderful city to explore. The apartment is very close to the central shopping and tourist districts, and it is no problem to walk to most places.  We based ourselves in Sofia and made a day trip to Plovdiv (the bus station was within walking distance -for this but I wouldn't recommend it with bags.)  
The apartment is not large and is at the top of the stairs (with no lift), but was clean, modern and adequate - and perfectly met our needs. Polina's mum was most helpful. She welcomed us, arranged for our washing to be done, and even replaced a lost set of keys.
We could also walk to the market - and found wonderful eating places that were close by in that direction.
We would happily stay there again.  Thanks Polina and your mum.", "The apartment was clean, comfortable and cosy with lots of character. Polina responded quickly to any questions we had before and during our stay. All the basics you need to cook and eat are there, and Polina's mother very kindly did some laundry for us. The apartment is located within walking distance to most landmarks and we found it was a great base to explore Sofia. Highly recommended!", "this little cosy apartment is well equipped and has everything you need. the small balcony with its nice view over sofia is just perfect and we slept very good.
actually, i haven't met polina (her mother showed us everthing), but she seems to be a very kind person ;) - laid-back and uncomplicated.
definitly recommended. thanks a lot!", "Super cozy apartment with all the essentials to make your stay pleasant. Very nice location near everything. Polina was super fast to answer our email and very helpful. Strongly recommended. ", "Everything was super", "The flat was very nice and quiet, it looked exactly like it is described.
Just a few minute walk from the city-center. Perfect !", "Polina and her brother are very friendly host. They provided maps and guides for Sofia and helped us to find a car rental company for our trip in Bulgaria. It was really easy to communicate with Polina before and during our stay.
The appartment is very cute, clean and perfectly located in the center of Sofia.
