Die Gastgeber waren bei Bedarf immer sehr gut zu erreichen.", "Delizioso monolocale nel cuore di Sofia. Posizione perfetta per visitare il centro a piedi e godersi i numerosissimi e bellissimi locali, bar e ristoranti. Non abbiamo incontrato Ppolina di persona, ma ci ha dato tutte le informazioni e i consigli di cui avevamo bisogno pprima del nostro arrivo ed è stata molto flessibile negli orari di check-in e check-out.", "Nous sommes venus en Bulgarie pour un mariage à Sofia. L'appartement d'Alex et Polina a été parfait pour ce séjour de 2 semaines. Il est très charmant et situé plein centre dans une rue tranquille. Nous nous y sommes sentis très à l'aise. La seule remarque concerne les serviettes de toilettes  :  un jeu est insuffisant pour 15 jours en l'absence de machine à laver. Mais tout le reste était parfait et nous avons bien profité de notre séjour. Merci à Polina et Alex pour leur disponibilité et leur discrétion.8", "Ótima localização ", "Даже не знаю, что и добавить к выше сказанному... Всё соответствует описанию, место очень удачное (3 мин ходьбы до ст. м. Сердика и 6-7 - до Администрации Президента, Пл. Света Неделя и т.д.), центр, но достаточно тихо. Сама квартира уютная, на последнем, 4-ом этаже, мансарда. Есть всё.
Возможно, эта проблема была только у нас, но на карте, полученной с бронированием, местонахождение дома было указано неверно. Вам нужен будет перекресток улиц Цар Самуил и Тодор Александров, от него метров 15 в сторону ул. Александр Стамбопийский. Дом из одного подъезда, розового цвета, номер дома рядом с дверью, а не на стене. Звонка на двери нет, нужно будет звонить по указанным в бронировании телефонам. Да, ещё - Полина отлично разговаривает по-русски.", "Le logement n'est pas là où c'est indiqué mais à 500 mètres !
C'est bien pour 2 nuits mais je n'y resterais pas une semaine. Il y a tout ce qu'il faut et c'est assez tranquille.", "De studio ligt echt fantastisch in het centrum van Sofia. Daarnaast is het ook keurig onderhouden en schoon. Alex en Polina hebben we zelf niet ontmoet, maar ze zorgen er wel voor dat we netjes ontvangen werden. De studio is erg knus en gezellig ingericht, met een leuk klein balkon. Het keukenblok is wel wat aan de kleine kant, maar alles is aanwezig. Mochten we ooit weer eens in Sofia komen is deze studio zeker keuze nummer 1!", "Nous avons passé un très bon séjour à Sofia. L'appartement est bien placé, juste à coté de la station de metro Serdika, en plein centre, nous avons fait toutes les visites à pied.
Le marché couvert est juste à deux rues pour s'approvisionner.
L'appartement est très cosy, parfait pour un couple, il faut juste monter les escaliers.
Nous sommes enchantés de notre séjour, merci Paulina !!!", "Bon accueil de notre hôte. Appartement bien situé (proche du métro), propre, fonctionnel cependant l'insonorisation entre les appartements est mauvaise. Idéal pour un court séjour. ", "Le logement est bien équipé, très agréable et très bien situé proche du centre. Merci à Polina pour sa disponibilité et la flexibilité pour les heures d'arrivée et de départ! Je ne suis vraiment pas déçue super séjour", "Le logement est très agréable, il y a même le nécessaire pour se faire un thé ou un café. Il est très bien placé, proche du centre.
Nous avons rencontré Polina, très sympathique et serviable.", "Appartamentino centralissimo ma comunque silenzioso. Perfetto per vivere il centro di Sofia. Dotato di condizionatore che in estate risulta perfetto e necessario per il fatto che si tratta di un mansardato.
", "Комната милая и уютная, но крохотная :) В принципе есть все, что надо, но.. Кондей еле пашет, после душа надо шваброй поработать, время от времени сантехника издает громкий звук и я просыпался. Солнце в комнате до обеда. Ну и минус центра- слышно мотающиеся авто.. Из хозяев встречался только с Натальей- очень милая женщина, помогла с бесплатной парковкой, потому что отимел инцидент- мою машину эвакуировпли из-за парковки в "синей зоне" на улице :) Но расположение хорошее.", "Goede locatie dichtbij het centrum! Schoon en rustig gelegen. Alle apperatuur werkt (ook de airco). Zeker een aanrader. Daarbij kwam Polina zelfs de sleutel brengen in de restaurant waar wij aan het eten waren, leuke service. Als je twijfelt tussen dit appartement, zeker doen!", "Das Apartment ist sehr zentral gelegen, der Großteil der Sehenswürdigkeiten ist fußläufig gut zu erreichen. Ein kurzer Anruf bei Polina vor der Haustür und sofort kam ihre (Schwieger)Mutter, um uns zu begrüßen und uns die Wohnung zu zeigen. Das Apartment liegt im Dachgeschoss, so hat man einen wunderbaren Blick über die Dächer von Sofia. Alles war sauber und alles nötige wie Geschirr, Handtücher, Bettwäsche usw. war vorhanden. Allerdings war die eine Seite des Bettes kaputt, sodass es- sehr zum Leidwesen meines Mannes- schon beim Auflegen der Hand sehr laut knarzte. Das ist aber auch der einzige Kritikpunkt, den wir zu äußern haben, ansonsten haben wir den gesamten Aufenthalt sehr genossen.", "Ottimo rapporto qualità/prezzo. L'appartamento è molto carino e confortevole. La posizione in centro città consente di fruire di tutte le attrattive presenti in città. Lo consiglio a tutti.", "Localización muy céntrica, a pocos minutos del bulevard Vitosha. 
Para nosotros, además, fue un plus que Alexander hablara castellano! Nos dió bastante información y recomendaciones para movernos por su ciudad. El estudio pequeño pero justo para 2 personas; muy bien decorado; muy buena la señal de wifi. Tiene un balconcito (al que nos podemos asomar los fumadores...) Bien equipado (toallas, utensilios de cocina, aceite, café, azúcar...) Como peros, comentar los ruidos extraños de la cisterna del cuarto de baño, así como la dificultad en conseguir ducharse sin empapar medio cuarto (tendrían que ampliar la mampara). La mesita para comer es una barra americana que se queda un poco justa.Convendría también (no sé si esto corresponde al dueño o a Airbnb) que adjuntaran la dirección correcta (no corresponde con la del (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps, y la calle es discontinua, con lo cual el taxista tuvo que telefonear finalmente al propietario para averiguar la localización ) Y tened en cuenta, si lleváis maletas pesadas, que hay 4 pisos ! (aunque el chico fue muy amable y nos ayudó...) Parece que haya puesto muchas pegas, pero si resumo diría que tiene muy buena relación-calidad precio, y altamente recomendable!", "Уютная студия в центре города, милые хозяева, но поющие трубы водопровода будили нас среди ночи.", "Pour notre 1ère expérience avec cette formule d'hébergement et BNB, nous avons été ravis de l'aventure. Alexander et sa famille ont été à notre écoute et attentifs. L'appartement était vraiment bien, calme, très bien situé, et la photo du "Studio Natalie" sur le site bnb ne nous a pas déçue !
Merci Alexander pour ce bon séjour
Marie et Francis Philbert", "Хорошая чистая квартира со всем необходимым и очень удобным расположением.", "Очень хорошие впечатления от квартиры и от хозяев))). Спасибо большое!
", "Un apartamento precioso y situada en el mismo centro de la ciudad, absolutamente recomendable! No dejeis de hacer la visita guiada gratuita a pie  de la Oficina de turismo; merece mucho la pena para conocer la historia de Sofia.
Gracias Alexander!
"]

reviews:
["My stay with Nadia and Boris was by far one of the most pleasant experiences I've had. The location is absolute fantastic, not only it is 4 min walking from most of the significant places one would like to visit the city center but it is also very close to a great variate of different places to eat - fresh fruits/vegetables or supermarkets, fast food, restaurants. No matter if you prefer to prepare you food in the kitchen ( you won't miss anything if you are in the mood to spend some time next to the oven ) or just to try some Bulgarian or international cuisine - Greek, Turkish and Japaneses restaurants are very near. 
The apartment itself is perfect for one-two persons. The location although  central is very quite so you won't miss any sleep after long day of walking (the great mattress also  helps here :) ), plus the windows and the terrace are facing the inner yard so you can leave them open in the night without warring from the noise on the street. The interior was very modern and  in top condition. The shower and sink in the bathroom perfectly matched the design so you have one very spaces bathroom without any compromises in the amenities. The dishwasher and the oven programming (didn't used the last still noticed it) would be a great help to save time  if you are into preparing your own food, and the frig is with all the space one would need.    

Those are my reasons to recommend this place for anyone looking where to stay in Sofia.", "Great hosts, perfect location, highly recommended.", "Great location and very cozy place ", "The apartament is very modern, stylish and clean! Fully equiped with all amentities you need. The thing that we appreciated the most was the top location. It is located on a quiet street at the heart of the city, 2 minutes walk to the famous commercial street Graf Ignatiev and the street with the best bars and cafes I. Shishman. Also it is in walkable distance to all landmarks and big parks in the town. The check-in is flexible and the host is very kind and approachable. Highly recommend it!", "I am from Sofia, born & raised. I stayed in Nadia & Boris' place for a week to accommodate a friend visiting. Here are my top 4 reasons why next time when I need a place in Sofia I will book this place again:

1. This place is located perfectly. It cannot be located better, srsly. On one of the more quiet, greenest streets in the very center of Sofia - so good that the UK embassy and several others chose it for their location. 
2. Incredibly clean, everything is brand new, everything works. High-grade mattress, kitchenware, bath, etc. Much thought put into the design of the studio, feels incredibly cozy. 
3. Has everything you need: coffee machine (and coffee!), iron, ironing board, extra pillows, extra towels, literally anything I could think of - it was there. Even a pencil, once I needed to write something down :) 
4. The hosts were incredibly fast, punctual, warm, friendly, helpful, flexible, and... intelligent (which frankly helps in communication a lot). There is literally nothing I could think of that could be better/more to ask for.", "We had a great time at Nadia and Boris’ apartment! We stayed together with husband for a week. We found apartment stylish and fully equipped. Everything we need was available. Thanks to large windows it was bright and homy. The check-in and check-out were easy and flexible. The location of apartment was perfect, within walking distance to most important sight of Sofia. We had unforgettable vocation!) For sure we would stay here again when visiting Sofia.", "It is a beautiful flat, very well-located, stylish and elegant. I really enjoyed it! The check-in and check-out were easy and seamless. I certainly 100% recommend this place!", "The house of Nadia and Boris is exactly like in the picture! Every detail is in the right place! The apartment is small but functional, very bright thanks to the large windows (with curtains), the bed is very comfortable and the bathroom has a really spacious shower. It's closer to the stadium than it appears on the map and the location is strategic to reach the main points of the city. Everything was perfect!", "We found Nadia & Boris's place very stylish and well-equipped. There was plenty of space and it really felt like our home for the duration of our stay. Would stay again!!", "Great apartment with everything you need for a short or longer stay. Thank you!", "Lovely studio next to a nice park in the city center of Sofia. The appt looks nice and was really clean. We were welcomed by Nadia’s brother and he gave us some nice tips on where to go and what to see. Thanks  again for having us!", "Loved our stay at this apartment. Prefect location, great facilities and a super comfy bed. Highly recommend staying there when in Sofia.", "Not willing to repeat what all the other guests already wrote I can only confirm: it was a wonderful decision to make a trip to Sofia and even a better choice to stay at Nadia & Boris' place! We really enjoyed our stay!", "Boris and Nadia’s place was perfect for my 4 day stay in Sofia. Hosts checked me in and gave me local tips! Super nice couple! Communication was timely and excellent. Good location and within walking distance to most important sights in Sofia, shops and restaurants. The place was perfect, spacious, clean and had everything I needed for a comfortable stay. I would stay here again. 
Only minor thing was wifi can be super slow especially at night but not a big deal as I had a local SIM. 

And this is something that the hosts have no control over but to those who are travelling with a vehicle. Parking can be very challenging! It’s only street parking that you have to pay for (cheap) if you can find a spot (very challenging). Nadia was super kind to show me the closest private parking about 150 meters away from the house, however, it’s very expensive and the guy don’t speak a lick of english which was just as frustrating. 

Again, it’s not the hosts fault. It’s just something to keep in mind for travellers with vehicles.  

Thanks Nadia and Boris!", "We had a great stay. Very stylish and clean. Flexible check-in and out was very convenient and communication with hosts went smooth. Would definitely recommend this place!", "very good apartment, not far from the 
malls and every interesting point.", "Nadia and Boris' place is a real gem located in one of the coolest neighborhoods in sofia. My stay couldn't have been more satisfying.
Thanks", "We had a wonderful stay at Nadia and Boris' place! It is well situated, spacious, stylish and well equiped. We would definitely stay here again when visiting Sofia!", "One of the best Airbnb's I've stayed at. The studio is cozy, stylish and incredibly clean. We loved the small touches that made us feel at home. The hosts had even left an umbrella for us to use on a rainy day in Sofia! :) 
All of the main attractions are within a 
walking distance. The studio is situated in the heart of Sofia with plenty of trendy cafes and restaurants nearby. The metro station is approx 5 mins away.
The hosts were kind and incredibly helpful and accommodating. Definitely recommend!", "I had a great time at Nadia and Boris' place in Sofia! I stayed with my girlfriend in this very nice apartment within 10-15 mins walk to the centre. There are also lots of nice bars and taverns in this area too, and the University is only 10 mins walk away. It was especially nice being right next to the big park so I could go running every day.

The apartment was perfect, clean and Nadia and Boris were very responsive and quick. I highly recommend it to anyone visiting Sofia.", "Nice place in the center of Sofia! ", "Very clean and comfy apartment very close to the city center. The apartment has a high-quality equipment. Everything you need is available. Contact with Nadia and Boris was quick and easy. Petar waited for me at the check-in and I could also store my suitcases there after the check-out. I can recommend this accommodation. See you next time. ", "One of the best apartments we have stayed in. Beautiful design, practical and lots of amenities, great location, comfy. It's obvious that a lot of thought has been put into this place. We had a great time in Sofia and the apartment played a big role in that. And Petar was super friendly even though we were late. ", "Another great stay. Thanks for having me.", "Cool and bright apartment with perfect location.", "A beautiful studio in an excellent location, which is deceptively larger than what the photograph suggests. Sparkling clean with all the expected requirements (and the most comfortable bed), a rare find and I would strongly recommend it!", "Great stay, would stay again!", "Great, place. The location is just perfect, near the metro and all major points in the city. Boris & Nadia where both great and help us. ", "Beautiful apartment! Very clean with everything we needed! Great location, walking distance from restaurants and shops. Host was very easy and quick to communicate with. Loved our stay here ! ", "The location range in the listing may be misleading. The apartment is actually closer to Vasil Levski Stadium. Nadia and Boris sent detailed transportation options prior to my stay. My flight was delayed. Peter kindly checked me in around 11:30PM and helped me with my luggage (the apartment is on the 5th floor). Although the interior is very trendy, I was surprised to find food crumbs on the couch, couch pillow, and by the kitchen sink. I wasn't sure whether the cleaning person overlooked it or Peter had some late night snack while waiting for me (he had a beer in his hand when I arrived). I also saw more bugs than most accommodations I've stayed. Friendly hosts but diligent maintenance is needed to keep this new apartment long lasting.", "We stayed for 4 nights in this stylish and comfortable Airbnb. Located near the stadium - its easy to direct taxi drivers how to get home (and so cheap as it's so Central!). You are so close to the main area of the city and it's a lovely walk. Also very clean! Highly recommended!", "Good place to stay in Sofia. Comfortable , new refurbished and near to the centre. Nadia's brother was really kind , he wellcome us really late at night.
Highly recommended !!", "Really stylish apartment with great amenities, useful location for exploring areas of the city. Well equipped and clearly looked after. Easy communication with owners. Impressive!", "If you want to explore Sofia with your stay at walking distance from all good places, this is the place. Within 10 minutes you are in the center,  within 5 you are in a very nice park behing the stadium. Next to this the place itself is very stylish and clean. Nadia&Boris respond very fast for helpful tips!", "The place is just as it looks like in the photos. It's clean, bright, newly renovated, and has everything you need. The location is perfect, just a short walk to all the hipster shops, restaurants and bars, and at the same time very residential and quiet.", "Nadia and Boris are great, reliable and nice hosts. The location of the studio is amazing both from the airport and to the city. Basically you can reach the city center on foot in 15-20 minutes. The studio is very clean, stylish and new. Highly recommended for everyone. Well equipped, quiet and bright. Kitchen is perfect, lot of spaces. The bed was very comfortable. In one word: go for it! 
We also enjoyed Sofia, great city, lot of huge spaces and parks, public transport is excellent. People are very nice and hospital. Worth to see at least once in a lifetime. 
Thank you for the memories and the perfect service for Nadia and Boris!", "One of the best Airbnbs I've stayed in. Super stylish. Excellent location 7 mins walk from hip bars/restaurants. Max 20 mins walk to free tours meeting points. Rapid WiFi. 

Nadia's brother was waiting for me at the apartment. Ask for the buzzer number - my phone didn't work initially so couldn't call to say I was downstairs. Luckily taxi driver was kind and helped me out. 

Sofia is an amazing city and this apartment is awesome.", "Nadia's and Boris's apartment is a great base for exploring Sofia. It is centrally located and within walking distance to (e.g.) ul. Tsar Shishman where you can find excellent restaurants and nice boutiques. The apartment is very tastefully decorated and offers all mod cons. The bed is particularly comfy. We can only recommend staying there. We would certainly do so ourselves.", "The apartment was amazing. A lot of attention was paid to little details, it is very bright and furnished with brand new and modern looking furniture. Heating during the winter was amazing and we had no problems with the cold. The apartment is very clean and it has a spacious toilet which I really enjoyed. The location is wonderful, you are max 15. minutes away from some of the major attractions of the city, and there is a metro line just a few minutes away, making your daily commute even faster! 
Overall, it's an amazing apartment!", "Don’t be mislead by the old building, because the apartment of Nadia&Boris is very modern, stylish, all renovated with a beautiful new design. The flat is completely well-equipped and nothing is missing. The location is perfect, next to the all touristic points and close to the metro. 
Boris, Nadia and her brother Peter are very kind and very welcoming. We felt at home and we highly recommended the place!", "The two of us stayed at Nadia & Boris' place for a long weekend and everything was perfect. Check-in and check-out were super flexible, the reply time was extremely short, the location is perfect - walking distance to almost everywhere in the centre and just around the corner from a metro station. The apartment itself outclassed our expectations: Everything was brandnew (even windows and doors), the kitchen is incredibly well-equipped, the bathroom was super clean and beautiful and all in all, it is so tastefully furnished that we had no choice but to fall in love with it. Highly recommending this place!", "Das Appartement ist super schön und perfekt gelegen. Alles ist zu Fuß erreichbar und damit die optimale Ausgangslage um Sofia zu erkunden.   Jederzeit wieder gerne!", "Buen sitio para alojarse en Sofía. Condiciona bastante el hecho de no disponer de ascensor y tratarse de un cuarto piso. El apartamento es bonito, acogedor y provisto de todo lo necesario. ", "Das Apartment ist hübsch eingerichtet, super gelegen und passend für einen kurzen Aufenthalt. Optimal für die Leute, die eine klassische Ferienwohnung wünschen. Wer jedoch ein authentisches Sofia-Erlebnis sucht und bei jemanden privat "wohnen" möchte, sollte sich eine andere Unterkunft suchen.", "Appartement très moderne et très bien décoré. Conforme aux photos. Propreté impeccable.
Un peu excentré mais cela reste accessible à pieds. 
Nous avons été accueillies par le frère de Nadia, très poli malgré une communication en anglais difficile.
Logement vivement recommandé pour un séjour à Sofia !", "Le studio est moderne et tout équipé. Il s’agit d’un lieu calme qui se trouve à quelques pas du centre-ville. 
Nous remercions également Nadia et Boris pour leur accueil chaleureux et leur bienveillance. 
De plus, très bon rapport qualité/prix !  Fortement recommandé !"]

reviews:
["Great location, beautiful apartment, everything is clean, friendly host,... only remark on my account is the typical shower that is not separate, but it works fine and there's easy material to make everything dry again after taking a shower.", "Vera is a nice host and the apartment met the expectations, i wish all the apartments and hosts were like this in Sofia !!!", "Really enjoyed my stay. Would be happy to stay again.", "Great location, nice apartment, Vera is a fabulous host!!", "Spotlessly clean . Modern , comfortable accommodation . Within walking distance from city centre . Vera is quick to respond to messages and was there to welcome us when we first arrived even though it was quite late . Very quiet in the night ample of pillows towels and extra quilts in case it was chilly. Well worth the money a great host .", "Central, very clean and easy to travel to any part of Sofia. Vera is very friendly and helpfull host.", "Great value for money and superb location. Would stay here again.", "The apartment was really clean and nice! It is located in the middle of the Center, near the metro and a supermarket. The neighbourhood is quit and there are some great bars and restaurants nearby. The communication with Vera is very good, she offers great tips and advice if you want to know something. She replies quickly and is very helpful. We had a great stay.", "Vera's apartment is great overall - it has a great location, it is really clean and it was amazing for the price. Vera was really helpful and answered all of our questions and offered assistance with all matters for our stay. We'd definitely recommend this to our friends! ", "The apartment was wonderful, within walking distance from everything you could possibly need. Vera was kind and helpful after I accidentally made a mistake with the dates of our booking. Overall great apartment, great value for price and wonderful host. Would stay here again :-))", "Vera’s place was just delightful. Great location within walking distance (and I’m unfit), for a few tourist attractions, restaurants and night life. 

Not to mention the hospitality and patience of the host. Thank you once again Vera. 

Would definitely stay over again! ", "A perfect stay in Sofia! It truly is a great location, next to the main underground that has grocery stores, close to historical sites, and only minutes away from some amazing restaurants. On the street is a restaurant called Checkpoint Charly - which is also wonderful and recommendable. 

I was there for a week, and it may have been a bit too long for the city of Sofia itself, but coming back to a nice and clean apartment made it more enjoyable. ", "I would definetly recomend Vera's place! In the very center of Sofia,  good transport to any place you like,  metro to the airport very close to the apartment. Everything in a walking distance. Lots of shops,  restaurants. There is a very nice market 5 min walk. Bila grocery 5 min walk, pharmacy  at the corner. You can get your manicure  next door at the street Monuments,  University, National Library and lots more in 10 min walking distance.  The place is clean,  cosy and stylish.  Vera was nice and helpful. It worths  staying at her place.  Thank you  Vera. We'll  definitely meet  again! ", "We really enjoyed our stay at Vera's and would have been happy to stay longer. The apartment was very clean and roomy and also in a central location with plenty of local shops nearby. Vera was very accommodating and even waited around for us after check out to return an item we had forgotten. There was free parking on the road just outside the building due to some construction. Usually it is paid parking, but Vera provided us with printed directions to a nearby free parking lot. Would stay here again and recommend to others! Really good value!", "Great place at great location, highly recommended.", "Lots of consideration has gone into this place, very tasteful and smart interior design. Very relaxing.", "Централно местоположение и близо до метро. Апартаментът гледа към вътрешен двор така че не е шумен. Вера ни посрещна и настани, чек аут също беше лесен. Абсолютно достатъчен за 2ма възрастни апартамент.", "Super schönes Apartment im Herzen von Sofia, alles sehr gut auch zu Fuß zu erreichen und nur 5 Minuten bis zur U-Bahn und sehr Sauber. Sehr freundliche und schnelle Antworten. Definitiv gerne wieder!", "Die Wohnung ist sehr schön und geräumig. Gute Lage, alles zu Fuß erreichbar. Leider war die Straße aufgerissen und dadurch der Zugang zur Wohnung erschwert."]

reviews:
["Amazing place. Very comfortable and stylish. We felt the good vibes of the flat. Highly recommend. Good location and very clean:)", "Great location and beautiful apartment. Quick and friendly communication. I had somehow messed up my itinerary and thought my friend and I had booked another night, Diyana was very friendly and allowed us to book for another night at very late notice. We really enjoyed our stay here. The restaurant downstairs was great and offers lots of local specialities which was a bonus too.", "Very gorgeous and great location", "Great hosts. I would definitely  come back there.", "Great contact with the hosts and nicely designed apartment. Quite well located ! Definitely a choice next time we visit !", "Incredibly tasteful design of the interior , I am more than happy with my stay there. Hosts were nice and incredibly helpful .", "The Hosts
The hosts are extremely responsive and the communication with them was superb!
There was all the necessary amenities in the apartment, and the check-in and check-out was smooth and considerate from the hosts end by allowing us to rent an extra night, enter the flat earlier than the scheduled check-in time and exit one hour later than the scheduled time.

The Building
The building itself is kinda creepy with old-school elevators that had no doors in them which not the safest experience ever. Below the building is a 24/7 Kiosk which is nice on one end but draws drunks and unpleasant crowds in the evening time.

The Apartment
Very well designed apartment with a lot of storage space and great amenities with a huge 50 inch TV and 50mb Download/Upload Wifi that never crashed.
Very stiff bed that is not for everyone, my pregnant wife could not sleep on it at all which resulted in us sleeping on the couch which was nice and comfortable.
The cleanliness of the place could be improved.

The Area
15 minutes walk from Kaufland and Sofia Mall (Which is not so great imho). 30 minutes walk from Vitosha and other main points of interest.", "I would definitely recommend Dimitar and Diyana's place. It is very stylish and comfortable, close to the city centre and public transport. I was delighted by the incredible accuracy of the hosts and their welcoming behaviour. I had a great stay !", "Great apartment, everything you need to relax!", "Super fijn appartement. Ruime vertrekken en alles wat je nodig hebt is aanwezig. Communicatie is erg goed. De stad is met de metro (2stops) erg goed bereikbaar.  Echt een aanbeveling om naartoe te gaan.", "Angefangen bei den superschnellen Antworten und der unkomplizierten Kommunikation bis hin zu einer tollen, top gepflegten und sehr stilvoll eingerichteten Unterkunft, hatten wir ein paar sehr schöne Tage in Sofia. Man darf sich anfangs nicht von den Plattenbauten abschrecken lassen in denen das Appartement liegt und wenn man Laufmüde ist, einfach mal die Bahn oder ein Taxi nehmen. Doch auch zu Fuß ist die Innenstadt gut erreichbar. Alles was man braucht findet man in direkter Umgebung und auch vor Ort hört der Hilfsbereitschaft der netten Vermieter nicht auf. Alles in allem war es sehr schön und wir haben uns sehr willkommen gefühlt."]
topics: ['recommend highly place', 'great downstairs lot', 'gorgeous great location', 'host great there', 'next time choice', 'tasteful stay there', 'building could nice', 'great stay behaviour', 'need great apartment', 'te naartoe een', 'und sehr der']

reviews:
["Great apartment, amazing view.", "Outstanding place, the roof terrace wonderful at any time of the day or year.  The owner has spent a lot of time making the apartment special, it is clearly their home and not just a rental property, the views are amazing and I don't think I would want to stay anywhere else in Sofia.  Good location as well, central without being touristy, good access to public transport, small market nearby, also local shops and a very nice restaurant in the next block along.", "Great place and would highly recommend - great communications and directions - Parking right out the flat - Flat is retro/ stylish and super cool- great views from the roof top", "One of my favorite Airbnb places ever. Very cool apartment, incredible views, modern, projection screen, jacuzzi and outdoor shower!", "Fantastic top floor penthouse apartment complete with jacuzzi. All the amenities you could want. A great place to base yourself in Sofia. Parking available in communal car park outside. Taxis are cheap so I would recommend using taxis to get to and from the town centre. Highly recommended place to stay!", "Wonderful views - especially from the rooftop with a little glass of wine. Easy walking distance of Sofia centre. Wonderful place to spend a long weekend. Thanks Fox", "We had a great stay at Fox’s apartment. 
Geoffrey who was handling the check in and check out is a lovely guy, super nice and helpful, who gave us some tips and some great insights about Sofia and Bulgaria in a general way.
The flat is a bit outside the city but as the weather was nice and we love walking we mostly walked to the city center, it is also a great way to see the real face of the city outside of the touristic area. The jacuzzi and the rooftop were great to relax after long day walking across the city. 
One minor thing is that the flat does not have curtains so we were awake quite early in the morning which was a bit exhausting. Except for this everything was great!", "Super nice apartment and extra ordinary clean!", "Fox is a great host. The communication was friendly and very helpful. Beatiful, stylish and clean apartament with wonderful view from the rooftop!☺The Apartment is located in the heart of Sofia. I highly recommended! ☺", "You can expect to have a brilliant stay here. Especially if the tips I gave to Fox are also taken into account. Taxi's are cheap, we did literally everything with a cab. 

The appartment is very nice and properly cleaned, the jacuzzi is a treat. You can open the window, step out of the Jacuzzi, take your drink and shower-off on the rooftop. It's awesome.", "Great value for money. Amazing rooftop and view. Not super central but the center (Vitosha etc.) quick to reach with Metro or the cheap and abundant cabs.", "Very helpful people, fun apartment with great views of the city", "very optimistic atmosphere!", "This was our best airbnb so far! The place is amazing, the views indescribable and the jakuzzi the best way to finish our holidays. The host would also help us very quickly when we forgot our keys in the apartment. Highly recommendable! ", "Amazing view from the rooftop!", "The apartment is exactly as described. A cool inner city place that has amazing views and rooms that can take advantage of the top floor apartment. Fox was easy to contact and I was given great advice about the area, where to go, what to see that I would not have known about, and how to get around. 
The place is set up for the young and young at heart.", "I'm working remotely for several companies and using the rooftop as my temporary office was beyond pleasant. The Sun-screen, the outdoor-shower, strong WiFi and the view made for inspiring days, and the proximity to the center for easy walks right after and some going out for drinks. Ely was super friendly and knowledgable, providing a very warm welcome and check-in. I'll definitely book again.", "I'm from Sofia myself, so I knew all about the neighborhood already before checking in. It's quite central yet calm, perfect spot. The view is stunning and so is the bedroom and living-room. It's a perfect place for a little couple-retreat, especially because of the jacuzzi-tub.", "The view on the mountains from the rooftop was just wonderful, and so was letting the day end in the jacuzzi while watching a movie on the projector. The place was very close to the centre also, making it super easy to get to all the attractions. Pricewise it is an absolute steal. Can't recommend it enough!", "Мартин е изключително приятен и гостоприемен домакин със страхотен апартамент, перфектен за събиране с приятели на покрива, който е обзавел за лятото след последния път, когато бях там. Джакузито с изглед към Витоша е чудесно за релаксиране. Близко е до метро и е само на 10 мин с такси от центъра. Препоръчвам го на всеки. Мерси за всичко, Мартин. До скоро.", "Vi havde et dejligt ophold i Fox's lejlighed, alt i alt levede det op til vores forventninger. Området som lejligheden ligger i er dog ikke så spændende, men det er hurtigt at komme ind til byen med taxa, eller metro.", "Super hôte ! toujours dispo pour partager les bon plans ! Appartement très sympa, quelques originalités (super Nintendo, Playstation, jacuzzi et surtout le rooftop superbe !) mais tout n'es pas fonctionnel, quelques petits points noirs, des petits efforts rendrait l'appartement incontournable !", "Sehr schöne Unterkunft mit freundlichem und hilfreichen Vermieter, großartige Aussicht auf der Dachterrasse. Ich hatte eine tolle Zeit in dieser Unterkunft und würde gerne wieder in dieser Unterkunft übernachten.", "Die Wohnung ist farbenfroh gestrichen und macht richtig gute Urlaubslaune. Die Aussicht oben vom Dach des Gebäudes ist ein Traum und das Schlafzimmer sehr gemütlich. Die Kommunikation mit Fox und Ely lief glatt und sehr freundlich ab, ich würde definitiv nochmal buchen!"]

reviews:
["Clean and spacious place, super welcoming host. A bit noisy at nights due to traffic on the nearby street, but overall a positive experience.", "We are a video and film production company based in Sofia, Bulgaria and needed an apartment to shoot a short movie. We found Victor's place contacted him and quickly arranged the details. He was very friendly. The apartment was great. Clean, stylish and in an awesome location. Everything went perfect on the shooting day and we are very happy with the overall look of our shots. Thanks man!", "Victor's place was very modern, clean and with great interior. There was everything that we needed during our stay! The apartment looks exactly as shown in the photos!", "Victor is a great host!  The place is awesome, central, really spacious and clean! You have everything you need in the apartment it feels like home! Totally recommend! Next time I visit I stay at Victors place again! Thank you for the amazing accomodation!", "Amazing cozy place! We had great time and we will come back again!  ", "clean and quiet space. nice touches, made it feel like home. would stay again. thank you.", "It’s a lovely apartment with 5 stars! Close to the centre, but in a lovely street with lot of green. If we will go again to Sofia I am sure that apartment will be our place again.", "This place is really big, spacious, stylish and clean as seen in the photos. We love the apartment very much and really enjoyed our stay. Although do note that it’s a little bit far from the city center, 30 mins walk or accessible by public transportation. We booked it without realizing the distance from the city because we really like how the place look, but indeed it’s very comfortable and we enjoyed the stay very much. We had some trouble finding our way from the Sofia Central station however we managed to find our way there. Once you know the local transportation system it is not that difficult. 

Also do note that the area is quite dark and quiet at night, the stairway is not lit at all. We had to use the light on our phone to find our way up at night. If you are tall you have to watch your head because the stairs are quite low, and because it’s so dark you can easily bump your head.", "Wonderful place and very good location", "Very clean and beautiful apartment.
It have everything you need.
Easy access to heart of Sofia.
The host is very helpful to.
Great stay!", "We had a very nice stay in Sofia!
Thanks Borislav  to beeing our host", "The apartment was very spacious. Are only point of criticism might be the bathroom, as it is quite small and nearly everything gets wet when you take a shower. However, communication was fast and precize and self check-in went very smooth. We would definitely recommend this place, as it is great value for your money.", "Great location, close to everything needed! The appartment is spacious and cozy! We enjoyed our stay there a lot! ", "Apartment is situated on the fourth floor and has poor lighting in some areas if arriving at night or using the stairs in the evening. Despite this the apartment is spot on and has everything you would need, good choice of TV channels, two separate areas for chilling, the lounge and the diner. The use of the washing machine is great especially because it has symbols on the right programme to wash certain items. Good balcony to hang out clothes or just chill, but not the best view and a nice airy feel to the apartment overall. There are good amenities within walking distance such as chemist supermarket and so on and a regular tram and bus system. Walking to the university took me 18 minutes and was ok.
I loved the space offered and look forward to Borislav offering me a discount when I return again....soon!", "Very good experience at Victor's place. Clean, cosy and with functional settings. ", "The host canceled this reservation 43 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.", "The apartament is located in old tenement house, but the apartament itself is very lovely and cosy. ", "It was a clean, quiet and convenient place for me to work.  Super comfortable, great neighborhood and most importantly, good internet connection.   Thanks Victor for being a great host.  Much appreciated!", "Great apartment.", "Victor's place was outstanding, in terms of both style and value. The place was clean, bright, modern, comfortable and full of light from the terrace windows. It has everything in it you could possibly need. The one thing to note is it's a little away from the centre, but this really doesn't matter because (1) you can get a bus/tram to the centre in about ten mins, (2) you can also walk it in half hour, and (3) the area around the apartment has everything you need - shops, parks, pretty neighbourhoods. Sofia is well worth an explore - and I'd love to go again. if I did, I'd certainly want to stay at Victor's apartment again!", "We couldn't believe that the apartment was that beautiful. Victor was very helpful and responsive on our needs. Great, everything is as pretty as it looks on the pictures. Keep up Victor!! Totally would visit.", "Clean, just like the picture.", "Great place recommended!!!", "Extremely helpful with any questions and always went above and beyond. We enjoyed every moment in the apartment and it had everything you need!", "Victor’s place was gorgeous! If you haven’t been to been to an ex-Soviet city before you might be a bit surprised at the buildings exterior and hallway at the start but once you open the door to Victor’s place you’ll realise you’ve stumbled on a hidden paradise! The area felt really safe and its in easy walking distance of the city.
Victor’s hospitality was fantastic, really responsive and always able to help with any questions on the flat or the area.
Comfy beds, warm and a great shower too!", "I completely recommend Victor’s place. Not only was he a great host, his apartment was lovely.", "The place was nice and the price is ok also. The host was always available and ready to help.", "Victor is a great host and the apartment is super nice. It is just 15 min walking to the center, it is comfortable and very spacious. Everything you need is there! I totally recommend it!", "Very nice and cozy apartment (compared to the surroundings, it was luxurious). Otherwise, very close to the center.", "It was really nice staying in Victor's place!", "Amazung host and chic apt", "Victor was a wonderful host who made us feel at home for Christmas. Lovely apartment, it was very well equipped with lots of information on what to see in Sofia. Very well located, with supermarkets and transport nearby. Overall positive experience and would definitely recommend.", "Very nice flat. Very clean and good located.", "We really enjoyed our stay in Victor's apartment. He was super helpful and kind. He gave us suggestions for local places and helped us book a taxi. The flat was clean and homely, but tidy and stylish too. The bed was very comfortable. The block entrance is a bit odd but there are good places nearby; we recommend Halbite Pub, Bulgaran restaurant and Kanaal bar.", "Nice apartment, new furniture, and stylish.  Loved it.  

Difficult to find a parking at night", "Victor’s apartment is fantastic! We were sad we were only staying there for one evening. Victor met us at the apartment and showed us everything - he called a cab to take us to the airport and recommended great places that were located close to the apartment. There is great art and photography in the apartment and there is everything you would need to cook a meal! Victor has thought of everything for this apartment and he is so friendly and helpful. Thank you, Victor! We’ll be back!", "Victor place is really great very near city center. Apartment is nicely decorated with all new equipment, bathroom is a bit small but it's ok. Communication was fast and good and Victor is always ready  to help. I would recommend this place to everyone. Thanks Victor.", "Victos very attentivethe and the apartment is very nice.", "Victor’s place is a beautiful and tidy home. He provides his guest with everything they need. If you have a question, don’t hesistate to ask, Victor is happy to help you! We really recommend you stay here if you’re planning to visit Sofia. Thank you Victor!", "A+++ Lovely home, a charming Host and an absolute Bargain -  win, win, win!

Viktor was an EXCELLENT host! Helpful, kind, really went out of his way to answer all my millions of silly questions (before and during my stay) and even called us a cab and waited with us until it came on the way home!  

The apartment is lovely;  clean, spacious, stylish and well presented. It is close enough to the city to get to all the main attractions within a 5-minute cab ride and is a safe and scenic walk back if you are so inclined. He was a genuinely nice person and seemed really interested in making sure we had a fun time in Sofia, which we most certainly did. I would not hesitate to recommend both him and his apartment to anyone visiting the area, as it is a great place to stay, provided by a lovely host. Be sure to check out the guestbook on the coffee table for tips and advice from (us and) all the happy visitors to the apartment and don't forget to admire all the great photos on the wall.

Thanks Viktor!! :)", "Very nice!", "This is the ideal apartment for a city visit & Victor is a great host. The apartment is exactly as described/pictured. All the conveniences were there like hairdryer , coffee machine, good wifi. It has a great balcony for the sunny daytime and was really cosy & warm in the cold November nights. We were able to walk everywhere in the city from the apartment. Victor was a great host, he met us on arrival & was able to answer all questions we had & he arranged a taxi to take us to the airport on departure. We would definitely stay again!", "Great place to stay. Really cosy and nice decorated. The location is very central and offers many places and pubs for visiting. Victor was very helpful and cheerful. Thanks to his hospitality and positive attitude the stay was even better.", "The flat is really clean and bright with all necessary things and gadgets for nowadays travelers. The neighborhood is safe and friendly in walking distance from the city centre. I can sincerely recommend this accommodation based on very pleasant personal experience. The host is also nice guy, helpful in every sense plus very quick response on all questions/queries.", "Victor is a great host with a lovely apartment. The apartment is located approximately 20minutes walk from the centre. 

Not sure if it says on the description but the apartment is situated on the 4th floor so be ready to climb 8flight of stairs which wasn't a problem for us as we love walking and hiking but might be an issue for someone with breathing difficulty or bad back or knee.

Even though the building itself looks a little dated and dodgy from outside the apartment is very modern and clean and Victor had done a good job renovating the place. We felt safe and comfortable throughout our stay. 

Victor communicated well and as we were checking in late at night, he send detailed description with pictures on how to locate the keys and check in. He also kindly arranged a cab for us when we checked out, allowed us to stay extra couple of hours and also store our luggage as our flight was after 8pm.

All in all a great experience and we would recommend this place to all travelers to Sofia.

Kind regards
Surya & Iulia :)", "Victor's apartment is the best! it has everything you can ask for and it is perfectly clean and beautiful! We felt like it was our home, thanks. Also, we really liked the neighbourhood, quiet and with everythingyou need. Finally, thanks Victor for answering all our questions and doubts!", "Victor's place is clean, well supplied, stylish and well located. The shower is in the toilet which I've never experienced before, but it was absolutely fine. The tram to the outskirts of town is around the corner, or else it's about a 30 minute walk into the city centre. The supermarket is on the doorstep, as are bus and taxi connections. It's a nice little area with various shops. 

We opted to walk from Sofia University to Victor's house. Almost 45mins to an hour later we realised we should have just got the 15 minute taxi from the airport! Regardless, Victor was there to meet us outside and welcome us in which was seriously appreciated; we were drained! He gave us great tips and advice, and was easily contactable throughout. We loved Sofia and really enjoyed our stay, short & sweet as it was (2 nights).", "A very clean and stylish apartment. We arrived late at night an Victor explained clearly how to arrive and check in to the accommodation.
It had all the amenities we needed for a 3 night stay, good for accessing other areas. 
It was cosy & comfortable, and quiet - we slept well.", "Victor's apartment is beautiful and very cozy.I really enjoyed my stay there. Victor is a superhost. He was very friendly and even picked me from the airport. I highly recommend his place.", "Victor’s place was perfect. We were travelling to Sofia for a long weekend. Short taxi journey the airport, and excellent self check-in instructions as we arrived at 0200. 

Apartment clean and spacious, with everything you would expect. If you are tall or large in size, it may be a squeeze in the shower but it was perfect for me. 

Great place. Thank you Victor!", "Victor was available all time we needed him, he offered a lot of information from the area and also the apartment was exactly as the pictures showed. We had all we needed and a small shop close to the apartment and a 24h supermarket close to us too. We could go by walking to see all monuments and  we didn't need the public transport to go anywhere. we will repeat with viftor if we go back to sofia for sure!!", "A very comfortable apartment with all necessary amenities and more than enough space for our family (we stayed for 5 nights - 2 adults & 2 kids). We were able to walk to all of the sights, landmarks, parks etc. that we visited within 10 - 30 minutes. Within 5 minutes (most are only 1-2 minutes) you also have a big supermarket as well as smaller grocery stores, cafes, fruit & veg shops and restaurants/cafes.

Victor was an excellent host and a really nice guy. His level of contactability and fast responses were impeccable both before and during our stay. He even came out at around 10pm one evening to reset a router box that was external to the apartment so that we could have internet ... above and beyond our expectations.", "Victor's apartment is clean, well equipped, modern and well located. The apartment has a lovely sunny little balcony to enjoy an espresso from his coffee machine and the kitchen is really well equipped for self catering. Victor can also recommend some places nearby to eat and drink. There is a supermarket and pharmacy nearby. We could walk to the centre of Sofia from the apartment too. It is very spacious in the living area, and decorated nicely. The shower pressure is good and the bed is comfortable. The wifi worked really well throughout the apartment. Check in was super easy, and Victor was waiting patiently when we were a bit late after our taxi got lost! The apartment literally has everything and we would not hesitate in staying there again! It is somewhere you want to stay for more than a couple of days so you can really enjoy the city and the homeliness of the apartment.", "Perfect stay for us at Victor's place, the apartment is super nice and comfy and only a 20 minutes walk from downtown Sofia. As well Victor was super kind and easy to communicate with.", "Lovely guy, very friendly and helpful!", "He is a really nice host, the communication before arriving was perfect and the apartment is really comfortable and big.", "Great place to stay when you're in Sofia!  Clean, comfy and well decorated. And Victor is so friendly!", "We stayed at victor's apartment 3 night.
The location of the apartment was great! (Although it was hard to get a taxi to get there, because most of the drivers didn't know the street).
The apartment was clean and organized, very specious and cozy.
Victor is a great host! He replies very quickly and he has great recommendations for restaurants in the area.", "Victor's flat is a wonderful Airbnb property for exploring Sofia. It is beautifully furnished and well equipped with everything you might need, including a TV! It is close to a Billa supermarket for self-catering, and is about a 25 minute walk from central town. Plenty of buses go nearby although the transport system in Sofia can be quite difficult to navigate for English speakers! 

Self check-in is available and Victor was very accommodating about our late arrival by communicating plenty with us in advance. The wet-room style shower was a new concept for us but we soon got used to it :) I would definitely recommend Victor as a host and this flat to stay in if coming to Sofia. Thank-you!", "We spend just one night in the house of victor but that was perfect !  The appartment is beautifull", "Victor's apartment was lovely! Really clean and tidy and he had thought of basically everything to make it very comfortable. He met us when we arrived and took time to explain things to us and to help us with arrangements for our stay in Sofia. Really kind and thoughtful. The decor was very attractive and made it feel homely. Good location and easy to find. Definitely recommended!! Hopefully we will be back :)", "The apartment is located in a charming neighborhood, located close to the city center. The tasteful interior makes it a very enjoyable place to stay. Victor was a very communicative and helpful host. I recommend him to anyone travelling to Sofia!", "The flat is so beautiful, and really close to everything we wanted to see. Victor is a good host, and made sure everything was right for us. He responded quickly to messages and gave recommendations for sight seeing.", "Victor was really helpful and nice, in the house there was everything we needed, he gave us a lot of info about place to go and how, and he worried about us! A really nice person!!", "Victor is very good host. He gives many informations about good spots, good things to do and explain how to do them. The flat is very very nice, near to the center (which is at 10 minutes away). We had a pleasant stat at the Victor's place. We recommend ! ;)", "It's a very nice apartment. You've got everything you need and Victor is very kind, he also helps you with all your questions. The location is okay; shop is nearby and you can easily take a taxi for places more far away", "Very cute apartment, in a nice area of Sofia away from the central touristy hubbub. A great biergarten down the street and a short cab ride to the center or medium walk to the metro stop. Victor had great communication, and the place was clean and stocked. Would recommend! ", "We would highly recommend to stay here if you visit Sofia. The appartment is very clean and tidy in a great location!

The local area has a good selection of restaurants and bars and the main city centre is a short and easy walk away. 

Communication before our visit and during our stay was excellent with Victor giving us information of where to go and what to see. Check in was also very easy and Victor meet us at the appartment to give us the keys and some more tips about the local area. 

A brilliant visit in a brilliant appartment! ", "The apartment had everything we needed (and then some). Victor was a friendly and helpful host, eveything went fine.", "Victor has taken a special care to make his apartment comfortable and to prepare a pleasant stay for his guests. He was very prompt in his communication, he welcomed me very well and provided excellent information about the area and all I needed.  I have very much enjoyed my stay at Victor's place. The only consideration is that there is no elevator in the building, and the apartment is on the fourth floor - but there was no problem for me, as I did not carry much luggage.  I would be glad to return to Victor's place.
Kalin", "The appartement was clean, spacious and good-looking. We enjoyed the balcony and it was quiet but still just a ten-minute walk from the center og Sofia. 

Victor was very nice and helpful! I would absoloutley recommend this place. 



", "I have used airbnb for a good couple of years now and know there some obvious mistakes that certain apartments can make. Victors made none of them. It was a delight - clean, bright and a short walk from the centre of town. Our flight from the UK was delayed and we ended up arriving in sofia at around 1am. Victor not only stayed awake but was also really easy to contact and even met us off the taxi. The area is really residential and chilled. There is a cafe down the road called HleBar that does the most fantastic breakfast treats. If you use airbnb to meet someone lovely, live as the locals do and get great value for money, then this is your place! ", "We used this apartment for a 2 nights stay over at Sofia during our train trip on the Balkans. It was ideal and can only say good things from both the owners and the place. Great experience. Very friendly and thoughtful Host with good knowledge of the area and excellent communication. The apartment is clean, safe, welcoming, modern with charming characters and easy to access with public transportation from the train station or from town centre. Most tourist attractions and good restaurants at the centre can be also reached by foot (15-20 min walk). Good general store and restaurant within 5 min. ", "I had a lovely time staying at victor's apartment, it had all amenities, is a very good space to hang / chill out & was close to the centre of Sofia.

I didn't spend too much time in the area but there was a big supermarket 'Billa' around the corner, very handy for stocking the fridge :)

I would definitely stay here again if I went to sofia, both for the location & helpfulness of victor who was an excellent host :)", "Our stay at the apartment was lovely and Victor is a very friendly and helpful host. The communication was very good and we got all the information for our stay we needed.
The flat itself is well-equipped and had everything we needed. The balcony is a cute place to use for breakfast or dinner and the kitchen is kept clean and well-organised so it's nice to cook there as well. The flat is located near some shops/supermarkets, bars and public transportation but it isn't noisy.
I definitely recommend the place and Victor as a host and again, very nice to meet you and thanks for the great stay! :)", "The Appartement was amazing. Victor is a great host. Communications were easy and frendly. We enjoyed our stay very much. The Appartement is good situated. ", "I wouldn't hesitate in recommending this apartment for a weekend away. Victor was always on hand to help and even met us in the early hours of the morning as our flight was a late one. The apartment was spacious, clean and comfortable. Hopefully we will visit again in the future ", "We enjoyed our stay at Victor's place. It is a lovely apartment close to Sophia's city centre. We really liked the balcony, where you start and end the day. We definitely can recommend staying there! ", "Clean place. It is also new & renovated, however the building is oldish. It is walkable to the center. Host, Victor is kind.", "Victor was a perfect host,really nice and helpful. He gave us all information and advice about the city. His apartment is clean and super comfortable,we felt like at home. He used to live there therefore it is fully furnished,you can cook and even more, coffee machine is available so you can drink  tasty coffee every morning :) Highly recommended!", "Victor's apartment was nice and clean with a pretty balcony area to enjoy sunshine during the day! Air conditioning and quality coffee available in the apartment as well. Great value overall. The location is close to Sofia city center, within walking distance. 

Victor was a kind host who was on time during check in and out, he patiently explained things to do and see in the area. We had a very pleasant stay in Sofia, highly recommended!", "The best apartment that I've saw in Sofia. Grazie Victor. Recommended", "I know Victor very well now, I think we became friends, it was very easy because when we met, he spent two hours welcoming me, showing me the apartment, spreading maps for Sofia and Bulgaria, telling me where to go and what do, then we talked about so many other things. I need plenty of words to describe victor, being brief is not fair to him. pleasant, beautiful smile,  genuinely friendly,  very helpful, polite from here to Mars. In short you want Victor to be your host.

Victor responds immediately by text, viber,  email and phone. He waited for me to arrive at the street corner with a great smile.

I was his first AirBnB guest. The apartment looks exactly like the pictures, but the pictures don't show how well the place is equipped. Everything u need in a kitchen, cooking, cleaning, washing, drying, ironing, and Victor left me plenty of amenities,  including great coffee. Great warm water from a heater probably 50 litres big, air condition and a heater, which i never used. The apartment is very stylish, and looks and feels brand new. The bed easily fits a couple, but there are also two sofabeds in the living room. The place is spacious for a couple. The living room has lovely pictures by Victor's talented brother and a beautiful painting by a very talented mother. One of the best features in the apartment is the small balcony in the livingroom

The place is on the fourth floor, wide easy stairs. A safe quiet great neighborhood, shops and a bar around the corner. The tram that takes you to city center is a one minute walk, also 3 bus stops just as close. I walked from the place to the university metro station that brings you from the airport in 12 minutes. I walked to town everyday in 20 min. The farthest corner of Sofia is 40 minutes away with plenty to see.

P.S. the public transport of Sofia is NOT on (Hidden by Airbnb) maps, BUT there is an app called easy way public transport" will help greatly.

I recommend Victor and his place a hundred times in writing.
.", "Het appartement is net zoals op de foto's, modern en ruim! Alles was ook heel proper! We mochten van Borislavs ook later uitchecken omdat onze vlucht pas in de namiddag was! Deze airbnb is zeker een aanrader!", "Appartement très confortable, cosy, bien équipé et calme. Hôte très accueillant et arrangeant. Appart à 30 min à pied du centre (possible même avec des enfants de 9 et 12 ans). Aéroport à 12 min en taxi (11 lev).  Nous recommandons vraiment.", "Το σπίτι ήταν αρκετά καλό για τα δεδομένα της πόλης.
Καθαρό μπορώ να πω όμως έλειπαν από το σπίτι σημαντικά πράγματα όπως μικρά τρόφιμα-σνακ.
Τα σακουλακια τροφίμων δε μπορούσα να τα πλησιάσω γιατί ήταν ανοιχτά. Πιστεύω να διορθωθεί για τους επόμενους τουλάχιστον! Κατά τα άλλα ο Victor, ευγενικός πρόθυμος, και κατατοπιστικός! 
Προτείνω!", "Het appartement van Victor was heerlijk voor onze trip naar Sofia. Schoon, fijn ingericht, van alle gemakken voorzien, gelegen in een leuke buurt, centrum dichtbij. Communicatie met Victor verliep prettig, hij reageert heel snel. Flexibele check-in. Aanrader!!", "Victor est un super hôte tres disponible et très attentif ! Son appartement est super et très agréable. Nous y avons passé un super moment avec mes amies !", "Super Wohnung in Wohngebiet, Nähe Straßenbahn, Supermarkt, Restaurants .... Schöner Balkon. Das Bad ist etwas eng, Dusche ohne Abgrenzung neben Toilette.", "Die Kommunikation war am Anfang etwas schleppend, aber verbesserte sich schnell. Unser spätes Check In war durch den Safe an der Wohnungstür und genaue Angaben sehr einfach. Die Wohnung ist zentral gelegen, schön eingerichtet und sauber. Zum kochen steht alles zur Verfügung. Leider ist das Bad so klein, dass beim duschen alles nass wird. Man duscht quasi „mit“ der Toilette. Victor war sehr hilfsbereit und hat immer Unterstützung angeboten.", "Victor is een heel behulpzame man en een man van zijn woord.
Het appartement beantwoordt aan de foto’s. Minpunt was een onaangename geur vanuit het toilet.", "Todo estupendo. Piso moderno y bien ubicado, con óptimas condiciones. El dueño ofrece todas las posibilidades y ha estado muy atento por nuestra comodidad.", "房子宽敞明亮设施齐全暖气也很足,楼下就是超市和公交车站非常方便,victor人非常热情给我们了很多游玩信息推荐入住", "Todo fue excelente, El piso de Victor es genial está muy bien decorado y bastante moderno! La calefacción está super bien, a pesar del clima fuera en el piso estaba muy a gusto la temperatura.", "Apartamento muy céntrico, en condiciones óptimas y muy cómodo. El dueño ofrece todas las facilidades. Lo mejor para llegar a él desde el aeropuerto es coger el metro hasta la Universidad, que solo dista a 10 minutos caminando del piso.
La habitación es genial y la cocina y el salón también. Hay calefacción y aire acondicionado. Una muy buena opción y a un muy buen precio!", "집은 매우 깨끗하였고 필요한 모든 시설이 준비되어 있었습니다.호스트는 공항까지 갈 콜택시를 직접 예약해줄 정보로 친절하고 소피아에 필요한 모든 정보를 알려주었습니다. 깨끗하고 편리한 집을 원한다면 이 곳을 추천합니다.", "Wat kan ik zeggen? Het appartement ziet er net zo uit als op de foto's. Geen verrassingen. Heerlijk balkonnetje voor een koud drankje in de zon, mooie foto's en schilderijen aan de muur, complete inrichting van de keuken, heerlijke douche en leuke lokatie. De winkeltjes (zuivelwinkeltje, slijterij, kleine supermarkt) in de buurt hebben alles wat je nodig hebt en anders zijn er wat grotere winkels op loopafstand. Tram en bus in de buurt (voor planning hiervan installeer de app Eway, veel gebruik van gemaakt), maar het centrum is op loopafstand, dus vaak heb je het OV niet nodig. De Biergarten om de hoek is een leuke plek voor een hapje en drankje als je niet ver weg wil gaan.
Victor en zijn broer Boris waren erg behulpzaam en makkelijk te bereiken mocht het nodig zijn. Victor heeft voor de dag van vertrek een taxi naar het vliegveld voor ons geregeld. Heel fijn, want dat lukte ons niet telefonisch in verband met de taal. 
Al met al een aanrader!", "Apartamento muy bonito y muy limpio. Se puede llegar andando al centro en 15-20 min.", "El lugar es espacioso tiene todo lo necesario para sentirse cómodo está bien ubicado y Viktor está siempre atento a los mensajes y las necesidades especialmente porque el idioma no es familiar para mí el estuvo pendiente de los movimientos del aeropuerto con taxi seguro ida y regreso. Muy recomendable lugar volvería encantada", "*Parfait pour un week-end en amoureux. L'appartement est juste à côté d'un bar/restaurant très chouette et d'un supermarché. Une dizaine de minutes à pied du centre-ville. L'appartement est comme sur les photos et Victor est très sympa.
", "Het verblijf bij Vincent was erg goed. Het apartement is groot en schoon met een balkonnetje erbij. Vincent heeft ons bij aankomst tips gegeven voor een taxi maatschappij en tijdens ons verblijf websites om naar de berg in de buurt van Sofia te komen.

Er is er bed en een bedbank. In de slaapkamer missen nog wel 2 gordijnen waardoor het om 7u in de ochtend al licht is. Verder staat er in de keuken nog een heerlijk koffiezetapparaat. 

Een aanrader voor een verblijf in Sofia!"]
