reviews:
["We had an amazing time at Zdravka’s place, first and foremost Zdravka is just a wonderful and warm person who goes out of her way to make you feel welcome. We were greeted with yummy pasteries and sweets as well as bottled water. Outside of the apartment was some of the best food I've eaten, all within a couple of mins walk. Taj Mahal for the best Indian I've ever eaten, and a Thai place that Zdravka can recommend you. Next time I'm in Sofia I'll definitely be staying with Zdravka! :)", "Feeling home away from home. The place has the best location of the city I suppose it is better than any luxury hotel has. 

Host - Zdravka is a very wonderful person and she has made my stay in Sofia felt like home instead of the fact of being abroad. 

Everything is perfect and I highly recommend this place!", "Perfect location. A nice appartement in which you could feel at home.", "Zdravka's place is in a great location, next to the famous cathedral.  It is very close to the Metro station where the tourist information office and a big supermarket located.  It is also very close to the stop where all Day Tours starts.  The room I had was large with comfortable bed.  Zdravka is a nice old lady, and she is interested to introduce the different types of Bulgaria's food.   Zdravka's place is a good place for first time traveller to Bulgaria.", "I am very happy with my stay at Zdravka's place, the location is amazing - in the very centre of the city - and the room is very cosy and spacious. I highly recommend it! ", "If you want a lovely view over the trees to the cathedral, in the most desirable location in the whole of Sofia and a kind and cultivated hostess who speaks perfect German and excellent English, then stay with Zdravka!", "Amzingly central location, quite decent bedroom, and a very kind host. The apartment is located right next to Nevsky cathedral and I could simply walk all around the city centre and sightseeing places. The bedroom was comfortable and very clean. Zdravka was a very kind host. Even though she was not in entirely good health, she helped me with whatever I needed. I had a great time in Sofia.", "Great place, location, host.  Stay here! ", "I stayed at Zdravka's for 7 nights and it is one best experiences I have had in a long time. Zdravka is very friendly and her hospitality is impecable. She is very knowledgeable and gives you nice little tips to get around the place. Her flat is centrally located and the view of the cathedral from the flat made the stay even more special. Highly recommend.", "Wonderful location and host - outstanding in every respect!", "WAS GREAT THE ZONE WHEN YOU ARE IS NEAR OF THE BEST IMPORTANT IN SOFIA", "Zdravka is such a lovely friendly beautiful person.She welcomes me into.her beautiful home like her own daughter/ niece. Always with a smiling, kind face Zdravka provides the best Bulgarian hospitality.  Her home is in the perfect location facing the gorgeous Alexander Nevsky Cathedral. Walkable to everywhere with really nice deco. Thanks for everything!", "I was very well received by Zdravka and she was really present for me.
She gave me all useful informations for a good stay, maps, addresses...
Flat clean and ideally situated... I recommend it.", "A great place that just adds so much to an experience of visiting Sofia just by it's slightly vintage feel. The area is close to anything one might need from night clubs to sight seing spots as well, so a all in all, a highly recomended spot!", "This is the 3rd time I have stayed here because the location is just perfect and Zdravka is a fantastic host.  Sadly she wasn't able to be there this time, but her friend Rossi was a lovely, relaxed and helpful replacement.  Both she and Zdravka bend over backwards to make your stay amazing and I really can't recommend them highly enough.", "it was really nice", "Incredible hospitality and the ideal location! Zdravka was helpful in every way. We only wish that we could have stayed longer!", "We are so glad we stayed at Zdravka's airbnb!  It is in a perfect location, and the view of the Alexander Nevsky Cathedral is amazing.  The apartment was spacious and clean, and having parking available was very convenient as well.  Zdravka was also such a warm and welcoming host, she really went out of our way to be sure we felt comfortable and at home.  I would definitely recommend this airbnb and would not hesitate to stay there again!", "Zdravka was a great host! She helped me in every way she could. She called the train and bus station to find out schedules and ticket prices. She suggested tours and places to visit in the city and  she got me a registered taxi to get to the station. If you’re visiting Sofia, I honestly recommend you stay with Zdravka.", "Zdravka's place is in a great location, close to shops and the centre of town. The room agrees with the photos and there is a nice view. The kitchen is also well-equipped. During my stay, the elevator did not work and the internet sometimes dropped out in my room. I did not get to meet Zdravka as she was away when I arrived and there were some friends of hers who stayed some time in other rooms in the apartment.", "Zdravka is a wonderful host and her place is super cosy and lovely! It is located at the very heart of the city centre and it is a great point to set out from and explore the city. Zdravka is very friendly and kind and always ready to come up with suggestions of what to do and see in Sofia, which I thought was very lovely. I highly recommend her place!", "I can thoroughly recommend Zdravka as a hostess for her friendly helpfulness, fascinating conversation and spacious and architecturally interesting apartment in  its beautiful and quiet location overlooking Sofia's imposing cathedral. There couldn't be a better location, and the Metro is only 5 minutes' walk away! Don't miss this one!", "Zdravka was an amazing host. From the attention to detail to the great source of information about the local area and the immense hospitality to make sure I was comfortable and had everything I needed, even with things way outside of what Airbnb requires. I can only highly recommend Zdravka's wonderful home.", "Sofia it's a wonderful city; be guest of Zdravka complete the wonderful trip. She is very Kind and smart person, her home is beautiful, big and in perfect position.", "Zdravka is the nicest little lady and the place is AMAZING! She has everything you could need, including snacks in the room and (quite often) something on the stove for you to eat. She made me crepes/pancakes and they were delicious with her homemade sour cherry jam and honey. My heater stopped working so she immediately found me another one that worked super well! You take the elevator up, but you have to walk down the steps to leave the apartment (I was so glad I didn't have to walk up though!!). For future guests, if the front door key gets stuck, jiggle the handle up and down/side to side - it gets a little stuck. If the apartment key gets stuck, pull the door toward you and then turn the key. Such a great stay, the apt is lovely and Zdravka is like the grandmother you wish you had. Her English is good, and her German is amazing. She's the greatest! Bring earplugs if you are sensitive to noise, as sometimes the floor squeaks (understandably, though, considering that the building is SUPER old - but just as beautiful! It's on the same block as the big Cathedral, so neat!!). Danke, Zdravka! Ich hatte so viel Spaß!!", "Zdravka is a real Sofia insider! We had great conversations with her and enjoyed our stay! Her apartment is perfect located with a great with. Absolutely great experience, thank you very much.", "Amazing location! Nevsky Cathedral is right out the front door!  I stayed here when I was passing through Sofia for a night. Both Zdravka and her friend, who let me in, were incredibly kind! Very comfortable.", "Zdravka's apartment has the most amazing location overlooking Alexander Nevski cathedral - it was wonderful to chat to her in the living room while looking out at the cathedral. Everything is in walking distance and it is a very easy metro ride from the airport. The bedroom is very large and comfortable and it has an attached shower-room which is very handy. Everything is spotlessly clean, the wifi is fast and Zdravka seems to think of everything you might need.

Zdravka is such a lovely welcoming host and so fascinating to talk to. She gave me lots of tips about where to go and places to eat. It was only a short trip for me but I felt like I could have stayed much longer. Next time I am in Sofia I would love to stay with Zdravka again.", "This home is just lovely with a stunning view of the Nevski Cathedral.  Zdravka is warm and welcoming and I was soon feeling comfortable and happy.  Book this one, it is a rare treasure right in the centre of Sofia, but take time to talk to your very interesting host.", "Wonderful location and zdravka is a wonderful host, both knowledgeable and friendly. Would definitely stay again!", "Zdravka's apartment is really great!
Perfect location and a amazing view to the Alexander Nevski cathedral from the living room. 
The private room is also very nice. In addition it is calm and clean!
I enjoyed my time, had interesting conversations and I am sure to see Zdravka again.", "Great place for spending few days in the center of Sofia. The owner arranged for a late arrival and provided me with everything I needed. I recommend", "Zdravka is a lovely woman and her flat is special. The room is simple and spacious with antique furniture and a window to a quiet courtyard. Zdravka was so helpful with tips on what to see and where to go and on history and culture. She made me feel very welcome and comfortable and I would certainly stay again.", "The host canceled this reservation 29 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.", "Staying at Zdravka's place was awesome. The room is a nice size and super comfortable, and you can't do much better as far as location. The view from the balcony of the adjacent room which is also unoccupied is beautiful. It's right in the center of the city, close to everything, but this particular area is quiet at night, and the apartment is removed from the street by 4 floors, so noise was never a problem. Zdravka was an excellent host. Not just that but she was a really sweet, accommodating and interesting person. I enjoyed getting to know her  and the conversations we had. I would definitely stay here again if I ever returned to Sofa. ", "Zdravka is warm and welcoming, and her apartment is on the doorstep of the iconic cathedral. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would visit again in a heartbeat.", "Zdravka was an incredible host and the house was perfect. She made sure every aspect of my stay was great. I also enjoyed our conversations very much. I would highly recommend.", "Homely. Caring.Friendly.
Zdravkas takes pride in hosting, she said that she cannot travel,so she brings the WORLD to her.The attitude to her guests reflects her inner beauty. Even though She was under weather, she was more worried about me.
The view from her balcony is priceless.
Planning my day,,guidance, and explaining Sofia.....
Thanks for making my stay with you aliving memory .


", "Perfect location! Zdravka is super friendly and accommodating! ", "What a wonderful ambassador for Bulgaria. There were issues with hot water that were beyond her control. The best view in Sofia!", "Zdravka was a lovely lady to commicate with. Unfortunately the morning of the trip I woke with a locked back and could not get on a 3 hour bus ride from starazagora to Sophia. I wrote an email explaining this that morning to explain I would not make check in at 4pm. I also acknowledged in the email that since I was cancelling on the same day I knew I would not get a refund. I then used the air bnb function to rebook and requested to stay 4 days later. I must illiterate how friendly and welcoming she is I am merely explaining why i could not stay. ", "Great place to stay, super central.
Love the old fashion elevator that worked perfectly.
Zdravka is a lovely HOST, we had a great conversation.
THANK YOU Zdravka
", "Zdravka is the best host I could imagine.  She is brilliant and funny and very nice.  We had a great visit and she pointed me towards great things in Sofia.  You could spend a week just exploring Sofia on foot from her place.  It's even easy to find.  Best imaginable place.  Wonderful city, too.", "As long as I live I will never stay in a place with such a view in a European capital city. We had a nice room and a gracious host in Zdravka.", "Great apartment in the heart of Sofia with a great view. Zdravka is nice and likes to talk to you about your plans and experiences in Sofia. ", "Really enjoyed my stay in Sofia, in part because of Zdravka. She's a friendly and informative host, who made me feel at home. Her apartment is super central, with an amazing view of Nevski Cathedral. Would definitely stay again!", "Zdravka was an excellent host and made me feel extremely welcome in Sofia, my first visit to Bulgaria! I was even treated to traditional Bulgarian Easter cake on arrival. Contact before arrival was clear and helpful and check-in/out was without any problems. The apartment was extremely clean and very comfortable. The location is perfect, walking distance from everything and close to metro station if needed. Zdravka was extremely kind, welcoming and very helpful. I would highly recommend a stay in this apartment!", "Couldn't be a better location than this. Just across the main Cathedral, you see it right from the room. All other sightseeing places  in city are also in walking distance. Nice communication with Zdravka. In short home away from home. Room and house exactly as shown in the pictures, pretty old but clean and the awesome location makes you forget everthing else. ", "She's great! one of the best hostess I have ever had", "Very central position. The host is very kind, polite and resourceful! She helps you for reservations, taxi and restaurant. You feel like to stay in your grandma's house.", "The top of the top!

I highly recommend the place for the location and also because Zdravka is very nice and gentle.

", "Zdravka is a very friendly, charming and attentive lady and my friend and I couldn't have imagined a better host or place to stay for our little vacation in Sofia. Even though our plane arrived at night she awaited us with a warm welcome and a bulgarian breakfast snack on the next morning. The appartement is located beautifully in the very center of the city, and we could reach all important spots in a few walking minutes. Anyways, the area is quite and safe. The apartement is very cosy and had everything we needed. Kitchen and bathroom are shared with Zdravka. Since Zdravka speaks german, we got along easily and she helped us with city maps, tram tickets and gave a lot of recommendations. But the best thing was an invitation to take part in a Bulgarian Christmas-/ New Years-Tradition together with Zdravka and her grandson, which was a unique experience and great pleasure! We really felt at home and I would chose Zdravka's room again every time for a stay in Sofia. Highly recommended! :)", "Great place! Great host! Most recommended!", "This is the second time I have stayed here and already Zdravka is treating me like family. The location is as central  as you could ever hope, whilst still quiet at night, and everything is within easy walking.  Zdravka goes the extra mile to make you feel happy and welcome, booking a trip for us before we arrived and even texting me during our stay, checking that I remembered to take my hat! She is wonderful and I can't recommend her apartment enough. You will love your stay as much as I have. ", "Zdravka is a very kind and attentive person. She made my stay easy and lovely: she offered me tea/snacks, invited me to share a soup she just made for her grandson (and friends) and even booked a taxi for me to be sure I arrive safe to the airport (very early flight). Like being at home (or better :)).

The apartment is perfectly well located, the room is big, the bathroom shared: could be ‘convenient’ to have a way to lock the door as there are basically 2 entrances to the bathroom and you never know if someone will surprise you while you’re having a shower :). ", "I stayed at Zdravka's place for 5 days. Because of the great location of her home, I was able to easily walk around in the city center during day time. During night time, Zdravka would always sit next to me in the kitchen and listen to me narrating my adventures. She is very very caring and helpful, she helped me ask where I can buy bus tickets to different cities, and she would always propose if I needed a taxi to the bus station or the airport. My stay in Sofia is definitely amazing! I would love to come back next time :D ", "Zdravka is amazing and the location couldn't be better, right in the center of Sofía. Zdravka will make you feel like home, she's such a beautiful person. She gave us maps of the city, tell us about Sofía's history, when we arrived she was waiting for us with some bulgarian sweet snacks and she offered us coffee and tea. She has been like family, and she has a better view than most of the hotels, I'm sure! If I come back to Sofia, I would stay here of course!!!  Loved It!!!", "The apartment is very conveniently located in the heart of Sofia, close to public transport, shops, bars etc. The room itself was quite nice and Zdravka was a very helpful host, giving us lots of information for our stay and answering all of our questions. She also booked a taxi for us to travel to Boyana in the outskirts of Sofia. There are just two things I would add. The first is that the entrances of the apartment are only semi-independent (not entirely independent). The second is that the apartment is not very sound-proof (as most apartments from that era). That's not a big problem, but just so that you are aware and know what to expect in terms of privacy. For a short stay, it was a very nice place and Zdravka was a perfect host!", "Zdravka was nice host. she helped me in everything that I needed and giving to me information about the city and the differents trips around Sofia. the house was tidy and clean , bedroom as well and the bed was very comfortable. Zdravka's house is just in the center of Sofia. we didn't have hot water during two days, it was due to a general fault. ", "I have stayed in Sofia numerous times and Zdravkas place is by far the best. It would be hard to get a better location. The photos dont do this place justice. Its really big inside and airy . Zdravka makes you feel very welcome and has very good english, i would stay again no issue.", "I only wish I could have stayed longer! Zdravka is the loveliest lady I have met through airbnb to this date! She was so welcoming and kind, I felt like I was family as soon as I arrived. The location is amazing too! Right in the centre of Sofia! Yellow bricks practically right outside the door! I can't wait until my next stay! Thank you so much Zdravka!", "She could not be there personally but did all she could to help me with everything. Fantastic location! Cozy apartment.", "Zdravka's flat is as described in the listing or in the comments below.
It is well located in the center of the center in Sofia which is really convenient to visit everything you want to visit in the city or to go out and have a drink or something. The view is also amazing !

But what makes this flat so unique besides its perfect location or fantastic view is Zdravka herself. She is such a nice host, always chatting with you about Sofia, Bulgaria or your day. She gave us really good advices and places to visit in the city so that we regretted we couldn't stay longer..

I hope we will see each other, because we definitely have to come back to Sofia and Bulgaria !", "Zdravka was a lovely hostess.   She was very welcoming and friendly and made me feel completely at home. Everything was as described in the listing.   The flat has a lovely retro feel and the room was large and comfortable.  Zdravka's flat is situated right in the centre of Sofia on the main square of the cathedral so all the main cultural attractions were just a few minutes walk away.", "Absolutely amazing location next door to the Mayor's place and facing the cathedral and central square. A perfect base for exploring Sofia and the view from the balcony of the cathedral and mountains behind is breathtaking. The opera house is immediately behind the building too. The rooms are spacious and light, comfortable and full of character. Also surprisingly quiet for such a central location.  Zdravka is an amazing host, from taking the time to chat over a drink in the evening, to explaining Bulgarian language and customs as well as suggesting ideas for places to go and things to do. I cannot recommend her or her place highly enough. She really tries hard to make sure your stay is perfect and it feels like I've gained a genuine friend. Thank you x", "Staying with Zdravka was like staying with a family member. As a host she made us feel right at home. Myself and boyfriend thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The location of Zdravka's apartment was ideal - centre of the centre! We would recommend staying here when exploring the city of Sofia.", "Zdravka is such a nice person, she made me at home as soon as I arrived and really helped me to park my car, which is not so easy... Her "rétro" apartment is really nice and ideally situated to visit the nice and interesting town of Sofia. Thank you Zdravka ", "Zdravka is THE HOST. She explained us everything. We experienced very warm welcome and perfect service. We stayed for one night before leaving Bulgaria but she cared as much as if we stayed for a month. Zdravka has has great overview about many topics and we very much enjoyed the conversation with her. I will absolutely remember that experience. ", "Zdravka and his house is one of the best places to arrive and live Sofia as it is, and feel as a "family guest!" ... Big appartment in the heart of Sofia,  Very clean place beautifull energie and attentions, Super Recomended", "Dank Zdravka und ihre tolle Wohnung ist Sofia eine Reise wert!", "Die Wohnung ist wunderbar gelegen, ich habe herrlich gut in dem ruhigen Zimmer geschlafen. Sehr gemütlich in seinem Retro Style! Zdravka lässt einen wie zuhause fühlen, ist grosszügig mit Informationen. Es war sehr interessant für mich mich mit ihr zu unterhalten, sie spricht wunderbar Deutsch und ist sehr gebildet! Ich komme gerne wieder!", "Ik ben 4 nachten bij Zdravka blijven slapen. De locatie is top, alle bezienswaardigheden zijn op loopafstand, zo ook de metro. Zdravka was voor mij een soort grootmoeder, ik ben erg verwend met lekkere snacks. Ze heeft ook goede tips. Zo ben ik naar Plovdiv geweest en naar de opera. Ook kon ik mijn Duits met haar oefenen. Het huis is wat ouder en heeft een grappige lay-out met veel deuren. Omdat het wat ouder is hoor je 's avonds wel de vliegtuigen of lawaaige buren, maar dat maakt niet want het bed ligt lekker en het is goedkoop. Hoewel we huisgenoten waren had ik wel het gevoel dat ik veel privacy had. Voor mij was het de eerste keer Airbnb maar het is mij erg bevallen. Dankjewel Zdravka!", "Zdravka ist eine hervorragende Gastgeberin, mit der ihr euch auch auf Deutsch sehr gut verständigen könnt. Sie kennt sich sehr gut aus in Sofia und kann gute Tipps geben. Ihre Wohnung ist sehr zentral, aber auch sehr ruhig gelegen. Das Zimmer ist sehr gemütlich. Ich habe mich sehr wohl gefühlt und werde beim nächsten Aufenthalt in Sofia wieder bei Zdravka übernachten. Ich kann die Gastgeberin und das Zimmer nur empfehlen!", "Zdravka ist eine hervorragende Gastgeberin, mit der ihr euch auch auf Deutsch sehr gut verständigen könnt. Sie kennt sich sehr gut aus in Sofia und kann gute Tipps geben. Ihre Wohnung ist sehr zentral, aber auch sehr ruhig gelegen. Das Zimmer ist sehr gemütlich. Ich habe mich sehr wohl gefühlt und werde beim nächsten Aufenthalt in Sofia wieder bei Zdravka übernachten. Ich kann die Gastgeberin und das Zimmer nur empfehlen!", "Zdravka harika bir ev sahibi, Sofya hakkinda cok seye hakim.Bir dahaki gelisimde kalacagim yer kuskusuz burasi olacak.Zdravka ile tanisamadim fakat arkadasi Rosi ile Nuzhka ile tanistim; cok degerli,kulturlu,dusunceli,nazik abla kardesti.Zdravka olmadigi icin benimle ilgilendiler.Zdravka ve arkadaslari Sofya’dayken sik sik mesaj attilar.Unutulmaz anilar yasadim, her sey icin cok tesekkur ederim!!!", "Zdravka hat uns viele Tipps zur Erkundung der Stadt gegeben. Sie hat für uns telefoniert, Fahrräder organisiert, ein Taxi bestellt und uns Hinweise auf diversen Stadt- und Umgebungskarten gegeben. Zdravka hat uns Gebäck bei der Ankunft bereitgestellt und uns Obst gegeben. Spontan hat sie uns ein für uns komfortabelstes  Zimmer mit Balkon und Blick auf die Alexander Newski Kathedrale gegeben. Der Kaffee war wie zu Hause. Zdravka ist ein sehr herzlicher Mensch und bewirtet mit großer Freude. Sie hat uns den Aufenthalt versüßt.", "Zdravka ist eine gebildete, mehrsprachige und angenehme Person . Die Wohnung ist vor 80 Jahren gebaut und liegt in nobler Umgebung (Kathedrale, Universität mit Metrostation, britisches Konsulat u.a.) .", "Het appartement ligt lekker centraal waardoor je makkelijk veel lopend kunt bezichtigen en je hebt een mooi uitzicht op de Alexander Nevski-kathedraal. De metro is handig op 5 minuten loopafstand. Zdravka is heel behulpzaam. Het enige minpunt voor mij was dat de gehorigheid. Ik ben nogal gevoelig voor geluid en de tv en radio hoorde ik door de muren heen. Zdravka deed toen meteen heel lief alles voor mij uit.", "Un excellent séjour à Sofia passé chez Zdravka. L'accueil fut impecable. L'appartement, qui se situe en plein centre de Sofia, est extrêmement paratique pour les séjours longs ou courts, étant proche des quartiers vivants de la ville et de tous les endroits intéressants à visiter. Zdravka, en très bon hôte, nous a renseigné sur l'ensemble des choses qu'il etait possible de faire à Sofia. Je recommande de ce fait ce logement à toute personne désireuse de découvrir la cultire Bulgare et la capitale.", "Wir haben fünf Nächte bei Zdravka, es hat uns sehr gut gefallen, die Lage ist hervorragend, die Wohnung auch sehr schön. Zdravka selbst war nicht da, hat sich aber im Vorhinein um alles gekümmert, uns tolle Tips geschickt, die unseren Aufenthalt bereichert haben :) Alles in allem ein sehr guter Aufenthalt, bei Kommunikation bezüglich der Ankunftszeit gab es ein Missverständnis, das schnell aus dem Weg geräumt werden konnte. ", "Lo mejor de este alojamiento es la ubicación, justo frente a la Catedral Alexander Nevski. Se puede ir a pie a cualquier punto de interés de la ciudad. La casa es antigua pero eso le da un encanto especial. Zdravka fue muy amable en todo momento. La habitación da a un patio trasero, pero es luminosa y amplia. El cuarto de baño es compartido. ", "Wir sind am späten Abend angekommen und Zdravka schon auf uns gewartet und zwar mit einem kühlen Bier und selbstgebackenem Baniza. 

Sehr herzlicher Kontakt mit ihr und sie sorgt sich sehr um ihre Gäste,  hat einen Ausflug organisiert und gute Tipps für den Urlaub gegeben. 

Die Lage der Wohnung ist wirklich ideal,   alles was sehenswert ist, erreicht man zu Fuß in maximal 15 Minuten. Taxen sind billig und ausreichend vorhanden, als Tipp,  die App TaxiMe herunterladen.  So geht man sicher, dass man an kein Fake Taxi Gerät, welches horrende Preise fordert. 

Eine U-Bahn Station ist in 5 Minuten zu erreichen und der Flughafen ist 15 Minuten mit dem Taxi entfernt, die Fahrt kostet 6€.

Wir hatten einen schönen Urlaub in Sofia und Umgebung, die Unterkunft wurde nur zum schlafen genutzt, tagsüber waren wir unterwegs. ", "Zdravka ist eine echte Lady und sehr zuvorkommend. Bei meiner Ankunft um Mitternacht gab es einen kleinen Snack und auch ansonsten einige bulgarische Spezialitäten aus ihrem Kühlschrank. Die Gespräche mit ihr habe ich sehr genossen. Das Zimmer ist wirklich retro und gemütlich. Ich habe fantastisch geschlafen. Die Aussicht ist großartig. Die Wohnung liegt sehr zentral. Von hier aus ist alles innerhalb von einigen Minuten zu erreichen. Kurzum kann ich alles weiterempfehlen und ich selbst würde auch wieder bei Zdravka wohnen. ", "Tolle zentrale Lage, großes ruhiges Zimmer und daran angrenzend Küche, Bad und WC, freundschaftliche und aufmerksame Betreuung durch Zdravka !", "Nous avons passé deux nuits chez Zdravka qui est une hôte sympathique, accueillante, généreuse, ouverte, disponible et serviable. Elle était prête à répondre à toutes nos questions. Elle a tout fait pour faciliter notre séjour. Le dernier matin, nous devions prendre un taxi à 4 heures 45 pour aller à l'aéroport. Zdravka, qui s'était couchée tard, s'est levée pour nous dire au revoir et s'assurer que le taxi était bien là...
Le logement est très bien situé, les monuments principaux sont accessibles à pied. 
Malgré la chaleur à Sofia, l'appartement reste frais et la vue est magnifique.
Merci encore Zdravka !", "Zdravka a été parfaite. Elle a été très présente dès mon arrivée malgré mon retard de plus de 3h00. Elle est très gentille, très accueillante. Le logementcest parfait : grand, propre, spacieux. Il est tout proche de la cathédrale, des monuments, musées et métro (pour la gare ou l'aéroport)."]

reviews:
["Very good place for explore Sofia!", "Everything - place, location, communication - was perfect. Many thanks!", "Fantastic newly renovated beautiful designed apartment in a great central location next to shops, restaurants and public transport.10 min walk to the city (Website hidden by Airbnb) 10/10.
Service and communication with host quick, friendly and efficient.
Highly recommended anytime again.", "The place,the location....everything os superb!", "Everything as in descriptions and on pictures. Lovely, comfort apartment on a nice location with secluded private parking. Recomendations!!", "Just book it already! Spotless hospitality, the host always responded immediately to our requests/questions. The location is also excellent in a very nice neighborhood with hip joints and close to beautiful parks and the centre itself.", "The apartment was really great. Everything is brand new and has everything you need for a stay in Sofia. Also, the location is great. You can walk everywhere from there.", "Beutiful apartment in a pretty good location", "Absolutely recommended Violeta’s Flat.Best location only 10-15 min from the airport,clean and tidy place,excellent host.", "The appartment is nice and well located, however it is run by a company and we were not well welcomed. We had to wait 45 minutes for someone enter the flat and he took less than 1 minute to present us the appartment! We would have had a greater experience with a real host!
I still recommend it for its location. ", "Sofia bohemienne and central", "Fantastic flat in a great location. Everything has been recently refurbished to a really high standard so its like staying in a luxury hotel but all to yourself! - incredible value for money! It's really easy to get to all the main sites in Sofia. We walked everywhere and nowhere was further than twenty mins - half hour walk. Flat was very comfortable (beds were so comfy), has air con, really nice little kitchen, power shower - highly recommended. Oh and Pavel is really nice too! Very relaxed, gave recommendations - just what you want from a host. ", "Very cozy and comfortable apartment. Good location. I recommend it.", "Très bel appartement, propre et refait très récemment. Il est surtout particulièrement bien situé.", "Séjour d'une semaine dans l'appartement de Violeta : appartement très confortable et très propre, moderne, central, literie impeccable, très bien équipé, fonctionnement wifi parfait, tout était bien en fait !  Un plus non négligeable, l'accueil personnalisé de Pave, sa disponibilité pour des renseignements pendant le séjour et ses messages pour savoir si tout va bien. Je recommande vivement sans problème cette location", "Appartamento meraviglioso, appena ristrutturato. La qualità dei dettagli è stata una sorpresa per noi. Pulizia impeccabile. Quartiere molto tranquillo e host estremamente disponibile. Consiglio vivamente."]

reviews:
["It is a very nice place. It has been my second time that I stayed here.", "Yulian's place is wonderful. It has a great location and the host was very kind and also responding very fast. I definitely recommend the place!", "Amazin host - very quick to respond and a great place in Sofia - excellent location, nice apartment. Highly recommended!", "Julian is really a super host!!!!! Thank you.", "Great hosts! Great location! Very clean and tidy. No need of elevator, it's on the second floor. Stylish bedroom and paintings.", "Great place, nice location. Yulian is very kind, informative and overall great host!", "Yulian’s place has very good location to the subway and a taxi drive to the central bus/train station would take only five minutes. The appartment is situated in a quiet residential area. The place consists of three living spaces - a bedroom, living room and a kitchen each of them can host separately three people with the possibility for as much as five people all together - two pairs plus one. The appartment is exactly as shown on the pictures, very cute and cosy. There isn't elevator but that's not a problem as the appartment is on the first level above ground floor. I would definitely recommend Yulian’s place to everybody looking for an affordable and comfortable stay in the city.", "Great place. Thank you, Julian.", "Perfect family accommodation! We will visit next time again!", "The apartment look exactly as showed in the pictures. Everything was great. It was very clean and comfortable. The location is great and the neighborhood is lovely. I would definitely recommend it.", "Апартамента е супер! В непосредствена близост има денонощно магазинче, голям супермаркет,  МОЛ. Също лесно и безплатно се паркира. ", "A very modern, light and cozy place to stay. It was a pure pleasure to spend a vacation there. A huge thanks to Yulian who was very kind and polite to us all the time. ", "Good apartment. Nice host.", "The neighbourhood is safe and popular, the accuracy and communication with the host were excellent and the flat was just as shown on the photos!", "Very nice place and very helpful hosts.Everything was great!", "Gr8t ppl. awesome plc. very usefull for a pre/post-flight sleep over. 5min. Subway access", "Perfect place equpped with everything you need for your staying.Hosts are friendly and helpful people . Our holiday was excellent in this place", "I can totally recommend this apartment. It is a very nice place with very polite host. The pictures tell almost everything but it is actually nicer once you get inside. If I need I'll come again without hesitation.  ", "We enjoyed our stay in Yulians apartment. It was clean, close to the center (walk, taxi, bus, metro) and everything you can ask for when you are looking for a cheap stay in Sofia!", "Very nice place, quite big, well arranged, with both a heater and a fan. 
A casserole and all the other basic kitchenware but no pan. 
Good location, very central.", "everything was ok for one night stay.", "Yulian's place is wonderful. It's very close to. The center, even closer to the mall and is a very nice apartment overall. I very recommended!", "Out trip to Sofia was a short one, one night staying. Yulian was very king and responsive, not just during our trip but also before giving us tips about public transport and ways to get to the crib. 
I was expecting the apartment to be much more central, is anyway a bit far ( about 20 min. by walking) from the night movida. That is a bit hard after a hole day visiting  but probably by public transport/cab that would be a quick way. 
The place was nicely furnished and clean!", "Thanks! Location is good, the apartment is clean and cosy. Thanks for hospitality!", "Casual apartment, located 20 minutes by foot from city center and 9 minutes from metro station. Apartment has everything, for short stay (we stayed one night). We travelled around Romania and Bulgaria for 15 days and stayed in 12 different apartments, but i dont agree, that this apartment have so many 5star ratings, because it's not so special, we would say, classic 3-4 star value apartment. In any case, if you need apartment for short stay,  this is not a bad option.", "Modern apartment just as shown in the photos and is near the center.", "Super quick answer from the host, perfect location close (by feet) to the center !
Quiet place, with everything needed !
I recommand !", "Very nice place to stay. Yulian and his wife were very nice, the flat is beautiful and spacious.", "You can’t fault the apartment. It’s clean, cheap and in a good location. I would certainly recommend staying here if you’re on a budget. ", "Good address ! not so far from the city center !", "The apartment of Yulian was very clean and bright with big windows ) Yulian was very kind and hospitality, he meet us and show us everything we need in the apartment. We like our staying in Sophia so much!", "Well equip and good price", "Awesome , central and clean .", "We had a nice stay in Yulian's accommodation. Its a good location near the city center and everything was provided in a good manner.", "A very comfortable, modern space. Great for our one-night stop in Sofia, and extremely cheap! Would definitely recommend.", "Yulian was such a nice host! He let us came in earlier, and he was always reactive to our messages. Although the building is a bit old from the outside, the apartment is perfectly luminous, kitchen is nice, everything was like the pictures. It is a very nice apartment, there are commercial areas close by. Metro station is just less than 10 minutes walking, you can also walk downtown, it’s about 15-20 minutes walking. Thanks Yulian for your kindness!!", "Excellent value! Amazing and beautiful space - super quiet for a great nights rest", "Excellent communication, nice and friendly host, location 15 min easy walk from main walking street.", "Clean and bright, comfortably furnished and in a really great location, walking distance to anything you might need, this is a really great apartment. Yulian and Luba are kind, responsive hosts, and they made everything very easy. 
I was only there for a couple of days, but this would be a great place for a longer visit. It's really spacious, and there's tons of storage space. I was a little disappointed in the meager offerings of cooking utensils and pots and pans, but for a short stay it was fine. Plus, there are so many great cafes and restaurants nearby, you really might not need to cook.", "Nice, cosy apartment, very clean, affordable, near city center. Great hosts and friendly, helpful neighbours. Highly recommended!", "I recommend it without doubt not only because the apartment is very close to the city centre and beautifully decorated but mainly cause she is an excellent host!", "Great place, 10 minutes from Opalchenska metro stop. Stylish and clean!", "Good location and comfort place to stay", "Highly recommended! Awesome place, very clean, bright and well located. Close enough to the center and to any comfort.", "I spent a great 3 nights at Yulian's place. The hosts were kind enough to let us check in after a late night flight, and the rooms were exactly as described. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this to anyone!", "Hosts were very nice. The apt looked just like the pics. Recommended.", "Yulian is a nice host and the place it's clean and central", "Everything was great!", "Very cosy apartment in convenient location. Host was very friendly and approachable. Even left work earlier to facilitate check in when I arrived three hours ahead of schedule. All in all great place and A+ experience!!!", "This was my second time staying at this apartment. Yulian is very accommodating and helpful! This is a great place to stay in Sofia and very affordable.", "Everything as described, VERY sharp communication. Good central location and all needed things are in place.
Highly recommended.", "We had a great stay at Yulian's! The place was great and clean, and Yulian was very helpful when we were a bit lost and couldn't find the building. We would definitely recommend the airbnb.", "The apartament is close to the city center and near Sofia Mall. La casa è leggermente fuori, ma a piedi o con i mezzi in pochi minuti si è in centro. 
Ci sono 2 supermercati vicini e un baretto aperto 24/24. 
Non fatevi scoraggiare dall'esterno dell'edificio, all'interno è molto più bello ;) ", "Ottimo soggiorno, l'host molto gentile e disponibile.
L'appartamento è vicino al Mall of Sofia (Uno dei più grandi centri commerciali della capitale) e a soli 20min a piedi dal centro.", "Logement super clair et propre, très bien situé et confortable.", "Yulian è stato molto gentile e disponibile. L'appartamento è vicino alla fermata della metro ,a una fermata dal centro e a circa 20 minuti dall'aereoporto. Comodissimo davvero. Nell'appartamento possono dormirci 5 persone. Mi è piaciuto molto. Magari visto che dalle tende entra la luce,se si preferisce dormire al buio,consiglio di portare una mascherina. Casa fornita di tutto,asciugamani-lenzuola-saponi-detersivi-addirittura lavatrice e lavastoviglie. Negozio sotto casa aperto tutta notte che vende un po' di tutto. Siamo stati molto bene.", "Logement propre facile de stationner. L'hôtel est très sympathique. Le centre est à peine 15 minutes. ", "Muy buen lugar, nos brindaron toda la informacion necesaria para conocer Sofia", "yulian è stato molto gentile e accogliente, l'appartamento risulta forse più spazioso i quelle che sembra nelle foto, l'unica stanza più piccola del previsto era il bagno. Il quartiere non è una meraviglia ma è sicuro e  c è tutto quello che serve intorno, il centro è a 15 min a piedi ma ci sono vicini anche i mezzi! nel complesso consigliato!", "Nos guardó las maletas después de la hora del check-out. ", "Ο οικοδεσπότης ήταν πολύ ευγενικός, χαμογελαστός. Δεν αντιμετωπισαμε κανένα προβλημα.", "Logement très propre et très bien équipé. Il dispose d'absolument tout le nécessaire pour cuisiner et se sentir comme chez soit. 
Au pied des transports en commun (tramway), proche du métro, à 15 minutes à pied des principaux monuments de Sofia, l'appartement de Yulian est très central. 
Yulian est très accessible, par téléphone, mail afin de faciliter notre arrivée dans le logement. 
Je recommande absolument ce logement", "Polecam ten apartament. Znajduje się w tradycyjnym bloku, tzw. mrówkowcu, ale jest bardzo dogodny (I p.), przytulny i urządzony ze smakiem. Dogodny dojazd do centrum miasta, w pobliżu bank i sklepy.
Gospodarze przemili, troszczą się o gości. Bardzo miło wspominamy pobyt, pozdrawiam.", "Séjour agréable passé à Sofia et dans les environs. Appartement situé à une dizaine de minutes du centre-ville de Sofia, proche de 2 centres commerciaux et d'une petite boulangerie. L'intérieur est correct, chaleureux mais la propreté n'était pas tout à fait au rendez-vous.
Le hall de l'immeuble est typique des vieux immeubles bulgares qui mériteraient un bon ravalement de façade !
", "Моя семья очень благодарна Юлиану за прекрасное размещение. Особо отмечаем доброе отношение хозяина, его желание всегда помочь гостям, удобное расположение квартиры, порядок в помещении. Всем рекомендуем!", "A 15 minutes en voiture de l'aéroport . A 5 minutes à pied d'un supermarché avec un restau bien sympa au 2ème étage : happy .

Yulian répond très vite et son appartement est parfait et décoré avec beaucoup de gout .", "J'ai apprécié ce court séjour chez yulian. Je n'ai pas eu la chance de le rencontrer sa femme nous a très bien accueillie. L'appartement est bien situé et très conviviale.", "Хозяин не отказался встретить нас довольно поздно вечером, что иногда отказываются делать. Хорошо понимает по русски. Квартира уютная, имеется всё, что нужно для компфортного проживания. Район - самый центр, недалеко Молл, Лидл, метро. Остались всей семьей очень довольны!", "Appartement comme sur les photos 
Tout comme sur la description, pas de surprise, appartement clean. 
Hôte sympathique et facilement accessible.", "Yulian est un hôte très accueillant et serviable. Son appartement est très confortable et agréable. Il a tout ce qui est nécessaire pour passer un très bon séjour à Sofia.
Le quartier dispose de toutes les commodités à proximité, notamment un grand centre commercial. Le centre ville est à seulement 20 mn à pied et il y a le métro pour l'aéroport à proximité.", "Хозяин очень вежливый и гостеприимный, встретил нас около метро и привез в квартиру, ответил на все наши вопросы. Жильё полностью соответствует описанию, мы удобно разместились четвером с детьми. До памятников города (центра) 10-15 минут. До торгового центра и супермаркета 5 минут пешком. Рекомендуем всем, по соотношению цена/качество - "отлично".", "Yulian é um grande anfitrião. Procurou nos mostrar o bairro e nos deu dicas sobre a cidade. Esteve sempre disponível. Recomendo sem dúvida.", "Квартира хорошая, хозяин приветливый и очень заботливый об своих посетителей, квартира находится очень удобно"]

reviews:
["Really enjoyed this apartment. Great location for my business appointments and also just a short walk to the centre.  Stylish apartment with good size rooms.  Would definitely recommend", "amazing place", "Great place, great stay. I really enjoyed being so central, yet in a quiet neighbourhood, and of course the apartment is fully equipped and well furnished.", "I had the pleasure of living in Nona's apartment for 5 months. It really is a spectacular place to call home. The built-in coffee makers is fantastic! The apartment really has EVERYTHING you need, and because it is a real home, it has lots of things you don't know you need until you need it - things like scissors, needle and thread, glue, and so on. Nona's mom makes sure everything essential is stocked up, so really all you have to buy is food! If you are staying long-term, this makes the apartment a great value. It is quiet, safe, and the building is modern and clean. I loved living in Nona's apartment!", "Excellent place, friendly people, would use it again!  ", "We can't say enough good things about this apartment and the hosts. The location is superb, the apartment is really nicely decorated and incredibly well maintained - everything works. This is rarely the case on airbnb where apartments look much better on the pictures and are often falling apart. It is the best equipped apartment I have stayed in - you have everything you need to feel at home, to cook and to live there long term. The needs of the guests are taken into account in every detail. There is even a scale :) 

And yet the best part about it are the hosts - Nina is supremely quick in her communication and her mom Maria who took care of us during our two month stay is incredibly kind, thoughtful, and funny. We really had a joyful time getting to know her as she is an exceptional woman. We are very grateful to her for looking after us. It is also the cleanest place we have ever stayed in and she truly impressed us with the quality of everything she did - from fixing the building's door when the handle broke to always providing fresh, ironed towels for us. Thank you both for making these two months a home away from home for us and for all the fond memories we created there! :)", "Lovely apartment don't worry about it it's the best location and the jacuzzi gonna make u crazy!", "A great place to stay. Good location, not far from the city center. Pleasent house.", "Nina’s apartment is very modern and has all the necessary equipment for a comfortable stay in Sofia. The kitchen is super and there are 2 balconies. Comfortable beds and very nice dining/living room area. The location is great and the apartment is quiet and safe and has an elevator. Near small grocery stores and public transportation. Short distance to the center of Sofia and important sites as well as parks. Highly recommend this apartment for a short or long stay in Sofia for 2-4 people.", "Modern, well-equipped, clean flat in a quiet location close to public transport (tram and Metro),within walking distance of the pedestrian zone on the Vitosha boulevard. Highly recommended.", "We had a great three weeks in beautiful  Sofia and our apartment was great!  The kitchen was well equipped and the living space very comfortable. 

While it wasn’t an issue for us as the weather was cool, guests should be advised that the only air conditioning unit is in the living/dining/kitchen space so I would be worried that it might be warm in the bedrooms during a hot spell. 

I especially enjoyed the builtin Siemens automatic coffee machine-fresh ground coffee every morning at the push can’t be beat and we are spoiled for the future!", "The flat was absolutely great! Nothing to fault. Clean, great location, very quiet, but only a 15 to 20 minute walk to the main shopping area/restaurant and very close to the museum area. The communication was flawless and everything went perfectly! Again anytime!!", "Definitely will be back at this place. Nice apartment with good location...central. Close to hospitals, restaurants, bars... all. Very good comunication with the host. 24/7. Thank you Maria & Nina", "Everything was as promised.", "A perfect flat just 15 minute walking from the center. Very clean with very good equipments. Thank you Nina!", "5 stars all the way. The location is good, the appartment is clean and nice and the communication with Nina is smooth. I highly recommend.", "Perfect apartment as described. Great value will definitely stay again", "We loved the apartment! Excellent space for two couples or for a family of four, excellent location, very close to the center, we went on foot! Really clean and cosy, very hot, we didn't understand that the temperature in Sofia was about 1°C! Nina was reaaly helpful and her mother really friendly! We will definitely go back, I suggest this apartment to everybody!", "Excellent place. Nina is very helpful", "We spent 3 nights here over a weekend - it was amazing! The apartment is lovely and clean, very well presented and has loads of facilities including lots of toiletries and ingredients in the kitchen. Nina was very helpful and quick to respond to questions / phone calls. 

We absolutely loved having the balcony which has a lovely view of the mountain, and he jacuzzi bath was a fun addition too! :)

Outside the apartment was a small cafe where we sat outside to have a beer, and there was also a well stocked supermarket and fruit & veg shop around the corner. Taxis into the centre were very cheap (the app TaxiMe is very handy) and were about 3-4 lev (£1-2). 5 mins walk from the apartment is a great restaurant called Chevermeto and further up from there is Switch bar which has great vibes. If you do one thing whilst you visit it should be the Sofia Pub Crawl tour, it was 20 lev and an amazing night out visiting different bars and meeting new people. 

All in all an amazing weekend away, I would definitely prefer to stay in this apartment rather than closer to the centre as it’s quieter :)", "In this flat you fell it's your own house. Everything is clean and comfortable. Highly recommended.", "The flat is great! It's near to the City. Easy to find. With parkingplace. I come back!", "Good location for the centre and very confortable apartment", "Wonderful place and great area to stay while in Sofia! ", "Nina has a great place. Walking distance to downtown but on a quiet street. The apartment is very comfortable with good internet and facilities (of course I have to mention the fridge with build in TV ;)). Communication was very prompt and we enjoyed several suggestions from Nina. Would stay again and highly recommend. ", "Very nice place ", "Nina's apartment is fantastic. She gave us suggestions for places to go and was very prompt to reply to any Qs. The apartment itself is great and was a perfect stay for the four of us. We were very comfortable and happy- we look forward to returning one day! ", "Nina's place is centrally located in Sofia, about a 20 minute walk to the centre. There's an ATM located just around the corner, and a few small shops just on the other side of the block. The area was very quiet with no noise issues.
The apartment is very spacious and clean. The kitchen is well equipped with utensils.
Nina was great at communicating and answered all our questions.
I would strongly recommend for anyone looking for a nice place to stay in Sofia!", "We have stayed in this apartment for second time. The apartment is great for up to five people, very new furniture, great location and it has all amenities that you need.", "Nina made the whole trip and stay a sheer delight. This was my first experience with Airbnb and I have to say both the host and the apartment made me feel very spoiled. Nina was the first to answer any questions I had by (Hidden by Airbnb) or email and the communication was 1st class.  The apartment was clean, tidy and centrally located ( 15 min walk to city center). The apartment is in a quiet neighbourhood and has a great coffee machine and whirlpool jacuzzi on one of the bathrooms. if you have time to watch TV there are over 150 channels!  Nearby you have a local grocery store and a delightful coffee shop and pastries.  I must thank Nina for making the whole stay memorable and safe for me and my friend who travelled me. I felt as if I was home from home.  Thank you very much. ", "Great apparment. The description is very accurate. Clean, comfy. The coffee machine is great. The location is perfect, 10 minutes walking from the most commercial street in the city. Amazing food around! We loved the stay! ", "I think this was the most comfortable apartment I met in my long AirBnb experience. The apartment, is in a quite new building. It is spacious and definitely equipped with everything you may need. Two bathrooms, with hydromassage shower/bath, two sleeping rooms (silent during the night and well warmed), a great living room with LED tv with satellite and wifi. 
If you think to stay in Sofia for a long time this could really be a place you may consider your home, because you will feel cuddled, every minute.
Nina was kind and available to help me to find places in the city where to find what I needed.", "“Great place! Very kind host ! Superb location! New apartment, 2 rooms, 2 restrooms, good for family traveling!", "Nina's apartment is greast choice because it si very well equiped, it is spacious and very clean and the city centre is just 10 minutes on foot. Great value also.", "I can only recommend staying at this flat! Communication was perfect, flat really modern, extremely clean, tidy and cozy! Very good location, easy to access the city centre by tram, metro or just on foot!! Thanks for making the stay so enjoyable :)", "That is an amazing place. It is equipped with modern furniture and it was nicely decorated. Overall it was a house worth staying in and i definitely recommended to people who want to be close to medical university of sofia", "This was my second time staying at Nona's apartment and there was great satisfaction with everything. Highly recommended and Nona is great at responding to any concerns or questions. Thanks Nona.", "So my friend and I stayed at Nona's beautiful apartment in the middle of July. At the very beginning we treated like family. The apartment was so clean that it looked brand new! The pictures didn't do the apartment justice, which is hard to do since Nona took phenomenal pictures. The bedrooms were spacious, the bathrooms were super clean, and the living room/kitchen had more than enough space. The location was perfect, in a nice quiet area but within easy walking distance to everything! Definitely would stay there again in a heart beat!", "I have stayed at this apartment 3 times now, so needless to say I like it very much. This time I had another great experience. Nona and her mother, who runs the apartment, were very nice, accommodating and generous. Everything went smoothly, communication was excellent and everything worked out perfectly. I highly recommend staying at this wonderful place.", "Nona was prompt and helpful in her communication. Her lovely mother welcomed us, and was also very helpful. Her apartment was very comfortable and situated perfectly! ", "The host was fantastic.  We have had a great luck in Sofia and this was no exception.  A great location close the centre but still far enough away to be nice and quite. 

The unit itself had the best of everything which made a longer stay very comfortable. Great beds, kitchen equipment, and  a soaker tub. If it was available we would have extended. Book while you can! ", "Nona's flat is the perfect place to stay in Sofia - great central location, flat is equipped with everything you might need. Communication was easy and we would be happy to stay there again.", "Great experience, great value, great service! ", "Norams Mom waits for me. She show me the Flat and all environment.
She also helps me with using the wasching machine.
Everything was clear and working.
", "The host canceled this reservation 10 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.", "The apartment was very nice. The neighborhood was okay, but somewhat difficult to maneuver with a vehicle but, to be expected in Sophia, that has very narrow streets. Not too far to walk to the city center, about 10-15 minutes.", "Listing was as described except the hot tub was not working. The apartment was clean and well located. Nona was easy to communicate with and her mom was lovely enough to let us in and show us around when we arrived. ", "I travel a lot and have used airbnb many times throughout the world.  Nona apartment is fomr far the best one I had the chance to stay into.  Location is just great, a short walking distance from the center.  We had the chance to meet with some neighboors and had great exchanges with them.  Thank Nona and if we goback to Sofia, we ill definitely request your apartment but for at least 1 week.  Wish you and your mother, many blessings, Dulce", "Upon arrival, everything was just how Nona had described. Her mother was waiting for me and let me into the building. The apartment was wonderful and very comfortable. I was there for one month and Nona's mother came by a few times to clean and change the bedding. I was able to be in contact with Nona by phone and any questions I had were handled immediately. The location of the apartment was perfect for me. I couldn't have asked for anything better. Thanks Nona and your Mom. I will definitely look forward to staying with you again in the future.", "The apartment is one of the best ones I have ever been to. Nona is a great host. I'dcome here anytime again.", "The apartment was Beautiful! Everything you could possibly need! There is a very nice grocery store on the block along with two vegetable and fruit markets. A small coffe shop/ restaurant and an Italian restaurant. There is a lovely park for walking very near. This apartment is steps away from the medical academy but a long distance from the city center. The neighborhood is quiet.", "The flat was clean, well proportioned and within easy walking distance of the city centre.
The bed mattress is a little on the hard side and the large frame that extends around it may cost you a few cuts and bruises if you wake up in the middle of the night.
The jacuzzi bath overflows on to the bathroom floor when water goes down the overflow pipe and at night between midnight and 4 am the jacuzzi bath switches itself on automatically (for what and why; no one knows) and cannot be switched off manually during this process. The sound prevents anyone from sleeping or wakes you up.
Apart from these small things we had a pleasant stay.
PS: the tv on the fridge is too small to be viewed from the sitting room.", "We stayed in this apartment twice, in October 2014 and in January 2015. We liked it so much the first time that didn't even look for another one when we had to return to Sofia in January. Nona was very helpful and accommodating. We were met by her mother who welcomed us and made sure we knew where everything was in the apartment. The neighborhood is about 20 minutes' walk from the centre and it's very pleasant as you walk on the main central street Vitosha. One thing we really liked is the proximity of the traditional Bulgarian restaurant Chevermeto where you can see a program with Bulgarian folk dances - I highly recommend going there. If you are going in winter, you'll be happy to know that there is central heating and the apartment is very warm. ", "Our second time there... and still as satisfying as the first visit. This place feels great and is well heated during winter! The host is absolutely easy to communicate with! ", "The apartment was exactly as described. The host and her mother were very friendly and hospitable and waited for me even though I was delayed by 2 hours. Lovely apartment - very cozy, very well furnished and close to the center.   You can practically walk down to the National Palace of Culture (10-15 min walk).  Safe and quiet building and neighbourhood (no parties, loud music )
Would go there again.", "Nona's apartment was great!  It was really modern and warm and hot water and everything was clean.  It was only a short walk to the main pedestrian street and close to the city center.  She also gave good advice on how much taxis should cost.  ", "The flat was exactly as we expected. Clean, well-furnished, and tranquil.... everything was nice and tidy, the bathrooms finished to a very high standard, bedrooms comfortable and spacious... and the coffee machine in the kitchen is AMAZING.

Nona was super-helpful whenever we needed something... highly recommend staying here. We'll certainly be back next time we visit our family again in Bulgaria!", "I stayed for five days and it was more than expected. The apartment was a luxury and has all the equipment that need a whole family. Nona was kind and helpful, a good person to deal with.", "Great welcome and availability, new and comfortable home in a great location, within walking distance from the center.", "We were 2 couples stying in Nona's Fantastic home ,
From the First Moment Nona did everything to make us feel as home as possible.
When we arrived everything was ready for us like we asked and the diractions were really easy and clear. 

During time we stayed in Nona's place the communication was just great and She answred any question we had within a very short time and in a very caring matter.

The place it self was also great, very modern and comfortable with two sunny balconies, The loction is just on the edge of the center of sofia and the main resterunt and bars area only a short taxi\Metro or 15 min walk away . 

Thank again Nona , It was a fantastic experience !", "Awesome two-bedroom apartment! Perfectly positioned, right where you want to be – just moments from all the best cafes, restaurants, and shops. Stylish look, nice open-plan living & dining room and modern kitchen with all necessary appliances. Highly recommended accommodation and very friendly host. We had a great time. Thank You! ", "The apartment is really nice. It's spacious, modern, with well equipped kitchen. We loved all the appliances, especially the coffee machine. It is cool! We made cappuccino every morning.
The location is great! There are 2 small shops nearby if you need to buy something to eat. There are numerous restaurants in the city centre which can be reached within 7-10 mins on foot. 
The Internet is fast enough, though had some problems with WiFi, couldn't connect all our 7 devices at the same time, had to play around with the router, but we still managed to work. 
Nona is very attentive and helpful host. She is willing to solve any problem you may face. She was always in touch with us.
I would definitely recommend this place to stay in Sofia, whether you are coming for holidays or for a business trip. You will enjoy it for sure!
", "Nona's apartment is awesome! It is basically a hotel presidential suite but at a much lesser price! Everything was perfectly clean, the facilities are fully equipped and the zen atmosphere is exactly like in the photos. I definitely recommend this great place for everyone in Sofia. One again, AirBnB proves to be an excellent alternative to expensive and impersonal hotels..All the best! ", "Nona was a perfect host. Everything worked well and was organized. Communication was awesome. The apartment met all the promises - especially it was very clean which I liked very much!", "We had a great time at Nona's apartment. It was very clean and supplied with all the necessary amenities. The balcony and the flowers were perfect.  Everything was OK and we highly recommend it.  ", "The apartment is spacious, beautiful and modern. The location is fantastic, right off of Vitosha and walking distance to pretty much everything in Sofia. Nona met me in the apartment on arrival, and prior to my departure was even nice enough to print out my boarding pass for me and drop it at the apartment so I could avoid waiting on line at the airport. I will definitely stay here again next time I am in Sofia. ", "Nora s apartment is outstanding. Very clean and quite central, it has everything you could possibly need. It is a very modern and tasteful apartment and Nora and her mother are very nice and helpful. Highly recommended. Thanks again Nora!", "Me and my friends had a great time in Sofia - also thanks to Priya.
The apartament is just wonderful like the photos: clean, peaceful, exotic and comfortable. The neighborhood is mostly quiet and so is the whole building. 
Priya's mother helped us with the laundry and she was so kind altought she don't speak english. 
Beautiful place, kind people - rent for good!", "The apartment is amazing, very modern and clean. We enjoyed our stay there very much. ", "Great apt
", "The neighborhood was great and within walking distance of everything. Sofia is a small city, and cabs are cheap, so it's easy to get around.

The apartment was incredibly clean and well-provisioned, and Priya and her mother are great hosts!

Will book again!", "The apartment is a few blocks from all of the shops and restaurants. Great place, and Priya and her mom are great hosts! Will book again.", "This appartment is fantastic; very clean with two very nice finished baths. Wifi works great and It's full of usefull equipments, finally it's really close to the city center (10 min walking). I absolutely recommend it.", "We had an excellent time in Sofia and surroundings. The appartment is spotless clean and very quiet. Spacious with two toilets, a shower and bath. luxury! Really, good quality for a good price. The balcony is small but big enough to have breakfast of to chill after a long day in town. Within a walking distance of ten/fifteen minutes you'll be in the heart of the centre with lots of bars and restaurants. We will definitely choose for this exotic oasis once we visit Sofia again. And believe me, that will happen!", "It was a very Nice week end in this flat. Clean, Safety, everything is Alright, but the most important was the nina's welcome, smile, positive attitude, she took care about us and about the car because she stayer till WE found a Free place for the car. 
Thank you very much Priya and Nina", "this appartment is just amazing, it felt immediately like home. i really loved it.", "The apartment is gorgeous and stylish. Everything you need is provided for and it's really no more than 10-15 minutes away from the center. Very quiet and relaxing, Nona and her mother were so polite and kind, strongly recommended, you won't be disappointed!", "The place was as advertised and Nona's mom was awesome and adorable - she helped us out (even though she doesn't speak english) and for 10€/week she helped with cleaning as well. All in all it was a great experience. And we would definitely recommend Nona's place in Sofia. And YES, we'd love to come back! ", "Nona's flat is fantastic. The pictures don't really make justice, the apartment has got everything you need, it's tastefully decorated and well located. You can easily walk to the main attractions.
Last but not least, Nona is a great host and will take care in case of need.
I would definitely book it again.", "Absolutely comforting place, has its own spirit and character... Feels like home... And the location is more than perfect.  We had an enjoyable stay!  :)))", "Great apartment. Great walking distance from the center (15mins). Apartment is furnished with really nice stuff, and it is very pleasant to live in. Definitely a big recommendation.", "Ok, so we loved the apartment so much we booked it twice!  Once again, Nona was kind and exceptionally accommodating... A perfect experience from start to finish.  Book with Nona and you won't be disappointed!

Chris", "We rented Nona's gorgeous  apartment during our recent summer vacation in Bulgaria. The location in Sofia's center was superb, minutes walking to the National Palace of Culture, restaurants , bars, shopping and tons of cultural entertainment. THe apartment is absolutely beautiful, with very high end furnishing, making for a really superior comfort. The host communication with us, flexibility with dates we booked and overall coordination throughout our  stay was an excellent experience  and we have rented over 10 times all over the world and are airbnb hosts ourselves. Highly recommend  and would love to stay again at the apartment on our next trip to Sofia. ", "Apartamento bien situado, bien equipado y la anfitriona está muy atenta a las necesidades de sus huespedes", "Πολύ ωραίο σπίτι,κεντρικά εργονομικό", "Eine super tolle Wohnung!! Jederzeit wieder!!!", "Departamento muy recomendable espacioso, bien ubicado en una palabra excelente.", "Al nostro arrivo abbiamo subito trovato una persona che ci ha (Website hidden by Airbnb) in casa e illustrato il funzionamento degli accessori in dotazione all'appartamento che è situato in un quartiere tranquillo pulito, ben servito dai mezzi pubblici e dal quale in pochi minuti si può raggiungere il centro della città-
", "Мы были в Софии неделю. Квартира очень чистая и удобная в соответствии с её описанием на сайте .
Район тихий и спокойный .  Спасибо Нона .", "La casa estaba muy bien y sorprendio gratamente nuestras expectativas.", "THANK YOU NONA AND YOUR MOTHER VERY VERY MUCH ...
