reviews:
["The place was great, the host was very responsive and easy to communicate.", "Radoslav was a great host. The studio was very comfortable and spacious. It was equipped with all the necessary utilities. The location was perfect- within a few minutes from the center of the city. Highly recommend!", "Radoslav was very responsive and easy to communicate. I recommend his place.", "Great location, nice view, smooth communication with the host. Clean and tidy flat. You can find everything needed in the kitchen. Probably the beds could be a bit more comfortable. However, clean sheets and towels . Nice stay in general. Thank you, Radoslav!", "Great host, clean apartment, fully equipped. Recommend.", "The neighborhood is great, there are plenty of shops and places to eat at. There is a shopping mall at a walking distance and the metro station is not too far away. The apartment is well equipped with everything you might need from. There was a problem with the refrigerator, but unfortunately the company's service was not able to fix it while we were there. Overall experience was as we needed and expected.", "Great host. Very cozy and clean apartment. Near to the Mall of Sofia and to the center of Sofia.", "Would recommend it to everyone! We had great time!", "Radoslav was very careful to explain me all the details and his friend Kris check-in us although was late in the night.  The apartment was very clean, I liked the urban view from the window. The area was safe and 15 enjoyable minutes by walk to the center. I only suggest to be quite especially during the night because the man downstair can hear all your steps. Anyway was a good stay and I recommend this place. Thank you.", "Good place, I recommend it!", "Nice apartment in a very good location!", "Kris was very kind and attentive! helped us a lot", "Ok apartment. But A lady came and cleaned the House a Day before We were leaving and took the food out of the fridge. Washer machine and the oven didn’t work", "Perfect location, near Mall Sofia, easy walk to public transport. Clean and comfy apartment. Accurate pictures.", "The apartment is located in the heart of Sofia and equipped with everything that you need. The price is really good for what it offers. The only negative aspect would be the fact that there is a very impolite neighbor living under Radoslav`s place who seems to be more than sensitive to noises and reacts in a very bad way. We were 4 friends staying there and during the evening we stayed in the kitchen and had some chat, but nothing very noisy (it was on a Friday, before 11 PM) and the neighbor came almost knocking down the door and he even tried to enter in the apartment (he tried the door). He seemed to be pretty massive and some of the people got scared. Of course we didn`t open, as we don`t know the language and he didn`t seem to have be very friendly at all, but that made the stay there a bit uncomfortable. 
I know is not Radoslav`s fault, but you should keep that in mind in case you`re planning to do any kind of socializing with your friends there that don`t involve whispering.", "Super nice place, close to center and metro and bus stops if you don't like to walk. The apartment is clean and has everything needed for living even if for short visit. Recommended", "The apartment was great, not too fancy but still we had everything we needed!", "Best flat for a fair price. I cn just recommend this place", "The flat was Ok, in a good area. The bed can be better, the bathroom looks pretty decadent and the decoration style its simply terrible, but it becomes part of the charm.
I like my experience and I appreciate the fast answers and good communication.", "the house was perfect ", "The apartment was ok for low budget guests. It has all you need inside but we had a bad luck to find the washing machine is out of order and that was a matter for us . We recommend that listing if you on a budget. 
Thank you 
Hani", "The flat is lovely, just like sleeping at your grandmothers. Very clean, address is easy to find, parking spot out front. Radoslav was very responsive and friendly. Perfect!", "Everything was cool. Clean, cute apartment. Everything you need is here. Place is close to historical center of Sofia.", "The apartment is located in residential area around 10 -15 min by walk to city centre. It was very clean inside and it has big bedroom with nice balcony! It's on sunny part and nice view to all city. I haven't met Radoslav but I met his friend Martin who was very friendly and polite. He was happy to wait for me at 1am due to my late flight to Sofia. Just 5 min away is Big shopping Mall called Mall of Sofia! Also cross the street is small convenient shop open 24/7. Just be aware that there is fee for "late check in"  after 10pm in amount 10 usd. It's hidden on house rules and I didn't know about that. For solo traveler (or couple) I can recommend this apartment!", "The apartment was centrally located and very comfortable; would stay again if I return to Sofia!", "Huge flat very well situated (10 - 15 min of the center by walk), and well equiped.
I didn't Radoslav in person, but he was very reactive at my messages and very friendly.
In a word : I recommand Radoslav's place!", "Very good located,clean and cosy apartment. Check-in and communication was great. I would definitely recommend it to everyone.", "Definitely the best AirBnb deal in Sofia. Great location, very clean and modern and good price. I recommend it!", "Big and comfortable flat, located very central; one block away from a big shopping mall and two and a half from the subway. Easy to walk to the main attractions of the city. The kitchen is fully equipped. It’s located in the 10th floor and the lift is a bit scary.
Good value for money. 
We did not meet Radoslav in Person. However, he was always available and also replied very fast. We did meet Rossen, who was very friendly and helpful.", "Communication Radoslav was easy and friendly. I booked this ahead of time for a friend and I, and ended up having a family emergency. I messaged him asking what he'd like to do to move forward, and he was very kind, understanding, and accommodating. My friend stayed there and said the place looked exactly like it did in the pictures, check in was a breeze, and the amenities exceeded her expectation.

Based on my experience, I would book this place again and stay here.

Thank you, Radoslav. Your kindness was very appreciated with everything I had on my plate.", "Radoslav and his brother Rossen were very kind and responsive to any of my requests. The pace was nice and clean, the building quite charming, and a walking distance from downtown Sofia. We had a nice stay at this place, I recommend!", "Good place in city centre near shops and cafes", "It was amazing stay at your home. Thanks a lot for everything.", "Everything was really clear and the house was very comfortable. Big kitchen with all the  essentials and a nice bathroom. Im very satisfied with my stay there.", "Good value for money! Good host!", "Good position,  close to center", "Clean and warm aparment, perfect communication with the host. Very good quality-price relation.", "I recommend the Radoslav apartment.
Rossen (a friend of Radoslav), waited for me in a Friday late evening.
The apartment is in a good location, in a walking distance to the center, near a lot markets and places to eat.
The bed is a little bit noisy and the bath tube don't have the curtain but the flat is great, clean and in the kitchen u will find everything you need.
I loved the urban view from the tenth floor.
Radoslav and Rossen answered always quickly to my messages. 
A great value for a weekend in Sofia.", "Everything was good.", "Clean apartment in a good position to reach the city center. Close to the metro station. It’s a nice place!", "The location of the apartment is in a walking distance to the center. The apartment is ok. The sheets are clean. But the bed is noisy and uncomfortable. The kitchen is ok. But  the bathroom is very old and the bath tube has no curtain so everywhere is a mess after every shower. The entrance to the buildining is too old dirty and creepy.", "Like it is said, it is not the best looking building from the outside. But once in the accomodation, everything is perfect. Not too far away from the city center and NDK. We visited Sofia only by walking from this place. And Radoslav answered vert quickly and precisely to our questions. A very good stay !", "Great place to stay in Sofia! Great hosts who even allowed us to check in early and took us to a nice cafe for lunch while the cleaners prepared the apartment. Highly recommend.", "Radoslav was good host- he answered quickly to our messages so we could check-in on the same day. The flat was clean and spacious. It was fully equipped, especially the kitchen. The flat close to the center of Sofia- around 15 minutes walking. We had a good time.", "We arrived late than anticipated to our apartment and Rossen was waiting for us. The apartment block itself is like Radoslav described: not very appealing entrance or lifts but the apartment itself was well presented. Good facilities inside such as washing machine, bath. Overall, it was a good base for exploring Sofia.", "Old apartment, being likely dangerous elevator...
But I was satisfied with the clean and safe hostel.", "it was nice, host was kind and friendly
i felt only bathroom was little bit old
good location", "Very friendly apartment great value and amazing hosts very well recommend", "I will recommend Radoslav apartment. It's in a good location, very quite. The apartment it's very clear and the communication was perfect. ", "Всё идеально. Всё необходимое в квартире есть. Центр. Отличная инфраструктура рядом. Честный хозяин. Всем рекомендую.", "Apartment spacious, propose et accueuillant", "Wohnung etwa 2km vom Zentrum entfernt. Liegt zwar im 10. Stock eines Blockhauses aber für bulgarische Verhältnisse ideal für einen Aufenthalt in Sofia. Ich würde die Wohnung jederzeit wieder buchen.", "Primeiramente, tivemos dificuldades para encontrar o local pois não tínhamos internet para contato com o anfitrião e o alfabeto búlgaro não é fácil de entender, por sorte tinha próximo uma Wi-Fi free. O elevador não funcionou e tivemos que subir as escadas com malas pesada, e eram 10 andares. Quando achamos que estava ruim, notamos que a escada era suja, cheia de entulho, e com paredes pichadas e destruídas, e ficamos com muito medo. Notamos também que haviam muitos fios elétricos mal instalações com riscos de curto-circuito. O prédio é velho, e depois de ver tudo isso até fiquei aliviado de não utilizar o elevador pois o risco a minha vida poderia ser maior, e isso foi consenso entre meus acompanhantes. Não sei até que ponto isso é culpa do anfitrião mas tem que ficar claro para todos que o prédio não é bem cuidado. No mais a acomodação por dentro é excelente e bem localizada.", "casa spaziosa e accogliente, cucina molto attrezzata, vicino al piano di sotto MOLTO sensibile e abbastanza aggressivo.", "appartement was een  beetje verouderd, met name de badkamer. Bedden hadden enkel een topper waardoor je erg hard ligt. De ligging is wel Oké, leuk om vanuit het appartement naar het centrum te lopen.", "Es handelt sich um eine ein Es handelt sich um eine einZimmerwohnung im 10. Stock eines großen Plattenbaus. Ein großes Lob an die Sauberkeit, die Wohnung ist gut ausgestattet und alles ist an seinem Platz. Der Check in war problemlos dank (Hidden by Airbnb) , was bei der Anzahl der Wohnungen und Größe des areals nicht selbstverständlich ist. 

Alles ist gut zu Fuß zu erreichen. Ich komme gerne wieder.", "Es un alojamiento relativamente bien situado, a unos 20 minutos andando del centro, con cocina, baño y una habitación con cama de matrimonio y 1 sofá. Por otra parte, recomiendo dejar claras todas las condiciones con el anfitrión, ya que no nos aclaró la hora de salida (nos dijo que cuando quisiéramos irnos, dejáramos las llaves en un punto)  y por ello tuvimos que salir corriendo cuando llegó la persona de la limpieza. Al hablar con él por teléfono, se puso un poco brusco porque en poco tiempo tenía otros huéspedes. Sin embargo, con una buena comunicación, lo considero un buen sitio para pasar unos días en Sofía.", "Отличная квартира на 10 этаже многоквартирного дома. Для нас было не просто разобраться с адресом из-за того, что в Софии есть ещё какая-то нумерация помимо домов, мы так и не поняли в общем, что она означает, достаточно смотреть на номер дома и подъезда, чтобы найти, а загадочная цифра 29 означает что-то ещё) мы немного переживали из-за этой нумерации и звонили хозяину. Нас встретил друг хозяина и всё в итоге было хорошо) ещё в доме есть не знакомая нам система с магнитным ключом, который надо прикладывать везде) чтобы зайти в подъезд, чтобы выйти и чтобы лифт поехал) на этом сложности заканчиваются) в квартире очень чисто, особенно нас порадовала кухня, на которой можно было найти всё. Не всегда бывает комфортно готовить в путешествиях, но здесь было всё для того, чтобы можно было чувствовать себя как дома) можно было найти специи, масло, кофе. Каждый что-то привозит и может оставить для следующих гостей, это приятно. Кондиционеры работают хорошо. Есть телевизор с большим количеством каналов на болгарском, английском и даже один на русском) больше всего нам понравились болгарские фолк-каналы) стиральная машинка есть, но к сожалению, она не работала, о чем было сказано в записке, приклеенной к ней. Кажется, она сломалась не перед нашим приездом, потому что записка выглядит уже немного потрепанно, надеемся, хозяин скоро её починит;-) достаточное количество ящиков в комоде, есть одеяла в шкафу, сушилка для белья, довольно просторный балкон, кондиционеры на кухне и в комнате. Шампунь и гель для душа были, но для 6 дней количества было маловато. Отличная квартира за отличную цену)) метро недалеко, продуктовый магазин виден из окна, надо пройти через двор, и есть ещё маленькие магазинчики рядом. И торговый центр недалеко. Нам всё понравилось) спасибо, Radoslav! ", "Miejsce warte polecenia. 
Od centrum dzieli nas tylko krótki spacer. Okolica dobrze wyposażona w sklepy.", "Цена-качество лучшее в городе !)
", "Απολυτα εξοπλισμένο σπιτακι, με πολυ ωραία θέα.  Καθαρο με άνετη κουζινα, ιδανικο για 1-3 άτομα. Το στρώμα δεν ηταν άνετο αλλα κατα τα άλλα εξαιρετικό δωμάτιο. Καλη σχέση ποιότητας τιμής.", "房子位置不错,交通便利,室内设施齐全,非常好,值得推荐", "El apartamento está muy bien ubicado para conocer Sofía a pie. Supermercados y restaurantes a solo unas cuadras. El departamento es muy completo, limpio y cómodo. Volveríamos sin dudas!", "Appartement confortable et très lumineux. Le repérage dans le quartier n'est pas toujours évident, surtout le soir, à cause du défaut d'indication des noms des rues..
Sinon, 25 mn à pied du centre sur un parcours agréable, c'est vraiment sympa.
Radoslav donne les renseignements en temps et en heure, en particulier pour l'arrivée.", "Apartamento situado a 20-25 mins del centro de Sofía (Vitosha y alrededores). Muy limpio y muy bien cuidado y acogedor. Para repetir !", "Ci siamo trovati bene! L’appartamento è curato e ospitale! A 10 min a piedi dal centro e 5 dalla fermata metro. Palazzo alto 10 piani facile da trovare. Lo consiglio!", "- Die Wohnung liegt im 10. Stock eines Plattenbaus, mit der Aussicht auf andere Plattenbauten. 
- Innenarchitektonisch ist die Wohnung zwar kein Highlight, aber es war alles da, was man so braucht. 
- Vermietet wird anscheinend durch ein Unternehmen, wodurch der persönliche Aspekt von AirBnB etwas zu kurz kommt. Der Check-in war in Ordnung, verlief aber unter hohem Zeitdruck, weil schon die nächsten Gäste in einer anderen Wohnung warteten. 
- Parkplätze sind rar.
- Die Nachbarn scheinen nicht glücklich zu sein mit der professionellen Vermietung einer normalen Wohnung an Touristen. 15 Minuten nach dem Checkin klopfte ein Nachbar an unsere Wohnungstür und wies auf die Hellhörigkeit im Gebäude hin. Als ich die Koffer bei der Abreise nach unten brachte echauffierte sich eine andere Nachbarin, allerdings auf Bulgarisch, so dass ich nicht verstand, was genau das Problem war.", "L'appartamento si trova in una posizione strategica vicino al centro città e a 5 min dalla stazione metro. Il quartiere è tranquillo e pulito e ben servito da negozi, bar e ristoranti. L'alloggio ha tutte le essenziali comodità per soggiornare comodamente in due persone. Radostin è stato sempre molto tempestivo nel rispondere alle mie domande. Grazie per avermi ospitato! Dessislava", "Tolle Lage, gute Verkehrsverbindungen, gemühtliche Wohnung, genauso 
wie beschrieben. 
Gerne wieder!", "Top Preisleistungsverhältnis! Alles war super.. Sofia gerne wieder :)

Liebe Grüße aus Köln
Gökhan", "L'appartamento di Radoslav è accogliente e spazioso, situato in una zona tranquilla a una fermata di metro o 15 minuti a piedi dalle principali attrazioni turistiche della città. L'ampia cucina è dotata di tutto quello che serve e anche di più, e gli ambienti sono puliti e curati. Radoslav è stato sempre estremamente disponibile e gentilissimo, e così il suo amico Rossen che ci ha accolti il primo giorno. 
Un ottimo posto per passare qualche giorno in una splendida città! Grazie mille!"]

reviews:
["perfect location, good value! recommend it :)", "Good location with kind hosts.", "Excellent apartment, accommodation and location! Stan &Mimi, thank you very much! 
Cvety Angelova :-)", "The location of the apartment is just gorgeous - seconds away from the pedestrian Vitosha blvd, the space is clean and cozy, ideal for travelers, who need accessibility to Sofia downtown without much hassle.
The hosts are really strict on check-in and check-out, so don't expect any leeway, even if your flights get in before 3pm or you have to leave much after 11am. There were some issues with the piping, but they were relatively quickly resolved.
Overall - very good value for money for short term stays.", "The apartment is perfect - clean and cozy. The location is great central. Stan&Mimi is very friendly, easy to communicate. But one thing upset us - there was no hot water. Hot water was switched of for 2 weeks in the whole center in Sofia before few days of our arrival. I can't understand, how host didn't know about it and didn't notify us about this situation in Sofia. Absolutely no chance to take a shower after fly and hot day. There was no basin or washbowl to heat water and clean our child. This only one thing upset us very much. ", "Wonderful place at the heart of the city! Quiet and calm place, 50 meters from the beautiful pedestrian zone of Sofia. I strongly recommend it!", "Very nice place, in the top of the city center, clean and comfortable. ", "A truly great apartment with an amazing location (you are basically 10m away from Sofia's Fifth Avenue :). The apartment is nice and clean, very spacious and very well equipped. Anything else you might need like shops, restaurants, bars, museums, etc is just around the corner - literally! Communication was super fast and friendly, would highly recommend it!", "Stayed here for 2 night, and thoroughly enjoyed it. The center is only a few steps (Website hidden by Airbnb) is a beautiful apartment just as described. We will look for this apartment on our  next visit. Super gr8 stay .5 stars all the way. Thank you Stan you are the best host.", "Stan is a great host. I totally recommend him. The apartment is really cozy and  in the ideal centre.", "Truly amazing and it is really unbeatable location! I've been all over the world and this is one of the best value/money spots we've found! 

The apartment is brand new - renovated in a small 9 unit building only 10 steps away from the main pedestrian street. It had everything we needed.

The neighborhood is safe and around us we found so many little nice shops, great restaurants, and cafes. Stan recommended to us a place called Momata - they serve delicious Bulgarian food and the service is outstanding.

Stan was very easy to communicate with. Check in and out was as smooth as possible. All you need is a code he gives you. This really helped us since we did a late check in. 

We definitely recommend Stan's apartment and would gladly stay here next time we come in Sofia. Thank you!  ", "Very nice and clean place. Great location, I was really easy to make my meetings around the city center. Internet was really fast, that is important for my work.", "Amazing flat in the best area of Sofia.
Cozy, clean, comfortable .
Stanimir was extremely helpfull .
Thank you ", "This apartment is amazing! Loved it and will return. Highly recommended!

I guess we were the first guests to a brand new apartment. Everything was new and it was wonderful. 

The kitchen is really well equipped and the living room is very charming. The bed was comfortable and the wifi was fast (this is always very important for us).

The location is very easy accessible and Stanimir's apartment truly is right in the center of the downtown area. We couldn't me more lucky to have this apartment, at that price, in this location.

Stanimir was really nice and we had a smooth airbnb experience.", "Great location, everything as expected. Really good communication and great recommendations. We will be back", "Great apartment, located perfectly near the main street to discover the center on foot! Quick and easy Check-In and fast communication! Definitely recommend it!", "Communication was spot on, everything ran like clockwork.  Apartment was perfectly located and was touching distance from everything central.  Shopping is amazing!  We were left lots of tips which we took up a few and were great.  Would definitely stay here again.", "Hi. Great location in heart of city and close to all restaurants and cafes. Excellent!", "Highly recommend, TOP location, super clean, quiet and comfy apartment!!!
Great value.", "The apartment is located in the centre of Sofia, near the main Street. it's possible to reach the mains monument by walking. The house is nice, clean and comfortable; the only one thing I didn't like was the view from the window, but it's not so important: do you have to visit the city, not stay at the window.", "Great place! The location is perfect if you want to enjoy Sofia center! Very quiet place for its location! I recommand it!", "Best location! Comfortable apartment! No need to look any further!", "It was such a good experience to stay at this nice apartment!!! The host was so kind and make all the stuff so easy to us. The apartment is as beautiful as it seems, and it was clean and confortable. The location was unbeatable!! Just go out the door and you will be at the main boulevard of  the city, with a lot of stores and restaurants, and if you walk it down, you will arrive at Palace of Justice and city centre Old Town in 10 minuts. Absolutly recommendated to stay at this place if you go to visit the beautiful Sofia!!", "Excellent apartment, well located. Stan & Mimi were very reactive. We enjoyed our stay in here", "Great location to pedestrian walking street with restaurants and access to Metro and city center", "It was a real pleasure having the opportunity to stay 2 nights in Stan&Mimi's flat. Its location was very central, it's exceptionally clean, tidy, secure and equipped with everything we needed in the kitchen, bathroom and bedrooms. My mother, aunt and I felt very comfortable and really happy to go to the flat after our long walks around the city. If we come back to Sofia we'll definitely check if  this flat is free for us to stay there again. We will also highly recommend it to others. Thank you Stan&Mimi!", "Looks much better in photos. No air conditioning. No soap. No shampoo.
Location decent. It’s in a weird creepy building. I wouldn’t recommend", "The apartment is placed in perfect place. The check in was very accurate and fast.", "the apartment is not suitable for guests who come with children.
the location is excellent but everything else is not.", "exactly as the name says - unbeatable location ", "Thank you for the tips, they were all very relevant! We had a great time in Sofia and we will keep good memories of your place. Thanks! Caroline & Mathieu", "Just perfect! Exactly in the center but in a very quite corner. Mimi & Stan are super kindly and they are the perfect hosts.", "Great apartment and you can’t find better location than this. We are definitely staying there again next time. The hosts are great with communication. Highly recommended ", "The place is accurately described, with smooth check-in! Although we did not meet Stan and Mimi, they offered us tips about Sofia and readily answered our questions regarding our stay. Highly recommended!", "Everything is perfect. Excellent location, Response quickly, communication well...If I go to Sofia next trip , I will stay here again.", "perfect! very nice house and good chickin checkout ;)", "Great place! Easy check-in and overall an apartment that's very worth it for its price. You can't get a better location: in the middle of a lively neighborhood with lots of bars and food place nearby. I would definitely come back here, next time I'm in Sofia!", "Check-in and check-out were perfect and super easy. The apartment is in a very good location. The only downside of my stay is that the apartment was missing shower gel and shampoo. 
That's very annoying when you arrive late after a long flight and want to shower. Those items were supposed to be provided and included with the apartment but when I requested some, I simply got a message from the host telling that the cleaner must have forgotten to put some in the apartment and that I should go buy some myself... 

Another annoying thing: the bed was made with very light bedsheets and no blanket. During my stay the weather wasn't so good so it was cold at night... In the wardrobe there was some blanket, but none of them were clean (they were quite smelly (bad)). 

I tried to contact the host but got no response for more than 1 or 2 days. Apparently, the host didn't get any notifications that I left him several txt message via airbnb.

Other than that, the apartment is nice and spacious with fast internet, easy to find and only 20 mins from the airport in taxi (11-13 leva).", "This is as they say an unbeatable location. If you want to live in the heart of the city and have a relativly quiet bedroom on budget price. This is your place!
There were no extras or luxury, but just enough for our needs.", "Great location and great amenities! Perfect for staying in Sofia :) ", "Unbelievable appartment!", "Great location, walking distance from one of the main roads. The house is very big and comfortable.", "The house was really big and nice! Had everything we needed. Great location!", "best place to stay, very close to the main attractions in Sofia! Super nice and clean apartment. Highly recommended!", "Good central apartment with responsive hosts. They could recommend me a god car rental place with affordable cars.", "This flat is very well located in Sofia.  The self check-in instructions were very clear so we had no problem getting to the location and getting in.  I must say, though, that never meeting the host felt very impersonal. The flat itself is fine- good couch, dining table and comfortable bed – but rather dark inside.  The shower encompasses the whole bathroom, so you have to be thoughtful about using it (move the toilet paper, close the commode, and hold the shower carefully so that you minimize the overall wetness in the bathroom).  The kitchen had only 2 pans! I bought, and left behind, a small saucepan because I found it very hard to cook with only a skillet and a very large pot.  Everything in the kitchen worked well. The Wi-Fi was fast and reliable.", "Awesome place!
Really good central location and stylish apartment.
Highly recommended", "Lovely home with beautiful aesthetics and decoration of the area, quiet neighborhood and no bells. For the next time I already know the choice of the house !!!! Thanks for all!!!!", "Nice house and very centric, very useful the locker to leave and pickup de key easily without contact the owner.", "Perfect place, Located almost on Vitosha Blvd, easy check in.  Highly recommended!!", "Had a wonderful stay in this perfectly located and homely apartment! Wonderful hosts who shared so much helpful knowledge about Sofia and replied promptly to all questions. Would definitely stay here again! thank you", "House was very nice and clean with beautiful furnitures. Even if outside there was the snow house was gery very warm and comfortable. Just 1 minutes walking from vitosha boulevard and 8 minutes from the metro station. Stan and Mimi has been really gentle and always they had suggested me what to do and where to eat. Definitely I will book again with them.", "Great looking, clean, and in the perfect location.", "The place is great and the location is amazing. We have stayed in 3 Airbnb in Sofia and so far this is our favourite one. It is 10 metres away from the bars and restaurants on Vitosha blvd. Next to the apartment there is a place to change currency, with some of the best rates in the city. The apartment is clean and nicely furnished. Although we did not meet the hosts, the communication was super fast and efficient. When we received the confirmation for the booking it was written that there was a water leakage from the neighbours. Do not worry about this, as the spots on the walls are almost invisible. However, there was still some of the unpleasant smell linked to the problems with the pipes, but if you air the apartment often enough, it is not a big deal.", "AMAZING location! If you are planning a trip to Sofia, I highly recommend Stan and Mimi's place. It is immaculate and very spacious. Easy check in and fast responses. ", "Best possible location! Clean and warm!", "It’s a warm and cosy apartment right in a heart of Sofia. Comfortably fit family of 4, kids 3 and 6 years old included. Walking distance to everything and metro stop just in 5 minutes if you need to go further. Self check-in was super easy, all instructions and tips provided by owners.
Be aware of private taxi on a Vitosha Bolivar, negotiate price before or use “Ok taxi” as we did.", "Unfortunately, we had to cancel our stay with Stan & Mimi  after half a day due to a smell which we thought may have been mold was causing issues with my partners Asthma. The owners had warned us that there had been a water leak from neighbours previously so perhaps it was this. This was unfortunate as the location is ideal for anyone staying in Sofia. The hosts were really apologetic and allowed a refund for us straight away and even offered another home that they host close by which was nice. The owners insisted that the place would be cleaned and investiagted and assuming that the smell is gone -  the host were nice, the place was close to the main boulevard and most amenities you need were there. The accuracy and cleanliness has been rated lower due to my own personal experience but the hosts are very considerate and want you to enjoy your stay!", "Perfect location, hosts that respond very fast and nice apartment.", "Superb location meters away from Sofia's busiest shopping street and in close proximity to a lot of nice restaurants and cafes. The place is cosy and clean and the communication with Stan&Mimi was perfect.", "A great little apartment in the central area.  Was perfect for four of us staying, close to everything we wanted to do in the city.", "I definitely recommend staying here. The host was very accommodating with us, communicated quickly and is very kind. The apartment really is in an unbeatable location as well!", "Great place. Everything was perfect. It was very easy to make everything on time.. I strongly recommend this place for a stay...perfect place for an easy access to everywhere within the city", "Unbeatable location, walking distance from every single attraction of the city center!", "Perfect place to stay in Sofia. Well located, plenty of space for 5 people and felt very homely. Stan and Mimi always responded very quickly.", "Awesome apartment, location, and host! Would definitely stay again", "This is a great place to stay, very comfortable with everything you need! And perfect location right off the main shopping/restaurant Street. The hosts communicated well throughout the booking process/ our stay and suggested lots of great things to do around the area. I would highly recommended for groups, my friends and I had a wonderful stay!", "Excellent location and a very nice apartment", "Nice location close restaurants and shopping.", "Perfect location, clean and well furnished. Perfect for anyone looking to explore the beautiful city.", "Unbeatable location! We were so close to all the action. We went on a walking tour and when we reached Vitosha and showed our fellow travelers our road, everyone was blown away! We were easily able to walk to everything we wanted to see in Sofia - we had a perfect time. Thanks so much to Stan and Mimi for staying connected and making our stay so easy.", "Great location, easy self-check-in process, clean, and as described.  No complaints at all.  Recommended.", "Clean
Perfect location
Everything in good condition 
No AC
No boiler, so there was a problem with central hot water in Sofia  and we ended up not having hot water for 2 days", "Stan&Mimi's apartment was at the perfect location. It is a very nice and clean place. The apartment doesn't have an a/c, but it was pretty cool outside so we got to open the windows, witch was awesome. The communication was great and easy, witch is very important if you are traveling with three children. No room for mistakes :) Thank you guys. We'll see you next year when we are in Sofia.", "First one of the Best location in Sofia ! Lots of bars restaurants and markets around. 
The appartement is confortable, well equiped and perfect for a couple and a family. 
Hostes are great, always available and gave us amazing tips for nice moments in the city. We strongly recommande this place.", "Great apartment in a great location", "The appartment is nice, the location is great. the check in was bad. their was a problem with the wifi.  pay atenssion to move you'r car before 7.30 a.m.", "Perfect location. Amazing amenities.. can't fault it in any way. Definitely worth the money and booking this place for your next Sofia stay.", "The flat is really nice placed, really good for 4 people, close to the night life and the main street, good cleaned.
5 stars. ", "Amazing place to stay ! ", "My third time with Stan & Mimi and all great again :)", "My stay at Stan & Mimi's apartment was ideal for my time in Sofia. The apartment is in a PERFECT location--walking distance to everything you want to see/do and close to all sorts of public transport if you want to go a little farther away or it's too hot to walk. The communication between me and Stan & Mimi before my arrival was superb, check in was well-explained and smooth, and they even checked in on me on my first evening to make sure everything was ok, which I really appreciated. I would not hesistate to recommend Stan & Mimi's place to anyone headed to Sofia, and I'd stay there myself if I ever make it back to their beautiful city!", "Awesome, clean and Central", "Perfect location, clean and quiet apartment, Stan&Mimi respond very quickly. Highly recommended!", "Perfect Location!
The apartment is located on a side street off the Main Street in Sofia. Where there are restaurants, bars and shops. The street that the apartment on is very quiet which is ideal. The apartment itself was clean and just right. The bathroom actually isn't that small, my partner is 6foot 5' (2metres) and he had plenty of space.
We loved our stay. ", "The apartment is a nice size and contains anything you might need for a short or long stay. It is located off a Plaza-like area with many shops,  restaurants, and ice cream/ gelato stores. Cabs are handy and metro entrances just a short walk.", "The apparement is nice and clean and the location is great! Stan and Mimi are good hosts, take care of their guests.", "It was perfect. Best location, very clean and silent. Totally recommended. ", "מיקום מיקום מיקום ! 
דירת 2 חדרים מקסימה שיש בה הכל", "We definitely suggest this flat for short or longer stays in Sofia. ", "Location is amazing. Place is very clean and tidy. Interaction was perfect. Highly recommended. ", "Awesome place. Highly recommend. ", "It is amazing apartment. Just in the middle of everything. The owner organized everything very simple. ", "This place has a great location, near to the pedestrian street with a lot of restaurants and coffee shops just a few minutes walk. We didn't have any difficult to do the self check in. The apartment was very clean and comfortable with this big living room. We totally recommend this place!", "Close to everything, but SO quiet. Will definitely try to stay again. ", "We stayed at Stan and Mimi's appartment for a weekend. The appartment is on the best possible spot, right around the corner of the biggest shopping street of Sofia. The appartment is spacious an very clean. We didn't cook because the food in Sofia's restaurants is so lovely, but it is possible to cook a good meal there. The bed is nice and big and we slept excellent. We did,not  meet Stan or Mimi, but check in procedure is very easy, you can take the key from a locker, so even though we were late, it was possible to enter the appartment without any problems. wifi was very fast.
We did not get to meet Stan and Mimi, but the communication was nice. They responded immediately. We think this is a five star appartment en would recommend it to anyone who,s visiting Sofia. ", "Ok", "You can't go wrong with this apartment. Very nice close proximity to everything. There is even a little cafe to the right when you come out of the apartment. Hosts are very nice. This was like staying at my own home. ", "Very nice apartment, perfectly situated in the center of the city. The flat is very comfortable and pleasant, well equipped so you will not miss anything while staying there. I would definitely recommend staying there for an awesome stay in beautiful Sofia!", "Great apartment in excellent location! Really easy check in. Hosts sent helpful information about the city, too. Definitely a perfect place to stay in Sofia.", "The appartement was clean and minimalistic but very complete. The location is next to the main shopping street and as advertised, very centrally located. Sofia itself takes a bit of getting used to. It's useful to check routes, restaurants etc. in advance. The Free Sofia Tour is a great way to see the more beautiful side of the city so I would recommend doing that first.", "Fantastic location at the very center, close to restaurants, bars, cafes and the ever lively Vitosha street. Metro's close by for those who want to venture out. 
The apartment is spacious, has everything you need and it's ideal for solo travellers or couples. Would stay there in a heartbeat. ", "Very nice, best location", "Very nice place, I can agree with unbeatable location!", "Clean and comfortable, espresso in the morning.", "Nice and clean apartment in centre. Everything is near, a lot of restaurants, shops, supermarket, metro... Recommend it!", "If you are looking for an apartment in the center of Sofia this one is perfect. Restaurants are really nearby (less than a minute walking) and both the metro lines are also at walking distance. Next to this, the apartment itself was just as depicted on the photo's. Great place!", "Really lovely flat in a great location. Though we didn't get to meet Stan & Mimi, they gave us lots of great recommendations and info about the  flat and Sofia generally which was helpful.

Would definitely recommend", "Excellent house and location!
Super host
Thank you for everything", "A very nice and warm (even with it being -14 outside) place.  We really liked how close it was to everything, and only a few minutes walk from the metro station that will take you in about 25 minutes (for 0,80 Euro) to the airport.

The place was quiet while it's very close to the main street. And the fact that the couch was also a bed was great as I tend to snore and my girlfriend tends to dislike me doing so...

Overall we really liked our stay and would definitely recommend! 

Ps: one extra positive thing my girlfriend made me type, the shower is really really nice (not the dribble you sometimes get at hotels) even if you have rather long hair. ", "Good place to stay, big, central, clean, modern and with a very comfortable bed!", "We only stayed for one night, but it was a very nice apartment at a great location! ", "I highly recommended this apartment to everyone! The best location- at the very center of Sofia, near famous Vitosha Boulevard.  The apartment was clean, cozy, warm, and very comfortable. The host was also very helpful, responsible and friendly. We didn’t meet the host, as check-in/check-out process was very easy, but communication (via viber) was great.  We had an amazing stay in Sofia. Thank you for your professionalism, guys! ", "Very good position and comfortable place!", "Great apartment - 10 mins walk from the Metro and couldn't have been any more central! The apartment was clean, warm and quiet.  We didn't meet the hosts as the set up meant key collection was easy, however communication was great and hosts responded quickly to any emails we sent.  Top notch!", "The apartment is really nice and clean, the location is perfect and the hosts are super helpful! Can't think of a better place to stay in Sofia! Would definately reccommend! ", "This place is a really good choice. It is super well located. The apartment itself is nicely renovated, clean and warm! And warm is really important when outside is -5! So you won't regret if you pick it! ", "Very kind and helpful host", "We were a couple of days and the experience was awesome. Clean, cozy and modern apartment near to the main street in Sofia.

We ll repeat the experience in that apartment when we back to Sofia : )", "Simply perfect. Everything was really professional and fluent. ", "Our stay could not have been better. Stan and Mimi let us check into the apartment earlier than agreed as we had arrived in the city early in the morning. So this gave us more time to explore Sofia without having to carry our baggage. The apartment was very clean, warm and cosy. It was right in the middle of the main tourist area but we were never disturbed by noise of any sort.
All communication was prompt and friendly. I would highly recommend the apartment to anyone", "My second stay here, again everything was perfect!", "The apartment is in perfect location, clean and quiet. ", "Home is great location 10seconds on the square  everything is useable , great host i am very happy for this rent . Next time i will come and i will rent this home", "I've been in several apartment in Sofia, this one is my favorite. Why? The location is perfect, right in the middle of Vitosha street. 

Restaurants, supermarkets, bars and everything else is right out of the doorstep. At the same time it's quit, perfect to work and sleep. 

The apartment is cozy but modern, with an oven which I missed in many other apartments, as well as a modern kitchen. Internet is very fast.

The check-in was fast and great with the key waiting for me in the master lock. Communication was very fast and Stan and Mimi helped me out immediately when I needed an extra heater.

Highly recommended!", "We had a very pleasant stay at Stanimir's apartment. He checked on us many times and made sure everything was allright. The apartment is situated at a great location near Vitosha street and the park for the palace of culture. All the touristic sites are within walking distance. The apartment was very clean and for just two persons very big. I also loved the coffee machine Stanimir installed there. The only minus to our stay was that the shower wasn't separated from the toilet and the sink. So after a shower the water would remain in the bath room for a long time and you would get wet feet every time you go to the toilet.", "Good host. Very helpful. Great location. Shower drains slowly, so ddon't go for a long rinse. The pictures make it seem like there are 2 rooms, so just know there is only one, as is listed in the review. Overall good experience. Thank you", "We loved the flat’s location in a quiet street with central Sofia on its doorstep, and the easy 24-hour check-in system. We didn’t meet Stanimir in person but he was in regular text contact with us to ensure that everything went smoothly, which was great. The flat is clean, well-equipped and functional. We had an enjoyable stay, though there are a few minor things to look out for. You’ll need to move the toilet roll out of the way when you have a shower, and the shower is slow-draining. The ironing board was unsteady with a damaged cover, which will hopefully be fixed for future visitors.", "The place was great! In the middle of the main street. And the apartment was beautiful. The only miss was that The water in the shower took a while to drain", "This apartment was perfect for me. the best location, renovated, clean, cosy, quiet. Defiantly it is going to be my apartment every time I arrive to Sofia. Thanks Stanimir!", "At the beginning, I had some troubles with the masterlock and moreover it was really late because of my flight. But Sam and the Airbnb customer care were perfect and I sort everything out. Stanimir was really understanding and everything was solved for the best.", "A nice room with very helpful folks. 
Denis waited patiently as the train was delayed into Belgrade. Lined us up with where to grab a few things and where to eat some local fare. 
Good location to Zoo, Danube, and Skadarlija. 

Modern room with a good AC unit. 

All you need for a visit to Belgrade. ", "The place was great. Even better than the picture showed. The location was so good. Comparing with my friends in other parts of Sofia, this  flat had the best location by far. The process of booking, keys, wifi and leaving was made super simple. 

Stan was really responsive to all my needs and checked in with me to make sure all was well. Great Airbnb overall!", "Stanimir, was an excellent host and very accommodating. the apartment is located meters away from the main shopping street and I really enjoyed my stay.", "My partner and I stayed in Stan's apartment for just under a week. It was a great place, clean, well equipped and very central - everything you need is in walking distance. Even though we didn't actually meet Stan, he was very easy to communicate with and have very clear and simple instructions as to how to get to the apartment and check in/out. 
The place is exactly how it looks in the photos and a great place to stay for 2 people with plenty of room. ", "Stanimir was a good host and very responsive, especially considering my last minute request. The apartment is in an extremely central location, which made it easy to get around. I found the apartment to be clean and tidy and as it was represented. The bathroom was a little small with a shower that is not self contained but it wasn't too much of an issue. I'd recommend the apartment for it's location.", "It's a nice apartment is a perfect, central location. A lot of restaurants nearby and in general a nice area to explore. The apartment is very quiet. Great experience overall.  The bathroom has a shower, but no bathtub. You can see the whole apartment as-is in the photos.

Stanimir was exceptionally quick to answer messages. Was simple to get and leave the key. No problems at all.", "The apparement is great and everything is new. It is located in the very down town of Sofia. 
Stanimir is very reactive and helpful. ", "Όλα ήταν υπέροχα", "Han sido súper atentos y magníficos anfitriones, estaban cada vez que los llamábamos. La casa era tal cual la esperábamos y estábamos en pleno centro, hemos ido a todo andando, nos volveremos a ver muy pronto! Gracias amigos!", "Lindo lugar", "Logement parfait, idéalement situé et au calme. 2 chambres, une avec un grand lit et l'autre avec un lit double confortable. Très propre et très bonne communication avant l'arrivée. A recommander", "Appartement comme décrit : tout est très récent, en très bon état et parfait pour un séjour pour découvrir la belle ville de Sofia. Les indications pour l'arrivée autonome était précises et claires, et Stan & Mimi sont très réactifs. De plus, l'appartement est très bien situé pour visiter Sofia à pied ou en métro. Recommandé ! ", "Appart très sympathique et bien situé.

Les propriétaires fournissent une liste d'endroits à visiter ce qui est très appréciable.", "Mooi en centraal gelegen appartement voorzien van alle gemakken.", "Alloggio rispecchia ciò che si vede nelle foto. Abbiamo pernottato 3 notti in 6 persone, è stato comodo, un letto king size, un divano letto e un letto a castello. È ideale per gruppetto di amici, o coppie. Comodissimo per il centro, davvero a 50 metri dalla via centrale dove ci sono negozi e ristoranti o club. Il self check-in e self check out è stato e semplicissimo seguendo le istruzioni datemi dall' host, non ho mai conosciuto di persona il propietario, ma non ho avuto bisogno di nulla, l'appartamento era attrezzato di tutto il necessario. Unico punto negativo il bagno/doccia, un po' scomodo perché quando ci si lava si allaga tutto il vano doccia. Comunque in generale lo consiglierei perché qualità_prezzo è onesto.", "Muy bien situado. En líneas generales bien aunque la ducha sin mampara es un poco incómoda y el colchón de la cama de matrimonio no es muy bueno.", "Το διαμέρισμα ήταν πραγματικά πολύ καλό. Ξεκινώντας από την τοποθεσια το σημείο που βρίσκεται είναι κεντρικό και παράλληλα ήσυχο, Κοντά σε εστιατόρια καφετέριες και μαγαζιά. Όλα ήταν πολύ καθαρά και αρκετά καλόγουστα. Ο οικοδεσπότης μας κατατοπισε πλήρως για το πως θα μεταβούμε στο διαμέρισμα. Το προτείνω ανεπιφύλακτα.", "Appartement tres bien placé!", "Excelente departamento, muy bien ubicado, muy accesibles los anfitriones, excelente experiencia.. a una cuadra de  una de las calles de compras y restaurantes", "De Airbnb was prima. 
De locatie is geweldig, aangezien je direct bij alle restaurants in de buurt zit. Wat dat betreft is het zeker een aanrader. De Airbnb was daarnaast netjes. 

Enige minpunt is de badkamer en wc. Deze zitten bij elkaar in in een erg kleine ruimte. Het doucheputje zit iets voor de wc en er is geen douchegordijn of iets dergelijks. Zodoende werd tijdens het douchen alles nat; van de wc tot de wastafel, tot je kleding. Het water kwam daarnaast tot aan je enkels tijdens het douchen en de vloer was daarnaast erg glad.", "La casa está muy bien ubicada. Hemos tenido el inconveniente de que solo había 1 baño para 5 (ya lo sabíamos), pero no que la ducha era con un agujero en el suelo y había que recoger el agua y esperar a que se secara el baño tras cada uso, con el consiguiente peligro de resbalar como le pasó a una hija. En La Cocina no teníamos cubiertos para comer 5 y en el salón no teníamos 5 sillas.", "Отличная уыартира ", "Non ho conosciuto di persone Stan e Mimi, ma sono stati disponibilissimi. Hanno risposto velocemente ad ogni mia domanda. Mi hanno dato dei consogli su come raggiungere l'aeroporto e dove cambiare i soldi. L'appartamento è esattamente come descritto: Centrale, funzionale, bellissimo, caldo e molto pulito. Consigliatissimo. ", "Si si preciso e completo in ogni sua parte.
Appartamento centrale a pochi passi dalla metro, molto comodo lo consiglio vivamente noi eravamo con un bambino e ci siamo trovati molto bene.
", "Le logement était parfaitement situé au 1er étage, à 50m de la rue piétone principale et à 25m d'un bureau de change aux tarifs impeccables.
L'appartement est très confortable, rénové très récemment et à une machine à laver toute récente et des fenêtres très pratiques
Stanimir est un hôte très sympathique et prévenant et le système mis en place pour l'entrée dans l'appartement et la sortie de l'appartement est parfait"]
