reviews:
["Very nice apartment. I'll hire it in the future.", "A comfy place in a central location, perfect for exploring the city center on foot. Martin was very welcoming and a great host overall. Would recommend!", "Martin was an excellent host, very helpful and was there when we needed him. The place is great, excellent location in downtown Sofia in a new building and had everything we have expected.", "We had a great stay at Martin's apartment. He was super helpful and had prepared the apartment perfectly. I loved how sunny and centrally-located the place is. You'll definitely enjoy your stay here.", "Martin place is very central, clean and had all I needed, highly recommended.", "The best place you can get in Sofia concerning location, cleanliness, fast responses to msgs... the only thing that can be added only is a curtain to separate the shower area to the wc but it's nothing comparing to the added value of Martin's apartment Enjoy...", "Marin can pickup from Airport", "Martin is a great host, he have a great place in a great location, I promise you, you will not be  disappointed with Martin apartment.", "Awesome place in central Sofia. Big & very clean appartement well furnished. There was everything we needed in this one. I highly recommand :)", "We stayed 2 nights at Martin’s place. Martin is extremely helpful, answers quickly and adapts to your schedule. His place is as advertised and centrally located. ", "Martin was a great host, extremly friendly and welcoming. We had a fantastic time in Sofia!!", "Perfectly located apartment for visiting Sofia on foot. Very nice and functional. I highly recommend !", "We enjoyed staying at Martin’s apartment. Very clean, spacious for two and a great central location for exploring Sofia- we accessed most places on foot. Nearby shop open 24/7 for essentials and also a Lidl in easy reach (usual opening hours). Good instructions on how to find it and flexible check in/out. Martin quick to reply and we were able to leave our bags. Take basics like a few t bags to tide you over if arrive late. We appreciated the air con at night.", "Perfect location, nice and spacy apartment for one couple. Martin is very polite and helpful. I will be very happy to stay in the same apartment on my next visit to Sofia.", "Excellent location,  great apartment. would definitely recommend staying here. 

", "Perfect location, perfect apartament and perfect host. Highly recommended", "The appartment is very nice, brand new and very clean. The location is amazing. 2 mins walk from Vithosa and in the mid of the central area. I highly recommand it", "Beautiful, stylish apartment in the heart of Sofia! A few steps from the shopping street Vitoshka, basically it is close to everything . The best part was the lovely host! Marty was very helpful and sweet! Highly recomended! 10 out of 10!", "The location is ideal, in a street parallel to the main pedestrian street, so it was quiet but near the lively area with lots of restaurants. The apartment was clean and spacious. The bathroom has an open shower, i.e. no curtain or actual separation from the rest of the bathroom, but worked well. The host waited for us to check in very late at night, so we really appreciated that. He also suggested the free Sofia tour, which was great! I’d stay there again.", "Good apartment , excellent location ( close to a lot of bars , restaurants , stores etc) , very good host . I highly recommend the apartment, would gladly come back", "Martin is a fantastic and responsive host, and we loved our second stay in his lovely apartment. It is well equipped, modern and quiet - whilst being right in Sofia's centre, only a few minutes' walk away from Vitosha boulevard, St Nedelia Church, shopping, restaurants, bars and most local attractions in the centre of the city. Definitely recommended!", "nice apartment, great location, very attentive and responsive host.
we highly recommend", "Martins apartment was lovely and clean very warm,minutes from city centre.There was a  15/20 minuet taxi ride from the (Website hidden by Airbnb) can get great coffee from the shop downstairs.
There are some great restaurants close by,Divaka and UGO,were our favorites.", "Martin’s apartment it’s exactly what you’ll need after a busy schedule around the city: A cozy and warm place to rest! Totally children friendly, in the city center and in a quiet but safe street close to the main pedestrian boulevard and to plenty  nice local restaurants. Martin is a great host and an even better touristic guide. Reliable and very helpful. Sofía is for sure worth a visit in spring or even summer with its high temperatures but in winter with a white snowy layer it’s beautiful!", "This apartment is in the best location! Quick walk to all the tourist attractions/ restaurants It has everything you need and very clean. Martin is always quick to respond to questions and very friendly. Would recommend to others.", "The apartment is on a very central location and situated very close to Vitosha Boulevard. Highly recommended", "The apartment had everything we need, right in the city centre! Everything was within walking distance and the apartment was perfectly clean en spacious. We had a really good time and would definitely recommend this place.", "Nice apartment. Central location ideal to visit the city!", "We loved it. Great location. Very clean & modern.", "Martin's flat is on a great location. Right in the centre of Sofia but in a quiet street. It's big and clean. Great value for the price", "I tried several airbnb in sofia and this one is by far the best. I will for sure book it again next time i m in sofia.
Perfect location, very quiet, super clean. 
I loved it", "Three friends and i stayed in Martin's apartment for a long weekend. Communication was never an issue and Martin met us at the apartment to hand over keys and give us some useful information on the apartment and the area itself. The apartment was very clean and was a mere minute or two away from what friends and I took to be the 'main drag'. Martin was a fantastic host and i wouldn't hesitate to stay here again next time. Thanks Martin!", "I love the brightness, i love the sofa, the convenience of the location.", "Martin is a great host! Very helpful and had a lot of tips for making the utmost of our short stay.
His apartment is not less than perfect!
It's located in the best location and in the newest building around. 
It's cozy, beautiful and clean with personal touch and thought about the details.
The beds are very comfortable and all the needed kitchen amenities were available.    
Very recommended!", "Martins place was in a great location was very mordern and clean", "Martin's place is very well located. It is one street over from Vitosha. Downstairs is a burger bar, a craft beer shop and a very good coffee shop. It is also very close to the train station and numerous grocery stores. 
The place is surrounded by restaurants and bars yet remains quiet. 
The apartment is well laid out and spacious. No complaints. We would stay again.", "Martin's APT is the best choice to visit Sophia. The apt is very clean and nice. Martin is a super host, he can suggest many things about Sophia. Great!", "Great appartement for discovering the city!", "Great apartment. Very we", "We really enjoyed our stay in sofia at Marty's apartment which is brand new and is really close to all the things we wanted to see. ", "Ideal location, great amenities, superb host. Can't wait to stay there again!", "Martins apartment ticks all the boxes! It's clean, spacious, well equipped and located in the centre of town. Tucked away on a quiet residential street, it's is literally one corner away from all the buzz and action. Within a two minute walk, you will find yourself surrounded by the most popular restaurants, cafes and bars in town. Martin is a fantastic host, he even went the extra mile and offered us transfer to the airport. We would highly recommend this apartment to anyone visiting Sofia! ", "Martin is a great host and welcomes his guests with tips and tricks for a great stay in Sofia and around. The apartment is super well located and everything is reachable on foot. Only small downside: the apartment is not for noice sensitive guests as walls are thin and neighbours might be noisy. For us, this was not a big issue though and we would recommend staying here!", "Great location, great apt, and a beautiful city.", "We loved Martin's great apartment right in the centre of the city. 
It is a lovely, clean, bright apartment with modern furniture and appliances. 
Everything in central Sofia is just a short walk away, and you could not wish for a better location. 
Martin was a great host, instantly responding to any queries we had, and we will love to come back and stay at his great apartment soon. 
Steve, London", "This appartement is really well locate and nice. Martin picked up at the airport which was useful.", "Lovely apartment, even lovelier host! The apartment is located right at the heart of Sofia, made it the perfect place to stay in when visiting Sofia. ", "Martin's apartment is really nice! Quite big, perfectly located in central Sofia. The apartment is very clean and Martin was here to welcome us. Moreover the bed was incredible! Had an amazing sleep there. I will not hesitate to come back to his flat! Thank you Martin", "Martin's apartment is in the best location possible, very central. The apartment is nicely decorated, extremely continent with everything needed for a short or long stay. Great shower, excellent kitchen, good washing machine, safe environment.

I stayed here for one month, experienced cold winter and snow, and the beginning of spring. I enjoyed my stay a lot. Martin is a great host, easy and efficient communication.

Many thanks!", "Thanks Martin you were a great host! We appreciated your quick responses, your willingness to help us get where we needed to go, great recommendation with the free Sofia tour and your helping us find a bus to Bansko. ", "I've been 3 days at Martn's apartment with my mum and aunt and it's been great! The apartment is just next to Vitosha Street which is the main street in the city & there's one cafe and one bar/restaurant just downstairs! The location is perfect! Martin is really nice, he has helped us with everything and he always answers very quickly! I'm very gretaful :):) Sofia is really beautiful!", "A very pleasant staying undoubtedly. Warm , cozy , comfortable and peacefull at the center of Sofia. We will be back for sure!", "Our stay in Sofia was fantastic. The apartment was clean, super warm (which we needed since it was snowing like crazy!), and the location was very central. I will definitely stay here again the next time I am in Sofia!", "He made us feel like he is always available and ready to help. 
Very busy but a nice neighbourhood concidering the location in the heart of Sofia. ", "The location was excellent and the room was up to the mark in all spheres, highly recommended for a getaway at Sofia!", "Martin welcomed us and was very helpful with what we needed. I will definitely return to this apartment.", "Martin is great, he helped us whit all, the location is near everithing and in center of the city.
I really reccomed to stay in this house.", "Great communication from Martin, friendly and welcoming host. His place is perfect for a short-stay and central accessing many areas of interest. ", "I'm staying on a monthly basis in Sofia and this was by far the best experience I had so far with a Airbnb apartment. Martin was great. Very polite and he spoke good English.

The apartment was spacious, clean and had all facilities needed for a business stay.

This will defiantly my first place to check for my next stay!! ", "5 Stars across the board here! We have visited Sofia before, but this was our first time in Martin's apartment....We will never stay anywhere alse!
Beautiful building, apartment, and location. Although located in hotel building, the apartment has separate entrance...and you truly feel you are living in a private apartment. Interior finishes are all to high standard, and location is perfect to everything in Sofia. Martin is a great host, and wealth of local information....Highly recommend, and look forward to our next stay.", "Great apartment, central location, exactly as advertised. Lots of helpful information around the apartment and from Martin re. Local activities, and Martin was very helpful in suggesting the best way to get from the airport into town. I would recommend this listing to anybody.", "We stayed at Martin's place for 2 nights in Sofia and our stay was perfect. Once we arrived Martin gave us many advices about Sofia and recommended us a very good local restaurant. The apartment looks like in the photos and it was very clean when we arrived. Furthermore it was located in the heart of Sofia downtown so it's very close to the main city's attractions. I have no doubts to recommend Martin's apartment for a short or long stay in Sofia.", "Excellent  experience. The flat is even bigger than expected, comfortable and clean. Excellent location. Martin is punctual and very nice. ", "Very good experience. The flat was even bigger than expected and well located. Martin was discret and very nice. ", "Super, absolutely recommended!
 ", "Great place and a wonderful host, provided us with any information and help and the apartment is sublime. Literally as close as you can get to the main boulevard without being on it! Definitely 5 stars ", "Martins flat is truly recommendable!

I travelled with two friends, and we had a great time. Martin was responsive and flexible on arrival, and he provided us with good advise on what to see and where to go. We were very pleased with the condition of the flat and its interior, as it felt new and modern. Besides, we really enjoyed the location, which is nothing but amazing. The street itself is quiet, but supermarkets, great restaurants and Sofias major nightlife area are literally just five minutes away on foot.

Martins flat stands out as one of my best Airbnb-experiences so far. If returning to Sofia, there is no doubt where I will stay!", "Martin was a very nice host. The apartment was as described, very clean, comfortable and cosy! It's located directly in the centre, close to restaurants, bars, shopping and sightseeing. We had a very good stay and I can definetely recommend Martin as a host!", "Martin was very nice, he waited for us at the apartment with the keys and an explain for everything we wanted to do at the city. The apartment is located just in the center of the city short walking from all the atractions you might think about. The bed was great for sleeping and the shower big and with goos presure of water. Martin even helped us to call for a tavi in the middle of the night. We recommend Martin as an AirBnb host.", "The apartment is super central, yet it is in a new residential building so it's very comfortable. Martin was kind and fast in communication. Yet for me it is important to highlight that the place is rather a hotel type of flat than it is a private home which is offered for airbnb.", "Nice, bright, cozy and clean apartment in centre of Sofia. One block away from Vitosha street and less than 10 mins walk from NDK. Great spot to explore the area. Martin was a nice an friendly host. Highly recommended!", "Perfect house - perfect host .simple as that . would definitely  recommend  the place", "We enjoyed our stay at Martin's apartment. It's spacious, clean and modern with all of the necessary amenities and located very centrally (surrounded by good restaurants and ~10 minute walking distance to major attractions) but without any street noise. Martin made all of the arrangements for our arrival and was very easy to be in contact with. Thank you!", "The stay was just perfect. Martin picked up at the airport and we went to the apartment. The apartment is really located in the center and all POI are just a walk by foot away.
A coffee shop, a diner and a craft beer shop are located in the same building; thus you can really have a good start in the day.
The apartment is clean and as equipped described. The bed and the couch is really cozy and there is everything you need (also a washing machine).", "Great apartment in the centre of the good bars and restaurants, they are only 5 to 10 minutes away

Bistro Pesto is recommended and it's 5 mins walk.

Martin was also able to guide me to local car parking which was great value for a longer stay

", "The perfect airbnb experience.  Centrally located apartment, well decorated, spotlessly clean and good size with all the facilities required for a comfortable stay.  The host was very helpful and friendly, quick to respond to all queries and provided transfers to/from the airport.  Also provided useful tourist information, personal recommendations and a private guided tour to a local point of interest.  Highly recommended.", "The apartment was beautiful and even bigger than it looks in the pictures, and the location is perfect to see all of the sights in Sofia. Everything is within walking distance! The sofa bed is also very comfortable - we stayed with 4 people and there was plenty of room and we all slept comfortably. Martin was also extremely accommodating and helpful - he even came twice the first night to let us in since we had people arriving at different times and then leaving for an event. He also suggested some restaurants and attractions which were all great and very close to the apartment. I definitely recommend this place if you are looking for a convenient and spacious apartment in downtown Sofia.", "This is the perfect apartment for your perfect stay in Sofia. The apartment is very clean, cozy and everything looks exactly like the pictures. The place is located in the city center so you have easy access to bars, restaurants, shops and sightseeing spots. 
Martin is such a nice and helpful host. He waited for us as we had some problems with the taxi driver and recommended some restaurants for traditional Bulgarian food. Thanks Martin, looking forward to see you again. I absolutely recommend this apartment !!", "The place is very nice, clean as a picture. Location really close to main street where you can find many restaurants and stores. Martin is really helpful, nice and kind.
I will recommend all my friends to rent this place if they are going to Bulgaria.  ", "Apartment very clean and comfortable, situated in a prime area. Martin is a really thoughtful host, I asked where I could buy the martenitsa and there he has procured a little bit, he was really very nice. Really recommended", "Thank you Martin for your patience to wait for us late in the night.
A restaurant close to The appartment is open all night long.
The appartment is very nice: spacious, well equipped, in the center , close to interesting sites and to bars, restaurants and shops.
The street is rather quiet.
Sofia is a beautiful city that can be visited easily by foot. Don't miss Sofia free tour (at 11h and 18h). Very interesting.
To be noticed:No climatisation . We had a warm night.", "Great location in Sofia's city center. Martin was really helpful with advice on what to see and where to eat. For an extra fee he even picked us up at the airport. We had a great time.", "Lovely flat,perfectly located in the center of Sofia.Very clean and cozy Martin is great and very healpful host.We recommend this flat - without any doubt!!! ", "Lovely flat, perfectly located, very clean. All as on the photos. And that must be the most comfortable sofa bed I've slept on. Martin is  courteous and obliging to all, super easy to communicate with. Thank you Martin and looking forward to seeing you again. ", "Perfect. Great Location. Very clean. Martin picked us up at the airport and even brought water! We recommend this flat - without any doubt. Thanks Martin!", "A lovely apartment ideally located in the centre of Sofia.  Martin was there to greet us on arrival and was very helpful.  We would definitely stay here again!", "Great experience!", "The apartment is very well located. It is next to the Main Shopping Street with a lot of great restaurants and looks exactly as in the pictures. Very new and clean.Taxi from the airport was just around 6 Euro!!! We will definitely stay in this apartment again. Thank you Martin!", "Martin is such a kind and great host. He sent messages to me the day before we arrived, telling us everything we need for the coming days. We arrived late at night at 11 p.m. But Martin waited for us patiently, making me feel quite sorry. Everything about the house is just beyond perfect. It is clean, well-equipped and stylish. I love its location most. It is just several steps away from the meeting point of the free Sofia City tour. Please do not miss it. I strongly recommend Martin's house to every traveller. Thanks, Martin. Thanks, Sofia. ", "Like this apartment a lot, Quiet, very clean and nice. Martin was very friendly too. The apartmment is located just in the center. Definitely will stay here again!", "This apartment is very practical, clean and has everything you need for a great stay in Sofia. Its located in a very central location in Sofia, near the main street, restaurants, shops and museums. Martin gave me valuable information regarding the museums, and all relevant information about the apartment. I can highly recommend a stay at his apartment!", "Apartment and location are awesome. Martin helped us to find parking that is not so easy to find in center of Sofia. The building is new and has new elevators, however it is not so easy to get into the entrance with baby-cart because there is "just stairs" and you have to carry it inside. Would like to note that in Bulgaria almost all building are not suitable for "baby carts") So, I think, this is the best place to stay in the center of Sofia. Thank you!", " Martin was great. He was waiting for me at the apartment without any complaints although I was a bit late as my flight was delayed. As a welcome he had some fruits in the apartment as well as coffee and tea. So that was really nice. The apartment is newly renovated, light, and at a perfect spot  within Sofia. One can reach all the central places within a few minutes walking distance. ", "I had one amazing Airbnb experience. Martin, the host, was so polite and helpful from the initial contact till the end of our stay. The apartment even better than the photos, seriously!!! Extra clean, brand new and with everything you need for pleasant stay. Situated in the heart of Sofia, everything was on walking distance.
5+ stars place ;) I will visit again!!!", "Otsednahme pri Martin s 2 malki deca i cialoto semejstvo se chuvstvashe izkljuchitelno komfortno v apartamenta - chist i mnogo  funktionalen. Martin e mnogo otzivchiv, biahme posrestnati surdechno i s ogromno udovolstvie ste otsednem pri nego otnovo :-) ", "Martin was a great host! He was waiting for us, just gave us the keys and left the apartment.  His apartment is warm, clean and modern, at the very center of Sofia. Nights were quiet. We were four people and it was great experience for all of us.", "Martin was a great host! Was there waiting for us when we arrived, and gave us some leeway on our checkout. The apartment is very nice, new, modern, surprisingly warm and cosy considering it was snowing outside!  Perfect location, fast internet, surprisingly nice shower, very comfortable and in a safe building.  Would definitely stay there again!", "Martin is an amazing host! He is really friendly and welcoming! His information about the city was perfect. His flat is clean and comfortable. We were 4 people and it was great!", "It was a pleasent stay in Martin's apartment. The location is perferct - in the city center and the famous sights and restaurants are in walking distance. Martin greet us very warmly and the place was very clean and tidy. If you plan to visit Sofia I would strongly recommend this cosy apartment.", "We with my mum enjoyed staying in Martin's apartment in Sofia. Martin was very helpful and hospital: we asked for apartment booking in the evening and already at 11:30 am next day met Martin to have the keys from it :) Moreover, the recommendations for places to visit and tours to book were very useful and made our 3 days stay in Sofia memorable and joyful.
The apartment is exactly as at the photos, perfectly clean, cozy and bright, extremely well located just near the main pedastrian street of the city, with lots of restaurants and shops of different kinds nearby. The only minus we noticed was not very sufficient sound isolation as our neigbours had a small child, but anyway, the nights were quiet.
We thank Martin once again for the hospitality and elegant apartment provided!", "Great location, welcoming host, clean and tidy apartment, highly recommended!", "Martin was very nice and courteous. He even met us at a much later time for check-in when our flight plans were changed. He also checked on us a few times throughout our stay to ensure we had everything we needed! The neighborhood was a great location, we felt very safe at all times. It was a very short walk to the many great restaurants and shops on Vitosha. The apartment was wonderful, very nice, clean & comfortable. I would definitely rent Martin's cozy apartment again! ", "Really nice and confortable apartment in the heart of the capital and close to everything important to see though walking distance. Martin was available at any time to guide us and gave us amazing tips or ideas for things to do in Bulgaria and not only in Sofia. Everything was perfect and I will  definitely check if his apartment is available for my next visit. Many  thanks for having us as guests.", "Simply perfect in my opinion. I had nothing to complain about. Very freshly renovated, comfortable, perfectly equipped. 

Fabulous location and a very safe and well-run entry to the building. 

In fact the apartment is located in the same building with a hotel so it feels extremely secure and comfortable. 

Martin is a perfect host. Very delicate and to-the-point. 

I would highly recommend this apartment and will definitely come again. ", "Communication with Martin was perfect, great host. The appartment is very nice, spacious, clean and new. We had a wonderful time there and will come back next time in Sofia. Location is great, in the centre of Sofia.", "Yet another good experience!
Martin contacted me few days before the arrival to make sure everything was ok, to meet at the right time of the check in. A very attentive host.
Everything was ready, the flat clean and very comfortable, situated at few minutes from Vitosha boulevard, ...
Well furnished, it is quite convenient when you stay for several days. :)
An excellent stay at Sofia to sum up!", "Wonderfull experience! Host was great,on time with all our meetings.
The place is beautiful,quiet, very nicely furnished ,centrally situated.
And extremely clean!
I would recomend this to everyone
", "Nice place. Very clean and centrally located. ", "We (3person)stayed there 3 nights. The apartment was so clean, spacious  and equipments are very useful. The location was perfect, you just need to walk 1min to the main shoping street. Above all..Martin prepared everything so perfect so there was nothing we needed to complain about. Thank you so much again.", "This comfortable, modern and tidy apartment in the immediate center of Sofia, gave us the opportunity to spend our time there with maximum pleasure. The apartment is equipped with everything a person might need to feel like at home. It is obvious that the host is thinking about the needs, pleasure and comfort of his guests. Martin was hospitable and ready to help and advice. When comming by car, be aware that the location in the center does not offer a lot of parking opportunities, and organize your stay accordingly (there are several private parking areas in the same street). What I can say for sure is that when visiting Sofia again, this is our place of choice.", "Out experience was great! The location was exactly what we expected. It was in a great location and easy to get to everything. Martin went above and beyond to make us feel welcome. We really enjoyed our stay.", "The apartment is stunning. It is completely new and I must say that I appreciated very much the way it has been decorated. It felt like everything has been carefully choosen. It is also very central. I couldn't think of a better location. But the nicest was not even the apartment ;) It was Martin and his girlfriend. They have been very very helpful, very welcoming and I guess one of the nicest memories from Sofia will be the long and deep conversation we had.", "I have spent 4 nights in this apartment, and it is nothing else but amazing: very clean, quiet, spacious and stylish with extremely light atmosphere. 
Everything you might need is just around the corner, and you can feel the spirit of old Sofia combined with the modern environment every detail of which was made with love and care. 
Martin is very kind host, ready to help and making sure you have no difficulties.  
Thank you so much once again.  If I have a chance to visit Sofia again, I would never choose to stay at any other place. 
", "We rented the flat for 3 nights and it was perfect. The apartment is very well situated in the very center of Sofia (just next to the Vitosha Boulevard). It is very clean, and has everything needed for a short or long stay. 

Martin is a very nice and kind host, who even offered to give us a lift from the airport considering the hour of our arrival and our little knowledge of the town. He was OK for a late check-in and an early check-out. He made sure everything was fine for our stay. We were welcomed with fresh fruits and a bottle of wine :)

Thank you Martin !
", "Definitely one of my best Airbnb experiences! Martin is very friendly and really helpful host, I would recommend his apartment to everyone who would like to visit Sofia. Thank you Martin for everything, we were very satisfied. ", "Ottimo appartamento al centro di Sofia, host molto cortese e gentile", ".", "El apartamento estaba en perfectas condiciones. Muebles y equipos nuevos, y muy limpio. Martin me estaba esperando en la puerta a mi llegada y me ha contestado los mensajes muy rapido. Ubicacion central y en un edificio nuevo que es conpartido con un hotel. Muy recomendable!", "Nous avons passé un super séjour. L’appartement et très fonctionnel, confortable et merveilleusement bien situé. Martin est un hôte très gentil et réactif. Y aller les yeux fermés!", "Splendido appartamento centralissimo. Si trova nella parallela al Vitosha Boulevard che è il viale pedonale maggior via commerciale di Sofia pieno di negozi. La zona è piena di ristoranti. Martin è stato puntuale e ci ha suggerito il miglior ristorante tra quelli in cui abbiamo mangiato (è nella stessa via a 150 metri di distanza..) ed il Free Sofia Tour, giro a piedi gratuito (con offerta libera) del centro città  con una guida  che locale che parla un ottimo inglese (almeno nel nostro caso) che abbiamo molto gradito. La casa per il resto è molto accogliente ", "Voor een paar dagen Sofia is dit appartement alles wat je mag verwachten voor een goede stedentrip. Wij hebben niks gekookt, ik ben per slot van rekening op vakantie, maar de mogelijkheid was er en dat is prettig. De airco was echt een dikke plus voor de zonnige week die we hadden. De locatie is ook nog eens perfect. De straat van het appartement zelf is lekker rustig, maar paralel eraan liep de vitosha boulevard waar veel leuke cafés, restaurants en winkels zitten. Op nog geen 10 minuten ben je bij alle hotspots. Het grootste pluspunt echter aan het appartement is de host. Martin is echt een super lieve host en je kan je geen betere bedenken. Wij zijn door hem opgehaald van het vliegveld, uiteraard wel tegen een kleine vergoeding, hij liet ons tijdig weten wanneer het water zou worden afgesloten vanwege renovaties aan een straat verderop en we mochten onze spullen zelfs nog tot 's avonds laat in het appartement van zijn zus stallen totdat we naar het vliegveld moesten. Als ik dan perse een minpunt moet noemen zijn dat de bedden, omdat het twee enkele bedden zijn. Als je als stel komt, moet je er wel op instellen dat je niet tegen elkaar aan kan kruipen. Maar als dat alles is... Al met al echt een dikke aanrader dus!", "zeer centraal gelegen appartement. Foto's komen goed overeen. Comfortabel bed en bank/ twee persoonsbed in de woonkamer. Winkels dichtbij (24 uur p/dag supermarkt en lidl of bila supermarkt) 
Enige wat ontbrak was een theedoek.", "Appartamento spazioso, moderno, pulitissimo. a 2 passi da blv Vithosa ed a 5 minuti dalla fermata della metropolitana, quindi in ottima posizione. Martin super gentile e disponibile. Alloggio top! lo consiglio vivamente", "L'appartamento si trova in centro,in posizione ottimale per visitare la città.
Martin disponibilile ,preciso e puntuale in tutte le nostre richieste. Consigliatissimo", "Martin fue muy simpático, debido a que nuestro vuelo llegaba tarde nos esperó hasta las 2:00 am para hacer el check-in.
El apartamento está muy bien localizado, a 5 minutos andando del centro y muy bien equipado!", "L'appartement est idéalement situé, nous avons tout fait à pied, quel plaisir. 
Malgré le fait que l'appartement ce trouve au centre de Sofia il est très calme. Martin a été très arrangeant avec nous, car nous repartions très tôt le matin. 
Je recommande vivement. ", "Appartement bien situé, calme et proche des activités en même temps. Propre. Bon contact avec l'hôte. ", "Piso muy recomendable. Localización perfecta. Martin deja a disposición café para el desayuno y alguna fruta.
La comunicación es muy rápida.", "Alles war sehr sauber. Super gelegene Wohnung.
Sehr bemühter Gastgeber, mit vielen guten Insidertipps :)
Wir würden es weiterempfehlen", "Este es un alojamiento realmente fabuloso!! Gracias Martin ", "Un placer habernos alojado en el piso de Martin. Centrico, nuevo, limpio y atento a la llegada.", "Das Apartment hat eine wirklich tolle Lage direkt in der Stadt. Für einen Aufenthalt in Sofia wirklich zu empfehlen. Die Kommunikation mit Martin einfach und unkompliziert.
Wir würden jederzeit wiederkommen.", "Eravamo in tre nell'appartamento di Martin ed abbiamo avuto un bel soggiorno. La centralità  dell'appartamento ci ha consentito di muoverci liberamente in città  a qualunque ora e senza bisogno di taxi. L'appartamento è  confortevole e tranquillo ed il soggiorno è  stato piacevole.", "L'appartement est très bien situé, au calme. Nous l'avons trouvé très confortable. Martin est très sympa et disponible. Le wifi marche parfaitement. 
Vous trouverez un super café juste sous vos fenêtres pour le petit déjeuner : (Website hidden by Airbnb)", "Francamente bie:  el piso está muy céntrico y en muy buenas condiciones. Ideal para hacer turismo y muy tranquilo. Hicimos el viaje con nuestros hijos pequeños (que hicieron un poco de ruido) y sin problema. ", "Tres aidant at compréhensif, il nous a fourni un lit pour bebe et a accepté un check out plus tardif. ", "Tolles Apartment in super Lage! Alles sieht genauso aus wie auf den Bildern, in unmittelbarer Nähe der Wohnung gibt es eine Menge netter Restaurants, Cafes, Bars und Läden.
Martin ist ein toller Gastgeber, er hat uns sogar noch ein Babybett für unsere Tochter besorgt und gute Tips für den Aufenthalt gegeben.  ", "Το διαμέρισμα ήταν καθαρό, ζεστό με πολύ ανετα στρώμματα και καναπέ, τις απαραίτητες ηλεκτρικές συσκευές στο κέντρο της Σόφιας.
", "Мартин очень доброжелательный и приятный человек! Он встретил нас в аэропорту и отвёз в день отъезда. В квартире нас ждала бутылка вина, свежие фрукты и вкусный кофе для заварника :). Квартира действительно очень уютная и светлая. Находится очень удачно, в центре города и все достопримечательности (которые хотели) мы прошли пешком. Дом новый, квартира чистая и уютная. Мы остались полностью довольны пребыванием :)"]

reviews:
["Our stay at Silviya's apartament was perfect. We are a group of 4 friends and we had all the amenities. The apartament is very cozy and well located (10 min approx. to Vitosha street) and Silviya was very helpful, her uncle kindly received us at 4 am because of a delay in our flight and the last day she help us booking a taxi to the airport. I will definitely recommend staying here :) Thank you!!", "Lovely apartment in a great location in Sofia. Don’t be put off from the outside of the building it really is a hidden gem. Lovely and clean and very comfortable. Had everything we needed. Not too far from the centre. Silviya was great at giving us lots of local tips that we did! Would definitely recommend!", "Just returned from the most amazing weekend in Sofia.  Silviyas place made it.  Quiet and pretty neighbourhood with a supermarket just over the road for essentials, walkable to everywhere, lots of space in the flat, REALLY COMFIE BEDS - I could go on.  I would def return and strongly recommend.  

Silviya also hugely helpful and welcoming.  Great food recommendations and very quick to reply.", "Sylvia's place is great for 2 couples or 4 friends, you have all the space you need in a stylish and very clean place. You can do almost everything walking from the apartment.", "Very nice!", "We arrived at the apartment a tad earlier than expected but were able to leave our cases and were let in by Silviya’s Uncle who was very helpful. Silviya was a brilliant host and emailed me the day before to confirm check-in etc and she very kindly offered to book us a taxi to the airport on our way home. The apartment is very modern, looks just the same as in the photos and was sparkling clean. The location is great, only a 10 minute walk from the main centre shops bars etc. There is also a handy small supermarket across the road. Would definitely stay here again!", "Silviyas appartment was perfect for our mid week stay. We made food, had a nice stay and the location was at a walking distance from the city centre. Thank you for the experience.", "Great host, great local tips and easy to communicate! Totally recommend it.", "Flat was lovely. Really well decorated and everything you need is there. Sylvia got someone to meet us after we missed our flight at an unreasonable hour. Great host", "Very clean!", "Sylvia's apartment is really a great choice and scores with a very good location, high comfort and perfect cleanliness.  The price/performance ratio is excellent.  Especially worth mentioning is the pleasant size of the apartment (there were three of us, but five of us would still have felt at home) and the extremely tasteful furnishings.  Who plans a city trip in Sofia, is here exactly right!", "Great place. Great location. Great hospitality. Seriously the place is amazing.", "Nice flat, very  clean, very pretty and good situation.", "We had a great time at Silviyas place. Everything is clean, looks lovely and you can reach all important parts in walking distance.", "Everything was great, the apartment was perfectly clean and the location is central and practical. Silviya was very kind, reactive to messages and helpful!
Thank you a lot!", "lovely apartment in a good location", "We loved our stay at Silviya’s! Very easy to communicate with, and very accommodating. The place is even better than it looks in the pictures! I definitely recommend staying with Silviya! ", "Everything is ok !! ", "Silviya is a perfect host and the apartment is perfect as well. It has a high standard is very cosy. We felt very well and would book it again during our next sofia trip. 

The communication with Silviya was on a high level. She answered very fast.

There‘s nothing negative to say except the condition of the house around the apartment. Perfect stay for us and our kids. 

Thanks Silviya", "Great location, central yet quiet. All amentities in place. Quick and good communication with the host. Great value for money! Higly recommended. ", "Beautifully decorated flat, with 2 bedrooms. Very spacious and clean. The host was very helpful and everything was as we expected. Within 10 minutes walking, you reach the centre of Sofia. The neighbourhood was quiet. I highly recommend it.", "The apartment is located in a quiet area, close to the city center. Smooth check-in and check-out. The apartment is clean and welcoming. No surprises: everything is like in the pictures. Comfy beds, good wifi. Silviya responds instantly to any message you send. Definitely recommend.", "We are all very satisfied with the accommodations, the location and the communication!! Everything was great! Recommending!", "A really stylish and comfortable apartment in a great location. Silvya gave us some great restaurant recommendations - thank you!", "Great apartment, good location and very friendly and helpful host. Thanks again Silviya!", "A really beautiful home, couldn’t have asked for more. Flexible check in even on such short notice. Great all round.", "The apartment was in a great location and within easy reach of shops, bars and restaurants.
It was very clean and has everything we needed for a great stay . I would highly recommend. ", "Lovely space close to City Centre. Fantastic communication. Thank you", "I couldn’t fault Silviya’s place! The location is walking distance (15 mins) from the main boulevard in Sofia but was quiet enough to get a good nights sleep. The apartment itself was spotless and felt so homely. There’s 2 balcony’s to be enjoyed, the beds are beyond comfortable and the rooms all excellent sizes. Silviya herself was incredible with restaurant recommendations, tips about Sofia and even went out of her way to  bookus a taxi for the journey home. The apartment was the icing on the cake for our incredible stay. 5 stars!", "The place was perfectly clean.  The beds very confortable. The location was perfect: near to the city center in a quiet street. Near to public transports. Conform to the description. Silvia was kindly helping us every time we needed. I recommend this place!", "Great apartment for a good price! The apartment has everything you need and Silviya is a very good host. Quick and clear in communication!", "Looks exactly as in the pictures. Clean, lovely host and great location.", "great stylish place! recommend", "I highly recommend this beautiful flat - very nice place!", "Very kind and accomodating host. We were very comfortable during our stay, the shower is great and the beds are comfortable. The location is very convenient, close to the town centre and check in was made very easy thanks to Silviya's good communication. Thank you very much for our stay, I will definitely stay again if I'm back in Sofia.", "Great communication - guest orientated and friendly - clean and fairly central - everything necessary close by - typical residential area - not very inviting from the outside but lovely inside.", "We are happy that we chose Silviya's place for our vacation in Sofia. It is beatiful, quite, spacious, quite, and comfortable. And Silviya turned out to be a great host, being always ready to help and answering any our questions in moments! If we manage to travel to Sofia again, we definitely know where to stay :)", "This apartment is excellent. Bright, clean and comfortable. In a quiet  location with good general shop immediately opposite. Easy walk to town centre. Be aware entrance is not on Sveti Ivan Rilski but round corner opposite shop. Host communicates well. Highly recommended by all 4 of us. ", "The place is amazing. I loved the apartment so much! Silviya is an amazing host. She answered all questions and provided with good tips about restaurants and so on. Definitely recommended! Thank you very much!", "Very well thought and clean place! There were these little things which made our staying very cosy! Thank you very much!", "Silviya’s place was great. Also very understanding when we were delayed in arriving. Would recommend.", "Silviya's place was absolutely amazing. Me and my friends had a lovely time and we would definitely visit again.", "Perfect host! Silviya has was very helpful and could assist for all kind of questions - it was a pleasure being her guest!", "Wow! Such a gorgeous apartment. Really lovely, lots of space in all the rooms. The decor is great & very stylish. There is a balcony & lots of windows & the entire place is very light.
The apartment is about a ten minute walk into town, so a fab location.
Really enjoyed our stay at Silviya’s place & would certainly chose to stay again when in Sofia.
One word of warning to travellers. There are several unscrupulous taxi drivers around town. Download an app & always order one to avoid being charged 10 times what the cost should be.", "Everything was really amazing, me and my family enjoyed the stay at Silviya's place. Location is about 10-15 min away from the city centre. The place is really stylish and has everyone what one needs.", "Silviya's apartment is very beautiful. It is exactly how it is shown in the pics. She is a super host, so quick with all the responses and even gave us so many top tips about the city. It really made our stay in Sofia pretty great. The location is quite close to the center. The taxi costed about 3 - 4  levs (about 2 Euros) to get to the center.", "Amazing stay. The apt is great and Silviya is the best!!
Thank you so much", "Silviya's home is beautiful and she was very helpful throughout our stay. Thank you for having us Silviya!", "Silvya's place is a gem! It is close to the center. Well decorated, clean and tidy, funtional with a warm touch. Silvya is a great host and provides you with all the information and amenities that you require plus there is coffee in the kitchen!  I would definatly recomend!", "Everything was as expected. The apartment is located in walking distance to the city center. The interior decoration is very nice. The five of us had a great time in Sofia.", "What a great host!! Silviya was very attentive, responsive to every question we had. Thank you so much!! 
Her place was so cozy, a place you would live permanently, very thoughtfully made, quite spacious for the three of us. Nice shower, inviting living area and great bedrooms with lots of storage. Check in-check out was effortless and the area was quite convenient with nice places to eat/drink a couple blocks away. Vitosha which is the main pedestrian center street was 10’ on foot. Definitely coming back when in Sofia!", "Cozy and clean apartment that fits 4 people perfectly. All the furniture and decorations were very nice and stylish. The beds in both bedrooms were comfortable and nice. 
We really loved the kitchen with the wooden cabinets as well as the bathroom with the walk in shower. Really nice.

The location is very convenient. About 5 minutes walking to NDK, 10 minutes to "Vitosha" Blvd. The apartment is in a quite street and we did not have problems with noise. 

The communication with the host Silviya was very pleasant and fast. We had an issue the first morning which however was not hosts fault but of the whole building. Never the less Silviya reacted immediately and helped us fix the issue really quickly. 

I would definitely recommend the apartment and would gladly stay there again!", "Place is impecable and is very well furnished. I would not hesitate to stay here again. Silviya was a great host! She was very attentive and responsive. Thank you!", "Sylviya’s apartment is great value, very clean and artistically decorated. We had a great time staying in Sofia, and it helped that you could walk to the centre to see all of the attractions, restaurants and bars. Sylviya was very helpful with our check in and advised us on where to go for food and drink. We highly recommend this place!", "Lovely place, very cozy and clean. I would definitely recommend Silviya's apartment!", "Lovely apartment close to town. Recommended.", "Best AirBnB i have stayed in, host is amazing would recommend.", "Silviya is absolutely the best host! I booked this air bnb for a girls trip with 3 other friends. The apartment comfortably fit 4 of us, and was absolutely faultless. It is ideally located, about 15 - 30 mins walk from anywhere you'd want to visit in Sofia. We were there for 5 days and never had more than a 30 min walk to the main tours, escape rooms, recommended restaurants, and the main street (Vitosha).

Although we weren't able to meet Silviya, she gave us great recommendations for places to eat (I would highly recommend Sladkarniza Daga for breakfast!) As we were there for a few days and had a mix of activities, she also gave us details with how we could order food in, which we did whilst we were out there with no issue. She was also helpful regarding the estimated prices for taxis, and just anything! 

The apartment is great - there's plenty of space to chill out, and balcony space which is always great :) Absolutely loved the apartment, loved Sofia and had a great host!! I would definitely recommend Silviya's apartment!", "Nice appartement in the center of Sofia.
Silviya is always reachabel", "Apartment in the perfect location. Quiet area but only a 10 - 15 min stroll to the centre.", "Great apt and service. Recommend!", "Great appartment: very cozy, well equipped, close to the center. Silvia was extremely flexible regarding checkin and checkout times. Very late arrival and departure was absolutely no problem. So, perfect communication with Silvia. All in all: thank you Silvia, very recommendable!", "Our family of four had a wonderful stay at Silviya's place. The apartment is freshly renovated, clean, modern and well equipped (for the ladies: it has one of the best hairdryers I have used at airbnb ;)). Location is very good - centrally located and about 5-7 min walk to the absolute center of Sofia. There is a little supermarket steps away from the the building where you can find pretty much anything you may need, including fresh fruit and veggies. Communication with Silviya was quick and flawless - she would always respond within minutes and try to help with whatever we may have needed.
We highly recommend this place and we will be back again at our next visit of Sofia. ", "The apartment is really nice and Silviya is a great host! ", "Very very nice Apartment. Silviya answered very fast and was totaly helpful. 
The apartment is modern arranged and the area quite and green.
In front of the house is a little shop and around the corner is a bigger supermarked (5min walk).
The centre is 10min away.
The Apartment is one of the best where we ever were.
Thank you Silviya for all!! ", "The apartment was clean, comfortable, and had a great location! Most areas of Sofia were easily within a short walk. It was great sitting on the balcony at night. There was also a wonderful, small, friendly market across the street that sold fresh fruit. Silviya was very accommodating and was quick in her responses. She made our stay very easy. Would definitely recommend this apartment to others. Thanks Silviya!!

", "Siliya's apartment was lovely! It was very clean, comfy and stylishly furnished. She was very friendly and helpful. All in all, we had a wonderful time at Silviya's apartment!", "Great place! Very well appointed. Silviya was an excellent host with good communication.", "The apartment was lovely and as decribed! Everything was perfect! Silviya is great host and communication was easy! We'd definitely would stay there again!", "The apartment is very nice, cozy and clean. Silviya answered always very quickly, she was very helpful and really made our stay pleasant and easy to menage. Definitely would come back and recommend it to everyone!! ", "Silviya's apartment is contemporary and well maintained. The open plan layout is great, along with the terrace and there is plenty of space for 4 people to stay. The area is very residential but just a 5-10 min walk to the centre.

We found Silviya to be a very helpful and welcoming host & she went out of her way to help us when there was an issue with the hot water supply. I would recommend this apartment to everyone.", "Beautiful apartment in perfect location! Quiet neighborhood but close to everything. Silviya was a great host!", "Perfect location, awesome and super responsive host, apartment cosy, stylish and fully equipped.
Would definitely recommend it!", "Really nice place to stay. Silviya and her family are super friendly. We have been here for the weekend en enjoyed it very much. apartment is very clean and nice. It's Central located, city centre is walking distance. Airport is only 20 minute drive with a taxi. We would really come back again. ", "The apartment is nice, cozy and big enough for 5 people. It's clean and modern, very comfortable! It's near the city centre with the main shopping street and restaurants. We enjoyed our stay very much!", "Silviya's apartment was a lovely quiet retreat in Sofia. Everything we needed was provided and she was quick to answer any of our questions. Silviya greeted us hersle", "The apartment is beautiful and Sylvia goes out of her way to make your stay nice. She's very accommodating and even called for a taxi when we needed to go to the airport. The apartment is in a great location too", "We walked pretty much everywhere, only 15 mins max. Everything is close by and the apartment was very clean & extremely comfortable :)
", "Silviya's place is a combination of modern and vintage. It is a comfortable apartment, very quiet, just a few blocks from major transit hubs and walking distance from all the centrally located attractions. Lightning fast internet and a/c in all rooms. A small shop is just across the street. Great communication with nearly instant replies, five star check in outsourced to smiling family members :-) What would you need more? Oh maybe, another week here?", "The apartment is perfect, everything is tidy and clean. Silviya gave us some fantastic recomendations. Thank you for all, Silviya! ", "Amazing place, the flat has everything you need, cool decoration and style, close to everything and quiet. Silviya was super nice, she gave us a lot of information about the city, all the facilities, she is just lovely. ", "Absolutely fell in love with this apartment! Supper cozy and  beautifully decorated. The location is central and located in a quiet neighbourhood. Highly recommended! ", "L'appartamento è davvero bello, con un arredamento piuttosto curato! È molto pratico ed è in un'ottima posizione (10 min a piedi dal centro e 5 min a piedi dalla metro). Pulizia e servizi ottimi. Host gentilissima, molto accogliente e davvero disponibile in tutto!! Sicuramente torneremo qui se ci sarà un altro viaggio a Sofia in futuro!", "Schitterend appartement met veel voorzieningen. Handdoeken aanwezig evenals strijkijzer en föhn. Keuken van alles voorzien. Rustige ligging maar toch op loopafstand van vele bezienswaardigheden. Silviya reageert heel snel op alle vragen. Echt een aanrader voor een verblijf in Sofia!", "Appartement superbe, très bien équipé. La clim’ est un plus non négligeable surtout l’été.
Silviya a été une hôte très disponible
Appartement très bien situé dans Sofia, dans un quartier très calme.
Je recommande cet appartement si vous deviez passer quelques jours à Sofia", "Nous sommes ravis de notre  séjour grâce à Silviya. Son appartement est l’endroit idéal pour découvrir Sofia à pieds. 
Situé à 10 mns du centre historique, nous avons pu optimiser notre temps et profiter de nos vacances. 
De plus l’appartement est accueillant. Très propre et bien équipé. 
Merci Silviya ", "Appartement très propre, conforme aux photos. Bien équipé. Un peu en retrait des zones vivantes de Sofia. Hôte très sympa et réactive. Très bon rapport qualité prix.", "Casa molto bella. Il palazzo non molto. Host cordiale con cui ho avuto contatti principalemente telefonici. Consiglio", "Le logement correspond parfaitement à sa description, idéal pour accéder rapidement au centre ville tout en étant dans une rue relativement calme. Je recommande le logement à toute personne, famille ou couple d’amis comme nous qui veulent profiter de Sofia.", "La casa di Silvia è molto bella e arredata con gusto, in centro e molto confortevole. Ci ha accolto con garbo lo zio Petko. Silvia, tramite messaggio, ci ha dato ottimi consigli sui migliori ristoranti e locali della zona.", "Dit appartement is prachtig, aangenaam en zo leuk.  Het voelde aan als thuiskomen. We hebben met 5 ons heel goed geamuseerd, zowel in het appartement als in Sofia. Veel plezier en ga ervoor.", "Silviyas Wohnung ist toll eingerichtet, es fehlt einem an nichts. Die Kommunikation war schnell und unkompliziert. Die perfekte Wohnung, um die Stadt zu erkunden!", "Le logement est conforme aux photos présentées 
 Très bien situé par rapport au centre-ville 
 Très calme", "Het is een super appartement. Nieuw, schoon, en super ingericht. Het ligt ook ontzettend centraal.", "Το διαμέρισμα είναι σε ένα ήσυχο σημείο, πολύ κοντά στο κέντρο της πόλης. Η απόσταση από το μετρό με τα πόδια ήταν περίπου 10 λεπτά, πράγμα πολύ σημαντικό. Όλα ήταν υπέροχα και η Sylvia πολύ εξυπηρετική και άμεσα διαθέσιμη σε ότι χρειαζόταν.", "zeer mooi appartement, goede ligging en zeer snelle reactie van Silviya indien je vragen hebt ( meestal binnen de 5 à 10 minuten antwoord) 
zij is er zelf blijkbaar niet veel maar haar nonkel die 2 verdiepen hoger woont is er om te helpen, zeer lieve man", "L'appartement était juste parfait, très propre, ultra moderne! Clim indispensable et réactive, porte d'entrée capricieuse mais une fois que l'on a le coup de main nickel! En résumé, si vous allez à Sofia, prenez le Air BNB de Sylviya.", "Le séjour a été excellent. L'accueil s'est fait dans de très bonnes conditions, malgré le retard que nous avons eu. Le logement est moderne, très propre et possède tout le corps fort nécessaire. Il est idéalement situé pour se promener et atteindre le centre de Sofia.
La literie est bonne et il y a peu de bruits aux alentours. 
Sylviana a été extrêmement disponible et très agréable nous l'envoyer remercions.
Ce fut un très bon séjour 
Pour info, les logements bulgares n'ont pas pas de volets, seulement des rideaux, cela peut parfois être complexe pour de tous petits enfants.", "Appartamento delizioso, arredato con cura e molto accogliente. Pulizia ottima , quartiere tranquillo vicino al centro.  Host molto disponibile anche se non presente perché  fuori per lavoro. Lo consiglierei  sicuramente!", "Silviya, ha sido una anfitriona perfecta, nos ha facilitado en todo momento nuestra estancia,   El apartamento es muy bonito, está limpio y tiene todas las comodidades.
Lo recomendaría 100%"]

reviews:
["We likes the clean bedrooms and the stylish livingroom! The athmosfhere was very nice and easy!", "You may not get any extra information other than login guide (link) given on their airbnb but otherwise good location, clean, cam-secure and price worthy.", "Great value for money and great location! Nice and clean space, comfy beds and fast response from host. Would stay again :)", "The room was clean and nice. Lucy was very kind and the communication was quick and easy. I recommend this affordable flat.", "Clean, quiet and centrally located. Couldn’t ask for a better place to stay. Thank you for a goodnight sleep. I highly recommend this place.", "The family who runs this place is very sweet and kind. The bathroom was very clean and with a great shower. The room itself was a bit cold,however it was clean. They let us check in earlier as well as leave our things after checkout in their lockers, which was very kind of them. Their location is right next to the metro and very close to central Sophia. They had tips on what to do as well as suggestions. We had a great stay at this place!", "Central location very near the metro station and near the local restaurants.", "Downtown Sofia which was great for us.", "Hosts really put effort in answering our questions and were very kind. Bathroom floor was once not very clean, but the bedroom was very clean. Location is very convenient in the center of Sofia.", "Really nice place in a great location. From there the most important sights and downtown area are walkable. Metro Station is right outside, so it is easy to get to the airport. The hosts are extremely nice and went out of their way to help us, for example when we needed to print our boarding passes. A pity we only stayed a night. If we ever come back to Sofia, we will come here again! :-) ", "Good place to stay un sofia", "A great place to stay that is perfectly located for the centre of Sofia; I thoroughly recommend it.", "Super place! Good price, good location, nice and kind people. Very recommended, if you visit Sofia.", "This guys are amazing, the apartment is perfect, very clean and comfortable, full equipped! We are very happy for have found this place, close to all the attractions and public transport. Highly recommend this place, it is one of the best that I have been!! 
Thank you very much :)", "Place in the city centre, clean, nice hosts and very helpful! Definitely worth recommending :)", "We highly recommend this place and the wonderful people who are managing it ! They were really kind and understanding about our check-in and check-out time (our flight was late)
The bed was great, the best mattress we had during our 2 weeks holiday in Bulgaria. The hostel is ideally located next to Serdika station, very central and the train goes directly to the airport.
The hostel has a kitchen fully equiped but if you feel like eating outside, you will have plenty of options from a true bulgarian canteen (with a smiling and very welcoming staff!) just some meters away to all the fanciness of the Vitosha street.
Thank you Jenny for being so helpful and kind to all our requests !!!", "It's a hostel. Very clean and comfortable. Big common area", "Quiet and clean place, kind hosts! The house is in the really center of Sofia.. cheap and comfortable.", "I stayed here for two nights with my boyfriend and a friend and it was perfect! The place is super clean and is right in the center of Sofia. Also, the host was really friendly and even helped us with the parking. I would definitely go back!^^", "I really have great time in Sofia also thanks to our accomodation. There was no problem with anything. Thank you very much!", "Very nice simple flats, very nice hosts, clean rooms! Everything there what you might need. Very close to public transport, very central. It was perfect for our stay of 3 days.", "The owners are very kind and the place is in the center with very good location. It was a fine staying.", "Very nice and confortable place :)", "Perfetto! Puoi scendere e c'é il ristorante cinese anche se... Meglio du spaghi!", "Nice rooms, friendly people, no complaints.", "More of a hostel than Airbnb. Very clean room and comfy beds. Bathrooms have shower gel and shampoo.", "A cozy home. People are kind and warm. Perfect location, the hostel is exactly located near the metro station, really convenient place. I look forward to coming back!", "This is my second time to live here cause now I am travelling. I am so glad that I can find this wonderful room. Vera and the host are kind of you. See you soon my friend.", "Both Ma and Lars have been extremely helpful. As a first timer to Sofia, the information given by them to their house is very informative and accurate. The house is very clean and newly renovated. It is right in the heart of the city and it is just a stone throw away from Serdika Metro Station exit. We had a twin bed room with airconditional. The room also equipped with led TV.  There is a room where Ma has converted into common room where guest can use for chilling out. Guests are free to use the kitchen for cooking and there is also a washing machine if one wish to do their washing as well. Another thing worth mentioning is that Ma is doing up his private garden at the entrance as well to allow guest taking a drink there and stay relax especially after a hard day exploring the city. Will definitely come back to stay again. Highly recommended to anyone who wish to have a comfortable and relaxing stay. Cheers.", "Great and central place", "This place is nearly ideal, clean and quiet though right next to the main metro station and all the central Sofia sites. A great find for a reasonable price.  ", "The accommodation is a perfect 10/10 and the host more than that! The place was neat and clean, and everything was properly organized. Vera went out of her way to help us with everything, especially getting the tickets for our next destination, planning our Sofia trip and stored our luggage for an extra eleven hours ", "Fantastic location, walking distance from main sights and streets. Felt safe in the neighbourhood. The accommodation was clean and well kept. They're doing some small rennovtions but it wasn't disruptive at all. The building is safe and gated. The hosts were gracious and accommodated our early check in. The kitchen is well equipped, comfortable living room space, free laundry and AC. We felt right at home! Definitely would recommend, amazing value.", "The place is great! Great location! The place has several of rooms for rent so it cab be crouded for who is looking for privacy. But for us it was just perfect! Very nice host! Reccomended", "Beautiful, cheap, very friendly hosts!!", "The room is GREAT!  The entry is under construction. The shared living room and kitchen are nice. The bathroom is very small and the shower is kind of the bathroom. It's not a separate stall.  The host was very friendly and helped as much as he could. He is a hard worker and it trying to put everything together. Great value!", "You are not going to believe it! Am a solo adventuer to Europe for the very 1st time so I booked this accommodation since the price is quite friendly. I was wondering if the accommodation is as good as wats described, the price can't be so affordable isn't it!!!  

To cut the story short, I was planning to have the solo adventure around Europe but I became a friend of the host/I help to manage the place now. The location, hygiene,transportation, comfort lvl everything  surely fall into the first tier. Every major attractions of Sofia are within stone thrown. No matter if you are a solo traveller, couple enjoying some good holiday or a family trip lover, the place worth 100% of the money.

Book it now and if your planned date is before my flight back to Singapore, am more than willing to share with you our story !!!", "El sitio es muy limpio y cómodo, tal y como se ve en las fotos, además es cerca de todo... muy central. Honggang de súper amable.", "Servicio inmejorable, cocina muy equipada, sales a la calle y ya estas en el centro, pudimos lavar nuestra ropa, llegar antes del horario de check in, dejar nuestros bolsos para recorrer el ultimo dia en Sofia. Volveria a hospedarme con Luci.", "地理位置非常好,离所有的景点都特别近,住在这里我们没有乘坐任何交通工具｡离索菲亚步行街五分钟路程,门口就是地铁站｡房东特别nice!去索菲亚住在这里绝对不会后悔", "房子位置极佳,位于城市中心,出门即是地铁口!
房间一尘不染,设施一应俱全,相当舒适!
房东热情好客,还帮忙打印机票!
性价比非常高!强烈推荐!", "Het was een TOP locatie! Kwaliteit stijgt boven de prijs uit bij deze kamer. Het enige wat iets minder fijn was is dat er geen centrale verwarming is, maar de elektrische kachel kan je op je kamer zetten en dan is het zo warm. Verder een super vakantie gehad, wat een mooie stad!", "Это хороший небольшой хостел в центре города. До метро 2 минуты. Множество разных магазинов рядом. Нас приветливо встретил хозяин хостела и помог поднять чемодан на второй этаж, отказавшись от денег за эту услугу. Нас, конечно, это приятно удивило. Соседями оказались туристы из разных стран, что тоже интересно. Чисто и уютно. Быт продуман до мелочей. Нет только микроволновки, если кого нибудь это беспокоит. Очень заботливый и внимательный  хозяин. Языки для общения китайский и английский.  Для экономных туристов очень хороший вариант для жилья.", "We hebben genoten van ons verblijf hier in Sofia. De air bnb leek eerder op een hostel, iets wat ik niet verwachtte maar het was wel een aangename kamer. Zeker een aanrader!", "Buen apartamento. Baño un poco sucio. Todo bien ubicado", "Buena localización, habitación impecable y zonas comunes muy limpias.
Jeny estuvo muy atenta. Lo recomiendo.", "Buena habitacion. El baño compartido un poco sucio. Apartamento bien ubicado a 5 minutos de la calle de bares", "Muy céntrico y fácil de llegar", "非常棒的民宿!房间都很干净,厨房很大｡在市中心位置,去所有景点都很方便｡关键还靠着苏非亚唯一两条地铁的交汇站,出行更方便了｡房主很热情!强烈推荐!", "Un appartement très propre et chaleureux. Nous avons moi et mon fils de 6ans été très bien accueillis. Le métro est à côté et direct vers l'aéroport. Vitosha est à 5minutes à pieds.", "Très bonne localisation ! Hôte agréable , bonne communication. Je vous recommande ce logement", "Difficile da contattare anzi imposdibile", "房间干净整洁,住的非常舒适,房东很热情也很好沟通!下次还会再来!", "老板人真的很好,还是住在中国人家里舒服,免费提供旅游咨询,哈哈,很满意｡", "El alojamiento eratal y como estaba descrito. Limpio, aseado y cómodo. Muy centrico, cerquisima de transporte publico y la atención de Honggang excelente. Una gran persona. "]

reviews:
["Good location and delicious breakfast! ", "Very sympathique and well equipped loft in the center of Sofia, you can find everything you may need in a walking distance. Rossy and her father are very welcoming hosts. Thank you!", "Great experience!", "Very nice place to stay in Sofia, very close to city centre. Peter is very pleasant.", "Very nice place to stay, close walk to landmarks and public transport too.", "Beautiful apartment, great location, tasty breakfast and a nice history lesson too!", "Fantastic choice for a stay in Sofia. Peter was a friendly host (as well as being a talented artist), giving us a history of Bulgaria. He’s multi-lingual although prefers to speak in French if you can (ours was a little rusty but we got by!). Breakfast was filling and healthy and always punctual. The place itself was very pretty too (small and cosy but functional). The nearby restaurant recommended to us by Peter was really tasty, if you’re a meat eater. We accidentally ordered far too much but took it home to finish it the next day. We recommend doing the free food tour and going up to mount Vitosha in a cable car-both were highlights of the trip. Don’t bother going to the National Art gallery though- not worth the money. And most museums are closed on Mondays. and try the Bulgarian wine!", "Very centrally located. Cute apartment in an authentic local style. Would recommend!", "everything was wonderful", "This loft was very nice. It was cute, the breakfast was great, and it was only a short walk from the city center. Peter was very helpful and held our bags the last day we were in Sofia so we didn't need to carry them through the city.", "Excellent! Greeted by Rossy’s father who was very welcoming and has brought us breakfast with a smile every day. Highly recommended. Will be back!", "Great stay and lovely host. Rossy’s Dad gave us an excellent welcome and told us a lot about Bulgaria. The breakfast was also great and the location was perfect. The studio is full of character and allows you to get a real local feel for Sofia.", "Nice small apartment, 10 min walk from city center. Clean, cozy and kind owners.", "Apartment not recomendable", "Firstly I would like to say that the location is great, very close to central atractions. Rossy's father was nice, punctual with the breakfast (which was great) but we had a little problem with communication. We know only Spanish and English and he was fluent in French and Italian. Anyway, we managed. Also, we were really lucky that it was possible to keep our luggage because our departure was at night...all in all, we liked the apartment, Rossy was really quick in responding. Everything went smooth.", "Great place in a quiet neighborhood, with a great host bringing breakfast 5 flight of stairs with a smile daily", "Very nice and cozy accommodation and a very friendly and interesting host. Breakfast was good", "The house is close to the metro station, if you don't mind walking, and relatively close to the city center. 
Having to walk 5 flights of stairs might seem daunting at first, but it's not that hard.
Peter was really nice and welcoming, and really helpful with things to see and do in the city.
And the breakfast every morning was so much, that we couldn't possibly eat it all. 

Overall i would recommend staying here, if you want to feel a little more like a local.  ", "The place is like in the pictures. Rossy’s father is a very interesting man, knows different languages and gives very good tips of the city. We’ve really enjoyed our stay!!", "Everything is just as described from Rossy.Her father is a great man and our stay there was exceptional.", "Wonderful place to stay! Host's dad was super funny, speaks many European languages. Breakfast was such a nice touch. Thanks for everything!", "Beautiful authentic appartment in the hart of Sofia.", "Everything went great.  The host helped us a lot with finding a private parking near the apartment. ", "Enjoyable stay. Very nice room. Had all the amenities needed. Nice family.", "Rossy’s place is located quite near to the centre of Sofia (10minutes walk) which is great for exploring the city. Nearby are all kinds of restaurants and Cafés and also shops. We were welcomed by Rossy’s father who was just lovely, chatty and warm-hearted. We immediately felt at home. He prepared us a small breakfast each morning and gave us some suggestions and historical background info on the city. Easily recommendable for a short spontaneous weekend trip !", "We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in our first airbnb ever! Rossys dad was extremely welcoming and friendly and made us feel at home. He showed us some of the books in the place and told us a little about Bulgaria’s history. Breakfast was exactly on time and DELICIOUS! Much more and better than we could have asked for! Amenities were great (fridge, dishes, towels, books, tea, water, etc) Even with a bit of a language barrier (he spoke Italian, I spoke Spanish) we were still able to generally get by.", "This suite is quirky and exactly as pictured. The air conditioning was appreciated during a summer heatwave. Clean and comfy beds in a fantastic location, easily accessible by metro. Basic continental breakfast was brought up in the mornings and it was a great way to start the day. Rossy is very quick and helpful with communication, and her father, Peter, who checked us in and brought breakfast in the mornings, is a funny and interesting man. I would recommend this suite to people that are up for a walk up right in the centre of Sofia. ", "Very good location, walking distance from everywhere. The 5 floors without elevator are a bit painful but really it didn't feel that bad in the end. The shower is in a different room than the toilet (thanks god!) and the place is very quiet. The breakfast was a nice surprise and plentiful (ham, cheeses, bread, fruit, juice, even eggs...), so plentiful we had to tell the host to bring us half of it!", "I had a great experience staying at Rossy's. Her father is a comedian, he speaks very little English but that didn't affect anything, and the breakfast made in the morning was delicious. The apartment was unique, traditionally decorated, comfortable and had the typical European rooftop view - loved it! I would recommend this place to everyone.", "Fantastic location and outstanding hospitality! My wife and I spent a weekend here and we’d definitely recommend staying at Rossy’s father’s place!", "Clean, cosy place to stay in a good location and great hospitality. I would definitely recommend it!", "The appartment is located near the city centre. It is a small but complete place to stay. Fresh breakfast is brought every morning, which was a very nice extra. We had a pleasant stay here.", "I had a great stay in Sofia. Rossy’s father, Petar, was a very kind and generous host, and breakfast was a nice touch to wake up to. Thank you so much for your hospitality!", "Good location, we were able to walk everywhere. We arrived at 1am because of a delayed flight and Peter kindly met us with a big smile and made us feel welcome.", "The studio has an easily-accessible location,allowing the guests to walk to famous tourist places(like the St.Alexander Nevsky Cathedral) and shopping streets.Also you can find many bistroes,cafes and bakeries around it. The studio is in a quiet block despite it is located at very close to the city center. It was clean and tidy inside when I checked in. Rossy and her father are warmhearted people and I really enjoyed Mr.Peter's carefully-made breakfast!", "Great hospitality. Got tips and help without the need to ask. And a lovely place, in walking distance from everything.", "Awesome location. Breakfast is quite handy and served at a convenient for us time.", "The loft is fantastic. If you are looking for a unique place to enjoy your days in Sofia this is the place!! 

Loft: It´s beautifully furnished and nicely decorated. You will find anything that you could need. The location is perfect, you can explore the city center by foot, there is a nice restaurant just 50m away and small shops too. Wifi Is super fast and the breakfast is just AMAZING!!! You will have local fruits and local dishes from Bulgaria. 

Host: Rossy and her dad are both extremely kind and they will help you with everything you need. We really enjoyed spending time with Rossy´s father since his talk is very interesting. Thank you for everything, we had a great time in Sofia and definitely we will come back to this beautiful loft.", "We had a great time at Rossy's place. Peter, her father, had an excellent knowledge of the Bulgarian history. The room was perfectly clean and cozy and breakfast was great.", "Lovely apartment with everything you need. The location is excellent. Close to the National Palace of Culture and Vitosha Road. There's quite a bit of night life in the area as well.", "I only stayed one night but Peter could not have been kinder or more helpful. He is a kind gentleman and brings the apartment to life  As it used to be his artist studio. He went above and beyond to make me feel at home - my flight was too early for a proper breakfast but he met me with a little bagged one for the plane. Such a nice touch! 

The room is comfortable, modest buts has some flair and style. It's located on the seventh floor so could be hard for people to make the climb either due to physical or baggage reasons.", "Good communication with Rossy, helpful father, interesting home.", "Very nice room, friendly and very interesting host, good location in the centre", "We booked the appartment cause our flight was leaving Sofia at 6:30 am. The ommunication with Rossy was excellent. Quick reply, (Hidden by Airbnb) location point to navigate with maps the taxi  best.
