Then he asked "what time I want to have breakfast?, I said: "breakfast?", he said, "yes I will cock a breakfast for you, what time you want me to serve it?!"))) I said "9!". And each day at 9 o'clock I woke up with someone's nocking at the door. Opening i found out Petar standing with a tray full of home maid food. Petar were breathing deeply, 6 floor is not the ground) 

I Wish him all the best, and thanks for Magnificat impression of Bulgarian people. Very welcome and intelligent.  Ciao! ", "
I can only describe my experience at this airbnb apartment as magic. Petar was so welcoming and funny and brought us a home-made breakfast at precisely 11 am in the morning. He is also an iconographer! The place was clean, bright, charming, beautiful and perfect temperature. I had a great sleep and a great shower and amazing food there.", "My stay at Rossy's loft space was comfortable and very convenient. The space was clean, bright and had everything that you would expect plus some helpful extras. 

Thanks Rossy", "Great place - cozy & super cute. Conveniently located to all restaurants and night life spots in Sofia. Our only regret was we couldn't stay longer!", "We had a WONDERFUL stay in the heart of sofia. the apartment was quite cute!! loved having Rossy's father wake us up with breakfast after a long day and night!! no worries though you can say when you would like breakfast or even if you want it. Only have nice things to say about this stay.
thank you ", "We loved staying in this beautiful loft that was perfectly located in the centre. Rossy's dad Petar, is one of the nicest people you could meet. A true gentleman and a wonderful human being! We enjoyed his company very much and on top of that he made us delicious breakfast each morning! Amazing and kind hearted! Thank you so much for making our experience in Sofia even more special! x", "Rossy and her dad were very helpful and friendly. The room was lovely, as described. Breakfast was a great addition. Would recommend. 

p.s. - the local area is really cool - there is an excellent vegan restaurant nearby called moon and sun.", "Rossy and her dad Peter were absolutely charming in hosting us in Sofia. Knowledgeable, kind and ready to help, we couldn't have enjoyed our stay more in this cosy little appartment, very close to the center of Sofia.", "I spent two nights at Rossy's flat and can only recommend it! The loft is cosy and comfortable, it's situated in the best possibly spot in the centre of Sofia and at the same time it's quiet at night. We enjoyed our stay also thanks to our host - Rossy's father, who was a pleasure to talk to.
", "I highly recommend staying in the loft. Very central and easy to get around the amazing city . Rossy and Peter are overly helpful and the loft is filled with maps and books on things to do. The detailed decor adds a personal touch that makes you feel like it is your own Bulgarian home. Overall had an amazing time wish I could have stayed longer ! Thanks !", "We were received by Pepe, the host, with a lot of humour, stories and french language! He's a painter and will tell you some anecdotes about the history of Bulgaria. In the studio you can find many interesting books about the country's history etc.
The little loft was perfect for the night we were staying there, and Pepe even brought us breakfast in the morning, climbing up the 6 floors without lift!", "I generally had a good time in Rossy's charming, little flat but must admit It was a bit disappointing to find that her dad, who is running the place, does not speak English. He seemed like a nice guy though but unfortunately conversations were running on a very basic level.
The included breakfast was, aside from the fruit and freshy-squeezed (?) juice, a bit too bland for my tastes but that is a matter of preferences.
That being said the place is close to everything, quiet and the wi-fi workes without any problems at all. I would recommend the place, especially to people speaking any of the languages that Rossy's dad does.", "Rossy's apartment is very close to the city center which makes exploring the city quite easy. We found lovely restaurants that offered great food for little money. Everyone was extremely nice.
Communication with Rossy beforehand was easy and smooth. She replied very fast. Unfortunately, we had rather a hard time talking with her dad, the actual host, because we can't speak Italian or French. We got along just fine but it is definitely easier if you are able to speak either of the two languages.
Wifi worked very well.", "Rossy's loft is located within walking distance of lots of different sights in downtown Sofia. Communicating with Rossy was easy and straightforward, and Rossy's dad (the actual host) is kind and accommodating -- we found it easiest to speak French together. 

Travelers with limited mobility should note that the loft is located on the top floor of its apartment building; also, the mattresses are thin and a little bit uncomfortable.  Overall, though, this apartment met the needs of two travelers on a budget and we recommend it.", "The appartment was perfect in every way
Dad is a legend ", "We had a wonderful time at Rossy's apartment. The loft is cosy and well equipped with everything you need, including local maps, guidebooks and history books. The location is perfect for wandering into the centre - the excellent Sun and Moon restaurant is only about 10 minutes away.

Rossy's father was a true gentleman, bringing us breakfast promptly every morning and offering to help out with anything we needed. Rossy even checked up on us after a big storm! ", "This place is amazing!! Adorable loft, clean, great shower, perfect location and the best of all: the host Pepe!! He had so much personality and is really funny!  We loved our time in Sofia. Very good location - close to the city center, a couple of parks and small farmer's market on Graf Ignatiev Street where you can buy fresh local veg and fruit!
Overall, the place was clean, very cute, perfect size for one or two. I highly recommend staying at this loft!", "Our stay was wonderful, we were well taken care of, and Rossy's dad told us many great stories.", "Fantastic in all areas.  It has lots of stairs and no lift but worth it.   Clean cute great breakfast spectacular service.   Loved the location.  We arrived after midnight but not a problem.
", "I had a lovely time at Rossy's! I actually never met her but her dad Petar took care of me and was extremely nice and helpful (not to mention the wonderful breakfast he made for me the two mornings I was there - I mean, crepes?! The studio is very charming, fully functional and very well located. I was by myself but I think it would fit two people comfortably. I would definitely stay at Rossy's again if I go back to Sofia and I hope I do because I loved this little artsy town!", "My friend and I spend two nights at Ross's. Overall we had a pleasant stay. I can very much recommend staying at Rossy's place.", "Visit Rossy's loft for the best central location in downtown Sofia. Very clean, welcoming and cosy!!", "Thanks to Rossy and her father our Sofia trip was easy and great. Really good location, nice apartment and quiet for a god sleep. Perfect stay!", "I did not see her but her father is extremely helpful and friendly. He speaks French and Italien and his career is quite interesting
", "Amazing place and great hosts, it is really well located in the city centre and Rossy's father is a wonderful person and very supportive. A most recommended place to stay.", "Rossi and her dad Pepi are sweet and hospitable people! The studio was cute, had perfect downtown location and it was very clean.

The breakfast that is offered by Rossy's father is very tasty and delightful. Rossy was very responsive and I enjoyed communicating with her.", "It was a pleasure to stay at this loft. Not only because of its coziness or for its great localization, but for the kindness of Rossy and her father. Recommended.", "I would definitely recommend Rossy's place. It was exactly what I was looking for- in the city centre, clean, cozy, calm and safe! Rossy and her father were extremely kind and we had a nice home made breakfast. This is an unique place where you will feel home.", "A fantastic experience all the way through! Rossy was patient & responsive to all my questions before the trip, and was very clear in the instructions to get to her place, keys etc. The apartment itself was very cosy and impeccably maintained. Rossy welcomed me the evening I arrived and I was very lovingly attended to by her father through the stay - with sumptuous breakfasts served everyday! The place is well located in a by-lane so there's not much noise, and yet, all major landmarks are just a walk away! If there is any downside one might find to the place, it is that it's on the 5th floor, without a lift... Otherwise, excellent value for money, and there're some things that money can't buy - like a yummy home-cooked breakfast with freshly squeezed orange juice served with a smile!", "Communication was excellent and check-in was flexible and suited our needs! 5-Star Experience! Apartment is the perfect location to a local Vegetarian Healthy Restaurant (Sun & Moon). Night bars, shops, strolls on the main la rambla. Internet is fast (fiber-optic) and reliable. They made my days in Sofia warm, positive, I felt exactly like I'm at my own family's home. Each morning George or Petr provided us with a delicious home-made breakfast. Rossy was very responsive and polite, she organized everything we needed: hair dryer, an iron and the desk, additional cleaning. The studio is tiny, warm, each furniture, decoration here were made with love and soul. I appreciate such attitude to the details, and I'm sure you'll like it too. As apartment doesn't have a kitchen space to cook and the two beds are not so wide, the studio is a perfect accommodation  for a couple of friends or colleagues. The location is awesome, you'll stay in a 7 minutes by walk from old city. I like those cafes: Supa Star (shishman str) and Local (sheynovo str). check them out! :).We spent in Sofia 5 days with my colleague Anya, and it was such a pleasant time! We really enjoyed our stay in Rossy's studio. Also we met Rossy and George at a big party for Airbnb community, and it was superfun! :-) thank you dear Rossy! Good luck with apartment and take care. ", "Sehr angnehme Unterkunft mitten im Zentrum - authentische Einrichtung. Rossys Vater war immer zugegen, wenn wir was gebraucht haben. Ich würde nochmal buchen.", "최고였어요 :) 소피아에서 가장 좋았고 기억에 남는 장소가 이곳 에어비앤비 집이네요! 호스트 아빠 집이 1층쪽이고, 게스트가 머무르는 곳은 아파트 맨 윗층이예요. Rossy는 질문사항에 빠르게 답해줬고 정말 너무너무 친절하고 재밌던 Rossy의 아빠께서 이곳에 편히 머무를 수 있게 도와주셨어요. 처음 찾아갈 땐 밤이라 좀 무서웠는데, 알고 보니 중심가 완전 근처라 다 걸어다닐 수 있고 좋았어요. 지하철역까지는 도보 10분 정도인데 지하철 타면 버스스테이션도 편히 갈 수 있어요. 아침식사도 매일 정해진 시간에 직접 가져다주셔서 감동! 덕분에 굶주리지 않고 하루를 시작할 수 있었네요. 숙소도 예쁘게 잘 꾸며놓아 머무르기 편했어요. 전반적으로 다 좋았던 곳이라 소피아에 여행오는 분들에 추천하고 싶어요! 단, 올라야하는 계단이 많아 다리나 허리 안좋을시 피하는게 좋구요! :)", "Abbiamo alloggiato io e la mia fidanzata nell'appartamento! Rustico e ben tenuto(si vede proprio che Peter, l'host, era un artista di professione!). Siamo stati accolti prima dell'orario di check-in previsto! La casa è ubicata in un ottima zona! A 5 minuti dalla famosa strada Vitosha(una via dove si può trascorrere un'ottima serata) e dal palazzo della cultura: Magnifico! Tutto può essere raggiunto a piedi nel centro in pochi chilometri! Troverete molti ristoranti vicino alla casa e anche molti locali! Per i taxi consiglio un'applicazione che si chiama TaxiMe, tariffe oneste(anche troppo basse per noi italiani) e soprattutto molto puntuali e onesti nel richiedere il costo della corsa(Sconsiglio la compagnia O.K. , poco seri nel pagamento e, a fine corsa,  fanno finta di non avere resto e soprattutto di non avere pos per pagare con la carta, nonostante venga indicato). La mattina Peter vi porterà una ricca colazione (per lo più salata) e sarete pronti per visitare la città nel migliore dei modi!!", "Sehr angenehme und top Lage Unterkunft. Sauber und gastfreundlich. Schnelle Kommunikation und nette Gastgeber. Ich empfehle jedem Gast diese Unterkunft zu besuchen und geniessen.", "L'appartement est superbe, propre et idéalement placé. Le père de Rossy nous a superbement accueilli, avec un petit cours d'histoire bulgare ;) Le petit déjeuner était aussi excellent. Bref, un endroit incroyable à Sofia. Merci Rossy et merci Peter !", "Un apartamento bien situado, un host Super amable, nos ofreció desayuno, y nos dio recomendaciones para visitar la ciudad, además de contarnos muchas historias subre Bulgaria, 100% recomendado.", "比较好的性价比,到市中心教堂､商业街也都是步行可达的距离｡Rossy的回复非常及时,她的爸爸Peter很耐心,每天早上准时送来早餐｡公寓在五层无电梯,对于有比较大行李的朋友来说不是特别方便｡Peter很热心地帮我拿行李｡Thanks!", "Logement bien situé, propre, convient pour une nuit une deux.  Nous n'avons jamais vu Rossy mais uniquement le père qui parle français et qui prépare le petit déjeuner; par contre, à déconseiller à une femme seule.", "Schöner Aufenthalt in Sofia!", "Le logement est bien situé, nous y avons passé un très agréable séjour. Peter est intarissable d'anecdotes sur son pays et a été tres flexible avec nos horaires. ", "Il loft di Rossy è perfetto per un soggiorno a Sofia: si trova in zona centrale ben servita dai mezzi pubblici e a pochi passi dalle vie principali. L'appartamento è luminosissimo, riservato e indipendente, completo di ogni comfort. Peter, il papà di Rossy, è il valore aggiunto: parla italiano (e non solo), è di gran compagnia e prepara delle ottime colazioni. Highly recommended!!", "Een mooi 1-kamer appartement waarin alles aanwezig was. 
De aankomst op de luchthaven en ophalen door de vader van Rossy verliep perfect. Alles gevraagde informatie was beschikbaar. We hebben genoten van een heerlijk uitgebreid ontbijt. Echt een aanrader voor wanneer je Sofia wilt verkennen. Wel rekening meehouden dat je naar 5-hoog moet lopen.", "Ottimo soggiorno", "Das Appartement ist sehr zu empfehlen. Die kleine Dachgeschoss Wohnung besticht wie auf dem Foto nicht nur durch seine Gemütlichkeit, sondern vor allem durch die ruhige und zentrale Lage. Metro- und Tramstationen sind fußläufig schnell zu erreichen, aber auch zu Fuß ist man in etwa 10 Minuten am Vitosha Boulevard. Im Viertel selbst fühlt man sich außerdem sicher und viele kleine Bars laden zum Verweilen ein. Der Weg zum Flughafen kostet mit dem Taxi 10€. Unser Gastgeber Pietr ist ein sehr netter Mensch, der viel zu erzählen weiß. Sofern man über ein paar Französisch-Kenntnisse (oder Russisch, Griechisch oder Bulgarisch) verfügt, kann man sich auch gut mit ihm über Land und Leute unterhalten. Wir haben jeden Tag ein kleines aber feines Frühstück aufs Zimmer bekommen. Insgesamt ein sehr gelungener Aufenthalt.", "Все очень понравилось - спасибо большое, при возможности приедем еще раз!)))  Спасибо Петру за приятное общение!", "J'ai passé un très, très bon séjour ici, avec un petit-déjeuner chaque matin que j'ai beaucoup apprécié: fromage, des figues, en suite. J'ai pas rencontré Rossy mais son père était vraiment sympa, très aimable, avec bcp de recommandations en termes des restaurants, parcs, musées... j'aimerais revenir un jour, c'est sur. ", "Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Alles war genau richtig: Das große gemütliche und sehr gepflegte Zimmer, die sehr nette Betreuung, das gute "kleine" Frühstück mit frisch gepresstem Orangensaft und frischem Obst, die Umgebung mit schönen kleinen Kneipen, wenn man Richtung Innenstadt geht, die bequem fußläufig zu erreichen ist, das Wetter,...vielen Dank!  ", "Alles hat bestens geklappt und war wie beschrieben. Herr Antonov ist ein freundlicher und zuvorkommender Gastgeber. ", "Petit loft tranquille au calme , près du centre ville ,le papa (Peter) un artiste peintre reconnu, très serviable  nous a expliqué pas mal de chose en français. 
Il nous a transporté nos bagages dans le logement et de plus à trouvé chez un ami une place de parking. Il nous a fait un petit déjeuner et un encas pour la route. Nous sommes très satisfaits. 



. ", "Rossy fue muy atenta por mail, y muy rápida con sus respuestas. Su padre, Peter, nos esperó y nos ayudó con todo el equipaje, un pintor con muchas historias y una gran cultura. Te ayuda a conocer la cultura búlgara. El apartamento es muy acogedor, lleno de luz y encanto. La casa está ubicada en una zona estupenda de Sofia. Se llega muy bien caminando a todos los lugares de la ciudad. ", "El apartamento está centrico. El desayuno que nos traía Peter (el padre de Rossy) está muy bueno. Tanto Peter como Rossy nos recomendaron algún restaurante para comer comida típica búlgara y nos dieron información sobre los autobuses para hacer alguna excursión por los alrededores. Muy recomendable.", "Le logement est parfait, très calme, très propre. Nous n'avons pas rencontré Rossy. Pierre, le père de Rossy parle français et a été très attentionné à notre égard ; il a même accepté de nous faire un petit déjeuner à 7h00 du matin, un record matinal en Bulgarie. Il s'est également occupé de notre transfert à l'aéroport.
L'appartement est bien situé avec deux rues piétonnes (et commerçante a proximité).", "Nous avons été accueillis par le père de Rossy, très sympathique et parlant parfaitement le français. L'appartement est suffisant pour deux personnes et idéalement. Pierre nous apporte tous les matins un excellent petit-déjeuner, selon l'horaire décidé par nous.
L'appartement ne contient cependant pas de plaques de cuisson, mais dispose cependant d'un frigo et d'une bouilloire pour pouvoir faire du café et contenir des aliments ne nécessitant pas de cuisson. Bref, un très bon séjour passé dans cet appartement ;)", "(english follows)
Ce petit appartement possède vraiment un cachet unique. Très bien situé au centre (partie sud), près des bouquinistes de Graf Ignatief, du métro NDK, des rues commerciales Rakovsky et Vitosha et du coeur de Sofia.

Le lit double est en fait deux petits lits simples d'un confort acceptable. C'est un détail, mais pour un séjour de plus d'une semaine, un certain inconfort pourrait s'installer. Le petit frigo était bien pratique. La douche était très bien.

L'accueil est certainement un point fort de l'endroit. Rossy répond très rapidement aux courriels et son père, Petar, est un hôte exquis. Il sert un petit déjeuner délicieux et très typique chaque matin, et se passionne pour l'histoire bulgare et européenne. Il sera aussi d'excellent conseil pour des destinations hors-Sofia. Son français est excellent.

Nous avons passé de très beaux moments à Sofia (2 semaines) et l'appart fait définitivement partie de ces beaux souvenirs.

ENGLISH:
This little apartment has a unique cachet. Very well located in the center (south part), near Graf Ignatiev's bookstores, NDK metro station, commercial streets Rakovsky and Vitosha, and the heart of Sofia.

The double bed is in fact two joined single beds, and confort is ok. Not a big deal, but if your stay were to be quite long, bed confort could become an issue. The small fridge was very convenient, shower was great.

Rossy answers very quickly to all emails, and her father, Petar, is an exquisite host. He will serve daily a delicious and typical breakfast, and talks passionately about bulgarian and european history. He is also resourceful in giving advices on non-Sofia destinations. He also speaks french.

Had a wonderful time in Sofia and no doubt that this apartment is part of the memories.", "Nous avons passés un séjour fort agréable à Sofia. Nous commencions la journée avec un petit déjeuner de roi servi par Pierre et ses petites anecdotes fortement intéressantes ! Logement idéalement situé par rapport au centre ville ( 5 min a pied ) dans un quartier calme, propre, climatisé et proche de petits commerces ( restaurants, épiceries...)  ", "Nous avons été merveilleusement bien accueillis par Rossy. Il parle très bien français et est un hôte très intéressante. Il nous a même accompagné le matin a la recherche d'une carte de randonnée! L'appartement est sympathique et il nous a apporté un très bon petit déjeuner. Si vous dormez a Sofia je vous recommande vivement d'y dormir.", "C'est le pere de Rossy qui nous a acceuilli, hôte très attentionné (il a monté 6 etages ts les matins pr ns apporter le petit dej). Il parle francais. L'appartement est confortable et situé dans le quartier que nous avons trouvé le plus sympa et animé à Sofia.", "Nous avons passé un très bon séjour dans ce loft tout près du centre de Sofia. Il est très facile de se déplacer à pied, les trésors du centre sont proches et accessibles. L'appartement est très sympha avec ses meubles style renaissance et les belles icônes peintes par notre hôte Petar Antonov. Les petits-déjeuners sont copieux et très bons et servis à l'heure désirée. Nous avons été très bien accueillis par le papa de Roussy, Petar, pendants les premiers jours et pendant les derniers jours par Georgi, le mari de Roussy qui est également très chaleureux et sympathique. Monsieur Petar nous a beaucoup parlé des icônes et grâce à lui, nous avons pu visiter une collection très riche à la faculté de théologie qui est difficilement accessible. Georgi nous donnait de précieux conseils pratiques et n'a pas hésité de chercher des informations pour nous sur internet. Nous ne pouvons que recommander ce loft aux personnes qui veulent passer quelques jours agréables à Sofia.
 (Website hidden by Airbnb) Lisa et Pjotr, septembre 2014", "Петр, отец Росси — очень гостеприимный хозяин и интересный собеседник. Он встретил нас, рассказал про район, о местах, которые стоит посмотреть и посетить. Каждое утро он кормил нас завтраком и рассказывал истории, а перед отъездом собрал нам завтрак в дорогу. Спасибо ему за это.

Квартира расположена практически в центре Софии. Через дорогу от дома находится район маленьких баров и кафе, рядом также большой парк и пешеходный бульвар. Хорошее место, чтобы начать знакомство с городом.

Petar, Rossy’s father is incredibly welcoming and good company. (He knows Russian!) He warmly met us and provided all information we needed. Every morning we had tasty breakfast with interesting Petar’s stories. He was so kind that made last breakfast for take away. Thank you Petar for such a wonderful, hospitable experience! 

The loft is located near Sofia center. There are many good bars and cafe, big park and walking street Vitosha. Great place to start exploring the city.
", "Nous avons passé 3 nuits à Sofia dans le charmant  appartement de Rossy. Il est très bien situé pour découvrir la ville à pied, en bus, en taxi... Le quartier est calme, et on y trouve facilement tout ce dont on a besoin (épicerie, bons restaurants signalés par nos hôtes). Nous sommes très contents de notre séjour et de l'accueil qui nous y a été fait. Nous avons eu grand plaisir à converser en français avec le papa de Rossy qui nous a accueilli à notre arrivée et nous a préparé de copieux petits déjeuners, et qui nous a fait découvrir certaines facettes de Sofia et de la Bulgarie qui ne figurent pas forcément dans les guides touristiques.
Une très bonne adresse.

["Amazing luxury cozy place. Like 4 star hotel!", "Great place for one or more nights to stay. Recommend to everyone. Elena is very hospitality person.", "Great little place. Elena is very hulpfull, vriendly, ... We can strongly advise this place to everyone.", "Elena's house is lighty, very clean and comfortable. It's well placed relative to the city center (15-20 minutes on foot). Enjoy :)", "visit ASAP", "Helena is a nice person and her place is awsome!!!", "Perfect place to stay for a fare data in Sofia. Great position, silence and just an easy walk from the center.
Super clean and cozy!
Elena gives  a lot of good suggestions about what to do in the city.", "Elena was fabulous. Our flight was delayed and we ended up arriving quite late at night and also getting lost, and she stayed up for us and gave us directions over the phone. The room was lovely, clean and spacious. Well worth a stay here :)", "Elena was a very nice and discrete host; when we arrived she gave us a map of the city and she gave us suggestions and indications (about monuments, restaurants, supermarkets..).
The room was lovely and very clean, and there was everything you could possibly need: towels, soap, iron, fridge, microwave, kettle, coffee and tea...
Everything considered, our staying was very agreeable and we would definitely recommend Elena as a host.", "Elena’s place is only a 15 minute walk from the center and has two great restaurants within a one minute walk.  Elena was very welcoming and took the time to explain how to get to the main sights and also the practical amenities travelers need.  Her place was well equipped and spotless.  We highly recommend Elena as a host.", "Elena‘s appartement is located very central. It is quite, clean and cosy. An elevator makes up for the location on the 6th floor. Supermarket, subway, bus and railway station are within 5 min walking distance. Also, there is a really nice typical Bulgarian restaurant down the street. Elena was helpful upon our arrival, giving us some hints about the neighborhood. We can recommend her as a host. :)", "Everything was very good, cleen and fresh.But especially the location of apartment  in the center of Sofia it is ideal for relaxed walks and food. I will definitely re-select it next time.", "Helena's place was very clean and had everything you need. The location was near to the center of Sofia. The communication with Elena was very good. I recommend a lot this place!", "cozy, clean and comfortable.

A fantastic host with a very nice and quiet apartment! Elena gave us a lot of tips and was very understanding to our needs. Highly recommended!", "perfect!", "Everything was like in the photos. Maybe I need to change the router ...

On the other hand, it does not have a shower. The shower is the bathroom floor itself (I do not know if it is common in Bulgaria)

For the rest, a very nice and cozy apartment !!", "Cozy room with private bathroom to the center of Sofia and also very near by feet to the train and bus station.
Mrs Elena are very kindly and helpful and the room was very very clear.
You can prepare your coffee or your tea to the room but also in the corner has also a mini market  if you want to buy something quickly like cigarettes, bread and ready coffee from machine.
The area is very safety, has everything around, 4  min. by feet from the metro station ''Lion's Bridge'' (if you want to go to the airport change line to the ''Serdika'' station.", "Well positioned clean, convenient room", "Elena was super easy and very helpful! Great stay, thanks Elena!", "We had a great time in Sofia! Elena is very nice and helpful, she didn't mind that  we could arrive just very lately. She offered us good places in the city. All in all, a very good and pleasant stay.", "Helena is kind and helpful and the room was very clean , cozy and really close to the center!!", "Excellent price/quality relationship :-)", "Elena is kind and helpful, and the space is excellently located and very nice.", "Excellent!", "We had a very good time in Sofia. Elena speaks decent English and responds to any questions right away. The bed is SUPER comfortable and cozy; exactly what you need for a good night's rest. The shower head was also really nice. Not too strong, not too weak. VERY hot right away, so be careful. Also, while the water gets hot instantly, it doesn't stay hot for very long. So make sure to be quick or the water will turn cold on you. Great location and great value for the price. The room was lovely; situated in a secure building in a quiet residential area; not far from town and other attractions.

We would happily stay again and recommend Elena's apartment as a nice place to stay in Sofia.", "Excellent value for money. Big room good ensuite. Fridge kettle available plus a sofa. Spotlessly clean. Near to main bus and railway station by foot.", "From other Bulgarians I heard the neighborhood was not real safe. I haven't noticed or experienced that. Did not feel unsafe at all.
The neighborhood is a bit "under construction", the apartment is really nice though. And nearby the Metro station.
The city is on 30 minutes walking distance.

I really loved the stay in the apartment. It was very clean, light and well equipped. It felt more spacious then the pictures suggest.
The bed is very comfortable. Even towels and soap were included. A complete package. When I might come back to Sofia, I remember this apartment.
Also the flexible in and out check times are really appreciated.", "Elena is a great host. Every detail at her place was really well-thought through. The location was very convenient too. There were two restaurants next to the apartment that offered traditional Bulgarian food (it was delicious). It's conveniently located near the central bus station and train station (~5 mins walk), 5 mins walk to metro station and about 15-30 mins walk to city centre. The room is very spacious and clean, with a fridge and microwave. The bed is very soft and comfortable. We had a nice stay.", "nice room, friendly host", "Very good room to stay in Sofia.", "Elena is a great host! I can recomend staying at her place :-)", "Perfect", "Everything was perfect ", "Really nice apartment. With everything I needed. Super close to train station and easy to walk to the downtown area", "It was lovely to stay at Elena's. She's a good host, even though she doesn't speak fluent english she will try to help you the most to make your stay as comfortable as possible. The appartment is in a good neighborhood, quiet and about 20mins by walking away from all the big monuments to see in Sofia. There's also a traditionnal restaurant about 500meter next to the appartment, I highly recommand it it was perfect time!", "We had a fantastic time here; the room is definitely more like a private apartment. There is no kitchen and washer since it is a private room., but it felt more like an apartment because the rooms are not connected and we didn't have to share the bathroom which was great! The room was very clean and quiet and was in a perfect location to the city center and all the attractions. Elena is very communicative and includes maps and guidebooks which helped a lot. We did get woken up one night by other guests arriving and people talking in the hallway and the wifi is spotty and went out completely our last evening so we could not talk to our families, or catch up on our travel blogging, but otherwise we really enjoyed our stay. We would definitely recommend staying here and would stay here again. Lovely place and great location!", "Elena's place is really nice. The room is perfect for one or two person. It is located really near the center, so it is easy to visit the area by foot. Elena was very available for us and flexible. She has maps of Sofia and gives precise informations about what to visit and how.
We recommend Elena's place for everyone who what to visit Sofia. It was a perfect stay.", "great place to stay! super clean and elena was very hospitable. ", "We would definitely recommend staying at Elena's place. Great communucation, friendly and helpful! Lovely, spacious and bright room that was clean. Thank you!!", "What a wonderful room with a wonderful host! This feels more like a 4.5 star hotel than like a private room. The room has a mini fridge and microwave and a private bathroom, making for a private stay. Everything was clean and beautifully decorated. ", "We had an amazing time at Elena`s place. It was one of the cleanest airbnbs I have ever been to. Elena was very kind and helpful. ", "Elena's place is really nice. Super clean, comfortable bed, nice bathroom. The location is good. Her flat is near the metro and easy to find. We really enjoyed our stay and can highly recommend this flat!
Thank you Elena ", "We enjoyed our stay at Elena's. She was nice and told us how to get to the city centre or other atractions. Room was clean and bright. Felt like home. Plus in room we found maps and etc. All in all, it was a lovely stay.", "Great room in a nice location. Private bathroom was clean and shower had good water pressure. Wifi tended to drop out at times which was a little bit frustrating. Elena was a great host, and good communication. Great for a short stay in sofia ", "Better than we have expected from the pictures that we had seen earlier. Everything is new in the apartment in the new building, separate bathroom in the room, location is good there are few traditional restaurants in the street. Elena was really helpful she gave us a lot of useful information and ordered taxi for us. My recommendation. ", "Elena is the kindest host you can imagine! She took a lot of time to explain us about the city and give us some tips. The room was very clean and comfy, and the apartment was close to the center and the train station. We would definitely recommend Elena's place :)", "This place was perfect! Definitely recommend, perfect apartment, spotless and super clean and modern! 2 minute walk to Metro station which was cheap, clean and easy to navigate around the city. Elena was an excellent host and recommended heaps of restaurants and places to see/things to do with maps which did not disappoint. Thanks again Elena!   ", "This is not very big, but comfortable room with all convinient and necessary things: bed, wardrobe, working area, freeze and bathroom. Very clean. I liked it. ", "Elena's airbnb is very comfortable, spotlessly clean, modern, and is a five minute walk from the Metro. Elena had maps and information for us and is very friendly. 

There is also a great Bulgarian style restaurant right down the street from her place. (we went there two different nights) but also found lots of food choices in the center of town. 

Elena and her daughter were very helpful and we had some interesting conversation together. The center of town is only one metro stop away. 

We highly recommend Elena's airbnb.  It is an outstanding value and a very nice place. ", "We had a great stay here. 5 minutes walk to the central train/bus station. 5 minutes walk to the metro/subway station. 5 minutes walk to a supermarket (Billa). 10-15 minutes walk to city centre.  Clean, spacious and bright room on the top floor (6th floor).", "

reviews:
["Very clean apartment and perfect location", "It’ a great place, very central and quite at the same time. Nadia is a great host, very kind and helpful.", "Nadia is great and very welcome.", "Location is excellent, it is exactly in the city centre. Nadia was nice and hospitable. Apartment is nice and well kept.", "Nadja's place is exactly what you see on the photos. It is clean, the location can't get more central than that, warm, and you have absolutely everything you need for a short or longer stay. Nadja is welcoming,friendly and very helpful! The location is exactly 5 min walk from the National Assembly, Sofia University, Ivan Vazov Theatre and 10 min from the presidency, 15 min from Vitoshka, 20 min from National Palace of Culture. Super clean!", "Уютен апартамент на перфектното място в София! Надя е страхотен домакин!

Cosy apartment in the perfect place in Sofia! Nadya is great host!", "The apartment is awesome!!! Definitely recommend it! ", "It was amazing experience staying at Nadia's place! It's cosy, clean and  close to the anything which you can need! One of the best places where I've stayed in Sofia. Definitely will recommend it to anyone and will stay there again next time I travel to Sofia.", "The neighbourhood was really nice, a very central location, and the host welcomed us very sincerely. Nadia was very friendly, helpful and welcoming. We felt at home from the word go. We will definitely stay there the next time we visit Sofia! ", "Nadia was really nice and reachable (i booked instantly). A very smiling and helpful person. The place was extremely well located and had everything I needed. It was clean and spacy.", "Nadia is a very nice and hospitable person. The apartment is in the city center, well maintained and very clear. You can find a lot of interesting places around.", "Надя, не случайно е суперхост .Тя беше много любезна да ни се довери и позволи да организираме моминско парти.Апартаментът е много по-хубав на живо .Намира се точно в центъра на София-топ локация .Апартаментът  е  чист, уютен,светъл и  изпълнен с хубава енергия.Спалнята е много интересна ,създава впечатление на каюта в кораб.В апартамента има всичко необходимо до 
най- малкия детайл.Препоръчвам  горещо!!! :)  :) ", "Beautiful apartment and really central. Very stylish...very short walk to the center of Sofia!", "Our stay at Nadia's apartment was very pleasant and we felt very welcome as she was waiting for us at the place on our arrival. 
The accommodation is as described and shown on the pictures - very stylish  and finished with taste of the details. The kitchenette was well equipped with all needed. 
The classic music CDs were nice touch. 
Location - right into the heard of the city, very near to the main signs a block apart for the best theaters in Sofia, shopping streets and very best places for dine and night out. 
Definitely our next stay in Sofia will be at Nadia's place. 
Great time, indeed.   ", "Nadia’s place is located right in the center of Sofia, the apartment is nice and clean . It offers pretty much everything one needs.Nadia was a great host , fast to respond and really welcoming.
I can not recommend this apartment more ... great location, nice and clean apartment furnished with taste and a fantastic host.
Thank you Nadia for a perfect stay", "Perfect location, beautiful apartment, great host! I would come back for sure..!", "Very Nice flat With good position, near to the centre, metro, restaurants. Everything was perfekt. Thank you Nadia ", "It's always a pleasure to stay at Nadia's apartment. We have stayed there a good number of times due to its location, spacious and modern apartment and ever so friendly host.

We always think of staying at Nadia's apartment when we visit Sofia and should be back again next year!", "A very nice, spacious and bright apartment, overlooking a typical Bulgarian idyllic courtyard, where people hang their laundry to dry. The kitchen is well equipped, even with a dishwasher which is not a common occurrence in this part of the World. My only disappointment was with TV set, which was too small by today's standards (not even 32').", "No regrets. Excellent place.", "Nadia's response was fast and precise. The moment we met she is very welcoming and nice. The apartment had everything needed and was quiet for some good rest. Thank you.", "What a great location and a sparkling clean apartment!  So much natural light in a comfortable living space. Nadia quickly answered questios and gave us sugestions as to help   us enjoy our time in Sophia.  Thank you Nadia.", "It is a beautiful apartment in a great location. Nadia's hospitality is outstanding, she waited for us to arrive when our bus was very late at night. The bed wasn't the most comfortable (too soft and dips in the middle) and the kitchen is basically equipped - cutlery, plates and a pan, no cooking utensils (colander, grater, peeler, masher) or sharp knives. A wonderful city stay if you are interested in eating out. The washing machine is a huge bonus as is the washing line outside on the balcony.", "Nadia is a kind, friendly and attentive host. She made us feel very welcome. Her apartment is lovely and perfectly placed.", "Nadia was so kind and welcoming. She ordered a cab to take us to the airport the next morning, which was helpful. Her apartment is beautiful and very clean. The bed was comfy too!", "This place is very elegant and classy, with a great little balcony. There’s a spacious and open living room and table area. The bathroom is a little small but we had no problems and very clean and efficient. And it’s an amazing location, so close to everything we wanted to see. Would very much recommend", "It’s in the city center. Nadia is very nice. Double check our car park place is ok. The house is convenience to go every where.", "We had a great stay at Nadia's place. The apartment was clear, centrally located, with possibility for car parking (free in the evening) and everything was nice, as described. Nadia was a great host, waiting for us until we arrive and explained us everything for the place. I would definitely recommend the place to anyone coming to Sofia and exploring the city for short or longer stay! Thank you Nadia!", "Nadia was extremely communicative, flexible, and kind! Her apartment is right in the center of Sofia, walking distance to all attractions and landmarks. I would be happy to stay at her place again!", "Nadia's apartment is a beauty. Located in the center of Sofia, it is perfect if you visit with a group of friends. We found it very clean and Nadia made the check-in easier, letting us put the luggage before it was supposed to.
The bathroom and shower are very clean and with hot water. 
Kitchen has everything you need, living room has a nice space with a fan for the hot days, and the small balcony allows you to have a drink in the afternoon and/or dry clothes.
Nadia is a lovely, very kind lady, and makes an extra effort to welcome her guests.", "Best location, very bright, clean and cozy apartment. Nadia is very friendly and always there for her guests", "We loved the space and it was a nice break for our early flight the next day. The unit was exactly as pictured and was larger than we imagined. Both the kitchen and bathroom were clean, though small, as is typical in Bulgaria.

Nadia met us with a smile and was quick to respond to our messages.    Street parking can tough for outsiders (we parked by Parliament) and can be confusing, but there are plenty of hotels nearby for valets. The unit is very close to the Metro that serves the airport.

Would stay again.", "Nadia and her place were great! The location of the flat and the welcomeness of the host made our stay perfect.", "Great locatuon, Nadia waited for us until 1 am.", "nice clean apartment two nice restaurants one below and one across the road and a nice bar  no.noise from the restaurant  nice kitchen everything you need 
nice shower . bedroom balcony books of info about sofia...nice bedroom plenty of wardrobe space  tv which has english tv balcony. nice quiet area and central for all the sites
.
", "Nadia was a wonderful host,easy check in and check out. Very quick responses too. Her apartment is beautiful with an excellent location. She also had a lovely balcony which we enjoyed every morning. 

If you are in Sofia,you must stay here :-) ", "The apartment was extremely accurate to the photos and was absolutely stunning! The location is so close to all the sights, restaurants and bars and has everything you need for a stay. The balcony was an added bonus and Everything was very clean and well presented. Nadia met us at the apartment after our very late flight and explained everything about the flat and was more than happy to let us check in around midnight! Overall the place was amazing and is fully recommended! Thanks Nadia for a great stay in Sofia!! ", "anytime again.", "the apartment is really confortable.  And Nadia is a 10 stars. She was  waiting until 2:00 am. She is the perfect host. Thanks. 
", "We had an amazing time in Sofia thanks to Nadia who is a super host! Her appartement is really nice, clean and very well located! I strongly recommand! ", "The stay was amaxing, we had the best few days in Sofia. Nadia was great, super helpful and accommodating. I highly recommend the place, it’s perfect for couple or bigger group. It’s in the city center, amazing location and apartment. ", "Perfect, spacious apartment for a weekend in Sofia. Centrally located and walking distance to most locations. Highly recommend for 2-3 people to visit.", "We chose this apartment for our one night stay in Sofia because of it's location. Very clean and full of light. The bed mattresses however, was very uncomfortable and would have been a problem had our stay been longer.
Nadia was extremely pleasant and welcoming. Thank you ", "Nadia is a great host. She gave me excellent instructions regarding getting a cab from the airport and also helped me find a good Private Tour company to go to Rila. The apartment is perfectly placed to walk to pretty much all the important tourist sites, I went for the Opera - the Opera House is 5 minutes walk away. The is an excellent bakery nearby for Banitsa and a Supermarket just round the corner. I will stay at Nadia's next time I go to Sofia.", "The space is as advertised. Very close to the cathedral and a short walk to town. Very light and airy, with a good breeze on a hot day. WiFi was very good. Just be aware parking is non-existent on the street and the lot next door is pricey. (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps will get you to the place but make sure you have 3G", "Nadia’s apartment was spotless & had all the ammenities one would need (bank, tourist sites, open late night restauraunts, coffee/bakery) was in a perfect location.

Would definitely stay here again and I do not hesitate in recommending it to anyone travelling to Sofia!", "Very clean, lovely host. A very nice apartment in a good location", "Nadia is a perfect host! The check in was super easy and welcoming despite the late hour of arrival. The flat is amazing, super quiet and comfortable. The location could not be better! I will definitely come back again! Thank you, Nadia!", "Right near the centre of the city and all the attractions you could hope to see in Sofia, Nadia's apartment is a startlingly spacious (pictures don't do the space justice) gem tucked into a side street. Nadia is a fantastic host, very accommodating for early check in and bag drop offs, and even ended up calling us a cab without hesitation when we realized our phones didn't work. Can't recommend enough!", "A really great space that is very conveniently located in Sofia. Incredible view out of the balcony, and nicely furnished. The apartment was clean, and nicely kept. We would stay here again in a heartbeat.", "Our stay at Nadya's place was just amazing! The location cannot be better, just at the perfect centre of the city, in a walking distance from anything you may want to see, with bars and nice restaurants just outside the building! Very cosy, nice and quiet place, the balcony has a view over the inner quiet backyard, very pleasant, so much greenery around (we live in the dessert so we learnt to appreciate such things!).  Nadya was so nice to welcome us in the middle of the night as our flight was delayed and we came at 3a.m. She was more than responsive, very helpful and friendly! The place was clean, very well-maintained! I used to live in Sofia, so I carefully chose the place where to stay. We are definitely coming again next time we are back in Sofia!", "Perfect! The flat was very clean, really nice furnished und central located. Everything is within walking distance (pubs, restaurants, supermarket, sightseeing spots). 

Nadia is one of the best host I´ve ever met. Helpful, friendly, fast attainable. She speaks Bulgarian, English and German. 

My girlfriend and I really enjoyed the trip to Sofia and definitely recommend the offer from Nadia. It was a pleasure. Thanks a lot! :)", "Incredible apartment in the heart of the city. Very comfortable. Quiet at nights. Nadia was easy to coordinate with.", "Nadia's flat is perfectly located to everything, just off a busy street in a quiet corner, it was ideal for our tired bodies to rest and enjoy a little bit of Bulgaria. Nadia is an exceptional host, very kind and helpful. We had a great time.", "This was our second stay at Nadia's. The apartment is beautiful and clean, in an excellent location. Nadia was very friendly and helpful.
Amazing place! I would recommend this to everyone. We are planning to book again.", "Excellent apartment in a top location. Definitely recommend.", "Central location, clean apartment, friendly host.", "Nadia and her place were amazing. Great communication, place was clean and local to city center and restaurants and bars. Highly recommended!", "My two friends and I had a great stay at nadia's! The apartment is beautiful, spacious and clean. The location is ideal, since everything is close and the area seems safe. Nadia is a great host, a cheerful and helpful person. We definetely recommend it!!!", "Nice place to go around Sofia.
So clean and large rooms.
Nadia is very kind. She helped me whenever I asked for.

I'm satisfied to stay here.
Thank you Nadia!", "Nadia was the perfect host, she welcomed us so sweetly, the place is amazing and we had a great time!", "Nadia welcomed us very warmly in her beautiful, cozy and amazing flat with this excellent location: quiet enough but located superbly at the center of historical / hip / shopping places. We will be back!", "Nadia place is in a wonderful location and has everything you could possibly need to feel at home. Including coffee and tea. Nadia was very communicative and helpful upon my arrive in a strange new land. She even stored my bag while I went skiing in bansko. I highly recommend her flat.", "The apartment of Nadia  is 5 star, clean modern and Nadia super nice .
We really recommend.", "We had an awesome stay with four people at Nadia´s flat. She is very welcoming and the flat is just perfect for a stay in Sofia. The location is awesome and all the sights are reachable by foot. The flat itself offers everything you need. We would higly recommend to book Nadia´s flat!", "Nadia is a great host, she waited for our late check in. The apt is very central location and very well furnished. It is new, renovated and comfortable. There is elevator in the building.  I would recommend this location and apt to all.", "Beautiful clean apartment in an excellent location for sightseeing and mixing with the locals in Sofia. Nadia's directions and help in getting from the airport to her place was greatly appreciated. Superb value for money.", "Nadia's place is perfect if you're look to stay in Sofia. It's in a great location and the apartment is lovely. Nadia is a great host - we had a very late flight and she stayed up late to make sure we got there and into the apartment ok. Would recommend 100%. Thank you for a wonderful stay.", "This is our second stay at this superb apartment.  It was like home from home and it was lovely a cozy warm.  We will be back in Sofia again in 2018.  Nadia was a great host once again.  Thanks.  Alan & Debbie.", "She is super awesome. Place is really good", "Nadia's place is beautiful and very clean. Situated in a very central position, it is perfect for discovering the cit by foot! Absolutely recommended!", "Perfect host and apartment. Everything you could want and need. On your doorstep you will find excellent restaurants and a short walk to shops, bars and attractions. Highly recommended!!!", "Nadia is very responsive and understanding. Her place has lovely location, in the heart of Sofia.", "Nadia's place was just fantastic!  You can't beat the location - which for us is one of the most important things.  It's central to everything, and even only a couple of blocks away from the St. Alexander Nevsky Cathedral.  The apartment was clean, spacious, and had excellent lighting through the bright, sunny windows.  (But also curtains for when you wanted to block out that light first thing in the morning!)  Nadia was there to meet us as soon as we got out of the taxi, and recommended a great restaurant for dinner. Thank you so much for your hospitality, Nadia!", "Clean, spacious and well equipped apartment in the centre of Sofia. Communication was smooth and access easy. ", "Nadia's place was excellent. I was happy to see the same sofa bed that I have at home in the living room. It almost felt like being back at home.", "The apartment is exactly as advertised, very bright and conveniently located. Highly recommended!", "Nadia's place was perfect for us - the location was great, easy to walk to anything you might like to see in Sofia and close to restaurants, bars, delis and shops. We were arriving very late and it was no problem for Nadia to arrange for us to check in at 2am which we appreciated so much! The apartment was really clean and well equipped with a lovely bright living area. We would definitely stay again - thank you Nadia.", "Najia's place was a home away from home. Had everything you need for a comfortable stay. Great position in Sofia close to a lot of the must see attractions. The owner of the Bike Shop up the road was full of great information as to where to buy things you needed. Also an out door market for fruit and vegetables, a butcher shop and the Billa supermarket. We had a lovely stay. We were sorry to have to leave.", "Nadia's place was perfect for the 2 nights we stayed in Sofia. It was very close to everything and the apartment was very clean!", "Nadia is a great host and the apartment is in a fantastic location. For us as a small family it was perfect.", "Excellent stay in a top location.", "This place is just perfect! Lovely interior, clean, bright, great location, a fantastic host... I can't praise it enough! And you will find everything you need inside, including fresh towels and even coffee for tired travelers. Nadia even left us a handwritten note, such a lovely touch :) Thank you for this amazing three days in the heart of my favorite city, Nadia!", "Nadia was a lovely host, she explained everything we needed and we were allowed to check in earlier than stated on the website!! Her apartment was just enough for 3 people staying, it was close to some nice bars/ supermarkets but also a walk away from the metro and sites!!. Would definitely use her again in the future:)

Thank you

Tina and friends", "Nadia's Appartment is in a perfect spot. All of Sofia's central sights are within walking distance and with 10+ restaurants and cafes within 100m, it's simply wonderful. The Appartment is clean, comfortable and has everything you need for a short stay including a balcony at the back where you can relax, read and listen to the clink of glasses from the resftaurants below. Nadia was a great host - she let us drop our bags after an early flight and was a perfect host. Thanks Nadia! ", "The perfect location! All was great! So comfortable, easy and secure. Would stay here again in a heartbeat. Nadia was a wonderful host!", "Staying at Nadia's flat was amazing. We stayed with our 5 years old boy and had no problems. Flat was clean, matress was comfortable, communicating with Nadia was easy.  Location is very central, you can walk everywhere in the city. There is a private parking lot right around the corner (15€/24 hours).", "For the short stay we were very pleased with everything. I recommend", "Second time in this apartment! We live the location and our great host! Very clean and accommodating!", "We travelled with two kids and just stayed one night. Nadia is very friendly, sweet and welcoming. The next street has a 24-hour parking. There is an elevator and in the apartment there were all comfortabilites that we needed, including wifi. Central location and close to parks where the kids could play. ", "Great house!! Great location!! Very central ", "This is our 2nd time staying at Nadia's beautiful apartment. It is centrally located and easy to reach all areas of interest in Sofia. Nadia accomdated to our check in time despite it being a really early flight. She is an excellent communicator and highly recommend her place.
We are certain that we will return again, and will definitely book her place in future visits. ", "A very warm welcome by Nadia! The apartment is located very central, surrounded by nice restaurants and bars. ", "Nadia's apartment was fantastic, super clean and in a great location. She is a wonderfully nice host that welcomed us warmly. She can speak a little German as well. The apartment unfortunately does not have any air con, but it's fairly well-aired with big windows, so the summer heat is quite bearable in the apartment. Nights are quiet and peaceful. Definitely would stay again!", "Nadia's flat is very central, just next to the pedestrian area of Sofia, and near a park where the youths and artist-types hang out at night to socialize. We were warmly greeted by her upon our arrival, and she let us know about the amenities, etc. The flat is spacious and well-equipped, with a powerful shower and comfortable beds; there's even a little balcony to have a couple cold beers in the glorious sun. Who needs a modern, neutrally decorated, and universally inoffensive hotel room when you can stay in a place with character and charm?! I highly recommend Nadia's apartment, and would happily stay there again if the future ever finds me in Sofia. ", "Nadia was very friendly. She helped us to find a taxi very early in the morning. The apartment is big but cozy, with a beautiful terrace. The locations is very good, close by foot to the principal buildings of the old town.", "Nadja was very nice and answered very quickly to all of our questions . The place was great and very well located. I would definitively stay here again. Thanks Nadja!", "Wonderful location and place to stay, thank you so much for your great hospitality. ", "Nadia's apartment is great, very spacious, clean and bright. Nadia was waiting for me in the apartment when I arrived and gave me a warm welcome. I would absolutely recommend staying in her apartment!", "Very plaisant and short stay, well situated, nice apartment with space. Thanks Nadia for welcoming us, we may come back ;)", "The location of the apartment is perfect. I stayed here for a short weekend with three other friends and we had nothing to complain. Thanks Nadia for hosting us!", "This place was absolutely great. The location could not be more central, you are steps away from Alexander Nevski cathedral and all of the museums. 

I would recommend this place with no hesitation.

I am already trying to think of a reason to go back and book it again :)", "Very central, quiet and lovely little balcony ", "Nadia is a gracious host, who welcomed us into her lovely flat in central Sofia without hesitation - even though we were late! The flat is comfortable and fully equipped with anything you might need for short or long stays... Even the pull-out bed in the couch was kind to the weakest of our backs. Would recommend 100% for location, awesomeness of host and comfort!", "We had a great 2 nights stay in Nadja's apartment. Nadja was very welcoming and communicated extremely well prior to and during our stay. 

Her apartment is perfectly located and easy to access all of central Sofia. It is very cosy and has a warm vibe to it. 
Our only regret is not booking for a longer stay. 
We highly recommend Nadja's apartment and would love to stay again!", "I stayed in Nadia Home for two nights in April 2017. Nadia was a fantastic host. Her house is very nice, clean and really central: all was fantastic!", "
This apartment is very well located and provided a great base for my partner and I to spend our first night in Bulgaria. We only stayed in Sofia one night before heading to the Pirin mountains.  

Nadia was lovely and waited for us to arrive from our late night flight without complaint. Thank you Nadia. 

The living area of the apartment is lovely and very true to the name - sunny, airy and light.  The rest of the apartment was fine - functional, clean. 

I recommend Nadia's apartment if you want to be right in the middle of things in Sofia. You can walk to all of the main attractions easily, and there are restaurants, bars, shops, parks and cafes nearby.  

Parking was a little bit of an issue - we had to go outside of the more central bit to park in the 'green zone' which is free most (but not ALL!) Saturdays.  Nadia's place is in the 'blue zone' which is not free.  The green zone also costs on Monday - Friday but we were just lucky to be there on Friday night - Saturday.  Parking is definitely a bit of an issue in Sofia so I would think twice before hiring a car - if you're travelling around Bulgaria best to pick up the car upon leaving Sofia, I think. 

That being said, the walk back to Nadia's house from the green zone was only approx ten minutes so nothing to really complain about!

Overall, a great base for Sofia.
", "Lovely, spacious apartment.  Quiet but very central.  Lots of nice restaurants and stores very nearby.", "We had a great stay in Sofia! This apartment was spotlessly clean and comfortable. It was nice and quite inside the apartment although we were right in the city! Nadia was a very helpful host and we would be happy to return here!", "Nadia is a very good hostess, very friendly and attentive, the apartment has an excellent location, very spacious and cute. 100% recommended", "Nadia's place is right in city center!!! It's beautiful, clean, quite and has every amenity a traveler would need!! Nadia is a lovely and communicative host, who made our stay wonderful!!!", "We love Nadia! She is so sweet and a great communicator! Nadia's place is amazing! We loved staying here! The kitchen was great, very user friendly and the sofa bed was also very simple to pull out. The apartment is in a prime location, just down the street from the cathedral and the art museum! The Italian restaurant downstairs is also great! The apartment is nice and quiet far enough above the street that you aren't bothered by any street noise even though you're still close to all the action! The apartment does have an elevator which is great since it is up on the 3rd floor! We would absolutely stay here again if given the chance!", "Stayed with my three brothers at this beautiful place in Sofia, not a single complaint!", "The house is located right in the center ,super close to walk anywhere .Nadia is a fantastic host ,she waited for us on the street because we didn't have a SIM card and couldn't contact her right after we disconnect the wifi from bus station .She wasn't super helpful and kind .We had a wonderful time there .Definitely recommend this house to anyone :)", "Excellent location and remarkably peaceful and quiet considering it is so central . I would book again without hesitation !", "Nadia is a great host, we arrived very late in the evening (around 1 am) but Nadia greeted us in the flat regardless and showed us around the flat. The flat is compact but comfortable and in a fantastic location - right in the city centre and a short walk away from some of the sights, museums, opera and theatre as well as being close to all the main transportation links like the subway and buses. There are also plenty of restaurants, bars and cafes around the flat.", "Friendly host, spacious apartment central to Sofia shops and restaurants. ", "Everything is very good about this place. Neighborhood is very centrally located, plenty of bars supermarkets and places to go nearby.
The flat is clean, and the communication was great.
The only downside is the low-quality mattress on the bed, if you have any sort of back problems you should consider staying somewhere else .", "Nadia's apartment is simply perfect. It's big and spacious and it's situated in an amazing location in Sofia.

Perfect to see what the city has to offer!", "Very nice flat in the very center of Sofia. Close in walking distance from many points of interest of the city. The flat is very nice and furnished. The communication with Nadia was very easy and kind.", "Everything about this place is simply perfect. From the space itself to the location to Nadia's hospitality. Highly recommended. Would never want to stay anywhere else in Sofia. 

The best AirBnB experience I've ever had. Can't say thank you enough!", "Апартаментът е централно разположен, слънчев, чист и тих. Надя е чудесен домакин. Препоръчвам ви го.", "Great apartment, wonderful host, perfect location! Thank you, Nadia!", "This place was a little gem, centrally located in a nice part of town and close to everything.  It was lovely and cosy too.  Nadia was a super host and we will be back in 2017.  10 of 10 !", "Nadia came to meet us when we arrived and is lovely! As is her flat. Highly recommended. Bring a sleeping mask if you're bothered by sunlight in the mornings. All in all, - fantastic hostess with a fantastic flat!", "Nadia is a very nice Host !! When we arrived there was a little present for my birthday and the appartment was very nice atmosphere, warm and cosy. ! The appartment is beautiful in the middle ofSofia center and the best choise you can make! I will recoment Nadia's hospitality and appartment to anybody,  thank you so much Nadia", "One of the bests flats that I have been. Very good prive and all services, very nice, clean and in the best situatioj of Sofia.", "Beautiful house in the city center. ", "Nice decorated place with everything you need. excellent location!", "I had a wonderful stay at Nadja's flat. The flat is exactly as described and everything worked very well. It has a wonderfully central location which makes it very easy to walk to all the sights. It has a lovely balcony and is also very quiet, despite being so central. Overall. This is a great place to stay in every way, and I recommend it wholeheartedly. ", "Nadia's apartment is just lovely. Quite spacious and very bright. The location is great with everything, from nice restaurants and cool bars to the main tourist attractions, only a few steps away. Despite the central location it is incredibly peaceful and quiet and the small balcony, overlooking the back garden, is perfect for enjoying your coffee under the morning sun. I highly recommend this apartment....", "The apartment is very nice, and looks just as in the pictures. The location was perfect, walking distance to everything, and felt very safe. Do not miss it for your next trip to Sofia ", "We had a great stay at Nadya's flat. Clean, quiet, brilliantly located and well-maintained. One can find wonderful bars and restaurants in the area. Highly recommend it! ", "Nadia was very welcoming and she gave me great advices on how to move around Sofia. She was lovely and very helpful. We had two wonderful days over there", "A lovely apartment in the very heart of Sofia, in an area known for its many health-food eateries, design shops, hip cafes and restaurants. Nadia was a wonderful host, communication was excellent. We rented the place for one night only and left very early in the morning, and so did not have the chance to use the many amenities available, but we noticed that the apartment was equipped with everything necessary for a comfortable stay. The beds were comfortable, and everything was very clean. We'd definitely stay here again, and warmly recommend it!", "Sofia was amazing and made more so by sweet Nadia and her great apartment. The flat is in a great location--easy to walk everywhere. I loved the little balcony for my morning coffee.  The living room is large, bedroom very adequate and everything you need for cooking is in the kitchen. I would stay at Nadia's place again. ", "We had a great one night stay at Nadia's Airbnb. The flat is modern and it is situated in the very heart of Sofia, easily reachable within 30 mins from the airport. It was nice and cosy and had everything we needed. There were also little personal touches left by Nadia to make us feel extra welcome.
Nadia herself was very friendly and helpful. She was waiting for us when we arrived and he helped us to arrange a taxi to the airport when we left.
We would just wished to have a bit more information and advice about restaurants. Nadia mentioned an area with several restaurants , but we didn't actually find them. It seems the entrance of most good restaurants in Sofia are a bit hidden away. Maybe a list of restaurants could be compiled and left in the apartment?
Anayway, we really enjoyed our stay and would not hesitate to recommend it to others or to come back ourselves!", "Brilliant location! Very close to lots of nice restaurants and bars. ", "This was a great experience! Nadia and Shu were so welcoming and helpful. The apartment was beautiful, clean and well equipped.

That was a luxury for us, as we were travelling on a budget. When we arrived, Nadia made us feel welcome and showed us where everything was. The area is safe and secure and we had no problems. И для путешественников на автомобиле - очень большая проблема это припарковаться. Рядом есть платная парковка ( за ночь около 7 евро и берут только в болгарских левах) и только наличными. Zeker aan te raden als uitvalsbasis om stad te verkennen. Enige minpuntje is de kwaliteit van het bed. Het matras is erg dun en het bed schudt je partner wakker als je je omdraait. Er staat ook een bed/bank in de woonkamer. Misschien dat die beter is.
Het sanitair is schoon, maar erg krap. Dit was voor ons geen probleem, maar voor iets dikkere personen is dit een aandachtspunt.
De aanwezigheid van vaatwasser en wasmachine is erg prettig. 
Nadia is aardige vrouw, waarmee goed te communicere valt en die haar afspraken keurig nakomt.


", "L'appartamento di Nadia é centralissimo, a pochi passi dalla cattedrale e vicino a ristoranti e locali. La comunicazione é stata semplicissima, così come la sua disponibilità: davvero impeccabile!
La casa é semplice e molto luminosa, con un bagnetto molto piccolo con il wc, separato dall'altro bagnetto con la doccia. Divano letto in sala semplice da estrarre. Ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo!", "La casa di Nadia è accogliente, pulita e in una posizione ottimale per visitare Sofia! Io e le mie amiche ci siamo trovate molto bene. Se tornassimo a Sofia ci piacerebbe essere di nuovo ospitati da Nadia! :)", "Wir hatten am Anfang und am Ende unserer 11-tägigen Bulgarien-Reise einen wunderbaren Aufenthalt bei Nadia. Sie spricht ziemlich gut Deutsch und Englisch, die Verständigung war sehr gut. Die Lage ist perfekt, die Wohnung  liegt zur Alexander-Nevski-  Kathedrale und zu allen anderen Sehenswürdigkeiten im Zentrum fast nur einen Katzensprung entfernt. Nadia hat uns sehr freundlich empfangen und alles erklärt. Wenn ich wieder eine Unterkunft in Sofia brauche, werde ich mit Sicherheit wieder dort übernachten wollen. ", "Der Aufenthalt bei Nadia hat uns sehr gut gefallen!Wunderschönes Appartement, super zentral und eine tolle und zuverlässige Gastgeberin!Jederzeit gerne wieder!", "super schönes großzügiges Apartement, sehr sauber, zentral gelegen und trotzdem ruhig, mit tollem Balkon in den den begrünten Hinterhof.  Nadia war sehr zuverlässig und nett. Auf jeden Fall wärmstens zu empfehlen!!! Tolle Erfahrung!", "Nadia nous a donné toutes les informations précises pour trouver l'appartement et nous a très gentiment accueilli", "Nous avons passé 3 nuits dans l'appartement de Nadia.Celui-ci est idéalement situé et permet de visiter Sofia très facilement.

Je recommande sans hésitation cet appartement", "Nadia est une hote tres agréable 
L accueuil était parfait 
L appartement est très beau, propre, spacieux et idéalement situé. 
On peut tout faire à pied et on peut se garer facilement dans la rue.
Salon sans vis à vis avec vue sur des arbres et petit balcon.
Pour mon prochain séjour à Sofia je sais déjà où j irais dormir !", "Es ist eine tolle saubere Unterkunft. Die Gastgeberin ist sehr freundlich, zugewandt und offen. Sie konnte tolle Tipps geben. Das Preis - Leistungsverhältnis ist unschlagbar gut.", "Nadia nous a accueilli elle-même dans son appartement. Celui-ci est situé en plein centre de Sofia et permet de visiter la ville à pied. Il est très confortable et bien agencé. Lumineux, il est très calme et donne sur un jardin et sur une cour arborée. Situé au deuxième étage, un ascenseur en permet l'accès. C'est un appartement idéal pour passer un séjour à Sofia. Merci beaucoup à Nadia pour sa gentillesse et sa disponibilité.", "Надя очень отзывчивая и хорошая хозяйка. Отличное и качественное жильё в самом сердце Софии. Наилучшие рекомендации.", "Appartement très bien tenu, idéalement situé au centre de Sofia et très calme
Séjour parfait !
Nous recommandons vraiment ce lieu !", "Великолепная квартира, очень чисто, быстрое заселение, в центре! Спасибо!", "Vor unserer Ankunft hat sich Nadia bei uns gemeldet und dafür gesorgt, uns persönlich zu empfangen. Die Wohnung liegt absolut zentral in Bulgariens Hauptstadt Sofia und hat einen wunderbaren Charme! Sie ist sehr geräumig und geschmackvoll eingerichtet mit vielen Extras. Nadia ist eine ausgezeichnete Gastgeberin:  wir haben uns sofort willkommen und wie Zuhause gefühlt! 

Es war uns ein Vergnügen, liebe Nadia, und wir würden jederzeit wieder Deine Wohnung buchen! 

Herzlichen Dank von Greta und Familie", "Super appartement très bien situé, agréable et bien équipé. Ne adresse à retenir ! Nadia  a été très sympa !", "Le logement est très agréable, très bien situé au coeur de Sofia, près de restaurants très sympas.  Nadia a été charmante, elle nous a indiqué où garer notre voiture en toute sécurité. Je recommande à 100% ce logement. 

The accommodation is very nice, very well located in the heart of Sofia, close to very nice restaurants. Nadia was charming, she told us where to park our car safely. I would 100% recommend this accommodation", "L'appartamento di Nadia si trova in una posizione ottima del centro di Sofia, giusto a pochi passi dalla cattedrale di Alexandr Nevskji e dai più importanti top places di Sofia.
La casa è molto carina e spaziosa e le foto dell'annuncio riproducono fedelmente la realtà.
Nadia ci ha accolto bene e ci ha prestato l'assistenza necessaria per garantirci un piacevole soggiorno a Sofia.
La comunicazione con l'host è stata agevole e tempestiva in ogni momento.
Consigliatissimo!!"]

reviews:
["Great location, interior design and hospitality! Very happy with this choice :)", "Apartment was amazing! Great location and very nice host! ", "perfect place", "Nevena is such a perfect host! The apartment itself is very modern, absolutely clean, tastefully decorated, cozy, beautiful, well equipped (what more should I say?!). The bed is really large and sooo comfortable. It's been a while since we had a bed this good (even a 5* hotel bed was not as comfortable). The view from the window is also pretty cool when it snows.
This is really the place to be in Sofia, in a nice walking distance to great coffee shops, restaurants, and for visiting the city.

Thank you Nevana!
", "The apartment is very nice, clean and described correctly", "We stayed 3 nights in this very spacious appartment. It's all brand new and very clean. ", "The place was great. Very clean which is rare in Airbnb’s these days. Also they were very quick to respond to messages and help us with organizing a cab to airport. I would 100% stay there again. I recommend with eyes closed

", "Nevena's place is well located within waling distance from central Sofia. The place is spacious and clean. It is as you see it in the photos. ", "A great place in a very central area! The hosts were great and very helpful. We are very happy with our stay :)", "Very clean and well appointed with lots of space and a comfortable bed. ", "This is a beautiful,  spacious apartment within walking distance of most of the sights in Sofia.  Nevena was very communicative and dealt with queries promptly via the airbnb web site. Nevena and her husband warmely welcomed us at the apartment, explaind everything, recommended what to see and where to go in Sofia and helped with organizational stuff. The communication before our trip was very good.
