I totally recommend her and her flat for your stay in Sofia.", "We had a great 3-night (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication with Nevena and her family was all very smooth, timely, and pleasant. The apartment itself is comfortable and clean, in a good location. 

One thing I don't like about this building (and lots of other Bulgarian buildings) is that the front door is locked even from the inside, so it is impossible to even exit the building without the key, which, in addition to being a safety issue, can be very restricting to a party of more than one person. For our first day we only had one set of keys, which was quite tricky for our party of 4, as we weren't always moving around together. On the second day we asked for another set of keys, and Nevena's husband brought them over just a few hours later. So, here's a tip: if you are a party of more than one, you'll want to ask ahead for a second set of keys for more flexibility and safety. 

Other than that one issue, our stay at this lovely apartment was wonderful, and we recommend it to prospective guests. ", "5 of us visited Sofia over the weekend having stayed at Nevena's flat for 2 nights. The apartment was modern, clean and in central Sofia which made it really easy to get everywhere. Nevena's husband met us at the flat on arrival and her daughter had come to collect the keys. They were all very helpful in arranging airport transfers etc. Highly recommended.", "This is an amazing apartment, it's as good as it looks in the photos. And we're so glad to have met Nevena when we arrived. A lovely lady! 

The flat is within walking distance to the city centre and about 10-15 minutes walk from the nearest metro, which goes to the airport (next time we would definitely use this both ways and not the taxi like we did when we arrived).", "Nevena met us promptly at the apartment and was very helpful answering our questions. The location is wonderful. We would happily stay at this home again.", "We spent 5 nights in Nevenas beautiful apartment and are happy we chose it.  The 2 bedrooms are very spacious and the beds comfortable. Everything that you will need is in the apartment.   Given that the apartment is located in the city centre,  we were surprised how delightfully  quiet the street was.   You can walk to all the attractions.  We did take a taxi home one evening, price is no more than a couple of euro.  Small supermarket nearby and also a 24 hour petrol station,  which had limited groceries.   This is one if the best airbnb apartments I have stayed in and Nevena is a very welcoming host!!!", "We spent 2 magical days exploring Sofia and enjoying Nevena's beautifully finished house. Nevena greeted us with a wonderful amount of information about Sofia and Bulgaria as well as delicious homemade cherry tart (a welcome surprise after our journey). 

The house is perfectly kept and has everything you could possibly need during your trip. The location is within easy walking distance to central Sofia and surround by lots of 24hour shops, cafes and restaurants.

We hope to stay here again on our next trip to Sofia. And recommend it to anyone who needs a home away from home. 

", "We, two girls from the Netherlands, stayed in this appartment for 3 months during our Erasmus program, from march till june.  We absolutely loved it! The pictures on this website are trustworthy, it really is that beautiful and spacious. We really felt like home during these 3 months. There was enough space for visiting friends to come over and it is also close to the city centre (about 15min. walk). For us the busstop to the university was also nearby, as is a small supermarket. Sofia is awesome and this appartment made our stay even better. Nevena is a really kind and nice housekeeper. She wanted to check the appartment almost every week because they had problems with damp spots on the wall before with previous guests, but this was not a problem for us. The neighbourhood is quiet, some schools nearby, and I never felt unsafe. Definitely recommend this appartment to my friends and family!", "Wonderful apartment and host. The apartment is ideally located on a quiet street near the center. It is walking distance to everything you might want to see in Sofia and to public transport as well. Grocery stores, cafes, etc. all very near by. The apartment is beautifully furnished and you can really feel at home there.  The kitchen is well equipped, as well. 

Nevena was a great host and accommodating of our slightly weird check-in/check-out times. One thing for potential renters: note that the second bedroom (shown in photos) is only unlocked if you are 4 or more people- I'm not sure that the apartment description indicates that. But in any case, the apartment is quite large without it! Wonderful place, would stay here again and highly recommend it to others. ", "Very nice apartment in the center of Sofia. Spacious, light and extremely clean.
Nevena is a very nice lady and showed us around, with many info about the city. Definitely recommend!", "The apartment was great: spacious and modern, it's in a quiet location but not a long walk from the centre. Nevena was incredibly helpful and always responded promptly to communication. A great experience!", "Great place, host welcomes you with a delicious traditional Bulgarian dish. Thanks Nevena! ", "I don't really write a review of something, but after staying at Nevena's place for 5 days, I had to! Sofia was indeed impressive but what made my trip perfect was this flat! It has everything I needed with modern interior. It's also really well located in a quiet neighborhood. I didn't even have to take a metro. If you ever visit Sofia and look for a plce to stay, I highly recommend this flat! You will not regret it;) ", "Again a perfect stay with Nevena :) nothing to remark, will stay here definitely again... ", "We had a lovely stay at Nevena's apartment in Sofia. The apartment is very clean and spacious. The kitchen has everything you would need to make a meal. Only a 10-15 minute walk to downtown. We would definitely recommend a trip to Sofia and staying here! Thank you, Nevena, for being a great host!", "She and her husband was so amazingly friendly. Great apartment, really good location and everything you need is there! 
We found our place whenever we come back to Sofia!", "It was a very nice welcome. Nevena was very friendly and showed me around the appartment.", "We stayed in Nevena's apartment for 1 month. The apartment was better than the pictures.  Very clean, everything is well kept and the location is easy walking to Vitosha Boulevard (a cafe and shopping strip). It's also very close to a supermarket so you can get the groceries you need easily. 

Nevena was great, from the communication, to meeting us when we arrived and answering any questions and request that we had. 

I would highly recommend this apartment, we felt very comfortable and happy staying here. 

Nevena also made us a Bulgarian pie for when we arrived. Delicious! 
", "The apartment is really great, modern and fully equipped. It is fairly centrally located, just a 15-minute walk from all the central locations. We were welcomed warmly and provided with everything we needed. Overall a great experience staying there. ", " Nevena was a fantastic host. She was quick to respond both before and during our stay and was very helpful. The apartment was perfect for our family of five - very spacious and nice. The location was good - we walked and took buses to go to and from the sites. Thank you Nevena!", "Three of us stayed at Nevena's apartment for three weeks while studying in Sofia. It was absolutely perfect! In a quiet neighborhood and a short walk to all main attractions. It was very welcoming and had everything we needed- a beautiful kitchen for making dinners, washing machine, two spacious bedrooms and a cozy living area. It was nice to come back after a long day and feel at home.  Nevena and her daughter were very helpful and kind. ", "The appartement is really good. It was very clean and as descibed. We also appreciated that coffee and tee was available. Besides the handover of the key worked perfect for us. Neveda and her husband were very flexible.", "Extremely nice flat and helfull guest. Full recommandation.", "We had a lovely two night stay at Nevena's apartment in Sofia. She was very easy to communicate with ahead of the stay - her husband met us on arrival and was very helpful at showing us around the apartment and suggestions for what to do in Sofia. The apartment was very clean and spacious - just like in the photos, and it was a nice cool temperature during the hot evenings!", "Clean, light apartment with everything we could have needed during our stay. Good location and helpful host.", "This is a great apartment to stay in! We had a fantastic time in Sofia, thanks to the hospitality of Nevena and the spacious, modern and clean place we could stay in. Everything we needed was there and more, including some maps and brochures to discover the city. We would totally recommend this awesome apartment!", "Apartment has modern design with ample light coming in. Very clean and spacious living room. Nevena is easy to communicate with and make arramgements for handing over keys. Would highly reccomend the place.", "Nevena's home was really nice and 100% same with picture. We stayed 3 nights in here, this space was clean, bright, spacious. Also she prepared Bulgarian spinach pie for us, that was nice.
About location, it's near by old town and central station, thus more comfortable use taxi with cheap price.", "Great place, very spacious, most comfortable bed ever, perfectly decorated and with everything one might need for a short or long stay. Location is very convenient and easy to find. Nevena was extremely accurate and on time in both check-in and out of the apartment. The pictures are extremely accurate just looks better in person. Very recommended.", "Very well located and pretty apartment. Nevena treated us very well and everything was tidy and clean", "Nevena's apartment is very nice and perfect for who's wanna stay in Sofia both for business and leisure, as it is in a very strategical position, very close to the city centre.
It's very spacious and with all the facilities needed.
At my arrival it was perfectly clean and the host provided all the informations I may need and... some cherries! It has been a very nice surprise!
There is also a very fast internet connection and a big smart TV useful for every moment of relax...
Warmly recommended!", "Nevena made us feel really welcome. The apartment looks exactly as shown in the pictures and it was very clean. We had a great stay!", "Wonderful spacious appartament, recently reinovated and very clean, within walking distance from everything there is to see in Sofia. Host was very helpful and more than willing to accomodate in every possible way. Best money spent in a while.", "My husband and I spent 10 days in this absolutely gergious flat! The apartment is fully furnished and has everything you need at home. The place is very clean, modern and spacious. It is located in the city center just 7 min walking distance from some of the major tourist attractions.

I personally, really enjoyed Nevena`s friendly, accurate and knowledgable support. She had prepared all the important information one might need - emergency numbers, maps, internet access codes, current cultural events in the city- excellent tool for any tourist in a new city!

For us, this was one relaxing, comfortable " Home, away from home"!

I would certainly return there.

Hava", "We came to stay at this place again because the first time was so great. You won't regret staying here!", "This apartment was great! It was perfectly clean, very spacious and the kitchen has everything you need plus more. Nevena was super kind and available to help when we had questions. We would definitely stay here again. Oh and the bed and pillows were the comfiest we've slept on in the nine months we've been traveling!", "Such a lovely place! My boyfriend and I stayed in the apartment for a week and both agree that its our favourite AirBnB place yet - its spacious, full of light, modern and everything seemed brand new. It had everything we needed without being over-cluttered. Location is great as it's close enough to all main sights. Nevena, our host, was probably my favourite thing about this place - she had important information with telephone numbers and passwords printed out just for us and gave us, gave us a lot of useful tips and really made us feel welcome. Even gave us some home-made  treat when we were leaving :) A very sweet and caring lady who made out stay truly special. Thank you! We will definitely recommend this lovely place! ", "My friends and I had very pleasant stay at Nevena' s place. She was very accurate, friendly and polite. 
The apartment is quite comfortable and just amazing. It is totally renovated and professionally designed, equipped with all you may need. It is very bright and impeccably clean. The location is very convenient as it is just a few steps from the city center. It is perfect for exploring the city. 
The neighbourhood is very quiet and there are shops around, as well as nice bars and restaurants. 
I strongly recommend this place as we did not miss anything and it was very comfortable. 

", "Прекрасно местенце за уикенда е София ,уютно ,тихо на пешеходно раЗстояние до центъра", "appartement bien placé et très fonctionnel. Séjour très agréable.", "Приняли вовремя! Квартира оказалась даже интересней чем на фото! Хозяева предупредительны. Хорошо знают русский язык. Это большой плюс! ", "Appartement tout simplement PARFAIT! Exactement comme sur les photos, spacieux, très bien éclairé, propre. Je n'ai aucun reproche à faire sur l'appartement. Et que dire de Nevena et son Mari qui sont tellement gentils et attentionné envers leurs invités. De plus ce logement est idéalement bien placé, pratique pour visiter Sofia à pied. Je recommande vivement ce logement lors d'un séjour à Sofia.", "L'appartement de Nevena était tout simplement parfait et nous nous y sommes sentis comme à la maison; spacieux, propre, parfaitement équipé, à quelques minutes à pied du centre ville. Nous avons également pu faire notre check-in et check-out à notre convenance sans aucun problème. ", "Schoon en net appartement. Overal dichtbij , je kunt echt overal lekker eten en niet duur!", "Appartement parfait, propre, fonctionnel et dans le centre de Sofia ! Idéal pour ceux qui veulent visiter la ville a pied. Aucun point négatif, absolument parfait !", "Muy bonito apartamento, muy limpio y nuevo para alojarse y sentirse como en casa, volvería a alojarme si vuelvo a Sofia!! Totalmente recomendable!! ", "Super recomendable, localizacion, limpieza y espacioso", "Dit prachtige appartement net buiten de stad is echt een aanrader. De vrouw des huises stond ons op te wachten en gaf onze alle nodige uitleg die wij nodig hadden. We konden gebruik maken van; wasmachine, afwasmachine (indien nodig) strijkgerij, tv, internet en alle handen keukengerij. Het appartement was schoon en zeer goed onderhouden. We hebben mede dankzij deze  accommodatie genoten van een 5-daagse Sofia-trip.", "Logement grand très propre bien situé pour visiter Sofia  rien à dire à par merci et à bientôt", "Cet appartement est exactement comme vu sur les photos: propre, lumineux, confortable et en très bon état. La cuisine est bien équipée. Les hôtes sont très accueillants, nous ont aidés et ont offert de bon conseils pendant notre séjour. L'appartement est bien situé sur une rue tranquille. Je recommande vivement cet appartement!!!", "Hôte extrêmement sympathique et accueillante, appartement très propre - fonctionnel - à 10 mn à pied des principaux points de visite. Nous recommandons fortement ! ", "FR/ENG 

Bel et grand appartement, très bien équipé, avec deux chambres. Quartier tranquille, à 15 min à pied du centre de Sofia. 
Hôte sympathique et très arrangeant. 

Big and nice flat, well equipped with two rooms. Calm area at 15 min to Sofia's center. 
Nice and very accommodating host. ", "Het verblijf in dit appartement was top. Groot appartement en alles was super schoon.

Een tip is het restaurant 'Papa Joe' in dezelfde straat als dit appartment. Bulgaars eten tussen de locals, en onwijs goedkoop. ", "Cómodo y acogedor apartamento. Todo es nuevo y limpio y agradable. Lo recomiendo.", "Alloggio molto pulito e confortevole.
Posizione in quartiere residenziale centrale di Sofia. Nevena e sua figlia sono molto gentili e si sono sempre rese disponibili ad aiutarci. Grazie per l'ospitalità!
Very Nice Flat in the center of Sofia. Big livingroom, clean bathroom, new kitchen. Nevena and her daughter were very kind! Thank you!", "Après un voyage de 45 jours en Europe de l'est, nous pouvons dire que cet appartement est notre meilleur. Tout y est. Le lit king est hyper confortable, nous avons passé nos meilleures nuits. La cuisine est parfaite et il ne manque de rien. La propreté est irréprochable. Une odeur d'humidité dans la salle de bain se fait oublier en partant la ventilation. Les fenêtres sont grandes ce qui rend l'appartement lumineux. Nous nous sommes sentis comme à la maison.

Nous avons été accueillis avec sourire par la fille de Nevena malgré une heure de retard de notre part. À notre arrivé, nous devions aller à l'hôpital pour un problème de santé. Elle à aussitôt mise sa mère au courant de la situation. Nevena et son mari sont venus nous voir rapidement à l'appartement pour nous aider. Ils nous ont conduits dans deux hôpitaux et une pharmacie. Nevena a joué le rôle d'interprète. Nous sommes très reconnaissant de leurs grandes gentillesses et du dévouement envers nous.

Nous recommandons fortement cet appartement et déclarons qu'il est géré par des gens qui ont à coeur le bien être des autres.


", "Wenn das Gebäude und die Umgebung einen von 5 Sterne ausmachen würde, sind 4 von 5 Sternen angebracht. Aber so zuvorkommend und hilfsbereit die Gastgeberin war muss die Bewertung 5 von 5 Sternen sein.
Gerne sind wir hier wieder Gast!!!", "Очень приятно было провести 4 дня в этой светлой, чистой и комфортной квартире. Она удобно расположена, совсем близко от центра, рядом есть магазины, паб и несколько ресторанчиков, а также парковка, если вы на машине. Особенно благодарны Невене за гостеприимство и оперативность, она встретила нас, рассказала все о квартире, предоставила карты города. Мы путешествовали с дочкой и квартира просторна и удобна для маленьких детей. Рекомендуем всем!!! Квартира полностью соответствует фотографиям и описанию.", "L'appartement est calme, propre, spacieux, moderne et très bien situé pour découvrir le centre-ville de Sofia. Nous avons apprécié notre séjour de 3 jours, ainsi que l'accueil et les bons conseils de Nevena. Nous recommandons cet appartement.", "Excellent logement pour découvrir la ville. Très propre, spacieux, très bon accueil.", "Très bel apartement très bien situé dans Sofia, proche du centre et de toutes les commodités. Apartement  spacieux, très confortable et conforme à la description.  Nevena est très accueillante et n'hésite pas à apporter son aide. Je recommande  très vivement cet apartement", "Appartement tres bien situé et tres propre. Nevena parle tres bien français et nous a fourni toutes les informations pour nous permettre de passer un agréable sejour à Sofia "]

reviews:
["Kristina's place is lovely! Was daunted by the amount of stairs the first time I went up but by the end of the second day we stopped noticing it. 
Cozy and bright, would happily stay again.", "Everything was as depicted. There were a lot of extra and very useful amenities - coffee, water, tea, 3 towels per person, pans, dishes, shampoo, brochures with local places and things to do, speedy wi-fi, umbrella, rubber shoe cleaner etc. etc (you got the idea). I highly suspect there's a professional touch with the interior of the place too! Location is 10min walk from city center. Response time from the host was always within minutes. If you don't have problems climbing stairs and your budget can stretch it - I highly recommend. I'd personally come back again if I need a place to stay in Sofia.", "Lovely place to stay- cozy, central with very nice host. A home away from home. ❤", "Kristina is really nice and friendly! The apartment is very modern and has a great vibe. There is everything you need plus a little snack in the fridge that was very thoughtful. We had a great experience and would definitely go back! ", "The appartment is brand new. You Can find everything you need and even more. Location is perfect, walking distance to the centre, few steps from tram and subway. 
Kristina was very welcoming. 
We very enjoyed our stay.", "Great apartment in a great location in Sofia! I'm in love with this apartment,there is everything you need.I will love to go back there!
Thank you for everything Kristina, i wish you all the best! :)", "Great apartment at a perfect location! We had an amazing time. Kristina is a great host and was always available if we had any questions. Thank you for the amazing hospitality!", "Thank you, Christina for the warm welcome. The apartment is perfect, very, very comfortable, with excellent location. The interior is lovely, cozy and I felt wonderful. Cristina is a wonderful and perfect host. I highly recommend staying at Christina's home.", "Centrally located and well priced. This apartment is ideal for anyone who wants to be in a local neighborhood near the center of Sofia. The apartment is clean, quiet, and good for a couple. The bed is comfortable as well. The bathroom is cozy, but efficient. Overall, the apartment is in the best area of Sofia. Lastly, Kristina was a friendly and generous host.", "Kristina's apartment is really wonderful, very clean and perfectly equipped.
The decor is very neat and very modern. 2 small terraces so one that leads directly to the market that is at the foot of the building. Very nice to have a coffee while looking at everyday life.
Access to the center and very simple and really close.
I rented a car and it is extremely easy to find a place in the neighborhood.
An apartment I will return without any problem, and that I strongly advise you.", "Very nice stylish place in a good location. Kristina is a wonderful host, she checked me in earlier which was great after a long night trip. The apartment has everything you might need! Highly recommend.", "Kristina was a great host and I would highly recommend her to anyone looking for a place to stay in Sofia, BG- both long and short term!", "The apartment is just great. It's located perfectly next to a metro station and the city center, but in a quit side street. It's extremely shiny clean, and furnished and decorated with a great eye for detail and practicality. On longer stays, you can wash and iron your laundry. 
Kristina is a perfect host, very friendly and helpful. Thanks for the great stay!", "Kristina was a great host. Quick replies and met us to check us in. Flexible check in and check out. Nice sized flat and easy to walk into the centre. Would definitely recommend.", "Perfect experience :) thank you for your kindness.", "It was the second time we stayed at Kristina's place and it was as amazing at the first time. I highly recommend staying at this extremely cozy and light apartment to anybody who is looking for a peaceful place to stay in such a hectic city as Sofia undoubtedly is. It truly makes you wanna come back...", "Kristina's place was fantastic. Great location, very clean and Kristina welcomed us on the first day which made everything a lot easier. No hesitation in recommending!", "Kristina’s place was great, very stylish, sparkling clean and excellent location. Checking was smooth and communication was prompt. Nice Mountain View. I would definitely stay again.", "Great stay at Kristina’s apartment. Excellent communication before and throughout our stay and Kristina was accommodating with our check in time. The apartment is just like the photos, clean, neat, stylish and comfortable. The bed is comfortable too, had a great sleep both nights. All facilities and stocked items you’d expect at your own home (and more!) are provided in the apartment. The neighbourhood is residential, mostly quiet but has some local market stores and restaurants nearby; quiet enough to enjoy your sleep but close enough to the city centre to walk there. Good transport link to the airport too with the Metro. Lovely park nearby which we strolled through on the Sunday. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay in Kristina’s apartment and can happily recommend it for short or longer stays in Sofia. Thank you Kristina for your hospitality!", "Great apartment for a stay in Sofia! Amazing location and a lovely view. Awesome accommodations, would recommend to everyone!!!", "Kristine's place is very modern, newly refurbish and pretty much as described. She was very hospitable and thoughtful with little things like waiting for us at the place for our arrival, leaving some food for us so we wouldn't be rushing to get supplies to dropping us off to our sporting venue for which we were in Sofia. Communication was excellent and her appartment is an Oasis amidst a more traditional and less swanky appartment block/area but with such lovely people around.  After a long race the stairs seemed a bit of a challenge but other wise what a lovely stay we had. Btw there are two lovely restaurants/bar (one called Everyday bar) just down her road in he opposite direction to the Roman wall. Taxis are cheap into town (3-4 euros max). Vitosha mountains (25euro return) had stunning scenery to enjoy at dusk. Enjoy:)", "Kristina's apartment was a perfect base from which to explore the lovely Sofia. It was modern, spotless and extremely comfortable and easy to get into town from. Kristina was the perfect host, very kind, welcoming and quick to respond! We would strongly recommend this apartment to anyone going to Sofia!", "Lovely apartment in a fantastic location - 10 min walk to the city centre. Apartment as described, lovely and clean and Kristina was extremely helpful in guiding us places to visit. We would recommend!", "Very lovely space, spotlessly clean, and a great location. Everything one might need within minutes, and Kristina moments away by text. I would definitely recommend this apartment and look forward to returning.", "Kristina was so helpful with ways to get from the airport to the apartment with costs, directions in english and bulgarian (for the taxi driver's). She was so flexible and accommodating with our needs and gave plenty of advice on places to eat and taxi numbers. There was good wifi, the apartment was spotless and kitted out with everything we needed. Plenty of fresh towels and food in the fridge. The location is very central. Kristina's description is spot on. Amazing place to stay, would love to stay again.", "Kristina, was awesome the photos are accurate the place was really clean and spotless. A couple of blocks away from the train and walking distance to the city center and only two blocks from a good restaraunt called Mariah very good place to eat. If coming to Sofia I recommend this place.", "Great place to stay, 10-15 min walk to the main attractions and restaurants. You will find everything you will need in the apartment, it is comfortable and clean. Kristina and her son, were very helpful. I would definitely stay again.", "An absolutely top-rank AirBnB with a great location, all the facilities you could wish for, a helpful and communicative host and just a great all around vibe. Highly recommended.", "Had a great time in Sofia. Everything was as described. Kristina`s pace is great, located the heart of Sofia (close to everything). I`ll definitely stay here again.", "Kristina is such a great host- she gave perfect instructions on locating the flat and loads of stuff to make our stay enjoyable and comfortable in the flat itself. Plus she helped out by booking us a taxi for a super early flight. The flat itself is near enough to the centre to walk in, but far enough to feel like its in a neighbourhood and to get some quiet, which we appreciate after being on road for a while. Thanks Kristina!", "Can’t say enough positive things about this flat and its host(s)! My wife and I stayed four days at Kristina’s place and it was perfect for our needs. Kristina’s son, Kiril, greeted us at the unit and after a warm welcome walked us through the essentials of the apartment and a list of recommendations—transportation, restaurants, and location/proximity to key sites. Throughout our stay, both Kristina and Kiril were also highly responsive to our questions, providing timely and extremely helpful replies.

The flat, located near the Roman Wall Market and Levski Stadium, is perfectly situated within 15-20 minutes walking distance to almost all of Sofia’s major attractions; and within a 5-minute walk to public transit (taxi stand, tram, and subway- Vasil Levski Stadium stop). The unit itself was spotless, cozy, well-equipped, renovated in very good taste and all at a great price! In short, the accommodations and experience were even better than advertised!

The flat served as a perfect stay for two. I highly recommend a stay here!

", "Very nice place for a weekend in Sofia", "We enjoyed our stay in Sofia and at Kristina's place very much. I would definitely stay here again. Very quick and nice communication before and during our stay. Apartment was clean and has everything you need for a city trip. 
", "Wonderful flat to stay in Sofia.  Clean. Easy walking distance to all of central Sofia.  Breakfast items generously provided.  Fabulous communication.  Put at top of your list in Sofia!!", "Exactly as described - very clean, excellent communication and seamless checkin. Definitely recommended. ", "Kristina and her son Kiril made their outmost to provide what we required. The apartment is clean modern and had everything required. Its in a central area next to the metro so its very easy to reach sofia in no time. Thanks again for the stay.", "Kristina's flat is excellent. It's nicely decorated and well equipped, and in a really handy location a few minutes walk from a metro station and lots of shops and restaurants. The bed is comfortable and the balcony off the sitting room (there's also one off the bedroom) is a nice place to sit and have a drink on a sunny evening. Having gone to Sofia for business (with a bit of leisure in between) I would definitely stay here again if the opportunity arises.", "Kristina is by far the *best* AirBnB host my boyfriend and I have ever encountered. She was helpful, kind and so welcoming. She did everything possible to make our stay great. 

The appartment itself was beautifully finished & perfect for our needs. We walked into the centre eah day, it was well located. We enjoyed the area - it was quiet. And found everything we needed, and more, in the appartment. (Including an ubandance of toilteries!!)
We would stay again and will certainly be recommending both the appartment and Sofia to friends and family. ", "Kristina was extremely welcoming and even left us some food in the apartment! It was one of the nicest Airbnb experiences we've had so far. The apartment was very clean and cosy and had everything we could possibly need! We would definitely stay here again!", "Great appartment! Kristina and her son are great hosts. My daughter Sofia and I really enjoyed Sofia.", "Great value for money. Kristina was a great host and the flat is just as described.", "I really enjoyed my experience in Sofia, at Kristina apartment! All the communication with her was very easy! Always very helpful and kind!
Very close to the city center, groceries and metro station!
The apartment is definitely lovely! Very well decorated, clean and charming!
I recommend the place!", "Very nice apartment, very clean, has everything you can expect for a home stay :)
Kristina and her son Kiril are super nice people and gave us a lot of travel tips. 
I would highly recommend this place!", "Great place to stay!!", "Beautiful apartment in a good area. A great host! ", "I stayed from Friday to Tuesday in Kristina's spotless apartment - with everything you could possibly need - including coffee and brown sugar lumps! It is just the right size for 1 or 2 people and very convenient for the tram into town.", "The appartment is located in a quiet neigbourhood, although the buidling itself is quite shabby the appartment is amazingly comfy, clean and very well equipped. We found this to be a great place relax from our trips and Kristina's place was a huge contribution to our pleasant stay in Sofia!", "Lovely place, well situated near the city centre and a metro station. Easy to get to from airport. Kristina was a lovely host, helpful information about what's nearby and the added first breakfast is a great touch. ", "The apartment is a beautiful place located in 10 min walk from all of the major hotspots of the city. We had an excellent stay with Kristina doing an extra stretch to help us with an early check in. The space was ultra clean, the bed was comfy we had clean white towels and thank you Kristina for having us the breakfast stocked up in the fridge.", "Quick and friendly communication with Kristina before arrival.
Flawless check in.
Very clean and practical apartment with all I needed supplied. Even a fridge with water, juice, cheese, breakfast meat, bread etc. A very nice touch by Kristina. 
Also a very well supplied bathroom.
Comfortable bed and fast wifi.
Only a few minutes by foot from Levski Stadium and metro station from where you can get to the airport in 30 minutes.
Plenty of room for two people in the apartment.
A delightful stay in Sofia. Thanks Kristina.", "Me And my friend Caterina had a great time in Sofia... Kristina's apartment is The best accomodatin we could hope To find...we loved The suggestive neighbor... Also so close To The city centre. Kristina is a special Host,  She welcame us early in The morning,  was My birthday ad Just arrived she showed me a Birthday cupcake! The house has a great vew,  is very clean And pleasantly decorated, also has all of comfort. We felt At home! ", "Nicely equipped and decorated apartment. Walking distance to city center. Very good service from the owner. Would stay again.", "Everything was perfect! Kristyna was an amazing and kind host! Definitely one of the best Airbnb experiences I have ever experienced! благодаря Kristyna! :-)", "Kristina was perfect in everything, she home was clean, quietly and comfortable. Highly recommended. Thanks a lot again and hope to see you soon :)", "We loved the apartment, it was the perfect place for a weekend away, thank you for having us! Everything you could need was provided, including tea, coffee and even a beer! We would definitely recommend staying here.", "We really enjoyed our stay in Sofia and in this very nice and cosy apartment. It's very clean and luxury. The bathroom is beautiful and it's great to have a small, but useful kitchen (with a fridge and oven and a toaster).
Also thanks for the warm welcome. Our flight was delayed, but that wasn't a problem! I recommend this place, especially for those who are planning to have a city trip to Sofia. 



", "This has been the best airB&B we have stayed at. Imediately as you walk in the place smelt great and felt amazing! The bed was the best to sleep in after a long trip and the kitchen had all the best (and new) facility's to use. Kristina even left us a great breakfast! We were met by her son which he was externally helpful to where to go to eat and see and do. Kristina even followed up to see how we were getting on. Best experience highly recommend this place! ", "I had a absolut perfekt stay in Kristinas apartement.  It s very well appointed,  fresh decorated,  very clean and I could highly recommended this apartement.  The communication in advance and during the stay and the Check in was very good as well. Thank you very much Kristina, Stefan", "Kristina's Apartment is an awesome place to stay in Sofia. It is very close to the city center with lots of shops and bars around and the metro that is 2 minutes away brings you directly to the airport or business park.
The apartment has a modern and clear interior and is equipped with everything you need. 
Kristina is a 5 star hosts. We had very good communication before and during my stay and she took care of every request quickly.  I will definitely come back to her place for my next visit.
Highly recommended!!!", "Kristina was an amazing host! She kept me updated before going to the flat about where to go and who to talk to. 

We were welcomed by her friend who gave us the keys and a warm welcome. It was my girlfriend's birthday and upon entering the flat there was a birthday cupcake on the counter! The flat was clean with all the amenities. There was even some breakfast stuff in the refrigerator for us. 

The flat is about a 10 minute walk from the city center and there's a good restaurant/bar down the street. 

Highly recommended to stay here if you visit Sofia. ", "Kristina was a most Fabulous host! The Flat was superb and perfect for all our needs. She has thought of everything to provide convenience to travelers. There were many amenities and the apartment was very clean, cozy and perfectly located in one of the best neighborhoods. Close to all public transportation, parks, and open markets ", "Everything perfect!", "Apartment was exactly as described. Only a short walk (15 minutes) to main sights. Kristina was a very helpful host, nothing was too much trouble and always easy to contact. We particularly like the personal touch of Kristina having bought a decorated cupcake for my boyfriends birthday- such a sweet thought. And having some supplies in for our first breakfast there was also very helpful. Sofia is a very beautiful city and the apartment was cosy, clean and modern. Had a lovely stay. ", "Kristina was really friendly and gave me all the information I needed on my arrival. The place was clean and very nice. it's location is great, just minutes walk from the center.", "Kristina as a host, there is no better than her. Her ability to communicate and advise in reference to our stay in her pretty city, remarkable. Her apartment, well refurbish, looks like new, with all the amenities and supplies that a traveler need to spend a few days without worries. 
My wife and I enjoyed being guests at Kristina apartment and receive the attentions that we did not expect.
THANKS:  Carlos and Rina.
", "Kristina was very helpful prior to and during our stay, the apartment was very well equipped, exceptionally clean and in a very convenient location.", "Perfect one bedroom apartment in a great location. I have stayed in a few AirBnB's in Sofia and this is by far my favorite one so far!  Kristina was very prompt in replying to all our questions and the check-in/check-out process was as smooth as possible. I would certainly stay there again!", "Wonderful! Kristina was extremely communicative from our booking through our final day, and patient and flexible even when our plans changed. The apartment is beautiful and spotlessly clean, and the neighborhood is just a few minutes walk from the center city. There is a cafe and a restaurant right around the corner, and also a tram stop. The apartment was well-stocked with anything we could have needed, and Kristina was always available if we needed her; one of my best AirBnB experiences!", "We loved our stay at Kristina's apartment! It nice, clean and cosy, well-designed with a lot of amenities provided. Honestly, I can't praise enough host's attention to the smallest details, expect to find everything you may need and even more. Kristina's son was waiting for us in the apartment, even though we arrived really late and he took his time to show us around and gave us few useful tips. Kristina was always there for us, making sure we can reach her whenever we needed. Overall, 5 out of 5, we would recommend it to anyone!", "Kristina's amazing apartment is one of the best places I have been so far. It is a modern apartment with everything in it. Not far from the centre of Sofia. I was really happy with her hospitality. Got a lot of additional information to have a pleasant stay. She was really nice and the communication was quick and helpful. ", "We had a GREAT staying - place is perfect and in a nice area. Kristina was amazing and really accommodating with our timings and logistics. 
USE IT!", "Kristina is an amazing host! Her attention doesn't rely only on her beautiful apartment, but also the whole experience of her guests! She was guiding me throughout my whole stay and made my trip as smooth and east as it was possible. The Apartment is super close to everything you need to see in Sofia (walking distance). The whole center in Sofia is almost "in front of the door" and you can walk by max 15 min to experience all the great places! The Market in front of the apartment offered super fresh fruits, vegetables and everything you actually need for a and great and convenient stay! I would definitely stay in this apartment again and strongly recommend it to others!", "We had a wonderful stay in this apartment! It is cute, really clean, and located in a nice neighborhood close to the main sights. It also had a nice supply of basic food items and toiletries. Kristina was so kind and accommodating when our flight arrival time changed. Her son met us and was very sweet. Overall, a superb experience!", "The apartment is nice location, few minutes walk to the central of Sofia! 
Kristina was so welcoming as I arrived late night(much appreciated)!
The place is lovely, clean and everything you need is there for your stay! I highly recommend to stay at this amazing apartment! 
Also, she is helpful in recommendation what is good in Sofia! 
Rmiska market just right there by the apartment and you can buy what so ever you want! 
 
", "The apartment is a little gem right a few minutes walking to the centre of Sofia. It's got everything you need and even more - stuff you don't usually expect from an airbnb, like fresh bread, local jam and a few snack to get you go as you're just arrived. Clean to perfection, calm, cozy and good smelling. I met Kristina only when I arrived, and she is smart, sweet and helpful - I wish I stayed more here and I will definitely stay here again if I happen to head to Sofia in the future. Absolutely brilliant", "Kristina was a wonderful host. She made sure that check-in and check-out went smoothly. 

Her place was super nice. Clean, with lots of sunlight, and wonderful design. The attention to every detail was amazing! Strongly recommend", "The apartment was comfortable and modern, just as described/pictured and at the perfect location in the center of the city for easy access to everything. The host was very communicative and helpful and made the transaction extremely easy and efficient. The cleaning service is a very nice touch, and made the long stay hassle-free. Great experience overall!", "Kristina was very kind & the appartement is exactly as shown on airbnb. Clean, light and spacious.  Although we arrived later than expected, Kristina was there waiting for us! ", "Kristina is lovely and couldn't have been more helpful. She was flexible with my checkout because I wasn't flying out until 6:30 PM. I would highly recommend this property.", "I was really impressed with the flat.  I did not meet with Kristina but met with her daughter Rumi.  So many additional things were provided like bread, butter, jam, water, herbal teas, coffee, toiletries and information on local areas.  The flat was equipped with all mod cons and located by the metro.  All local shops were near by and the main city was only a 15 minute walk.  Kristina was in touch throughout the holiday via email and was very helpful in providing any information I required.  I will definitely book again.  Recommended for those who do not want to stay in the center but close by.  It was value for money.   ", "What a wonderful place to stay! Kristina was so welcoming and accommodating. Every detail had been thought through to make our stay as homely and comfortable as possible. The apartment is immaculately clean and tastefully decorated, even better than the photos show. We will not hesitate to get back in touch and stay here if we come back to Sofia. 
Thank you so much Kristina, hopefully we will see you again one day!", "공항 OK택시 리셉션에서 콜하면 미터기켜고 11km입니다. 비용은 10-11레바 정도 나오고 4-5유로라고 생각하시면 됩니다. 시내까지는 걸어서 이동가능하지만 바로 옆 걸어서 5분거리에 메트로가 있으니 하루 4레바짜리 데이티켓 사용하시면 편해요. 시설은 깨끗하게 관리되어 있었고 친절하게 맞이해줬습니다. 소통도 잘되었구요. 세탁기가 없었던 것 빼곤 괜찮았어요. :D", "Ambiente curato, pulito e confortevole. Ci siamo sentiti come a casa! Kristina è un'ottima host, premurosa nell' assisterci anche a distanza. Posizione comoda per gli spostamenti a piedi verso il centro, fermata metro vicinissima. Consigliata!", "Bonne communication avec Kristina. Son fils m'a bien accueilli. On se sent très bien dans cet appartement rénové avec goût qui est au calme, très propre et assez bien équipé.
La climatisation et la douche sont performantes. Deux petits balcons sont à disposition. Marché et taxis en bas de l'immeuble.
Le centre de Sofia est assez accessible à pieds (taxis peu onéreux).", "Ottimo appartamento, ben arredato, letto comodo, cucina abitabile fornita di tutto il necessario, bagno con doccia perfetta. Kristina è estremamente precisa e corretta, niente è lasciato al caso. Gentilmente ci ha lasciato il necessario per una prima colazione, compresi formaggio, pane e salame. Localizzazione perfetta con tutto il centro di Sofia a portata di gambe. Per le persone anziane e disabili, bisogna tenere conto che l'appartamento si trova al quarto piano senza ascensore. Consigliatissimo.", "Das Apartment ist sehr gut eingerichtet und sehr sauber, nur das Bad ist etwas klein, was mich aber nicht gross gestört hat. Die Lage ist auch sehr gut, ca. 15 Minuten laufen bis zum Stadtzentrum oder ein Taxi für EUR 1.50. War alles in allem sehr zufrieden und kann das Apartment uneingeschränkt weiterempfehlen! ", "El apartamento está genial en todos los sentidos, no le falta detalle. Se encuentra relativamente cerca del centro. Los dueños fueron muy amables y atentos.", "Todo fue perfecto!! Mejor que en las fotos! Aunque llegamos a casa de Kristina a la 1 de la madrugada, nos esperó despierta para abrirnos la puerta de forma remota, eso es de agradecer. Soy muy exigente con la limpieza, y la casa sobrepasó mis expectativas, como en un hotel de 5 estrellas! Recién reformada y con todos los detalles que te puedas imaginar: lavadora, plancha, secador de pelo, zapatillas de casa, mapas de la ciudad... En la nevera nos dejó un desayuno muy completo; además, pan fresco del día, café y té! La cocina muy bien equipada: cafetera, horno, todos los utensilios como nuevos! El baño también tenía todos los detalles, las toallas nuevas y las sábanas también! 
Tiene un pequeño balcón con vistas a un mercado, desde donde disfrutamos nuestro primer desayuno en Sofía :)
El centro de la ciudad está a unos 10 minutos de la casa caminando. 
El día que nos íbamos, Kristina nos reservó un taxi que pasó a buscarnos a las 4:30 de la madrugada para llevarnos al aeropuerto (tarda unos 15 minutos y son unos 6 euros). Fue muy atenta con nosotros y en todo momento nos prestó su ayuda.
Sofía nos sorprendió y nos gustó mucho, esperamos volver y hospedarnos de nuevo en casa de Kristina. Eres maravillosa! Gracias por todo!!!! Raúl y Yolanda", "Die Wohnung ist wie auf den Bildern abgebildet sehr schön eingerichtet. Sie liegt sehr nahe zur Innenstadt und auch zur Ubahn in einer sehr sicheren Gegend. Ein Taxistand ist auch gleich um die Ecke, Taxis sind sehr günstig in Sofia. Das Internet ist schnell, der Kühlschrank war auch noch mit Lebensmittel bestückt, alles in allem eine sehr schöne Wohnung. Kristina war für Fragen jederzeit zu erreichen, sie ist eine tolle Gastgeberin. Ich würde sofort wieder bei ihre Wohnung buchen."]

reviews:
["Me and my friends enjoyed the beautiful atmosphere of the studio! The design was truly amazing, everything was clean and it was also very calm! We absolutely loved it! There was enough space for four people. There were also clean towels, bedsheets that smeled amazing. If you're looking for a cozy place to stay, this is where you should go!", "Helpful hosts! Perfect apartatament - clean, comfortable, perfect location, super atmosfore! Strongly recommend!", "This was my first experience with Airbnb and I loved it!!! The apartment was amazing, just as described and the interior is purely inspirational. Mila & Ned were amazing helping me with everything I needed - these guys are just awesome. I will definitely come back!", "A great stay at Ned’s place! Perfect location and super communication. Would definitely stay again!", "Excellent!", "Amazing place in the center", "Great place for the value.  FYI - there are no elevators/lifts, stairs only which I don't mind at all.  Overall, great experience, communication & location to explore the city!", "AMAZING location and very stylish space! We actually enjoyed spending time and eating meals in the apartment because of how cute it was. The printed document with local tips helped a lot. Check-in/out was very easy and stress free. Hosts were very accommodating with questions and leaving bags. Highly recommend.", "We got much help from Ivet! Thanks a lot", "Lovely, stylish apartment on the top floor, lots of stairs but I guess thats reflected in the price. Easy and quick communication with the host and very, very central - just off the main street in Sofia - yet quiet and spacious. Bed is also very comfortable. I would book again, thank you.  ", "The space is great. Very stylish and comfortable. Right around the corner from the main busy street with loads of restaurants and bars. Really enjoyed our stay!", "Really nice stylish apartment right in the center of the restaurants and bars. We had a great stay!", "Great place, perfect means of "unattended" checking in,  great location, stylish place. Recommend A++", "Perfect location! Sofia is such a beautiful city and you can reach almost everywhere from the apartment. Rooms are exactly like on the pics, very cosy and clean. Shopping and dining possibilities are close. Highly recommended!", "Very cosy and nice decorated apartment in the centrum! Everything was in walking distance! The host was also very helpful! There is nothing to complain about this charming flat and friendly host!", "The apartment was spotless and very well designed. The location cannot simply be topped!	a word of caution for tall people to beware not to hit your head as there are many ways to do that here. Overall, the location alone is very much worth it and the communication with the host", "Our stay in Sofia was full of wonderful surprises, but by far the hit for our four year old was that we were living in an attic. Clean, safe, perfect location, and all the amenities anyone could need. There was even a beautiful bouquet of flowers waiting for us upon our arrival. Above and beyond.We had a wonderful visit and would recommend your spot to others.", "Onc again, an amazing hosting experience from Ned and co. The flat has received some impressive redesign and was incredibly clean.

Location wise - it’s at the hearth of Sofia and next to one of the most popular streets.

Also pay a visit to the chilly shop right in-front of the flat - seriously good stuff!

Iliya", "The perfect stylish apartment for a weekend away. So close to everything; food, shopping, bars, sights to see etc. Very clean, bright and all around wonderful apartment. We had a great stay, and the hosts were lovely. Thank you for everything! ", "This is a great location for a stay in Sofia, right near the main street! Really cute flat, perfect for a couple. Only thing to bear in mind is the titled ceilings if you are tall, but would return!", "Great location, great value. Stylish place in the heart of the city", "Outstanding location right in the centre, good tips on food etc. the apartment is really modern and cozy, would recommend", "Very cute and cosy apartment with everything you could need. Great location but still very quiet.", "Ned's place is a real gem. A little hidden away, but smack in the middle of Sofia; the perfect location for a city trip. Communication was very easy, fast en clear. The appartment is cosy, comfortable and offers very sweet views of the mountains! A little printout of a very helpful powerpoint presentation provided some very helpful tips. Would recommend!", "It was perfect, the apartment was difficult to find but finally we did It. It's in a perfect place.", "Ned's apartment is very cosy, clean and exactly in the center of Sofia! We had a great time being there and I would definitely choose it again next time I'll visit Sofia. The information he gave me were very helpful and always in time! I would strongly reccommend it!", "Really stylish cosy apartment in the heart of Sofia. Highly recommend.", "Perfect!!!!!   This apartment is perfect if you want to tour Sofia. We will repeat insurance. A pleasure.", "The apartment was fantastic, we were in 4 and even if it's small is very comforting and in a very central position! The host has been very friendly and cooperative. We had such a nice stay, I highly recommend it (:", "We had a lovely stay at Ned's. Photographs were accurate. Central location but very quiet. Low ceilings so not good for tall people. Would recommend!", "This is the 3rd time I have stayed in Sofia and Ned’s Place was by far the best. Perfect location - less than a minute’s walk to Vitosha Boulevard. 

Ned was a great host and very quick to respond to any questions I had. Hospitality was fantastic and the extra touched made me feel really welcome. I plan to visit again soon with friends and family and will definitely stay here again.", "The apartment was perfect. Clean, beatiful, with every neccesities to stay. Eliah was so kind to help us every time we needed - thank you very much Eliah!

We loved the decoration and the placement, already in the city center. Two steeps to arrive to the amazing street called "Vitosha" (with a lot of restaurant and bars where have breakfast at sun or take an aperitive...or just shopping) . 

We were in 4, sleeping like at home, beds are super confortable!!! The bathroom is bigger than it look in the photos. You just have to go some upstairs but as we ate a lot of traditional bulgarian dishes, it was so good to exercise a little bit. Just It was a bit unconfortable to open and close the three doors every time we had to leave the aprtment but you can be sure that this is nothing about to be worried. Olso the shower in the middle of the bathroom, but you have olso a bath there. The area around is save, and we didn't have problems with nothing.

Definitely, we loved and enjoy a lot the apartment.", "The flat is perfectly situated, decorated and taken care of. I felt 100% at home in Sofia thanks to Ned! It was cosy, clean, spacious, and I would recommend it to any solo traveler or young-ish couple that can handle stairs and wants to be in the center of the city. But sensitive noses or people with allergies might want to stay away, as there’s a noticeable but not terrible mildew smell in the flat (that I’m sure can be fixed).", "The place had everything we were looking for. Elian responded quickly to all of our questions. Everything was as good as we expected. The apartment had all the amenities we needed. We would totally recommend it, if you visit Sofia for a weekend.", "Lovely flat, great location. Great communication from our hosts!", "This was a lovely little apartment which is decorated really nicely. Very unique and a great use of space. The host is very quick at responding to any questions and check-in is so easy. The location is great and all the key spots are an easy walk away. It's also very quiet in the flat so we slept very well. There are quite a few steps to the apartment but we found that to be no issue. It's also quite bright in the mornings with the light from the skylights.
Overall we enjoyed our time in the apartment and would recommend it! Thank you!", "We had an excellent stay in the Ned's apartment. It is more spacious than expected in the pictures, full equiped and very cleany. A bit too hot when we arrived but there's an air conditioner in the living room. Weird and funny thing in the bathrom : you take your shower in the middle of the room :)
Very well situated, near one of the most animated pedestrian street in Sofia.
Care if you come by car as there's no many parking lot in the surroudings", "Great location. Amazing comunication and a really cozy , clean and well furnished home to be in . Highly recommend it!", "Ned's apartment is very nice and cozy. The only negatif point is that there is no shutter on the windows. I recommend this apartment.", "Ideal location and adorable apartment. Amenities included which made it a home away from home. Would recommend this apartment over and over again.", "Nice apartment in center !", "Perfect place. Well located. Ok for 3 people. Air conditioning really useful during summer ;)

Easy communication. 

For people with heavy luggage it is on the sixth elevator without elevator. ", "Great location! Place clean.", "We stayed at Ned and Mila's for our pick up trip for our adoption - We stayed here with two 4 year old girls, and loved it! super clean and modern! The girls loved staying here, and want to say that they miss their little Sofia home! 

Ned was quick to reply when we had any questions, and we got into the building with no issues. 

Very awesome location right on Vitosha with all the shopping and restaurants you need! We never got a taxi for anything, because everything was right there. 

The apatment sleeps 4 comfortably. The washing machine worked great, no electric dryer which was fine because they provided a drying rack. the kitchen was very functional and had everything we needed to cook and eat our own meals.

Ned and Mila's place is on our favorites list, and we look forward to returning!!", "The apartment was clean, modern and quite spacious. Although it's on the fifth floor and you have to climb up five flights of stairs, it was a good excuse for ice cream or desert after dinner. We were there during a heatwave (34-36 degrees Celsius in the late afternoon) and the air-conditioning was perfect when we decided to take a break from the heat. The apartment is not far form the main shopping/ restaurant street as well. ", "I traveled with my husband and 2 grown up kids to Sofia and spent 5 days in that beautiful apartment. the location of the flat is just amazing. inside we liked the design and all the cool details of the interior. just it's good to know that the flat is on 6th floor and there's no elevator in the building, so for some older people can be hard to get there. I really liked the rainbow that appears in the bathroom when you have a shower  in the morning. so magical...<3  otherwise is good to know that the bed in the bedroom is a bit small for two people and the sofa is not so comfortable for sleeping. as well we would appreciate if there was  some blinds on the windows, in the morning it gets very bright and sunny in the rooms...", "Lovely and comfortable in an excellent location in the center of Sofia. Hosts were a pleasure to communicate with.  Would stay here anytime!", "Great place ... pretty much right on Vitoshin Blvd which is the main street  for everything that's restaurant and bar related.  Place was clean and higher than normal Bulgarian standards (I've been in quite a few BG apartments).", "It is a amazing flat and the host are so nice ", "Ned ans Mila's apartment is just as in the pictures- little and cosy. The building is incredibly secure- 4 doors to get through before the apartment. It is well equipped and SOOO close to the city centre. We loved it- thank you!", "Amazing location and amazing value for money. Honestly, this couldn't have been better.", "This is a lovely, unique apartment in an excellent location. You are within walking distance of so many sights, restaurants, transport. It is a beautiful and spacious apartment, with a lovely living room with TV (many channels), dining room and kitchen. The bedroom is a good size but the roof is very slanted so you just need to watch your head. The bathroom is a very good size and serves as a wetroom as well, which is slightly awkward using the toilet after having a shower (and needing to hide away the toilet roll :) but it`s a lovely shower and includes a bathtub as well. Towels are provided, as well as everything you need in the kitchen.

Ned and Mila were good hosts - we didn`t meet them but they were so responsive over messenger. They quickly answered any questions we had at any time, and the check-in was so easy. 

This is a very comfortable apartment, exactly as advertised with very pleasant and helpful hosts! We would recommend staying here for a nice, unique experience where you can feel like a local. Lovely stay!", "Just perfect! ", "Great location warm welcome and attention. To detail high ", "great place ! ", "Such a beautiful apartment in the center of Sofia! We loved our stay :)", "This is the perfect place to stay when you're visiting Sofia. The apartment looks very nice. Great location. ", "This apartment is really lovely, Ned and Mila really have made it a great place to stay and they are very helpful hosts. Would highly recommend and would stay here again. Location is perfect and it's quiet and comfortable. ", "The apartment was really great! Ned and Mila have been really helpful! If you visit Sofia, I definitely recommend to stay in their apartment! :) Great place!!", "Great apartment,right in town centre. Clubs,bars,restaurants are just a short walk way. Yet,the place is quite.Great host (I bet you, won't be needed ). Would love to stay again there. Thank you", "We had a great time at Ned and Mila´s place. The apartment is beautiful, very clean and location is great. Would highly recommend it. Communication was also very good! Thank you Ned and Mila!", "We had a great experience at Ned and Mila's place. It's spacious, beautifully decorated and in the the perfect location to explore Sofia.

There were little points that made the stay more great than perfect like missing spare toilet paper and a lose cover by the bath tub, but these can simply be fixed.

I definitely recommend staying here as it's a very cute, cozy and affordable option. ", "Cozy apartment, clean and well communicated.", "Great experience in Ned apartment. It is in a very well located área, around many shops and restaurants and you feel quite safe comparing to other Sofía áreas. The apartment is great for a couple, very lighting, spacious and comfortable livingroom. Our last day Ned has been super helpful keeping us the lugagge after our check out. We really appreciate such a nice, polite and helpful host. ", "This was a perfect apartment for our stay! It is lovely and cosy and has everything you need, including a well equipped kitchen, and a really nice space to spend time in when you have finished exploring. It is very close to lots of lovely bars and restaurants but still very quiet in the flat. Check in and out was very easy and smooth and Ned and Mila were great hosts - communication was great and questions answered immediately. Thank you for a great stay, we would highly recommend this place!  ", "The flat is just as amazing as expected by the pictures, it is very well decorated and perfectly clean and tidy. Its location is very central so very convenient. Ned and Mila were very friendly and quick to reply. Highly recommend!", "The flat was lovely and exactly what we were hoping for. Great location and Ned & Mila are very quick to respond to any queries.", "Ned and Mila's flat is really close to the centre of town, offering a small haven to travellers like us. It's super cosy but watch your head if you're taller than 6'! Ned and Mila were really helpful and responsive, giving us loads of information to make the most of our stay in Sofia. We had a great time here!", "This place is great! A very cosy and warm space to relax in central Sofia and a great base for exploring. Lovely modern and comfortable interior with lots of attention to detail. When we come back to Sofia we will stay here", "Mila was so friendly and helpful. We could get into contact very easily and she helped us when we have a question or needed something. The house is well designed and it was very comfortable to stay and relax. I am looking forward to visit Sophia and this house again soon. Highly recommended. You will not regret anything.", "We had a great time in the flat of Mila &  Ned. Everything was fine and it was just perfectly located in the city centre. Thanks for hosting us!!", "Everything just perfect. Keep it up!", "Lovely appartment, really cozy and amazing looking. The beds were a little bit small for two persons and the shower was without curtains. But those were the only two things that were less great, the rest was perfect.", "The apartment was very good, located near to the city centre and a pretty interior equipment.
I would book it again :)", "Ned & Mila's place is a fantastic home base for exploring Sofia. Central, cute, clean, and comfortable!", "Amazing apartment and Mila was really friendly and helpful throughout. Great location and really comfortable and cozy! Would really recommend this place!!", "Amazing house and perfect location", "Our stay at Ned and Mila's apartment has been wonderful. The place is really cosy, you'll feel immediately at home! All this small decorations and items about travels makes it really special :) It is also perfectly located, you will find all kinds of restaurants and places to eat or have a drink. We visited all the city center by walk!
On top of that, Ned and Mila are really disponible and reachable whenever you need it. I would definitely recommend you to stay at there place :)", "Communication with Mila is perfect and she is so helpful! There's even a cute little note left by them suggesting restaurants etc. The flat is on the top floor which means 5 flights of stairs but more the reason to have dessert! The flat is spacious but homely, I loved all the small details. It was also great having a bath. The location could not be any better. We walked everywhere but it's on a quiet side street. I highly recommend staying here, we hope to be back one day! ", "Very nice apartment in the middle of the city center. Very nice designed.", "Second time I've stayed here! Great apartment, great location. Host is very helpful and easy to communicate with. I will stay here again when I come to Sofia!", "We had a great time in this lovely flat! It is a very beautiful place, you can see and feel the love put into every detail and it was very clean and there's so much light! The area is great, you are right in the centre of Sofia. Mila was lovely, it was very easy to communicate with her, even if we did not meet her. She also provided some documents with  tips for tours, restaurants, places to see... we enjoyed staying here a lot!", "Ned&Mila's place is wonderful, not only for sleeping but also enjoying the day. It is full of design ideas, really lovely! The host is very helpful and responsive, we arrived late but could get in within 5mins. It is right in the center, everything is around and the area is very safe to walk even at night. Thank to the host, we got very cool tips for restaurants in the area.", "Such a nice and artistic apartment, highly recommended!! Hope they won't increase the price soon :))", "Ned and Mila were excellent hosts, very helpful and always there for any question. The flat was clean, modern and very beautiful. It is located directly in the city center with every thing you need just a few steps away and a wonderful view over the city. We enjoyed our stay and will definetely book this apartment again when coming so Sofia!", "Our stay in the appartment was great! We really enjoyed the spacious and nicely decorated place. The appartment is perfectly located in the centre. Also the contact with Mila was really good. ", "This apartment is so great that I hesitate to post a really good review because I'm afraid it will always be booked when I come to Sofia! Easy coordination with hosts, perfect location, comfortable bed and other furniture. Apartment gets plenty of sunlight. The walk up the five floors each time makes a great excuse for enjoying the amazing ice cream on Vitosha! I highly recommend this place.", "Stunning place with a fantastic location - literally 20 steps away from Vitoshka and still amazingly quiet! We loved staying there and will for sure use it again if ever in Sofia again! Wi-fi with great speed, TV with many channels, full size fridge, extremely nicely decorated, mixing old with new and keeping the charm of the old building! A true gem in the city centre!", "This is a great place you will long to visit again. I arrived to work for a week and I found the apartment a perfect getaway for both doing some concentrated creative work and discover the heart of Sofia. Love it. ", "Great location right in the city center. Lovely interior, we felt right at home. Fast an reliable internet, ideal for working from home. We liked it so much, we extended our stay by an additional week. We would definitely stay here again :)", "The apartment is great! It is located two steps away from a major pedestrian street with plenty of restaurants and coffee shops. The apartment has everything you may need, even a washing machine. Spacious, light, comfortable. Mila is a great host: during my stay, the A/C broke down and she responded to me within minutes and found a technician to fix everything. I returned back in the evening to a cool and airy place again to find also a bottle of very nice white wine. Felt really welcome! ", "Great place, great location! It is really clean and cosy. I definately recommend it :)", "Ned and Mila's apartment is a real gem! I wouldn't even know what to start with: location is amazing, just a few meters away the main pedestrian street in Sofia - Vitosha Boulevard, but still on an accessible road for cars - which made calling a cab really easy. Both Ned and Mila has been more than swift in replying so I felt I had 24/7 assistance during my stay. The space was recently renovated and they did a great job at it! you can see they put real passion into decorating the flat and making everything as convenient as possible for the guests. I would definitely recommend their place for your stay in Sofia!", "The apartment was in the perfect location and was exactly as described. Ned was an amazing host (unfortunately we didn't meet Mila) who gave us lots of helpful advice throughout the trip and was always quick to reply! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would recommend this listing to anyone who wants to stay in Sofia!!", "Mila and Ned's apartment was absolutely amazing - from the views of the Vitosha Mountains to the 200m walk to the Main Street it really does have everything you could ask for! It was homely and welcoming and we could have stayed for much, much longer. 

Mila and Ned were super helpful when it came to recommendations as to what to see, do and eat and we felt happy and confident to explore the city with all of the information they had provided! We couldn't recommend the Free Sofia Walking tour enough! 

We loved our experience in sunny Sofia and if you're looking for a beautiful apartment right in the centre then look no further! I hope to visit again soon :) ", "Волшебные апартаменты с тёплой атмосферой. Учитывая что я плохо сплю на новом месте, здесь все ночи напролёт крепко и без ночных пробуждений.
Стильно, особенно понравится тем кто увлекается фотографией.
Благодарю принимающую сторону за очень оперативные ответы и гостеприимство.
", "Appartamento meraviglioso. Ottima pulizia. Ubicato nella zona centrale della città.", "Immersa nel centro di Sofia, basta uscire di casa per avere ristoranti, negozi e monumenti da visitare a portata di mano.", "Un super séjour dans l'appartement de Ned: bien décoré, bien équipé, en plein centre ville. Nous nous sentions comme chez nous et reviendrions avec grand plaisir à Sofia dans ce logement!!!!!", "Apartamento muy cuidado. Perfecta ubicación a tan solo unos metros de la calle más animada de Sofia y desde donde se puede ir a cualquier sitio a pie", "Un piso muy bien situado, cómodo y acogedor. Ned es un anfitrión genial y Sofía una ciudad preciosa!", "Perfecto para visitar la ciudad, no cerca sino en el centro de la ciudad. A un paso de todo. Una maravilla poder descubrir la ciudad alojados en un sitio tan encantador.", "El piso es exactamente como se ve en las fotos, incluso más grande. Muy bonito y muy céntrico. Ned estuvo muy amable y pendiente de nosotros en todo momento, nos ayudó mucho al dejarnos guardar las maletas el último día. ", "Séjour parfait dans ce petit appartement cosy et parfaitement équipé. Ned et Mila sont adorables et très réactifs! Nous les remercions encore pour ce séjour qui ne pouvait pas se dérouler mieux...", "Buhardilla muy agradable y cómoda en pleno centro de Sofía. Limpio, acogedor, amplio y cómodo.", "Ottima soluzione per famiglie. Pur non avendo avuto contatti diretti con Mila, è stata molto puntuale nelle nostre richieste e ha rimediato alla grande al malfunzionamento del calorifero del bagno facendoci recapitare subito un radiatore elettrico. Perfetta la posizione centrale, moderno, caldo e funzionale l'appartamento; perfetta la rete wifi; Sofia si è inoltre rivelata una piacevole sorpresa; si vede che è una città con molto potenziale sia culturale che di accoglienza. Da consigliare assolutamente!", "Een heel aangenaam, gezellig ingericht,  appartement om tijdens een citytrip in te verblijven.  De inkom is ouderwets en verlichting in de ganse hal zou zeer welkom zijn, maar eens boven waan je je in je eigen paradijsje :-)", "Super mooi en knus appartement echt letterlijk in het centrum van Sofia. Als je de deur uitloopt sta je binnen 10 meter in de grote promenade die midden in het centrum ligt. Het appartement bevat alles wat je nodig hebt, prima keuken, leuke zithoek en badkamer. Het bed is aan de smalle kant maar was goed te doen. Wifi is uitstekend. Mila was altijd bereikbaar voor vragen en gaf erg snel leuke tips om te doen in de stad. Ook liggen er kaarten en wat foldertjes in het appartement. De gratis food tour is een aanrader! ", "Tutto perfetto...
L'appartamento è molto bello, confortevole e pulito. Si trova a due passi da bulevard vitosha e da ploshtad nezavisimost, quindi in pieno centro. Vicino vi è un supermercato aperto 24h su 24, tanti ristoranti e cafè, oltre molti negozi. 
Mila è stata gentile e disponibile: ha sempre risposto immediatamente ai messaggi. ", "Sehr schön dekoriertes Apartment! Sehr zentral und perfekt um Sofia zu erkunden! Würden jederzeit wieder kommen!", "Dit is een hele mooie en comfortabele ruimte. 2 personen is wel het maximum aantal om hier te verblijven. Heel centrale ligging. Gemakkelijk bereikbaar. Heel snel internet. Goede communicatie. Handdoeken, douchechel en shampoo zijn aanwezig. Ook een wasmachine. Alles wat je nodig zou kunnen hebben is aanwezig. Wij zouden hier zeker terugkomen, dit appartement heeft mede geholpen bij onze fantastische ervaring met Sofia. ", "Ottima Ubicazione, Condizioni Apprtamento perfette.
Ottima pulizia.
Tutto perfetto.
Unica pecca manca ascensore, ma per il prezzo oltre le aspettative.
"]
