reviews:
["I wish all Airbnb-ers are like the. Amazing apartment, great amenities, good location.", "Hands down, this apartment is one of the most perfect we've rented on Airbnb (and we have rented a lot). The pictures don't say everything about how good the place actually is.
It is perfectly clean on every single, most secret corner. It is warm, it is spacious and it is beautifully decorated. The WiFi is speed and stable. The location is bomb. 
Aleko and Zary are also very accommodating. Perfect address in Sofia.
Thank you so much!", "Everything was top! I recommend it!", "The apartment was just as described! Everything is walking distance and the apartment itself was very clean and comfortable. It is brand new and has all the amenities one could need for a stay. Zary and Aleko are super helpful and welcoming, amazing hosts. Don't hasitate to book if it's avaible!", "very nice place. clean. comfortable . all usefull thing included. thx.", "Amazing experience in Sofía thanks to them. The place is perfect and the location is great. Detailed and friendly attention. I totally recomend it. Next time in Sofía i will definetly come back to zary and aleko's place. Thank you very much guys, we felt really cared for.", "The apartment is located in a walking distance to all famous Sofias sightseeings. Zary and Aleko are great hosts! The apartment was clean and well equipped with everything we needed. It was our first stay in Sofia and the hosts provided us great tips what to see, where to go for dinner or breakfast etc. If you do not know the city, just ask them about recommendations for e.g. restaurants (breakfast tip from Zary and Aleko was really perfect, visiting a hidden restaurant in Sofia, which standard tourists cannot find as well). Our flight home was early in the morning and Zary & Aleko organised a taxi for us. The communication with them was really good and they responded very fast every time. Would definitely recommend!", "This was my second stay at Zary & Aleko‘s apartment and it won’t be my last. The place is beautiful, spotless clean, quiet and in a great central location. Around is everything you need - great restaurants, shops and sights. All in walking distance. It is also well connected to the metro and tram. Zary and Aleko are amazing hosts with great hospitality and always helpful if you have questions or need help!", "Spacious, immaculately clean, cozy and sunny apartment. It was better than expected...we had a very warm welcome upon arrival as well as detailed explanations about the apartment and area from Zary the host. The beds are extremely comfortable and the shower is wonderful. The apartment is on the 3rd floor in a typical Bulgarian apartment building; it is clean and in a good location (3 min walk to central mineral fountains/trolley lines, 5 minutes to Hallite, 6 minutes to the mosque, 8 minutes to Serdika main metro station). Would highly recommend!", "This is my first time to rent whole house in Airbnb, and it’s really a great memory! Z & A’s apartment locate 4f, near the downtown, but quiet . The rooms are wide, clean & bright, good environment, equipped kitchen, soft bed, high speed wifi, the most important is the friendly introduction from Aleko, she is so nice! And do us big favors when we arrived and before leave. I really can’t find any thing to complain, it’s almost perfect. This is the  first choice when visit Sofia city!", "10s across the board. Great location, beautiful, cosy apartment, quick response, very friendly and informative. I would highly recommend.", "This is the perfect appartement for walking into town and enjoy Sofia. Everything you need is nearby: supermarkt, restaurants, coffeeplaces etcetera. The appartement was spotlessly clean and has a nice feel and is practical. Everything is taken care of, including some little extras. It was the perfect stay for me and I would visit again!", "Everything was as described. The apartment is in the center of the city, just 5' by foot to the main pedestrian of Sofia. Cosy and stylish apartment which I will definitely book again when I will visit Sofia. Zary is the best host someone can have.  Thank you Zary for everything!", "Very good location, close to everything - mineral water source, the Hali (market for food, souvenirs), Lidl - big food store, the station of the transportation subway Metro. The apartment is cozy, extremely clean and very well maintained, full equipped kitchen, very spacious. The hosts were very professional and kind. We had a great time and will recommend it to everyone.", "We enjoyed our stay there. Location was great. It was on the 4th floor so if you have problems walking up stairs you may want to take that into consideration. The host was gracious enough to help with our luggage. Would definitely stay there again.", "This was the perfect base to explore Sofia! We only wish we stayed longer. The apartment is centrally located, the wifi is extra fast and the neighborhood is silent at night.", "A lovely apartment, and very walkable from the old centre of town. We were also comfortable walking to the train station so a great location.

Groceries a block away.
Good wifi.
Lots of nice touches like a welcome drink and local confectionary.
Very big and spacious apartment.
Well equipped kitchen with microwave.
Very clean.
A friendly, personal welcome, with map and info.
Does require climbing 3 flights of stairs.", "Great Flat, great Stay! We would definitely come back. ", "Large appartment in a quiet street, walking distance from the main things to see in Sofia.  Easy to communicate with Zary and Aleko, and everything went very well.", "Fantastic apartment, extremely well located a short walk from the centre. The apartment is really well equipped, impeccably clean and much larger than we expected! Zary met us for check in and she was very friendly, providing us with tips about the local area and thoughtfully providing a map showing good cafes, bars etc. We very much hope to stay again!", "Old super central building that looks like nothing much from the outside. Flat is absolutely gorgeous however! 3rd floor (in english terms!). 2 lovely balconies, lots of thoughtful touches and a really stylish space. Hosts super friendly. 100% recommend you stay here!", "Our stay at Zary's and Aleko's place was just perfect. The apartment is super fresh and nice and has EVERYTHING!! The apartment is perfectly located and we had an easy and super friendly conversation with both of them. These two are real superhosts and their local tips where just perfect! ", "Everything was as described and for me perfect! The apartment is spotless clean and in a very quiet but yet central neighborhood. Super easy to get anywhere: metro, tram, taxi ... and most places for sightseeing are within walking distance. The communication with Zary and Aleko was very fast and super friendly. Zary greeted me when I arrived and gave me a map and many tips for restaurants, shops, things to see. I loved the views from the two balconies ... very calming. ", "Great offering. Location is very close to most of the attractions. Very professional host. Would definitely  stay here again", "Quick and smooth communication with Zary and Aleko. No problem with check in during the night and even with latter check out. New, spacious, really nice and clean appartment. Good position - close to the center, main stop of metro station Sadrika and some really good pubs and restaurants.", "amazing spacious clean place with plenty of room in kitchen , 2 toilets  separate toilet and bathroom ..comfortable beds, nice and large living room. good location 7mins from Serdika metro", "Zary and Aleko’s place is exactly as described. Extremely clean, very close to all the fantastic sights in town, airy and light. Zary’s lightning speed responses and warmth are not things that one often comes by!

Everything of relevance from a tourist point of view is walking distance. There are some amazing places to eat (L’Etranger with the amazing Chef Olivier and Mitana) and drink ( Com.Bar located opposite the entrance with the fantastic Iliya at the bar). Shouldn’t be missed whilst in Sofia!", "Zary and Aleko's place was wonderful! They were very welcoming and accommodating and provided us with great tips about travelling around Sofia and Bulgaria. The location is fantastic. Overall, we had a very comfortable stay.", "The was the best place we have stayed in the past five months. It had everything you could need including toiletries, soap for the washing machine, dishwasher and condiments for cooking. It was huge with two balconies. It’s in a very quiet street but an easy walk to restaurants and you can walk to the Main Street of the city. We will definitely stay again if we go back to Sofia. This hosts were great.", "Great communication with hosts and very attentive and accommodating.", "Zary And Aleko’s place, you cannot find better !", "To start, the location of the apartment is fantastic! It is close to everything you need, the center, the supermarket, the Vitosha boulevard, information, and change. From some of the places it’s like 10-15  minutes walk, but that way we got to see the city which is beautiful, and we always ran into something unexpected and spacial. Also, in the streets surrounding the apartment there are a lot of nice restaurants. 
The apartment is absolutely beautiful! It’s very clean, convenient and well occupied. The Wifi was good!
The hospitality of Zary and Aleko was more than we expected. Their responses are very quick, and when we first came they welcomed us and explained to us everything about the city. In addition, the transportation from and back to the airport was easy and quick.
For summary, we highly recommend the apartment to anyone who comes to the beautiful Sofia, we had the greatest time!
", "This appartment gave us a "wow" effect!
Given pictures and description reflect reality. It's an Insider Tipp for all of you who would like to stay in the heart of the city. There is no car needed as all activities can ne done be walk. The host met us at midnight, gave us instructions around the flat and helped us around activities, locations etc. We always got answers on short term even via phone and Social media.", "Zary and Aleko are wonderful guests: very kind and helpful, they gave us very useful information during our stay. The communication was very quick. The apartment is perfect: cental location, close to supermarket and public trasportation and recently renovated.", "Zary and Aleko are very kind, willing to welcome and assist guests. Their apartment is close to the city centre and very convenient to explore Sofia. The apartment has everything you need, comfortable to stay and rest. Thanks to the map they gave us and also we could get tips from them, we enjoyed visiting several places such as nice cafe's, restaurants and shops which seem to be popular among local people. Once again thank you so much for your hospitality, Zary and Aleko!", "Thank you very much Zary and Aleko for your hospitality. The apartment is fabolous - spacious, stylish and very clean and the location is just about perfect. Hope to visit you soon.", "Had such a great time staying at Zary and Aleko's - Felt like a home away from home, especially the amount of effort they went to to show me some of their favourite local treasures. I hope to stay again next time I am in the city.", "Zary and Aleko has been one of the best host I have ever had, they were so helpful in all the situation we had.
They picked up in the night, when we arrive, and they gave us also maps and recommendations of the city.
The apartment matches perfectly the description and photos of it.", "The best air bnb experience ever ❤

Zary was supernice: she came to pick us up because we didn't succeed in finding the way to the flat, she gave us a catchy map of the city and explained everything we needed to know about the apt and about Sophia.

The apt is next to the city centre, it's very beautiful, modern and clean. It has got all the things you might need on holiday.

We'll be grateful for this experience forever (:", "The apartment is very nice and comfortable. Very big and new. Close to all the main attractions and Serdika metro station which connects the entire city. The host are very nice and always available. I suggest this location 100%", "We ended up unable to visit Zary and Aleko's place, but we kept the reservation since we felt bad cancelling on such a short notice. They were both understanding of our decision and I certainly hope to visit them on an upcoming trip to Sofia.", "Nice, spacious and clean apartment in an ideal location. Thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would visit again!", "Zary and Aleka were great hosts who were very helpful and quick to respond. If you rent/bring a car, be aware of the parking regulations in Sofia, as we saw many cars with a clamp, and so were very careful ourselves to park in a correct way.

The apartment is close to many tourist sites and easily reachable by public transport. There is also a large supermarket nearby, as well as restaurants/snackbars. The apartment is situated in a typical local neighborhood, while the apartment itself is very spacious, modern and comfortable, with everything you will need.

We were glad with our choice and would definitely recommend this accommodation and hosts! We are sure you will enjoy your visit to Sofia as much as we did!", "We loved your’s place, it was nice, cosy and clean, good location..
Better then pictures..
Very proffesional, recommend to all..", "The hospitality and the hosts were very good. Answer always in e-mails and it's quite friendly. The location of the House is a little strange.", "Thanks for all, helpful information earlier check in and quick answers about any doubt that I had. I will go back :)", "My friend Karl and I stayed at this place for 5 nights and it was just what we required. Aleko met us late in the evening after our flight, and since we were hungry, first took us to get some food before checking in. There was cider in the fridge and sweets on the table! The place was clean and in an excellent location just a 10 min walk from Serdika metro. Also nearby are Lidl and a 24hr convenience store. Zary and Aleko communicated very well and I would stay here again if I return to Sofia.", "Zary is very kind and his house is clean, confortable", "All you see in photo is real. Central position, best host", "Nice and comfortable apartment, very close to the city centre; you can find supermarkets, apothecary and restaurants nearby.  Zary and Aleko are very kind and helpful, they suggested us places to visit and they even reserved us a table in a restaurant for New Year's Eve. It was a wonderful stay!", "Z&A are really nice people, they offered all the help needed and responded super quick in every questions we had! The apartment is super beautiful, clean and comfortable in every way! The apartment is within 10-15 min walking distance to literally everything! But there are shops and restaurants in closer range as well:) Metro station is really close too and that helped us alot.  Highly recommended! We had a lovely stay! Thanks Z&A!!", "The apartment is perfect for visiting Sofia. It's very close to the city center and to the most important attractions, it is easy to get around on foot and you can easily get to the airport by metro.
Zary and Aleko are very hospitable and available for every information", "Well located apartment, near the city center. Well decorated, with all the comodities you need. The hosts where easy to comunicate and very welcoming. Highly recommendable.", "We really enjoyed our stay at Zary’s apartment. She welcomed us at her apartment and answered al our questions. When we had some question she aswered really fast by phone! We will really recommend Zary’s apartment to everyone! The location is maybe the best in whole Sofia.", "Amazing hosts, great location, felt superB! :)", "Really lovely space in a great location that is ridiculously central. The apartment itself is really clean and pretty and if anything, the pictures don't show you quite how big the place is.", "Wonderful stay! Aleko and Zary were wonderful. Came and got us from the airport and made sure we were settled in!!

Wonderful big flat and throughly enjoyed Sofia!!!

Thank you!!", "It was a realy nice Stay in Zary and Aleko's Place!!! Every thing was better than fine! The Room's are amazing and realy clean! Zary gave us a good explanation of the lokal shops and Bars... Even we get an authentic Map of the Center. Everything is real top Center, it couldn't be better!!!", "This house is lovely and absolutely huge. Great location. Flat wasn't ready until 5pm ish which was quite late but otherwise all good!", "Zary and Aleko have been very supportive since we made the booking. Communication was very quick. They let us check in earlier as we had a morning flight. As well as they agreed to keep our suitcases after check out time so we can still enjoy the city. We have been welcome by a friend of them, Isi, a very friendly person who showed us the flat. Flat is spotless and very comfortable with all you need for self catering or just enjoy your morning coffee on one of the balconies. Sofa bed and bed is very comfortable with a firm mattress, which we loved. Everything is walk distance if you are a lover of walking you can get to main sightseeings in 15-25 min. Or just have a walk and explore the city centre in few hours. They've been so kind to offer us a lift to airport at our departure, we chose the subway, very comfortable and quick as well, we had plenty of time till our flight. 
We had a great stay at Zary and Aleko's flat.", "Nice spacious comfortable place in between two subway stations...serdika and....something with lovov. Take a good look which subway you take since it goes around in a circle. Apartment need and clean. Shower is good, only the water goes away slowly but that wasnt a problem for us. It is normal i think for older buildings. Lady market very near by, nice for fruits. We would come back here when we are in sofia again. Also visit plovdiv!", "It was a pleasure to stay at that apartment, it was really cosy and the hosts were very kind. I would definitely stay again next time. I recommend that property.", "Super new great apartment  in the centre of Sofia, everything in distance suitable for walks.(which we enjoyed a lot!) Zary and Aleko are great hosts, super friendly and flexible. We had a delay of our flight with 1 day and they took really great care and hosted us the next day. In the apartment there is everything that you may need for your stay. We felt like home :) 
Thank you  Zary and Aleko for everything! We would love to come back  again. :)", "Loved our stay at Zary and Aleko's place! They were great hosts, very informative and quick with communicating / providing recommendations. Great location, apartment exceeded expectations!", "The flat is amazing. It is a cosy apartment very near to the downtown. It is perfect to walk around as you have practically everything near the flat. 
Everything in the flat is new and you can really feel like at home. 

Zary and Aleko are awesome people, very comunicative and they will help you in everything. We check in earlier than allowed and they took us from the bust station and took our luggage.
They are a really nice hosts!. In addition they have a superb list of recommendation around the neighborhood (nice places, all of them).

Definitely, next time in Sofia we will book them again if it is possible!

Thanks for everything.", "Very unkomplikated communikation and check in. The flat was like the discription. Thanks for our stay in your flat...", "The apartment has everything! We felt like home. Everything is clean and nice and really comfortable. The location is great  close by walking distance to everything and in a quiet erea. Zary and Aleko was wonderfol.  Very kind and helpful and made sure are stay will be perfect.", "Aleko and Zary are one of the amazing hosts. The communication was great, and Aleko went all the way to provide tips how to get to the apartment. The apartment is centrally located and easy to walk around. The apartment was brand new and nicely decorated and very clean. The host was very accommodating with check in and check out, which was a bonus. Also they provided with welcome beers, those were really tasty. It was a 5 star experience for sure! looking forward to come back!", "Nice, spacious apartment. Very good location. Helpful hosts.", "Lovely, modern apartment in quite a central location. It has everything you could need for a short or long stay. Zary was lovely, willing to go the extra mile and help us with absolutely anything we needed. Would 100% recommend!", "Ce logement est tout simplement parfait! Il est grand, moderne, bien divisé et tout équipé! À quelques coins de rues du centre touristique de Sofia, il est à la fois assez près de tout pour se déplacer à pied uniquement et à la fois assez loin pour ne pas être incommodé par les bruits de la ville. Je le recommande vivement à tous!", "Die Unterkunft ist genau wie auf den Bildern. Schick und modern eingerichtet und ein super modernes Badezimmer. Die Lage ist grandios mitten im Stadtzentrum mit Anbindung in alle Richtungen (Tram und Metro). Die Kommunikation mit Zary und Aleko verlief einwandfrei, sie haben uns sehr schnell genatwortet, haben uns jede Frage beantwortet und uns hilfreiche Tipps für Sofia mitgegeben. Alles in allem ein perfekter Aufenthalt :) Vielen Dank an Zary und Aleko :))", "-schöne und zentrale Unterkunft in Sofia
-nette Gastgeber
-sehr gute Kommunikation", "Un endroit parfait au cœur de la capitale Bulgare !!! Une hospitalité exceptionnelle, Z&A sont de formidables hôtes !!! Je recommande expressément ", "Началось наше прибывание приятной встречей с Зари, мы приехали раньше времени заезда, но Зари и Алеко пошли нам на встречу. Зари порекомендовала куда сходить и что посмотреть. Квартира идеально чистая, со стильным дизайном, находится вблизи основных достопримечательностей. Проживанием остались очень довольны.", "Zary y Aleko son muy majos. El piso es precioso, muy moderno, ducha europea, televisión y cocina perfectamente equipada. No sé si aparece en la descripción, lo único es un tercer piso sin ascensor. Muy luminoso y agradable. Ellos son muy atentos y están cerca para lo que necesites, te puedes comunicar con ellos en inglés sin problemas, cualquier duda, consejos... lo que sea!", "L'appartamento è in una posizione comoda al punto di raggiunge tutto a piedi. Molto pulito e inoltre i proprietari sono cordialissimi. 
È stato un piacevole soggiorno.", "El apartamento esta impecable.Todo nuevo y muy limpio. Zary fue muy amable .Nos dio un mapa y nos explicó como manejarnos. La contra es que el edificio está en malas condiciones y es un 4 piso por escaleras. ", "RECENSIONE IN ITALIANO 

Consiglio vivamente quest' appartamento a tutte le coppie in cerca di una vacanza tranquilla, a pochi passi dal centro. La casa è perfetta, come nelle foto, praticamente nuova, probabilmente da poco ristrutturata ed arredata. 
L'accoglienza da parte degli host Zary ed Aleko è stata praticamente impeccabile, cordiali e disponibili a qualunque consiglio sia su posti da visitare, sia sui locali da provare. Ci hanno accolto con tre piccoli omaggi, due birre tipiche del posto, delle caramelline tipiche bulgare ed una mappa dettagliata di tutte le attrazioni turistiche e culinarie della zona. La casa è "no shoes inside", quindi bisogna camminare in crocs o in ciabatte. La posizione è, come già accennato, in una zona molto tranquilla e soprattutto a pochissimi passi dal centro della città (circa 10 minuti a piedi) , dove in effetti sono racchiusi un po tutti i posti da visitare; noi, fatta eccezione per la chiesa di Boyana (a circa 8km dal centro) abbiamo girato Sofia praticamente a piedi. Inoltre a 100 metri dall'abitazione c'è un LIDL dove potete acquistare praticamente qualunque cosa. Insomma noi siamo rimasti soddisfattissimi per tutto, lo consiglio vivamente a tutti. 5 stelle meritatissime, complimenti e grazie ancora a Zary ed Aleko, da Paco e Amelia

RECENSIONE IN INGLESE

I highly recommend this apartment to all couples looking for a quiet holiday, just few steps from the center of the city. The house is perfect, as in pictures, practically new, probably recently restored and furnished.
The welcome from the hosts Zary and Aleko was perfect. They was friendly and helpful to suggest us places to visit, local, restaurant ecc...
They greeted us with three welcome gifts, two local beers, typical Bulgarian caramels, and a detailed map of all the tourist and culinary attractions in the area. The house is "no shoes inside" so you have to walk in crocs or slippers. The location is situated, as mentioned above, in a very quiet area and especially just a few steps from the city center (about 10 minutes walk), where in fact are enclosed a bit all the places to visit; we, except for the Boyana's Church (about 8km from the center) visited Sofia practically on foot. Besides, at 100 meters from the house, there is a LIDL (supermarket) where you can buy anything you need. In the end, we are very satisfied about everything, I would highly recommend this house to everyone. 5 star deserved, congratulations and thanks again to Zary and Aleko by Paco and Amelia"]

reviews:
["Viktor was very easygoing and helpful host. The accomodation was clean, perfect for two and in a good quiet location close to the center.", "Anna is very quick to answer and adapt our needs. The place worth the price.", "Anna's studio apartment is clean modern and very comfortable. The shower is brilliant. No shortage of hot water. there is a bus around the corner (no 72) which will take  you into the centre and a few minutes walk will take you to more buses and trams. The locality is quiet, attractive with local shops bars and restaurants.  I was here for a month and thoroughly enjoyed the apartment and the opportunities it gave me to explore Sofia.", "The place is very nice and cosy and has evrything that you might need. Check in and communication were excellent. 
Parking is free and safe on the street, but might be hard to find a spot.", "Nice little place, near the centre and excellent service", "Great place and great value! Though it is a studio it is very large and spacious. Great for a couple or solo traveler. Lots of cooking equipment that we took advantage of to prepare some of our own meals. About a 30-40 minute walk to the city centre which made for a really nice walk. This place has everything you need and Anna was a very friendly and responsive host. Thank you! ", "Anna and Viktor are great everithig was as described, and the place is exactly the same as in the pictures. We will always recomand this place ", "a very clean and stylish place, the location was nice and Anna was really helpful. would recommend!", "Anna's place is nice and cosy.
Even if she wasn't there to welcome us because of personnal reasons, her parents welcomed us and Anna left us a note with all the informations we needed about the flat and the city.", "My boyfriend and I enjoyed our stay at Anna’s and our time in Sofia. The apartment is on a quiet road and you’ll find the apartment is stylish, clean and comfortable. We recommend the free walking tour and we found a lovely restaurant on Oborishte St - Pavillion 37. If you’re okay with walking 30mins to the centre then this is a great place to stay.", "The host canceled this reservation 25 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.", "Well organized, friendly gesture, clean, I recommend it. 5 stars ", "Anna was lovely and a great host, big shopping centre with everything you need in walking distance, definitely recommend!", "I stayed for about three weeks in Anna's apartment.  Check-in was a breeze and I immediately felt at home.  Anna provided me with a tourist map of Sofia and showed me where to find all the best places to visit, eat, drink, and relax.  Her apartment is clean, the shower has good pressure and hot water, and the kitchen is well-equipped.  It's in a nice residential area and is a lovely walk into the city center and all of the parks, restaurants, bars, and attractions there.  There are also restaurants nearby that are good as well as grocery stores if you prefer to cook at home.  Anna was an excellent host--if I had a question about something, she responded within minutes of me sending a message through Air BnB.  I would definitely recommend staying at Anna's.  It's a great home base when visiting Sofia.", "The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.", "Anna and Viktor's place is located in a residential area at a reasonable distance from the centre. Very good price - quality relation. Anna is very nice and helpful.  The apartment is newly renovated and very clean", "Lovely little place in very nice quiet neighborhood with lot of trees in the streets. Easy to walk to most places. Anna is great to deal with. Friendly and accommodating. Would stay there again.", "We had a very nice stay at Anna and Viktor's place, they spent a lot of time to gave us recommandation. I recommend their place if you stay in Sofia :) ", "Everything great!", "Great location, great studio, lovely warm welcoming from Anna, she really took the time to give me tips and this made me feeling at home the entire time. 3 days were not long enough to try all her precious recommendations but I will definitely come back soon or later. 100% satisfied ", "This place is very central. We walked to all the Sofia main attractions from this place", "Thank you for your super lovely flat near the centre ( 15min walking) and your recommendations!
We really fell in love with the candles'bar :)
If we come back to Sofia, we'll come back here!", "Really beautiful and clean apartment. Anna was super nice and helpful, we enjoyed staying there a lot although it's not that close to the center ;) took us about 25 to 30 min by foot. But its a super nice neighbourhood!", "The studio is perfect ,exactly like the photos.
It is placed in a very safe and quite neighbour with easy access to the center and a mall nearby.
I chose this place cause i wanted to be close to Universiada Hall and it's 12-15 minutes walking.
Anna was very helpfull and sweet but i was too tired to listen carefully what she suggested when i arrived !
My bad ! ;)
The studio has coffee machine ,tea,water,stuff which you have to pay for ,if you stay in a hotel.

Thank you Anna.

P.s.
Take the "Free Sofia Tour" you'll enjoy it !", "Great spacious and clean apartment. Anna was lovely and so helpful. Checking in was easy. Anna recommended great restaurants and bars around the area and was helpful in calling us a taxi to the airport.", "Really nice and modern apartment, well-equipped, clean and cozy, with comfortable sofa bed in a quiet neighborhood. The air conditioner is a big bonus in the warmest days. Anna and Viktor are very friendly hosts, the communication was fine, we didn't met, but everything went perfect. Thank you!", "The flat was beautiful, very spacious and had everything we needed. Buses are close by which makes it easy to get into the centre. Anna went out of her way to help us and was extremely kind, friendly and accommodating!", "The studio was very clean and modern and perfect for our stay in Sofia. It had everything you could possibly need.
It was only a short and nice walk away from the city centre.
Anna was such a nice host. We tried nearly all the restaurants she suggested and they were amazing, both in terms of quality and costs. She also provided us with a map of the city centre which was really useful to us.
I would definetly recommend this studio to any couple planning on visiting Sofia.", "Cozy nest in a quiet neighborhood
A leisurely walk to city center with elegant cafes along the way.", "Very clean and nice apartment! Not far away from the city centre and several supermarkets nearby. Anna and Viktor were super friendly and helpful with everything! We had a great time and can only recommend this apartment and Anna and Viktor as hosts :)", "Anna and Victor's house is exactly the same as the pictures. It's very clean and cozy. There is a nice restaurant nearby the house, and a shopping center around the house. Anna and Victor are very helpful and punctuality, I had good communication with them. Highly recommended ", "Super clean little flat in a quiet, residential area just outside the city center. Convenient to groceries and shopping. Charming hosts with lots of great recommendations: my girlfriend and I went to three restaurants on their note and all three were fantastic. ", "Really nice place, Anna was super helpfull, generous and very kind! When we arrived there were clean sheets, chocolats and even Raki for us. Not to far from the city-center!  We enjoyed the place so much that we added one more night to our reservation! Thanks you Anna :) ", "We had a great trip to Sofia and loved making this little flat our home for the week. Lots of kitchen accessories and overall just a great space for a couple. Thank you Anna and Viktor!", "Anna was an amazing host! Showing me around her beautiful apartment! She went the extra mile to give me advice and recommendations around town! Really appreciate her efforts and her kindness :) 
Her apartment is also definitely valuable because it's new and spacious ! Go for it and you won't regret your choice! :)", "Из плюсов: 
1. Студия в партере, не нужно никуда подниматься. 
2. Недалёко от центра
3. Рядом есть два неплохих ресторана, но они работают до 22:30.
4. Хозяйка быстро отвечает на сообщения.
5. Было очень приятно, что мы смогли выехать позже 12.00.

Из минусов:
1. Бесплатной парковки нет. Теоретически можно оставлять машину рядом с домом, но там все время занято. Практически приходится ездить кругами по соседним улицам и искать место. Потом пешком возвращаться домой.
2. Студия прокурена. И диван и подушки. Мы не курим, нам было некомфортно. 
3. Диван раскладывается. Одна половинка жесткая, другая мягкая. Не очень удобно спать. 
4. Одеяло и пододеяльник в одном экземпляре. Подушки правда две.
5. Нет электрического чайника, это очень странно.
6. Есть пакеты для мусора, но нет мусорного ведра.", "Petit studio propre et bien équipé. 
Situé à plus au moins 30min du centre ville.
Seul bémol : insonorisation. Cependant, le quartier est calme et cela ne pose problème que le matin (crèche à côté du studio).", "공항과 가깝지만 걸어서 시내 중심에 가기엔 멀어요. 그렇지만 정말 깨끗했고 정말 넓고 호스트와 의사소통도 원활했습니다!", "Anna è un'ospite impeccabile, gentile e attenta.
L'appartamento è spazioso, ben organizzato ed arredato con gusto. Il divano letto è ampio e comodo.
La zona è molto tranquilla, si può parcheggiare davanti all'ingresso, e la passeggiata verso il centro è gradevole.

Assolutamente consigliato.
"]
topics: ['easygoing viktor helpful', 'place worth price', 'quiet local shop', 'parking spot hard', 'nice near place', 'spacious studio though', 'place recomand always', 'recommend would really', 'anna place nice', 'stay time anna’s', 'posting automated reservation', 'recommend organized well', 'need shopping host', 'home sofia find', 'host day reservation', 'reasonable located residential', 'place street tree', 'stay place recommend', 'everything great', 'definitely come later', 'place central sofia', 'walking super centre', 'really clean beautiful', 'cause close wanted', 'great spacious clean', 'fine everything host', 'kind help extremely', 'need could everything', 'quiet walk neighborhood', 'apartment viktor anna', 'house around restaurant', 'three girlfriend host', 'raki sheet clean', 'great week sofia', 'apartment around definitely', 'но рядом есть', 'bémol insonorisation seul', '정말 넓고 의사소통도', 'e è unospite']

reviews:
["Great!", "Amazing place! Location is the best! Everything is exactly how it is on the pictures! Definitely will use it again!", "nice plays to stay", "I great place, near metro station. I recommend it.", "Good location, stylish and modern apartment.", "Very modern appartment with everything needed! Good location also", "Lovely apartment would definitely go back if I was going to Sophia again", "This apartment was very clean and spacious, perfect for our group of 2. Check-in was easy as the host’s friend was there upon arrival to check us in. Location wasn’t bad also as it was about a 15 min walk straight into the city center, with plenty of cafes and food stops along the way. 

The major downside unfortunately although not the host’s fault was the surrounding noise. In the building we were in there was someone doing construction work downstairs and was woken up every morning to extremely iterating power tools. The tools were being run all day also so we really couldn’t spend time in the apartment from 8:30am to the late afternoon everyday.", "A lovely apartment. Well decorated and equipped. The main bedroom is huge. The shower/toilet is a pretty small - for me it didn't matter too much. Well located. 5 - 8 minutes of a walk from a metro station (Lavov Most), 10 - 15 minutes from a main street (Dondukov) and ~25 minutes by foot from the city centre (Serdika). The area is quiet. Everything was tidy and clean.", "Perfect appartment...little scary the neigbourhood..not people at streets after 22.00...not far away from metro station.", "The flat is really economical, centric and well situated. Everything was very clean.
The owners were truly attentive.
At summary, I would recommend the flat to any group of 4 thinking in spending some days in Sofia. No doubts about that", "Kamelia and Vasil’s place is absolutely beautiful, comfortable and extremely neat. Communication was amazing, and they were so accommodating. I highly recommend this place, it’s stylish, comfortable, safe, and has a parking space! Thank you!!", "I like the beatiful and modern interior of this Apt. the area of the Apt. is quite old and a bit dark. They provided us a parking lot and there’s no lift but it jsut on 3rd floors.  If you have a heavy luggage than concering it. 
We enjoyed much but the second nigjt there wasn’t hot water running. The host sent us a guy who solved the problem but it was 1:30am. We’re very tired. But it took a time and only one person took a shower and next  morning the other two of us expected to take shower but again no hot water. Due to checking out time and our trip schedules we had to leave the Apt. without shower.  It wasn’t happy with the probelm. Although the host tried to help us but i guess the system of their Apt. isn’t going smoothly.  I hope they may find out a better solution for next guest. ", "Clean, big flat. Possible to use privat parking for free. The location is good for ones, who loves explore the city walking (about 30 mins to main walking street). After a long walking day it was a pleasure to find that TV has a lot of channels with movies in English. I would recommend this flat)", "A great, stylish apartment. The place was clean, comfortable and had everything we needed for a great stay in Sofia. Very close to the central bus station, metro and about 10-15 min walk from city centre area. Would highly recommend it!", "Nice and Good place for take rest and visit to Sofia! ", "Excellent location for easy access to Sofia with only a 15 minute walk into town. Communication with the hosts was also excellent. The apartment was spotlessly clean with air conditioning in the main bedroom. Spacious bedrooms and comfortable beds resulted in a pleasant visit. ", "What an amazing place! The front view of the building does not show what hidden gem of an Airbnb is inside. The streets surrounding the apartment can be quite dark by night, but the apartment was clean, modern and spacious. It is very close to both the metro station (5 min walk), boulevard (10-15 min walk) and the central train station (15 min walk). We really enjoyed our stay here and would definitely recommend it! ", "Clean, comfortable apartment. I recommended it. ", "A great, clean and beautiful apartment. A modern place with nice details. Easy check-in.", "Chic is the right word for it. It was nice.", "Nice and clean apartment - location from the city centre is at least 30 mins walk not 15 mins as advertised. 
I think it's a downside that the hosts our different people so it often changes to who is available to help check in and they don't always know about the apartment or about parking. 
Otherwise comfy night sleep with all the amenities and air conditioning. 
Good value for money, just need to sharpen up on the hosts! ", "I was ok in the appartament, it was clean and quiet.", "Third time a guest in this apartment, really a great place!", "Large apartment in fair part of the city. Fine, once you got into the apartment.", "Great place, everything as described, I was actually surprised with how much I liked the appartment. Highly recommended!", "Nice and clean home. Alex was very kind and helpful. I enjoyed the stay with my small family.  I strongly recommend this home", "Very good apartment. Definitely recommend, very clean and close to most of the tourist places. We enjoyed very much. Would love to come again. Thanks again!", "good", "Great flat, very clean and contemporary. Small bathroom but this seems to be standard for Bulgaria. The location is an easy 15min walk to the centre of town and parking with the apartment is off street which is perfect.  Host was really helpful and met us promptly at the agreed time.

General note on parking in Sofia: we found parking in town very difficult the next day would not recommend trying to park for the day in central Sofia!  ", "Great location and really good mattress to sleep on. Overall neat and tidy place.", "The outside looks a little sketchy but once you open the door the apartment is awesome! We throughly enjoyed our stay and they were very accommodating when our group size increased. They allowed us early checkin and were friendly and helpful. Great suggestions for food. Skaptoburger was one recommended and we went back several tines. The beds were super comfortable and the home was very clean. Loved the espresso machine used it about 3 times daily! Great location and parking is easy in the provided lot or on the street. Overall a great experience and great place, will definitely stay here again next time I’m in Sofia!", "Its a nice cosy space, clean. Very comfortable and well located, about 15 mins walk to city centre.", "Beautiful apartment. Fantastic host. We would definitely stay again.", "We were very happy with the appartment. Everything worked out and we would book it again in the future", "Great apartment, spotlessly clean, very comfortable bed and very quite location but close to city center. I will for sure be back. It was ideal for my business trip to Sofia.", "Great time in the place would definitely recommend!", "Great apartment, cozy and very good position.", "The", "The apartment was really nice. Our stay was really good because of our good accommodation.", "We had a great stay in Kamelia and Vasil's newly renovated apartment. It was everything we ever hoped for and more: stylish, bright and spotlessly clean. Communication ran smoothly, and they were helpful in all aspects. Highly recommended.", "We had a wonderful stay at the flat! It was perfect for us with a small baby. Thanks!", "Thanks!", "Very nice place, modern and clean with comfy beds. Absolutely good value for money. The friend who stepped in to receive us was very nice and communication went smoothly. It feels like a hotel apt rather than a place where people actually live. There is no living room (this is turned into the master bedroom) but there is a table in the kitchen to sit together. There is no separate toilet and the shower is open (no door/curtain) so things get quite wet when showering. Neighbourhood is nothing special but the center is in walking distance (20min). The bedrooms are on the street side so if you like to keep a window open at night it may get a bit noisy for the light sleeper.", "Perfect", "Kamelia and Vasil's apartment was great. We really enjoyed our stay! The apartment was super clean, tidy and close by to everything we needed. Everything was within a short 15 walk. We throughly enjoyed our time here thank you so much!", "Very good option!", "Kamelia and Vasil’s apartment is exactly as soon. It was a perfect size for a group of 3, and give us the choice to cook if needed. There were a number of small touches that made the stay great, like shampoo. The beds were comfy!

Location was good, could walk into the city centre or a short walk to the metro.", "This place was in a good location and I was able to walk to all the historical sites, restaurants and shops. An added bonus was to wake up and make a nice cup of coffee.", "The appartment is renovated and completely new. All ammenities werr there. I enjoyed my stay. Thnks", "A fully-equiped, shortly renovated and very well clean apartment in a walking distance to the city centre of Sofia. Supermarkets and restaurants are all in a walking distance, as well as a Metro station. It was very comfortable and easy check-in procedure. We recommend the place highly.", "Great apartment for its location (10mn from the central bus station, 20-30 from the center by walk) and its style, fully renovated. Really nice place to stay in Sofia. I recommend it !", "The tastefully decorated and clean apartment of Kamelia and Vassil has everything you need for a stay in Sofia. It is located in a quiet building and neighbourhood, a 20' walk from the city centre. Ivo gave us a warm welcome.", "Such a lovely apartment! Within walking distance to bars and restaurants. The air con was a great addition in such a hot time of the year! Very helpful hosts, accommodating our very late check in and arranging for us to be picked up from the airport! ", "We were in Sofia in July 2017.
Very nice appartment, 15 min walking to city center.
3 beds, space for 4.
Quite area, 3rd floor.", "A great place!", "Nice apartment, very clean and cozy. Super easy check-in, quick responses to questions. The location is good, walkable distance to city centre or there's also metro close by. Would like to stay there again!", "We had a really nice stay at the apartment of Kamelia and Vasil. The apartment was really clean and well equipped. No complaints at all. Very friendly people as well.", "We had a very pleasant stay at Kamelia and Vasil's apartment. Very easy to get to public transport and walkable to downtown. Clean and tidy. ", "The building is nothing fancy on the outside, but the apartment is very updated and clean. It's a relatively quick walk (20 min) to the center of town and walkable to convenience stores, grocery and restaurants. Warning to families with small children.., the shower is a part of the bathroom, so it can be very slippery when wet. There is also a grumpy next door neighbor who complains about noise, and threatens to call the police even when it wasn't you. The walls are very thin. ", "Great appartent for 4 people sharing. 10 minute walk to the city centre and easy access. 

The apartment was very clean, really spacious bedrooms and great value for money! ", "A brand new apartment in a leafy small street a bit out of the Centre. Very comfortable bed and nice design. I did not use the private parking spot but it can be a big convenience. The communication was prompt and excellent. And I would always like to receive such amounts of positive energy from people like here at check in :-)", "It was great! The apartment is very clean and with all the facilities that you need for your stay in the city. Very recommended!", "Everything was as expected. Kamelia and Vasil's house was very clean, nice and has everything you need to feel comfortable during your visit to Sofia. Really recommend it. They also let us to pick up the luggage a little bit late. Big thanks for that. ", "Comfortable and spacious appartment in the centre of Sofia. Even it is located in the centre it is very quiet at night if you wanna stay at home. Ideal place for a short weekend trip or even a longer stay. Highly recommended!", "Easy communication and a great flat. Clean and spacious. Monica (who showed us the flat on behalf of Kamelia and Vasil) was super helpful, recommended us some really great places for food and drinks :) 
An overall very pleaseant stay! Thank you so much again.", "Great location. Clean and tidy. Excellent hosts. Great value overall", "Very nice!", "The apartment was really clean and pretty, good located (about 7 min walking to the centre) and everything was perfect. I highly recommend them and this apartment! ", "The apartment is really nice, it is well furnished and super clean. It has all the amenities you need, even for a long stay. The hospitality has been excellent as well as the person who welcomed us that gave us a lot of helpful informations. Super recommended!", "My staying was great! the flat is spotless and very well equipped, location is great, just a short walk to the metro station, the host was very nice and helpful! i really recommend to stay here!!!", "", "Super Wohnung, stilvoll und durchdacht eingerichtet. Total sauber. Alles vorhanden für einen Städtetrip.
Perfekte zentrale Lage- vieles kann zu Fuß erreicht werden. Alle öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln auch.
Nicht erschrecken, wenn man das Haus sieht und das Treppenhaus betritt-
beim Betreten derWohnung wird man belohnt- außerdem gibts einen Parkplatzes im Hinterhof für ein Auto, was man in Sofia nicht braucht.
Wir kommen garantiert wieder nach Sofia und dann wieder in dieseWohnung.
Eva und Hanne aus Hamburg", "우선 개인이 하는 공간이 아니라 회사가 몇십개를 운영하는 곳 중에 하나이다
차는 주차 가능하지만 주차장에서 대로로 나와 다시 건물 3층까지 짐을 옮겨야 하는 것은 고역이었다
방은 두 개 이지만 소파가 없고 부엌 사이즈는 괜찮았지만 욕실은 비좁고 샤워하기 불편했다 그리고 세탁기는 탈수가 전혀 안되서 사용할 수 없었다
그외 타운은 도보로 15-20 정도 가능했다", "Отличная квартира. Чисто, уютно. Недалеко от центра. Есть огороженная парковка во дворе.
Рекомендую!", "Un très grand appartement, très moderne et parfaitement confortable et propre. Très bien situé dans Sofia. A recommander en priorité. Excellent rapport qualité-prix.", "깨끗하고 인테리어가 아주 좋았습니다 :) 
호스트는 친절한데 확실한 설명이 붓족했곳 연락잇 잘 됫진않았는듯..", "Die Wohung ist sauber ung zweckmäßig eingerichtet. Allerdings ist die Straße sehr verkehrsreich, hierdurch ist die Wohung selbst bei geschlossenen Fenstern in beiden Schlafzimmern sehr laut. ", "Wir waren zum 2. mal in der Wohnung, da alles super Top ist. Siehe meine 1. Bewertung von 01.06.2018.", "Als wir angekommen sind, haben wir erstmal gedacht, oh je, wo sind wir denn hier. Aber die Überraschung war umso größer als wir dann in der Wohnung standen. Echt top. Die Wohnung ist super modern und gemütlich eingerichtet. Und super sauber. In der Küche findet man alles vor, was notwendig ist. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt und mit gutem Gewissen kann ich die Wohnung weiter empfehlen. Es war richtig schön, fast wie zu Hause.", "Het appartement ligt in een zijstraatje van een grote weg.Ter orientatie het zwembad ligt er vlak achter. van buiten lijkt het slecht onderhouden eenmaal binnen is het een grote positieve verrassing.Veel ruimte, schoon, hartelijke ontvangstkortom alles wat je verlangt. Bovendien dicht bijj het centrum gelegen. Alles was op loopafstand te bereiken.
Wij bevelen dit appartement van harte aan.", "Хорошая, чистая квартира", "Appartement très confortable (très bonne literie), calme, conforme au photo, propre. Situé dans un quartier calme, à 5 minutes du métro ou 15-20 minutes à pied du boulevard Vitosha (sorte d'avenue des Champs-Élysées, mais en mieux) et des bâtiments remarquables (musées, cathédrale Nevski...). Proche d'épiceries ou boulangeries et du marché des femmes. Possibilité de se garer dans le parking de l'immeuble.
Seul petit bémol : la douche. Pas de bac, pas de rideau de douche, la salle de bain est donc inondée à chaque fois, mais il y a du matériel très pratique pour "essorer". C'est juste un coup de main à prendre... Surtout ne pas s'arrêter sur ce détail pour louer l'appartement. D'un point de vue rapport qualité/prix, il est parfait! 
Merci à Rosen pour sa patience et pour nous avoir accueilli si gentiment malgré nos retards répétés.", "Το σπίτι ήταν πάρα πολύ ωραίο! Ηλιόλουστο με μεγάλα παράθυρα, καθαρό και λειτουργικό. Το ίντερνετ ok, η κουζίνα εξοπλισμένη. Η γειτονιά επίσης ήταν πολύ κοντά στο κέντρο, ήσυχη κι ακίνδυνη. Δεν χρησιμοποιήσαμε καθόλου μετρό, όλα βρίσκονταν σε κοντινή απόσταση με τα πόδια.", "Dan respuesta casi de inmediato, casa acogedora y a 17 minutos andando del centro. En definitiva, Lo recomiendo.", "도심에서 멀지 않고 조용한 곳이어서 좋았습니다.
식기류도 잘 구비되어 있고 깨끗합니다.

Dort war sehr gut mit der Familie zu bleiben. 
Alles gibt es zu kochen. 
Wir waren da 5 Tage geblieben, es war bequem und angenehm.", "Отличная квартира, хороший район, единственный минус - волосы в ванной", "Casa muy limpia y tal cual se ve en la fotos. Los dueños tienen una buena comunicación y el centro está a 15 minutos andando. Ademas tienen parking en la parte trasera, lo que nos ayudó mucho y ofrece seguridad de que el coche no sufriría ningún percance. 

Perfectamente recomendable.", "Sehr zu empfehlen. *T*O*P*", "Emplacement proche de la cathédrale et d un restaurant traditionnel Bulgare excellent! Le lieu est très calme, propre et parfait pour un séjour de plusieurs jours. Les hôtes ont été également très réactifs et n ont pas hésité à nous conseiller des endroits sympa autour. Je recommande vivement cette adresse ", "We hebben genoten van het appartement, zeker een aanrader!", "Zeer netjes en ruim appartement op een goede lokatie nabij centrum. Perfect voor zowel stellen als kleine gezinnen (4 slaapplaatsen in totaal en 2 slaapkamers). De verhuurders zelf hebben we niet ontmoet, maar de communicatie was uitstekend en we werden opgevangen door een vriend van hen. De wijk zelf is niet bijzonder, maar het centrum is vlakbij en biedt genoeg restaurants, winkels, cultuur etc.", "Apartament situat en un barri en vies de transformació. Interessant el contrast d una finca antiga, trista i un apartament absolutament modern.
Tenir aparcament assegurat és un valor afegit si aneu amb cotxe.", "L'appartement de Kamelia et Vasil est vraiment conforme aux photos : propre, spacieux, moderne et tout équipé. Nos hôtes n'avaient rien laissé au hasard, de la place de parking jusqu'au guide touristique. L'appartement est situé dans un quartier calme à 15 minutes à pied du centre historique et dispose de tous les commerces à proximité. C'est l'un des meilleurs Airbnb dans lequel nous avons séjourné. Vivement recommandé ! 

Kamelia and Vasil's apartment is really the same as on the pictures : clean, large, modern and well furnished. Our hosts did think about everything, from the parking spot to the touristic guide. The apartment is located at a 15 minutes walk from the historic part of Sofia and has all the facilities in the nearby. Definitely one of the best airbnb we have stayed in around the world. We recommend !", "Notre séjour s'est très bien passé. Tout était conforme à nos attentes. L'appartement a été rénové très récemment et est très propre / fonctionnel / joliment décoré. On s'est tout de suite senti comme à la maison.
L'emplacement est également très bon, à 5 minutes à pied de la station de métro, et à une vingtaine de minute du centre.
Nous recommandons vivement cette location.", "Un appartement magnifique.", "Nous avons séjourné une semaine dans cet appartement. Nous sommes tres satisfaits - il est beau refait a neuf facile a vivre. Peut être un deuxième petit climatiseur serai une bonne idée car pendant les jours caniculaires nous avions chaud pour dormir et celui qui est installé dans la grande chambre ne peut pas tempérer la chambre la plus éloignée.
Bravo et merci pour cette belle découverte.", "La recepción muy amable, están atentos a cualquier tema, la localización está centrada y el piso es moderno y estaba impoluto, mejor que muchos hoteles, no echas nada de menos realmente, recomendado.", "Ottima sistemazione appartenenti nuovo vicino al centro con tutto a disposizione nella casa ", "Die Wohnung liegt im zweiten Stock und ist wirklich liebevoll und nett eingerichtet. Das große Schlafzimmer hat einen großen Schreibtisch und einen hübschen Blick auf die Straße - geweckt wird man, wenn man die Vorhänge nicht zuzieht, von der Sonne. Toll ist die Klima-Anlage, mit der man den Raum mal kurz abkühlen kann. Die Küche ist mit allen möglichen Basics ausgestattet und bildet eine wirklich gute Basis, falls man sich dort selbst versorgen möchte. Das zweite Zimmer habe ich gar nicht richtig betreten, es gab aber keine Klagen; also wird auch prima gewesen sein.", "소피아에서 2박 머물렀던 숙소에요. 인테리어도 이쁘고 청결했어요. 키친시설도 잘갖추어져 있어 식사해먹기 편리했어요. ", "Très bel appartement situé dans un quartier très calme à 10 minutes de l'hyper-centre (à pied).
Appartement très propre.
À sélectionner les yeux fermés!", "Cet appartement est un bijou. Idéalement situé, proche du métro et du centre-ville, il est également très calme. 
L'appartement a été refait récemment, il est très confortable et accueillant, décoré avec beaucoup de goût et aussi très bien équipé même pour une famille avec enfants. Nous y avons passé un magnifique séjour et y reviendrons avec plaisir à l'occasion. 
La communication avec les propriétaires a été facile et ils se sont montrés très disponibles pour toutes mes questions. 
Hautement recommandé ! ", "Sehr schönes und gut ausgestattetes Appartement. Sehr sauber und modern. Die Einrichtung ist neu und das Appartment frisch renoviert. Die Kommunikation hat einwandfrei funktioniert. Wir wurden vom Flughafen abgeholt und direkt zum Appartement gebracht. Das war sehr komfortabel. 
Einziger Kritikpunkt hier, ist die kleine Dusche. Beim Duschen wird alles Nass. 
Das Gebäude ist sehr alt.  Das Treppenhaus ungepflegt. Auf den ersten Blick etwas abschreckend, aber dafür war das Appartement super. Die Eingangstür ist sehr Massiv und sicher. Unser Aufenthalt war sehr schön. Ich kann eine Buchung bedenkenlos empfehlen.", "Очень хорошая квартира, полностью "Икеевская". Просите хозяев прогревать квартиру перед своим приездом. Мы отогревали ее 2 дня. В целом-отличная квартира."]
