reviews:
["Thumbs up for Ivo's place, everything was excellent! We strongly recommend it! Thank you again, Ivo,  we'll come back!", "Perfect stay at Ivo's place! Everything was as described. Thank you for your hospitality, Ivo!", "It was a comfortable and very clean place to stay with amazing view of the mountain and a beautiful park. Very good location for the city - close to the center and the parks around. The host is polite and leaves you to yourself. Cute cat and a mini tomato garden on the terrace - a really warm home. Thank you Yvo!", "Yvo is a nice hoster, very welcoming and interesting. The room is confortable and clean. In the center of Sofia.  I recommend.", "The apartment has a very stylish and modern decoration as well as a large and comfortable room. We each got 3 towels each, shampoo, soap, and had full access to whatever amenities we needed in the apartment. The hosts are very nice and pay attention to detail. We felt absolutely comfortable in their home and, given the chance to return to Sofia, we would 100% book again this airbnb. 10/10 place to stay", "Yvo was very hospitable from the very first response to our check in were he needed to guide us to the apartment. The location of the apartment was close to the center where we were able to walk to all the places you need to see even for a short stay like ours. He had a lot of suggestions and provided us with a map. His Co host Gergana was very kind and helpful with lots of suggestions as well and help us with a reservation we wanted in a restaurant. All an all we enjoyed this trip a lot and we certainly recommend staying in Yvo's place. Thanks again Yvo and Gergana for an excellent stay! 
", "Great place and excellent hospitality. Even carried the suitcase up the stairs. Introduced some nice places to eat which we went and was good. Would recommend.", "Nice couple and dog. House is always clean.", "Ivo and Gergana were super nice hosts that made us feel very welcome and gave great tips. The neighbourhood is also very beautiful and we would recommend this accomodation.", "The apartment is in a great location - we just went everywhere on foot! The flat is really nice and clean, the bedroom pretty large, definitely comfortable for two! 
We did not really meet the hosts or just very briefly but they were very easy to reach per message. 
In the whole I definitely recommend Ivo's and Gery's apartment :) thanks for hosting us!", "Ivo and Gery are cool and friendly people, it was a pleasure staying at their place. The location is perfect, the apartment is very stylish and most importantly the bed is super comfy! I can absoletely recommend staying there! ;)", "There is this wonderful view from your window and from the balcony!
A warm welcoming (quiet) place to be.
Just great!", "Ivo's top floor flat is in a great location, overlooking a lovely park popular with families and groups of friends and also with Mt Vitosha in the background. There were plenty of places to eat nearby and we got to the flat easily in about 25 mins from the main bus station using metro and tram - both so efficient & cheap in Sofia. It was very restful having breakfast on the balcony off the living room, surrounded by tomato and basil plants. Ivo was very accommodating about us dropping our rucksacks off early.", "Top accommodation in the center of Sofia.", "The apartment is in a great location, just minutes walking from the center of Sofia and also right next to a great restaurant. The room itself is very big and spacious and all toiletries were provided but unfortunately, we couldn’t really shower due to extremely low water pressure. They are working on getting this fixed so I am sure it wont be an issue in the future. We would definitely stay here again!", "The apartment was great! Placed in the city center (5/8 minutes by walking from Sofia s central University). Ivo was really fast with the answers and very kind when he welcomed me! Prise/quality rate is perfect. If icome to Sofia again I ll definitely come back at Ivo s apartment!", "Excellent hosts. So friendly and helpful. Cool place. Everything you need. Highly recommended.", "Nice little apartment, old, but well kept. Great thing is that the room got an insect net in the window frame, so you get new air coming in with no mosquitoes. View is great too.", "Ivo and his girlfriend were outstanding hosts! From the minute we entered they helped us with any questions we had about Sofia and gave us a lot of recommendations on where to go. If their was anything we needed they tried to help accommodate. Ivo even went out and got a fan because we were not able to handle the heat. 

The place itself is very clean and located close to all the attractions of Sophia. A big plus is the bed. Super comfy! 

On our last night my mate and I ran into some hiccups and Ivo and his girlfriend made sure we were well taken care of, arrived safely and helped us all in between. They Would not leave us until everything was handled. Zuly and I are very greatful. 

I would recommend this place to anyone and plan on stopping by once I’m back in Sofia! 

Thank you guys! ", "I really enjoy my stay. The hosts are super nice and always there to help. The room is clean and has a lot of space. Highly recommend! ", "Ivo and Gergana's apartment is so pretty and cosy! Not only will the hosts make you feel at home, but you can walk to the centre in ten minutes and the room is clean, comfortable and beautiful. This is what all air bnbs should be like! ", "Was just great. Apartments are wery close to Zaimov  park, there's a subway near that and it pretty close to the center. Really beautiful flat with super nice balcony. Ivo was really friendly and helped us a lot. Very good time at his nice place.", "Amazing place to rest after walking the view is great and its really relaxing. Everything is clean and me and my girlfriend slept very good ( bed is great )", "It’s like staying in an underlease with the best roomates you could wish for, spectacularly helpful, and let’s not forget about the second cutest dog ever(of course mine is the first :D)", "Highly recommend place to stay in the center of Sofia. Amazing host and hospitality. Enjoyed a lot ! Plus, Amazing view of the park. 
Thank you!", "Ivo is a great and interesting host with many local tips up his sleeve. Very calm area and excellent location. 5/5", "Ivo and his wife are great hosts, very friendly and helpful. Their dog Luigi is the sweetest (but won't bother you at all if you don't want to!). The apartment is really nice, on a good, central location and next to a park. Communication was flawless. We stayed here at the beginning of our Bulgaria trip and came back at the end. We would definitely stay here again!", "Ivo's flat is lovely, plenty of space and it's very clean. Great location and Ivo was very helpful with giving us tips on places to eat and things like that! The view from the balcony is beautiful and we loved Luigi (the dog). Only wish that we could have stayed longer!", "Yvo is a super host for a reason. He’s got a great place & location, punctual in his time and clear in communication before arrival. 

Yvo and his girlfriend are quite hospitable, treated me to salad & rakia drinks with fun conversations. Yvo offered his washing machine and detergent — badly needed! 

Highly recommended place, if you’re okay with four-level staircase (good exercise!)", "Great location and very helpful for local tips. The balcony was what made Ivo's place stand out for us and it was certainly what we had hope for, a great way to start each day we were there. Thank you", "We really loved our stay at Ivo's. The place is very central and next to a park. Ivo arranged to meet us at the hour of our arrival and made room for our car. He and his partner are very nice people. He gave us information about the neighbourhood.
The apartment was very clean. When we went to bed, he put down the volume of the tv so we did not hear any noise. The bed is good and you can make the room as dark as you want to get a good night rest. In the morning we had breakfast at the recently renewed terrace with a view at the city and the mountains. We definitly recommend this place and would like to go back!", "Ivo and his girlfriend were wonderful hosts! The place was very nice and clean, and the view from the Park was lovely. When I return to Sofia I would definitely look to stay here again.", "Ivo's place honestly felt like a home. Even though I arrived late on a weekday, Ivo was available to greet me and make sure I was comfortable. He gave clear and precise directions, prices, info on how to get to his apartment from the airport (which was also useful b/c I would have probably gotten ripped off, if he hadn't).

Every morning he would give me tips based on where I wanted to go or what I wanted to do. It was nice not feeling like so much of a random guest in someone's home, but rather like a friend. Also, even though I went out very late on the weekend, I didn't feel like a nuisance. 
 
The bed is super comfortable; perhaps the nicest bed I have slept in across all my Airbnb stays. The view from the room and balcony is perfect (it overlooks the park, and you can also see Vitosha mountain). The window in the room is screened and I kept it open for my whole stay, as the early summer breeze was so fresh and crisp. They keep the living room window/balcony door open too, which is nice because then the whole house feels open to the park & mountain! 

Ivo offered me a set of towels, house slippers, & bottled water upon my arrival (which was very convenient). The kitchen was well stocked with a selection of fine teas and coffee that I was allowed to indulge in. He also let me try some Bulgarian meats and olives that he was enjoying for himself. 

Jeez, what else! Besides being a great host, Ivo is a wonderful and interesting person. So kind, real and whole-hearted. If I come back to Sofia, I know where I am staying!", "Ivo was a great host. He gave us nice tips on what to do in Sofia and Plovdiv. The house is located in front of a very nice park and has nice restaurants near by. Also, is only 5 min walking distance to one of the most popular landmark: Alexander Nevsky cathedral.
If you are planning on coming to Sofia, we highly recommend you to stay in Ivo’s place!", "Very friendly guy on à perfect location if you don't mind walking stairs to the fifth floor.", "Ivos place is everything that is written and more, because Ivo is realy hospitable, he helped us get to know Sofia and helped us with getting aroung Bulgaria. He even has a garden on the balcony. Him and his girlfriend, and Luigi made us feel at home. Thank you!", "Thank you very much for having hosted me for some days. I spent good times with Ivo and Geri in the city center of Sofia. They are very kind and very helpful. It was a pleasure to rent the room because it was very clean and with a beautiful view of the park but especially it was a pleasure to met you.", "It was a pleasure staying and getting to know Ivo, Geri and their small dog Luisi! They were both so helpful with any questions we had and made us feel at home. The room was clean with everything that we could have needed, perfect location, lovely view. Thank you for the great airbnb experience!", "Ivo's place was very nice. It has a fantastic view of the park and very convenient to get to the city center. As for Ivo, he is such an amazing host. So helpful and willing to answer any questions you might have about Sofia. He made me feel very welcome and save me from a potential disaster of not having a place to stay on my first night in Sofia. The place has everything you need and that little bit extra because of the generosity and attentiveness of the host.", "We had a really great time staying at Yvo's place! Our late check-in time was no problem at all. There was everything one could wish for and everything was clean and spacious, not to forget the great view from the balcony. 
Adding to that, we spend some very nice evenings with Yvo and his girlfriend Geri, who helped with any questions we had and who where really nice and hospitable people to get to know.
Thank you for the lovely time, we would definitely stay here again!", "Ivo has a very nice and homey place. We felt at home during our stay and he also gave us good tips and a very useful map. Ivo’s House is conveniently located in a quiet place, and only 15-20 minutes walk to the center of the city . Ivo has a very cute and friendly dog as well :)", "Yvo's place is exactly like as in the pictures, and even better: the room and the whole house are super nice, cozy and quiet, only a few minutes walking from the very center of Sofia. And the view on the park and on Vitosha mountain is beautiful.
Yvo and his girlfriend are really nice and warm people. I've had very good communication with Yvo, who was really helpful in arranging my check-in and available for anything I might need.
Everything was perfect, I would definitely come back here.", "Ivo's place was a great find! The bed was super comfortable, the kitchen was well-stocked, and Ivo and his girlfriend made the extra effort to get to know us and make sure we were comfortable. We felt welcome in their home and we are so glad that we decided to stay here! ", "Great host!", "I had a brilliant time at Ivo's apartment which lies in a quiet and compelling area in Central Sofia. Everything as described. The guest room is spacey, clean and the matress is very comfortable. Also, a metro station lies within walkable distance (10 minutes) and the transport from or to the airport costs less than 1 Euro.
Ivo is an experienced host, a wonderful conversationalist and fluent in English and French due to his international biography.
Thank you again for having hosted me and good luck!", "Ivo was a great host! The communication was extremely prompt and he even helped us check in during the later hours of the night. The flat is well accessible and clean and we had fun talking to him and Geri. It's a good place for a short stay at Sofia!", "איבו וגרי מאחרים נהדרים! היו נחמדים ונעימים, נתנו עצות ועזרו בכל מה שיכלו. הדירה נקייה מיוחדת ונעימה. נקייה, מצויידת היטב וממוקמת נהדר!", "Everithing was good!", "Yvo was a fantastic host, he came to meet us when we got lost... Gave us a tour of the apartment which is very nice and clean. He has the comfiest bed we found in all of Bulgaria!! He also speaks better English than most English people. We were made to feel very welcome and he couldn't do enough for us. 
I would highly recommend anyone staying Sofia to stay with Yvo.", "Yvo and his girlfriend are very nice people and they help us for everything we needed! The house is near the centre of the city and in front of it there is a big park. Really recommended!", "Everything was perfect, a wonderful host with a beautiful and cosy apartment. We felt very welcome and  at home with Yvo and his amazing girlfriend. The apartment is very clean with very tasteful interior, very beautiful!  
Perfectly located near a nice park and all good spots in Sofia. Do not hesitate to book this lovely place! We are looking forward to come back and are very happy and grateful for the nice experience.", "The location is great because its at walkable distance to center of the city. The flat is very cozy and clean with a very nice and friendly host.", "The check-in time was super flexible and communicating with Yvo was easy and uncomplicated. We enjoyed the stay and loved the comfi bed. Thank you and all the best!", "I had a great stay at Yvo's apartment! The room was clean and bright, in a calm neighborhood, but still in the city center, the bed was one of the most comfortable I had ever slept on, the flat was charming and Yvo's host was a lovely person, I felt completely at home!", "We stayed three nights at Yvo's place and really enjoyed our stay. We reached Sofia late but it was no problem for Yvo to accommodate us that late. He gave us really good recommendations for our stay! I enjoyed my tea in the mornings on the balcony with a view of Vitosha mountain!", "Yvo's place is amazing, warm, cozy and home-like. it's a room inside his aparment, with great view to the vitosha mountain. Yvo has great balcony, well equipped kitchen, Tv and some arrogant cat :). Yvo itself very talktive, smart and interesting person. He helped us a lot to get our way through Sofia and its attractoins.
Thanks, Ivo!", "We had a great time in Sofia staying at Yvo's place. He is very nice and interesting guy busy doing many interesting things. The apartment is close to the center, 10-15 mins walk. Thanks Yvo!", "The appartement is very well located. 
The arrival was perfect and Yvo give you all the good tips to visit Sofia! 
The balcony will give a wonderful view of Alexandre-Nevski cathedral! 
For the pet lovers a sweet cat lives there too! 
*De plus l'hôte parle français, ce qui est un petit plus pour les francophones !", "Very good place and very good host!!!!!!!!!!
The only problem: the room is a little warm in this torrid summer. 
On the other hand, the flat is in the 4th floor, keep that in mind if you're not fit!", "We had a great stay here, easy to walk right to all the landmarks, restaurants and bars nearby. Yvo was very friendly and helpful, he left us a map and a couple of leaflets too. Would recommend a stay here! ", "Nice apartment, nice location. Recommended!", "Yvo is really nice and welcoming. We had a great stay!
To find a free parking spot in Sofia is almost impossible. Yvo has a good tip for it but the free parking spot is not always available.
The apartment is close to a lovely park, in a quiet street and near the center of the city.", "Great location, near to market, park, and all the sites, and public trans", "Yvo was kind and welcoming, we felt at home staying here.  Our stay was lovely - I really liked the location, with the balcony + little vegetable patch/garden overlooking the park. The flat is central within easy walking distance of parks with lots of summer events on - music, dancing. It is close to lots of bars and restaurants that are on the cartoon map of Sofia ( which you will find in many cafes etc). ", "Excellent stay... Central location, beautiful view over trees in park (building entrance is right on edge of park), very quiet, comfy mattress and 2 reading lights and desk & chair, great shower, nice cat, and best of all, terrific host- very easy to chat to. And by the way, stay with Yvo, and you're helping (indirectly) to support the movement for Bulgaria to get a freer media & and a more transparent and just political system (you can find it all out when you get there ...  but only if you're interested, of course).", "This apartment was in the perfect location! The host was very nice and told me all about some tours and provided coffee, towels and obviously the room! The balcony is all you need to relax and enjoy Sofia! ", "Yvo's an incredible man.  If you want to learn more about Bulgaria's misgovernment than anyone else could teach you, stay here and talk to him--in English, French or Russian or all three. Hopefully Yvo becomes Bulgaria's prime minister in 2030.  I've yet to meet a more worldly host--and I speak six languages and have lived in four countries.", "Yvo was a very good host. Communication with him was very good. The apartment is very nice, bright and in front of a beautiful park. It is also next to the center.

The room was very nice and the bed very comfortable.

Definitely 100% recommendable.", "Great apartment, with a great center location, cute nice cat (who goes mental during the night, but that was fun to hear as well :D) and really great host, who missed a bit of concert just to check us in. Really worth it. ", "Had a great time at Yvo's place! It's centrally located and has the softest bed ever! Yvo is a great guy and willing to help you with anything! Highly recommended", "yvo was a fantastic host. lovely clean apartment in great location. Would definitely recommend staying here if you are in sofia.", "Book this place if it is available!!!
Yvo was the most wonderful Airbnb host we have stayed because of his extreme devotion to social issues. We both admire him greatly.
I booked this place primarily because of its location and the cat.  The location and apartment were great, but the cat is sadly not as friendly as Yvo.
We cooked in his kitchen (grocery store one minute away) and ate at restaurants also v close to his place.
Public transportation in Sofia is fantastic, and it is just a few minutes walk to Alexander Nevsky Cathedral from Yvo's apartment.
", "Although we had a bit of a challenge finding the apartment (mostly due to an inexperienced cab driver), Yvo was extremely patient and accommodating with our flexible arrival time as a delayed train resulted in us arriving very late. 

The apartment is quite nice and cozy, and the bed is wonderfully comfortable. The location is perfectly central and so if you like walking about, book here!", "Super !
Merci", "The flat was really lovely (great view!) the bed was comfortable and the location is very good. Yvo was really helpful - would stay again!", "Everything went well with Yvo, from initial communication to him sending SMS's to ensure that we wouldn't get our car clamped. The room was perfectly adequate for our very brief 1 night stay, including a kitchen for us to prepare dinner and its location overlooking a park. The walk into town was a comfortable 10-20 mins depending on where you're heading. We would recommend Yvo's place. ", "I had very good time in the Yvo and his girlfriend's apartment. They are very kind and attentive hosts. The view is really amazing and the room and the flat are quite and confortable. The neighborhood is well furnished and well communicated. The cat is  a must! :)", "I had a great time at Yvo's. They were both very welcoming and the flat was as conveniently situated and comfortably furnished as advertised. I only stayed for one night, but I would have preferred to stay with them for another few! ", "One of my best stay with Airbnb, this one at Yvo's in Sofia. 
So in confirming all previous guests good appreciations I add my own. Thanks Yvo.", "Although we stayed only one night, before our return, we had the pleasure to spend it at Yvo's place.
Along with clean room and warm shower, we were welcomed with friendly and lively conversation.
Great location, in the center of Sofia and near a lovely park!", "We had a wonderful time in Sofia and really enjoyed staying in Yvo's apartment. The location is perfect, with a view of the park and lots of cafes nearby. Yvo and Gergana were very nice and helpful hosts.  We also enjoyed his cat. ", "I stayed at Yvo's place with a friend and it was one of our best AirBnb experiences ever. The apartment is big and very clean. It has an amazing view on a park and the Vitosha mountain. The location is very good, it's very close to the city center (5 min walk) and the neighbourhood is quiet and very pleasant at the same time (many nice isolated restaurants/cafés around and in the park next to the apartment). Yvo and his girlfriend are also incredible hosts. They showed us many places in Sofia that as random tourists we would have never seen, and we were able to share many interesting conversations with them. I recommend their place without any reservation whatsoever to anyone interested in discovering this great city that Sofia is and meeting nice and interesting people.", "THanks Yvo for the room and the nice conversation. We enjoyed it very much. We arrived well in Istanbul and had a great time. 

All the best for you
Sandra ", "Very nice days in Sofia thanks to Yvo and his flat. The place is cool and quiet just in front of a park. Yvo was a very friendly guest, who speaks Bulgarian, French and English. going out with him was perfect to meet the "real" bulgarians and chill out with them in Sofia's parks ", "Hi, I had a good overnight stay at the flat. Yvo was very helpful sending messages and information so I could find it. His girlfriend was there and let me in. She was very friendly  and helpful. The room was a good size and clean, bright and airy. The shower worked. There's a good sized living room. There's a big park nearby with some nice open air cafés. It was a great place for my short stay and priced very fairly. ", "A great place with very nice people; I warmly recommend :)", "This place is great! Very comfortable bed and lovely apartment. The hosts are very friendly and interesting people. We would return here if we are in Sofia again! ", "Yvo was incredibly hospitable and made sure everything was in good order during my stay. The room is by far the most quiet one I have stayed in throughout my extensive stay in Sofia. It has an amazing view over mount Vitosha and the park. I felt so comfortable that I extended my stay in which Yvo was very flexible. His cat quickly became my friend, will miss its company. Would gladly stay here again!", "The flat is located in a nice and very central  area of Sofia 10 to 15 mins walking from  the main shopping area.  We had a chance  to talk a bit with  Yvo which is a very  interesting  and polite  person. If you have a heavy luggage beware that there is no lift in the building.", "Nice place. Helpful host. Cute cat!", "Thank you Yvo for the pleasant stay I had at your place and in Sofia.
The apartment is cozy, tidy and clean, I couldn't have hoped for a better place or a better people to stay with.

", "Yvo is a great host and we've had really good time to meet him and his girlfriend! The room is nice and has exactly what you want to have as a guest! There is a great view of Mount Vitosha and the nearby park. It's about 15 minutes walk from the center, through the beautiful cathedral. 
The only thing is that you need to climb to the 4th floor to get there...", "The description of the place proved perfectly appropriate: close to the city center, park view, pleasant cfés and restaurants around. And so did the room: clean, spacious, nice, a large and cosy bed. Everything works well, bathroom as well als kitchen. Yvo was nice, welcoming, helpful, friendly, in no way intrusive. He speaks good English and perfect French. I could not imagine a better place to stay in Sofia. (It was not a problem for me, yet could be one for the elderly or disabled: It's 80 steps to the 4th floor.)", "We spent a good moment in yvo's place! The room and the view is as shown in the pictures and the apartment is in the center of Sofia which gave us the opportunity to discover freely the city!", "One felt very much at home in Yvos Apartment. Nice host, nice view, nice place. This is just how AirBNB should work. Thanx!", "Overseeing the Zaimov Park, the place is centrally located, for example you can walk to the Nevsky Church in 5-10 mins. The room and apartment is clean and quiet. And Yvo is a cool guy speaking fluent English and French, he'd tell you about Sofia and Bulgaria.", "Ivo and Gergana are amazing hosts, the apartament is perfect and has everything we need, they are incredible hosts I recomend they totally", "Meeting Yvo and staying at his beautiful flat in the centre of Sofia was a brilliant experience, and goes to show exactly why I would prefer to stay in an Airbnb flat than a hotel. Yvo promptly and thoroughly answered a bunch of questions I had beforehand about my arrival in Sofia. At his house upon arrival, he offered me a cold beer and we had a great discussion about current events in Bulgaria. The next day, I needed to run some errands before leaving town, and he was very helpful in showing me how to get around town. 

In short, this was my favorite Airbnb experience (both as a host and a guest), meeting someone as kind and smart and interesting as Yvo and staying at a clean, nice flat with a lovely balcony garden and view of the park across the quite street. 

Thanks Yvo, come visit Barcelona someday!", "We spent only one night in Sofia and Yvo's apartment was definitely what we were looking for. In front of a great park with a great view and only 5 minutes (walk) away from the center. Yvo & his girlfriend are great people but unfortunately we had only a small talk in the morning before we left. Great location, really friendly, 100% suggested. Thank you Yvo", "I very much enjoyed my stay with Yvo. The apt was centrally located and convenient to most major attractions.  Yvo gave great ideas on what to see and was a great host. I especially enjoyed our talks and his insight into historical and current Bulgaria. He is a great example how Airbnb can enhance your travel experience.", "My daughter Shira and I stayed at Yvo's flat for 2 nights. The place is very central and convenient to explore Sofia. The flat was clean, quiet and cozy. We felt most welcome and received all the guidance we needed for our local trip.
Thank you very much!  ", "Yvo og hans sambor var plikttrogne  og hjelpsomme . Leiligheten var som beskrivet sentralt i Sofia men veldig rolig ved Zaimov parken.
Rent og romsligt .Problemfritt.", "Le logement d'Ivo est très bien et très bien situé. Il est conforme aux photos.
Ce que j'ai apprécié par dessus tout est la sympathie d'Ivo et la gentillesse de Gueri", "Un logement bien situé près du centre ville et des commerces entourés d’un parc et accessible en métro depuis l’aéroport. Il y a tout ce qu’il faut dans l’appartement et nous profitons d’une terrasse agréable. Je recommande. Le propriétaire est réactif. ", "Hôte charmant et attentionné, des conseils ultra pertinents et un appartement confortable, bien décoré, calme et donnant sur un parc, avec un balcon fleuri. Le top !", "Un hôte parfait et un logement super !
Je recommande !", "Een heerlijke kamer in een erg leuk ingericht appartement op een mooie plek aan het park in de stad, rustig vanwege het ontbreken van verkeer voor de deur. Lekker bed! 
Maar vooral: een voortreffelijke gastheer. We zijn maar kort gebleven helaas, maar Ivo heeft ons enorm geholpen toen we aankwamen en de auto eigenlijk niet op de juiste plek stond en hij zich zorgen maakte dat er parkeerwacht zou komen die een wielklem zou zetten. Dat is dus niet gebeurd, dank je wel, Ivo!
 Verder is hij een enthousiast urban gardener, de planten op zijn balkon krijgen net zo veel aandacht als zijn gasten: ze worden gewoon verwend. 
Leuke tip van hem: het restaurant iets verderop, dat helaas op deze feestdag vol was, maar er erg leuk uitzag. 
We moesten al om 4:30 op om naar het vliegveld te gaan, en om ons te helpen had hij zelfs zijn wekker gezet. Top gastheer!", "De todos los viajes que he hecho y de todos los Airbnd en los que me he hospedado, sin duda el de Ivo es de los mejores por no decir el mejor. Situado literalmente al lado de la catedral AlexanderNevsky, este centrico apartamento te da la opotunidad de visitar la ciudad sin necesidad de coger el transporte publico. 

La disponibilidad de Ivo ha sido total, siendo totalmente flexible tanto con la hora de llegada como con la de salida almondandose siempre a nuestras necesidades. 

Si vuelvo a Sofia, quedarme con Ivo sera sin duda mi primera y unica opcion que considere.

Muchisimas gracias por todo Ivo!!!", "Yvo ist ein toller Gastgeber, der uns viele aktuelle Informationen über die Stadt Sofia geben konnte. Wir haben uns oft und gut unterhalten. Sogar ein wenig Bulgarisch könnten wir dabei lernen. (War sehr lustig) Mit Hund und Katze kann man super auskommen. Das Zimmer ist sehr ruhig und man kann sich hier sehr gut zurückziehen.  Auch der toll bepflanzte Balkon zum Park ist eine Bereicherung. Von der Wohnung aus kann man alles gut zu Fuß erkunden, aber auch Bus, Tram, Metro und Taxi sind in unmittelbarer Nähe. Empfehlenswert ist die in der gleichen Straße gelegene Bar "Raketa", die bei den Einheimischen offensichtlich sehr beliebt ist.
Wir wünschen allen einen tollen Aufenthalt in Sofia - wir fanden es super!", "La chambre est agréable et propre. L'accueil était bon et le quartier à la fois central et calme. C'était parfait!", "J'ai trouvé l'appartement de Ivo très central , magnifiquement situé à coté d'un parc , lumineux , bien équipé , accueillant . Mais ce qui en fait , à mes yeux , le charme essentiel c'est la personnalité de Ivo et Gergana.Est -il nécessaire d'en écrire davantage ?", "Eenvoudige kamer in het appartement van een superleuk koppel.
Zeer leuke ervaring.", "Yvo et son amie ont su être plus qu'accueillants. Leur appartement est plus qu'agréable, aussi Yvo a su nous faire partager sa passion pour son pays et ses projets remarquables. Vous adorerez Opira (j'écorche un peu le prénom du chat).", "Merci Yvo. Merci pour ta sympathie, ton accueil, tes conseils et surtout merci pour le logement "]

reviews:
["Fabulous location! We had a very pleasant stay in Ilian & Ani's apartment, we felt at home. Many thanks to them for their kindness,  warm welcome and tips. They were very helpful for a lovely stay in Sofia. Ilian & Ani's  appartment is idealy located, quiet, comfortable and well equipped. We will definitely recommend to our friends ;)", "Amazing hospitality and easy/ great communication. The place is very cute and cozy, had everything you might need. 100% recommended :))", "Много любезни и отзивчиви собственици.Жилището е чисто,уютно, разполага с всичко необходимо дори за по-дълъг от няколко дни престой. С удоволствие и за в бъдеще. 
Поздрави", "The apartment is very cozy, clean, beautifully decorated and has everything you would need even for a longer stay.

Great location, 15mins walk from the historical center and to all main sightseeing spots. 

We had a very pleasant stay and would be happy to go back there some day.", "nice rustic space! allowed me to check in early which was a plus", "This place had basically I needed for my short stay - A veeery comfy bed, wi-fi, shower, an amazing location (close to the center, bus station, and many different restaurants), plus it was very cheap for me and my 2 friends, ended up costing criminally cheap.

Thank you guys!", "was good value for money. the bathroom is a bit basic and you need to check the boilers on before you go to bed otherwise if you want a shower and to hit the streets to explore you'll have to wait a while for the boiler to heat up. was everything we needed. about 20 min walk to the center, 10 mins walk to a great outdoor market. Sofia was a beautiful city and Belle house was a lovely pad to have as a sanctuary. I loved the wonky staircase!", "Despite the apartment's cute furniture, we were (unpleasantly) surprised to find out the apartment doesn't have a proper shower: The bathroom has a draining hole on the floor,  the water heater is broken (so no hot water), and dripping,  making the "shower" look constantly dirty.", "Although Ilian and Ani were very responsive hosts and checkin was quite smooth, the apartment is very tired and this is unfortunately not seen on the photos here. The bathroom needs a complete makeover, the walls inside the apartment need to be pained as well. I’m sure some small improvements would make it much fresher and welcoming. ", "Lovely little apartment, not far to walk from the centre and breakfast was a lovely surprise! Host very responsive and helpful, we loved out stay! Thank you ", "Very good hospitality. Ilian & Ani are very kind hosts, they met our needs for check-in and check-out. Bedroom and kitchen are very nice, bathroom could be better.", "Beautifully decorated, everything as described. Ilian and Ani were great hosts - although we didn't meet they replied so quickly to our questions, and made our check in and out super easy, even though we arrived very late.", "We had a good stay at the apartment. There was some problems with the water, but the hosts were helpful and flexible. Good communication.", "The apartment was well decorated, homely and comfortable, with all the utensils the cater for 2 easily (we visited as two) and probably more. The hosts are aware of minor issues with a dripping shower and plan to fix them, and their hospitality is fantastic, I have not seen better on Airbnb. Anything you need they'll jump to help, including local guides. We loved our time there.", "Cute little house in a central part of town. Close to supermarkets and the Metro. Or you can walk the city if you choose as it’s a short stroll to all the main sights in Sofia. Hosts were lovely and helpful, replying to any queries very quickly. Would stay at this Airbnb again if I was back in Sofia. Would only note the staircase is quite narrow and steep so may not be the best if your mobility is impaired. ", "Thank you for all the information, quick replies and help Ani. We really enjoyed Sofia. Highlights for us where the free Sofia tour, the archaeological museum, and a great café near Alexander Nevski Cathedral to sit and watch the world go by. We had a great time in Sofia nd Bulgaria in general", "Ilian and Ani’s place is incredibly pretty - you feel like you’re in a  Parisian flat. Cute space, beautifully decorated, and very communicative and helpful hosts. Bathroom is shared yes but it’s not an issue at all. 

We had a car rental and whilst parking isn’t easy (hard to find and couldn’t text the appropriate number via our British phones) Ani and Illian were super helpful in helping us locate and pay for lots. 

Thank you guys! ", "Verry nice owner. Place is nice but a bit broken down. The roof leaked when it rained and the shared bathroom was verry dirty. Bed old and a bit uncomfortable. Close tothe lady market. Nice breakfast and the owner was verry welcoming and arranged a taxi to the airport. 2nd sleaping option pull out coach. Beware: you have to climb a lot of steep stairs to get to the apartment. Not for those who are less able", "Ilian is a great host, always ready for anything you need, kind and helpful. He provided us  with a lot of ideas for activities and restaurants. He didnt even doubt to come and fix and internet problem at 12 p.m. while he was hanging out and bussy. The apartament is very beautiful and funtional, perfect for two and very confortable. I will recomend it for sure. Its not far from the center, between 15 to 20 minutes, and just 10 min away from the train station.", "It was ok. The apartment itself was ok, but the bathroom is not the cleanest one as the other guy next door uses it as well. Wifi was fast but it’s limited for the fast one, you need to contact the host when it gets slow. Kitchen has everything you need except you can only use one stove. The water from the sink of kitchen leaks so it might bother when sleeping, also the water in the bathroom leaks so you have to careful because it gets slippery. The shower is ok, hot water runs out quiet fast so if two people want a shower one should wait for it.
Oh, the breakfast is included but you get it once on the first day during your stay, not everyday. The yogurt he got for us was really good. 

The host is friendly, and he always responds so it was very helpful. ", "Ilian's apartment was really a great place to stay. The apartment is thoughtfully decorated and bright, and is in a good location to walk to the main sites of Sofia. 

Ilian's description of the building is accurate - it is in an old building (which adds to the authenticity of the experience), and as it is on the top floor, the apartment has some nice views (as its on the top floor).", "Beautiful apartment in the city of Sofia. Have not met a friendlier host in a long while, warm and welcoming. Highly recommend.", "Really nice and cosy apartment, ideal for a citytrip in the beautiful Bulgarian capital! Great host!", "Lovely vintage apartment. In walking distance from the interesting places of Sofia.", "The place was exactly as expected and described on Airbnb. Very cosy appartement, good location, very nice host, great communication and good tips to visit the city ! We totally recommend it ☺", "We had a great time in Sofia!! Tha appartment is really cute... we walked to the citycenter and every other place we wanted to go! When we had a problem with the shower any came by with an expert and they fixed it right away - that was great! Thanks for a really good time and hope to see you again soon!", "Ilian was a great host , really helpful probably I will back to Sofia in future and I will plan to stay same place. That was exactly the experience I was looking for.", "Ilian and Ani are very nice hosts that have a cute appartment in the center of Sofia. It's perfectly located if you want to get to know the city and you can easily walk to the most destinations.", "The apartment has everything in it, from kitchen to hair drier. IIian and Ani are amazing, always reachable and gave us great tips for our staying in Sofia!", "Illian and Ani are great hosts.  We had no problem in communication whatsoever. The apartment is located in the center of the city which was most important for my stay. The photos posted are illustrative enough, and I can add that apartment is equipped with all necessary (and functioning) appliances.  I particularly appreciate good, clean, comfortable beds. This apartment has it.", "I had a nice stay there! Cosy Appartement :)", "This place is adorable! We felt very cozy there. Heating system is great. Kitchen is really nice and although it only has one stove working we still were able to cook and enjoy a few dishes. The oven is useful for heading up meals or melt the cheese in your dishes. There is a kettle and an Italian coffee maker. The bedroom has a very comfy sofa to sit and the bed is a queen size bed fairly comfortable. The bathroom is right outside the studio and we were fine with it. I think you will be usually sharing it with another person who stays next door but he was not there during our stay. There were little things to be fixed here and there because the apartment is a little old but Ilian was always available to help. You just have to be ok with unexpected issues. We were generally happy with our stay.", "Looks exactly like the picture! Ilian and Ani were very helpful and their apartment was wonderful!", "Ilian and Ani so so so helpful and responsive. We were the first guests they had so there were a couple of teething problems, but nothing to be bothered about. They were so quick to fix everything and there for anything we needed. We really had a fantastic stay. The location was ideal, the place was quirky and cute and again the hosts were so helpful, including driving us to the bus station at the end. Highly recommend.", "De foto's geven een realistisch beeld van hoe de kamer er uit ziet. Het is alleen erg schattig en goed voor elkaar. We waren ongeveer 10 a 15 minuten lopend onderweg naar het centrum. Hierdoor zie je meteen al veel van de stad. Handig is ook dat er een supermarkt en een crown change in de buurt zit. Erg fijne mensen die de hele dag voor je klaar staan! Een heerlijk plekje is Sofia.", "Hôte accueillant et disponible. Logement décoré avec goût et bien situé.
Petit déjeuner avec des produits locaux à l'accueil !!
Je le recommande vivement ! ", "Eine nette Bleibe . Der Eingangsbereich erschreckt aber die Wohnung ist schön. Der Gastgeber sehr fürsorglich. ", "Ani et Ilian sont de super hôtes, très sympatiques et arrangeants. Nous avons été bien accuilli, ils nous ont laissé quelques produits locaux à déguster. Le voisin est gentil et discret nous ne l'avons quasiment pas vu. L'appartement est à une vingtaine de minutes de marche du centre, ce qui est très pratique ! je vous recommande ce logement ! ", "Prachtige twee kamers appartement met een aparte badkamer, die we wel met iemand anders moesten delen. De binnenkant van het appartement is super schattig en ideaal voor 2 personen. Je kan er goed koken en alle nodige spullen zijn er daar ook voor. Het appartement zit 15minuten lopen van het centrum met alle barretjes en restaurants. In de buurt is er een supermarkt die 24/7 open is. Ilian & Ani zijn geweldige hosts, ze helpen je overal bij. Ze laten je de beste plekken van Sofia zien en als er wat is reageren ze ook direct.", "Très bon séjour dans cette appartement situé près du centre ville . L appartement n est pas de première jeunesse (mur et sol abîmé) mais il reste tres confortable . Le voisin avec qui nous partageons la salle de bain est gentil mais un bruyant. Les hôtes sont très réactif . Aucun soucis"]

reviews:
["Unique space. So stylish. I felt in love with this place. It realy a hidden gem !
", "Zashev is a great host! We were visiting Sofia for just a couple of days and the apartment was the perfect base to explore this beautiful city. The recommendations of Zashev helped us to get to know the city and the people even better. I would love to come back and totaly recommend this his apartment to everybody who wants to have a place to stay which is really clean, beautiful and good located. Thank you!", "Amazing apartment, with an special relaxing atmosphere. You are going to feel so confortable there. Central and safe area, a block distance from one of the main avenues. Highly recommended", "This is truly a hidden gem, the accommodation description is totally accurate and the apartment itself is warm and cozy, spotlessly clean and beautifully furnished. The kitchen is well equipped if you do want to cook for yourself, but with the close proximity to numerous local restaurants there really is no need. The location is down a quiet side street and the apartment building itself was also very quiet, ideal if you want to chill out or if you want to concentrate on some work. The check in was super easy, and thank you Sani for waiting around for me when I arrived slightly later than expected. Any questions I had were answered promptly and the information provided regarding local restaurants, bars, transportation etc was invaluable. I have no hesitation in recommending this apartment, and I will certainly be booking for my next trip to Sofia.", "We had a delightful stay in a perfectly situated and roomy flat, all communication was prompt and detailed, and Zashev's mother was very kind to us all", "The apartment looks and feels great, however we visited at a time when the central heating wasn’t turned on, and the small electric space heaters provided by the host didn’t quite do the job. We were nearly freezing all the time, and worse - the humidity was so bad. Our clothes had to be re-washed in order to lose the foul smell. Overall, great place, with minor problems - unfriendly neighbors, not enough sun light throughout the day, but great location, and nice touches around the apartment.", "A really nice flat and great hospitality, thanks!", "Clean, beautiful home, with good location and timely communication.", "Zashev's appartment was really good, clean and very well located.
It met and exceeded our expectation and I will recommend it to anyone travelling for short or longer stay in Sofia.

Zashev provided us with lots of advices and tip; all of them were very useful and led us to amazing places and discoveries in Sofia.", "Really wonderful flat, beautiful place in a fantastic location. A real gem. Both Zashev and his mother Sani went out of their way to make our stay perfect. We had a lovely holiday, couldn’t have asked for better hosts.", "Zahev’s place was wonderful, we really enjoyed the apartment and the city. Everything was great, we found parking for the car, the apartment was amazing and very clean, everything was close to as and his mother was very very nice and helpful.

We hope to come again soon", "great location, nice, spacious and clean apartment. I would recommend it", "Spacious apartment with everything you can wish for, even an old guitar which was a real perk for us!", "We loved Zashev’s place!! It was super stylish and loved the mix of old and new! Zashev left great recommendations for us around town and everything he said was spot on! It was super easy to jump on the metro or walk everywhere! We were super impressed! Check in was easy with his mom, although our plane was delayed and we felt bad that she waited!! Definitely felt like a home away from home!", "This is a large contemporary lovely light filled apartment that we would have been happy to have moved in to live. It is very well located being just on the edge of the centre with excellent walking access to shops restaurants and bars.  The apartment is very well equipped and was a delight to spend time in and relax between forays to see the sights of Sofia. We met the mother of the host on check in who was very nice and she gave us a good rundown of the apartment. Zashev also provided a good list of sights and restaurants/bars. A perfect base to explore Sofia.", "Comfortable apartment, really spacious and clean. A bit far from the centre of the city but still close to Restaurants and was about 15 min walk to the center. For those who like to wake up late, the curtains are white so might be a bit tough to sleep after sunrise.  Great place for two singles, couple or even couples. ", "It’s a beautiful place in a central location. Has everything you would need and is very comfortable. Great hosts and quick communication. One of the best places I’ve stayed at in Sofia or elsewhere as a matter of fact.  Book it now!", "Grate place 
We loved it very much", "We had a very nice stay in Zashev's house. It is beautifully presented and has lots of character with its high ceilings and large rooms. The location is good with easy access to trams, buses and metro.", "Zashev’s place is excellent - spacious, spotlessly clean and with everything, you would need for your stay in Sofia. It's located in quiet, residential area, but there are enough shops and restaurants near by. It's also walking distance from everything in Sofia, so you don't need to use public transport at all.", "Super helpful, quick at communicating and an absolutely beautiful apartment. It was perfect for my friend and I for having a room each. And the shower was divine! There were some lovely little touches that made a huge difference. Restaurant recommendations were great and really helpful to find the unusual places to enjoy some typical food and atmosphere. The location was absolutely brilliant too. We were able to stop by and drop things off as the apartment was so central to everywhere in Sofia.", "This apartment is simple perfect. Well located and equipped and  wonderful. We also received all kind if information about Sofia. The place is strongly recomended! Thank you!", "This apartment is located in a very good place in Sofia. It's very quiet, big, with fully equipped kitchen. The owner's mother, was there to help us in every detail. 
We were really happy we found this place to stay in Sofia.", "The apartment was absolutely gorgeous and perfect! Location in the heart of Sofia, on a quiet street, it’s very spacious but cozy at the same time. Beautiful antique furniture, super friendly and helpful host, all amenities one could need, it didn’t feel like Airbnb but more like 4-5* hotel :) very happy with my stay! Thank you again for having us!!! And highly recommend the place! ", "very nice, clean and spacious appartment. Friendly to wait longer than expected, beacause it took us a while to get our rental car and they waited  1,5 h for us and were still friendly. Just better mattress in one room en better curtains and everything is perfect.", "A wonderful and stylish apartment on a quiet side street of an avenue with antique furniture elements. In real life looks even better than on pictures. I could live there and will book again when in Sofia :) ", "Stylish, elegant and beautifully furnished apartment full of lovely paintings. The rooms are huge, with high ceilings, windows everywhere, fabulous kitchen and bathroom and a sweet balcony to sit out on.
The apartment's location is just perfect for exploring Sofia's main sights - a short walk from Alexander Nevski cathedral and the metro stations at Serdica and St Kliment Ohridski. 
We loved the garden at the front of the building which has the biggest cherry tree we have ever seen.
A wonderful place to stay.", "Great location, stylish apartment, and a superb host.", "This is a great old but renovated, house with high ceilings and stylish touches. Definetely recommend it.", "Spacious, very clean and comfy apartment. Close to many highlights of Sofia. Mini market just around the corner. Very kind and caring hosts! Recommended!", "Апартаментът се намира на много добра локация в сърцето на София. Атмосферата е много уютна с всички необходими удобства. Човек се чувства като у дома.  Бладарим за гостоприемството и приятното общуване.", "Ottima scelta la casa di Zashev : la posizione è strategica sia per visitare la città a piedi sia per fare tours della Bulgaria che partono dalla piazza della cattedrale Alessandro Nevsky a due passi dall appartamento . La casa ampia e arredata con personalità ed autenticità  e' appena ristrutturata ed è ben (Website hidden by Airbnb) check in e check out '  automatico  è molto  funzionale , anche se noi abbiamo trovato la gentilissima  e poliglotta madre di Zashev ad accoglierci e addirittura ci ha accompagnato ad un ottimo ristorante vicino !  Grazie a Zashev per i consigli , per la disponibilità e per la rapidità delle risposte ai nostri quesiti ! Consigliatissimo", "Sehr zu empfehlen!", "Nous avons adoré l’appartement de Zashev, spacieux et moderne avec une touche artistique. 
L’emplacement est parfait, il est possible de tout visiter à pied. Un de nos meilleurs ( voire le meilleur) hôtes et appartement que nous avons eu en Bulgarie. Merci Zashev !", "绝对市中心的位置,可以步行去所有地方｡安静的小花园,非常及时的反馈和帮助｡房子美极了,干净,厨房的设施也非常棒｡会推荐给朋友们｡", "Un appartenant spacieu et aménagé avec beaucoup de goût. Nous recommandons vivement. Sofia est une charmante capitale. "]

reviews:
["Very   stylish and clean apartment..!!!
Excellent choice for the center of Sofia", "Outstanding place! Highly recommended!", "great location, very clean and modern", "Valentin’s place is an excellent place to stay, centrally located, clean and tidy, warm and exactly as it looks in the photos. Good communication, easy access and local tips. I would definitely recommend this flat to people visiting Sofia.", "Great location, old unrenovated building, however the apartment was renovated with lots of creativity and love. Valentin was always available. The bed was not really comfortable, but for the price very good choice. Recommended.", "very spacious space on the fourth floor. good communication.", "Nice and stylish appartment near the city center. No problem with the Host. I can honestly reccomend a stay there.", "A wonderful host and an amazing apartment in a central location. Everything went smoothly and I would definitely stay here again when in Sofia. Highly recommended.", "Valentins place is superb. Stylish yet practical and well equipped. We absolutely loved our stay. Excellent value for money, located in a quiet street, near to a Lidl supermarket for essentials and only a 5-10 min walk from the centre. I wouldnt hesitate to recommend  this place to anyone. Book now, you wont regret it :-)", "Clean, stylish space in a good location (about a 15 minute walk to the centre).  Valentin was really responsive and helpful. Would recommend.", "Great place to stay", "Valentin’s apartment is great choices in the center of Sofia.
Very close to everything,but at the same time in a quiet street.we was totally happy with our stay, Quick responses,very good institutions to find the apartment and Valentin let us check in early .
We love the place totally we will come back 
Highly recommended", "The apartment was really really nice! I loved the style! Very cozy and clean and also very central. I totally recommend it .", "Our stay in Valentin's apartment was great!
The apartment is really amazing, looking even better than the pictures! Stylish,  comfortable and in a good location close to the center.
Valentin was really helpful, providing tips & recommendations and I will surely look for his apartment again when going back to Sofia!", "Perfect flat and location! Thanks!", "Very stylish and well designed apartment. Valentin is responsive and helpful - I can easily recommend this place.", "You’ll love the location and stylish decorations.  There’s even a public park with spring water within a couple blocks, organic juice bar, coffee shops, and restaurants.  Close to historic buildings and not too far from metro and tourist areas. You’ll love it.", "We stayed for a friend's reunion at Valentin's place in Sofia and had a great time. The apartment is well located and nicely decorated. It is plenty of room for four. Valentin arranged a guarded parking for our minivan. He answered quickly and made sure that everything was in order when we came.", "The place is great and looks exactly like it does in the pictures. Checking in and out is very easy. The apartment is located in the city so there are lots of restaurants and bars nearby.", "My partner and I had a great stay at Valentin's place. It's much more spacious than it appears on the pics. It's very well appointed and comfortable. The location is fantastic, steps from anything you may want, yet tucked onto a charming old street that is very quiet at night. The bed was comfy and I apprecied the black curtains that made it possible to have a complete darkness for good sleep.

Valentin is easy deal with, and he made it a breeze to check in and out. He made himself available for questions and had prepared a few resources with tips on things to do in Sofia, which we appreciated.

Overall, I would highly recommend Valentin's apartment and would stay there again in the future without hesitation.", "Great place- excellent location! Don’t judge by building- it’s beautiful inside!", "this place stands up above any other place in Sofia or anywhere else we have been. a perfect location, beautiful appartnent and great investment in all that you cant even imagine. wanted to stay there forever. a perfect host! helped us in ordering taxi for us to the airport in cheap prices of 13BGN flexible with early check in..cant describe how great was our experience. thank you big time", "Valentin is a great host, very responsive and check in went smoothly. The apartment is very clean and modern.", "Very very nice place, so spacious, well illuminated and with a good industrial design! We stayed just one night, but we really enjoyed our stay. Thank you, Valentin!", "Inspiring interiors in top city location.
Would book again 100%", "Valentin is a great host, very flexible and accomodating. we were allowed to leave our Luggage longer in the appartment, as our plane was only late in the evening. this left us with opportunity to fully enjoy our last day in sofia, as we didn't have to bother on what to do with our stuff. great appartement, for sure recommend.", "Amazing apartment on one of the best locations in Sofia! Sparkling clean, stylish and definitely worth the money!", "Valentin’s place was very cool, easy to get in and super clean. Easy to walk to Vitosha blv etc. He even let us check out late to fit with our schedule. Amazing would definitely love to stay here again.", "Wonderful apartment and very convenient location, this is a center but quiet, I would recommend this apartment.", "Heads up! This beautiful apartment is on the forth floor with no elevator! There are 87 stairs to reach the apartment. Surprised us... didn't appear in the description of the apartment.
If you don't have lots of luggage and/or little kids it's not a big deal. Great location and decor.", "Stylish apartment in super central location in Sofia. Amazing host! Thanks", "Perfect place to stay in sofia. Look no further. ", "Valentin’s place is quite amazing.
It was extremely easy to check in to, had a very good location, very clean, and had all the amenities one would need. Would not hesitate to come back. ", "Valentins apartment was great for our family of four. It was a lovely place to return to after a day out. When we had a problem with hot water Valentin came very promptly to deal with the issue. We felt very welcome during our stay.", "Valentin's place was as awesome. Very cosy, clean and spacious. Recommend to anyone :)", "Great apartment with very cool design and clean/prepared throughout. Walking distance to the centre of town", "Valentin's apartment is exactly how it looks in the photo's the space and decor is awesome! All necessary amenities were provided, wifi worked great and the location is fantastic as it is walking distance to the central station and the city centre. The only negative, as others have previously mentioned is the bathroom which is quite small and with no shower screen water can go everywhere.  I didn't get to meet Valentin but he was very easy to communicate with and I would definitely recommend his apartment to other travelers to Sofia.", "Can't think of a better mix of location, style, amenities, and ease of check in and communication. Great value for money and much recommended ", "Fantastic appartment. Spacious, confortable (if you don't mind a few steps), with a good location in a quiet area near the touristic attractions. Perfect, thank you.", "The amenities: Valentin’s apartment is a gem! This is probably one of the best decorated places I stayed at in over 17 years of traveling. The apartment is clean, well equipped and shows pride in ownership. I was surprised to find an AC unit in every room - that’s something not many Bulgarian homes have (usually one unit per appartment). Valentine was not cheap in his choice of quality. All furniture and decorations are top notch. The mattresses were very comfortable, I believe memory foam. Pillows and sheets felt soft and comfy. Hair dryer, iron, soap, shampoo and conditioner were provided and the towels  smelled fresh and clean. 
Location: only a few min walk from Main Street with shopping, restaurants, and night life. All main tourist attractions downtown  are within 15-30 min walk from his place. We suggest you take the “Sofia free tour” which will give you a 2 hr walk around those attractions. 
The host: Valentine made the check in instructions very easy to follow with step by step explanation and pictures. He messaged us quickly answering questions and provided alternative ways to reach him in case of an emergency. He was available to answer questions, help us find the place (I’m directionally challenged with a GPS in my hand), provided us with links for restaurants and night life. 
My only regret was that we didn’t stay longer. We will definitely return to his apartment next time we visit family in Bulgaria and plan to extend our stay at Valentine’s apartment. ", "This is an absolutely fantastic apartment and is excellent value. The inside is extremely stylish and spacious and the air conditioning was a life saver on the hot days!! The beds were comfortable and kitchen came with a coffee machine and coffee!

The apartment is on a quiet residential street 5/10 minutes walk from all of the main attractions in Sofia. It is on the 4th floor with no lifts - good exercise for burning off the great food!

Valentin was an excellent host. He was extremely responsive and helped suggest places for a celebratory lunch and was happy for us to check in at 4am following a late flight. He also gave other tips in the area that we followed and were amazing such as the free sofia walking tour, and dinner at Raketa Rakia bar with drinks at Sputnik that I would highly recommend. 

Overall we had a great time and I would highly recommend this apartment to anyone visiting Sofia. ", "Great location and easily walkable to great landmarks, restaurants/cafes, and nightlife.  ", "Valentin's place was the most stylish airbnb we have used - it looks exactly like the photos. It was centrally located - within walking distance of the city centre and the central bus / train stations. The bed is big and comfortable and the shower was amazing (although there is no shower curtain so the whole bathroom gets pretty wet, but we didn't mind). We absolutely loved the apartment and really enjoyed our stay there. Would love to come back and would definitely recommend it to anyone! ", "Thanks Valentin, we had a lovely stay at your beautiful, creative place", "Awesome place, Great price. I think Valentin works hard to make your stay a good one. He was very polite and if you had any questions he could answer them timely. I would recommend his place if you are interested in staying in a quiet area with less traffic than the main areas of Sofia. Also, make sure if you rent a car there, Freshen up on Sofia parking laws... they‘re a real treat :)", "My 2nd time here. Will keep using it", "Our group of 4 loved staying in Valentin's home in Sofia!  Valentin is an amazing host, one of the best I have had experience with!  He was proactive in reaching out to us prior to check-in and provided detailed instructions for self-check-in making it a breeze.  He also gave us great local suggestions for how to spend our time in the city.  Valentin was quick to respond to any inquiries and was very flexible with check-out, allowing us to store our luggage until our late night flight.  
The home itself is beautiful and stylishly designed with modern touches.  It could comfortably sleep 6 people as the common space has a separate door that could be closed off for those on the sofa bed.  The air-conditioning in each room is a great perk in the hot Sofia summers.  Note that it is a 4th-floor walk-up so this would be the only drawback if you have mobility issues.  The home is so comfortable that I would happily book here for an extended stay as well.   Highly recommended!", "Nice place in a central location. Great communication and smooth check in / out process. Would stay again!", "Really an amazing place in a great location. Stylish, comfortable, clean, quiet", "It was a nice stay", "Great flat in a convenient central location", "The place looks great and a percect location ", "Nice location, near to a metro station, pretty appartment although you frequently hear the airtraffic. ", "Thank you for the lovely stay and the recommendations for places to visit/eat. Your home is very nicely decorated and was the perfect place for me and my friends during our first visit to Sofia.
I would gladly stay here again should I come back to Sofia in the future.", "This was an extremely stylish gem--unassuming on the outside but beautifully polished on the inside. You'd never know from the street how amazing it is! The apartment was spotless and check-in procedures were straightforward; it was so nice to be able to come and go on our own time. This didn't bother us at all, but be aware that a neighbor practices piano each day at 9:30 am sharp, so if you're both a light and a late sleeper, it might be something to keep in mind. I found it charming!", "The apartement is so beautiful! Even better than shown on the photos;) ", "Easy check-in and out, perfect location, great and clean apartament!", "Great place! Clean and cozy modern interior. Close to all what you need. Superhost!", "Beautiful place, quick communication about the self-check in. 

Everything was great, we slept wonderfully.", "We had an amazing stay here. The location is perfect and the apartment is beautiful! Lots of space and very comfortable! Our host was extremely helpful he facilitated an early check in for us, organised a taxi back to the airport And sent us some local recommendations too!", "Valentin’s appartment is very stylish, comfortable and located in a nice quiet neighborhood yet its a short walk from the Vitosha boulevard.  Also valentin gave us great tips on places to eat and I highly recommend this appartment and would stay there again when am in Sofia.", "Everything was great with Valentin's place. He even let us check-in an hour early because our flight arrived early and even helped us with calling a taxi for our check-out. He was very helpful and fast in his responses.
The apartment is clean, as seen in the photos and in a good location. We walked to everywhere but even if you want to use the tram or metro, stations are also close.", "Valentin's place is splendid: enormous, spatious, elegant and the interior is outstanding! I've never been in such a place for this value of money! I had the best 2 days of stay, Valentin was really helpful even though I know Sofia very well,  he was always there with suggestions and understanding. The rooms are so big and you feel extremely cozy, the area is close to absolutely everything by foot, so I'm totally reccomending you leave your money with this place,  you won't regret it!", "The apartment is amazing, clean and confy also very stylish. Valentin has made a great work with it. We were 3 but it’s also perfect for 6 people cause there are 2 beds and a big couch. 
Everything you need is in its place.
The apartment is near the city centre almost 5/7 minutes from the main road Vitosha and very close to Serdika metro station. So if you need a nice place for your holidays in Sofia this is the best choice! Thank you Valentin we had a great time!", "A great place in a hip quarter with a lot of places to discover around :)", "The apartment is awesome. It is very central located, within 3' you are at the Serdica Metro Station. It is enough spacious for 4 people and its decoration is unbelievable. We recommend it to everyone who wants to have  a very good accommodation at Sofia.", "Is the best location for traveling, really on the center center of all the sights.
The price is fair as well, can't ask for more.", "Das Apartment ist wirklich sehr schön eingerichtet.  Die Thermalquellen und viele Sehenswürdigkeiten  sind gleich um die Ecke . Ein Lidl in wenigen Minuten erreichbar . Sehr zentral. Der Kontakt zu Valentin war nett und unkompliziert.  Empfehlenswert !", ".", "El alojamiento es impecable. Es tal y como muestra en las fotos, con todo lo necesario y decorado con muy buen gusto. Valentin , aunque no le conocimos en persona, siempre estuvo muy atento a nuestras comunicaciones y nos dio algunas sugerencias de que hacer, ver y comer en Sofía.
Totalmente recomendable ", "Es war eine sehr stylishe und tolle Wohnung. Alles lief problemlos und unkompliziert ab. Ein Supermarkt ist quasi um die Ecke und sämtliche Sehenswürdigkeiten sind günstig in Gehweite erreichbar. Der Host war sehr aufmerksam und hilfsbereit. Wir würden wieder es jederzeit wieder mieten! TOP!", "+++++ 5/5", "Appartement très agréable et calme au centre ville. Tout est accessible à pied. Merci pour l'accueil.", "Dit is een geweldig appartement! Het was netjes, stijlvol, ruim, comfortabel en dichtbij het centrum en vele leuke cafés.", "Awsome appartement", "De buitenkant van het complex en de andere gebouwen in de straat doen misschien niet vermoeden dat je daarbinnen het hippe appartement dat je op de foto’s hebt gezien vindt. Toch klopt dat wat je op de foto’s ziet precies, Valentin liegt met geen woord over wat het appartement te bieden heeft. Erg fijn! :-)

Het appartement is schoon, ruim en voorzien van airconditioning in alle ruimtes, geweldig! Met een supermarkt (Lidl) om de hoek heb je eventuele boodschappen zo in huis. 

Enige kanttekening zou de badkamer kunnen zijn. Niets aan te merken op de hygiene, maar enkel het formaat. De badkamer is erg klein en er is geen apart toilet. Maar als dat alles is... 

Overigens is het grootste deel van het centrum prima te voet te bereiken, als je liever niet loopt zijn er taxi’s in overvloed die ook nog eens erg goedkoop zijn. Ideaal!", "Très bel appartement. Très bien placé, à moins de 10 minutes à pied du centre ville. 
Propriétaire à l'écoute et très réactif. A recommander.", "La casa di Valentin  si trova in  posizione  centrale vicino alla metro che collega direttamente  all'aeroporto .puresserndobin cente"]

reviews:
["Clean, stylish, warm place. Great location. Prompt communication, responsive and considerate host. Highly recommended", "Great host", "wonderful host", "Cozy comfortable place with a good location and very easy check in.", "Lovely place! Nice location. It is really cozy and warm apartment. Highly recommend it!", "Amazing apartment very clear and very comfortable.
The kitchen has everything you need. 
The bathroom is new but a little bit small. This a tipical characteristic in Sofia!
The living room and the bedroom are very spacious.
Very recommend for an holiday!", "Very nice appartment, well located and easy to check-in.", "A clean and big place where you really can feel like home. All facilities needed are there. Central position and easyto get to. We can recommend to stay here if you are in Sofia.", "Elka apartment is clean, comfortable and close to everything; restaurants, bars, supermarket and the old town. The photos are accurate. The apartment is on a quiet street and people in the building are nice. Plus the air conditioning works really well.

My boyfriend and I really enjoyed our stay.", "Nice apartment close to the city center.", "Many thanks for everything! ", "We had a lovely time staying in Elka’s beautiful and spacious flat. The beds were really comfortable and the kitchen/diner space was a great feature for social cooking and eating. The location was perfect - a ten minute walk to the very centre of Sofia, but located in a quiet side street without much noise disturbance. Would recommend for a family, couple of group of friends wanting a great base to explore the city from. We also really appreciated the television with many different channels in English!", "A beautiful, lovely place close to the center. Highly recommend it!", "Super!", "Great place, spacious, very clean, comfortable, accurate communication and with a nice Italian restaurant right across the street. Supermarket around the corner, very good area of Sofia. Actually all Sofia is good area ;).", "Elka's place is a model home to be shown to other hosts of how to keep a place if you want to do a high standard business and keep the customer happy.
Guys just go to this place and chill out.
Do not make the place bad. It's a place to enjoy.
100/10. 
The place from international bus stand is a 10 min ride by taxi ( get the taxi with Cheaper rate per minute .. yes all taxis are not standardized... remember the driver is starting the meter when you sit in the cab) ride to Elka's place is around 5 Lev. Amazing place ", "Strongly recommended! 
The place is much better than it appears in photos. Newly renovated with new furniture and exceptionally clean.", "Spotless apartment and very convenient for walking to all the main areas in Sofia. Host communicated very well. Highly recommended.", "Great to have a home in Sofia!", "Modern, comfortable, well equiped apartment. Location of the apartment great. I recommend!", "Worth the money exactly. I love the apartment, would like to stay longer. The owner has a very good taste! Thumb up!", "Just like the pictures. A beautiful, stylish relaxing property within walking distance to the center!", "Fantastic brand new apartment at super great value. The best Airbnb apartment I’ve ever stayed!", "Изключително чист и комфортен апартамент, направен стилно и с вкус.", "Appartamento molto ben arredato e corredato. Posizione eccellente.", "Gostamos imenso de estar na casa da Elka. Próximo do centro, com todas as comodidades e super limpo.", "Cet appartement est bien situé, dans le centre de Sofia, en quelques minutes de marche vous  rejoignez le cœur de la ville.   Plusieurs lignes de bus ou tramways passent également à proximité. On trouve aussi dans ce quartier commerces, cafés et restaurants.
   Elka nous accueille dans son appartement, a priori rénové assez récemment. Aucune fausse note, le logement est stylé, mobilier moderne, et très bien équipé, parfait pour héberger un voyageur individuel ou un couple. Si on a des questions ou besoin d'infos, Elka nous renseigne très rapidement."]

reviews:
["Had a great time in the Biser's apartment. It' s cosy and stylish. It's located in the very center of Sofia  on a pedestrian street. Near by subway and other transports.  Strongly recommend. The place is clean and quiet.", "Amazing place for short and longterm stay", "This place is decorated very stylishly and modern. Bed and house were very comfortable with many towels and kitchen supplies which is appreciated. Espresso machine was a lovely touch. Only complaint was that there was aVery awful sewage smell coming from the bathroom the entire time and unfortunately nothing we did could cover it. I recommend just keeping the door closed and just be prepared. Apart from this, the stay was good. Location is excellent but be aware the city is doing construction, no noise issues thank goodness, but finding the place can be extremely difficult the first time, as the street is not actually accessible by car and it is quite the maze.", "The flat is well located and good value for money. Easy communication and check in.", "Great location, fast communication!", "We had the best experience at Biser's place. Highly recommended. Everything was perfect. The place is beautiful and charming. Super clean and very well located. The hosts are great and fast communicators. We will come back for sure :-)", "Great apartment, the bed is so comfortable! Very clean and stylish, close to the centre.", "Very nice apartment right in the city center, just minutes of walking distance to everything. The apartment itself is very cute, freshly renovated in a modern and comfortable style, and has everything you may need, including an ironing board and a lovely espresso coffee machine. Highly recommendable.", "great location 1 min from everything", "Everything was ok! We had a great stay", "Nice and clean space very close to Sofia main events.", "This is a 5 stars place. Great location , beautiful apartment and very good communication with host", "I have stayed here multiple times, great location, super responsive host.", "This is a very good appartment as described by the host. Location is great. Check in and check out  were smooth. I can only recommend it. Germán and Oscar", "Very clean, comfortable place and I would recommend.  Thank you for a very nice stay!", "Very good location in sofia. Clean and cosy. Susan was very attentive.", "Great location! Easy access and just as described.", "The apartment is incredibly well situated. It is super clean and cosy, bed is very comfortable, all in all the place is very well furnished. The check-in and the overall communication were super easy. I did not meet Biser but he was super friendly. 
I would greatly recommend this place!", "Very clean, pleasant apartment, great location. Highly recommended", "The Place is literally in the center of Sofia, you can find anything you need, the apartment is by Far one of the best I've been too and everything works as described... 5 stars", "Non è la prima volta bellissimo appartamento quando vado a Sofia.
Ottimo soggiorno. Ineccepibile!!!!
TOP +++++++++++++++++++++++++", "Ottimo soggiorno-Top+++++++++++", "Posizione centralissima in uno dei migliori quartieri di Sofia, a due passi dai principali centri di interesse. Appartento pulito e comodo con tanto di ascensore. Check in & check out chiari e semplici.", ".", "Veramente ineccepibile, comodità nel check in, appartamento ben arredato e pulito, dettagli piacevoli e posizione centrale. Lo consiglio caldamente!", "Host mai visto ma nel contempo disponibilissimo a distanza, attento alle esigenze dei propri ospiti!
