reviews:
["great apartment!", "Absolutely  amazing place!
Sparkling clean, very comfortable, top located, and the host was very kindly and give us a very good recommendations!
I felt  in love in this place, and in the future  i will come back  for sure!
Top!!!", "A great apartment with a very central location. 10\10 recommend!", "I didn’t want to leave! Would come again most def!", "A great apartment in the heart of Sofia. Very stylish, clean and comfortable place. We loved it!", "The apartment is as it appears on the pictures, and it has everything needed for a short or long stay. The location is very central, with transportation, taxis, supermarket, restaurants 1 block away. I definitely recommend it.", "Fabulous location. The place is adorable absolutely loved it. The host was very helpful and friendly :-)", "The apartment was lovely, the beds were very comfortable, it was really clean and the location was perfect. There was high speed wi-fi in all of the rooms. The furniture is brand new and it's very well designed -  just like in the photos. The hosts were so nice and friendly, they advised me for nice clubs and restaurants. Also there was coffee,tea and tourist maps left for me. 
I definitely recommend this place.  Thank you Ivayla for the wonderful stay!", "Really nice place. Clean, comfy, well maintained. I will be stopping there any other time when I go in Sofia.", "We would enthusiastically recommend a stay here. Located very central. Incredibly friendly and helpful family staff. Phenomenally clean, well equipped, and very nicely decorated. It was the perfect apartment for a stay in Sofia. You will not be disappointed.“", "Perfect location. Great apartment. Very sunny. Well equipped kitchen with free coffee Lavazza :) A strong and unlimited Wifi connection. Very friendly host.", "Really cool guy. Will definitely stay again there when I come to Sofia again", "Beautiful apartment in the center of Sofia. The apartment is exactly as it looks at the photos. Clean with great design. Ivayla and Toni are very helpful and friendly! I recommend it!", "Good value for money and an ideal location right in the city center.  The hosts were kind enough to arrange a very late check in and had taken the effort to leave fresh flowers in the flat.", "The place was very clean, stylish, good located! Ivayla is very good host, helpful and it's very easy to communicate with her! We really enjoyed the stay there!", "very big and nice apartment with a great view of Sofia's buildings and lots of light (!!). everything was perfect. the location is great and walking distance to everything. highly recommended!!", "Great place, in the very heart of the city, clean, cosy and stylish. The host is really sympathetic responded immediately to all the messages. I recommend!", "Everything was perfect.The house is exactly in the center ,5 minutes from vitosha,sredets,national culture center...the metro is also 10'. The house is very clean ,very bright ,very beautiful...We just love it. We surely recommend it!!!! thank u for the hospitality ", "Don't hesitate to book this place. One of the most charming airbnbs we've ever been. Sunny, clean, welcoming and with great location. Ivayla was able to accommodate early check in for us. We stayed only one night, but I wish we  stay for more. The place is well equipped with everything possible you might need.", "Beautiful apartment. Full of light. Great location to visit the center of Sofia. Easy communication and checkin. All together a great place to stay.", "This place is amazing! The host, the location, the apartment, everything was perfect ! I recommend 100%! ", "I only stayed for a night but have to give this place a stellar review. Excellent location and reliable communication with the hosts.", "Really friendly and helpful hosts! Wonderful place with a scenic view of downtown Sofia, clean and pleasant! Great for those who would like to enjoy the city day and night! ", "Wonderful place, excellent location in the city center, cozy apartment and very friendly and helpful hosts, the place to stay when in Sofia.", "Beautiful apartment, very clean! Awesome location and hostess!", "Nice location. The apartment is as on the pictures. Ivayla and her boyfriend are very nice people.", "Ivayla and Toni were very kind and helpful. (They are also a beautiful couple!)The place is in a great location, very clean, communication was wonderfully fast. I highly recommend this spot.", "Great location and apartment in the city center. 5 min from bulevard and center. Tony and Ivayla were so kind waiting for our arrival at late night. Also they allowed us to left our luggage without problem till 2pm.  Totally recommendable", "Great place, great location. We loved it. I totally recommend it. I would love to come back one day.", "The best apartment and host in Sofia", "Communication was amazing from start to end, Toni was waiting with a key for us when we jumped out of the taxi, and he was so helpful with tips for the area. The location really is right in the heart of the city. And the bed is super comfy. A++", "Everything was ok! It was nice to meet you and stay at your apartment. Good location and central area!", "I had a great time in this apartment! 
First of all the location is excellent. It’s in the most beautiful part of Sofia :) 
It is a very cozy and light place! 
There’s absolutely everything you would need for your stay - all the amenities ... iron, hair dryer ... you would feel like home! 
I would definitely come back! :)", "Great space! Communication was near instant. One of the hosts was waiting on the corner from the moment I got out of my taxi to welcome me and show me up to the apartment. It is a slightly non-descript entrance so being shown the way the first time was very helpful. The building doesn't look like much but once in the apartment, it's beautiful! And quite large as well! Shower had great water pressure and very hot water. The bed was also so comfortable I had a hard time waking up for my flight. Everything it's walkable from here as well and seemed safe and well traveled day and night. My only negative was I wish I could have stayed longer in this apartment and the beautiful city of Sofia!", "Ivayla’s place is lovely with a roof top view and it is close to everything, nice restaurants, bars and tourist attractions are all within walking distance. We had a wonderful stay :)", "It was very cozy and comfortable. Really recommended one. Don't hesitate to choose her house. Thank you.", "Ideal!!", "perfect", "We stayed one night in this beautiful apartment wich we really liked!! It 2 mint walk from bul. Vitosha!! The apartment was big with a magnificent view.
In the bathroom we found shampoo and all the other things that you need!! 
Toni was very kind and super helpful!
We really enjoyed our stay!!", "Ivayla & Toni are very friendly . Helpful . Their place is very clean . Spacious . & comfortable . Their is shops & Resturant s nearby .", "Very quiet apartment with lots of daylight in a strategic central location. Hosts were lighting quick to respond and accommodating.", "Would highly recommend this wonderful apartment. The host is very responsive and the location is absolutely great.", "Lovely apartment, great location in the heart of Sofia,
close to the center, don't need taxis, everything is close to the apartment.
Amazing host, always willing to help.
Can't wait to come back :)", "Good location, the apartment is very comfortable and nicely decorated. Only the bathroom is rather small but overall is highly recommended. Host is always ready to answer your requests.", "They were phenomenal hosts. Met us upon arrival and showed us the way in and helped with parking. Suggested a great place for dinner. Ivayla was very quick to respond to any and all questions we had. I would absolutely recommend.", "Really, really enjoyed our stay in this apartment. Super clean and comfortable and within walking distance of everything. The hosts are amazing and were super helpful and excellent at responding quickly. Highly recommend this place.", "Great location. Clean and stylish. Very good host.", "Apartment in a great location, close to trum lines, few minutes walk to central places.
Toni (Ivayla boyfriend) met us at arrival and was very nice and helpful.
Recommended place!", "Though we were not able to meet Ivayla during our stay in Sofia, she made sure to make us feel as comfortable and attended as possible.  She was very easy to reach via the airbnb app and she made sure to make our stay as smooth as possible by answering any question we had.  Her flat is as beautiful, clean and bright as the pictures demonstrate and the view is absolutely beautiful! Not to mention the bed was very comfortable too.  I would definitely stay here again!", "Ivaylas apartment was a very good choice on our journey .
It was so perfect to live so central. The accomodation was very clean and bright, and warm. 
Ivaylas boyfriend was so helpul. He supported us, in every questions, we had. It was a pleasure to get to know him. Thank you so much.", "Had a wonderful time in this super central apartment. Perfectly situated close to the trendiest restaurants and bars, as well as Sofia's main sights. Perfect home base for exploring the city.", "We loved everything about this place! The location was great, only a few minutes from the centre. Ivayla and Toni were very welcoming, meeting us at the flat around midnight when our flight was delayed by a few hours. The place itself was beautiful, very clean and bright, beautifully decorated and well equipped with everything we needed, and Ivayla and Toni were happy to help us with any recommendations around Sofia. 

The only thing was the kettle didn't seem to work unless you pressed the button down which was a bit annoying, but that's a minor thing that can be replaced pretty easily!

I would definitely recommend Ivayla's flat if you're looking for a place to stay in Sofia!", "We had a great time in Sofia. The appartment is very neat, clean and has a central location between all of Sofia's highlights. The hosts are very friendly and helpful and even picked us up from the street, just seconds after stepping out of the Taxi. Definitely would recommend it!", "This is an amazing apartment! Very confortable, lightly and safe.
The location is perfect, walking-distance to all the attractions of Sofia. The hosts were very nice an attentive. 
I will recommend this place 100% if you plan to visit Sofia.", "Great flat, staying there for 2nd time, Iva is a great host and accommodated a late check-in for me. Will definitely stay there again, thanks", "Ivayla's place was great! Very cutely decorated, spacious, and in walking distance of many great restaurants and bars. I did not get to meet Ivayla in person, but she was communicative in the days leading up to my visit and had her friend show me how to use the various locks. Would definitely recommend!", "The place i newly renovated and generally in a nice shape. The rooms are big and light, they are bigger than they appear in the pictures! The location is close to a supermarket and the city center. 
Perfect apartment and nice hosts. ", "Great location and spatious apartment, thanks for hosting!", "Ivayla and Toni met us around 12:30 am for check in since we had a really long time at the boarder crossing. They are great hosts.   They were very nice and showed us what we needed for the apartment.  They left us coffee for every morning of our stay which was very helpful.  There are 2 AC units and blinds on all the windows.  the apartment was clean and well maintained.  I would stay again and reccomend it to anyone.   Thank you so much.", "Great flat in central Sofia, close to loads of bars and restaurants. Very clean and hostess Ivayla is very friendly and made herself available all the time. Highly recommend, definitely will come back. Thanks. ", "very nice place with very nice people, i was arrived very late on 2:00 am, the host are still waiting for the door, and show us the facilities,  very good experience with", "We stayed in this apartment for short vacations in July 2017. It fully met all our expectations! Good location, near to all transport, restaurants, supermarkets. Comfortable apartment for travelling with children. 
Special thanks to Ivayla and Toni for their hospitality! They are wonderful! Thanks for their daily help with all questions! We were surprised that they bought a new holder for drying clothes when we asked for it (I couldn't understand quickly how to switch drying function on washing machine))). I would surely recommend this apartment to everybody and would be happy to stay here when we come back to Sofia! ", "Neat, clean and well furnished flat. Very central and convenient. Very well done up and very comfortable. ", "Ivayla was very accommodating and prompt in communication. The apartment was beautifully designed and quite clean. It has a lot of light and the view of the city and the mountains was excellent. Ivayla was warm and welcoming, and she had espresso and almond chocolates for us. When we were leaving, we forgot some clothes, and Ivayla's boyfriend contacted us and brought them to us. They are very kind people, and we would definitely stay again!", "A fantastic apartment with a great view over the city, perfectly centred for sight seeing and only a 5 minute walk from Vitosha Boulevard! ", "Everything was smooth and in-order. Very clean apartment with everything you would need for a short stay.
Toni and Ivayla are very friendly and responsive too. Highly recommended.", "Great location and wonderful hosts! We are deffinitely coming back!", "They are so friendly, I come a little bit late, but they still wait for me down street, and help me to book taxi, Recommend to stay here ", "Ivayla and her boyfriend have been amazing hosts! They not only waited for us until 2am because of our late flight, but also have been paying a lot of attention to us during our staying.
The apartment is really close to everything, full of details that will make your trip easier and comfortable. I would really recommend it!
", "We absolutely loved the apartment! The location is very central, close to all restaurants, bars and tourist attractions. The apartment was really clean and beautifully decorated. Communication with Ivayla was easy before and during our stay. She was helpful and extremely accommodating. We would highly recommend this place to anyone! ", "The flat was lovely - really clean and modern with lovely furniture. Ivayla's style is great! Excellent communication before we arrived and Ivayla even messaged to give us advice on where to go in Sofia. The flat is in a great location - right next to Lidl for food shopping and only a maximum of 20 minutes walk from anywhere you would need to visit. ", "Nous avons passé un agréable séjour chez Ivayla. Le logement est grand, propre et très fonctionnel, à la décoration soignée. Il est situé à 2min du centre, ce qui est très pratique. Parfait pour un séjour à Sofia!", "Siete stati come sempre eccezionale ", "Ottimo . Appartamento bello e pulito . Gentilezza e cortesia e perfetta comunicazione  ", "Fantàstic, molt recomanable. Un pis còmode, ben decorat, net, cèntric. Si tornem a Sofia repetirem segur!", "Ivayla e Toni foram fantásticos no acolhimento. O apartamento é muito bom e, o elevador cumprindo a sua missão, é inesquecível", "Ospite gentile è sempre diposnibile. Ottima la posizione della casa a pochi metri dalla via principale della città. Consigliata", "Todo bien", "Fantástico!, lo recomiendo a todo el mundo que quiera visitar Sofía.
El apartamento es perfecto en cuanto a localización, luminoso, espacioso y bien equipado, todo estaba muy limpio y decorado con mucho encanto. 
Además, Toni fue un gran anfitrión, la comunicación con él fue muy buena, se mostró atento a cualquier demanda y siempre con simpatía y amabilidad. Gracias por tratarnos tan bien.", "Casa confortevole, moderna e recente. Posizione molto comoda, host molto attento. Consigliato!"]

reviews:
["We enjoyed our stay in Maxi's apartment with our (Website hidden by Airbnb) has a great location and we recommend it for families since there is plenty of space for the baby stroller and cot. Friendly host that is ready to help, we gonna come back.", "Very well located apartment, clean and spatious. Maxi has been very communicative.", "We had a great stay in Maxis Apartment. It was clean, he welcomed us nicely even the flight arrived late. The communication was always quick. The location is central and close to the subway. We can only recommend the apartment for the value! The only drawback was the barking dog of the neighbours every morning at 8 and 10am. Otherwise even if in the city center the apartment was very calm.", "Great location, we enjoyed staying here with our two young children! Would stay again!", "Value for money, great location in center of beutiful Sofia", "Amazing place with a great host, maxi was there for us without delay and with a big smile always in his face. He makes our stay easy. The house is super nice and the location is awesome.", "We had a very pleasant stay at Maxi's. The apartment is spacious and close to everything you want to see in Sofia.", "Had a very pleasant stay at Maxi's apartment. The location was perfect and there was a great communal garden right in the center of Sofia. The apartment was spotless clean and had everything we needed..", "We had a good stay at Maxi's place. The appartment is very well located, close to everything. The kitchen is nice, everything you need is there. The shower is good and hot. Only the mattress of the double bed is really thin. After one night, I moved to the single bed in the other bedroom.", "Great location, the place is lovely and Maxi was a great host and really helpful.", "Maxi's apartment is a great space for a visit to Sofia....clean, quiet, and private. It's a super location and one can walk anywhere to experience the sights and sounds of Sofia. We did a day tour to Rila Monastery and were only 5 minutes walking distance from the meeting point for our tour. I would recommend Maxi's place for a great Air BnB experience.", "Maxi is a very friendly, and responsible host. His place is an ideal retreat for Sofia city life!", "Very friendly host and great location (few mins walk from the center), getting anywhere in the city was very easy. Metro accessible and clean apartment. Unfortunately there were no mosquito nets in the bedroom which restricted us from keeping the windows open at night and that would get a little too stuffy since there was no A/C.  Clean bathroom but the screws from the shower kept coming off while using the bathroom. Overall, wonderful apartment with great location and good hospitality.", "Maxi's apartment is in a great location in walking distance of some great bars and restaurants. Located an easy 5 min walk from the metro (direct metro to/from the airport). The apartment is spacious, clean and pleasantly decorated, powerful shower, basic kitchen and comfy beds.  We had a great time and will not hesitate to book it again when we are back in Sofia !   Many thanks Maxi - you made our trip !", "Apparently the city was replacing pipes so hot water was only found in the shower but you need to find out how to work the system. We felt a toaster and also a microwave would have been very helpful. Also it was very hot so an air conditioning would make it a much more comfortable stay. If not, at least good screens so the windows could be left open at night and allow some circulation. 

Sometimes the cleaning help drops the ball and I think maybe that’s what happened in our case. We liked the overall feeling of Maxis place and Maxi and Alex were very responsive in trying to remedy the problems and answer questions. Very nice to work with. We would stay again with a few changes. ", "Top hospitality but no functional mosquito net or A/C.", "My friend and I stayed in Maxi’s place for four days. The location was absolutely fantastic! So central, and getting everywhere was so easy. Maxi made sure we knew that he was available at any time should we need anything. He also gave us some  good local tips when we checked in. The apartment was very clean, and has a really great amount of living space. The kitchen was fairly basic and could probably do with a toaster and/or microwave, but it does have a hob. We also struggled a bit with the freezer, but this isn’t a huge issue as, without an oven, you probably won’t need many things frozen! The bathroom was a good size, although again fairly basic- but has everything you would need. We got taxi’s to and from the airport and would hugely recommend the TaxiMe app that we used. A lovely stay in a very well located apartment!", "Wonderful, spacious and very well decorated apartment in a great neighborhood! ", "Perfect location for exploring the city; nice big living space. ", "Great spacious and tidy place in the very city centre. Has everything one needs for a comfortable stay. Friendly host, clear and simple communication. Highly recommended.", "We had an amazing stay at Maxi's! The apartment is spacious, comfortable and well-equipped, the host was kind and very responsive and the central location was priceless. Thank you!", "Maxi was a very helpful and kind host. His place is great too - perfect location, clean with loads of space. Very nice artwork on the walls! I would definitely stay again and recommend this place to anyone visiting Sofia.", "Maxi has a fantastic apartment in a nice location of Sofia. The apartment is bigger than expected on had everything we needed. From the apartment, travelling to other parts of the city is reasonably simple, allowing for an efficient city trip. Many thanks to Maxi, he let us check-in in the middle of the night and was even in the mood to give us some information regarding the neighborhood so that we could get started. I would really recommend this apartment to other travelers!", "Maxi was a very friendly and attentive host, and the communication was fast and efficient. The apartment is tastefully decorated, cosy and clean. It’s ideally located in the city centre, we could walk to all the main highlights of the city. I would definitely recommend staying here if you visit beautiful Sofia! ", "We enjoyed our 4 days spent in his flat (cleanliness, availability, welcome, well positioned)... I recommend!!!", "We stay at Maxi's flat for couple of nights. It is in the centre of Sofia with a walkable distance to nightlife and main attractions.

Maxi is amazing, he gave us many tips about where to go, eat and spend the evening.
The flat it is not like a 5 stars hotel, but it is what you need for a long weekend in Sofia, I recommend it.", "We had a great stay at Maxis apartment. It is very central located. Communication with Maxi was quick and easy. Check-in and check-out was easy, too. We did not miss anything and can fully recommend this apartment.", "Location, Location,Location :) 
Very cozy apartment at the heart of Sofia center !", "Had a great stay here. Communication with Maxi was quick and easy. The flat has plenty of space and is in a very central location - we walked everywhere. Maxi was a great host and replied to messages quickly, even checking on us in the middle of our stay to see if we needed anything.", "Nice big appartement as seen on the pictures. Maxi is good host. Price/quality is very good. Location was perfect. Very nice, busy but relaxed neighbourhood.", "The flat was very spacious, bigger than we thought when seeing the Fotos. It was also clean and the communication with Max was easy. The best of all is the amazing location, just in the center of town and very close to all the sights, restaurants and bars.", "perfect host and perfect stay", "This was a great base for a few days in Sofia. Clean, spacious and stylish apartment and good communication from Maxi.", "I am very happy to stay for second time in Maxi's  apartment, everything was excellent again plus there are some  new  improvements.", "Perfect, central location; cosy and spacy apartment; outgoing, helpful and easy to talk to host.", "Lovely place and cool living room with all comfort", "Great place, fantastic location (downtown Sofia is the best part of the city in my opinion) and a very friendly host. Would stay again if we were ever to go back.", "Spacious and very comfortable apartment. Located in the center of Sofia, with everything easily accessible, walking distance to restaurants, bars, grocery stores, the metro, and all the main attractions of the city. Easy check-in/out process. Maxi was a great host, easily reachable and very responsive.", "Our stay was very pleasant, and Maxi was very helpful.", "Maxi was a great host, always helped us with everything even with luggage! The apartment was very spacious and stylish. Will definitely return and recommend to anyone!", "The house of Maxi is super nice, perfect and in a perfect position close to all, and he is a friendly and nice person, :) thanks again", "Great location, within walking distance to major attractions and central town. Maxi was very accommodating with our check in and check out times.", "Maxi's place is  warm,spacious and centrally located in the heart of Sofia!Maxi was responsive regarding specific information we needed and also discreet as a host! Cheers Maxi!", "Maxi's apartment was perfect for a couple of days in Sofia. Location great, apartment very stylish and comfortable with all the facilities you would need. Communication with Maxi was quick and efficient. Would recommend to anyone visiting Sofia! ", "Nice and spacious home right in the city center. Maxi was a really kind host.", "We loved the apartment - great location, sylish touch to the amenities, spacious and quiet, children-friendly! Highly-recommended for an extended stay in the city - easy access to all landmarks, metro, etc. Maxi was a helpful and responsive host. Very pleasant experience overall!", "Everything was Great!!! Thank you!!!", "Perfect location! Huge place,clean and very confi
Absolutely recommend it!", "Greatly located, ground floor - easy access but not so bright - and spacious apartment. Max was a very helpful host", "Nice apartment in a great location. Near to local supermarkets, bars and restaurants. Host was very easy to contact and replied quickly, provided us with tips during our stay in Sofia and also allowed us to extended our check out time due to a late flight.", "Friendly host,  comfortable flat in good location.", "A good place to stay and explore Sofia.", "Found maxis place to be very comfortable and great value. It had all the essentials we needed and maxi was very helpful before and during our stay. Great location and easy to get to and from the airport. Would definitely recommend!", "All Perfect. Great location, in the middle of everything, nice restaurants around. Big appartment, clean and comfortable. ", "Beautiful place in a convenient location in Sofia centre! Highly recommended.

Merci Maxi ;D", "Very nice Host, the location is very central but quiet and close to everything. The apartment was spacious and the Internet really fast (50 mbs up and down)! Easy to communicate with the host and he was there within one minute for check in when we called him on arrival at the house. Basic but sufficient furnitures, beds and other things.", "Max is a great person and easy to talk to. The place is nice. Thanks for everything!", "Maxi was a great host, very kind and hospitable. Very clean and convenient flat.", "A great place to stay with plenty of nice bars nearby. Maxi is a very friendly host.", "Great location, great apartment, bigger than it looks but just as nice as it looks in pictures. Good bars in the area, we felt safe walking around at night, close by everything you can need including a supermarket and pharmacy. Highly recommended!", "The house is perfect location, big, clean, confort and maxi is  very good", "Maxi's place is cosy and spacious. The kitchen and bathroom are functional. Although we experienced some glitches upon arrival, Maxi was quick to fix them. The house is located in a very lively part of town , close to many shops and historical places. However, if you are a person who likes to go to bed early after a day of exploring, then perhaps you would want to seek a quieter place , as the street is filled with revellers until the wee hours and garbage collectors start working after midnight.", "We had good communication with Maxi before the trip and he accommodated us well even when we had a major flight delay. The location is very good right in the heart of the city, the house is very spacious as well.", "Maxi was very Kind and He helps us in a lot of way. The house is in the centre.", "Maxi is a great host. His apartment is in the center of City Center, all of the tourist point are within walking distance.", "Maxi's apartment is well located in a nice part of Sofia. The apartment is comfortable and has most of the facilities we needed. There are shops and good restaurants nearby. Maxi was there when we arrived and was friendly and helpful. A good place to stay.", "Very nice and comfortable flat, perfect for two couples. Central, in a calm but lively neighbourhood.

Maxi is also a charming host, always OK to help you in any way (ask him to make you taste the best ice-creams in town !)", "I had a great stay in Sofia, Maxi's apartment is super central in cute street walking distance to all attractions. It is very clean and beautiful decorated with all that you need for a pleasant stay. The host  Maxi seems like a very interesting guy and gave me lots of useful information about the city and the best places to visit. I would definitely come back when visiting the city again and I recommend this place to all travelers.", "This is a basic apartment, in a nice district of restaurants and bars.
The floorwood needs some serious maintenance, since you cannot walk without waking others up, and in some places the wood can even pinch your feet. Other than that, it seems Maxi is doing a big effort to renovate the flat and make it better, and the place has great potential. (so always look for the latest reviews).
Our host Maxi was very nice, and very easy to communicate with.", "Maxi's place is extremely central. Everything is walkable distance, metro to the airport is 3 min away. The neighbourhood can be quiet (not a main street) and loud at the same time (couple of bars nearby). Maxi was super responsive to the messages, attentive and accommodated us well. He met us at the place and showed it to us. The flat is bigger than it looks on the pictures, but because of the wooden floor it also looks a bit older. One of the double beds is a bit smaller and would be more comfortable for 1 person than for 2 (unless you really like to cuddle). The flat has everything we needed for a comfortable stay and I would recommend it.", "Maxi is a great host. He organized such that we could check in early and didn't feel stranded in a new city. Also he was super flexible with our check out. We loved the central apartment and proximity to all the great restaurants and sight seeing places in sofia. If you want to enjoy the old charm of Sofia city living then this would be ideal place for you. ", "I couldn't recommend booking this place enough! Maxi was the ideal host - very attentive and flexible. The place was very stylish and had character, with lots of cool art pieces. Also the location was super central, but also tranquil because the apartment was down a quieter road. ", "Perfect place to stay :-)", "I recently stayed in another of Maxi's apartments and really loved it. When I found out I needed to extend my stay, he was quite accommodating, and easily transfered me to this flat. It's in the perfect center of Sofia, close to shopping, public transport, and nightlife. The space is quite large and beautiful, with a full kitchen and bath, which are well-equipped for all your needs. Maxi is an amazing host, and the apartment is quite comfortable. I had a very calm and pleasant stay.", "The Apartment is perfect for four people. You can play cards and eat in the larger room. Easy to reach from the airport and the main attractions of the city are near by. I can recommend the apartement.

Cheers, 

Vitali & Friends", "Everything was perfect, Maxi was particularly helpful and flexible with our schedule! 2 things to say nonetheless, the area can be a bit noisy in the morning and at night, but nothing scandalous. Also, there was a problem with hot water in the shower which did not work properly but overall very pleasant stay! I would all advise you to choose this flat !", "Maxi's place is so great! Couldn't recommend enough. He's a thoughtful and helpful host. When there were some problems with the building, Maxi compensated and did his best to fix it quickly. It's a beautiful space in a great location, very close to everything. Please stay here. You won't regret it! Thanks Maxi!", "It is a good accommodation but is was quite noisy and the environment was a bit dilapidated. The apartment was good but it smelled a bit like someone has been smoking there for quite a while. Maxi was ver nice and helpful.", "Beautiful apt in a very central position. Max is a great host", "Perfect location and amazing apartement for friends or Family. Next to public transport, very cozy and calm ´neighbourhood. Maxi was always available and very kind. I highly recommand ! ", "Central area, perfect!", "Fantastic apartment with everything you need. Very close to metro stop and supermarket making it convenient. Also just around the corner from the magnificent Alexander Nevski Carhedral. Kind host more than happy to help. When I return to Sofia, I will return to Maxi's place. Thanks maxi.", "The apartment is nice and sunny. It is located in the best area of central sofia. Maxi the host, is friendly and considerate. His place is also very clean. ", "even though initially we were a bit weary of the street (a little run down) we were amazed at how good the location was and how central the apartment is to Sofia with a less than 10 minute walk to most places of interest in the city centre - once you get your bearings!

The apartment itself is spacious and well laid out, and had everything we needed for a short weekend stay and wouldn't hesitate to stay here again if I was to return to Sofia! ", "Maxi's place is very central and offered all we needed to explore Sofia over the weekend. The check-in was very smooth and friendly. Would come again!", "It's a very nice and spacious apartment. It's been decorated very beautifully by the friendly host himself. The apartment is situated in walking distance from the city centre, in a quiet residential area.", "Very good location, the apartment is comfortable and spacious with amazing atmosphere. Maxi was very helpful and respond quickly to all my questions. I recommend this place, one of the best  that i have been so far.", "Great apartment with all important attractions within short walking distance. Also nice restaurants just nearby. Very cosy and clean. Maxi was very helpful, giving informations about the city. The good place indeed. ", "My stay was just excellent! 
I was rather surprised by the place itself and the location as from the description I really didn't comprehend how well it was located! Later I stayed in other parts of Sofia as well, but this was my absolute favourite, everything was close by what made my stay especially comfortable! Stores were just around the corner and it was a really short walk to Ivan Vazov National Theater with its lively park :)
The apartment itself met my every need, as I like to cook some meals myself while travelling, I appreciated that the kitchen had all the things I needed. The rooms are spacious and comfy, I really enjoyed it because everything fit together so well. As I later learned form a short talk with the host that he is an interior designer, so no wonder your eyes feel at ease looking around in that apartment :D 
Host himself was very friendly and helpful, even gave me information about where to hike on Mount Vitosha.
And extra bonus! There is a shared garden as well with a bench to enjoy morning tea on it ;)

One of the nicest places I have stayed at!
Ethel", "L’appartamento è carino esi trova in una zona molto comoda vicinissima al centro", "Zeer centrale locatie in het centrum van Sofia, makkelijk om de stad te voet te verkennen. Ruime kamers, de keuken is wel wat beperkt als je er echt wil koken. Smaakvol ingericht. Het appartementencomplex is wel wat gehorig, 's ochtends werden we wakker van een hond boven. Bij het complex hoort ook  een mooie binnentuin. Over het algemeen hebben we genoten van het fijne appartement.", "Die Wohnung ist sehr schön, sehr zentral gelegen und schön ruhig. Der Vermieter reagiert schnell auf Wünsche. Bei uns war der Kamin leider nicht nutzbar. Vielen Dank!", "Очень хороший хозяин. Удобное расположение апартаментов в центре города. Рядом есть кафе. Чисто и  со всем необходимым.", "Superbe appartement au cœur de la ville. L'emplacement est juste parfait. La qualité du logement également. Maxi est un hôte disponible et très accueillant prêt a rendre service. Je recommande sans hésitation.
", "Maxi nous a accueilli avec le sourire malgré le retard de l'avion et a pris le temps de tout nous expliquer! appartement dans l hyper centre et parfaitement propre. à recommander les yeux fermés", "Maxi was erg behulpzaam ondanks het latere aankomstuur door vertraging op onze vlucht. Hij gaf ons nog een adres waar we konden eten een vooral: waar we de volgende dag de voetbal konden zien.", "Sehr schöne Wohnung, sehr zentral, aber dennoch ruhig gelegen.
Ich hatte nicht erwartet, dass sie im Erdgeschoss liegt, aber das war kein Nachteil.
Das Doppelbett steht im Wohnzimmer - wenn man also mit mehr als zwei Personen anreist, sollte einem das bewusst sein.
Ansonsten: Eine tolle Basis um Sofia zu erkunden.", "We hebben een erg fijn verblijf gehad in Sofia. Het appartement was het perfecte plekje na een lange dag in de stad. Er zijn veel leuke bars en restaurants in de omgeving, en ook het centrum is op loopafstand. 
Zeker een aanrader!", "Tolles sehr großes Appartement. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Die Lage der Wohnung ist zudem nicht zu toppen. Man ist mittendrin, hat aber trotzdem Ruhe in der Wohnung. Sehr empfehlenswert. ", "Het appartement is precies zoals op de foto's; mooi en ruim. De locatie is ook ideaal. Maxi is een super fijne host, de communicatie ging makkelijk en snel en hij heeft ons een paar goede eet tips gegeven voor in de buurt. Onze 2 nachten in Sofia waren veel te kort, we willen zeker nog een keer terugkomen en dan zouden we met veel plezier weer in deze airbnb verblijven!", "Die Lage der Unterkunft war perfekt. Wir würden wiederkommen :)", "Super Apartment in super zentraler Lage. Wenn ich das nächste Mal in Sofia bin, dann werde ich es gerne wieder buchen!", "Отличное местоположение, тихая улица, в 5-7 минутах ходьбы до главных достопримечательностей. Интересное оформление квартиры, много примечательных деталей. Комнаты просторные, есть все необходимое. Хозяин очень оперативно реагирует на сообщения и всегда готов пойти навстречу.", "El apartamento está muy bien ubicado, grande, cómodo y limpio.  Maxi muy majo y nos ayudó mucho.  Muy recomendable", "L'appartamento è in un punto strategico del centro città e con circa 7 euro si arriva in taxi oltre alla possibilità della metropolitana. Da li in poi si può girare a piedi e vedere tutto. Ci sono ottimi locali intorno ma la zona universitaria è lontana (circa 20 minuti di taxi se non ricordo male). Di positivo c'è che la casa risulta calda d'inverno ed è spaziosa. Di negativo, a mio parere, il materasso un pochino troppo basso e scomodo ma Maxi sono sicuro farà qualcosa perché è molto disponibile. Ottimo come punto di appoggio per un gruppo di amici. Ci tornerei.", "Posizione strategica. Accessibile, pulito e confortevole. Host gentile e disponibile. Consigliatissimo", "Appartement parfaitement situé et très spacieux, Maxi a pu se rendre disponible et nous conseiller sur les choses a faire et voir ! Recommandé fortement!", "Alloggio ampio, arredato con tutto l'essenziale, vicino al centro. Buona esperienza.", "Logement très bien aménager et propre. Maxi est très serviable et apporte ses conseils pour vous faire vivre un agréable séjour. Je recommande !", "L'appartamento di Maxi si trova in centro, a due passi a piedi da tutti i principali monumenti di Sofia e dalla fermata del tram che va all'aeroporto (terminal 2). Lo consiglio assolutamente per soggiorno brevi per visitare la città. Maxi è molto gentile e disponibile. ", "L'appartamento di Maxi e' molto bello, pulito, spazioso e vicino al centro della citta'.   Ci sono stato in piena estate ma non ho sofferto il caldo perché l'appartamento e' molto fresco.    Lo consiglio a tutti.", "Квартира находится в центре хозяин очень радушный . восхитительно", "Das Apartment ist sehr ruhig und auch im Sommer angenehm kühl. Die Lage ist optimal.", "Apartamento muy centrico ", "Es un buen anfitrión y con disposición para solucionar problemas. Muy buena ubicación y cerca del Metro."]

reviews: ["Miroslav's place was great and cozy. The bathroom and the kitchen were sparkling clean. The room is very well decorated, there is a small corner for eating and resting. The bed and the pillows were very comfortable.\nCommunication with Miroslav was very smooth and easy.\nHighly recommend the place and the host.", "Nice apartment - all what needed. Good location, two metro station away from Serdika.", "everything was fine. the room was very clean. we got there all things we needed.", "Studio is as described, very clean and comfortable. Communication with Miroslav was very easy and he help with everything he could.", "Everything was great.", "Miroslav was very friendly. Great apartment, clean and cozy with more than everything that we needed.", "Very good experience!!! See you soon Miroslav!", "Was a very pleasant experience. Everything was clean and was a nice location. Definitely plan on visiting Sofia again!", "An excellent and clean and new place to stay only 39 minutes walk from the centre and less than 10 to the metro which easily connects to the airport and city. Fantastic host that speaks excellent English and very amenable. Would definitely stay again and recommend to others. We wish we\u2019d found it at the beginning of our trip."]
topics: ['corner room well', 'nice needed apartment', 'fine everything room', 'communication easy help', 'everything great', 'friendly miroslav great', 'good experience miroslav', 'experience pleasant location', 'stay others recommend']

reviews:
["Very nice", "A very calm place at the center of Sofia.", "it was an pleasure booking with them, the room was lovely!  and it was an interesting experience for my first time,
thanks to the whole team for the effort they put in! all the best.", "Top apartment", "The studio is located in the city center. Very clean, cozy and stylish. Everything was perfect. Would like to thank Angel for quick responses. I enjoyed my stay a lot!", "Very nice apartment at a very good location. It takes only a few minutes to walk to the Mall of Sofia (a huge shopping mall) and there are many smaller shops nearby. Angel was a great host with excellent communication. Self check-in and check-out were a breeze with the lockbox and clear & detailed instructions from Angel.", "Comfortable and reliable
spacious and clean", "In a few words... everything was excellent! Would stay again.", "Great stay! I accidentally knocked the curtain down and someone was over to help me within the hour, they were so nice.", "Bogdan and Angel gave us very clear and useful instructions. Check in was great-there is a lock box which made it very easy to check in as we arrived late. The place is very clean and the bed comfortable. Central town is only 20 minutes’ walk. We really enjoyed our stay, thank you!", "Very nice place.", "Great place! Will definitely recommend them!!", "Comfortable and cozy studio about 20 minutes to the center of town. Great value for a private apartment on a budget. Very good communication and fast responses to my inquiries. ", "Everything was as promised, the house was very clean, the wi-fi is well, and i liked the decoration too. there really is everything you need or may need. ", "This place was great. It's got everything you need for a short stay and it's only about a 15-20 minute walk to the main sights. It was very clean and had everything I needed even for a longer stay already provided. The bed was comfy and the internet was fast and reliable. Angel always kept in touch, and even let me know when the water line was down in the area. He was also really helpful in ordering a cab for me to the airport. I would definitely stay here again. ", "I like there", "Angel and his co-hosts are very friendly and attentive, quick to respond to all questions. Angel provided a great guide for the city. The studio needs soundproofing ― it has concrete/plaster walls, and you can hear everything right through them. The area is fairly quiet, but the neighbors have a small child, so don't expect to get a good rest during the day. It gets quiet at night, though. The studio is not really in the center; it's 10-15 minutes from Opalchenska subway station (which itself isn't exactly the center, either), and 20-30 minutes to Serdika and NDK (which is) and Vitosha boulevard, Sofia's main pedestrian street. But seriously, get off at Serdika: the area is much more pleasant. Keep in mind that the trip from/to the airport could take longer than expected; it was 1.5-2 hours each way for me. Groceries and a mall are walking distance away. The studio doesn't have a stovetop (only a microwave) but is well equipped otherwise. The kitchen is separated from the bedroom by a plaster wall. There's indeed no separate shower cabin, but there are a showerhead and a sinkhole in the floor, so you just take a shower in the lavatory itself ― no problems. Ventilation is poor, but there's a working AC; keep it on when inside. There was a fairly strong smell of stale wet rags when I arrived, which the AC helped dissipate. Self-check-in/check-out are very easy and convenient, and Angel's directions make it extremely easy to find the place.", "These take excellent care of you and the studio has everything you need and more. They certainly care.", "Convenient location. Walking distance to all the shops and restaurants in the city. 
The studio is very comfortable, clean and cozy. As it looks in the photos.
Super easy check in. 
The hosts are super attentive from the moment you confirm the reservation. They provide very useful information about the city.
Communication is very effective. They're are always available to help you and answer all your questions. They make sure you feel like home. I definitely recommend this place!", "The studio is very beautiful and clean, i love so much. Near the studio, it has mall, market, bar and public park, very convenient. Angel is so kindly and give me so much helpfully information. It’s a good place.", "The studio is big enough for two. The instructions are clear and communication from owner is very fast and helpful. You can catch Tram 4 or 5 to the centre of town. Lidl is walking distance. The shower is unusual but does have good pressure and heat. WiFi is reliable and bed comfy. Would stay again. thanks!", "Everything was great:
- Good location close to the center (also LIDL food shop in about 15 mins walk).
- Clean and tidy apartment
- Very responsive host

Thanks a lot and take care!", "A clean and comfortable place to feel at home in Sofia. Thanks again !", "A bit far from the center (20 minutes walk) and with no shower or a proper kitchen (no stove/cooker). It also was very hot, with only one window. However, Angel was very helpful and the communication was quick.", "It is such a great cosy place to stay in!", "Nice place very close to sofia center .... I definitely recommend to everyone", "Everything went smoothly. The place is clean and very central, perfect for a short trip. Angel was very helpful. A beautiful weekend in Sofia.", "Angel is a perfect host. We even received PDF with information and recommendations before our trip. The apartment was nice and very clean, located in a calm are, 20min walk to city center. We strongly recommend it!!", "The best stay in Sofia!! The host thinks about everything you need and they help you in each thing you need. The place is perfect for two.... You have in everything you need in a regular flat.... Really everything!!", "Lockbox made it easy to do self check-in. Was quick with answering messages. They created their own travel guide about Sofia, including sites to visit, best restaurants, tours, etc. It was very helpful for hitting the ground running quickly.  Only "odd" thing was that as soon as you open the front door on the street, the bed is right there. Some people might be uncomfortable about that. I enjoyed my stay.", "Great studio, good location, quick communication, recommended!", "Me and my friend stayed at Angel’s place for 3 nights. Easy check in and good communication with the host. The studio was really clean, the bed comfortable and the wi-fi good ;) In the bathroom you could find spare shampoo, soap, tooth paste and in the kitchen space bags of tee and coffee which was really nice and appriciate it. The place is 5min walk to the nearest bus that takes you to the city center, its perfect for 2 persons for a couple of nights. Since they did not have guests the day we were checking out we could stay longer. Thanks a lot! I would stay at this place again and i recomend it.", "Angel's apartment is very clean, well-equipped and has everything you need. Kalina, which is the person I deal with, is very prompt to answer. Definitly recommand her place", "Comfy studio apartment with a really nice bed, in a quiet neighborhood walking distance from the center. Not much of anything within a 5 minute walk, but lots of supermarkets, shops and cafes can be reached in 5-10 minutes. The wifi was really excellent, and the shower had great hot water. Plus, the hosts responded REALLY fast to my queries and were very accommodating with my ever-changing plans to extend my stay, which I appreciated a lot. ☺", "Ako chovek tarsi naistina tiho mqsto za prestoi v Sofia,blozo do centara,  na sravnitelno niska cena, naistina bi izbral tova studio.
Bqh naistina priqtno iznenadan ot posreshtaneto, informaciqta kade kak da nameriq, chistotata i gotovnosta pri nujda da se pomogne-,, Ako se nujdaete ot neshto, tuk sa nashite tel nomera"-bqha dumite na sobstvenicite. Oshte vednaj Blagodarq!", "The place was exactly as described, very central location, quiet neighbourhood. The apartment is ideal for one person or a couple, very clean and nicely decorated. Shower room spacious enough, but like one of the travellers commented earlier do not forget to hide away toilet roll when you are having a shower! The hosts are great, information given is all you need with some great recommendations for places to visit and have a meal. Communication with the host was excellent.", "Good value for money! Great host.", "I stayed at this studio for 7 weeks, and being Solo female traveller, I think I can give an honest feedback about the place.

Pros:
1) Communication with Kalina was very good. She even sent me a detailed file suggesting things to do, restaurant and sights in Sofia. Even during my stay, she checked on me often to ensure I had no problems with the apartment or otherwise. Replied to the messages asap.
2)The apartment is located very close to the public transport.5 mins to the tram stop. Tram 4/5 takes you to the Serdika center or Palace of Justice. 15 mins walk to the Vitosha Boulevard 
3)The apartment had all the basic things(even the toiletries) for daily use and its extremely clean and well maintained.
4)There is a beautiful park just behind the apartment.
5)The area/neighbourhood is very safe, even if you are coming late at night. 
6)There is Mall of Sofia/Lidl(super market), which is 7-8 mins walking and Kaufland(super market) again 7-8 min walking distance.
7)The apartment is very comfortable and has A/C which is very important if you are travelling in summers.
8)There is a beauty salon next door, really good and inexpensive.

Cons:
1) The bed is just next to the main door. It feels unsafe in the beginning, however it is not. 
2)The shower space is small,so be mindful to remove the toilet roll before the shower or it gets soiled.
3)Lastly, the drying space for clothes. you can either dry is outside towards the car park, which is also the entrance for others in the building, thus not convenient for anyone or inside the house, resulting in your clothes smelling damp.
4) There is no gas or cooking equipment( it was clearly mentioned to me before I booked the apartment) but has a microwave.

To sum it up, I had an excellent stay in this apartment and I had started feeling like home. Its an excellent place to stay if you are visiting Sofia for work or for holidays. Will definitely come back and stay here if and when I visit Sofia next.
Highly recommended!!", "Angel was fantastic! He picked us up from the airport at 2am and gave us a tour of the apartment. He was able to answer questions and queries we had. The flat was lovely and had everything you needed (except a hob/oven but we knew that before arriving). 
Angel also sent big documents of things to do and see, as well as bars and places to eat. The location is about 20 minutes from the main street of Sofia to walk. It is also 20 minutes from the mall of Sofia. 
Overall it was brilliant if you want somewhere fairly central with a kitchenette, good transport links and an awesome host. ", "Very nice and central apartment, host very good people and helpful for our questions! ", "Angel's place is very clean and looks exactly like the photos and is only a 15 minute walk to the city center, i would highly recommend this place and would stay here again if I returned to Sofia. ", "Our stay at Angel's place was great. It was in a really convenient location - about a 10 minute walk to the nearest metro station. Everything in the apartment is exactly like the pictures. Angel and Kalina were very helpful and recommended lots of things to do while in Sofia. I will definitely stay there again if I am ever back in Sofia.", "From the outset, this was an easy booking to make with excellent communication and a fantastic range of local suggestions provided to help us plan a perfect city break. The apartment's description was accurate, the apartment was exceptionally clean and well-equipped, located about 10-15 mins walk from the main shopping street. Our hosts, Angel and Kalina, were proactive at all times, offering to arrange taxis throughout our stay (although we didn't make use of this), allowing us early check in and even leaving a few local treats as a welcome gift. Would highly recommend a stay here to explore Sofia.", "From arrival to an allowed late checkout, this was the best stay. It's a compact converted shopfront into a private studio apartment. Comfy bed, cable TV, great wifi and literally all the amenities you need. ALL of them, it's a little further out of town but still walkable within 15 mins or so. Otherwise it's close to public transport and also a short walk to a major shopping mall. Great stay would stay again.", "Apartment was clean and the host was helpful.", "Angel and Kalina were very nice to me. Angel came to the bus terminal at 7:30am on a national holiday to pick me up, he took me to his beautiful home for the breakfast and I met his wife Kalina who's super friendly and gave me many recommendations for sightseeing. On the day of my checkout, Angel called a taxi for me. Incredible hosts. Thank you so much for everything and I loved the breakfast!", "Great place simple flat with all the comfort that a single traveler needs.
Thanks", "Angel and his wife were so helpful to me and my partner when we visited Sofia. Before we had even set out on our flight Angel and his wife had sent 3 PDF files to us highlighting the best places to eat and have coffee, and attractions to see when you visit Sofia. These PDF files were massively helpful to us and prepared us well for Sofia. The apartment itself was really cool, great colour scheme, very clean and cosy and it had everything you needed there. The bed is so big, and very comfy as well, so especially after a long day of walking it is nice to come back and relax. Whilst at the apartment I was also finishing off University essays and didn't find a problem at all with the internet connection, it's very quick and great to stream shows on if Bulgarian TV isn't your thing. The location of the apartment is very convenient, you are so close to everything in the city that we managed to walk it the city all the time to visit the different churches, etc. Angel even gave us some great tips on where to go and places to drink (and there are lots of great places to eat and drink) and if we did have a problem or a question he was quick to solve and sort the situation as quick as he could. If you want a nice trip abroad, with a good location for an amazing price I would check out Angel's apartment. ", "Angel is a wonderful host, he has answered quickly to my messages and provided me all the information needed for our stay. The Studio is a perfect place for a short stay in the city, clean and tidy, walking distance from the center (or just 5lv away with a taxi). You could find a lot of items you might need, but do not want to carry arround in your hand luggage. The small details make the place feel like home and the colorful walls bring a good, playful mood. Even though it is a ground floor level, we have not felt disturbed. 

I would recommend it to friends. Thank you! ", "Great place at very reasonable price. It was very comfortable and easy to get to and from anyplace in Sofia.Angel was very helpful.I will definitely come back again. Hghly recommend!", "Angel is a great host with a perfect apartment to rent. Angel was very fast to respond to my messages and communication was easy. Check-in was also straight-forward, Angel greeted me at the apartment when I arrived and showed me around and gave some information about the surrounding area, local shops and sites.
The location of the apartment is excellent, there is a very large supermarket maybe a 5 minute walk away. There is a lot of transport options nearby, and you can also walk to the center, it's not very far. The area is quiet and mostly residential with some small businesses around. The Mall of Sofia is maybe a 10 minute walk away.
The apartment itself was perfect and is described well in the listing, it's cosy with a comfortable bed. There is a good air conditioner that kept the place warm, the internet is fast with no issues, the bathroom was very clean and the host also provided towels, shower gel and shampoo. 
I would book this listing again without any hesitation. 5 stars!", "Very good. Thanks.", "Excellent studio with amazing hosts, who helped us out with all of our questions and requests -- would definitely recommend this place.", "Truly, the best hosts we have ever had!The apartment is exactly as described, very clean, warm and cozy, with all the amenities for the guests. We meet Kalina, who was impressively kind, helpful and available to give us all the information we needed in order to have a beautiful time in Sofia. The location is not exactly in the historical center of the city, about 20-25 minutes on foot, but this is not a problem for someone who likes walking. Unfortunately, we weren't able to stay a little longer. We definitely recommend this lovely apartment.", "The apartment is amazing and cozy. It has absolutely everything you need, including heaters to keep warm during the cold moments. 

The apartment looks amazing too, and the wi-fi was fast (if you need it).

The location is close to a big shopping mall, and you can walk around freely and safely within the area and around sofia.

I highly recommend this apartment, I wish more apartments could cost this much and be this awesome.

Thanks again Angel :)", "I couldn't feel safe in the neighbourhood and in the house", "Good position ", "I stayed at Angel's place for the second time. Everything is good and well organized in Angel's apartment. I would totally recommend the place.", "Everything perfect!", "The studio is perfect! Everything you need for a short stay. The location is really good, using the public transportation or walking around. Park, supermarket, banks and bars in less than 5min walking.
Angel and Kalina are an amazing hosts...the best you gonna get!!!!!", "The flat was precisely how described, very clean and new. Location was also good, walking distance from all main tourist attractions. At our arrival we were kindly welcomed by Nadia, Angel's sister-in-law, who showed us all we could find in the house and even directions. We highly reccommend Angel's place.", "The host was very nice and well mannered. Attention to details and complimentary approach were outstanding. Strongly recommended.", "Angel was very helpful in checking us in. My girlfriend arrived earlier than me and he gave her all the information we needed. He also invited us for beers.

About the apartment, it's a nice and small apartment at the end of street. On one side, there is a new park of Sofia and other side is close to many places to eat and small shops.

The bed is next to door which in beginning felt like an issue but it's wasn't really a problem for us.", "Angel is an excellent host. Very friendly and knowledgeable about the local area and always offering to help. He gave me a lot of useful information on the day that I moved in and was always available to answer questions. The apartment was very clean and matched exactly with what was advertised in the listing.", "Angel ist ein super Gastgeber. Alles ist reibungslos abgelaufen, die Bestätigung der Buchung ging schnell. Der späte check in war auch unproblematisch. Selbst apartment, wie von Angel selbst auch beschrieben, ist kein Luxus apartment, aber ist sehr sauber und hat alles für ein kurzes Urlaubsaufenthalt. Die Lage ist auch gut, auf einer ruhig abgelegener Strasse, aber leicht in 10 - 15 Minuten bis nach Zentrum zu fuss zu erreichen.  Ich kann den Apartment nur empfehlen.", "Tutto perfetto, pulito e ordinato. Angel è molto gentile. Grazie di tutto. A presto!", "Excelente! Todo como lo describen. Lo recomiendo totalmente!!!", "Der Host war sehr zuvorkommend. Eine späte Anreise würde möglich gemacht und die Kommunikation ist super gut und schnell gelaufen. Das Studio ist kompakt aber völlig ausreichend, ich war eine Woche dort und es hat mir gut gefallen. ", "Pequeño estudio tal como se indica pero con las comodidades necesarias. A unos 20 minutos a pie de la zona comercial y de restaurantes.  Angel nos recibió y nos explicó muy bien los alrededores, como llegar al centro incluso nos facilitó información extra que le pregunte para llegar a vitosha. También nos ayudo a reservar el taxi para que nos llevara al aeropuerto el último día.  Genial estancia. Lo recomiendo. 
", "L'appartamento di Angel è come descritto nell'annuncio. Piccolo ed essenziale ma completo, caldo e pulito. La posizione non è centralissima, ma a 10 minuti di cammino ci sono i mezzi pubblici ed i taxi. Angel ed i suoi collaboratori sono stati molto accoglienti e disponibili. Se dovessi tornare a Sofia tornerei senza dubbio nell'appartamentino di Angel", "Angel est très sympathique, je recommande pour une petite période.", "El lugar es tal como se describe en el anuncio. Con cercanía a la Estación del metro y a dos cuadras de buses y tranvía. La atención de Ángel fue cordial  y volverla a alojarme allí."]
