reviews:
["George's apartment is centrally located.", "George is very kind. The place is in great location. Nice and clean. I met his lovely daughter who checked me in and showed me the place and his wife who came on checking out! 
The entire family is super kind and I will definitely recommend! ;) 

", "Perfect location in central Sofia. The place is small but very cozy. Highly recommended", "Great location. Very clean and cozy place.", "Was my last day in Bulgaria, and I choose again this apartment for my third time. Perfect like always!!!", "Like a quiet but central hide away in the middle of the city. ", "I was in this apartment some months ago, when I saw the availability I checked inn as fast as I could, is better then a 4 star hotel room!!!", "Close to the city but in a quiet street, everything I needed was close by. Internet was great and so were the hosts. ", "George's place was nice, clean, the location is very comfortable, for 5-10 you will reach all main touristic places. The host welcomed warmly and kept in touch to know if everything is going fine. Would definitely recommend him :)", "The apartment is better than a 4 star hotel room here in Sofia, perfectly located and the owner is a very nice person ", "Perfect place for a couple!", "Very good and cosy apartment.
George is a very nice person.
I would go back and recomend this place.", "We had a great stay at George’s flat. The flat was like a hotel room, very clean and comfortable. I recommend staying at this flat. ", "Building looks a bit rundown, the apartment is small with 1 sink in the bathroom.   That said it was a very nice small apartment definitely comfortable for 2 people.  Great location, walking distance to parks and other places in Sofia.
Close to Synagogue and  the Jerusalem restaurant.  Good choice for Shabbat.  ", "George is a really nice guy. Allowed us to do an early check in and gave us tips for Sofia. The apartment is really nice, though the building doesn't match its style. Would definitely recommend", "Our stay at George's place was great, he was very nice and thoughtful. The appartment was clean, cute and with great location. We warmly recommend!", "The place was really nice and clean! Mr George was really communicative and kind...the location is great too!", "I had a wonderful stay at George’s place, very clean and central and he provided some tea, coffee, soap and shampoo!", "Excellent location, 5 min walk to center. Great communication with host, everything as described. Highly recommend!", "It was such a great place, near everything, George and his daughter were great hosts, hipe to come back to his place again!", "George’s place is in an awesome location. He’s super friendly, and is an awesome host :)", "I found myself in a last minute need of place and got instant reaction from George. The stay was lovely and well situated. Thank you for all!", "Lovely apartment in a fantastic location, walkable to all the main sites as well as the metro (if travelling to/from the airport). George was great, from the moment I landed in Sofia he always answered any questions or queries very promptly. Special thanks to his son for meeting me past midnight after my flight was delayed. Highly recommended. Thanks George.", "Very nice host, welcome us at the middle of the night due to our flight arrival time, communicative, fast response, the flat is 5 mins away from the city center, the building is outdated but the flat is renovated with a secure door, nice pick for a couple on short visit", "Really nice place to stay in Sofia. Literally 5 minutes from the center. George is an amazing host, he take care of us a lot, sending us Sofia information and weather news. I had a perfect experience in Sofia thanks to this place :)", "Very nice place, very close to center. Great for solo travelers, maybe even a couple.", "Really nice place to stay over in Sofia center. The place is very clean and tidy, cosy and warm. George was an amazing host always making sure everything was ok. A bottle of Bulgarian wine and local sweets were waiting from me when i got in :) i recommend and ill use it again next time i come to Sofia.", "Nice Apartment close to sofia's center. Everything you need for a good weekend trip :)", "We had a very good stay in Sofia, the place is very well situated and Georges gave us very nice wine to enjoy. We recommend it :)", "The apartment was clean and in a really good spot. All the city sides were in walking distance. 
All in all you get exactly what you paid for, and that is something very important. We definitely did not regret staying there and would rent the place again! 5 stars from me!", "I stayed at the Budapest Apartment for two weeks and it was a great place all around.  The flat is centrally located, super clean, and George is very responsive to even minor queries.  An ideal option for those seeking a compact yet pristine apartment, without a kitchen but with a microwave, fridge and water kettle.  Lots of nice touches for guests made the stay especially pleasant.  Plenty of good, reasonably priced takeaway restaurants nearby too.  Barista cafe especially is ideal for grabbing a high quality coffee or working in the excellent space. Strong recommend in central Sofia for Budapest Apartment.", "We really enjoyed our stay. Flat is in a great location close to the city center attractions. It is really new, clean and comfortable and has everything that we neeed. I recommend as a nice place to stay in Sofia", "The place was small but comfortable and close to the city center.  George was a kind, helpful and professional host.", "George was a really kind and professional host. Best choice for a couple in Sofia.", "Very close to most of the interesting places of the center of Sofia. The building needs a rehabilitation, but the mini-apartment is brand  new, with all you need to enjoy the city: clean, air conditioning, TV with international channels, refrigerator, coffee machine, nice bathroom...", "Good studio apartment in great location very central but in a quiet street. The communication from George was excellent both for checking in and checking out. He also provided some gifts upon our arrival which was greatly appreciated.", "just for sleep is the perfect place..
thanks again", "Great location. Great host. The apartment is very clean, stylish, efficient - a tad small but if you don't need a full kitchen this place is perfect!", "Perfectly located little studio apartment, right in the centre of Sofia. George is a great host who strikes a perfect balance between allowing you your space and independence while being on hand at a moments notice if you need anything. Would definitely stay again.", "Our stay at George's appartment was very good. The appartment is located very close to the city center. It provided everything we needed and even a little food package (fruits, water, wine) when we arrived. We didn't need a kitchen as eating out is quite cheap (and very delicious!) in Sofia. The appartment is in walking distance to all main sights and a metro station, supermarkets and restaurants are close by. The main bus and train station can be reached in 20 minutes on foot. The apartment was clean and comfortable. All in all, we would recommend to stay there!", "This was our first Airbnb experience and it was wonderful. George was a great host! Wine, flowers, even an invite to come have dinner with his family at a restaurant when we arrived. The apartment was clean, comfortable, and in a perfect location on a quiet street in the city. We felt safe and comfortable the entire weekend. Check-in was smooth and George's son was right on time to pick up the keys from us for check-out when we left. Would absolutely recommend George's place!", "Perfect location in Sofia's city center. Apartment had everything we needed. Communication with George went smoothly, as well did the check-in & check-out. I would recommend this to everyone!", "Convenient studio apartment in Central Sofia. Great coffee shop in which to work just around the corner (Barista café). Used the In Your Pocket app to find some great restaurants in the city. Really enjoyed my stay.", "George has been a nice host. He waited for me when I came to Sofia late at night. The apartment is located in a nice place very close from the Cathedral and the city center. The apartment has a cozy and comfortable decoration and you can feel there like at home.", "The stay from the very start till the end was very organised and cosy. If you are looking for a warm, well-located accommodation with a very friendly landlord (this includes his entire family), I would definitely recommend it.", "Nice, cozy apartment. Comfortable bed, modern furniture and bathroom. With fridge and microwave, here in Sofia this apartment is a great option as you can go to the market near the synagogue and buy local food to take away :) Great host, definitely recommended", "The apartment is very well located, 15min-20min walking from the main city attractions. It's small studio but more than enough for two people. It's clean and has small utilities need for a short stay. George is really helpful and flexible in terms of schedule.", "L'appartamento è in posizione centralissima ed è ben arredato ed organizzato. Pur non avendone la cucina ha tutto l'occorrente per riuscire a mangiare qualcosina anche a casa. Rete wi-fi ottima.
George è una persona molto amichevole e cordiale, lo consigliamo molto come host.
Sarete nel cuore pulsante di Sofia, nelle vicinanze non mancano Bar, Ristoranti, Pub, negozi etc.
Le principali attrazioni turistiche sono a meno di 600 metri dall'appartamento. Consigliatissimo!
", "George was very kind and available in all moment. He helped us in our late arrival and wait for us after midnight.
Only explain about the main acces and stairs, it is very poor and unconfortable to find the building in that conditions but the apartment despite is small in very confortable and has all you need for a short stay in Sofia.", "George is a very nice person. He always answers very quick to every questions and is available. And he took the time to walk with me around the close neighborhood to show me some places to eat and drink near the flat when I arrived.
The location of the flat is perfect. Close to the center, not far from the metro station, and in a really quiet place.
The flat is clean, the matress is super comfortable. The Internet connection is fast and perfect.
I really recommend.", "George and his son Julian were great hosts, the flat is in a central location in a quiet but interesting neighbourhood with restaurants etc. Might not be for you if you want a more intense house share but worked for me to have my independence and I got enough local info. Everything was Spick and span, and communication great. There was a rather bad smell from the drain at one point but this was cleared up quickly. Was really impressed with the hairdryer and UK plug adapter! The complimentary water and wine also turned out to be really useful and was a really nice touch. Would definitely return, thanks a lot guys :)", "We had a really nice stay. The flat is perfectly located in a very safe and central neighbourhood.
There is everything in the flat that you need.
Our check in and check out went very well.
I would totally recommend the flat.

Unfortunately the floor wasn't properly cleaned.", "George's apartment is absolutely fantastic and I believe it offers the best value for money in the whole of Sofia. The flat offers a very nice and clean bathroom, doublebed, TV, Wifi, Refrigerator with water ans wine,  tea kettle, air conditioning. It is very central to most of the sight-seeing venues in Sofia. The host and his family are very helpful and quickly reply to all requests. ", "George was very helpful host. He managed even to deliver my a computer when needed. Definitely worth of recomending.", "I am very satisfied with a room with all guests needs covered (WiFi, bathroom etc). Great welcome with bottle of wine, water and fruits. TV has different channels from different countries for all kind of taste. I liked most Travel HD that showed all Bulgarians beautiful places. George was a great owner and a whole week I felt his support. He is also great guide to whom one can apply in order to organize a great tour. ", "The apartment is right in the centre of Sofia just a 5 min walk to vitosha blvd. Great location, clean & modern, small studio apartment with fast wifi.", "The place is very central and had all the basics covered. The remodeled space is very comfortable. George is great and even collected a parcel for me.  Wi-Fi was flawless and lots of local establishments make for convenient and memorable times.", "I stayed at the "Budapest" apartment for three nights in early June 2016.  Apartment was very comfortable and centrally located.  George was a great host - answering any questions I had and even walking me to the bank to exchange money.", "Georges apartment was very modern and comfortable. The area of the apartment is located very central, but still in a nice quiet street. 
George and his son welcomed us well and are very friendly. 
I can really recommend this apartment to everybody! ", "Tutto ok.
Ci siamo trovati bene.
L’appartamento è piccolino ma moderno e accogliente con un letto molto comodo.
La zona è ottima.
George è gentile, ospitale e disponibile.
Ci proponiamo di ritornare.", "le studio de George est bien situé pour visiter Sofia à pied , il est conforme aux photos du site bien décoré et très propre. entièrement satisfaite de mon séjour", "L'alloggio è carino e rispecchia la descrizione, zona centralissima e ben fornita, ingresso pittoresco. George è molto preciso e puntuale, non fa mancare nulla ai suoi ospiti. 
", "Tutto perfetto! Posizione centrale a due passi dalle principali attrazioni. George è una persona molto simpatica e ospitale.", "L'appartamento di George è situato in una posizione davvero comoda e vicina ai luoghi d'interesse della città. Era tutto in ordine, abbiamo avuto solo un piccolo inconveniente con il vicinato (forte odore di fumo che entrava in casa alle 6-6:30), ma l'host è stato molto disponibile e tutto si è risolto quanto prima. Molto consigliato!", "Monolocale grazioso e pulitissimo, perfetto per due persone! Posizione centrale, a due passi dalle maggiori attrazioni. George host super disponibile, comunicazione veloce.", "O apartamento do George é lindo e muito bem localizado! A fachada do prédio a princípio assusta um pouco, mas o apartamento em si por dentro é super aconchegante e lindo! Estava tudo muito bem arrumado e limpo! Tínhamos toalhas e edredom quentinho. Senti falta apenas de um tapete para enxugar os pés. Algo que me incomodou um pouco foi que na noite anterior ao nosso check out, havia um vizinho que estava fumando muito (eu e meu marido não fumamos então isso nos incomodou)! Esse foi o único incômodo! Mesmo assim o George foi super receptivo conosco!", "Localización optima. George es muy amable y atento. Perfecto para pasar unos días visitando la ciudad.", "Todo genial,me espero a la llegada,muy  recomendable.George es una persona muy cercana,se preocupo de escribirme todos los días para preguntar si todo estaba bien.Volveria sin dudarlo.", "미리 예약했던 호스텔에 문제가 생겨 당일에 급하게 예약했는데, 예약확인도 매우 빠르게 받을 수 있었고 거의 바로 체크인할 수 있었습니다. 
George가 직접 아파트를 안내해줬는데 굉장히 친절하고 소통에 어려움이 없었어요!
방은 작지만 깔끔하고 주변 관광지까지의 거리도 좋은 편입니다. 
전날 미리 연락하면 체크아웃시 10유로에 공항까지 데려다줍니다.", "Appartamento funzionale e in una buona posizione. Ottimo prezzo. Host molto gentile.", "Muy buena habitación. Pagué 20 e. muy buena relación calidad precio. Ideal para dos personas que visiten Sofía. Muy cerca del centro, iba caminando. Barrio pintoresco, me gusta el ambiente. La fachada del edificio es horrorosa, en mal estado, y la escalera también, pero el piso está totalmente reformado y nuevo, no te dejes impresionar por la fachada y la escalera. La cama, grande y cómoda. Tiene aire acondicionado, pero no lo use. Si vuelvo, repetiría. Y George es muy amable, se ofreció a indicarme sitios visitar en el país. Todo perfecto!", "Todo muy agradable y George ha sido un anfitrión magnifico.", "Desde el primer momento George ha sido un anfitrión estupendo. Me he sentido como en casa.
El apartamento se encuentra muy bien ubicado, cerca de la Catedral y con una decoración agradable y en el que recomendaría y repetiría sin duda.", "El apartamento es bastante acogedor y cómodo. Perfecto para una pareja.", "Квартира полностью соответствует описанию.  George приятный в общении, в любое время был доступен. Обеспечил нам трансфер из аэропорта, даже после срока пребывания. По запросу предоставил детский стульчик, за это отдельное ему спасибо. Провел экскурс по раслоположению магазинов, кафе, ресторанов. Помог с парковкой. Полностью довольны. Будем рады остановиться в следущий раз у George снова.", "Llegamos a Sofia el sábado de madrugada y George estuvo esperándonos en el portal, no nos puso ninguna pega a pesar de que tuvimos algún imprevisto y llegamos bastante más tarde. Fuimos con coche de alquiler y nos enseñó donde podíamos aparcar, nos advirtió que en la green zone que es donde se encuentra el piso hay que pagar y hay un máximo de horas para estar estacionado (creo que eran 3). Se portó con nosotras de maravilla, nos escribió un par de veces para ver si necesitábamos algo y nos hizo varias recomendaciones de sitios para ver. Acertó de pleno. El apartamento está genial para dos personas. Nos dejó agua y vino en la nevera y algo de fruta. Tiene secador, una cafetera con sobres de café y de manzanilla. El apartamento es muy moderno y cuenta con aire acondicionado, el cual nos vino de maravilla porque hacía bastante frío en Sofia(puedes regular la temperatura). Si volviera a Sofia repetiría alojamiento sin dudarlo.", "Het is een geweldige verhuurder met een leuk appartement. Goed gelegen in het centrum. Echt een aanrader."]
topics: ['apartment centrally george', 'kind clean nice', 'sofia perfect location', 'location great clean', 'perfect always like', 'like hide middle', 'month saw hotel', 'close needed quiet', 'definitely recommend would', 'room sofia perfectly', 'couple perfect place', 'cosy apartment good', 'flat hotel room', 'small apartment 1', 'would definitely recommend', 'cute location clean', 'location mr great', 'stay tea shampoo', 'highly recommend great', 'place great near', 'super friendly host', 'stay well situated', 'george thanks always', 'flat nice night', 'sofia u place', 'nice close center', 'local ill making', 'center sofia apartment', 'u wine sofia', 'place definitely rent', 'budapest apartment week', 'stay really enjoyed', 'host kind george', 'host really george', 'center interesting close', 'checking location street', 'perfect place sleep', 'great location host', 'notice host george', 'stay appartment good', 'experience airbnb first', 'apartment everything needed', 'stay enjoyed really', 'host george nice', 'stay start cosy', 'nice cozy apartment', 'small term flexible', 'molto george host', 'moment kind available', 'really close place', 'really turned complimentary', 'check went well', 'offer doublebed conditioning', 'deliver computer needed', 'great guide also', 'apartment walk sofia', 'local flawless make', 'comfortable centrally located', 'apartment george everybody', 'ci trovati siamo', 'de satisfaite entièrement', 'mancare george non', 'ospitale simpatica molto', 'molto consigliato situato', 'due perfetto pulitissimo', 'e lindo é', 'george atento muy', 'todo persona preocupo', '수 미리 예약했던', 'prezzo ottimo gentile', 'muy buena pagué', 'magnifico muy todo', 'como sentido casa', 'una para perfecto', 'полностью соответствует квартира', 'si sofia repetiría', 'echt aanrader gelegen']

reviews:
["Excellent host! Provided everything we needed", "We retired in January 2017 and have had 19 months travelling, using AirBnB almost exclusively.
Maria's unit in Sofia is the best unit we have experienced in this time.
The unit is modern, spotlessly clean, very well located and setup perfectly for a travelling couple.
We walked from the station to the unit in under 20 minutes. There is a terrific local market ("the Ladies Market") as well as a good Billa supermarket within 5 minutes walk. We chose to walk in to the city (you could easily use a tram) and were generally where we wanted to be within 20-30 minutes.
The kitchen is amazingly well setup, with a 4 plate cook top, oven, microwave, jug, toaster, several coffee machines and more pots and pans than you are likely to need. We stayed for a fortnight and everything we needed was there.
The unit is remarkably warm, as it faces south and gets good sunlight all day.
The hot water was continuous and piping hot.
Having a washing machine and dryer in their own room was handy.
Sofia was also a great experience - a fascinating city.
We loved it all and will definitely be back.
Thanks for your hospitality Maria.", "Maria is a perfect host. Wonderful, modern and spacious, appartment in the heart of the city.", "Maria's place is absolutley amazing gem in the Wonen's market district area. The building is absolutely lovely and the appartment is well renovated, designed with a personal touch. and got everything needed. It's location allows you, to explore the city the best way possible.  Maria was a wonderfull host, the communication was very easy along with checking in and out that were really smooth. This is an absolutely recommended apparment in Sofia. Definitely coming back there", "We loved the apartment, very cleam, Fresh bed linen with a good smell. modern building. very well equiped extra pillows etc.   close to bila supermarket.", "Maria's apartment was spacious, clean, and very comfortable! One of the best places we've stayed during our 3+ months traveling. Kitchen has everything you need to make simple meals, cute balcony for coffee, and she even has a clothes dryer, which was a treat :)  Couldn't recommend this place enough. I only wish we could've stayed longer!", "this is the best apartment by far. u will not regret it.", "It was a pleasure to stay in Maria’s apartment for four nights, excellent value for money. Recently renovated, it’s equipped with everything you’ll need for a stay of any length.

Prior to arrival both hosts were very informative and prompt with their messages; on arrival Nelly issued the keys, showed us around the place and was keen to offer advice on the area. She was in no rush to leave and was very helpful.

During the stay we encountered absolutely no issues, the place was well stocked with toiletries, pasta, coffee, tea and sugar; linen was clean and there were extra pillows, towels and linen available of which we were invited to use if necessary.

At the end of the stay, as no other guests were booked for the next day we were kindly offered a late checkout which was perfect for us because our flight was in the evening.

I can safely recommend this property to anyone needing Accomodation in Sofia - especially to those who are visiting for the first time.

", "The apartment was brilliant! It was clean and stylish with all the amenities you could need for couples or for a solo traveller. The apartment is bigger than it looks in the pictures as well and is fifteen minutes' walk to the town centre. Maria was very helpful. She met us at the apartment and gave us tips about the local area. We would definitely stay again.", "Maria's place is in a great location. We went to the Women's market which is about 3 minutes walk away every other day to get fresh fruit and rest of the downtown and sightseeing opportunities are close-by as well. Apartment itself is clean, roomy and has everything needed for an extended stay.", "The apartment is just lovely! The bed is really comfortable, like the sofa, kitchen is well equipped, with coffee machine and everything you need! You’ll find a supermarket 3 minutes from the apartment, that is always handy!
Maria was a great host,  Every question we had she was fast and helpful!

I really recommend the place :)", "Fantastic specious apartment.  Very good location . Maria is fantastic host I will defiantly book again next time", "Very kind host, flexible as my flight was delayed late in the evening, she waited for me. The property is big, well-equipped and very clean.", "One of the nicest appartments we have stayed in. The place is very well decorated, stylish and full of thoughtful touches - it has everything that you would need for a luxury stay.  The host was lovely and welcoming. I highly recommend this place.", "The apartment is brand new, very clean and equipped with everything necessary. The host is very friendly and helpful and has given us some tips. The city center is within walking distance, if you don't want to walk you can also take a taxi (very cheap in Sofia).
We would stay again here. 
Thank you for everything.
Best regards Michele", "The apartment is much better than in the photo. Spacious, comfortable and clean, modern apartment in a new house, quiet. The owners are very caring people. There is everything you may need plus Nelly always answers questions and gives you advice. The location is perfect, close to the center. Near the market with excellent and very cheap rural products. If we're back in Sofia, we'd definitely stay here. Highly recommend. A small price for such a high-quality thoughtful atmosphere! and welcome!", "Highly recommend. Maria was extremely helpful and informative. 
Apartment is new and in immaculate condition. Everything you need is provided. The accommodation is similar to a serviced apartment.

Excellent location - 10 minute walk or 1 tram stop to downtown. Largest market in Sofia is 1 minute walk away. We ate at one of the cafe style restaurants there - 3 main courses, 2 salads & 3 soft drinks for 15 lev.  Also ate at Niagara which is a 2 minute walk and would also highly recommend.", "Maria has a wonderful place! We felt right at home. Her niece who checked us in is a lovely host and offered all sorts of recommendations. We would stay here again anytime. Thank you!", "I had a lovely time during the two weeks I spent in Maria`s apartment. It was modern, spacious, cosy and exactly as described. It`s located at the city centre, close to public transport, shopping streets and markets. Maria was a great host and the communication was easy.  I highly recommend Maria`s place and would love to stay there again when I go to Sofia.", "Clean flat,  all necessary amenities included (if else, there is a local supermarket called Billa and can buy all necessities)

In the centre of Sofia with access to the metro (within walking distance)

Nelly has been very helpful with all details, tips and guidance around town.

Will come back for sure!", "Everything was great. The apartment was very clean and nice. The hostess were friendly and helpful.", "The welcome was wonderful: a very good communication, clear instructions, very friendly hosts. The apartment is spic and span, everything one needs is there, and there is a lot of space. The location is also perfect: walking distance from the center, near to a daily marketplace with the freshest local ingredients. Quiet and safe neighborhood, I traveled alone and didn't feel frightened at all.", "She has been a wonderful host, she helped us from the check in to the check out.
She has been kind and helpful, she also gave us nice suggestions on how to take the best out of the city and so we did! It was a wonderful experience in a nice and clean apartment. Highly recomended", "The apartment is amazing abd location one of the best, Maria and Nelly the hostest persons, the advice us good places and very kind, i recommend this flat as one of the best in Sofia", "My family spent a few days at Maria's place, but we would have liked to stay longer as we love Sofia..! :) The flat is really cozy, clean, spacious and equipped with all you need and makes you feel like at home. We really appreciated the wardrobe with additional bed sheets, blankets and towels. The location is great, we walked to the very city center and the metro station is also not so far. From and to the airport we took a taxi ca. 15 min for ca. 7€. The communication with Maria was really good, she was kind and helpful and we were also able to check-in late in the evening. Check-out was also really easy. We definitely recommend Maria's flat for short (and long) stays in the city of Sofia.", "Maria has a great apartment. The location is just perfect. A 15 minute walk to the city centre. The neighbourhood itself is very quiet. The apartment is very clean and the apartment has everything you could need. 

We communicated with Maria's niece Nelly and she was very helpful with describing the city, how to get to the apartment from the airport, and she also gave us useful tips on restaurants and activities in Sofia. 

Highly recommended!", "A lovely, lovely experience. The apartment is sunny and warm in the winter (we visited February) and it feels like home. There are little things provided by Maria which make you feel cared for. She even arranged the taxi to the airport and offered to wake us up at 4 in the morning so as not to miss our flight!! Thanks, Mamma Maria :). 

The location is ideal, about 800 metres from the central metro station (Serdica II) and right next door to a lovely street market where you can get fruit, veggies, meat, fish, pizza (at about 1.3 euro for a humongous slice) but also clothes, shoes and souvenirs (low prices) and a super market. The main attractions of the city are all around Serdica Station so quite close to the apt. Highly recommended!", "Modern, newbuilt house in the center of sofia, very clean and proper for long/short stay", "Very beautiful, cozy, modern apartment. Good location, very clean, warm and wide. The hosts were amazing and very helpful, great hospitality, I definitely reccomend this place, and will go back for sure.", "Maria&Neli’s flat is more than an apartment in the heart of Sofia, it’s clean, huge, worm, only 10-15 minutes distance by foot from the central Vitosha boulevard, and 5 minutes from the central station! We highly recommended this place, expecially for Maria and her niece Neli: it’s rare to find people so kind and helpful for every kind of necessity or need. They made us feel like being home, and Neli gave us a lot of good suggestions about restaurant, cocktail bar, club and place to visit. We also spent a day with her in a near old city (Plovdiv), and she was really friendly and kind! 
Definitely, one of the best accomodation I had during travelling around the world :) thank you very much Maria&Neli, hope to see you soon! 
Silvia&Francesco", "One of the best accomodations I had during travelling around the world. Very comfortable, clean and well equipped. It is very good situated, not far from the metro and very close to the market. Mary`s niece Nelly was very helpful and she could give you many advice where to go, what to do, etc. Thank you very much Maria and Nelly.", "I highly recommended this place. It is only 10-15 minutes distance from the central bulevard Vitosha, 5-7 minutes distance from the metro station and also there is market in the neighborhood. The place was very clean and warm.We were in touch with Nelly Maria's niece, who she was very kind and helpful when we needed her. I just loved this place.", "This appartment is simply as shown in the pics: huge, confortable and really stylish! All the forniture is new and there isn't nothing missing! It is well lit and well insulated from the outside to rest calmly. In addition, it's equipped with many useful details for travelers. I want to make special mention of the bathroom, which is very modern and complete. The bedroom is very huge as well. It's equipped with a large wardrobe, TV, and also a private terrace that allows you to sit and chill out a bit.

Maria and her niece Nelly were waiting for me at the agreed time and gave me a warm welcome. If you have any kind of doubt they will do their best to help you as soon as possible along your stay. Maria and Nelly made me feel like being home and showed me around the city. Even further, Nelly is a very smart and alive girl who enjoys helping perople in order to make your trip enjoyable. She always has good suggestions if you need it :P Thank you for your hospitality and dedication, Maria and Nelly! You two are very kind people.

I absolutelly recommend the place and will repeat again the next time I come! So...waiting to see you soon again! Maybe we could share some drinks in Barcelona for the next occasions ;)", "Nuestra experiencia como huéspedes en el alojamiento de María fue extraordinaria, por lo que animamos a otros usuarios a decantarse por esta opción para disfrutar de su estancia en Sofía, Bulgaria. Nos gustaría destacar los siguientes aspectos:

1)	María es una anfitriona de confianza, la cual está siempre disponible para resolver dudas antes y durante el alojamiento.
2)	El apartamento se corresponde con lo representado en las imágenes, y la impresión que genera al llegar al mismo es cálida y acogedora. Nos sorprendió gratamente la cantidad de recursos adicionales de los que dispone (nosotros, por ejemplo, no tuvimos que hacer ningún gasto en droguería; e incluso pudimos cocinar algunas comidas con lo que nos había dejado almacenado).
3)	Todos los aparatos electrodomésticos funcionan a la perfección, y el suministro de agua caliente es realmente eficiente.
4)	El barrio, aunque a simple vista pueda no parecerlo, es bastante tranquilo y no presenciamos ningún tipo de conflicto. A menos de 5 minutos se encuentra un pequeño supermercado BILLA en el que encontraréis productos necesarios para vuestra estancia a un precio muy asequible; en frente de este, se encuentra el Mercado de Mujeres (punto turístico). Además, se puede llegar a la estación de metro de Serdika en menos de 10 minutos a pie (el trayecto Serdika ↔️ Aeropuerto dura unos 20 minutos) y en aproximadamente 20 minutos es posible acceder al centro de la ciudad al pie de la Catedral de Aleksandr Nevski, por lo que la ubicación del alojamiento es excelente.", "Es un apartamento perfectamente equipado para pasar varios días, limpio y nuevo. María nos recibió correctamente. Nosotros repartiríamos sin duda.", "Το σπίτι είναι έτσι ακριβώς όπως το χρειάζεται κάποιος για να νιώσει πως είναι σπίτι του. Είναι μοντέρνο πεντακάθαρο έχει όλα τα απαραίτητα και παρά πολύ καλό ίντερνετ. Η επικοινωνία ήταν άψογη και η Νέλλη είναι ένα πάρα πολύ ευγενικό και χαμογελαστό κορίτσι. 
Ευχαριστούμε για την φιλοξενία!", "appartamento ineccepibile..nuovo,pulizia perfetta,posizione strategica, luogo tranquillo, cortesia e disponibilità. perfetto!! lo raccomando!
", "Anfitrionas excelentes, departamento bien ubicado cerca a los principales atractivos de Sofia. Si esta disponible no duden en tomarlo", "Maria et sa nièce sont extrêmement gentilles et attentionnées.
Tout était parfait ! C'est très propre, très bien équipé. L'appartement est grand et bien agencé.
Proche du centre, d'un grand marché ...
J'y suis resté 4 jours et m'y trouvais très bien.
Rien à redire ;-)", "Communicatie verliep heel vlot. Zeer proper appartement en alles wat je nodig hebt. Vlakbij het centrum gelegen. Host geeft je veel tips en helpt je als je vragen hebt.", "Maria è stata disponibile e flessibile riguardo all'orario di arrivo, ci ha accolto dandoci delle ciabatte e presentandoci gli spazi della casa, mettendoci quindi a nostro agio. 
Lo spazio di sala e cucina è unito e molto spazioso; Maria ci ha lasciato caffè e te da usare a nostro piacere. 
Abbiamo usufruito di forno, fornelli e tostapane ed ogni cosa funzionava benissimo!
Il supermercato è a pochi metri dalla casa e anche il centro della città è raggiungibile a piedi in pochi minuti.
Ci ha consigliato luoghi da visitare e ristoranti dove cenare lasciandoci a disposizione delle mappe della città. 
Se dovessi tornare a Sofia sicuramente la ricontatterei.
Grazie Maria!!", "Ospitalità ineccepibile, appartamento molto pulito e completamente nuovo. Dotato di ogni tipo di servizio. Ci si sente davvero a casa propria."]

reviews:
["Good value for teh money, Dino and his friend reacted quickly to our booking. The appartment was more than clean! has everything which you need. It was noisy because of teh big boulevard in front of the  house. I missed a coffee machien and  more tea, but overall everything was good!", "Great small studio close to a major tube station. Clean and convenient", "Recommend!", "Awesome place! We recomend!", "Close to city center.", "Great place,same as photos. Fairly good location, safe and good parking, 30 minutes to walk to centre.", "Very nice apartment, well decorated with good facilities. Location is good.", "the apartment is very nice but our experience was not all good. First because when we booked the apartment he didn’t answer our airbnb messages, we had to write through (Hidden by Airbnb) the same day we checked in. The location is fine. the apartment was a bit dirty in terms of floors and ceilings (full of spiders). There was no toilet paper and therefore we had to go to buy (we did not receive an answer). conclusion: a place that solving some details, would be very good.", "Great host. I will stay at his place again", "Great little spot about 6min walk from the metro. Good communication and very helpful. Great space and great price.", "The apartment was very suitable for our needs. There was free parking, ten minutes from the city center by metro or taxi. The apartment is very pleasant. The bed mattress was very comfortable.", "The apartment was nice and clean. Everything was good", "We booked Dino's place on very short notice, because I wasn't feeling well enough to keep exploring the city. The co-host Georgi was super quick to reply all my questions and the check-in was very easy. The place itself is so very nice! I LOVED it from the start. My 2 meter tall boyfriend needed some time to adjust, because the ceiling is quite low in certain areas but that wasn't a big problem for us. It was so cozy and comfortable! And not mini or little at all. It had the perfect size for our taste and we were there with our one-year-old. For dinner we ordered pizza, which was simple. For breakfast I walked to the markets to get bread and fresh fruit. The only tiny thing I didn't love was that the traffic was very loud up until late at night. With closed windows it was very quiet though. I would have loved to stay longer and I would definitely come back.", "Fantastic, clean apartment.", "The apartment was nice, check in was very smooth. It's about a 6min walk to the metro, and 2 metro stops to the centre where everything is located. The metro only costs 1.60BGN so very easy to get around. ", "Very nice place to stay in Sofia. Cozy apartment 10min by car to the very Center of Sofia. Clean and comfortable. Parking is in a concealed place, hence public. Air Condition would be a good option. It is missing a little since the apartment is under the roof and the street is a lot noisy during the night for an open window.", "My number one choice in Sofia next time again! ", "The place was charming! It was exactly what we saw in the pictures and Georgi and Dino were so nice and willing to help every time we had any questions. The place was clean and tidy", "The hosts are very nice and welcoming, they even met us early to let us into the apartment. The place is very clean, and although it is a bit smaller than the pictures suggest, a good size for two people. It is a bit far from the city centre (40 minute walk, 15-20 minutes by metro), but for the price, it was very reasonable. We would definitely stay here again.", "Lovely stylish space, clean and central. We loved our stay here.", "There is free parking in front of the house and the flat is basically very nice and has great decoration. Host was friendly and helped us with tips. Some things need more attention on the flat, there was barely any toilet paper, no dishtowels and a cheesy feet/cold smoke smell on the mattress plus long hairs, this was a downer. Recommend this flat for a short stay, but regarding to the issues the price should be a bit lower. ", "Very cool loft, comfortable and clean, and a great value, highly recommended ", "It's a cool little space with a lot of style - and the bed is amazing!", "A very nice, cosy, clean and modern place!!! ", "It's in a great spot ,realy nicely laid out .So  clean  and so easy to find, there's even a fish & chip shop over the road what more can you ask for folks .", "Great host , nice place to stay close to downtown .", "It was really great to stay in the flat! ", "It was very difficult finding the location with the address provided, and even more difficult finding where to park and meet the host. Then he forgot to leave the keys with us so we had to wait to leave the apartment until he dropped them off. Better communication and customer service goes a long way. ", "Very cozy loft! Perfect location just outside the city center near to a metro station. Host communicates fast and is very helpful. ", "Place is very cute, super small but comfy. Would of been better if it didn’t smell like curry.", "This flat is charming, clean, and super comfortable! The double bed gave us a really amazing night's sleep before we drove up into the Rhodopes mountains the next day, and having free parking all around the building was really helpful with our hire car. Dino's communication was perfect and really flexible. I actually booked this apartment twice in the same trip to Bulgaria as it was so modern, convenient, and stylish too! There are lots of nice touches that make it a great flat to chill out in.", "Good location,  very clean, perfect communication , stylish ambience. I would HIGHLY recommend this place !!!", "This is a excelent place, beatiful and asomb, is perfect for any people ...", "Theodor’s space was great value for money and a good place to stay for a night stop over in Sofia. The apartment itself is very stylish and it was immaculately clean for our arrival. The only thing to note is that it’s about a 25/30 min walk from the city centre but with taxis being so cheap in Bulgaria this wasn’t a problem! Dino was extremely quick in responding to us and an overall great host. Thanks again!", "Nice place", "Very nice and cosy flat, very well decorated", "The loft is even better than it might look on picture: quiet, cozy, highly funcional: one feels at home straight away. The host was quick to reply and always available, full of good advice and recommendation. Definitely a flat we would return to!", "Theodor received us and gave us some indications on what to do in Sofia. We loved staying at his place! The only inconvenient we found was that it was a bit difficult to shower, since there wasn’t any shower panel, but apart from that everything was great. Thanks for everything :)", "This place is so cute! We stayed only one night, but wish I could of spent more time hanging in this little cocoon!", "I would definitely recommend this apartment. Really good value for price. Everything is super tidy and new, the bed is very comfortable and the host is super friendly and easy to reach. The apartment is also very stylish, and just has a good atmosphere.

The apartment is not in the city center (so the nights are quiet!), but perfectly accessible by public transport. Or a 30 minute walk. 

Our tips for Sofia: Have dinner at Aubergine and lunch at Made in home, and take the skilift up to Vitosha mountain.", "Nice and clean apartment, just like in the pictures. Excellent communication with the host.", "Everything was perfect!", "This place is just amazing. The wooden interier, close zo the city center and Tido and Ethan are cool guys. They even have us good reccomodation for restaurant :)", "Dino et Georgi ont été de supers hôtes. Je n’ai pu les rencontrer du fait que je sois arrivé très tard le soir, mais ils ont su l’aiguilleur a distance et de manière trames précise.
Le studio est très sympa et b en situé. Une station de métro toute proche vous amène au centre de la ville en seulement 2 arrêts. J’ai également apprécié les meules faits main. Je recommande.", "Der Aufenthalt bei Dino entsprach getreu den bisherigen Bewertungen allen Erwartungen. Die Ankunftszeit wurde vorab per Chat übermittelt und obwohl unser Flieger Verspätung hatte, wurden wir geduldig erwartet. Die Schlüsselübergabe fand persönlich statt, vorher hatte Georgi uns über (Hidden by Airbnb) Hilfestellung beim Finden der geeigneten Metro-Verbindung geholfen. Auch ein paar Tipps zur Futtersuche, sowie eine Orientierung auf einer in der Wohnung ausliegenden Stadtkarte wurde uns zuteil. Die Wohnung ist zwar klein (und niedrig, daher eher nichts für große Menschen ;), aber sehr schön eingerichtet und sehr sauber.  Einen unangenehmen Geruch der Matraze o.ä. konnten wir nicht feststellen. 
Lediglich die Tür zum Badezimmer ist nicht dicht, sodass man beim Duschen wenn man nicht aufpasst, das Esszimmer unter Wasser stellt (was aber dank vorhandenem Wischmop auch kein Problem war). 
Das Fenster liegt zu einer recht lauten Straße, ist aber schalldicht, wenn es geschlossen ist. 
Die Küche war sehr gut ausgestattet, sogar eine Waschmaschine inklusive Waschmittel waren vorhanden, die wir nutzen konnten. 
Gegenüber ist eine Bäckerei, wo man leckere Frühstücksgebäcke kaufen kann.
Hinterm Haus befinden sich mehrere kleine Straßen, wo man problemlos parken kann.
Zur Metrostation (Bvd. Konstatin Verichkow) läuft man 6min und gelangt nach wenigen Stationen zu Serdika (Innenstadt).
Alles in allem ließ der Aufenthalt keine Wünsche offen und wir haben uns ausgesprochen wohl gefühlt.", "Meglepo, hogy mennyire kornyezetidegen a haz, de pont ez benne a jo. Ugyanakkor jeleznem, hogyha valaki osszetor valamit, mondjuk konkretan egy tv-t, akkor ne titkolja, mert a kovetkezo utazot hozza rossz helyzetbe. Mi megkerdeztuk, tudja e  szallasado, es nem tudta..."]

reviews:
["It was an amazing experience. The hosts were really great, the place was clean and tidy. I highly recommend it. ", "Hristiyan's place is quiet, clean and excellently maintained. Communication with the host was easy. There are good kitchen facilities as well. Would stay again!", "Perfect location, nice host. The WiFi worked from only one spot in the apartment and the connection was weak, but otherwise it was great.", "Fantastic central area, and excellent apartment, really well equipped.", "The host was really helpful and understanding as we arrived much later than originally planned. The place was cozy and it really helped us rest after a long day. The location is perfect because you're in the city's center and if you need to go somewhere in the city the central metro station is only 3 mins walking.", "The apartment is ideally located. At check in and out Hristiyan is very flexible and responsive. Even carrying my very heavy luggage up and down the stairs I got help. Despite the central location, it is pretty quiet. Highly recommended accommodation.", "Hristiyan’s place is perfect if you are looking for a place to stay during your Sofia citytrip: small appartment in quiet street in the city center that has everything you need", "Excellent location. Super clean with all amenities provided. Better than 5 stars hotel.

The TV box was amazing with more than 200 channels.", "The house is wonderful, clean at at the center of Sofia near the metro. If you visit Sofia you must stay in this apartment.", "Very nice simple place in an excellent location. Exactly as described. It is simple, it has everything you need, great place for a single traveler or a couple who explores the city during the day and needs a quiet place to sleep. I would certainly stay there again. Very quick responses from the host, everything was easy, simple and just as expected. ", "A nice apartment, very well located.  Hristiyan was very responsive and helpful in our recovering our luggage, which was delayed in-flight.  
It is a great value—highly recommended.", "The appartement was amazing and in a great location, near the center of Sofia. We had a great communication with our host and even though our flight god delayed he was really polite, understanding and helpful we everything we asked. We had an amazing time. 
", "very nice", "This was our sedond time at Hristiyan's place and just like the first time, it was as described. Hristiyan and his friend Michail were great hosts.", "Wonderful appartment Hristiyan is very reactive. For sur if I come back in Sofia I will go to his flat", "Hristyan was a great host, place wasas described, very clean. Would recommend.", "Hristiyan's place is perfect. He replied messages really fast, the check in was made on time and the instructions to get his home were more than precise. The apartment is close to every touristic place in Sofia, as well with everything you need if you cook there or store your food in the fridge, it was extremely clean and and the WiFi worked perfectly all the stay. I would recommend this place without any doubt.", "Hristiyans place is great for a short or longer stay- I was there 9 days and it was perfect.  Great location- close to everything you would want to explore in Sofia.  I will definitely stay at his place again if I come back to this great city. 
Space was nice as the kitchen was a good size as was the bedroom and bathroom. Great value!", "Nice, comfortable and well-kept apt, close to all facilities and near the the city centre and the metro on the other side of the street. Shampoo and soap supplied like in the hotels and unlike other apts. Quiet place. I strongly recommend it though I haven't met him but he sent his friend to welcome me and do the cleaning later.", "Poca disponibilità e scarsa comunicazione con l’host ( ritardi nelle risposte ) , rumori provenienti da ogni dove , letto scomodo e lenzuola sporche . 
La casa è ottima per la posizione , e per appoggiarsi , c’è il minimo indispensabile , quindi è sicuramente funzionale , ma avrei preferito maggiore disponibilità e più pulizia . 
Considerando il prezzo , è accettabile , ma nulla di entusiasmante .", "Fantastic place with an even better location. Literally 2 minutes walk from the metro and a 10 minute walk to the main attractions. Even had a supermarket just down the street with hot food. Amenities were basic and useful. Air conditioning was also great when it gets warm. There is also a car park opposite the place that charges 14lev for 24 hours of parking which was very convenient.

Hristiyan was very friendly and had no qualms about handing us the keys at 1.30AM.

Only minor downside was that the hot water in the unit did not last long and was only sufficient for a 10 minutes shower.", "The apartment was super clean and the location was great but you can hear everything through the walls from the neighbors. What you have to know is that the hot water for a shower is just enough for one person.", "We had a lovely time in the city. The flat is situated in a great location and we loved the fact that within walking distance we could reach all the main attractions. Thanks for letting us stayed in your house.", "Very nice flat !", "Hristyan's place is located in an excellent location, very close to Vitosha Boulevard and the other main amenities. I highly recommend this place.", "Great, considerate host, the location is top notch, and the apartment was warm, clean and sunny. I had a terrific time, would definitely visit again.
Recommended!", "Hristiyan’s place is in a great location. We didn’t use metro to visit Sofia’s major attractions. 
The apartment is super nice and comfortable. 
He is super fast and kind in communications! 
Great experience", "He is an excellent host. The flat was very near to a lot of interesting point of the city center. He was extremately nice anda helpful with us saving our luggages and so on. Thanks friend!", "The apartment was easy to access and very central in the city of Sofia.
Clean and spacious enough.", "Great value flat in an amazing location, would definitely use again.", "We stayed at Hristiyan's place over the weekend. Location was perfect and the apartment good. The place is slightly cold but with the small heather provided it’s enough as the place is not very big. Highly recommend this place.", "Spacious, good value, good location, and host was responsive, no problems. I'd stay here again!", "Ok", "The kitchen has everything you could need for a stay. Really good value for money especially for people who want to stay in the city centre", "prijatno jiliste i top lokacija", "Nice little apartment in the centre of town. Cons: can be noisy - walls are thin so you can hear neighbours coming and going which is annoying. Bring ear plugs; no living room. Didn't bother me but some people may want one. Overall - excellent value for money.", "The location is excelent, very close to the  better area of the city (tipical bulgarian food in many restaurants over there) and well communicated by subway (two lines in Serdica). ", "We had two nights in this apartment in Sofia, the apartment was in a good location very near the city centre. The apartment was a good size but some of the photos were inaccurate. ", "The place is perfect for a single or a couple looking to get to know Sofia. Highly recommended.", "This small apartment is perfectly located in central Sofia. The street itself was calm and quiet, about 20 minutes walk from the train station and right beside the metro. The bed wasn't super comfortable and the internet was a bit unreliable, but other than that I have no complaints. I recommend this place for anyone looking for a central location in Sofia :) ", "The apartment was as shown in the pictures, small but cozy. ", "We arrived late in Sofia & Hristiyan was very accommodating. Great location & clean place. Would syay again", "GOdd Location, Good Place to stay,

", "Nice apartment! ", "The location is fantastic and the price is great. Though we found it very cold and had to wear jackets inside. Several basic things were missing and our check-in was delayed. ", "The apartment is very central! Perfect to visit the city by walking or with metro. Hristyan is kind and puntual. This is now my go to place whenever I'm in Sofia.", "The apartment located well. The owner is so helpful and kind. highly recommended. ", "Host was excellent in communicating with us before arrival and was at the property at agreed time to welcome us.

Not bad quality/price ratio.", "The appartement is very well located in Sofia. Overall, a very nicely located, comfortable stay.  ", "Great location, clean apartment and even free coffee and tea. We enjoyed our stay it was perfect for our quick 2 nights. As others have written, the location is really right in the center of Sofia and pretty much everything is reachable by foot or easily by metro (like the airport or the bus and railway stations). The only thing you need to know is the right exit (we had some problems finding it when arriving): At Serdika station the two metro lines cross, so be sure to get out at the exit "Knyaz Boris I." (line 1) - then the apartment is literally right around the corner!", "We didn't meet Hristiyan but our instructions and directions were well communicated to us. ", "Hrstiyan was absolutely fantastic, we got in 2hours later than expected and then got lost and he came and found us and showed us to the apartment which was absolutely beautiful, one of our best experiences to date ", "Good location", "Good experience. ", "Great hosting from hristiyan

highly recommendable :)", "Hristiyan was very welcoming and available to the time I was expected to arrive.

Hristiyan is very warm welcomed owner. The flats are based in the center of city - just few blocks to President House. The line of Metro in less than 5 min of walk. Close to these apartments are a lot of shops (Lidl, Pikadily etc. - for food, and sops with other staff you need), Trade Center etc. So, if you would like to stay in the center of Sofia - this place if perfect choose for you!", "Hristiyan was a good host, answered the emails prior to arrival quick and his place is acurately represented by the pictures. The location was excellent, and the apartment itself is lovely and complete with a kitchen area. Would definitely recommend staying here!", "Hristiyan was very welcoming and even allowed us to check in earlier. The apartment can be a bit tricky to locate so read the listing information VERY CAREFULLY and don't rely on the map. He was very understanding when we were confused regarding the location. 

The apartment is very close to the Sofia metro stop Serdika so the convenience cannot be matched. The bathroom was large and even had a waterfall/rain showerhead! The TV had a TON of channels in different languages, which was very appreciated. Overall, it was a great place to stay at a very good price and we would stay there again. ", "Fabulous experience! The apartment was better than described, Hrystian very pleasant and flexible with our departure schedule. The apartment itself is located in the heart of Sofia, and you could not ask for better!", "Nice place and host, great location in the heart of city, highly recommended.", "Hristiyan was kind And the apartment was Cool! Great location And nice! Totally recomended!", "The apartment is perfectly situated next to Serdika, which is the only subway stop where all the lines cross each other, so it makes it easy to reach pretty much each point of Sofia.

I didn't do much other than sleeping there, but for this matter it was just fine, and the AC was working very well, which was a lifesaver knowing that outside it was 34°C at the time of stay. Highly recommend the apartment, and will book it again for my next stay in Sofia!", "Hristiyan is a really nice person who took the time to give us the keys and show us his flat. He always stayed  available and allowed us to let our suitcases in his flat the day we were leaving (as we had to take the plane late in the evening.)
His apartment looks exactly like on the pictures and is well-located (5 min from the metro going to the airport, 5 min from the centre and 5 minutes from a supermarket). The bathroom and the kitchen are big and spacious, they also have evertything you need. The bedroom has air conditioning which is really nice when the temperature outside is hot.
We had a nice stay there and we encourage people to rent Hristiyan's flat. We will surely go there next time we go to Sofia.", "Hristiyan was very nice to me. All my questions were answered very quickly. The flat in reality looks like on the photo. All you need you will find in the flat.", "The appartment was clean, well-maintained and a good size for two persons. The location is great, very close to the centre and metro, which has a connection to the airport. Hristiyan was a nice host and was always available when needed.", "Hristiyan was great with providing me with all of my questions before the arrival and during my stay. The place looked like in the pictures, it had all the indicated amenities. The location of the apartment was very convenient by all means. Would stay again.", "Hristiyan was a really helpful host. We didn't see each other much, mostly because we spent all our time enjoying the lovely city of Sofia. The apartment was exactly as described, and is very close to Sofia's main attractions. Totally recommended!", "Really nice guy, was there to meet me right on time and talked to the cab driver on the phone to make sure we found it alright. The apartment was great; great location close to transport and major tourist attractions, nicely appointed and very clean. Would definitely recommend it to anyone who wants to check out Sofia.", "Hristiyan was really helpful for everything (taxis number, vacuum that we needed, etc).
Really well-located flat. Next to all the monuments (Sophia statue is 2min by walk from home max for example).
You have the minimum that you could need to cook.
Funny adventure in the flat ;)

Just, for girls with long hair, who would like to dry their hair : bring your hairdryer because it's a really small one which is not working so well.", "My stay in Hristiyan's flat was extremely pleasant. Hristiyan is a really nice young man, the communication with him was great, he pick me up from the airport and took me to the flat. 

The flat was really clean, nice and cozy and i felt at home! The location  was good as well, around the corner from the tube station, close to the main pedestrian street and shop. There were few shop next door which is quite good. The locations is quite as well even tho its next to main road its still quite.

Highly recommend the apartment and the host !

Thank you so much Hristiyan :) ", "Apartment is good and clean. Teo is good host. Recommendation for alone travelers. :)", "Hristiyan was an incredible host.  He responded immediately to any questions I had, fixed any issues that came up and was always ready to help.  The three spaces that he has at Tsar Samuil are terrific and so well taken care of - perfect locations and great prices.  I would highly recommend this location to ANYONE planning a trip to Sofia.  Thanks Hristiyan!
", "Fantastic experience.  The apartment was in a terrific location, very clean and Hristiyan was incredibly helpful.  Would highly recommend the apartment.", "Hristiyan is absolutely reliable, punctual, helpful.  The apartment was nice, neat and clean. For us even with the heaters it was still a bit too cold. But probably it's not an issue for everyone. The apartment is situated in the heart of the city, everything within a walking distance. We have received extras like spices, oil, tea, even toothbrushes. :) I would recommend it to anyone. ", "All good, placeas described, nice and clean aand very close to downlown! the host was super helpful!", "It's modern appartments in Sofia. All clean and nice. Good host", "It's modern appartments in Sofia. All clean and nice. Good host", "The space was great and Hristiyan met me for checkin. I had no issues at all and really appreciated the water pressure at the shower. Great location near everything too!", "Our host waited for us at the apartment. Note that it is important to tell the host your arrival time as accurately as possible, since the downstairs door is locked and the apartment does not have a buzzer. The apartment was clean and had all the facilities that we needed, including coffee and a coffee machine. It is located in the center so we didn't need any public transportation at all. To sum up: we had a great time. Thanks Hristiyan!", "Great location. The host was very nice, met me on time, offered me a drink and we sat and talked a while. ", "Hristiyan was very flexible and accommodating. The place is lovely and perfectly located in the centre of Sofia! ", "Excellent!", "Hriystian was waiting for us in front of the house, he is friendly and the appartement is in a good location. It is as described.", "Very clean, great location, thanks!", "Perfect place! It was realy nice to stay here. Very clean, Big, close to everything in Sofia! Plus there is everything to cook and it was all new.
This place was realy enjoyable! I really recommend it. 
Hristiyan is really flexible (we could arrive much sooner than we annouced ).

Appartement vraiment impeccable, c’était vraiment très agréable de rester ici. Très propre, grand, près de tout à Sofia. En plus, il y avais tout le nécessaire pour cuisiner et tout était neuf.
Vraiment parfait et à recommander.
Hristiyan est très arrangeant, on à pu arriver beaucoup plus tôt que ce qu'on lui avais dis.", "супер локация, перфектна комуникация, чисто и спокойно място...", "Meravigliosa accoglienza.
Appartamento perfetto.
Pulito, ordinato...dove trovi tutto quello che ti serve per sopravvivere.
Situato in zona strategica.
Vicinissimo al centro di Sofia e ad una sacco di negozi.
I miei complimenti, non è sempre facile trovare sistemazioni così agreabili.", "El alojamiento tiene una ubicación inmejorable y es un espacio estupendo. La cama es súper comoda y muy grande, el baño está renovado con una ducha perfecta y el espacio en general tiene todo lo necesario para cualquier tipo de viajero.", "Ottima posizione e appartamento molto carino. L’host molto gentile e disponibile.", "A estadia no espaço de Hristoyan foi agradável, o quarto estava limpo e organizado, assim como toda a casa. A localização é ótima perto dos principais pontos turísticos, conseguimos conhecer tudo caminhando. O apartamento está a 5 minutos da estação de metro Serdika. A cozinha não possui muitos utensílios, por exemplo só tem uma panela, o que dificulta para quem gosta de preparar suas próprias refeições. Não possui frigideira nem fervedores. Na hora do banho o ralo nem sempre da conta de escoar toda a água, necessitando assim um cuidado para não inundar a casa e desligar o chuveiro para dar tempo da água escoar. Mas de modo geral o espaço Hristoyan é bem localizado. Eu indico o local. ", "Um bom espaço com uma excelente localização para conhecer e explorar a cidade. Se voltarmos e o apartamento estiver disponível será a nossa escolha.
Obrigada Hristiyan.", "Molto rumoroso, pavimenti e mura costruite per risparmiare si sentono i passi delle persone negli appartamenti superiori o limitrofi. Si sente persino quando gli host dell'appartamento accanto entrano in casa e sembra stiano entrando nella tua di casa. Per il resto posizione ottima. L'aria calda non funzionante. E l'acqua calda finiva dopo pochi minuti.", "Hristiyan is zeer gastvrij en het appartement was netjes. Ligging is ook ideaal, makkelijk bereikbaar vanuit de luchthaven en dichtbij het centrum.", "Io e la mia amica abbiamo trascorso 3 giorni da Hristiyan. Lui si è fatto trovare sotto casa al nostro arrivo e ci ha mostrato l'appartamento. Hristiyan e disponibile e gentile. La casa è bella e confortevole. Buona posizione centrale per poter visitare tutti i siti del luogo camminando a piedi. La consiglio a tutti.", "Una bella esperienza. L'appartamento si trova esattamente nel centro storico di Sofia. Abbiamo soggiornato per 1 settimana e tutto è stato perfetto. L'appartamento è ideale per coloro che volessero visitare Sofia. La metro è vicinissima, inoltre hai tutto a disposizione. L'unica negatività è il materasso molto vecchio e scomodissimo. Per il resto, tutto perfetto!", "Все великолепно, отличная квартира в самом центре, что очень удобно для недолгого пребывания в Софии.
В квартире большая кухня, удобный коридор и спальня со всем необходимым. Хорошо работающий WiFi и 3 обогревателя на любой вкус. Спасибо, Христиан!", "El apartamento es muy céntrico, con la estación de metro de serdika al lado. Desde el apartamento puedes visitar casi toda la ciudad a pie. La conexión wifi funcionaba perfectamente. Puedes encontrar a pocos metros varios restaurantes de comida rápida.", "Квартира в очень хорошем месте, в самом центре города, 2 минуты от метро, 5 минут от супермаркета Billa. В квартире есть кабельное, интернет, кондиционер, приятная кухонка и в принципе есть всё для проживания на небольшие сроки. Христиан встретил нас около дома и отвечал очень быстро. Короче проживанием мы довольны и однозначно можем порекомендовать это жилье.", "Prima locatie, op loopafstand van een metrohalte waar beide lijnen bijeen komen. Je hebt dus ook geen taxi nodig om van de luchthaven bij het appartement te komen. Alle bezienswaardigheden liggen overigens op loopafstand en er zijn voldoende winkels in de omgeving. Ook voor restaurants en cafe's hoef je niet ver te lopen. Het appartement is ruim en voldoende ingericht. Was ook prima schoongemaakt. Communicatie met verhuurder ging prima. Als ik weer naar Sofia ga, en dat sluit ik zeker niet uit, ga ik niet verder zoeken voor accommodatie!", "La posizione, che permette di raggiungere comodamente a piedi tutte le principali attrazioni della città, rende l'appartamento di Hrystian ideale per chi voglia trascorrere un breve soggiorno nella capitale bulgara. L'appartamento è infatti situato a pochi passi dalla stazione della metro Serdika, nel pieno centro di Sofia. La casa è piccola ed essenziale, ma molto accogliente e pulita. L'unico neo può essere la doccia (non ha né piatto né tendina), ma per noi non ha rappresentato un grosso problema. La cucina, anch'essa piuttosto essenziale ma molto accogliente, è dotata di un fornelletto elettrico ed un piccolo frigorifero che rappresentato senz'altro una grande comodità.
Assolutamente consigliato.", "Ventajas: buena ubicación, equipamiento básico en la cocina, precio asequible, ducha correcta, tiendas y centro Ciudad cerca

Inconvenientes: colchas sucias, solo limpio en lo superficial, malísima conexión WiFi, mala comunicación con el anfitrión que tarda en contestar y no sabe responder preguntas básicas relativas al alojamiento como calidad del WiFi", "La casa è tranquilla e situata in una posizione ottima per godersi al massimo la città. ", "L'appartamento si trova in pieno centro, facilmente raggiungibile a piedi dalla stazione Serdika della metro. Pulito, confortevole e con tutto il necessario per un soggiorno a Sofia. Check in e check out facilissimi e rapidi, consgiliato", "La casa è carina e soprattutto molto molto comoda, è in pieno centro. A due minuti a piedi dalla via principale. In due minuti si è ovunque. Molto comodo anche per lo spostamento dall aeroporto fino alla cas (Website hidden by Airbnb) minuti dalla fermata della metro che collega l aeroporto alla città (0,80€ il biglietto).
Per il resto la casa è pulita e fornita di tutto l'occorrente.
Unica pecca il wifi che non prendeva , se non in un punto dela camera da letto.
", "Apartamento céntrico, pero si queréis cocinar necesitareis llevar vuestras ollas y sartenes. ", "Casa in ottima posizione a 2 minuti dalla metro e nel cuore della città.
Si sente molto rumore delle scale che la casa è quasi in cartongesso. La doccia non ha tende o altro intorno, quindi ogni volta che ci si lava si bagna tutto il bagno. Casa carina all'aspetto ma potrebbe essere curata molto di più.
Letto non molto comodo, bene nel  complesso ma potrebbe essere meglio.
Rapporto qualità/prezzo per l'Italia buono", "Le logement est bien situé (proche du centre-ville et des lieux touristiques), la rue est calme. 
La propreté et certains équipements (en mauvais état) pourrait être amélioré. Mais pour le prix (vraiment pas chère) on ne peut pas tout avoir. 
L'hôte nous répondez rapidement aux messages, et nous a bien accueilli. ", "L'appartamento è esattamente come si presenta, carino, delle giuste dimensioni. Dotato di tutto il necessario. Avevo letto in qualche recensione precedente che fosse freddo, effettivamente non ci sono termosifoni (come in qualunque altro posto in Sofia) ma solo un condizionatore nella camera da letto e una pompa di calore da poter spostare a piacimento. Non abbiamo avuto freddo ma non era confortevole passare dal bagno alla stanza da letto (unica stanza effettivamente calda della casa). Altra pecca il bagno, con doccia a terra senza tende, un lago di acqua ad ogni doccia con poca possibilità di limitare i danni. Air-drier inoltre poco potente.  
Ottima la posizione, centrale e facile da raggiungere. 
Host disponibile e puntuale. Ci ha chiamato il taxi per il ritorno in aereoporto. ", "La casa è centralissima e molto comoda per girare tutta la bella Sofia: vicina a molti ristoranti e bar, vicina a un mercato coperto e alla metropolitana.
In casa non ci sono mappe o brochure della città.
L'arredamento è essenziale e comodo. Il riscaldamento è solo nella camera da letto: questa è luminosa la mattina (le persiane erano rotte) ma la sera è poco illuminata (lampadario con luci basse e mancano luci vicino al letto). Il letto è comodo e le coperte molto calde.
Il bagno è spazioso ma manca tenda per la doccia e bidet. Non è fornito nessun asciugacapelli. Viene dato 1 asciugamano a persona.
La cucina è molto ampia e si scalda con una stufetta ad aria.  La pulizia è accurata in camera, un po' meno in cucina e bagno.
Con noi il nostro host è stato molto frettoloso e poco amichevole, stranamente perché i bulgari si sono rivelati delle persone molto gentili e cordiali,  ma quando si è rotta la stufetta in casa è venuto e ce l'ha cambiata subito.  
gentile ad anticipare il check-in e ci siamo accordati per il check-out notturno ", "L'appartamento si trova in una posizione molto centrale ed è anche vicinissimo alla metro. Il nostro soggiorno è stato piacevole e la casa era perfetta anche se fredda in quanto il riscaldamento c'è solo in camera. Hristiyan è stato un host meraviglioso! Ci ha permesso di fare il check-in qualche ora prima ed è stato così gentile da chiamarci il taxi per il ritorno dato che li quasi nessuno parla inglese. Consigliato!!!", "Siamo stati accolti da Hristiyan che ancora stava facendo le pulizie ci ha fatto posare le valigie e ci ha mandato a pranzare,un bellissimo ragazzo,gentile e molto simpatico,ci ha fatto vedere la casa molto accogliente e ci ha lasciato le chiavi. Tornati aveva finito le pulizie ci ha riscaldato la camera con il condizionatore e la cucina con la stufetta e se ne andato. La casa è in posizione centrale vicino la vistosha e vicino la metro,da qui riesci a visitare tutto a piedi non ce bisogno di bus o metro. Che dire grazie Hristiyan di questi 3 giorni stupendi se un giorno capiterai a Roma scrivimi che il mio amico ha 2 b&b ti troveremo una sistemazione. Grazie di tutto! Kiss!", "La casa era abbastanza pulita, in posizione centrale. Si riuscivano a raggiungere i maggiori punti di interesse in pochi minuti a piedi. A 4 minuti a piedi dalla metropolitana, e a 2 dal più vicino supermarket. Unica pecca, la casa era un po' fredda nonostante il condizionatore sparato al massimo. Consigliata!", "Hristiyan é stato cortese ed educato. Puntuale e gentile, ha cercato di aiutarmi in tutto. ", "Hristiyan was een goede gastheer. Het appartement lag ideaal, alles was op loopafstand. In het appartement lag alles wat we nodig hadden. Eenvoudig maar heel een prettig appartement voor een paar dagen. Ik zou het zeker aanbevelen. ", "Das Appartment liegt in einer sehr guten Lage und ist perfekt, wenn man Sofia zu Fuß kennenlernen möchte. Die Küche ist ausreichend eingerichtet und alles war sehr sauber. Einziges Manko: Leider ist das Bett sehr unbequem.", "Hristiyan est très sympathique et disponible , l'emplacement du studio est idéal , c'est un studio au 3ème étage sans ascenseur ( 40 marches ).
Pour vous rendre au studio , il est près de la station métro Serdika , et   il faut impérativement être à côté d'un grand building de UniCreditBulbank (vous ne pouvez pas le rater ) il sera votre point de repère , je vous dis cela car la ulitsa tsar Samuil est très très longue et elle est coupée par 3 boulevards , si vous n'êtes pas à côté de ce building vous n'y arriverez pas . L'emplacement est très central et vous êtes à 5 mn à pied de la grande avenue Vitosha qui est toute proportion gardée les champs Elysées de Sofia .", "Très bon accueil et très bon séjour en plein centre ville de Sofia", "Fué muy agradable nuestra estancia en Sofia Bulgaria. Nos espero hasta la noche y nos ayudó a resolver nuestras dudas, muchas gracias por tu apoyo.
El departamento muy limpio y con todo lo necesario está junto al centro histórico y al Metro. Gracias.", "Très bon accueil et très bon séjour en plein centre ville de Sofia", "L'appartement est idéalement situé dans le centre de Sofia.
Hristiyan s'est rendu disponible pour nous accueillir mais cet accueil fut bien rapide. Nous ne sommes pas certains que les draps aient été changés et n'avons pas été convaincus par l'explication de notre hôte qui les trouvaient uniquement tachés.", "Hristiyan fue puntual . Fue cordial comedido y paciente.  Mi compañero de viaje no se acordó que en bulgaria es una hora más.  Y a la hora de contactar con nuestro anfitrión le dio la hora de llegada .hora española. Así que el nos espero una hora más tarde de lo acordado. El sitio es estratégico para visitar la capital en buen zona. Lo recomiendo y obviamente yo repetiría", "la casa centrale,ma i servizi della casa non funzionavano per nulla,esperienza veramente poco carina.", "Hristiyan è stato molto disponibile con noi, ha atteso fino a tardi il nostro arrivo. La casa è esattamente come si presenta in foto (ho trovato soltanto un po' scomodo il bagno senza il box doccia).
Il posto é comodo per spostarsi a piedi nella città. Sofia è davvero una bella città! 
Indicazione utile: se scegliete questo appartamento e vi spostate in taxi dall'aeroporto, come indicazione al tassista dite "presso la fermata metro SERDICA", che è vicinissima! 

Molto consigliato!", "Bel appartement, belles vues avec couleur douce (rose).
Personne privée que notre odobriha.toy une bonne personne et une conversation agréable. En seulement un appartement fraîche et un entièrement meublé. Proche du centre et du métro. Meilleur prix que les hôtels.
Christian, nous sommes heureux :) Croyez-nous!", "Ottimo rapporto qualità/prezzo. Tutto corrisponde all'annuncio. Il nostro futuro riferimento abitativo per Sofia. 
Grazie Hristiyan e scusaci ancora per il ritardo.", "L'appartamento è ben fatto è situato al centro della città, a due passi dalla fermata della metropolitana "Serdica". Di quella casa e di Hristiyan ho adorato l'accoglienza e la disponibilità. Consiglio caldamente questo appartamento a chiunque volesse vivere con comodità il proprio soggiorno.", "Hristiyan était présent à mon arrivée, il m'a fait visiter l'appartement qui correspond à ce que j'attendais.
Il est bien placé près du métro et assez silencieux. Sofia est une ville sûre et agréable.", "Hristiyan fue puntual y muy amable. 

En cuanto a la localización, el piso se encuentra muy bien situado, en el centro a pocos minutos de todo. 

En lo que respecta al estado del apartamento todo perfecto. Piso luminoso, equipado con todo lo necesario y muy limpio.

Sin duda lo recomendaría.    
", "Todo perfecto persona muy amable apartamento limpio y ordenado zona buena un 10 . Gracias", "L'appartement bénéficie d'une localisation parfaite, un seul problème mais pour nous important, la literie est très inconfortable...
", "Anfitrión: Hristiyan fue muy amable. Se adaptó a nuestro horario y nos facilitó mucho las cosas.

Localización: perfecta. En el centro, a pocos minutos de todo.

Limpieza: perfecta.

Espacio: ideal para parejas. Habitación correcta y cocina práctica.

Relación calidad precio: Buena."]
