reviews:
["All was perfect.", "Liliya and Dimitar's flat gives you extremely cosy and homely feeling. It is located on a walking distance to the city center,  and you can find everything you need in the area. The flat is very bright when there is sun outside. And if you are lucky and the weather is nice, you can watch the moon and the stars from the ceiling windows while you are in the bed.
 
In addition Liliya and Dimitar were extremely amiable, considerate and easy-going hosts. I didn't have the chance to meet personally with Liliya, but she gaved me valuable suggestions about the area and was always available when I had questions or challenges.  
Highly recommended!", "Thanks to Liliya's apartment my girlfriend and I spent great time at Sofia. Apartment was clean and very romantic. We didn't meet Liliya but she arranged keys and everything perfectly. Everything was smooth and nice. Liliya's place will be my first choice for next visit of Sofia.", "Great place, great location, great hospitality and receptiveness to additional request, stylish interior design of this maisonette, and great location. Totally worth it and comes highly recommended from my stay here in Sofia for 40 days.", "Description and pictures exactly as it is in real life. Liliya was very helpful and greeted us, was very quick to respond. The house is lovely in general with a very good location. Would stay again :)", "Liliya was a kind and thoughtful host,  very attentive and helpful with any questions I had. The place itself is beautiful, with a balcony and view of the mountain and all the necessary appliances to make the most of a stay here. Brilliant location, comfortable bed- couldn’t have asked for better. I stayed here for six weeks and would recommend to anyone visiting Sofia whatever the length of their stay. I hope to be back!", "We enjoyed our stay in Liliyas apartment very much. We would and will highly recommend the apartment to people who also plan a trip to Sofia. Liliya and her husband were very friendly.", "Brilliant place, would definitely stay there as it’s close to everything. Liliya is extremely helpful and accommodating.", "Lilya's apartment is in the perfect location, and the pictures are accurate. 

I enjoyed my stay there. I had a family emergency at the end (grandma in the hospital) so left Sofia very quickly to see her before she passed, and my friend continued staying at the Air B&B. I messaged Liliya about this the next morning, and she didn't seem happy about it but also didn't want to move forward in a different way, when I offered for my friend to leave immediately. I understand where she's coming from, as it's her apartment, and I feel bad about the circumstance.

Other than that, which is my fault, everything went smoothly. I love this neighborhood a lot... It's a safe part of Sofia and there are two big grocery stores near by and a fantastic outdoor market nearby as well. Also a very inexpensive vegan restaurant, Kring, just around the corner. 

A couple slight things to note... The shower will stay warm for about ten minutes. And the bed is very, very firm... Which could be fine if you like a firm bed. Check in went well for me, but I could imagine it being tricky if you don't have phone service, so perhaps ask for the wifi-code beforehand... I believe it reaches outside the building.", "I highly recommend this apartment. Great location, well appointed and excellent value. Liliya is a great host; friendly, prompt with replies, and gave us some great local tips.", "We stayed for 1 month - the house is incredible, beautiful, and really well located! Liliya is amazing and was always there to help us out with anything we needed. The internet worked fine, the place is really near coffees (Barista, Coffee and More was our favorite), vegetarian restaurants and everything else you may need, like grocery stores and the city centre. We didn't use public transportation to do anything. 

We had a fantastic month in Sofia, and being in her house helped a lot with the experience. Fully recommended! :)", "A spacious retreat right in the Center of Sofia and wonderful hosts. I recommend.", "Amazing place in a great location. Everything described in profile was spot on. I stayed for a month and really enjoyed it. 
Thank you Liliya. ", "I stayed for four enjoyable weeks at Liliya's apartment and loved every minute ...
The apartment is on two levels with the bedroom and great work space / table in the loft and living area and bathroom on first level plus small sunny balcony with a tiny view to Mt Vitosha. 
I had everything I needed for self-catering in the kitchen + plenty of hot water + the wifi was speedy and reliable + TV with cable ...
The apartment is very central and only a five to ten minute walk to cafes and two large supermarkets + an easy walk to most of the cultural attractions. 
Sofia is a delightful city - especially now in its Spring colours - and I found the Sofianites so charming and friendly. I was quite sad in the taxi on my way to the airport ... !!! ...
 
 

", "This is a great little place -- cool layout, so much great light, really well-stocked, and a great location (away from the hustle and bustle, but still close enough to everything).  Liliya and her brother were excellent hosts, the wifi was great, I found some great cafes in the neighborhood, and overall I really enjoyed the apartment. I had a really nice, three week stay in Sofia, and it was always a pleasure to start my days in this space, and to come home to it after my adventures in the city :)", "I just spent one the happiest months of my life living in Liliya's charming and comfortable home. She welcomed me personally, and on the day I left, her husband arrived promptly to assist with check-out. I had everything I needed to truly feel at home while working remotely. The view of Mt Vitosha and the quietness evoked the countryside, yet I was a mere stroll from the city center. The neighborhood is safe, close to cafés, grocery stores, a very cool co-working space, public transportation, & more. I arrived wondering if a month in Bulgaria would be too long; thanks to Liliya's artistic maisonette, I left feeling like a month's stay was too short. "Mnogo blogodarya, do scoro. Thanks so much, see you soon."", "Lovely apartment in quiet street, on walking distance from city centre. Enjoyed my morning coffee at the sunny balcony and Liliya was very helpful and welcoming. ", "Lovely flat with everything you need for having a good time in Sofia. The location is perfect to head out and explore the city and its surroundings. It is quiet place with a cute little balkony to sit in the sun. Liliya was a great host: friendly, helpful and reliable, making our stay just awesome :) Thanks for having us!", "Had a fantastic stay in Liliya's apartment whilst working in Sofia. It really does look as nice as the photos. The location is great, very close to the centre but also really quiet. Lovely little balcony to sit on when the sun is shining and cosy inside when the rain is falling. Felt very at home. Liliya is extremely helpful and responded directly to any questions. Absolutely no complaints. Thank you for a great stay!", "I really needed a place where it feels like home, and this apartment was exactly that! Liliya was also very easy-going, so everything worked out perfect. My highest recommendations! ", "Liliya and Demeter were great hosts. The apartment was perfect for our two week stay. The apartment is right in the center of Sofia. Definitely recommend it!", "Liliya was very friendly and helpful and the flat was really cosy, homely, tidy and comfortable. Would recommend!", "The apartment is at a central place, 10-15min by walking from Vitosha Blvd and the same distance from the Main Bus and train stations. We liked the apartment also, it is in a very quiet street. The owner Liliya was very friendly. Her tips were very helpful, we were totally satisfied. Highly recommended.", "Lovely apartment within walking distance from all the major attractions. Lilya was a great host - easy to communicate and very friendly. ", "Liliya is a very good host. She met her at the apartment early in the morning to show us the apartment and gave some recommendations on breakfast places. She also replied to airbnb messages promptly to help us with directions. Overall the apartment was very beautiful and looks just like the photos. The apartment is located in the city centre near to the main bus station. ", "This place was wonderful! Looks just as cozy as it did in the pictures, and was in a very quiet neighborhood close to the center of Sofia. Liliya was a wonderful host and was flexible about giving me the keys to the place. I didn't really need help navigating the city (have been here many times for work), but she was willing to give me all sorts of recommendations for good places to go, eat, etc. ", "The apartment is very central walking distance 5 min to the center , the host was very friendly, I'd defiantly recommend and would stay again if I was ever to Sofia again .", "Very nice flat, perfectly located near the center. We felt at home ! We haven't met Liliya but Dimitar was very friendly and gave us plenty of great advice for our stay. Definitely a great place to discover Sofia !", "At the time of making the initial arrangements, everything was great. Liliya was quick to respond and everything was completely clear.  I was really looking forward to being in Liliya''s place, and had heard from people in Sofia what a great area the apartment is in. Unfortunately, due to a medical emergency, I ended up having to leave Bulgaria before I got a chance to stay in her place. I certainly hope that I can manage to get there next year.  So, thanks for all the arrangements which were made - sorry I wasn't able to enjoy your place. Adrian", "My wife and I stayed at Liliya's apartment for a few days. The apartment is located about 500mt from the nearest metro stop, in a calm neighborhood. 

Although we didn't get to meet Liliya in person, she made all the necessary arrangements for her neighbor to receive us and show us the place. 

The apartment was clean and had everything we needed for a short stay. The apartment comprises one bedroom, living room, kitchen and bathroom. A washing machine is available for use. We would recommend the place.", "Lovely friendly couple and pretty house :)", "We really loved staying at Liliya's appartment. It is beautiful and comfortable. Liliya is a wonderful host. We highly recommend it!!", "It's a very nice place, I felt very comfortable, my hosts answered all my questions and really helped me find my way around the city.  They took care though, not to intrude on my privacy.  However, the occasion did arise one night, and Dimitar took me on a fantastic walking tour of the city center!  It's a great location...right in the heart of an amazing city--Sofia!  Many cafes and restaurants.  Highly recommended.", "I am very thankful to sweet Lily and her boyfriend - I could not expect more friendly and intellegent couple as host.
The appt should I say is much more bright and big as it may seem on the fotos (household stuff, bed, bathroom - all this i leave with no comments, it is perfect). 
The location is ideal, grocery and some nice place to have breakfast, subway and already a couple of sightseeing attractions are 5 min to walk.
I definitely do recommend those guys and their airbnb-offer)", "Liliya was very friendly with us... His flat was  just perfect for fwe days in Sofia!!! She answers very Kindly to all of our questions... Very good adress!!!!", "Hemos tenido el gusto y placer de quedarnos en la casa de Liliya. Es una casa muy limpia y acogedora y tienes todo lo que necesitas, la ubicación es perfecta cerca de la estación de autobús y metro. 
No pudimos conocer Liliya pero hablar con ella siempre fue fácil y ella ha respondido a todas nuestras dudas. Ademas Liliya nos ha dejado quedarnos  mas tiempo en el apartamento ya que nuestro vuelo salia tarde. 
Recomendamos la casa de Liliya al 100%!

Muchas gracias Liliya
Yordanka y Nahuel", "Très bon séjour à Sofia dans cette appartement, qui est spacieux et bien équipé. Bien que Liliya n'a pas pu être présente à notre arrivée, elle est venu le lendemin pour nous parler de l'appartment, de la ville et nous conseiller des restaurants."]

We had a superb experience and would definitely use again in the future!", "Всичко беше супер, апартаментът е много просторен, беше чисто и хост-а беше много учтив.", "Изключително сме доволни от престоя си в апартамента. Винаги бих отсядала там. Ще го препоръчам на всичките си познати и приятели, които пътуват до София. ", "Отлично място, по-хубаво дори от снимките! Чисто и добре организирано. Има всичко необходимо за пълноценен престой. Локацията е перфектна, спирка на метро, търговски център, на пешеходно разстояние от всички забележителности. 
Симеон и Марияна бяха много отзивчиви и направиха коуникацията  много лесна и приятна .
Със сигурност ще наемем апартамента за следващото ни пътуване :)", "Limpo e agradável!", "Un apartamento muy limpio y cómodo cerca del centro, decorado con buen gusto y con cafetera para poder hacer café. Una estancia muy agradable sin duda.", "Très bel appartement grand, au calme une très belle chambre et grande cuisine.", "El edificio por fuera es viejo pero el alojamiento es tal cual se ve en fotos. Simeone nos recogió en el aeropuerto por 15€, es un poco caro para los precios de allí (para irnos cogimos un taxi por 7€) pero te ahorras tener que cambiar el dinero en el aeropuerto y te lleva al piso directamente (es un poco difícil de encontrar aunque está en el centro). En la calle de al lado está el centro comercial donde hay que cambiar el dinero. El piso está limpio y cuenta con todo lo que necesitas. Buen alojamiento.", "Perfecta elección para dormir en Sofia. Muchos servicios a pocos minutos a pie. La comunicación con el host fue magnifica. Muy recomendable", "Bedankt!", "Bardzo czyste i przemyślane mieszkanie, położone blisko centrum. Gorąco polecam dla wszystkich, którzy chcą zwiedzić Sofię.", "Apartament znajduje się w centrum bardzo blisko do wszystkich znanych obiektów. Apartament bardzo ładnie urządzony. Tylko parking jest kiepski. Uwaga mapa pokazuje nieprawidłową lokalizację.", "Appartamento molto ampio e comodo al centro di Sofia, raggiungibile a piedi in 10 minuti. Salotto con dettagli ricercati nell’arredamento . Consigliato! ", "Спасибо за все!!! Квартира расположена в тихом месте, где есть парковка. Рядом находится коммерческий центр. Хозяева очень отзывчивые, всегда рады помочь. Чистая ухоженная квартира со всеми удобствами!!!очень рекомендую!!!", "superbe appartement très propre, idéalement situé et un super accueil . nous recommandons ! 












", "Superbe appartement propre et très bien décoré. Myriana est une très bonne hôte très disponible.", "Ottima struttura, rimasti veramente impressionati positivamente, tutto pwrfetro e pulito ", "Het appartement ligt ergens achterin en is langs buiten in slecht staat. Maar dat maakt totaal niet uit als je de binnenkant ziet. Een zeer ruime living en slaapkamer en volledig uitgeruste keuken.
Het centrum en de winkels zijn dichtbij.
We hebben enorm genoten van ons verblijf! 
Enige spijtige was dat we telkens heel vroeg wakker waren omdat de gordijnen in de slaapkamer niet echt verduisterend waren.", "Отличная квартира и замечательные, гостеприимные и отзывчивые хозяева. Прекрасный выбор, всем советуем)", "Чисто, приятно, супер локация много гостоприемни и приятни!", "Квартира очень понравилась, фото соответствуют действительности. Свежий ремонт и новая обстановка. Очень чисто. На все сообщения хозяева отвечали быстро, Волновались все ли нас устраивает. Тихое место, рядом торговый центр, магазины, кафе. До центра ходили пешком, близко , минут 10. Мы остались очень довольны
", "Buona la posizione a 10 minuti a piedi dal cuore di Sofia, appartamento nuovo e super funzionale. Miryam è un host gentile e disponibile, consiglio vivamente di soggiornare da lei per la vostra prossima visita a Sofia!", "Een heel mooi en netjes appartement vlak bij groot winkelcentrum en Lidl. Max 10 minuten lopen naar het centrum. Binnen  is alles aanwezig incl. Koffiezetapparaat en grote koelkast. Goed bed en grote kast.", "Чистая и уютная квартира, есть все необходимое, удобное расположение - до центральной части города 15 минут пешком.", "Świetne miejsce; 150 metrów od stacji metra lub 10-15 minut pieszo od ścisłego centrum Sofii- jak kto woli :P  Czysto, schludnie, ładnie zaaranżowane-otrzymujesz dokładnie to co na fotografii plus poranną kawę i drobny poczęstunek. :) Sam budynek szokuje na zewnątrz ale w środku 101% zadowolenia. Kontakt z Miryaną jest błyskawiczny - w razie potrzeby chętnie służy pomocą. POLECAM", "Comparto opinión respecto a todo lo ya descrito en los comentarios de los demás viajeros. Es un apartamento genial, con excelente ubicación. El centro comercial (Mall of Sofia) está a 5 minutos andando o menos y está muy bien para comprar cosillas y para cambiar dinero (el cambio está a 1,95) es un sitio fiable para cambiar.

A cualquiera que esté leyendo mi mensaje, le recomiendo esta reserva porque no defrauda! El exterior del edificio es muy feo y viejo pero, por dentro, es totalmente como se muestra en las fotos.", "Genial!La primera vez que me hospedó a través de Airbnb, y la experiencia ha sido muy positiva...quizás haya sido el apartamento o tal vez los anfitriones, pero las dos cosas juntas la combinación (Website hidden by Airbnb) llegar me dio la impresión de haber estado antes ya que las fotos son un auténtico reflejo de lo que es.La ubicación, centro sin (Website hidden by Airbnb) calle en si está algo abandonada, pero en la misma esquina sales a una Avenida llena de vida con negocios de comida como carne a la parrilla 24 horas y con precios sorprendentes(una súper hamburguesa 3 levas) pero si lo prefieres en la otra esquina el McDonald también abierto todo el día.La metro a dos pasos,  pero no la utilice ya que llamamos a Simeon y a los 5’ estaba en la puerta para llevarnos a la estación y al centro fui (Website hidden by Airbnb) comunicación con Simeón y Miryana fue excelente con respuestas muy rápidas a todas nuestras consultas .Un detallazo lo del café, té y cruasanes. No se puede pedir más.La estancia ha sido corta, pero si necesito alojarme otra vez en Sofia espero contar con este apartamento libre.Un consejo si necesitáis cambio ir al Mall Sofia está al lado, no cobran comisió (Website hidden by Airbnb) 1,95 levas.Buen viaje!", "Отличное расположение! Две минуты от торгового центра и метро, до основных достопримечательностей 10-15 минут пешком. Квартира в идеальном состоянии! Наш самолет задержался и мы прибыли на час позже оговоренного срока, но муж Мирианы дождался нас, встретил возле метро, провел в квартиру и все показал! В квартире есть кофемашина, чай, растворимый кофе, круасаны, стирал.машина, телевизор, кондиционеры, небольшой балкон, отличная двуспальная кровать, огромный диван! Мы были вчетвером и было очень комфортно! Рекомендую!", "Super Wohnung , sehr nette Gastgeber und sehr Gute Lage. Die die Wohnung und die Küchengeräte sind nagelneu! Da wir mit den Kindern Reisen kochen wir auch viel . Hat super funktioniert . Nur tiefe Teller, ein wenig Salz und Öl haben gefehlt. Das aber lässt sich ja schnell ändern :) 
Vielen Dank und weiter so !", "De communicatie liep erg soepel. Het appartement ziet er van binnen super modern uit en is erg schoon. De buurt zelf is niet echt geweldig (kappotte huizen om je heen) maar qua locatie ben je overal binnen 20 minuten lopen of met de metro in 10 minuten. Ga je naar Sofia voor een stedentrip? Raad ik deze air bnb zeker aan!", "Appartamento bello, spazioso è in centro. Ospiti eccezionali, Simeon il marito di Miryana sempre pronto, anche disponibile ad accompagnarci all’aeroporto all’alba. Da raccomandare!"]

reviews:
["One of the best possible locations in Sofia. Newly refurbished flat with all the necessary amenities. Highly reccomend!", "Ivailo is great host, very strict and accurate. Always answers st phone calls and messages. Thank you!
We stayed 5 nights at his appartment. Me and my boyfriend were here happy with our stay - very clean, tidy, cosy apartment. It is completely equipped, we used the kitchen and cooked dinner at home. 
It has great view towards the park, very romantics I would say as it snowed and was beautiful. 
The place has great location - just one minute walk is one of the best reastaurants and bar in Sofia / according to us / Rakia Raketa Bar offers great food and next door is Sputnik Bar - best cocktails in town, I recommend it.
The center is 10 minutes walk, there are lots of shops nearby, big supermarket 3 minutes walk. 

We enjoyed our stay and would definitely love to stay there again.", "Ivailo has been a great host for my guests! The apartment was very neat and clean. There was nothing that we needed more.
My guests experienced some technical difficulties with the internet connectivity and he was very fast on addressing the issues and basically change the router.
Last but not least, the location is great - a very quite street, in the middle of the park and a few minutes walking from the city centre.
I was happy to chose this apartment and will come back again.", "Nice and very helpful host.
Great location.", "This place is in a great location, with a nice park right outside. Close to local food and bars, couldn't be happier with this find! Host is amazing and was quick to respond to any questions. Would definitely stay here again!", "Beautiful view excellent service,", "Great place in very beautiful location. Highly recommended for everyone.", "Ivailo is a very friendly guest, his appartment is very clean, nice and well situated in Sofia.", "Very impressed and will return. Thank you!", "The apartment is great, it’s very clean and spacious. We loved the big bed and the balcony. Communication with Ivailo was very easy and he was available to help us when we needed.", "Ivailo is a great host working around your schedules and even offered us a late checkout. The flat is lovely with great views of the park, really nice and cosy place to relax with all the amenities you could ask for! The bed was easily the most comfortable bed we’ve ever slept on in our life ( would suggest choosing this apartment simply for the bed)! Overall thanks to Ivailo for being a great host, very easy to communicate with and offering us a great apartment in a fantastic location.", "This is my second time in this apartment. I love it: clean, sunny, central, everything is there! Go there, you won't regret it!", "Very nice, clean place, spacious, stylish in a great location", "Had a great stay at Ivailo's penthouse apt.  The property was spacious, bright and open.  We took advantage of the balcony overlooking the park and enjoyed the complimentary bottle of wine that was left for us.  

There are about 4 flights of stairs with no elevator, which we already knew and was prepared for.  The apartment is about 25 min walk from the center of town, which was great exercise each day we went out.   We also checked out some really nice and quaint restaurants and coffee shops nearby (on the other side of the park) .

Kitchen amenities and condiments were nice and appreciated (olive oil, cooking oils and some dressing, as well as salt and pepper).  As well as soaps, shampoos raincoats, umbrellas, an outlet converter, books and recipes on Bulgarian culture and cuisine.

Ivailo was a great host and answered all our questions promptly.  He even graciously extended our check out since our flight wasn't until later that evening.  

The other thing to point out is garbage, garbage bins for litter are next to the supermarket behind the property.  Recycling, there are a bunch of large bins on both sides of the park (more on the Aleksandar Dondukov St. Side).

Tranquil and lovely stay and experience at the penthouse.  Would highly recommend!", "A truly awesome cozy place, with a great view and host. I love it", "The apartment is perfect and the location even better, would definitely come back here.
Thank you!", "The apartment is on perfect location. You are downtown Sofia but next to a beautiful park. The place is on 5th floor (no elevator) and very quiet. The place is not penthouse but it is more than enough even for family. Public transport is very close. Huge bonus to this place is a secure parking garage! Amenities were great, the apartment was spotless clean. Ivailo was really great host. He met me at check-in at almost midnight. Loved the place and I will be back here for sure!", "I can say that I had already been a Ivailo's guest so everything was perfect. PS. Read my first review) :)", "A very beautiful view of the park and Vitosha mountain, amazingly comfortable home. Extraordinary location.", "Ivaylo is a kind, considerate host. He took time to receive some materials I needed prior to my arrival from a colleague, and took time to meet me upon arrival very late at night.  The apartment is excellent, it was spotless clean, spacious, located in the city centre, immediate proximity to Sofia University, excellent quality bed, large bathroom and living room, fully equipped kitchen.  I had a wonderful stay at Ivaylo's place, and recommend it without reservation.
Thank you Ivaylo,
Kalin", "Perfect location, downtown Sofia but right next to a beautiful park so it is very quiet.  Very easy walk to the subway station and public transport.  A secure parking garage for your rental car if you don't want to deal with traffic in Sofia.  

Amenities were great, the apartment was spotless and Ivailo was great to communicate with.  He met us at check-in and was a phone call away if we needed anything.  

Loved the place and will definitely come back next time we are in Sofia! One thing to mention is that there is no elevator in the building and with Ivailo's place being on the 4th floor it is something to consider if you are traveling with a lot of luggage.

Thank you Ivailo, for a great stay!", "The flat is fully equiped, very clean and confortable, also nice and stylish.
Near of the center town with services in the same neighborhood as supermarket, pubs, restaurants, ATM and convenience store.
The communications with the host is clear and fast.", "Spacious, stylish home. Super close to supermarket and restaurants.", "This was the perfect place to stay in Sofia. Amazing house, very clean and with every thing you might need in a house. Also the terrace with views to the park are remarcable as well as the location close to the center. I am very glad I found this place. Thank you.", "Amazing place. Just 15 min walking from the center of Sofia.
Quiet neighborhood with some very nice restaurants. Also there was
a supermarket just next to the house open all days of the week.
 Beautiful view of the park from those huge windows in the living room.
It was an amazing place in general.", "Clean flat with all the amenities you'd want. Location is great - walking distance to everywhere. Pakema is a superb restaurant situated just next door. We found the apartment a little difficult to find at first - best way to track is down is to search for Pakema and it is just next to that. All in all, it was a brilliant stay in a brilliant apartment!", "House was really clean and everything is just the same as the photos! The best part is that he had a private garage for our car were you can park it easily. The only thing is there was no elevator to the house .", "We had a really nice stay. Clean and nice appartement, everything within 20 minutes walking distant.", "This is an amazing apartment, intact it is even nicer than the photos show! Invailo met us and allowed us to leave our bags with him as we arrived early which was great. The apartment is in a super location, with a fantastic view over the park and in the distance, Mount Vitosha. I has everything you need, its fabulous in every way. Probably the best bed we've ever slept in too! The balcony is great and the tv does have some English spoken programmes. There is a supermarket really close behind the apartment block and the restaurant a few doors away, Reketa Raika is absolutely amazing, we went twice in our three night stay! Everyone is very friendly in Sofia and Invailo was too. Its up quite a few flights of stairs with no lift so just bear that in mind if you struggle with stairs. We had a great time in Sofia and would highly recommend this apartment. Its a straight 5 stars for us!!", "The house is perfect, really clean, beautiful and with everything you need for relax and cooking. The host is really polite. Recommemded.", "Everything was as I expected ,Ivailo is a distinctive owner and the home was very clean.", "Ivailo’s place is classy, stylish, clean, cosy, excellently located, bright and sunny. It’s got great window views and a fantastic home design. It also provides parking garage for your car (if you drive one), which is pretty convenient as you know that all central area in Sofia is non-free parking. I’d definitely recommend staying at Park Penthouse!", "Amazing apartment! The balcony is beyond incredible, overlooking one of Sofia’s nicest parks. Ivailo is super helpful as well.", "The apartment looks very good and cozy and Ivailo is a friendly host.", "A beautiful appartment in a beautiful place", "Best Spot to stay and explore Sofia! Ivailo was very kind and responded very fast to every question we had. His apartment is very very good equipped and it´s very nice located near by a park. So if you plan to come to Sofia, you should stay here", "Great accommodation and excellent service from Ivailo", "15 minutes from the city center. 
Although, great location! 
A big supermarket right next to the apartment. 
A change right across the street and a great park in front.

Great balcony with fresh air.
Very quite area!!!", "Nice appârtment well located
One minus need to walk four floors up..", "Ivailo is a great host - he was always very quick at responding to queries before and during our trip. The apartment is exactly as it looks - everything is very new, very comfortable and well appointed and would easily cater for 4. It is very convenient for Sofia and surroundings are easy to reach. It is also very convenient for some good restaurants - which Ivailo has put on an app. He made us feel very welcome , met us when we arrived from the airport and showed us round the apartment giving some local information. A great visit - thank you.", "The place was bright and shiny with a great view of the park below. There is a kitchen in the contemporary furnished apartment.  There is a near-by supermarket. The place is close to everything and yet far enough from the busy streets of Sofia for one to be able to relax and have a quality time. Highly recommended.", "High quality apartment with great furnishings. The location is 15 minutes walk to downtown and is in a leafy quiet residential area. We parked our motorbikes in the secure separate garage which was absolutely perfect for us. Highly recommended!", "very nice apartment in front of a beautiful park, quite neighbors...Ivailo is very helpful!I would recommend the apartment to a friend...", "The place is very nice, and Ivailo was very helpful. I recommend it to other people.", "Nice location by park, walkable to downtown. Great to have a balcony. Ivailo was very helpful and good about communications!", "Perfect apartment, exactly like on the pictures. Good location, great restaurant next door.", "Ivailo is a great host, the apartment is very nice, completely renovated, the view is wonderful and the location is great! Highly recommend it!", "This apartment was great from start to finish. We arrived a little late which wasn't a problem for Ivailo and his friend. The place was clean and well equipped with everything we needed. Nice comfy beds and a stocked kitchen. Would 100% stay here again.", "This is a great apartment, with everything you'd want. A lovely balcony in particular, and a very helpful host.", "Great area near downtown and park. Beautiful, well kept space. Everything you need.", "A good place to stay in Sofia ~ great view of the park close by! ", "Ivailo was a great host. We had a lovely stay in the apartment. The park next door was a very nice place to hang out and the supermarket was next door. Definitely a place I would recommend!", "Good and sunny apartment with luxurious equipment. Very easy to handle with the hosts and everything works smoothly! Highly recommended for Sofia!", "Another great experience in this awesome apartment. Thanks for all!", "Great place for family. Close to park and nice restaurants, close to the central part of Sofia. Quiet and convenient. The check in was smooth and the apartment has everything you need for a comfortable stay. ", "We had a great stay at Ivailo's apartment! Everything was great and communication was perfect. Recommended! ", "We had a really good time in Sofia. The apartment is awesome: totally renovated, great view on the park and mountain and well furnished. Ivailo was really kind and we really appreciated the presents (wine, water, chocolate,...). One of our best experience with Airbnb. Very recommended.", "Ivailo is an amaizing host. We had amazing stay. He provides much needed information about places to visit in Sofia and Bulgaria. He has very informative books on places to visit, eat and drink. The house is even more beautiful then what looks in the pictures. I would definitely book the same place if I travel to Sofia again.
Only one small issue with kitchen. The utensils in the kitchen were not clean. ", "Amazing and wonderful apartment in a very Nice and central location, with a terrace Looking Into a beautiful park. Friendly and profesional host, our stay in This apartment was a pleasure from the begining to the end. I hope i Can come back soon", "The perfect apartment to explore Sofia from: 
The flat itself is fantastically clean with great facilities (modern kitchen, clean bathroom with a great shower, BIG bed and a lovely balcony overlooking the park that's perfect for relaxing in the evenings.)
The location is spot on too - a short walk from many of the sights or central bus stops to see attractions further out of town, within five minutes of two of the best restaurants in Sofia, 2 minutes from a supermarket and with a friendly green park right on your door step. Ivailo put all of this on a custom-made (Hidden by Airbnb) map too so we didn't get lost once.
Finally, Ivailo was incredibly helpful before the trip, helping us sort a few last minute querries before we traveled, was waiting to show us around when we arrived and was always available throughout the weekend if we need anything. 
As you can probably tell, we had a really great trip, due largely to the location and quality of this place, and so can't recommend it enough. ", "The appartement is lovely; very clean, nice furniture, good equipped kitchen. The shower is hot and heavenly. The view from the balcony is nice on the park, where children play and people sit down to rest. In a few minutes you walk to the centre. Ivailo is a nice man; when we had a question he came over within half an hour. We will come back!", "Ivailo was a fantastic host with a great apartment. Ivailo worked really hard to ensure everything was perfect for our arrival. Every minor detail had been considered... the small things make a big difference (iron, hairdryer, corkscrew etc!). Having a private garage was a big plus too. Any questions we had (how to turn the oven on for example) Ivailo was quick to answer the phone and offer guidance or help in any way. The apartment really felt like home for our short and sweet stay in Sofia.", "We had a perfect stay in this lovely, modern, clean and central located apartment. Ivailo has put a lot of effort into this Airbnb experience. His personal (Hidden by Airbnb) map with all the recommendations has lead us the way to really nice places. The location is perfect anyways but on top of it you'll find one of the best restaurants & cocktail bar just next door - amazing! The communication & Check in was super easy and Ivailo was perfectly flexible. I can only recommend this place and we will definitely come back on our next tour to Sofia. Thanks for everything! ", "Lovely place. I strongly recommend it.", "The balcony of the apartment is great for sitting with your friends. There is a supermarket 2 minutes away. It is really modern and all in all a great choice to stay in Sofia. ", "This is a really great place to be! Beautiful, so clean, central, amazing view! Maybe my best Airbnb experience so far... We also had a garage for our car. And Ivailo is so nice and flexible. I recommand this place from all my heart! ", "Приятно място. Страхотна локация. Любезен домакин.", "Alles hat bestens geklappt. Wir wurden freundlich vom Co-Host empfangen und erhielten eine kurze Einführung. Die Gegend und die Wohnblöcke sehen etwas verkommen aus, was aber nicht ungewöhnlich für Sophia ist. Der äussere Eindruck täuscht, denn das Appartement ist vollständig saniert zu einem stilvollen, modernen Appartement (analog den Fotos). Wir würden es auf jeden Fall wieder auswählen und können es auch absolut empfehlen!", "Πρόκειται για ένα ιδιαίτερα φροντισμένο και καλαίσθητο διαμέρισμα. Ο Ivailo ήταν αρκετά εξυπηρετικός και φιλικός και μας παρείχε βοήθεια και διευκρινίσεις για ότι χρειαστήκαμε με προθυμία. Η τοποθεσία ήταν ιδανική για κάποιον που αποζητούσε την ηρεμία και την χαλάρωση. Δίπλα σε σούπερ μάρκετ και εστιατόριο, και απέναντι από ένα μεγάλο πάρκο. Η απόσταση από το κέντρο με τα πόδια ήταν περίπου 15'. Η παροχή ιδιωτικού χώρου στάθμευσης αποτέλεσε προτέρημα, καθώς, η εύρεση χώρου  στάθμευσης, ιδιαίτερα μέσα στην πόλη, ήταν δύσκολη υπόθεση. Μείναμε ικανοποιημένοι από την επιλογη και σίγουρα θα το προτείναμε, με μοναδική επιφύλαξη την σχετική απόσταση από το κέντρο, η οποία καθιστούσε αναγκαία την επιλογή του αυτοκινήτου ως μέσο μετακίνησης. Βέβαια, ως επιλογή υπάρχει και αυτή της δημόσιας συγκοινωνίας, την οποία δεν επιλέξαμε γιατί δεν μπορούσαμε να βγάλουμε άκρη με την γλώσσα.", "Erg schoon en mooi appartement. Niks is te gek, Ivailo helpt overal mee en heeft ons verblijf top gemaakt! Een dikke aanrader", "Onlangs heb ik hier vier dagen mogen overnachten. Wat een geweldige plek is dit! Het appartement is compleet nieuw en luxe uitgerust. Het heeft een geweldig uitzicht over het park en vitosha mountain. Het is pak en beet 15 min lopen naar het dichtstbijzijnde metro station. Vanaf hier kom je gemakkelijk naar het vliegveld. Het appartement bevind zich aan de rand van een diplomaten (ambassade) wijk. Veel mooie en grote huizen en vriendelijke mensen. Het was echt top.", "Gran piso, muy bien ubicado, frente a un parque. Recomendable 100%.", "Het appartement kwam overeen met de beschrijving en de foto's. Het was schoon en had een balkon dat uitzicht had op een park. Ivailo reageerde direct op vragen en het appartement was centraal gelegen. Wellicht een nadeel dat het appartement op de vierde ( bovenste) verdieping lag en geen lift had. wij vonden dat overigens geen probleem en hebben het prima gehad.", "L'appartamento è luminoso, pulito, accogliente e di recente ristrutturazione. 
Al quarto piano, senza ascensore, di un palazzo che si affaccia su un bellissimo parco.
Grazie alla sua posizione è possibile raggiungere  a piedi, facilmente e in breve tempo, il centro della città con la sua cattedrale e i suoi monumenti.
Ivailo, il proprietario, è stato con noi  molto gentile e disponibile.
"]

reviews:
["A real gem in Sofia downtown!  Quiet, stylish and cosy, this place is a must for everyone who want to explore the romantic, old Sofia ;)", "Daniela is a wonderful host! We’ve had a delightful stay at her beautiful apartment and would gladly return! Very accurate information, artistic and cozy atmosphere and great location! Thank you! ", "Great apartment..!!!

Recommended 100%", "Very good host and lovely apartment. Everything you need to make yourself at home.", "Daniela is an amazing host.  The place is beautifully decorated and location is great.  Can't wait to come back and stay again. Thank You Both.", "the apartment is beautiful, and very clean. we had a great experience and if we will come again to Sofia we defiantly will be happy to stay there.", "This apartment is very well appointed and stylishly decorated. Also it is spotlessly clean and well located. Restaurants and shops are within easy walking distance, as is Vitosha Boulevard, the Main Street in Sofia. Our hosts were very welcoming and helpful, providing us with plenty of information for our stay. If we return it will be to this property,as it has everything that you need in a home from. home.", "This is a wonderful place and so full of charm. Great location too. Highly recommended", "The apartment is simply wonderful, small but very comfortable, both in the summer and in the winter. Daniela and Mois are very kind and you can reach the city’s center by foot (5-10 min). So happy!", "Lovely central location in a neighbourhood with a nice community feel. The apartment itself is very tasteful providing a comfortable and homely ambience with everything you can possibly need to make your stay enjoyable. Daniela and Mois were very attentive.", "Really clean house, nice atmosphere, really good location and mois was very helpful and kind.", "We absolutely loved the space that Daniela and Mois provided. Daniela met us upon arrival and was very accommodating when we had to change our agreed check in time with her. She was very helpful in giving us recommendations for our time in Sofia, and also helped us phone a taxi when we checked out to get to the airport. The flat is very central, making exploring the city very easy, and a very beautiful space with plenty of home touches added to it. We would definitely recommend their flat as somewhere to stay whilst in Sofia! :)", "This is a great place. Close to the city centre, shops, restaurants and the airport. The apartment is nicely decorated, it has everything that you need, the kitchen is fully equipped, the hosts are lovely people, very helpful. I will definitely go back again.", "Very nice place, I recommend it. Nice people and hosts!", "If you want to stay in a home with romantic vintage touches and  you love photography - this is the place for you. The Loft is indeed a really charming place to stay. Daniela and Mois have thought about every detail - from the Sofia photographs to an explanation of the channels in English for the TV. There is everything one might need in the flat, and much more than that. The location is really good - a few minutes walk from Opalchenska Metro station. One can pretty much walk to any place within the city center.", "Great place! About 10 mins walk to everything you need to see... beautiful flat, can’t ask for more!", "The apartment of Daniela and Mois looks exactly like on the pictures: newly renovated with tasteful decoration throughout, beautiful black and white pictures of Sofia on the walls. This is the top floor with windows to all directions, so you feel like you're among the trees, lots of light and beautiful greenness all around. The neighborhood is walking distance from the center, easy to reach from the airport and at the same time very quite and peaceful. A hidden gem at a very reasonable price - you couldn't pick a better accommodation for your stay in Sofia! The owners are quick to respond, arrival and communication was flawless, tips are given on how to spend your time.", "We use Airbnb extensively and Daniela's and Mois's apartment was one of the best presented with many extras that would meet any traveller's needs. 
The apartment is very stylishly decorated full of prizewinning streetscape photos. 
In a very good location less than a kilometer from  the city center.", "Daniela is such a wonderful host. From the first moment on, I thought I knew her for years. 

The loft itself is spacious, charming and very clean. Everything we needed was there. Something typical about this loft are the photos on the wall. All made by Daniela or her husband themself. Very artistic and it gives a very personal touch to the appartement.

Another big plus was the locked solo garage just across the street. Very handy in a town where they are very generous with parking fines :-)

Absolutely a wonderful experience to be in Sofia and especially to stay in Loft 47.", "A very nice appartment very central in Sofia city", "This was an incredible experience-to have a stay that afforded amenities across the board. And air conditioning-too fantastic! Great service and great hosts. Convenient also-10 minutes to Metro, Mall of Sofia, and major sites. If only more stars were possible!", "very aesthetic and comfortable apartment in a very nice area of Sofia. Many nice and thoughtful touches throughout. Daniela and Mois even booked us a taxi for our early flight. definitely recommend.", "The apartment is located in a central and comfortable location and there is close to the apartment and everything you need including public transport, it is highly recommended to get to Daniella and Mois' apartment", "Fantastic place! Fantastic host! I strongly recommend it!", "This is a lovely place to stay.
Very stylish. 



























", "An elegant loft I could easily have lived in long term!  Spacious living room, bedroom and kitchen and air conditioning which was invaluable le as it was quite warm.  Daniela greeted me at the door and showed me many things to see on the map, I.e. furna for breakfast, made in home for dinner, etc,

The loft is elegantly decorated, spacious and quiet.  It is close to the great fruit and vegetable market and the metro if you are arriving from or going to the airport.  A great location.  It might just be the best Airbnb I have ever stayed in!", "Great apartment in good location, 10min walk to center of Sofia or a few minutes in taxi for ~4lev. Had everything we needed in the apartment , great shower pressure and hot water! Daniela was quick to respond to messages and very helpful. Free parking in garage is just across the street from the apartment, it's a small space but would fit a compact/standard size car.", "This is to date the best Airbnb we have ever stayed in! Daniela & Mois have done exceptionally well in creating a place that feels like a home away from home (but better!) We fell in love with it and they are lucky we checked out ;)

We met Daniela when we checked in and she was incredibly friendly and welcoming. She gave us a brief overview of the place and let us drop off our bags even though the flat was not ready for us yet (we were early.)

They flat itself is stylishly decorated, and yet in a way that feels homey and unique too. The photos are ones they have taken themselves, which give it a nice personal touch. It was a relaxing space to come back to after exploring Sofia and it's surroundings. With the 2 AC units (living room and bedroom), it stayed cool despite being the top floor.

Everything you could possibly need and more was available. We are talking umbrellas and a reusable shopping bag ready to go by the door if you need them! In the bathroom, there were full sized shampoo, conditioner and shower gels, as well as some feminine supplies, make-up remover, cotton buds, and a hair dryer.  There is a washing machine as well, and we found our clothes dried quickly. If you needed to iron, that was an option as well. Like I said, they have thought of everything.

The kitchen was immaculate and well stocked, making it a pleasure instead of an "adventure" to cook in. My husband was pleased to find coffee grounds and a french press available for use. If you are more of a tea person, they have provided options for you too.

The location is great. It is on a quiet street, but close to shops, city sights and metro stations.

I would come back to Sofia just to be able to stay here again!", "dear  ...
It's  was a pleasure for us to rent a such amazing , woundedful apartment with  beautiful decorations .
The location of the apartment is really good ,where you have most of things around you such as mini shops or restaurants .
The decoration  was gorgeous , gave you a relax feeling  , in away you just wanna set and relax on the apartment 
in addition,it was organized , cleaned  and whatever you need is available. 
As we reach late to the apartment,it was so kind from them , they came with us and guide us to the nearest restaurant, although its was really late . 
They were lovely and kind .
Just a wounderful apartment
thank you so much
really appreciated", "This is as perfect as a place could be. The hosts are warm, friendly, thoughtful, and absolutely accommodating, and they have thought of every possible amenity for their guests. We especially appreciated the maps of Sofia, the use of umbrellas, since we were there in a rainy spell, nice coffee set up with coffee provided, a washing machine, adapters for our American electrical plugs, and even a list of which channels were in English! This is a beautiful, light-filled apartment, tastefully decorated with Daniela's photographs, and the surrounding trees make it feel like a tree-house. We loved it. ", "Daniela and Mois are wonderfull hosts. Communication was great. The apartement was very clean and beautifull and is located in walking distance of the city centre.", "Daniela and Mois’ loft apartment was a really lovely place to stay. Stylishly designed and very clean. Daniela and Mois always replies really quickly to our messages and, upon arrival, gave us plenty of tips to enjoy Sofia. We would both definitely stay again!", "Our stay at Mois and Daniela was outstanding. The pictures don't do justice. Their home has an incredible homely feeling and amazing design. Everything is as described and beyond. We loved the location as we explore each city by foot. You are in the heart of Sofia with everything you need within walking distance. Their urban photography is beautiful and adds a personal touch to space. Our check-in was seamless, and communication is always speedy. They are both super sweet, Superhosts who cares about your enjoyment. Their home is sparkly clean, equipped with everything you need, the apartment has huge windows that bring light and breeze into the apartment, washing machine, and a rack to hang clothes to dry, beds are super comfy, the kitchen is fully equipped, and if you're on a business trip, the space is comfortable to work from. I can't rave enough about the space, hosts and if you're reading this review, you should be booking it by now. As we are both Superhosts ourselves who travel full time, we know to appreciate an amazing apartment, hosts, location, and value. Thank you Mois and Daniela for your warm welcome and beautiful home. See you next time! :)", "Me and my husband didn't feel at home here - we felt better! The apartment is brand new, sparkling clean and thoughtfully arranged, but there's more: it reflects perfectly the spirit of Sofia! We really loved staying chez Daniela and Mois and will surely try to book their place next time!", "Beautiful house with perfect location.
We had wonderful time here.", "This is my favorite apartment.  I have traveled to many places and this is the perfect space! The owners are so wonderful and this was my second time staying here! I work in Bulgaria every summer and this will be the apartment I select every time, I love it!", "Location is great= Less than 5 minutes to the Metro (with one rolling bag, a backpack and a bag for luggage.). Street cars stop right in front. Walk to center in 15 min through a scenic, interesting part of town.
Communication is excellent- clear instructions on access before hand, detailed information on the apt and the location as well as local recommendations on site and easy access to hosts. Thorough introduction of space - (if Danielle's English is "limited", as opposed to her French, Mois must be fluent.)
The space is so nice you might want to just spend a day there. Comfortable seating in all rooms, great workspaces, functional kitchen, cozy bed with good linens- and so nicely designed we took pictures for our own home!
Yes, it is a 3rd floor walk up, but it's not terribly steep and the wonderful airy house in the trees feeling is worth the effort. The light and space of this place cannot be over emphasized. ", "A great place to stay! It's a short walk from the Metro and various shops and restaurants. Stylish decor and well-supplied. We really enjoyed the wine, yoghurt and cookies :)", "Fantastic apartment very conveniently located in central Sofia. My partner and I had the pleasure of staying in the apartment for 2 nights. We loved we quirky feel and attention to detail. The flat was super clean and we had everything we needed. Despite being within walking distance to most attractions, the apartment is very quiet and tranquil, an ideal place to relax after a busy day sightseeing. Daniella is a great host, very friendly and easy to communicate with. We would love to stay here again next time we visit Sofia.", "We love the place so much! One of our favourites. Perfect for a couple. Lots of good local recommendations also. Many thanks", "I would travel to Sofia again just to stay here! It is beautiful, so clean and cozy, and in a great location!", "This is a great apartment close to the city centre. It is safe and secure. Everything you need is there and close to any amenities. Hosts communicated almost instantly every time. They allowed us to leave our bags after check-out as we had a late flight. If we end up in Sofia again, we would definitely stay here again. ", "Cosy loft just minutes walking from the city centre. Quiet neighborhood Very clean and with everything someone will need. Highly recommended", "It was absolutely unbelievable experience to stay at Daniela's & Mois' loft. The unique style where traditional Bulgarian meets modern; the interesting decorations throughout the flat; the hospitality shown by the hosts and great tips for restaurants. The loft is in a good location too, just 15mins walking to the very centre of Sofia. Also, the fast response and earlier check-in than usual was much appreciated as me and my girlfriend had an emergency situation and had to find alternative accommodation at 23.00 but Daniela responded already the next morning at 7.00 and arranged check-in for 11.30. It really saved our Sofia experience.", "Daniela & Mois' place is awesome! They were super friendly and easy to communicate with at both check-in and check-out. The apartment was clean, spacious and stylish. The location super. Would definitely recommend to others!", "- Great hosts
- Quick communication
- Multiple languages
- Nicely decorated loft (great details)
- Everything available (soap, hairdryer, etc)
- Good location as the citycentre is in walking distance
- Information available (taxi, restaurants, what to do....)", "We had a lovely stay at Daniela and Mois’s place. The apartment was bright and homely with some lovely touches. It had everything we needed for a short stay. We walked everywhere - only 5-10 mins to get to Serbika underground station. There are places to eat nearby - we recommend breakfast at Furna. Mois and Daniela responded quickly to all our queries and were very helpful. They allowed us to drop our bags off with them before check in and helped us order a cab back to the airport. We were really grateful and recommend you stay here.", "Incredible apartment, beautifully decorated, very clean, and lots of guide books and tips of where to eat etc. Would really recommend to anyone staying in Sofia!", "Mois and Daniela's loft is an oasis in  Sofia.  The space is full of natural light and very thoughtfully renovated and furnished.  The bed is very comfortable. The kitchen is well appointed.  The bathroom is well-designed with great hot water and water pressure.  The living room is  a great place to relax alone or with friends and the table makes an excellent work place.  Mois and Daniela were easy to communicate with, responding promptly to all requests and inquiries, and going out of their way to make me comfortable during my stay.", "Highly recommend this apartment. Very bright, in a quiet area and has everything you’d need. There are also lots of books/ flyers and tips in the apartment about things to do in Sofia. It’s only a 10-15 minute walk from the centre. The hosts were great and very accommodating for us.", "Great location and Daniela and Mois offer great tips and insight to the city. Will definitely stay here again!", "Really an excellent place to know about Sofia. Absolutely advisable", "Lovely new apartment, beautifully laid out and decorated. Stylish, lots of light, and many extras left behind by the generous hosts. Daniela and Mois were very responsive and helpful. A more alternative part of town away from the busiest streets, but just a 10-minute walk to the center.", "The apartment is central, cute, beautifully furnished and clean! Especially the windows in the rooftop lead to a cosy atmosphere and make the apartment even bigger as it is.
Daniela and Mois are very friendly and helpful. We definitely would come back and warmly recommend the apartment!", "Beautiful apartment, really central, great hosts who went out of their way to help us have a good stay.", "We were in the appartment of Daniela and Mois for a week. They thought of everything in the apparment (from vinegar to slippers). The very bright bedrom is not only great to wake up in, but also perfect to work (like a studio). The flat is located in walking distance to every important point of the inner city of Sofia - so it was a fantastic stay. Thank you!", "Really amazing loft apartment. Exactly as described and is so comfortable. I cannot recommend it more. Really good location as well,  we walked to the sights.

Wouldn't definitely return here when visiting Sofia again.", "A really nice apartment at a good location. The place looks very beautiful and was very clean. It had everything you will need for a short stay in Sofia. 
The instructions/directions from Daniela and Mois were very clear. They also provided many tips for nice restaurants and city highlight. Very much appreciated! 
This is definitely a great place to stay at when you're in Sofia!", "This house and its hosts were perfect. Beautiful home! Next to subway and grocery market. Great recommendations! We went in winter and it was warm and cozy. Perfect Sofia stay!", "Daniela and Mois' place was stylish, lovely and roomy. We enjoyed our stay, found it a nice place to hang out and relax, but also a great base to get out and explore Sofia from. Highly recommended.", "There is no better looking flat - everything feels luxury in there. Drowning in natural light, modern and comfortable. Daniela was very helpful and welcoming. ", "Our stay in Sofia was really special thanks to this lovely place. It's a great location - we walked all the time. The shops and restaurants are also close. We loved the list with recommendations and the books which can be found in the apartment. The only thing we would say was a minus is the fact it takes some time till the place warms up as there are no heaters just air conditioning. But the overall experience was great. ", "The apartment was as charming and spacious as depicted in the photos. It’s a shame I only came for a quick work visit. Daniela received me warmly and gave some great tips so I could spent my spare time effectively :). Thank you!", "We have spent two amazing days in Daniela and Mois' apartment. It was clean and tastefully furnished. Also the communication in advance with Daniela was uncomplicated and she waited for us at the flat to welcome us.", "Beautiful clean loft, decorated to a high standard and filled with everything you could imagine to make it a home away from home whilst staying in Sofia. It's a short walk to the nearest metro station which is very simple to use to get around or 15mins to simply walk to main points in Sofia.  Communication with Daniela and Mois before, during and after the stay was prompt and clear and they were very helpful throughout. Would highly recommend their place when visiting and exploring Sofia!", "Fantastic hosts and fantastic apartment! Apartment is lovely! Great location, very clean and stylish! Has everything you need for a short or longer stay. Very secure, in a good location- all round just brilliant! Daniela and Mois were amazing hosts, accommodating late check in and check out and even arranging for us to stay an extra night when our flight home was cancelled due to snow! Very responsive, with great tips for the area. Would highly recommend this as a base to exploring Sofia! Thank you Daniela and Mois!", "Daniela and Mois are fabulous hosts. 
We fell in love with their gorgeous apartment!!! It is clear how much effort they put into making their guests feel
Comfortable and welcome in Sofia. The apartment is just lovely. They provided an extensive and up to date list of handy tips about the city and delicious restaurants. Always prompt with their replies, we appreciated their easy and friendly communication. 
Thank you again! We hope to return to Sofia one day. 
Alice and Lucy.", "Everything about this place is wonderful! Daniela and Mois were great at getting back to me and waited for my husband and I to let us into the apartment for a late arrival. The apartment is very well designed and it was decorated for Christmas! Such thoughtfulness and heart have gone into this place. The space is so cozy, it was hard to leave it to go and explore the city. Everything is really within walking distance in Sofia, so it was a perfect location to see everything. We loved this space and absolutely will be back! Thank you, Mois and Daniela!", "This flat is a great find - central, very economical and stylish.  It is around 15-20 minutes walk from the tourist sites.  The neighborhood is quiet and safe.  Also Daniela and Mois’ communication was always swift and friendly.  I would absolutely stay here again!", "Amazing! Location, cozy flat, and the best hostes!", "Everything was as it should be! :) Great hosts!", "This apartment is just great!It has everything you need for a lovely stay in Sofia. We loved the style of the house, very romantic and cosy and Daniela, the host, was super friendly and helpful. She gave us some very good recommendations  of restaurants in the city. We would definetely recommend it!", "We really liked our stay in Loft 47! It is really beautiful and cosy, Daniela and Mois are perfect hosts and the location is close to the city center. In Dutch we would say: ‘een echte aanrader’ (highly recommended).", "Short stroll into Sofia Centre, amazing little local gems at the market and a beautiful apartment with everything you could need and want. Very stylish, comfortable and lovely little extras (tea/coffee/shampoo etc).  Make sure you go to the Armenian restaurant across the road. The hairdresser also does a great cut and blow wave!", "We arrived at Loft 47 to a warm welcome from Daniela. The apartment is very stylish but full of charm and character. Its situation about 12 mins walk to the center of the old town makes it convenient yet quiet at night for sleeping. We loved it and found Daniela most helpful arranging taxis to the local mountain Votosha and airport. Well recommended.", "One of the most beautiful places we have ever stayed! Equipped with absolutely everything you could need,  and the flat is so thoughtfully decorated. The courtyard outside is lovely, and located very conveniently to walk or take the metro into town, plus very close to coach/train stations. Very quiet and safe at night, shops and places to eat nearby.  We didn't want to leave! Daniela and Mois were so kind and helpful, and communicated with us quickly and clearly.", "Everything was perfect!", "Everything is nice, the location, the room, and the special decor...Daniela & Mois are good hosts, very good to communicate with and very helpful. Highly recommended.", "The loft47 is remarkable. An oasis of calm, of space and light. It is the most beautiful and finely renovated apartment that we have stayed in. Very well thought out and designed, very clean and very well stocked in all ways. We highly recommend this. It is a short walk to the centre and the nearest metro stop is just around the corner.  Daniela is a great host and helpful in all ways providing personal information to your own individual requirements. Both Daniella and Mois are particularly good photographers as well, with their own photographs adorning the walls of the apartment and the stairs up to the top floor. Thankyou to you both for providing such a fantastic place to stay for five days in your city.", "Absolutely perfect! I recommend it 200%!", "Daniela and Mois' apartment is as beautiful as the photos suggest. The location is ideal for accessing the city and attractions (it's only 10 minutes walk to the centre, 5 minutes walk to a supermarket, and a minutes walk to a convenience store. The neighbourhood is bustling during the day, and yet very peaceful at night. Daniela and Mois were great hosts and worked around our very delayed arrival, as well as organising a taxi for our very early departure. We highly recommend Loft 47 for your stay in Sofia.", "We had a great time at re apartment. Both of them were incredibly welcoming and helpful, responding quickly whenever we needed to contact them. The apartment was brand new and spotless. Bed was comfy and we had access to everything we needed.  Their place is roughly a 15 minute walk to the centre of the town. There is a great breakfast place we would reccomend called furna near by, and another called the rainbow factory.   Great quality and traditional food. Overall we don't have any bad words to say about our stay and would like thank them for making them for making it such a pleasant trip.", "I had a lovely stay in this beautiful and cozy apartment. It is located in a house in a backyard and therefore very quiet. Definitely worth to book and feel like being at home.", "Daniela & Mois have a fantastic home that was perfect for our first stay in Sofia. 

The house is very secure and the hosts were fantastic at communicating with us prior to our stay. 

The house is fully equipped and we have everything we needed to make our stay as comfortable as possible. 

Thank you! 

Delen & Ben", "Fantastic place, exactly as in the description. We found it perfect for our longer stay (2 weeks), really well equipped, lovely and bright, beautifully designed loft. Location was great 10 minute walk to centre of city.
Daniela and Mois were very accommodating. Highly recommend this place for your stay in Sofia!", "I'm going to Sofia every year since 2015, so far, it's the best place I've been to.
Everything was perfect.", "You don't get better Airbnb experiences than this! The apartment is amazing, very bright and airy. Plus it is so nicely furnished with everything you could possibly need.  Great location, a 5 minute walk and you're basically in the heart of Sofia. And Daniela and Mois are the most helpful hosts you could ask for! If only we could give more than 5 stars we would!", "Where to begin? Staying at Daniela&Mois's place was an absolute pleasure. Apartment is everything as described. Never stayed at such a clean place! Has all the necessary amenities such as umbrellas, first aid kit, sewing kit, iron&board,coffee/tea, maps, guides, tips. Bed was firm but super comfortable. Linens also very nice. Plenty of drawers and hangers for clothes, tons of electrical outlets. Did not use the kitchen much but it had everything one could need if one wanted to make some food at home. A/C units cooled off apartment remarkably quickly. Decorated with taste and style just as the pics show. There was nothing but peace and quiet when I was in the apartment. The hosts are both very warm and friendly and helped make my stay in Sofia easy and delightful. Thank you so very much!!!!", "Daniela and Mois were great hosts. Mois went out of his way to research car rentals for me and was extremely helpful. They have a lovely home and we wish we'd stayed longer.", "This place is fantastic, a beautiful fairy tale-like apartment, every little detail is just perfect. Location is great, very close to everything but still quiet. Daniela and Mois are perfect hosts, quickly answered to any question we had and their house manual is also very detailed. I am very happy we chose their apartment. Thanks a lot for everything!", "Wonderful loft, exactly as described. Daniela and Mois are very nice and communicative people and they created a perfect place to  stay. The city centre is at walking distance, the supermarket around the corner.", "One of our best airbnb experiences. Beautiful apartment, with absolutely everything you need. Modern, spacious and very clean. Great location, very quiet but close to city center. Daniela and Mois are great hosts and always responded if we had questions. Would recommend!!!", "Daniela and Mois' Place truly felt like home from home. A much nicer home. Perfect location, wonderfully decorated, amazing value. ", "Very nice, bright, spacious and clean apartment not far from city centre. Daniela, Mois and Andrey were very kind and helpful. I can only recommend. ", "We really enjoyed our stay at Daniela & Mois's loft! It was very clean, conveniently located, spacious and well equipped. Overall, we would recommend to anyone looking to discover the charms of Sofia!", "The apartment is beautifully decorated and very pleasant. It is also very well equipped and we were able to cook full meals in the kitchen. The location is perfect to explore the city and get a taste of the real Sofia. Daniela, Mois and their son were very helpful and kind both before and during our stay, also by letting us park our car in their garage.", "If you visit Sofia you have to stay at Daniela and Mois's place ! The location is unbeatable to see this beautiful city but the comfort of the gorgeous apartment makes it that much better . Check in / out was super easy and Daniela and Mois were very accommodating! We will be back to this sanctuary in Sofia .", "This is a fantastic apartment with a very reasonable price.  The apartment and owners are wonderful.  I really like the neighborhood and it was very easy to navigate the city from there.   Daniela and Mois allowed me to leave my luggage at the apartment longer than expected and then even gave me a ride to another location to meet work colleagues.  I would absolutely stay here again and I look forward to that opportunity! ", "Loft47 is every bit as charming as the photos suggest, and even better. The place is spacious with lovely wood beams, plenty of windows and skylights, a fully equipped new kitchen, exposed brick, and beautiful views. The bathroom is brand new, and the bedroom is wonderfully light and airy but cosy at the same time with vintage design details. My favourite part is the big chair that is perched just under a skylight between two brick walls -- a perfect spot to read! It feels like you are tucked away in a quiet, residential neighbourhood, but it is only a 10 min (1 metro stop) walk to the centre. Daniela and Mois were such kind and welcoming hosts - we cannot thank them enough for their hospitality, and for helping us get the metro to the airport. We felt that we found the best place in Sofia! Thank you, merci pour tout Daniela & Mois!", "Very very nice place to live, there are several windows to see the sky and the stars. Very clean. Mois and Daniela    and their son are friendly and willing to help you. The loft that I lived in Airbnb is the best one.", "Daniela welcomed us on arrival, kindly letting us check in early due to our morning flight. The loft apartment was beautiful, clearly deigned and created with care and love. The layout was spacious, tastefully decorated and all amenities were provided. The apartment was easy to locate and Daniela explained in both French and English about the surrounding areas with a wealth of knowledge on activities we were interested in. It was an honour to be the first guests of Daniela and Mois' gorgeous home and I would highly recommend booking this unique apartment when visiting Sofia and surrounding areas. Thank you both so much for a wonderful stay. Alice and John xx", "Το Loft είναι πραγματικά ενα κόσμημα! Ξεκούραστος χώρος, πεντακάθαρα όλα, απολαυστική ησυχία, πολύ κοντά στο κέντρο. Οι οικοδεσπότες μας εξυπηρέτησαν σε όλα, μας έκλεισαν και το ταξί της αναχώρησης. Το προτείνω ανεπιφύλακτα. Αξίζει να το επισκεφθείτε.", "Très belle location, bien située. Hôte très agréable et disponible. ", "Appartement très cosy, lumineux et propre. On se sent vraiment bien. On est à 10 Minutes du centre ville à pieds. Daniela est très facilement joignable, et arrangeante. Un petit plus : Daniela parle très bien français, ce qui facilite les échanges !  ", "Très bon séjour passé chez Daniella qui parle très bien français.  L'appartement est très joliment décoré, bien équipé et très propre !", "Daniela en Mois zijn superhosts. Hun accommodatie is prachtig! De sfeervolste Airbnb ruimte ooit en we hebben er  velen bezocht. Met een persoonlijke touch. Er hangen mooiste foto’s door hen zelf gemaakt. De buurt is ook geweldig, heel authentiek en lokaal . En toch op loopafstand van de bezienswaardigheden.", "Mooi appartement, dichtbij het centrum. Alle benodigde faciliteiten en erg mooi ingericht.
We moesten alleen wennen aan het wakker worden in een lichte slaapkamer, maar verder enorm genoten!", "Die Wohnung ist ein kleines Juwel im Herzen von Sofia. Tiptop ausgestattet und sehr zentral gelegen. Für uns als Pärchen eine absolute Traumwohnung im Loft Style. Wir würden definitiv wieder kommen und empfehlen die Wohnung weiter. Daniela und Mois sind super nette Gastgeber!", "Es un lugar hermoso. Un verdadero oasis de calma en el centro de Sofia. Tienes todo para sentirte como en casa! El gusto en la decoración es exquisito, hay mucha luz natural y buena energía. Hemos pasado unos dias fantásticos. Gracias Daniela y Mois!! ", "Séjourner au Loft 47 de Daniela et Mois a vraiment été une super expérience !
L'appartement est magnifique, plein de charme et on s'y sent tout de suite chez soi.
Il est totalement équipé (cuisine et salle de bain très modernes) et tout confort.
Daniela nous a accueilli avec son français impeccable, et nous a donné plein de conseils de tout ordre (restau, balade, etc). Tous ses conseils sont imprimés et disponibles à l'appartement, ils ont été un précieux guide pour notre séjour !
Encore merci, c'était un super voyage, en grande partie grâce à vous !!
Zoé & Philippe", "Es war alles ganz wunderbar! Das Appartement wird beim nächsten Sofia-Aufenthalt auf jeden Fall wieder gebucht! Vielen Dank!", "Heel mooi sfeervol appartement met vele voorzieningen. Vanuit 't appartement kun je hartje centrum goed bereiken, lopend of met de metro. In de buurt is een supermarkt.", "Это место превзошло все ожидания. В центре города - уединенный артхауз, в идеальной комплектации, светлый, чистый, теплый, удобный в каждом уголке своего пространства. Эстетически совершенный, что в общем-то уже ближе к искусству дизайна, нежели к максимально удобному жилью. Хозяева - очень гостеприимны и внимательны. Спасибо за эти дни!", "El mejor piso de Airbnb en el que hemos estado hasta la fecha! Todos los detalles han sido cuidados al máximo, desde las recomendaciones locales hasta la decoración, pasando por la limpieza y la amplia gama de menaje del hogar a nuestra disposición. Además, Daniela y Mois han sido los anfitriones más atentos y amables con los que nos hemos encontrado. Absolutamente recomendable!", "Todo perfecto!", "Notre séjour était parfait. Le logement est très bien situé pour accéder au centre ville rapidement à pied. Tout est bien équipé pour manger même pour les toilettes. La maison est bien rénovée très joliment c'était bien agréable pour passer notre séjour à Sofia. Merci beaucoup Daniela ! Daniela parle très bien le français *^^*  On la recommande vivement !", "La casa si trova al limite nord ovest del centro. Si raggiunge la zona pedonale in una decina di minuti a piedi. Non è necessario prendere mezzi di trasporto per spostarsi. La metro è comunque ha 5 minuti di distanza. L'appartamento è molto ben tenuto e pulito è i proprietari sono stati molto disponibili. Consigliatissimo", "Charmant appartement parfaitement meublé moderne, à deux pas du centre, au calme. ", "Все соотвествует заявленному. Дом просторный, светлый, чистый. Даниела, которая встретила нас, рассказала все,что требуется. Под рукой всегда была визитка для решения любых вопросов. Дом действительно уютный, чистота и порядок. Я хотела бы вернуться сюда еще раз!", "Die Wohnung ist absolut top. Die Beschreibung und Bilder treffen vollkommen zu.

Die Wohnung ist vom Flughafen mit der Metro (Haltestelle Opalchenska) sehr leicht fußläufig zu erreichen. Das Zentrum ist zu Fuß in 15 Minuten zu erreichen, die Moschee und die großen Regierungsgebäude aus den vergangenen Jahrzehnten sind in 10 Minuten.
In nächster Umgebung gibt es einige lokale zum Essen, die aber nicht unbedingt empfehlenswert sind.

Die Lage ist gut und ruhig gelegen.

Die Wohnung ist phänomenal, wunderschön und sauber. Da macht es Spaß. Die Küche ist gut ausgestattet mit Ofen, Herd, Kühlschrank, Gefriertruhe.


110% Weiterempfehlung."]
