reviews:
["excellent location, great bathroom with Jacuzzi and very large apartment, all is present for a perfect stay.", "Near perfection. I can't say more than that. 
Location; can't be better, Right in the middle of the center, near Vitoshka (the shopping street) and Graf Ignatiev, which ment I had to walk 10 minutes to my office. Everything is rather nearby (unfortunately the Carrefour went bankrupted, but still Lidl and Bila are close enough).
Check in: Is the most easy, no need to wait for anyone, just take the key from safetybox. Desislava was extremely fast to respond on any question we had.
Most detailed description of the host I have ever seen, for checkin, and also every appliance in the apartment is well documented. Very impressive work. Also maps and explanations about places around.
The apartment: One of the best I have had. Completely renovated and modernized with very modern equipment. A lot of contact points to load your laptop/phones/etc...  All equipment we used worked well and all you need has been carefully thought of. Microwave, glasses, plates, cooking pots... even some products to keep you going for your first days like washing powder, little box of coffee powder, etc, etc...
I was overall very impressed with how this was all organized.
Most recommendable.", "Great place with with a WONDERFUL LOCATION!!! Highly recommend!!! ", "Everything was great and we enjoyed our stay very much.", "Super central space. Connected to all you need and everything you wanna see in the city. And beautiful jacuzzi", "Best apartment in Sofia. 50m from Vitosha street. All is perfect and easy.", "Very nice apartment in a very good location. Prompt communication.", "Everything was good, good localisation and nice apartment", "Nice place in the centre of Sofia. Fully equiped for a comfortable stay. The hot tub is a welcome extra. Quick responses on messages.", "Fantastic place, location and service.  A must stay if in Sofia", "Great place! Sparkling clean, central, in an excellent condition. Host and co-host were both very nice and eager to make my stay as pleasant as possible. I definetely recommend it!", "The location of the apartment is great and right in the city centrum. The general cleanliness of the apartment was not as expected and even after the cleaning lady came back for a second swipe of the bathroom, we still found toe nails of our previous renter... the kitchen could have a also needed a good dusting. We booked the apartment especially because of the beautiful jacuzzi that looked super inviting on the pictures. Due to the strong smell of mold in the entire bathroom, we didn’t, however, feel comfortable using it at all. The communication with Vassil was good - over all, we would have chosen a different apartment though if we had known about the state of the bathroom. What is nice about the apartment is that it has amazing light blockers in the bedrooms so you can get an amazing sleep!", "Very nice stay, clean apartment. Easy access late at night with locked key outside apartment. 

Location is everything here. Almost everything at walking distance. Some nice amenities which we didn’t use beacause there are so many nice restaurants, bars etc around.", "A lovely, safe, central apartment that is near all you would wish to do and see in Sofia - be it culural, culinary or nightlife. Vassil himself is prompt with reply and communication, and happy to help. A great place.", "Me and my friends stayed here for a few nights and could not believe what a fantastic apartment this was, it far exceeded our expectations. The place was extremely central, clean, large and modern with a jacuzzi really adding to the finishing touches! 

The host was quick to respond on any questions we may have and would definitely book this apartment again.", "This is a great location which would be hard to be improved upon. We had a great time and communication with Vassil was excellent. We had a small issue with a water leak while we were there but this was swiftly dealt with. The flat is most adequate for a week's stay. We would happily return to this safe and vibrant city. I did feel the flat was a tad dated (Website hidden by Airbnb) what?", "The apartment is so well located. It's a quick walk to Vitosha, but without the noise of being on the main street.  The kitchen isn't super well set up for cooking, and we did have some issues with hot water (that were promptly solved!), but it's a great apartment and I'd definitely recommend it.", "The apartment is in a perfect location. Less than 1 block away from lots of restaurants and bars. We were able to walk to the sights and anywhere else we wanted to go easily. The bed was one of the most comfortable I have ever slept on! Vassil was also a great host and we appreciated his great communication during check-in and check-out.", "The apartment was in a great location to explore Sofia and our host was perfect in communicating with us.", "Perfect", "The location is awesome if you like to be close to restaurants and bars. Had a great time there.", "My family and I stayed in this apartment for a second time during our vacation in Bulgaia and would stay again if we we had a chance. The apartment is very comfortable, clean, and quiet. It is equipped with everything necessary for a comfortable stay. The location is truly prime. Communication with the host Vassil was easy, prompt and efficient. Highly recommended.", "Fantastic location. You are in the heart of the city, close to everything. 24hr store a block away. Vitosha blvd. with lots of places to eat 2 blocks away. The apartment itself is ok. Lots of space. Unfortunately the interior is dated: desk, beds, bathroom faucets. Lots of things missing in the kitchen. The toilet flush, extra pillows, and few other items are downright disgusting. Few lights were out. Foul odor throughout the place. Overall i'd rate it 3/5.", "Perfect location, spacious, easy checkin and great communication. I would stay there again!", ".", "Fantastic location with quiet bedrooms. Carpets could use a change but well maintained otherwise. Great place for a Sofia visit.", "Right in the centre, very good communication, comfortable beds!", "We were surprised how accurate everything was. I have to go far to look for something negative to say about the Apartment. Very easy check in. Great location in the city, great kitchen fully equiped with everything you need to cook for your friends. Great living room, bed rooms, and bathroom. Thank you very much and we hope to come back one day.", "It is a very nice and spacious apartment in the real center of Sofia.  We could reach everything important by foot. Vassil was very obliging. If we needed something we could always contact him. The whirlpool by the way was amazing! ", "The Apartment is located in a very central part. It is located in the city center. Supermarket, different restaurants and bars are just minute away from the place. The Apartment is big enough for four people. It has almost whatever you could need for your stay. I would have preferred, if the flat was better cleaned. NOT that it wasn't clean but there was room for improvement ;) The only disappointing point was the not-working Jacuzzi. It was broken which was not a big deal but I wish Vassil have told us about it before. Communication with Vassil was super easy and however we didn't have the chance to meet him, he was answering our messages very fast and friendly. I totally recommend the place.   ", "Great location with Vitosha blvd and it's many shops, restaurants and bars closeby. Within walking distance many parks, night clubs, musea, theaters,... so the location if this place was superb! Well equipped kitchen, spatious bathroom,... we did not use the jacuzzi. Very easy checking in and out, clear instructions and communication. Great place for this money.", "The apartment was very nice and clean, right in the center very close to al shopings, restaurants and party areas. Vassil use a self check-in system thar perfectly worked, so we did not met him but every question I asked him by e-mail he answered vere quick. 

I highly recommend this apartment because us the perfect combination: location, equipment (oven, microwave, jacuzzi..), space (is very big!) and very clean.", "Superb location! Nice apartment and the best location in town. If we would be in Sofia again I´m sure we would repeat
Vassil was nice host and always reachable for any kind of inquiry
", "Great Host. Quick and good communication. Appartement has a very attractive location. 
We definitely would like to  come again.", "Vassil was tremendously flexible and helpful, and the apartment has ample space and is well equipped. Hope to use stay here again! ", "Good host.", "Absolutely great apartment, in the best central location in Sofia! The host was very helpful and the apartment was spacious and accommodating for 4 people.  The jacuzzi was lovely and the shower even better.  There is a small but great little terrace and the apartment kitchen is fully equipped. ", "One of the best flats I've ever stayed in!! Close to city centre and the night life. Highly recommended, would stay again.", "The place is at a superb location, close to everything from historic landmarks to nice cafés and restaurants! Just a block away from the lively Vitoshka street. The apartment is very neat and has everything necessary for a relatively short stay. Bedrooms are quiet facing a courtyard, not the busy front street, which allowed good rest away from the noise of the city center. Having AC was a definite bonus in the hot summer days. Communication with the host was smooth and efficient. Overall, this was a very positive and pleasant experience; would stay there again.", "Best location. Everything was organized. Worth the price!", "Probably the best place I've ever stayed. Our flight was delayed by a few hours and Vassil even waited up for us - then he showed us places and left us alone to do our own thing. The apartment itself is literally 2 minutes from the centre and includes aircon and electric shutters for the best nights sleep. ", "The flat is really well located, large and very comfortable. Vassil's lovely daughter welcomed us and waited even though our flight was late. She was extremely welcoming and made us feel at home instantly. Vassil is great at communicating and responds fast, we had a few requests and he was very accommodating. ", "The apartment is fantastic, very clean, modern, well-appointed and really really well located! Vassil is a perfect host! He helped us in everything we needed. I recommend a lot this apartment!", "We had a fantastic experience with booking Vassil's apartment - highly recommended! Very quick and smooth booking process, received a confirmation email and message from Vassil within minutes. All information provided, flat - as advertised, in an excellent location in the city centre, close to all sightseeing attractions and places to eat, dance, etc. Value for money. Host exceeded expectations, had an extra set of keys, had prepared a map of Sofia for us and gave us tips for exploring the city, was very responsive when we reached out to him during our stay - all was amazing! Vassil explained to us that he has a number of properties in Sofia - we will definitely reach out to him next time we'd stay there! Ivelina", "Vassil met us as arranged and drove us to the apartment. He was very welcoming and pointed out places of interest during the drive. The apartment was in the centre of Sofia in a perfect location. We could easily walk to a variety of restaurants, shops and bars. The apartment was as described, it was clean and it was well maintained. We had a great time in a lovely apartment and our host did all that was required. I would certainly stay at this apartment again if I were to visit Sofia.", "The host was very welcoming, he also arranged for a taxi to pick us up from the airport. 
The host also gave a very detailed description of areas to visit in sofia, restuarants, supermarkets, and pharmacy around the area. 
The apartment is very clean and perfect location to explore the city. ", "I spend 3 nights in Vassil's flat. He is a very good host and showed us all the good places around the area, left us maps and flyers of restaurants, pubs, tourist attractions. Vassil also waited up for me as I had a late arrival, Much appreciated!!!
Good location, easy to find and the place was clean. Close to supermarket and restaurants, walking distance from all tourist attractions and nice restaurants. 
I recommend it!!!", "Thanks for an apartment with lots of space.
Really good location, place was clean and easy to find. Close to supermarket and restaurants. i highly recommend it", "Vassil made the check in and check out process very easy for us - accommodating our travel times. The apartment looks just like the pictures - VERY spacious and great location. A  few broken bits here and there but nothing that impacted our stay. The jacuzzi was an extra bonus! The location is great - just around the corner from TONS of restaurants, bars, parks and where all the tours meet. Would stay again!", "Vassil was always easy to contact and provided us with a booklet which gave us useful information about the area.

The apartment is clean and in a great location. We enjoyed our stay.", "The apartment was very conveniently located.  Vassil was a great host.  He answered any questions promptly.  I recommend him. Thanks Vassil", "Vassil was a great host. He informed us about all the things to see and do in Sofia, as well as, restaurants nearby and shops. I would really recommend the flat and Vassil", "Good house, really in the citycenter!", "Very nice and great location", "The apartment was in perfect condition and the description in the website is correct. Lovely experience.", "Great experience. Nice apartment in great location. Parking is a pain if you rented a car, but that's to be expected in any European city center. ", "Nice apartment, comfortable, had really nice heating, and everything we could need. We had a great stay, and everything went smoothly! Thank you Vassil for the stay! We definately recommend this to others!", "Apartment was great, very clean and as described in the description. Would recommend. Vassil also made arrangements to pick us up and drop us off at the airport. ", "Vassil's daughter Valentina meet us and showed us around a very well appointed place.  We were very happy with it. It had a lovely kitchen and living space.  The only disappointment was that the water wasn't really hot enough to make the spa tub useful.

There place was clean, bright, functional, well located, and attractive. If stay again.", "The host canceled this reservation 15 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.", "Vassil's place was right in the center. We stayed there for 6 days and it was like we felt Sofia from the heart. Nice bars and restaurants are just around the corner. We'll probably go back! ", "This is a very pleasant apartment. Generally it's in very good condition. Perfect size and very good location. Plenty of good restaurants and things to do around. Well furnished. Appliances work perfectly well. No issue at all with either cold or hot water. The cleaning service is good and the cleaning lady is very friendly.
Vassil is an excellent host. Very responsive with good communication skills. Very punctual in his appointments .
I highly recommend both Vassil as a host and the apartment.", "Both Vassil and his daughter were very nice to us. They helped us by giving us an extra set of keys, leaving detailed maps of the city in the apartment, and being very available and responsive with any questions or concerns we might have had.

Furthermore, the apartment is simply perfect. 5-10 mins walk from all the major highlights of the city downtown, clean, spacious, nice ACs in every room, great kitchen equipment. 

We will definitely be coming back. Sofia made a huge impression and captured the hearts of us all. Thank you, Vassil, and good luck with everything!", "host was warm and welcoming as always. flat is great, great location and very comfortable.
", "We were very pleased with this apartment, having stayed twice recently. It certainly met our needs as a family of four. It was very well priced, especially for a lovely apartment in a prime location in the city centre. The kitchen was well-equipped and the jacuzzi an added bonus. The landlord was incredibly helpful and easy to contact throughout both of our stays. ", "Vassil welcomed us at the flat explaining us everything and especially what to do around the city. The flat location could not be more central. Me and my friend highly recommend this flat !", "Espectacular la ubicación del apartamento, limpio y sobre todo una fácil comunicación con  Vassil", "Hat uns sehr gut gefallen,
jede Menge Platz,
Sehr zentral gelegen,
Sehr hilfsbereit", "Die Abdeckung des Whirlpool war offen daher sind wir nicht reingegangen.
Hundegebell im Haus hat uns früh geweckt.
Die Lage ist Top! (Einkaufsstraße, Kiosk,  Supermarkt, etc)
Die Türen im Badezimmer lassen sich nicht komplett schließen.", "Sfortunatamente nel nostro soggiorno a Sofia dei lavori nel quartiere hanno causato la completa assenza di acqua calda nell appartamento.
Vassil e' stato gentilissimo assieme ad Airbnb nell offrirci un rimborso per l inconveniente .
L appartamento di Vassil  è modernissimo e in pieno centro , a pochi passi da metro e dalle principali bellezze artistiche , tutto a portata di mano.
Le foto rispecchiano perfettamente la realtà dell appartamento.... 
consigliatissimo!!!", "Ottima ubicazione, comoda e centrale consigliatissima!", "We hebben een heerlijk weekend gehad in dit appartement. Het ligt erg centraal met veel lekkere restaurants, ontbijttentjes en kroegjes op loopafstand. Ook alle bezienswaardigheden zijn per voet te bereiken. Het rook alleen erg muf in het appartement, waarschijnlijk kwam de lucht uit de putjes in de badkamer. Goed doorspoelen, de ramen daar openzetten en de badkamerdeur dichthouden hielp al wat.", "Die Unterkunft ist sehr zentral gelegen und man ist direkt bei der Einkaufsstrasse. Checki  war um 14.00Uhr und die Schlüssel waren pünktlich in der Box.
Alles in Allem, gute Wahl(:", "Proper en ruim appertement op een geweldige locatie. Alles wat je nodig hebt is aanwezig.", "Posizione comodissima per raggiungere i locali e il super mercato,casa sileziosa, pulita e spaziosa", "Appartamento accogliente situato in posizione centrale", "L'accoglienza puntuale e gentile. Il quartiere centrale come da descrizione. Il palazzo esternamente decadente (ma come la maggior parte dei palazzi in Sofia) però l'appartamento come da descrizione, molto funzionale. Consigliato.", "васил  потрясающий хозяин. он очень внимателен тактичен предусмотрителен.к нему хочется приезжать еще ни раз.квартира полностью соответствует описанию.есть все и даже  более того(кухня укомплектована на 120%  банные халаты  и т.д.).а расположение квартиры-просто сказка.так держать.всем советую.", "Ottimo appartamento, posizione centralissima, pulito e accogliente. Sicuramente da tenere presente per i prossimi viaggi a Sofia. "]

reviews:
["Perfect!", "Great place with great hosts for a great price! Thank you for everything! See you again :) !", "Stylish cozy place in a great location in city center! Highly recommended.", "Amazing place, quick check-in! The location is on spot and the apartment is so colorful!
Definitely recommended. Thank you Tanya & Alex!", "This was my third stay in this magical place. It inspires me and is one of the most beautiful and well thought apartments with its own character ! This is why I love Airbnb so much!", "This was my second stay in this flat. It is definitely one of the best places I have ever rented. Would not book another place while staying in Sofia!", "What a gorgeous and beautiful place! One of the best stays ever! It was very stylish, impeccable clean and also located just next to one of Sofia's main metro stations which made my trip very convenient. I would and will stay here again! ", "This was my second stay at this magical place. This is for sure THE place with soul and character . So much style and coziness. Would not stay anywhere else while visiting Sofia! Thank you so much for your exceptional hospitality !", "Wow, what a place! By far the most interesting and stylish flat I have ever been to! No need to say that it was sparkling clean and extremely comfortable! Do read and follow the tips of the hosts for going out and activities! ", "Very nice place! Clean, stylish and the host was amazing! I recommend this place!", "The artament is exactly the same as the pics. It's super beautiful, clean, with nice views, amazing amenities as fully loaded coffee machine, teas, cooking utensils... everything a real home has. check in super convenient without any need to exchange keys and hosts are amazing in their attitude and tips too. The best airbnb I have stayed in. Totally recommend!", "Great apartment and a wonderful host. Highly recommend!", "Great, clean place with very good location.", "Апартамента е направен с много желание. Беше ни интересно пребиваването. Радваме се че избрахме Вас", "Excellent host", "Very cozy and convenient flat ", "ARTament is an awesome place with quite a shabby chick touch. Close to the city centre, super close to on of the Sofia busiest shopping centres, beautiful view and yet, somewhat private and very personal. ", "Top apartment in close proximity to metro stop. Beautiful view. Amazing value for money. Recommended!
Супер апартамент близо до метро спирка. Прекрасен изглед. Препоръчвам!
", "Apartment was very charming, lots of character and very clean which is always most important to us. The location was good. Only thing was that the parking is not guaranteed, it is on a first come first serve basis.   Other than that the apartment was perfect.", "Everything like on the photos. Nice looking spacious apartment, furnished with taste.", "Great hosts and wonderful location, the apartment is cosy, comfortable and beautiful", "The apartment is so lovely and really cozy! The decorations and all the details like the vinyl collection that we could listen to really add a lot to the atmosphere. It is exactly as the photos and they have everything you may need. There is a subway station just a 100 meters from the apartment so getting anywhere around Sofia is very easy. Would love to go back to Alexander's place some day! Thank you for the hospitality! ", "Me and my girlfriend felt like at home in Alex' place. I really appreciate good design and this place has a very unique touch to it :).

Most of all Alex was very welcoming and helpful to us.

/Stefan", "Great hosts!! Very nice and clean apartment !! Close to the Center and transportation , metro etc !! For sure it will be my first choice next time in Sofia !!", "Great hosts and always available for questions. Hospitality was that good with personal touches, it was like checking into a hotel. 
Apartment has everything you could need and next to the city sights and amenities. 
I honestly can't think of anything that was missing or needs improved.
Had an amazing trip to Sofia. Thanks Tanya and Alex.", "10 stars , highly recommend", "Tanya and Alex’s place was a lovely apartment to stay in for our short trip to Sofia. It’s in a great location to get to the main tourist spots and attractions, and is super close to the Metro.

The apartment itself is quirky and stylishly decorated, with some really nice touches to make you feel at home. Tanya and Alex also left information about places to visit and hidden gems which were great - would definitely recommend!", "Tanya & Alex were outstanding hosts and made us feel very welcomed and safe in a city we were totally unfamiliar with.  The location , cleanliness were superb.  We would like to return the favour to them someday.  THANK YOU from the bottom of our hearts.", "The appartment is really nice, especially when you like a vintage style. The location is good, nearby the metro station (perfect line to the airport). We had a very good time! Thanks again :)", "Very lovely and comfortable place. It’s perfectly clean!", "We loved the cosy apartment! 
It is comfortably furnished and is close to the center. 
The best thing about the Tripp: the nice and uncomplicated communication with the hosts. Thank you", "This is one of the best Airbnbs I have ever stayed in. 

It's a beautifully spacious flat with lots of homely touches. 

Check in was super easy, the flat is in a nice neighbourhood with a shop conveniently across the road and nowhere is more than 30 - 35 minutes on foot. 

I would highly recommend to anyone looking to stay in Sofia for work or pleasure.", "Tanya&Alex’s place was very comfortable and stylish. We enjoyed our stay very much. We have not seen them but we can comfortably say from the experiences we had that they are kind, friendly and accommodating. The apartment is in a convenient location with the metro, tram and walking distance to the city center. Only thing to be aware of is that you may not feel entirely comfortable with walking back to the apartment late in the night if you are a solo female traveler.", "the apartment was perfect and typical ! we loved the stereo and the washing machine. you are 20 min to the center by walk and the building and the area are quiet. 
we ask for booking the same day and they answered to our message immediately ! very nice !! 
for parking space : we paid 40 levas for 2 days in a parking close to the apartment. 
thank you again, our trip in Sofia was perfect thanks to you guys !", "This is a great stylish place. Conveniently located right next to the metro station. I felt like the neighborhood is real local Sofia, you hear very limited English as compared to the city center. Definitely well recommended.", "Tany & Alex flat is really nice. Very good beds! The neighbourhood might seem a little deserted if you arrive by metro at night (very easy from airport), but in daylight the surroundings are very nice with lovely coffe place across the street and a lovely park to drink it in nearby. It was just a short walk into the center of the city. 
Tanya & Alex is very easy to communicate with. We didn't meet them in person, but the flat was filled with tips on what to do and where to go. Great hosts!", "The flat is as beautiful as you can see on the pictures! The flat is furnished with love & lots of lovely Details. As a welcome we had some delicious filled chocolate and a lovely sign with my name :) The flat is very well located, directly at the Metrostation Opalchenska - and on a main road. One sleeping room is calm when you close the windows but for noise sensitive people this flat might be not the perfect one. I could sleep very well, especially in the room with the smaller bed - the mattress is like cloud-loved it! The mattress of the other bed is comfortable to, is mid-hard. The washing machine is an old lady - a bit hard to handle but it works ;) You have the Supermarket Billa a 5 minue walk away as well as a lovely little park. The hosts Tanya & Alex were always there for us, we could even leave our luggage on the leaving day until the evening (because the next guests arrived late) at the flat - just great! I just can recommend this flat :)", "Very good location, quiet, clean and comfortable.
Recommend strongly.", "We had a wonderful week in Sofia and the appartement of Tanya and Alex was great! The trafficsound is a bit loud but that's probably how Sofia (and all big cities) is like. We recommend it warmly and we will come back next time we travel to Sofia!", "Nice stay, nice apartment, nice people", "Tanya and Alex are excellent hosts: they give you wonderful tips to visit Sofia, they're very precise and always available to reply you anytime - plus, the self check-in is very useful and easy! The apartment is super close to the metro station, so it's perfect to reach any spot of the city. The furniture is amazing, very detailed and well orgnized; the rooms are perfect to host a group of friends who wants to enjoy a weekend in Sofia. In the house you'll find everything that you need (from the bathroom to the kitchen): all the rooms are super tidy and cleaned! I strongly suggest to enjoy your time in Sofia at Tanya & Alex's place!", "Lovely apartment. If you go by metro get off at the western end of the station, the apartment is only 50 M away.", "This flat is equipped with everything you might need for your stay. It is located not far away from the metro, a supermarket and a nice park.", "We stayed at Tanya & Alex's apartment for 5 nights and were very happy with our choice. Super-easy connection to the airport, speedy communication and very straightforward check-in & -out. The flat was clean and equipped with everything you could need, but also had convenient amenities very close by. Best of all we enjoyed the attention to detail and the effort that had clearly gone into the decor, which made the flat feel very welcoming!", "Lovely apartment just as on the pics, though out decoration, good location (particularly practical to get to the airport), ac worked wonders on a hot day, good shower, considerate hosts who helped us for instance book a taxi to the airport and gave us tips on what to do and where to eat. Also they had gotten us some local beers and yogurt. Highly recommendable!", "The appartment is lovely, charming and really welcoming! Everything was clean and perfectly organized. Communication with Tanya and Alex couldn’t be better! There’s a metro station right on the corner so is easy to get there from the airport and move around. ", "We spent great time in this apartment. Tanya and Alex obviously have had an artistic taste when furnishing the apartment. So many nice and interesting details. Not to forget that the apartment was sparkling clean and had all the amenities one might need. Thank you for a great stay! We definitely recommend! Eleonora and Stefan", "Apartment is good,clean and well located. If you try to use washing machine read instruction first !!!!

Building is renovating(old ) and next is building the new one (just connecting wall) so on 8:00 on the morning constructors start perforating that wall knocking by hummers and soon. House of the rules “be quiet on 2:00 to 4:00 pm” sound strange.", "The apartment was as described.
The building was very old, but nice in the apartment. 
Close to metro if you don't have a car,
Tanya and Alex where very responsive wheMN messages where sent,", "Great convenient location and old building with character. Elevator takes you back in time. Nice, clean and affordable. ", "Nice. All as described. But notice the bathroom photos? They are small, strange and sometimes a little smelly. We woke up twice with the early construction noise. ", "The apartment is as lovely and homely as it looks and everything works well. Tanya and Alex respond very quickly and kindly, which was very appreciated. The place has lots of light and I love that it was on the top floor (the lift works fine!)
The neighbourhood has hidden gems - don't be put off by the big, slightly noisy street this flat is on - and do look at their local recommendations listed online. Walking into the centre of town is easy (though it can get quite hot in summer) and the metro station (and very easy metro system) is two minutes from the front door. The bed was comfortable and the wooden blinds cut out the bright, summer sunshine for naps and lie ins after long days of exploring. All in all a very good for value, charming location from which to explore. This area feels safe, as most of Sofia does, and the cobbled streets and the trams are charming. I feel that they would be very helpful if you had more questions about what to see and do. Thank you, Tanya and Alex.", "The apartment is very well situated close to Opalchenska metro station! We also walked into the center of town in less than 20minutes! At first I was a little scared about the look of the outside of the building but the apartment was beautiful and well designed! We felt very safe and at home there! We loved the quirky features and found it very comfortable!", "A super quirky apartment that made us feel instantly at home. It was spacious and light and we loved the coffee machine. ", "Tanya & Alex’s place was wonderful! Great location and very stylish. We really enjoyed our stay. ", "Tanya & Alex’ place is lovely. 
Really stylish place, comfortable bed. Well fitted out kitchen. 
We had a few issues with the Tv, Tanya arranged for someone to come & fix it the next day which was really kind. She responded to messages quickly.
My only complaint which isn’t Tanya or Alex’s fault is the loud building works going on outside the sitting room window the week we were visiting. It appears they are building new apartments next door & it was loud with drilling & hammering from 7:30am every morning including Sunday.", "Lovely apartment, especially the living space and bedrooms. Lots of amenities nearby and very close to the metro and walkable from the centre. Excellent base for visiting Sofia. Didn't meet hosts directly, but good communication. ", "A beautiful apartment, perfect for a short weekend break. A short walk from the centre of town and close to a metro stop (which we never used as it was a lovely walk), it’s close to a large supermarket which is a bonus! Check in/out was very easy and the apartment was lovely and clean. I would highly recommend staying here, especially if there’s a few of you.", "We recommend this flat SO much! it's beautiful, the style of furniture is really chic&cozy, Tanya and Alex reply so fast and do everything to make the trip comfortable for you! there is a document uploaded that explains very well how to get there from the airport... the nice veggy restaurant SUN&MOON is only 15 mins by foot and the towncenter is even nearer... the two have been very flexible with our late checkout time.
the beds are amazingly confortable! thanks a lot", "Alex and Tanya's apartment is so cool and stylish. Great location and super easy check-in. Alex was kind enough to welcome us at check-in with a much needed cold beer. A must if you are staying in Sofia and have an eye for design, the apartment interiors are very cool. 
", "Tanya & Alex’s place is just fantastic. So funky and fun but also very clean and comfortable, we felt right at home and even enjoyed an evening round the kitchen table with sangria and cards whilst there was a storm. It was like being at home, but better!
Great local tips, we didn’t have chance to do them all but everything we did was brilliant. Sofia is a fun city with so many different days and nights to offer. 
The flat was in a great location close to transport links, which we only used once as the apartment is so well placed we walked everywhere.
Thanks guys!", "Very comfortable room with a nice view. Clean and stylish with boardgames available. Tricky to find but the hosts were responsive and helpful, guiding us to the location.", "We stayed here for our honeymoon 2nd June until 7th June. It could not have been a more perfect apartment to stay at. Beautiful, clean, cosy, incredibly unique and stylish! It is within walking distance of many museums and galleries. We often walked to the Serdika area where you will find a lot of things to do, but sometimes we just took the metro which was less then a minute walk away. There are also a couple of different supermarkets nearby to choose from and parks too. I would definitely want to stay here again next time we visit Sofia. Thank you so much Tanya and Alex!", "Best communicators on Airbnb that I’ve had so far! Apartment couldn’t have been cleaner and was a lovely space. Would definitely stay again!", "Tanya and Alex’s place is the ideal apartment when staying in Sofia. They place is very spacious, clean, and beautifully decorated. It is a 10 minute walk from Sofia city-center. It is located next to a city-park. In this park is a very traditional Bulgarian restaurant you cannot miss - delicious! The apartment is also near a grocery store which is very convenient for longer stays. The free parking outside the apartment building was great. We would happily stay here again - would highly recommend!", "We had a wonderful stay at Tanyas and Alex' unique and beautiful flat. It really felt like a home, not just like an accommodation. Public transportation and a supermarket is nearby.", "Really beautiful and tasty flat. It could be mine. Great location, you can visit most part of the city by feet.", "Nice appartement, good location to walk or with public transport to the centrum, coffee, croissants and alcohol shop on the other side of the street. Only the bathroom is a little less comfortable than the rest of the apartment. We would come back anytime", "Me and my dad had a wonderful time in Sofia. The apartment was very nice, clean and comfortable. The owners must have good taste. The have some amazing records, Beatles, faithlessit, daft punk and others:) the appartement is also very conveniently located near a metro station.", "Beautiful apartment with two bedrooms, great location right next to a metro stop, walking distance to the city centre. We would definitely stay here again! Thank you Tanya and Alex.", "Loved the place! Had everything you could need. Also loved the local restaurant tips. Went to nearly all of them.", "We didn't meet Tanya but Alex is a great guy. Everyone should definitely go to the flea market with him! For the rest he always answered quickly if we had questions and showed us a very cool neighbourhood in sofia! Thanks for an amazing stay!", "Thank you Alex & Tanya! We really enjoyed your place and Sofia. The apartment was very clean, cosy and right next to the metro station.", "Tanya’s and Alex’s place is just amazing! Very specious, beautifully and stylish decorated, very comfortable and clean. Easy location. It’s a pity we could stay there only one night. Highly highly recommended!", "Brilliant appartment with many thoughtful touches. I particularly appreciated the excellent mattresses and venetian blinds. Tanya and Alex gave us some brilliant tips for things to do and great Restaurants. Highly recommend Muzeiko the children’s Science museum (our 8year old son loved it!) and also the taxi App is very reliable and efficient. The code entry system is also a real plus. 
The appartment is wonderfully interior designed and feels like a bohemian dream. Very cultured and solid experience - living like a local.
Warm and welcoming!", "Very nice place! Thanks Tanya & Alex", "Centrally located! metro station is less than 100 meters away which can take you to the airport in 30 mins. There’s also a quite big shopping mall nearby. Overall, Tanya and Alex’s place was homy, artsy, clean and relaxing. I would recommend this place to everyone!", "A lovely, stylish and cosy apartment with everything you need . Very close to both the metro and supermarkets. Another plus is that it is an easy walk into the city centre. Lots of nice local shops nearby and a great Bulgarian restaurant across the street (behind the church - look for green lights !)
We had the pleasure of meeting Alex. He was so very helpful , pleasant and informative. A brilliant base for exploring Sofia.", "Beautiful apartment, spacious, clean and homely. Handy location right beside the metro station, and only 5 mins from city centre! Would highly recommend :)", "Alex was wonderful! He personally waited for us and helped at check-in, and he was always extremely prompt with responses. The apartment is very conveniently located - walking distance to Mall of Sofia and a metro station. The place is nicely decorated in a very artsy way; feels like home! The only [very minor] issues for me were that the apartment is old (as are most places in central Sofia), and that I couldn't find a deep-enough pot to cook pasta. Otherwise everything was great!", "Tanya and Alex were wonderful, they respond quickly and are sincere. They allowed us to check in early when we got in to town really early and made sure we had everything we needed. Would definitely recommend.", "The place is very clean, the host is very helpful and it is in a good location. I would stay here again.", "Great decorated appartement. Beds are good. Enough extra blankets. Clean. 6st floor. There is an elevator, but i don't dear to use it. It looks crappy. No excess to the rooftop fire escape. It was locked. You can get easy get trapped.

Location is good. Near to the city center and on 20 meters from a metrostation.", "Thank you Tanya and Alex for our wonderfull stay. The house is very clean and the bed is awesome! Location is good, next to the metro station. Across the street Youll Find coffee, a 24 hours shop and a second hand shop . Everything was perfect!", "I really recommend this apartment, it’s beautifully decorated in a quiet, central area. There is a direct metro connection to the airport and the main tourist areas in the city. Check in was easy and Tanya and Alex always responded to messages quickly.", "Really Very unique and cozy appartment ..i liked the Open view from the windows.Very close to everything you need.We definitely reccomend this place!", "Super nice place to stay in Sofia! Everything was great and the flat was as perfect as on the pictures.", "This is the place I always want to stay when I'm visiting Sofia. Fantastic location, lovely decor, and attentive hosts!!!", "Таня и Александър предлагат изключителна услуга, която препоръчвам на всеки!

Страхотен апартамент(!) на централно място в София с отлични транспортни връзки. Освен всичко друго, за мен локацията имаше и сантиментална стойност, защото от кухнята се вижда добре моето бившо училище - ЦИЕК.", "Very good choice for any visitor !!! Strongly reconnected to anyone !!!", "What an amazing flat--so perfect in every way. Great location, easy to get to metro for all parts of city centre and back to airport. Tanya and Alexander left lots of information and maps. The decor was quirky and hip, while also being a practical space for two gals to share a pad with two toilets, shower room, private bedrooms both opening onto lounge which made the common area feel spacious. Tea and creamer sachets were already stocked in the kitchen which was very important to us UK based travellers :). Loved the sharing of recipes in the kitchen journal. Will highly recommend it to friends traveling to Sofia. Thank you so much for a lovely stay!!", "The artament is always great. We stayed there for a second time and it always feels like home. Close to the center of te city, and just in front of a metro station. The idea of using security codes and automatic locking of  both doors is very practical and safe. Guests shouldn't be discouraged of the old elevetor and the shabby look of the building. Hope to visit again soon!!!", "What can I say that hasn’t already been said. This listing was perfect. Check-in was seamless and very efficient. The location is perfect as its right by a metro that goes straight to the airport and has really handy links to the bus station. The views are also quite spectacular and there’s plenty of great places to grab delicious food nearby. Personal recommendations are Furna for delicious pastries and coffee and Factory rainbow for some really great sandwiches and salads. Tanya & Alexander’s place comes very highly recommended!", "Tanya & Alex’s flat was lovely. It is well located and is just a short walk to the centre of Sofia. The bed was so comfy that we barely noticed the roadworks outside! Would definitely recommend :)  Vielen Dank für alles!", "The apartment was lovely, exactly as pictured in the listing. A 15 minute walk into town, or one stop on the metro (which costs less than £1 each way). Tea, coffee and cream were nice touches that we were grateful for, since we didn't arrive until well after midnight. Beds were comfortable. Thanks for a lovely stay.", "What a lovely stay! A cute flat equipped with everything we could need. Thank you!", "Great place! Would definitely recommend it.", "Great apartment, spacious, well equipped, and in great location. Metro is just around the corner and the connection to the airport is simple.", "Tanya an Alexander are amazing hosts. Very clear communication. Everything went smooth and easy and the apartment is great. Perfect location to explore the city. And the apartment itself is also really nice. We adored the decorations and interior and the lp player for the tunes.", "The appartment was so beautiful and had a good emplacement, I just loved everything about it, thank you so much,.especially for the check in earlier ! :)", "It was a really nice place, and the location is good -- right next to a metro station.

An irrelevant tip -- when entering metro stations in Sofia, hold the ticket in your left hand!", "Great stay in a beautiful apartment. We really enjoyed our time in Sofia and the apartment was just what we wanted. Comfy beds, cozy sofa and tastefuly decorated. Alex and Tanya were really helpful and excellent at communicating. They helped us find a place to store our bags on the last day which we really appreciated. Highly recommend this apartment.", "FAB!! super nice apartment and tons of personal touches. Thanks again and we'll be back!", "Everything was as expected :) A very nice flat!", "As a couple we had lots of space to relax in after a day's exploring around Sofia. We are in our 60's and walked everywhere. The exterior of the building and the lift may be a little off putting but you will be rewarded by the well renovated interior.
We would happily recommend this Appartment to any of our friends  visiting Sofia.", "This is a great Airbnb place! We can say that from both the point of view of two experienced guests as well as two Airbnb fellow Superhosts. We had a perfect time here. The apartment is beautiful, immaculately clean, tidy, stylish and spacious, in a lovely area of the city. From here you can virtually get everywhere  you like walking or catching the metro at the station few steps from the front door. We didn't get to meet the hosts in person, but they are super easy and nice to communicate with and the check in was extremely well coordinated. And Sofia is a nice city that is definitely worth a visit! We would love to be back and would wholeheartedly recommend Tanya & Alex's place to any guest in the Airbnb community. GRAZIE! =D", "The apartment was excellent - a lovely modern, stylish space with amazing views, all the amenities and very clean! Tanya and Alex made the check-in very smooth and we enjoyed the suggestions left by previous guests. I would definitely recommend staying at Tanya and Alex's place if you are planning on visiting Sofia!", "The apartment is lovely and exactly as advertised. Communication with hosts was easy. Strongly recommend.", "Alex and Tanya are extremely responsive and have detailed instructions on how to get to their apartment on the day of your arrival. They were flexible and let my sister and me leave our suitcases at the flat before the check-in time since we arrived in the city much earlier than anticipated. They have a very big refrigerator, which comes in handy if you like to cook or have some food readily available at the apartment. The decor in their apartment is impeccable and the view of the beautiful church just a few blocks away was the highlight for me every morning and evening. The apartment is only a block away from the nearest underground stop. The nearest grocery store is about a 7-minute walk and the Palace of Justice is about a 15-20 minute walk. I would highly recommend!", "Tanya and Alexander's is beautiful and just how it looks in the photos! We arrived in the evening and the hosts gave us perfect instructions on how to check into the flat using the self check in system. The flat is in a great location with some lovely Bulgarian restaurants right on the door step as well as a cinema really close (which was great for us as it rained a lot while we were in Sofia) There is a metro stop just a few minutes walk away and it's also possible to walk to many places from the apartment. I would really recommend this flat if you are visiting Sofia! ", "Tanya & Alex were very helpful in giving us instructions on how to get to the flat from sofia airport and made some useful suggestions for activities during our stay.  The flat was exactly as described and we had a very comfortable stay as we enjoyed Sofia (a great city).  Many thanks to both!", "We had a wonderful stay at Tanya and Alexanders place. Great start of our Balkan trip! ", "Exectly pretty and cozy as pictures. 
You can get to the central by metro in a few minutes or by foot 20 minutes. There is big mall and big market near house. 
We didn't meet host face to face, but communicated via airbnb message and there was no problem at all. ", "We loved our stay at this flat - was perfect for what we needed and we loved the quirky decor. Would definitely stay again!", "This apartment is gorgeous.
We loved the views, especially the beautiful sunset. The hosts thoughtfully provide things like shampoo, tea/coffee and brochures to plan your stay.  It was easy to get around town on the metro - highly recommend this apartment to all visiting Sofia! ", "very nice and cosy apartment in the old part of Sofia, relaxed atmosphere, very gentle hosts and perfect communication ", "Such a beautiful apartment and comfortable stay. Would stay here again! ", "The apartment is so cozy and comfortable and clean. You cannot find a more helpful host. The location had me worried when I first saw it But No NEED To WORRY. We felt very safe there. The Small 24 hour shop across the street came in handy everyday and the people there were friendly. The metro location is So convenient. Because taking a taxi was also a reasonable price, although not as cheap as the metro, we took a taxi a lot. It was easy to Walk down to the mall and find many taxis there. The mall is 5 mins. away. Taxis are able to get you to places that you can't get to by metro. A 15-minute ride in a taxi only cost about 5 BGN (approximately 2,50€ at this time). I cannot say enough nice things about Tanya und Alexander. Incredibly helpful and answered so many questions very quickly. Hiking at Vitosha was so beautiful. The free Sofia walking tour was top-knotch. We loved everything about our visit. Don't miss this delightful opportunity!", "It was a pleasure to stay at this stylish classy apartment in the centre of Sofia. Felt directly "at home". We would love to come back soon!", "Tanya's place was very easy to find, charming apartment with all the home comforts needed to make your stay here like home from home. Beautiful trendy vintage chic decor without being uncomfortable. Beds were a dream! Ample linen and towels provided. Lovely view from bedroom 1, kitchen and living room. Very accessible by public transport and local shopping mall, restaurants, cafe and a Lidl for all your needs. I cannot fault anything in this air bnb apartment. The shower was perfect, plenty hot water and the coffee provided was much needed after travelling for so long. Will be back to stay if ever in Sofia again.  Thank you for allowing us to stay in your beautiful home and for your responsive communication in regards to all my queries before arrival. You made my birthday weekend the best to date! ", "This apartment is truly stylish and will find everything you need. I enjoyed my stay very much!", "Nicely renovated appartement, high quality windows, not right in the center but conveniently located next to the Metro and still easily walkable distance to the center.
...and a beautiful Saeco Espresso machine goes a long way to start the day! :-)", "Perfect place for our stay in Sofia!", "Alexander was fantastic - a great communicator before and during the stay, and a kind helpful host. The apartment was large, clean and had an edgy style with comfortable beds. The kitchen is fully equipped and stocked. A homley feel was accomplished with a rocking chair, JENGA and candles. A great stay in Sofia close to the metro and city centre. Thank you!", "Super cool flat with a great cachet.
Great communication and very clear instructions by the host with a convenient self check-in procedure.
A bit far from the center but you can take the tube/tram or simply walk it if the weather is nice enough.", "Amazing apartment with a quirky style that fits in perfectly with the surroundings. Favourite feature was the windows which open fully- in the morning you can enjoy the sunrise from bed and later watch it set from the dinner table. Beautiful. 
We were a group of three and the place felt spacious and homely. Kitchen is fully stocked and there is a cool vinyl/CD/speaker system you can listen to whilst cooking. 
Most things are walkable from the apartment (the opposite end of the city centre is probably 30-35 min walk?) and there is a lidl for supplies less than 10 mins away. 
Tanya and Alex are excellent hosts, quick at responding and were very helpful.", "This is a very beautiful inspirational apartment. Probably one of the best I have every stayed at. The internet is fast but was in and out during my stay for short periods of time. Over all highly recommended.", "We had a great time in Sofia and a good stay in Tanya & Alexander's apartment. There are a lot of shops just a few walk minutes away. The apartment was very clean and cozy with a lot of lovely details. The communication was perfect. Thank you very much!", "The apartment is located literally across from the entrance to oplechenska metro station, which in one stop (less than 5mins) will get you to a central station. Alternatively, a 10 Min walk through a high Street will do the same thing.

About 100m down the road is a supermarket with everything you need should you choose to use the spacious kitchen the flat has to offer. 

Two toilets, one wet room, two bedrooms adorned with beautiful decor.

Honestly amazing. I can see why this place is reviewed so highly, as it has not only lived up to, but surpassed expectation. Would not stay anywhere else in Sofia. ", "Everything worked well with the check in and we felt comfortable. We had a nice stay at Alexanders place! ", "We had a very pleasant stay at this tasteful apartment. Thank you Tanya & Alexander for being such great hosts. ", "We stayed in Tanyas and Alexanders apartment for two nights. It is really beatiful and cozy with lovely details. perfectly equiped, there is everything you need. We can highly recommend the apartment and would stay there again. The communication also was very good. :)", "Tanya and Alex are very responsive! The place is great! Everything was as described. Thank you!", "Very cosy apartment, lovely interior decorations! Thank you for having us! ", "We had a good time in Tanya & Alexander's apartment. It's good to reach with public transportation service and has a lot of shops just a few walk minutes away. We can recommend this place for your stay in Sofia!", "Adorable, well designed, cozy and clean apartment walking distance to everything. I felt very much at home there! Would definitely and highly recommend.", "Our stay at the place of Tanya and Alexander was awesome. The apartment is totally cosy and clean. The tips Alexander gave us were really good and helpful. 
I would go there anytime again.", "Great place with a great atmosphere, I would definitely come here again. ", "We really enjoyed the three days in Tanya`s and Alexander`s appartment. It is elegantly furnished, and located in a central district. To be highly recommended! 
", "Alex welcomed us to the apartment and helped us get our luggage to the 6th floor with the small elevator.  The apartment was charming, clean, nicely decorated, with a comfortable bed.  It was in a great location, only a block from the metro and the Mall of Sofia.  We had an enjoyable stay.", "The apartment is delightful and very clean and comfortable. There are lots of utensils and towels and home comforts which is a blessing when you are travelling. We did get to meet Tanya or Alexanda but we met their brother in law Ivo who was extremely helpful. 
The Metro is a couple of minutes away and gives you access to the whole area. We really enjoyed exploring the area and trying al things Bulgarian. 
There is also a Billa down the road (cheap supermarket) which makes getting food and stuff really easy. 
Sofia is a very interesting place and we would recommend the free Balkan Bites tour which is a good tasting tour and also a visit to the mountains. They are very beautiful. 
We really loved Sofia and would definitely recommend this apartment as a place to stay. 
", "Great place to stay whilst in Sofia! Convenient, close to the centre of the city and a shopping mall nearby. The apartment was exceptionally clean and tidy, just like on the photos. Communication was clear and super easy! Would stay again when visiting Sofia!", "Great apartment in a central place. We enjoyed our stay in Sofia and definitely recommend the city and this apartment! ", "Plenty of ease, awesome apartment and great stay. Thanks guys. ", "Tanya and Alex's apartment is very central and convenient to get around Sofia. ", "The flat is awesome like promised. At 50 footsteps from the M station (1 stop from the most central M st.) ", "Everything was fantastic, great hosts who were helpful both before and during the stay, good location not too far from the centre and a very stylish and quiet (and warm!) apartment. ", "The flat was great - the hostas were highly responsive to our messages and although they were away on a trip when we arrived, their friend Monica took great care of us. ", "Fantastic experience - Tanya and Alexander's apartment was beautiful, warm and cosy, and a very comfortable base to explore Sofia - would happily have stayed longer if time permitted!

", "This place was stunning! The apartment was amazing and uber chic with a real sense of culture and taste.

", "Tanya and Alexander's apartment is great, it is exactly as the pictures you see, the location is great, a few steps from metro station and a few blocks from a big mall. ", "We had a great time in the apartment, it really has a cool and unique style. Location was goid and Alex was very helpful. They even let us have both early AND late check in/out. Would go back there anytime.", "We had a great time at this appartement. The pictures shown reflected the reality really well. It is a light, artistic place with many interesting objects to observe and enjoy. We had everything that we needed. The place is situated downtown but a little further for walking to the main centre. Thank you.
", "I fantastic stay at this flat, after our hotel fell through at the last minute. We felt very lucky that the flat was available for our weekend in Sofia, much better than our hotel could have been.

The apartment is a beautiful and sunny space to stay in Sofia - it's well cared for and easy walking distance to the centre. We really enjoyed our stay and would definitely recommend it to friends and family - we hope to stay here again! ", "Such lovely hosts and so helpful! You're also not even that far from the city centre if you fancy walking and experiencing the neighbourhood. Although we didn't meet Tanya and Alexander it was really easy to communicate and the key exchange was very smooth. Thanks again!", "The apartment was chic, spacious & in a great location. Highly recommended!", "Tanya and Alexander were always very prompt with communication when we asked questions before/during booking, for check-in and while we were there. The apartment was very cute and it was handy having two loos! Having the metro so close was also very handy, though we also used taxis. We wish we had been smart enough to figure out the AC in time to use it both nights we were there :)", "Nice, stylish flat. It was clean and comfortable. Very friendly welcome. Really nicely decorated with close attention to detail and all updated appliances in the kitchen. It is a beautiful apartment and we recommend to travellers.", "Tanya and Alex were really great hosts, they were flexible to let us check in earlier and meet us at the apartment to show us round and answer any questions.

The apartment was very clean and all amenities were provided, it was a great space with really comfortable beds

The location was really good as we could walk to most places and there is a Metro station right next to apartment so we got to explore Sofia really easily. 

Had a wonderful time and would definitely recommend staying here.", "I love my stay at Tanya and Alex's flat. It's beautifully decorated and has absolutely everything you need. The neighbourhood is lovely and is only a short walk to town. Great to be so close to a supermarket - 500m or so. Especially loved the map and food recommendations - nothing beats local knowledge! ", "Tanya and Alexander were very responsive despite my slow reply as I was in the mountains with no reception. They were not able to meet me, but their friend came instead and provided us with lots of useful tips and was very friendly. Tanya and Alexander also provided us with a very cute map (probably the most useful and interesting map I've had) as well as recommendations and guidebooks (the restaurant in the book was exactly what we were looking for - delicious!) 

The apartment was beautiful. It is exactly as it is in the pictures (or even better). It is artistically designed, very homely, with everything you need. Very comfortable bed. I wish this is my home!

Location wise, it is around 5-10 minutes walk to the centre of the city. Sofia is really easy to walk around - esp with that map! 

Thank you so much! ", "Our stay was great, we stayed only for one night as we were going in another city afterwards but this place is very cosy and we directly felt at ease. This apartment really has some charm.

", "The apartment is very clean and cosy, spacious and character.

", "Great environment, very unique place, cozy sleeping and perfect location. You can't beat it!", "Everything was perfect, the flat, the location and the city...

Highly recommended!", "Great appartment at a perfect location just 15 minute walk from downtown. Very homey. The hosts were very accomodating. ", "We have just returned from a wonderful week in Sofia.  Alexander was very welcoming and gave us some great tips about where to eat and what to see during our stay.  The restaurant in the park behind the church was brilliant - delicious food, amazingly good prices and very friendly people who helped us to learn more Bulgarian and practice our pronunciation. We ate there at least 4 times as we enjoyed it so much!  The apartment was perfect for us, comfortable, clean, well located for getting around and nicely decorated.  The lift works very well but is a little alarming at first to those of us more used to western styles!  We visited Vitosha mountain, Boyana Church, Rila monastery and Plovdiv during our week and as much of Sofia as we could squeeze in to the remaining days.  The archaeological museum is well worth a visit to see that amazing ancient burial masks and treasures.  Thank you Tanya and Alexander for providing our home from home for our busy week.", "A beautiful place with very friendly hosts, we were well taken care of and comfortable for our couple days in Tanya and Alex's rental. If you are looking for a hearty and tasty meal nearby, we have to recommend the restaurant behind the cathedral across the street. Alex recommended it to us and we found the staff to be warm and the place to be genuine, much like the ARTament. The suite felt fairly well stocked and if we needed something the response was promptly helpful. You're staying with professional hosts here and are highly likely to enjoy the space. Thanks to both of you!", "The greatest host and perfect location and comfortable place in Sofia . Look no further .", "Tanya's apartment is adorable and perfectly lovely! A great location, right near a metro stop. Everything you need is in the apartment.", "We had a really lovely time at Tanya and Alexander's. 

They are located in a great spot. It is a very easy 10 minute walk to the center of the city and all the tourist destinations. 

The apartment itself is very clean and beautiful with two large bedrooms. They were very responsive to messages. 

The only thing is there is an old elevator, and we couldn't figure out how to work it. They are on the 6th floor (7th to Americans) and so make sure that whoever takes you to the apartment really shows you how to use it first! 

Otherwise, an ideal place to stay in Sofia. ", "Alexander was exceptionally kind and welcoming - he held a parking space for me in front of the apartment for when I arrived. The apartment itself is stylish, comfortable and unpretentious. A very homey feel. I recommend it highly.", "This is brilliant base for exploring Sofia and highly recommend to anyone looking to visit the city. Tanya and Alexander were also really good at keeping in touch about my visit and provided useful information to help you make the most of your stay. If you want to feel like a local, stay here. ", "A beautiful stay in a beautiful apartment. Excellent location close to a big supermarket and a shopping mall. ", "This place is so special to me. It is a beautiful apartment with such attention to detail. Tanya and Alexander are brilliant comminucators and help make the whole experience one to remember.", "i had a super nice stay at the aparement. alexander waited for me at the apartement and we had a quick chat about the flat and the area around.

the flat is super nice and chozy, it has two differen toilets and a bathroom. the whole flat is newly and with a lot of love rennovated.

the metro station is very close and also the sofia mall is just some minutes by feet away, there you can also easily get a cab to bring you somewhere else.

thank you for my nice weekend at sofia.

", "We had a great time in the cozy apartment of Tanya and Alexander. Perfect location,literally a stone's throw from the subway, vintage furniture, attention to detail, quiet and plenty of light. Very useful were the advice received on restaurants and things to do and see in and around Sofia. Alex was an attentive host, friendly and knowledgeable with whom we spent a beautiful day together in Boyana, Plovdiv and Bachkovo. Experience to be repeated!", "Tanya & Alexander apartment was very nice .
Vintage look like and well designed.
The apartment was clean and 1 min walk to mall of Sofia and the center.", "We absolutely loved this apartment, and after this trip of 6 days we are in love with Bulgaria!

Tanya and Alexander were not only great hosts, (by meaning showing us around in a wonderful sized vintage looked design home), but gave us amazing tips as well! Sofia is a beautiful city and they definitely know the best hidden places in town! They gave great tips of restaurants, hidden bars, lovely vegetarian lunch places and some hell of a vintage shop! 

The apartment was absolutely wonderful, exactly as on the pictures, loads of space and felt for instant like home. 

If you have the time to clime up the mountain right in front of Sofia, we highly recommend it! Tanya and Alexander give you the option with then to do it, and we dit! We hicked the mountain to the top with Alexander himself and his friend. A very very special experience, to see country's like Macedonia and Serbia from the top.

If you have the time, stay a little while longer, to see the mountain and visit the old ancient city Plovdiv. Easy to visit in 2 hours by bus.

We definitely come back one day!
Ed and Cindy", "Great appartement! Verry next to the city centre! We were 2 couples, staying for a week and we perfectly enjoyed our stay! Thank you Tanya and Alexander!", "Loved our stay at the ARTament. It was lovingly appointed, a fabulous location (easy walk to the centre or one metro stop) and had everything we needed for a great few night stay in Sofia including some helpful maps and guide books. We took the hosts up on their restaurant recommendations and ended up at the the really close by Contessa - 3 times. The food and price was unbeatable! ", "Great, lovely place and really helpful people. It has a record player and vinyl.", "Tanyas and Alexanders apartment was our choice for a winter stay in Sofia in 2015. We were provided with a vast, neat and comfortable place, colourfully furnished in retro style. Being located in a central part of the capital, we've were satisfied to have a queit surrounding, but in the same time still manage to get to other places for a short time, thanks to the metro station, metres away from us.
Alexander welcomed us freindly in the apartment in the day of our arrival. Apart from showing us around he was also helpful with information about current events going on, nice places to eat, or also how we could drive to and reach some of the near-by mountain peaks of Vitosha.
We are thankful for a lovely stay! We were happy to choose their accomodation!", "Really nice place with a great aesthetic. We had a great time exploring the city and couldn't have asked for a better place to stay! ", "The apartment was beautiful. A perfect mix of contemporary and vintage. It was maintained to a very high standard. The hosts were very helpful and kind.

", "Great location, great hosts, great flat. Highly recommended!", "The apartment was amazing. I was so impressed with the design.

Overall I give this apartment 8/10. Unfortunately not the maximum due to what happened with our lock. 

", "The appartment is as beautiful as it is in the pictures. It was in a fantastic location, very clean, original and comfortable. Tanya and Alexander were fantastic hosts and were really helpful at every stage of our trip, before and after.

", "From the outside, we were a bit worried, as the building looked a but scruffy - but it turns out that's what all apartment blocks look like! We mainly just used the bedroom, as we were only there for 3 nights and ate out a lot, but the kitchen seemed well-stocked and there was a cool old record player as well as the TV to keep you entertained. The bed was also very comfortable, as shown by how long we slept every night!

We didn't need much advice on the local area as we have a friend in the city but Tanya, Alexander and their friend who let us in (whose name I've forgotten) all offered lots of tips if we needed them. The apartment was just 1 metro stop from the city centre but it was also a really easy 15 minute walk if the weather is nice.

All in all, a great place to stay for our city break in Sofia. ", "The apartment was amazing! Very tastefully decorated and in a great location: close to the metro and within walking distance of all of the major sights. ", "Great apartment, great hosts!!!", "Alexander and Tanya were really helpful - right from the point we booked our trip to Sofia a few months ago. ", "Very smooth interaction and a really, really spacious, light and well-furnished apartment. Highly recommended!", " Great hosting, the place feels really like home. At street level above the metro, the intersection has barriers to prevent pedestrian crossing, so you have to find the correct exit from the metro for your block, or it's back down and up. Get instructions from hosts about this if arriving by metro, especially with heavy luggage.", "The apartment looked exactly as it is in the photos and was both comfortable and charming. ARTament is a very cosy apartment, decorated with great taste, nice wide view, making guests feel at home. It is very calm, spacious and clean. We enjoyed several little details, like playing jazz vinyls, having breakfast in fine china and relaxing in the living room. We found everything we needed. The neighbourhood looks as a typical middle class Sofia area not far from city center (10-15 minutes walk), while the metro station is just adjacent.
ARTament is a real gem, although the first impression of the building, its shabby entrance and the worn elevator may disappoint the guest.  ", "Great mix of old and new, of functional and tasteful. Denise and Dominik
", "Guys ! if you look for a real and serious profesional host , this is the man !! Everything is absolutely perfect to the last details ....much better than any great hotel in town !! ", "The back and fro communication we shared with Alexander and Tanya was superb. The beds were some of the most comfortable we've slept on! Don't hesitate to stay here.", "Really cool appartment in the center of sofia. Perfect stay!", "We had an awesome experience with alexander's apartment. It is great, very confortable, nicely decorated and in a good location. Its even better than its shown in the photos! Alexander was really kind and did everything the best way possible!

We stayed here for the night of my birthday, walked across the snowy park and ate at Kontessa and had a very nice time (I also highly recommend this restaurant).

It's in a good location to get to anywhere central and well connected with buses, trams and metro. 

Looking forward to staying here again when we come back to Sofia!", "Alex is friendly and welcoming, and gets back to your messages in no time, even if in the middle of the night. Not only did I love the creative atmosphere kindled by the apartment (the pictures don't lie in this case!), but I also enjoyed the central location, being right next to the metro line and one of the main shopping malls in Sofia. Five nights passed so quickly I think I'll need to visit again very soon! 

This was my fourth visit to Sofia this year -- all my previous times I stayed at business hotels like the Hilton, Rad Blu, Hotel Downtown but I found this place to be so much bigger and nicer (way more creative than hotel rooms), so, so worth the price. ", "Great location in Sofia, short walk to subway (and a brilliant restaurant - Kontesa, highly recommended). Apartment is lovely, spacious and well equipped. ", "The host was very kind and friendly. ", "Alexander was very easily contactable and he collected us from the airport (10 Euro) which was  very helpful for us as  we were arriving mid to late evening. ", "Hi, we Enjoyed it Very much to Stay in your well furnished, beautiful and clean comfort. Just had problems with w- LAN and TV. TV we did not need anyway. Great location, beautiful surroundings, and a cozy feel. Alexander came to pick us up at the airport past midnight which we appreciated so much! It was a great way to start our trip in Bulgaria and I would recommend this place to anyone planning to visit!", "Great apartment, very comfortable and very close to the center...", "My fiance and I loved this flat.  It was gorgeous, comfortable, clean and so well designed.  The view from the windows of the rest of Sofia were beautiful to wake up to and the neighborhood was good.  Close to the metro, the mall of Sofia and the bus line, it's super easy to get around town from there and Alexander was quite hospitable and picked us up from the airport much later than anyone should have to.  This was the perfect introduction to Sofia for us.  

Other bonuses were a clothes washer, a full kitchen, fast and reliable wifi and heating for cold Bulgarian nights!  I will say that the outside of the building can make you raise an eyebrow upon pulling up to it, but it's mere cosmetic neglect.  The flat itself is fantastic.  We'd definitely come back again.", "Choosing a place to stay on holiday is usually a complicated and time consuming business with lots of searches through reviews and websites. This time I just looked at the pictures for Alexander and Tanya's apartment and then clicked the book button.

I'm glad I did because the pictures show exactly how nice the apartment is - although they don't show how big it is and it is much larger than I would have expected for the price. 

Alexander was a very friendly host and although I did not contact him during our stay I get the feeling he would have dropped everything to help out if help was needed. 

Taxis are super cheap in Bulgaria but the location is so good that you can walk to the centre of town in about 10 minutes or just get the metro, which is a very short distance away from the apartment. 

If you are thinking about visiting Sofia then you should stay here.", "It was a really nice experience staying at Alexander and Tanya 's place. thanks again alexander and tanya!", "This has to be the absolute best apartment in Sofia: it's a beautiful, big space with a fantastic bed, top views, fast wifi and a brilliantly central location a few seconds from the metro, and a few minutes' walk from the mall and downtown. Both Alexander and Tanya were very helpful and friendly and available if I needed anything. Check in and out were very easy. Tanya also recommended a very nice restaurant just 3min walk across a pleasant park that sits opposite the apartment. The room is also 10min-12min walk into the centre, and there's several little cafes and bars on the same street.

Very highly recommended.", "Easy to communicate with. Great place. Highly recommend Alexander and Tanya. Location is slightly tricky to find, but not too problematic. ", "The apartment is simply stunning: it is spacious with high ceilings, whisper quiet airconditioning in the bedrooms, bed is comfortable, it has a nice kitchen with all things you might need (from champagne glasses to a good coffee machine) and wifi is great. The apartment building itself is not in the best condition, as isn't the neighborhood, but neither are things to really worry about. There is a metro station just around the corner which will take you right into the city centre or anywhere else you might want to go. 

The contact with Alexander and Tanya was great, they answered any questions immediately before I arrived. Nothing really to complain about. 

I would highly recommend this place to anyone!", "Alexander's and Tanya's place is really lovely. We were amazed by the interior  design. Although we got lost at first when we tried to find it, it is actually quite easy to find and Alexander helped us to find it quickly.
