We totally recommand this place!", "A friend and I stayed at Alexander and Tanya's place for three nights. We arrived in Sofia at 0:00 and Alexander was gracious enough to pick us up and take us to their beautiful home (for a small fee of course). As other guests have mentioned it is exactly as pictured. The location is great. We were definitely immersed in a bustling Bulgarian neighborhood. Alexander took the time to orient us and he gave great restaurant suggestions. I would definitely recommend staying here. Thanks Alexander for everything!", "The apartment was very stylish, clean and roomy.  Perfect for 4 people, especially 4 girls, since there were 2 separate toilets and a bathroom.  The view from the windows was great, you could see the sunset on one side and the sunrise on the other.  There was everything we needed in the apartment.  Unfortunately we couldn't meet Alexander And Tanya in person, but they were very helpful throughout the messages.  They arranged a friend to let us into the apartment and everything was very punctual.  
I definitely recommend this apartment for a stay in Sofia.", "We loved staying at Alexander and Tanya's place!  Their cousin, Tony? (not sure if we heard his name correctly), met us at the apartment on time and let us in.  He showed us around and answered all our questions.

The apartment is clean and well stocked with maps, guide books, towels, and kitchen essentials.  Plus, it has air conditioning! :) It is very well located and is within walking distance of all the major sights - we didn't have to take the tram once. 

We really enjoyed our time in Sofia and are glad we stayed here.  Highly recommend this apartment to other travelers who want a home away from home.  Thanks, Alexander and Tanya!

  ", "Alexander and Tanya's place is even more beautiful than the photos and spotlessly clean. It's in a good neighbourhood about 25 minutes walk to major sights and with good little bakeries close by. We recommend the little authentic restaurant tucked in the park behind the church if you don't want to go far afield for dinner one night - look for green lights. 

While a friend let us in and gave us a great tour, Alexander was quick to respond to questions by text and the maps in the apartment were a great help. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and our only disappointment (apart from the lift that stopped working our last night there) is that the flat is booked when we come back through Sofia on our way home.", "Great flat in a great location. Exactly as it looks in the photos. Comfortable, light and clean. One minute to the metro which only costs one lev but an easy fifteen minute walk to the city centre. Alexander was really helpful over phone and email and we were met by Tony who told us everything we needed to know. If we're ever back in Sofia we will definitely stay here again. Would recommend!", "Alexander was a great host, and the apartment was just like the photos and description. Very sunny and a great location, close to the Metro. Alexander was very helpful and overall we had a great holiday in Sofia.", "Our stay in Sofia was wonderful! Alexander was a perfect host, meeting me at the apartment as soon as I arrived and providing some really helpful local info as well as showing me around the apartment. 

The apartment is beautiful - very thoughtfully decorated with a mixture of old and new furniture and furnishings. The bedrooms are spacious, the beds comfy and there are plenty of toilets! : ) 

The location is great, with a metro just 3 mins away taking you to the centre in less than 5 minutes. Thoroughly recommended!", "This is a beautiful flat in a very central location in Sofia. Very clean, good wifi and all amenities. Alexander was very kind and easy to contact.  A great place to explore the city from!", "The apartment was lovely and bright ! Alexander was very helpful and recommended us a good place to have dinner. The subway is close, and we can park in a parking near their place. Really nice stay !!", "Alexander had been very helpful throughout our trip to Sofia. Although he was busy so we did not actually get to meet him. He provided maps and useful information which made our stay very confortable. He also ordered a cab for us to take us to the airport early morning. 
Although location could have been better, the flat is about 20 mins walk to the main sites, nicely decorated and we had great time staying there.
", "Wonderful flat in central location and good walking distance from city centre and train station. Super clean and very friendly owners.", "Excellent place, Alexander is a nice guy. The  location is cool, the apartment very nice. I can recommend this place to anyone visiting Sofia.", "Well as i said last time this is the only place and host you need to know in Sofia . Such profesionalism and care . You need to be crazy to look for somewhere else.
", "We had a great stay at Alexander's apartment and would definitely recommend it to others. The apartment itself is spacious and beautiful and only a 15-20 minute walk from the center and just steps away from the Metro. Next time we are in Sofia, we will be sure to book with Alexander again!  ", "Awesome flat with incredibly well designed interior. Super clean! I loved the espresso machine!! Couldn't be more grateful for Alex's accommodation of my requests - late checkout, etc. The flat is right next to the mall so everything was right there if I needed it. Just perfect!", "Alexander was a great host and waited to meet me in the flat to tell me everything I needed to know. The flat is very bright, clean and close to the city centre. I had to leave early in the morning for a flight & he organised a taxi for me to the airport. I would recommend this as a great place to stay in Sofia.", "Alexander is a very kind person: he waited for us in the street near the apartment and gave us any useful information about our stay in Sophia.", "Alexander was a great Host. On the check out date we needed to store our luggage untill the evening and he was so kind to do us the favour to take it with him to his office untill we came to pick it up. A very friendly guesture, thanks again for this! The apartement is a beautiful place and realy well equipped with realy eveything one could dream of. Overall a great stay!", "We had a lovely stay in Alex & Tanya's apartment. Alex met us at the airport and drove us into Sofia for 10 Euros.
The apartment is very comfortable and private, well furnished and equipped with all mod cons. Lots of room and all was just as described in the website.
Please do not be concerned when first entering the building. The apartment is on the top floor of an OLD building (a bit dilapidated) and the small elevator is also old, but works well . Once inside the apartment all is light and cheery.There is wi-fi as well.
Very conveniently situated near the Opalchenska Metro station( only a minutes' walk away).
Perhaps I can recommend here the Contessa restaurant in the park behind the church opposite the apartment. Good food and friendly welcome at a very reasonable price
 If I come to Sofia again I will definately stay with Alex & Tanya. 10 out 10 from all points of view.", "A lovely, light and spacious apartment just 10 minutes walk from the city centre. Alex was a very warm and helpful host, collecting us from the airport late and providing us with useful information for our time in Sofia. We would definitely recommend this as a great place to stay.", "Alexanders and Tanyas flat is great with all the comfort You can wish! We spent a very nice time in this lovely appartment. It was also very clean. It is not far from the center of Sofia and the métro station is right at the corner of the street. Our hosts were very kind to us and receptive. We recommand them warmly!", "Really enjoyed my stay at Alexander & Tanya's lovely apartment. It's spacious, well decorated and only about 10 - 15 minutes away from the heart of Sofia. Highly recommended :) ", "Very convenient location; clean, cozy, and cool apartment, decorated tastefully and with lots of character!  It has everything that you might need! Don't judge the apartment by the outside of the building, that looks little old. Great bakery across the street for fresh croissants and good coffee. For late dining, there is a very cool restaurant located behind the cathedral. 

Highly recommended. We're looking forward to another stay. ", "The place is very unique and beautiful. The bed was very comfortable and over all the apartment has a specific peaceful style.  Really enjoyed staying here. 

", "Your place is really an oasis of charm, warmth, and great care to details. i am already thinking to book next time at least a week . No kidding !! Really Perfect service and design.Dont even think for another place in town !!!", "great hosts! Alexander and his wife always answered my questions quickly. Flat is very cozy and clean. It is well situated.
Highly recommended!!! 

", "Fantastic apartment. Comfortable, clean, close to transport and Mall of Sofia where you can find anything you need.

Owners were friendly and quick to resolve any issues I had. 

Highly recommended!", "Thank you very much, Alexander! 
He is very pleasant and punctual. He can help and tell about everything in this city. The apartment is very nice and clean. It has a very convenient location in the city center near the metro station Opolchenska.", "I booked the flat for 10 days. From the first moment i felt like home, i liked that they have kept  some original furniture and details. The flat is sunny, on top floor with big windows. The mall nearby with all modern facilities as well as the autentic bulgarian kitchen at the small restaurant back the church. I would book it again.", "I simply LOVED the apartment! It was very cosy, clean and well located. As I was working most of the time it was really a place to feel at home after a crazy day at work. Alexander is very friendly, a great host and always answered my questions immediately. I will definitely come back!", "A very cosy and stylish place! I felt instantly at home and recommend it to everybody. Alexander is very kind and helpful. The apartment provides everything one could think of. It has a great view and is very well situated, next to a metro station. I will book again for sure! ", "My stay  of 3 weeks in this flat was perfect! It's even more gorgeous than on the pictures. It is really clean and decorated with great personal taste. I had everything I could need, plus fresh food for the breakfast..
Perfect to feel like home.
 Also the view from the 5th floor is amazing and really inspiring for me. 
Alexander and his wife are great hosts, really wishing to share life moments with their host. They also gave me great advices and insight about Sofia. 
So, to sum up: Don't hesitate 1 second to go in this flat and meet them.
Alex, I wish you the best and anyway we see each other soon!!", "Great apartment!!

Very large, very central, the hosts are wonderful, and there is every amenity you could think of.
", "Апартаментът е произведение на изкуството. Атмосферата вътре е неповторима и от всеки ъгъл си личи стартането, което са положили за да направят това красиво място такова каквото е. Още с първата крачка в апартамента знаех, че със сигурност няма да е последното ми посещение там. Комуникацията с Алекс и Таня беше лесна и на ниво, което винаги е огромен плюс. Локацията е перфектна и в близост до всичко от което ще имате нужда. Препоръчвам на 100%.", "Хорошее жилье в центре. Все точно, чисто и приятно. ", "veramente un bel appartamento! Host molto gentile e pronto ad aiutarti nel tuo soggiorno!", "Si l’appartement est bien il n’est pas un logement habité. Le bien est donc géré par une agence et à destination uniquement des touristes.", "Die Wohnung von Tanya und Alex ist eine wunderschön eingerichtete Altbauwohung im Zentrum von Sofia. Die Matratzen dort waren sehr bequem und definitiv die besten unserer gesamten Reise durch Bulgarien und Rumänien! Die Metro Stadion ist ungefähr 50m von der Wohnung entfernt, so dass die Fortbewegung total einfach ist. Wer sehr geräuschempfindlich ist, sollte jedoch vielleicht über eine andere Wohnung nachdenken, denn die Straße war in der Wohnung schon gut zu hören. Wir würden trotzdem jederzeit wieder kommen, wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt.", "Wij hebben erg genoten van deze plek! Sfeervol, gezellig, schoon, goed contact met huiseigenaar, dichtbij de stad, een avontuurlijke lift kortom een hele fijne plek on vanuit hier Sofia te ontdekken. 
Een aanrader!", "Das Apartment ist mit einer direkten Verbindung zum Flughafen perfekt gelegen und ist unglaublich schön designt. Check in war super easy und wir würden die Wohnung auf jeden Fall nochmal mieten.", "Het was echt een super fijn appartement. Heerlijk geslapen en leuk uitzicht. Vanaf het vliegveld pak je de metro en stap je zo uit bij het appartement. Het centrum is ongeveer 20 minuten lopen en de eigenaren helpen je graag als je vragen hebt!", "Un très bel appartement, très bien situé avec tout ce qu'il faut. L'arrivée se fait de manière parfaite tout est bien réglé. Un endroit chaleureux et très bien décoréà visiter en amoureux ou en famille. Tanya et Alex avaient tout préparé pour nous accueillir avec notre petit bébé, jusqu'aux petites attentions pour lui, adorables !", "Sitio muy acogedor y limpio. Cerca tiene muchos restaurantes y un centro comercial.", "L’appartamento e’ ben tenuto, confortevole e silenzioso. Comodo per i mezzi pubblici e a 10 minuti a piedi dal centro. Zona ben servita con ristoranti e bar. Gli host sono stati disponibili e hanno risposto velocemente aiutandoci. C’e un problema con l’odore di fumo che fuoriesce dalla canna fumaria; il forte odore entra nella stanza. Bisogna tenere la finestra aperta. Il secondo letto non e’ matrimoniale.", "Großartige Unterkunft! Die Wohnung ist sehr liebevoll eingerichtet und hat alles, was man braucht. Die Innenstadt ist fußläufig erreichbar und die Metrostation ist direkt vor der Haustür. Ich würde Tanyas und Alexanders Wohnung auf jeden Fall weiterempfehlen!", "Wer eine Spitzen-Unterkunft erwartet wird hier nicht enttäuscht. Angefangen von der perfekten Kommunikation vor der Reise bis hin zur Wohnungseinrichtung und der zentralen Lage. Alles war perfekt organisiert und die Wohnung entsprach vollends den Erwartungen. Ich würde jederzeit bedenkenlos nochmals buchen!", "El apartamento está a un minuto de la parada de metro y caminando puedes llegar al centro en 15 minutos. Estar allí es como sentirte en tu propia casa la decoración es preciosa así como la limpieza y comodidad del apartamento.", "Super appartement,  grand, très propre, bien situé.  C'est vraiment agréable y vivre. On vous le recommande. ", "L'appartement de Tanya et Alexander est tout simplement parfait. Bien situé, on peut se rendre au Centre ville à pieds ou prendre le métro ou le bus. Une épicerie n'est pas très loin et quelques restaurants aussi. En prime, les habitants de Sofia que nous avons rencontrés étaient tous fort sympathiques ! Nous recommandons fortement cet appartement aux voyageurs.", "L'un des meilleurs Airbnb où j'ai logé. Cet appartement est vraiment magnifique. Très facile d'accès, et non loin du centre. Les hôtes répondent rapidement et sont très aimables. Niveau qualité/prix, il n'y a rien à redire. Je recommande vraiment ce logement.", "L'appartement est très très bien situé, le métro est au pied de l'immeuble.

L'appartement est meublé avec goût et agréable d'y vivre. Sofia est une ville magnifique, ensoleillée, et la ville de Bourgas au bord de la mer noire top !

Je reviendrais.

Soraya", "Die Unterkunft von Tanya und Alexander war super!  Die Fotos der Wohnung entsprechen der Realität. Sie ist sehr zentral gelegen, die Metrostation ist vor dem Haus und man gelangt ohne Probleme in die Innenstadt zu Fuß nach ein paar Minuten. Es gibt Einkaufsmöglichkeiten gegenüber und in der Stadt. Sofia ist super für einen Kurzaufenthalt und eine sehr interessante Stadt. Die Kommunikation mit Tanya und Alexander war komplett problemlos, sodass ich diese Unterkunft nur weiterempfehlen kann und werde.  ", "Het is een ideale locatie met een wijds uitzicht. We hebben ons zeer welkom gevoeld en genoten van dit zeer stijlvol ingerichte appartement. ", "Alexander hat uns pünktlich empfangen und uns alles in der Wohnung gezeigt. Er hatte außerdem noch wertvolle Tipps rund um Restaurants, Bars oder Ausflüge in die Berge.
Die Wohnung ist absolut liebevoll dekoriert, sodass man sich direkt wohl fühlt. Unser persönliches Highlight waren die tollen Schallplatten :) ", "Wir hatten ein wunderbares Wochenende in Sofia. Tanya und Alexander standen mit Rat und Tat zur Seite, ihre Tipps für Restaurants waren super. Die Wohnung ist für 4 Personen prima ausgestattet, alles war sauber, es waren genügend Handtücher vorhanden. Die Ankunft lief reibungslos, selbst unsere Fragen per Mail am Wochenende wurden super schnell beantwortet. Wir kommen wieder...", "Die Wohnung ist sehr schön und gut gelegen! Wir würden sofort wieder kommen!", "Muy buena estancia en esta casa! El entorno es un barrio popular, muy cerca del centro. Probar el restaurante Kontesa, en el parque enfrente del piso, bueno y sencillo.", "집이 너무 넓고 예쁘고 좋아요 
추천합니다!!", "Tutto perfetto! Casa splendida, buona posizione, accoglienza impeccabile.", "公寓很干净,很温馨!公寓附近有地铁站和大的商场｡房东的朋友Monica给了我们很多有用的信息｡非常感谢!!", "Alles was geweldig! Het is exact zoals in de foto's. Het ligt op 50m van de metro die je overal naartoe brengt. Ideaal logeeradres voor u verblijf in Sofia! ", "Accueil très chaleureux d'Alexander. 
Appartement très confortable, entretenu et décoré à la perfection.
Nous recommandons sans réserve !

", "Séjour très sympa, appart' où l'on se sent tout de suite chez soi. Spacieux,confortable, bien situé, déco choisie avec goût, Alexander nous a accueilli avec beaucoup de gentillesse et s'est montré disponible. Aucun regret si ce n'est un séjour trop court.", "Appartement très sympa idéalement situé pour visiter sofia à pied. Très calme et parking sans difficulté 
Très bon contact avec nos hôtes", "Wir hatten eine wunderbare Zeit in Sofia und mit der Wohnung ein richtiges Zuhause.  Ihr seid tolle Gastgeber,  die sich sehr um ihre Gäste kümmern und dabei auch kleinste Details beachten!", "写真通りの可愛い内装で交通の便利も良かった‼しかし､ｴﾚﾍﾞｰﾀが壊れていた為大変だったが､ｵｰﾅｰが親切に荷物を運んでくれた｡1つだけ残念だったのは洗濯機によるｶﾋﾞ臭さ｡", "Questa casa e' vicino 50 metri, quindi 10 minuti a piedi , dalla metropolitana e'molto bella e gode di un panorama stupendo , mi sono trovato molto bene. Ve la cosiglio.

  Perl'host consiglio di combiare lo scaleo con un forno a microonde che sarebbe molto utile :-) . Ciao e grazie x tutto , comunque e' bellissima e ve la consiglio ;-)", "Aleksander hat auf jede erdenkliche Weise dafür gesorgt, dass wir einen wunderbaren Aufenthalt in Sofia hatten. Er hat ein Fotoshooting verschoben das eigentlich für den letzten Tag unseres Aufenthalts geplant war. Vor allem aber sind wir dankbar dafür wie er reagiert hat als es ein technisches Problem mit airbnb gab. Airbnb hat ihm einen Abend vor unserer Ankunft gesagt, dass sie keine Verantwortung für unseren Aufenthalt und die Bezahlung über nehmen und er die Vereinbarung canceln kann. Für uns wäre das natürlich eine kleine Katastrophe und deshalb sind wir superdankbar dass er uns trotzdem aufgenommen hat und unkompliziert und schnell mit uns kommuniziert hat bis das Problem gelöst war. Wir haben Aleksander als sehr vertrauenswürdigen, entgegenkommenden und unkomplizierten Gastgeber erlebt. außerdem ist die Wohnung wunderbar, liebevoll eingerichtet, sauber und mit einem großartigen Blick auf die Stadt.
Wir würden jederzeit wieder bei Aleksander wohnen und empfehlen die Wohnung wärmstens.", "В принципе, мне квартира понравилась. Очень уютная, все чисто и со вкусом. Что не понравилось. Заселились мы в эту квартиру в 16 часов. Улетали следующим днем опять же в шесть вечера. Но хозяин попросил нас выселиться из квартиры до 12.00. У него уже были записаны новые гости. Конечно, это его право. Но мне казалось, что на этом сайте все-таки другие требования, более человечные, это же не гостиница. Впрочем, это мелочи. От самого центра совсем недалеко: одна станция метров, или 15-20 минут пешком. Правда сам дом старый, да и район не туристический. Но и цена, с другой стороны, демократическая. ", "Superbe appartement, très bon accueil. Logement situé à proximité du centre, facilement accessible en métro ou à pied.", "Ottima e puntuale accoglienza, annuncio affidabile e appartamento pulitissimo e accogliente. Complimenti.", "Bel (et grand) appartement situé non loin du centre de Sofia.
Il est très propre et dispose de toutes les commodités (sauf un micro-ondes).
Il est meublé en style vintage, mais les doubles rideaux ne sont pas efficaces, au contraire du double vitrage qui vous protège bien des bruits des rues (l'immeuble est proche d'un carrefour, mais l'appartement est au 5ème étage)
Alexander est très accueillant et sympathique : je vous recommande les tours qu'il organise le week-end dans différentes parties du pays : on voit beaucoup plus d'endroits qu'en passant par une agence !", "Sofia ist definitiv eine Reise wert und die Stadt könnte sicherlich noch ein paar Touristen mehr gebrauchen. Also fahrt da alle hin!! 

Die Wohnung von Alexander und Tanya eignet sich dafür perfekt als Unterkunft, sie liegt sehr zentral und optimal an der Metro. Man kann von dort alles zu Fuß erledigen und besichtigen. Die Wohnung selbst ist hübsch geschnitten und sehr cool und toll eingerichtet. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt.

Mit der Schlüsselübergabe und Absprache hat auch alles perfekt geklappt. Rundum zu empfehlen!", "Das Apartment ist Super. Es ist sehr liebevoll eingerichtet und bietet alles, was man sich wünschen kann. Alles ist sehr sauber und gut gepflegt. Die Wohnung liegt ca. 10min vom Zentrum entfernt. Wer will, kann sich sogar für 10 Euro von Alexander abholen lassen. Ich kann das Apartment wärmstens empfehlen. Wirklich Klasse. ", "A parte externa do prédio assusta um pouco, bastante mal cuidada e passa uma impressão ruim. O elevador também é antigo e mal cuidado. O apartamento é ótimo, super bem decorado e bem localizado. Tem um supermercado próximo, shopping e o metro. É possível conhecer os pontos históricos caminhando. O anfitrião nos recebeu muito bem, nos deu informações e havia muito material turístico. Só temos uma reclamação quanto ao mau funcionamento da geladeira. "]

reviews:
["Great location and very very friendly host, even though I stayed one night, I was very happy with the room, and Dimitar was very nice  and helpful with information. Recomend!", "The place was perfect, in the perfect location. Met only Peter, but he was really friendly. Would highly recommend to other airbnb-ers !", "We had a great time! Dimitar helped us even though we had last minute issues with the trip. Very easy-going :)", "The location of the apartment is perfect and easy to find. The room was so tidy and clean. Dimitar and Peter are such a great and friendly hosts. I highly recommend that place for staying in Sofia!", "Great location, the hosts were really welcoming, to be recommended.", "Excellent location, room is as described with a natural light, spacious and clean. Easy and flexible communication with Dimitar and Petar, which are very nice guys.", "Great guys. I felt like I was hosted by my friends! 
Thank you very much Dimitar and Peter!", "Both Dimitar and Peter were  outgoing and amazing hosts. Thank you so much for the hospitality. The place was great and location wise,  really convient as it is located in the city centre and close to everything.", "The apartment was bright and comfy. The room was very big and very clean. The bathroom is shared, but it was always clean. The communication with Dimitar was excellent, he answered all my questions really quick and he gave me great tips, specially about restaurants and types of food. Dimitar and Peter are amazing people, they treated me like they knew me before, I felt I was with friends from the past, I felt at home; we enjoyed some bottles of wine together and had a great talk. Dimitar cooks incredible good, he cooks for his friends, so I was lucky to be able to try his delicious and tasty inventions ;)   I recommend 100% staying at Dimitra's place.", "This is almost not useful to future airbnb’ers because I just fell so immediately in friend-love with both Dimitar and his flatmate Peter that I can’t even write a good critical review... So first of all, GREAT PEOPLE. But as far as the guest experience goes, also great. They were super-responsive, committed to making sure I had all the info I needed for an optimal Sofia experience, ready to leave me alone and to welcome me into their existing life, as I liked. The bedroom is huge and peaceful, minimalist without seeming barren. No waiting for hot water. They sent me away with apples and walnuts and hugs. I hope to be back.", "Really nice and eays to comunicate with. Recommend for further gests", "The guys are amazing. I had Such a wonderful time with them. Amazing people and the BEST location you can possibly find in the city! Really Recommend!!!!", "Clean and cozy room. Dimitar responed question quickly which was helpful .", "Dimitar is a friendly and considerate gentleman. He waited for me quite late to check in, gave me traveling tips and recommendations for nice local restaurants. I’m allergic to smoke so he tried his best to make my room smoke free. I slept very well. Great location and very convenient. His roommate Peter is super nice too. If I could stay longer I would spend time hangout with them. Nice people!  Thanks Dimitar and Peter :)", "Convenient location; cordial and open minded person", "Very good location and welcoming hosts.", "Dimitar and his flatmate are very kind and helpfull. 
The flat is in the center of Sofia, near the pedestrian street. 
I recommand this place !! :)", "Great stay", "Very nice and friendly hosts, very spacious room, and an overall very nice place to stay!", "Perfect location!! Tidy and clean room just as on the pictures. Dimitar is a lovely host.", "Amazing experience. Definitely recommended for anyone who wants to experience a great stay in Sofia. The hosts are amazing and will help you with anything you need.", "Absolutely friendly and helpful hosts, and they are relaxed and easygoing too. The flat - as well as the room - is spacious, clean and it’s location is just excellent.  And very good double bed!", "Dimitar's place is great for the solo traveler. He and his flatmate are both incredibly kind and helpful, and so I would definitely recommend!", "Dimitar and Petar are wonderful hosts, friendly, helpful and really awesome people. 
The flat is cozy with an amazing vibe, very central and in a pleasant neighborhood. Best place in Sofia!", "the room is in the heart of Sofia, in a picturesque building, very clean, cozy, the host is very friendly, I requested to arrive a few hours before and there was no problem, I would return without a doubt.", "Everything was perfect! The apartment is inside the city center, and every attraction is within walking distance. Dimitar is an awesome host, very polite and helpful. Totally suggested ;)", "Dimitar and his flatemate have been very kind and helpful. They are cool people. The apartment is situated in a good position. I had a very good stay in their accomodation.", "Nice place and good price
Right in city centre 
Night life,clubs pubs on 2 minuets walk", "The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.", "This was my second stay at Dimitar's place and it went as great as the first one. Apart from the fact that Dimitar and Petar, his room-mate, are nice hosts, I really appreciated being independent by having a key of the apartment. The room is clean and large. Wifi works really well. The apartment is in the heart of Sofia. Again, I recommend this rent.", "Great location and big room. The housemates (unfortunately I haven’t met Dimitar) are really nice and easy going. Dimitar is easy to communicate with. Despite the nice hosts, I wouldn’t recommend the place. It feels kind of like home, except for the fact that it isn’t clean at all (especially the bathroom and kitchen area are dirty, and the sheets were really old and hairy).", "Nice place to stay close to the main pedestrian area", "Dimitar is a perfect host. Nice, precise, easy going and warm. The appartement is ideally located. Especially for vegetarians as there are two places down the street that offer delicious food. Thanks Dimitar I hope I see you again.", "Cool people, nice and friendly, flexible, generous.", "The place was just perfect for us, central and in a very nice street.
At our arrive we were welcomed very friendly and provided with lots of useful guides about Sofia and Bulgaria. 
We will definitely come back here at our next trip to Sofia!", "The house is positioned in a quiet street, halfway between two metro station, and is  very close to  Vitosha and almost everything that deserve to be visitted in Sofia. The apartment is clean the room is exactly we expected. We pass four comfortable days and both Peter and Dimitar have been very kind and hospitable with us, suggesting us what to do and to eat in those days . They are very friendly and comunicative, like almost every person we met during those days.", "2 stars for the location. Besides that very dirty bathroom and kitchen area. Hot water went out and the AC didn't work which would only be an issue if you are traveling in the summer. However, if you pay for something you'd expect it to be available. That being said there are many other places I would have booked if I knew the AC was out. First disappointing Airbnb in the 3 months I've been on the road. ", "Great place in central location, yet on a side street so it is a lot quieter. Walking distance to everything major in the center and less than two blocks away from Vitosha St (main pedestrian shopping street). Dimitar was super chill and Aslan (the cat) is adorable and friendly. Would stay again and highly recommend!", "Room looks exactly as it does in the photos. Very spacious and light. Located in a very central area which is great. Hosts are very chilled out. ", "A fantastic stay in a very central location. Dimitar was an awesome host.", "Dimitar and his roommates were great hosts and I enjoyed my stay at their place. In terms of location this place could hardly be more central. Within a few meters you're right at Vitosha Boulevard and the metro stops Serdika and NDK are close by. There's a supermarket only a few minutes away and great restaurants are also available without much walking.
I especially want to mention Ari, the sweetest cat I ever met. This little cuddly guy made me feel at home right away. 
All in all, I can only recommend this place.", "This place is great. It's right in the heart of Sofia, but isn't loud or busy at all. I didn't get the opportunity to meet Dimitar, but his flat mates were gracious hosts. They even called a taxi for me at 4:15 in the morning!
I was supposed to stay two nights but I missed my first flight, so I was only able to stay one night. I was stressed out about it, and I let Dimitar know I wouldn't be able to make it the first night, and he let me cancel the reservation and refunded the money. I was so grateful. 
If I ever have the luck of finding myself in Sofia again, I will definitely stay at this apartment. ", "Great location, Nice host and big sunny room, Dimitars and his roommates were very kindly, always available for anything I needed in my stay. The apartment have awesome locations near to bars, shops , restaurant and tourist places . thanks  for everything", "Dimitar's place is perfect! The room is very spacious and comfortable, and the apartment is ideally located right near Vitosha Boulevard. Dimitar is a very friendly and welcoming host, I would definitely stay with him again.", "A great room, very spacious and in a good location. Everything is walking distance and the hosts are very helpful.", "Great host, great location, and great place. Perfect for my short visit to Sofia. Convenient location walking distance from metro stations and other sites. Would definitely recommend if you're looking for quick and simple place to stay", "Great location, great host, everything went according to plan - so definite recommendation.", "The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.", "Dimitar was a great host. He was very easy to communicate with and made sure I knew the metro stops on how to get from the airport to the flat. He was also very kind to reserve a taxi for me for an early flight. He was not able to meet me upon arrival, but he made sure that his roommate Petar was there with the keys. Overall, the people and the cat living in the flat were very welcoming

The room was as described and pictured. It really does get a lot of sun! Which was especially welcomed, since I was there during January. The bed was comfortable and I was warm in the room despite the negative temperatures outside. The space is also very conveniently located to shops, eateries, and the metro. 

Enjoyed my stay there. Would definitely recommend it to others. ", "Located IN the center, great restaurants nearby, check out the nearby restaurants. Host is very kind and willing to give tips!", "Enjoyed my stay with Dimitar.  He was great to talk to and was very friendly, as was the cat.  Both Dimitar and his flatmate were available to answer questions but were also very willing to allow for freedom and independence.  Would stay with them again.", "Dimitar and his friend were fantastic hosts! Perfect location, just a few minutes walking distance all bars and restaurants. Spacious room, I couldn't have better welcome in Sofia. It was a pleasure to meeting you guys... I hope to see you again next time in Sofia. Thanks Dimitar!", "The house is in a super location, a quiet spot but very close to the city center and the main attractions. It is very clean and Dima and Peter were very nice and helpful. I would really like to stay there once again. I really recommend it!", "so yeah, I had to stay longer :)", "very nice host in a very good location, right in the center. we could do everything in a walking distance. Dimitar also helped me a lot during my stay, gave me tips of where to go, went out with me to nice bars and even gave me coffee and rakia :) I would totally come back.", "Dimitar, Petar and their cat are very welcoming. You can go to their flat without any doubt. The place is very central, near to all the main monuments, bars and restaurants. Dimitar gave us a lot of good advices to go out in Sofia. We had a very nice time there.", "I had a wonderful stay, dimitar was really Nice and helped me out with the Nice spots. Had a great stay! ", "Dimitar is a great host. The room was perfect and we had everything we needed. Dimitar has great tips and helped us get to grips with Sofia. We enjoyed all the cafes and sights he recommended. We love Sofia and would love to come back again!", "Great (Hidden by Airbnb) . Very helpful guys and quiet place in the city centre. Highly recommended. ", "Cozy place in the downtown, 1 minute walk to the Vitosha (central street with cafes and shops).
Dimitar and his friends were very nice to me. 
Thank you guys!", "Dimitar was a great host. Unfortunately, he was called away on travel, but his roommate, Petar, was kind and extremely hospitable. The room was spacious, with a bed and rack to hang up clothes, and a bathroom nearby. Petar's cat is very friendly too. Petar showed me the maps of Sofia and did everything he could to make my stay as comfortable and pleasant as possible. ", "It was a pleasure to go to Sofia and Dimitar provided everything so my stay be ok. His a great host. :)", "It has been a pleasure to stay at Dimitars place, can only recommend :)", "Wow! Dimitar and Petar and their apartment are the best! Hosts are laid back, friendly, but mostly out on their own schedule. Apartment was spacious (big, serene room!) with clean bathroom, wifi, space to chill, and the most adorable kitty to cuddle with. Location was easy to explore Sofia, and Dimitar helped a lot with recommendations of restaurants and aiding in transportation - We didn't want to leave!", "Dimitar and Petar are two nice and very caring guys. It was a pleasure to meet them. The apartment is located in Sofia's center, from where you can reach everything easily. I enjoyed my stay very much.", "All in all it was a pleasure to stay at Dimitar's!", "The stay at Dimitar's and Petar's flat was short but perfect. The place is very big, central and chilled. The hosts were super nice and helpful. Nothing more to say but short, uncomplicated and premium stay in Sofia! Recommend!", "This room's location is absolutely great for exploring Sofia and surroundings. The center is just around the corner. The hosts - including Bulgaria's most intelligent and friendly cat - are Good People; helpful, fun and they speak solid English. The apartment is clean, cozy and feels like a home away from home. I would choose it again in a heartbeat.
", "Had a really nice stay at Dimitar's apartment! It's a perfect apartment for cat lovers - his cat is very cuddly :) He's a relaxed and friendly guy and had many good ideas for us about what to do in Sofia, Thank you! ", "A nice place to stay in the very heart of Sofia!
Dimitar and Petar were always available to answer any of my questions about Sofia and Bulgaria.
The appartment is well located, and the room is simple but comfortable.
and the cat is very friendly!", "Great place. Clean, comfortable, and great location. Really friendly guys; My flight arrived at 2am and Ditmar woke up to let me. Thanks dude!! Can't wait to come back. ", "I would recommend to stay at this place. It's in the center, not far from the tram stop and Lidl. The atmosphere at home is quite relaxed and friendly. And last but not least, Dimitar and his flatmate Petar are really nice ppl.", "Great location, in the middle of everything you would want to do in the city. The place needs a little more cleaning and our host could have given us more details on the city or at least a map (he was on holiday so we were received by Peter).  ", "The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.", "We had a wonderful time staying at Dimitar's place. He was incredibly helpful before and during our stay with everything we needed and was very fast to make sure all was perfect for us. The location of his apt is great for exploring the city, and really close to excellent restaurants and shops. We had a great time! Thank you for everything, Dimitar!", "Dimitar was absolutely fantastic!  When I arrived he nor Petar could be at the flat but they had their friend Dolores meet me.  Instead of merely showing me in, Dolores showed me around the city with what little free time she had.  As I was headed to Macedonia after my time in Sofia, they gave me a great list of places to see and things to eat in Macedonia.  I highly recommend staying at Dimitar's place.", "Our stay at Dimitar's place was great. He's a friendly and helpful host! The location was just the best: walking distance to every main attraction and very cool local bars and cafès in the streets surrounding the apartment. The room was clean and exactly as it was described. Would definitely stay here again! ", "The appartement is ideally located, in the  centre of the city and quiet in the same time. We did have a nice  welcome by Dimitar. His roomates and him are very friendly. We only stayed for a night but if we had to come back to Sofia it would be defintly to this place!", "Dimitar was a nice and helpful host! We really enjoyed our time in Sofia, though it was only for one night. Definitely would stay again!", "Great apartment located in a very nice neighborhood.
Dimitar was extremely friendly and helpful ! 
I recommend.", "I really enjoyed my stay at Dimitar's, he's a very outgoing host who can recommend all sorts of things you might look for. the room is located right next to the main shopping street, highly recommended!", "Great location and really nice hosts! The room was confortable, with everything I needed. I had a good time there, I recommand this place.", "The very central location of Dimitar's place is just perfect for moving around Sofia. His suggestions and help during my stay were very useful. I recommend Dimitar's place as a very good option to stay in the city", "The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.", "I had a great stay at Dimitar's apartement! It's a spacious, bright room, the apartment is very central and easy to find.
Dimitar is a flexible and helpful host, he and his roommates had good recommendations what to do, where to eat in Sofia. I felt very welcome at his place!", "Dimitar is an excellent host with a great apartment. Dimitar is very friendly and responsive, he was flexible with check in and check out times and was able to recommend things to see, do and eat while in Sofia. He was very welcoming and not at all intrusive. 

The apartment is described accurately. I had access to the kitchen (fridge, oven, toaster, hob), living area, the washing machine, a nice clean bathroom and my own private room. WiFi and hot water are always available. The room is large with a big bed and the door can be locked. The room was comfortably warm all the time (my stay was mid-April), but it also has air conditioning. 

The location could not be better, especially as I prefer to walk everywhere. It is less than a 1 minute walk from the main shopping street Vitosha Boulevard. It's also 3-4 minute walk to a nearby Lidl. You can walk to countless parks and tourist destinations from here.

Highly recommended host, I would stay here again anytime.", "Dimitar and his housemate Peter were very friendly, I got to their place at 7am in the morning and I am pretty sure I woke Dimitar up from his beauty sleep, but he was nice to me and quite flexible with things. The room is big, the bed is comfortable, there were a cloth rack and a table in the room with a mirror, that were the only furniture in the room. I really liked how the place is close to the city centre, I easily walked to most of the sightseeing places.", "I am so pleased I got to stay with Dimitar and his flat mates; they made me totally welcome, and he and his friends had great suggestions! I got to have drinks and a shed load of laughs with them, and had a blast. The apartment itself was in a fabulous location, close to Vitosha Blvd and two metro stations, and the bed was very comfy. If I'm back in Sofia I'll definitely be tapping Dimitar to stay there again... Definitely recommend!", "Very nice people who did all the Best to make it nice for us. Very close to everything. I can highly recommend.", "The location is fantastic and Demity was a great communicator. I did not have a chace to meet him. His housemate Oeter welcomed me and he was a great talking to him", "Really nice stay in a great location , lovely cat who loves attention . Dimitar and Peter were really friendly and helped me with anything I needed to do around the city . Peter makes a great breakfast :) . Thanks guys ", "Was wonderful! I really loved the apartment, kinda of feeling than i want to live there :) dimitar and also his flatmate were too good :)", "I had a great experience staying with Dimitar and his roommate. The room was spacious and very confortable. The aparment has an excellent location and is easy to find. Overall I had a great stay and I highly recommend staying with Dimitar if you visit Sofia!", "Our stay with Dimitar was our best Airbnb experience yet! Dimitar and his roommate are great hosts and people, super welcoming, friendly, and knowledgable about the city. The location of the apartment is absolutely perfect; you couldn't find a place that's more central. The apartment itself is very nice, with a big comfy bed and a decent bathroom. Definitely a great place to stay!", "The apartment is exactly how it is described. It is in the city center, practically on Vitosha boulevard, and it is really near to all the restaurants, bar and touristic attractions. The apartment is well furnished and very clean. The room is spacoius and sunny. 
I stayed there for one month and it was one of the best place I have  ever stayed. Dimitar and his friends are very friendly and they will help you in everything you should need during the journey. The atmosphere is comfortable, funny and familiar. 
I really suggest this apartment both for short and long staying :) ", "I'm travelling a lot and it was one of the best place, where I've stayed. Dimitar and his friends were highly welcoming and positive. I liked time, that I spent there, the atmosphere was really calm and friendly. The accommodation was fine, in the city center, near shops and the main sights. I highly recommend it.", "This is a review because we booked an extra night at short notice. It was as good as the other days :)", " The apartment was really central (just off vitusha), the room was nice, clean and comfortable. Our plans changed and we had to stay an extra night which was totally fine. In the mornings, the cats came to say hello which was lovely.
I would definitely stay here again! ", "The room is really good: very spacious and cosy with very comfortable, big bed. The apartment is located in the centre: close to the main pedestrian street with a lot of cafes and restaurants, close to metro station and everything you would like to find in Sofia. Great localisation to explore. Dimitar and Andrey are very helpful, talkative, nice guys and their cats are cute! Cute and smart :)", "top emplacement et rapport qualité prix  excellent", "La mejor experiencia de mi vida sin duda. Era la primera vez que viajaba sola y me encontré con dos chicos encantadores que ahora para mi son mis amigos. Os lo recomiendo totalmente, por la amabilidad, la decoración tan bohemia, la ubicacion, esta en el centro de Sofia. Repetiría sin duda!!", "Dimitar war ein super Gastgeber, stets zuvorkommend und darauf bedacht dass ich mich wohl fühle. Sogar, dass ich erst nach Mitternacht Einchecken konnte war kein Problem. Die Unterkunft liegt sehr zentral - zu Fuß sind die wichtigsten Sehenswürdigkeiten zu erreichen. Alles in allem ein sehr schöner Aufenthalt", "Dimitar et Petar sont deux hôtes d'une grande hospitalité, d'une grande gentillesse et très amusants. L'appartement est bien situé au coeur du centre ville, proche du métro et des transports, ce qui permet d'accéder rapidement à tous les secteurs de la ville. C'est l'endroit parfait pour découvrir Sofia en excellente compagnie. ", "Petar et Dimitar sont des hôtes très accueillants et prévenants. Leur appartement est idéalement situé et la chambre propre et fonctionnelle. Bref, une super adresse pour budget réduit.", "Anfitrião educado e gentil. Quarto espaçoso e cama confortável. Ambiente limpo e organizado. Próximo ao centro, restaurantes e lojas.", "Una casa molto pittoresca in pieno centro a Sofia!! Un alloggio semplice e senza pretese ..da viaggio "all'avventura" ma con inquilini davvero gentili,disponibili e sorridenti!!
Viva la Macedonia!!", "Il posto è davvero centralissimo...a due passi da una delle die strade principali...facile da raggiungere...sotto casa puoi trovare davvero di tutto!
", "Infos und Organisation waren gut", "dimitar è stato molto paziente ad aspettarmi dopo la mezzanotte, venendo dall'aeroporto. subito l'ambiente mi è sembrato familiare, stanza grande letto comodo cucina dotata di tutto, soggiorno molto carino.", "Cerca a la parte más turística de la ciudad, el anfitrion y sus amigos fueron muy amables.", "Très bon séjour chez Dimitar et Petar et leur adorable chat Arslan :)
Petit bémol c'est que quand il fait froid il faut demander un chauffage supplémentaire car la chambre est grande et vide donc la chaleur mal maîtrisé. 
Bonne communication!", "Chambre agreable dans un appartement agreable.Les hotes sont sympathiques et leur chat adorable.", "Dimitar og Andrey er glimrende værter - åbne, fleksible og meget nemme at kommunikere med. 
Mit oprindelige fly til Sofia blev aflyst, og jeg ankom først efter midnat - vi kommunikerede løbende undervejs, og jeg følte mig hele tiden tryg.
Lejligheden har en rigtig god placering i forhold til mange af Sofias vigtigste sights - og placeringen i forhold nogle af byens bedste restauranter og coffee shops er unbeatable. 
Overskriften på annoncen er en meget præcis beskrivelse af værelset - det er præcis, hvad du får - hverken mere eller mindre.
Mine oplevelser omkring ankomst, kommunikation og belliggenhed gør, at jeg vil kalde mit ophold som glimrende value-for-money, og giver Dimitar og hans værelse mine bedste anbefalinger.
", "Dimitri et Andrey ont été des hôtes parfaits, très sympathiques, qui ont pu me conseiller sur les restaurants et endroits à visiter à Sofia. J'ai été très bien accueilli, la chambre était parfaite! Je recommande chaudement!", "Assolutamente consigliabile!!!
Ottima esperienza a casa di Dim e Peter! Accoglienti e sempre ben predisposti a farti sapere cosa fare e dove mangiare ! 
La
Stanza è incredibilmente grande , ci si sta in due tranquillamente , con un materasso molto molto morbido , cosa importantissima dopo aver girato tutto il giorno a piedi! Una cosa va detta! La stanza non ha le tende , quindi , per quelle persone che voglio dormire fino a tardi , senza luce, poi diventate difficile ! Non per me assolutamente , abituato ad alzarmi alle 7 con tanta luce per me era perfetto! 
La cucina è provvista di tutto quello di qui avete bisogno , ma mangiare costa così poco in città che farete anche a meno. 
Ah!!! Una cosa importantissima ! Ed è un vero pregio ! Il appartamento ha ben Due bagni , percio non c'è il problema della attesa mai! 
Ah! Ecco! Siete a 200 mt del boulevard Vitosha, in pieno centro , meglio di così....! ", "Der Gastgeber ist sehr nett!! Ich bin sehr zufrieden. Die Unterkunft liegt trotz echt im Stadtzentrum, aber ganz ruhig. In der Naehe gibt es viele schoene Kaffee, Restaurants. ", "Je suis arrivée très tard, vers minuit, et Petar m'a accueilli avec une gentillesse extraordinaire.
L'appartement est très bien situé dans un quartier commerçant.
Chambre propre et fonctionnelle.
Je recommande vivement ce Airbnb."]

reviews:
["The apartment was so comfortable and we spent our time as we were at home. There is everything you need for your stay :) 
Thank you Keva and Denis ", "Great and moder apartment. Exactly as descried. Graet hospitaly. 
Thank you!", "Quiet, comfortable place for staying with friendly owners! ", "This is really so wonderful place!!!!We spent such a good time here!The apartment is perfect and there is everything that you need to feel good!!!The neighborhood is so peaceful and the location is perfect!We truly recommend that place!Also the hosts are available and very friendly!When we have opportunity,we will visit that beautiful place again!", "great overall value!", "Lovely apartment, beautifully decorated and clean, friendly and hospitable hosts, nice neighborhood.", "Great place, very cosy and clean. The hosts are very responsive. Very convenient check-in. Relatively close to the airport and the city center.", "I would sincerely recommend this place to anyone coming on a trip in Sofia. A cozy, tidy and stylish apartment in a quiet neigborhood next to a beautiful park.", "The place is well designed and comfortable.", "Beautiful place to stay, pleasant and calm atmosphere, clean and comfortable. Would highly recommend.", "Great place! Very clean, cozy, bright - there's everything you need for a perfect stay. The only thing that might be a problem is the parking places around the apartment - it's hard to find a place... but not impossible :) I will definitely recommend the place and I'll be happy to visit it again!", "Lovely place to stay in Sofia!  Everything was great as always .", "New,  homely and clean  apartment with good location, very quiet area . Great amenities. Tastefully decorated. Friendly and helpful  hosts. I sincerely recommend!", "Прекарахме два прекрасни дена в уют, удобство и комфорт. Комуникацията с домакините бе отлична. Местенцето е тихо и предразполага към отдих и релакс. Определено бих посетил отново!", "Идеално", "We sped few days at Keva and Denis's place and it was great.Really amazing place with super atmosphere.Strongly recommend!!!", "Прекрасно уютно местенце. Има всичко необходимо, за да остави добър спомен у всеки отседнал. Перфектна опция за настаняването ;)", "We spent two nights in that lovely apartment after which it was hard to let go - really! The location is great, with nearby groceries and restaurants. I highly recommend to book this place instead of a hotel room. It's way more cozy and convenient.", "Едно от най-любимите ни места за отсядане в София. За пореден път комуникацията с Кева беше много лесна и своевременна. Апартамента е прекрасен, обзаведен с толкова вкус и внимание към детайла.Препоръчваме с две ръце!!", "I booked the apartment for a colleague of mine and her family and they really liked it. Keva and Denis helped me with everything, even they prepared a crib for the baby. I strongly recommend it!", "Апартамента е изключително комфортен и уютно обзаведен, с всички необходими консумативи. Локацията е удобна, в тих и спокоен район.
Кева и Денис са изключително любезни и отзивчиви.Ще посетим отново с най-голямо удоволствие!", "Keva and Denis are lovely... thank your for your GREAT  hospitality!
The apartment is really really lovely... nice location very clean comfortable and cozy!
For sure we will come back again!", "The flat was exceptionally clean, with easy check-in with a lockbox available even if you arrive at night. The appliances are almost completely brand new, with a combined washer/dryer that was helpful for my extended trip. Accessing the city center requires a bus or inexpensive taxi ride (5-7 levas) but the place is located in a safe residential neighborhood. Walking to Serdika Center, one of the largest malls in Sofia takes around 10 minutes. Keva and Denis are extremely responsive, often replying to any questions sent through Airbnb within minutes. Great people!", "I stayed in another apartment of the owner before. Because it was so nice and the landlord is very responsiveness and helpful, I felt the need to try this one. And of course it fulfills my expectations. I am sure I will come back again.", "Felt like home - beautifully kept space - exactly like the photos :)", "Keva and Denis Apartment was perfect. Great location and beautifully decorated, very stylish and clean. Keva and Denis were super attentive and easy to communicate. Highly Recommended. Thank you.", "Really enjoyed my stay here!", "This is an excellent place with all the amenities that could be wanted. Only problem was that I wanted a place very close to airport that I thought this was but it isn't. My wife and I had to fly out on different days, both early morning, so we both left for the airport about 5am, she from a place we stayed in Old Town city center and her trip took 15 min and cost 15 leva. My trip from this location took a little over 10 min (driving very fast in no traffic) and cost 11 leva. So no real advantage in proximity to airport.", "I loved the time we stayed there the flat is warm cosy stylish and u feel like home from the first minute.", "We had excellent communication with Keva and Denis. We really liked this spacious apartment. This apartment has everything you need and its really close to the city center. We definetly book this apartment if we come back to Sofia.", "Amazing apartment, very modern and well designed. Keva and Dennis were very friendly and offered advice if needed. Would definitely stay here again when visiting Sofia", "Very nice place near to a park. 
Everything was prepared perfectly. ", "A very nice, quiet place. Host is responsive and quick to answer. The apartment is clean, well arranged, with all necessities and amenities in place, on a quiet street near a park, etc., etc...I can list all the pros and only one con - parking could be a challenge; however, a neighbor was on vacation and the host arranged for me to use his/her parking spot which was nearby.
I would definitely stay here again when in Sofia (if available).", "In short-one of the BEST airbnb's we've been to so far. 

In detail: 
The locstion is pretty good-10-15lev for a taxi from the airport(ask for counter, dont get a fixed price from the beginning, they will try to get a higher price). The apartment is 10 min walk to the nearest mall (closes at 22:00). 

The house itself is breathtaking. Clearly designed by somone who knew what they were doing. The kitxhen, modern design, is equipt for mid-high end cooking, with a lot of exessories hidden in the drawers.

The gestroom/kitchen is equipt with a mighty Samsung TV, that is sure to deliver on whatever youx decide to watch is, and is connected to the intenet. On the subject of internet-45mbps download, and 25mbps upload, so if you wanted to watch Netflix on the TV, and upload a video to youtube from your laptop in the same time,Id say go ahead (Website hidden by Airbnb) The dubble bed is very comfrtable, As for the sofa,  I dont recommend a full grown adult to sleep on it (Website hidden by Airbnb) All in all, I highly reccomend the house for couple's, or parents with a child in the age range of 5-12ish (just so they have a good time on the sofa) HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!", "The best Airbnb we've ever been in. 
Highly recommend! Great apartment great host great location! We'll come again!", "The place was extremely cosy and clean, great location too. The hosts were quick to reply and very helpful!", "This is a true gem of an apartment in a quiet neighborhood of Sofia. It is a short walk to the bus to take you into town and there are a number of mini marts and a few restaurants around the neighborhood. The apartment is big and well equipped as well as decorated nicely. The host were great too, accommodating a very late check in. You should definitely stay here!", "Recommended!!!!!!!!!!", "Great place and perfect communication with the hosts.  Definitely recommended.  Thank you very much for your business Keva  and Denis!", "Amazing place: very tasteful interior design, everything like new, plenty of amenities. The apartment exceeded our experience. The checkin process and the communication was smooth and efficient. 

We recommend it to anyone looking to have a pleasant  stay in Sofia!", "Awesome place!", "It's a cozy and stylish place! We really enjoyed staying in this apartment! Thank you!", "This place is from a fairytale, it's that good. There are nice touches in every corner of this apartment and the hosts are great. Highly recommended.
11/10", "Our second time staying here and it was just as amazing as the first, can’t recommend it enough! Looking forward to next time already.", "Had at GREAT time staying at Keva and Denis’s place.  Excellent host with helpful information and extremely quick communication.  Location was wonderful.", "Hi! The appartment is so cute, situatted next to the centre of Sofia. It was cleany, illuminated, and completly equipated. Keva and Denis are so attented and worry about our comfort. I recommended this place at all! :)", "The flat was lovely, clean and cossy my wife fell so much in love with it that she said we are coming back without a doubt. Bus stop was next to the park and super easy to go to either the center or a big mall nearby.", "Excellent apartment, great amenities, fast wifi, excellent location and very quiet area! What more can we ask for? The apartment is well renovated, will excellent attention to detail which made the stay that much more enjoyable. Thank you and we'd be happy to book our future stay with you again!", "This place was very clean, cute, well equipped, comfortable to stay. The host is very easy to communicate and very helpful. We used self check in and check out system, it was really convenient for us. 
Highly recommend!", "Newer apartment. Very nice and amazing value! I travel a lot and this was closer to a 5* botique hotel inside. I have stayed in many airbnbs in Sofia and this is by far the best! Very quick responses too.", "This apartment is just amazing! Stylish, clean, homey, well equipped, warm, Did I mention clean? It’s in a good location, shop is close by and hosts are communicating very well, are very kind and helpful. I wouldn’t think twice about this one! Just book it! Book it now!", "Amazing apartment with everything you need. I highly recommend Keva and Denis's place - it is very stylish, clean and comfortable. The communication was effortless and coherent. Best host we've had!", "Keva and Denis were both kind and easy-going to deal with. The apartment was fresh and clean and was aproximately 15 minutes of walk from city center. The only thing I have to remark is that the advertisment was a bit unclear regarding how many beds there would be, I thought it would be two seperate beds rather than one double.

With that being said I'm very happy with my first Airbnb experience!", "Keva and Denis are the best hosts we have ever had. Communicating with them was so easy and they were willing to help us with anything, they made us feel extremely welcome.

The apartment is located in a quiet and comfortable neighbourhood just a short taxi ride from the centre, there are also several shops and cafes in the area.

The apartment itself is adorable. Clean, new and welcoming. It has absolutely everything you could possibly need along with some nice added touches such as a jar of candy, takeaway menus and maps of Sofia for guests to use. We even had spices and oil for cooking. 

The kitchen is perfect and fully equipped and the living room comes with a big, comfortable sofa and an amazing TV. It was a real pleasure to have a chilled out night and watch a movie under the cute blankets provided by the hosts. 

Thank you Keva and Denis, we look forward to coming again!", "Me and my husband stayed in Denis and Keva apartment for a month and half, and with absolute pleasure we may say that we had the best time possible. The apartment is with great location of 2 min walking to one of the most beautiful parks in Sofia. Not only this but the apartment is fully equipped with  everything you need for short or long stay. Its is very very clean, organized, warm and cozy. It really feels like home. We had amazing welcoming from Denis and Keva who are very supportive, respectful and always in great communication during the stay. This apartment is excellent and we would recommend it to anyone who wishes to stay in Sofia with Keva and Denis where you will get really first class experience!!!! 
Thank you so much ! Deni and Ahmad", "Very nice and clean place, he treated us very friendly and with a lot of hospitality. He helped us for arranging our taxi. Will definitely recommend it! ", "The flat is really confortable. ", "Dear Denis and Keva, 
   It was a real pleasure staying at your beautiful home. It was just what we needed, a small apartment with a high end ameneties at a great location. Thank you for sharing your home with us, we will definitely spread the word and maybe look to come back in the future. Regards, Desi and Milen. ", "Great little spot. We stayed for 3 weeks while travelling around Europe and were very happy with everything. The apartment has great air con, a washer and dryer, and everything else you need.

locationwise it is about 20 minutes from the main city and there are a few convininece stores within close proximity.

There's also a spattering of bars and quality affordable places to eat within a 10 minute walk.

We look forward to returning to Sofia again.", "We enjoyed our stay greatly. Denis was there to meet us when we arrived and very kind and welcoming. Any questions or requests we had, he was easily reachable and ready to help. The flat itself was lovely and equipped with everything you need. Overall, we greatly enjoyed our stay in Sofia. ", "A lovely space to relax in, lots of special touches to the place! Much recommend ", "Brand new apartment with everything that you might need. Very clean and cozy. The location was great, very quiet and yet close to the center. Recommend to all.", "It's a brand new apartment with cozy decoration, close to a park and good neighborhood! Small stores and restaurants near the apartment which you can enjoy the time in the apartment. We had a wonderful night there and thanks for the welcome fruits! :)", "The place to stay was clean,  comfortable and peaceful about 50 meters from the Grate Park when I had a marvelous rest after the hot sunny day. 
It is close to the center witch is good, just about 2 EUR cost by CAB. 
I recommend that place.

", "The place was great- cozy and well equipped. Very good location and infrastructure around it- restaurants, shops, transportation,green spaces, big park right next to it. I especially liked the park and the free fitness equipment in it!!. 
I also love the fact that the Sofia center is within a walking distance ( 15 mins) and the big shopping center which is like a kilometer away. 
Everything was perfect, thanks for the hospitality.", "Бих искала да дам своето мнение като клиент, комуникирал със собствениците. Това беше бърз, точен и създал ми пълно удобство и комфорт контакт. Когато ми се наложи да настанявам мои гости в бъдеще, бих била доволна отново да избера този апартамент. Благодаря!", "Здравейте!  
Искам да изкажа благодарностти на прекрасните домакини   от името на дъщеря ми, която  живее в Ню Йорк и ни гостува със семейството си.
 Прекрасен апартамент!  Домакините бяха безкрайно внимателни и любезни! Апартамента е много слънчев и чист, в нова сграда в близост до парк. Гостите бяха очаровани от  функционалното и артистично обзавеждане  на апартамента с всички необходими условия за малко дете. ГОРЕЩО ПРЕПОРЪЧВАМ  ТОЗИ ПРЕКРАСЕН АПАРТАМЕНТ И НА ДРУГИ ГОСТИ!", "Гостувахме за втори път в дома на  Кева и Денис и бяхме отново очаровани от гостоприемството им. Лесна и бърза комуникация, безпроблемно настаняване дори след полунощ, чистота и уют. Тихо и комуникативно място. Препоръчваме на всеки,който би искал да се чувства у дома и да се наслади на спокойствие и уют. С удоволствие бихме избрали отново домът им при всяко следващо пътуване до София!", "Отличная, чистая, уютная, светлая квартира. расположена в тихом районе, легко добраться как до центра, так и до технопарка. Хозяин очень приветливый, вежливый и дружелюбный. Пребывание оставило только положительные впечатления.", "정말 좋아요! 조용한 환경에 힐링!", "소피아 시내에 위치한 조용하고 쾌적한 숙소!", "Очень красивые и удобные аппартаменты. Рекомендую всем."]

reviews:
["Used the apartment for 10 days. Location is great. 5 mins away from big supermarket, shopping center and public transport. View is great, which can be seen from photos also. Even though the apartment is located next to boulevard, it's not noisy. Communication with host was also perfect.", "Nice host and nice place!", "Nice place, quiet building!", "Peter is a great person to communicate with. The place is very nice too.", "Peter was a great host! He responded very quickly to our messages and was always helpful. The apartment is warm, cozy and has an amazing view of Vitosha mountain. Its really close to a big supermarket and a tram station so you can be downtown in 15 minutes!", "I had excellent experience. From the moment I opened the door, I felt like home.The apartment is clean and tidy with everything you may need. Near to the city center, just few minutes to big supermarket, mall, and the wonderful South Park is just 10 min walk. Very nice view to Vitosha mountain. Great internet. Highly recommend!", "It's a really nice place, clean,  comfortable and calm.The appartament is fully equiped of everything you will need for short or long stay.What about the hosts?Those people are very kind and helpful.Thanks for your attention !", "Excellent guest apartment. Near to the city center. Apartment was clean and tidy with everything you need. The hosts were very helpfully. Right choice.", "Very nice view to Vitosha mountain, close to supermarket and bus stops. The apartment is very comfortable, everything what you need, you can stay long time too.", "Fabulous place to enjoy your stay in Sofia. Host really friendly and everything you need is in the apartment.  Will use again. Carole and John", "All was super ! of course the Great View in the front of window give you more and more energy - thanks !", "Nice apartment", "I and my partner stayed in Peter's lovely apartment with a spectacular view of the mountains. Really, that's the selling point of the whole place! It is so enchanting, and we loved spending time on the balcony morning and evening. 
Peter's place is quite big! We both work and teach online, so it's important that we have stable internet and a bigger place like Peter's provided a large quiet space for both of us to work happily and independently with stable, high speed internet (well over 40 down and 20 up) .
The bed was quite big and comfy, and Peter was available for check-in as well as quickly sorting out some small issues throughout out 3-month stay.
Our only mild complaint,  is that the street below the apartment can be quite loud on weekdays and the windows in the bedroom could use some shutters as the lights can be a bit bright while sleeping, also, during our stay, the tram was being dug up, so that can be a little confusing for travelers who can't read Cyrillic :)
Overall, wonderful stay and the magnificent views and Peter's helpfulness will have us staying here again for sure when we come back to Sofia :)", "As advertised, amazing mountain view, nice flat, and a great host - flexible on both, check in and out. Recommend it.", "Peter's place was very clean with a beautiful view of the mountains. The apartment is clean and cozy with all the amenities you need for a self sufficient easy stay located 15 minutes by tramway to National Palace of Culture Metro station. Peter's wife Vicky was always available when I called her if I had  questions.", "This is the best place in sofia for the money guys. Look no further.", "The apartment was very nice and comfortable inside, with an excellent view of the mountain from the windows. There were several nearby supermarkets and a bus stop just round the corner for busses into Sofia which was a pretty short journey. Peter was helpful, friendly and communicated promptly.", "Amazing !", "Very nice place", "The place was in a very nice location that's easy to get to, a big supermarket nearby, a mall and city center is 10 minutes with a car. Peter was amazing and always responded quickly to any questions. The flat was stylish, clean, have an amazing view to the mountains and very warm... keeping in mind the cold January in Bulgaria.

Thanks for the hospitality, Peter.", "The pics and the description is exactly what it is. Great location!", "Very nice appartement. Great location, excellent owner. Highly recommended.", "Great view and clean apartment", "A lovely, clean, quiet and cosy apartment with gorgeous views, loads of natural sunlight, a short walk from a large mall (with everything you'd need) or a short tram ride to central Sofia. I will absolutely be back and can't recommend Peter and Victoria highly enough. :-)", "Clean, well-maitained flat in a perfect condition. The mountain views is beyond expectations. The host is there for you, making sure your arrival, stay, and departure are stress-free. Would stay there again.", "Very nice and clean apt. Victoria and Peter were very helpful. It's a bit out of the main part of town but not far from the tram stop.", "My stay at Victoria's appartment was amazing. When you walk near te building, you won't expect there could be an amazing apartment like this. But the moment you open the door, you'll feel like home. There's enough space. You can find everything you need. Victoria and Peter are really kind people and always want to help. They fixed a little problem very fast. Also the communication was good. I would recommend.", "Nice flat with a great view, equipped with everything you need close to shops. City center is rather close by public transport.", "everything was just fine,victoria and petri were very welcome ,and the appartment lovely and exactly what we wanted.From the first day we felt like home.", "Victoria is very responsive, friendly and helpful. We stayed here for 2 weeks, getting too comfortable to leave! She did check with us if there's anything we need help with. This apartment has a panoramic view of Vitosha, admiring it every single day. Very comfortable :) Highly recommended and I will definitely come back again!", "Alloggio pieno di polvere, host assente al ritiro delle chiavi.", "El apartamento perfecto , muy buena comunicación con el tranvía el numero 7 directo a él centro , supermercado al lado y centro comercial , limpieza perfecta yo volveria", "Vittoria e molto cordiale  e disponibile,ci ha dato informazioni su qualsiasi cosa ci servisse.casa molto carina e ben collegata con i mezzi al centro."]
