reviews:
["Beautiful place,excellent location,my favorite part of central Sofia.", "Very kind hosts! Perfect location and clean, modern established apartment!", "We had a great stay in Sofia. The house was very clean and prepared to receive us. We found a very cosy environment and everything went perfect during the 4 days that we were there 
PS: We're able to leave our luggage there because there wasn't anyone checking in the day we're checking out, which gave us some freedom to visit Sofia.", "Sarah and Anton are very welcome hosts. The apartment has nice location with close proximity with the city center. Also nice neighbourhood.", "Sarah and Anton were lovely hosts. The apartment has central location and is very comfortable. Enjoyed my stay and definitely recommend it. Thanks for everything!", "Everything about this flat is great. There are full amenities, whether it’s the kitchen, bathroom, or the bedrooms. The location is superb, one of the best neighborhoods in Sofia. Without sound too clichè, I’d have to say this place feels like home away from home.
I highly recommend Sarah and Anton’s flat to anyone who wants to stay in Sofia and feel like a local.", "It was really easy to work my way with Sarah and Anton. The place is central and is really all you need.", "One of the best places we've stayed in so far! The apartment  is located 10 minutes from the city center in an extremely quiet area. Anton was a great host! Thanks again! Would highly recommend!", "Great.", "Отново бихме предпочели да отседнем на това място!", "Anton was a very nice host, thanks for having us.", "Апартаментът беше невероятен, чист и на спокойно място. Антон е невероятен хазяин! ", "This is a fantastic place. Close to the city centre but in a quiet quarter of a very nice neighbourhood, with a restaurant on the next corner and a range of shops a minutes walk away. We really enjoyed our time there and plan to return.", "Sarah and Anton are very kind and frendly. The place is nice, cleen and near to the centar of Sofia. ", "I had a wonderful stay in Sarah's and Anton's appartment. It is an appartment where you simply feel home from the way it's furnished. You are in the city center by 15 minutes walk. Would absolutely stay again there.

Further, the host's are both lovely and helpful. As I had my flight only late the night and somebody had booked the appartment for the day I left, they suggested me to look after my luggage themselves.", "Please, if at all possible, copy and paste my previous message here on the publically accessible page.

Jennifer Coleman and Uttam Biswas", "We were so incredibly impressed by both our hosts, Sarah and Anton, as well as the absolute PERFECT nature and location of their Airbnb apartment that we decided to book it FOR OUR ENTIRE TIME IN BULGARIA. We decided we'd make side trips to some of Bulgaria's other highlights but always know we had a fantastic place waiting for us when we returned to Sofia. I will leave a more extensive review of this wonderful Airbnb experience once our stay in Bulgaria concludes on Sept. 28th. Thanks so very much, Sarah and Anton! 

Sincerely, Jennifer Coleman", "Highly recommended", "Really nice and cozy place. Cause we stayed only for one night we didn't really have a lot of time to get to know Sarah and Anton, but they seemed like great hosts :)", "The flat is as described. We did not have any issues at all. Very central location. The host are very kind and supportive, worth visiting!", "If you love this apartment because of its pictures, you will love it even more when you finally get it. I felt like home, the master bed is super comfortable, no regrets at all. But, there is some other thing, Anton and Sarah were like my "younger parents"; they were awared of my arrival and later about my health... Thank you guys!", "good service, friendly people and a very cosy flat at a ceral but quiet location. I enjoyed my stay a lot!", "We like the apartment which is clean and well decorated. Sarah is very nice and provided all the info. for moving around. The place can be reach within 15min. from the metro and there are plenty of eatery & two supermarkets.", "Sarah and antons place was great.", "Perfekt stay! Would always recommend. The 2 beds are nice and very comfortable. It is easily reachable by the tramstation stadium. By foot about 10 minutes from there. Sarah is a really nice host, thanks again sarah!", "The apartment was spacious, well designed and offered anything we could ask for.
10 minutes by foor to the metro station and in a great neighborhood.

Sarah and Anton were kind and willing to communicate

I would happily spend time again in their apartment, even for an extended amount of time.

Would totally recommend it.", "We had a great stay in Sofia and the place offers good value for money. Special thanks to Sarah & Anton for the very late check-in and easy communication!", "I needed an extra place for several days. The whole experience was great - very responsive hosts and a very cozy apartment. Excellent", "Everything perfekt ", "Stayed twice and would stay again for sure! Sarah was very helpful and the location was great!", "Central & cosy, all you could ask for! Great stay in Sofia and I would 100% stay again. ", "Our stay here has been really good. We appreciate your kindness and all your recommendations about local restaurants and activities to do. 
Thank you Sarah and Anton to let us make the most of our travel to Sofía.", "The apartment was very nice and clean and close to the city center. Sara was a great host. I felt like home.", "Very nice apartment and beautifull,suggested for everyone who wants to feel like home.", "The location was really great. Down the street a restaurant which is open 24 hours with great food. 15 minutes walk to Nevski Cathedrale. The apartment was very clean, the combined shower was good and had enough space. TV and all amenities work perfectly. The hosts are very friendly and helpful. All in all a very good experience.", "Sarah and Anton apartment is relly cosy, close to the center, in a nice area of Sofia. They were kind and helpful to give us those information to enjoy the town.", "Please explain to your client to pay attention to airbnb messages. So clients will be aware", "Sarah and Anton are incredibly welcoming hosts. They are willing to go above and beyond to ensure you enjoy your stay in Sofia. The apartment is very well kept, and I couldn't be happier with my stay.", "We were pleasantly surprised by this destination and Sarah's place.
Many reviews say that the location is under ground floor and although yes, you do go a bit downstairs to enter the apartment, we never felt like living at basement level. The windows are pretty much at the same height as the restaurant across the street, so don't get discouraged by other reviews.
The apartment itself was clean and we had everything we needed. The bed was a little too hard for our backs, but in the end that depends on personal preferences.. we just prefer a softer bed.

Our guests were very nice. Great communication. Anton greeted us promptly once we announced we arrived and helped us find a parking space, presented us with maps and some tips about locations around. They even helped us find an auto service so we could get our car checked before the rest of our trip.
Thank you!", "Clean top lcated flat, very friendly host! Highly recommended! ;)", "Great little place, very clean and comfy. Owner was easy to talk to and very lovely.", "Everything worked out very well and we had an overall good stay in the apartment.", "I have to say that this apartment was little less good than what I expected.
First the flat is in basement, so you have to know because the natural lighting is missing and also humidity is existing in this kind of apartment.
As many apartment in Bulgaria, the shower is not a real shower. 
Sarah and Anton are a good person, I think they just need invest for update and renovate their apartment.
the location is quiet and green. You are from 15-20mn by walk of the center.", "Good flat to have some great days at the city!!!", "Great value place in a quiet neighborhood fairly close to the centre of Sofia and to local parks and restaurants.

The flat is in the basement. Though it doesn't have air conditioning, it is still cool and comfortable in the summer.

The only reason for the mediocre review is the fact that the hot water wasn't working properly while we were staying (September 2017). Hopefully this will be fixed for the next guests.", "gogogogo there. great apartment:)", "Sarah and Anton are very friendly and trying their best to make you feel at home.", "The apartment was as described, really good location which was convenient for the centre of town. It was comfortable and interesting the way Sarah and Anton had decorated it. Would recommend for short stay in Sofia but probably not for a long one/many people as was quite small.", "We had a great stay in Sarah and Anton flat. The flat is comfortable and clean, also close to city center (15-20 min walking). There is a tram stop and a 24h minimarket really close to the flat (1 min walking). Moreover Sara and Anton are two beautiful people, they gave us a lot of advices and they were always ready to answer our questions! Lovely :)", "Fantastic apartment just outside the centre of the city", "Great hosters, Great place ", "Sarah and Anton were super friendly, and when we arrived much later than expected they welcomed us and showed us the flat and gave recommendations for places to eat. We highly recommend this place to anyone who wishes to stay in Sofia. It's easy to get to the city center - we walked the 1,5 km but could easily have taken public transport as well. ", "Sara and Anton has been realy lovelly. We arrive very late and go out very early and they always helpfull with us. The flat very cute and clean. Excellent!", "I didn't get to meet Anton, but Sarah was constantly in contact as I needed. The place was clean and convenient. I got a little lost on foot in between the metro and the apartment because I didn't have a map (or internet on my phone). After that, we quickly settled in to this cozy place. It was hot outside, but comfortably cool inside. It was convenient to walk to many sights in the city. Great neighborhood and convenient. Great wifi. Really enjoyed our first AirB&B experience.", "We had a great stay in the apartment and Sarah and Anton were extremely friendly and helpful, giving us tips about what to do while we were there. The apartment is very stylish and about a 20 minute walk from Vitosha Boulevard.", "Its a clean place in a fantastic location !", "Nicely decorated apartment on the groundfloor, close to the tramway and metro. The hosts were very kind and let us a lot of informations about Sofia. Communication was easy and helpful, the neighborhood was calm and safe even at night. Very good value for money, don't hesitate to book!", "I recommend Sarah and Anton's place, the location is very good, an easy walk from the center, and if you are arriving by car, you can leave it on the street. Great value!", "Good stay for a citytrip in Sofia. The hosts were really nice and helpfull!", "Choosing their place won't lead to your disappointment. You will feel calm and relaxed even after one night in the apartment. The neighborhood is amazing and so is the outstanding design in every room. It's clean and neat in many ways. You won't regret choosing them.", "Appartment is very clean with really cool interiors. It has everything that you need. There are two bedroms, a kitchen and a living room. It's very cool. The apartment is located cca. 10 min by car from city centre. Cool flat! ", "Sarah and Anton are amazing hosts. We reserved their apartment literally the night before our flight to Sofia and they got back to us the next day just in time so we could figure out all the logistics. Sarah is one of the most nicest and hospitalble people ive ever met. She was very fast and responsive to all my messages on airbnb and (Hidden by Airbnb) and answered every single question I had(god knows I had loads of them).
The apartment itself was very nice. It had a simplistic and cosy feeling to it, and was relatively close to the city center. The only complaint I have is that one of our neighbours decided to have a very loud party at 3 in the morning and woke me and my girlfriend up, but apart from that the apartment was in a very nice and in a quiet area.
Last but not least, Anton was also very nice and welcomed us to the apartment a gave us the keys. He recommended us some good places to eat and visit. The next morning we forgot to bring our luggage to Sara and Anton's place and he took two suitcases and backpacks by his own to their place for us, which was very kind of him!
All in all if you're ever staying in Sofia, I would very much recommend this place. It's a good place with even better hosts and a very reasonable price.
Thanks for everything Sara and Anton, I hope to see you again if im ever in Sofia! :)", "Hi!The communication with Sarah and Anton was perfect from the beginning.They are attentive and helpful hosts.The place is nice and well equipped,clean.The location is really good and convenient .I recommend it to anyone!", "Sarah's and Anton's place was great and good value for (Website hidden by Airbnb) was clean and tidy and Sarah and Anton were very helpful and very cooperative.I will stay at their place again if I go back to Sofia.", "This apartment is lovely just as is it described- stayed here as a couple and loved it. Easy to walk into the centre in 15 mins and surrounded by shops and had all amenities nearby. The apartment itself was clean and spacious and Sarah and Anton were super helpful, even looking after our bags on checkout day as our flight wasn't until late. Keep in mind that during the summer a lot of activities are only available at weekends such as the cable cars to the mountain. ", "I don't really know what do say about Sarah And (Website hidden by Airbnb) because I have nothing so say but because I have to much to say about them!
Clean house In a good neighborhood  with restaurants and parks etc meny more this to do and to see!
And their ospitality is the best just the best!
If I travel from  to sofia again  I will definitely stay with them again..!", "Our two-day stay at Sarah & Anton's place was very relaxing. It's in a quiet neighbourhood but close to the trams and shops. 
Anton was very helpful, and despite our later than expected arrival he was able to meet with us within five minutes. His restaurant suggestion was also excellent.
We would recommend staying at Sarah and Anton's place.
", "Sarah and Anton were very king and helpful with us giving advice, offering a parking and helping us finding a taxi. Their apartment is in a good and quiet location, not far from the center. It is clean and fully equipped with the necessary. The beds were very comfortable. We wholeheartedly recommend their apartment. ", "Great host, perfect location, and well organised apartment.", "Loved the location, hospitality and cleanliness of the place! ", "The place is awesome, very clean and in one of the best neighborhoods in Sofia. 10 min walk to the centre, but still quiet and green. Great space for a very good value. ", "Good location, just 10 min with tram to centre :) Good communication with Anton ,highly recommend :) ", "The house is very nice and in a very good location. Sarah and Anton are very helpful and kind hosts. I would recomend their place. There were some issues with the water though, but i believe that they will be resolved. And in would be nice if we had a second set of keys. However their house is recomended!", "We had a great stay at Sarah and Anton's place. The apartment is really cute, and Sarah is very nice (she really went out of her way to help). The area is quite charming, and close to all the points of interest, and cool areas, in Sofia. ", "Sarah and Anton's place is very close to the centre. You can basically walk everywhere. We were 3 people and it was comfortable. Anton did everything to make us feel welcome and he provided everything needed. I am happy to recommend his place to travellers. ", "Sarah and Anton were fantastic hosts, very helpful and even when our arrival time was put back until after midnight due to a delayed flight they had no issues and welcomed us without fuss and were very friendly.  Sarah gave us great tips of what to do and where to go in Sofia which really added to our experience of the city.  Lovely apartment and short walk to city centre, no need at all for taxis or public transport which is a real bonus!  Cannot recommend highly enough...Thanks again Sarah and Anton!! ", "book their home and you´d be in for a nice homestay and great assistance from the hosts. our very best airbnb stay thus far. super value for money and very kind and helpful hosts. we will know where to go again if we need a place to stay in sofia :D", "Sarah and Anton were great hosts, the flat was nice and cosy. Being on the ground floor the noise was a bit biger than usual after 8 am, but nothing disturbing. The hosts were kind, communicative and punctual. Location is great you can get everything within walking distance.", "Great place to stay with lovely hosts.The flat is really nice and clean.The location is amazing - just 10 minutes walk to Sofia City Centre.", "Sarah & Anton propose un appartement très propre, bien situé (station de métro "stadium" à 5 min à pied), dans un quartier tranquille, avec restaurant et épicerie h24 à quelques mètres.
Sarah a été trés réactive lorsque j'ai voulu prolonger d'une nuit ma location, et trés attentionnée (conseils, prend des nouvelles de votre séjour...). Je n'hésiterai pas une seconde à y retourner !", "Sarah & Anton sont trés accueillant et attentionnés. L'appartement est spacieux, trés propre, très bien situé, la station de métro (stadium) est à 5 min. Le quartier est calme, avec une épicerie h24 à quelques mètres. 
Le plus, Sarah a été très réactive lorsque j'ai voulu prolongé d'une nuit ma location, et elle se soucie de votre séjour en Bulgarie (conseils, prend des nouvelles...)
Merci encore ! Je n'hésiterai pas à revenir.", "Mes filles et moi, avons tellement aimé notre première visite chez Sarah et Anton, que nous y sommes retourné une deuxième fois. Et nous en sommes de nouveau très satisfaites ! Merci ! ", "prachtig en gezellig appartement en ideaal gelegen. zeer ruim, proper en volledig in orde. we werden verwelkomt door een vriend van het koppel maar ook hij was behulpzaam en gastvrij. zeker een aanrader om Sofia te ontdekken.", "Le logement est top ! Très bien situé et très agréablement décoré. Sarah et Anton sont adorables et réactifs, ils habitent le quartier et sont de bons conseils également. 
Mes filles et moi avons apprécié et comptons y retourner à notre prochain séjour à Sofia. Je recommande ! ", "Schöne Wohnung im Kellergeschoss (angenehm kühl im Sommer, außer an Regentagen), gute Umgebung (ca. 30 min zu Fuß in das touristische Zentrum) mit Einkaufsmöglichkeiten (kleinere Shops um die Ecke, ein großer Billa ca. zehn Minuten zu Fuß). Schnelles Internet, zum Arbeiten geeignet. Dusche klein und unkomfortabel.", "Anton et Sarah sont des gens agréables, à l'écoute, ils vous conseillent et vous aident. L'appartement est propre (malgré quelques odeurs un peu fortes dans les toilettes et la cuisine), il est bien aménagé (il manque tout de même des volets ou des rideaux épais à mon avis), il est assez siencieux (le quartier est calme et la circulation un peu bruyante à partir de 8h), bien situé. Une bonne location à conseiller
", "Sarah und Anton sind ganz tolle Gastgeber! Bei Ankunft zeige uns Sarah die Wohnung und wenn man irgendetwas braucht, sind sie und ihr Mann sofort mit Rat und Tat zur Stelle. Die beiden versorgten uns mit nützlichen Tipps und einer sehr leckeren Restaurantempfehlung. Ich reiste zusammen mit meinem Vater für einen fünf-Tage-Trip nach Sofia. Die Zeit verging viel zu schnell und wir hatten einen ganz tollen Aufenthalt, der durch Sarahs und Antons Apartment perfekt gemacht wurde!

Die Wohnung passt haargenau auf ihre Beschreibung hier. Es gibt zwei Schlafzimmer, ein Wohnzimmer, eine kleine Küche, die aber ganz gut ausgestattet ist mit einer Mikrowelle, einem Backofen und einer Dolce Gusto Espressomaschine sowie dem dazugehörigen Geschirr und Besteck. Zwischen dem Wohnzimmer und dem Schlafzimmer gibt es keine Tür, sondern die beiden Räumlichkeiten werden, wie es auf den Bildern zu sehen ist, durch eine Wand aus Holzpaletten getrennt. Die Einrichtung ist sehr kreativ und modern. WLAN ist in der ganzen Wohnung mit exzellentem Empfang vorhanden.

Die Anbindung an den Flughafen ist zügig und unproblematisch. Wir sind 10 Stationen mit der Metro gefahren, was ca (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Minuten dauert und waren schon am Terminal bzw. ein paar Gehminuten von der Wohnung entfernt.
Die Ausflüge in die Stadt haben wir zu Fuß erledigt. Alles ist innerhalb von ca (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Gehminuten erreichbar und wer es etwas bequemer mag, kann auch die Straßenbahn vor der Tür nehmen oder sich ein günstiges Taxi nehmen (Achtung vor Betrügern! Entweder "Yellow"-Taxi nehmen oder darauf achten, dass die Kilometerpreise an den Fensterscheiben ausgezeichnet sind).

Die Kommunikation mit den Gastgebern lief reibungslos entweder hier über airbnb oder später auch über (Hidden by Airbnb) . Sarah antwortet in der Regel schnell und sehr freundlich. Wir schrieben und sprachen auf Englisch, aber sie versteht auch fast alles auf Deutsch.

Wenn wir noch mal nach Sofia kommen, würden wir jederzeit wieder das Apartment nehmen und auch unseren Freunden weiterempfehlen.", "kendine ait bir otoparkı yok ama hemen üst sokağına ücretsiz park mümkün. Sokak güvenliydi. Wifi-ı gayet iyi. Ev zeminin alt kotunda, rutubet kokusu mevcut bu koku çarşaf ve havlularda da var ve temiz hissi bırakmıyor. Bununla birlikte duş büyük problem. Duş için lavaboya monte bir duş başlığı kullanmak gerekiyor, bir duş kabini mevcut değil. Eve gittiğimizde bir yatak hazırdı ancak diğerinin çarşaflarını serip, yastık kılıflarını geçirip yatağı ben hazır ettim. Anton çok güleryüzlü ve tatlı bir evsahibi. Ancak evde revizyonlar yapması gerekiyor.", "Sarah e Anton sono disponibilissimi e rispondono sempre subito. La casa è grande, comoda e pulita, le uniche pecche sono la posizione non centralissima e l'assenza di una vera doccia. ", "Emplacement parfait pour visiter Sofia à pied , proche du centre et du tram"]

reviews:
["Stylish, super clean and extremely good location! Totally recommend!", "The location of the place is great in the very centre of Sofia very convenient and with easy access to public transportation. The communication with the host was excellent. I recommend it for couples. A single lady might not feel very comfortable... I had weird experience during my stay which doesn't make the place bad it was the building where it is located. The apartment is part of an old house and the staircase is a bit creepy... In the first night of my stay there was a stranger lying and sleeping on the stairs in the lower floor (probably drunk neighbour or homeless person) which really scared me...", "This was our first Airbnb experience and we are happy that it was in Luchezar's place. It is wonderful: great location (3 minutes walk to the main pedestrian street Vitoshka, rich in cafeterias, restaurants, bars and night clubs), also close to archaeological and cultural sites; very well equipped kitchen, there is everything you might need to prepare meal, tea/ coffee. The atmosphere is really nice and cosy, we felt like home, still it's stylish. It's even better than on the pictures. It was not a problem for our late arrival, nor checking-in on our own. Lucho is really helpful. Totally recommended.", "The place was really cozy and super cute! Great location, stylish interior, kitchen with everything you might need, non-stop hot water and comfortable matress! It's just perfect, I wish I could live there! I highly reccomend it to anyone looking to stay in Sofia! ", "This was my 2nd stay at Luchesar's flat.  It is truly a home away from home in Sofia.", "Luchesar was very accommodating and responsive to our needs. The flat was cosy and clean in a great location with access to a variety of Sofia's amenities.", "the apartment is located in the center of sofia and is equipped with everything you could need. the building and the entry looks a little bit shady, but you will find a really beautiful apartment in the top floor. 
everything works and looks great..you have an comfortable bedroom, a living room with kitchen and a small bathroom. perfect for a couple. check in and communication was super easy. the neighbors listened to quite loud music in the evenings, but it was no problem for us. 

Thanks again, lucho!", "We had a nice stay at this apartment. Unfortunately from the second evening there was loud music from the apartment downstairs which was played until late, this is not the fault of the host obviously, however it was really annoying for us. Apart from this we had a lovely stay. The bedroom has lots of space and the whole apartment has character. 
Cafes and shops are not far down the street. 
The gate is tricky to open however once you follow the detailed instructions your fine. Lighting has been installed in the stairway which is great.", "We had an amazing time in Sofia, the flat has a great location and is well equipped. I totally recommand luchesar’s appartment to visit this nice town!", "Really good value for money. Nice apartment in a perfect location close to the center and metro station ! Building and stairs look a bit dodgy and are a bit smelly but nothing major. Gate is hard to open/close but you get used to that as well. Would certainly recommend!", "Lucho’s apartment has a strategic location, right at the heart of Sofia. This helped save a lot of time, especially when I only had 1.5 day in the city. Everything was provided and clean. He also helped me deliver a gift I left behind to my aunt. Wonderful host. Highly recommended.", "Luchesar is a great host and always sorts out any problems quickly without fuss. I always stay here when I come to Sofia and I intend to do so again in the future.", "The apartment is bright, tastefully decorated and very close to the city center. Do not pay attention to the entrance of the building. In Sofia, often the common parts of the buildings (stairs, entrance etc.) are not very welcoming, but they do not necessarily reflect the quality of the apartments. The Luchesar apartment is one of the nicest I've ever seen in Sofia!", "Lucho was in England so we never met him, but he was available online for any question or concern. His flat is up 3 flights of stairs (no lift!) on the top floor of an older building, in a quiet street a couple of blocks from the "Las Ramblas" of Sofia: the very central Vitosha Boulevard.  It's an older, traditional building accessed through a locked gate. The keys are in a lockbox just inside the gate, which is easy to reach. The tricky part is opening the gate, as the 2-step mechanism is old and not user-friendly. Make sure you ask Lucho for an extensive, in-depth description of which key to use and how exactly to use it - as it took us a good 20 minutes of exasperation in order to manage to get the gate unlocked. Once we figured out the trick, it was relatively simple, but it can be very tricky the first time! Other than that, the access to the flat was straightforward. Inside the flat there's a good mix of traditional and modern. The Wi-Fi and TV are great (we brought our own Chromecast so we watched our Netflix). There's one futon couch and two lounge chairs in the living room (NOT the second couch pictured, so probably the pictures uploaded here are old).  The kitchen has an electric cook-top and oven, but no microwave. There's some pots and pans, crockery, cutlery, cups and glasses provided but it's not a kitchen set up for cooking up a storm as only basic things are provided. Salt, pepper and oil were provided, as well as tea and ground coffee. An electric kettle, a mocha coffee maker and a washing machine with a drying rack were provided.  The bathroom is small, with a small shower. There's some random liquid soaps provided in the shower: the labels all said they were orange hand washes but I'm pretty sure the bottles had been refilled with shower gel. There was also some body lotion and hair gel. The bathroom has 3 windows with clear glass and no privacy screens, so I felt extremely uncomfortable as I felt I was being watched from the windows of the adjacent buildings outside. Especially at night! There was a small mirror propped up against the window on top of the sink which fell over because of the wind, so maybe there's no more mirror in the bathroom (or perhaps Lucho organized for a new one to be properly installed). More clarity on the products would've been appreciated, also in regards to the cleaning products as all the labels were in Cyrillic so it was next to impossible to figure out which bottle contained the laundry detergent and what was the correct dosage to use.  In regards to the cleanliness, the apartment was relatively clean but far from spotless. The shower drain was full of the previous guest's hair so we immediately contacted Lucho who organized for a cleaner to come clean the bathroom first thing...", "Luchesar’s place was comfortable and central, and felt safe. It was great to have an oven. Checkin was easy and our two weeks in the apartment went well. ", "Old house full of atmosphere. The apartment is very cosy and very confortable. Inside there is all what you need. Lucho is very kind and you can contact him for everything you need. 
If we'll come again in Sophia this will be our home.
Grazie!
", "Very pleasant stay at Luchesar’s place.

Apartment was clean, comfortable and in a very good central location for exploring Sofia without the need for using public transport.

The apartment was perfect for what we needed for our weekend trip and is a very good choice for visiting Sofia.", "Luchesar’s place was comfortable, stylish and charming with its original floorboards and top floor setting. Emplacement au top, quartier safe, prêt de la vie nocturne comme diurne ! Validé et recommandé !", "El departamento está úbicado en una zona céntrica, todo queda caminando. Recomiendo este lugar ampliamente.", "Πολύ καλό σπίτι, εξαιρετική θέση και τιμή! Πολλές παροχές το σπίτι μεταξύ άλλων, βολικό και μεγάλο σπίτι ακόμα και για πάνω από 2 άτομα. Το συστήνουμε ανεπιφύλακτα!", "Excellent séjour dans cet appartement très cosy de la capitale Bulgare. L'accueil fut très chaleureux et tout est fait pour faciliter l'arrivée et le séjour des hôtes. Le logement est en tous points conforme aux photos proposées ici et extrêmement calme et agréable. Situé non loin de rues plus vivantes, il dispose d'une très bonne localisation.
Un logement que je recommanderais volontiers !", "Luchesar est un hôte à l'écoute et tres accueillant même si les échanges se faisaient par mail. 
En fonction de votre heure d'arrivée vous pouvez récupérer les clés dans un petit coffre dans la boîte aux lettres ce qui est très pratique. 
L'appartement est spacieux, propre et tres bien décoré. Nous etions 3 et le canapé fait très bien l'affaire! Vous n'êtes qu'à quelques mètres de la rue Vitosha et des attractions touristiques mais la rue est calme. 
Merci pour tout! ", "Nous avons eu une bonne communication avec Luchesar.  A notre arrivée à l'appartement, nous avons reçu un accueil sympathique d'une de ses amies, Ina, qui parle très bien francais. L'appartement est bien situė et on le recommande. Merci à Ina et Luchesar.", "Bella casa carina e molto funzionale. Contesto molto vecchio ed in costruzione. Non ci sono oscuranti alle finestre quindi la mattina ti svegli con il sole in faccia"]

reviews:
["A nice place to stay", "One of the best place in downtown.", "Perfect as always, I recommend it.", "As good as it was in my previous visiting.", "Great and cosy place at excellent location. Its clean and new. I recommend it.", "The host was amazing and kind, hopefully soon again. Highly recommended!", "Great apartment on a top location. Good and clean facilities. I would recommend escape room “Escapeway” which is on a stone’s throw distance.", "Cozy, clean place, at walking distance of the Sofia city center.", "We had a great experience here and would recommend to future guests. The space was clean, in a great location and had the perfect amount of space.", "Perfect location walking distance to everything and close to Serdika Station for easy transfer to/from the airport using the metro. Flat is quiet and dark...I slept very well there.", "Clean, spacious and it's got everything you need. Close to the boulevard and other sights. Easy and fast communication. Highly recommended!", "Great location. Everything you need for a short stay.", "Nice place in the center of Sofia. A lot of nice restaurants and bars around. Highly recommended.", "Great apartment with everything that you need. All brand new and refurbished. The apartment is beautiful, but the location, in the city centre, is the best part! Thanks for everything! ", "The apartment is excellently situated in a great location in the heart of Sofia and is clean and well decorated.

We would however note a hidden charge for arrival after 10 pm, not included in the listing. Whilst we can understand the rationale for this and the amount is fairly low, it should be added to the listing to provide full and clear information to guests.

We have therefore marked down on this basis.", "Very nice, and clean place. It is right in the center, so everything is close. Although it was warm outside, it was cool inside. Perfect for sleeping after exploring the city by day and night.", "Very nice place in a great location, right next to the main walking street. The apartment is very nice, clean and comfortable. I would recommend this apartment for anyone visiting Sofia. ", "We enjoyed our stay! The apartment was in a prime location! Everything was great, special thank you to the host, who let us stay a few extra hours after the check out time!", "Cool space, all the amenities you could need, great location near bars, restaurants, shops, and not too far from the metro to get everywhere else too! Thanks for everything, and the late check in!", "Its was all great they were really polite for giving me assistance for accommodating my colleagues from France", "Quick responses, easy check in, close to public transit. The pictures don’t do the location justice! The description is incredibly accurate! The next time I am in Sofia I will be making sure that this location is available!", "Professional communication with the host
Quick response 
Amazing location
Clean and cozy place. Everything is done with attention to the details. Recomend it!", "Sparkling clean and right in the centre, fabulous!", "Flat is clean and spacious. Pictures don’t do justice to what it really is. Theres everything needed for a short stay. If you considering booking you must.", "Good location.great for family", "Alles super!", "Mooi appartement op een mooie locatie. Dicht bij veel restaurantjes/barretjes. Veel bezienswaardigheden op loopafstand. Alles was aanwezig voor een stedentripje in Sofia! ", "L'appartamento è come si vede nelle foto, anzi, anche più bello. Curato nei minimi dettagli, pulito e ordinato. È fornito di tanti accessori, come saponi, detersivi, lavatrice, phon, ferro da stiro ed altro ancora. La posizione è centralissima, si può fare tutto a piedi. Non ho visto personalmente i proprietari, ma siamo rimasti sempre in contatto per tutte le necessità. Lo consiglierei sicuramente!"]

reviews:
["Good place, perfect location, friendly host!", "One of the most beautiful and quiet homes", "The apartment is amazing and very cozy. It’s been designed very modern that fits all the needs not only for travels but for a long stay. We had so much fun as the apartment is specious and clean. The area is close to all the central points in Sofia and walking distance to the centre, restaurants and shops. The block is secured with CCTV and it can be entered only with a secure key. 

Amazing stay and we were sad to leave", "Amazing bed and really nice and stylish living room. Would definitely stay there again.", "Very nice place, I really recommend Encho house", "We had a good time at this apartment. Everything was as advertised.", "Was such a great stay! Everything was fantastic! Always again!!l", "We stayed in Encho’s apartment for a week. It was really spacious, the bed was amazing! So comfortable! 

The apartment is really well located. There’s a supermarket a few doors away for all your basic supplies. 

There is also a really cute blues bar across the street and the owners are lovely.", "We stayed for a few days at Encho's place. We are traveling around the world for the last 20 months and it was one of the best AirBnB's we have stayed at. We can only highly recommend it to any other traveller. ", "Really nice and stylish apartment.  In terms of the bedroom and living room it is probably the nicest apartment I stayed at in all of Europe.  Strangely, the bathroom is very small and seems out of place.  The shower is combined with the toilet and sink like you would find in a very small apartment.  Low price for what you get, but a bit far from the center to walk.  20 minutes to restaurants and bars.", "Clean house with a good location!", "This place was fantastic! A very stylish, modern, comfortable, and clean space. This place was definitely above average. I'll be back!", "Great apartment in a great location. Clean, stylish and modern with everything you could need. City centre is easily walkable and transport easily accessible. Loved staying here in Sofia. Thank you.", "I strongly recommend the place, great location, good host and a lot of space in the apartment!", "Home is pretty good and nice decorated bedroom and living room was very good and house is well secured with electronic keys for garden and apartment gate thank alot", "Very nice apartment right in the city. Good value for money. Has one of the fastest Wi-Fi I've ever seen. I was able to stream movies without any problem. Well equipped kitchen and the building was very secure for peace of mind. Highly recommended.  I will stay there again for sure.", "Great place :))", "This is a great apartment with everything you could want: coffee machine, washing machine, smart UHD TV, and a very big - and very very comfortable - bed. Encho and his co-host were very responsive, and made it easy to stay there, even though we only booked a few hours before checking in!", "
very nice experience", "Very clean and modern apartment with f***n fast wifi! (100+mbps). Highly recommended. ", "Ho preso in considerazione questo appartamento insieme ad altri due amici principalmente per la posizione. Infatti, esso si trova a pochissimi passi dalla zona ospedaliera (zona che ci interessava per l'università) e a circa 5/10 minuti dal centro, o comunque per vitosha boulevard. Complessivamente abbiamo passato un buon soggiorno. L'appartamento ha tutto l'essenziale anche per eventuali studenti come noi, che vogliono quindi prepararsi un pranzo/cena a casa e poter studiare.", "Mooi en schoon apartament.Makkelijk te vinden,goede locatie.", "Habe mich sehr wohl gefühlt! Alles was super cool! Jederzeit wieder! Danke :)"]

reviews:
["Nice place,whit everything you need for your stay", "Clean, cozy place perfect for a romantic holiday..", "Nice cozy place for a short stay with great shower and artistic atmosphere.", "Recommended for business trips.", "The apartment is as described. Clean and convenient. Great communication with the host. Recommended for business trips.", "All what you need for one pleasant stay in the heart of the city center. Central location , great hospitality  and  well equipped charming  studio.", "A very modern, light and cozy place in the heart of Sofia. It was a real pleasure to spend the weekend there. A huge thanks to our host, who was very kind and polite.", "A very cosy studio at an excellent location!", "This is your place! I used to live in this neighborhood and know it very well. It's a perfect spot for your Sofia stay. Very cute space with tons of amenities. Which is a good thing, because my bags were delayed. Thanks to there being so many little touches to the place, I was able to be comfortable and go about my regular business without any hassle - this wouldn't have been the case in a hotel. The host even brought a US-Bulgaria adapter for my devices! You'll feel totally secure in this spot, and it's completely quiet because it's at the back of a building, so it doesn't face the street. The host is super responsive and caring. Tons of hot water, too. Ideal!", "Great caring host, they brought me a foam top to make the bed nicer. This Safe location made it easy to walk anywhere and meet up with friends but the Apartment itself was uncomfortably humid and regularly smelled bad. Also spiders everywhere haha. Wish I could give higher praise bc it is a cute spot for one person to relax but its in a basement and entirely feels like it.", "We spent only one night at Svetlana's place but we had a wonderful stay.
The apartment is small but very well organized, comfortable and equipped with everything and spotlessly clean.
The location is perfect, central and close to all the important landmarks.
Communication with our host was always quick and efficient and the instructions to check-in and for our stay very clear. 
The apartment is a bit dark because it's a subterranean one but still quite charming.
Definitely best value for the price. 
Thank you!", "Svetlana's and Pavel's apartment is really fancy and unique. The Interieur is classy and well arranged with a nice view on details. The apartment is close to the university and surrounded by some embassies which makes it to a very good starting point to explore the neighbourhood and the city centre.", "We really enjoyed our stay with a nice little backyard garden for breakfast!", "The house has good location. But the studio is very damp because of it is in basement. The bed was a sofa, which could be turn in to bed. It was not so comfortable. 
Beside these, studio was really clean and Pavel is nice house owner.", "Good place for a short stay in Sofia. The neighborhood has some very nice cafes, bars and restaurants. You can walk to the main hotspots in the city. ", "Super cool place to stay at. Within walking distance to restaurants, bars and sights. Would recommend", "Nice place, but very damp because it is located in the basement.", "It is a great studio with a super location to stay and visit Sofía! I would definitely recommend it!
Have a nice stay in Sofia ", "It was an amazing stay. and an perfect neighborhood.", "Great place, great location. ", "The apartment was in a very safe, established, upscale neighborhood. The location is not in the "middle" of Downtown but is a 10-20 minute walk from the main tourist areas and hotels. I look for locations like this as I prefer to get away from the potential noise at the end of a busy day. The street and area are quite safe (as is the whole city) and there is even a police station a block away (on the same street). I am also a runner and I like to be near parks. The apartment is located close to three nice parks of various sizes, two of which are excellent for running. The apartment is not big, and does not have a separate bedroom. Instead, the living room has two full sized pullout sofas from Ikea that are comfortable. It is a fine size for 1-2 people, but I would not want to have any more in the apartment. The kitchen and bathroom are a good size and nice. Communication with Svetlana and her colleague was excellent. They gave me numerous suggestions for a local masseuse (who came to the apartment at a very reasonable price) and for a cab company for a very early morning pick up. I enthusiastically recommend this apartment.", "Svetlana's place is very cozy and has a great location in Sofia", "A very sweet little place, an ideal base for exploring Sofia. Would recommend to others.", "Great value for money!", "I can't say how AMAZING this place is! Nice location, nice amenities with loads of extras (soaps, coffee, razer), super cosy and just as it looks in the pictures. Nikola was a star! he allowed me to do a very early check in and all the process was smooth. He even helped me with tips and advice and everything done very promptly. I could not have imagined a better place to stay in Sofia... I could literally live there. Hope to come back to Sofia soon!!!", "What a cosy little studio. Perfect walking distance from all attractions, shops, parks etc. Nikola was so welcoming. This was my first time staying in an Airbnb and he made it very easy. Nikola kindly booked a taxi back to the airport for me. Awesome hospitality. Thank you ", "You can find everything you need here~", "nice stay! - fast & uncomplicated communication :)", "Very good location and very good communication with quick answer with Nikola, he help us very much.
Stylish apartment and very comfortable beds.
Of course, we recomend this apartment.", "Lovely studio in city centre, hosted by easy-going hosts.", "A cute little place, well equipped, and close to everything.  Nicola is a fantastic host and very helpful.  He helped a lot with my check out and getting a taxi and everything.  Thank you Nicola!", "Nice flat, ideally situated.", "Nikola was a great host. He attended to all of our inquiries and did everything in his power to make us feel as welcome as possible. The place is cousy and also perfect for up to 4 people. I greatly recomend this place to make your stay at Sofia enjoyable.", "Great place to stay in great location. Apartment itself is quite small, but for us 3 was just enought :)", "Our accommodation at Nikolas home was wonderfull. The house is very warm, very nice and it is a place in a quiet neighborhood. Mr Nikola is very friendly and one of the most polite person we have ever meet. I hope to go again at Sofia and stay at the same place and i suggest this place for sure for an amazing accomondation. Thanks for all Mr. Nikola.", "Flat was very cool and as described. Good value for money in a nice location. Nikola is very helpful and quick to respond. Thanks for everything!", "It is a nice  small studio.. But really couching and the guy is super nice, and clean. Defintely would take it again!!! Near also the many tourist places in Sofia", "Perfect apartment, perfect location and nice hosts. We stayed for a week and we really enjoyed it. We were welcomed with a smile and there was cookies and wine for us - what a nice touch! Restaurants and bars right around the corner. We would definitely recommend this place!", "Nikola is a very friendly host. Always replied superfast. The apartment is supercozy. 
Supergeil! #edeka", "Awesome location!", "Nice flat next to downtown!", "Great place and a great host! :)", "I luv this place i like interior and space also there are everything you can cook with that and he kind to me mostly the place is in the city center so can go tracvel easily 
and also 40 second distance has a market where you can buy food also there are sales meals

if I come sofia again I'll stay here Thanks !!", "Excellent! Everything exactly as described in the profile. Communication with owners is excellent. Make sure you ask Nikola if he is available for his airport collection service - nicest guy ever and great hints & tips. Great location for privacy and quiet, but near restaurants like Rakia Raketa, Atelier, Pavillion 37 etc etc. Brunch nearby at Rainbow Factory 2 or Cafe Ma. Taxis are cheap, or a quick ride on #22 or #20 tram into the city.", "A lovely decorated home in a great neighborhood!", "Svetlana’s place couldn’t be any better than it is now. Communication with the hosts is great and easy and they will go the extra mile to make sure you are comfortable and your needs are taken care of. The place is small studio style accommodation with a private access, great location and comfortable set up. The design of the studio is great and makes the space look big, cozy and welcoming. With a fully equipped kitchen you can prepare your own meals if you feel like it. Bathroom is small, but  you have unlimited hot water and great water flow - perfect for a nice relaxing shower at the end of the day spent in exploring the city. Overall I couldn’t be happier with my stay there and I would highly recommend.", "Nikola welcomed us to his basement apartment, which is a really quirky and interesting place to stay in. For the price, it's absolutely great value. Everything you would want during your stay you will find there. With many restaurants, shops, public transport and famous buildings this apartment is a very good choice.. Nikola is a fantastic host, quick responses, super friendly and more than willing to give to some nice recommendations where to go to in the city. Thanks again and good luck with the apartments!", "Great location and value! I wouldn’t try to fit more than two people here, though.", "The Svetlana and Nikola's place is even more pretty in real life than on the pictures :) Since the first moment you feel like you are at home with beautiful details all around the flat. The flat has a perfect location with many cute coffee places around and walking distance to Sofia downtown. I highly recommend this place when you want to spend nice time in Sofia.", "Wonderful place, very centric. Great guests", "Very clean and stylish in a quiet location with access to shops and public transport.
The host went out of his way to deliver the keys to a location that was convenient for me. 

Recommended!", "This is a very stilish, clean and cozy space in central area.The host respond to our requests very quiqly and existent.The studio is perfect for couples or solo travelers, but also have enough space for more leople to sleep.Very quiet so it is perfect to rest and the beutiful outdoor space make it perfect for getting a breackfast or just to chill.Highly Recomended!", "The place is just a gem! It felt cozy and comfortable, really stylish with thoughtful touches everywhere. Meeting Nicola was amazing too, apart from being super friendly, punctual and welcoming, he is really passionate about what he does and has a unique style. He showed me everything I needed to know about the place and made me feel at home. The location is also great, really close to stores and pretty cool restaurants and bars- can't recommend it enough!", "Страхотно местоположение, невероятна гостоприемност! Комуникацията беше много лесна!", "Чаровно място, на удобна позиция. В близост има приятни заведения, центъра се стига за минути пеша. Двойното легло е диван, с топматрак, в кухнята има всичко необходимо.", "Semplicemente fantastica, sia la casa che l’host, consigliatissima!", "Eine sehr stylishe Unterkuft im Keller in einer tollen Lage, Gastgeber sehr nett und unkompliziert (wir durften etwas früher einchecken)", "Το διαμέρισμα είναι ακριβώς όπως η περιγραφή του. Για να πάρεις το μετρό πρέπει να περπατήσεις περίπου 10 λεπτά. Η περιοχή είναι ήσυχη και δεν σε ενοχλεί τίποτα. Το διαμέρισμα είναι απομονωμένο υπόγειο και πολύ καθαρό.", "L'appartamento è una vera perla nel cuore di Sofia. L'ambiente è confortevole,  moderno e con tutti i comfort. Il quartiere è tranquillo a due passi dal centro città. Nikola è un ottimo host super gentile e disponibile.  Spero di avere l'occasione di tornarci presto."]

reviews:
["Great place! We would definitely stay there again", "Clean and stylish flat, great location, close to the trade center and city center, hospital and communicative housekeeper. This place could be an amazing choice if you want to experience old Sofia street athmospere.", "I've lived almost 5 years in Sofia and I can safely say that this is one of the best streets for living in Sofia. Apart from that, this kind of apartment at this insanely cheap price is the idealist choice you could make. It was in an immaculate condition when I checked-in. Also it basically has everything you need and everything is very modern. I wanted to extend my stay here but it was already booked. And finally, Rado is a very polite and a considerate guy. He came all the way walking to pick me up and walk me to his place because I accidentally went to somewhere a bit away from the flat. If you're lucky enough to find this place you should really stay here!", "Very nice and clean please, close to shopping centre and public transport.", "I would definitively recommend Radostin's house to everyone, is an excellent host. Very clean apartment, quiet neighbourhood, good location - perfect for walking around the center or for shopping, plenty of stores and a shopping mall nearby, 10 minutes from the Central Railway Station, 19 minutes from Sofia Airport, just what I was looking for. 
Thank you Radostin.", "Very nice place to stay! It's comfortable and location is central. We really enjoy our stay here :) ", "Rado is an excellent host. He was very welcoming and dealt really quickly with our concerns. His apartment is in a nice, quiet neighbourhood within an earshot of the city center with plenty of stores and a shopping mall nearby. I would highly recommend it to anyone travelling to Sofia.", "Very friendly host, clean place and nice location.", "Our stay at Rados place was perfect! Perfect size for 2 people and sparkling clean. Rado was a great host, he even offered to take us for a city tour to see Sofia! Location is perfect for all the sites. Would 100% stay again!!!", "Radostin is a great host and gave me great advice on what to do and where to go in Sofia. He was very thorough in communication and this made it easy to settle in. The apartment is clean and modern with all you need.", "Radostin is great host and has an eye for detail and quality. He is helpful and really made an effort to make our stay as enjoyable as possible. The apartment has everything you need, is spick and span and is located centrally in a nice neighborhood. I would definitely recommend staying at this apartment!", "Great stay in Sofia. We didn't get a chance to meet Radostin, but he gave us really detailed instructions for self check-in and directions from the bus station that made the process a breeze. He also gave great recommendations for places to eat in Sofia. The location was great as you can just walk down the street to the Nevsky cathedral and downtown.", "Everything was wonderful!! The apartment is very close to the City center. It is near the Serdika Center /shopping mall/. The Radostin's place was very comfortable and clean . Everything you need about your accommodation you will find it into the house. We will suggest it to everyone who want to visit Sofia !!", "Everything was perfect, from check in until check out. Radostin was very nice to arrange for us very smooth check in, despite our arrival after midnight. We found everything necessary for our stay. Also Rado was very nice to help us with tips for local foods, bars and how to get around the city. We had also a nice chat about Bulgaria, people, economy, politics, etc. And also Rado let us stay a little longer after check out due to our late flight. We definitely recommend this place. Also it is very quite and seemed very safe to walk at night.", "The place is amazing as mentioned in the Airbnb, the apartment is clean and tidy, the apartment exactly the same as mentioned in the ad, the host is  quick responsive and polite personality, he has good knowledge around the town. The place is perfect near to the centre  and there is big shopping mall near the apartment like 2, 3 mins away. The only problem is the parking, if you have car then you need to sort out the parking space as my car been clamped and I paid like 70 leva. Apart from that everything is perfect.", "It's located in a really good place, easy check in 24 hours a day, and Radostin is a very good host, has a good answer and answers for all topics and questions.
Everything was really nice.", "Radostin’s place was easy to find and conveniently located. Everything was exactly as described. I would definitely stay at his place again and highly recommend to other travelers.", "This is our second time in Radostine's apartment. We really enjoy the area: stores, restaurants, mall and public transportation.", "This appartment is perfect. Near to the center, clean and with all you need to have a good stay. Radostin is also the perfect host, allways offering his help and good recommendations.
", "Really nice flat, well located and really comfortable.
We had a wonderful time in Sofia, Rado gave us some local adresses to try and that was lovely.
We had all the commodities not even five minutes from the flat.
Overall, it was a really good experience, I would totally recommend!
", "Stayed here for 6 nights and  it was the perfect location for a citytrip.  20min walk to the cathedral, shopping center around the corner with a really big Billa-supermarket. Also only 10min in a cab from the airport (5Euro, - 10lev) and with a cab you will be in 15-20 minutes in the mountains. The flat is very clean, sunny and has everything you need for cooking. Rado is a great host, fast communication and has lot of tips for local places to eat. I would  stay there again!
", "The apartment is very nice, it has everything you need and it is near a big mall which is very useful. Radostin is very kind, he gives a lot of info about everything in the city and is available if you need something. It was a really nice stay :)", "Very nice place in central Sofia! It’s interesting to wonder around the neighborhood and sit for coffee and bakery. I enjoyed so much of staying. Radostin was great and being very helpful. He was fast in response and could think every detail for his guests. Highly recommended! ", "Great host, went the extra mile to ensure pleasurable stay!", "Great great place ", "The apartment is quiet with a view of trees from one of the two balconies, despite being so central in Sofia. It has an attractive modern interior design and all the needed amenities in the kitchen. There are lots of restaurants and shopping in the area. Most importantly, our gracious host was there to check us in even though our evening flight was delayed and we arrived after midnight. Thank you Radostin!", "Impeccable host.
Very nice apartment provided and very very clean.
Perfect location.
Highly recommended", "We have had a great time at Radostin’s apartment! It is a very nice place with many facilities. Check-in was perfect: although we arrived one hour late by airplane, Radostin was waiting for us. During our stay, he gave us so many tips for good places in Sophia and he helped us with exploring the rest of Bulgaria. Highly recommended!", "The place is very cozy and calm, although perfectly located. Radostin was very responsive all the time and I totally felt at home ", "Good location, close to Sofia center. Lovely sparcling clean ,sunny appartment and Rado was very helpfull and a really nice guy. Very nice tips and always quick to answer. I defenatly recommend this place for anybody who wants to have a magic trip.", "I loved everything about this flat so much so that next month i am returning there again!", "I can't recommend staying here highly enough. 
The apartment is lovely - a nice bright, airy space with 2 balconies, one of which is south facing, and a great place to sit and relax or have a meal at any time of day.
The location was ideal. Oboriste is a lovely area just outside the centre of Sofia with nice bars, restaurants and shops nearby. There's also a shopping centre around the corner where you can get anything you could possibly need during your stay. 
Finally, Radostin is the best air bnb host I've ever had by miles. He's extremely thoughtful and helpful. My first day he took me for a really informative walking tour of the city and  for the rest of my stay was kind enough to always be on hand for translating T-Shirt slogans or advising what brand of Rakia to drink. 
A few places I'd personally recommend - Khlebar for coffee and breakfast, or get a banitsa to go.  Sun and Moon for lunch.  Park Cafe is a nice location off Doctor's Gardens for a bit of day drinking. Q-ftetaria for dinner and 65 Fireflies was a stylish spot for the evening with cheap cocktails and nice atmosphere.", "Stayed here for 3 nights it was perfect.
Location is great, 20min walk to the cathedral (along a road with some bars and restaurants) supermarket close by and a shopping center around the corner. It's also only 10min in a cab from the airport (roughly 10lev)

The flat is clean and safe. 

Rabo is a great host, fast communication and tips for local places to eat. 

Would recommend and stay again!", "Radostin's apartment was fantastic, it was spotlessly clean and in a good location for shop and transport around the city.

Radostin himself is a fantastic host who replies to your messages incredibly fast. He also took me on a tour of the city soon after I arrived, and as he is an ex-tour guide, the tour was amazing. 

I shall certainly stay again when I get the chance.", "Radostin’s apartment is very clean and cozy and there you will find everything you’ll need during your stay. It’s 3 minutes walk to the nearest bus/tram stop and about 10/15 minutes by bus to the center of Sofia. Taxis are very cheap so it will take you even less time by car. 
But a special thank goes to this super host, who made us even find a bottle of wine in the fridge to celebrate New Year’s Eve! Radostin was always available when we needed him and offered us his help to organize trips and tours around the city.
5 stars won’t ever be enough! 
Super super super recommended!", "I would definitively recommend Radostin's house to everyone. Picked us up from the airport and gave us some tips for our stay in Sofia. Later on he gave goods restaurants, bars and clubs. We could always contact Radostin for questions and he was there to respond asap. He thought of everything, slippers for me and my girlfriend, water and a beer in the fridge and so on. Best Airbnb appartment I've had till now! Thank you Radostin!", "Picked up from airport no problem.

Fantastic apartment. A little small, but absolutely perfect for two people. Very well furnished, comfortable, warm even in December, great shower. 2 rings to cook on, kettle etc. Location is perfect - close to shops of all kinds, not too far out of town. Taxis from the centre cost about 5-10 Levs, which seems to stick around a 2:1 exchange rate for £/EU so £2.50-£5 for a ride into or out of town for when the 20 min walk is too much!

3 hour tour by Rado himself of the town centre including huge amounts of information about the history, culture, best places to eat, drink, buses, taxi companies, literally everything you could possibly want to know about Sofia or Bulgaria.

Lovely guy, nothing was too much trouble. Thoroughly enjoyed the stay. If you visit, then far and above place to have dinner is Rakia Raketa which is a 10-15 min walk away.", "The apartment is well located, bright, light and very comfortable.  Rado is an outstanding host even, taking us on an excellent walking tour of the city as well as giving us great local tips.  I can't recommend this apartment highly enough.", "Great apartment for even better value. Radostin is a fantastic host who replies very quickly and has lots of useful information about the city and where to go. Will definitely try to stay here again when next visiting Sofia.", "Rado's apartment is located in a quiet neighborhood that gives you a feeling of security. Many shops around, bakeries, supermarket, even a mall. It is 15-20 minutes walk to the center of Sofia. The apartment is on the fifth floor, it has an elevator, it's super clean, super sunny and super warm! Fully equipped, and, not very common, in reality, it was even better looking than the photos of it. Its best asset, however, is its owner, Rado, who was very attentive to our needs. Not only was the house very well equipped with maps, city guides, even discount card for the nearby supermarket (!) but Rado was present and quick responding to every mail we sent. It is so relieving not to have unpleasant surprises when taking the risk not to accommodate in a hotel. And, for sure, we'll be staying there next time I visit Sofia.
Thanks Rado for being the nicest host!", "The apartment is clean, cozy, warm and sunny. It is located in a quiet central neighborhood. 
The city center is within 15 mins walking distance. If you prefer public transportation, there are two bus stations next to the building. 
Rado offers airport tranfer, a free walking tour and recommends places to eat, so you 
needn't worry about anything. 
Definitely recommend it!", "Rados is a great host. He is very helpful, warm and makes us feel welcomed. The Apartment is very cosy, clean, sunny and contained everything we needed for a pleasant stay in Sofia. The Location was quiet and everything you need (bakery, Shops, Restaurants) is very close. Thank you for Hosting us. We can recommend Rados To 100%. :)", "This apartment is super cute and impeccably clean. It's in a great location with easy walk into the center or you can jump on the bus. Rado was an excellent host - he checked in with us every step of the way, responded immediately whenever we asked some questions, and provided us with excellent recommendations. HIGHLY recommended!!!!!", "We had an absolutely lovely stay in Radostin's place. He offered a pick-up at the airport and was incredibly flexible when our flight times changed. The apartment itself was incredibly clean, comfortable, and in a great location. Radostin really took the time to make our stay enjoyable by offering us a tour of some important monuments in Sofia, listing places to find authentic food, and letting us know about all of the activities taking place in the city. Communication was very quick and professional. Would definitely recommend for anyone who wants a great time in Sofia! It made our trip incredibly enjoyable.", "First time i used air B&B from the first message exchange with Radostin i know that i can be assure that he will do my visiting to be great. The apartment is located in the center, everything was as described. Radostin is a great host, he picked me from the air port and also organized me a reliable Taxi on the way back to the airport. He gave me many usefull advices and did his best. I will definately recommend to stay in his apartment and will come back again for sure. Thx", "The apartment was exactly as seen in the photos, if not better. It was very clean, cosy and spacious. The location is perfect if you don't mind walking a bit to the city centre (10-15 mins maximum), if not there is a bus stop close as well. Also, Radostin is the best host ever. He took us from the airport and brought us to the apartment even it was late at night, provided us with many information regarding transportation, places to see, things to do and of course, food! He was very friendly and helpful. Overall, I would definitely recommend this apartment to anyone who wants to have a pleasant stay in Sofia.", "The beautiful cozy apartment is central clean and with a perfect host who is willing to give you a deep city tour and provide you with anything you may need. Radostin is definitely a super host and an example for all hosts.. thanks again for the great accommodation!", "Everytging was great! Place is cozy, nice and just in walking distance from Alexander Nevskiy cathedral. In a sunny day you can enjoy breakfast on the balcony. Rado gave us a list of local places to eat and helped us to get a taxi to airport. Definitely recommended!", "The perfect option to stay in Sofia for your vacation", "Highly recommended :)", "Radostin is great host, really helpful and polite. He replies very fast and provide you with advices on public transport and what to see. 
His place is beautiful and perfect for 2 people. In appartement you can find kitchen with everything you need, some books and games for rainy days :) 
We are very happy with our experience and I would highly recommend this place to anyone :)
Thank you for everything again.", "Me and my boyfriend felt like home in Radostin's apartment. So tiny and lovely, everything extremely accurate and clean. Loved the little balcony where we enjoyed a wine with a candle every night. We also went several times for a drink or groceries shopping at the mall which you can see from the window, 1 minute walk. 
To go to the centre with all the main attractions we always took the taxi for like 4 minutes, as the walk would be for like 20. But the location itself is very good. Far from noises, close to shops and atm.  
The simple design of the house is very beautiful, giving a pleasant feeling of relax. 
The house has anything you basically  need, even slippers for walking in the house. 
Radostin is a very good person and always available in case of need. 
We'll come back to the beautiful Sofia and to his house for sure!", "Everything was good. Very sunny and good location.", "A great place, very clean, conveniently located. Rado was not able to welcome us but his mum was here and he promptly answered all our questions. parking in the neighbourhood is easy. We recommend it for short stay for  individual/couple in Sofia", "Superb hospitality, great communication with the owners, top location nearby the heart of the city. Extremely clean, fancy and cozy place that will make you feel like home. A great shopping area, close by the apartment, enables you to have everything necessary quickly and at high quality. You can find delicious traditional Bulgarian food, the latest European designers collections, pharmaceutical, and many other services. The lovely apartment is located at one of the ancient Sofia's street where you can either enjoy just walking to the top center of the city or trying French, Italian, or Bulgarian cuisine in the cozy restaurants that are located at the this street. Generally, the stay exceeded my expectations. For my next visit, I will be back there for sure!", "Rados apartment is in the fifth floor, well renewed and has everything a guest needs: a full equipped kitchen, a comfortable bed, two nice balconies and a professional secured front door. The flat is calm, so I could sleep with open windows. The whole house is renovated and the neighbors are calm and friendly. Wifi works perfectly. Rado is absolutely reliable, answers within minutes. He lives in the same house. The apartment isn't in downtown, but in a walking distance of twenty minutes. Around the corner is a shopping mall and a big grocery store from Billa. All in all: I felt quickly at home, and I would always rent Rados apartment again.", "This was a wonderful place to spend a couple days in Sofia. Great location, about a 20-minute walk to Alexander Nevsky Cathedral, extremely clean and comfortable, and the balcony was lovely. Radostin was a great host and responded to all my questions promptly.", "Rad has been a great host and communicating with him has been really easy at all times. His flat looked actually better than in the pictures, it was comfortable and really clean and he provided us with everything we needed: brochures, towels, gel, etc. Rad even showed us around the city and explained many historical details about the past of Sofia while he invited us to have a beer with him. He also helped us with the schedule for buses and other means of transport, so he was very helpful all the time. The last day he even invited us to try homemade rakia his family had made for him. We couldn't be happier after this stay in his nice apartment in Sofia, so we totally recommend it. We will see you in Valencia! Regards, Pablo and Ricard", "Rado's flat was very cozy and had everything what guests might need. Balconies, which we loved the most in his flat, have tables for a lovely coffee time. There will be almost every equipments you might need. Even there are slippers!
The location is not at the super center but you can experience the local life with a shopping center(just 2minutes walk), bakery, bank, cafe, beauty salon, pharmacies etc... nearby. It has quiet and friendly neighborhood and also you can easily reach the center on foot or public transportation. 
Our check-in time was almost midnight due to the flight delay. Rado thankfully waited for us for pick-up. 
During our stay, my friend had to go to the pharmacy for a painkiller late at night. Rado replied us immediately and  sent us the address of pharmacy nearby. He was always ready to give us help. :-)
We were lucky to stay at his place. I would definately stat at his place if I visit Sofia again ^_^", "The place was extremly nice: comfortable, spacious. The balcony was as cool as he described it, there was no chance to disappoint in anything. He was precise when we arrived (even though we late pretty much) and also helped with the leaving with the same precision. The apartment had a lot of small positive things that we appreciated it much (3in1 coffee, more towels, basic kitchen equipments and shopping bags(!) maps, etc.). It was basically as professional as a hotel room. 

The building is very well located, good starting point for a trip in the center but we could reach Vitosha with metro and bus easily. 

OFF: I would highly recommend the daily tickets for public transport. It's only 4 leva and we could reach many places with it. 

Finally big thanks to you Radostin for everything, if I road will lead back to Sofia I would choose it again. :)", "Had to come back to Sofia in a short period. Obvious choice was Radostin's place. Again a very comfortable stay and the host being professional and helpful. Recommend to everyone!", "The place is very clean, nicely renovated and is in a great center neighborhood. There is a big shopping center next to the building and most of the parks and must see places in Sofia are pretty close.
Rado and Vikki are nice, always replying within minutes to messages and always there to help.
As my flight was arriving at 2:30 a.m. they waited for me and even picked me up from the airport.
They gave me some great recommendations to walk trough the city and for a Bulgarian restaurant. I would definitely stay again with them!", "Nice and friendly neighbourhood. Radostin was a great host, looked after my needs at all times. The flat is cosy and comfortable. Good location, close to all amenities and the centre.Definitely recommend to all.", "Just great. Rado even printed my boarding pass :-)

 Couldn't be better

Juste parfait avec un rapport qualité prix génial.", "Прекрасные хозяева   , отличный сервис .", "Estoy muy agradecida por la amabilidad de Radostin y facilitarme la llegada tardía (de madrugada), así como el check out un poco más tarde de la hora prevista. El piso es muy acogedor y con las principales comodidades. Silencioso y soleado; con diseño elegante y minimalista; situado en el centro de la ciudad. 
La comunicación con Radostin en todo momento ha sido rápida y eficiente. ", "Очень милая и уютная квартирка в тихом центре Софии, идеально чисто и в квартире и в самом доме . В самой квартире все приспособлено и продумано для удобного быта: оборудованая мини-кухонька ,стиральная машина , два балкончика , уютная прихожая, большая гостиная .  На прилегающих улочках множество кафешек , кондитерских и ресторанчиков , а из окон гостиной виден роскошный торговый центр , для любителей покупок всех видов - от одежды до мебели ! Приятно прогуляться до центра пешком , рядом несколько парков , но есть и станция метро неподалеку. Идеальное место для визита в Софию .", "La ns. esperienza è stata perfetta. L'appartamento di Rado è super funzionale, con due balconcini carini, dove godere anche un pasto all'aperto. Appartamento su una strada che in due km è alla cattedrale di Nevsky, ma al tempo stesso tranquillo perché ben distanziato dalla strada. Servito dai mezzi pubblici, e soprattutto da tanti negozi nelle vicinanze oltre che da un super centro commerciale a 150 mt! Ma Sofia si può girare a piedi e la casa di rado è una base perfetta ad un prezzo veramente ok! Grazie", "A recommander ! Appart très bien situé  a côté dun tres grand centre commercial ! très propre !", "Appartement très fonctionnel et bien chauffé à proximité du coeur  de sofia que radostine nous a fait découvrir aucours d une bonne après midi en nous informant de l histoire de sa ville  avec beaucoups d engouements et plaisirs nous garderons un très bon souvenirs de notre voyage merci encore radostine pour ta disponibilité et gentillesse que du bonheur amar et myriam", "Es un increíble lugar ubicado en una excelente zona, Rado es un anfitrión increíble, con un lugar hermoso, limpio, espacioso, muy amable, siempre atento de lo que necesitáramos y atendiendo al instante. De verdad no pueden dejar de reservar con él.", "Alles war so wie wir es uns vorgestellt haben und zu unserer vollsten Zufriedenheit. Würde jedem Reisenden der nach Sofia möchte dieses Apartment empfehlen. Rado war auch sehr nett und ist auf jede Frage schnell eingegangen.", "Ho soggiornato in questo graziosissimo appartamento per 3 notti. Mi sono trovata veramente bene e' molto curato nei dettagli e dotato di ogni tipo di comfort sia nei prodotti trovati in  cucina che in quelli del bagno. Lo consiglio.", "位置很好,靠近市中心,环境安静｡附近有多个巴士站和电车站,出行方便｡旁边有大型超市和餐馆咖啡店,生活也方便｡
房间是新装修的,很干净漂亮,宽敞舒适,令人有在家的感觉｡
房东人很好,热情细心,有求必应｡
下次来索菲亚,我们还会住在这里｡这是一套性价比很高的民宿,我强烈推荐｡
"]
