reviews:
["Great space, excellent location and very responsive hosts. Highly recommend!", "Amazing place. Highly recommended!", "Awesome place. Enjoy Sofia in a cozy stylish way. 5*!", "As other reviews state, this is a fabulously decorated apartment (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication was good with Martin and Dasha and nice touches like a a bottle of wine on arrival and a city guide were much appreciated.  The bedroom is at the back of the apartment and is very quiet even though the apartment is centrally located. If you're hooked on coffee (I am) then there is a Costa in the park opposite and a Starbucks  on the left side of the park but there are also many fantastic bars and cafes in the streets behind the apartment.", "All perfect. 
Perfect location. Wonderfull house.", "Everything was top grade about this place.. Location, Facilities, Amenities, communication, checkin, public transportation, value etc. Definitely a great apartment to make your base while visiting Sofia.. Would highly recommend it.", "Wonderful, very cozy and stylish apartment. Very close to the metro.", "Hands down one of the best, if not best, places I have rented via Airbnb. Very stylish flat, in the center of the city, with amazing living space and everything you need for day to day activities. I will definitely rent again. Thank you Martin and Dasha for being amazing hosts!", "Top place", "beautifully stylish, well-situated place in the middle of everything in Sofia. thanks!", "Martin and Dasha's apartment was perfect in every respect. It is not only beautifully and modernly furnished, but also has all the everyday things you would expect in a household. The apartment is also located in the centre. Wherever you want to go, it's around the corner. I can only recommend this apartment!", "This place is GORGEOUS! Beautiful marble floors, lovely bathroom, full kitchen, nice TV, it's got it all! Wonderful location, super close to restaurants and bars, and right on the bus line (though we didn't use it as taxis are very cheap and easy to get). Check in was super easy, and hosts were very responsive. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Sofia and wished we had stayed longer!", "Martin and Dasha’s apartment was fantastic. It’s in a great location right next to Vitosha Blvd. Although it’s located on a busy street, the bedroom is at the rear of the apartment and is very quiet. The apartment is modern, spacious and very comfortable. Communication with Martin was easy and fast. I would highly recommend this apartment to other travellers.", "Close to the center, and public transport with a great view to the mountain", "Stylish apartment with a great location. Easy checkin. Highly recommended if you are looking for a place in the center. Quiet too.", "Very stylish place in the heart of Sofia. Wounderful place to stay.", "The flat was on the best possible location, very cosy, sparkling clean and with great view of the park. The co-host Boris was super flexible and welcomed us way past 2am as our flight was delayed. Really absolutely amazing Airbnb from top to bottom!  Thanks! ", "Martin and Dasha are always very responsive and are wonderful hosts. All of their apartments are very clean and stylish and they take a good care to make sure that they provide good experience to their guests. I had wonderful experience and would love to stay in any of their apartments again.", "We had an amazing time in Martin & Dasha's apartment. It was clean and beautiful and had a perfect location. We were welcomed with a sweet letter and some typical Bulgarian treats. Great place, great price and great hospitality! We highly recommend this apartment to anyone who wants to visit Sofia!", "This is my second stay at Marto's and Dasha's apartment. The apartment is wonderful, centrally located and quiet and Marto and Dasha are very responsive to their guests needs.  I highly recommend the apartment", "One of the best air B&B apartments we've ever stayed in. Spacious and bright, has everything you might need. Perfect location, too. The couch that's in the picture is not there any more, but there are 2 comfy chairs in the living room. The only complaint I had is that it wasn't clean - dust bunnies, hair (cat and human), cat food on the floor. For the price, I felt like it should be spotless. We never met Dasha, but she was very quick to reply to all our questions. Overall, we had a great time. ", "The apartment if beautiful (a perfect way to start relaxing) and Dasha and her friend Vanya were so helpful! I would highly recommend this apartment to anyone considering a trip to Sofia. 
Make sure you take an evening walk through the park across the road  - it is full of locals relaxing and enjoying their beautiful surrounds and is very safe.", "I had the best experience staying at Dasha's apartment. I really loved the decor which I found to be very classy, artistic and luxurious. The apartment was very comfortable and had all the creature comforts one can ask for. It has a very clean and pristine atmosphere and great lighting from both the light fixtures and the large window which opens onto the park showing you all the beautiful trees and plants around. The neighbourhood is amazing with great restaurants, shops and bars. Everything is at your fingertips and is the perfect choice if you want to have a wonderful place to stay in the heart of culture in Sofia. I would definitely decide to stay again for my next holiday. ", "The apartment is wonderful, quiet, it has a very nice vibe and it's centrally located. It has all amenedies, it does feel like home and it's extremly clean. Dasha is a wonderful host and always very accessible. I highly recommend staying in Dasha's apartment. ", "Die Wohnung ist perfekt gelegen in unmittelbarer Nähe von (auch nach deutschem Standard) richtig guten Restaurants und Bars. Wir waren sicherlich nicht das letzte mal dort.", "l appartement est très bien situé métro bus taxi . bruyant côté salon mais fenêtres bien isolantes et avec la climatisation c était ok. côté chambre incroyablement  calme . seul bémol impossible de se faire un café ", "El piso es ideal para una pareja. Está decorado con muy buen gusto y resulta muy acogedor. Además está muy bien situado junto a la calle principal del centro de Sofía y sin embargo es tranquilo. Muy recomendable.", "Bellissimo appartamento arredato con gusto, pulito e accogliente in pieno centro.
"]

reviews:
["You just can’t ask for better location. Cozy and comfortable. I strongly recommend :)", "The apartment was beautiful and the location is one of the best in Sofia....
Pretty much - everything that you can ask for :)", "Very clean and quiet place. Perfect location. Definitely recommend.", "Very nice, and very clean (spotless!) apartment. ", "The place is awesome, Hristina and her friends too. Everything from booking to checking in and out went nice and smoothly.

The place is very central, super close to public transport, restaurants, clubs, shops, etc. 
Totally recommended. ", "Excellent experience", "Xristina's place is a nice, clean, peaceful place with modern touches.", "Xristina’s place was great. Very good experience.", "Nice Stay. Totally recommend", "Thanks Xristina, for your help, for your fast answers and at least for the appartement. Entrance is creep. Location is good.
Mattres on bed was extrimly hard.", "Excellent location and a lovely apartment. 

The appearance of the building may leave much to be desired, but once inside the apartment it's a whole different story. The apartment is just 12 steps up from the ground floor, so no elevator is necessary. The apartment has clearly been renovated and looks modern and clean. There is even a radio in the bathroom. The apartment is as described and looks in the pictures. 

The location is excellent as it's a very short walk to the metro station, where you will find there a tourist information center, supermarket, etc. The apartment is also close to many tourist sites and restaurants. 

The communication with Xristina a easily and pleasant. We would gladly stay there again if we visit Sofia again.", "Xristina's appartment is conveniently located within walking distance of all major sites within Sofia. Also close to public transport and good restaurants.

The appartment itself is very well depicted in the advert. It is super clean and comfortable.

I will definitely stay there again in future.", "We had a lovely time there. Thanks", "Clean modern appartment in the heart of Sofia! ", "We had a very good time here. The accommodation was perfect. The host is very nice and helpful.", "Xristina's place really does look like the photos and even wows with little details like built-in radio/music in the bathroom. 
Location is also ideal as it is pretty central to everything in Downtown Sofia but at the same time it is not loud/busy at all. 

Had a great time staying at Xristina's and would do it again next time I am in Sofia! 

Alex", "Probably the best Air BnB I've ever stayed in. Cheap, central, clean, nicely furnished - cannot say a bad word about it.

Xristina was an excellent host, providing me with a guide of all the stuff to do and see in the city, checking us in bang on time, and providing some little sweetness like chocolates and proper coffee.

Look no further, stay here.", "Great apartment! Perfect location and it's worth it for the money ! Breath change to explore the city ", "My boyfriend and I spent two weeks at Xristina's apt.  We never met her personally, but her friend Bobby met us to welcome us and they were both quick to respond to messages.  The apartment is centrally located and comfortable for two people on longer stays.  The aircon was great as Sofia gets rather hot in summer.  We're actually heading back for a second shorter stay, and we're looking forward to returning.  ", "Absolutely amazing apartment right in the middle of it all!! Wouldn't hesitate to book Xristina's place again. Check in was a breeze and the apartment is exactly as described. Thanks!!", "I stayed in Xristina's apartment with my girlfriend whilst on a short, and thoroughly enjoyable, trip to Bulgaria. 

Xristina was a fantastic host in every sense. Needless to say, we will definitely be returning! ", "This is a really clean and comfortable flat in a good location. We walked almost everywhere, and the metro is very close for those destinations a little further afield. It is also nice and quiet for such a central location, with all the windows facing back into the courtyard.

Xristina was also a very professional host. When it turned out the hot water had been disrupted in large parts of Sofia she did everything possible to make our stay as comfortable as possible, as well as providing a discount. She was also flexible for check-in, sending a helpful friend when it turned out she could not meet me herself.", "Lovely apartment & great host. ", "we had a great time staying at this place! it was super clean, everything was just newly bought and redone, we were probably among the very first ones to use the space. we were welcomed by the host outside the house and have been given a tour - all very kind and nice. the area is super central, walking distance to all of the city's hot spots, shopping areas and going-out places. great place! exactly what we wished for. ", "The apartment was central and a perfect location for walking around the city. Massive selection of bistros and bars around, and plenty to see and do. ", "Great experience. Every thing was perfect ", "Appartment is nice and clean. The bed is quite hard though.", "Great apartment! The apartment is how it looks in the pictures.

It is well equipped (there are even speakers in the ceiling of the bathroom #showerparty) and the location is great - you are about a 10 minute walk from the start of the free Sofia Walking Tour (which I would highly recommend). ", "Overall, the experience was very good and the host great. ", "All was good.", "This was my second stay at Xrisitna's apartment - I guess there's no better recommendation I can provide. Monica, a friend of hers, welcomed us warmly and gave us a short introduction to the city. She was very friendly and helpful. The communication before, during and after our stay was perfect.

The apartment is very modern (though the building doesn't look like that from the outside), exceptionally clean (fresh sheets & towels) and well equipped (modern TV set, dish washer, washing machine, A/C, furniture). It is closely located to the metro (near the stadium), tram and busses. And if you're looking for nice places to eat, you'll find e. g. 'Made in Blue', 'The Little Things', or 'Skaptoburger' nearby.

I can only recommend Xristina's place. ", "Amazing place, located walking distance from various popular destinations. 
The flat was professionally cleaned (in fact the cleaner was finishing when we were checking in). It is spacious warm and modern. TOP TIP! Get yourself a flash drive with music or a cable for the phone, as there is a sound system in the bathroom which sounds great!
Xristina was a great host, who was replying to our emails almost immediately and made our stay very stress-free.   Definitely recommend this place :)", "This flat is awesome. It has everything we need to feel at home, everything works well, the location is perfect (you can walk everywhere). I will stay there again if I come back to Sofia. The apartment is well located near the center and near shops, restaurants and cafes. We walked to all centeral places up to 10 minutes. I would notice that apartment gets cold in winter seasons, should use the AC as heater and upstairs neighbors like to listen to loud TV ;) take your ear plugs with you!", "I only have good words about Xristina's apartment, as it was clean, modern, and well-equipped. All in all, a very nice experience, I can highly recommend this apartment as a place to stay in Sofia!", "Xristina's apartment was simply perfect! The aprtment is nicely renovated with all the amenities one can expect - and even more. For example: two air conditioners and two flat screen TVs with cable (in the main room and bedroom respectively)! WiFi worked perfectly.

Xrisitna's rep was totally accommodating: she left the keys at a nearby place convenient for me and allowed me to drop them off at a different place again.

reviews: ["The property is located conveniently and is very clean. Everything you need for a comfortable stay is present. The terrace is very cosy with a nice mountain and green area view. The place is quiet. Stairs area is clean and well maintained. The host is very responsive and hospitable.", "The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.", "Great location. Clean apartment, has everything you need to make your stay easy and enjoyable. Very secure and safe. Highly recommended !!! Thank you !!!", "Beautiful apartment, great location and communication from host was fast and reliable!", "Andrey is doing his best to respond quickly and provide best experience. The apartment is nice but gets very hot in the Summer and there is no air conditioner. He provides a big fan but that doesn't help much. Bathroom drain is either not designed well or clogged because you cannot use the shower in full stream. Also shower is somewhat inconvenient to use. Other than that - great location, safe and nice look from the balcony.", "Beautiful apartment with a very luxurious balcony and a great view of Vitosha mountain. Perfect base to see both the different parts of the city and the nature around it. A very quiet residential area, but easily accessible by public transport. Didn't meet Andrey, but he was quick and helpful when needed, and his mother welcomed me into the apartment and was kind and friendly. Highly recommended!", "We lived with my girlfriend in this flat. Andrey's mum met us in front of the house. She showed everything in the apartment. The apartment is very spacious and large. All you need is found in the apartment. On the balcony you can sunbathe in sunny weather. Also, Andrey's mum helped us to get to the Airport. Thank you very much for the good welcome!", "Un appartement tr\u00e8s agr\u00e9able dans un cartier calme. Les h\u00f4tes sont vraiment gentils, difficile a demander plus. Notre fille a fait un s\u00e9jour tr\u00e8s agr\u00e9able a Sofia, en grande partie gr\u00e2ce a Andrey et sa mama.", "L'appart d'Andrey est spacieux et bien \u00e9quip\u00e9. Il se situe \u00e0 2 pas du tramway, et des commerces. Nous avons \u00e9t\u00e9 accueilli par la m\u00e8re d'Andrey, elle a \u00e9t\u00e9 charmante."]

["Really nice and cozy place with a great location.", "The host was really helpful. Very stylish and cozy place.", "What a great cosy flat in the perfect centre. Just loved it!", "The apartment is located in the hypercentre of Sofia, all movements can be made on foot. Trifon is a kind host available to travellers. I recommend! :)", "Very kind host! He made our visit a pleasure for us. The apartment is a real flower in the heart of Sofia. An incredible location, close to everything you need. Nearby are the best restaurants and pubs in the city. The apartment is very clean, tidy and cozy. Has everything you need! I recommend it to anyone who wants a pleasant stay in the capital.
Thank you, Trifon!", "Great apartment! in the top center of Sofia,  1 min walk from the main street, but still very quiet. Trifon is an amazing host, who answer very fast and always wanted to help. highly recommend on this apartment !", "all guest please keep the house clean.  and put the book back if you used . don't touch bamboo plants.  in the kitchen there is amazing plant check if she need water a little bit. keep the photos on the same place and if you have special one you can keep it. wishing you the best.", "Clean and beautiful apartment in the heart of Sofia, top facilities and great host!", "Great place and well located! Had everything i needed! Thank u", "Trifon was a great host, and it was very fast communicating with him  His place is centrally located and would definitely recommend staying there.", "really stylish place, with a great location. Trifon was very easy and quick to communicate with.", "Everything was exactly like the pictures. The apartment is very clean and tidy. Trifon was very kind and the communication was great. I highly recommend it!", "A very nice and clean place in a location just in the centre of the city. The owner was very helpful and with very quick response time to my messages. The neighbourhood was quiet and with many facilities nearby. I suggest you try it. Sofia is a lovely city.", "Super!", "Everything as described, good communication with the host", "Trifon's place is located right off of Vitosha in Sofia's center and is stylish and clean. We had a wonderful stay and would highly recommend it. Ideal for people who want to be right in the center and be able to walk to all of the museums, galleries, and nightclubs :D", "Super host, flat is in super center near walking street. Top communication.", "The location was perfect. All the places we wanted to go to were in a walking distance. 
The place was really neat. Trifon was a great host! He could answer all our questions and helped getting us a taxi to get to the airport.

Tip for the vegetarians: Go to Sun and Moon on "small 5 corners", the food is delicious! Only vegetarian food and they also have very yummy pies/cake! Vegan as well.", "A very nice flat in a fantastic location!  Definitely would stay here again.", "Very nice apartment in a perfect location to explore the city. In a quite area and in a walking distance from the main sightseeing and with many close options for restaurants and cafés. 15 mins by cab from the airport or easily reachable by subway if you land at terminal 2. Well furnished apartment with a lot of natural light. Communication with Trevor was always fast, effective and easy. Highly recommended.", "Trifons place is not far from main attractions and extremely close to where the free walking tour meets! The shower was a little smaller than expected but perfect for a short stay. Trifon gave very detailed entry instructions which were helpful upon arrival. I felt very safe in the flat. Overall a lovely place to stay! ", "The best position to reach every corner of Sofia. The apartment was very clean and Trifon was very kind for my every request and offer a very fast communication.
I suggest to every who wants to visit Sofia.  ", "It has been the perfect house for us. Just few minutes walking from Serdika station and the Vitosha boulevard, in a quiet and nice area where there are typical shops and restaurants. The house was very clean and well designer. We'd go there again next time in Sofia. ", "We had a happy few days at Trifon's apartment. Everything was clean and in order, and the location is very handy. Pudimos alargar la hora de Check out según nuestras necesidades, fueron muy hospitalarios", "Bastante aceptable y bien comunicado. Quizás el único defecto que hacía un poco de frío y la única forma de calentar la habitación es con un aparato de aire caliente y que el agua caliente de la ducha tardaba muchísimo en salir. Por lo demás todo bien y la comunicación con los anfitriones muy buena.", "Appartamento minimale con tutto il necessario per qualche notte. Ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo. Letto matrimoniale comodo e vicino alla finestra. Cucina con fornelli elettrici, forno a microonde, frigorifero e lavatrice.
E' situato a circa 5 minuti a piedi dalla via centrale Vitosha e dalla fermata metro NDK e circa 15 minuti da Serdika.
Consigliato", "L'appartamento è centralissimo e la  pulizia impeccabile. Lyudmilla e Rado sono stati molto ospitali, gentilissimi e veloci nella comunicazione. Super consigliato vivamente a tutti coloro che intendono visitare la città di Sofia!", "Le loft est très bien. Lyudmila et son fils sont vraiment de très bons hôtes ! Nous avons beaucoup apprécié leur hospitalité. Nous recommandons sans hésiter.", "Die Wohnung ist sehr modern eingerichtet. Zwar nicht sehr groß, aber für ein oder zwei Leute vollkommen ausreichend. Ich habe mich sehr wohl gefühlt. Allerdings muss man gut zu Fuß sein, da es keinen Aufzug gibt und man in der 7. Etage wohnt ;-) 

Die Lage ist ganz gut, zu den wichtigen sehenswürdigkeiten muss man allerdings 1.5 km Fußweg in Kauf nehmen, was bei gutem Wetter aber kein Problem ist.

Der Gastgeber war sehr zuverlässig und hat mich für 10 Euro auch vom Flughafen abgeholt!", "Leiligheten til Lyudmila er en veldig fin og sentralt plassert. Nær de fleste attraksjonene som er i gå avstand. Leiligheten er i 6 etasje uten heis. Kan godt anbefale denne leiligheten.", "L'appartamento è fedele alle immagini e alla descrizione: centrale (5 minuti dal viale principale), nuovissimo, pulitissimo e silenzioso, molto ben fornito di biancheria, vettovaglie e wifi. Lyudmilla e suo figlio Rado due persone deliziose e disponibili, sempre pronti a dare aiuto e suggerimento. Accoglienza con sorriso, e in casa c'era persino della frutta fresca! Unico dettaglio che forse nn è ben specificato: l'appartamentino è al quinto o sesto senza ascensore: lo dico nn perchè sia stato un grosso problema (anzi ho adorato trovarmi all'ultimo piano), ma per coloro che nn sono in vema d'esercizio ☺ Se dovessi tornare a Sofia, senza dubbio mi affiderei di nuovo a Lyudmilla!", "Hebben een heerlijk verblijf gehad. Het appartement ligt heel erg dicht bij de drukste winkelstraat, de ontvanger is ook heel erg gastvrij en wil je graag helpen. Zeker aan te raden, erg goede prijs / kwaliteit verhouding. ", "Está muy bien ubicado, al lado de la calle principal y al lado de una parada de metro. Muy bien equipado y confortable, ideal para 2 personas. Además, todo se ve igual que en las fotos. "]

reviews:
["Maybe for the 3rd or 4th time at Exotic app and everything was just great.Thank you for the hospitality and see you again.", "I rented this apartment for my  wife's parents and everything was great. It looks even better than on the pictures. You have everything you need and it is very clean. Close to mertro station Alexander Malinov and a few nice restaurants. I recommend it.", "The place is just great. The location is very convenient, around 5 minutes away from the metro, with lots of shops and restaurants around, while at the same time a few meters away from all the noise. 
However, two things really distinguished it for me from all the other small apartments in the Mladost area (in which I've stayed, at least). One is that there is a full-size living area in which one can actually sit down and have a beer or watch some TV after a hard day's work. Second is that the place was really sparkling clean, no dust/trash/hair whatsoever and the linen looked, felt and smelled clean as well. 
 The rest is equally good, amenities are all one could hope for, communication and check-in are as hassle-free as possible. Next time when I need to travel to Sofia, this will be my place of choice for sure.", "Great place to stay. Thank you.", "Clean and tidy apartment with good location in the capital.", "I recommend it. The apartment offers every necessity you'd expect of an everyday home. And other than a few minor issues, is a great deal.", "I highly recommend Dimitar's place. It was clean and like he said "with exotic touch".", "Great host, great place, clean and very cozy. Thank you, Dimitar.", "Dear all,
Dimitar’s home is great. Top location, very clean and comfortable.  Enjoyed my stay very much!", "Great place!", "Big and spacious. Very clean and fresh.", "Really great, convinient and clean! Very stylish.", "Everything was fine. Very clean. Near metrostation. Parking Place", "Very cozy and clean place. Responsive and nice host. It is near a subway station.
Good value for the money.", "The place is very nice and clean, has everything necessary and is very close to a metro station. The host is very kind.", "Димитър се оказа страхотен домакин,точен коректен и много любезен!Апартамента е чист ,спретнат ,уютен , топъл и предлага всички удобства,че дори и по-вече! Намира се на тихо и спокойно място , с голям паркинг , в блока има пицария и магазин ,а зад блока “Хепи”! Благодарности на домакините ,които направиха престоя ни в София още по приятен! Горещо препоръчвам апартамента на всички,които имат нужда от подслон в столицата!", "The apartment was very clean and warm.  It´s very close from the metro station.
Dimitar and Radka are great hosts and very helpful. Thank you", "A graet place, exactly as described.", "Изключително приятно, уютно и чисто място.  Горещо препоръчвам! При нужда отново ще го посетя.", "It was great for my business trip, but I think it would be great for other purposes too. Clean, comfortable and have everything i need. Next time I will use it again.", "Перфектно място. Уютно, чисто с всичко необходимо. Препоръчвам на всеки.", "Идеален за цената, комуникативно разположен, добре оборудван и чист апартамент.", "Perfect and helpful host", "Чист уютен апартамент бих посетил отново препоръчвам го .", "Its my second time in the apartment, everything was even better than before :)", "Had a great weekend. The apartment was clean and had everything we needed. The area is nice and calm with many shops and restaurants around. The subway is also near by. Really enjoyed our stay there. Many thanks to the hosts.", "Place was great, there are all kind of shops nearby.Everything was clean and neat, the apartment is huge there is everything you need :)", "Dimitar was a great host! He could be reached immediately and he responded our emails within a day. The apartment was very clean and he even prepared essential for the guests. The location is perfect - close to shops,  big supermarket, restaurants and public transport! We will definitely visit again :) ", "Great, clean place with everything you need, for more than reasonable price. We really enjoyed staying in Radi's apartment and would highly recommend it to everyone reading this.", "Nice apartment near the metro station, big supermarket and Happy restaurant in the walking distance. Just 4 stops by subway from the airport.", "Dimitar's place is exactly as described. It's well equipped, very clean, comfortable and funcitonal.
It's great value.
Communicating with Dimitar was very easy and he provided detailed and clear info for the self-checkin which is very convenient.", "We've found the place quite easy. As we entered the apartment I was nicely 3 about cosy and renovated groundfloor. We got what we've needed. It's gold in middle-class", "Dimitar is an excellent host. Everything was perfect.  Hi was available all the time when we needed him. his apartment was very clean and tidy. We will definitely visit him again.", "Unbelievable clean, i think most clean from all apps i have book via airbnb, very friendly host with immediate answers, space for the car next to app (public) 5' from metro station and 20' with metro from centrum..and for last but not least veeeeery quiet place..reccomended 101%", "All is conform to the description. Dimitar answers very quickly to your questions. We were very well in his appartement, direct access by metro to center and to the airport", "the place is hard to be found , it is in ground floor (ex store ?) no windows, if you open the door  you smell the cars from the parking area , the beds are bad -not comfortable and noise , the place is very clean and with all you can need ", "Quiet, modern and clean place in one of my favorite Sofia neighborhoods, Mladost.  The people here are very friendly and there are lots of good and  inexpensive places for breakfast lunch and dinner.  You will not need to do any cooking.  Well served by the nearby metro, and with a very pleasant and flexible host.  I strongly recommend.", "We had a great stay at Dimitar's place. He helped us a lot even after we had departed the place which we appricacete a lot. Location is super convenient since everything you need is nearby.  ", "Dimitars' apartment is located very conveniently for the airport and the city. Taxi fare from the airport is about 3.5 euro. There are 2 metro stations about 10 minutes walk (Website hidden by Airbnb) line links the city with the airport.  We felt quite safe in the  area in the evening. There are a number of  restaurants and cafes nearby and a large supermarket 5 minutes walk away that is open till late. The apartment itself was as described, very clean, comfortable and quiet.  We thought it was great value and we had a lovely two days in Sofia.  We would stay here again if we return to Sofia. Thanks Dimitar.", "We had a great time in Sofia. The apartment was spacious, clean and cosy. Alsi very nearby are a lot of shops and restaurants. Metro is only a 5 minutewalk away. All together a very good place to stay during your visit in Sofia. ", "We were really satisfied with the host and accommodation. The apartment was clean and very cosy. Dimitar was helpful and the location was great (restaurants and markets nearby, close to the airport). 100% recommended", "Great spot ! It was really clean and cosy. Close to metro station, restaurants, supermarket. I totally suggest !", "Recommended.", "Dimitar was a great host, and really helpful during the check in. He was available for any question we had since the check in was automatic and we didn't really get the chance to actually meet.
The place was clean, functional for everything you might need during the stay. Dimitar thought of the small details, like a charger for your phone in case you bring your usb cable only, slippers, several power outlets near the night table in the bedroom for charging phones... There is a parking right in front of the apartment, and the apartment has a separate entrance on the ground floor. The internet was awesome (25/20 mbps) and really came in handy for our needs. The location really worked for us, plus nearby you have a lot of restaurants and The Mall of Sofia. All in all, it's a great value for money.", "The apartment is close to the airport and city center approximately 15 minutes away each way by taxi and metro. There is a nice restaurant and a supermarket near by. There is also a playground for kids just opposite the apartment. The apartment is very clean and spacious. Dimitar responded to my queries promptly. I highly recommend everyone his apartment. We will stay in his apartment again in the future.", "Everything was done to make us all feel welcome! Nice and clean flat! Good location! Our host was very friendly and helpful! Definitely we will be back soon! 
Thank you Dimitar!", "Great place to stay in Sofia. I recommend  it and definitely will stay there again. ", "Very clean place, looks like new, just around the corner from Billa supermarket and Underground station, 6 minutes walk to traditional Bulgarian restaurant and lots of little shops. Dema sports club  is five minutes away, perfect for recreational holiday. Will stay here again", "Very nice place. Clean and very practical. We'll come back ...", "Everything wonderful", "Quite, clean and nice place.
Close to many shops, restaurant and the metro Station in Mladost 3.
Recommended!!", "Beautyfull and cosy house with tasteful minimal decoration, in a quiet area.", "I booked Dimitar’s place for my Mother visiting me, I’m living few meters away. It has been the best choice ever.
The house is extremely comfortable, warm and super clean, it has really everything to make your stay perfect and it’s 5 mins walk from two metro stops taking you to the center. 
Quiet and lovely furnished is the kind of place you can stay in for weeks feeling even better than home. 
We will book it again when we have more guests coming over.

Highly recommended", "Dimitar's place was excellent! It was plenty for the 4 of us for a weekend trip. The place was very clean and Dimitar as a host was helpful and friendly. The neighborhood was safe and only a 5 minute walk to the metro station. A metro trip into center city Sofia is only 30 minutes from his place.", "The apartment is a little outside the city center, but it is close to a metro station. It is a five minute walk from the apartment. The apartment was quiet and clean with a comfortable bed. The washer and dryer were nice to have. It was a good place to stay.", "Smještaj je jako dobro uređen, upravo kako je na slikama,jako zgodno za manju obitelj, stanica metro je blizu, taxi do aerodroma je 3eura, blizu je Billa trgovina i pizzerija.", "The apartement was just perfect! We spent unfortunately just 2 nights there, but seriously we wished , we could stay longer. Everything went perfectly, the communication, the check-in, check-out. The accomodation is tidy and nicely decorated, has everything what you need. We had even a bigTV, lots of shops in the neighbourhood, a metro station in a 5 minutes walk. We can just recommend this apartement! It´s a great one!", "Everything was ok. I recommend you the place.", "Very nice and comfortable apartament. Very good equipped. Dimitar very kind and helpful!", "Stayed at Dimitar's twice. Dimitar is a good host, met us at check in and explained everything. His place is very clean and tidy. There are quite a few shops around and not too far from supermarkets and Sofia Mall.", "great place! very good communication with city center and airport, close to metro station. Dimitar is very nice and helpful person!", "A great host with an amazing apartment. Fab kitchen equipment, expensive stuff. Immediate location of apartment is a little strange as the inside of apartment is top notch and outside does not do it justice. However it is close to numerous shops and a shopping mall and we will be returning for a few nights next month.", "It was great to stay in Dimitar's apartment. It was spacious, had air conditioning, washing and cooking acilities and was really close to three train stations. Dimitar was a great host, he was very helpful, welcoming and informative. I would definitely recommend stay here to anyone.", "Great place, convenient location, wonderful host.", "I recomand you Dimiter hous.", "The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.", "Clean Place . Very good conection to the city center. Thank You very much Dymitar. I recomend this place!!!!", "We had an excellent stay in Dimitars appartement. At the check-in, he could even pick u's up from the location we were being dropped at in Sofia. The appartment is close to the metro and to some good restaurants. Dimitar recommended us restaurant Happy, which is veel good. With the metro the appartement is only a few stops from the airport.", "Много уютно местенце, чисто, удобно. На комуникативно място, близко до метро. В квартала има абсолютно всичко, както и в апартамента. Препоръчвам горещо.", "Great place. 1st time using Airbnb,  and our host made us really feel at home. A little far from the center but one main road very close by and you'll be there in 13 minutes or less. The A/C unit kept the whole appt very cold. There was I think a 60' inch TV with both English and Bulgarian channels.  Over all I would recommend it.", "Dimitar was amazing! He goes above and beyond in assisting his guests. My friends and I arrived after midnight. He personally gave us a ride to the flat, so we would not get lost in a cab. Moreover, his place is fully equipped with anything you need - kitchen,washing, heater, etc. It is a short walk to multiple dinning areas and grocery store (Billa) - about a 5 min walk. The metro is around the corner, 5 mins walking. It comes directly from the airport and is only 4 stops from city center. I would highly recommend this Airbnb for anyone coming to Bulgaria. ", "The apartment was very clean, well equipped and very convenient. Though its location is out of the center, it is close to Mladost 3 metro station, bus 84 to the airport and a big Bila supermarket. The communication with Dimitar was great and he even came to meet us at the metro station for picking us up to the apartment. 
The whole experience was beyond our expectations, so I highly recommend staying at this apartment.", "The apartment is further away from the centre than what I expected, but if you are with a car as we were this will not pose any problems. Mall, grocery shops and restaurants are close by. The apartment was nice and clean.", "The place is great. It's actually much better than even advertised. I really enjoyed my time at Dimitar's place. Very family friendly place. It's clean and safe, convenient, parking provided, washer and dryer, super fast wifi, stuff for cooking and whatnot, just everything you need to feel at home. Thank you for a pleasant stay, Dimitar and I would rent your cozy place again soon. ", "The flat was amazing. It was within walking distance of 2 metro stations and dimitar was so helpful he picked us up late at 10pm from the airport and showed us around. The flat was bigger in real life and was a pleasant stay.", "The place was great and I strongly recommend it. The host was very kind and helpful.", "Dimitar is a very nice host. I recommend him for kindly.", "The flat is close to the metroline and also to the shops.", "The apartment was very clean and cozy. The housekeeper was very kind and friendly. Everything was much better than the expected. 
5/5 from us ! Enjoy", "Dimitar is very friendly host, we loved our stay at his place. The whole apartment was brand new, comfortable, clean and functional. The location is little bit off, but it's well connected with public transport/taxi and great thing was the free parking place nearby. There are supermarkets, malls, shops and restaurants nearby, and it was very easy to find the address using (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps navigation. Great choice! ", "Our stay at Dimitars apartment was perfect. Dimitar was very helpful when he met us with the keys and showing us around.The place was very clean and new. There are many restaurants, shops around walking feet. We will definitely return again.
", "Our stay at Dimitar's place was perfect. The flat is new, and it is very well equiped. It is very close to the metro station and also to the airport. Dimitar is a very nice percion, he came to see us at the metro station to make it easier to find his flat. Looking forward to stay there again! :)", "The house itself was so clean, so modern pretty good, wifi, super modern shower the best part of the house, we strongly recommend it, full of ammenities and subway nearby downtown! 

We will return it soon!!! ", "The apartment has good transport connections. You need approximately 20 min to be in the city. It was very clean and you have a very good WiFi-Connection. The host, Dimitar, and his family are super hospitable. They were so nice and propose to give us a lift to the airport. It wasn't needed, because the metro is 5 min by foot and has a direct connection to the airport. They also gave us candies as a welcome gift. I would highly recommend this apartment.", "Dimitar is an awesome host. He waited for us even on the street when we couldn't find him on our first try. We were actually just next to his apartment. Apartment is very clean, has all the amenities of a normal household. He provided clean towels, even tooth paste and shower gel :) Overall very pleased with our stay. Thanks Dimitar again for making our trip to Sofia enjoyable.", "Ok location. Good place. Very good host. 1 km to very big mall.", "Dimitar has made an extra effort decorating/furnish the apartment and perfect cookware (I love cooking). 5 min walk to restaurants, shopping and the metro (directly to either airport or center).
Dimitar was very smiley and helpful both before and during the stay.
The apartment is very local in between blocks and everyday life. Quiet and I felt safe. I was dancing in a dance studio nearby, so for me the location was just perfect.", "Great host!  The apartment looks great and only five minutes walk to the metro station some restaurants and grocery stores ", "За втори път отсядаме в апартамента на Димитър и отново всичко беше безупречно. Има всичко необходимо, за да се чувстваш като у дома си. Кварталът е спокоен с много зелени площи за разходка, пазар, магазини...Предвижването из града е много удобно, използвайки близката метро станция. Определено при следващото ни пътуване ще отседнем там.", "Чудесен апартамент на много добра цена. Много чисто и уютно място. На първия етаж е, което е много удобно за настаняването. Има достатъчно място за паркиране, ако сте с кола. В близост има много магазини и ресторанти, а метро станцията е в непосредствена близост, което е много удобно за придвижването в града. Домакинът е много отзивчив и комуникацията с него е лесна. Препоръчвам апартамента на Димитър и бихме го посетили отново.", "Świetna lokalizacja - blisko do metra (centrum 10 min). Apartament czysty, nowoczesny. Gospodarz bardzo uczynny, dobra komunikacja.", "Квартира нам очень понравилась. Она была чистой, уютной, светлой и тёплой (это актуально в ноябре). Все, что необходимо для комфортного проживания в ней имелось. Расположение тоже очень удачное, рядом большой супермаркет Вилла, кафе и много мелких магазинов. 
Минус пожалуй только один: квартиру трудно найти, в инструкции по заселению указан неверный адрес. Пришлось минут 20 поискать.
С парковкой проблем не было, возле дома всегда было свободное место.", "L'appartamento è veramente carino. La sua posizione è comoda in quanto, nonostante si trovi in periferia,  la metro vicina permette un rapido e veloce collegamento con il centro città.", "Super ! Gute Alternative zu Hotels", "Impec! Appartement spacieux et fonctionnel, très proche d’une station de métro. A recommander", "Es un apartamento que tiene todas las necesidades y si no necesitas estar todo el tiempo en el centro de la ciudad, está bien. Es limpio y tienen detalles como lo básico para estar cómodo. Gracias", "Appartement bien conçu et fonctionnel. Bien situé. Dimitar  a fourni précisément les détails pour trouver facilement la location et a organisé un  accueil efficace par le biais de sa soeur. Séjour agréable", "L’appart est a 5mn à pied du métro  Mladost 3.
 1,60leva. Deux lignes. Très facile d’accéder au centre et aéroport. Les gens sont vraiment gentils et aident à tous moments (en anglais ou même en’ bulgare). 
Dimitar est un tres bon hôte : l’appartement est d’une proprete exemplaire, tout ce dont on a besoin y est. Le lit est confortable, appartement très proche du supermarché Billa, restaurants. La rue est très sombre la nuit,mais Dimitar a prévu un spot lumineux à sa porte. Très très satisfaite de mon séjour. Blogodaria Dimitar", "Gran anfitrión, muy buen apartamento.Bien comunicado.", "Благодаря исключительному гостеприимству, пунктуальности и атмосфере доверия со стороны хозяина квартиры,пребывание нашей семьи  в Софии было исключительно комфортным. Квартира оказалась стильной и удобной, всё, что касалось быта, было продумано до мелочей. Димитр постоянно интересовался о том,  всё ли нас устраивает. Однозначно рекомендуем всем, кому нужна квартира во время пребывания в Софии, обращаться к Димитру - вы не пожалеете!", "Excelente anfitrión Dimitar.Muy buena ubicación el piso.cerca del metro y del centro.muy cómodo y muy limpio.muy tranquilo el barrio.fue muy placentera nuestra estancia en Sofia."]

reviews:
["Great location, very well-designed apartment. Had everything I could ask for.", "The apartment is bright, clean and very modern. The kitchen is very well equipped. The apartment is located in the heart of Sofia. Alex is really helpful and did his best. I definitely reccomend the apartment!", "The apartment is bright and clean, and it has got everything a person may need in order to feel at home. The kitchen is very well equipped indeed, unlike many other places, where the host claims it is, but actually it is not. Last but not least, the apartment is very close by the crowded places yet, it is located in a relatively calm area in the centre of Sofia. 
Alex has been very responsive and helpful, and he had prepared a detailed guide about all sorts of different places in Sofia. ", "Modern and stylish apartment, Alex was a great host, helpful and speedy responses. Highly recommended!", "Great location, very smooth communication and great organisation of the check in and check out processes. It is a small place but the space is utilised very smartly, so there is no feel of narrowness. It was a great pleasure to stay there. Thank you so much Alex!", "- The host is great, he thought on every detail to make the stay cosy .
- On site you have free parking from 19:30h until the morning to 8:30h, and if you want to move your car, there are 4 parking places at a distance of only 200m away. After that you could move you car 200m further. They cost around 0,5€/h throughout  the day.
- The apartment is on the 5-th floor the building doesn’t have an elevator, so little workout is always good for the heart :)
- The location is great, its 5min walk to the center.", "value for money , great apartment, friendly Alex , super location", "Was a good stay at Alex‘ appartment! Definitely recommended for a trip to Sofia", "Lovely place in super central location! Everything that you need is in there! Alex is very friendly, helpful and explained all that we need it. Lovely bakery just opposite of the property. I would greatly recommend it to anyone who wants to get to know Sofia and relax in a nice place.", "The apartment is nice but the area is not so good specially if you are travelling in your own.", "great place, really modern. good location downtown close to interesting locations, the subway and many trams. ", "This "smart" apartment was perfect for the two of us on our weekend away. The bed was comfortable, which I didn't fully expect, given that it ejects from the wall. We didn't cook our own meal, but there was enough equipment available if we would've wanted to. Check in and check out were perfect, and even though we didn't see Alex in person, communication was quick and easy. The extra added PDF's with basic information about the apartment and tips about the city were also very nice. It was a 5 minute walk from the main metrostation Serdika, which allowed us to go wherever, but overall everything is walkable. Highly recommended!", "couldn't have asked for a better location and a better host! alex was super attend to us and was always there to help us out, definitely he gives the extra mile to make you feel comfortable, and  his guide maps were superb! best place to stay in sofia no questions asked", "Super clean, comfy and modern flat. It was really so nice and cosy and we enjoyed our stay so much. The host is super kind and the place is in top location. We highly recommend it :)", "cool and stylish apartment, center location and great value for money! highly recommended! ", "The apartment is simply awesome, it has everything you need and more. It is small but it is really modern and fashion. For a couple, even with a baby boy like us, is big enough. The location is really good as well, we did everything walking. I would back definitely ", "Alex's place is very nice. he does a great job to make you feel welcome and the flat is very nice and in a close location to central. ", "Lovely apartment with modern, high-tech, comfortable facilities in a convenient location. Alex was a pleasure to deal with - fast, clear communications and he shared a comprehensive information package - very useful for first time visitors to Sophia.", "The apartment was very beautiful, clean and near the center. The host was very helpful and available to answer any question we had. I highly recommended it.", "We’re really enjoyed our staying in Alex’s apartment, he was really helpful and whatever we needed he helped us . The apartments are modern, check in was also very easy. I would definitely recommend this place!", "Alex's place is lovely and the location is perfect! So clean and nice to stay in, really good value for money! I'll definitely come back here when I go back to Bulgaria.", "Great location to experience the local life of Sofia, the room was clean, modern and perfect for our stay and once more such a thoughtful and helpful host! Thank you", "The appartement is very nice,cosy and renovated.Everything inside is brand new and full of technology!It’s a less than 5 minutes walk from the metro station Serdika that is connected with all metro (Website hidden by Airbnb) easy to go to the airport since it’s about 20 minutes from Serdika station.Also,very close to the city center,about 10 minutes walk.Alex,the owner is more than helpful,sending us maps,useful information,public transport’s timetable,Sofia’s sightseeing and much more!!!Always available and happy to help!Congratulations,we really enjoyed our stay and we definately reccomend your place!!!", "Near the touristic center of Sofia, clean, very good instructions and tips and a very good coffee bar right on the opposite of the street to start your day with.  I would advice this place for anyone visiting Sofia.", "The place is really new and clean, good location and centre in a walking distance, Alex was extremely helpful, generous and kind. Absolutely recommend this place.", "What a great place and what a great host. Alex thought of everything for you. He made my trip to Sofia very pleasant. He responds very quickly to messages and he gave great tips.
The apartment is luxurious with some electronic enhancements.
Great location. Would love to return to this place.", "Very comfortable appartement, good location and easy access! Alex’s appartement is perfect for couple, small and welcoming, I definitely recommended this place to stay in Sofia", "Nice place to stay. Good location 5 minutes walking distance to city centre and serdika metro station. Very clean and modern flat. Friendly host Alex.", "This is a lovely apartment! Very close to the metro and near stuff to do. Would highly recommend this apartment to anyone looking for a cozy and highly functional apartment to stay.", "Would definitely recommend Alex’s place for a nice stay in Sofia. Very clean, hi-tec and a wonderful cosy space. Except that, Alex has prepared thorough guidelines and tips to get around Sofia and find enjoyable places.", "If there's one word which describes Alex's flat the best it would be "perfection". The Flat is not only located perfect in the centre of Sofia but also better equipped than all the vacation apartments I've been so far. There are so many little details like the homelike kitchen equipment, a suitcase scale, all the basic kitchen and bathroom accessories and supplies you can dream of, the tv with international channels and many more. I would rate the apartment equal to an 4-Star german hotel room.", "The place is in great location, easily accessible, convenient. Very clean, easy access to public transport, restaurants and bars. Alex was a great host, very quick to respond.  Would highly recommend!", "Alex place is just perfect...little,new,central,clean,tech and confy. You have all you need as at home! We highly recommend Sofia and Alex place!!!", "Good value for money. Good location. Minor detail if you are not in great shape: the apartment is on the fifth floor and there is no elevator.", "Alex has shown over-the-top attention to detail in restoring the Sunny Sofia flat. The place has all the amenities a traveler requires. The flat is in a convenient location close to the city center and the beautiful churches and parks of Sofia. It's on the same street as the Ladies Market so good local food is a short walk away.", "Amazing, modern apartment with everything you could need and more. Spotlessly clean and in a great location. Alex was very responsive to our messages and provided excellent information about how to find the apartment and things to do in and around Sofia. Thank you for a great stay!", "This cosy apartment is centrally located with a multi-ethnic neighborhood. The apartment is quite small but the host Alex makes it like a very nicely managed 4-star hotel. Alex is very helpful and warm, showing up at the time of check-in, which alleviated lots of my anxiety of high-tech check-in procedures. Thumbs up for Alex and his Sunshine Sofia! Sofia is a fabulous garden-city, a true gem full of surprises!", "Great host, highly recommended", "Great appartement near the center of Sofia. Alex is a very friendly host and ready to help if a problem arises. We had an amazing stay.", "Alex's place was cosy, clean and close to bars and restaurants. The flat was modern and everything was easy to use. There were many basic necessities there when we arrived which was perfect for us as we had been travelling for over 10 hours. In addition, Alex was quick to respond with messages and came to help us when the SmartLock didn't work.  ", "Alex doing a great job and suply you all the information, tips and stuff you'll need. 
The house is clean and well equipped.", "The place is nice and very well located, with all what is needed to be comfortable. No problems with the self check in. Very recommended.", "The host canceled this reservation 67 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.", "My second stay here. Perfect apartment and host. Everything you need to feel comfortable after a long day of sightseeing and exploring Sofia. Attention to detail. Instant response. If you're looking for a great value and a guaranteed "feels like you're living in Sofia" experience, look no further!", "High-tech creature comforts combined with convenience and comfort make this an ideal lodging. And Alex is great — immediately responsive, friendly and attentive. Highly recommend!", "Alex's house is the best house I've ever stayed in. Perfect for two people; situated in the center of the city and near the metro line. Alex's check in procedure was extremely easy to do, and the guides provided were very helpful in so many ways. The house was very clean, VERY modern, and provided everything you could possibly imagine for to ease your stay. Alex himself was very pleasant to talk to, keen on helping and providing useful information. It's a shame we didn't meet in person, but hopefully I'll have that chance in a later visit.", "Alex's place is of of the most amazing place to stay in Sofia. It was very easy to contact him with prompt reply at any time and easy check-in and out. A lot of restaurants and shoppings are close to this place that you can go by around 10 mins. I totally would recommend this place to anyone who visit Sofia. ", "It was my pleasure to stay in Sofia, in Alexe's great place! He has put a lot of thought in having everything one would need in the apartment, from kitchen equipment to furniture. One of the best hosts I have been in touch with - approachable, communicative, organized - he made my short Sofia stay a great experience!", "We had a great time staying in Alex's place, the apartment was really clean with all modern furnishings and amenities. The location is perfect with walking distance to the train station and less than a 5 minute walk to all of the bars and restaurants of central Sofia. If you are looking to explore the city then I would definitely recommend staying here. Alex was a brilliant host and provided us with great information and ideas on how to make the most of our visit.  If we ever decide to visit Sofia again we will be staying here!", "Alex was really fantastic, and his place is amazing. It's really thoughtfully designed to be a perfect little home for a visitor to Sofia. Great technology, Netflix, amazing wifi, smart storage everywhere. I absolutely loved my stay there and would book it again in a heartbeat!", "Brilliant apartment. Definitely helped make the holiday a nice relaxing get-away, knowing that we had a comfortable place to stay. ", "Alex is a wonderful host! So accommodating and the Airbnb was exactly as he described it/the pictures looked! The interactive maps and recommendations and documents he provided us with helped our trip tremendously. Alex helped make our trip an incredible experience! ", "Cool flat, full of neat gadgets for saving space.

The location is central and easy to get to.", "Alex is a great host and the apartment is perfect! Check-in was really easy, Alex was there to show me around and explain how everything works. The apartment is actually bigger than it looks in the pictures and even though it is compact it has everything you could possibly need. Alex has done great work to make the most of the space and all the fittings and appliances are really modern as well. Location is great, you are only a 5 min walk from the central station and the main area of the city. I would definitely stay again!", "This is one of the funkiest and most modern places we have booked through airbnb. Getting to and from the apartment cannot be any easier. The auto lock system is great and Alex's guide  and instructions were excellent. The apartment has everything you need and more allowing for a relaxing stay. The apartment is new, clean, practical and sure comfortable. If you come to Sofia, this is a must book.", "The place is very modern, clean and Alex is a great host: very communicative and helpful.
Although climbing to the 5th floor might be a hassle for some, the location and apartment's functionality pays it off.
I definitely recommend this place to other travelers.", "The house was very morden. And you can find Mall of Sofia and vitosha street by walking. The place was the best!

In the house, you can find everything. He prepared very well!

And Alex is the best host. We asked him many things and he did his best. We really thanks to him and someday i want to visit again :)", "Alex was a very helpful and friendly host. He took my bags up to the apartment and explained a bit about the area. The apartment itself is brand new and furnished to a high standard. There's a full kitchen with all the utensils including microwave, oven, fridge and even a rice cooker! The internet was fast and reliable and there was a 4K TV too. The bed was really comfortable and the apartment was well insulated for sound so you couldn't hear any street noise from outside at all. The location was great and it's easy to just walk into the centre or get to a metro or tram stop to explore the city. It's great value for money and I will stay there again for sure.", "Inmejorable, sin duda la mejor opción en sofia", "Super appartement, propre et bien placé !", "Très bon séjour au Sunshine Sofia ! Emplacement parfaitement au centre, appartement très propre et très bien optimisé. Je recommande!", "I can not recommend to live in Alex apartment. The cleanliness was a whole mess at all. The rooms haven't been cleaned at all and the worst thing was the bed linen, that haven't been changed and there were like hairs everywhere in the bed. After talking to Alex (quite funny communication as he winded up in one excuse to a next) the female cleaner came and really picked up 5mins all the hairs of the bed linen and left afterwards again. So this was her cleaning the bed. Luckily there has been a washing machine in the kitchen, otherwise we would have definitely left the apartment immediately. I like to say to it, that I am not a very picky person common to cleanliness as a lot of my trips I just do camping in my own tent and living in a German flat share with 3 other men, but this just has been too much. After walking 1-2 minutes barefoot on the floor, your feet have been black, in the bath there were long haired hairs and the table in the kitchen was sprinkled with foodsauce and other shit. We refused to have a better look on some other things and tried to be out in the city as much as possible. 
 
As well some of the domestic equipments weren't as told in the description. Part of that our stay was okay, as the apartment has a top position to have a look over the attractions in the city or even to visit the mountains. Still we would never book one of his apartments again. 




German/Deutsch:
Würden und werden diese Wohnung nie wieder buchen. Die Sauberkeit ließ extrem stark zum Wünschen übrig. Die Bettwäsche wurde defintiv nicht gewechselt und so fanden sich Haare überall auf dem Bett, die nach mehrmaligen Kontakt mit Alex von dessen Reinigungskraft einzeln eingesammelt wurden, während die Bettwäsche belassen wurde. Nach 5min hatte mich der Ekel von dieser Vorgehensweise so gepackt, dass ich mir nur noch gewünscht hatte, dass sie bald das Apartment verlässt, was sie nach 10min auch machte und ich die Bettwäsche in die Waschmaschine schmeißen konnte. Auch der Boden, der Küchentisch, sowie das Bad ließen stark zu wünschen übrig und eigentlich waren wir uns beide sehr sicher, dass die Wohnung höchstens 5min "geputzt" (Mülltütenwechsel und neue Handtücher bereitgelegt) wurde, nachdem unsere Vorgänger sie verlassen hatten. Wenn man sich überlegt wie hoch der Preis der Wohnung ist (etwa 32euro pro Nacht bei 3 Nächten) und wie viel eine Reinigungskraft in Bulgarien wohl pro Stunde verdient (wahrscheinlich weniger als 5 Euro), kann man nicht verstehen, dass so wenig wert auf die Sauberkeit und Zufriedenheit der Besucher gelegt wird.  
Würden somit allein aufgrund der Sauberkeit diese Wohnung niemals wieder buchen und das obwohl wir beiden nicht gerade sehr ordentlich sind und gerne auch mal 2-3 Wochen am Stück mit Backpack und Zelt durch die Welt campen. 
Auch einiges an Equipment, welches in der Beschreibung aufgeführt wurde, fehlte und so muss man einfach sagen, dass es bis auf die wirklich excellente Lage einfach nicht dem entsprach was wir uns vorgestellt hatten und sehr enttäuscht über die Wohnung waren.", "Si fa prima a dire cosa non c'è in casa di Alex che non cosa c'è.
Professionalita estrema.
Sempre disponibile in tutto pur non essendoci mai incontrati.
Le modalità di check in sono FUTURISTICHE.
Vicinissimo al centro. In 3 giorni non ho mai preso un mezzo pubblico a parte la metro dall'aeroporto a casa sua.
Andateci senza nessun timore.
NoN ve ne pentirete.", "Un petit cocon en plein centre ville de Sofia. L'appartement est connecté, l'ouverture se fait via téléphone de façon  très simple. L'aménagement interieur est de trop bon goût avec des petits détails très malin. Alex est très  disponible et réactif dans les messages. bref c'est un petit bijou de logement, parfait pour un week end en  couple à Sofia.
", "Que surpresa ótima! O apartamento é super bem montado, de forma inteligente. Você tem uma sala e quarto no mesmo cômodo, o que deixa aproveitar o espaço de uma forma muito melhor. O acesso ao prédio e checkin podem ser feitos com o celular ou à distância, o que facilita combinar horários. O Alex é super atencioso. Mesmo não tendo o conhecido pessoalmente, ele preparou informações da cidade por escrito e também nos deu várias dicas via (Hidden by Airbnb) . A localização inicialmente não nos pareceu muito boa mas é bem tranquilo e fica a 10 minutos a pé de onde tem tudo na cidade! Ótimo lugar, recomendo!", "Le logement top rien à dire, propre, fonctionnel et Alex super réactif et toujours la pour vous aider dans vos vistes, restaurants etc .. Alex est le meilleur hôte de Sofia.  Si je reviens à sofia je reprends son logement.  Allez y les yeux fermés..(juste petit détail 5 étages a monter peu être contraignant pour des personnes (Website hidden by Airbnb) attention aux rambarde de l escalier si enfant.  Trop basse.. ) bonne continuation Alex", "Il soggiorno al Sunshine è stata la migliore scelta che potessimo fare per il nostro weekend a Sofia. La casa è curata nei minimi dettagli e Alex è di una rara cortesia, non ci ha fatto mancare nulla.
La posizione è centrale, sulla stessa via si trova il Mercato delle Donne e a poca distanza di cammino (neanche 1 km) c’è il viale principale della città.

Inoltre di fronte casa c’è un forno artigianale ottimo per fare colazione!

Consigliato!", "Buona posizione, ottimi i servizi della camera, padrone di casa molto cordiale. La consiglio", "Tuve una estancia genial, el apartamento es muy moderno aunque sus zonas comunes necesiten alguna reforma, Alex el anfitrión se comunicaba continuamente con nosotros, llegamos a las 2:00 de la madrugada y Alex estaba en línea para saber si todo estaba en orden, uno de los mejores anfitriones de airbnb, con anfitriones como Alex airbnb sería la mejor página de hospedajes de internet.", "L’ appartamento é moderno e carino, perfetto per un breve soggiorno. La posizione pur non essendo centralissima è molto comoda ed a poca distanza dalle principali attrazioni della cittá. Alex é stato molto disponibile e gentile. Se visitassi di nuovo Sofia sicuramente tornerei qui!", "Das Apartment liegt nah an der Innenstadt und ist gut an die Metro angebunden. Die Wohnung ist geräumig und modern, der Check-In per App funktioniert problemlos. Es tropfte an Tag 1 vom Obermieter von der Ecke, aber Alex kümmerte sich noch am selben Tag um einen Handwerker, sehr gute Kommunikation! Das Badezimmer hätte etwas sauberer sein können. Liener hier ein paar Euro mehr investieren als für ein Hostel, es lohnt sich!", "Super appartement. Bon rapport qualité prix. Alex joignable à tout moment. L'agencement de l'appart est génial.", "Siamo stati 5 giorni in questa casa è devi dire che ci siamo trovati benissimo...Alex è sempre stato disponibile e (Website hidden by Airbnb) casa è piccolina ma molto accogliente e sfruttata in modo (Website hidden by Airbnb) posizione come nella descrizione è ottima...è stata davvero una bella esperienza l unica nota negativa sono 5 piani da fare senza ascensore...CONSIGLIATO."]
