reviews:
["Great place i the center! All was clear and cozy. Mila is really pro-host.", "It was a wonderful stay at this place. "Mila" on Bulgarian language means "kind" and we would like to say that Mila is really kind person. Everything for the self check in was explained clearly in advance. Thank you for the nice hosting.", "We stayed at Mila's place for 4 days. Although Mila was out of town, it was very easy to find the appartement and the keys following the instructions she gave us. The appartement was lovely and clean and had everything we needed. Also, the location was perfect to explore the city as it is in walking distance from the center(about 20 min) and close to The Mall of Sofia. I will definately recommend the place and would stay here again next time I visit Sofia.", "Good location close to the center. perfect place to explore wonderful Sofia!", "It was ok", "Lovely clean apartment with plenty of space. Nice to have a balcony too.", "Nice place with great location.", "A great place for the value. I highly recommend it.", "It was more than perfect", "very nice place next to the historical centre of the city. I highly recommend it.
", "A very nice place to stay in Sofia. Absolutely recommended. Many thanks to the owner.      ", "Communication was easy and I got quick replies. The flat was clean and the little terrace is very enjoyable. The location is fine as it's pretty close to the city centre (15mn walking).", "Apartment is ok. Very good position.", "the apartment was not very clean and certainly located in a central area, Mila left us only one towel for 7 days, the elevator chip never worked and for 7 days we climbed 4 floors on foot every time we we returned home, with suitcases, with packages, with the weariness of a day spent walking for miles. Mila was not interested in finding a solution for the malfunctioning chip, she just proposed to find me a different accommodation. not satisfied at all.", "Fantastic location, easy walk into the main areas. Tidy apartment with great layout. Very comfortable!", "I would recommand staying at Milas place. It's very near to the centre.", "All perfect, everything in walking distance and communication was perfect. Thanks again.", "Nice place", "Mila's apartment is in a great location close to public transport and the city center. I loved the local neighborhood as much as the main sites of Sofia. Mila was also a gracious host, who tried to arrange everything for our ease and comfort even though she couldn't be there in person. Highly recommend!", "Nice, spacious flat, very well located just a 5 minute walk from metro and 10 minutes from Vitosha Blvd. Great wifi and a desk if you need to work in Sofia.
Excellent value for money and communication for Mila was great throughout. Would thoroughly recommend.", "Very nice apartment,hope to stay again.", "I was surprised, the flat was bigger it seems to be In the photos. Really great place, the mall is 3min away.", "My boyfriend and I stayed at one o Mila's apartments. Self check-in was required so we didn't meet Mila in person. The apartment is very nice and clean. The WiFi broke down one evening for a couple of hours. Mila was always reachable and said she would call the providers but they don't work in the evenings. Luckily, the internet came back anyway. The neighbourhood is very lonely at (winter) nights. The busier areas are around a 10 minute walk away so still pretty central. After confirming my stay, Mila sent a message with useful information, including the info that there is no opportunity to store luggage during your check-out day (i.e. you have to leave at 11 am and if you are still in the city because you travel later during the day, you need to take your luggage with you). I would suggest to include that information right in the description of the apartment. When asking for advice, Mila sent us information / a (Hidden by Airbnb) link to a person where we could store luggage (in the end we didn't use it). All in all it was good value for money, more of a holiday apartment than a house sharing experience.", "Comfortable central place. Communication and check in were easy. Would stay again.", "Perfect Host!
Very comfy and helpful!", "It is comfortable apartment in walking distance to Sofia's center.  The apartment has all features for comfortable stay. It was warm and pleasant in the winter time when I was visiting it. There is good desk and fast WiFi for those who need to do some work during their stay.
Mila is very quick to respond, friendly and welcoming. Despite that we have not met face to face all check in/out went smoothly.
I will recommend the place as good one to stay when in Sofia.", "The apartment was even better than I expected. There was even a balcony which was a great surprise. Location was very central in Sofia, close to the main strip of restaurants and cafes. The only missing thing was that there wasn't a television receiver, so I was devoid of watching the folkloric TV channels in the apartment as a person interested in Bulgaria's ancient folkloric culture. Apart from that great stay, would love to stay again.", "Lovely apartment. Great location. Nicely decorated with a nice balcony", "The apartment is in a great location - 5 mins walk to a mall, cinema, supermarket. Couple minutes walk to few dining places and small delis. 10 mins walk to Sofia’s historic center. Few minutes away from the metro station. 
The apartment itself is very cozy, with separate kitchen equipped with the essentials. There is even a balcony. The bed is comfortable. The building is new (which is hard to find in Sofia’s downtown) with elevator. 
Next to the building is a big police station which makes the area safe. 
Mila is a great host, the communication with her was very easy and nice. We checked in around 3am so it was dark and hard to find the keys so I had to wake her up but she was great and assisted us without complaining. And when we had an issue with the washing machine she arranged to be fixed as soon as possible. 
Highly recommend the apartment and the location", "The apartment was as described and the host was amazingly responsive.  The location is great -- about a ten-minute lesurely walk from Vitosha Boulevard.  It is a great value.", "Great place - quiet and spotless - shower fitting a bit loose - but otherwise perfect !", "Great place and Mila is very helpful. Highly recommended.", "Mila's apartment was very nice and cozy; it was quite a lot large for a couple.
It was near to the main attractions of the city centre.
Mila is very kind and available with us for all the needs we had in the house.", "We had a great time in Sofia. The Appartment was just perfect:)", "Amazing place to stay, would highly recommend. Did not expect a balcony which was great! Location was very central in Sofia, close to the main strip of restaurants and shopping mall. Taxi driver had trouble finding the apartment on arrival but Mila answered her phone to help even though it was 3am, very good of her. Only issue we had was the washing machine. It kept stopping and starting and the door would not close properly so we had to sit next to it holding it closed the whole cycle. Apart from that great stay, would love to return.", "Mila was fantastic, she communicated with me as soon as I booked the apartment. Any problem that I had she was always on the other end of the phone, location was perfect and the sites amazing. 
If I return to Sofia I will 100% try to book this apartment again!", "Communicating with Mila was easy even though we didn't meet her personally. She's a very nice, helpful person. The apartment was clean and comfortable. The shower curtain needs to be longer but this is a minor issue. We had a good stay. ", "Comfortable place that needs some TLC and mosquito screens . Don't use the washer without consulting the host . The shower stand is broken but if you like hand showers that is not a major issue . Mila is very receptive to communications especially if you have urgent problem or can't get inside of the hidden lockbox. The place is described at central location but is a good hike from where you want to be. All in all B-", "Mila is a super host. Her suggests was perfect to go in good place to eat very well.
The house is clean and comfortable.
There is not air conditional but sleeping was always good even if these days was very warm.
The balcony is a good place to have a bit of relax before to sleep.
Thanks Mila", "Mila is a great host very reactive, she does all she can to help you and organize your arrival. Everything was perfect, lot of equipments, many documentations about the city. Just there are no blackout curtains.", "The flat was brilliant, in a perfect location, Mila was very helpful. Would definitely want to go back it was so good.", "Nice place in a really convenient location. Thanks for having us there :)", "The apartment was big and spacious for one person. The location was good too, it was not far away from the center. The rooms were cleaned up and tidy.", "Mila is an exceptional person. She gave us every facility to stay at their home, she was flexible with the check in and the check out and it was incredibly easy to reach her. Furthermore she solve every single doubt or problem we could have.
Finally, the apartment is exactly as you can see in the pictures, really comfy for a couple, the bathroom is really new and in the kitchen your can find the primary stuff you need to survive a weekend or a long-weekend though you can't leave Sofia without trying at least one of Mila's recommendations.", "I had wonderful time in Sofia and enjoyed  staying at Mila's flat! It's exactly as described, very clean, cozy.. pretty everything is within easy walking distance from it! Mila is an AMAZING host! VERY helpful! I would highly recommend this place to anyone! ", "The apartment is very cute and cosy, and fun to stay in. It's also very clean and the bed is comfortable. It's close to city center and also to the metro so you can arrive from the airport in about 40 minutes. Mila is a great host, she's friendly and helpful. I highly recommend this place!", "We had a great time in Sofia and our stay at Mila's place made the whole trip even more enjoyable. The flat is very clean and comfortable and it is quite near to the city centre and all the main attractions of Sofia. Mila is a very helpful host and she answered always inmediately both before and during our stay when we contacted her. We'll definitely contact her again if we had the chance to visit this charming city in the future.", "My friend and I really enjoyed to stay at Mila's flat. The flat was very clean and was very comfortable. Walking distance to city centre and perfect for a stay of a couple of days in Sofia. It was very easy to get in touch and communicate with Mila as she is very helpful.", "We had a wonderful time on Sofia, the apartment was great and we had a nice communication with Mila.", "Nice apartment has everything you need, great location with easy access to public transport.", "Mila is a great host, really nice and helpful. Apartment was quiet central, clean and lovingly furnished. We had a great stay, so definitly a recommendation ! :)", "Mila is very nice and professional. She answers quite fast if you have any problem. The house is very clean, nice decorated, spacious and better than a normal studio because the kitchen is separated from living room.

 

The house is placed in the city centre at walking distance of any interesting places. You can park in front of the building for free. It is a bit crowded during the working hours but out of them it is plenty of space.

 

The only issue that we had was that the curtains were too transparent, too much light at morning and lack of privacy during the night, but I’m sure that Mila has solved this problem in the apartment.



I will book again if I go to Sofia again.", "Hi,
The house is very clean and calm. We enjoyed our trip. ", "It's a very comfortable place and al the instructions are good. It's really near of the city centre, very warm and have all the things you need for your trip. I recomend it.
Es un sitoo muy comodo, perfecto para parejas, es calentito y acogedor. Tiene todo lo que necesitas para un viaje y su localizacion es inmejorable en pleno centro. Lo recomiendo sin duda.
Ci sono tutte le cose che tu hai bisogno in a gità, è perfetto per due persone e è nel centro della città.", ":)", "Очень хорошо шикарное расаоложение центр города. Хозяйка приветливая. Все продумано ей до мелочей. Я очень доволен.", "Un joli appartement très bien situé. Une adresse facile à trouver, proche des métros, tramways et bus. Arrivée facilitée car accès aux clés autonomes. Dommage toutefois de ne pas rencontrer Mila.", "Vraiment propre,111 mètre du métro Opalchenska  sur la ligne rouge qui va directement à l’aéroport de Sofia,les supermarchés Lidl  et Billa sont à centaine mètre de ce logement, il y a un arrêt jusqu'au centre(( arrêt serdika au centre)), quartier est calme et sécuriser car le bureau de  la police est à proximité,  il y a beaucoup de possibilités pour aller différentes direction touristique de la ville.", "Un apartamento de tamaño normal en el centro de Sofia, la calidad del apartamento es acorde con el precio, la limpieza no estaba muy conseguida más teniendo en cuenta que se paga tasa de limpieza. Hay que tener en cuenta que la entrada es a las 3 de la tarde y la salida a las 11. Por lo que el día de salida tener en cuenta que hay que madrugar.
Por lo demás muy asequible.", "Het appartement is dicht gelegen bij het centrum en de metro, makkelijk bereikbaar. We hadden wel een probleem met de douche en de boiler waardoor we 2 van de 3 ochtenden met  ijskoud water hebben moeten douchen. Mila heeft ons wel via sms proberen te helpen omdat ze er zelf niet kon zijn, maar het lijkt alsof het water max 10 minuten warm blijft en daarna ijskoud wordt. Waardoor douchen met 2 personen na elkaar heel moeilijk is. Voor de rest was het appartement heel mooi en zou ik het zeker aanraden.", "Ev sahibim chech in erken yapmamda bana yardımcı oldu iletişim hızlı ve iyi 
Teşekkürler", "Het appartement is exact zoals op de foto's, goed gelegen op 5 minuten van het centrum. Zeer vlotte communicatie.", "L'appartamento è spazioso e perfetto per una coppia che si fermi fino ad una settimana. E' molto vicino al centro, che si raggiunge con 10 min a piedi; a circa 5 minuti c'è il Mall of Sofia e le fermate di Bus, tram e metro. Per parcheggiare eventualmente un'auto di sera e nei giorni festivi ci sono spazi gratuiti, mentre di nei giorni feriali, dalle 8.00 alle 19.00 c'è un parcheggio custodito proprio dietro al condominio.", "muy muy recomendable el apartamento cómodo prolijo y completo además muy bonito. Mila excelente  la verdad muy buena con nosotros respondía a cada una de nuestras consultas sobre la ciudad y nos armó un itinerario... la verdad excelente la super recomiendo.", "Данное жильё находится практически в центре города, рядом mall of Sofia . До исторического центра 5-10 мин пешком . 
Хозяйка даёт подробные инструкции. 
В квартире нет телевизора. Но это даже неплохо.", "Nous n'avons pas rencontré Mila mais elle fut très gentille et efficace à distance, elle nous a conseillé de très bons endroits. L'appartement est très calme et lumineux et le balconnet est très agréable pour déjeuner. L'appartement est proche du centre et des restaurants/bars ainsi que de supermarché. Nous le recommandons.", "Wir haben den Aufenthalt in Milas Wohnung sehr genossen. Wir haben sie wie beschrieben vorgefunden. Sie ist sehr sauber, besitzt eine schöne Terrasse und bietet einem alles was man benötigt. Die Lage ist perfekt um Sofia zu erkunden. In der Wohnung findet man jede Menge nützliche Tipps für den Aufenthalt. Abgerundet wird alles durch einen schnellen und unkomplizierten Check-In und Check-Out. Zudem war Mila stets zur Hilfe wenn es Fragen gab. Vielen Dank und hoffentlich bis bald!", "Alles war in bester Ordnung.", "Le logement est un peu plus grand qu'il ne parait sur la photo, très propre, calme , à 10 min à pied du centre et très proche de magasins. Parfait quand on est sans voiture. 
Se garer est difficile entre 8H00 et 17H00 parce qu'il y a des bureaux autour. 
"]

reviews:
["Accommodation was amazing and the hospitality was great. Will book this apartment again for sure.", "Always when I am in Sofia, I am amassed how great are the AiRBnB accommodations. How thoughtful are hosts, and how they really try to make their guests happy. This time was no different! BUT... it was even BETTER!  In fact - that was my BEST experience so far ever! Not just in Sofia but in general all over the world I have been! You can feel the LOVE the hosts put in every single detail, the art, the style, those little details to make you feel really great while staying at this little gem in center of Sofia... Totally impressed, respect to Vasil and Sofia, and thank you very much! Would definitely stay again in the future! ", "This place is really nice and the host is very kind. We had good time there.", "Very nice would recommend ", "Very good location, cozy small apartment, very good for couples...
I very much appreciated the simplicity of the accommodation and the good touch in every detail.

Cheers ", "Everything was perfect, clean and as we expected. Thanks for having us!", "Great place to really see all Sofia.", "The place is very nice and modern, it is in nice building very close to the city center. I had a nice stay in Sofia!", "Great!
Clean, Cosy, and in a great location.
Just as it was advertised.", "Great place", "If I’d be to come back to Sofia and rent an airbnb, I’d definitely come back. The place itself is at a very communicable spot, the apartment was what I’d already expected. I strongly recommend for newcomers. I was treated with great hospitality and the hosts were very approachable at all times. Thank you and once again extending my apologies for any inconvenience I may have caused you. All the best!", "The apartment was perfect!  It was modern and it was in perfect central location, around 500 metres from the metro station. It had all the facilities we needed. I would definitely recommend it!!!", "I really loved staying here. It’s a beautiful apartment and was very clean. It had everything I needed. Very close to an amazing restaurant called Aubergine. Very close to transit, food and coffee shops. Will gladly come back!", "You are the best Vasil! Perfect location! Beautiful place! Perfect for me! I will definitely comeback! 
The only disadvantage I will get from this is that, the more you get popular, the more difficult it is to book this place! But you deserve it! Thank you! Beat wishes!", "The place is absolutely gorgeous and worth every penny! I had such a lovely stay and was so pleased at how modern and easy the apartment was to be in.

Fast internet, excellent shower and water pressure, easy check in, elevator, and major style points!

LOVED it!", "Very equipped and clean appartment located perfectly! Clear and fast communication.", "Vasil was the perfect host commutating in both Bulgarian and fluent English, and a genuine nice person.
As for the apartment, brilliant place, the location is prefect for every amenity you can think of, from sight seeing to shopping, metro, public transport, all within a few steps from the front door.
Wifi and multi channel tv, washing machine all worked perfectly and you can see all these things are well maintained.
Without question my next trip to Sofia I'll be staying at Vasil's apartment, a great Airbnb experience all round", "Vasil is very nice, always respond very fast. he gave me a lot of help. The apartment is just like what the pic show.well equipped, you can get whatever you need in the apartment.", "Solid place", "Beautiful apartment. Professionally designed and decorated to maximize every inch. Quality lighting,  comfortable bed, nice linens and well stocked. Easy check in.  Perfect location. I would definitely recommend Vasil's place.", "Great location. Everything same as described in the profile. ", "Really recommend this apartment, so nice and so easy to get around on the metro and he was a really helpful host!", "A really nice place in an incredible location. ", "Apartment was just as described,great amenities,extremely clean and in a great location to walk around the city and see the sights.Vasil was great for contact and even organized a taxi for me to the (Website hidden by Airbnb) again Vasil", "We had great time during our stay in Sofia. First of all , Vasil is your guy , he speaks English very well , he is very informative and willing to answer to any kind of questions you probably have. Furthermore , he informed us about the frauds taxi drivers that hang around and booked for us a taxi to get us to the airport .He was always there when I wanted to ask him something .

The house is great , it's both very well decorated and big enough as (Website hidden by Airbnb) is obvious that has been recently renovated and everything looks clean and fresh .The location is great as (Website hidden by Airbnb) about 5 to 10 minutes to Vitosha, one step to NDK building and the great park . The metro station is about 2 minutes but you probably won't need it cause the distance to everything is walkable .

In general , is a great choice to live there for a short stay in Sofia I would definitely choose it again if I decide to visit Sofia.


", "The place looks even better in person, it's located in the heart of the city, so most places are within a walking distance, metro & bus station are close by and taxis can be found everywhere.
The apartment looked extremely clean with a fresh smell, we hade EVERYTHING we needed and Vasily was the most pleasant host, very attentive and extremely kind.
We were really blown away by how perfect it was, will return for sure! ", "Excellent location.  Modern.  Sparkling clean. Very well equipped for long or short stay.  Perfect communication. Easy check-in, check out. Highly recommended. This apartment will be my first choice on my future visits in Sofia. Definitely. 
 Thank you Sofi and Vassil.  
", "Nice place in the  very center of Sofia!
The apartment is excellent: light , cozy and has everything is needed. 
Vasil is responsive person. ", "The apartment is beautiful, even more beautiful than pictures can show and it has everything you need for a longer stay. It is located on a great location near Vitosha Boulevard and metro station. Vasil is a fantastic host who will manage that you have everything you need and that you easily get to the apartment (with instructions and transportation if needed). Vasil even picked me up on metro station and he helped me carry on my luggage even though the apartment is only 5 minutes-walk away. I highly recommend!", "We had a wonderful stay at the apartment. Vasil is a great host and met us for some great conversation and tips on going around Sofia. The location is ideally located and super comfortable. Not to mention, very clean, equipped and charming.
I'd book it again if I go back to Sofia. ", "I loved it! A very nice and cosy place at walking distance from the center and close to the NDK where I had to attend to a conference!!! I recommend it without any doubt", "The place was amazing! Great location, nice and charming apartment and a great host! Definitely staying there again. ", "The place is amazing and ideal for a stay in the heart of Sofia, located close to everything you need like stores, parks or the lively vitosha boulevard. Vasil is an amazing host and made my trip to Sofia perfect, he made every effort to male my stay better and more enjoyable. 
If your looking for a place in the city center for one or two people I can highly recommend this place, the best airbnb i 
 in Sofia so far and I found my place to stay.", "Great tiny place, renovate recently, close to center and Metro.
It's only maybe not adapted for people who are sensible of the street (car) noise as the place is just front big street cross.
Otherwise Vasil is very good host and the place is clean and complet.", "Vasil and his wife were very friendly. The the apartment has great location in the heart of Sofia. It is modern, clean, equipted with all necessary appliances for living. I liked it very much also because the pictures of the apartment in the web represent the reality - modern, nice, clean.", "The apartment was extremely stylish and clean, and has all the necessary facilities. The location is central and easy to reach. The communication with Sofi and Vasil was quite smooth and they were very accurate. Highly recommend it and would definitely reconsider when visiting the city.", "What a FIVE STAR air bnb experience! The apartment was flawlessly clean, decorated, comfortable, and location was excellent. There is nothing that could have made our stay more enjoyable. Thank you!", "Great studio, perfect for a single traveller or a couple. 
Comfortable and very practical. Well located, pleasant and safe. 
Highly recommend!", "The apartment was absolutely fantastic in a central location that helps a lot to visit all that sights of Sofia at the minimum time. Vasil is a great host willing to give you all the information that yo need. Thank you Vasil for the hospitality.", "L'alloggio di Vasil é una soluzione ottimale per trascorrere una vacanza nella bella Sofia. Vicinissimo alla metropolitana, che peró non é strettamente necessaria. Anzi, io ho sempre preferito la piacevole passeggiata che porta in una delle vie piú centrali della città! Vasil é stato impeccabile nella comunicazione, rispondendo immediatamente a qualunque messaggio. Vi consiglio vivamente di scegliere il suo alloggio.", "Ново ремонтирано и обзаведено, чисто в модерен оригинален стил и топли светли цветове студиото предлага истински комфорт и уют. Жилищното пространство, кухненският тракт и банята са оборудвани с всичко необжодимо и достатьчно за безпроблемно краткосрочно или далгосрочно пребиваване на двама или сам човек. Входното пространство е добре подаржано и чисто,стьлбите са широки и удобни, асансьорат е допалнително удобство. Отличното раэположение в идеален центар и на крачки от НДК и парковото пространство около НДК, свьрзано с пешеходната зона на бул. Витошка дава вазможност за приятни разходки по всяко време на деня в наи приятната и оживена  част на идеалния центар. Самостоятелното настаняване без присьствието на домакините е реално удобство за кьсно пристигащи гости. Домакините са непрекаснато на разположение и контактьт е лесен и бьрз. Внимателни и дискретни. Благодаря Ви още веднаж эа всичко !", "van harte aanbevolen!
Appartement is niet groot maar prima voor 2 personen. 
Modern in een ouder gebouw,  zeer compleet, alles is er.
Goed gelegen. 
Vasil spreekt zijn talen en is zeer hulpvaardig.", "Vasil est un hôte très réactif et très arrangeant. L'accueil était parfait, le logement impeccable et très bien agencé. La situation nous a permis de tout faire à pied. Je recommande vraiment! Merci Vasil et Sophie!", "Excelente decoração, gostei muito do apartamento.

Obrigado por tudo", "L'appartement est conforme aux photos, il est très propre et spacieux, il vient d'être rénové entièrement à neuf avec goût, il y a tout ce qu'il faut pour un séjour agréable. Le lit est très grand et très confortable, la salle d'eau est très jolie et très agréable, la cuisine est bien fonctionnelle. Ce n'est pas bruyant du tout et situé en plein centre-ville au 2e étage d'un immeuble calme (avec ascenseur). Nous sommes restés 4 nuits et avons visité à pied les principaux sites de la ville. A notre arrivée notre avion avait du retard et Vasil s'est montré très prévenant en nous attendant à l'appartement. Grand merci à lui, nous recommandons chaleureusement Vasil et cet appartement, et nous y reviendrons avec plaisir si nous revenons un jour à Sofia."]

reviews:
["The location of the apartment is spectacular, it is right in the middle of the centre of Sofia you are a few minutes walk from the main places. The hosts were very helpful and extremely quick at responding. The room itself was very cool and this is very good because in the summer the capital becomes a very hot place. I would love to stay at this Airbnb the next time I visit Sofia. I recommend it to anyone who wants to have a perfect stay !", "Eléonore, is a wonderful person, his appartement is perfectly located and clean.", "Всичко беше ОК! Беше топло въпреки -15 градуса студ.Липсваше ни само маса за хранене - макар и сгъваема.
   Благодарим ви от сърце.", "Perfect hosts! Great studio in the center of Sofia. A little bit depressive view from the terrace (near buildings), but this is the reality in the big cities...  ", "Second visit in Eleanora's property.
Once again perfection.
Highly recommended host!", "Eleanora was a perfect host since the first minute to the last one.
All was handled with care and intelligence.

It's a nice flat in a modern building offering all the comfort one might expect, and with high quality furniture. The listing of the apartment is accurate and precise.

Located in the center of the city, Serdika metro station, which is the most central one of all, is just few minutes away by walking.
In the surroundings, you can find all the shops, coffees, restaurants one might need.

My journey there was very nice and this flat allowed me to discover Sofia in the best possible conditions.", "Good located flat! Really cleaned, with all services. Highly recommended", "If you love sightseeing like me this is the place for you! it had everything I needed including very comfortable beds, extra pillows, loads of towels, and the shower was amazing! The location was perfect and cost only 15 let from the airport... with traffic.
Everything you need is there and the host was very helpful and understanding when our flight was delayed. I would reccommend staying here!", "Thank you for your hospitality. It was a great time in Sofia. The apartment was really nice and we've enjoyed staying there!", "A very cosy apartment, well located and with very good equipment. Eleonora and her husband are kind and welcoming. The communication was efficient. Thanks again!", "I highly recommend this place! It is very nice, clean, and has all of the gadgets needed to cook. Eleonora is an amazing host! Our flight was late and Eleonora met us to check in at 9:30pm. She also answered any questions we had. I will definitely stay here again when we come back to Sofia.", "Great place to stay in Sofya in central location. The apt is very clean and cozy, the place is quiet and there's basically everything you need for short and even long stays. Check in was flexible, right on time we requested, and communicating with Eleonora was very easy. I would definitely recommend it.", "My train was scheduled to arrive 22:30, it was late, so I didn’t get to apartment until 23:30 but I was cheerfully greeted upon arrival. Great service! Location, amenities, great shower, clean, perfect studio for solo or couple travelers", "Great location and very accommodating host . Would recommend", "Very nice place: clean and fully equipped, balcony included, to spend a few days in Sofia. The communication with Eleonora was excellent; she advised us about transportation from the airport and when we arrived to Sofia at 3 AM her husband was there to hand us the keys. Also, the apartment is downtown, very close to all the monuments and important locations.", "Great host, the appartement is close to the subway. The bed are confortable and the housse very clean.", "Very well located and quiet place! I really recommend it ", "A good value for money but not what I imagined. Lets start with the good things, a/c working fine, hot water for both of us, coffee and sugar available in the kitchen and the area was quiet at night so we managed to sleep pretty well. Location is central enough to both visit sofia and reach the subway. Unfortunately though, we had some issues with reaching Eleonora when we landed 3hrs late, at almost midnight (as our flight was delayed) even though we informed her as soon as we knew. Be aware that she doesnt have (Hidden by Airbnb) . The boiler in the bathroom was heavily leaking for the first two days of our 3 days stay (and its located right above the hairdryer so not the best in terms of safety), we couldnt find shampoo nor conditioner (which where specifically confirmed by Eleonora before booking), the curtain fell down when opened (luckly on the last day, as if it happened on the first we would not have been able to sleep at all), and pillows were absolutely as not as in photos, but one per bed and very thin. Again, our stay was ok, but not as expected.", "Great spot! Perfect location in downtown Sofia, amenities (including washer and cable TV), and a nice little terrace. Not much natural light, but still highly recommended for a short or long stay! Also, great communication with the host. ", "Wonderful studio in the heart of Sofia. All the major sights within a few minutes walk, with charming cafes and cozy, tasteful restaurants behind the corner. The host was really professional and responsive, which made things even more delightful! ", "Great location. ", "Great location, appartment very clean. Eleonora and her husband are available with a quick response to serve you...", "A really nice little apartment perfect for a quick trip away. Close to the centre and some of the main attractions along with the metro station. 
The water gets a little hot so just be warned but rather hot that cold.", "Despite a change in our arrival time, Eleonora's husband welcomed us with a lot of kindness. The apartment is perfectly clean, confortable and very quiet located un a nice building. Less than 10 min walking from the main attractions in Sofia, it is also easy to park your car in front of the building. I really felt like at home in this apartment, the best I had during my trip in Bulgaria. Highly recommended. Thank you.", "Great location for exploring Sofia. Apartment has everything you could need. Eleonora is a great and very helpful host. Recommended!", "Lovely studio and great location.", "Really nice small flat, with everything you need for few night stand.", "Very nice apartment in a good position (city center 5 minutes far). Everything was clean and tidy. Host very hospitable. Great solution for an holiday in Sofia!", "Everything was wonderful!! The house is very close to the center. It is near the metro station "serdika " . The house was very comfortable and clean  . Everything you need about your accomondation you will find it into the house. We will suggest it to everyone who want to visit Sofia !!", "Had a fantastic stay at Eleonora’s flat. Great location for exploring all areas of Sofia. Really easy to get to from the airport by taxi (only 15 lev). Very quiet and peaceful. A comfortable stay for a short break away.", "The place is perfectly located.  Away from the business of the centre but with a 5-10 minute walk you are in the heart of Sofia.  There are amazing restaurants as close as the other side of the road.  Perfect for a few days exploring  Sofia!", "We were so happy there. Perfect place and efficient communication. Thank you", "Central", "A really nice apartment with all the facilities I needed in a great location right in the heart of Sofia. Highly recommended.", "What a fantastic place great location easy walking distance to the city's main attractions! Comfy beds, good powerful shower, air con, wifi, everything you need for the perfect short stay!! The hosts were very attentive and flexible which was greatly appreciated! Many thanks", "Great host and apartment. :) Warmly recommended!", "Great location 5 to 10 minutes walk from the centre. Corner shop across the road and various other places like pubs and restaurants. 

Only issue was that the beds were very uncomfortable so we didnt get a good nights sleep whilst we were there. 

Apart from that no problem.", "Great place to stay! Really close to the center, a nice balcony and a clean and nice bathroom.", "The apartment was quite comfortable, and its location couldn't be better.", "Thank you, 
We had a great stay! Good location, very quiet and relaxing neighborhood. Eleonora was great with communication.", "Eleanora's place is perfect for those travelling to see Sofia, it is centrally located, within 20 minutes walk of all the attractions and clean in a friendly neighbourhood; excellent value for money. I would recommend this to anyone wanting to explore Sofia. ", "We had a really nice stay in Sofia! The apartment looks like its shown on the pictures. Communication with Eleonora was easy and she was very flexible with Check-in/Check-out time.", "Great place to stay for a weekend", "nice quiete and cool apartment", "Great appartment, Great people. Thanx!", "Very helpful and friendly, made my stay very comfortable. Great location :)

Veryyyy great host!", "clean.. perfect for few days..
", "Thanks Mrs. Eleonora the apartment very good Nice location and good hospitality.", "Eleonora and her husband were flexible with our check-in and check-out times, provided us with everything that we needed. The location was great, the neighborhood was quiet, the metro station was very close, and we had everything that we needed in the apartment. Will be looking for the same place the next time we visit Sofia!", "We had a lovely time, the appartment was perfect ", "Great communication with Eleonora. She is very kind. The studio is very beauiful and comfortable. ", "Really lovely and central place! The flat is equipped with everything you need. And thanks for the flexibility concerning the check-in-time!", "We loved our stay at this apartment! It is very well located if you want to visit the cultural sites in Sofia. To go to the area where the bars are, just take a taxi. It will cost just a few lev.", "Great place, in walking distance of everything. Really clean and comfortable apartment too.", "Studio is in an excellent location to explore the rich and interesting history of Sofia.  Everything was as described.  I spent a wonderful week exploring the city and feeling very comfortable in the studio.", "It was an amazing stay! The flat serves its purpose perfectly, it's 5 minutes from the center and close to the main sights. Everything in Sofia is in a walkable distance and the main two attractions were pretty close to the flat. Also close there was a DM, a super market, ATMs, etc. As the studio is close to a main road. It was clean and fully equipped. On top of that, Eleonora's husband waited for us to arrive from the airport at almost 2AM in the morning!! I totally recommend this flat!", "We had a great stay at Eleonoras apartment. It was very clean und comfy. The apartment is very close to the beautiful center of Sofia. Her husband got to the apartment in the middle of the night for our check-in. He explained everything we needed to know to us. Also the check-out was great, we cult stay a little longer than usually. We would totally recommend the apartment and would also stay another time at the apartment. ", "Clean and quiet place in the city centre", "A good starting point for getting to know the city. Well located and very comfortable. Eleanora is very friendly and gives many facilities for the collection and delivery of keys", "Great stay, great Apartment! The location is just superb, the host very friendly! Would definitely book again when i'm coming back! Best regards", "We had a great time.", "Eleonora and her husband were very friendly with us. In addition, the flat is very good located, very clean and warm. I totally recommend this flat to everyone who wants to enjoy Sofía. If I come back, I would choose this flat again for sure. Thanks a lot Eleonora.
", "I went to Sofia last week-end with one of my friend and we spent 4 days on vacation.
Eleonora is a very nice person! She gave us accurate indications to reach the house and she was very thoughtful with us.
We met her husband when arriving to the house and he was kind and hospitable.
The house is cozy and close to the center of the city.", "We pass 4 nights in Eleonora's place. 
The place is big for two persons, the internet works quite well, there is no problem with ot water or air conditioner.

The place is located almost in the heart of Sofia, so is relative easy to walk to any point.
", "Eleonora and her husband were really friendly and kind to us. Our check-in time by night was no problem. The appartment was really clean and has all equipment you need. The neighborhood was quiet and a air condition was also in the appartment.The communication was no problem.", "Leonora and her husband are really kind! The appartment is very nice, full-equipped and comfortable. Everthing is new and perfectly suitable to relax and enjoy Sofia. 100% recommendable!", "Efficient communication with Eleonora. Quick response on questions and easy to follow directions to find the studio. Eleonora and her husband live with their kids at 20 minutes distance. So communicating the time of arrival in front of the studio is helpful. Practically at any spot in Sofia you will find a free wifi connection. There either Eleonora or her husband hand over the key, switch on internet-wifi ( a welcome 29 mb/s). The studio is absolutely perfect . Everything you may want is there. And it all works well. Spotlessly clean and relatively new. The location is exactly what you would look for.  In the right Sofia neighbourhood, 10 minutes walk to the metro (directly to the airport), great lively streets full with cool drinking spots, restaurants, parks all minutes away. I strolled around Sofia town and while doing so hopped in now and then to the studio. And there I had full internet several English language tv channels and the luxurious feeling of having my own place in Sofia. Highly recommended. Eleanora and husband Plamen are likable persons and speak English well. Next time in Sofia, no doubt same place.", "The appartment was very nice and confortable. It was also well-located, close to the city center and not too far from the train/bus station.
Eleonora was a great host. She waited for us, even if our train was late and welcomed us warmly. 
We had a great stay in Sofia, and I would definitly recommand this accomodation. ", "Eleonora is a great host, punctual and welcoming!
New building with an elevator in the centre of Sofia, quiet and secure neighborhood, clean and nice apartment. Stayed for a long period and all was perfect, absolutely recommend!
", "Very good location. Clean apartment. Working utilies. Quiet. Air condition. No problems in communication in english.", "Eleonara apartment is very well located , near all , near the center , vitoscha . Just few minutes by (Website hidden by Airbnb) apartment is small but have everything and very quiet", "We stayed a few days in Eleonora's wonderful studio apartment. The place was perfect, very clean, stylish and in a great location for seeing the city center.  Eleonora greeted us upon arrival and informed us about everything we needed. Recommended place to stay in Sofia.", "The Studio is perfectly situated in the heart of Sofia. Everything you need to visit is in close surrounding, so that the apartment is more than good for discovering the city. Besides there is the metro line leading directly to the airport in 5min by foot.
But being in the heart of Sofia has the disadvantage that it is sometimes quite noisy. 

", "Very good studio and very Well placed in the Hyper center of Sofia with many restaurant all around. 
", "
Perfect in every way! The photos of Elonora's studio are totally accurate as are the many wonderful reviews. The place is spotlessly clean, quiet and everything is in perfect working order. The shower is enclosed and provides excellent water pressure and hot water. The a/c was a blessing and whisper quiet. The studio is centrally located allowing one to walk to all the major sights. Elonora was easy to communicate withand provided easy to follow directions on how to reach her place using the metro from the airport. I had a wonderful stay and I am already looking forward to a return visit.", "Eleanora gave us detailed directions and was quick to answer. The apartment is clean and neat, has everything we needed. Good value. Thank you!", "This is a lovely studio apartment not far from some of the best sights in Sofia (nice cathedral) and some good breakfast spots if you like fancy pastries.

I stayed with a friend for 3 nights in May, arriving early in the morning on the Friday. Eleonara and Plamen were great hosts - even arranging to meet us in the early hours to hand over the keys so that we could have a nap before heading out to see the sights.

The apartment has most things you'll need and is very quiet so you'll get a good night's sleep. Very much recommended.", "The studio is spacious, perfectly well-equipped, in a great central neighborhood of Sofia. An important feature - the mattresses and pillows are very comfortable! The window and balcony face an interior courtyard so the place is very quiet (even if there is not much direct sunlight). Eleonora responded immediately to my booking request and she and her husband were always available to answer questions. Flexible check-in/check-out also appreciated. Good value, definitely recommended, would consider staying there again.", "Gracious and flexible host. Excellent apartment with nice touches. Several times we said to ourselves, "We could really use X" and, surprisingly, we looked around and found X. Very nice. Also, the bed, though firm, was comfortable--unlike many hotels. My wife and I had a wonderful time and felt right at home. We'll be back. ", "Eleonora was a very kind host. The communication with her was fast and smooth. The flat was really nice, quite,  modern, warm and in the city center, surrounded by great places to eat & drink. 
The pictures totally reflect the reality.

(Especially I could recommend the one when you go out of the flat - left from the door, first street left and there is a restaurant just on the right side).

I would definitely recommend this flat & when coming back to Sofia, this will be our choice for 100%! :)", "Appartamento giusto per due persone c'è tutto quello che occorre anche per cucinare pulito e sopratutto silenziosissimo molto vicino al centro la stazione metro di serdika è molto vicina ma anche anche la stazione dei treni . Nel boulevard principale c'è anche una buonissima pasticceria italiana che fa anche un ottimo cappuccino. Soggiornate da Eleonora perché è stata gentilissima ed efficientissima nel comunicare e per il check-in", "El apartamento de Eleonora se encuentra en una buenísima localización, a menos de 10 minutos andando de la estación de metro de Serdika, línea directa desde el aeropuerto. Y a 5 minutos de Aleksandûr Nevski, de la Presidencia, la Casa del Partido, ... 
Es un barrio con varios sitios donde poder comer/cenar y un supermercado si quieres hacer compra. Aunque no hicimos uso del coche, nos dio la impresión de que se puede aparcar cómodamente.
Es tal y como aparece en la fotos: limpio y muy bien aprovechado. Una sola estancia, más el baño y la terraza, pero muy amplio. El baño tiene ducha con mampara, algo que no parece muy común, y que en nuestro caso, es muy importante.
Eleonora siempre ha respondido a nuestras preguntas de manera rápida.
Recomendamos la estancia.", "Die Lage des Apartments ist sehr zentral, es ist schön eingerichtet und Eleonora ist sehr hilfsbereit und gastfreundlich.", "Il monolocale è pulito, accogliente e a pochi passi dal centro.", "Sve je bilo super!", "El apartamento está situado muy cerca del centro. Es bonito, acogedor y limpio. El marido de Eleonora nos esperaba en la puerta nada más llegar. Recomendable al 100%.", "L'appartamento è molto centrale e comodo. C'è tutto quello che serve.", "Pasamos 5 días en este apartamento a finales de Enero. Ha sido una experiencia genial. Sofía es una ciudad con mucho encanto (¡y más aún estando toda nevada!), Eleonora y su marido han sido muy agradables con nosotros y el apartamento tiene todo lo necesario: nevera, TV, microondas, cocina, una mesita y un par de sillas... y aunque hacía mucho frío en la calle, en la casa se estaba genial. Está muy cerca del centro y de los principales sitios turísticos, y el vecindario es muy tranquilo ¡Una pena tener que volver!", "Molto accogliente, pulito, accessoriato e centralissimo (è proprio dietro la fermata della metro di Serdika, lo snodo principale di Sofia). Eleonora è stata molto precisa e gentile.", "Muy bien situado,zona tranquila y con restaurantes cerca.", "Tiene una ubicación fantástica cercana a todos los puntos clave de la ciudadad. Es un apartamento ideal para parejas o para dos personas porque es pequeñito y muy cómodo. Estaba muy limpio y se nos indicó el funcionamiento de todo a la llegada.", "Sistemazione perfetta per soggiornare a Sofia: casa moderna, ben tenuta, pulita e vicinissima al centro. Se dovessi tornare a Sofia, soggiornerei di nuovo quí, senza alcun dubbio.", "Eleonora y su marido se han portado genial! Hemos podido decirles en el último momento que si podíamos llegar antes y no hemos tenido ningún problema. Todo muy limpio y con una ubicación excelente!", "Fijn appartement op een goede locatie, veel bezienswaardigheden zijn prima te voet te bereiken. Eleonora stuurde een routebeschrijving vanaf het vliegveld waardoor we meteen wisten waar we moesten zijn. Super!", "El alojamiento está muy bien para 2 personas, tiene todo lo que aparece en las fotos, 2 camas, lavadora, frigorífico, cocina, microondas... El baño está bastante bien. Además dispone de aire acondicionado que, en nuestro caso, nos vino de perlas, ya que hizo bastante frío durante esos días.

En cuanto a la limpieza, en general bien, no perfecta, pero tampoco para quejarse, ni mucho menos.

La ubicación bastante buena, tal y como se indica.

A tener en cuenta si vas en coche de alquiler, es que las zonas de aparcamiento son limitadas y, por ejemplo, en la zona verde, sólo puedes aparcar entre las 19:00 y las 08:00, el resto del tiempo tienes que pagar mediante SMS o buscar otro lugar. Por supuesto, esto no es responsabilidad del anfitrión, pero creo que es reseñable.

La estancia ha sido muy buena y el alojamiento cumple perfectamente con las espectativas, ya que es barato y está muy cerca del centro (10 minutos escasos andando hasta la catedral de Alexander Nevsky.", "Très joli appartement, bien situé, jouissant de tous le confort nécessaire pour être à l aise et ne manquer de rien.communication super avec Eleonora je recommande vivement !", "Eleonora is zeer vriendelijk en behulpzaam. Appartementen complex is echter wel wat gehorig en ruimte om te koken en om aan tafel te zitten is er niet echt. Wel hele goede en betaalbare restaurants vlak bij.  ", "L'accoglienza e la permanenza e'stata ottima. Perfetta posizione dell'appartamento, comodo e pulito. Da consigliare!", "La casa di Eleonora è molto carina e accogliente. Al nostro arrivo siamo state accolte da Plamen il marito di Eleonora che è stato gentilissimo. 
L'appartamento è situato al centro di Sofia, a pochi minuti dalla metro di Serdika. Perfetto per la visita della città.
Pulito e dotato di tutto il necessario per un soggiorno confortevole. 
Molto comodi i letti. 
Consiglio il soggiorno presso Eleonora!  "]

reviews:
["It is the second time I stay at the apartment. Very clean and good location. Easy communication.", "Great place with great location!
A really lovely apartment, very cozy, stylish and comfortable.
Nice communication and helpful hosts.
Highly recommend.", "Actually rented the apartment for a photo shooting of my family, because it is very cozy, spacious and nicely lit by the sun. But if I were to visit Sofia for a trip, I would have definitely considered it for my stay!
The communication with the hosts was perfect and easy going.", "Everything was perfect.
 I recommend it to everyone!", "If you want to live like local in a stylish and cosy place this is the apartment you will fall in love with", "Amazing! We coulnd't believe that we had this flat! It is for sure the best place we have ever rented on Airbnb - it has a unique design, is sparkling clean and everything is brand new. The location could not be better - just next to everything in the center. Moreover Alexander and Tanya were really great hosts - real Superhosts! 
This is the place in Sofia! Don't look further!", "A very nice flat exately like described. A lot of nice details made my stay a pleasure. I will come again...", "Tanya and Alex were very réactive and friendly to all the questions I had ! It was a pleasure for me to stay in their amazing appartement , everything was perfect ! Thank you again for your welcome :)", "If you want a convenient, comfortable & pleasant place to stay in Sofia, stay here. I'll be back!", "Tanya and Alex have a wonderful flat. great location, plenty of restaurants, coffee shops and Mall Sofia across the street. Alex was really helpful with the parking situation and he wait and kept a spot for me. either way it is a green zone. sparkling apartment, all the amenities. they even have a Tetris game. 
highly recomend their place. 
thanks for the stay", "Lovely house, we felt right at home. Exceptionally warm ambiance and great decor. Very comfy beds and nice rain shower.", "We were two couples and one infant. The apartment was absolutely perfect for our needs. Great location, well equipped, good communication with hosts. We'll definitely want to come back.", "This is a beautiful well thought appartement with every thing you need and even more, clean, easy to reach from/to the city center. Communication is fast and efficient.", "Great space with pretty interior and extremely comfy beds. Shower and other amenities of very high quality. The apartment was a bit on the chilly side in late October, but with two electric heaters we were ok (and too late we realized the abundance of slippers on a shoe rack near the door ☺️)

Location-wise it’s not so interesting, but frequently running trams are just on the other side of the street and took us to central Sofia in 5-10 minutes. On foot it’s about 20 minutes.

Tanya and Alex helped us with tips during our stay, answering our questions almost immediately - impressive. All in all an awesome way of experiencing the fascinating city of Sofia for the first time.", "Beautiful apartment, amazing hosts", "Accurate step by step guide with photos self check in . Vintage apartment , vintage elevator , hip & modern interior design of apartment , love the smeg pink fridge , kettle , toaster . Location nearby Mall (3 minutes walk ), to metro (5minutes walk). Free parking .", "RECOMEND!!!", "Tanya and Alex’s apartment is centrally located in Sofia. It’s an amazing place with so many little special details. We loved the modern/mid century feeling of the place. 
The place was very clean and the communication with the hosts was very easy and fast. We are definitely going back to them...what a special place. Thank you again!", "Very nice place. The beds are very good and everything is clean. Good location close to the metro. We loved it!", "Everything about this place is fantastic! Great location! Fantastic beds and shower!  Very spacious bedrooms and the kitchen has everything you need! 
There is a Billa supermarket across the street in the shopping mall and a Lidl just around the corner.
I would 100% recommend staying here!", "Great stay. Great location. Stylish apartment. Friendly & helpful host.", "The place is very stylish but still has a home feeling and is very functional. 
The kitchen was equipped with everything we needed and much more. 
Tanya and Alex were very responsive and helped us order a taxi. 
Overall we had a great experience, highly recommended.", "We spent one night here on a long layover. Don't let the building fool you, the apartment is BEAUTIFUL. It is so nicely decorated and trendy! It had everything we needed and the bed is super comfy! Self-check in was a plus due to our 3am arrival and the hosts were great by accommodating a late check-out for us!", "Possitive things: 

decoration of the flat really nice and warming
sunny, nice view.
big beds
quiet
location ok, close to metro
really good description to enter in the flat", "An absolutely lovely, clean and well located apartment. It's decor is quirky and homely. Tanya and Alex were great hosts giving clear instructions on how to get into the apartment, even answering our call and being very helpful when we struggled to open the door! Thank you!!", "Very nice apartment in a good location and very very comfortable beds!", "If you are in Sophia you need to book this place. Felt like home the entire time and the host were responsive and clear. Beds are so comfy :). The neighborhood was perfect for our purposes! Also,if you’re traveling from the states be mindful of pins on (Hidden by Airbnb) maps they may be slightly off!", "We had a lovely stay at Tanya & Alex's apartment. It was very spacious and comfortable and very nicely furnished - a very pleasant place to come to after arriving late in Sofia (and back to after sightseeing all day). The apartment was in a great location and only a short walk to the nearest Metro station - super easy to get to from the airport, and also for travelling around the city. We also appreciated the local tips left for us and tried several recommendations! It was just a shame we could not stay longer! We would highly recommend this apartment.", "Second stay. as great as the first visit.
", "We really enjoyed our stay here. Easy to get onto local metro station to go around the city, clean and modern apartment, lots of good tips from the owners. Would definitely go back and stay here.", "Wonderful modern apartment. everything you would need. Excellent communication and directions. very helpful local tips.  recommended", "Our stay in Tanya & Alex’s apartment was very enjoyable. Great location. Walking distance to Shopping Centre and Metro Station. Spacious and clean apartment with lovely artistic decor.", "Very nice appartement , only 5 min.walk to Subway , (Billa)Supermarket across the street,quiet house , appartement is on top floor with elevator(what an intersting piece of machinery) , so you don´t really hear 
the traffic , nice beds ,very tastefully furnished, luxury bathroom . wonderful location to start sightseeing from .You can get cheaper appartements in Sofia, but this one is worth every € .    Luxury .We felt very much at home . Alex and Tanya couldn´t greet us on our arrival , but they sent us a fantastically clear manual via airbnb how to get the key and into the appartement . Until next time ! ", "Tanya & Alex’s apartment is exactly what it is shown in their pictures. It is very pretty and artistically decorated. 

You will have everything you need and more to make your stay enjoyable. The apartment is so comfortable that during the hot summer day, I was reluctant to leave the comfort of the apartment. 

The apartment is just located opposite the mall with everything you will need there. It is also within walking distance of major tourist sites in Sofia. 

Would definitely want to stay here again if I’m coming back to Sofia. ", "Beautiful stylish and very clean flat! Just as on the pictures! It felt like going back in time! Conveniently located with private parking! I would totally recommend this place!", "Lovely stylish, clean and modern apartment near the city center of Sofia. Communication and checkin were perfect. Would definitely
recommend staying here!", "We've had a very pleasant stay in this apartment - perfect central location, private secure parking, stylish and cosy place, we've felt like visiting friends. Definitely recommend!", "Extremely cool and well designed flat, a little gem in a "characteristic" building not so far from the city center. 
Thank you Tanya and Alex for give us the opportunity to stay in this little piece of art.", "Tanya and Alex’s place is the perfect location to base yourself when visiting Sofia. They were both so helpful in providing us with information about the local areas. The appartment is very stylish and clean and close to all the major attractions which are all walking distance. We would gladly stay again. ", "My husband and I stayed here for one night before moving on from Sofia. It was one of the nicest air bnbs we have stayed in: spotless, very stylish and with a high quality coffee machine, very fast washing machine and other amenities. 

The building itself was hard to recognise from the outside as we couldn’t see a building number, but on the apartment panel to the left of the door, we saw “Alex and Tanya” next to the number. The gate is metal with some graffiti on it - so you can recognise it this way. The self check-in was quick and easy. 

Highly recommended! ", "This beautifully styled apartment is very clean, cozy and met all our needs in Sofia!  We took their recommendations for activities and restaurants and were very happy with what they suggested.  This apartment is close to all amenities and conveniently located across from the mall of Sofia.  Tanya and Alex were very quick to respond to my messages and very helpful.  Would definitely recommend if you are visiting the city!", "Great value for the amount of space. Very clean and comfortable. ", "Beautiful apartment, walking distance from the city centre, opposite a major mall, easy access to public transport. Very much enjoyed our stay!", "Great apartment, very stylish and comfortable. We really appreciated the lovely coffee machine too! Communication was great and easy pick up of the keys. All in all I would definitely recommend this apartment.", "Great overall experience!", "A stylish place to stay in Sofia. It has mostly everything you could need. Although it’s a little bit outside the center, the area always felt very safe and accessible. Tanya and Alex were also quick to answer any questions.", "Brilliant apartment.. loved it.. just as described..very well decorated and close to the centre.. great check in ..you have the door code so no issues with the time that you arrive.. Will be back..", "Stylish apartment next to the Sofia mall, comfortable beds, nice woodwork throughout, close to metro and taxi stand. Kids park behind the mall with a green area. Great coffee shop just down stairs. Happy restaurant in the mall was our favourite. People in the area are friendly. So far our best airbnb! ", "The place that Alex and Tanya are renting out is (are) really fantastic. Clean, modern, stylish, good location. Can absolutely recommend them as hosts!", "Great place and help from hosts with local tips and when we needed to check out a bit later. Would come again!", "This flat is pretty close to the perfect AirBnb. Modern and stylish but with all the practical amenities you need for a comfortable stay (e.g., a well equipped kitchen, a decent TV, good AC). The location is great. There is even parking, which can otherwise be challenging in Sofia. Although we didn't have the chance to meet Tanya and Alex they were extremely quick to respond to messages during our stay. We wouldn't hesitate to stay again next time we're in Sofia.

The only thing I would point out is that the elevator up to the flat is ancient and makes all kinds of interesting creaky noises when in operation. It works just fine but if you are generally nervous about elevators you may struggle with this one.", "A lovely apartment opposite the Mall of Sofia and a 10 minute walk to the centre of the city. Not that easy to find but when you open the front door you get a lovely surprise with how nicely Tanya and Alex have decorated and furnished their apartment. Recommended, as is Sofia, which has so few tourists compared to other capital cities in the area, but is well worth a visit. ", "The place is in a very good location, opposite to Sofia mall, 20 minutes and 15 lev by taxi from airport.  Very walkable within the city, otherwise 3 Lev taxi take you to all the attractions. 
The check in instruction is clear so it was easy to get in. The place is really tastefully renovated and clean.  Beds are very comfortable. Highly recommended.", "This is a truly beautiful Appartement! You can easily stay with up to four people, the citchen is fully equipped and it was definately one of the cleanest and most stylish appartment i ever had the luck to stay in. The communication was fast and easy, you live about Ten to fifteen minutes from the City Centre, a supermarket is nearby. Thanks a lot again!", "We had a fantastic time in Sofia and at Tanya and Alex place! Thank you very much for the quick and easy communication! Highly recomendable.", "We loved staying at Tanya and Alex's stylish apartment. It was in a central location and we felt very comfortable. Would highly recommend.", "Sparkling clean flat with last minute reservation and easy check-in. Tanya & Alex’s place had everything we looked for and we had a great time in Sofia. 5-stars!", "Lovely place, great hosts, comfy beds!", "Tanya and Alex's apartment is in a great location, excellently decorated with great designed furniture and very clean and tidy. Alex took us to the gypsy flea market which was a highlight of our trip - I would suggest everyone to go there! Alex's local knowledge was very useful and he recommended good places to eat and drink. The metro station is close by, which goes straight to the airport, and there are buses and trams very close so it is easy to get around. I would definitely stay here again if I came back to Sofia.", "We loved our stay! Everything was perfect! Location was great, communication always on time, check-in and check-out process really convenient, decor unique, cleanliness a pleasure, amenities and atmosphere on point! Our little one loved the type writer and the little touches around the apartment We'd definitely stay here again! Well done guys! ", "Guys that was lovely flat and adorable design with small details) I m in love with ur fridge! Thank u)", "Alex & Tanya we’re very helpful hosts. The apartment was great, had everything we needed for a short break!", "Everything was amazing! The apartment is even better than the pictures and super clean. Is located on the center, 200 meters away from a metro station,with a parking lot for my car. Since the first step you make when entry the apartment, it feels like Home . Unfortunately I haven’t met Alex and Tanya but they were there for me answering every Question and providing whatever i needed. They even let me check out 2 hours later when i asked to. When i come back in Sofia, trying to book their apartment it will be my first priority . Overall , a great experience.", "We enjoyed our stay very much in this very lovely apartment. Everything is as shown in the photos plus a warm homey atmosphere which was welcoming after a long day exploring this great city. Tastefully decorated, not cluttered with a nice kitchen and everything was very clean.

We walked everywhere, about 20 mins to the centre and the convenience of Sofia Mall right across the road is a plus with Bilia in the basement level for your groceries. 

Tanya and Alex was very quick with their responses and the restaurant suggestions  was very much appreciated. We definitely recommend going to Ashurbanipal on Kynaz Boris aside from the great food the owner ( cook and waiter) is quite a character and definitely adds to the experience! Also the free Sofia walking tour and free Balkan bites tour, fabulous! Highly recommend this apartment for your stay in Sofia!", "We had a great time at the appartment of Tanya and Alex and would totally recommend it to my friends and family (and blog followers!). It's very modern, spacious and had everything you need. We felt very safe in the neighbourhood and felt very welcomed by Alex!", "I stayed to time in Tanya & Alex apartment. I would not stay anywhere else in Sofia, it is perfectly located and perfectly cosy and sweet with a lovely decoration. The sun light enlights it, crossing from East to West. I had the chance to experience some of the addresses recommended and that made also our stay delightful. Thank you very much for having us. I would recommend to all not to miss the chance to stay here. Kind regards.", "Tanya and Alex apartment is located in front the Mall of Sofia, there you can find all kind of shops and a supermarket.. 5 min. walking distance from metro station which is one stop from Serdika city center and 30 min. from city center. The apartment is on the 5th floor and it is well furnished. Check in is by lock box.", "This apartment is a cosy sweet home which is well located in the city. Sun shine in the room was so pleasant to meet the delightful tonality of the decoration. It's a quite and confortable nest in an historical building. What I miss in the organisation is not to had a drink with Tanya & Alex...", "Tanya & Alex’s apartment was perfect for the four of us. Having breakfast together in the kitchen and lounging in the living room and the two bedrooms fitted us perfectly. It was very quiet on the fifth floor, the sounds from the street very distant. 
Having Sofia Mall across the street with the Billa supermarket, shops and Happy Grill restaurant was great. We found that we could buy the daily transport card (4 lev) from the little kiosk on Opalchenska street outside the Mall. We used the tram and metro to go downtown when we didn't walk the 20 minutes to get there.
We can recommend the 33 Gastronauts restaurant, very cool and cosy with great food and the Rainbow Factory café was a very nice find too.
We will definitely choose one of Tanya & Alex’s apartments the next we are in Sofia.", "Everything was perfect! We love the design inside and it’s super clean!!! We had a great stay!!!", "This apartment is by far the best apartment that I have ever been in during my time using Airbnb. The location is very good, just in front of the Mall of Sofia. The communication with Alex was wonderful as he was very quick to respond to everything. If you are traveling with a car this is the place to go to!  In addition, the place is spotless cleaned and offers everything that you could need. Our stay at this apartment was more like an experience in its own way because every detail in this apartment is so thoughtful, you simply dont want to leave and just want to stay inside and enjoy the coziness and warmth that the ambient reflects. I would like to say thank you to both Alex and Tanya for making our stay so good and worth it.  I definitely recommend this place to anyone!", "Tanya and Alex are great hosts. They provide all the information you need and will reply quickly to anything you ask. Their place is just like in the pictures, only with even more nice details! It was clean and well equipped. It’s easy to get there from the airport and easy to get around in the city. We can recommend this place to anyone travelling to Sofia!", "Perfect place!", "Great apartment in the center of Sofia with a parking space. Easy check in, clean and a distinctive style. Beds were very comfy.", "This apartment is a gem of a find close to everything that matters in central Sofia.  The modern upgrades make sure you have everything you will need for a short stay or a longer stay in Sofia.", "A very beautiful apartment with its own parking spot. Everything is as described. Tanya and Alex responded  immediately to our messages and were very helpful. I would recommended it if you visit Sofia.", "The appartment was perfect for my 2 days un", "Stunning host and outstanding and spotless new apart from Alex in best location in Center Sofia  . i know Alex a few years now , he is always a true pro and wonderful host .", "It's a nice and cosy apartment with great beds and a perfect shower. A good place to take a rest after a long day of visiting the city. The facilities are good if you want to make your own food.
We really liked to go to the fleamarket with Alex as our guide. 
The apartment is near the metrostation and a supermarket and close to the city.
We also liked the tips in the guide for places to eat or to buy local stuff.
It really is a nice place to stay if you want to visit Sofia", "Attention to detail, this is what mostly differentiates this amazing apartment! From the coffee creamers left to supplement my morning wake-up ritual, to spare bulbs in the drawer just in case, or a hairdryer, or thick curtains for a good sleep, to shampoo & shower gel in the bathroom or tea or comfy slippers...the comfort is greater than expected. 

It is our second time in this apartment and certainly not the last one. Thank you, Tanya and Alex, for being such great ambassadors of Sofia.", "This beautiful apartment and the hosts are the epitome of Airbnb perfection. Gorgeous mid century design, warm and cosy ambience, comfy bedrooms, small but well designed bathroom and kitchen with everything you need to comfortably enjoy staying at home while perfectly located in the centre of the city to access all the sights and cool restaurants in Sofia. The check in process was super easy thanks to Alex and he was always quick to respond to any questions we had. We even loved our stay so much we booked another week in their other gorgeous Airbnb apartment! These guys have also gone to the effort of creating a great guide to Sofia as well as provide a cool flea market tour. If you’re into mid century design and appreciate thoughtful touches and great hospitality then this is the perfect Airbnb experience for you. Thank you Tanya and Alex!!", "Cosy, stylish, with a heart & soul and an individual touch...we could go on like this for a long time, as this apartment is a true jewel in the centre of Sofia.

Immaculate communication, cleanness, proximity and you name it. Basically, you get the point - we highly recommend this place.", "Very clean and organized apartment! Perfect location!", "This is the best and only place to stay in Sofia! Five stars, ticks all the boxes. Very stylish, lots of space! Tanya & Alexander are great: nice and communicative. The apartment is brand new so super clean, its very quiet and the beds are sooo comfy with great smelling soft sheets. 
On saturday morning Alex took us to the gypsy market wich is a very cool expierence. We’ll be back in Sofia with Tanya and Alex for sure!", "Die Wohnung hat eine tolle Lage, ist sehr genau beschrieben und ist ein Besuch wert. Mein Aufenthalt in Sofia war mit einer Familienfeier verbunden, aber die tolle Tips von Tanya und Alex helfen für viele schöne Erlebnisse. Sie sind jeder Zeit zu erreichen und reagieren schnell auf alle Fragen. Nicht zu unterschätzen ist die Parkmöglichkeit im Hof und die gut beschriebene unkomplizierte Schlüsselübergabe.", "El departamento de Tanya y Alex es muy cómodo, ideal para grupos de hasta 4 personas. Está completamente reciclado y decorado teniendo en cuenta hasta el más mínimo detalle. La ubicación es buena, tiene un centro comercial enfrente y se llega,  caminando, en 15 minutos al centro histórico. 
Si bien, nunca los conocí personalmente, la comunicación con Tanya y Alex fue muy buena.", "Prachtig en stijlvol ingericht appartement, misschien nog wel mooier dan op de foto's. Hoewel we heb niet in real live hebben gezien, ging de communicatie met Alex en Tanya vlot. Vanuit het appartement sta je in een kwartier wandelen midden in de binnenstad van Sofia. Dankzij het winkelcentrum aan de overkant zit een supermarkt dichtbij. Geen zin om te wandelen? Het dichtstbijzijnde metrostation is maar 3 minuten lopen. Een klein minpunt was de kleine badkamer, waardoor douchen al snel een waterballet werd. Daar was overigens op geanticipeerd met een prima trekker.", "Unfassbar schöne Wohnung! Hochwertig, komfortabel und geschmackvoll ausgestattet.", "Mooi appartement met goede bedden en alle voorzieningen. Het gebouw zelf doet heel erg denken aan de voorbije communistische tijden, iets wat de verrassing van het mooi ingerichte appartement alleen maar groter maakt.", "Πολυ καλη επιλογη για διαμονη στο κεντρο της πολης! Ευκολη προσβαση με το μετρο και τραμ!Ηρεμη περιοχη,διπλα στο mall!", "Es erwartet euch eine sehr schöne und geschmackvolle Unterkunft, die einen den Trubel der Stadt vergessen lässt. Alles ist genau so wie angegeben, nämlich wunderbar. ", "Diese Unterkunft ist wirklich besonders schön. Liebevoll und geschmackvoll eingerichtet, sehr sauber und entspricht absolut den Bildern und der Beschreibung.
Alex und Tanya sind sehr freundliche und zuverlässige Gastgeber. Sie beantworten alle Fragen schnell und haben tolle Tips für den Aufenthalt in Sofia und Umgebung.
Wir würden jederzeit wieder buchen und können diese Unterkunft jedem wärmstens empfehlen!!!", "Wir durften dank dieser wunderschönen Wohnung einen sehr schönen Kurztrip in Sofia genießen. Die Beschreibung der Wohnung war sehr genau, toller Stil, bequeme Betten und eine exzellente Lage. Dank 3 Klimaanlagen in der Wohnung sowie Verdunkelungsvorhänge  konnte man nach langer Nacht in der Clubs von Sofia mitten im Sommer entspannt schön ausschlafen. Jederzeit empfehlenswert! Danke ", "Très belle découverte. Je recommande cet appartement à la fois bien situé et très agréable. Le design est particulièrement remarquable ", "Appartement très bien situé, très propre et très élégant, dans un style années soixante raffiné avec certains objets d’époque mais tout le nécessaire à la vie moderne. Les locaux communs sont très anciens et l’ascenseur est assez surprenant... mais la localisation est impeccable, et il y a tout ce qu’il faut à proximité pour le petit dej. ", "Vlotte manier van inchecken. Zeer net en stijlvol appartement met 2 grote slaapkamers . Zeer goed bed! Babybed stond klaar. Op wandelafdtand van metro (5 min.). Goeie douche! Wel vreemd dat je hele badkamer nat wordt maar hadden we bij al onze verblijven in Bulgarije. Goeie tips om Sofia te ontdekken. ", "Квартира очень уютная, просторная и 100% чистая!
Есть все для комфортного  проживания: кофемашина, утюг, фен, стиральная машина, тостер). Интернет работает отлично! В здании есть лифт!!! Напротив находится торговый центр с большим супермаркетом, рядом рынок (фрукты и овощи) 5 минут, станция метро 2 минуты, до исторического центра 10 - 15 мин пешком (все достопримечательности и улица Витоша с ресторанами).
Татьяна и Алекс спасибо за быстрые ответы!", "Αν και δεν γνβρισαμε την Tanya&Alex ηταν πολυ εξυπηρετικοί. Αμεση απαντηση στα μηνύματά μας, το σπιτι πολυ καθαρό,όμορφο και ακριβώς οπως οι φωτογραφίες! Το συστήνω!", "Zeer mooi en aangenaam verblijf in het centrum van Sofia. Alles wat je nodig hebt is aanwezig in dit kraaknette appartement. Het leuke interieur zorgt voor een zeer ontspannen sfeer. Fijne lectuur is aanwezig en info om je verblijf in Sofia aangenaam te maken. Het boekje op het nachttafeltje met hippe barretjes, restaurantjes en shop adressen was zeer welkom. 
Kortom een absolute aanrader voor wie een bezoekje wil brengen aan deze hoofdstad! 
 ", "Casa pulita accogliente e in posizione ottima! Grazie di tutto", "Muy buen apartamento, todo como se describe y muy limpio."]
