reviews:
["Nikolai was very accommodating and helped us check in even though we arrived in the middle of the night! Friendly and understanding host", "The Apartment is pretty nice. You can walk in a few minutes to the center of Sofia.", "The place was nice, big and comfortable. In a great location very close to cathederal. I really enjoyed the cable TV. There were not many amenities, kettle etc. and the building itself didn’t feel very safe but the studio was spacious and relaxing", "Very close to the center, looks like the pic and Nikolai was a very nice Host , he was helping  me with all
The details that i need it", "An extremely spacious studio apartment, recently done-up for Airbnb (by the looks of it). Bed area is lovely, and the overall design modern. Bathroom is small but perfectly adequate. Kitchen is fully equipped with coffee machine etc (but no coffee!), but there is only one (tabletop) hob, so would probably not plan to cook a large or complex meal here. Overall, great for a romantic getaway, thanks!", "The apartment is very nice. You have everything you need and it’s next to the city center. Nikolai is a nice person, he helped us with the transportation from the Airbnb to the airport. Strongly recommend. ", "The location of the apartament is really good, it is very central. The only thing that I didn´t like of this apartment is that the floor of the shower is the same that the floor of the bathroom. But even though I think it´s worth it to stay here ;)", "T*O*P", "La habitación está muy bien, para dos personas muy amplia con todos los servicios(lavadora, secador, toallas varias, jabón y champú, terraza, menaje...) Además estaba todo muy limpio y la ubicación estaba en un buen punto! Nikolai muy amable, nos facilitó la llegada y acudió a nuestro encuentro de madrugada!", "Appartement très bien situé en centre ville mais donne sur le boulevard donc un peu bruyant la nuit. Prévoir des boules quies si vous avez le sommeil léger.", "El apartamento está muy bien ubicado. Puedes visitar el centro sin necesidad de coger coche o tranvía. 

", "El alojamiento es tal y como aparece en la descripción. Desplazarse a los lugares de interés está al alcance de un paseo tranquilo. Sin duda es una buena opción para viajeros solitarios, parejas e incluso parejas con bebé como nosotros"]

reviews:
["great place! nice host! :)))", "Excelent place for business travels, perfect location with good connections for public transport and nearby pubs and restaurants.", "We really enjoyed Anris apartment as a base for our trip to Sofia. It was very easy to find, and the private off road parking was perfect. It was a two minute walk to Eagles bridge, where you can pick the metro up and this is only 1.60 Lev to the airport and various other stops. A 15 / 20 minute walk will take you into the centre of Sofia. The street at the end of the road, has many shops, restaurants and bars along it, and we particularly enjoyed The Art club as it was quirky, with mellow jazz music and did great cocktails! 

Be careful of the small step between the kitchen and lounge as it's easy to miss, as its all in the same coloured tiles. My son fell and did hurt himself. Perhaps a strip of tape along the edge to hi-light the height difference might help.", "Awesome place and location!", "The place is surprisingly big but also very cosy. The fireplace makes you feel at home and you can enjoy a great view as the flat is faced towards one of the best parks in town. To add to that, the location is right in the city center giving many opportunities to explore the vibes of the town. Not to worry at all about security and comfort as this apartament has it all including not just the fireplace but electrical heating. Bed was super comfy and it was quiet at night. Mind that there are 2 bathrooms, one of which has its own bathtub! Hosts were charming and welcoming, quick to respond and mindful. Gems like these are why I use airbnb.", "Great Location, Superb apartment in one of the best districts in Sofia.", "The apartment is great. Recommend it to anyone who wants to have a real pleasure of his stay in the centre of the city", "This apartment is in a great location, near shops, the metro etc and within easy walking distance of the main attractions. With two bathrooms and two large bedrooms this was an excellent base for our trips around Sofia and further afield. Anri, our host, was very friendly and informative. If you want to visit Sofia this is the place to stay", "One of the coziest places I had been to. Outstanding location, great and considerate host, and unforgettable memories. Really looking forward to visiting Anri’s place again soon.", "Great place if you're staying in Sofia!  Anri is very professional and thoughtful.  No complaints from me", "This was a super comfortable and stylish apartment nice and close to the center of Sophia, but around the corner from a bunch of little stores and bars, etc.  A nice deep bathtub, a little balcony, and a well equipped kitchen.  I highly recommend this place.", "The place was extremely clean, spacious, stylish and very comfortable! The location is superb - central and across from some lovely parks, yet still the apt. was quiet. Anri was a very responsive host and was available every time we had a question by email or phone. We stayed with our toddler and we had everything we needed. Wonderful stay!!!", "Full marks! Sensational apartment, great location. I will definitely be back!", "Colour home is a lovely spacious apartment with a nice little balcony. Very clean and comfortable. 

Easy to check-in and out and great communication with Anri the host. 

Close to the metro but also walking distance from the centre. Lots of attractions on the way.", "Couldn't have asked for a better apt.! The location was amazing, the apartment was gorgeous, it met all of our needs!! Easy to get anywhere from here! Bonus was a gourmet restaurant right next door!!! :) This apt. is a Must when in Sofia!", "Specious and comfortable apartment. Great response from the host. Would definitely recommend.", "Great location, the most beautiful park in Sofia is just across the street, public transportation is 2 mins walking, 10 mins walking to the heart of Sofia, convenient parking, the apartment is spacious and clean. recommended", "Nice appartment complete with all services & stuff very comfortable and quiet. Good communication and flexibility.Greateful to be hosted
 there. Very recommendable!
", "Nice place in a nice area", "The apartment is very comfortable and has a perfect location. Anri is very well organised and cares about details. I happened to lose the key to the apartment (sorry Anri!) a day before my departure, but a spare key was available in a code box, so there was no problem to access the flat nevertheless. I'm very happy that the key was finally found (by the neighbors) and that Anri had to issue with changing the lock because of me.
The recommendations of visits are useful and accurate. I didn't pay much attention to them at first but it turned out that I discovered myself part of those places and they were, indeed, to recommend.
I will miss Sofia!
", "This apartment is as good as it looks in the pictures. It is a large and stylish place in an excellent location very close to the city centre, so it is perfect for exploring Sofia on foot. Highly recommended!", "A warm comfortable and roomy Apartment in a great location. The host Anri is genuinely interested in ensuring his guests enjoy their stay in Sofia. He is communicative, friendly and extremely helpful in providing any sort of information about the city. Highly recommended.", "This is a spacious apartment in a great location. Clean, comfortable and with good air-conditioning. Easy walking distance to parks and the main sights. Anri was an excellent host and always responded quickly to our questions. ", "Anri was very welcoming and his apartment was great, comfortable with lots of space and a great base to explore Sofia from. ", "This is a well equipped apartment perfect for two couples. It has an excellent location near the city centre with lots of restaurants, shops, cafes and a park nearby. Private parking is a bonus.", "Anri is a very generous host, very responsive and willing to be of assistance.  The apartment is very nice and roomy and it is in the perfect location, very close to downtown and it's off a street that lots of little shops, bakeries, wine stores, excellent bannitsa (our favorite).  We would definitely enjoy staying here again!", "Anri is a great host! It was a pleasure for us to stay at his nice home.
The apartment has everything you need and the location is top!

Thank you Anri", "Very nice place with good location. Family friendly. Anri is great host who reacts immoderately to all requests", "This is the only place you should stay in Sofia.

The location was fantastic with everything you need, just a stones throw away.

The place itself is very large and beautifully decorated.

The balcony was a perfect place to have coffee in the morning and a drink in the evening after a busy day of activities around the Sofia area.

Parking is great, as it can be hard to find a place a park in Sofia. Everything is walkable from the apartment. 

Would 100% reccommend to all friends and family.

Thanks Anri", "Perfect spot, very nice apartment and very friendly and helpful owner!", "We loved our stay here. We had our toddler with us, and they were sweet enough to add a cradle for her and some toys. The place is the perfect distance to everything and it’s literally right by to an amazing cocktail bar/ dinner place called the happy pig, where we went 3 times out of the 4 days. We had a car and they also arranged a private parking spot. The day we had in Sofia, we could walk around everywhere to all the main attractions. There’s a lovely park near by, which was perfect for our lil girl to run around. Highly recommend this place, it’s a cozy apartment with ample places", "Everything about Anri's apartment was first class. It was spacious, airy and clean. Beds were very comfortable and it was quiet at night.  The location is central, with nice local shops, and a short walk to the historic/tourist areas. Check in and communication was straightforward. Highly recommended.", "Anri was very helpful in general and especially in helping with making local excursions, tips on sightseeing. The aparment is great, spacious and clean.", "Anri is such a great host!, he organized a list of restaurants and gave us recommendations where to go etc. I loved the appartment, very comfortable and nice! I would recommend it!", "The best Airbnb experience I've ever had. Awesome communication, cosy and spacious place. Thank you!", "Great flat, very big and comfortable and brilliant value.  (fire can't be used at the moment though which was a shame). Anri was lovely, responded quickly to messages and let us leave our bags in the flat on the last day. It's only a short walk into town and there are a couple of cute/cool bars and decent restaurants a few minutes away. Also very easy to get there on the metro from the airport.", "Anri‘ s Colorhome is a great place should you be visiting Sofia. Close to local shops, the subway station and within walking distance to a good numbers of other local highlights. The apartment is spacious and well-equipped. It is also situated within a very nice part of town.", "Great place great location very cosy.", "Colorhouse really feels like home! It is very well located near the park, markets, restaurant, bars and walking distance from Sofia main attractions. The house is very comfortable, just as in the pictures, big, very well organized , well equipped and clean... Hosts Miglena and Anri are lovely, communicative and made us feel very comfortable! =)", "We really enjoyed our stay and had everything we needed. Anri is a real nice host and we would definitely recommend a stay in his flat!", "Really nice and friendly and Anri was especially helpful in providing us with advice with what to do and where to eat. The flat is also really nice and spacious with all the amenities you could want. I would definitely stay again!", "Anri was super friendly and the appartment was nice, big and clean. It did take me some attempts to figure out how the hob worked but in the end it turned out fine.

The location couldn't be better: right next to the nicest area of the park and close to the center too.

The appartment is huge -I think 4 people could stay comfortably in it.

Perhaps some more kitchen equipment -such as a sieve for draining rice- could make things even better.", "The is big, well equipped and very pleasant.
It is in a great location and have a private parking spot.
We left our car parking and just walked around.
Almost anything interesting in Sofia is within walking distance.

Mariela & Ofir", "Anri is a greathost and his apartment is excellent. Big and cozy an the same time. Next to a beautiful park for your afternoon walk and has sunlight throughout the day. Totally recommend it.", "It could not have been any better. Located minutes away from the main tourist attractions, the place is bigger and better than in the pictures and a great host!

Thanks! we will come back for sure!", "Great place in a great location with an excellent host.", "Nice, central location big apartment, Anri and her family are very friendly. ", "Great host! The place was in excellent condition. Well described and we had a great stay in a great central area. Recommend and will go again when in town. :)", "Anri was great! We loved our stay so much. Anri had city maps, road maps, a list of restaurants, transportation recommendations, nearby pharmacy address, emergency numbers, etc. all printed out for us to use at our convenience. He was very thoughtful and hospitable and we will definitely try to stay here again!! The location is also perfect. Everything is easily within walking distance. He made our trip so much easier than it would have been. I wish I could give more than 5 stars but they don't make more than that! ", "The apartment is perfect and Anri was always helpful with everything. The location is near to the center 10-15 walking. 

We will definitely be back! 

All the best.", "Anything was perfect! One of the best choises for accomodation in Sofia.
Great place in the center of Sofia and opposite the bigest park of the city, 
Nice , secure and with plenty of shops and services neighbourhood!
The apparment is very nice , plenty of space , nice view and fully equiped .
Anri was very helpful and willing to help us!!!", "The neighborhood is just outside the center... about a 15-20 minute walk from the main sights. However, the local neighborhood was quite authentic, and it has plenty of its own character, as well as some good options for food. In fact, one night we walked down Ivan Assen street, AWAY from the city center and discovered some really cute eateries.
Anyway... the place itself was great! Very clean and comfortable! Our hosts were available to answer any question we had, and they were extremely helpful with regards to our entire stay! Great choice!", "My wife and I staied in Ani's place for a few days and we had a great time. The apartment is well equipped, clean and quiet and Anri was very helpful and welcoming. I definitely recommend it for visitors!", "Very nice place Anri is very helpful and welcoming will come again blagodaria ", "Very Nice and clean central place in Sophia!", "Beautiful, luminous and spacious apartment, extremely comfortable, just opposite a big park. ", "Anri is the perfect host - friendly, always willing to help and always giving the info that one needs.

The place is awesome - it is in the city centre, part of an old neighborhood. Everything is within an arms length - nightlife, main bus and metro stops, Sofia university, the Parliament.

It is clean and charming, spacious too.

I enjoyed my stay very much and I hope to be back in colorhome soon.", "Whilst not quite high end, this flat is better as it is so homey and has all one would need for a great stay in Sofia. In a fantastic location for those who like a more individual 'village' feel and enjoy walking, it is very easy to get into a fantastic park that extends to woodland, doesn't take long to walk into the city with the Cathedral close by, and has almost immediate access to the Metro. Spacious, clean, wonderful views of Vitosha and extremely comfortable. The main road is a little noisy but that did not spoil our stay. It was particularly wonderful to have a parking place! Anri provided us with a home from home and we are very grateful.", "Great apartment with all amenities within walking distance of all the major downtown sights. Lots of space, good kitchen, nice balcony. The host was very welcoming and helpful with local information. ", "Great location. The neighborhood is lively and full of restaurants and bars. Andi was very helpful, and the apartment is huge, well equipped and very pleasant to stay. Highly recommended.", "Anri is a very nice and kind person, we had a little problem with the bathroom and he tried to fix it as soon as possible. 
The house is beautiful, clean with every comfort! I'd love my trip in Sofia 
(Thank you a lot, hope to see you soon Anri!)", "Great location, amazing interior and the perfect hosts. It was a great stay, as usual!", "Nice apartment. Anri is a kind host. He offered us his parking space. Generally satisfied", "Great place.  Unique architecture with great lighting and great ambiance including the fireplace and each room having its own distinctive style.  Great neighborhood with most anything you could desire.  Even a few 24 hour restaurants and convenience stores in the area.", "this house is clean and quiet. We like it so much. The host is very kind. ", "Excellent. Good area. Close to centre. Good value. Very spacious. Very clean. Anri very helpful host", "Anri and Miglena have designed and put together an amazing spot for travelers. Location is unbeatable, apartment is spacious and modern, fireplace is a great bonus, the parking spot was super convenient. 
Pro tip: Check out Vlaikova Cinema nearby for independent movies and coffee with friends.", "It's a very spacious and clean flat. Great Wifi. The location itself is great. Though it's quiet and residential you get a local community feeling with lots of little shops around and nice cafe's and restaurants. You can easily feel like home.  ", "Great place, great location, great host! My first Airbnb experience was more than satisfying. ", "Anri was great. he waited for me outside and helped me with my heavy bags. the Apartment is huge, very clean, heating and chimney works perfectly and when i needed a bigger pot for our cooking anri bought and brought us all we needed. 
The Apartment has a direct view on Vitosha mountain and is very sunny- we enjoyed it very much and are happy to come back soon.", "We went to Sofia for a long weekend and had a lovely stay at Anri's apartment. It was clean, warm, comfortable and the WiFi works very well. There's a great coffee machine too!
The apartment is very close to the centre of Sofia and is within easy walking distance of all the sights. The neighbourhood is nice and there are shops and some good little cafes and restaurants at the end of the road. 
Anri is very helpful and responded to all of our queries very quickly.

We would definitely recommend this apartment! :-)
", "Anri and Miglena were travelling to Sofia from Glasgow on the same flight as us. We met them at the airport and they gave us a lift to the flat. They are wonderful hosts and could not have been more welcoming and helpful, telling us interesting facts about Sofia and the neighbourhood as well as providing us with maps and useful information. 

The flat itself is spacious, beautifully decorated and spotless, with everything that is required for a comfortable holiday.  The WiFi and heating work perfectly. All around this delightful neighbourhood are wonderful shops, bars and restaurants and is well within walking distance to the centre of the beautiful city of Sofia. The amazing transport network is also just a few minutes walk.  What a fabulous apartment!  
I would recommend a holiday in Sofia and definitely to stay with Anri and Miglena.
", "Anri’s flat an amazing place, near to the city center of Sofia. The middle of the apartment a nice live room, and some bedroom around. Good for anybody, who interesting with a friendship company or with family about Sofia. Two bathroom is enough for the quick starting with group also. Parking place all right, and the net is quick enough. Some design details in the flat, for example the lights, and a very nice inside fireplace, but clima technology also available. Everything was clean and all right for using. Suggested place.", "The apartment was clean and neat, all the necesseties like towels and hand soap were provided. Anri was already waiting for us to arrive and gave us a little tour around the apartment, he was very helpful. The location is quite close to the city central and in a nice neighborhood! 
Overall it was great and i would very much recommend this apartment, ", "The flat is fantastic, modern, clean, complete, cosy, everything you want ,we had 2 wonderful days", "Anri and his family were amazing, my partner and me were here to celebrate my birthday and they had a birthday present for me with a beautiful card! Anri was waiting for us outside the building, he did the tour of the flat and also gave us key information about the city and reassured us that we were able to contact them anytime (we did not to but it was great to know this was a possibility ).  The flat is very spacious, beautiful floors, great mattress and pillows and kitchen!", "Anri was very friendly and willing to help. He met me on the airport and drove me to the apartment. Communication was easy, he's a guy with great sense of humour and besides he's literary ready to help you with anything that you need! He helped me with the luggage, recommended me some stores around and he even had put some fresh tomatoes from his garden in the refrigerator.

The apartment was great, very stylish interior and it has everything that one can possibly need: large fridge, air conditioner, very good wifi, a washing machine for your clothes, big TV screen that you can use to watch TV and that you can even connect to your computer as well (HDMI cables were there, next to the TV).

Location was also great - the city center, old and charming neighbourhood.

I highly recommend both the apartment and the host! I will try to book that apartment every time when I visit Bulgaria.", "When you opeb the door and see 2 people who gives you a few smiles you stay is staying verry good.", "I came to Sofia with one colleague for working purposes, and we found this flat to be a perfect spot for visiting the city and also for working, as it was fully furnished, very clean, located nearby the city center, in a nice neighbourhood with many restaurants and shops. 
It was also a perfect place to work as the internet connection worked pretty fast.
The hosting couple was friendly and welcoming, they supported us with all our questions about the city and the restaurants.
I highly recommend this place.", "We stayed at Colorhome for three nights. The aparment is very nice, spacious, clean, modern. It is located in a very central area, close to sights, coffee houses and restaurants. There is a fully equipped kitchen, there was even coffee left for us. 
Even though we didn't meet Anri and Miglena, the communication was impeccable prior to and during our stay. 
We highly recommend Colorhome to anyone looking for a place to stay in Sofia. ", "Anri was wonderfully helpful and friendly. He responded quickly to my communications with him.
The flat was large clean comfortable and had everything we needed for our comfort. The neighborhood is great and has shops and restaurants in less than 5 minutes walk. It's also only a 15 minute walk to the city centre. There is a major road less than 100 metres away but as long as we kept the windows closed the noise didn't bother us. I would definitely recommend this listing.", "We had an excellent time at Anri's place! We traveled to Sofia to see the city for a few short days and he was extremely helpful. Anri had maps and guides ready for us, and made up feel completely at home. The place is a great location, very clean and pristine. I would recommend Anri's apartment to anyone! We will definitely be visiting again on our return to Sofia.
Thank you Anri!
Daniel and Jessica. ", "Anri is a wonderful host, easy to communicate with, was flexible with check in and out times and genuinely made every effort to ensure we had a pleasant stay.
The apartment is beautiful and very comfortable, all appliances, including the air conditioner worked well, and the internet is fast.
The location of the apartment is central, close to everything, but on a quiet street off the main thoroughfare.
Overall, this spacious two bedroom, two bathroom apartment offers great value and guarantees a comfortable stay - highly recommend it!", "We were anri's first guests and he was very welcoming and accommodating. The apartment was spacious, stunning, modern and very clean. For the price it was fantastic value. The location was superb and all the main sites were within walking distance. It was also close to supermarkets and restaurants and a park, which was a great place to relax  in the evening. The balcony was also a great place to chill after a long day. Anri Is a very friendly, warm and welcoming person and we could have sat chatting with him for hours! We hope to see him very soon! All in all we highly recommend his apartment as a place to stay in Sofia", "Anri è una persona cordiale e ospitale. Ci rivolgiamo ai suoi servizi ogni volta quando il nostro team management soggiorna a Sofia. Consigliamo caldamente Anri e Colorhome alle persone che stanno organizzando un viaggio in Bulgaria.", "è la seconda volta che il nostro team management allogia nel Colorhome. Ringraziamo Anri per l'ospitalità, cordialità e e la precisione...come sempre :-)", " Buongiorno Anri,
Grazie per l'accoglienza riservata al team management di R2 Consulting. Il Colocrome è caldamente consigliato per la sua posizione centrale, dalla quale è possibile arrivare a piedi nei punti principali di Sofia e godere le ore libere dal lavoro. Ben collegato  con i  mezzi di trasposto pubblico ci ha permesso di raggiungere l'ufficio con facilità. Grazie della Sua cordialità, attentenzione alle varie esigenze e atmosfera confortevole della casa. Ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo!
Presto ci incontreremo di nuovo!
Zornitsa Stoilova

", "Ottima posizione, appartamento bello spazioso con 2 bagni! Parcheggio gratuito sotto casa, senza problemi di cercare posto", "Рекомендую! Вы будете приятно удивлены!", "Super Wohnung ! Einfach empfehlenswert!! Wir kommen sicher gerne wieder!", "L'appartement d'anri est très confortable, bien équipé et plein de charme.
Idéalement situé pour les visites du centre historique.
Excellent accueil d'anri.", "Τέλειο διαμέρισμα ιδανικό ακόμα και για οικογένεια ή για 2 ζευγάρια. Το διαμέρισμα προσφέρει όλες τις ανέσεις και βρίσκεται σε πολύ καλό σημείο.
Ο Anri είναι πολύ καλός οικοδεσπότης και απόλυτα συνεργάσιμος και αξιόπιστος.", "Posizione fantastica e accoglienza totale. Nessuno ci ha disturbati, siamo stati benissimo. Consiglio a tutti!", "Vielleicht die beste Wohnung in Sofia. Anri is sehr freundlich, lieb, blitz schnell beim Check-in und alle andere Nachfragen. 
Die Wohnung war so sauber und schön eingerichtet, mit hübshem Balkon. Ganz viel Raum und sogar mit einem Kamin. 
Die Lage ist einfach top, die Viertel ist wundervoll zum Spazieren, schöne Restaurants, einer direkt an der Ecke, gegenüber ist der wundervolle Park - Furst Boris' Garten mit noch weitere Lokals und Bars. 
Einfach eine Rarität sogar für den Airbnb.
Herzlichen Dank Anri

Immer wieder gerne in Sofia! 

Lyubomir", "这个房源离古城步行有30多分钟的路程,没有公共交通工具｡", "Στο σπίτι του Anri περάσαμε ένα πολύ όμορφο και χαλαρωτικό τριήμερο!  Το σπίτι ήταν πολύ άνετο, καθαρό και ταυτόχρονα τόσο οικείο όσο το σπίτι μας! Το σπίτι βρίσκετε σε κομβικό σημείο τόσο κοντά  στο αεροδρόμιο όσο  και στο κέντρο της πόλης, ενώ ακριβώς από πάνω βρίσκετε  στάση  του κ τρένου  και  του  λεωφορείου(έκανε την μεταφορά μας εύκολη). Ο Anri παρα το ότι φτάσαμε αργά το βράδυ, ήταν εκεί να μας καλωσορίσει στο χώρο του αλλά και στην πόλη του. Μας έδωσε χρήσιμες συμβουλές και τοπικές πληροφορίες για να κινηθούμε ,να φάμε αλλά και να θαυμάσουμε τα αξιοθέατα της πόλης. Ακόμη, υπήρχε πολύ καλή και άμεση επικοινωνία μαζί του. Αν επέλεγα να ξανά πάω στη Σόφια σίγουρα θα ξανά επέλεγα το colorhome.
Anri σε ευχαριστούμε, 
Kostas, Mary, Dennis.", "Sehr schöne Wohnung :)", "Immer wieder toll:super gelegen,nahe oborishte und park,viele geschäfte in der nähe. Die wohnung ist sehr sauber,sonnig und grosszügig im vergleich zu anderen wohnungen in sofia.

Anri ist sehr nett. Und zuvorkommend!", "Die wohnung ist in einem angenehmen quartier gelegen,zentrum ist ein spaziergang von 15 minuten entfernt. Nahe der stark befahrenen strasse und dennoch ist es friedlich auf dem sonnigen balkon zu sitzen. Immer wieder sehr gerne kommen wir hierherher zu miglena und anri!", "Mon fils et son ami, qui arrivaient pour le programme Erasmus,  ont passé un excellent séjour chez Anri . L'appartement est impeccable , conforme à la description et bien situé . Anri est très prévenant et toujours à l'écoute ; il a été très arrangeant avec eux ; c'est une adresse que nous retiendrons et que nous recommandons vivement !", "El departamento de Anri, está muy bien ubicado, es cómodo, amplio y muy bien equipado. Anri fue muy amable, nos dio buenas recomendaciones y desde el apartamento pudimos recorrer Sofia sin problemas. Muy recomendable!", "Appartement et accueil parfait !!! rien a dire de plus a par qu'enri nous a très bien accueillies. je recommande fortement", "harmonische Inneneinrichtung, perfekte Citylage, Siebträger-Espressomaschine, Bad und Gäste-Wc, offener Kamin, gute Doppelbetten, Sicht auf Vitosha", "Estuvimos muy  bien! Todo igual que en la descripción! Uno de los mejores apartamentos donde hemos estado! Gracias!", "조용한 동네에 위치해 있지만 근처에 바와 영화관, 슈퍼 모든 편의시절이 있습니다. 바로 앞에 지하철이 있어 편리합니다. 숙소는 완벽했습니다. 편안한 거실, 좋은 전망을 가진 발코니, 따듯한 방, 넓은 욕실!
반드시 불가리아를 다시 방문할 거에요. 그리고 다시 이 숙소에 머물고 싶습니다!", "Locatie dicht bij centrum en vlak naast winkelstraatje. Ruime woning met goede voorzieningen. Enige minpunt is de ingang van het huizenblok. Gelegen aan de achterzijde, slecht betegeld en onverlicht.", "Het contact met Anri werkte perfect hij heeft ons vee dingen over wat we wel en niet moesten doen verteld. Hij was heel behulpzaam en dat maakte het verblijf heel aangenaam. Het appartement was mooi en schoon. Het is van alle gemakken voorzien. Om in het echte stadscentrum te komen  moet je ongeveer een kwartiertje lopen. Ook kun je voor eeb klein bedrag een taxi nemen. Al met al was het een fijne ervaring. We hebben veel van het moois in Sofia kunnen zien. Zeker een aanrader!", "Alloggio ottimo l'appartamento è molto bello pulito accessoriato. Si trova a meno di 10 minuti a piedi dal centro e vicinissimo alla metropolitana . Anri gentilissimo . Consiglio vivamente questo appartamento . Personalmente dovendo ritornare a Sofia sceglierei lo stesso appartamento . Un grande saluto ad Anri . ", "Хубав апартамент и много симпатичен гост.
Bel apartement et hôte très sympathique.
Schöne Wohnung und sehr sympathischer Gastgeber.
Beautiful appartment and very nice guest.", "Es war ein Klasse und günstiger Aufenthalt für eine super Lage in Sofia", "Hezky byt blizko centra, dobre vybaveny s oddelenymi loznicemi, idealni pro rodinu. Vrele doporucuji, citil jsem se jako doma.", "Anri is heel zorgvuldig in zijn communicatie, gedetailleerde uitleg hoe je er moet komen en bereidwillig om je ergens tegemoet te komen wanneer je het niet kan vinden. 
Het appartement is superschoon en zeer ruim. Twee grote slaapkamers met een dubbelbed, kast, bureau en airco. Een keuken met voldoende spullen om zelf te koken, een wasmachine en een grote en kleine badkamer met beiden een toilet. 
Het appartement is goed bereikbaar met openbaar vervoer vanaf het vliegveld. Houdt er rekening mee dat de bus er in de middag rond spits er erg lang over doet, beter kan je dan de metro nemen. Een kaartje kost omgerekend nog geen euro. (Geldt voor alle openbaar vervoer). Metro doet er 13 minuten over. dan hoef je een kleine 5 minuten te lopen en proef je de eerste sfeer van de stad. 
Vanaf het appartement is alles beloopbaar, er zijn restaurantjes en genoeg winkels in de buurt, avondwinkels maar ook supermarkten (borden Billa of DK) die tot 2200 open zijn. Veel kroegjes en vriendelijke mensen. Het appartement van Anri wil ik zeker aanbevelen. ", "Anri ha sido un anfitrión fantástico. Nos recibió en la casa siendo flexible con el horario y nos aconsejó varias cosas para nuestra visita en Sofía. El piso es muy agradable, limpio y espacioso. Además tiene vistas a la montaña nevada de Vitosha. 
Sin duda recomendamos esta estancia y volveremos :). 
Muchas gracias Anri", "Es un 10", "Anri molto gentile e disponibile. ..appartamento molto grande e bello!!! Vicino a centro negozi e ristoranti...lo consiglio", "Ruim en licht appartement, met balkon waardoor je in de middag nog van het zonnetje kan genieten. Er zijn veel winkeltjes en verschillende restaurants in de directe omgeving. Het appartement ligt in een autoluwe rustige straat, al hoor je op de achtergrond wel de grotere weg een stukje verderop.  Maar dit heeft ons (vooral mij, ik ben nogal gevoelig voor geluiden) niet gestoord. Vanuit het appartement kun je lopend het centrum van de stad goed verkennen. Ook is het appartement vanaf het vliegveld heel gemakkelijk te bereiken met de metro (ongeveer 7 minuutjes lopen vanaf het metrostation). Als je iets sfeervoller wil dan een hotelkamer en meer voorzieningen; zoals een eigen keuken met een goed koffie zetapparaat, wijnglazen enzovoorts dan is dit appartement zeker aan te raden. ", "Siamo rimaste piacevolmente sorprese. L'appartamento è molto bello, colorato e ben arredato. Situato in un condominio tranquillo ma allo stesso tempo vicinissimo(2minuti a piedi) alle fermate dei mezzi pubblici che vanno in tutte le direzioni. A 10minuti di passeggiata tranquilla dal centro. Il padrone di casa è stato molto gentile e disponibile. Consigliatissimo."]

reviews:
["I spent a few nights here with my fiancee.

The apartment was much better than expected. Clean, tidy, and with everything you need, the apartment was like a home away from home.

The location is excellent with a Lidl and McDonald's nearby. The main city center is only a few minutes walk away too.

The customer service provided by our host Lily was of the highest caliber.

We highly recommend staying at this fantastic apartment!", "Spot on location.", "Great apartment, comfortable bed, excellent location! Lily was very communicative and provided extra tips as well. I highly recommend it!", "Good location. Nice views (very bright). The check-in is very simple. The hostess is really friendly and cares so much that the stay is the best possible", "Exactly as described, fantastic location in the heart of the historical part of the city 2 minutes to the mosque, synagogue and church and 5 minutes from the palace of justice which is where the free Sofia tour of the city starts which is a must for your first time in the city. 

As other reviews have said you can hear the trams so if you are very sensitive to noise then maybe this apartment is not for you, however we found no problems with this and after the first night it just became background noise.

Check in was easy, you get the code to a locked box and clear instructions, there is a lift up to the apartment. The apartment is exceptionally clean and light and there is air con and heating if required. The kitchen has plenty of crockery and some basic kitchen essentials such as salt, and other spices should you wish to cook. The bathroom is perfect, the shower is really hot and powerful and the double bed is super comfortable. 

The apartment really made our stay in Sofia super comfortable and easy, the city is amazing and we cannot wait to return we would most definitely stay in this apartment again.", "You cannot ask for a better location to explore Sofia. The apartment was spotless, with all that you could ask for. Lily was a gracious host, and was very quick with her responses. I would stay here again!", "Amazing location! Everything’s well-prepared. This is my friend’s first Airbnb experience and she did enjoy it so much. If you’re not someone who’s sensitive with the noice, this is definitely the best choice for you in Sofia.", "Cvety's apartment was perfect; it has everything you could need and within a short walking distance of everything in Sofia. We didn't actually meet Cvety but Lily was a very welcoming host and replied to any questions we had straight away. I definitely recommend the apartment and will stay again in the future!", "Great location, very central but you can hear the sound of the trams in the apartment. The directions for checking in were very good. Quick replies on our messages. We had a very nice stay in this apartment!", "Me and my family spent some days in Sofia and the experience was great. 

Apartment located in the center, it is easy to achieve wherever you are. We could enjoy the aparment, which is big enough, confortable and plenty of light. Just sometimes a bit noisy because of the tram. 

Besides it was always easy to comunicate with the host, from who we have received always quick answers and advises.

Thank you Cvety (Lily) for making us easier our stage in Sofia. Totally recomended your apartment for discovering the city. 

Best regards,

Alejandro.", "Great location. All is walking distance. Spacious apartment and drinking water from the hot springs!!", "This apartment is in a brand new building, very cozy, clean, spacious with a well-equipped kitchen. Free parking was in the street outside on the weekend which was perfect for us.
There is a big supermarket nearby (Lidl, 50 meters) and good places to eat (Happy Grill, 400 meters).
The sofa is really great and can be open to a bed (even two!), It was perfect to watch TV as well. 
We had everything in the apartment and everything is like new, and there is a great view on the area.
We are definitely reccommend this apartment for everyone! :)", "First off, the location is as good as it gets. It can be a little noisy as a result (right next to the tram line), but the apartment is in the middle of everything.

The apartment is well furnished and the bed is comfortable; however, there is no AC in the bedroom so I stayed in the living room on the sofa bed for the duration of my stay.

Other perks...I loved the coffee maker, washer, and balcony to watch the sunset! 

Lastly, Lily and Cvety are unbelievably responsive to messages. I asked several questions across my stay and they were all answered within 5-10 minutes. 

All in all a great stay - thank you!", "The apartment is placed in the middle of Sofia, near the most important monuments to visit.
Lily, the person who managed the apartment is so friendly. She gave us the instructions to get to the apartment from the airport. She instantly replies the emails and looked after us during our stay.
100 % recommended", "I’ve reviewed this property before. Lily is a great host and the apartment is fantastic: clean, great location, great communication and an overall wonderful experience. ", "This apartment is great! A sizable one bedroom, it is in easy walking distance of all the downtown attractions in a very nice and safe neighborhood. Lily, co-manager of the property, was very quick and considerate with communication.  The apartment gets a lot of light and has a great view of the Sofia City  Museum, Banya Bashi Mosque and the Central Market. Serdica Subway is tight next door for easY access to mass transit and Vitosha Street is only a short walk away. There’s even free mineral water available from the hot springs down the block (a pitcher of which awaits you in the apartment). 

As it turns out, I’ll be passing back through Sofia in the near future, and I’ve already booked this place again. I had a very positive experience, and I’m sure you’ll have one too. ", "great appartment, amazing location, equiped with everything you need, 5th flor with an elivator great view, very recommended ", "What you see is what you get! Nice apartment that’s pretty close to everything you’d wanna see in Sofia. Only interacted with lily while I was there, she was super helpful and kind to me, helping me find a place to mail a package back home. Would totally stay here again!", "Great location for the price.", "This is a corner apartment, with AC, good for nonsmokers, in an unbeatable location.  You hardly needed to go out to see the sights: south view = looking south along the city’s main drag, including the mosque and one of the orthodox cathedrals.  West view = the synagogue. Stepping out the door, the free hot mineral spring water of Sofia is 30 to 60 seconds to the left and the ruins of Serdika and the central subway station are just beyond the mosque. Alexander Nevsky Cathedral is an easy walk to the east.  

This is a very nice, comfortable, roomy apartment with a good kitchen, washing machine and drying rack, fan, and queen bed.  Excellent WiFi.  A better than average number of TV channels in English.  Thoughtful furnishings; we had everything we needed.", "Great location. Very nice and convenient place. Great comunication.", "Communication was great and the apartment was perfectly located -walking distance to everything and with a great view. Apartment was clean and well equipped and Lily was super accommodating and enabled us to store our bags on our last day. We would definitely stay here again!", "This place is just great. Location right in the city center, everything was prepared perfectly for our arrival. The communication with Lily was flawless.  I can only recommend this place to everyone who's spending a few days in Sofia! ", "The place was very nice with an amazing view.  It was though quite noisy because of the tramway", "The apartment is spacious, well located and has a nice atmosphere. The beds are comfortable and the view is marvelous. The coffeemachine (fresh beans!) is a plus .;-) ", "It was great that I recommended the place to my father. He loved it. If I am going in the summer to Sofia I will definitely book there.", "A very central flat with all necessary facilities for the week we spent there. Cvety's friend Lily who met us on arrival  looked after us for the week, and was very helpful, spoke excellent English and responded immediately to any query we had. Shops, market, trams, restaurants, tourist sites all on the doorstep or a few minutes away. This is a city centre location so there is some traffic noise, especially from the trams which pass the flat but we soon got used to them.", "The apartment was big and spacious with everything needed. It was good located and with all the main attractions in walking distance", "My mom and me stayed at this apartement for 5 days. The place was just as described. Very comfortable, clean and well located. The view from the windows amazed us as we walked in. At night, that same view is even more beautiful!
I recommend this apartement very much!", "Great apartment in the middle of Sofia. Most activities such as sightseeing, drinks at bar, visiting musea, etc. can be done by foot.
The landlord is very kind, helpful and clear in communication.", "It was absolutely AMAZING! The location, well equipped, clean, so bright, just amazing. Metro station in walking distance (5mins), local market just in front of your doorway. I absolutely recommend this one :) Thank you", "The host(s) are very kind and responded fast! The apartment has an amazing location and got everything you need for a nice weekend sofia.", "It was a great pleasure to  stay at Cvety’s place. It is perfect. It is situated very close to the center, the market..Very lightly, marvelous views, comfortable, clean. And Lily was really nice and kind with us .
Thank you very much", "The place was great, perfect central location, metro station is 200 m away and you have many things to see and there are lots of small restaurants and coffe shops.", "This is a truly amazing place. You are not getting a better view over the centre of Sofia, this is just perfect. Good service of the host, the coffee machine is already filled for you when you arrive! 

Would come here again and definitely stay longer at this home.", "Perfectly located, clean, spacious, reasonably priced, Rado was nice and welcoming. Would recommend the place anytime!", "Great host, awesome apartment. Wholeheartedly recommend.", "Great location, view and place. Extremely well connected. Everything was in walking distance. Host was super nice. Recommended!", "Nice and best place to stay in sofia! It's central and perfect if you want to take care of your self because there is a huge kitchen with all essentials :) would love to stay there again", "A perfect location, a perfect stay and a great host. Scenic from the apartment itself before you even explore Sofia. My family had a super stay. Thanks Rado for the clear and prompt communication!", "Super location, very reasonable, and great communication from host. Highly recommended for your stay in Sofia. Close to all the main attractions in the city centre, and the ancient city of Serdika.", "Radio met my son and I at the airport and took us back to the apartment.
On the way back Rado gave us some information on places of interest and recommended the Free Sofia Tour that turned out to be very beneficial. The apartment was in a good location to visit the main landmarks, the apartment itself was very clean and well appointed and met all of our needs, I would not hesitate to go back again if returning to Sofia.", "The apartment of Rado and Cvety is situated perfectly in the heart of Sophia. Rado was a great host, answered every question that occured really fast and was also flexible. 
The apartment itself offers a great view over the Mosque and also Witosha Mountain, which you can enjoy on the comfortable windowbank. It‘s furthermore equiped with everything you need for your daily life. 
We totally recommend staying at their place!", "Great accomendation! Nice and clean flat, beatiful view and close to everything in the city. The host host very friendly and service minded and made us feel very welcome in Sofia. Highly recomended!", "Great location and clean and tidy apartment. Perfect for a short stay to explore Sofia. Rado was super friendly and helpful, showed us the apartment and gave us a guide on what things to do in Sofia. Would stay again! :)", "it is a really nice place in the center of sofia. the public transport is next to the door and brings you everywhere if you don’t feel like walking. everything you need is in or near the apartment", "We (4 friends) stayed at the appartment for our weekend trip to Sofia in October 2017. The appartment was perfect and Rado organized everything to perfection. He waited for us outside the appartment because we walked around as lost lambs, and then helped with all our questions. Appartment is stylish, clean and has an amazing view to Banya Bashi mosque and museum of history. Main metro station is just a short walk away, which came in very handy. Nice little touch in the appartment was a little tourist board with all important info and also a coffee machine, including milk in the fridge. Really good bargin for the price - we definitely recommend!", "I have been 4 times in Sofia, this apartment has been from far the best.", "I very much recommend this beautiful apartment. Location is perfect and there is a lovely view out over the mosque, mount vistosha and fountains in the square from the living room. Lots of information available to help you find your way in Sofia. Apartment was very clean and meeting Rado was easy for checking in. Beds were comfortable and lovely but the bedroom is a little noisy - tram runs right outside so earplugs are needed if you are sensitive to noise in your sleep. Location is great - walking distance from all the main tourist sights. Bathroom was good and wifi had a strong fast signal. All good, thanks for a great welcome to Bulgaria.", "The view from this apartment is amazing!  New & clean.  Coffee maker was a bonus!  The guy helping with check in was efficient & available for questions.  This place is a gem!", "Central location, supermarket downstairs. Fast and stable Wifi. Friendly host, great communication. Would stay again!", "The apartment is in the Old Town and on a steep cobbled hill so not suitable for people with mobility problems. That said it comprised of part of the top floor of an old house and is very large with a double bedroom and a smaller single bedroom. There is a balcony with a view over the city, ideal for sipping wine in the evening and also a large lounge and well equipped kitchen.

The host's mum, Yoni, picked us up and dropped us at the bus station, and there was some food and water in the fridge including fresh fruit which was a nice touch. There is a small shop close by but the larger supermarket (CVA) is about a 15 minute walk though there is a bus. There a lots of restaurants and bars close by as well. 

All the main tourist sites are within easy walking distance but buses are frequent to all parts of the city and the outlying countryside. 

We really enjoyed our stay and highly recommend this apartment for a short stay in a beautiful and interesting city.", "The flat is in the middle of the city, right as promised, very close to EVERYTHING and very easy to get to and find. 
The flat is well organized and equiped, and the owners were lovley. Deffently a flat to stay in if youre going on a trip to sofia.", "One of the best Airbnb places that I have stayed in...this place is worth every penny. The location is right in the middle of all the main attractions including the famous Vitosha street...There is the local food market too right outside the apartment so you don't have to worry about waking up hungry and searching for food. The apartment itself is so tastefully done up. And the view is simply spectacular! The church, mosque and synagogue are all visible from the apartment. It was a beautiful site to wake up to such view. I didn't meet Cvety but Rado helped us with local information and all our doubts. It was a great pleasure staying in this lovely apartment and this beautiful city of Sofia.", "Ideally located, this is perfect for a short stay. I highly recommnd this place.", "Very good location and good communication. Polite peple.", "Very central flat very well equiped and super clean. The view on the mosk and the market is awesome. We were kindly welcomed by Rado who was always helpful and available at anytime. We highly recommend Cvety's place with a minor comment concerning the noise of the traffic. But the flat is a nice place to be for a pleasant stay in Sofia.", "This beautiful apartment is located at city center with a fantastic view. We enjoyed the spectacular scenery every day...... already miss it. ", "Everything worked easily and the apartment was great. Perfect location! Definitely recommend for everyone!", "I'm hosted by the co-host, Rado and he us really friendly. Prompt reply, and we felt so welcomed. The host was really flexible and allowed us to leave our bag in the home earlier even though the check in time is 3pm. The house is in the central, and was exactly the same as the photos. I will definitely stay in his house again if I'm revisiting sofia in the future.", "Cvety's apartment is spacious, comfortable, clean and has beautiful views of the city.  It's in a perfect location - a quick walk to all of the sights and close to many restaurants, cafes and shops.  Check in and check out were easy and Rado was always available if we had questions.  I highly recommend staying here. ", "My boyfriend & I had a great stay at this apartment. It was everything we were expecting- great location & well-equipped with kitchen/bathroom necessities. Easy 15min walk or 1stop on the metro from the bus/train station. 

The apartment overlooks the city centre which is beautiful to see in the morning & evening. 

We were also easily able to extend our stay an extra night as we weren't quite ready to leave!

Definitely recommend this place & would stay here again. 



", "The apartment is very nice and comfortable, in a very central position. The main   attractions of the city can be easily reached walking. We have not met Cvety, but Rado was our contact and the communication with him was easy and quick. He arranged also a private transfer from and to the airport for us. We do really recommend the location! ", "Couldn't have asked for more from this ideal centrally located apartment. The owners made our stay very welcome, always on hand to answer any questions and picked us up/dropped us off at the airport for a very reasonable price. Would definitely stay here again next time in Sofia. ", "Great place and very central! Rado was a fantastic host and helped us with lots of tips regarding Sofia!", "The apartment has a great location right in the city center. Rado picked us up at the airport and provided us with all the basic information we needed. We did not meet Cvety during our stay. The apartment has everything we needed and I would recommend staying there :) ", "Cvety and Rado were great hosts and were very good at communicating with us during our trip. They arranged a private pick up for us from the airport even though we arrived late and provided us with a good range of recommendations around Sofia. The apartment was spacious and very clean and had a comfortable living area with satellite TV. The location was brilliant and we were only a short walk away from the main streets and sights. We really enjoyed our stay and next time we are in Sofia we will certainly stay here again. ", "Cverty & Rado are the perfect hosts.  Rado met us at the airport and provided direct check-in, along with plenty of information on the city.  He has perfect English and is very friendly.  Cverty provided us with a very comprehensive guide to the city, it's history and it's attractions.  

The apartment is perfectly located, safe city zone for a couple, restaurants and attractions all within a 3 minute walk.  Public transport, the metro station and tram stop is right outside the apartment ( but to note, taxi's are extremely cheap in Sophia).  

The apartment is very clean and modern.  The twin beds have mattress toppers which makes them extremely comfortable and the shower is lovely and in a wet-room.  

The view from this apartment is breath-taking with a full wall of windows facing the city.  It has air-conditioning and a flat screen tv, the sitting room couch is an L-shape which can be moved to form another bed and is very comfortable.

I highly recommend Rado for a meet and greet at the airport as this makes the beginning a pleasure and totally stress free.

All round, this apartment gets a five star review.
", "Very good experience with Cvety and the co-host Rado. The flat is just perfectly placed, Cvety and Rado are available for all kinds of information and arrangement. Helpful people and great flat :)

", "The host canceled this reservation 31 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.", "At first we hesitated little bit since there was no review. However, location and the house was simply perfect. You can walk anywhere in the center. Plus Cvety and Rodi were very friendly. 10/10 

House was clean, tidy and new. Area is pretty safe and there is a paid parking area 2 mins away the house.", ".", "Wir haben 4 Tage in der Wohnung von Cvety verbracht, die Wohnung war sauber und wie auf den Fotos, die Aussicht und die Lage sind einzigartig. Kommunikation mit Rado war auch super.", "Perfect centraal gelegen, met mooi uitzicht op oa de Markthal, het oude badhuis (thans museum) en een parkje. Op een paar minuten lopen van een Lidl én een openbare warmwaterbron waar je d.m.v. fonteintjes gratis drinkbaar mineraalwater kunt tappen. Ook het hoofd metrostation Serdica ligt vlakbij. 
Communicatie met Lili gaat razendsnel en is zeer sympathiek. Inrichting van het appartement is zeer compleet, zelfs een strijkijzer, tostiijzer, waterkoker en allerlei toiletspullen ontbraken niet. Een toplocatie in Sofia!", "Sono stata a Sofia 4 giorni per un viaggio di piacere e l’alloggio di Cvety è stato super! Ci ha accolte Lily che ha spiegato tutto alla perfezione ed è sempre stata disponibile nei giorni successivi per qualsiasi informazione. 
La casa è in una posizione centrale,a 5 minuti a piedi dalla metropolitana e dal centro; ben servita anche dal tram. Intorno c’è tutto:il mercato coperto,il supermercato e alcuni localini per fare aperitivo. 
Insomma tutto ha superato le mie aspettative! Grazie!! ;)", "heerlijke woning' licht en ruim met een prachtig uitzicht.alle bezienswaardigheden nabij.", "El mejor alojamiento para disfrutar de Sofía, lily es una maravilla de persona, siempre intentando ayudar. Sin dudas lo recomiendo a todo el mundo.", "Mi sono trovato molto bene nell appartamento di Cvety, la comunicazione è stata semplice e l host è stato sempre disponibile a rispondere alle mie domande, la casa è molto grande, luminosa e confortevole. la posizione è molto comoda in quanto vicina a tutti i luoghi di interessa e vicinissima alla metro Serdika che incrocia le due linee metro di Sofia. ", "Emplacement idéal et vue splendide sur mosquée, synagogue, églises,... Appartement très bien arrangé et très lumineux. Hôtesse très sympathique, parlant très bien l'anglais. ", "El apartamento esta super centrico, permitiendote ir andando a todas las ubicaciones de interes. Se ajusta al contenido del anuncio, con todo lo necesario para hacer agradable la estancia.", "Inmejorable ubicación, impresionantes vistas, muy bien equipado y un 10 para Lily", "Wunderschönes Apartment mit großartigem Ausblick.", "Apartamento bien situado en el centro, ideal para 4 personas,  vistas muy Bellas hacia la plaza y la mezquita.", "Todo perfecto! Totalmente recomendable. Buena situación, limpieza genial contestaciones rápidas y ayuda en todo lo necesario. :)", "Ik ben met 2 vriendinnen naar Sofia vertrokken op citytrip.
Ons verblijf in Cvety haar appartement was PERFECT!
Ons contact was steeds met Lily, via (Hidden by Airbnb) . Zij antwoordde snel op berichten en gaf ons enkele leuke tips om zeker te bezoeken. 
We hebben snel zelf ingecheckt via de beschrijving die we hadden gekregen. Alles wat vooraf was afgesproken was ook in orde, het 3de bed en extra handdoeken waren geregeld. 
Deze plaats is zeker aan te raden.", "Een heel fijn licht appartement middenin het centrum van Sofia. Er is een verse-bonenkoffie machine aanwezig wat de ochtenden nóg prettiger maakt. Op loopafstand van bijna alle bezienswaardigheden en vanaf het vliegtuig met de metro gemakkelijk bereikbaar. Heldere en snelle communicatie. 's Avonds zijn de verlichte gebouwen (het national museum of history, de moskee, de markthal en de synagoge) prachtig te zien vanuit het appartement. Echt een aanrader!", "ringrazio rado per la sua gentilezza ed ospitalità,la casa era perfettamente pulita e dotata di ogni conforts,anche la macchinetta per il caffè espresso con la miscela.vista strepitosa sulla città e in posizione ottimale per raggiungere tutti i luoghi di interesse. Zona servita benissimo. Consiglio di prenotare questa casa che io sceglierei se tornassi a Sofia", "Εξαιρετική τοποθεσία, δίπλα σε όλα τα σημαντικά αξιοθέατα με τα πόδια. Όμορφος χώρος, καθαρός και παρείχε ότι χρειαζόμασταν. Φιλοξενεί εύκολα 4 άτομα. Άψογη επικοινωνία με τον οικοδεσπότη σε οτι χρειαστήκαμε.", "Piacevolissimo soggiorno nel centro di Sofia,a pochi passi da tutte le principali vie e luoghi di interesse. Appartamento nuovo, ben arredato e dotato di ogni confort ( compresa lavatrice e lavastoviglie ) . Molto comodo anche il servizio navetta da e per l'aeroporto di Sofia. Grazie per l'ospitalità e per la piacevole accoglienza !!!", "Great Appartement", "La casa no puede estar mas céntrica, tiene todo a dos pasos: mezquita, sinagoga, iglesias, los edificios nacionales, el mercado, el boulevard Vitosha, el tte. público...  
Las vistas por la ventana son espectaculares, tal cual se puede ver en las fotos. Está recién reformado, con todo lo necesario para alojarse. Lo recomiendo al 100%", "We hebben hier een heel fijn weekend gehad. Het appartement is netjes en van alles voorzien. De bedden sliepen heerlijk. Er was zelfs zonnebrand aanwezig, hoe fijn voor de felle zon.

Zeker een aanrader en alles is op loopafstand!", "Die Lage des Appartments war super. Man ist direkt bei der Metro und bei der Straßenbahn. Lidl ist auch gleich um die Ecke. 
Shoppingmöglichkeiten sind leicht zu Fuß oder innerhalb 5-10 Minuten mit dem Taxi zu erreichen.", "Merci beaucoup pour ce séjour, L'appartement est très bien situé dans le centre de Sofia, il est très propre et accueillant, le quartier est vivant et il est très agréables, aucune nuisance est à signaler, le service aller/retour aéroport avec un supplément est très appréciable.
Si nous revenons à Sofia nous passerons forcément par vous.
"]

reviews:
["My stay at Vladislava’s place was more than perfect- from the quick communication between each other to the accuracy of the information in the profile. Not to mention the location (top center!!) - everything reachable in no more than 5 minutes walk. You can’t find such nice place to stay for that small amount of money in Sofia! Definitely recommend!:)", "A really nice place for 1 or two persons. Everything is very clean and well done. the street is calm and not far to the center (10min by foot).  i don't have any bad critics things are like in the profils or ... better.
A really good price for the quality.

About Vladislava, she is very nice and very listening. She also do many little touches in the room. She answer fastly to mails.", "It’s a really nice and cosy studio with the best price/ quality ratio I’ve ever had via Airbnb. Location is superb with a real eye for detail and super clean. Vladislava was very helpful and a really good and fast communicator. All in all a place I would highly recommend!", "Awesome! Highly recommended!", "It was a great stay.
The space was clean, and the house was close to the center.
Vladislava always answer quicly to our mensages and was always available and ready to help us.", "The room is soo cozy and clean!! It has everything (and more) you need and has a lovely style. Vladislava is a very nice, helpful host. I recommend this place 100% and would defenitley stay here again.", "The studio is cozy and comfortable for staying 2 or 3 days, with convenient location and an incredible host. Totally would recommend.", "Very centrally located, very close to the metro. Room has everything you need, with small bathroom for exclusive use by guests next to it. Very fast internet connection. Would definitely return if travelling to Sofia again.", "We really enjoyed our stay at Vladislava's place. We arrived earlier than the check-in time and she really tried to help us with a solution of leaving our bags next door, at her own place. She responds very quickly to messages. The room was not too big, but included everything you need for a pleasant stay. The bed was very comfy, there's a 2nd mattress on top so it doesn't feel like a sofa bed. We really recommend this place!", "Great place to stay in Sofia, close to public transport and a short walk to breakfast cafés and sights like the Alexander Nevsky cathedral. The only inconvenience we found was the lack of a wiper of some kind to make the floor dry again after showering. The bathroom is quite small and there is no separate shower cabin, so the water went all over the floor. Vladislava was very hospitable and made our stay a very pleasant one.", "Vladislava's place is very cosy and elegant at the same time. You can reach all sights on foot as this apartment is close to the main streets of Sofia. Vladislava was very kind and left us some coffee and snacks. We were happy about everything.", "We had an amazing stay at Vladislava’s studio! The place is really stylish and has all you need (actually more than that) for both short or long stay. Everything is functional and doesn’t feel small at all - it’s actually cute and convenient, and of course sparkling clean!
It’s located in a central, but very quiet area, which is only a couple of minutes walk from a subway station and Oborishte Str. where you can find many nice places to eat and drink. We took the metro from the airport and went off at Serdika from where we decided to take a 10-min walk to the studio, passing by some of Sofia’s famous sights. 
Vladislava as a host was just great - the communication was always smooth, the check-in was quick and friendly, even though our flight was delayed by more than 2 hours and we arrived late in the evening. She knows her city well and can help you with some good advices where to go.
Overall we really enjoyed our stay and will definitely book the same studio when visiting Sofia again!", "It's great staying at Vladislava sweet apartment. Communication, check in and everything else very easy and uncomplicated. Close to public and transportion. I would definitely come back for another stay in Sofia. Vladislava is very helpful! Thanks again!", "We enjoyed our stay very much, even if we have not met in person we felt very welcome and everything was we’ll explained by vladislava.", "Small place in a great location. If you come for business or travel you really don't need more", "Vladislava’s place is a wonderful base for exploring Sofia! The apartment is small but extremely functional and full of nice touches to make your stay easier. The bed was super comfy, everything was exceptionally clean, and the value for what you get is great. Vladislava was very communicative and helpful. I would highly recommend staying here!", "This is a true Airbnb gem! Centrally located but on a nice quiet street. Super prompt responses and lovely friendly check in with the hosts husband. It is bigger than we expected and really well decorated and so well equipped with fridge, coffee machine, kettle even knives and a chopping board and more! Great for a weekend stay.", "After my second stay at Vladislava`s place I would say again this is very a cosy studio and it`s a great value for the money with location in the hub of Sofia :)", "great little Apartment near central Sofia. everything was clean and you find everything you need in the surroundings. We recommend this Apartment to anyone. even a really late Check in by night was no Problem at all. 
vladislava is a great host and helps you fast with any Problems you Have. keep up the good Work :-) Thank you again we Had a great time.", "Was a pleasure to be the first guest at the House with the Roses and stay at this lovely flat. It was serene, comfortable, and cozy. Vladislava is very friendly and helpful host :)", "Appartement parfait pour passer quelques jours à sofia. Proche du centre, propre et mignon. On s'y sent bien. Vladislava a été disponible et attentionnée.
Recommandé vivement !!!", "Ótima localização. Ótimas instalações. Atendimento personalizado. Local muito limpo, bem cuidado, ótimo chuveiro. Bairro silencioso. Ótimo preço!!! Indico para familiares e amigos.", "Alojamiento perfecto. Muy bien ubicado, limpio y con anfitriona super atenta. Volveremos!", "Шикарное место размещения для двоих путешественников. Жаль, что такие варианты встречаются не часто.", "Excelente apartamento para 2 pessoas. Apesar de pequeno, o ambiente é cuidadosamente preparado pela anfitriã, com muitas comodidades, por exemplo toalhas e roupa de cama de primeiro nível. Wi fi excelente, o melhor que já tivemos.
A anfitriã está sempre à disposição para ajudar com dicas de todo tipo, uma pessoa muito legal."]
