reviews:
["Very stylish and clean apartment.", "This is a nice house, modern. Very much like the facilitated system of arrival and departure, without the participation of the host, at a convenient time. Thank you.", "Very nice place, easy communication with the hosts", "Modern interior, good location, fast check in, I will use this apartment for my next trip. I recommend that place", "I stayed in Martin and Dasha's place for second time and all was perfect except the heating which was not working when we arrived.", "I find Martin and Dasha's place cozier and more pleasant , than I expected. The location is perfect ,really close to  a metro station and the Mall of Sofia too.  The host was very helpful and gave us quick answers to all of our questions. I have no hesitation in recommending  the place to each person looking for relaxing stay in Sofia . I surely would stay there next time I visit the town.", "Had a wonderful stay, the place is outstanding. Martin and Dasha were perfect. Can’t recommend this place enough", "Amazing place and really accurate description. Highly recommended! Near to city centre and to underground station.", "Spotless apartment, very modern and exactly as the pictures describe. location was excellent and Martin & Dasha were very helpful.", "Apart is so nice we didn't want to leave so soon!", "It's perfect to spend time here. Good location, Clean and Comfortable. I love it!", "The place is absolutely amazing. Looks just like on the photos, has a perfect vibe. Everything are just minutes away.", "Such an amazing apartment! Really great value as well. So convenient that the apartment is very close to the metro so getting there from the airport was so so easy. Martin was also very good with the responses. Thanks for a lovely stay in Sofia! Would 100% recommend.", "A spotlessly clean, stylish space. Thanks for having us!", "Awesome hosts! Great communication. We didn’t make it to Bulgaria as I broke my leg cycling on the day of our flights! Will be visiting in the future for sure.", "The apartment was centrally located ", "Great place and helpful host. We had troubles when we arrived with the key and Martin sent someone in less than 5 minutes to help us. The place is close to everything and there is a mall and supermarket near by. We enjoyed our stay there and the parking is very useful.", "Lovely place. Very close to a large mall with shops and restaurants. Maybe a bit far to walk for some people but taxis are very cheap in Sofia.

The decor is contemporary and stylish as seen from pictures, it's a very comfortable apartment!

Maybe the only bad thing was that there could have been more towels, but that's the only has thing I could say!", "Everything was perfect except that apartment was not clean ", "The apartment is in a great location, with a nice balcony. Checkin instructions were clear. The parking space was helpful as we rented a car too. Would recommend!", "A nice space as you can see in pictures. Short walk to subway. 1 Stop to Vitosha but also walking to Vitosha is only 10 minutes with many shops on the way. ", "This is a great apartment - modern furnishings, a quiet neighborhood, and even a small balcony where you can have a coffee.  Check-in and check-out were a breeze.  Just note that it's a short walk into town-  between 15-30 minutes depending on your destination.  It's right next to a metro stop (tickets cost $1) which helps you get around, and also close to a mall.  The neighborhood gives it a much more local feel, which is nice-  check out the restaurant Kontesa in the nearby park for an authentic Sofia dining experience.", "Martin was a wonderful host. The place is very cozy, clean and stylish, great location. I felt like home. Check in/out instruction was very clear and easy. Prompt communication. Interior design and home setting is highlight. Martin allowed me early check in and late check out. Thanks again Martin for everything.", "Great apartment for visiting Sofia. Close walk to everything. Very modern and feels like new.", "Very modern apartment and 1 metro station to the center of Sofia. Self check-in was very convenient. And having private parking space is an additional bonus. I would love to stay here in my future travels to Sofia!", "Very subtle place..i highly recommend it", "toll.", "Really Nice appartement. Very good communication and good advice for local activities.", "This apartment is exactly like the pictures and description. It's a spacious main living area with super comfy corner sofa. We loved the location as it's about a 20 minute walk to the centre with plenty of shops and bars along the way. Nice powerful shower and functional kitchen. We've stayed in several Air B&B homes and this was one of the best.", "This apartment is incredible !!! Such a beautiful place to stay.", "Perfect apartment , outstanding design , really big and comfortable 
Very central , nice location cause the small distance you need to do for public transport and mall 
Very good communication with the hosts 
A place that’ll make you love Sofia", "Stylish, superb place with everything you could possibly need in an appartment, I enjoyed it 100%. Location walking distance to center, subway close by, a shopping mall also, super easy self check in and check out, practical and safe garage... I cannot think of anything to add at this price point, and well beyond it, just fantastic...", "The appartement is amazing and located even better than we expected. Sofia is a beautiful city and martin and dasha helped out a lot with a list of hotspots. We would definitely recommend this appartement!", "Good ", "We loved it!", "Best airbnb in the town :).", "Excellent place. All good.", "My second stay in Martin's appartment and I still love this place. Perfect location, amazing space to chill and relax. Ill keep visiting in the future. :)", "Martin and Dasha's apartment is lovely and near to the centre of town which was very convenient", "Amazing spacious place, really nice location. Martin was extremely helpful during my stay he even let me check in earlier. I loved my chilling nights with Netflix at the coach. Over all really happy with my stay. Definitely coming back. :)", "The place was super nice. Clean and modern. My wife loved it.", "The apartment has a great location, just a few minutes within walking distance of the metro station. We are traveling by car and Martin and Dasha’s place has its own private garage which was very convenient for us. The check-in instructions were very detailed and made the process very easy (very important for us since we arrive late at on a very cold night).
On our last night, watched the snow fall from the balcony and the big windows, a fun way to end our stay in Sofia.", "A very stylish and clean place, close enough to metro station so great spot to explore the city :)", "Perfect designed and comfortable apartment. 2 steps from metro station and the Main Street from Sofia Vitoshka. Perfekt for a city trip", "Great apartment, metro station just round the corner, Billa and Lidl few minutes away, also Mall of Sofia. Our stay was during the winter, so it was nice that the apartment has smart TV that supports Netflix for the cold evenings :).", "Martin met us at the apartment promptly and showed us inside. He was very friendly and this helped us to settle in straight away. He gave us tips about the surrounding area and how to get to the city centre so it was easy for us to head straight out and explore Sofia!

There is a large supermarket five min walk from the apartment and the metro is only a two min walk! One stop on the metro takes you straight to the city centre or it’s a 15/20min walk which we often did.  The flat was modern, clean and well equipped, couldn’t of asked for a nice place for our stay! There is a lovely little balcony too. 

Overall I wpuld highly recommend Martin & Dasha as hosts as they were so accommodating, always fast to respond and let us check out late:)

Thankyou for letting us stay in your lovely apartment! Fran & Robyn", "The appartment was really nice. It was clean, stylish and had a good location. Martin and Dasha were nice and the communication was good and fast. We got great tips for where to go and those places were all very nice. Thank you for the nice and warm stay!", "The place is absolutely amazing. Very clean, cozy and stylish. Outstanding host, great location, great value! I would recommend to anyone!", "Its a nice place and the communication aswell as the check-in were easy.
We just wished the place was cleaner -especially the fridge.", "Awesome place !", "The place is really spacious, bright, clean and really stylish! It is a minute away from a metro station, close to a mall and is located in the wide center of the city. The hosts gave me great directions and instructions for check in and check out. When checking out , the hosts even let me stay in the apartment for a little longer than 12 o'clock. Thanks for the lovely stay. Hoping there are more to come!", "Martin and Dasha's apartment is very modern and clean with a really nice interior. It's located only 3 minutes walking distance from metro station Opalchenska from where you can easily go through the city. But also walking to Vitosha boulevard ( mainstreet with shops and restaurants) is only 10 minutes from the appartment. Martin was very helpful and replies quickly when you have a question. I would definitely recommend people to stay here.  
", "Lovely hosts, lovely apartment just like the pics, amazing location, amazing value!!", "The apartment is big and centric. 
We had issues with the hot water but Martin offered us to use a small boiler inside the laundry room.
When we arrive the house was not very clean(there was hair in the kitchen and bathrooom, towels)..
Btw we cannot find the coffee maker and the toilet paper was missing ):", "Martin's and Dasha apartment was amazing.
Perfect location, very clean and gorgeous.
Soon I'm coming to BG again and I will definitely choose to stay in this apartment.
Thank you very much guys.
Zlata and Krasimir", "Martin and Dasha have a new modern and spacious apartment. We enjoyed the location as it was about a 20 minute walk to the city centre or one metro stop. A large Billa supermarket is about 5 minutes walk and a Lidl about 10 minutes. The apartment was very quiet for sleeping with windows closed.
It is a short 10 minute taxi ride to the Central Train Station. It had the basic equipment needed for self catering. We were disappointed not to have any English channels on TV (although Martin said it was a problem with the provider).
Martin was an excellent communicator prior to and during our stay and our arrival was very smooth.
We enjoyed our visit to Sofia and Martin and Dasha's apartment made it a relaxing visit.", "Me and my boyfriend stayed at Martin's house for 8 night, at our arrival Martin was home for waiting us, he was so helpfull telling us where are neighborhood's supermarket and metro station. The house has a modern style but not so comfortable for us. We found the kitchen a little bit dirty (there were a pan full of oil in the oven and the dishwasher was full of oil too and smelled so bad) but this is due to clean lady's not so good work. We haven't found any moka or coffe machine for having a coffee for breakfast at home. The house is in a good position, 2 min to the metro and 1 stop to the city center.", "The place was very nice! It had a luxury feeling and you had everything you need. We were welcomed by Boris. He gave us a map and a book with nice places to go. There where towels, sheets, cooking gear, tv, wifi,... and a nice balkony. There is a supermarket close by and the metro entrance is just around the corner. There you can take a metro to the city centre. ", "I highly recommend staying at Marto's apt , it was a very nice and clean apartment and amazingly decorated , close to the Sofia mall , minutes away and to the metro station . The view from the balcony was very nice too . Marto was always there to answer my questions and was very helpful and generous . I definitely would stay there again and again .", "The apartment is perfect, very stylish, excellent design and materials, and very close - just one metro stop - from the central road in Sofia. We enjoyed our stay there and Dasha was a very nice and helped with all the questions we had about Sofia and our stay. Definitely your best choice!!", "Great service, high availability for my every need .
Conveniently located to services , and transporting .", "Отличное современное жилище..) Есть всё необходимое, чтобы комфортно пожить некоторое время + свой гараж. Общительные, доступные хозяева. Прямо рядом метро, магазины, парк и тп. Рекомендую!", "Супер, аппартамент! Чисто, уютно, приятно, все есть для жизни! Шикарный телек) Хозяин, Мартин, готов к общению и все  предоставил. Даже прикопаться не к чему) Удобная локация. Короче все понравилось, будет там постоянно жить!!", "wij hebben een super verblijf gehad! Het is een ruim appartement en voorzien van alle benodigdheden! Zeker een aanrader als je in Sofia verblijft.", "Alles bestens und genau wie geschrieben. Gerne wieder!!!!", "Όλα ήτανε υπέροχα...!!!", "We hebben een super tijd gehad in het appartement, welke zeer dichtbij het centrum ligt. Aanrader voor iedereen!", "Pour un séjour en amoureux, on est resté 2 nuits dans l’appartement de Martin et Dasha. L’immeuble et l’appartement sont vraiment exceptionnels, surtout pour la ville, qui reste assez pauvre. Nous avons beaucoup aimé le logement même si le quartier dans lequel se trouve l’appartement est peu accueillant. Si vous voulez visiter Sofia, vous ne serez pas déçu par. De plus, le rapport qualité-prix est top!", "Alles super,klare Empfehlung!", "Yeni bir apartman. Evin iç dekorasyonu güzel. Güvenli bir otoparkı var. Merkeze yürüme mesafesinde. Kalmanızı tavsiye ederim.", "Très bel appartement. Prestation de qualité. Confortable et propre. Notre hôte s'est avéré être très réactif en cas de questions ou urgences. L'appartement est proche d'une station de métro qui rejoint le centre en 1 connexion. Quelques restaurants à proximité. ", "Bonjour, 
L'appartement est confortable, propre et lumineux. 
Il est bien situé près de toutes les facilités (métro, commerces, centre commercial,...)Les photos correspondant à la réalité. 
Les hôtes sont très présent via la messagerie de l'application. Disponibilité : ok
", "Super Wohnung, klasse Design, meine Ansprüche sind zu 100% und mehr erfüllt worden.  Werde auf jeden fall bei meinem nächsten Aufenthalt versuchen wieder bei Martin und Dasha unterzukommen. Habe mich sehr wohl gefühlt.  Pietro", "Cooles Appartement mit guter Anbindung an Metro und Tram. Wifi ist sehr gut und schnell. Alles ist sehr modern eingerichtet.", "Ένα εξαιρετικό διαμερίσμα 700μ από το κέντρο.στην γωνία υπάρχει μετρό στα 50μ όπου σε μια στάση είσαι στο κέντρο.στα 150μ υπάρχει εμπορικό κέντρο για φαι και ψώνια και casino sta 300μ.το προτείνω ανεπιφύλακτα σε όποιον θέλει να επισκεφθεί την Σόφια.", "Schönes und sauberes Appartment mit zentraler Lage. Auf Martin und Dasha kann man sich verlassen.", "Notre séjour a été vraiment parfait, l'accueil de Martin est très agréable et il a été toujours très réactif concernant nos demandes. L'appartement est très agréable et parfaitement situé.", "Nous n’avons pas rencontré Martin et Dasha durant notre WE mais ces derniers ont été très disponibles et réactifs via la messagerie avant et pendant notre séjour.
Appartement spacieux, design, propre et correctement situé (proche métro).
Nous le recommandons sans hésiter !
Encore merci à tous les deux :)", "Het verblijf was heerlijk!! Het appartement is precies zoals op de foto's en heeft een mooi uitzicht over de stad. In een klein half uurtje lopen ben je in het centrum van Sofia maar je kan ook de metro (letterlijk om de hoek) nemen en in 2 stops sta je ook in het centrum! Maar lopen vonden wij fijner.

De communicatie was enorm goed, het was heel duidelijk waar de sleutel lag etc! Kortom, een geweldig verblijf in Sofia in dit appartement!!", "Appartamento molto bello e pulito.
Vicino alla fermata della metro e a soli 15 minuti a piedi dal centro.
Martin, per qualsiasi dubbio, ha risposto subito ad ogni messaggio.", "Martin y Dasha, estuvieron en continuo contacto con nosotros, nos facilitaron la entrada al apartamento de manera detallada. El apartamento vale cada euro que piden, muy moderno, con todas las comodidades, con garaje privado. Un auténtico lujo en una ciudad increíble.", "Eine sehr schöne und helle Wohnung. Excelentes instrucciones sobre como llegar y entrar por parte de Martin. La ducha de lluvia es un regalo despues de un viaje largo! El balcón el perfecto para tomar una taza de té en la mañana y la Aeropress facilitada por los amfitriones es de lujo!"]

reviews:
["Nice and cozy place, warm and with high ceilings.  We felt comfortable staying in there, and it was in a great spot, with the Daro cafe just 50m down the road for nice breakfasts to start each day. (Also to answer a previous review, there is a fridge, it's just in the hallway since the kitchen is small and has a dishwasher.)", "A really nice place at the heart of Sofia. Close to a lot of historic sights and clubs.", "It’s a wonderful place in the heart of the city. Walking distance to all the public transportation. The venue is just perfect if you want to be close to restaurants, nightlife and shopping area. At the same time it was very quite and private. The apartment was bright, clean and cozy place with everything you need inside! Definitely will be my first choice next time ! Thank you so much for the hospitality and making sure that the stay in Sofia is a pleasant and  meaningful experience!", "Roumi's place was just fantastic! It was sparkling clean, perfect location, very cozy and stylish. Roumi was also quick in answering and very helpful. I would definitely recommend it if you're looking for a nice place to relax and explore the city center!", "Perfect small apartment in the heart of Sofia - everything you need is in walking distance. The apartment itself felt like home, and had everything you might need. Thanks for the hospitality!", "Great stylish place at the very heart of the city centre.", "Roumi is a dream host - easy going, polite and respectful. I don't think I could have chosen a more gracious host, or a better home to stay in! She was so quick to respond and was so helpful. The apartment itself offers everything that you might need during your stay in Sofia. It is located literally in the heart of the city center, less than a minute walk from the main pedestrian boulevard Vitosha. The place was super clean, cozy. Highly recommended apartment and host. Thank you, Roumi for letting us stay in your beautiful home!!!", "Roumi's apartment is great and it is just as advertised. The apartment is very stylish and has a historical, artistic look to it. It is very clean and the location is perfect. 5 to 10 minute walk from most key points in the centre of Sofia.

Roumi and Rosen were very quick to answer any questions I had and even though I didn't meet them in person, they gave a lot of local tips for a newcomer to Sofia.

I would hope to stay here again if I return to Sofia, and would certainly recommend this as a good spot to stay.", "Very good placement near NDK and most attractions of night", "We had a nice stay in Sofia. The apartment is extremly good located. We loved the area with all the restaurants and bars. From the apartment it's easy to walk to everything you need.", "One of my best Airbnb experiences on 3 continents. Pristinely clean and beautifully designed pre-war flat, situated on a quiet but very central location. Super fast internet, which was crucial for my work. 

Instructions how to get in were very accurate, and there was no need to meet the hosts (in case of late arrivals). The only thing - be aware there is no refrigerator in the house. 

The neighbourhood offers scores of restaurants, bars and cool hangouts. 

No issues or problems.", "Nice place in the city center! We had a great stay!", "Awesome place. I loved the self check-in. Very easy and did not have to worry about meeting at an exact hour. The place itself is fantastic. stylish, clean, spacious. Right in the city Center. pretty much anything you'd want to do in Sofia is within a walking distance. NDK Metro station is a 5 min walk. I'm very happy with my stay, thanks!", "I can’t recommend this place enough. The location is perfect. It’s super clean. It’s spacious and felt like my own home during my stay. The location, entrance and building all felt very safe, which is important to me. The host was brilliant. If you’re coming to Sofia - stay here! ", "Great apartment and location. Located on ground floor so easily accessible yet quiet place.", "We stayed for one night in Sofia and chose this apartment because of it’s amazing location. It was  close to everything in the city center. The place itself was clean and lovely. Recommended! ", "The apartment was in a perfect location right downtown in Sofia and walking distance to many attractions. ", "NIce stay. Good option for next visit to sofia", "Perfect place to stay in Sofia. Highly recommended!  ", "The place is fantastic, full of useful optionals and equipment and very clean. I really recommend it.", "Perfect apartment and location with easy access to visit all the major attractions of Sofia. Highly recommended!!! ", "We had a great stay! Thank you!", "Perfect location! The apartment was nicely decorated and very clean! We had a great time!", "The apartment represents good value for money if location is the prime criterion.  The apartment can be noisy and the TV screen is too small, but if you are out and about most of the time the apartment is a good choice.", "Very good apartment. Stylish, central, clean and quiet. If I'd go back to Sofia, I'm pretty sure I'll stay there again :)", "It was all good but the additional fees which will be charged for late arrival...", "Clean apartment on quiet street in central location. Great host and service. Thanks!", "Very central , warm and stylish apartment and building. U feel home immediately and as part of Sofia life. ", "Couldn't be in a better location. 5 minutes walk from all the parks, city center, bars and restaurants. The apartment was really nice and warm and the hosts were very helpful and responsive. I will definitely stay again.", "Great place for short stay.
very central place. tidy but all you need are there.
will be great if can change curtain with dark ones for more privacy.", "Roumi‘s place is situated in a beautiful old building in one of the loveliest streets in Sofia. The Apartment is very comfortable and perfect choice for a perfect stay.", "Very nice small apartment with an excellent location in Sofia. Good bed + good sofa bed, good shower, fridge, coffee machine, good wifi... The communication with the hosts was all quick and correct. Recommended!", "Cute place in good location, easy to walk to main attractions. It was very comfortable and private. Rosen was very good at responding to our questions and messages, for example when there was no detergent and he brought us some!", "Roumi is a perfect houseowner. I stayed almost 1 mounth and I am  very pleasure to stay there. Thanks for everything.", "El apartamento está muy bien ubicado y bastante amplio, muy cómodo en general así que lo recomiendo sin duda", ".", "Perfekt beliggenhed. Perfekt indtjekning. Meget rent. Bliver helt klart dét sted jeg fremover vælger i Sofia.", "El apartamento es muy acogedor y está muy bien ubicado. Los anfitriones muy atentos, reservamos el apartamento con solamente una hora de antelación."]
